a glacier गुफा is a गुफा formed within the ice of a हिमानी.
Glacier caves हैं प्रायः called बर्फ caves, but इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त to describe bedrock गुफाएं that contain year-round ice.
In physics, गोलाकार गति is a गति of an ऑब्जेक्ट साथ the परिधि of a circle or rotation along a circular path.
It can be वर्दी, with निरंतर angular रेट of रोटेशन ( and constant speed ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
the rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional body involves गोलाकार motion of its parts.
the equations of motion describe the गति of the center of mass of a body.
उदाहरण of circular गति शामिल : an कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर height, a stone which is tied to a रस्सी and is being swung in circles, a car turning through a curve in a race track, an electron moving perpendicular to a वर्दी magnetic फ़ील्ड, and a gear turning inside a यांत्रिकी.
चूंकि the ऑब्जेक्ट 's velocity vector is constantly बदलना दिशा, the moving ऑब्जेक्ट is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in the दिशा of the center of rotation.
Without this acceleration, the object would move in a straight line, according to न्यूटन 's कानून of motion.
अपोलो Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World.
he was played by कार्ल weathers.
Creed था अनेक nicknames, including The Master of Disaster, The King of Sting, The Dancing Destroyer, The Prince of Punch, The One and तभी and The Count of मोंटे Fisto.
Urban legend states that अपोलो पंथ 's name is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed, a statement of belief used in Christian churches.
All of अपोलो 's चैंपियनशिप fights were अनुसूचित लिये the 15 गोलाकार distance.
Championship fights did not convert from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
Rocky Balboa is प्रायः wrongly credited with popularizing the red, white, और ब्लू trunks ; पंथ was the first man to wear them ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by टॉमी `` The Machine '' Gunn ( टॉमी मॉरिसन ) in the 5th किश्त ) although normally he wore red and श्वेत, as seen in Rocky II.
Balboa 's signature colors यहूद black and gold—colors he used in the नवीनतम movie.
In the संयुक्त States, the title of संघीय judge usually means a judge नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the United States और पुष्टि by the United राज्य Senate pursuant to the Appointments clause in आलेख II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the परम् Court of the United States, whose existence और some aspects of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार are परे the constitutional शक्ति of Congress to alter, अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have established 13 courts of appeals ( भी called `` circuit न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, और 94 United States ज़िला courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; ऐसे positions include the मुख्य Justice और Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit न्यायाधीशों of the courts of appeals, and district न्यायाधीशों of the United States district न्यायालयों.
All of these judges वर्णित thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article iii judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. संविधान.
in addition, न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of International व्यापार exercise judicial शक्ति pursuant to आलेख iii.
Other judges सेवारत in the federal courts, सहित magistrate judges and bankruptcy न्यायाधीशों, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the Senate, and their power गर्भाशयी from Article I instead.
देखिए आलेख i और Article III tribunals.

Variable Universal जीवन बीमे ( often shortened to VUL ) is a type of life बीमे that builds a cash value.
In a vul, the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of separate खाते, similar to mutual funds, and the चुनाव of which of the उपलब्धियाँ पृथक accounts to उपयोग is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' घटक in the नाम refers to इस क्षमता to invest in पृथक accounts जिनकी values vary—they vary because वे are invested in भण्डार and/or बंध markets.
the 'universal ' घटक in the name refers to the flexibility the owner रै in making premium भुगतान.
the premiums can vary इससे nothing in a given माह up to maximums पारिभाषित by the Internal Revenue Code for जीवन बीमे.
इस लचीलापन is in contrast to whole life बीमे कि has फिक्स्ड प्रीमियम भुगतान that typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( हालांकि one may exercise an Automatic Premium ऋण feature, or आत्मसमर्पण dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable सार्वभौमिक life is a प्रकार of permanent life insurance, because the death लाभ होगा be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the लागत of बीमे in the policy.
With most if not सब VULs, नापसंद whole life, वहीँ is no endowment age ( the age at which the नकदी value बराबरी the death benefit amount, जिससे लिये पूरे जीवन is typically 100 ).
This is yet another कुंजी advantage of vul over Whole जीवन.
With a typical whole जीवन policy, the मौत benefit is limited to the फेस amount specified in the नीति, and at endowment age, the फेस राशि is all that is paid out.
Thus with either death or endowment, the insurance company keeps any cash मान निर्मित up over the सालो.
however, some participating पूरे जीवन policies offer riders which specify that कोई dividends सशुल्क on the policy be used to खरीदें `` सशुल्क up additions '' to the policy which बढ़ाएँ both the नकदी मान and the मौत लाभ over time.
if investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account of the insurance कम्पनी, a उच्चतर rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life.
The combination over the सालो of no endowment age, continually increasing death benefit, and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy, this could परिणाम in higher value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as प्रीमियम.
the outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the classic wood stove adapted लिये set-up outdoors while still transferring the heat to आंतरिक buildings.

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies बेची by लड़की Scouts of the USA ( GSUSA ) as एक of इसके major fundraisers लिये local Scout units.
सदस्यों of the gsusa have महरूम selling cookies चूंकि 1917 to raise funds.
लड़कियों who participate can earn पुरस्कार for उनके efforts.
There are also ईकाई incentives if the unit as a whole does well.
As of 2007, sales were अनुमानित at about 200 लाख बाक्स per साल.
विश्वविद्यालयों Hall
Purdue विश्वविद्यालयों, located in West lafayette, इंडियाना, is the flagship university of the six-campus Purdue University system.
purdue was founded on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant university when the Indiana General सभा, taking लाभ of the Morrill Act, स्वीकृत a donation of land and धन from Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science, technology, and agriculture in his name.
The first classes were held on September 16, 1874, with six instructors and 39 students.
Today, Purdue is a member of the Big टेन Conference, and is a खूब known world-class research institution.
purdue enrolls the दूसरी largest student देह of कोई university in Indiana as खूब as the fourth largest international छात्र population of any university in the संयुक्त States.
purdue offers both undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट programs in over 211 major areas of study, and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula.
the university has भी महरूम अत्यधिक influential in America 's इतिहास of विमानन, having established the first college क्रेडिट offered in flight training, the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation, and the पहला university विमानक्षेत्र ( purdue University Airport ).
purdue 's aviation प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains one of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific programs in the world.
in the mid-20th century, Purdue 's विमानन program विस्तारित to encompass advanced spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving rise to purdue 's उपनाम, पालना of Astronauts.
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including Gus Grissom ( एक of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ), Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the चंद्रमा ), और Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; l72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
क्युकी an epidermoid गाँठ originates in the epidermis and a pilar cyst originates from hair follicles, by definition, neither type of गाँठ is सख्ती a sebaceous cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, श्वेत, semi-solid सामग्री in both of these cyst entities is नहीं sebum, but keratin.
Furthermore, under the सूक्ष्मदर्शी neither entity contains वसामय glands.
In practice, however, the शर्तें are often प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively विरल and हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or, if multiple, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe जूते.
the किनारे of the toe pad, which is inserted between the foot and टो box लिये cushioning, can be seen on the right foot.
A pointe जूता is a type of shoe worn by ballet dancers जब performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have विकसित to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended अवधि of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, हालांकि male नर्तक may wear them लिये अपरंपरागत भूमिकाएँ such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella, Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's Dream, or मेन performing as women in नृत्य companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva.
They are manufactured in a variety of colors, most commonly in shades of light pink.
इस tablespoon रै a capacity of about 15 ml.
Measuring Spoons
in the us और parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a bowl.
In the UK, Europe और सबसे Commonwealth countries, a tablespoon is a प्रकार of large spoon usually used लिये serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a serving spoon, the निकटतम equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the मिठाई spoon or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the क्षमता of one tablespoon, is commonly used as a measure of आवाज़ in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by विधि and is subject to considerable variation.
In the यूएसए one tablespoon ( मापन unit ) is लगभग 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL.
in Australia one tablespoon ( मापन unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry कुम्हार is a series of seven काल्पनिक novels written by the अंग्रेजों author J. K. Rowling.
The किताबे chronicle the adventures of a wizard, Harry Potter, और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली and Hermione ग्रेंजर, all of जिसको are विद्यार्थी at Hogwarts School of चुड़ैल and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort, जिनकी aims are to become immortal, conquer the wizarding world, subjugate non-magical people, और destroy all those who स्टैंड in उसके way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the रिलीज of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone on 30 June 1997, the books have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide.
the series has भी had कुछ share of criticism, including चिंता for the increasingly dark tone.
, the book series रै sold परिचय 450 million copies, making it the best-selling book series in इतिहास, and रै been अनूदित into 67 languages.
The last four books consecutively set records as the fastest-selling books in इतिहास.
A series of many genres, including काल्पनिक and coming of age ( with तत्व of mystery, thriller, adventure, and romance ), it has many cultural meanings and references.
According to Rowling, the प्रमुख theme is मौत.
There are also many other themes in the श्रेणी, ऐसे as पूर्वाग्रह and corruption.
the आरंभिक major प्रकाशक of the books were bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and scholastic Press in the संयुक्त States.
The books have since been published by many प्रकाशक worldwide.
The books, with the seventh book विभाजित into two भाग, have महरूम made into an eight-part फिल्मी series by Warner Bros. Pictures, the highest-grossing फिल्मी श्रेणी of all समय.
The series भी originated much tie-in merchandise, making the Harry कुम्हार brand worth in excess of $ 15 billion.
भी due to the success of the किताबे और films, Harry कुम्हार has been used for a theme पार्क, The Wizarding World of Harry कुम्हार in Universal Parks & रिसॉर्ट 's आइलैंड्स of एडवेंचर.
rs-68 होने tested at NASA 's Stennis Space बीच.
The nearly पारदर्शी exhaust is due to इस इंजन 's exhaust being mostly superheated steam ( water vapor from its propellants, hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking 5c rocket engine
A प्रक्षेपास्त्र engine, or बस `` rocket '', is a jet engine that उपयोग only भंडारित propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive जेट.
प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन are प्रतिक्रिया engines and obtain thrust in accordance साथ Newton 's third law.
Since वे need no बाह्य सामग्री to form उनके जेट, rocket engines can be used for spacecraft propulsion as खूब as terrestrial uses, ऐसे as missiles.
Most rocket engines are internal combustion इंजन, although non-combusting forms also exist.
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities, are by दूर the lightest, but are the least propellant efficient of सब types of जेट engines.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a song by American रिकॉर्डिंग artist Britney Spears.
it परोसा as स्पीयर्स 's डेब्यू single and शीर्षक track इससे her debut studio album,... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ).
Written by Max मार्टिन and produced by Martin and Rami, ``... Baby One More समय '' was released on सितंबर 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
बाद रिकॉर्डिंग and sending a demo टेप with an unused song from toni Braxton, स्पीयर्स signed a multi-album सौदे with jive.
``... baby One अधिक समय '' is a teen pop and dance-pop सोंग that refers to a girl who regrets breaking up with her बॉयफ्रेंड.
The song received generally favorable समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, who praised इसके संयोजन.
``... Baby One More समय '' attained global success, reaching number one in every country it charted.
It भी received numerous certifications around the संसार, and is one of the best-selling singles of all समय, साथ over 10 लाख copies बेची.
An accompanying music वीडियो, निर्देशित by निगेल Dick, portrays Spears as a छात्र from a Catholic high स्कूल, who starts to daydream that she is गायन and dancing around the school, जबकि watching her love interest from afar.
the music वीडियो was later संदर्भित in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), where Spears 's fictional daughter is dressed साथ a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her बाल.
In 2010, the music video for ``... Baby One अधिक Time '' was voted the तीसरा most influential video in the history of pop music, in a poll आयोजित by Jam !.
स्पीयर्स has performed ``... baby One More Time '' in a number of live appearances and in सब of her कॉन्सर्ट tours.
It was the encore of the... Baby One अधिक समय Tour ( 1999 ) and सपना Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स also performed remixed संस्करण of the song during the उफ़ !...
I Did It again World Tour ( 2000 ), The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), The m+m 's दौरे ( 2007 ), The सर्कस Starring britney स्पीयर्स ( 2009 ), और the Femme fatale Tour ( 2011 ).
``... baby एक More समय '' was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance, and रै been शामिल in सूचियाँ by ब्लेंडर, Rolling स्टोन and VH1.
It has been noted लिये redefining the sound of late 1990s म्यूज़िक.
Spears has named ``... Baby One More Time '' as एक of her favorite songs from her career.
it थी also the final song to be played on the BBC 's music कार्यक्रम शीर्ष of the Pops.
Cholera is an infection in the small intestine caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The प्रमुख symptoms हैं watery अतिसार and उल्टी.
हस्तांतरण occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food कि रै been contaminated by the feces ( बर्बाद उत्पाद ) of an infected व्यक्ति, including one साथ no apparent symptoms.
The severity of the अतिसार और vomiting can सीसे to rapid निर्जलीकरण and electrolyte imbalance, and मौत in some मामले.
The प्राथमिक treatment is oral rehydration therapy, typically with oral rehydration solution, to replace water और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स.
if this is not tolerated or does not provide improvement तेज़ enough, intravenous fluids can भी be used.
Antibacterial drugs are फायदेमंद in those साथ severe disease to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 million people और कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 मौतों a year.
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological विधि.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published अनोखा by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the सीसे story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890, मुद्रित as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
The magazine 's सम्पादक feared the story थी अभद्र as submitted, so they censored roughly 500 शब्द, बगैर वाइल्ड 's knowledge, before publication.
लकिन even with that, the story थी still greeted साथ outrage by British reviewers, कुछ of जिसको suggested that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds, अग्रणी वाइल्ड to defend the novel aggressively in अक्षर to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book publication, making substantial alterations, deleting controversial passages, adding नई chapters and सहित an aphoristic Preface जिससे has चूंकि become famous in इसके अपना right.
the amended संस्करण was published by Ward, Lock and कम्पनी in अप्रैल 1891.
Some scholars believe that Wilde would आज have wanted us to पढ़ा the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man नामित Dorian Gray, the विषय of a painting by artist Basil Hallward.
Basil is impressed by डोरियन 's सौंदर्य and becomes infatuated साथ उसे, believing his सौंदर्य is responsible लिये a new विधि in उसके art.
Dorian meets रब Henry Wotton, a friend of Basil 's, and becomes enthralled by रब Henry 's world view.
espousing a new hedonism, Lord Henry suggests the तभी things worth pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day उसके beauty will fade, Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell his soul to ensure the portrait बेसिल रै painted होता age rather than he.
Dorian 's काश is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a जीवन of विलासिता, the portrait serves as a reminder of the effect each अधिनियम has upon उसके soul, साथ each sin displayed as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
The चित्र of Dorian धूसर is considered a work of classic Gothic fiction with a दमदार Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as Zsa ज़ा Gabor ( ), is a हंगेरियाई -born American अभिनेत्री who acted in supporting भूमिकाएँ in movies, on Broadway, and occasionally on टेलीविज़न.
गैबर was भी a socialite.
वो began her stage career in Vienna at आयु 15, and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936.
वो emigrated to the United States in 1941 और became a sought-after actress साथ `` यूरोपीय flair और style '', with a personality that `` exuded आकर्षण और अनुग्रह ''.
उसके first फिल्म भूमिका was as supporting actress in प्यारे to Look At.
She later acted in We 're Not शादीशुदा !
and played one of उसके few leading roles in Moulin रूज ( 1952 ), directed by John Huston, जो वर्णित उसके as a `` creditable '' अभिनेत्री.
Besides her film and television appearances, she is बेहतरीन known लिये having nine husbands, including hotel magnate कोनराड हिल्टन और कर्ता George Sanders.
She once stated, `` मेन have सदा liked me और I have always liked मेन.
लकिन I like a mannish man, a man who knows how to talk to और treat a woman – नहीं बस a man साथ muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born ली Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial कलाकार, actor, martial arts instructor, पारस, and filmmaker.
The founder of Jeet Kune Do, Lee was the son of Cantonese opera स्टार Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely माना by commentators, आलोचकों, media and other martial artists to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time, and a pop संस्कृति icon of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to बदलें the रास्ता Asians were presented in American films.
Lee was born in Chinatown, San फ्रांसिस्को on 27 November 1940 to parents from Hong Kong और थी raised in कोलून with his family until उसके late teens.
He थी introduced to the फिल्मी industry by his पिता और appeared in अनेक films as a child कर्ता.
ली moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive उसके higher शिक्षा, और it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts.
His Hong काँग and Hollywood -produced films elevated the परंपरागत Hong Kong martial कला film to a new level of लोकप्रियता और acclaim, sparking a surge of ब्याज in चाइनीज martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and टोन of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in हांग Kong and the rest of the world.
He is विख्यात for उसके roles in five feature-length films : Lo वेई 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and मुट्ठी of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon ( 1972 ), निर्देशित और लिखा by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) और The खेल of Death ( 1978 ), both directed by रॉबर्ट Clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the संसार, particularly among the Chinese, as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in उसके films.
He initially trained in Wing Chun, लकिन later rejected well-defined martial आर्ट styles, favouring बजाय the use of techniques इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत, in the स्पिरिट of his निजी martial कला दर्शनशास्त्र, which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the intercepting Fist ).
Lee held डुअल citizenship of Hong Kong और the United States.
he died in Kowloon Tong on 20 July 1973 at age 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary बीमारी ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ), दीर्घकालिक obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ), chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) और chronic obstructive respiratory disease ( cord ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over समय.
This limits airflow to and from the lungs, causing shortness of साँस ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, COPD is defined by its characteristically कम airflow on lung फलन tests.
In कंट्रास्ट to asthma, इस limitation is poorly reversible and प्रायः gets progressively worse over time.
COPD is caused by noxious अणु or gas, most commonly from tobacco धूम्रपान, which triggers an abnormal जलन response in the lung.
The diagnosis of copd requires lung function tests.
Important management strategies are smoking cessation, vaccinations, पुनर्वास, and ड्रग चिकित्सा ( प्रायः using inhalers ).
Some patients go on to आवश्यकता long-term oxygen therapy or फेफड़ों प्रत्यारोपण.
Worldwide, COPD ranked as the छठे अग्रणी cause of death in 1990.
it is projected to become the चौथी leading cause of death विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an बढ़ाएँ in smoking rates and जनसांख्यिकी changes in many countries.
COPD is the third अग्रणी cause of मौत in the U.S., और the आर्थिक बोझ of copd in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in स्वास्थ्य care costs और lost productivity.
annelies `` ऐनी '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 June 1929early March 1945 ) is one of the सबसे discussed यहूदी victims of the Holocaust.
Her diary has been the आधार for several plays और films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in वाइमर Germany, वो lived most of उसके जीवन in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
born a German नेशनल, फ़्रैंक खोया her नागरिकता in 1941.
She gained international कीर्ति posthumously after उसके diary was published.
It दस्तावेज़ उसके experiences छुपाना during the German occupation of the Netherlands in संसार War ii.
The Frank family स्थानांतरित from जर्मनी to एम्सटर्डम in 1933, the साल the nazis gained control over Germany.
By the beginning of 1940, they यहूद trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the Jewish जनसांख्यिकी increased in July 1942, the family went into hiding in the hidden कक्ष of ऐनी 's पिता, Otto Frank 's, office building.
बाद two सालो, the group was betrayed and transported to concentration camps.
Anne Frank and उसके sister, margot, were eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp, where वे died of typhus in March 1945.
ओटो Frank, the only उत्तरजीवी of the family, लौटे to Amsterdam बाद the war to find that Anne 's diary had महरूम saved, और उसके efforts led to its publication in 1947.
It was अनूदित from its original Dutch and पहला published in English in 1952 as the डायरी of a Young Girl.
it has since महरूम translated into many languages.
The डायरी, जिससे was given to Anne on her 13th जन्मदिवस, क्रॉनिकल्स her जीवन from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944.

Kurt Donald Cobain ( फ़रवरी 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी musician and artist, best known as the lead सिंगर, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge बैंड Nirvana.
कोबेन formed निर्वाण with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 and स्थापित it as part of the Seattle music scene, having इसके debut एल्बम Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After हस्ताक्षर with major label DGC रिकॉर्ड, the band found breakthrough success साथ `` खुश्बू जैसे Teen Spirit `` from its दूसरी album nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of nevermind, निर्वाण was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and कोबेन hailed as `` the प्रवक्ता of a generation ''.
कोबेन, however, थी often असहज और कुंठित, believing his संदेश and कलाकारी vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, with his निजी मुद्दे प्रायः विषय to media attention.
he challenged Nirvana 's audience साथ its फाइनल studio एल्बम In utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, Cobain struggled with heroin व्यसन, बीमारी और depression.
he भी had difficulty coping साथ उसके fame and public चित्र, and the professional और lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his बीवी, musician Courtney Love.
on अप्रैल 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his घर in Seattle, the शिकार of what was officially शासित a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the सिर.
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and बहस.
चूंकि their debut, निर्वाण, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 million albums in the u.S., और over 50 million worldwide.

The रेडियल engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders पाइंट outward इससे a सेंट्रल crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
it resembles a stylized star when viewed from the सामने, और is called a `` स्टार engine '' ( German sternmotor ) in कुछ languages.
The radial configuration थी very commonly प्रयुक्त in aircraft इंजन पहले turbine इंजन became predominant.
the Golden लड़कियों is an अमरीकी sitcom, created by Susan हैरिस, that originally aired on NBC from September 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
Starring Bea Arthur, बेट्टी White, rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty, the show centers on four पुरानी women sharing a home in Miami, फ्लोरिडा.
it थी produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions, in association with touchstone Television, and Paul junger Witt, टोनी थामस, and हैरिस served as the original कार्यपालिका निर्माता.
The सुनहरी Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won अनेक awards, सहित the Primetime Emmy पुरस्कार for Outstanding Comedy श्रेणी twice.
It also won तीन Golden Globe पुरस्कार for Best टेलीविज़न Series – musical or Comedy.
सब चार stars each received an एमी Award throughout the series ' run and था multiple nominations.
The series also ranked among the top टेन highest-rated कार्यक्रम for six out of इसके सात सीज़न.
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas खोजी और production in depths of अधिक than 500 फीट.
By इस definition, वहीँ are लगभग 600 deepwater wells in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
It has been economically infeasible for many years, but with उठती आयल prices, more companies हैं investing in this area.
Major कंपनियाँ working in this सेक्टर शामिल Diamond Offshore, TransOcean, and Baker Hughes.
There हैं basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible खुदाई rigs and drillships.
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( मंच ) or tension-leg platform.
Recent industry analysis has अनुमानित कि the total व्यय in the वैश्विक deepwater अवसंरचना मार्केट होगा पहुँचें $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all आयल is accessible on land or in उथले water.
तुम can ढूँढें some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... Using sonic equipment, आयल कंपनियाँ determine the drilling साइट सबसे संभावित to produce आयल.
Then they उपयोग a mobile offshore drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well.
Some units are परिवर्तित into production rigs, meaning वे स्विच इससे drilling for oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the time, the oil कम्पनी will replace the MODU साथ a अधिक permanent आयल उत्पादन rig to capture oil.”... The MODU 's job is to drill down into the समंदर 's floor to find oil deposits.
The भाग of the ड्रिल that extends नीचे the डेक and through the water is called the riser.
The riser allows for खुदाई fluids to move between the floor and the rig.
Engineers lower a drill string -- a श्रेणी of पाइप designed to drill bas to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater खुदाई is happening despite accidents in offshore fields... ”
in 2010 a विशाल explosion occurred हत्या 11 workers and spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a bp oil rig थी खुदाई in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and बंद the coast of East Africa after a string of विशाल discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling, analyst कह, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the आयल so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that आइये with deepwater drilling in order लिये अमेरिकी to continue to carry on उनके रोज जीवनदान.
“The Energy विभाग recently प्रक्षिप्त that gulf oil उत्पादन would expand इससे its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day, still nearly a क्वार्टर of कुल घरेलू production, to 2 लाख barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण in दोनो ऋणात्मक और positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is still a hazardous possible outcome.
Oil spills result in oil डूब to the नीचे of the ocean smothering plant life leaving fish without food और shelter to जीवित.
On the other हाथ deepwater खुदाई effects the environment in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater आयल well is नहीं in उपयोग anymore plants होगा grow on and around the well making a cave or cavern जैसे आश्रय ideal लिये animals to thrive in.
Deepwater खुदाई also lets us see the depths of the समंदर मंजिल that are hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on रोवर्स at the नीचे of the wells record footage and लो photos of rare fish that are in there प्राकृतिक habitat, giving scientist a dekh at पशु they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी woman साथ whom संयुक्त States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the श्वेत House in 1995 and 1996.
the affair और its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's महाभियोग ) became ज्ञात as the Lewinsky कांड.
Francis अल्बर्ट `` Frank '' सिनात्रा,, ( December 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an American सिंगर and film actor.
शुरूआत his musical career in the swing era with Harry James और Tommy dorsey, सिनात्रा found unprecedented success as a सोलो कलाकार from the early to mid-1940s बाद होने signed to Columbia रिकॉर्ड in 1943.
Being the आइडल of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released उसके first album, The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946.
His पेशेवर career था stalled by the 1950s, but it was पुनर्जन्म in 1953 after he won the Academy Award लिये Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
he signed साथ कैपिटल रिकॉर्ड in 1953 and released अनेक critically lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small घंटों, Songs for Swingin ' Lovers !, Come Fly with me, तभी the निर्जन और Nice 'n ' Easy ).
सिनात्रा left Capitol to found his own record label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding कामयाबी with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, Sinatra at the Sands और Francis अल्बर्ट Sinatra & Antonio Carlos jobim ), toured internationally, was a founding member of the चूहा Pack and fraternized साथ हस्तियाँ and कूटनीतिज्ञों, सहित John F. Kennedy.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective September of My Years, starred in the Emmy -winning television खास फ़्रैंक Sinatra : a Man and His Music, and scored hits साथ `` अजनबी in the रात्रि `` and `` my Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling और बाद appearing in अनेक poorly received films, Sinatra रिटायर्ड लिये the first समय in 1971.
Two सालो later, however, he आए out of रिटायरमेंट and in 1973 recorded अनेक एल्बम, scoring a Top 40 hit साथ `` ( थीम इससे ) New York, New York `` in 1980.
using his Las Vegas shows as a home आधार, he toured both भीतर the संयुक्त States और internationally, until a short time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra भी forged a highly successful करियर as a film कर्ता.
After winning Best Supporting कर्ता in 1953, he also garnered a nomination लिये बेहतरीन Actor लिये the Man with the Golden Arm, and critical acclaim लिये his performance in The Manchurian Candidate.
he also starred in such musicals as ऊँची समाज, pal Joey, Guys and Dolls and On the Town.
सिनात्रा थी सम्मानित at the कैनेडी Center Honors in 1983 and थी awarded the Presidential पदक of Freedom by रोनाल्ड Reagan in 1985 और the Congressional सुनहरा Medal in 1997.
he was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards, including the Grammy Trustees पुरस्कार, ग्रैमी लेजेंड Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling कलाकारों of all time, having sold अधिक than 150 million copies worldwide.
ठेठ cornhole फलक
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, corn toss, baggo or बैग, is a लॉन game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at a raised platform with a hole in the दूर end.
A bag in the छेद scores 3 points, while एक on the platform scores 1 point.
Play continues until a team or player पहुँच the स्कोर of 21.
The American Gold Eagle is an official सुनहरा bullion coin of the United राज्य.
प्राधिकृत अंतर्गत the सुनहरा Bullion सिक्का अधिनियम of 1985, it was first released by the संयुक्त States मिंट in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that बिक्रम Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha yoga तकनीकों and popularized beginning in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga classes चलाएं लिये 90 minutes and consist of the same series of 26 postures और 2 श्वास exercises.
बिक्रम Yoga is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) साथ a humidity of 40 %,.
Christopher माइकल Massey ( born 26 जनवरी 1990 ) is an American actor, हास्य and rapper best ज्ञात लिये starring as Michael barret in Nickelodeon टेलीविज़न series Zoey 101.

A conventional teaspoon made of बेदाग steel.
a teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument, as खूब as a unit of measurement of volume in some countries and customs.
A fern is any एक or अधिक of a group of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical समूह known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, they have xylem and phloem ( बनाना उन्हें vascular plants ).
They have stems, leaves, और roots like other vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via spores और have neither seeds nor flowers.
by far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as पारिभाषित यहाँ ( also पुकारा monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte भी refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular plants ( देखिए classification section below ).
ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the Carboniferous but many of the current families और प्रजाति किया not appear until roughly 145 million सालो ago in the early Cretaceous ( after flowering पौधे came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are नहीं of major आर्थिक importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as ornamental plants, for remediating contaminated soils, and have महरूम the विषय of research for their ability to remove कुछ chemical प्रदूषक इससे the air.
Some are significant weeds.
They also play a role in mythology, medicine, और आर्ट.
चपटा roofs in इसराईल
Flat roof in Los Angeles
A चपटा roof is a प्रकार of covering for a भवन.
in contrast to the more sloped form of roof, a चपटा roof is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
the ढलान of a roof is properly known as its pitch : Roofs जिससे हैं nearly चपटा are ज्ञात as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pitch is said to increase ).
Any sheet of सामग्री used to cover a चपटा or low-pitched छत is usually ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that कवर चपटा roofs typically allow the जल to run off इससे a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water इससे some flat roofs ऐसे as on गार्डन sheds sometimes flows freely off the edge of a छत, though gutter systems are of लाभ in keeping both दीवारें और foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs प्रायः lead water directly onto the ground, or better, into a specially made soakaway.
ड्रेनेज on larger roofs usually lead water into the rainwater drainage system of any built up क्षेत्रफल.
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool, usually for aesthetic purposes, or लिये rainwater buffering.
चपटा roofs मौजूद सब over the world and प्रत्येक area has इसके अपना परंपरा or preference for materials प्रयुक्त.
In warmer climes where rainfall is कम और freezing is unlikely to occur, अनेक चपटा roofs are simply built of masonry or कंक्रीट and इस is good at keeping out the heat of the sun और सस्ती और easy to build where timber is नहीं readily उपलब्धियाँ.
in areas where the roof could become saturated by rain और लीक, or जहाँ जल soaked into the brickwork could freeze to बर्फ and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs हैं नहीं suitable.
traditionally most flat roofs in the western world make use of tar or more usually tar paper applied over छत अलंकार to keep a building watertight.
the tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to रखना the sun 's heat, UV किरणें and मौसम off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering और degradation.
Roof decking is usually of plywood, chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand Board, also ज्ञात as स्टर्लिंग board ) of around 18mm मोटाई.
the tar coating is लागू in one or अधिक coats as a hot liquid, heated in a tar kettle, or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued down और sealed together at joints by hot tar - एकबार it has cooled, the बजरी is spread evenly over it.
A main कारण for failure of these परंपरागत roofs is ignorance or कमी of maintenance where people or events cause the gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing, thus exposing it to मौसम and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and आखिरकार जल gets in.
tarpaper is प्रायः a 'paper ' or fibre सामग्री soaked or impregnated in tar.
As बजरी can not protect tarpaper सतहों जहाँ they वृद्धि खड़ा इससे the roof ऐसे as on मुंडेर walls or upstands, tarpaper variants are produced साथ fine gravel लागू to the hot tar दौरान the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in अनुक्रम to give it जारी protection.
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship and training of those applying it to produce more or less कामयाब results.
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the लागत of materials खरीदें and cost of laying them, however the cost of modern membranes ऐसे as EPDM has come down over recent years to make उन्हें more and more सस्ती.
There हैं now अधिक firms supplying modern विकल्प और there is generally a growing awareness of उनके performance and उपलब्धता.
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then क्षति often goes unnoticed for long periods of time दौरान which जल penetrates and soaks the decking and any इन्सुलेशन and/or structure beneath it.
This can lead to expensive क्षति from the rot जिससे often develops और if left can weaken the roof structure.
There are also विभिन्न स्वास्थ्य risks to लोगों and पशु breathing the सांचे बीजाणुओं : the गंभीरता of this health रिस्क remains a debated point.
One प्रॉब्लम साथ maintaining चपटा roofs is that if जल does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern झिल्ली ) it can travel a long way पहले causing visible damage or leaking into a भवन जहाँ it can be seen.
यूँ it is नहीं easy to see where it is टपकती in अनुक्रम to repair it.
Once underlying छत decking is soaked it often sags causing a further collection or puddling of water in that क्षेत्रफल and the problem worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact डिस्क which contains आंकड़ा.
The नाम is an acronym जिससे स्टैंड for `` Compact Disc read-only memory ``.
Computers can read cd-roms, but can not write on them.
CD-ROMs हैं popularly प्रयुक्त to distribute computer software, including video खेल and multimedia applications, though any data can be भंडारित ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced cds, hold दोनो computer आंकड़ा और audio with the latter सक्षम of being played on a CD player, while आंकड़ा ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( ऐसे as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the format of CD-ROMs.
One of a set of color-bound books कि contain the technical specifications for सब CD स्वरुप, the पीला Book, निर्मित by सोनी and Philips, was the पहला एक्सटेंशन of Compact Disc Digital ऑडियो.
It adapted the स्वरूप to hold any form of आंकड़ा.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 July 1965 ), कलम name J. K. रोलिंग, is a अंग्रेजों novelist, best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series.
The Potter किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी attention, won अनेक awards, और sold more than 400 million नक़ल.
वे have become the best-selling book series in history, और been the आधार for a श्रेणी of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts as well as maintaining रचनात्मक control by serving as a producer on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling was working as a researcher and दुभाषिया secretary for Amnesty International जब she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a विलम्बित train from मैनचेस्टर to London in 1990.
The seven-year काल कि followed entailed the death of her माँ, तलाक इससे her पहला husband and poverty until Rowling समाप्त the पहला अनोखा in the series, हैरी कुम्हार and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last, हैरी कुम्हार और the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as खूब as 3 supplements to the श्रेणी.
in 2012, Rowling parted साथ her agency and resumed writing in the form of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership, entitled The Casual Vacancy.
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for वयस्कों, the other for children younger than the हैरी कुम्हार audience, and she expects the latter to be published first.
रोलिंग has led a `` rags to riches `` जीवन स्टोरी, in which वो progressed इससे living on state benefits to multi-millionaire status भीतर five years.
वो is the United किंगडम 's best-selling author चूंकि records began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 लाख ), ranking her as the twelfth richest स्त्री in the United Kingdom.
Forbes क्रमित रोलिंग as the forty-eighth most powerful हस्ती of 2007, and समय magazine named उसके as a runner-up लिये its 2007 व्यक्ति of the Year, noting the social, moral, और political inspiration she has given उसके fans.
In October 2010, Rowling थी नामित the `` सबसे Influential स्त्री in ब्रिटेन '' by अग्रणी magazine editors.
She has become a notable philanthropist, supporting ऐसे charities as Comic Relief, One जनक परिवारों, अनेक Sclerosis समाज of Great Britain और Lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level समूह ).

the population was 11,032 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.

a tropical cyclone is a storm प्रणाली characterized by a low-pressure center घिरी by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and भारी rain.
तीव्र cyclones strengthen when जल काफूर from the समंदर is released as the संतृप्त air rises, resulting in संघनन of water वाष्प contained in the नम air.
They हैं fueled by a different heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, European windstorms, और polar lows.
The characteristic that separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is कि at कोई height in the atmosphere, the center of a tropical चक्रवात will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` गरम core `` तूफ़ान systems.
the term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of ये प्रणालियों, जिससे usually form in tropical regions of the globe, and to their formation in maritime तीव्र air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic प्रकृति, with counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी Hemisphere and clockwise हवा प्रवाह in the Southern गोलार्ध.
the opposite direction of the हवा प्रवाह is a result of the Coriolis फ़ोर्स.
Depending on its स्थान और शक्ति, a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), typhoon ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic storm, तीव्र अवसाद, और simply cyclone.
जबकि तीव्र cyclones can produce extremely शक्तिशाली winds and torrential बरसात, they are also able to उपज high waves, damaging तूफ़ान surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over large लाशें of गरम water, and lose their strength if they move over जमीन due to increased surface घर्षण and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source.
This is क्यों coastal regions can receive significant क्षति from a तीव्र cyclone, जबकि अंतर्देशीय regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant flooding अंतर्देशीय, और storm surges can उपज extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to from the coastline.
हालांकि their effects on human populations can be विनाशकारी, तीव्र cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
वे भी carry heat energy away from the tropics और transport it toward temperate latitudes, which makes उन्हें an important part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism.
as a परिणाम, तीव्र cyclones help to maintain संतुलन in the Earth 's troposphere, and to maintain a relatively stable and गरम temperature worldwide.
अनेक तीव्र cyclones develop जब the atmospheric शर्तें around a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are अनुकूल.
The background environment is modulated by climatological चक्र और पैटर्न ऐसे as the Madden-Julian oscillation, El niño-southern Oscillation, and the अटलांटिक multidecadal oscillation.
अन्य रूप जब other types of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics.
Tropical systems हैं then moved by steering winds in the क्षोभमण्डल ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an eye.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the conditions around the प्रणाली deteriorate or the tropical चक्रवात makes landfall, the system weakens और eventually dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of these systems with current प्रौद्योगिकी.
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an American stage and film कर्ता, film producer और लेखक.
His popular films include आउट of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), इक्का in the Hole ( 1951 ), The ख़राब and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust लिये Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ( 1957 ), the Vikings ( 1958 ), स्पार्टाकस ( 1960 ), Lonely हैं the Brave ( 1962 ), सात दिनों in May ( 1964 ), the Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and मुश्किल Guys ( 1986 ).
he is No.17 on the American फिल्मी संस्थान 's list of the greatest male American screen legends of all time, making उसे the highest-ranked living व्यक्ति on the सूची.
In 1996, he received the अकादमी Honorary Award `` लिये 50 सालो as a creative and moral force in the motion चित्र community. ''
He is one of the पिछला surviving actors from Hollywood 's `` सुनहरी age ''.
Robert क्लार्क `` Bob '' Seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an American चट्टान and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful detroit-area artist, he performed and recorded as bob seger और the पिछला Heard और Bob seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the जल्दी 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' from his recordings और जारी to strive for broader success with other various bands.
in 1973, he put together The चांदी Bullet Band, a समूह of detroit-area musicians, with whom he became सबसे कामयाब on the national level with the album Live Bullet, recorded live with the Silver Bullet बैंड in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit, मिशिगन.
in 1976, he achieved a नेशनल breakout साथ the studio एल्बम Night चालें.
on his studio albums, he also worked extensively with the Alabama-based Muscle shoals लय Section, which appeared on several of seger 's best-selling singles and एल्बम.
A roots rocker with a classic raspy, चिल्लाना voice, seger wrote and recorded songs कि dealt with love, महिलाओं, blue-collar विषयवस्तु and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
seger has अंकित अनेक हिट्स, सहित `` रात्रि चालें, '' `` Turn the Page, '' `` We 've मिला Tonight, '' `` Against the Wind, '' and Shakedown कि थी written for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock, '' और also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` Old Time Rock and फेंकें `` was named एक of the गीतों of the Century in 2001.
With a career spanning five decades, Seger continues to perform और record today.
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 and the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012.
Richard milhous Nixon ( जनवरी 9, 1913 – अप्रैल 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
निक्सन had previously परोसा as a Republican U.S. representative and सीनेटर इससे California and as the 36th Vice President of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 to 1961.
Nixon थी born in Yorba Linda, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
He ग्रैजुएट from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University स्कूल of विधि in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He और उसके wife, पैट Nixon, moved to Washington to work for the federal सरकारी in 1942.
he subsequently served in the United States Navy दौरान World War II.
Nixon थी elected in California to the हाउस of Representatives in 1946 and to the सीनेट in 1950.
उसके pursuit of the Alger Hiss मामला स्थापित his प्रतिष्ठा as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican पार्टी अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served लिये eight years as वाइस president.
he waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय campaign in 1960, narrowly खोने to John F. Kennedy, and lost a race for राज्यपाल of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the प्रेसिडेंसी and was elected.
हालांकि निक्सन initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended u.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, और he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic मिसाइल सन्धि साथ the Soviet Union the same साल.
domestically, his प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों that transferred power from वॉशिंगटन to the states.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight कर्कट and illegal drugs, imposed wage and दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental सुरक्षा Agency.
हालांकि he presided over the lunar landings beginning साथ Apollo 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He थी re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
निक्सन 's second term saw an Arab आयल embargo, the resignation of उसके vice अध्यक्ष, Spiro agnew, and a continuing श्रेणी of revelations परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड and other misconduct by members of the प्रशासन.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of लगभग certain impeachment and हटाना from दफ्तर.
After उसके इस्तीफा, he controversially received a pardon issued by उसके successor, Gerald Ford.
In रिटायरमेंट, निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring several किताबे and undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate उसके पब्लिक image.
He suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on April 18, 1994, और died four days later at the age of 81.

the Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused bitter contention between President Grant and Sen. Sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American साम्राज्यवाद in the caribbean और fearful that annexation होता सीसे to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of हैती, became convinced that corruption lay पीछे the treaty, and कि men बंद to the president shared in the corruption.
As अध्यक्ष of the Senate Foreign संबंध Committee, Sen. sumner initially withheld his opinion on the treaty on जनवरी 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had महरूम leaked सूचना इससे सहायक Secretary of राज्य, bancroft डेविस, that u.s. नवल ships were being प्रयुक्त to protect अध्यक्ष Báez.
sen. sumner 's कमेटी voted विरूद्ध annexation and at sen. sumner’s suggestion and quite संभवतः to save the party इससे an भद्दा fight or the president from शर्मिंदगी, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive सत्र.
President ग्रान्ट persisted और भेजा messages to Congress in favor of annexation on कूच 14, 1870, और May 31, 1870.
In बंद session, Sen. sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there होता be difficulty साथ the foreign nationals, noting the chronic rebellion कि took place on the island, and the risk कि the independence of Haiti, पहचाना by the United राज्य in 1862, would be lost.
sumner stated कि Grant 's उपयोग of the U.S. नेवी as a protectorate थी a उल्लंघन of International law and unconstitutional.
Finally, on June 30, 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate and विफल to gain the required 2/3 बहुमत for treaty passage.
The following day, President Grant, feeling betrayed by Sen. sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of sumner’s बंद dost J. Lothrop motley, Ambassador to ब्रिटेन.
By पतझड़, Sumner 's निजी दुश्मनी to the president थी public ज्ञान, और he blamed the Secretary of राज्य लिये failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
The two मेन, friends until then, cooled into bitter दुश्मनों.
In दिसम्बर, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire सेंटो Domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely critical speech accusing the president of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President Grant, supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, had initiated a campaign to depose sumner इससे the chairmanship of the Senate विदेशी Relations Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` प्रशासन man '', in जोड to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had पराजित Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act, अवरोधित ग्रान्ट 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to u.S. Secretary of Treasury, and been a निरंतर harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than ग्रान्ट had महरूम willing to go.
Grant resented sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
Told एकबार that Sumner किया not मानना in the Bible, the president is supposed to have said that he थी not surprised : `` he did n't write it. ''
as the दरार between Grant and Sumner increased, sumner’s स्वास्थ्य began to decline.
When the 42nd u.S. कॉंग्रेस convened on March 4, 1871, सीनेटरों affiliated साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, known as ‘’New radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner इससे the सीनेट Foreign संबंध कमेटी अध्यक्षता.
Business ethics ( also कॉरपोरेट ethics ) is a form of applied आचार or professional आचार that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a कारोबार environment.
It applies to all aspects of business conduct और is relevant to the conduct of individuals और संपूर्ण organizations.
कारोबार आचार has both normative और descriptive आयाम.
As a corporate practice and a करियर specialization, the field is primarily normative.
लड attempting to understand business बर्ताव employ descriptive विधि.
The range and quantity of कारोबार ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing बर्ताव साथ non-economic concerns.
Interest in कारोबार ethics accelerated dramatically दौरान the 1980s and 1990s, दोनो within प्रमुख corporations और भीतर academia.
For example, today most प्रमुख corporations प्रचार their commitment to non-economic मान under headings such as ethics codes and social जिम्मेदारी charters.
आदम स्मिथ said, `` People of the वही trade seldom मिलें together, even for merriment and diversion, but the conversation ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध the पब्लिक, or in कुछ contrivance to raise prices. ''
Governments use laws और regulations to point कारोबार behavior in what वे perceive to be beneficial directions.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and विवरण of बर्ताव that झूठ beyond governmental कंट्रोल.
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in जिससे they operate accelerated the development of formal ethics regimes.
A burn is a प्रकार of injury to flesh or स्किन caused by heat, electricity, chemicals, घर्षण, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the सतही skin ( known as superficial or first degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do नहीं involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as आंशिक thickness or second degree ).
Rarely सब layers of the skin or deeper ऊतकों, such as मांसपेशी or bone can be injured in which मामला the burn is either full मोटाई ( third उपाधि ) or fourth उपाधि.
the treatment required depends on the गंभीरता of the burn.
सतही burns संभवतः managed with छोटी अधिक than simple पीड़ा हत्यारे while major burns may require prolonged उपचार in specialized burn centers.
Cooling with tap water may सहायता pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may result in low body temperature.
आंशिक thickness burns may आवश्यकता सफ़ाई with साबुन and जल followed by dressings.
Blisters चाहिए typically be left unbroken.
Full मोटाई burns usually आवश्यकता सर्जिकल उपचार such as स्किन grafting and extensive burns often require विशाल amount of intravenous fluids.
The most आम complications of burns are related to संक्रमण.
While large burns can be fatal, आधुनिक treatments developed in the पिछला 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children और young adults.
Globally परिचय 11 million लोगों तलाश medical treatment and 300,000 लोगों die इससे burns.
in the United States, of those admitted to a burn center, approximately 4 % die from उनके चोटों.
The long पद निष्कर्ष is primarily related to the आकार of burn and the आयु of the person effected.
the अटलांटिक समंदर, not including Arctic and Antarctic regions
This वीडियो was लिया by the crew of expedition 29 on board the ISS.
the pass starts from just north-east of the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the उत्तर Atlantic समंदर to central Africa, over South Sudan.
the Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the world 's oceanic divisions.
साथ a कुल area of about, it कवर approximately 20 प्रतिशत of the Earth 's सतह and about 29 प्रतिशत of its water surface area.
The first भाग of its name refers to Atlas of Greek mythology, making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
the oldest ज्ञात जिक्र of `` Atlantic '' is in The histories of Herodotus around 450 bc ( Hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( यूनानी : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of एटलस ).
The पद Ethiopic Ocean, derived from इथियोपिया, थी applied to the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century.
Before europeans discovered other महासागर, the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar कि we अभी know as the Atlantic.
The early Greeks believed इस ocean to be a gigantic river encircling the world.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped जलाशय extending longitudinally between Eurasia और Africa to the ईस्ट, and the americas to the west.
as एक घटक of the interconnected global ocean, it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific समंदर in the southwest, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as extending southward to Antarctica. )
the equator subdivides it into the उत्तर Atlantic Ocean and South Atlantic समंदर.
Due to their long-term हठ, and the need for a unique पहचानकर्ता in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ, tropical cyclones and subtropical cyclones are दिए names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
The following are lists from जिससे these तीव्र and उपोष्ण cyclone names are derived.
White light is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the colors of the optical वर्णक्रम.
the visible spectrum is the portion of the electromagnetic spectrum कि is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
Electromagnetic विकिरण in this range of wavelengths is पुकारा visible light or बस light.
A typical human eye will respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of आवृत्ति, this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted नजर generally रै its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ), in the green region of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ).
the spectrum does not, however, contain all the colors that the human eyes and brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated रंगों such as pink, or जामुनी variations such as magenta, are absent, for example, because वे can be made only by a मिक्सर of multiple wavelengths.
Colors containing तभी एक wavelength हैं also called pure रंगों.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the region of the electromagnetic spectrum which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An example of this phenomenon is that साफ air scatters blue light more than रेड wavelengths, और so the midday sky appears blue.
the optical window is भी called the visible खिड़की because it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य response spectrum.
the निकट infrared ( NIR ) window lies बस out of the इंसान vision, as well as the मीडियम Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or दूर Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience उन्हें.
अनेक प्रजाति can देखिए लाइट साथ frequencies outside the `` दृश्य spectrum, '' which is defined in terms of इंसान दृष्टि.
Bees और many other कीट can detect ultraviolet लाइट, जिससे helps them find मकरंद in flowers.
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to their appearance in ultraviolet light, rather than कैसा colorful they appear to humans.
Birds, too, can देखिए into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ), and some have sex-dependent markings on उनके plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many पशु that can see into the पराबैंगनी दायरा, however, can नहीं देखिए red लाइट or any other reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm, just before the नारंगी wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see कुछ red wavelengths, लकिन not as अनेक as humans.
Zebras ( or ) हैं several species of अफ़्रीकी equids ( horse family ) united by उनके distinctive black and white धारियाँ.
Their धारियाँ आइये in अलग patterns, unique to each individual.
They are generally social animals that सजीव in small harems to विशाल herds.
Unlike उनके closest relatives, horses and asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
There हैं three प्रजाति of zebras : the plains जेब्रा, the Grévy 's zebra and the mountain जेब्रा.
The plains zebra and the पहाड़ zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris, but grévy 's zebra is the एकमात्र प्रजाति of subgenus Dolichohippus.
the latter resembles an गधा, to which it is closely related, while the पूर्व two are more horse-like.
सब तीन belong to the genus Equus, साथ with other living equids.
The unique stripes of zebras make उन्हें one of the पशु most परिचित to लोगों.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, kyu, और coastal hills.
However, विभिन्न anthropogenic factors have had a कठोर प्रभाव on जेब्रा populations, in particular शिकार लिये skins और habitat destruction.
Grévy 's zebra and the पहाड़ zebra हैं endangered.
While मैदान zebras are much अधिक plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – though वहीँ is currently a योजना, पुकारा the quagga Project, that aims to नस्ल zebras that हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a process called प्रजनन back.
Barry White, born बैरी यूजीन Carter ( – ), थी an American composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time ग्रैमी Award -winner known for his distinctive बास voice and रोमांटिक image, White 's महानतम कामयाबी came in the 1970s as a सोलो singer and साथ the Love Unlimited ऑर्केस्ट्रा, crafting अनेक enduring soul, दुर्गंध, and disco गीतों such as his दो biggest hits, `` You 're the पहला, the Last, My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with इसहाक़ Hayes, White is considered by Allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s.
दौरान the कोर्स of his career in the music कारोबार, White achieved 106 gold albums worldwide, 41 of which also attained प्लेटिनम status.
श्वेत था 20 gold and 10 platinum singles, with विश्वव्यापी बिक्री in excess of 100 million, according to critics Ed Hogan and वेड Kergan.
उसके influences शामिल रेव. James Cleveland, Ray Charles, एरीथा Franklin प्लस Motown कलाकारों The supremes, The चार टॉप और Marvin Gaye.
Angelina जोली (, born Angelina Jolie वोइट ; जून 4, 1975 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, film director, and screenwriter.
She has प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार, two Screen अभिनेताओं Guild Awards, and three सुनहरी ग्लोब Awards, and was named हॉलीवुड 's highest-paid अभिनेत्री by फोर्ब्स in 2009 और 2011.
जोली promotes humanitarian causes, and is noted for her work with refugees as a खास Envoy and पूर्व Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High कमिश्नर for शरणार्थियों ( unhcr ).
She has प्रायः महरूम cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman, a शीर्षक for which वो has प्राप्त substantial media attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside उसके father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ), लकिन उसके film करियर began in earnest a दशक बाद साथ the low-budget उत्पादन साइबोर्ग 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first leading role in a प्रमुख फिल्मी was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She स्ट्रक्चर in the critically acclaimed biographical टेलीविज़न films George वालेस ( 1997 ) और Gia ( 1998 ), and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for उसके performance in the drama Girl, बाधित ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved चौड़ी fame after her portrayal of video खेल heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ), and स्थापित herself among the highest-paid actresses in हॉलीवुड with the sequel The Cradle of जीवन ( 2003 ).
वो continued उसके action स्टार career साथ mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for उसके प्रदर्शन in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) और Changeling ( 2008 ), जिससे earned her a nomination for an Academy पुरस्कार for Best Actress.
Jolie बना her directorial डेब्यू with the wartime drama in the Land of Blood and मधु ( 2011 ).
तलाक from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy bob Thornton, Jolie now lives with actor Brad Pitt, in a relationship notable लिये fervent media ध्यान.
Jolie and Pitt have three biological children and तीन adopted children.
A natural मेहराब उत्पादित by the अपरदन of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, जॉर्डन
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock हैं removed इससे the धरती 's surface by exogenetic processes such as wind or water flow, और then transported and deposited in other locations.
जबकि अपरदन is a natural प्रक्रम, इंसान activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion causes problems such as desertification, decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation, sedimentation of जलमार्गों, और ecological पतन due to loss of the nutrient rich अपर मृदा layers.
जल and हवा अपरदन are अभी the दो primary कल्याणकारी of land degradation ; combined, they हैं responsible for 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion one of the most significant global पर्यावरणीय problems.
Industrial कृषि, वनों, roads, anthropogenic climate बदलें और urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in regard to उनके effect on stimulating अपरदन.
however, वहीँ हैं many available alternative जमीन use practices that can काटना or limit erosion, such as छत -building, no-till कृषि, और revegetation of denuded soils.
जर्सी Shore is an American reality television series which ran on MTV from December 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United राज्य.
The series follows the जीवनदान of आठ housemates spending their गर्मियाँ at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of नई Jersey.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast शीत to Miami Beach, with ऋतु 3 returning to the जर्सी shore.
The चौथी season, filmed in Italy, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The show returned लिये a पांचवां season, at seaside Heights on January 5, 2012.
the fifth season finale aired on कूच 15, 2012.
On March 19, 2012, MTV confirmed that the series would वापसी for their sixth season.
On August 30, 2012, MTV घोषित that the series will end बाद the sixth ऋतु, जिससे premiered on October 4.
the श्रेणी finale aired on December 20, 2012.

The series garnered रिकार्ड दरजा for MTV, making it the network 's सबसे viewed series telecast ever.

The University of शिकागो और the विश्वविद्यालयों of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions that have had classes or conferences परिचय the दिखाएँ.
In 2010, the cast of Jersey shore was नामित on Barbara Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating लोगों list, and the श्रेणी has चूंकि been exported to dozens of देशों विश्वव्यापी.
There are several remakes of the show in अन्य देशों, with two set in the United Kingdom ; the well known Geordie Shore, set in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The other is The Valleys, the Welsh equivalent, जिससे is filmed and नियत in Cardiff.

संयुक्त States territory is any extent of प्रदेश under the jurisdiction of the federal सरकारी of the United States, सहित सब waters ( around islands or महाद्वीपीय tracts ) and सब U.S. Naval vessels.
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, and managing its territory.
इस extent of territory is all the area belonging to, and अंतर्गत the dominion of, the संयुक्त राज्य federal government ( which includes tracts lying at a अलहदा from the country ) लिये administrative and other purposes.
the United राज्य कुल territory includes a subset of political विभाजन.
the U.S. government is a government with प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां अंतर्गत the United States Constitution.
`` the powers नहीं delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, are reserved to the राज्य respectively, or to the लोगों '' by the दसवाँ Amendment.

A cord of wood
The cord is a unit of measure of dry आवाज़ प्रयुक्त in Canada and the संयुक्त States to माप firewood and pulpwood.
A cord is the amount of wood that, जब `` ranked and खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े are aligned, समानांतर, touching and compact ), occupies a volume of.
This corresponds to a खूब stacked woodpile high, long, and deep ; or any other व्यवस्था of linear measurements that yields the same आवाज़.
the name cord probably comes इससे the use of a cord or string to measure it.
The, is an 8-bit handheld वीडियो game यंत्र developed और manufactured by Nintendo.
It थी released in Japan on, in North अमेरिका in, and in यूरोपीय on.
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy लकीर, और was निर्मित by gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same स्टाफ who had designed the Game & Watch series as well as अनेक popular games for the निन्टेंडो Entertainment System.
redesigned versions were released in 1996 and 1998, in the form of Game Boy जेब, and खेल Boy Light ( Japan only ), क्रमशः.
The Game Boy is निन्टेंडो 's second handheld प्रणाली following the Game & Watch series introduced in, और it संयुक्त features from both the निन्टेंडो Entertainment प्रणाली and Game & Watch.
It was originally bundled with the puzzle game टेट्रिस.
As part of the fourth generation of गेमिंग, the Game लड़के competed with the Sega खेल Gear, Atari लिंक्स, and the turboexpress.
despite these other technologically superior handheld consoles, the Game Boy थी a tremendous कामयाबी.
The Game लड़के and its successor, the Game Boy रंग, have both संयुक्त sold 118.69 million इकाई worldwide.
Upon its release in the United States, it sold its entire शिपमेंट of one million इकाई within weeks.
The World व्यापार बीच is a जटिल of buildings अंतर्गत construction in Lower मैनहटन, New York नगर, संयुक्त States, replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings साथ the same नाम on the same साईट.
The original संसार व्यापार Center featured landmark जुड़वा मीनारें, जिससे opened on अप्रैल 4, 1973 and were नष्ट in the September 11 हमले of 2001, along with 7 संसार Trade Center.
the अन्य buildings in the complex were क्षतिग्रस्त in the attacks, and their ruins were eventually demolished.
the site is होने rebuilt with पाँच new skyscrapers and a memorial to those killed in the हमले.
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the other चार हैं expected to be समाप्त before 2020.
One World Trade Center will be the सीसे building for the new complex, reaching more than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest building in New यॉर्क नगर on April 30, 2012, और is अपेक्षित to be finished by 2013.
a sixth tower is awaiting पुष्टि.
At the time of their completion, the असली 1 World व्यापार Center ( the उत्तर Tower ) and 2 World Trade बीच ( the दक्षिण मीनार ), ज्ञात collectively as the `` Twin Towers '', यहूद the tallest इमारतें in the world.
The other buildings शामिल 3 wtc ( the Marriott संसार Trade Center ), 4 WTC, 5 WTC, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
All of ये buildings were निर्मित between 1975 और 1985.
the cost for the construction थी $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ).
The जटिल was स्तिथ in the दिल of नई York City 's downtown financial ज़िला और contained 13.4 लाख square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space.
The World Trade Center experienced a आग on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 और a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the Port Authority decided to privatize the World Trade Center, leasing the buildings to a private company to मैनेज, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of सितंबर 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers उड़ाया दो Boeing 767 jets into the complex, one into each tower, in a coordinated terrorist आक्रमण.
After burning for 56 minutes, the South मीनार ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour बाद by the North Tower ( 1 ), with the attacks on the संसार Trade बीच resulting in 2,753 deaths.
Falling मलबा इससे the towers, संयुक्त with फ़ायर that the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the partial or पूरा collapse of all the other buildings in the जटिल and caused catastrophic क्षति to ten other विशाल structures in the surrounding क्षेत्रफल.
the process of cleanup and recovery at the World व्यापार Center site took eight months.
Over the following years, plans for a rebuilt World व्यापार बीच took form.
The first new building at the site was 7 World व्यापार Center, which opened in.
the निम्नतर मैनहटन Development Corporation ( LMDC ), स्थापित in to oversee the rebuilding process, organized प्रतियोगिताओं to select a site योजना और memorial डिज़ाइन.
मेमोरी Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, was selected as the master plan, but इस went through substantial changes in design.
The नई संसार Trade Center complex होगा include One World व्यापार Center, तीन other high-rise office मीनारें, and the National सितंबर 11 Memorial & Museum.
