the Transverse Ranges are a समूह of mountain ranges of southern California, in the Pacific Coast Ranges physiographic प्रदेश in North अमेरिका.
the Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and सैन Diego counties.
वे derive the name अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ due to their East-West orientation, making them transverse to the general North-South orientation of most of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's तटीय mountains.
Periodic तालिका with electron shells
An electron shell may be विचार of as an orbit followed by electrons around an atom 's nucleus.
The closest शेल to the केंद्रक is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K शेल '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` L shell '' ), तब the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` m shell '' ), and so on farther and farther from the केंद्रक.
The shell अक्षर K, L, M,..., प्रयुक्त in the X-ray संकेतन, हैं alphabetical.
Each shell can contain तभी a fixed number of electrons : The 1st shell can hold up to दो electrons, the 2nd shell can hold up to आठ electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, और 4th shell can थाम up to 32 and so on.
चूंकि electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus, an अणु 's electrons will generally occupy बाहरी shells तभी if the अधिक inner shells have already been completely भर by अन्य electrons.
however, this is not a strict requirement : Atoms may have दो or even three incomplete outer शेल.
( See madelung rule for more विवरण. )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in ये शेल देखिए इलेक्ट्रॉन configuration.
the electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or shells ) determine the chemical गुण of the अणु ; it is called the valence शेल.
Each shell consists of एक or अधिक subshells, और प्रत्येक subshell consists of एक or अधिक atomic orbitals.
Vickie lynn मार्शल ( née Hogan ; नवम्बर 28, 1967 – फ़रवरी 8, 2007 ), known by her moniker anna Nicole Smith, was an American model, अभिनेत्री, and television personality.
स्मिथ first gained लोकप्रियता in Playboy, becoming the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
She modeled for clothing कंपनियाँ, including अंदाज़ा जीन्स and लेन Bryant.
Smith dropped out of ऊँची school and थी married in 1985.
Her highly publicized second विवाह to oil business mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 सालो her senior, resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for his धन, जिससे she अस्वीकृत.
Following Marshall 's death, स्मिथ began a lengthy विधिक battle over a share of उसके estate.
Her case, Marshall v. मार्शल, पहुँचे the u.S. Supreme Court on a सवाल of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार, and again on a question of दिवालियापन court authority ( अभी called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, फ्लोरिडा hotel रूम as a परिणाम of an overdose of prescription drugs.
Within the final six months of उसके life, Smith was the focus of a renewed press coverage surrounding the मौत of her बेटे, Daniel, और the paternity and कस्टडी battle over her नवजात daughter, Dannielynn.
The is one denomination of Japanese yen.
The current design थी first minted in 1959 using जापानी characters known as the `` नई script ``, और यहूद also minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' जापानी characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when, due to the much higher value of the yen, they यहूद minted in gold ).
the front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing out of the water, with `` five येन '' written in कांजी ; the वापस is stamped साथ `` जापानी '' and the year of समस्या, भी in kanji, अलग by sprouts of a tree.
The तीन ग्राफिक तत्व of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries, the key elements of the जापानी first-sector अर्थव्यवस्था.
Around a hole, there is a गियर that represents industry.
It is the only Japanese coin in circulation to lack अरबी numerals on either face.
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned r & B, हिप hop, soul, funk, and नई jack झूले.
Originally consisting of singer tionne `` T-Boz '' वाटकिंस, rapper लिसा `` Left नजर '' lopes और singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas, the group मिला unprecedented success in the 1990s while भी enduring a series of spats with the law, प्रत्येक other, and the समूह 's रिकार्ड लेबल.
initially, TLC achieved commercial success following the release of उनके debut एल्बम Ooooooohhh...
on the TLC Tip, which sold 6 million copies worldwide.
however, it was their दूसरी एल्बम, CrazySexyCool, that catapulted the group to superstar औकात.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group, and आखिरकार बेची 23 million copies विश्वव्यापी.
Five years बाद, the group released their तीसरा album fanmail, which became the group 's first एल्बम to debut at number one and sold more than 11 लाख copies worldwide.
The subsequent tour following FanMails रिलीज became the highest grossing tour of all समय by a मादा band.
In 2002, Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in Honduras.
सात महीने बाद, T-Boz and Chilli released the समूह 's चौथी album 3D, which sold 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी, it featured unreleased vocals इससे Left नजर.
Billboard magazine ranked TLC as one of the greatest musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the बैंड accumulated ten top ten singles, four number one singles, चार multi-platinum albums, and चार Grammy Awards.
At the end of 1999, TLC was ranked as the seventh सबसे successful act of the 1990s by बिलबोर्ड.
in 2008, the group was inducted into the All समय hot 100 कलाकार हॉल of Fame by the same magazine, at 56th place.
That year it was also listed as the # 25 r & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years.
TLC has sold more than 65 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी और they are क्रमित as the second best selling female group of all समय, और the best selling मादा R & B group of all time.
In 2012, tlc ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 Greatest Women in Music, being ranked the number एक सब girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 American एनिमेटेड एडवेंचर फिल्मी उत्पादित by Walt डिज़्नी Feature Animation and distributed by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें.
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated क्लासिक, it is आधारित on the स्टोरी टार्ज़न of the Apes by Edgar राइस Burroughs, and is the तभी प्रमुख गति picture संस्करण of the story Tarzan प्रॉपर्टी to be animated.
Directed by Chris buck और Kevin लीमा with a पटकथा by Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, और Noni White, Tarzan सुविधाएँ the voices of Tony Goldwyn, Minnie Driver, Glenn Close, and रोजी O'Donnell साथ Brian धन्य, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the पिछला bona fide hit before the डिज़्नी slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing इसके predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of इसके release, its production budget of $ 130 लाख made it the most expensive animated film कभी made, जबतक topped by डिज़्नी 's own $ 140 लाख Treasure ग्रह in 2002.
It was also the first Disney animated विशेषता to open at # 1 since Pocahontas.
इस was the last major बक्सा office कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी Renaissance.

Oil platform Mittelplate in the North sea
An आयल platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल structure साथ facilities to ड्रिल कुएं, to extract and process oil and natural gas, and to temporarily store product जबतक it can be brought to shore for शोधन और marketing.
In many cases, the मंच contains facilities to house the workforce as खूब.
Depending on the circumstances, the platform may be फिक्स्ड to the ocean floor, may consist of an artificial द्वीप, or may float.
रिमोट subsea wells may also be connected to a platform by flow lines and by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea wells, or of एक or अधिक manifold centres for multiple कुएं.
वध is the killing of पशु, usually that of domestic livestock for food.
The पशु सबसे commonly slaughtered for food are cattle, जल buffalo ( for beef और veal ), sheep, goats ( for lamb और मटन ), pigs ( for pork ), घोड़े ( लिये horse meat ), और fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and बतखों and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).
The White House, the president 's official निवास and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the President of the संयुक्त States is the head of state and head of सरकारी of the United States.
As मुख्य of the executive branch और head of the संघीय government as a whole, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the highest political office in the United राज्य by influence and recognition.
the अध्यक्ष is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year term by an Electoral कॉलेज ( or by the House of प्रतिनिधि should the Electoral College fail to पुरस्कार an absolute majority of votes to कोई person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President अधिक than twice, and no one who रै served अधिक than two years of a term to which someone else was निर्वाचित may be निर्वाचित अधिक than once.
upon the death, resignation, or हटाना from office of an लाज़िम President, the Vice President assumes the office.
the अध्यक्ष जरूर be at least 35 years of age and a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the संयुक्त राज्य.
This list includes only those व्यक्तियों जो यहूद sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States संविधान, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
लिये American leaders before this ratification, see अध्यक्ष of the महाद्वीपीय Congress.
The list does not include any एक्टिंग Presidents under the twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into दफ्तर, और 44 presidencies, as Grover क्लीवलैंड served दो non-consecutive शर्तें and is गिने chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th अध्यक्ष.
Of the individuals elected as अध्यक्ष, four died in office of प्राकृतिक causes ( William हेनरी हैरिसन, Zachary टेलर, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) और एक resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George वॉशिंगटन, the पहला president, was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the चुनावी College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest समय in office with 32 दिनों in 1841, और Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve सालो, लकिन died shortly into his चौथी term in 1945.
he is the only president to serve more than two terms, और a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting presidents after हैरी ट्रूमैन, was passed to सीमा the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be निर्वाचित by men of all classes in 1828 after सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
वारेन Harding was the first elected बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920.
इतिहास records four presidents – John Q Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, बेंजामिन हैरिसन and जार्ज W. Bush – जो lost the popular vote लकिन assumed office.
जॉन F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman कैथोलिक आस्था, and the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, बराक Obama, is the पहला president of African descent.

Bolt action rimfire राइफल साथ suppressor
awm-f स्निपर rifle साथ attached suppressor.
A suppressor, sound suppressor, or ध्वनि moderator, is a यंत्र attached to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise, and usually the amount of muzzle फ्लैश, generated by firing the हथियार.
A suppressor can be used दोनो with a firearm and with संपीडित air gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a प्रक्षेप्य, विशेषकर one चलती faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
using a suppressor in long अलहदा शूटिंग ( i.e. greater than 300 मीटर ) can lessen, or retard, the report at the moment of impact, and बनाएँ the छाप of silence near the target.
The noise heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder साथ internal mechanisms to reduce the ध्वनि of firing by slowing the escaping propellant गैस and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
जल्दी suppressors were created around the शुरूआत of the 20th century by several inventors.
American आविष्कारक Hiram पर्सी Maxim ( not to be confused साथ Hiram Stevens Maxim, Hiram पर्सी 's father, and the inventor of the Maxim Machine गन ), is credited साथ inventing और selling the first commercially कामयाब मॉडल circa 1902 ( patented 30 कूच 1909 ).
Maxim दिया his यंत्र the trademarked नाम Maxim silencer.
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in समानांतर साथ the firearm suppressor by कहावत in the early 20th century, using अनेक of the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries ऑटोमोबाइल mufflers are स्टिल पुकारा silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in फैली उपयोग, हालांकि it रै since fallen out of favor with some, especially among the firearms industry, being replaced with the more वस्तुतः सटीक term sound suppressor or बस suppressor, क्युकी a `` ध्वनि suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic दबाव of a firearm discharging.
आम usage और U.S. विधान language एहसान the historically earlier पद, silencer.
in U.S. law, the शर्तें `` firearm muffler '' और `` firearm silencer '' हैं synonymous.
suppressors were regularly used by agents of the संयुक्त राज्य Office of Strategic Services, who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM.22 Long राइफल pistol during संसार War ii.
oss निदेशक William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the pistol for President फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt at the श्वेत House.
according to OSS research मुख्य Stanley Lovell, Donovan ( an old and विश्वसनीय friend of the अध्यक्ष ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a अक्षर.
While Roosevelt finished his message, डोनोवन turned his back और fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with him, घोषित what he था done और handed the smoking गन to the astonished president.
The अंग्रेजों soe ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod हत्या pistol with an integral suppressor was भी प्रयुक्त by the अमरीकी OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied यूरोपीय during the Second World War.
Beatrice `` bea '' Arthur ( may 13, 1922 – April 25, 2009 ) was an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, comedienne, and singer whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur हासिल fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude, and as डोरोथी Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom the सुनहरी Girls, winning Emmy Awards for both roles.
A stage actress both before and बाद उसके television कामयाबी, वो won the Tony पुरस्कार for Best Featured Actress in a musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the असली डाल of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3d computer-animated film आधारित on the Tekken video game series, उत्पादित by डिजिटल Frontier and वितरित by Asmik Ace Entertainment in संघ साथ Bandai entertainment.
the film premiered in North अमेरिका by Bandai Entertainment on July 26, 2011, and in Australia on July 27, 2011 in a special विशेष one-off स्क्रीनिंग.
It was released on सितंबर 3, 2011 in Japan.
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc on नवम्बर 22, 2011 for USA, and December 1, 2011 for जापानी.
This फिल्मी थी also released on DVD on November 22, 2011 ( 2D Version only ).
the फिल्मी was additionally included with the PlayStation 3 game, tekken Hybrid, and the निन्टेंडो 3DS शीर्षक, Tekken 3D : प्रधान संस्करण.
For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary neighborhood advocacy groups, देखिए पड़ोस संघ.
In the संयुक्त States, a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a रियल estate डेवलपर for the purpose of marketing, मैनेजिंग, और selling of homes and lots in a आवासीय subdivision.
It अनुदान the developer privileged मतदान rights in शासी the संघ, while allowing the डेवलपर to निकास financial और विधिक जिम्मेदारी of the संगठन, typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the association to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined क्रमांक of लोट.
Membership in the homeowners संघ by a residential खरीदार is typically a condition of purchase ; a खरीदार is n't given an option to reject it.
सबसे homeowner एसोसिएशन हैं incorporated, and are विषय to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations.
State oversight of homeowner एसोसिएशन is minimal, and mainly takes the form of कानून जिससे are inconsistent from state to state.
कुछ राज्य, such as Florida और California, have a large देह of homeowner association law, and some राज्य, such as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner संघ law.
the fastest growing रूप of housing in the United राज्य आज is common-interest developments ( cids ), a category that includes planned-unit developments of single-family घरों, condominiums, और cooperative apartments.
Since 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly common in the यूएसए.
the Community Associations Institute व्यापार संघ estimated that HOAs governed 24.8 million American homes और 62 million residents in 2010.
A prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
There are अनेक breeds of Guinea सुअर जिससे have महरूम विकसित since इसके domestication ca. 5000 BC.
breeds vary widely in रूप and purpose, ranging from show breeds साथ long, बहती hair to those in use as model organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the इन्का Empire in 1532, selective प्रजनन by indigenous South अमरीकी peoples resulted in अनेक varieties of घरेलू गिनी सूअर, which form the basis लिये some of the आधुनिक domestic breeds.
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock लिये food, और efforts at improving the Guinea सुअर as a food source continue to the modern era.
With the निर्यात of Guinea सूअर to Europe in the 15th century, the goal in breeding shifted to focus on the विकास of appealing pets.
To इस end, विभिन्न competitive breeding organizations यहूद संस्थापित by fanciers.
The American Cavy प्रजनक संघ, an adjunct to the American Rabbit प्रजनक Association, is the शासी body in the संयुक्त States and Canada.
The British Cavy Council governs cavy क्लब in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई National Cavy Council ) and नई Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ).
Each club publishes its own मानक of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible लिये प्रर्दशित.
नई breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though वहीँ are many breeds of Guinea सुअर, तभी a few breeds are commonly found on the दिखाएँ तालिका as pets.
Most Guinea pigs found as pets यहूद either मिला undesirable by breeders or यहूद करवाया to be सुखद pets regardless of how well वे meet the breed मानक of perfection.
the short hair, abyssinian, Peruvian और Sheltie ( उर्फ Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently seen as pets, and the former तीन are the कोर breeds in the इतिहास of the competitive showing of Guinea सूअर.
In addition to उनके standard form, nearly सब breeds come in a Satin variant.
satins, due to their खोखला hair shafts, possess coats of a खास gloss और चमक.
However, there is growing evidence that the जीनों responsible for the Satin कोट also can cause कठोर bone problems, सहित Osteodystrophy and पेजेट 's disease.
Showing साटन variations is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' associations क्युकी of animal welfare reasons.
सब cavy breeds have some साझा सामान्य मानकों : the सिर profile should be rounded, with large आँखें and large, चिकना ears.
The body should be strong and of compact build.
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly defined and thorough from root to tip.
ये standards हैं best मिले by long established, commonly bred breeds, as their breeders have had enough समय और animals to effectively नस्ल for these qualities.
The कोट colour आदर्श of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the smooth coated breeds, which have had well established, separate breeding lines for different colours.
राज्य स्कूलों ( also known as public स्कूलों or government schools ) generally refer to प्राथमिक or secondary schools mandated लिये or offered to all children without charge सशुल्क for, in whole or in part, by taxation.
the term may भी refer to संस्थानों of post-secondary education funded, in whole or in part, and overseen by government.
The राइबोसोम assembles polymeric protein molecules जिनकी sequence is controlled by the sequence of मेसेंजर rna molecules.
This is जरूरी by all living cells and associated viruses.
the राइबोसोम ( इससे ribonucleic acid और the Greek soma, meaning `` देह '' ) is a विशाल and complex आणविक machine, found within सब living cells, that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
Ribosomes कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ in the order specified by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules.
Ribosomes consist of दो major subunits—the छोटी ribosomal subunit reads the mRNA, while the large subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain.
प्रत्येक subunit is composed of एक or more ribosomal rna ( rRNA ) अणुओं and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of DNA एन्कोडिंग for a protein may be कॉपी many टाइम्स into messenger RNA ( mrna ) chains of a समान sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain and उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट for determining the correct sequence of अमीनो acids in a particular प्रोटीन.
अमीनो acids हैं चयनित, collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA अणुओं ), which डालें one part of the राइबोसोम and bind to the मेसेंजर rna chain.
the संलग्न amino acids हैं then linked together by another part of the ribosome.
Once the protein is उत्पादित, it can then 'fold ' to produce a विशिष्ट functional three-dimensional structure.
A ribosome is बना from देवालय of RNAs and proteins and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein.
प्रत्येक ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the mRNA pattern, जबकि the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the अमीनो acids.
When a राइबोसोम finishes reading an mRNA अणु, these two subunits विभाजित अलावा.
Ribosomes हैं ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity कि links अमीनो acids together is performed by the ribosomal rna.
Ribosomes from bacteria, archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, ढांचा, and the ratio of protein to RNA.
The differences in structure allow कुछ एंटीबायोटिक to kill bacteria by inhibiting उनके ribosomes, जबकि leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than एक राइबोसोम may move साथ a single mRNA कड़ी at one समय, each `` reading '' its sequence and producing a corresponding protein molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally resemble many सुविधाएँ of those in bacteria, reflecting the likely evolutionary उत्पत्ति of mitochondria.
Albert क्लॉड, Christian de Duve, and जार्ज Emil Palade were jointly awarded the Nobel पुरस्कार in Physiology or Medicine, in 1974, लिये the डिस्कवरी of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in रसायन 2009 was awarded to Venkatraman Ramakrishnan, Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure और mechanism of the ribosome.

अवलोकन of the Calvin cycle and कार्बन fixation
the light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are रासायनिक reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical प्रक्रियाओं on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : कार्बन fixation, reduction प्रतिक्रियाएँ, और ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( rubp ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this process occurs only जब light is उपलब्धियाँ.
पौधे do नहीं carry out the Calvin साईकिल by रात्रि.
वे, instead, रिलीज sucrose into the phloem from उनके starch reserves.
इस process happens when light is उपलब्धियाँ independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation, C4 carbon fixation, and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; कैम plants स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles every रात्रि और release it by day in order to मेक this process कार्य.
In गणित, a square क्रमांक or पूर्ण square is an पूर्णांक that is the square of an integer ; in other शब्द, it is the उत्पाद of some integer with itself.
For example, 9 is a वर्गाकार number, चूंकि it can be written as.
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a क्रमांक is नहीं the product, लकिन the समतुल्य घातांक, प्रायः सुनाया as `` squared ''.
The name square number comes from the name of the shape ; see below.
Square numbers हैं non-negative.
Another रास्ता of saying that a ( non-negative ) number is a वर्गाकार number, is कि its वर्गाकार roots are again integers.
लिये example, = ±3, so 9 is a square number.
A positive पूर्णांक that रै no perfect square divisors except 1 is called square-free.
लिये a non-negative integer, the th square number is, with being the zeroth वर्गाकार.
the अवधारणा of square can be विस्तारित to some अन्य क्रमांक systems.
If तर्कसंगत numbers हैं included, then a वर्गाकार is the ratio of two square integers, और, conversely, the ratio of दो square integers is a square ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting with 1, there are square numbers up to and including, जहाँ the expression represents the floor of the number.
the Era of शुभ Feelings चिह्नित a period in the political history of the United States that reflected a भाव of national purpose और a desire for एकता among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist पार्टी and an समाप्त to the bitter partisan disputes between it और the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the पहला पार्टी System.
President James Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan affiliation in making उसके nominations, साथ the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating पार्टियों altogether from national politics.
The period is so closely associated with Monroe 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative लक्ष्य कि his नाम and the era हैं virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings चिह्नित a transition in American politics साथ the end of the Federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812.
जबकि America was experiencing विकास and prosperity बाद the युद्ध with Britain, इस era also marks the पहला instance of आर्थिक troubles in the growing United States.
Mirroring the American प्रणाली proposed by Henry Clay, protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the संयुक्त States जटिल the tension between the North and दक्षिण with the coming of the first financial संकट.
जबकि the term “era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony because of the political turmoil, economic factors caused animosity between the North and South.
The designation of the period by historians as एक of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the इतिहास of the era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive, विशेषकर among गिरोहों within the Monroe administration and the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी.
the phrase “Era of शुभ feelings” was coined by बेंजामिन Russell, in the Boston Federalist newspaper, columbian Centinel, on July 12, 1817, following Monroe 's visit to बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स as भाग of उसके good होगा दौरे of अमेरिका.
Mariel Margaret `` मिया '' Hamm ( born March 17, 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी professional soccer खिलाड़ी.
hamm played many years as a आगे for the United राज्य women 's नेशनल सॉकर team and was a founding member of the वॉशिंगटन Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 अंतरराष्ट्रीय goals, अधिक than any other खिलाड़ी, male or female, in the history of सॉकर और is the third most capped female player in soccer history पीछे kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international मिलान.
hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the पहला two times that पुरस्कार was given ( in 2001 and 2002 ), and is सूचीबद्ध as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by pelé ).
She was inducted into the National सॉकर Hall of कीर्ति as well as the अलबामा Sports Hall of Fame and टेक्सास Sports Hall of Fame.
She is the लेखक of Go For the लक्ष्य : a Champion 's मार्गदर्शिका to जीतना in सॉकर और जीवन and appeared in the HBO documentary Dare to Dream : The स्टोरी of the U.S. Women 's सॉकर Team.
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon पुकारा hamm, `` Perhaps the सबसे important athlete of the पिछला 15 years. ''
hamm takes a corner लात.
The New York Red Bulls is an अमरीकी professional सॉकर team आधारित in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the नई York महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
the team competes in the Eastern Conference of Major League Soccer ( MLS ).
It is one of the ten charter क्लब of mls, having competed in the लीग चूंकि its inception.
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ), लकिन has गए through several name changes.
the team was originally known as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 season, the team was known as the MetroStars.
On कूच 9, 2006, the team was बेची to रेड सांड GmbH, leading to the team 's current नाम.
They are the only original MLS franchise नहीं to have won any significant trophy ( including regular season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) चूंकि inception.
the team 's बेहतरीन परिणाम in the mls was the MLS Cup final in 2008.
in the US खोलें Cup, the MetroStars reached three semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), before reaching उनके first फाइनल in 2003, खोने 1–0 to the शिकागो आग.
On August 26, 2000, the metros ' Clint mathis set an mls रिकार्ड by स्कोरिंग five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn.
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese, Tim हावर्ड, Tony Meola, Tab Ramos, alexi lalas, Clint Mathis, jozy Altidore, माइकल Bradley, Claudio Reyna, एडी Pope, Roberto Donadoni, Lothar Matthäus, एडोल्फो Valencia, Youri djorkaeff, Amado ग्वेरा, जुआन Pablo Ángel, thierry Henry, Juninho pernambucano, Jan Gunnar Solli, Rafael मार्ख़ेस, and Tim काहिल.

Confucianism, Taoism, और Buddhism are one, a painting in the litang स्टाइल portraying three men laughing by a नदी स्ट्रीम, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the क्रमांक of Buddhists in the world, or in many countries, is मुश्किल due to definitional issues as well as practical problems of enumeration.
To begin with, the religious beliefs, practices, and identities of East एशियाइ ( जो comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by any measure ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions including confucianism, the चाइनीज folk religion, Daoism, Shinto, और Korean shamanism.
Most followers of buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite अनुष्ठान of adherence such as taking शरण, making it मुश्किल to accurately अनुमान the number of practitioners.
An additional चुनौती is the दुश्मनी of several national governments ( often Communist ones such as चीन or उत्तर कोरियाई ) to religion generally or to buddhism specifically.
सरकारी policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of धार्मिक adherence, resulting in आधिकारिक योग that may drastically underestimate the number of धार्मिक practitioners in ये countries.
Estimate of the विश्वव्यापी बौद्ध population range from 350 million to over one billion, but cluster nearer to the first figure.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a फिगर of 397 million.
by प्रमुख शाखाओं, the numbers हैं as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, including East Asian buddhism, with no कम than 185 million adherents, and संभवतः several times that many ( again, depending on definitional मुद्दे ).
इस is the predominant रूप of Buddhism practiced in China, South Korea, Japan, ताईवान, Singapore, and वियतनाम.
( 2 ) थेरवाद buddhism, साथ no fewer than 125 लाख adherents.
इस is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in Cambodia, Thailand, Laos, श्री Lanka, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana buddhism, साथ लगभग 20 million adherents.
This form predominates in the greater Tibetan and Mongolian regions, as खूब as in the Himalayas.
Besides the independent देशों of Mongolia और Bhutan, और विभिन्न territories within what is now पश्चिमी China, Vajrayana is परंपरागत to निश्चित regions of Russia ( e.g. कालमिकिया, Buryatia ), India ( e.g. लद्दाख, Sikkim ), और नेपाल ( e.g. Khumbu ).
वज्रयान, also known as तिब्बती Buddhism, is प्रायः conflated with Tantric Buddhism, लकिन this is imprecise, as Shingon और other forms of East एशियाई Buddhism भी practice tantra.
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka, थाईलैंड, Cambodia, लाओस, Burma, Bhutan, and मंगोल ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on कैसा one calculates चाइनीज और other East Asian adherents, this फिगर might expand to include several more देशों.
in जोड, Buddhism is the state धर्म of Cambodia and भूटान, and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of थाईलैंड and Sri Lanka.
In उत्तरी India and Nepal, the जमीन where buddhism was born, the religion severely declined during the first millennium.
whether this decline थी due to the Islamic conquest of northern India, or to अन्य factors, remains controversial.
See the आलेख Decline of Buddhism in India.
जेम्स Butler Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – अगस्त 2, 1876 ), बेहतर known as जंगली विधेयक Hickok, थी a folk नायिका of the अमरीकी बूढ़ा West.
His skills as a gunfighter and scout, along साथ his reputation as a lawman, provided the basis for his fame, although some of his reported exploits are fictionalized.
born and raised on a फार्म in rural इलिनोइस, Hickok गई वेस्ट at आयु 18 as a fugitive from justice, first working as a stagecoach driver, before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of कान्सास and नेब्रास्का.
He fought लिये the Union Army during the American Civil War, and gained publicity after the युद्ध as a स्काउट, marksman, actor, and professional gambler.
between his law-enforcement duties and gambling, जिससे easily overlapped, hickok was शामिल in several notable shootouts.
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal & Mann 's Saloon in deadwood, Dakota territory ( अभी South Dakota ).
Artist 's conception of the जिज्ञासा रोवर vaporizing rock on मंगल.
The रोवर उतरा on Mars in August 2012.
a Mars rover is an automated motor गाडी जिससे propels itself आरपार the surface of the planet मंगल बाद landing.
Rovers have अनेक advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory, they can be directed to interesting features, they can place themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic गाडी कंट्रोल.
There have been four successful robotically operated Mars rovers.
the Jet Propulsion प्रयोगशाला managed the Mars Pathfinder mission और its अभी inactive Sojourner rover.
It currently manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission 's क्रियाशील Opportunity rover and निष्क्रिय Spirit, और, as part of the Mars Science प्रयोगशाला mission, the Curiosity rover.
a वित्तीय audit, or अधिक accurately, an audit of वित्तीय कथन, is the verification of the financial statements of a विधिक entity, with a दृश्य to express an ऑडिट opinion.
the audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable परख, but not absolute परख, कि the financial statements are प्रस्तुत fairly, in all material respects, and/or give a true और मेला view in accordance साथ the financial रिपोर्टिंग फ्रेमवर्क.
the purpose of an audit is provide and objective स्वतंत्र examination of the financial statements, which increases the मान and credibility of the financial statements produced by management, यूँ increase user विश्वास in the financial statement, reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of पूंजी of the preparer of the financial statements.
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing accountants जो are experts in वित्तीय reporting.
The वित्तीय audit is one of many परख functions provided by हिसाब firms.
अनेक organizations separately employ or hire internal auditors, who do not attest to financial reports लकिन focus mainly on the internal controls of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place limited रिलायंस on the कार्य of आतंरिक auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and सटीकता in the financial disclosures made by an संगठन, therefore होता likely to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the International Standards on auditing ( ISA ) issued by the International auditing और Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark for ऑडिट process.
Almost सब jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or a local variation of the ISA.
Dollar सिक्के have been minted in the United States in सुनहरा, silver, और base metal versions.
The term silver डालर is often प्रयुक्त for any large श्वेत metal coin जारी by the संयुक्त States with a फेस value of one dollar, although purists insist that a dollar is not चांदी जबतक it contains कुछ of that metal.
Silver डॉलर, the first dollar coin issue, were minted beginning in 1794.
सुनहरा dollars and gold-colored dollars have भी महरूम उत्पादित by the United States.
The Sacagawea और अध्यक्षीय dollars are often referred to as `` golden dollars ''.
in आधुनिक times, dollar coins have नहीं महरूम very popular in the संयुक्त States.
Despite efforts by the government to promote their use, सबसे Americans currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
In straight and level उड़ान lift ( l ) बराबरी weight ( W ).
In a banked फेरे of 60°, lift equals double the weight ( L=2W ).
The pilot अनुभवों 2g and a doubled weight.
The steeper the bank, the greater the g-forces.
इस top-fuel dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds.
This is a horizontal त्वरण of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g इससे गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a term for accelerations felt as वज़न और measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a force, per se, but a force per unit mass.
Since such a फ़ोर्स is perceived as a weight, कोई g-force can be described as a `` weight per ईकाई mass '' ( see the synonym विशिष्ट weight ).
The g-force acceleration अधिनियमों as a multiplier of weight-like forces for प्रत्येक unit of an object 's mass, और ( सहेजें लिये certain electromagnetic फ़ोर्स प्रभाव ) is the cause of an object 's त्वरण in relation to free-fall.
This acceleration experienced by an object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces एक्टिंग on an ऑब्जेक्ट free to मूव.
the accelerations that are not produced by गम्भीरता are termed proper accelerations, and it is only these that are measured in g-force इकाई.
वे कारण stresses and strains on objects.
क्युकी of these strains, large g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation एक्टिंग alone does नहीं produce a g-force, even though g-forces हैं expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity.
यूँ, the standard gravitational त्वरण at the धरती 's surface produces g-force तभी indirectly, as a result of प्रतिरोध to it by mechanical forces.
the 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward direction by the मैदान, keeping the ऑब्जेक्ट इससे going into free-fall.
The upward फ़ोर्स from the ground ensures that an ऑब्जेक्ट at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating सापेक्ष to the free-fall कंडीशन, जिससे is the पाथ that the object would follow जब falling freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' शर्तें अंदर a freely गिरना elevator falling toward the धरती 's बीच ( in vacuum ), or ( to शुभ सन्निकटन ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
These are उदाहरण of coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity ) without a sensation of वज़न.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is produced, is synonymous with weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at सही angles to them, उचित and coordinate accelerations हैं the same, and any निर्देशांक acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration.
an उदाहरण here is a rocket in free स्पेस, in जिससे simple परिवर्तन in velocity are produced by the engines, and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur पकड़कर a lituus, the curved wand often used as a symbol of augury on Roman सिक्के
The augur थी a priest and official in the classical world, विशेषकर प्राचीन Rome and etruria.
His main role was to interpret the होगा of the gods by studying the उड़ान of birds : whether they हैं flying in groups or alone, what noises they make as they मक्खी, दिशा of flight and what kind of birds they are.
इस थी ज्ञात as `` लेने the auspices. ''
the ceremony और फलन of the augur was central to any major undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war, कॉमर्स, and religion.
The Roman historian livy तनावों the महत्व of the augurs : `` Who does not जान कि this city थी founded only after लेने the auspices, that सबकुछ in war and in peace, at home and abroad, was done only बाद लेने the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent community in southeastern Michigan.
it is the दूसरी largest city in Oakland County in the U.S. राज्य of Michigan.
Its जनसांख्यिकी was 79,740 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor.
farmington Hills consistently बाँधने as एक of the safest cities in the संयुक्त States, as well as in the state of Michigan.
In 2010, the area क्रमित as the 30th safest नगर in America.
Although the two शहरों have पृथक services और addresses, Farmington और Farmington Hills हैं प्रायः thought of as the वही community.
Features of the community include a recently संवर शहर, boutiques, a vintage सिनेमा, numerous restaurants, exotic car dealerships, आर्ट galleries, and public पार्क including Heritage Park.
There are several historical साइट including the Longacre हाउस and the Governor warner Mansion.
Both cities हैं served by Farmington Public Schools.
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves as a major business center लिये the greater Detroit क्षेत्रफल.
present-day impression of a लेट Bronze आयु seal
कस्बा मुहर ( मेट्रिक्स ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a device for making an छाप in wax, मिट्टी, पेपर, or some other मीडियम, including an embossment on paper, and is also the छाप thus made.
The असली purpose was to authenticate a document, a wrapper लिये one such as a आधुनिक envelope, or the cover of a container or package holding valuables or other objects.
The sealing प्रक्रम is essentially that of a mould, साथ the final image represented on the device लिये बनाना the impression by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) राहत or intaglio.
The seal-making यंत्र is भी referred to as the मुहर matrix or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the high भाग of the matrix touch, the seal is ज्ञात as a शुष्क seal ; in all अन्य cases a liquid or liquified मीडियम ( such as स्याही or मोम ) is प्रयुक्त, प्रायः in another color than the paper.
For विधिक उद्देश्य, the definition of a seal may be extended to शामिल रबर stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
in the United States, the शब्द `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the मुहर डिज़ाइन ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ), जिससे may be प्रयुक्त in a किस्में of contexts including architectural जमावट, on flags, or on official letterheads.
यूँ, लिये example, the Great Seal of the संयुक्त States, among अन्य uses, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; और several of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags.
In यूरोपीय, although coats of arms और heraldic badges may well विशेषता in such contexts as well as on seals, the seal डिज़ाइन in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
the study of seals is ज्ञात as sigillography or sphragistics.
groundhog Day ( Pennsylvania German : Grundsaudaag, Murmeltiertag ) is a day मनाये on फ़रवरी 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy जब a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day, तब spring will come early ; if it is सनी, the groundhog will supposedly देखिए इसके shadow and retreat वापस into its burrow, and the winter weather will continue लिये six अधिक सप्ताह.
Modern customs of the holiday involve जश्न where जल्दी morning festivals are आयोजित to देखें the groundhog emerging इससे its burrow.
In southeastern Pennsylvania, Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow lodges ) celebrate the अवकाश साथ fersommlinge, social कार्यक्रम in which खाना is served, भाषणों हैं made, and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) हैं performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language बोला at the event, and those who बोलो English pay a penalty, प्रायः in the form of a nickel, dime, or क्वार्टर प्रति शब्द बोला, with the money put into a कटोरी in the center of the table.
The largest groundhog Day celebration is held in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular परंपरा, received widespread attention as a result of the 1993 film groundhog दिन, which was set in Punxsutawney, pa ( though filmed primarily in वुडस्टॉक, il ) and portrayed punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution image of Tampa Bay region
the tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate ( koppen Cfa ), with गरम and आर्द्र summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier winters with जमने temperatures occurring every 2–3 सालो.
The area experiences a significant summer wet ऋतु, as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation जलप्रपात in the months of June through September.
The area is सूचीबद्ध by the संयुक्त States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as being in hardiness zone 10, जिससे is about the northern सीमा of where coconut हथेलियां and royal palms can be grown.
highs usually range between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 और 35 °C ) year round.
Though ज्ञात for hot ग्रीष्म, tampa 's official ऊँची रै never पहुँचे 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time रिकार्ड temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. पीटर्सबर्ग 's all-time record ऊँची is exactly 100 °f ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a प्रायद्वीप between Tampa Bay और the Gulf of Mexico, and much of the नगर of Tampa lies on a छोटी peninsula jutting out into tampa खाड़ी.
इस proximity to large bodies of water दोनो moderates temperatures and introduces large amounts of आर्द्रता into the atmosphere.
In सामान्य, the local communities farthest from the coast have larger temperature सीमाएँ, both during a single दिन और throughout the seasons of the साल.
a diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, showing various properties across the range of बारंबारता और wavelengths
The इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation.
the `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a अलग meaning, and is instead the characteristic वितरण of electromagnetic radiation उत्सर्जित or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of kilometers bas to a भिन्न of the आकार of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, जबकि it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is अनन्त और continuous.
Most भाग of the electromagnetic spectrum हैं प्रयुक्त in विज्ञान for spectroscopic और other probing interactions, as तरीके to study और characterize matter.
In addition, radiation इससे various भाग of the spectrum has found many other उपयोग for communications and manufacturing ( see इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation for अधिक अनुप्रयोग ).
Legend
Franklin delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; जनवरी 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), also ज्ञात by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a सेंट्रल figure in संसार कार्यक्रम during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a समय of विश्वव्यापी economic अवसाद और total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic पार्टी and the तभी American अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित to more than दो terms, he निर्मित a नई सौदे Coalition कि realigned American politics after 1932, as उसके domestic policies defined American liberalism for the मध्य third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here again `` as उसके campaign थीम, FDR पराजित incumbent Republican हर्बर्ट Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his निजी victory over पोलियो, fdr 's unfailing optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the national स्पिरिट.
he worked closely साथ British प्रधान Minister Winston Churchill and सोवियत General Secretary Joseph Stalin in अग्रणी the Allies विरूद्ध Germany and Japan in World War ii, and restoring समृद्धि to the nation 's अर्थव्यवस्था.
In his पहला सौ days in office, which began कूच 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation और issued a profusion of executive orders कि instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce राहत ( सरकारी jobs लिये the unemployed ), रिकवरी ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of वॉल गली, बैंको and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937, लकिन then relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition कि formed in 1937 prevented his पैकिंग the Supreme Court or गुजर any considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the राहत कार्यक्रम when बेरोजगारी diminished दौरान World युद्ध ii.
Most of the regulations on कारोबार were ended परिचय 1975–85, except for the regulation of Wall Street by the प्रतिभूति and Exchange आयोग, which still exists.
Along साथ several छोटी programs, major surviving programs शामिल the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed in 1935.
as World युद्ध ii loomed बाद 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China and the आक्रामकता of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong राजनयिक and financial support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His लक्ष्य was to make America the `` आर्सेनल of Democracy `` which would सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional स्वीकृति, provided lend-lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
साथ very दमदार national support, he made युद्ध on Japan and Germany after the जापानी attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` date जिससे will live in infamy ``.
he supervised the mobilization of the U.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the Allied war effort.
As an active सैन्य leader, रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall war strategy on दो fronts कि ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom बमबारी.
in 1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese अमरीकी civilians.
बेरोजगारी dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new हाइट्स as लाखो of people स्थानांतरित to new jobs in war centers, और 16 million मेन and 300,000 women यहूद drafted or volunteered for सैन्य service.
रूज़वेल्ट dominated the American political झाँकी not only during the twelve years of his presidency, लकिन also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that निर्मित the Fifth Party प्रणाली.
fdr 's नई Deal Coalition united labor unions, big नगर मशीने, white ethnics, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और rural white Southerners.
he also influenced the later creation of the United Nations and bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents, along साथ अब्राहम lincoln and जार्ज Washington.
A liberal Democrat, रूज़वेल्ट पारिभाषित his ideological position as `` a little left of center. ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer to a committee made up of members of दोनो chambers of a bicameral विधानमंडल.
in other contexts, it refers to a committee with members from अधिक than one संगठन.
the विनियमन of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; अंतर्गत the Tenth Amendment to the United राज्य संविधान, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to परमिट, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as कॉंग्रेस may विनियमित it as भाग of interstate कॉमर्स with laws like the मन Act.
In most राज्य, prostitution is माना a misdemeanor in the category of public order अपराधों, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
फिलहाल, नेवाडा is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised statutes.
Only 8 काउंटी currently contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution हैं illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ), Washoe काउंटी ( which contains रेनो ), Carson City, Douglas काउंटी, और lincoln County.
The अन्य काउंटी theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of these counties फिलहाल have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and जीना बंद of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada विधि, as elsewhere in the country.
As साथ other countries, prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : गली prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The नेशनल flag of the United राज्य of America, often बस referred to as the American ध्वज, consists of thirteen बराबर horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white, with a blue आयताकार in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing पचास small, white, five-pointed सितारों arranged in nine offset आड़ा rows of छह stars ( top और bottom ) प्रत्यावर्ती with rows of पाँच stars.
The 50 सितारों on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America और the 13 stripes represent the thirteen अंग्रेजों colonies that declared स्वतंत्रता from the Kingdom of ग्रेट Britain and became the first राज्य in the संघ.
Nicknames लिये the ध्वज include the `` Stars and धारियाँ '', `` Old महिमा ``, and `` The star-spangled Banner. ''
इण्डिया is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight states और seven संघ territories.
The states and territories are further subdivided into districts and so on.
Congressional जिले लिये the 113th संयुक्त राज्य Congress
2010 Census change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional districts, starting in 2013, as a result of the 2010 census.
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, इससे 2003 to 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2000 census.
This is a पूरा सूची of congressional जिले लिये प्रतिनिधित्व in the United States House of Representatives.
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of जिले हैं determined after each census, although in कुछ cases states have changed the सीमाएँ more than once per जनसांख्यिकी.
This list includes the 435 current and over 200 obsolete जिले.
For उदाहरण, चूंकि the 2000 census, Nebraska has had three जिले, but it used to have as अनेक as six.
in the first decade of the twenty-first century, टेक्सास had 32 जिले, but रै since added चार due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census.
Other states have lost districts since the number of congressional seats has been set at 435 by statute.
Also included यहाँ are non-voting delegations : six current and चार obsolete.
The सीमाएँ of districts often शिफ़्ट with each redistricting.
over time, the प्रदेश and demographics represented in a ज़िला can change substantially.
furthermore, जिले sometimes retain the वही सीमाएँ जबकि changing उनके district संख्याएँ.
Mariah कैरी ( born कूच 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, actress, and philanthropist.
अंतर्गत the guidance of कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड executive टॉमी Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut स्टुडियो album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her विवाह to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), कैरी was established as कोलंबिया 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made म्यूज़िक history when इसके second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with बॉयज ii मेन, खर्च a record सोलह weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one सोंग in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate from उसके R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip हॉप.
इस musical बदलें became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which समय Carey had separated इससे mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, and हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million रिकॉर्डिंग contract साथ वर्जिन Records.
Before the रिलीज of उसके first विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical and emotional विश्लेषण and was hospitalized लिये severe थकावट.
following the film 's poor reception, वो was bought out of her रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध for $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a decline in उसके career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and बाद an unsuccessful period, returned to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक charts साथ the Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
इसके second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most कामयाब single of the 2000s, and was later named `` सोंग of the दशक '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received अभिनीत role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` भेदन Performance पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ Springs International Film पर्व, and Black रील and NAACP चित्र Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey has sold अधिक than 200 million records worldwide, बनाना her one of the best-selling music कलाकारों of all समय.
in 1998, वो was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music पुरस्कार.
कैरी was also named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
according to the Recording Industry संघ of America, वो is the तीसरा best-selling मादा artist in the United States, with 63.5 लाख certified albums.
साथ the release of `` Touch my Body `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained her eighteenth number one सिंगल in the United States, more than any other solo कलाकार.
In 2012, Carey was क्रमित second on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम Women in Music ''.
Aside इससे उसके वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, Carey has जीती five ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 World Music Awards, 11 American म्यूज़िक Awards, और 31 Billboard Music पुरस्कार.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World Records, वो is famed for her five-octave vocal range, शक्ति, melismatic style and हस्ताक्षर use of the whistle register.
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a बादल is a visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the माहौल above the surface of a planetary देह.
These suspended अणु are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere हैं पढ़ाई in the cloud भौतिकी branch of meteorology.
दो processes, possibly acting together, can lead to air becoming संतृप्त ; cooling the एयर or adding जल वाष्प to the air.
in general, वर्षण होगा fall to the surface ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga, जिससे evaporates before reaching the surface.
The international बादल classification system is आधारित on the fact clouds in उनके most basic forms can दिखाएँ free-convective upward विकास like cumulus, appear in non-convective layered sheets such as stratus, or take the form of thin fibrous wisps, as in the मामला of cirrus.
Prefixes are प्रयुक्त in connection with clouds to एक्स्प्रेस विसंगतियाँ or complexities in ये basic forms or to specify middle or high ऊँचाई ranges.
These शामिल strato- for low clouds साथ limited convection कि form mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- लिये जटिल highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- लिये thick layered clouds of कुछ complexity that can produce मॉडरेट to भारी precipitation, alto- for middle clouds, and cirro- लिये high clouds ; the latter two of जिससे may be of simple or मध्यम complex ढांचा.
Whether or not a बादल is low, middle, or high स्तर depends on how far above the ground its base forms.
Cloud प्रकार with significant लंबवत extent can रूप in the low or middle altitude ranges depending on the moisture content of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the लोकप्रिय adaptation of ल्यूक Howard 's cloud categorization system, which began to spread in लोकप्रियता during December 1802.
synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to रिकार्ड and रपट the types of tropospheric बादल visible at each scheduled observation time based on the height and physical रूप of the clouds.
जबकि a majority of clouds रूप in Earth 's troposphere, there are occasions when बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three प्रमुख परतों of the atmosphere जहाँ clouds may be seen are collectively ज्ञात as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, जिससे together मेक up the heterosphere that marks the परिवर्तन to outer स्पेस.
Clouds have been observed on अन्य planets and moons भीतर the Solar System, लकिन, due to their different तापमान विशेषताएँ, they are composed of other substances such as methane, ammonia, और sulfuric एसिड.
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas भीतर the houston–sugar Land–Baytown महानगर area.
As of the 2010 census, the population was 291,309.
Its काउंटी seat is Galveston.
League नगर is the largest city in galveston County in terms of जनसांख्यिकी ; url_http between 2000 और 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city.

the Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference, is the oldest Division I college athletic सम्मेलन in the United राज्य.
इसके twelve member institutions ( which हैं primarily flagship research विश्वविद्यालयों in उनके respective states, well-regarded academically, and with relatively विशाल student enrollment ) हैं located primarily in the Midwest, stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east.
The सम्मेलन competes in the NCAA 's प्रभाग I ; its फ़ुटबॉल टीमों compete in the Football Bowl subdivision ( fbs ), formerly known as Division I-A, the highest level of ncaa प्रतियोगिता in that sport.
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or, in two मामले, their parent university systems ) also are members of the कमेटी on Institutional Cooperation, a leading शैक्षणिक and research consortium.
despite the conference 's नाम, the बिग टेन actually consists of 12 schools, following the addition of The पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in 1993 और the University of nebraska–lincoln in 2011.
in 2014, the conference होगा विस्तार to 14 members with the परिवर्धन of the University of मेरीलैंड, College Park and rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.
it is नहीं to be confused with the Big 12 Conference, which रै only टेन schools and represents a different प्रदेश of the देश.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky बना in Scotland using a घट still distillation process at a single डिस्टिलरी, with malted barley as the only अनाज ingredient.
As साथ any Scotch व्हिस्की, a सिंगल malt Scotch must be आसुत in Scotland और matured in oak casks in Scotland लिये at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is आसुत from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of दाने can be malted ( for उदाहरण, barley, rye and wheat are all grains which can be malted ) ; however, in the मामला of single malt Scotch, जौ is सदा the only अनाज used.
`` Single '' indicates that सब the malts in the बोतल आइये from a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple distilleries हैं पुकारा `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of both barley and non-barley grain whisky, but this is no longer the मामला.
Under the शब्दावली स्थापित by the SWR 2009, a `` blended malt Scotch व्हिस्की '' is a mixture of single malt स्कॉच whiskies, not a mixture of malted जौ whisky and non-barley व्हिस्की ; those हैं पुकारा `` blended Scotch व्हिस्की '', without the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior labelling conventions.
The आयु statement on a बोतल of single malt Scotch is the number of सालो the whisky spent maturing in cask.
As बहुत few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the आयु बयान reflects the आयु of the youngest malt in the मिक्सर.
a texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, लिये उदाहरण, the खूबसूरत 'northern lights ' chord..., in a बहुत interesting वितरण of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a निलंबित झांझ roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
in contrast to अधिक traditional musical textures, sound mass composition `` minimizes the महत्व of individual pitches in preference लिये texture, timbre, और डायनामिक्स as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
विकसित इससे the modernist tone clusters और स्प्रेड to orchestral writing by the late 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( एडवर्ड्स 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may बनाएँ or be used with sound द्रव्यमान include विस्तारित techniques ऐसे as muted पीतल or strings, आतुर tonguing, wide vibrato, extreme सीमाएँ, and glissandos.
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb, pauline Oliveros ' Sound पैटर्न for कोरस ( 1961 ), Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass लिये कोरस ( 1963–1964 ), and नैंसी वैन de vate.
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of गायन और instrumental क्लस्टर, choral speech, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
A very जल्दी example is the opening of jean-féry Rebel 's ballet लेस Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a gradually cumulating orchestral क्लस्टर of all सात notes of the d minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
a later example is the third movement of Ruth क्रॉफर्ड seeger 's String Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently Phill Niblock 's multiple ड्रोन based music serves as an example.
the use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with debussy and edgard Varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत instrumental parts so that they होता fuse into one ensemble timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other उदाहरण include European `` textural '' रचनाएं of the fifties और sixties such as krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the पीड़ितों of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) and györgy ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works जैसे Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers साथ works using this technique include Henryk górecki, karel Husa, Witold Lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
ध्वनि mass techniques also appear in the music of जार्ज crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

Pupils in rural Sudan, 2002
A student is a learner, or किसी who attends an educational institution.
In कुछ nations, the English term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those who attend विश्वविद्यालयों, जबकि a schoolchild अंतर्गत the age of eighteen is पुकारा a pupil in English ( or an equivalent in other languages ), although in the संयुक्त राज्य a person नामांकित in ग्रेड K–12 is often called a student.
in its widest use, student is used लिये anyone who is सीखना.
ऑस्ट्रेलिया is a continent comprising mainland ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Tasmania, New Guinea, Seram, possibly timor, and neighbouring आइलैंड्स.
The continent is sometimes known in तकनीकी contexts by the names Sahul, Australinea or Meganesia, to distinguish it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the सात traditional continents in the English धारणा.
New Zealand is not part of the continent of Australia, but of the पृथक, submerged continent of zealandia.
zealandia and Australia are both part of the wider regions known as Australasia और महासागरीय.
The महाद्वीप of Australia lies on a continental शेल्फ overlain by shallow seas which divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura समुद्र and Torres Strait between mainland Australia and New Guinea, and बास Strait between mainland ऑस्ट्रेलिया और Tasmania.
When sea levels were lower during the Pleistocene ice आयु, including the last glacial अधिकतम about 18,000 BC, they were connected by शुष्क land.
During the पास्ट टेन thousand years, उठती sea स्तर overflowed the lowlands और separated the continent into today 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the two mountainous islands of New गिनी and Tasmania.
geologically, a continent extends to the edge of its continental शेल्फ, so the now-separate islands हैं considered भाग of the महाद्वीप.
Due to the स्प्रेड of animals, fungi and पौधे आरपार the single Pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota.
Central पार्क is nearly twice as big as the world 's second-smallest देश, Monaco.
Historically इसके reservoirs यहूद important components of the city 's water सप्लाई.
पर्यावरणीय issues in New York City are प्रभावित by the city 's size, घनत्व, abundant public transportation अवसंरचना, और स्थान at the mouth of the Hudson नदी.
नई यॉर्क 's जनसांख्यिकी density has पर्यावरणीय pros and cons.
It facilitates the highest द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the United राज्य, लकिन also concentrates pollution.
Gasoline consumption in the नगर is at the rate the national average was in the 1920s, and greenhouse gas emissions are a fraction of the national average, at 7.1 metric टन per person per year, below San फ्रांसिस्को, at 11.2 metric tons, and the नेशनल औसत, at 24.5 metric टन.
नई York नगर accounts लिये only 1 % of United States greenhouse gas emissions while housing 2.7 % of its population.
in September 2012, नई York थी named the # 1 `` अमेरिका 's Dirtiest नगर, '' by a travel+leisure readership survey that रेटेड the environmental विशेषता of 35 prominent cities in the संयुक्त States.
Atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of and the most populous नगर in the U.S. state of Georgia, साथ an estimated 2011 population of 432,427.
अटलांटा is the cultural and आर्थिक बीच of the Atlanta metropolitan क्षेत्रफल, home to 5,457,831 लोगों और the ninth largest metropolitan area in the संयुक्त States.
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton काउंटी, और a छोटी portion of the city extends eastward into dekalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad lines, and the city rose from the ashes of the Civil War to become a national center of commerce.
in the decades following the Civil अधिकारों गति, during which the city earned a reputation as `` too busy to hate '' लिये the प्रगतिशील दृश्य of its citizens and leaders, Atlanta attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary transportation हब of the southeastern संयुक्त States, via राजमार्ग, railroad, and एयर, with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport being the world 's busiest विमानक्षेत्र चूंकि 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) world नगर, '' and, with a gross domestic product of US $ 270 billion, atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among संसार cities and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse, dominant sectors include logistics, professional और business services, media operations, सरकारी administration, and higher education.
Topographically, अटलांटा is marked by रोलिंग hills and dense tree coverage.
पुनरोद्धार of अटलांटा 's neighborhoods, initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics, has intensified in the 21st century, altering the नगर 's demographics, politics, और संस्कृति.
A 1947 propaganda comic book published by the Catechetical Guild Educational Society raising the specter of a Communist takeover
McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or treason बगैर proper लिहाज़ for evidence.
It also means `` the अभ्यास of making unfair allegations or using unfair investigative techniques, especially in order to restrict dissent or राजनैतिक criticism. ''
The term has its origins in the period in the संयुक्त States known as the Second Red scare, lasting roughly इससे 1950 to 1956 and characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on American संस्थानों और espionage by सोवियत agents.
originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of रिपब्लिकन u.s. Senator Joseph McCarthy of Wisconsin, `` mccarthyism '' soon took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar प्रयत्न.
the पद is भी now प्रयुक्त more generally to describe लापरवाह, unsubstantiated accusations, as खूब as demagogic हमले on the character or patriotism of political adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, हज़ारों of अमेरिकी were accused of being Communists or communist sympathizers and became the subject of aggressive investigations and questioning before सरकारी or private-industry panels, समितियों and एजेंसियों.
The प्राथमिक targets of such suspicions were government कर्मचारी, those in the entertainment उद्योग, educators and संघ activists.
Suspicions यहूद प्रायः दिए credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, and the level of threat posed by a person 's real or supposed leftist associations or मान्यताओं was often greatly अतिरंजित.
अनेक लोगों suffered loss of employment and/or destruction of उनके careers ; some even suffered imprisonment.
Most of ये punishments आए about through trial verdicts later विकल, laws कि would be declared unconstitutional, dismissals for कारण later declared illegal or actionable, or extra-legal procedures that would come into सामान्य disrepute.
the most famous examples of McCarthyism शामिल the भाषणों, investigations, and hearings of सीनेटर McCarthy himself ; the हॉलीवुड ब्लैकलिस्ट, associated with hearings conducted by the House Un-American Activities Committee ( HUAC ) ; और the various anti-communist activities of the Federal Bureau of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) under निदेशक J. Edgar Hoover.
McCarthyism was a widespread social and सांस्कृतिक phenomenon that प्रभावित all levels of समाज and was the सोर्स of a great deal of बहस and conflict in the United राज्य.
नेपोलियन is a fictional character and the प्रमुख antagonist in George Orwell 's Animal Farm.
जबकि he is at पहला a common फार्म pig, he gets rid of Snowball, another pig जिससे shares the power.
He then takes लाभ of the animals ' uprising विरूद्ध their masters to आखिरकार become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm, '' which he turns into a dictatorship.

The वरुण Canada प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला regional-scale underwater ocean observatory कि plugs directly into the अंतरजाल.
चूंकि December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean वैज्ञानिकों run deep-water experiments from लैब्स and universities around the world.
Along with its sister प्रोजेक्ट, VENUS, वरुण offers a unique approach to ocean विज्ञान.
traditionally, समंदर वैज्ञानिकों have relied on infrequent जलयान क्रूज़ or space-based satellites to carry out उनके research, while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely संचालित crawler.

In the 1960s, the name was transferred to चकमा 's mid-size प्रविष्टि.
