Elizabeth II ( एलिज़ाबेथ Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, और their territories और dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is परम् Governor of the गिरिजाघर of England और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the title of defender of the Faith as part of her पूरा title.
on her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and महारानी regnant of सात independent राष्ट्रमंडल countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, New Zealand, दक्षिण Africa, Pakistan और Ceylon.
इससे 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of her realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the पहला four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the सुलेमान Islands, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, Saint विंसेंट और the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and बारबूडा और Saint किट्स and Nevis.
उसके reign of सालो is currently the दूसरी longest लिये a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth थी born in London and शिक्षित privately at home.
Her father acceded to the सिंहासन as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his bhai Edward VIII, इससे which समय she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second संसार युद्ध, in which she served in the Auxiliary territorial Service.
In 1947, वो शादीशुदा Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has four children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and एडवर्ड.
उसके coronation सेवा took place in 1953 and was the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many ऐतिहासिक विज़िट and meetings शामिल a state visit to the Republic of आयरलैंड and reciprocal visits to और इससे the Pope.
The महारानी रै seen major constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the संयुक्त Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of उसके children, the births of her grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of वेल्स, and the celebration of milestones such as उसके चांदी, सुनहरी, and Diamond jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, क्रमशः.
Major events in the Queen 's शासनकाल have शामिल the परेशानियों in Northern आयरलैंड, the falklands War, wars साथ इराकी and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow लिये her which include the death of her father at 56, the हत्या of प्रिंस Philip 's ताऊ, रब Mountbatten, the breakdown of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of her पूर्व daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The महारानी has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal परिवार and republican sentiments, but support for the monarchy और her personal popularity remain ऊँची.
Christianity is the largest religion सूचीबद्ध by australians in the national census.
In the 2011 Census, 61.1 % of australians यहूद listed as ईसाई.
Australia रै no official state religion और the Australian Constitution protects स्वतंत्रता of religion.
The presence of Christianity in ऑस्ट्रेलिया began with the आगमन of the First Fleet of British convicts in 1788.
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national population at the समय of the Federation of Australia in 1901.
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly ज्ञात as the Church of इंग्लैण्ड in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, जब it थी surpassed by the Roman कैथोलिक Church in Australia.
Post-war बहुसंस्कृतिवाद and a मनाही in religious observance among some sections of the population have diversified the demographics of religion in Australia.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as ईसाई in 2011, the largest denominations were either रोमन Catholic ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the uniting गिरिजाघर in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches like the Greek परंपरागत archdiocese of Australia and वहीँ हैं large और growing Pentecostal groups, such as सिडनी 's Hillsong Church.
The festivals of Easter and Christmas हैं पब्लिक holidays in Australia.
around a क्वार्टर of विद्यार्थी attend church स्कूलों and Christian organisations are अग्रणी non-government providers of स्वास्थ्य और welfare सेवाएं through संगठनों like कैथोलिक Health ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Anglicare, unitingcare ऑस्ट्रेलिया, the Salvation फौज and St विंसेंट de पॉल Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have included रेव Dr जॉन Dunmore लैंग, Saint Mary MacKillop, कैथरीन हेलेन Spence, Pastor David Unaipon, the Reverend जॉन Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian ईसाइयों शामिल : Tim Costello Baptist मंत्री and current CEO of World Vision Australia, Frank Brennan, जेसुइट human अधिकारों lawyer, कार्डिनल George Pell, कैथोलिक archbishop of Sydney, फिलिप aspinall the current anglican Primate और archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, former Labor Prime मंत्री, और Tony Abbott, leader for the Federal विपक्ष उदार Party.
Charter creating Collegiate School, जिससे became yale कॉलेज, October 9, 1701
yale University is a निजी Ivy League research university स्तिथ in नई हेवन, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of Connecticut, the university is the third-oldest institution of higher शिक्षा in the United States.
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '', the institution traces इसके जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen who sought to establish a college to train clergy and political नेताओ for the उपनिवेश.
in 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale College '' to honor a तोहफा from Elihu Yale, a governor of the British East इण्डिया कम्पनी.
In 1861, the Graduate School of कला and Sciences became the first u.S. institution to award the PhD. Yale became a founding सदस्य of the Association of अमरीकी Universities in 1900.
Yale College was रूपांतरित, beginning in the 1930s, through the establishment of आवासीय कॉलेजों : 12 अभी मौजूद and two अधिक are planned.
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach और advise about 5,300 undergraduate और 6,100 graduate and पेशेवर students.
Almost all tenured professors सिखा undergraduate पाठ्यक्रम, more than 2,000 of which हैं offered annually.
the University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of कोई अकादमिक institution in the world.
yale 's system of more than two दर्जन पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 लाख volumes.
49 Nobel Laureates have been affiliated साथ the विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी, संकाय, और स्टाफ.
yale has produced many notable alumni, including five U.S. Presidents, 19 u.S. Supreme Court justices, and several विदेशी heads of state.
At the graduate स्तर, Yale Law स्कूल, yale स्कूल of Art, and Yale School of नाटक are consistently ranked the top programs in their field.
Yale Law School is the most चयनात्मक law स्कूल in the संयुक्त States.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale Bulldogs in the ncaa Division I Ivy League.
The oldest intercollegiate एथलेटिक event in the संयुक्त States is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` बिग sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae, which grows in arid और semi-arid conditions, throughout a दायरा of cold desert, स्तान, and mountain habitats in the Intermountain वेस्ट of उत्तर अमेरिका.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several सम्बन्धित सदस्यों of the genus Artemisia, ऐसे as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big sagebrush and other artemisia species are the dominant plants आरपार विशाल portions of the Great Basin, covering कुछ 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian राज्य.
it is the राज्य flower of Nevada.
sagebrush provides food and habitat for a variety of species, ऐसे as sage grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, pygmy rabbit, and mule deer.
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of उत्तर America—especially लिये preventing infection in wounds, stopping internal bleeding, and treating headaches और जुकाम.
Chemically, the active medicinal constituents include camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
Several major threats मौजूद to ऋषि ब्रश ecosystems, including इंसान settlements, conversion to agricultural जमीन, livestock grazing, invasive संयंत्र species, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a फ़्री email service offered by the American search इंजन company याहू !
It was launched in 1997, and, according to comScore, याहू ! मेल is the third-largest web-based ईमेल सेवा साथ 281 million users as of December 2012.
Currently, Yahoo ! offers three संस्करण of याहू ! मेल.
The traditional `` याहू ! Mail क्लासिक '' continues the availability of the असली interface introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax इंटरफ़ेस, drag-and-drop features, improved search functionality, keyboard शॉर्टकट, address auto-complete, tabs, and other updated features.
in October 2010, याहू ! released a beta version of याहू ! Mail, जिससे शामिल improvements to the design, performance, search functionality, and फेसबुक integration.
In May 2011, बीटा testing for the नई version रोका, और it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail.
In early 2008, याहू ! began offering unlimited mail भंडार to its उपयोक्ता in response to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail market segment.
On जून 27, 2009, Yahoo ! मेसेंजर थी integrated साथ याहू ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban port city और the काउंटी सीट of Pierce County, Washington, संयुक्त States.
the city is on Washington 's Puget ध्वनि, southwest of Seattle, northeast of the राज्य capital, Olympia, and northwest of माउंट rainier National Park.
The population was 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the puget ध्वनि area and the third largest in the state.
टकोमा also serves as the center of कारोबार activity for the दक्षिण Sound region, which has a population of around 1 million people.
Tacoma adopted इसके name बाद the आसपास Mount rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
it is known as the `` नगर of Destiny '' because the क्षेत्रफल थी chosen to be the पश्चिमी terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century.
the decision of the railroad was बहकावे by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor, Commencement खाड़ी.
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` When rails meet sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of टकोमा, a center of international trade on the Pacific Coast and वॉशिंगटन state 's largest port.
Like सबसे central शहरों, टकोमा suffered a prolonged मनाही in the mid-20th century as a परिणाम of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the downtown कोर शामिल the विश्वविद्यालयों of Washington टकोमा ; टकोमा Link, the first modern electric light rail service in the राज्य ; the state 's highest density of art और history museums ; और a लौटी urban waterfront, the Thea Foss Waterway.
साथ a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the रेलरोड मजदूर of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the Labor Ready workers of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough, gritty image.
A song about टकोमा, `` Thrice All American '', by American singer-songwriter and former resident Neko मामला, describes it as `` a dusty old गहना in the South puget ध्वनि / where the कारखानों निकले / और the timber 's सब cut down ''.
tacoma-pierce County रै been named one of the most livable areas in the country.
Tacoma was also recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th most walkable नगर in the country.
In contrast, the city is भी ranked as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, women 's magazine स्वः named टकोमा the `` Most Sexually स्वस्थ City '' in the United राज्य.
In 2012, the Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City in अमेरिका '', in भाग क्युकी of the large diversity of पब्लिक offices आयोजित, and Washington राज्य गुजर a विधेयक in 2012 allowing lgbt couples to marry.
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 पतन of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge.
chula Vista ( ; ) is the दूसरी largest city in the सैन Diego महानगर area, the seventh largest city in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the fourteenth largest city in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 243,916 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Located just इससे downtown San डिएगो and from the मैक्सिकन border in the South Bay प्रदेश of the metropolitan area, the नगर is at the center of one of the richest आर्थिक and culturally diverse zones in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Chula Vista is so नामित क्युकी of इसके scenic location between the San Diego Bay और coastal mountain foothills.
Founded in the early 19th सदी, तेज़ जनसांख्यिकी विकास has recently been observed in the city.
As the second largest city in San Diego County, Chula विस्टा has जल्दी become a destination popular to many tourists.
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United राज्य Olympic Training centers and popular tourist गंतव्यों include Cricket Wireless Amphitheater, the Chula Vista marina, and the chula विस्टा Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a प्रणाली or method of describing जमीन, real प्रॉपर्टी ( in contrast to निजी property ) or real estate.
The system has महरूम used in England लिये many सदियां, and is स्टिल used there in the परिभाषा of general boundaries.
By custom, it थी applied in the असली तेरह Colonies that became the United States, and in अनेक other जमीन jurisdictions based on English आम विधि.
Typically the system uses शारीरिक features of the local geography, साथ with directions and distances, to define and describe the boundaries of a parcel of जमीन.
the boundaries हैं described in a कार्यशील गद्य style, working around the parcel in sequence, from a पाइंट of शुरूआत, returning वापस to the वही point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds.
It may शामिल references to other adjoining parcels ( and their owners ), और it, in फेरे, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the समय the description is compiled, it may have been marked on the ground with permanent monuments placed जहाँ there were no suitable प्राकृतिक monuments.
The पद `` metes '' refers to a boundary पारिभाषित by the मापन of प्रत्येक straight run, specified by a अलहदा between the टर्मिनल points, and an orientation or direction.
A direction may be a simple compass bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate सर्वेक्षण विधि.
The पद `` bounds '' refers to a more सामान्य boundary description, such as साथ a certain watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining पब्लिक road रास्ता, or an existing building.
the system is प्रायः used to define larger टुकड़े of property ( e.g. farms ), and political subdivisions ( e.g. कस्बा boundaries ) where precise definition is नहीं जरूरी or would be far too expensive, or previously designated सीमाएँ can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 दिसम्बर 164220 कूच 1727 ) was an English physicist और गणितज्ञ who is widely regarded as एक of the most influential वैज्ञानिकों of all time and as a key फिगर in the scientific क्रान्ति.
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of प्राकृतिक दर्शनशास्त्र '' ), first published in 1687, laid the foundations लिये most of classical mechanics.
Newton भी made seminal contributions to optics और shares credit with Gottfried Leibniz लिये the invention of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's Principia formulated the कानून of गति and सार्वभौमिक gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the शारीरिक universe लिये the next तीन सदियां.
It also demonstrated that the गति of objects on the धरती और that of celestial bodies could be described by the same principles.
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion from his mathematical वर्णन of gravity, Newton removed the last doubts about the validity of the heliocentric मॉडल of the ब्रह्मांड.
Newton built the first practical reflecting दूरदर्शी और developed a सिद्धान्त of colour based on the observation कि a prism decomposes white light into the अनेक रंग of the visible spectrum.
he also formulated an empirical law of cooling and पढ़ाई the speed of sound.
In जोड to his कार्य on the calculus, as a mathematician Newton contributed to the study of power series, generalised the द्विपद theorem to non-integer exponents, and developed Newton 's method लिये approximating the जड़ें of a function.
Newton थी a fellow of Trinity College and the second lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge.
he was a devout but अपरंपरागत ईसाई and, unusually for a सदस्य of the Cambridge faculty, he refused to take पावन orders in the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In जोड to his work on the mathematical sciences, न्यूटन also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy and biblical chronology, but most of उसके work in those क्षेत्रों remained unpublished until long बाद उसके death.
in उसके बाद life, Newton became अध्यक्ष of the Royal Society.
He भी served the British सरकारी as Warden and निपुण of the Royal Mint.
Prof. Walter Lewin explains Newton 's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles all obey Newton 's law of gravitation
Newton 's विधि of सार्वभौमिक gravitation states that every point mass in the ब्रह्मांड attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a force that is सीधे proportional to the उत्पाद of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the अलहदा between उन्हें.
( Separately it was shown that large spherically symmetrical masses attract and are attracted as if सब their द्रव्यमान were concentrated at उनके centers. )
This is a सामान्य physical law निकला इससे अनुभवजन्य observations by what न्यूटन पुकारा प्रेरण.
it is a भाग of शास्त्रीय mechanics and थी formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 जुलाई 1687.
( जब Newton 's book was प्रस्तुत in 1686 to the Royal Society, रॉबर्ट Hooke made a claim that Newton था obtained the inverse square law इससे उसे – देखिए History खण्ड below. )
In modern language, the विधि states the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( n ), m1 and m2 in गामा ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), and the constant G is approximately equal to.
The value of the constant g was first accurately determined from the results of the कैवेंडिश experiment conducted by the British वैज्ञानिक Henry Cavendish in 1798, although Cavendish did not खुद calculate a numerical मान for G.
इस experiment थी भी the first परीक्षण of Newton 's सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses in the प्रयोगशाला.
It took प्लेस 111 सालो after the publication of Newton 's प्रिन्सिपिया and 71 years बाद Newton 's death, so none of न्यूटन 's calculations could use the मान of G ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of electrical forces, जिससे is used to calculate the परिमाण of electrical फ़ोर्स between two charged bodies.
Both are inverse-square कानून, in which फ़ोर्स is inversely proportional to the square of the distance between the bodies.
Coulomb 's Law रै the उत्पाद of two charges in प्लेस of the product of the masses, और the electrostatic constant in place of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law has चूंकि been superseded by Einstein 's theory of general relativity, but it continues to be used as an excellent सन्निकटन of the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता.
Relativity is जरूरी only when there is a need for extreme precision, or when dealing with gravitation लिये extremely massive and घना objects.
White and रेड flags, representing Iraqi and अमरीकी deaths, बैठना in the grass चतुष्कोण of the Valley Library on the Corvallis, ऑरेगॉन, campus of ऑरेगॉन राज्य University.
As भाग of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं related to इराकी देह Count प्रोजेक्ट ), the flags aim to `` उठाएँ awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War. ''
( May 2008 )
हताहत of the conflict in इराकी since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of इराकी, और continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the activities of the विभिन्न armed समूह operating in the country ) have come in अनेक forms, and the accuracy of the सूचना available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly.
The table नीचे summarizes various estimates of the इराकी casualty figures.
For troops in the u.s.-led बहुराष्ट्रीय coalition, the मौत toll is carefully tracked और updated daily, और the names और photographs of those killed in कार्रवाई as well as in दुर्घटनाओं have महरूम प्रकाशित widely.
A total of 4,486 U.S. soldiers यहूद killed in Iraq between 2003 और 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, information on both military and civilian casualties is both less precise and less सतत.
Estimates of casualty levels are available from पत्रकारों on the झाँकी, इससे officials of शामिल संगठन, and इससे समूह that summarize information on incidents reported in the news मीडिया.
The word `` casualties `` in इसके most general sense शामिल the injured as well as the dead.
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is not स्पष्ट what should be counted : should only those injuries गंभीर पर्याप्त to put a soldier आउट of commission be included ?
Do बीमारियों or चोटों caused by दुर्घटनाओं गिनती, or should the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different परिभाषाएं may arrive at very different संख्याएँ, and sometimes the precise definition is not clearly निर्दिष्ट.

A highwayman थी a चोर और brigand who preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw प्रायः travelled और robbed by horse, as compared to a footpad who travelled and robbed on पैर.
Mounted लुटेरों were widely considered to be socially superior to footpads.
Such robbers operated in Great ब्रिटेन and Ireland from the Elizabethan era until the early 19th सदी.
The word highwayman is पहला ज्ञात to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms included `` शूरवीरों of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road. ''
दो terms लागू to 19th-century उत्तर अमरीकी highwaymen were road agents in कुछ instances for पहाड़ bandits while in other मामले the पद is Rlallaala लिये mountain-based ruffians.
In the वही समय period in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, वे यहूद known as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' जॉनसन, jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired American पेशेवर basketball player who निभाई पाइंट guard for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ).
बाद winning championships in ऊँची स्कूल and college, Johnson थी चयनित पहला overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers.
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in उसके रुकी season, and won four more championships with the लेकर्स during the 1980s.
जॉनसन retired abruptly in 1991 बाद announcing that he था contracted hiv, लकिन लौटे to खेल in the 1992 All-Star Game, winning the All-Star MVP Award.
बाद विरोध from उसके fellow खिलाड़ी, he रिटायर्ड again लिये चार सालो, but लौटे in 1996, at age 36, to play 32 games for the लेकर्स पहले retiring for the third और final time.
Johnson 's career achievements include three NBA mvp Awards, नौ एनबीए Finals दिखावे, बारह All-Star games, and टेन All-NBA पहला और Second Team nominations.
He led the लीग in regular-season assists four टाइम्स, और is the NBA 's all-time नेता in average assists per game, at 11.2.
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream Team ``, the U.S. basketball team that won the Olympic सुनहरा medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, Johnson formed the Magic Johnson All-Stars, a barnstorming team कि travelled around the world playing exhibition खेल.
जॉनसन was honored as one of the 50 Greatest खिलाड़ी in NBA इतिहास in 1996, and enshrined in the बास्केट Hall of कीर्ति in 2002.
he थी rated the greatest एनबीए पाइंट गार्ड of all समय by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship और फंसने साथ Boston Celtics star Larry Bird, whom he faced in the 1979 NCAA फाइनल and three NBA championship series, were well documented.
Since his retirement, Johnson रै been an advocate for hiV/ एड्स prevention and सुरक्षित sex, as well as an entrepreneur, philanthropist, broadcaster और motivational speaker.
Johnson was a part-owner of the लेकर्स for अनेक years, and थी part of a group that purchased the लॉस Angeles डॉजर्स in 2012.
allium cells in different phases of the कोशिका cycle
the कोशिकाएं of eukaryotes ( left ) और prokaryotes ( right )
The कोशिका is the basic structural, functional and biological unit of all known living organisms.
It is the smallest ईकाई of life that is classified as a जीना thing ( except वायरस, जिससे consists only from DNA/RNA covered by protein and lipids ), and is often called the भवन block of life.
It consists of a जीवद्रव्य enclosed within a membrane, which contains अनेक biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
Organisms can be वर्गीकृत as एककोशिकीय ( consisting of a single cell ; including most bacteria ) or बहुकोशिकीय ( including plants and animals ).
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies from species to species, इंसानो contain परिचय 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
सबसे plant और एनिमल cells are between 1 and 100 micrometres और इसलिए are दृश्य तभी under the सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
the cell थी discovered by रॉबर्ट hooke in 1665.
the कोशिका सिद्धान्त, first developed in 1839 by Matthias jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann, राज्य that all organisms हैं composed of एक or more कोशिकाएं, that सब कोशिकाएं come from preexisting कोशिकाएं, that vital functions of an organism occur भीतर cells, और that all cells contain the hereditary सूचना necessary लिये regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next पीढी of cells.
Cells emerged on ग्रह Earth at least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago.
the शब्द कोशिका आता from the लैटिन cella, meaning `` छोटी रूम ''.
The descriptive term लिये the smallest living biological structure was coined by Robert Hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he compared the cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small rooms भिक्षुओं lived in.
grecian Formula is a मेन 's hair coloring product in the संयुक्त States.

A मोटर scooter 's सामने साथ an impractical क्रमांक and variety of headlamps, added लिये decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front of a vehicle to light the road ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the ऑटोमोबाइल आयु, spurred by the ग्रेट disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety प्रशासन राज्य कि nearly half of सब traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite only 25 % of ट्रैफ़िक travelling during अंधेरा.
जबकि it is आम for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion, headlamp is the term for the यंत्र itself, while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device.
Other वाहनों, such as trains और वायुयान, are required to have headlamps.
सायकिल headlamps are often used on bicycles, और हैं required in some jurisdictions.
They can be संचालित by a battery or a छोटी electrical सृजनकर्ता on the wheel.
Additionally ऑटोमोटिव रात्रि दृष्टि प्रणालियों work to supplement headlamps.
Women 's अधिकारों are the rights और entitlements claimed लिये women and girls of many societies विश्वव्यापी.
In कुछ places ये rights हैं institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in others they may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ from broader धारणाएं of इंसान अधिकारों through claims of an अंतर्निहित historical and traditional पूर्वाग्रह against the कसरत of अधिकारों by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों include, हालांकि are not limited to, the सही : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold पब्लिक office ; to कार्य ; to fair wages or बराबर pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to डालें into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental और धार्मिक rights.
caryn ऐलेन Johnson, बेहतरीन known as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, लेखक and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the गहन South.
She प्राप्त a nomination लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award लिये उसके role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) सहेजें उसके lover ( demi मूर ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a दूसरी Golden Globe और an Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना Goldberg तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the history of the Academy Awards to win an एक्टिंग oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for गए With the Wind in 1939.
notable later films include Sister अधिनियम और Sister Act 2, The Player, बना in America, How Stella Got Her नाली Back, लड़की, Interrupted और Rat Race.
वो is भी acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as Terry Doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर Flash, और as कार्मेन tibideaux in Glee, as खूब as the voice of shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
गोल्डबर्ग रै been nominated लिये 13 एमी Awards for her work in television.
She was co-producer of the लोकप्रिय game show हॉलीवुड Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She रै been the moderator of the daytime talk दिखाएँ The View चूंकि 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, दो Daytime Emmys, two Golden ग्लोब्स, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, four People 's Choice Awards, and रै been सम्मानित with a star on the Hollywood चलना of कीर्ति.
She is one of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता who have won an एमी, Grammy, Oscar, and टोनी Award.
The National Hockey लीग ( एनएचएल ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a प्रमुख professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely माना to be the premier पेशेवर ice hockey लीग in the world, and एक of the major professional खेल leagues in the संयुक्त राज्य और Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the league playoff चैंपियन at the end of each season.
The league थी organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of operations of its पूर्ववर्ती organization, the National हॉकी संघ ( NHA ), which था been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the लीग is now रचित of 30 active franchises.
The स्वदेश to which the name of the league originally referred थी Canada, although the league रै now महरूम binational since 1924 when it विस्तारित into the संयुक्त States.
बाद a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, and television audiences.
the NHL draws many highly skilled players from सब over the world और currently has players from about 20 different देशों.
हालांकि Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past four प्लस दशकों the percentages of US and European players have increased दोनो because of the NHL 's continued expansion इससे छह to thirty clubs चूंकि 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
a maggot is the लार्वा of a मक्खी ( order Diptera ) ; it is लागू in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, cheese उड़ता, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the nematocera, such as मच्छरों and Crane flies.
`` Maggot '' is नहीं a technical term and चाहिए not be taken as such ; in many standard textbooks of entomology it करता not appear in the index at all.
In many non-technical ग्रन्थ the term is प्रयुक्त लिये insect larvae in general.
अन्य sources have coined their own परिभाषाएं ; for उदाहरण : ``...
The पद applies to a ग्रब जब all ट्रेस of limbs रै disappeared... '' और ``... Applied to the footless लार्वे of Dipters. ''
maggot-like मक्खी larvae are of चौड़ी महत्व in पारिस्थितिकी and medicine ; among अन्य roles, various species are prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion and garbage, attacking crops और foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, और causing myiasis.
हेरोदेस (, Hordos, यूनानी :, Hērōdēs ), also known as Herod the ग्रेट ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in Jericho ), was a Roman client किंग of Judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman who murdered उसके own परिवार and a great many rabbis ``.
He is also known for his colossal building projects in Jerusalem और elsewhere, सहित his विस्तार of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of his जीवनी are gleaned from the works of the 1st century CE Roman–Jewish इतिहासकार josephus Flavius.
The Romans made हेरोदेस 's son, Herod Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, and idumea ( biblical Edom ) इससे 4 BCE to 6 CE, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
archelaus थी judged incompetent by the Roman emperor Augustus who then संयुक्त Samaria, Judea proper और Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41.
Herod 's other बेटे Herod Antipas थी tetrarch of galilee from 4 BCE–39 ce.
ABO blood समूह antigens उपस्थित on red blood cells और IgM antibodies present in the सीरम
the ABO blood group प्रणाली is the सबसे important blood type system ( or रक्त group system ) in human रक्त transfusion.
The associated anti-A और anti-B antibodies हैं usually igm antibodies, जिससे are usually produced in the first years of life by sensitization to पर्यावरणीय substances such as food, bacteria, and viruses.
ABO blood types हैं भी उपस्थित in some other animals, for example apes such as chimpanzees, bonobos, और gorillas.

The area is a उपनगरीय of Metropolitan Detroit.

ब्रेट Lorenzo favre ( born अक्तूबर 10, 1969 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल quarterback who खर्च the majority of उसके career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ).
he was a 20-year veteran of the NFL, having निभाई quarterback लिये the अटलांटा Falcons ( 1991 ), ग्रीन खाड़ी Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ), New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, और over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the quarterback position लिये the University of दक्षिणी Mississippi for four सालो before being चयनित in the second round of the 1991 एनएफएल Draft by अटलांटा ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on फ़रवरी 10, 1992, लिये the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL ड्राफ्ट.
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the fourth game of the 1992 season, stepping in for injured क्वार्टरबैक Don Majkowski, और प्रारंभ प्रत्येक खेल through the 2007 ऋतु.
He was traded to the नई York Jets and प्रारंभ at quarterback for the 2008 season before signing with the Vikings on August 18, 2009 as their starting क्वार्टरबैक.
He made an NFL record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
he is the only player to win the ap Most मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी three लगातार times ( 1995–97 ).
he रै led teams to eight प्रभाग championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), five NFC Championship खेल ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), और दो Super Bowl appearances ( सुपर कटोरी XXXI, सुपर Bowl xxxii ), winning एक ( Super कटोरी xxxi ).
he holds many एनएफएल records, including most career touchdown passes, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, most करियर pass कोशिशें, सबसे career interceptions thrown, सबसे consecutive starts by a player, most लगातार starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, most career victories as a starting quarterback, most बर्खास्त, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by his nickname `` the Gunslinger ''.

the World चौड़ी वेब ( abbreviated as www or W3, commonly known as the web ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked hypertext दस्तावेज़ accessed via the Internet.
With a वेब browser, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, videos, and अन्य multimedia, और navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems जैसे ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist और at that समय employee of the cern, Sir टिम Berners-Lee, now निदेशक of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), लिखा a proposal in March 1989 लिये what होता eventually become the World चौड़ी Web.
At cern, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, berners-lee and Belgian computer वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to कड़ी and अभिगम सूचना of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at होगा '', and they publicly introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in दिसम्बर of the same year.
Wayne Lyman मोर्स ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a politician and attorney इससे Oregon, United राज्य, known for his proclivity for opposing his parties ' leadership, and specifically for उसके opposition to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds.
Born in मैडिसन, विस्कॉन्सिन, and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the विश्वविद्यालयों of Minnesota Law स्कूल, Morse स्थानांतरित to Oregon in 1930 और began teaching at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Oregon स्कूल of Law.
During World War II he was निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त States सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
जबकि an स्वतंत्र, he set a record for performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और was reelected twice जबकि a सदस्य of that party.
Morse बना a ब्रैड चलाएं for the लोकतांत्रिक Party 's अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of तभी two Senators जो opposed the Gulf of tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, which authorized the president to लो military कार्रवाई in वियतनाम बगैर a declaration of war.
He continued to speak आउट against the war in the ensuing years, and खोया उसके 1968 bid for reelection to Bob packwood, जो criticized उसके strong opposition to the war.
मोर्स बना दो more bids for reelection to the सीनेट before his मौत in 1974.
In parliamentary कार्यविधि, a गति to तालिका रै two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table usually means the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to move for postponement of consideration ; a प्रस्ताव to suspend consideration of a pending motion.
much less often, it अर्थात् a motion to `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ), a usage सतत with the rest of the english-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking world ऐसे as the संयुक्त Kingdom, to table अर्थात् to move to प्लेस [ the टॉपिक ] upon the तालिका ( or to मूव to प्लेस on the तालिका ) : a proposal to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration ) of a प्रस्ताव.
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the तालिका or to cause [ the टॉपिक ] to झूठ on the table.
The अंतर is the विचार of what the table is लिये, that of a shelf बंद to the side, or an क्रियाशील कार्य bench.
the अंग्रेजों meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work बेंच, with the topic being the center of attention, considered and discussed by सब until it can be resolved, at which point it is लिया off the 'table '.
The American भाव is कि the table is जैसे कि of a shelf, archive, or long-term storage device, where the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there.
खिलौना Story 3 is a 2010 American 3D कंप्यूटर animated comedy-drama prison film, and the तीसरा किश्त in the Toy Story series.
It थी produced by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Directed by Lee unkrich, the film थी released विश्वव्यापी from June through October in डिज़्नी Digital 3-d, RealD, और IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 थी also the first फिल्मी to be released theatrically with Dolby घेर 7.1 sound.
the पटकथा was written by Michael arndt, while Unkrich wrote the स्टोरी along साथ John lasseter और Andrew Stanton, क्रमशः director and co-writer of the दो first films.
the plot focuses on the toys Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and their मित्रों dealing with an अनिश्चित future as उनके owner, Andy, prepares to छोड़ for college.
अभिनेताओं tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan cusack, Don Rickles, Estelle Harris, John Ratzenberger, वालेस Shawn, जेफ़ Pidgeon, jodi Benson, R. Lee Ermey, John मॉरिस, and Laurie metcalf reprised their voice-over roles इससे the previous films.
Jim varney, जो played slinky Dog in the first दो films, and जो Ranft, जो portrayed Lenny और wheezy, both died before production began on खिलौना Story 3.
The role of Slinky श्वान was लिया over by Blake Clark ( a friend of varney ), while ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story.
New characters include performances by Ned beatty, टिमोथी Dalton, क्रिस्टन schaal, Bonnie हंट, Whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The विशेषता broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North अमरीकी सकल for an एनिमेटेड फिल्मी unadjusted for inflation, and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
it is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for a Pixar film, as well as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have खोली in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the United States और Canada, and worldwide.
In early August, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing फिल्मी at the उत्तर American box office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ), and the highest-grossing animated फिल्मी of all time worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that माह, Toy Story 3 became the पहला ever animated film in इतिहास to make over $ 1 अरब worldwide.
it is currently the 10th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of all time.
Toy Story 3 थी nominated for पाँच Academy Awards, सहित Best चित्र, बेहतरीन Adapted Screenplay, and बेहतरीन Sound Editing.
it was the तीसरा एनिमेटेड film ( बाद Beauty and the Beast और Up ) to be मनोनीत लिये Academy पुरस्कार for Best चित्र.
It won the पुरस्कार for Best एनिमेटेड Feature और Best Original Song.
John levell starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an American retired professional बास्केट शूटिंग guard.

सुरक्षित Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile फोन, डिजिटल कैमरे, GPS navigation devices, और tablet computers.
the Secure Digital मानक is maintained by the sd Card संघ ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in अधिक than 400 brands आरपार dozens of product categories and more than 8,000 मॉडल.
The सुरक्षित Digital format includes चार कार्ड families उपलब्धियाँ in three different form factors.
the four परिवारों are the original standard-capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the extended-capacity ( sdxc ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions साथ data storage.
The three रूप factors हैं the original size, the `` mini '' size, और the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
वहीँ are many combinations of रूप factors and यंत्र families.
electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer संस्करण of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept पुरानी sd cards, but this article explains अनेक factors कि can prevent the use of a नए sd card:
A newer card may प्रस्ताव वृहद क्षमता than the host यंत्र can handle.
a newer card may उपयोग a file प्रणाली the host यंत्र can not navigate.
उपयोग of an sdio card requires the host यंत्र be designed for the input/output कृत्यों the card provides.
the organization of the card was changed starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors उत्पादित SDSC cards above 1 gb before the SDA had standardized a method of doing so.
The SDA उपयोग अनेक trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure उपयोक्ता of संगतता.
Hugh John mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a अंग्रेजों कर्ता and film producer.
He has received a Golden Globe, a BAFTA, और an Honorary césar.
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25 नाट्य releases विश्वव्यापी.
Grant achieved अंतरराष्ट्रीय stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis 's successful चार Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used इस भेदन भूमिका as a बारंबार cinematic persona during the 1990s, delivering comic प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and नॉटिंग Hill ( 1999 ).
by the turn of the 21st century, he था established खुद as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a कैड in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), About A Boy ( 2002 ), Love Actually ( 2003 ), and American dreamz ( 2006 ).
He बाद निभाई against type साथ multiple cameo भूमिकाएँ in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film उद्योग, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches उसके roles जैसे a character कर्ता, और attempts to make his एक्टिंग appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic कौशल include a nonchalant टच of irony / sarcasm और studied शारीरिक mannerisms as खूब as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions.
The entertainment मीडिया 's coverage of Grant 's life बंद the बिग स्क्रीन has often overshadowed उसके work as a thespian.
He has महरूम vocal about उसके अनादर लिये the profession of acting, and in his तिरस्कार towards the culture of celebrity और दुश्मनी towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, Grant has repeatedly claimed that एक्टिंग is not a true calling but just a job he fell into.
The Han राजवंश ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 AD ) was an imperial dynasty of China, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 bc ) और succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the विद्रोही नेता Liu बंग, ज्ञात मरणोपरांत as Emperor gaozu of Han.
It थी briefly interrupted by the xin Dynasty ( 9–23 AD ) of the former रीजेंट वांग Mang.
This interregnum separates the Han into two अवधि : the Western Han ( 206 bc – 9 ad ) और Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ).
Spanning over four centuries, the period of the Han Dynasty is considered a सुनहरी आयु in Chinese history.
to this day, China 's majority ethnic group refers to itself as the `` हान लोगों '' and the Chinese स्क्रिप्ट is referred to as `` हान characters ``.
The Han Empire was divided into क्षेत्रों सीधे controlled by the central government, known as commanderies, and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
These kingdoms धीरे lost all vestiges of their independence, विशेषकर following the Rebellion of the सात राज्य.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic confederation which dominated the पूर्वी Eurasian Steppe, defeated the Han फौज in battle in 200 BC.
following the defeat, a political marriage alliance थी negotiated in which the हान became the de facto inferior partner.
When, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu जारी to रेड हान borders, सम्राट Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 bc ) launched several military campaigns विरूद्ध them.
The ultimate Han victory in these युद्धों eventually forced the Xiongnu to accept vassal status as हान tributaries.
ये campaigns विस्तारित Han प्रभुता into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia और helped स्थापित the vast व्यापार संजाल known as the Silk Road, जिससे reached as दूर as the भूमध्यसागरीय संसार.
Han शक्तियां प्रबंधित to divide the xiongnu into two competing nations, the Southern and उत्तरी Xiongnu, and forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River.
Despite these victories, the territories उत्तर of हान 's सीमायें यहूद quickly overrun by the nomadic Xianbei कनफेडरेशन.
After 92 ad, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court राजनीती, engaging in हिंसक power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the हान 's ultimate downfall.
इम्पीरियल authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist धार्मिक societies which instigated the Yellow पगड़ी Rebellion और the Five Pecks of राइस Rebellion.
Following the death of सम्राट ling ( r. 168–189 AD ), the palace हिजड़े suffered wholesale massacre by सैन्य officers, allowing सदस्यों of the aristocracy and सैन्य governors to become warlords and divide the साम्राज्य.
जब Cao pi, King of Wei, usurped the throne from Emperor xian, the Han राजवंश ceased to मौजूद.
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity और saw a significant growth of the money अर्थव्यवस्था पहला established दौरान the झोऊ राजवंश ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage issued by the central government मिंट in 119 BC remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 ad ).
To pay लिये its military अभियान और the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories, the government nationalized the private नमक and iron industries in 117 bc.
These government monopolies यहूद repealed during the Eastern हान period, और the lost revenue was recouped through heavily taxing निजी entrepreneurs.
The emperor was at the pinnacle of हान समाज.
he presided over the Han सरकारी but shared power साथ दोनो the धामों and appointed ministers who came largely from the scholarly gentry class.
इससे the reign of Emperor Wu onward, the Chinese अदालत officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court politics, synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong zhongshu.
इस नीति endured until the fall of the Qing Dynasty in 1911 ad.
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances, including papermaking, the nautical steering rudder, the use of negative numbers in mathematics, the raised-relief map, the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary sphere for astronomy, and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
Tourette syndrome ( भी called Tourette 's syndrome, Tourette 's disorder, गाइल्स de la Tourette syndrome, GTS or, अधिक commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by अनेक physical ( motor ) tics and at तनिक एक गायन ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically wax and wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
tourette 's is defined as भाग of a वर्णक्रम of tic disorders, which includes क्षणिक और chronic tics.
tourette 's was once considered a rare और विचित्र सिंड्रोम, most often संबद्ध साथ the exclamation of obscene words or socially inappropriate and derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ), but this लक्षण is present in तभी a small minority of लोगों साथ Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare कंडीशन, but it is नहीं सदा correctly identified because most cases are mild और the severity of tics decreases for सबसे children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % और 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have tourette 's ; the prevalence of transient and दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is higher, with the more common tics of eye blinking, coughing, throat clearing, सूँघने, and facial movements.
चरम Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, और Tourette 's does not adversely affect प्रज्ञा or जीवन expectancy.
जेनेटिक और environmental कारकों play a role in the etiology of tourette 's, लकिन the exact causes are unknown.
in most cases, medication is unnecessary.
There is no effective treatment for every case of tics, but निश्चित medications and therapies can help जब उनके use is warranted.
Education is an important भाग of कोई उपचार plan, and स्पष्टीकरण and reassurance alone हैं often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit hyperactivity विकार ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive disorder ( ओसीडी ) are present in many मरीजों seen in tertiary specialty क्लिनिक.
These other conditions often cause more functional पुतलियों to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them.
the eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on निमित्त of his resident, जॉर्जेस Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French physician and neurologist, जो published an खाता of नौ मरीजों with Tourette 's in 1885.

Sunbeam थी a marque पंजीकृत by जॉन Marston Co. Ltd of wolverhampton, इंग्लैण्ड, in 1888.
The company पहला made साइकिल, then मोटरसाइकिल और cars from the late 19th century until परिचय 1936, और applied the marque to सब three फ़ॉर्म of transportation.
The company also manufactured aero engines in the First संसार War and 647 वायुयान during the Second World War.
A Sunbeam थी the first British car to win a ग्रैंड प्रिक्स race, और set a क्रमांक of जमीन speed records.
The company गई into receivership in 1935 और थी purchased by the Rootes Group, जिससे continued to use the सनबीम marque.
Fox News Channel ( FNC ), also known as Fox News, is a cable न्यूज channel owned by the Fox Entertainment Group, a subsidiary of News निगम.
As of April 2009, the channel was available to 102 million households in the United States and to viewers internationally, broadcasting primarily from its New York studios.
the channel was निर्मित by australian-american media mogul Rupert मर्डोक, who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
it launched on October 7, 1996 to 17 लाख cable subscribers.
it grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the प्रबल cable news संजाल in the United राज्य.
Critics have stated that Fox न्यूज चैनल promotes conservative political positions और biased रिपोर्टिंग.
टीकाकारों, news anchors, और reporters at फॉक्स News चैनल have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate independently of each अन्य, and have अस्वीकृत any bias in न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the दाँत स्तिथ distally ( away from the midline of the face ) from both the mandibular second premolars of the मुँह लकिन mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) इससे both mandibular second molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) arch of the मुँह, and generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु ( अपर ) first molars और the maxillary 2nd premolar in सामान्य क्लास i occlusion.
the function of this molar is similar to that of सब molars in regard to पीस होने the principal action दौरान mastication, commonly ज्ञात as chewing.
वहीँ हैं प्रायः five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : दो on the buccal ( पक्ष nearest the cheek ), दो lingual ( side निकटतम the tongue ), और एक distal.
There हैं great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars और those of the permanent mandibular molars, even though their फलन हैं similar.
the स्थाई mandibular molars हैं नहीं considered to have any दांत that precede it.
Despite being नामित molars, the पतझड़ी molars are followed by स्थाई premolars.
In the universal प्रणाली of संकेतन, the deciduous mandibular पहला molars are designated by a अक्षर लिखा in uppercase.
The right deciduous mandibular पहला molar is known as `` s '', and the left one is known as `` L ''.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय notation has a अलग system of notation.
Thus, the right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` 84 '', and the left one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal system of notation, the permanent mandibular पहला molars हैं designated by a क्रमांक.
The right permanent mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` 30 '', और the बाएँ one is ज्ञात as `` 19 ''.
The Palmer notation uses a क्रमांक in संयोजन साथ a प्रतीक designating in which quadrant the tooth is मिला.
For इस tooth, the left and right पहला molars होता have the वही क्रमांक, `` 6 '', लकिन the right एक would have the प्रतीक, `` ┐ '', over it, while the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a different numbering प्रणाली than the previous two, and the सही permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '', और the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
mandibular प्राथमिक first molars usually have four pulp horns.
The पहला molar is प्रायः the first permanent tooth to erupt and has वयस्क undertones.
anatomy : The mandibular पहला molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline और गाल ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline and tongue ), distolingual ( DL, away from midline और towards tongue ), distobuccal ( DB, दूर from midline and toward cheek ), and distal ( D, दूर from midline ), listed in order of decreasing आकार.
Listed in अनुक्रम of decreasing height they हैं : ML, DL, DF, MF, and D. An eighth cusp was found in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed इससे the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five तरफा ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual, with the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial सतह, the lingual सतह, distal सतह, and the distobuccal surface.
The occlusal सतह has चार grooves.
The central groove is not सीधा but runs down the center of the दाँत mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
The distobuccal groove रनों from the distal गड्ढे in the central groove distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
the lingual groove runs from the more distal of the central pits in the central नाली toward the lingual सतह between the mesiolingual और distolingual cusps.
The buccal नाली runs इससे the more mesial of the central pits in the central नाली toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal पुलिन ending in the buccal गड्ढे.
the portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis ऑफसेट and is अनिवार्य to खाता for the स्थितियाँ of the buccal and lingual grooves ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual groove while वे are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal view ), दो roots हैं present.
the distal रूट is generally straighter, although दोनो often have a slight distal curvature.
The heights of रुपरेखा on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent teeth and are located at the junction of the occlusal और मध्य thirds of the crown.
The फ्लोरिडा Legislature is the दो houses कि act as the राज्य legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The Florida Constitution states that `` the विधान power of the राज्य shall be vested in a विधानमंडल of the State of Florida, '' composed of a Senate and हाउस of Representatives.
The legislature is seated at the Florida State Capitol in tallahassee.
Stained glass depiction of Daniel interceding साथ arioch, the king 's guard.
arioch had been charged साथ हत्या all the wise men बाद वे यहूद नहीं able to interpret nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the Book of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible.
the chapter 's source टेक्स्ट is predominantly लिखा in Aramaic.
According to the text, nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of Babylon who is troubled by his dreams.
He demands an निर्वचन लिये his सपनो or will have उसके mystic interpreters executed.
Daniel seeks दैवी अक्ल to interpret the किंग 's dreams and praises God साथ a short psalm.
परमेश्वर देता Daniel a vision in the night to खुलासा the किंग 's dream.
समर्थ to satisfy the king, Daniel is promoted over the whole प्रांत of Babylon.
One comcast Center, the मुख्यालय of comcast in Philadelphia, PA.
the old Comcast logo from 1969 to 1999, when it was replaced साथ the crescent logo.
The Comcast निगम is an अमरीकी प्रदाता of entertainment, information and communications उत्पाद and services.
It is the largest cable operator, एक of the biggest mass media, home अंतरजाल सेवा provider, और third largest home telephone service प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य, providing cable टेलीविज़न, broadband Internet, telephone सेवा and in कुछ areas घर security ( including burglar alarms, surveillance cameras, आग alarm systems and home automation ) to दोनो आवासीय और commercial ग्राहक in 40 states and the ज़िला of Columbia.
the company is headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % बहुमत stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal इससे ge in January 2011, and began the process of purchasing the remaining 49 % on February 12, 2013, at a लागत of $ 16.7 अरब.
it completed the purchase on March 19, 2013.
Comcast also रै significant holding in several केबल networks ( including E !
entertainment टेलीविज़न, Style संजाल, G4, the Golf चैनल and एनबीसी Sports Network ), distribution ( ThePlatform ), और related businesses.
Comcast has been the विषय of criticism for क्रियाएँ including its stance on net neutrality, as well as poor परिणाम on ग्राहक संतोष surveys.
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of शार्प spines, or quills, कि बचाव and camouflage them इससे predators.
They are स्वदेशी to the americas, southern Asia, and Africa.
porcupines are the third largest of the rodents, behind the capybara और the बीवर.
Most porcupines are about long, with an long tail.
Weighing, वे are rounded, विशाल and slow.
porcupines come in विभिन्न shades of brown, gray, and the असामान्य white.
Porcupines ' spiny सुरक्षा resembles कि of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme echidnas.
the आम porcupine is a herbivore.
It eats पत्ते, herbs, twigs and green plants like skunk गोभी and clover and in the winter it may eat bark.
The उत्तर American porcupine often climbs trees to find food.
The अफ़्रीकी porcupine is not a climber and forages on the मैदान.
It is mostly nocturnal, but will sometimes forage for food in the दिन.
Porcupines have become a pest in Kenya और are eaten as a delicacy.
The name porcupine comes from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A regional अमरीकी नाम for the animal is quill pig.

Elijah J. मैककॉय ( may 2, 1844 – अक्तूबर 10, 1929 ) was a ब्लैक Canadian-American inventor और engineer, who was notable for his 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of भाप engines.
born free in Canada, he लौटे as a five-year-old child साथ his परिवार to the United राज्य in 1847, where he lived for the rest of his life और became a us citizen.
Honda fcx स्पष्टता, a hydrogen fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle कि उपयोग हाइड्रोजन as its onboard fuel लिये motive power.
हाइड्रोजन vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets, as well as ऑटोमोबाइल and other परिवहन वाहनों.
The शक्ति पौधे of such vehicles बदलें the रासायनिक energy of hydrogen to mechanical energy either by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine, or by reacting हाइड्रोजन साथ oxygen in a fuel कोशिका to run electric मोटर्स.
Widespread use of हाइड्रोजन for fueling transportation is a key element of a प्रस्तावित hydrogen अर्थव्यवस्था.
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on Earth and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an उर्जा carrier.
it is सबसे frequently made इससे मिथेन or other fossil fuels, लकिन it can be उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( such as हवा, सौर, or nuclear ) that are intermittent, too व्याप्त or too cumbersome to सीधे propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants, using electrolysis of water, are exploring technologies to deliver लागत कम enough, और quantities great enough, to compete with traditional उर्जा sources.
अनेक companies हैं working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the potential of hydrogen energy लिये मोबाईल uses.
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy currency is कि, if hydrogen is prepared without using चट्टान ईंधन inputs, vehicle propulsion होता not contribute to कार्बन dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of हाइड्रोजन use are high capital लागत, कम energy content प्रति unit volume, ऊँची tankage weights, very high storage vessel pressures, the storage, transportation और भरना of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in vehicles, the large investment in infrastructure कि होता be required to fuel vehicles, और the inefficiency of production processes.
sacramento is the पूंजी city of the u.S. state of California और the seat of government of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River और the American नदी in the उत्तरी portion of California 's expansive Central Valley.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and आर्थिक बीच of the Sacramento metropolitan area जिससे शामिल seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its महानगर area is the fourth largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया after the वृहद Los Angeles Area, San Francisco Bay Area, and the San Diego महानगर area, as well as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento was cited by Time पत्रिका as America 's सबसे ethnically और racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a नगर through the प्रयत्न of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter, sr., his son John sutter, Jr., and जेम्स W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew quickly धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's Fort, जिससे थी स्थापित by Sutter in 1839.
दौरान the California Gold Rush, sacramento थी a major distribution point, a commercial and agricultural बीच, और a टर्मिनस for वैगन trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the टट्टू Express, and the पहला transcontinental रेलरोड.
California राज्य University, sacramento, more commonly known as Sacramento राज्य or सैक State, is the largest local विश्वविद्यालयों.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
Drexel University Sacramento is located in शहर, Sacramento.
विश्वविद्यालयों of the Pacific 's mcgeorge School of Law is located in the Oak पार्क पड़ोस.
In जोड, the University of California, Davis is located in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
the uc Davis Medical बीच, a world-renowned research hospital, is located in the city of sacramento.
The ठहराना स्टोर is a कड़ी of खुदरा stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing in computers and consumer electronics.
The स्टोर्स sell Macintosh personal कंप्यूटर, software, iPods, ipads, iPhones, third-party accessories, and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV.
Some high प्रोफ़ाइल स्टोर्स feature a Theatre for presentations और workshops and a Studio for training with Apple products ; all stores offer a Genius बार लिये technical support और repairs, as well as फ़्री workshops available to the public.
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice President of Retail परिचालन, the Apple Stores have, according to an article in the New York टाइम्स, been responsible लिये `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled साथ गैजेट ''.
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide, with global sales of billion in merchandise in 2011, और they lead the United राज्य खुदरा मार्केट in शर्तें of sales per unit area.
स्टीवन पॉल `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – अक्तूबर 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor, बेहतरीन known as the co-founder, अध्यक्ष, and सीईओ of ठहराना inc.
Through Apple, he थी widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer क्रान्ति and for उसके influential career in the computer and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` एक उद्योग after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and परोसा as मुख्य executive of Pixar एनिमेशन Studios ; he became a member of the board of directors of The Walt डिज़्नी Company in 2006, when Disney acquired Pixar.
कार्य was among the first to see the commercial संभावित of Xerox parc 's mouse -ड्राइवn graphical उपयोक्ता interface, जिससे led to the creation of the Apple Lisa and, एक साल later, the मैकिंटोश.
He भी निभाई a भूमिका in introducing the LaserWriter, एक of the first widely available laser printers, to the market.
बाद a power struggle with the board of निर्देशकों in 1985, कार्य left ठहराना and founded NeXT, a computer मंच विकास company specializing in the higher-education और business markets.
in 1986, he acquired the computer graphics division of लुकासफ़िल्म, which थी spun off as पिक्चर्स.
He थी credited in Toy स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता.
He served as CEO and majority shareholder until डिज़्नी 's खरीदें of Pixar in 2006.
In 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system, copland, gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer, and the nextstep platform became the न्यास for the मैक os x.
Jobs लौटे to Apple as an सलाहकार, और took control of the company as an अंतरिम सीईओ.
कार्य brought Apple इससे निकट bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
As the new CEO of the कम्पनी, Jobs oversaw the विकास of the imac, iTunes, iPod, iphone, and iPad, and on the services side, the company 's ठहराना Retail Stores, itunes Store and the App Store.
the success of these products और services provided several years of stable financial returns, and propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's most valuable सरेआम traded company in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by many commentators as एक of the greatest turnarounds in business इतिहास.
In 2003, Jobs थी diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it थी initially treated, he reported a हार्मोन imbalance, underwent a liver transplant in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
on चिकित्सा leave लिये most of 2011, Jobs resigned in August that year, and was निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष of the Board.
He died of respiratory arrest related to his metastatic tumor on October 5, 2011.
Jobs received a number of honors and पब्लिक recognition for his influence in the technology and music industries.
He रै महरूम referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or बस `` visionary '', और रै been described as the `` Father of the Digital Revolution '', a `` निपुण of innovation '', and a `` design perfectionist ''.

रोमन numerals, the numeric system in ancient Rome, उपयोग combinations of अक्षर from the लैटिन alphabet to signify values.
the numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in रोमन numerals as follows:
और.
the Roman numeral system is a cousin of etruscan numerals.
Use of Roman numerals continued बाद the decline of the रोमन Empire.
इससे the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in सबसे contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process was gradual, and the उपयोग of Roman numerals in कुछ नाबालिग applications continues to this दिन.
प्रभावी नाभिकीय Charge Diagram
The effective नाभिकीय charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the जाल positive चार्ज experienced by an इलेक्ट्रॉन in a multi-electron अणु.
the term `` प्रभावी '' is प्रयुक्त because the shielding effect of negatively चार्ज electrons रोकता higher orbital electrons इससे experiencing the full nuclear चार्ज by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The प्रभावी nuclear चार्ज experienced by the बाहरी shell इलेक्ट्रॉन is also called the core charge.
It is possible to determine the शक्ति of the नाभिकीय charge by looking at the ऑक्सीकरण number of the atom.
