the ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower National प्रणाली of Interstate and Defense राजमार्गों ( commonly known as the Interstate Highway System, Interstate Freeway प्रणाली, अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली, or simply the Interstate ) is a network of freeways that फ़ॉर्म a भाग of the National राजमार्ग प्रणाली of the संयुक्त States.
The प्रणाली is नामित for President ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower, जो championed its formation.
Construction was प्राधिकृत by the Federal Aid Highway Act of 1956, और the original portion was completed 35 years बाद.
The network has since been विस्तारित, and, it had a total length of, बनाना it the world 's second longest बाद चीन 's., about one-quarter of सब vehicle मील driven in the country use the Interstate system.
The cost of construction रै been estimated at $ 425 अरब ( in 2006 dollars ), making it the `` largest public works program since the पिरामिडों ``.
the system रै contributed in shaping the संयुक्त राज्य into a world economic superpower और a highly industrialized nation.
.eu is the country कोड top-level domain ( cctld ) for the European Union ( EU ).
शुभारम्भ on 7 December 2005, the domain is available for organisations in and residents of EU सदस्य states.
The tld is administered by eurid, a consortium originally consisting of the national ccTLD registry operators of Belgium, Sweden, and Italy, joined later by the national रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of the Czech Republic.
Trademark owners were able to submit registrations through a सूर्योदय काल, in an effort to prevent cybersquatting.
Full registration प्रारंभ on 7 April 2006.
Meister means निपुण in German ( as in निपुण craftsman, or as an honorific शीर्षक such as Meister Eckhart ).
The word is akin to maestro.
In sports, Meister is used for the current national, European or world चैंपियन ( Deutscher meister, *Europameister, Weltmeister ).
Many modern दिन जर्मनी police forces use the title meister.
During the Second World War, Meister थी the highest आयोजिक रैंक of the ordnungspolizei.
Meister has been borrowed into English slang, जहाँ it is used in compound nouns.
A व्यक्ति referred to as “Meister” is one who रै extensive theoretical knowledge और व्यावहारिक skills in his profession, कारोबार, or some other kind of work or activity.
For उदाहरण, a “puzzle-meister” होता be someone highly skilled at solving puzzles.
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for उदाहरण, “stubble-meister” for someone with a short, neat beard or “crier-meister” लिये someone जो often cries ).
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an अमरीकी live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers, based on the 16th किश्त of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise, Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger.
Both the show and its related merchandise saw unbridled overnight success, becoming a staple of 1990s पॉप culture in mere months.
अंतर्गत the original नाम, `` Mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों '' the series ran from 1993 to 1995 and spawned the feature फिल्मी mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie.
The दूसरी and तीसरा सीज़न of the दिखाएँ drew on footage and elements from the सुपर Sentai श्रेणी Gosei sentai dairanger and Ninja Sentai Kakuranger respectively, though the Zyuranger costumes were स्टिल used लिये the पाँच main Rangers और अनेक regular villains.
तभी the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the श्वेत रेंजर ) were retained from dairanger लिये the दूसरी season, जबकि only the mecha इससे kakuranger यहूद प्रदर्शित in the third season.
However the Kakuranger costumes were later used लिये the title characters of the mini-series, Mighty Morphin एलियन Rangers.
The series was produced by MMPR Productions, distributed by Saban Entertainment, and aired on Fox Kids.
The show 's merchandise was produced and distributed by Bandai Entertainment.
In 1996, the series was rebranded as the Power Rangers मताधिकार ; renaming the series every year after, और using वेशभूषा, props, और footage from subsequent सुपर sentai series, as well as बदलना the cast and storyline.
While an overarching storyline होता continue until Power रेंजरों Lost Galaxy, subsequent श्रेणी बाद MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense.
in 2010, a re-version of mighty Morphin Power रेंजरों, with a new लोगो, comic book-referenced graphics, and extra alternative खास प्रभाव, was ब्रॉडकास्ट on ABC बच्चे, and Bandai उत्पादित ब्रांड नई toys to coincide with the series.
एडगर allan पो ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19, 1809 – October 7, 1849 ) was an American लेखक, poet, एडिटर and literary critic, considered part of the American Romantic Movement.
Best known for his किस्से of mystery and the macabre, Poe was one of the earliest American practitioners of the short स्टोरी and is generally considered the inventor of the detective fiction विधा.
he is further credited with contributing to the emerging विधा of science fiction.
he was the पहला well-known American writer to try to earn a जीना through writing अलोन, resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन and career.
He was born as एडगर Poe in Boston, Massachusetts ; he was orphaned young when his mother died shortly after his father abandoned the family.
Poe was taken in by John and Frances Allan, of Richmond, वर्जिनिया, but they never formally adopted him.
He attended the University of Virginia लिये one semester but left due to lack of money.
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an officer 's cadet at West पाइंट, Poe parted ways with the Allans.
उसके प्रकाशन career began humbly, with an anonymous collection of कविताएं, Tamerlane और Other कविताएं ( 1827 ), credited तभी to `` a bostonian ''.
Poe switched his focus to prose and spent the next अनेक सालो working for साहित्यिक journals और periodicals, becoming ज्ञात for his own style of साहित्यिक criticism.
His कार्य मजबूर him to move among अनेक शहरों, including Baltimore, Philadelphia, and New York City.
In बाल्टीमोर in 1835, he married वर्जिनिया clemm, his 13-year-old cousin.
In जनवरी 1845 Poe published उसके poem, `` The Raven ``, to instant कामयाबी.
His wife died of tuberculosis दो years after इसके प्रकाशन.
He began planning to produce his own journal, The Penn ( बाद renamed The स्टाइलस ), हालांकि he died before it could be produced.
on October 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in बाल्टीमोर ; the cause of his death is unknown and has महरूम variously attributed to alcohol, दिमाग जमघट, हैजा, drugs, heart disease, rabies, आत्महत्या, tuberculosis, and other एजेंटों.
Poe and his works influenced literature in the संयुक्त States and around the संसार, as well as in specialized fields, such as cosmology और cryptography.
Poe and his कार्य appear throughout popular culture in साहित्य, music, films, और television.
a क्रमांक of उसके homes are dedicated museums आज.
The Mystery Writers of America उपस्थित an annual पुरस्कार known as the Edgar Award लिये distinguished कार्य in the mystery genre.
शेर are obligate carnivores ; वे require up to seven kilograms ( 15 lbs ) of meat प्रति day.
A major component of their diet is the flesh of large mammals, like इस African buffalo.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( लैटिन, caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an organism that derives its energy और nutrient आवश्यकताएँ from a diet consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of एनिमल tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
पशु कि निर्भर solely on animal flesh लिये their nutrient आवश्यकताएँ हैं considered carnivores while those that also consume non-animal food हैं माना carnivores.
Omnivores भी consume both animal and non-animal food, और अलावा from the more general definition, वहीँ is no clearly defined ratio of plant to एनिमल material that होता distinguish a facultative carnivore इससे an omnivore.
a carnivore that sits at the top of the foodchain is an apex परभक्षी.
Plants that capture and digest कीट हैं called मांसाहारी plants.
Similarly, fungi that capture microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः called carnivorous fungi.
The फीफा World Cup, often बस the संसार Cup, is an international association football competition लडे by the senior मेन 's national टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération Internationale de Football संघ ( फीफा ), the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी देह.
The championship has been awarded प्रत्येक four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, मगर in 1942 and 1946 when it थी not held because of the Second संसार युद्ध.
The current champions are Spain, who won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 teams स्पर्धा for the title at venues within the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often पुकारा the संसार Cup फाइनल.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is प्रयुक्त to determine which teams qualify for the टूर्नामेंट together साथ the host स्वदेश ( s ).
the 19 संसार Cup tournaments have been won by eight different नेशनल teams.
Brazil have won five times, and they are the only team to have निभाई in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, साथ four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, with two शीर्षक each ; and England, फ़्रांस, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people देखी the final मैच of the 2006 FIFA संसार Cup held in Germany.
the next three World cups will be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, Russia in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
नायक is an American science fiction television drama श्रेणी created by Tim क्रिंग that appeared on एनबीसी for चार सीज़न from September 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
The series tells the stories of ordinary लोगों जो discover superhuman abilities, and how these abilities take effect in the characters ' lives.
The series emulates the aesthetic style और storytelling of अमरीकी comic books, using multi-episode स्टोरी arcs that build upon a larger, more encompassing चाप.
The श्रेणी was produced by Tailwind Productions in संघ with Universal Media studios.
It was फिल्माया primarily in Los Angeles, California.
Four complete seasons aired, ending on फ़रवरी 8, 2010.
the critically acclaimed first season had a run of 23 episodes and garnered an average of 14.3 million दर्शक in the United States, receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years.
The दूसरी ऋतु of नायक आकर्षित an average of 13.1 million viewers in the U.S., and marked एनबीसी 's sole series among the शीर्ष 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 season.
Heroes has earned a क्रमांक of awards और nominations, including Primetime Emmy Awards, सुनहरी Globes, लोगों 's Choice पुरस्कार और British Academy Television Awards.
An online extension of the series, Heroes 360 Experience, later rebranded as Heroes Evolutions, was created to explore the नायक universe and provides इनसाइट into the show 's mythology.
Other आधिकारिक Heroes media include magazines, action figures, tie-in and interactive वेबसाइटों, a मोबाईल game, a novel, clothing and other merchandise.
In the fall of 2008, NBC Digital Entertainment released a series of ऑनलाइन सामग्री for the summer, सहित more original वेब content, wireless iTV interactivity, graphic novels उपलब्धियाँ for mobile देखने and webisodes.
NBC announced Heroes रद्दीकरण on May 14, 2010.
Afterward, the network माना making a television special event to conclude the series ; however, on September 9, 2010, NBC announced the निर्णय to stop कोई further development of the नायक franchise.
Tim क्रिंग तब suggested कि the व्यापक premise of Heroes storylines allowed for the franchise to वापसी for प्रशंसक, but he किया not specify when or in कया media format.
On April 17, 2013, tv Line reported कि एमएसएन थी in talks to revive the श्रेणी साथ a new डाल.
John Pierpont `` J. p. ''
मॉर्गन ( April 17, 1837 – कूच 31, 1913 ) was an American financier, banker, philanthropist और art collector जो dominated कॉरपोरेट finance और औद्योगिक consolidation दौरान उसके time.
In 1892 Morgan arranged the विलय of Edison सामान्य Electric and thomson-houston Electric Company to form General Electric.
बाद financing the सृष्टि of the संघीय Steel Company, he merged in 1901 साथ the कार्नेगी Steel कम्पनी और several other steel और iron businesses, including Consolidated Steel and Wire कम्पनी owned by William Edenborn, to form the संयुक्त States स्टील निगम.
Morgan died in रोम, Italy, in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75, leaving उसके fortune और business to his son, John Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan, jr., and bequeathing his mansion and large किताब संग्रहण to The मॉर्गन Library & Museum in New यॉर्क.
At the ऊँचाई of Morgan 's career दौरान the early 1900s, he and उसके साझेदार had financial investments in many large corporations and were accused by आलोचकों of controlling the स्वदेश 's high finance.
He निर्देशित the banking coalition that stopped the दहशत of 1907.
He was the अग्रणी financier of the Progressive Era, और his dedication to दक्षता and modernization helped transform American business.
This is a list of episodes of the television series.
The episodes were directed by Shigeru Ueda और उत्पादित by the yggdrasil Executive Committee which included xebec and Genco.
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo और revolves around रिन Asōgi, an अमर private अन्वेषक, as she explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future world and the supernatural events कि surround the fictional society of immortals like herself.
There हैं large समय gaps in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the first five episodes, ranging इससे एक to तीस years.

Aerial फ़ोटो of fletc, where US digital forensics standards were विकसित in the 1980s और '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic science encompassing the रिकवरी और छानबीन of material मिला in digital डिवाइस, प्रायः in relation to computer crime.
The term digital forensics थी originally used as a पर्याय लिये कंप्यूटर forensics but has expanded to कवर investigation of सब devices capable of storing डिजिटल आंकड़ा.
With जड़ें in the personal कम्प्यूटिंग क्रान्ति of the late 1970s and early '80s, the discipline evolved in a haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s, and it was not until the early 21st century that national policies emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a variety of applications.
The most common is to support or खण्डन a परिकल्पना पहले criminal or civil ( as part of the electronic discovery process ) न्यायालयों.
Forensics may also विशेषता in the निजी sector ; such as during आतंरिक कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion investigation ( a विशेषज्ञ probe into the nature और extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
The technical पहलू of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches, relating to the type of digital devices involved ; कंप्यूटर forensics, network forensics, forensic data analysis and mobile device forensics.
The typical forensic प्रक्रम encompasses the seizure, forensic इमेजिंग ( acquisition ) और analysis of डिजिटल media and the उत्पादन of a report into collected evidence.
As खूब as identifying direct evidence of a crime, digital forensics can be प्रयुक्त to attribute evidence to विशिष्ट suspects, confirm alibis or कथन, determine intent, पहचानो sources ( for उदाहरण, in कापीराइट cases ), or authenticate documents.
investigations are much broader in पैमाना than अन्य areas of forensic analysis ( where the usual aim is to provide answers to a series of simpler सवाल ) often involving जटिल time-lines or hypotheses.
A comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by कुछ रंग spaces.
A color मॉडल is an अमूर्त mathematical मॉडल describing the way colors can be represented as tuples of numbers, typically as three or four मान or color components ( e.g. RGB और CMYK are रंग models ).
However, a color model साथ no associated मानचित्रण फलन to an absolute रंग space is a more or less मनमानी color system with no connection to any globally understood system of color interpretation.
Adding a certain मानचित्रण function between the color model और a certain सन्दर्भ color space results in a definite `` footprint '' भीतर the सन्दर्भ color स्पेस.
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut, and, in combination with the रंग मॉडल, defines a new रंग space.
For example, Adobe आरजीबी and sRGB are two different absolute रंग spaces, दोनो based on the RGB model.
In the most जेनेरिक sense of the definition above, color spaces can be पारिभाषित बगैर the use of a color मॉडल.
ये spaces, ऐसे as Pantone, are in effect a given set of names or संख्याएँ जिससे are defined by the existence of a corresponding set of physical रंग swatches.
This article focuses on the mathematical model concept.
मजदूर दिन is an अमरीकी federal holiday observed on the first Monday in सितंबर, that celebrates the आर्थिक और social योगदान of workers.
जीवन बीमे is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an insurer, where the insurer वादे to pay a designated लाभार्थी a sum of धन ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, other कार्यक्रम ऐसे as टर्मिनल illness or critical बीमारी may also ट्रिगर payment.
the policy होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम, either regularly or as a lump योग.
Other खर्च ( such as अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) are भी sometimes included in the लाभ.
Life नीतियों are legal contracts and the terms of the अनुबंध describe the सीमाएं of the insured events.
Specific exclusions हैं often लिखा into the अनुबंध to limit the देयता of the insurer ; common examples हैं claims relating to suicide, fraud, war, riot और civil commotion.
Life-based contracts tend to fall into दो प्रमुख categories:
Protection नीतियों – designed to provide a लाभ in the event of specified इवेंट, typically a lump योग payment.
A common रूप of इस design is पद insurance.
Investment policies – where the main objective is to सुकर the growth of capital by regular or single premiums.
Common फ़ॉर्म ( in the us ) are whole life, universal जीवन और परिवर्तनीय life policies.

Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born May 2, 1962 in Yorba Linda, Orange County, California ) is an American अभिनेत्री, also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi kapture.
kapture began her career in films, सबसे of which were not विशाल commercial successes.
She went on to make a few television अतिथि appearances ( MacGyver, 1st & टेन, and as a contestant on the $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय exposure with उसके first प्रमुख टेलीविज़न role as Sergeant रीता ली Lance in the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी Silk Stalkings.
Kapture 's role as Rita, the other half of the two `` sams '' लिये almost 5 years, cemented उसके popularity.
युग्म with Rob Estes जो निभाई Sergeant Chris Lorenzo, Kapture gained global recognition along साथ her costar since the show थी broadcast in अनेक countries.
सार्जेंट Lance आखिरकार became Lieutenant तलवार by the time kapture बाएँ the श्रेणी in 1995 to have her first चाइल्ड Madison.
During उसके time साथ the श्रेणी, Kapture briefly सत in the director 's कुर्सी, लिये दो episodes.
वो थी interviewed for the Silk Stalkings ऋतु 1 dvd which was वितरित by Anchor खाड़ी Entertainment and released in सितंबर 2004.
बाद a short hiatus from the स्क्रीन following her निकास इससे Silk Stalkings, kapture returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network.
She played सीसे roles in two USA तस्वीरें Originals telemovies, पूर्ण अपराधों ( based on a true story, also called छुपा और Seek : the Joanne जेन्सेन Story ), जिससे also starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard.
She बाद starred in a few अन्य स्वतंत्र film projects and theatre productions and had several television guest appearances.
kapture भी था a recurring role on बेवाच as Alexis Ryker.
She played अनीता होजेस on The यंग और the Restless from 2002 through 2004, जहाँ she was credited as Mitzi Kapture Donahue, और starred in the made-for-TV movie Night of Terror जिससे premiered March 26, 2006 on Lifetime Network.
Her latest is a supporting role in God 's कानों, released in 2007.
Kapture is the आधिकारिक हस्ती प्रवक्ता लिये the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society.
the Xbox 360 is the second video game console developed by and produced for microsoft and the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes with Sony 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 and Nintendo 's वी as part of the seventh generation of video खेल consoles.
As of September 30, 2012, 70 लाख एक्सबॉक्स 360 consoles have been sold worldwide.
The Xbox 360 थी officially unveiled on MTV on May 12, 2005, with detailed launch and game सूचना divulged बाद that माह at the Electronic entertainment Expo ( E3 ).
The console sold आउट completely upon release in all regions except in Japan.
Several major सुविधाएँ of the Xbox 360 हैं its integrated Xbox Live service that allows खिलाड़ी to compete online ; download आर्केड games, game demos, trailers, TV shows, music and movies ; और its खिड़कियाँ Media Center multimedia capabilities.
The Xbox सजीव भी offers access to various ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party media streaming applications.
At उनके E3 presentation on June 14, 2010, Microsoft announced a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360 that would जलयान on the वही day.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and features integrated 802.11 b/g/n wi-fi, TOSLINK S/PDIF ऑप्टिकल ऑडियो output, पाँच usb 2.0 पोर्ट ( compared to the three from पुरानी संस्करण ) and a खास AUX port.
Older models of the Xbox 360 have since been discontinued.
The first new कंसोल to be released features a 250 gb hard drive, जबकि a बाद, कम expensive SKU features 4 GB internal storage.

A modern backpack
Swiss army backpack ca. 1960
एकीकृत bearer frame.
A backpack ( also called रूकसाक, knapsack, packsack, pack ) is, in its simplest रूप, a cloth sack carried on एक 's वापस and secured with two straps कि go over the shoulders, but there can be exceptions.
Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on only one shoulder strap.
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying कोई sort of equipment, because of the सीमित capacity to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands.
विशाल backpacks, प्रयुक्त to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 पाउंड ), usually offload the largest part ( up to about 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded hip belts, leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the लोड.
This improves the potential to carry भारी loads, as the कूल्हों are stronger than the कन्धों, and भी increases agility and balance, since the load rides nearer the wearer 's अपना बीच of mass.
In ancient times, the backpack was प्रयुक्त as a अर्थात् to carry the hunter 's larger game and other प्रकार of prey and as a रास्ता of easier transport लिये other materials.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters would dismember their prey and वितरित the pieces of the animal around, each एक packing the मांस into many wrappings and तब into बैग which they placed on to their backs.
the bag itself was made up of different animal hide and स्किन ( depending on what sorts of पशु were in the area ) and sewn साथ by the intestines of said animals, जिससे were woven together tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material.
Mexico ( ; ; ), officially the United मैक्सिकन राज्य ( ), is a संघीय संवैधानिक गणतंत्र in North America.
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and west by the Pacific Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala, Belize, और the Caribbean Sea ; और on the ईस्ट by the गल्फ of Mexico.
Covering लगभग two million वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( over 760,000 sq mi ), Mexico is the fifth largest देश in the Americas by total area और the 13th largest independent स्वदेश in the world.
With an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 million, it is the world 's eleventh most populous country और the सबसे populous Spanish-speaking देश.
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one राज्य और a Federal District, the capital city.
In pre-Columbian Mexico अनेक संस्कृतियों matured into advanced civilizations such as the Olmec, the toltec, the Teotihuacan, the zapotec, the Maya and the Aztec before पहला सम्पर्क साथ europeans.
in 1521, Spain conquered and colonized the territory from its आधार in méxico-tenochtitlan, which was administered as the Viceroyalty of नई Spain.
This territory would eventually become Mexico following मान्यता of the colony 's independence in 1821.
The post-independence काल थी characterized by economic instability, the Mexican-American युद्ध और territorial cession to the United States, a civil युद्ध, two empires और a घरेलू तानाशाही.
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910, जिससे culminated with the promulgation of the 1917 संविधान and the emergence of the country 's current राजनैतिक system.
Elections held in जुलाई 2000 चिह्नित the first time कि an opposition party won the presidency from the Institutional Revolutionary पार्टी.
Since 2006 the country has महरूम in the midst of a ड्रग war which has caused 60,000 deaths.
मैक्सिको has one of the संसार 's largest economies, and is considered both a क्षेत्रीय power और middle power.
in addition, Mexico थी the first Latin American member of the संगठन लिये आर्थिक Co-operation and Development oecd ( since 1994 ), और considered an upper-middle income देश by the World Bank.
Mexico is considered a newly industrialized देश और an emerging शक्ति.
It has the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and the eleventh largest जीडीपी by purchasing power parity.
The अर्थव्यवस्था is strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर American Free Trade अनुबंध ( NAFTA ) partners, विशेषकर the United States of America.
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and पहला in the Americas by number of युनेस्को World Heritage Sites with 31, and in 2007 was the tenth सबसे visited देश in the world with 21.4 million international आमद प्रति year.
Babe Ruth holds the MLB career slugging percentage रिकार्ड (.690 ).
In baseball statistics, slugging percentage ( abbreviated slg ) is a लोकप्रिय measure of the power of a hitter.
It is calculated as कुल bases divided by at bats :
where ab is the number of at-bats for a दिए player, and 1b, 2b, 3B, and HR हैं the क्रमांक of singles, doubles, तिगुना, और home runs, respectively.
सैर are specifically excluded इससे इस गणना.
For example, in 1920, बेब रुथ निभाई उसके पहला season for the New यॉर्क Yankees.
in 458 at bats, Ruth था 172 hits, comprising 73 singles, 36 doubles, 9 triples, and 54 home runs, which brings the कुल आधार गिनती to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His कुल number of bases ( 388 ) विभाजित by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, his slugging प्रतिशत for the season.
The next year he slugged.846, और these रिकॉर्ड went अखंड जबतक 2001, जब Barry Bonds हासिल 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing उसके slugging प्रतिशत to.863, unmatched since.
is a role-playing video खेल developed और published by Square ( now Square Enix ) लिये the Super Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली in 1995.
chrono ट्रिगर 's विकास टोली included three designers कि Square dubbed the `` Dream टोली '' : hironobu Sakaguchi, the creator of Square 's फाइनल Fantasy श्रेणी ; yuji Horii, a freelance designer and creator of एनिक्स 's popular Dragon Quest श्रेणी ; and Akira Toriyama, a freelance manga artist famed लिये his कार्य साथ Dragon Quest और Dragon Ball.
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game, masato Kato wrote most of the plot, while composer yasunori mitsuda scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring remaining ट्रैक्स to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu.
the game 's स्टोरी फ़ॉलो a समूह of adventurers who travel through time to prevent a global प्रलय.
वर्गाकार re-released a ported संस्करण by Tose in Japan लिये Sony 's PlayStation in 1999, later repackaged with a Final Fantasy iv बंदरगाहों as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North अमरीकी market.
A slightly enhanced Chrono ट्रिगर was released for the Nintendo DS on November 25, 2008, in उत्तर America and Japan, and went on sale in ऑस्ट्रेलिया on February 3, 2009 and in Europe on February 6, 2009.
The game was never released in PAL territories before the Nintendo DS version.
Chrono Trigger was a नाजुक and वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी upon release and is माना today to be one of the greatest video games of सब time.
Nintendo शक्ति magazine वर्णित aspects of Chrono Trigger as revolutionary, including its multiple endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character विकास, unique battle प्रणाली, and detailed graphics.
Chrono ट्रिगर थी the third best-selling खेल of 1995, and the खेल 's SNES and प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 million नक़ल as of March 2003.
the version for the Nintendo DS sold 790,000 copies as of कूच 2009.
Chrono Trigger was also ported to मोबाईल phones, आभासी कंसोल, the PlayStation Network ( only in the यूएसए ), आईओएस devices, और Android devices.
Goat cheese
Goat cheese, or chèvre ( from the फ्रेंच word for goat ), is चीज made आउट of the milk of goats.
Hyperthermia is elevated देह temperature due to failed thermoregulation that occurs when a body produces or absorbs more heat than it dissipates.
चरम तापमान elevation then becomes a चिकित्सा emergency requiring immediate treatment to prevent विकलांगता or death.
The most common causes शामिल ऊष्मा stroke and adverse प्रतिक्रियाएँ to drugs.
the पूर्व is an acute तापमान उन्नयन caused by exposure to excessive heat, or संयोजन of heat और humidity, that overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a relatively rare side effect of many drugs, विशेषकर those that affect the central nervous system.
malignant hyperthermia is a विरल complication of कुछ types of general anesthesia.
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical डिवाइस and may be used in the उपचार of some kinds of कर्कट and अन्य conditions, सबसे commonly in conjunction साथ radiotherapy.
अतिताप differs from fever in that the देह 's temperature नियत point remains unchanged.
The opposite is hypothermia, which occurs when the तापमान drops below कि required to maintain normal metabolism.
Belize, is a country located on the northeastern coast of Central America.
It is the only देश in the क्षेत्रफल where English is the आधिकारिक language, हालांकि kriol and Spanish are more commonly spoken.
Belize is bordered on the उत्तर by Mexico, to the south and west by Guatemala and to the east by the Caribbean समुद्र.
Its mainland is about long and चौड़ी.
With of land और a जनसांख्यिकी of तभी 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 जनसांख्यिकी ), Belize possesses the न्यूनतम population density in सेंट्रल America.
The country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the second highest in the region और one of the highest in the western गोलार्ध.
Belize 's abundance of स्थलीय and marine species, and its diversity of ecosystems give it a key प्लेस within the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological corridor.
Belize रै a diverse society, comprising many संस्कृतियों और भाषाएं.
it is the only nation in the region with a अंग्रेजों colonial heritage, लकिन as a part of the Western Caribbean मण्डल, it also साझा a common heritage with the fellow anglophone caribbean countries.
In general, बेलीज़ is considered to be a Central American and Caribbean nation साथ दमदार ties to दोनो the caribbean और लैटिन अमेरिका.
बेलीज़ is a member of the caribbean जातियाँ ( CARICOM ), the जातियाँ of लैटिन अमरीकी and Caribbean States ( CELAC ), और Central American संयोजन System ( SICA ).
Belize is ज्ञात for इसके सितंबर जश्न, और is the birthplace of chewing gum और Punta Rock.
The `` बेट्सी रॉस '' flag
A `` बेट्सी Ross '' flag flying बाहर सैन फ्रांसिस्को City Hall
The बेट्सी Ross flag is an early design of the flag of the United राज्य, popularly attributed to Betsy रॉस, using the common motifs of alternating red-and-white धारीदार फ़ील्ड with five-pointed stars in a ब्लू canton.
The flag थी designed during the अमरीकी Revolution and सुविधाएँ 13 stars to represent the असली 13 colonies.
the distinctive विशेषता of the Ross flag is the arrangement of the stars in a circle.
Although the Betsy Ross स्टोरी is accepted by most अमेरिकी, some flag historians और revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first अमरीकी ध्वज.
According to the परंपरागत खाता, the original ध्वज थी made in June 1776, when a small committee—including George वॉशिंगटन, रॉबर्ट Morris and relative George रॉस —visited Betsy और discussed the need for a नई अमरीकी flag.
बेट्सी accepted the job to manufacture the ध्वज, altering the कमेटी 's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed सितारों.
जबकि the Betsy रॉस legend is questionable, the flag design is known to have been in use by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड B. Street described it at the surrender of General burgoyne and समझा the वृत्त of stars to represent समता among the American states.
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags ज्ञात to मौजूद ; while it is not the oldest surviving flag artifact in cloth form, its likeness appears on पुरानी physical relics, namely, the समकालीन रणभूमि paintings by John Trumbull और चार्ल्स willson peale.
They depict the circular star arrangement being flown इससे ship masts और many other places, and thus provide the first ज्ञात ऐतिहासिक documentation of the flag 's रूप.
the मुहर of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs uses the Betsy रॉस flag to represent service to all veterans इससे the American क्रान्ति to the present day.
the Betsy Ross design of 13-star us flags has महरूम featured in many popular artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in Washington क्रासिंग the Delaware ) और films, such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna.
The ध्वज continues to be one of the most popular symbols of the American Revolution.
A purr is a sound बना by सब प्रजाति of felids and is a part of cat communication.
It varies between बिल्लियों ( लिये example by loudness and टोन ), and from species to species, but can be characterized as a tonal गुलजार.
The term `` purring '' has महरूम used liberally in साहित्य, and it has महरूम claimed that viverrids ( civet, नेवला, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
Other पशु that have been said to purr are rabbits, squirrels, guinea pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, elephants, raccoons and gorillas while eating.
However, using a strict परिभाषा of purring that continuous sound उत्पादन must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and प्रायः go on for minutes ), Peters ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive review of the scientific literature, पहुँचे the निष्कर्ष that until तब only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) और दो प्रजाति of genets, Genetta tigrina, and most likely also Genetta genetta, had महरूम documented to purr.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to eastern Australia, including तस्मानिया.
Together with the four प्रजाति of echidna, it is one of the पाँच extant species of monotremes, the only mammals कि lay eggs instead of giving birth.
it is the sole living representative of इसके परिवार ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ), though a number of related species have महरूम मिला in the fossil record.
the असामान्य appearance of this egg-laying, बतख -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ European naturalists when वे first encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few विषैला mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The अद्वितीय सुविधाएँ of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of विकासवादी biology and a recognisable and iconic प्रतीक of Australia ; it रै appeared as a mascot at नेशनल events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
the platypus is the animal emblem of the state of New South वेल्स.
Until the early 20th century, it was hunted for its फर, but it is now protected throughout its range.
Although captive breeding programmes have था only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of pollution, it is नहीं under any immediate threat.
St. Elizabeth is a village in Miller County, मिसौरी, United States.
The population was 336 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
wilton is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Sacramento काउंटी, California, United States.
It is part of the Sacramento – Arden-Arcade – Roseville महानगर Statistical Area.
the population was 5,363 at the 2010 census, up from 4,551 at the 2000 census.
In human-computer बातचीत, cut and paste and नक़ल और paste are सम्बन्धित commands that offer a user-interface interaction technique for transferring टेक्स्ट, आंकड़ा, files or objects from a source to a destination.
सबसे ubiquitously, users require the ability to cut और paste भाग of plain text.
the काटें कमांड removes the selected data from its original position, जबकि the नक़ल command creates a नकल ; in both मामले the selected data is placed in a clipboard.
The आंकड़ा in the clipboard is later inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the paste command is issued.
The कमांड names are an इंटरफ़ेस रूपक आधारित on the शारीरिक procedure used in manuscript editing to create a page layout.
इस interaction technique has close associations साथ related techniques in graphical user interfaces that use pointing devices such as a कंप्यूटर mouse ( by drag and drop, for example ).
आर्थिक order quantity is the order quantity कि minimizes total inventory holding costs and ordering costs.
It is one of the oldest शास्त्रीय production scheduling models.
The फ्रेमवर्क used to determine this order मात्रा is also known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula.
The मॉडल was developed by Ford W. हैरिस in 1913, but R. H. विल्सन, a सलाहकार who applied it extensively, is given credit for his in-depth analysis.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य and leader of Double Trouble.
Together with drummer Chris Layton और bassist Tommy Shannon, वे ignited the ब्लूज़ revival of the 1980s.
With a करियर spanning सात years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently बेची आउट concerts while their albums frequently went gold.
he थी born and raised in डलास, टेक्सास, and for a short काल of समय lived in ग्राहम, Texas.
As the younger brother of jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at age सात and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped आउट of ऊँची school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical करियर, joining समूह such as Krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a बैंड that आखिरकार evolved into दोगुना Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
in 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz पर्व in Switzerland, catching the ध्यान of musicians David बोवी and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked vaughan to play on उसके upcoming स्टुडियो album Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free उपयोग of his निजी studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, vaughan and Double Trouble were हस्ताक्षरित to एपिक Records by veteran रिकार्ड producer John Hammond Sr. and released their डेब्यू album, Texas Flood in June of that साल.
After successful touring, the समूह released the albums, could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which प्रदर्शित new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although उसके career had progressed successfully, vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a कोका and alcohol आदत और returned to touring साथ the बैंड.
in June 1989, In Step थी released and अर्जित them a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance.
On अगस्त 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter क्रैश following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र style was derived इससे a किस्में of musical genres.
he was influenced by ब्लूज़ musicians including Albert किंग, Freddie King, Otis Rush, and Muddy waters, and rock guitarists such as जिमि Hendrix and lonnie Mack.
उसके गिटार playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic scales.
he has received wide critical मान्यता लिये his गिटार playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
He थी posthumously inducted into the ब्लूज़ Hall of Fame in 2000 और a memorial statue was erected in ऑस्टिन 's Auditorium shores park.
स्टीवी Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas.
The Las Vegas Strip संसार of Coca-Cola museum in 2003
coca-cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, restaurants, and वेंडिंग machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
it is produced by the coca-cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of The coca-cola Company in the संयुक्त States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton, coca-cola was bought out by businessman Asa griggs Candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led Coke to its दबदबा of the संसार soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
the कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the world.
the bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive contracts साथ the company, produce finished उत्पाद in cans and बोतलों from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब बेचें, distribute और merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स and vending मशीने.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल Coca-Cola bottler in North America and पश्चिमी यूरोपीय.
The Coca-Cola Company भी बिकता concentrate for सोडा fountains to major restaurants and खाना service distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on अवसर, introduced other cola पेय under the Coke brand name.
The most common of ये is Diet Coke, with अन्य सहित Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet कोक Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and खास संस्करण साथ lemon, lime or कॉफी.
Based on interbrand 's best global brand 2011, coca-cola was the world 's most मूल्यवान brand.
बैरी लुई Larkin ( born April 28, 1964 ) is a रिटायर्ड Major लीग Baseball player.
larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from 1986 to 2004 and was one of the pivotal players on the 1990 लाल ' संसार श्रेणी चैंपियनशिप team.
larkin was निर्वाचित to the नेशनल Baseball Hall of Fame in जनवरी 2012 and थी inducted on July 22.
Larkin is considered एक of the top players of उसके era, जीतना nine Silver Slugger awards and three सुनहरा Glove पुरस्कार.
He थी selected to the Major लीग All-Star Game twelve times, and थी निर्वाचित the 1995 National League Most Valuable खिलाड़ी.
Brasília ( ) is the संघीय पूंजी of ब्राज़ील and the seat of government of the संघीय District.
Administratively, the city is located in the Federal District which is in the Central-West Region.
Physically, it is located in the Brazilian Highlands.
It has a population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate, बनाना it the चौथी largest city in Brazil.
however, as a metropolitan area, it ranks lower at sixth in population.
Brasília is the largest city in the world that did not exist at the beginning of the 20th सदी.
Brasília रै the पांचवां largest GDP among Latin American cities and the third in ब्राज़ील.
At around R $ 62,000 ब्राज़ीलियाई reais ( बराबर to approximately $ 30,900 US डॉलर or €23,000 euros ), the नगर 's per capita income is the उच्चतम among Brazil 's largest cities.
as the national capital, brasília is the seat of सब three branches of the federal government of Brazil.
The city also होस्ट the headquarters of many Brazilian कंपनियाँ.
Planning नीतियों ऐसे as the स्थान of residential इमारतें around expansive urban areas, as well as building the नगर around large avenues and dividing it into sectors, have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big शहरों in the 20th century.
The city 's design divides it into गिने blocks as well as sectors for निर्दिष्ट क्रियाएँ, such as the होटल सेक्टर, the बैंकिंग Sector or the Embassy Sector.
brasília होस्ट 124 foreign embassies.
the city was planned and विकसित in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal urban प्लानर, ऑस्कर Niemeyer as the प्रिंसिपल वास्तु और Roberto burle Marx as the landscape पंक्तियां.
Brasilia is in the युनेस्को 's World Hertitage List due to its वास्तुकला.
on April 22, 1960, it formally became Brazil 's national capital.
Viewed from above, the main portion of the नगर resembles an वायुयान or a butterfly.
the city is commonly referred to as पूंजी Federal, or बस BSB.
Residents of brasília हैं ज्ञात as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those not born in the city but जो migrated there after it was established ).
In लोकल usage, the शब्द `` Brasília '' usually refers only to the First Administrative प्रदेश ( RA I ) within the संघीय District ( distrito संघीय ), where the most महत्वपूर्ण government buildings हैं located.
brasília has a unique status in ब्राज़ील, as it is an प्रशासनिक division बल्कि than a legal नगरपालिका like nearly all शहरों in Brazil.
Nationally, the term is लगभग always used synonymously with the Federal District, which constitutes an indivisible Federative ईकाई, analogous to a राज्य.
Several `` satellite cities '' exist जिससे are also part of the Federal District.
Brasília International Airport is the प्रमुख airport in Brasília, connecting the capital to सब major Brazilian शहरों and many अंतरराष्ट्रीय destinations.
It is the third most महत्वपूर्ण airport in Brazil, in terms of यात्री और aircraft आंदोलनों.
Personifications of जर्मनी, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, और the United Kingdom attempting to keep the ढक्कन on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and nationalist तनाव in the balkans to prevent a general यूरोपीय war.
They were successful in 1912 and 1913 but did नहीं succeed in in 1914.
The causes of संसार War i, which began in central Europe in लेट July 1914 and समाप्त in 1918, included अनेक factors, such as the विरोध and hostility of the four दशकों leading up to the युद्ध.
Militarism, alliances, साम्राज्यवाद, and nationalism played major भूमिकाएँ in the विरोध as well.
The immediate origins of the war, however, lay in the decisions taken by statesmen and generals during the Crisis of 1914, casus belli लिये जिससे was the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand ( the Archduke of Austria Hungary ) and उसके wife Sophie by Gavrilo princip, an irredentist Serb.
the संकट came after a long और difficult series of राजनयिक clashes between the Great Powers ( Italy, France, जर्मनी, the British Empire, the Austria-Hungarian साम्राज्य और Russia ) over European and colonial issues in the दशक before 1914 that had left तनाव high.
in turn these diplomatic clashes can be traced to changes in the संतुलन of शक्ति in Europe चूंकि 1867.
the more तात्कालिक कारण for the war was तनाव over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed with Serbia and Russia for territory और influence in the प्रदेश and वे pulled the rest of the Great Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties.
हालांकि the कड़ी of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the war, the युद्ध 's origins go deeper, involving national politics, cultures, अर्थशास्त्र, and a जटिल web of alliances and counterbalances that had developed between the various यूरोपीय powers since 1870.
Some of the most महत्वपूर्ण long term or संरचनात्मक causes हैं : the growth of nationalism across Europe, unresolved territorial disputes, an intricate system of alliances, the perceived विश्लेषण of the संतुलन of power in यूरोपीय, convoluted और fragmented governance, the arms races of the previous decades, पिछला military planning, imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth, शक्ति and प्रतिष्ठा, and economic और सैन्य rivalry in industry और trade – e.g., the Pig War between Austria and Serbia.
Other causes that came into खेल during the राजनयिक crisis that preceded the युद्ध शामिल misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the जर्मनी belief कि the United किंगडम होता remain neutral ) and delays and misunderstandings in राजनयिक communications.
The various categories of स्पष्टीकरण for World War I correspond to different historians ' overall methods.
Most इतिहासकारों और popular commentators include causes from more than one category of explanation to provide a rounded account of the causes of the युद्ध.
the deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories कि see it as the inevitable and predictable outcome of निश्चित कारकों, और those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake.
In attributing causes for the युद्ध, historians और academics था to deal with an unprecedented flood of memoirs and आधिकारिक दस्तावेज़, released as each देश involved tried to avoid दोष for starting the युद्ध.
Early रिलीज of information by governments, particularly those released लिये use by the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the Authors of the युद्ध '' यहूद shown to be incomplete और biased.
In addition some documents, विशेषकर राजनयिक cables between Russia and फ़्रांस, were found to have been doctored.
भी in later decades however, when much more information था been released, इतिहासकारों from the same संस्कृति have महरूम दिखाया to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
जॉनसन 's new chart of नेशनल प्रतीक, प्रकाशित c. 1868.
The विशाल flags दिखाया in the corners are the 37-star ध्वज of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ), the Royal Standard of the United किंगडम, the Russian Imperial Standard, और the French tricolore साथ inset इम्पीरियल Eagle.
Various other flags flown by ships are shown.
the Flag of Cuba is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) ``.
the Chinese dragon on the Flag of China was drawn mistakenly as a पश्चिमी dragon.
A national flag is a flag that symbolizes a country.
The ध्वज is flown by the सरकारी, but usually can भी be flown by citizens of the country.
Both पब्लिक और private इमारतें such as स्कूलों and courthouses may fly the national flag.
In some देशों, the national flags हैं only flown इससे non-military इमारतें on certain flag days.
वहीँ are तीन distinct प्रकार of नेशनल flag for use on जमीन, और three for उपयोग at sea, though many countries उपयोग identical designs for several ( and sometimes all ) of these प्रकार of flag.
The American Civil युद्ध ( ACW ), also ज्ञात as the War between the States or बस the सिविल War ( see नामकरण ), थी a सिविल war लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several दक्षिणी slave राज्य that declared their secession और formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the युद्ध had इसके उत्पत्ति in the issue of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां did not intervene.
After चार years of bloody कॉम्बैट that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय election, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष James Buchanan और the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित his प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave राज्य continued to अस्वीकृत calls लिये secession.
confederate शक्तियां seized numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन विफल to find a compromise, and both sides prepared लिये war.
the confederates assumed कि European countries were so dependent on `` किंग Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the new confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब Confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort Sumter, a कुंजी fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
lincoln called लिये प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके total to ग्यारह.
The Union soon controlled the किनारा states और established a नवल blockade कि अबोध the southern economy.
The पूर्वी Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended with Confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों intervention.
lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made समाप्ति slavery a war goal.
to the west, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ destroyed the Confederate नदी नेवी, then much of their western सेना, and the Union at Vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the Mississippi नदी.
in 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
पश्चिमी successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of सब Union armies in 1864.
in the पश्चिमी Theater, William T. शरमन drove east to कैप्चर Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
the संघ marshaled the संसाधन and manpower to attack the Confederacy इससे all directions, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of attrition through the overland Campaign towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
the defending Confederate फौज failed, leading to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at Appomattox Court हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation और food supplies all foreshadowed World युद्ध I.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the मौत toll at ten percent of सब Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of सब Southern white males aged 18–40.
norrie disease is a genetic विकार कि primarily affects the नजर and almost सदा लीड to blindness.
in addition to the congenital ocular symptoms, कुछ मरीजों suffer इससे a progressive hearing घाटा starting mostly in उनके 2nd decade of जीवन, while another portion may be mentally challenged.
मरीजों with Norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear श्वेत when लाइट is shone on them ), along with अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the नजर, ऐसे as shrinking of the ग्लोब and the बर्बाद दूर of the iris.
around 30–50 % of them will also have developmental डेलाy/ mental retardation, psychotic-like सुविधाएँ, incoordination of आंदोलनों or behavioral abnormalities.
Most patients are born with normal सुनना ; however, the onset of सुनना loss is बहुत आम in early adolescence.
About 15 % of the मरीजों are अनुमानित to develop सब the features of the disease.
The बीमारी affects लगभग तभी male infants at birth or जल्द after birth, because the disease is inherited x-linked recessive.
Only in very rare मामले, females have been diagnosed साथ Norrie बीमारी as well.
The exact incidence number is unknown ; तभी a few hundred मामले have been reported so far.
It is a very विरल disorder that is नहीं associated with any specific ethnic or जातिगत groups.
a contract is an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by two or more पार्टियों, each of जिसको intends to create one or more legal दायित्वों between उन्हें.
the तत्व of a contract are `` offer '' and `` स्वीकृति '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक capacity who exchange `` विचार '' to create `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or सब of these तत्व may be done in writing, though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or specific प्रदर्शन enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation क्षतिपूर्ति, which हैं वृहद than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The पार्टियों may be natural व्यक्तियों or juristic persons.
A अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking that something will or will नहीं occur.
The word promise can be प्रयुक्त as a legal synonym लिये अनुबंध, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract विधि varies greatly from one क्षेत्राधिकार to another, including differences in आम विधि compared to civil law, the impact of received law, particularly from England in common विधि countries, और of law संहिताबद्ध in क्षेत्रीय legislation.
Regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई अनुबंध Law for example, there are 40 relevant acts which प्रभाव on the interpretation of contract at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / national ) level, and an additional 26 अधिनियमों at the level of the state of nsw.
In addition वहीँ are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International बिक्री of Goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side Web application framework designed लिये Web development to produce dynamic Web pages.
It was developed by microsoft to allow programmers to build डायनेमिक वेब साइट, वेब अनुप्रयोग and web services.
it थी पहला released in January 2002 साथ version 1.0 of the.NET Framework, and is the successor to microsoft 's क्रियाशील Server Pages ( ASP ) technology.
ASP.NET is built on the आम Language Runtime ( clr ), allowing programmers to write ASP.NET code using कोई supported.NET भाषा.
The ASP.NET साबुन extension framework allows ASP.NET components to प्रक्रम SOAP messages.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated एलएसडी or LSD-25, भी ज्ञात as lysergide ( INN ) और colloquially as एसिड, is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline family, well ज्ञात लिये इसके psychological effects which can include altered thinking processes, closed and open eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time और spiritual experiences, as well as for its कुंजी role in 1960s counterculture.
It is used mainly as an entheogen, recreational drug, and as an agent in psychedelic therapy.
LSD is non-addictive, is not ज्ञात to cause brain damage, और has extremely low toxicity सापेक्ष to dose.
However, adverse psychiatric reactions such as anxiety, paranoia, और delusions are possible.
LSD was पहला synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 इससे ergotamine, a chemical निकला by आर्थर Stoll इससे ergot, a grain कवक कि typically grows on rye.
The short form `` एलएसडी '' comes from its early code name LSD-25, जिससे is an abbreviation for the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
एलएसडी is sensitive to oxygen, पराबैंगनी लाइट, और क्लोराइड, especially in solution, though इसके potency may पिछला for years if it is stored दूर from light and moisture at low temperature.
In pure form it is a colorless, गंधहीन, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically delivered orally, usually on a substrate such as absorbent blotter paper, a शुगर cube, or जिलेटिन.
In its द्रव रूप, it can also be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is very potent, साथ 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) being the threshold dose.
New experiments with LSD started in 2009 for the first time in 40 years.
Introduced by Sandoz Laboratories, साथ trade-name Delysid, as a ड्रग with various psychiatric uses in 1947, LSD जल्दी became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) विचार the drug might be लागू to दिमाग control and रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's MKULTRA शोध कार्यक्रम propagated the drug among young servicemen and विद्यार्थी.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm कि resulted in its prohibition.
फिलहाल, a number of organizations—including the Beckley न्यास, MAPS, heffter Research Institute और the Albert hofmann Foundation—exist to निधि, encourage and coordinate शोध into the medicinal and spiritual uses of एलएसडी और related psychedelics.
The संयुक्त States नेवी 's Sea, Air, Land टीमों, commonly ज्ञात as the Navy SEALs, are the U.S. नेवी 's principal special operations फ़ोर्स and a part of the Naval Special Warfare कमांड and United राज्य Special Operations कमांड.
`` SEAL '' is सदा capitalized in reference to सदस्यों of the Naval खास warfare community.
The acronym is निकला from their capacity to operate at sea, in the air, and on जमीन.
seals are male members of the United States Navy.
An exchange program साथ the Coast गार्ड, which graduated तीन coast Guardsmen as seals, was suspended in 2011.
The सीआईए 's highly गुपचुप Special Activities प्रभाग ( SAD ) and more specifically इसके elite Special परिचालन Group ( SOG ) रंगरूटों operators from the SEAL Teams.
Joint Navy SEALs और CIA परिचालन go वापस to the famed macv-sog during the Vietnam War.
इस सहयोग still exists today and is seen in the युद्धों in Iraq and Afghanistan, and in the finding and killing of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on un 2010 projections ( रेड, orange, green ) और US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual अंकित population figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the संसार population may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest अनुमान, it may मनाही to 6 billion.
The world जनसांख्यिकी is the total number of living humans on धरती.
As of आज, it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक billion by the United States जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ( USCB ).
the uscb estimates that the world जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
the संसार population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the ग्रेट अकाल and the Black मौत in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 million.
The उच्चतम rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % प्रति year – were देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, and for a longer काल during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births were highest in the लेट 1980s at about 138 million, and हैं अभी expected to remain essentially निरंतर at their 2011 स्तर of 134 million, while deaths number 56 लाख per year, और are expected to increase to 80 million per साल by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near भविष्य ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 और 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or even overall decline in the वैश्विक population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further संसार population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food आपूर्तियाँ, और उर्जा resources.
Memphis is a city in the southwestern कोने of the U.S. state of Tennessee, और the county seat of Shelby County.
The city is located on the 4th chickasaw bluff, south of the संगम of the Wolf और मिसिसिपी rivers.
मेम्फिस had a जनसांख्यिकी of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest नगर in the state of Tennessee, the largest city on the मिसिसिपी River, the third largest in the Southeastern संयुक्त States, and the 20th largest in the United राज्य.
The greater Memphis metropolitan क्षेत्रफल, including adjacent काउंटी in Mississippi and Arkansas, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,316,100.
इस makes Memphis the second largest metropolitan area in टेनेसी, surpassed तभी by metropolitan Nashville, which has overtaken Memphis in recent years.
Memphis is the youngest of Tennessee 's major शहरों.
a resident of Memphis is referred to as a memphian, और the Memphis region is ज्ञात, particularly to media आउटलेट, as `` मेम्फिस & The mid-south ``.
The Cattenom नाभिकीय Power Plant in France.
France produces around three quarters of its विद्युत by nuclear power.
the Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power संयंत्र in जर्मनी.
चांसलर एंजेला मार्केल 's गठबन्धन announced on may 30, 2011, कि Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following जापानी 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
फिलहाल, 68 reactors हैं under construction in 15 countries.
नाभिकीय शक्ति stations operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, पहले the Fukushima daiichi nuclear disaster, it थी reported कि an औसत of about 10 nuclear reactors यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational per year, although according to the World Nuclear Association, of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only पाँच actually came on stream.
As of जून 2011, Germany and Switzerland हैं phasing-out nuclear power.
As of जून 2011, countries ऐसे as Australia, ऑस्ट्रिया, Denmark, Greece, आयरलैंड, Italy, लातवियाई, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear शक्ति.
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a तालिका of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and लगभग every muscle constitutes one भाग of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on both sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as अलग parts of a single muscle or as अनेक muscles.
Examples range इससे 640 to 850.
the muscles of the human देह can be categorized into a number of समूह which include मांसपेशियां relating to the head और neck, मांसपेशियां of the torso or ट्रंक, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी from the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, other actions may be performed.

The Seminole Wars, also known as the फ्लोरिडा Wars, were three conflicts in Florida between the seminole — the collective नाम given to the amalgamation of various groups of native Americans and Black people who settled in फ्लोरिडा in the early 18th सदी — और the संयुक्त States फौज.
The पहला Seminole War was इससे 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ), the Second Seminole War इससे 1835 to 1842, and the Third seminole युद्ध इससे 1855 to 1858.
the first conflict with the Seminoles arose out of tensions relating to General एंड्रयू Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro फोर्ट in Florida in 1816.
Jackson भी attacked the Spanish at pensacola.
ultimately, the Spanish क्राउन ceded the colony to संयुक्त States rule.
Orono is a town in Penobscot County, maine, United States.
It was first settled in 1774 and नामित in सम्मान of Chief Joseph Orono of the penobscot स्वदेश.
it is घर to The विश्वविद्यालयों of Maine.
The population was 10,362 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.

लक्सर लास Vegas is a hotel and casino on the लास Vegas स्ट्रिप in Paradise, नेवाडा.
the 30-story hotel, owned और operated by MGM Resorts International, रै a casino with over 2,000 स्लॉट machines and 87 table games.
In the 2008 to 2009 नवीकरण, it has a new, highly आधुनिकीकरण, and contemporary डिज़ाइन and contains a total of 4,400 rooms, सहित 442 suites, lining the आंतरिक walls of a pyramid style मीनार and within twin 22-story ziggurat मीनारें that were निर्मित as बाद additions.
The hotel is named बाद the city of Luxor ( ancient Thebes ) in मिश्र.
Luxor is the second largest hotel in Las वेगास ( the largest होने the mgm ग्रैंड ) and the eighth largest in the संसार.
As of 2010, the Luxor has a 4 कुंजी rating from the Green कुंजी eco-rating Program, which evaluates `` sustainable '' होटल परिचालन.
A पायलट प्रयोग, also called a pilot study, is a छोटी scale प्रारंभिक study conducted in order to evaluate feasibility, time, लागत, प्रतिकूल events, और प्रभाव आकार ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to भविष्यवाणी an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research प्रोजेक्ट.
Pilot studies, therefore, may not be appropriate लिये case studies.
The Los Angeles Fire विभाग ( LAFD ) is the agency कि provides आग protection and emergency चिकित्सा services for the city of Los Angeles.
it may be unofficially referred to as the Los Angeles City आग Department to फर्क it इससे the लॉस Angeles काउंटी Fire Department.
The एकड़ is a unit of area प्रयुक्त in the imperial and u.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly छोटी than an American football फ़ील्ड.
the एकड़ is no longer commonly प्रयुक्त, although a few notable exceptions शामिल the संयुक्त States, Australia, बर्मा and the संयुक्त Kingdom ( as of 2010, the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the United Kingdom, though is still प्रयुक्त in real estate descriptions ).
It is still used, to some extent, in कनाडा.
the international प्रतीक of the acre is ac, and is defined as 1/640 of a square mile.
the most commonly प्रयुक्त acre today is the international एकड़.
In the United राज्य both the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre and the slightly different us survey एकड़ are in उपयोग.
The सबसे आम use of the एकड़ is to measure tracts of land.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the मध्य Ages, an acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in एक दिन with a yoke of oxen.

भाषा प्रसंस्करण refers to the way human beings उपयोग शब्द to communicate ideas and feelings, और कैसा ऐसे संचार are processed and समझा.
Thus it is how the दिमाग creates and understands language.
सबसे recent theories consider कि this प्रक्रम is carried out entirely by और inside the brain.
This is considered one of the सबसे characteristic abilities of the इंसान प्रजाति - perhaps the most characteristic.
However बहुत little is known परिचय it and there is विशाल scope for research on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to तिथि on the subject has come इससे patients जो have suffered some प्रकार of significant सिर injury, whether बाह्य ( wounds, बुलेट ) or internal ( strokes, tumors, degenerative रोगों ).
अध्ययन have दिखाया that सबसे of the language processing कृत्यों are carried out in the दिमागी cortex.
the essential function of the cortical language areas is सांकेतिक representation.
Even though language exists in different forms, all of them are based on symbolic representation.
the bugatti Veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group और manufactured in Molsheim, फ़्रांस by bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the world, with a शीर्ष गति of.
The original संस्करण has a top speed of.
it was नामित car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी television कार्यक्रम शीर्ष Gear.
The standard veyron won शीर्ष गियर्स Best car Driven All Year award in 2005.

The Veyron 's मुख्य पंक्तियां थी Hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of volkswagen, with much of the engineering कार्य being conducted under the guidance of engineering मुख्य Wolfgang schreiber.
a number of खास variants have been produced.

DVD is an optical disc storage format, invented and developed by फिलिप्स, Sony, Toshiba, और Panasonic in 1995.
DVDs प्रस्ताव higher storage क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs while having the वही आयाम.
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding machines that physically stamp आंकड़ा onto the dvd.
Such discs are known as DVD- rom, because data can तभी be read and not लिखा nor erased.
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a DVD recorder and then फलन as a DVD-ROM. Rewritable DVDs ( DVD-RW, DVD+RW, and DVD-RAM ) can be recorded and erased multiple टाइम्स.
DVDs are used in dvd-video consumer digital video format and in DVD-Audio consumer digital ऑडियो format, as खूब as for authoring AVCHD discs.
dvds containing other types of information may be referred to as dvd data discs.

पीटर जीन hernandez ( born October 8, 1985 ), ज्ञात by his stage name ब्रूनो Mars, is an American singer-songwriter और record producer.
Raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a family of संगीतकारों, Mars began making music at a young age and performed in various musical venues in his गृहनगर throughout his childhood.
He graduated इससे high स्कूल और तब moved to Los एंजिल्स, California, to pursue a musical career.
मंगल उत्पादित songs for other artists, joining production टोली the Smeezingtons.
Mars था an unsuccessful stint with Motown Records, but then हस्ताक्षरित साथ Atlantic in 2009.
he became recognized as a solo कलाकार after lending his vocals and co-writing the hooks लिये the गीतों `` Nothin ' on You `` by b.o.b, and `` Billionaire `` by travie मैककॉय.
He also co-wrote the हिट्स `` सही Round `` by flo rida featuring ke $ ha, और `` Wavin ' ध्वज `` by K'naan.
in October 2010, he released उसके debut एल्बम, Doo-Wops & Hooligans.
Anchored by the विश्वव्यापी number-one singles `` Just the Way You Are `` and `` Grenade ``, the एल्बम peaked at number three on the बिलबोर्ड 200.
मंगल was nominated लिये seven Grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards, winning बेहतरीन Male Pop Vocal प्रदर्शन for `` Just the रास्ता You Are ''.
उसके second studio एल्बम, Unorthodox Jukebox, was released on दिसम्बर 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is विख्यात for displaying a चौड़ी variety of styles and प्रभाव, और contains elements of अनेक musical genres.
He has worked with an assortment of artists इससे various genres.
As a child, he थी highly बहकावे by artists such as छोटी रिचर्ड, एल्विस Presley और माइकल Jackson और would प्रायः impersonate ये artists from a यंग age.
Mars भी incorporates reggae - and Motown -inspired sounds into his work.
विश्वव्यापी, Mars became the best-selling डिजिटल कलाकार in 2011.
He had three singles in the top ten, including पहला place with `` Just the Way You हैं '', which sold 12.5 लाख नक़ल.
Mars won Best अंतरराष्ट्रीय पुरूष Solo कलाकार at the 2012 BRIT पुरस्कार.
Bruno Mars has बेची 6 million albums और 40 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी as a singer.
Althought as a song-writer, producer and singer उसके total single डाउनलोड sales surpass 100 लाख worldwide.

Greek mythology is the body of मिथकों and teachings that belong to the ancient Greeks, concerning उनके देवताओं और heroes, the nature of the संसार, and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices.
It was a part of the religion in ancient यूनानियों and is part of धर्म in modern Greece और around the world, ज्ञात as Hellenismos.
Modern scholars refer to and पढ़ाई the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious और राजनैतिक संस्थानों of Ancient Greece और इसके civilization, and to gain समझना of the nature of myth-making itself.
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives, and implicitly in Greek representational कला, ऐसे as vase-paintings and votive gifts.
Greek मिथक attempts to explain the origins of the world, and details the lives and adventures of a चौड़ी किस्में of gods, goddesses, heroes, heroines, and पौराणिक creatures.
These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition ; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek literature.
the oldest known यूनानी literary sources, होमर 's epic poems Iliad and Odyssey, focus on events surrounding the Trojan War.
दो कविताएं by Homer 's near contemporary hesiod, the Theogony and the Works and Days, contain खाते of the genesis of the world, the succession of divine rulers, the succession of human आयु, the origin of इंसान woes, और the origin of sacrificial practices.
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns, in fragments of epic poems of the एपिक साईकिल, in lyric poems, in the works of the tragedians of the fifth सदी BC, in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों और poets of the Hellenistic Age, and in texts from the समय of the Roman साम्राज्य by लेखक such as Plutarch and Pausanias.
Archaeological निष्कर्षों provide a principal source of detail परिचय यूनानी mythology, साथ gods and heroes प्रदर्शित prominently in the decoration of many artifacts.
Geometric डिजाइन on pottery of the आठवीं century BC depict scenes from the Trojan साईकिल as well as the adventures of Heracles.
in the succeeding Archaic, Classical, और hellenistic अवधि, Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear, supplementing the existing literary evidence.
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the संस्कृति, arts, and literature of पश्चिमी सभ्यता and remains भाग of Western विरासत and भाषा.
Poets and artists from ancient टाइम्स to the उपस्थित have derived inspiration इससे यूनानी mythology और have खोजा contemporary significance and प्रासंगिकता in the विषयवस्तु.
