वे are currently led by head coach Chris petersen और खेल their घर खेल at bronco Stadium.
The franc ( चिह्न : Fr. or SFr. ; German : Franken, French and Romansh : franc, इतालवी : franco ; code : chf ) is the currency and legal tender of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; it is also legal टेंडर in the Italian exclave campione d'Italia.
हालांकि नहीं formally legal tender in the German exclave büsingen ( the एकमात्र legal करेंसी is the euro ), it is in wide daily use वहीँ.
The Swiss नेशनल Bank मुद्दे banknotes and the federal मिंट Swissmint issues सिक्के.
the Swiss franc is the only version of the franc still issued in Europe.
the smaller denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a Rappen ( Rp. ) in German, centime ( c. ) in French, centesimo ( ct. ) in इतालवी, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
The आईएसओ कोड of the currency used by banks और financial संस्थानों is CHF, although `` fr. '' is प्रयुक्त by most businesses and advertisers ; some use sfr. ; the latinate `` CH '' स्टैंड for confoederatio Helvetica.
Given the different भाषाएं प्रयुक्त in Switzerland, लैटिन is used लिये language-neutral inscriptions on the सिक्के.
Sir Charles स्पेंसर `` Charlie '' Chaplin, ( 16 अप्रैल 188925 December 1977 ) was a British comic actor and filmmaker who rose to fame in the मूक era.
Chaplin became a worldwide icon through his स्क्रीन persona `` the Tramp `` and is माना एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़े of the film industry.
उसके करियर spanned more than 75 सालो, इससे a child in the Victorian era to बंद to his death at the age of 88, and encompassed both adulation and controversy.
Raised in London, Chaplin 's बाल्यकाल थी defined by गरीबी और hardship.
He was sent to a workhouse twice पहले the age of नौ ; उसके father was अनुपस्थित, and his mother was वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी asylum.
Chaplin began performing from a young आयु, touring म्यूज़िक halls and बाद working as a stage actor and हास्य.
At 19 he was हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious Fred Karno company, which took him to America.
चैपलिन was scouted by the film industry, and made his first दिखावे in 1914 with Keystone Studios.
he soon विकसित the Tramp persona और formed a large प्रशंसक आधार.
चैपलिन निर्देशित उसके films from an जल्दी stage, और continued to hone his शिल्प as he moved to the essanay, Mutual, और First नेशनल corporations.
By 1918, he was one of the most famous मेन in the world.
In 1919, Chaplin co-founded the distribution company United Artists, giving him complete control over his films.
His first feature-length picture was The Kid ( 1921 ), followed by A स्त्री of पेरिस ( 1923 ), the Gold Rush ( 1925 ), और The Circus ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s, बजाय producing City लाइट्स ( 1931 ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly political और his next film, The ग्रेट Dictator ( 1940 ), satirised Adolf हिटलर.
The 1940s थी a दशक चिह्नित साथ controversy for Chaplin, and उसके popularity अस्वीकृत rapidly.
He was accused of communist sympathies, while his involvement in a paternity suit और विवाह to much younger women were considered scandalous.
An एफबीआई investigation was खोली on चैपलिन, और he थी eventually मजबूर to leave the United States और settle in Switzerland.
He abandoned the Tramp लिये उसके बाद films, which शामिल monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ), limelight ( 1952 ), a King in नई यॉर्क ( 1957 ), and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ).
Chaplin लिखा, directed, उत्पादित, संपादित, scored, and starred in most of उसके films.
he was a perfectionist, and उसके financial independence meant he often spent सालो on the development और production of a चित्र.
His films हैं characterised by slapstick combined with pathos, और प्रायः feature the Tramp struggling against adversity.
Many contain सोशल and political themes, as खूब as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as भाग of a नवीनीकृत appreciation for his work, चैपलिन received an Honorary Academy Award for `` the incalculable effect he has had in making motion तस्वीरें the art form of इस century ''.
He continues to be held in high regard, साथ the सुनहरा Rush, City लाइट्स, Modern Times, and The Great Dictator प्रायः क्रमित among the greatest films of all time.
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood, is the u.S. affiliate of the International Planned Parenthood संघ ( ippf ) and एक of इसके larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing reproductive health and maternal and child health services.
the नियोजित Parenthood Action निधि, Inc. ( PPAF ) is a related संगठन जिससे lobbies for pro-choice legislation, comprehensive sex शिक्षा, and access to affordable health care in the United States.
Planned parenthood is the largest U.S. प्रदाता of reproductive health services, including कर्कट screening, HIV screening and counseling, निरोधक, और abortion.
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's कुल सेवाएं and abortions account for 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each साल, among 3 million people परोसा.
The organization has its जड़ें in Brooklyn, नई यॉर्क, जहाँ मार्गरेट Sanger खोली the देश 's first birth-control क्लिनिक.
सैंगर founded the American जनम Control League in 1921, जिससे in 1942 became part of the नियोजित parenthood Federation of America.
Since then, नियोजित Parenthood has grown to have over 820 clinic स्थितियाँ in the U.S., with a कुल budget of US $ 1 billion.
PPFA provides an सरणी of services to over three million people in the United राज्य, और supports सेवाएं for over एक million clients बाहर the United States.
Mens rea is Latin for `` guilty mind ''.
In criminal law, it is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes.
The standard common law test of criminal liability is usually expressed in the लैटिन phrase, actus non facit reum nisi mens बैठना rea, जिससे अर्थात् `` the अधिनियम is not culpable जबतक the mind is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions with due process, there must be an actus reus, or `` guilty act, '' accompanied by कुछ level of mens rea to constitute the अपराधों साथ which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ).
as a सामान्य rule, दण्ड liability करता not attach to a व्यक्ति who acted साथ the absence of दिमागी दोष.
the एक्सेप्शन is strict liability अपराधों.
in civil law, it is usually नहीं जरुरी to prove a subjective दिमागी element to establish liability for breach of contract or tort, for example.
However, if a tort is intentionally committed or a contract is intentionally breached, such intent may बढ़ाएँ the पैमाना of liability as well as the measure of क्षतिपूर्ति payable to the plaintiff.
Therefore, mens rea refers to the दिमागी element of the अपराध that accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the terms mens rea and actus reus have been replaced by वैकल्पिक terminology.
in Australia, for example, the तत्व of the federal offences are now designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental elements '' ( mens rea ) और `` physical elements '' or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ).
This terminology was अपनाया to बदलें the अस्पष्टता of the लैटिन terms with simple और accurate phrasing.
ulysses S. ग्रान्ट ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27, 1822 – July 23, 1885 ) was the 18th President of the United States ( 1869–1877 ) following his अत्यधिक successful भूमिका as a war general in the second half of the Civil युद्ध.
Under ग्रान्ट, the Union Army defeated the confederate military ; having effectively ended the war and secession with the surrender of Robert E. Lee 's army at appomattox.
As president he led the Radical Republicans in उनके प्रयत्न to eliminate all vestiges of Confederate राष्ट्रवाद and slavery.
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and having desired to protect African American नागरिकता, President Grant effectively नष्ट the Ku Klux Klan in 1871.
Grant was the पहला President to establish सिविल Service सुधार having निर्मित a two-year federally वित्तपोषित Civil सेवा आयोग in 1871.
In terms of foreign policy, Grant revealed an `` unexpected capacity लिये deliberation and परामर्श '' that प्रचारित the national interest.
His reputation was marred by उसके दोहराया defense of corrupt appointees, and by अमेरिका 's first औद्योगिक आयु economic depression ( called the `` दहशत of 1873 `` ) कि वर्चस्व his second पद.
Although उसके Republican Party split in 1872 with reformers denouncing him, Grant थी easily reelected.
By 1875 the रूढ़िवादी white दक्षिणी opposition regained कंट्रोल of every state in the South और as he left the White House in March 1877 उसके नीतियों were being undone.
a career soldier, he graduated इससे the United राज्य सैन्य Academy at West Point and served in the mexican–american War.
When the सिविल War began in 1861, ग्रान्ट प्रशिक्षित Union volunteer regiments in Illinois.
In 1862, as a general he fought a series of लड़ाइयों and थी promoted to major सामान्य after forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate army और gaining control of केंटकी and most of Tennessee.
He तब led Union forces to victory बाद initial setbacks in the Battle of shiloh, earning a reputation as an आक्रामक commander.
In July 1863, after a long, complex campaign, Grant defeated five uncoordinated Confederate armies ( capturing एक of उन्हें ) और seized vicksburg.
This प्रसिद्ध victory दिया the संघ पूरा कंट्रोल of the Mississippi नदी, split off the western Confederacy, और opened the way for more Union triumphs.
After another जीत at the Battle of Chattanooga in late 1863, President अब्राहम Lincoln made him लेफ्टिनेंट general और कमांडर of all of the संघ सेना.
As commanding general of the army, Grant confronted रॉबर्ट E. ली in a series of very खूनी लड़ाइयों in 1864 known as the Overland Campaign that ended with the bottling up of Lee at पीटर्सबर्ग, outside the Confederate capital of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant समन्वित a series of विनाशकारी campaigns launched by विलियम Tecumseh Sherman, Philip Sheridan, and George Thomas.
आखिरकार breaking through ली 's trenches, the संघ Army captured Richmond in April 1865.
Lee surrendered his depleted forces to ग्रान्ट at appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-Confederate इतिहासकारों attacked Grant as a निष्ठुर butcher who won by brute force, most historians have hailed his military प्रतिभाशाली.
Grant 's two consecutive terms as अध्यक्ष stabilized the स्वदेश after the American Civil युद्ध and दौरान the turbulent पुनर्निर्माण काल that followed.
as अध्यक्ष, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws and fighting Ku klux क्लान violence.
Grant won ड्योढ़ी of the Fifteenth amendment ; giving constitutional protection लिये African-American voting rights.
he used the फौज to build the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी in the दक्षिण, आधारित on black voters, Northern newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` ) and native white समर्थक ( `` scalawags. '' )
as a परिणाम, African Americans were represented in the u.S. Congress for the first time in American history in 1870.
reformers praised ग्रान्ट 's भारतीय peace नीति by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress, the creation of the Board of Indian Commissioners to make सुधार सुझाव, and his enlistment of quaker Protestants who controlled मिड western Indian agencies, कि effectively curbed congressional patronage.
Grant remained संकल्पित in keeping इंडियंस इससे being exterminated इससे white settler encroachment or by the U.S. military.
Grant 's प्रतिष्ठा as अध्यक्ष by 1875 was at an all-time high for his previous veto of the Inflation विधेयक, the passage of the Resumption of Specie Act, और सचिव Bristow 's कामयाब raids that shut bas the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by Secretary of राज्य Hamilton Fish, implemented International Arbitration, settled the अलबामा दावा साथ Britain and avoided युद्ध with Spain over the Virginius affair.
A ज्यूकबॉक्स is a partially स्वचालित music-playing device, usually a coin-operated machine, that will खेल a patron 's selection इससे self-contained मीडिया.
the classic jukebox has buttons with अक्षर and numbers on उन्हें that, when entered in combination, are प्रयुक्त to खेल a विशिष्ट selection.
A drug परीक्षण is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for example urine, hair, blood, sweat, or oral fluid / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of निर्दिष्ट जनक drugs or their metabolites.
Major uses of drug testing are to detect the presence of performance बढ़ाना steroids in sport or for drugs निषिद्ध by laws, such as cannabis, कोका and heroin.
A `` 10-panel urine screen '' consists of the following:
amphetamines ( including Methamphetamine )
Barbiturates
Benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids ( thc )
Cocaine
Methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( codeine, मॉरफीन, Heroin, Oxycodone, Hydrocodone, etc. )
Phencyclidine ( PCP )
propoxyphene
Saturn V प्रक्षेपास्त्र, used for the American manned lunar लैंडिंग मिशन
स्पेस exploration is the discovery और exploration of outer स्पेस by means of स्पेस प्रौद्योगिकी.
Physical exploration of स्पेस is conducted both by human spaceflights और by robotic spacecraft.
जबकि the अवलोकन of objects in स्पेस, known as astronomy, predates विश्वसनीय recorded history, it was the development of large and अपेक्षाकृत efficient rockets दौरान the early 20th century that अनुमत physical space खोजी to become a वास्तविकता.
Common rationales लिये exploring space include advancing वैज्ञानिक research, uniting अलग nations, ensuring the future अस्तित्व of humanity and विकासशील military और strategic advantages against other countries.
Various criticisms of space खोजी are sometimes made.
Space exploration रै प्रायः been used as a proxy competition लिये geopolitical rivalries such as the ठंडा युद्ध.
The early era of स्पेस exploration was चलित by a `` Space Race `` between the Soviet संघ and the संयुक्त States, the launch of the पहला man-made ऑब्जेक्ट to कक्षा the Earth, the ussr 's Sputnik 1, on 4 October 1957, और the पहला Moon landing by the अमरीकी Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 हैं often taken as the boundaries for इस initial period.
The Soviet space कार्यक्रम हासिल अनेक of the first milestones, including the first जीना being in orbit in 1957, the first human spaceflight ( Yuri Gagarin सवार Vostok 1 ) in 1961, the पहला spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965, the पहला automatic लैंडिंग on another celestial body in 1966, और the लॉन्च of the पहला space स्टेशन ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the first 20 years of खोजी, focus shifted from one-off flights to renewable hardware, ऐसे as the स्पेस Shuttle कार्यक्रम, and from competition to cooperation as साथ the International Space Station ( ISS ).
With the substantial completion of the ISS following STS-133 in कूच 2011, plans for space exploration by the USA remain in flux.
नक्षत्र, a Bush Administration program लिये a वापसी to the चंद्रमा by 2020 was judged inadequately funded and unrealistic by an विशेषज्ञ review panel रिपोर्टिंग in 2009.
the ओबामा Administration proposed a संशोधन of Constellation in 2010 to focus on the विकास of the capability for crewed missions परे low earth orbit ( LEO ), envisioning extending the operation of the ISS परे 2020, transferring the विकास of लॉन्च वाहनों for human क्रू from NASA to the private sector, and developing प्रौद्योगिकी to enable missions to beyond leo, such as Earth/Moon L1, the चंद्रमा, Earth/Sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and Phobos or Mars orbit.
As of March 2011, the us Senate and House of प्रतिनिधि हैं still working towards a सुलह NASA funding bill, जिससे will probably terminate Constellation and निधि development of a heavy lift लॉन्च vehicle ( HLLV ).
In the 2000s, the People 's Republic of China initiated a successful manned spaceflight program, while the European संघ, Japan, और India have भी planned future manned space missions.
China, Russia, जापानी, और India have advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to the Moon during the 21st सदी, जबकि the European Union रै advocated manned मिशन to दोनो the चंद्रमा और Mars दौरान the 21st सदी.
From the 1990s onwards, private interests began promoting space tourism and तब private space exploration of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ).
जॉन Calvin कूलिज, jr. ( July 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) was the 30th President of the United States ( 1923–1929 ).
A Republican lawyer from Vermont, Coolidge worked his way up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स state राजनीती, आखिरकार बनने governor of that राज्य.
His conduct दौरान the बोस्टन Police स्ट्राइक of 1919 thrust him into the नेशनल spotlight and दिया उसे a reputation as a man of decisive कार्रवाई.
Soon बाद, he was निर्वाचित as the 29th Vice President in 1920 और succeeded to the Presidency upon the sudden death of Warren G. हार्डिंग in 1923.
Elected in उसके own सही in 1924, he gained a प्रतिष्ठा as a small-government conservative, और भी as a man जो said very little.
Coolidge restored public confidence in the White हाउस बाद the scandals of his predecessor 's administration, और बाएँ दफ्तर साथ considerable popularity.
As a Coolidge biographer put it, `` he embodied the spirit और hopes of the मध्य class, could interpret उनके longings और express their opinions.
कि he did represent the genius of the average is the most convincing proof of his strength. ''
Some later criticized Coolidge as भाग of a general criticism of laissez-faire सरकारी.
His reputation underwent a renaissance during the Ronald reagan प्रशासन, but the ultimate assessment of his presidency is still विभाजित between those जो approve of his reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the संघीय government should be अधिक involved in regulating and controlling the अर्थव्यवस्था.
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a छोटी amount of nearly खौलते जल under pressure through finely मैदान coffee beans.
एस्प्रेसो often has a thicker consistency than कॉफी brewed by other विधि, a higher concentration of निलंबित और dissolved solids, and crema ( meaning cream, लकिन being a reference to the झाग with a creamy बनावट कि forms as a परिणाम of the pressure ).
As a result of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the जायका and chemicals in a ठेठ कप of espresso are very concentrated.
Espresso is the आधार for other पेय, ऐसे as a latte, cappuccino, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
Espresso has अधिक caffeine per unit volume than most beverages, लकिन the usual serving size is smaller—a ठेठ 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg of कैफीन, little less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 us द्रव औंस ) cup of drip-brewed कॉफी.
Brian कैथ Kelly ( born October 25, 1961 ) is an American football कोच and पूर्व player.
He is currently the सिर फ़ुटबॉल coach for the Notre Dame Fighting Irish, a position he has held चूंकि December 2009.
Kelly was previously head coach at ग्रैंड घाटी State University ( 1991–2003 ), सेंट्रल मिशिगन University ( 2004–2006 ), और University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ).
A अनुबंध is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by two or more parties, each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between उन्हें.
the तत्व of a contract हैं `` offer '' and `` स्वीकृति '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता who exchange `` consideration '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done in writing, though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for उल्लंघन of contract can be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction.
दोनो of these remedies award the party at घाटा the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
the पार्टियों may be प्राकृतिक persons or juristic व्यक्तियों.
A contract is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking that something will or will नहीं occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal पर्याय for अनुबंध, हालांकि care is required as a promise may नहीं have the पूरा standing of a अनुबंध, as when it is an agreement बगैर विचार.
Contract law varies greatly इससे one jurisdiction to another, including differences in common law compared to सिविल law, the impact of प्राप्त law, विशेषकर from England in common विधि countries, और of law codified in क्षेत्रीय legislation.
Regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Contract विधि लिये example, there are 40 प्रासंगिक acts जिससे प्रभाव on the interpretation of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर, and an additional 26 अधिनियमों at the level of the state of nsw.
In addition there are 6 अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं which are applicable लिये international dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International बिक्री of Goods.
Sidney Patrick Crosby, ONS ( born August 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी player who is captain of the Pittsburgh penguins of the National Hockey League ( एनएचएल ).
crosby was drafted first overall by the penguins out of the क्यूबेक Major जूनियर हॉकी League ( QMJHL ).
During उसके two-year major junior करियर with the Rimouski océanic, he अर्जित back-to-back CHL Player of the Year awards and led his क्लबों to the 2005 Memorial Cup final.
nicknamed `` The अगला One ``, he was एक of the most highly regarded draft picks in hockey history, अग्रणी many to refer to the 2005 ड्राफ्ट लॉटरी as the `` Sidney crosby Sweepstakes ''.
in his first NHL season, Crosby समाप्त sixth in league स्कोरिंग with 102 points ( 39 goals, 63 assists ) and थी a runner-up for the Calder Memorial ट्रॉफी ( won by Alexander ovechkin ).
By his दूसरी season, he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to कैप्चर the आर्ट Ross Trophy, becoming the youngest player और the only teenager to win a scoring शीर्षक in any major उत्तर American sports league.
That same season, Crosby भी won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey Writers Association 's choice for most valuable खिलाड़ी and the लेस्टर B. Pearson Award as the एनएचएल Players Association 's choice लिये most outstanding player, बनने the seventh खिलाड़ी in NHL history to earn all तीन awards in एक year.
crosby started the 2007–08 ऋतु साथ the टोली 's captaincy and subsequently led them to the 2008 Stanley Cup Finals, where वे were पराजित by the Detroit Red Wings in six games.
the Penguins returned to the Finals विरूद्ध डेट्रॉयट the following year and won in सात games ; crosby became the youngest कप्तान in NHL history to जीत the स्टेनली Cup.
in the 2009–10 season, Crosby scored a career-high 51 लक्ष्य, tying him with Steven Stamkos लिये the Rocket Richard ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; with 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, crosby प्राप्त the चिह्नित मेसियर Leadership Award.
In 2010–11, Crosby sustained a concussion as a परिणाम of hits to the head in back-to-back games.
the injury left him sidelined लिये ten and a half months.
however, after playing आठ खेल in the 2011–12 season, Crosby 's concussion-like symptoms लौटे in दिसम्बर 2011, और he किया not return until mid-March 2012.
Internationally, Crosby रै represented कनाडा in numerous tournaments for the देश 's जूनियर and मेन 's teams.
After स्पर्धा in the 2003 U-18 Junior संसार Cup, he represented Canada in back-to-back IIHF World u20 championships, winning चांदी in 2004 and gold in 2005.
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship, he led the tournament in scoring, while भी कमाई Top Forward and All-Star Team honours.
Four years later, Crosby थी named to Team Canada for the 2010 शीत Olympics in वैंकूवर.
Playing the संयुक्त States in the gold medal game, he scored the game-winning लक्ष्य in overtime.
A United राज्य cent, also ज्ञात as a penny.
`` my two cents '' ( 2¢ ) और its longer version `` put my दो सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त States ( us ) idiomatic expression, लिया from the असली English idiom expression : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
it is प्रयुक्त to preface the tentative stating of one’s राय.
By deprecating the राय to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents, a very small amount – the उपयोक्ता of the phrase hopes to lessen the प्रभाव of a possibly statement, showing politeness and humility.
However, it is also sometimes used with विडंबना when expressing a strongly felt राय.
The phrase is भी used out of आदत to preface uncontentious राय.

the Chinese Civil युद्ध थी a civil war in China fought between forces loyal to the सरकारी of the गणतंत्र of China led by the Kuomintang ( kmt ) and forces of the कम्युनिस्ट Party of China ( cpc ).
The युद्ध began in April 1927, amidst the Northern expedition, and essentially ended when प्रमुख active battles ceased in 1950.
the विरोध eventually resulted in two de facto राज्य, the गणतंत्र of चीन ( ROC ) in ताईवान and the People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) in mainland चीन, दोनो claiming to be the legitimate government of China.
The war represented an ideological विभाजित ( Left vs. सही ) between the Communist CPC, and the KMT 's brand of Nationalism.
The सिविल war जारी intermittently until late 1937, when the two parties formed a Second संयुक्त सामने to counter a Japanese invasion.
China 's full-scale civil युद्ध resumed in 1946, a year बाद the end of hostilities साथ जापानी.
After चार more सालो, 1950 saw the cessation of प्रमुख सैन्य hostilities—with the newly founded People 's Republic of China controlling mainland चीन ( सहित Hainan ), and the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to ताईवान, Penghu, Quemoy, Matsu और several outlying आइलैंड्स.
The Kuomintang शिकस्त is attributed to several कारकों : Corruption - च्यांग wrote in his diary on June 1948 that the KMT had failed, not because of external दुश्मनों but because of rot from within.
Strong आरंभिक support from the u.S. diminished, and then, रोका.
( partly क्युकी of kmt corruption और anti-democratic regime, and partly क्युकी of the uncertain u.S. foreign policy towards साम्यवादी between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist जमीन सुधार नीति promised ग़रीब peasants farmland from their जमींदार.
इस ensured pla popular support.
बाद the surrender of Japan at the end of World War ii, Soviet forces turned over their captured Japanese हथियार to the CPC and allowed the cpc to take control of territory in Manchuria.
to this day, no armistice or peace सन्धि रै कभी महरूम signed, and it is debated as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended.
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and राजनैतिक and आर्थिक दबाव, particularly over Taiwan 's राजनैतिक औकात, साथ both governments officially adhering to a `` One-China नीति. ''
the पीआरसी still actively claims Taiwan as भाग of its territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a military invasion if the ROC officially declares independence by changing its name to and gaining अंतरराष्ट्रीय recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
The आरओसी mutually claims मेनलैंड चीन, और वे both continue the fight over राजनयिक recognition.
Today, the युद्ध as such occurs on the राजनैतिक और economic fronts in the form of cross-strait संबंध ; however, the two separate de facto states have बंद economic ties.
The One Hundred बारहवीं United राज्य Congress थी the बैठक of the legislative शाखा of the United राज्य federal government, from January 3, 2011 until January 3, 2013.
It convened in Washington, d.C. on January 3, 2011, और ended on जनवरी 3, 2013, 17 दिनों पहले the end of the अध्यक्षीय term to जिससे बराक Obama was elected in 2008.
Senators elected to regular शर्तें in 2006 completed those शर्तें in this Congress.
This कॉंग्रेस included the पिछला हाउस of Representatives elected from congressional districts कि यहूद apportioned based on the 2000 census.
In the 2010 midterm चुनावों, the Republican Party won the बहुमत in the हाउस of Representatives.
While the डेमोक्रेट kept उनके सीनेट बहुमत, it was reduced from the previous Congress.
This was the first Congress in जिससे the House and Senate were controlled by different parties चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस ( 2001–2003 ), and the first Congress to शुरू कि way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ).
In इस कॉंग्रेस, the House of Representatives था the largest क्रमांक of Republican members, 242, since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the first Congress चूंकि 1947 in which no member of the Kennedy family परोसा, as well as the most politically polarized कॉंग्रेस since Reconstruction, with record low approval ratings.
Wealth in the संयुक्त States is commonly measured in terms of net worth, which is the योग of all assets, including home इक्विटी, minus सब liabilities.
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit organizations 1945–2009, unadjusted for महंगाई or population बदलें.
For उदाहरण, a household in कब्ज़ा of an $ 800,000 house, $ 5,000 in परस्पर funds, $ 30,000 in cars, $ 20,000 लायक of भण्डार in their अपना company, और a $ 45,000 ira would have assets totaling $ 900,000.
Assuming कि इस household would have a $ 250,000 mortgage, $ 40,000 in car लोन, और $ 10,000 in क्रेडिट कार्ड debt, its debts would total $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the worth of इस household 's assets ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), इस household होता have a net लायक of $ 600,000.
जाल worth can vary with fluctuations in value of the underlying assets.
the wealth —more specifically, the median net worth—of households in the संयुक्त राज्य is varied with relation to race, education, भौगोलिक location और gender.
As one would expect, households with वृहद income विशेषता the उच्चतम net worths, though high income can not be लिया as an सदा accurate indicator of net worth.
Overall the क्रमांक of wealthier households is on the rise, साथ baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers.
In addition, wealth is unevenly distributed, with the wealthiest 25 % of US households owning 87 % of the wealth in the United States, which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009.
Including human पूंजी ऐसे as कौशल, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र estimated the कुल wealth of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
इस आलेख सौदे with चयनात्मक Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) rather than the rhizotomy procedures for pain राहत ; for those procedures, which have begun to take the नाम `` rhizotomy '' in certain instances, see facet rhizotomy और समान.
A rhizotomy ( ) is a पद chiefly referring to a neurosurgical कार्यविधि कि selectively destroys समस्यापूर्ण तंत्रिका roots in the स्पाइनल cord, most प्रायः to relieve the symptoms of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia and other forms of spastic cerebral palsy.
The चयनात्मक dorsal rhizotomy ( sdr ) for spastic दिमागी palsy रै been the main उपयोग of rhizotomy for neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP since the 1980s ; in इस surgery, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted और destroyed.
The sensory तंत्रिका roots, where spasticity is located, are first separated from the मोटर ones, and the nerve fibres to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity are तब selectively lesioned with tiny electrical pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves कि don’t receive gamma amino butyric acid, which is the core problem for people साथ spastic cerebral palsy.
ये over-firing, non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity दौरान the EMG testing phase in sdr and are thus considered to be the source of the patient 's hypertonia ; they हैं eliminated with the electrical pulses एकबार पहचाना, while the बाकी nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct संदेश remain fully बरकरार and untouched.
This अर्थात् that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and कि this is किया बगैर affecting nervous system संवेदनशीलता or फलन in other areas, because the only nerves destroyed हैं the over-firing ones responsible for the muscle tightness.
The terms rhizotomy और neurotomy हैं भी increasingly becoming interchangeable in the उपचार of chronic back pain इससे degenerative डिस्क disease.
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure लकिन is बजाय done on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency लहरें to the impinged pain-causing तंत्रिका root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral देह.
Such radio frequency तंत्रिका lesioning results in five to आठ or more months of पीड़ा राहत before the nerve regenerates and another round of the कार्यविधि needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is बस one of many अलग फ़ॉर्म of radiofrequency ablation, और इसके उपयोग of the `` rhizotomy '' name चाहिए not be confused with the SDR procedure.
Migrant workers in California, 1935
The term migrant कार्यकर्ता has different official meanings and connotations in different parts of the world.
The United Nations ' definition is broad, including any people working outside of their home country.
The पद can also be प्रयुक्त to describe someone who migrates भीतर a country, possibly their own, in अनुक्रम to pursue कार्य ऐसे as मौसमी कार्य.
Photograph of लील वेन साथ teardrop टैटू below his आँखें.
The teardrop टैटू or tear tattoo is a symbolic tattoo कि is placed underneath the eye.
It has no fixed अर्थ but almost सब meanings ( see below ) have some connection to थाना.
U.S. रूट 75 is a north–south U.S. राजमार्ग.
The highway 's उत्तरी terminus is in Kittson County, Minnesota, at the Canadian border, where it once continued as Manitoba राजमार्ग 75 on the अन्य पक्ष of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern terminus is at अंतरराज्यीय 30 और Interstate 45 in डलास, टेक्सास, जहाँ it is ज्ञात as उत्तर सेंट्रल Expressway.
U.S. 75 थी a border-to-border route, from कनाडा to the Gulf of Mexico at galveston, टेक्सास.
However, the संपूर्ण segment south of डलास, Texas रै been decommissioned in एहसान of Interstate 45, a कटऑफ खण्ड of town-to-town सतह road having become राज्य राजमार्ग 75.
Lower Ninth Ward is a neighborhood of the नगर of नई ऑरलियन्स.
As the नाम implies, it is भाग of the Ninth Ward of नई ऑरलियन्स.
the Lower नवीं Ward is प्रायः thought of as the entire area within New Orleans downriver of the औद्योगिक Canal ; however, the City Planning Commission divides this area into the निम्नतर Ninth Ward ( 2 ) और पावन Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
The पद `` Lower '' refers to its स्थान farther towards the mouth of the Mississippi नदी, `` down '' or `` below '' the rest of the नगर in local geographic शब्दावली.
But the 9th वार्ड, like सब Wards in New ऑरलियन्स, is a voting district.
The 9th Ward was added as a voting district in 1852.
The `` lower '' 9th वार्ड is composed of वार्ड 9 जिले 1, 2, 4, and 7 जिससे make up the पावन Cross क्षेत्रफल and Ward 9 जिले 3, 5, 6, and 8.
Higher voting ज़िला numbers in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver पक्ष of the Industrial Canal.
the area आए to national attention for इसके devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005.
हबल views of कोपरनिकस crater ( inset ), which is about 58 miles ( 93 km ) wide
रेड and orange tinted Moon, as seen from Earth during a चंद्र eclipse, जहाँ the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only प्राकृतिक satellite of the Earth, and the fifth largest satellite in the सौर System.
It is the largest natural satellite of a ग्रह in the Solar System relative to the size of its primary, having 27 % the diameter और 60 % the density of Earth, resulting in इसके mass.
The Moon is the second densest satellite after io, a उपग्रह of Jupiter.
the चंद्रमा is in synchronous rotation with Earth, सदा showing the same face with इसके near पक्ष marked by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया that भरण between the bright प्राचीन crustal highlands और the prominent impact craters.
It is the brightest object in the आसमान after the सूर्य, although इसके surface is actually very dark, with a reflectance similar to that of कोयले.
Its prominence in the sky and its regular साईकिल of phases have, since ancient times, बना the Moon an important cultural influence on भाषा, calendars, art and mythology.
The Moon 's gravitational influence produces the ocean tides and the minute lengthening of the दिन.
the Moon 's वर्तमान कक्षीय distance, about thirty times the diameter of the Earth, causes it to appear लगभग the वही size in the आसमान as the सूर्य, allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in कुल solar eclipses.
This matching of apparent visual size is a coincidence.
The Moon 's linear distance from the धरती is फिलहाल increasing at a रेट of 3.82±0.07cm per year, लकिन this rate is not constant.
the Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 billion सालो ago, not long after the Earth.
Although वहीँ have been several hypotheses लिये इसके उत्पत्ति in the past, the current most widely accepted explanation is कि the Moon formed इससे the मलबा left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body.
The चंद्रमा is the only celestial देह other than Earth on which इंसानो have नियत पैर.
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon साथ unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the संयुक्त States ' NASA Apollo program achieved the only manned missions to date, शुरूआत with the पहला manned lunar orbiting mission by अपोलो 8 in 1968, and six manned चंद्र landings between 1969 and 1972, साथ the first being Apollo 11.
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar रॉक्स, which have been used to develop a geological understanding of the Moon 's origins, the formation of its internal structure, and its subsequent history.
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972, the Moon रै been visited only by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the फाइनल Soviet Lunokhod rover.
Since 2004, Japan, चीन, India, the संयुक्त States, and the European Space एजेंसी have each sent lunar orbiters.
ये spacecraft have contributed to confirming the डिस्कवरी of lunar water ice in permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे and बंधी into the lunar regolith.
भविष्य manned missions to the Moon have been planned, including government as well as privately funded efforts.
the Moon remains, अंतर्गत the बाहरी Space सन्धि, फ़्री to all nations to explore लिये peaceful purposes.
Ronald Wilson reagan ( ; फ़रवरी 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004 ) थी the 40th अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to कि, he थी the 33rd Governor of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( 1967–1975 ), and a radio, film और television actor.
Born in tampico, इलिनोइस, और उठाया in डिक्सन, Reagan was educated at यूरेका College, earning a स्नातक of कला degree in economics और समाजशास्त्र.
बाद graduating, reagan स्थानांतरित first to Iowa to work as a रेडियो broadcaster and तब, in 1937, to Los Angeles where he began a career as an actor, first in films and later television.
Some of his most notable films include Knute Rockne, All American ( 1940 ), किंग्स पंक्ति ( 1942 ), और Bedtime for Bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan served as President of the स्क्रीन Actors Guild and बाद as a spokesman for General इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; his start in politics occurred during his work for GE.
Originally a सदस्य of the Democratic Party, उसके स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s, and he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
After delivering a rousing वाक in support of बैरी Goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964, he was persuaded to seek the California governorship, winning दो years बाद and again in 1970.
He was defeated in उसके चलाएं for the Republican अध्यक्षीय nomination in 1968 और in 1976, but won both the nomination और general election in 1980, defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter.
As अध्यक्ष, Reagan implemented sweeping new राजनैतिक and economic initiatives.
His supply-side आर्थिक policies, dubbed `` Reaganomics ``, advocated reducing कर rates to spur economic growth, controlling the धन supply to reduce inflation, deregulation of the economy, and reducing सरकारी spending.
In his पहला पद he survived an हत्या attempt, took a hard लकीर against मजदूर unions, घोषित a नई War on Drugs, and ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He was re-elected in a landslide in 1984, proclaiming that it थी `` Morning in America ``.
His दूसरी term was primarily चिह्नित by foreign matters, such as the ending of the Cold War, the 1986 bombing of Libya, and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire ``, he supported anti-communist movements worldwide और spent his first term forgoing the strategy of détente by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR.
Reagan negotiated with Soviet सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल Gorbachev, culminating in the INF Treaty and the घटी of दोनो देशों ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan left दफ्तर in 1989.
In 1994, the former president disclosed that he had been diagnosed with Alzheimer 's बीमारी earlier in the साल ; he died टेन years later at the आयु of 93.
A conservative प्रतीक, he ranks highly in public opinion पोल of U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों and is credited for generating an ideological renaissance on the अमरीकी political right.
Complete नियत of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, Tenak, Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the यहूदी बाइबल.
The Tanakh is भी known as the masoretic Text or the miqra.
The नाम is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three परंपरागत subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '', also known as the Five किताबे of मूसा ), Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) and ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ) —hence tanakh.
The नाम `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that which is पढ़ा '', is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh.
the books of the Tanakh यहूद relayed with an accompanying मौखिक tradition passed on by each generation, पुकारा the मौखिक Torah.
The कावासाकी निंजा ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc class खेल motorcycle.
It was introduced in 1995, और has महरूम constantly updated throughout the years in response to new उत्पाद इससे Honda, suzuki, and यामाहा.
The zx series is what थी known as the Ninja लकीर of कावासाकी motorcycles in the 1980s and still carries the name today.
हत्या attempts and plots on Presidents of the संयुक्त States have been numerous : more than 20 attempts to kill sitting और former presidents, as खूब as the presidents-elect, are ज्ञात.
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ), James A. Garfield ( the 20th अध्यक्ष ), विलियम McKinley ( the 25th President ) और John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ).
दो राष्ट्रपतियों were घायल in attempted assassinations : former President Theodore Roosevelt ( the 26th President ), और अध्यक्ष रोनाल्ड reagan ( the 40th अध्यक्ष ).
Although the historian j.w. क्लार्क रै सुझाया that सबसे अमरीकी assassinations were politically motivated actions, carried out by rational men, नहीं all such हमले have महरूम undertaken लिये राजनैतिक reasons.
Some attackers had questionable mental stability, और a few were judged legally insane.
चूंकि the Vice President of the United States has for more than a सदी been elected from the same political party as the President, the assassination of the अध्यक्ष is unlikely to result in major नीति changes.
इस may explain why political groups typically do नहीं make such attacks.

Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state स्तिथ in West South Central संयुक्त राज्य.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United States.
the state 's नाम is निकला इससे the Choctaw words okla और humma, meaning `` red people '', and it is known informally by its nickname, the Sooner State.
formed by the combination of ओक्लाहोमा Territory और Indian Territory on November 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to enter the union.
इसके निवासियों हैं known as Oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma नगर.
A major निर्माता of natural गैस, आयल, and agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, telecommunications, and जैवप्रौद्योगिकी.
it has one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the nation, ranking among the शीर्ष राज्य in per capita आय growth और gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma नगर और Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, साथ nearly two thirds of oklahomans living within their metropolitan सांख्यिकीय areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, और पूर्वी forests, most of Oklahoma lies in the ग्रेट Plains and the U.S. आंतरिक Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a व्यापकता of English, German, स्कॉटिश, Irish and देशी अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 देशी American भाषाएं हैं spoken in ओक्लाहोमा, second only to California.
Oklahoma is स्तिथ on a confluence of तीन major अमरीकी cultural regions और historically served as a route for चौपायों drives, a गंतव्य for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory लिये Native Americans.
Redwall, by Brian Jacques, is a श्रेणी of children 's fantasy novels.
it is the title of the first book of the series, published in 1986, as well as the नाम of the Abbey प्रदर्शित in the book और the नाम of an animated tv series based on तीन of the novels ( Redwall, Mattimeo, and Martin the योद्धा ), जिससे पहला aired in 1999.
The books are primarily aimed at older children, but have fans of all ages.
वहीँ have been twenty-two novels and two picture books प्रकाशित.
The twenty-second, और final, novel, The दुष्ट Crew, was posthumously released on May 3, 2011.
Natural Gas is usually measured by volume in the संयुक्त States और is stated in cubic feet.
a cubic foot of gas is the amount of गैस needed to fill a आवाज़ of एक cubic foot under set conditions of pressure and temperature.to measure larger amounts of प्राकृतिक gas, a `` therm '' is प्रयुक्त to denote 100 cubic feet, and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 घन फीट.
To provide greater सटीकता in comparing fuels, उर्जा सामग्री is measured in शर्तें of `` अंग्रेजों थर्मल इकाई ( btu 's ). ''
A btu is the amount of ऊष्मा जरूरी to raise one pound of water ( लगभग a pint ), one उपाधि Fahrenheit at or close to इसके point of maximum density.
एक British therm ( प्रतीक thm ) is a non- SI ईकाई of heat energy बराबर to 100,000 British thermal इकाई ( BTU ).
It is लगभग the energy equivalent of burning 100 cubic feet ( प्रायः referred to as 1 CCF ) of प्राकृतिक gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume और नहीं उर्जा content, a therm फ़ैक्टर is used by ( Natural ) gas companies to convert the आवाज़ of gas used to its ऊष्मा equivalent, and thus गणना the वास्तविक energy use.
The therm factor is usually in the इकाई therms/CCF.
It will vary साथ the मिक्सर of hydrocarbons in the प्राकृतिक gas.
Natural गैस with a higher than औसत concentration of ethane, प्रोपेन or butane होगा have a higher therm factor.
Impurities, ऐसे as carbon डाइऑक्साइड or nitrogen, lower the therm फ़ैक्टर.
The volume of the gas is गणना as if measured at मानक तापमान and pressure ( STP ).
the heat सामग्री of natural गैस is solely dependent on the composition of the gas, and is independent of temperature and दबाव.
One therm is equal to about 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can also be provided by about of प्राकृतिक gas.
the therm sometimes रै been confused साथ the thermie ( देखिए below ).
The names of both units come from the Greek word लिये heat.
A thermie ( th ) is a metric ईकाई of heat energy, part of the meter-tonne-second प्रणाली sometimes used by European इंजीनियर्स.
the thermie is equal to the राशि of energy जरूरी to उठाएँ the तापमान of 1 tonne of water by 1 °c.
the thermie is समतुल्य to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 btu.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), थी a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war had इसके origin in the issue of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी powers किया not intervene.
After four years of खूनी combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and नष्ट much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
in the 1860 अध्यक्षीय election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United States ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan और the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural पता declared उसके administration would not initiate सिविल war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव states जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a Peace सम्मेलन failed to find a compromise, and both sides prepared लिये war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the नई Confederate States of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key fort held by संघ सैनिकों in South Carolina.
Lincoln पुकारा for प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
the Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval नाकेबंदी कि crippled the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
The Eastern थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war लक्ष्य.
to the west, by summer 1862 the संघ destroyed the Confederate river नेवी, तब much of their western सेना, और the संघ at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी Theater, विलियम T. शरमन drove east to कैप्चर Atlanta और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources और manpower to attack the Confederacy इससे all दिशानिर्देश, and could afford to fight battles of अपघर्षण through the Overland अभियान towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
the American Civil युद्ध थी one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed संसार War i.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 soldiers और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian जॉन Huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at ten प्रतिशत of all Northern males 20–45 years old, और 30 percent of all दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
William ब्रूस Jenner ( born October 28, 1949 ) is a former U.S. track and field athlete, motivational स्पीकर, socialite, television personality और businessman.
He won the gold medal for decathlon in the मॉन्ट्रियल 1976 Summer ओलंपिक.
Following his ओलम्पिक win and the सम्बन्धित मान्यता, he शादीशुदा क्रिस Kardashian, और his professional career evolved into being a television celebrity.
By 1981, he had starred in अनेक made-for-TV फिल्मों और was Erik Estrada 's replacement on the top रेटेड TV series चिप्स.
he रै six children : Burt, Casey, Brandon, ब्रोडी, केंडल and Kylie.
Since उसके 1991 marriage to Kris Jenner, he is the stepfather to Kourtney, Kim, Khloe और Rob Kardashian.
Since 2007, he has appeared साथ his blended family on Keeping Up साथ the Kardashians.
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. कोलाई ) is a gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium that is commonly found in the निम्नतर intestine of warm-blooded जीवों ( endotherms ).
सबसे E. कोलाई strains are harmless, but कुछ serotypes can कारण serious खाना poisoning in humans, and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination.
The harmless strains are part of the normal फ्लोरा of the gut, और can benefit their होस्ट by producing vitamin K2, और by preventing the establishment of pathogenic bacteria within the आंत.
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora, and fecal–oral transmission is the major रूट through which pathogenic strains of the bacterium cause disease.
Cells हैं समर्थ to survive outside the देह for a limited amount of time, जिससे makes them ideal indicator organisms to test पर्यावरणीय नमूने लिये fecal contamination.
वहीँ is, however, a growing देह of शोध that रै examined environmentally persistent E. कोलाई which can survive for extended periods outside of the host.
The bacterium can भी be grown easily and inexpensively in a laboratory setting, और has महरूम intensively investigated for over 60 सालो.
E. coli is the सबसे widely पढ़ाई prokaryotic model organism, and an important species in the fields of biotechnology और सूक्ष्मजैविकी, where it रै served as the host organism लिये the बहुमत of work with recombinant DNA.
Area code 217 is the North American टेलीफोन area कोड लिये much of पश्चिमी and सेंट्रल Illinois.
the 217 क्षेत्रफल includes इलिनोइस ' पूंजी, springfield, प्लस Champaign, urbana, decatur, Danville, क्विंसी, और Rantoul.
217 was एक of the असली area कोड, which were created in 1947.
the only significant बदलें in 217 's सीमाएँ थी in 1957, when its northern portion was combined with भाग of area code 815 to form area code 309.
चित्र of the largest Antarctic ओज़ोन hole ever recorded ( September 2006 ), over the Southern pole
Layers of the atmosphere ( नहीं to स्केल )
ओज़ोन depletion describes दो distinct but related phenomena observed चूंकि the late 1970s : a steady decline of about 4 % per दशक in the कुल volume of ओज़ोन in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ओज़ोन layer ), and a much larger springtime घटी in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions.
The latter घटना is referred to as the ozone hole.
in addition to ये well-known stratospheric phenomena, there are भी springtime ध्रुवीय tropospheric ozone depletion events.
the विवरण of ध्रुवीय ozone hole formation differ from कि of mid-latitude thinning, but the most important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens.
The main source of these halogen atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( cfcs, freons, halons ).
ये compounds are transported into the stratosphere बाद being उत्सर्जित at the surface.
दोनो प्रकार of ozone depletion यहूद observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs और other contributory substances are referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ods ).
Since the ozone परत prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of पराबैंगनी light ( uv लाइट ) from गुजर through the धरती 's माहौल, observed and projected decreases in ozone have generated worldwide concern अग्रणी to अपनाना of the Montreal Protocol that bans the production of CFCs, halons, and other ozone-depleting रसायन such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane.
It is suspected कि a किस्में of biological consequences such as increases in स्किन cancer, cataracts, damage to plants, and reduction of plankton populations in the ocean 's photic मण्डल may परिणाम from the increased uv exposure due to ozone depletion.
The Preamble to the संयुक्त States संविधान is a brief introductory statement of the Constitution 's आधारभूत purposes and guiding principles.
it राज्य in सामान्य शर्तें, और न्यायालयों have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning और what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the नई government originates इससे the people of the संयुक्त States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to कि vast population concerning the individual rights and समता among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
