the शॉट put ( pronounced ) is a track and field event involving `` throwing '' / '' putting '' ( फेंकना in a pushing गति ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as दूर as possible.
the शॉट put competition for मेन has been a part of the modern ओलंपिक since their revival in 1896, women 's competition began in 1948.
Map of the United Nations ( un ) member राज्य, with उनके territories ( including निर्भर territories ) recognized by the UN in blue
There are United राष्ट्र ( un ) member राज्य, and प्रत्येक of them is a member of the United Nations General Assembly.
The मापदण्ड लिये admission of नई सदस्यों are नियत out in the संयुक्त Nations Charter, Chapter ii, Article 4:
A अनुशंसा for admission from the सुरक्षा Council requires affirmative votes from at least nine of the council 's fifteen members, साथ none of the five स्थाई members मतदान against.
The Security Council 's recommendation जरूर तब be subsequently स्वीकृत in the General Assembly by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign states can become UN members, and currently all un members are sovereign राज्य ( although a few members यहूद not sovereign when वे joined the UN ).
क्युकी a राज्य can तभी be admitted to the UN by the approval of the सुरक्षा Council and the General Assembly, a number of states कि may be considered sovereign states according to the Montevideo सम्मेलन criteria are not members because the un does नहीं consider उन्हें to possess प्रभुता, mainly due to the कमी of international recognition or opposition इससे certain members.
In जोड to the member राज्य, the UN भी आमंत्रण non-member states ( currently two : the Holy देखिए and फिलिस्तीन ), intergovernmental संगठन, and अन्य international organizations और entities whose statehood or sovereignty हैं not precisely defined, to become observers at the सामान्य Assembly, allowing them to participate और speak, but not vote, in General सभा meetings.
the एफिल मीनार (, ) is an आयरन lattice मीनार located on the champ de Mars in Paris, named after the engineer gustave Eiffel, जिनकी कम्पनी designed and built the tower.
Erected in 1889 as the प्रवेश arch to the 1889 World 's Fair, it रै become दोनो a global सांस्कृतिक icon of France and एक of the सबसे recognizable structures in the world.
the tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited सशुल्क स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 million लोगों ascended it in 2011.
the third level observatory 's upper platform is at the उच्चतम accessible to पब्लिक in the European Union and the उच्चतम in Europe as long as the platform of the ostankino मीनार, at, remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000.
The tower received its 250 millionth आगंतुक in 2010.
the tower स्टैंड tall, about the same height as an 81-storey building.
दौरान its construction, the एफिल Tower surpassed the वॉशिंगटन स्मारक to assume the title of the tallest man-made structure in the संसार, a title it held for 41 सालो, until the Chrysler भवन in New यॉर्क City थी built in 1930.
Because of the जोड, in 1957, of the antenna atop the Eiffel Tower, it is now taller than the क्रिसलर Building.
Not सहित broadcast antennas, it is the second-tallest structure in France, after the Millau Viaduct.
The tower has three स्तर लिये visitors.
Tickets can be purchased to ascend, by सीढ़ियाँ or लिफ्ट ( elevator ), to the first और दूसरी स्तर.
The walk इससे ground level to the पहला level is over 300 steps, as is the walk from the first to the दूसरी level.
the तीसरा और highest level is accessible तभी by lift—stairs do मौजूद लकिन are usually बंद to the पब्लिक.
The first and second levels have restaurants.
The tower रै become the most prominent symbol of दोनो पेरिस and फ़्रांस, often in the establishing shot of films set in the city.
Kenneth वेन `` केन '' जेनिंग्स III ( born May 23, 1974 ) is an अमरीकी खेल show प्रतियोगी और लेखक.
Jennings is विख्यात for holding the record for the longest जीतना streak on the u.S. syndicated game show jeopardy !
और as होने the all-time leading money winner on American game shows.
in 2004, Jennings जीती 74 Jeopardy !
खेल before he थी defeated by challenger Nancy zerg on उसके 75th appearance.
His total earnings on Jeopardy !
हैं $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over उसके 74 wins, a $ 2,000 second-place prize in his 75th रूप, a $ 500,000 second-place पुरस्कार in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions, as खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000 पुरस्कार in the IBM Challenge.
During उसके पहला run of Jeopardy !
दिखावे, Jennings अर्जित the record for the highest American खेल show winnings.
His कुल was surpassed by ब्रैड Rutter, who पराजित Jennings in the फाइनल of the jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of champions ( first aired on May 25, 2005 ), adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing jeopardy !
winnings.
Jennings regained the record after appearing on several अन्य game shows, culminating in an appearance on हैं You होशियार than a 5th grader ?
( first aired on October 10, 2008 ), though Rutter retains the jeopardy !
record.
बाद his success on Jeopardy !, Jennings wrote about उसके experience and explored American trivia history and culture in his किताब Brainiac : Adventures in the जिज्ञासु, Competitive, Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs, प्रकाशित in 2006.
The Canadian Football League or CFL ( ' [ lcf ] in French ) is a professional खेल league located in Canada.
The cfl is the highest स्तर of competition in कनाडाई football, a रूप of gridiron football closely related to American football.
Its eight current teams, which हैं located in eight पृथक cities, are divided into two विभाजन of four teams each — the East Division and the West Division.
The league 's 19-week नियमित season runs from late जून to जल्दी November ; each team plays 18 खेल with एक bye सप्ताह.
Following the regular ऋतु, the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the fourth प्लेस team in one प्रभाग has a better रिकार्ड than the third place team in the अन्य प्रभाग, when the टोली with the बेहतर record makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the अन्य प्रभाग 's playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week divisional playoffs, which culminate in the late-november Grey Cup championship, the country 's largest annual sports and television event.
the CFL was officially founded on जनवरी 19, 1958, making it the second oldest gridiron football league in North अमेरिका still in आपरेशन, although all its teams long predate the modern गठन of the league.
it is the उच्चतम level of play in कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल, the most popular football league in Canada, and the second-most popular major sports लीग in Canada, after the National Hockey लीग.
Although ice hockey is Canada 's most लोकप्रिय sport, the CFL रै increased the popularity of Canadian football in Quebec and Western कनाडा.
Canadian football is also played at amateur levels ( i.e. युवावस्था, high school, CJFL, qjfl, CIS and वरिष्ठ leagues such as the अलबर्टा Football League ).
The 2010s will be a significant दशक for the CFL in terms of विकास, as teams have renovated, expanded stadiums, or plan to build entirely new स्टेडियम.
The मॉन्ट्रियल Alouettes accomplished this first, adding 5,000 सीटे to पर्सिवल molson Memorial Stadium in time लिये the 2010 CFL season.
The एडमॉन्टन Eskimos and Calgary Stampeders also renovated उनके respective stadiums and सुविधाएं लिये the 2010 season.
In 2011, the bc Lions निभाई under a new, retractable छत in BC Place बाद spending one and a half सीज़न at Empire Field.
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers होगा खेल in an entirely new stadium at the University of मनिटोबा, scheduled to खोलें in time for the 2013 season.
the हैमिल्टन tiger-cats, Saskatchewan Roughriders और the new ओटावा franchise are also looking at नई or extensively-renovated stadiums in the following years.
There are भी hopes of expanding the लीग to Atlantic Canada ( ideally basing a team in either the more populated halifax, or the more centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in moncton.
according to sports historian Douglas Brei, the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल League holds the distinction of होने the only पेशेवर sports league in North अमेरिका, major or minor लीग, in which प्रत्येक existing franchise रै won at least one league title while in their वर्तमान location.
प्रत्येक antibody binds to a विशिष्ट antigen ; an interaction similar to a lock and key.
an एंटीबॉडी ( Ab ), also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ), is a large Y-shaped प्रोटीन produced by b-cells that is used by the immune system to identify and neutralize foreign objects ऐसे as bacteria and वाइरस.
The antibody recognizes a unique भाग of the विदेशी निशाना, पुकारा an प्रतिजन.
प्रत्येक tip of the `` y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a structure analogous to a lock ) कि is specific for one particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a key ) on an antigen, allowing these दो structures to bind together with precision.
using this binding mechanism, an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected कोशिका for attack by other parts of the immune system, or can neutralize its निशाना directly ( for example, by ब्लॉकिंग a part of a microbe that is essential लिये its invasion और survival ).
The production of antibodies is the main फलन of the humoral प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली.
Antibodies हैं secreted by a type of white blood cell पुकारा a प्लाज्मा cell.
antibodies can occur in two शारीरिक forms, a soluble form कि is secreted from the cell, and a membrane -bound form that is attached to the surface of a B कोशिका and is referred to as the b कोशिका receptor ( BCR ).
The BCR is तभी found on the surface of B कोशिकाएं and facilitates the activation of these cells and their subsequent differentiation into either antibody factories पुकारा plasma cells, or memory B cells that will survive in the body and remember कि same antigen so the b cells can respond faster upon future exposure.
In most cases, बातचीत of the b कोशिका with a T हेल्पर कोशिका is necessary to उपज full activation of the b cell and, इसलिए, antibody generation following antigen binding.
Soluble antibodies हैं released into the blood और tissue fluids, as well as many secretions to continue to सर्वेक्षण for invading microorganisms.
antibodies हैं glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the शर्तें antibody और immunoglobulin हैं often used interchangeably.
Antibodies are typically made of मौलिक structural units—each साथ two large heavy जंजीरों and दो small light chains.
There are अनेक different प्रकार of एंटीबॉडी भारी chains, and several different kinds of antibodies, which are grouped into different isotypes based on which heavy chain they possess.
पाँच different antibody isotypes are known in mammals, which perform अलग भूमिकाएँ, and सहायता सीधा the appropriate प्रतिरक्षा response for each अलग प्रकार of foreign object they एनकाउंटर.
Though the general structure of सब antibodies is very similar, a small प्रदेश at the टिप of the प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक variable, allowing millions of antibodies with slightly different tip structures, or antigen binding साइट, to exist.
This region is known as the hypervariable region.
प्रत्येक of ये variants can bind to a different प्रतिजन.
इस विशाल diversity of antibodies allows the प्रतिरक्षा system to recognize an equally wide किस्में of antigens.
The large and diverse जनसांख्यिकी of antibodies is generated by random combinations of a set of gene खण्ड that encode different antigen binding sites ( or paratopes ), followed by यादृच्छिक mutations in इस area of the एंटीबॉडी जीन, जिससे create further diversity.
Antibody genes also re-organize in a process पुकारा class switching that changes the base of the भारी chain to another, creating a different isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen विशिष्ट परिवर्तनीय region.
इस allows a single एंटीबॉडी to be used by अनेक अलग parts of the immune system.
the symbol used by the zodiac Killer to sign his correspondence
The Zodiac कातिल was a सीरियल कातिल who संचालित in Northern California in the late 1960s और जल्दी 1970s.
the killer 's identity remains unknown.
the Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia, Vallejo, Lake Berryessa, और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between December 1968 and October 1969.
Four men and three women between the ages of 16 and 29 were targeted.
The कातिल originated the name `` Zodiac '' in a series of taunting letters sent to the local Bay क्षेत्रफल press.
These अक्षर शामिल four cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the four cryptograms sent, only एक रै been definitively हल.
Suspects have been नामित by विधि enforcement और amateur investigators, लकिन no conclusive evidence has surfaced.
In April 2004, the San Francisco पुलिस Department marked the case `` inactive '', yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007.
The case भी remains खोलें in the नगर of Vallejo, as well as in Napa County and solano County.
The कैलिफ़ोर्निया Department of Justice has कायम an open case file on the Zodiac murders चूंकि 1969.
जेनिंग्स is a small नगर in और the parish seat of जेफरसन डेविस Parish, Louisiana, United States, near झील चार्ल्स.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, a small मनाही from the 2000 tabulation.
The city is 68 percent white.
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings Micropolitan Statistical Area, जिससे includes all of जेफरसन Davis Parish.
it is also part of the larger Lake Charles-Jennings Combined सांख्यिकीय Area.
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर of matter on an परमाणु और molecular scale.
the earliest, widespread description of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological goal of precisely manipulating atoms and अणुओं for fabrication of macroscale उत्पाद, also now referred to as आणविक nanotechnology.
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National Nanotechnology पहल, जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of matter with at तनिक one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
This परिभाषा reflects the fact that क्वांटम mechanical effects are महत्वपूर्ण at इस quantum-realm scale, and so the definition shifted इससे a particular technological goal to a शोध श्रेणी समावेशी of all प्रकार of research and technologies that deal साथ the special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold.
It is therefore आम to see the बहुवचन form `` nanotechnologies '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक range of research and अनुप्रयोग whose common trait is size.
Because of the variety of potential applications ( including industrial and military ), governments have invested billions of dollars in nanotechnology research.
Through इसके National Nanotechnology पहल, the USA रै invested 3.7 billion डॉलर.
the यूरोपीय Union रै invested 1.2 billion and Japan 750 million डॉलर.
Nanotechnology as defined by आकार is naturally very व्यापक, सहित fields of science as diverse as सतह science, organic chemistry, molecular जीवविज्ञान, सेमीकंडक्टर physics, microfabrication, etc.
The associated शोध और applications हैं equally विविध, ranging from एक्सटेंशन of conventional यंत्र भौतिकी to completely new approaches आधारित upon आणविक self-assembly, from developing new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct कंट्रोल of matter on the atomic स्केल.
Scientists currently बहस the future implications of nanotechnology.
nanotechnology may be able to create many नई materials and डिवाइस साथ a विशाल range of applications, such as in medicine, electronics, biomaterials और energy production.
On the other hand, nanotechnology raises अनेक of the वही मुद्दे as any new प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित concerns about the toxicity and environmental impact of nanomaterials, and their संभावित effects on global अर्थशास्त्र, as खूब as अटकलें about विभिन्न doomsday scenarios.
These concerns have led to a debate among advocacy groups और governments on whether खास विनियमन of nanotechnology is warranted.
Map of the Eastern Bloc
The पद Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc refers to the former कम्युनिस्ट states of Central and Eastern Europe, generally the Soviet Union and the देशों of the वॉरसॉ Pact.
The शर्तें Communist bloc and Soviet bloc यहूद भी प्रयुक्त to denote groupings of राज्य aligned with the Soviet Union, although these terms might include राज्य बाहर सेंट्रल and पूर्वी यूरोपीय.
the New Jersey gubernatorial election of 2009 took place on नवम्बर 3, 2009.
लोकतांत्रिक Governor Jon Corzine थी running लिये a second term and was being challenged by Republican क्रिस क्रिस्टी, Independent क्रिस्टोफर Daggett और नौ others, in addition to several write-in candidates.
Christie won the चुनाव, साथ about 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote, to 44.9 प्रतिशत for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett.
Christie won the largest margin लिये a पहला term रिपब्लिकन since 1969.
Christie assumed दफ्तर on January 19, 2010.
इस was the first election to भरण the newly निर्मित office of लेफ्टिनेंट Governor.
The candidates for governor और लेफ्टिनेंट governor were joined together as a सिंगल choice, so that मतदाता did नहीं have the opportunity to विभाजित the टिकट.
Kim guadagno, Christie 's running mate, became New जर्सी 's पहला लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल following उसके inauguration.
Health care in the संयुक्त States is provided by अनेक distinct संगठन.
Health परवाह facilities are largely owned and संचालित by निजी सेक्टर businesses.
Health insurance लिये पब्लिक sector employees is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision and spending comes from कार्यक्रम such as Medicare, medicaid, tricare, the Children 's Health Insurance Program, और the Veterans Health Administration.
सबसे of the जनसांख्यिकी under 65 is insured by their or a family सदस्य 's employer, some buy स्वास्थ्य बीमे on their अपना, and the remainder हैं uninsured.
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the नेशनल Institutes of Health in 2013, the United States was at or near the bottom in infant mortality, heart and lung disease, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, और rates of विकलांगता.
Together, ऐसे issues place the U.S. at the bottom of the list लिये जीवन प्रत्याशा.
on average, a U.S. male can be expected to live almost four fewer सालो than those in the top-ranked देश.
According to the संसार स्वास्थ्य Organization ( जो ), the United राज्य खर्च more on health care per capita ( $ 7,146 ), and अधिक on health परवाह as percentage of इसके GDP ( 15.2 % ), than any other nation in 2008.
The Commonwealth Fund क्रमित the United राज्य last in the quality of स्वास्थ्य care among similar countries, and टीप u.S. care costs the most.
The U.S. Census ब्यूरो reported that 49.9 million निवासियों, 16.3 % of the population, were uninsured in 2010 ( up इससे 49.0 million residents, 16.1 % of the population, in 2009 ).
A 2004 Institute of Medicine ( iom ) रपट कहा : `` The United राज्य is among the few industrialized राष्ट्र in the world that करता not गारंटी अभिगम to health care लिये its population. ''
A 2004 oecd report said : `` With the एक्सेप्शन of मैक्सिको, Turkey, and the United राज्य, all OECD countries था achieved सार्वभौमिक or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990. ''
A 2010 report observed that कमी of health बीमे causes roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक मौतों every साल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
in 2007, 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed high चिकित्सा expenses.
A 2013 study found कि about 25 % of all senior नागरिकों declare bankruptcy due to medical expenses, and 43 % are मजबूर to mortgage or बेचें उनके primary निवास.
On कूच 23, 2010, the Patient Protection और Affordable Care अधिनियम ( PPACA ) became law, providing for major changes in health insurance.
In physiology, body जल is the water सामग्री of the human body.
A significant fraction of the human body is water.
आर्थर Guyton 's Textbook of चिकित्सा Physiology states कि `` the कुल राशि of water in a man of average वज़न ( 70 kilograms ) is approximately 40 litres, averaging 57 percent of उसके total body weight.
in a newborn infant, this may be as ऊँची as 75 percent of the body weight, but it progressively decreases from birth to old age, most of the घटी occurring दौरान the first 10 years of life.
भी, obesity decreases the percentage of water in the देह, sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''.
These figures are सांख्यिकीय averages, so हैं illustrative, and like सब biostatistics, होगा vary with बाते जैसे type of जनसांख्यिकी, age and number of people sampled, और methodology.
so there is not, और can नहीं be, a फिगर कि is exactly the same for all लोगों, for this or कोई अन्य physiological measure.
लिये example, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) anatomy & Physiology for नर्स gives a फिगर of 60 % for the proportion of body-weight attributable to जल, which approximates Guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased states where body water is प्रभावित, the compartment or compartments that have changed can दे clues to the nature of the प्रॉब्लम.
Body water is regulated by hormones, including anti-diuretic hormone ( अध ), aldosterone and अलिंदी natriuretic पेप्टाइड.
Per Netter 's एटलस of Human Physiology, body जल is broken down into the following compartments:
Intracellular fluid ( 2/3 of देह water ).
Per Guyton, in a देह containing 40 लीटर of fluid, about 25 litres is intracellular, which amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), बंद enough to the 2/3 rule of thumb.
जैक्सन 's texts states 70 % of body fluid is intracellular.
Extracellular fluid ( 1/3 of body water ).
प्रति Guyton 's illustration, for a 40 litre body, about 15 litres is extracellular, which amounts to 37.5 % Again, this is close to the 1/3 नियम of thumb cited यहाँ.
Plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular द्रव ).
प्रति guyton 's उदाहरण, of the 15 लीटर of extracellular fluid, plasma आवाज़ averages 3 litres.
This amounts to 20 %, the same as per Netter 's एटलस.
Interstitial द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular द्रव )
Transcellular द्रव ( a.k.a. `` तीसरा space, '' normally उपेक्षित in calculations )
contained inside organs, ऐसे as the gastrointestinal, cerebrospinal, peritoneal, and ocular fluids.
Self-esteem is a पद प्रयुक्त in psychology to reflect a person 's overall emotional मूल्यांकन of his or her अपना worth.
It is a निर्णय of oneself as खूब as an attitude toward the self.
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example, `` i am competent, '' `` i am worthy '' ) and emotions such as triumph, despair, pride और shame.
Smith और mackie define it by saying `` the self-concept is what we think परिचय the self ; self-esteem, is the positive or negative evaluations of the self, as in how we feel परिचय it. ''
self-esteem is भी known as the evaluative आयाम of the self that शामिल feelings of worthiness, prides and discouragement.
एक 's self-esteem is also closely associated with self-consciousness.
Self-esteem is a disposition that a person has which represents their judgements of their own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, मॉरिस rosenberg and social-learning theorists defined self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness.
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as `` the अनुभव of होने competent to cope साथ the basic challenges of जीवन and being worthy of happiness. ''
According to Branden, self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी क्षमता ) and self-respect ( a अहसास of निजी worth ).
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that प्रत्येक person has of उनके ability to face life 's challenges, to understand and solve problems, and their right to achieve सुख, and be given respect.
as a social psychological construct, self-esteem is attractive क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes, ऐसे as अकादमिक उपलब्धि ( दलदल 1990 ) or कसरत behavior ( Hagger et al. 1998 ).
In addition, self-esteem has also महरूम treated as an महत्वपूर्ण निष्कर्ष due to its close संबंध with मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being ( Marsh 1989 ).
self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example, `` I believe I am a शुभ writer और I feel प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a global extent ( for example, `` I मानना i am a bad person, and feel bad about myself in general '' ).
psychologists प्रायः लिहाज़ self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), though normal, short-term विसंगतियाँ ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also मौजूद.
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem शामिल : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, और self-integrity.
A masonic आवास, often termed a Private Lodge or Constituent Lodge, is the basic organisational unit of freemasonry.
प्रत्येक नई Lodge must be warranted or chartered by a Grand आवास, but is subject to its दिशा only in enforcing the published Constitution of the क्षेत्राधिकार.
by एक्सेप्शन the three surviving lodges that formed the world 's first known Grand आवास in लंदन ( today called the संयुक्त Grand Lodge of England ) have the unique विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e. without such वारंट ; only one other आवास operates without a warrant - this is the ग्रैंड Stewards ' आवास in London, although it is not also हकदार to the `` time immemorial '' शीर्षक.
A freemason is generally हकदार to visit any Lodge, in कोई क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e. अंतर्गत any ग्रैंड Lodge ) in amity with उसके own.
In कुछ jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to Master masons ( that is, Freemasons who have attained the अनुक्रम 's तीसरा उपाधि ).
He is पहला usually जरूरी to check, और certify, the regularity of the relationship of the Lodge - and be समर्थ to satisfy that Lodge of his नियमितता of सदस्यता.
freemasons gather together as a आवास to work the three मौलिक Degrees of Entered Apprentice, fellowcraft and Master Mason.
Pilkington समूह Limited is a multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered in St हेलेन्स, संयुक्त Kingdom और a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of the Japan-based NSG Group.
Prior to its acquisition by एनएसजी in 2006 it was an independent company listed on the London Stock Exchange and लिये a समय was a constituent of the ftse 100 Index.
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as भाग of another one, particularly when the कोटेड expression is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to इसके original source, and it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks.
a quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units of any other रूप of expression, especially भाग of artistic works : elements of a painting, scenes from a फिल्म or sections from a musical संयोजन.
Year 1877 ( mdccclxxvii ) was a common साल starting on सोमवार ( link will प्रदर्शक the full calendar ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a common year starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian पंचांग.
ब्लैक pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the परिवार Piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके fruit, which is usually सूखी and used as a मसाला and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn जब dried, is approximately in diameter, dark red जब fully वयस्क, और, like सब drupes, contains a single seed.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper निकला इससे them, may be वर्णित simply as pepper, or more precisely as black pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ), ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल ) and white pepper ( dried पके बीज ).
ब्लैक pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated there और elsewhere in तीव्र regions.
Currently वियतनाम is the world 's largest producer और निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has महरूम used चूंकि प्राचीनता for both its flavour और as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's most traded spice.
It is one of the most आम spices added to European भोजन and its descendants.
The spiciness of ब्लैक pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be confused with the capsaicin कि देता मांसल मिर्च theirs.
It is in the modern संसार, प्रायः paired with salt.
Fire hydrant in Charlottesville, Virginia, यूएसए
A आग hydrant ( भी known colloquially as a fire plug in the संयुक्त राज्य or as a johnny pump in नई York City ), is an active आग protection measure, and a source of water provided in most urban, suburban and rural क्षेत्रों with municipal water service to enable firefighters to tap into the नगरपालिका जल supply to assist in extinguishing a fire.
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an insurance छूट since अग्निशमन should be able to अधिक rapidly बुझा a fire on the insured property.
the concept of आग plugs dates to at least the 17th century.
This थी a time जब firefighters responding to a call would खुदाई down to the wooden water मेन्स and hastily bore a hole to secure water to लड़ो fires.
The water would fill the hole creating a अस्थाई well, and be transported from the खूब to the fire by bucket brigades or, later, by hand-pumped fire इंजन.
The holes were then plugged with stoppers, सामान्यतः redwood, which over समय came to be known as आग plugs.
The स्थान of the plug would प्रायः be recorded or चिह्नित so कि it could be reused in future fires.
This is the सोर्स of the colloquial term fire plug स्टिल प्रयुक्त for fire hydrants today.
After the Great Fire of London in 1666, the city installed जल mains with holes drilled at intervals, equipped with risers, allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs from street स्तर.
The आविष्कार of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to Frederick Graff sr., Chief Engineer of the फिलाडेल्फिया Water Works around the year 1801.
it had a combination hose/faucet outlet and was of `` wet बैरल '' डिज़ाइन साथ the valve in the top.
it is said that graff held the पहला पेटेंट for a fire hydrant, but this can नहीं be verified because the patent office in Washington D.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying many patent records from that period in the process.
the President of the गणतंत्र of South अफ़्रीकी is the head of राज्य and head of सरकारी under South अफ़्रीकी 's Constitution.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of state थी called the राज्य President.
the President is elected by members of the National Assembly, the lower house of Parliament, और is प्रायः the leader of the largest पार्टी, which रै been the African National कॉंग्रेस चूंकि the पहला non-racial elections were आयोजित on 27 अप्रैल 1994.
The role थी originally संस्थापित to be distinct from the अभी defunct role of prime minister, but the दो roles यहूद merged in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of दफ्तर.
The 1993 और later constitutions limits the president 's time in office to two five-year शर्तें.
the first अध्यक्ष to be elected अंतर्गत the नई संविधान थी Nelson Mandela, and the incumbent president is Jacob Zuma.
अंतर्गत the interim Constitution ( valid from 1994 to 1996 ), there was a Government of नेशनल एकता, in which an MP from the largest opposition पार्टी was entitled to a स्थिति as Deputy President.
Along with thabo Mbeki, the last State President, f.w. De Klerk also served as डिप्टी अध्यक्ष, in उसके क्षमता as the leader of the National Party जिससे थी the second-largest party in the new Parliament.
But De Klerk later resigned और went into opposition with his party.
A voluntary गठबन्धन सरकारी continues to मौजूद अंतर्गत the new संविधान ( adopted in 1996 ), although there have been no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of डिप्टी president.
खास education or special needs education is the education of students with special needs in a way कि पता the students ' व्यक्तिगत differences and needs.
ideally, इस process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching प्रक्रियाओं, adapted equipment और सामग्री, accessible settings, and other interventions designed to सहायता learners साथ खास needs achieve a उच्चतर level of personal self-sufficiency and कामयाबी in school and जातियाँ than would be available if the student were तभी दिए access to a typical कक्षा education.
Common खास needs include challenges with learning, संचार challenges, emotional and behavioral disorders, शारीरिक disabilities, and developmental disorders.
विद्यार्थी with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from additional शैक्षणिक services such as different approaches to शिक्षण, use of technology, a specifically adapted शिक्षण area, or resource रूम.
बौद्धिक giftedness is a difference in सीखना and can भी benefit from specialized teaching techniques or different educational programs, but the term `` खास education '' is generally प्रयुक्त to specifically indicate instruction of विद्यार्थी whose special needs reduce their क्षमता to learn independently or in an ordinary classroom, और gifted शिक्षा is संभाला separately.
In most developed countries, educators हैं modifying teaching methods और environments so that the maximum क्रमांक of विद्यार्थी are परोसा in general education environments.
Special शिक्षा in developed देशों is often regarded less as a `` प्लेस '' and more as `` a range of services, available in every school. ''
Integration can reduce सोशल stigmas and improve academic achievement लिये अनेक students.
The विपरीत of खास education is general education.
सामान्य education is the मानक curriculum presented with मानक teaching methods और without additional supports.
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12, 1930, as schwartz György ) is a Hungarian-American business महारथी, investor, और philanthropist.
he is the chairman of Soros Fund Management.
सोरोस supports progressive-liberal causes.
He is ज्ञात as `` The Man Who Broke the Bank of इंग्लैण्ड `` क्युकी of his in investment profits during the 1992 ब्लैक Wednesday UK currency crisis.
Between 1979 and 2011, Soros दिया दूर over $ 8 billion to human rights, public स्वास्थ्य, and शिक्षा causes.
he निभाई a significant भूमिका in the peaceful transition from communism to capitalism in Hungary ( 1984–89 ) and provided one of यूरोपीय 's largest higher education endowments to सेंट्रल European University in बुडापेस्ट.
Soros is भी the अध्यक्ष of the Open समाज संस्थान.
An actor portraying Alexander Graham घंटी speaking into an जल्दी मॉडल टेलीफोन.
The आविष्कार of the टेलीफोन is the culmination of work done by many individuals, the history of which involves a collection of claims and counterclaims.
The विकास of the आधुनिक विद्युत टेलीफोन शामिल an array of lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals और numerous कंपनियाँ.
This आलेख covers the early years from 1844 to 1898, from धारणा of the विचार of an electric voice-transmission device, to failed attempts to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' current, to successful प्रयोग साथ electromagnetic telephones by सिकंदर Graham Bell and Thomas Watson, and आखिरकार to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th सदी.
A निपुण of Fine Arts ( MFA, M.F.A. ) is a ग्रैजुएट उपाधि typically requiring 2–3 years of postgraduate study beyond the स्नातक 's degree ( BFA ), although the term of पढ़ाई will vary by country or by university.
The MFA is a creative उपाधि usually awarded as a terminal उपाधि in विज़ुअल कला, रचनात्मक लिखने, filmmaking, dance, or theatre and other performing कला.
Coursework is primarily of an applied or performing nature साथ the program often culminating in a major work or प्रदर्शन.
Master of Fine कला programs have generally required a bachelor 's degree prior to admission, लकिन अनेक do not आवश्यकता कि the undergraduate प्रमुख be the same as the MFA field of study.
The most महत्वपूर्ण admissions आवश्यकता has प्रायः been a नमूना portfolio or a performance audition.
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the निपुण of कला in कि the MFA, while an academic program, centers around practice in the particular फ़ील्ड, whereas programs leading to the ma usually center on the scholarly, अकादमिक, or नाजुक study of the field.
Additionally, in the United States, an MFA is recognized as a टर्मिनल degree for practitioners of Visual Art, डिज़ाइन, नृत्य, थिएटर, Film/Video, नई Media, and Creative Writing - meaning that it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in its field, और is used as a न्यूनतम qualification to be able to apply to become a Full-Time प्राध्यापक teaching at the विश्वविद्यालयों level in these disciplines.
There हैं exceptions to this मानक in the Arts, notably in the case of music performance, जहाँ the MFA is not seen as a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized dma degree.
It is भी critical to note that in the interest of extending the कनेक्शन between रचनात्मक production and जारी academic research, कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों have established practice-based Ph.D कार्यक्रम in fields ऐसे as रचनात्मक लिखने, visual arts, नई media, design and थिएटर.
While इस रै had an effect in Creative Writing, और to a lesser extent in डिज़ाइन and new media, the influx of graduates from practice-based PhD programs has not appreciably changed the standard for the mfa as the टर्मिनल degree in सबसे Arts disciplines yet.
This is an जारी contentious टॉपिक, and is the बारंबार subject of अकादमिक panels, especially at the सालाना कॉलेज आर्ट संघ सम्मेलन.
the CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the mfa strongly re-affirms that the phd is नहीं required as a terminal उपाधि in the visual arts.
The atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki in जापानी were conducted by the संयुक्त States दौरान the final stages of World War II in 1945.
The two events हैं the only use of nuclear weapons in युद्ध to date.
Following a firebombing campaign कि destroyed many जापानी शहरों, the Allies prepared लिये a costly आक्रमण of Japan.
The war in Europe ended when Nazi जर्मनी signed इसके instrument of surrender on 8 May, लकिन the Pacific युद्ध continued.
Together with the United Kingdom and the Republic of China, the संयुक्त States पुकारा for a surrender of Japan in the Potsdam घोषणा on 26 जुलाई 1945, threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter विनाश ''.
The Japanese government ignored इस ultimatum, और the United States deployed two नाभिकीय weapons developed by the Manhattan Project.
American airmen dropped Little लड़के on the city of हिरोशिमा on 6 August 1945, followed by मोटे man over Nagasaki on 9 अगस्त.
Within the पहला two to चार months of the bombings, the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki, with roughly half of the deaths in प्रत्येक city occurring on the first day.
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated कि, of the people who died on the day of the explosion, 60 % died इससे flash or flame burns, 30 % from falling debris and 10 % इससे other कल्याणकारी.
During the following months, large numbers died from the effect of burns, radiation sickness, and other injuries, compounded by illness.
in a us estimate of the total तात्कालिक and short पद cause of death, 15–20 % died from radiation sickness, 20–30 % इससे burns, and 50–60 % from अन्य injuries, compounded by illness.
In both शहरों, most of the मुर्दे were नागरिकों, हालांकि Hiroshima had a sizeable garrison.
on 15 August, six days after the bombing of Nagasaki, जापानी announced its surrender to the allies, signing the Instrument of Surrender on 2 सितंबर, officially ending World War ii.
The bombings led, in part, to post-war Japan 's adopting Three non-nuclear Principles, forbidding the nation from nuclear armament.
the भूमिका of the bombings in Japan 's आत्मसमर्पण and their ethical justification हैं still debated.
मोहनदास करमचंद Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ), commonly known as Mahatma गांधी, was the preeminent leader of Indian nationalism in British-ruled India.
employing non-violent सिविल disobedience, Gandhi led India to independence और प्रेरित आंदोलनों for non-violence, civil rights and स्वतंत्रता across the world.
The son of a senior government official, Gandhi थी born and उठाया in a हिन्दू Bania जातियाँ in तटीय Gujarat, and trained in law in लंदन.
गांधी became प्रसिद्ध by fighting लिये the civil rights of Muslim and Hindu इंडियंस in South अफ़्रीकी, using new तकनीकों of non-violent civil disobedience कि he विकसित.
Returning to इण्डिया in 1915, he set about organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong प्रतिद्वन्दी of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e. basing राजनीती on धर्म ) he reached out widely to सब धार्मिक groups.
he became a leader of Muslims protesting the declining औकात of the खिलाफत.
Assuming leadership of the Indian National कॉंग्रेस in 1921, गांधी led nationwide campaigns for easing poverty, expanding women 's rights, building धार्मिक and जातीय सौहार्द, समाप्ति untouchability, increasing economic self-reliance, and above all लिये achieving स्वराज —the independence of India from अंग्रेजों domination.
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national नमक tax with the Dandi Salt March in 1930, and बाद in demanding the British to तत्काल Quit इण्डिया in 1942, during संसार War II.
He थी imprisoned for that and लिये numerous अन्य राजनैतिक offenses over the years.
गांधी sought to practice non-violence and truth in all situations, and advocated that अन्य do the same.
he देखी the villages as the core of the true India और प्रचारित self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru.
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient आवासीय community and पहना the traditional भारतीय धोती और shawl, woven with धागे he था hand spun on a charkha.
His मुख्य political enemy in Britain was Winston Churchill, who ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir. ''
He was a dedicated vegetarian, and undertook long fasts as means of both self-purification और राजनैतिक mobilization.
In his last साल, unhappy at the partition of India, गांधी worked to stop the carnage between Muslims, Hindus and Sikhs that raged in the border area between इण्डिया and Pakistan.
He was assassinated on 30 जनवरी 1948 by Nathuram Godse who thought गांधी was too sympathetic to India 's Muslims.
30 जनवरी is observed as Martyrs ' Day in इण्डिया.
The honorific Mahatma ( `` Great Soul '' ) थी लागू to उसे by 1914.
in India he थी भी called Bapu ( `` पिता '' ).
He is known in इण्डिया as the Father of the स्वदेश ; his birthday, 2 October, is commemorated there as Gandhi Jayanti, a national holiday, and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence.
Gandhi 's philosophy was not theoretical but एक of pragmatism, कि is, practicing his principles in the moment.
Asked to दे a message to the लोगों, he would respond, `` My life is my संदेश. ''
Joan क्रॉफर्ड ( कूच 23, ca. 1904 – May 10, 1977 ), born Lucille Fay LeSueur, was an अमरीकी actress in film, television और थिएटर.
Starting as a नर्तकी in traveling theatrical कंपनियाँ before debuting on Broadway, Crawford was हस्ताक्षरित to a motion picture अनुबंध by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925.
Initially कुंठित by the आकार and विशेषता of her भाग, Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity and became nationally known as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
In the 1930s, क्रॉफर्ड 's fame rivaled, and बाद outlasted, MGM colleagues norma शियर्र and Greta Garbo.
क्रॉफर्ड प्रायः played hardworking young women who find romance and वित्तीय कामयाबी.
ये `` rags-to-riches '' stories यहूद खूब received by अवसाद -era audiences and were popular with महिलाओं.
Crawford became एक of Hollywood 's सबसे prominent movie stars and one of the उच्चतम paid women in the संयुक्त राज्य, but her films began खोने money and by the end of the 1930s she थी labeled `` box दफ्तर poison ''.
बाद an absence of nearly two years from the screen, Crawford मंचन a वापसी by starring in Mildred पियर्स ( 1945 ), for which she won the अकादमी Award for Best अभिनेत्री.
In 1955, she became involved with the pepsi-cola Company through her marriage to company Chairman Alfred Steele.
After his death in 1959, Crawford was निर्वाचित to भरण उसके vacancy on the board of निर्देशकों लकिन was forcibly retired in 1973.
She जारी acting in फिल्मी and television regularly through the 1960s, when उसके performances became fewer ; after the release of the British horror फिल्मी Trog in 1970, Crawford retired from the screen.
Following a public appearance in 1974, after which unflattering छायाचित्र were published, Crawford withdrew from public life and became increasingly reclusive until her मौत in 1977.
Crawford married four times.
Her first three marriages ended in divorce ; the last ended with the death of husband Alfred Steele.
She अपनाया five children, one of whom was reclaimed by उसके जनम माँ.
क्रॉफर्ड 's relationships with her two older children, Christina और Christopher, were acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the two and, बाद Crawford 's death, क्रिस्टीना लिखा a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण, Mommie Dearest, in जिससे she कथित a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional गाली perpetrated by Crawford.
She was voted the tenth महानतम female star in the history of American cinema by the American Film संस्थान.

Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a मुश्किल or soft cover used to protect unoccupied passenger seats in a convertible or roadster, or the कार्गो bed in a pickup ट्रक.
मुश्किल tonneau covers open by a hinging or folding यांत्रिकी while नरम covers open by रोलिंग up.
the tonneau कवर is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते cargo.
When the cover is pulled आउट, it keeps वस्तुएं आउट of the सूर्य and provides extra सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं out of sight, as खूब as shielding the driver इससे दृश्य.
Twitter is an online social नेटवर्किंग सेवा and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read text-based messages of up to 140 characters, known as `` tweets ''.
ट्विटर was created in March 2006 by Jack dorsey and by July, the social networking site was launched.
The सेवा rapidly gained विश्वव्यापी popularity, with over 500 लाख registered users as of 2012, generating over 340 million tweets daily और handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day.
Since its launch, Twitter रै become one of the ten most visited websites on the अंतरजाल, और has महरूम described as `` the SMS of the Internet. ''
Unregistered उपयोक्ता can read tweets, जबकि पंजीकृत users can पोस्ट tweets through the जालस्थल interface, SMS, or a दायरा of apps लिये mobile devices.
Twitter Inc. is based in San फ्रांसिस्को, साथ अतिरिक्त servers और offices in New यॉर्क City, Boston, and San Antonio.
the Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film, co-produced and directed by Todd phillips and written by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore.
It is the first फिल्मी of the Hangover franchise.the film stars Bradley कूपर, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Heather ग्राहम, जस्टिन bartha, और जेफरी Tambor.
The hangover tells the story of Phil Wenneck, Stu Price and Alan Garner, जो सफर to Las Vegas for a स्नातक पार्टी to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending marriage.
however, फिल, Stu और एलन have no memory of the previous रात्रि 's events और must find Doug before the wedding can लो place.
Lucas and मूर wrote the script after executive producer Chris Bender 's dost disappeared and had a large bill बाद being sent to a strip club.
After Lucas और Moore बेची it to the studio for $ 2 लाख, Philips and जेरेमी garelick rewrote the स्क्रिप्ट to शामिल a बाघ as well as a subplot involving a baby और a police cruiser, and also including boxer माइक Tyson.
Filming took प्लेस in Nevada for 15 दिनों, और दौरान filming, the three main actors ( कूपर, helms and Galifianakis ) formed a friendship.
The hangover was released on June 5, 2009, becoming a critical and commercial success.
It became the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009, with a worldwide gross of over US $ 467 लाख.
Critics praised the film 's comedic approach but criticized it लिये इसके vulgarity.
The फिल्मी won the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार for Best गति Picture – Musical or Comedy, and received multiple other accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009 in the world, as well as the second highest-grossing R-rated कॉमेडी ever in the United States, surpassing a रिकार्ड previously held by Beverly Hills cop for लगभग 25 years और बाद being surpassed by टेड in 2012.
आउट of all r-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing ever in the U.S., behind only The Passion of the मसीह and The मेट्रिक्स Reloaded.
a sequel, The Hangover Part ii, was released in 2011, and a तीसरा and फाइनल फिल्मी, the Hangover Part III, is नियत लिये release in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, showing chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a खास type of कोशिका division necessary for यौन जनन in eukaryotes.
the कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by meiosis हैं gametes or बीजाणुओं.
In अनेक जीवों, सहित सब animals and land plants ( but नहीं कुछ other groups such as fungi ), gametes हैं called sperm and अंडा cells.
Whilst the process of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities with the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis, it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a different genetic संयोजन in each gamete, compared with the co-existence of प्रत्येक of the two separate pairs of each chromosome ( one received इससे प्रत्येक parent ) in each cell which परिणाम from mitosis.
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically unique ) haploid कोशिकाएं, compared साथ the two ( genetically identical ) diploid cells produced from mitosis.
Meiosis begins with एक diploid cell containing two copies of each chromosome —one इससे the organism 's mother और one from इसके पिता.
the cell divides twice, potentially producing up to four haploid cells containing एक नक़ल of each chromosome.
( `` potentially '' क्युकी in some cases, ऐसे as the formation of oocytes in स्तनधारियों, only one of the संभावित four haploid cells survives. )
in पशु the haploid cell resulting from meiosis is a पुरूष or female gamete.
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete cells is a unique मिश्रण of maternal and पैतृक DNA, resulting in औलाद that हैं genetically distinct from either parent.
This gives rise to जेनेटिक विविधता in sexually reproducing populations.
This जेनेटिक विविधता can provide the विभिन्नता of शारीरिक और behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon which natural selection can act, but, as described below in Section 6, उत्पत्ति and फलन of meiosis, the genetic विविधता may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination कि is primarily employed for its DNA मरम्मत function दौरान meiosis.
It is also noteworthy कि during meiosis, specific जीनों are more highly transcribed, और ये हैं पुकारा the meiome, the पद used in कार्यात्मक जीनोमिक्स for the meiotic transcriptome.
Meiosis is a कुंजी विशेषता लिये सब sexually reproducing eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing, synapse और recombination occur.
In जोड to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mrna ( the meiome ), however, there are भी pervasive translational नियंत्रण ( e.g. चयनात्मक usage of preformed mRNA ), regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes दौरान meiosis.
Thus, both the meiome and translational controls determine the broad restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis.
prior to the meiosis process the cell 's गुणसूत्रों हैं duplicated by a गोलाकार of DNA replication, creating इससे the maternal और पैतृक versions of each chromosome ( homologs ) two exact नक़ल, sister chromatids, संलग्न at the centromere region.
in the beginning of meiosis the मातृ and paternal homologs pair to each अन्य.
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous recombination leading to crossovers of DNA between the मातृ and पैतृक versions of the chromosome.
Spindle मछली bind to the centromeres of each pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
तब the मछली खींचो the recombined homologs to opposite poles of the cell.
As the chromosomes move away इससे the center the कोशिका divides into two daughter कोशिकाएं, प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित number of गुणसूत्रों रचित of two chromatids.
After the recombined maternal और paternal homologs have separated into the दो बेटी cells, a दूसरी गोलाकार of कोशिका division occurs.
वहीँ meiosis ends as the दो सिस्टर chromatids making up प्रत्येक homolog are अलग और move into one of the चार resulting gamete कोशिकाएं.
Upon fertilization, for उदाहरण when a शुक्राणु enters an egg कोशिका, two gamete cells उत्पादित by meiosis fuse.
the gamete from the mother and the gamete from the पिता each contribute one half of the नियत of chromosomes that make up the new offspring 's genome.
meiosis uses many of the वही mechanisms as mitosis, a type of cell division used by eukaryotes जैसे plants and पशु to split one cell into two identical daughter कोशिकाएं.
In all पौधे and in many protists meiosis results in the formation of spores : haploid कोशिकाएं कि can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization.
मुक्केबाज़ी ( pugilism, prize लड़, the sweet science or in यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial art and combat खेल in which दो लोगों engage in a contest of strength, speed, reflexes, endurance and will by फेंकना punches with gloved hands.
Amateur मुक्केबाज़ी is an Olympic और राष्ट्रमंडल खेल and is a आम fixture in most of the प्रमुख international खेल - it also has its own World championships.
Boxing is पर्यवेक्षित by a रेफरी over a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds.
the result is decided when an प्रतिद्वन्दी is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी, is disqualified for breaking a rule, resigns by फेंकना in a towel, or is pronounced the विजेता or loser based on the न्यायाधीशों ' scorecards at the समाप्त of the contest.
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be its acceptance by the प्राचीन Greeks as an Olympic game as early as 688 bc.
Boxing विकसित from 16th- और 18th-century prizefights, largely in Great Britain, to the forerunner of modern मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th century, again initially in Great Britain and later in the United राज्य.
in 2004, ईएसपीएन क्रमित मुक्केबाज़ी as the most difficult sport in the world.
अनुबंध or concord happens when a word changes रूप depending on the other words to which it relates.
It is an instance of inflection, and usually involves making the value of कुछ grammatical category ( such as लिंग or person ) `` सहमत '' between different words or parts of the sentence.
For example, in मानक अंग्रेज़ी, एक may say i am or he is, but नहीं `` I is '' or `` he am ''.
इस is because the व्याकरण of the language requires कि the verb and its subject सहमत in person.
The pronouns I and he हैं पहला and third व्यक्ति क्रमशः, as are the क्रिया forms am और is.
The verb form must be selected so that it has the same person as the subject.
The agreement based on overt grammatical categories as above is औपचारिक agreement, in contrast to notional अनुबंध, which is based on अर्थ.
लिये instance, the phrase The संयुक्त States is treated as singular for purposes of agreement, even though it is formally plural.
इस is a list of places below mean sea level that हैं on land.
Places in tunnels, खानों, basements, dug holes ( भी with open sky ), under water, under ice, or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide इत्यादि. are नहीं शामिल.
सब figures are in meters नीचे समुद्र level:
डिब्बी Macomber ( born अक्तूबर 22, 1948 in Yakima, वॉशिंगटन ) is a best-selling American author of over 150 romance novels and contemporary women 's fiction.
over 140 million copies of her books are in छपाई throughout the world, और चार have become made-for-TV-movies.
Macomber थी the inaugural winner of the fan-voted quill पुरस्कार for romance in 2005 and रै been awarded both a रोमांस लेखक of America RITA and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of अमेरिका.
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Baltimore County, Maryland, संयुक्त राज्य.
The population was 41,567 at the 2010 census.
The community lies to the वेस्ट of Baltimore along the city 's border.
Catonsville is the home of the University of Maryland, बाल्टीमोर काउंटी ( umbc ), a public research university with over 12,000 विद्यार्थी.
A lawyer, according to Black 's Law शब्दकोष, is `` a व्यक्ति learned in the law ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a व्यक्ति who is practicing विधि. ''
विधि is the system of rules of conduct स्थापित by the sovereign government of a समाज to correct wrongs, maintain the stability of राजनैतिक और social authority, and deliver justice.
Working as a lawyer involves the practical application of abstract विधिक theories and knowledge to solve विशिष्ट individualized problems, or to advance the interests of those जो retain ( i.e., hire ) lawyers to perform legal services.
the role of the lawyer varies significantly across legal jurisdictions, and so it can be treated here in तभी the most सामान्य शर्तें.
Vector विपणन is the domestic sales भुजा of Cutco Corporation, an olean, New York आधारित cutlery manufacturer.
The परिवार and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a United States federal विधि requiring covered employers to provide employees job-protected and unpaid leave for qualified medical and family reasons.
Qualified medical और परिवार reasons include : निजी or family illness, family military छोड़, pregnancy, adoption, or the foster परवाह अवस्थिति of a child.
the FMLA is administered by the मजदूरी and Hour प्रभाग of the United States Department of Labor.
The विधेयक थी a प्रमुख part of अध्यक्ष Bill Clinton 's agenda in his first term.
अध्यक्ष क्लिंटन signed the विधेयक into विधि on February 5, 1993 ( ; 29 u.s.c. sec. 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) और it took प्रभाव on अगस्त 5, 1993, six महीने later.
The FMLA थी intended `` to संतुलन the demands of the workplace with the needs of families. ''
the Act allows योग्य employees to लो up to 12 work weeks of unpaid leave during any 12-month काल to attend to the serious health कंडीशन of the कर्मचारी, parent, spouse or child, or for pregnancy or care of a नवजात चाइल्ड, or for adoption or foster परवाह of a child.
In order to be eligible for FMLA leave, an कर्मचारी must have महरूम at the कारोबार at तनिक 12 months, and worked at least 1,250 hours over the पास्ट 12 महीने, and work at a location where the company employs 50 or अधिक employees within 75 miles.
The fmla covers both public- and private-sector कर्मचारी, but certain श्रेणी of कर्मचारी are excluded, including निर्वाचित officials and their personal स्टाफ members.
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era सैन्य conflict that occurred in Vietnam, Laos, and कंबोडिया from 1 November 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975.
This war followed the First इंडोचायना War और was fought between North Vietnam, supported by इसके कम्युनिस्ट allies, and the सरकारी of South Vietnam, supported by the United States और अन्य anti-communist देशों.
The Viet cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front, or NLF ), a हलके हथियारबंद South Vietnamese communist common सामने निर्देशित by the North, largely fought a guerrilla युद्ध against anti-communist forces in the region.
The Vietnam लोगों 's Army ( North वियतनामी फौज ) engaged in a more conventional war, at times committing large units into battle.
u.S. and दक्षिण Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct search और destroy परिचालन, involving मैदान forces, artillery, and airstrikes.
The U.S. सरकारी viewed involvement in the युद्ध as a way to prevent a communist takeover of South Vietnam as part of their wider रणनीति of containment.
The उत्तर वियतनामी government and Viet cong were लड़ to reunify Vietnam under communist rule.
They viewed the विरोध as a colonial युद्ध, लड़ा initially against France, समर्थित by the U.S., and बाद against दक्षिण वियतनाम, जिससे it regarded as a U.S. puppet राज्य.
अमरीकी सैन्य advisors arrived in कया was तब French इंडोचायना beginning in 1950.
u.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s, with troop levels tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units were तैनात beginning in 1965.
Operations spanned international borders, साथ Laos and Cambodia heavily bombed.
American भागीदारी in the war peaked in 1968, at the time of the Tet अप्रिय.
After this, U.S. मैदान forces यहूद धीरे withdrawn as part of a policy ज्ञात as Vietnamization.
Despite the Paris Peace accords, हस्ताक्षरित by all parties in January 1973, fighting जारी.
U.S. सैन्य involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church Amendment passed by the u.S. Congress.
The capture of Saigon by the Vietnam People 's Army in April 1975 चिह्नित the end of the war, and North और South Vietnam were reunified the following year.
the war exacted a huge human लागत in terms of fatalities ( देखिए वियतनाम War हताहत ).
estimates of the number of वियतनामी soldiers and नागरिकों killed vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians, 20,000–200,000 laotians, and 58,220 U.S. service members also died in the विरोध.
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of Alaska photographed from the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Space स्टेशन, May 2006.
Ash plumes reached a height of 19 km during the climactic eruption at माउंट Pinatubo, फिलीपीन in 1991.
a volcano is an opening, or rupture, in a ग्रह 's surface or क्रस्ट, जिससे allows hot magma, volcanic ash and gases to escape from the magma chamber below the surface.
Volcanoes are generally found where tectonic प्लेटों हैं diverging or converging.
A mid-oceanic ridge, for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge, रै उदाहरण of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic plates pulling apart ; the Pacific Ring of आग has उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by convergent tectonic प्लेटों coming together.
by contrast, volcanoes are usually not created where दो tectonic plates slide past एक another.
ज्वालामुखी can also रूप where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's क्रस्ट in the इंटीरियर्स of plates, e.g., in the ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी Rift, the Wells gray-clearwater volcanic field और the Rio ग्रांडे Rift in North America.
This type of volcanism falls under the umbrella of `` Plate hypothesis '' volcanism.
volcanism दूर from plate boundaries has also महरूम explained as mantle plumes.
ये so-called `` hotspots ``, for उदाहरण Hawaii, हैं postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs with magma from the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km deep in the Earth.
Erupting volcanoes can पोज़ many hazards, नहीं तभी in the तात्कालिक vicinity of the eruption.
Volcanic राख can be a threat to aircraft, in particular those with jet engines जहाँ ash अणु can be melted by the high operating temperature.
Large eruptions can affect तापमान as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the sun and कूल the धरती 's lower atmosphere or troposphere ; however, they also absorb heat radiated up इससे the Earth, thereby warming the stratosphere.
historically, so-called volcanic सर्दियों have caused catastrophic अकाल.

a pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and known in parts of the Western संयुक्त States as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the सतह of a roadway where a portion of the road material has broken away, leaving a hole.
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC, also ज्ञात as hypernephroma ) is a गुर्दा cancer कि originates in the अस्तर of the proximal convoluted tubule, the very small tubes in the गुर्दा that transport GF ( glomerular filtrate ) इससे the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
RCC is the most आम type of kidney cancer in वयस्कों, responsible for लगभग 80 % of मामले.
it is also known to be the most lethal of सब the genitourinary tumors.
Initial treatment is सबसे commonly a radical or आंशिक nephrectomy और remains the mainstay of curative treatment.
जहाँ the ट्यूमर is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year अस्तित्व rate is 60-70 %, लकिन this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread.
It is relatively resistant to radiation चिकित्सा and कीमोथेरेपी, हालांकि some cases respond to immunotherapy.
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, and sorafenib have improved the outlook लिये rcc.

The company has इसके मुख्यालय in Midtown Manhattan, New York City.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous membrane कि forms the अस्तर of the abdominal cavity or the coelom —it कवर most of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids, for instance ).
It is रचित of a layer of mesothelium supported by a thin परत of connective tissue.
The peritoneum both supports the abdominal organs और serves as a conduit for their रक्त and lymph vessels and nerves.
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal मांसपेशियां, diaphragm and श्रोणि मंजिल ) should not be उलझन साथ the intraperitoneal स्पेस ( स्तिथ within the abdominal cavity, लकिन लपेटा in peritoneum ).
The structures within the intraperitoneal space हैं called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal cavity कि हैं located behind the intraperitoneal space हैं पुकारा `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the kidneys ), और those structures below the intraperitoneal space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the bladder ).

DDR SDRAM आधारित SSD.

PCI-E, DRAM, and नन्द based SSD.
It uses an external शक्ति supply to make the dram non-volatile.
a solid-state drive ( ssd ) ( also known as a solid-state disk or इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्क, though it contains no actual `` डिस्क '' of कोई kind ) is a data storage device using integrated circuit assemblies as memory to स्टोर आंकड़ा persistently.
SSD technology uses इलेक्ट्रॉनिक interfaces compatible with traditional block input/output ( I/O ) hard डिस्क ड्राइव.
SSDs have no चलती mechanical components, which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical चुम्बकीय डिस्क such as मुश्किल disk drives ( HDDs ) or floppy disks, which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads.
Compared साथ electromechanical डिस्क, SSDs are typically less susceptible to physical shock, much quieter, have निम्नतर access time, and less latency.
however, while the price of SSDs has continued to मनाही in 2012, SSDs हैं still about 7 to 8 times अधिक expensive per ईकाई of भंडार than HDDs.
Many SSDs उपयोग I/O अंतरफलक developed लिये hard disk drives, thus permitting simple replacement in common अनुप्रयोग.
, सबसे SSDs उपयोग NAND-based flash मेमोरी, which retains data without शक्ति.
For अनुप्रयोग requiring fast access, लकिन नहीं necessarily data persistence बाद power loss, SSDs may be constructed from random-access memory ( राम ).
ऐसे devices may employ पृथक power sources, ऐसे as batteries, to maintain आंकड़ा after शक्ति घाटा.
Hybrid drives or ठोस राज्य hybrid drives ( SSHD ) combine the features of ssds and hdds in the वही ईकाई, containing a large hard disk drive and an ssd cache to improve performance of frequently पहुँचा आंकड़ा.
These devices may offer near-SSD performance लिये many applications.
Salmon roe ( left ) और sturgeon caviar ( सही ) served साथ mother of pearl caviar spoons to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar.
