Caviar, according to the खाना and Agriculture Organization, is a product बना from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family.
The roe can be `` भैस '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, with pasteurization reducing its culinary और economic मान.
Traditionally the term caviar refers तभी to roe इससे wild sturgeon in the कैस्पियन और Black Seas ( बेलुगा, ossetra and Sevruga caviars ).
depending on the country, caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such as salmon, steelhead, ट्राउट, lumpfish, whitefish, and other प्रजाति of sturgeon.
Caviar is considered a luxury delicacy और is eaten as a गार्निश or a spread.
In 2012, caviar बेची for $ 2,500 per पाउंड, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo.
the SEC संजाल is a टेलीविज़न syndication संजाल featuring सजीव broadcasts of कॉलेज football and बास्केट events from the southeastern सम्मेलन.
It is owned and operated by ईएसपीएन Plus and is दिखाया in अधिक than 50 percent of households in the संयुक्त States, mostly Southeastern United States markets.
The SEC संजाल typically airs in the noon eastern slot that was former home to the Raycom खेल SEC game of the week.
Games हैं shown locally on broadcast स्टेशन, regional sports संजाल, as well as on ESPN gameplan, ESPN Full Court, and ESPN3.com.
The SEC संजाल is also available in Canada via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV.
the SEC Network uses the वही on-screen graphics फिलहाल used by ESPN on ABC, a version of ईएसपीएन 's ग्राफिक्स पैकेज.
SEC Network 's football programming still उपयोग a title safe area because most of its affiliates do not Letterbox their Standard परिभाषा फ़ीड्स, while ईएसपीएन 's television संजाल have allowed their graphics to abandon the शीर्षक safe, but letterbox for SD दर्शक.
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball ऋतु, SEC Network 's graphics have been converted to a 16:9 widescreen-only format.
This is also being used for the 2013 बास्केट ऋतु, but had still adapted the former 4:3-safe graphics format लिये the 2012 SEC football ऋतु.
The 1990s, pronounced and भी known as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the Nineties '' or `` the '90s '', थी a decade that began on जनवरी 1, 1990, and ended on December 31, 1999.
It was the 10th and last दशक of the 20th century और the 100th और पिछला decade of the 2nd millennium.
The decade is best known for the end of the ठंडा War at the beginning of the decade and the expansion और व्यावसायीकरण of the अंतरजाल during the second half of the decade.
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a काल of unprecedented peace और समृद्धि, though अनेक parts of the so-called Third संसार faced various problems सहित नरसंहार, AIDS और new or continuing ethnic tensions और सिविल युद्धों.
Culturally speaking the decade थी characterized by the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media.
आंदोलनों such as grunge, the rave scene and हिप hop स्प्रेड around the world to young people दौरान the दशक, aided by then-new technology such as cable television and the Internet.
A संयोजन of factors, सहित the mass mobilization of पूंजी बाज़ार through neoliberalism, the beginning of the फैली अप्रसार of नई media such as the Internet, और the dissolution of the सोवियत Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of आर्थिक and राजनैतिक power across the world, and भीतर देशों.
Income inequality among countries in the संसार rose sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s, before levelling बंद and then falling after 2000.
New जातीय conflicts emerged in Africa, the Balkans and the काकेशस, the former two जिससे led to the Rwandan genocide और Bosnian genocide, क्रमशः.
the United States began its current military occupation of the Middle East दौरान the summer of 1990 with Desert शील्ड after it cut off a large portion of the संसार 's petroleum सप्लाई.
Signs of कोई resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab संसार remained elusive, though the Irish परेशानियों came to a standstill in 1998 साथ the Good शुक्रवार अनुबंध बाद 30 years of violence.
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species of canid native to the wilderness and remote areas of उत्तर America, यूरेशिया, और North Africa.
it is the largest member of इसके family, with males averaging, और females.
it is similar in general appearance और proportions to a German shepherd, or sled dog, but रै a larger head, narrower छाती, longer legs, straighter tail और bigger पंजे.
Its शीत fur is long और bushy, and predominantly a mottled धूसर in colour, although nearly pure white, red, or भूरा to black also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the gray भेड़िया represents a अधिक specialised और progressive रूप than its छोटी cousins ( the coyote and golden jackal ), as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल prey, its more मिलनसार nature and its highly उन्नत expressive behavior.
It is a social animal, यात्राएं in nuclear परिवारों consisting of a पन्द्रहवें pair, accompanied by the जोड़ी 's adult offspring.
the gray भेड़िया is typically an apex predator throughout इसके दायरा, साथ तभी humans and टाइगर्स posing a serious threat to it.
It फ़ीड्स primarily on large ungulates, though it also eats smaller animals, livestock, carrion, and garbage.
the gray भेड़िया is one of the संसार 's most खूब researched animals, with संभवतः more किताबे written परिचय it than any other wildlife प्रजाति.
It रै a long इतिहास of association with humans, having been despised and hunted in most agricultural समुदायों due to इसके attacks on livestock, while conversely being आदरणीय by some Native अमरीकी tribes.
It is the sole पूर्वज of the श्वान, जिससे was first domesticated in the Middle ईस्ट.
Although the fear of wolves is prevalent in many इंसान societies, the बहुमत of recorded हमले on people have been attributed to animals कष्ट from rabies.
non-rabid wolves have attacked और मारे लोगों, मुख्यतः children, but this is असामान्य, as wolves are relatively few, सजीव दूर from people, and have been taught to भय humans by hunters and shepherds.
शिकार and trapping रै reduced the species ' दायरा to, हालांकि इसके still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the प्रजाति is नहीं threatened at a global स्तर, and is इसलिए वर्गीकृत by the आईयूसीएन as तनिक Concern.
the Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient रोमन civilization, characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of government और large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman गणतंत्र, which preceded it, had महरूम destabilized through a श्रेणी of civil युद्धों.
Several events चिह्नित the transition from Republic to साम्राज्य, including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific augustus to octavian by the Roman सीनेट ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the pax romana ( `` रोमन सलाम '' ).
It reached its greatest expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of Trajan ( 98–117 ad ).
In the 3rd century, the साम्राज्य underwent a crisis that threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th century, during जिससे time a प्रणाली of डुअल rule थी विकसित in the Latin West and Greek East.
बाद the collapse of central सरकारी in the West in the 5th सदी, the पूर्वी half continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine साम्राज्य.
क्युकी of the Empire 's vast extent and long सहनशीलता, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound और lasting influence on the development of language, religion, architecture, philosophy, law, and forms of government in the territory it governed, विशेषकर Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Education in the संयुक्त States is mainly provided by the public सेक्टर, with कंट्रोल and funding coming from three levels : local, राज्य, and संघीय, in that order.
Child education is compulsory, and there are also a large क्रमांक and wide variety of higher education institutions throughout the देश कि one can choose to attend, both publicly और privately administered.
पब्लिक education is universally available.
स्कूल curricula, funding, teaching, नियुक्ति, and other policies are set through locally elected school boards साथ jurisdiction over school districts with अनेक directives इससे state विधानमंडलों.
School districts हैं usually separate from other local jurisdictions, with independent officials और budgets.
Educational standards and मानकीकृत testing decisions are usually made by state सरकारें.
The ages for compulsory education vary by राज्य.
It begins from आयु पाँच to eight and ends इससे ages चौदह to अठारह.
अनिवार्य education requirements can generally be satisfied by educating children in public schools, state-certified private schools, or an स्वीकृत home स्कूल program.
in सबसे public और private schools, education is divided into तीन स्तर : elementary स्कूल, middle school ( sometimes पुकारा junior high school ), and ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ).
In almost सब schools at these स्तर, children हैं divided by age समूह into ग्रेड, ranging from किंडरगार्टन ( followed by first grade ) लिये the youngest children in elementary school, up to twelfth grade, the फाइनल साल of high school.
The exact age range of students in these ग्रेड levels varies slightly from क्षेत्रफल to क्षेत्रफल.
Post-secondary education, better known as `` college `` in the United राज्य, is generally governed separately from the elementary and high स्कूल system, and is वर्णित in a separate खण्ड below.
Government supported, free public स्कूलों for all started being स्थापित बाद the revolution, and expanded in the 19th century, as the results of प्रयत्न of men जैसे Horace मन and Booker T. Washington.
by 1870, all states had free elementary schools, albeit only in शहरी centers.
as the 20th century खींचा nearer, states प्रारंभ passing laws to मेक schooling अनिवार्य, and by 1910, 72 percent of children attended school.
निजी schools जारी to spread during this time, as well as colleges and—in the ग्रामीण centers— जमीन grant colleges.
The year of 1910 also saw the first true high schools.
दौरान the बाकी of the 20th century, educational efforts centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling प्रणाली.
The landmark परम् Court case Brown v. Board of Education made the desegregation of elementary and high schools a national priority, while the pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college.
Special शिक्षा was made into federal विधि in 1975.
the Elementary और द्वितीयक शिक्षा Act of 1965 made standardized testing a requirement, and in 1983, a आयोग was स्थापित to evaluate their results and propose a कोर्स of action.
The resulting No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 was controversial and its goals proved to be unrealistic.
a commission established in 2006 evaluated higher शिक्षा, लकिन its recommendations have yet to be fully implemented.
पॉल ब्रैग ( February 6, 1895 – December 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement.
Health spending per capita, in $ US PPP-adjusted, with the us and Canada compared amongst other first संसार nations.
तुलना of the health care systems in Canada और the संयुक्त States are often made by सरकारी, public स्वास्थ्य and पब्लिक नीति विश्लेषकों.
The दो देशों had समान health care systems पहले Canada reformed its प्रणाली in the 1960s and 1970s.
The संयुक्त राज्य खर्च much more money on health care than कनाडा, on both a per-capita basis और as a percentage of जीडीपी.
In 2006, per-capita spending लिये health care in Canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., us $ 6,714.
the U.S. spent 15.3 % of GDP on health care in that year ; कनाडा spent 10.0 %.
In 2006, 70 % of health care spending in Canada was financed by सरकारी, versus 46 % in the United States.
कुल government बिता per capita in the U.S. on health परवाह was 23 % higher than Canadian सरकारी spending, and u.S. government expenditure on health care was बस अंतर्गत 83 % of कुल कनाडाई spending ( public and private ) though ये statistics do n't take into account population मतभेद.
Studies have come to अलग conclusions about the result of this disparity in बिता.
A 2007 पुनर्विलोकन of all studies comparing स्वास्थ्य outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal मिला that `` स्वास्थ्य outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in Canada versus the United राज्य, but differences are not सतत. ''
जीवन expectancy is longer in Canada, and its शिशु mortality rate is निम्नतर than कि of the U.S., लकिन there is बहस about the underlying causes of ये differences.
One commonly cited तुलना, the 2000 World स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's ratings of `` overall health service performance '', जिससे प्रयुक्त a `` कम्पोजिट माप of achievement in the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य, the distribution of health, the स्तर of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '', ranked Canada 30th और the US 37th among 191 सदस्य nations.
This study rated the US `` responsiveness '', or quality of सेवा for individuals receiving उपचार, as 1st, compared with 7th for कनाडा.
While the average life प्रत्याशा लिये Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US, simply comparing the life expectancy of two groups with अलग racial makeup and अलग मोटापा rates is likely नहीं an effective way of determining which healthcare system is श्रेष्ठ.
The जो 's study methods यहूद criticized by some analyses.
Although वहीँ is a measure of सर्वसम्मति that life-expectancy and infant mortality चिह्नित the सबसे reliable तरीके to compare nation-wide health care, assuming the population makeup is similar, a recent report by the Congressional Research सेवा carefully summarizes some हाल data और notes the `` difficult research मुद्दे '' facing international comparisons.
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed barrier, and is traveling at 1.4 times the गति of ध्वनि, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is moving faster ( with a speed ) than the ध्वनि waves it creates, it दरअसल leads the advancing तरंगाग्र.
The ध्वनि source होगा pass by a stationary निरीक्षक ( with a speed ) पहले the observer actually hears the sound it creates.
As a result, an observer in सामने of the source will detect
और an observer behind the सोर्स.
A सोनिक बूम produced by an aircraft moving at M=2.92, calculated from the cone angle of 20 degrees.
An observer hears the बूम when the shock wave, on the edges of the cone, crosses his or her location.

a सोनिक boom is the sound associated साथ the शॉक waves created by an object traveling through the एयर faster than the speed of ध्वनि.
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of sound energy, sounding much like an विस्फोट.
The crack of a सुपरसोनिक bullet गुजर ओवरहेड is an उदाहरण of a sonic बूम in miniature.
the Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk दिखाएँ hosted by Jay Leno that initially aired from May 25, 1992 to May 29, 2009, और resumed उत्पादन on March 1, 2010.
The fourth अवतार of the Tonight Show मताधिकार made its डेब्यू on May 25, 1992, three days following जॉनी Carson 's रिटायरमेंट as मेजबान of the program.
The program originates from NBC Studios in burbank, California, and is broadcast Monday through शुक्रवार at 11:35 PM in the Eastern and प्रशांत time zones ( 10:35 PM सेंट्रल / Mountain time ).
नापसंद कार्सन or his predecessor Jack Paar, Leno only एकबार utilized a guest मेजबान, preferring to मेजबान the series by himself.
On April 26, 1999, the show began broadcasting in 1080i hdtv, बनने the first American nightly बात दिखाएँ to be shot in high परिभाषा.
the show is shot in 16:9 पहलू ratio.
The series, which followed the same basic स्वरूप as that of his पूर्ववर्तियों ( an opening monologue followed by comedy दिनचर्या, साक्षात्कार and performances ), ran जबतक may 29, 2009, after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
एनबीसी signed Leno to a नई deal for a nightly talk दिखाएँ in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
the primetime series, titled the Jay Leno Show, debuted on September 14, 2009, following a similar format to the Leno incarnation of tonight.
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program, which premiered June 1, 2009, nor The Jay Leno दिखाएँ generated the ratings कि NBC had expected.
the network decided to move a condensed 30-minute संस्करण of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's समय slot, and O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour बाद.
इस decision met with opposition from O'Brien, whose stint on The Tonight दिखाएँ ended January 22, 2010, after जिससे he began his अपना talk show on TBS.
the Tonight दिखाएँ साथ Jay Leno then began its दूसरी और वर्तमान अवतार, the sixth of the franchise, on March 1, 2010.
rfid chip next to a grain of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic फ़ील्ड coil that modulates an बाह्य magnetic फ़ील्ड to transfer a coded पहचान क्रमांक when queried by a reader device.
इस छोटी type is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in pets, for पहचान purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer आंकड़ा, लिये the purposes of automatically identifying and ट्रैकिंग tags attached to वस्तुएँ.
the tags contain electronically stored information.
Some tags हैं संचालित और पढ़ा at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few meters ) via चुम्बकीय fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others उपयोग a लोकल power source such as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf radio waves ( i.e., इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation at high बारंबारता ).
Battery powered टैग may operate at hundreds of मीटर.
Unlike a bar कोड, the टैग करता not necessarily need to be भीतर line of sight of the reader, and may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked object.
rfid tags are प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग.
an rfid टैग attached to an ऑटोमोबाइल during production can be used to track its progress through the assembly line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
पशुधन and pets may have tags injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of reading personally-linked सूचना without सहमति has raised privacy concerns.
Id, अहंकार and super-ego are the three parts of the मानसिक apparatus defined in Sigmund फ्रायड 's structural मॉडल of the psyche ; they are the three theoretical constructs in terms of whose कार्यकलाप and बातचीत mental life is वर्णित.
According to this मॉडल of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the critical and moralizing भूमिका ; and the अहंकार is the organized, realistic भाग that mediates between the इच्छाओं of the id और the super-ego.
The super-ego can stop you from doing निश्चित things कि अपना id may want you to do.
Even हालांकि the मॉडल is संरचनात्मक और makes सन्दर्भ to an apparatus, the id, अहंकार and super-ego हैं functions of the दिमाग बल्कि than भाग of the brain और do नहीं correspond one-to-one साथ वास्तविक somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' और `` topographical मॉडल '' ) थी first discussed in his 1920 essay `` Beyond the Pleasure principle `` and थी formalized and elaborated upon तीन years later in his `` The Ego और the Id ``.
Freud 's प्रस्ताव was influenced by the ambiguity of the term `` unconscious `` और इसके many conflicting उपयोग.
Air Force ROTC emblem
The एयर Force Reserve अधिकारी Training Corps ( afrotc ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United States Air Force, the other two होने the संयुक्त States Air फ़ोर्स Academy ( usafa ) and Air Force Officer Training स्कूल ( OTS ).
a अधीनस्थ command of the Air University भीतर the एयर Education and प्रशिक्षण Command ( AETC ), AFROTC is aligned under the Jeanne M. Holm बीच for अधिकारी Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
The holm Center, formerly ज्ञात as the Air Force Officer accession और Training Schools ( AFOATS ), retains direct जिम्मेदारी लिये both AFROTC और ots.
AFROTC is the largest और oldest source of commissioned officers लिये the u.S. Air Force.
AFROTC 's stated मिशन is to उपज विशेषता leaders for the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC units हैं located on 144 कॉलेज and विश्वविद्यालयों campuses साथ 984 अतिरिक्त संस्थानों of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow उनके students to attend afrotc classes at a आसपास `` मेजबान '' कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों.
According to afoats hq, in 2006, afrotc commissioned 2,083 USAF दूसरी lieutenants, साथ AFROTC enrollment ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, और around 13,000 नामांकित today.
AFROTC units at colleges और universities are पुकारा `` detachments, '' और are typically headed by an active duty USAF अधिकारी in the रैंक of colonel or lieutenant colonel who functions as both the Detachment कमांडर लिये USAF purposes and with the nominal title of प्राध्यापक of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's अकादमिक community.
सबसे कॉलेजों and universities will designate the afrotc detachment as the Department of Aerospace Studies.
the pas is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of Aerospace अध्ययन ( APAS ), all क्रियाशील ड्यूटी USAF officers in the बाँधने of प्रमुख or captain.
तीन USAF non-commissioned अधिकारियों and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide military administrative support and हैं प्रायः augmented by one to two civilian स्टाफ support कर्मचारी of the अकादमिक institution.
Within afrotc detachments, the विद्यार्थी ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are व्यवस्थित into wings, समूह, squadrons, and flights, mirroring the USAF functional wing structure.
the AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into दो विभाजन : the सामान्य Military कोर्स ( GMC ) consisting of the first two years of प्रशिक्षण, and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last दो years of प्रशिक्षण.
the AFROTC program is also divided into two प्रशिक्षण functions : the अकादमिक Classroom Program ( aerospace Studies classes ) and cadet Activities ( i.e., नेतृत्व Laboratory, Physical Training, and other प्रशिक्षण ).
Paper घनत्व ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a पद used in the गूदा और पेपर industry and also लिये fabric industry to denote a measure of mass of the उत्पाद per unit of area लिये a type of fabric, paper or paperboard.
the term `` घनत्व '' is not used in its traditional sense of mass per unit volume.
`` Paper density '', बल्कि, is a measure of the क्षेत्रफल density.
Paper products कि let little or no लाइट pass through ( e.g. poster board ) are considered घना or heavy.
Paper products कि allow some लाइट to pass through ( e.g. tissue paper ) are considered lightweight.
In the pulp and पेपर industry, it is common to set a commercial paper machine to उपज paper to a target पेपर घनत्व.
Paper घनत्व can also be used to फर्क पेपर इससे paperboard as the latter प्रायः has a grammage वृहद than 134 g/m2.
Two तरीके of expressing पेपर density are commonly उपयोगd:
expressed in गामा per square meter ( g/m2 ), paper घनत्व is also ज्ञात as grammage.
This is the माप used in most parts of the world.
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as वज़न ) per number of sheets, it is known as basis weight.
The convention used in the United States and a few other countries using US paper sizes is पाउंड of a ream of 500 ( or in some मामले 1000 ) sheets of a given ( कच्चा, still uncut ) आधार size.
Japanese paper is expressed as the weight in kg of 1000 चादरें.
candace निकोल Parker ( born April 19, 1986 ) is an American basketball player for the wnba 's Los Angeles Sparks और ummc Ekaterinburg of रूस.
She is the younger sister of NBA player Anthony पार्कर.
वो attended the University of Tennessee and was drafted by the Sparks in 2008.
She may be best known for being the first woman to डंक in an NCAA टूर्नामेंट game और the first स्त्री to डंक twice in a college game—she set both माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on March 19, 2006.
She also became only the second player to dunk in a WNBA खेल on June 22, 2008.
a versatile player, she is mainly a forward, but थी listed on टेनेसी 's roster as a आगे, बीच, and guard.
She was a starter on the महिला Vols basketball टोली, winners of the 2007 and 2008 ncaa championships.
Parker won the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' चुनाव पुरस्कार as the favorite मादा athlete in the sports category.
And वो थी a अतिथि स्टार on Figure It Out.
a food guide pyramid is a pyramid तराशा guide of healthy foods divided into sections to show the recommended intake for each food समूह.
The first खाना pyramid was प्रकाशित in Sweden in 1974.
the सबसे widely ज्ञात food pyramid थी introduced by the United States विभाग of Agriculture in the year 1992, थी अद्यतनीकृत in 2005, and then replaced in 2011.
Over 25 अन्य countries and संगठनों have also published food pyramids.
hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. andersen ; अप्रैल 2, 1805august 4, 1875 ) थी a डैनिश लेखक and poet.
Although a सफल लेखक of plays, travelogues, novels, and poems, Andersen is best remembered for उसके fairy tales, a literary genre he so mastered that he himself रै become as mythical as the tales he wrote.
Andersen 's popularity is नहीं limited to children ; his stories—called, or `` fantastic किस्से '' —express विषयवस्तु कि transcend age and राष्ट्रीयता.
दौरान his आजीवन he थी acclaimed for having delighted children worldwide और थी feted by रॉयल्टी.
andersen 's fairy tales, जिससे have been translated into more than 125 languages, have become culturally embedded in the वेस्ट 's collective चेतना, readily accessible to children, but presenting lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity लिये mature पाठक as well.
They have inspired motion pictures, plays, ballets, and animated films.

Eye contact occurs when `` दो people dekh at each other 's eyes at the same time. ''
In human beings, eye contact is a form of nonverbal संचार और is thought to have a large influence on सोशल behavior.
Coined in the जल्दी to mid-1960s, the term has come in the West to प्रायः define the अधिनियम as a meaningful and महत्वपूर्ण sign of विश्वास and social communication.
The customs and significance of नजर contact vary widely between cultures, with religious and social मतभेद प्रायः altering its अर्थ greatly.
The पढ़ाई of eye contact is sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics.
Bed bugs are parasitic insects of the cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood.
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of which Cimex lectularius, the आम bed कीड़ा, is the best known as it prefers to feed on इंसान blood although other Cimex species are specialized to अन्य animals, e.g., चमगादड़ bugs, C. pipistrelli ( Europe ), C. pilosellus ( western US ), और C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ).
the name of the `` bed कीड़ा '' is derived इससे the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep क्षेत्रों.
Bed बग are mainly क्रियाशील at night, but are नहीं exclusively nocturnal.
वे usually फीड on their hosts बगैर being noticed.
A number of प्रतिकूल health प्रभाव may परिणाम from bed कीड़ा bites, सहित skin rashes, मनोवैज्ञानिक effects, and allergic symptoms.
निदान involves दोनो finding bed bugs and the occurrence of compatible symptoms.
bed bugs have महरूम known as human परजीवी for thousands of years.
At a पाइंट in the early 1940s, they were ज़्यादातर eradicated in the developed संसार, but have increased in prevalence since 1995.
Because infestation of इंसान habitats रै been on the increase, bed bug bites and related conditions have been on the rise as खूब.
the Book of Isaiah ( ) is the पहला of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, preceding ezekiel, यिर्मयाह and the Book of the बारह.
( The order of the subsequent किताबे differs somewhat in the Christian बूढ़ा वसीयत ).
the first 39 अध्याय prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose God, while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel and a new creation in God 's glorious भविष्य kingdom ; this section शामिल the Songs of the कष्ट Servant, four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel, interpreted by ईसाइयों as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to यशायाह बेटे of Amoz, लकिन now विद्वानों widely agree कि the किताब is the कार्य of three different authors - few scholars deny this दृश्य, and those that do, do so लिये theological कारण.
the first, termed proto-isaiah ( अध्याय 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second, deutero-isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century bce author writing near the end of the babylonian captivity ; and the third, the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ), was composed in जेरूसलम shortly after the return from निर्वासन, probably by multiple authors.
ऑरेगॉन State University ( OSU ) is a coeducational, पब्लिक research university located in corvallis, Oregon, संयुक्त राज्य.
The university offers undergraduate, graduate and डॉक्टरेट degrees and a multitude of शोध अवसर.
वहीँ are more than 200 academic degree programs offered through the university.
OSU 's कार्यक्रम in microbiology, nuclear engineering, ecology, forestry, public health, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, food science and pharmacy are पहचाना nationally as शीर्ष टियर programs.
the osu 's liberal arts कार्यक्रम have also grown significantly और the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
More than 200,000 people have attended osu since its founding.
The Carnegie न्यास classifies Oregon राज्य University as भाग of its शीर्ष tier of research institutions.
as of 2008, OSU is एक of only seventy-three land-grant universities.
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, making it एक of only two us संस्थानों to retain सब four designations and the only public विश्वविद्यालयों to do so ( कॉर्नेल is the only अन्य साथ समान designations ).
As one of the two फ्लैगशिप universities of the ऑरेगॉन University System, osu receives more funding for research, annually, than सब other public उच्चतर शिक्षा institutions in ऑरेगॉन संयुक्त.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females इससे the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra दौरान or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are considered to be different phenomena in some research publications.
The सटीक source and प्रकृति of the fluid continue to be a टॉपिक of debate among medical professionals, जिससे is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
the Kanab ambersnail, वैज्ञानिक नाम Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or species of छोटी, air-breathing land snail, a स्थलीय pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the परिवार Succineidae, the amber snails.
the common name of the amber snails is आधारित on the shell, which is translucent और जब empty usually resembles amber in color.
This प्रजाति is endemic to the संयुक्त राज्य, specifically the state of Arizona and Utah, where it was पहला एकत्रित in the early 20th century.
It रै been listed as endangered on the United States Fish and Wildlife Service सूची of endangered species चूंकि 8 August 1991.
This snail जीवनदान in वेटलैंड्स, स्रोतों, और seeps, और only two of its प्राकृतिक habitats हैं known to exist : Three झीलों, a meadow near Kanab, Utah, and Vasey 's Paradise, a spring along the Colorado River within Grand Canyon National Park.
In its प्राकृतिक habitat it is बल्कि polyphagous, feeding mainly on bacteria, plants और fungi, and reproduces during the summer.
Now माना a critically Endangered species on the आईयूसीएन Red सूची of Threatened Species due to a series of कारकों ( including influence ), the kanab ambersnail रै been reintroduced to three springs above the historic high water level along the Colorado नदी.
The स्पेनी language is the second सबसे used भाषा in the संयुक्त States.
There हैं more Spanish speakers in the United States than there are speakers of Chinese, French, German, Italian, Hawaiian, and the Native अमरीकी languages combined.
According to the 2010 अमरीकी जातियाँ सर्वेक्षण conducted by the u.S. Census Bureau, Spanish is the प्राथमिक भाषा spoken at घर by लगभग 37 लाख people aged five or older, a figure more than double that of 1990.
There हैं 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or दूसरी language, as well as six million Spanish language students, composing the largest national Spanish-speaking जातियाँ outside of Mexico और बनाना स्पेनी the Romance language और the Indo-European भाषा साथ largest number of देशी speakers in the संसार.
Roughly half of all U.S. Spanish speakers भी speak English `` very well, '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents.
The language आए to the देश since the 16th and 17th centuries साथ the आगमन of स्पेनी colonists in areas कि होता बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, Texas, Colorado, नई Mexico, Arizona, Nevada, Utah, और California and of the स्पेनी explorers - who छान क्षेत्रों of 42 states-.
Also west of Louisiana territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French रिकवरी of territory ), बाद the French और Indian युद्ध.
बाद of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first हाफ of 19th सदी, the Spanish language थी बाद reinforced by the अधिग्रहण of Puerto रीको in 1898 और by later waves of the हिस्पैनिक करणों, basically from Hispanic America, to the United राज्य beginning in the दूसरी half of 19th century until आज.

The टोकियो Mew mew manga and anime श्रेणी features a cast of characters designed by Mia Ikumi.
The series takes place in टोकियो, Japan, where five adolescent girls, called Mew Mews, हैं infused with the DNA of endangered प्रजाति to कॉम्बैट एलियंस attempting to take over the धरती.
The manga श्रेणी is followed by a छोटी sequel श्रेणी, Tokyo Mew mew a la विधि, which introduces a new mew Mew और a new threat.
The mew Mews हैं led by the प्रमुख character, ichigo momomiya, whose पहला task is to gather the other four mew Mews : Mint Aizawa, सलाद Midorikawa, Pudding Fong, and Zakuro Fujiwara.
As the श्रेणी progresses, Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya Aoyama to बनने उसके girlfriend while trying to hide उसके secret double life from him.
the series antagonists include three aliens, Kish, Pie, और Tart, और उनके नेता, Deep ब्लू.
Originally from Earth, the aliens were forced to छोड़ long ago due to deadly environmental changes.
वे have returned to kill the humans, जो वे feel हैं destroying उनके planet, and reclaim the planet.
In a la विधि, मध्य school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew mew और, in the absence of ichigo, the temporary नेता of the mew Mews.
A la Mode also introduces new set of antagonists, the Saint Rose Crusaders, a समूह of human teenagers with various psychic abilities साथ a desire to create their अपना utopia.
Led by ड्यूक, they make several कोशिशें to kill Berry, आखिरकार turning the local populace against the Mew Mews.
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew mew was a story पुकारा Tokyo ब्लैक Cat लड़की कि featured a cat-girl battling alien invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat story of five female superheroes, the अक्षर designs were redone to have a lighter, अधिक colorful महसूस.
the प्रमुख series characters were praised for being a perfect fit for the overall story, as well as लिये their cute appearances.
The characters introduced in a la विधि यहूद also praised लिये उनके visual दिखावे, but criticized as being repeats of the original series.
The character Duke थी also criticized for having a design reminiscent of the श्वेत supremacy group, the Ku Klux Klan.

Sedimentary rocks are types of rock that are formed by the deposition of material at the धरती 's सतह और within bodies of जल.
Sedimentation is the सामूहिक name for processes that cause खनिज and/or organic अणु ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or खनिज to precipitate from a solution.
Particles that form a sedimentary rock by accumulating हैं पुकारा sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a सोर्स area, and then transported to the place of deposition by जल, हवा, ice, द्रव्यमान गति or glaciers जिससे are called एजेंटों of denudation.
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the Earth 's क्रस्ट is extensive, but the कुल contribution of sedimentary रॉक्स is estimated to be only 8 % of the कुल volume of the crust.
Sedimentary rocks हैं only a पतला veneer over a crust consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks.
sedimentary rocks हैं deposited in परतों as strata, forming a structure पुकारा bedding.
the study of sedimentary rocks and चट्टान strata provides information about the subsurface that is उपयोगी for civil engineering, for उदाहरण in the निर्माण of roads, घरों, tunnels, canals or other constructions.
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of natural resources जैसे coal, चट्टान fuels, drinking जल or ores.
the study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source for scientific knowledge about the Earth 's इतिहास, including palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
the वैज्ञानिक discipline that studies the properties and origin of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology.
Sedimentology is both part of geology और physical geography और overlaps partly साथ other disciplines in the Earth sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, geochemistry or संरचनात्मक geology.

Humans are born with over 270 bones, some of जिससे fuse together into a longitudinal axis, the axial skeleton, to which the appendicular कंकाल is attached.
संत Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387 – 17 कूच c. 460 or c. 492 ) was a romano-british Christian missionary and बिशप in Ireland.
ज्ञात as the `` Apostle of Ireland '', he is the primary संरक्षक संत of the द्वीप along साथ Saints Brigid और Columba.
Two प्रामाणिक letters इससे him survive, इससे which come the तभी generally स्वीकृत details of his life.
When he was about 16, he was captured from his home and taken as a slave to Ireland, where he lived for छह सालो before escaping और returning to his family.
After becoming a मौलवी, he returned to northern and western आयरलैंड as an ordained बिशप, but little is ज्ञात about the स्थान where he worked.
By the seventh century, he had already come to be revered as the संरक्षक saint of Ireland.
सबसे available details of his life are from subsequent hagiographies, and these हैं now not accepted without detailed criticism.
the Annals of Ulster state that he arrived in आयरलैंड in 432, ministered in Ulster around 443, and died in 457 or 461.
The text, however, distinguishes between `` Old पैट्रिक '' ( विचार to mean Palladius ) and `` पैट्रिक, archapostle of the स्कॉट्स, '' who died in 492.
The वास्तविक तिथियाँ of Patrick 's life can not be fixed साथ certainty but, on a widespread interpretation, he थी active as a मिशनरी in Ireland during the दूसरी half of the 5th century.
He is generally credited with होने the पहला बिशप of Armagh, Primate of All आयरलैंड.
Saint पैट्रिक 's Day is observed on March 17, the date of his death.
It is celebrated both inside and outside Ireland, as दोनो a religious और, especially outside Ireland, secular अवकाश.
In the dioceses of Ireland, it is both a solemnity and a पावन day of obligation ; बाहर Ireland, it can be a celebration of Ireland itself.
Line segments in the सुनहरी ratio
A golden rectangle with longer side a and shorter side b, when placed adjacent to a square with sides of length a, will produce a similar golden rectangle with longer पक्ष a + b और shorter side a.
This illustrates the relationship.
In mathematics और the arts, two quantities are in the golden अनुपात if the अनुपात of the sum of the quantities to the larger मात्रा is equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller एक.
The figure on the right illustrates the ज्यामितीय relationship.

where the Greek letter phi ( ) represents the golden ratio.
Its value is:
The golden ratio is भी पुकारा the golden section ( लैटिन : sectio aurea ) or golden mean.
अन्य names include चरम and mean ratio, medial section, divine proportion, divine section ( Latin : sectio divina ), सुनहरी proportion, golden काटें, and सुनहरी number.
अनेक 20th century artists and आर्किटेक्ट have proportioned their works to सन्निकट the सुनहरी ratio—especially in the form of the सुनहरी आयताकार, in which the अनुपात of the longer side to the shorter is the golden ratio—believing इस proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( देखिए Applications and observations below ).
Mathematicians since Euclid have studied the properties of the सुनहरी अनुपात, including its appearance in the dimensions of a नियमित pentagon and in a golden आयताकार, जिससे can be cut into a वर्गाकार और a छोटी rectangle साथ the same aspect अनुपात.
the सुनहरी अनुपात has also महरूम used to analyze the proportions of natural objects as well as man-made systems such as वित्तीय markets, in some cases based on संदिग्ध fits to data.
North Myrtle Beach is a coastal रिज़ॉर्ट नगर in Horry काउंटी, South Carolina, संयुक्त States.
it थी created in 1968 इससे four existing municipalities उत्तर of myrtle Beach, और serves as one of the primary tourist कस्बों साथ the ग्रैंड Strand.
The population was 13,752 at the 2010 census.
संसार War i ( WWI ) was a global war केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the Great युद्ध from its occurrence until the start of संसार युद्ध II in 1939, and the पहला World War or संसार War i thereafter.
It involved सब the संसार 's great powers, जिससे were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, फ़्रांस and Russia ) और the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and इटली ; but, as Austria–Hungary था लिया the offensive against the अनुबंध, Italy किया not डालें into the युद्ध ).
ये alliances were both reorganised and expanded as अधिक nations entered the युद्ध : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य and Bulgaria the सेंट्रल Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without सम्बन्धित improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
एक of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the war थी the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of यूरोपीय.
More immediately, the assassination of archduke फ्रांज Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the किंगडम of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख powers यहूद at war और, via their colonies, the विरोध soon स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as preparation लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for ब्रिटेन 's declaration of युद्ध against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी Front settled into a स्थिर battle of attrition with a trench line that बदला little until 1917.
On the Eastern सामने, the Russian army थी कामयाब against the Austro-Hungarians, लकिन was stopped in इसके invasion of East Prussia by the germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia और the sinai.
इटली and बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the Russians to शर्तें साथ the सेंट्रल Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive साथ the पश्चिमी front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which था इसके own trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to लड़ो a total युद्ध.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor states of the former two खोया a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
the मैप of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into several छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such विरोध.
the European nationalism शाखित by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of Germany 's शिकस्त and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are सहमत to be कारकों contributing to World War II.
camden is a city in Camden County, नई जर्सी, संयुक्त States.
It is the county seat, स्तिथ आरपार the डेलावेयर River from Philadelphia.
As of the 2010 United राज्य Census the city had a total जनसांख्यिकी of 77,344, representing a decline of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) from the 79,904 निवासियों enumerated दौरान the 2000 Census, which had in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) इससे the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census.
Camden क्रमित as the 12th-most populous municipality in the राज्य in 2010 after having महरूम ranked 10th in 2000.
camden थी originally incorporated as a city on फ़रवरी 13, 1828, from portions of the now-defunct न्यूटन Township, जबकि the क्षेत्रफल was स्टिल part of gloucester County.
on March 13, 1844, camden became part of the newly formed Camden County.
Although एकबार a thriving center लिये निर्माण and industry, Camden is perhaps बेहतरीन known for its struggles with urban dysfunction.
Three Camden mayors have been jailed for corruption, the सबसे recent being Milton मिलान in 2000.
चूंकि 2005 the स्कूल system और police department have been operated by the state of New जर्सी ; the takeover expired in 2012.
In 2008, Camden had the उच्चतम crime rate in the U.S. with 2,333 violent अपराधों प्रति 100,000 people while the national average was 455 प्रति 100,000.
Camden पब्लिक schools spent $ 23,770 प्रति student ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil basis ) in the 2009–10 school year और two-thirds of the students graduate.
Two out of every पाँच निवासियों are नीचे the national poverty line.
Amitriptyline ( Tryptomer, elavil, Tryptizol, Laroxyl, Saroten, Sarotex, Lentizol, Endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
It is the सबसे widely used TCA and has at least बराबर efficacy against अवसाद as the नए class of SSRIs according to a पढ़ाई इससे early 2001.
As खूब as reducing depressive symptoms, these प्रकार of tricyclics also ease migraines, tension headaches, anxiety attacks and some schizophrenic symptoms.
It is also ज्ञात to reduce आक्रामकता और violent behavior.
A computer is a सामान्य purpose यंत्र that can be programmed to carry out a finite नियत of arithmetic or logical operations.
चूंकि a अनुक्रम of operations can be readily बदला, the कंप्यूटर can solve more than one दयालु of problem.
Conventionally, a computer consists of at least one processing element, typically a central processing unit ( CPU ) and some रूप of मेमोरी.
The processing element carries out arithmetic और logic operations, और a sequencing and control ईकाई कि can change the order of operations based on भंडारित information.
Peripheral devices allow information to be retrieved from an external सोर्स, और the result of operations saved और पुनर्प्राप्त.
the first इलेक्ट्रॉनिक digital computers were developed between 1940 और 1945 in the संयुक्त किंगडम and संयुक्त राज्य.
originally they यहूद the आकार of a large room, consuming as much power as अनेक hundred modern personal कंप्यूटर ( pcs ).
In इस era mechanical analog कंप्यूटर were used लिये military applications.
Modern computers आधारित on integrated circuits are millions to अरबों of times more capable than the early मशीने, and occupy a भिन्न of the space.
Simple computers are small enough to अनुरूप into mobile डिवाइस, and मोबाईल computers can be powered by छोटी batteries.
Personal कंप्यूटर in their various फ़ॉर्म are प्रतीक of the Information आयु and हैं what most people think of as “computers.”
However, the अंतःस्थापित computers found in अनेक devices from mp3 खिलाड़ी to सेनानी aircraft और इससे खिलौने to industrial robots हैं the most numerous.
`` Barefoot and pregnant '' is a phrase most commonly associated with the controversial विचार that women should not work outside the home and should have many children दौरान their reproductive years.
It रै several other meanings as खूब.
It is a फिगर of speech.
The phrase `` barefoot and pregnant '' was probably first used sometime पहले 1950.
an article from 1949 states, `` By early 1949, TWA was—in the words of its new अध्यक्ष, ralph S. Damon—both 'barefoot और pregnant. ' ''
Its usage may date as early as the 1910s.
An article published in 1958 states the phrase was first प्रयुक्त by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years पहले.
`` कुछ forty years ago, Dr. Hertzler advanced a परिकल्पना which यंग women of today seem bent on proving correct. '
The only way to keep a woman happy, ' he कहा, 'is to keep her barefoot और गर्भवती. ' ''

University of Phoenix Stadium, खोली August 1, 2006, is a बहुउद्देशीय football stadium स्तिथ in Glendale, एरिज़ोना.
it is the घर of the एरिज़ोना Cardinals of the National Football लीग ( NFL ) और the annual Fiesta Bowl.
The स्टेडियम is located next द्वार to the jobing.com Arena and it features the पहला fully retractable natural grass playing surface built in the United States on top of an एयरफील्ड प्रणालियों drainage system.
an opening on one पक्ष of the stadium allows the playing field to move to the exterior of the building, allowing the entire natural turf playing surface to be exposed to daylight.
The stadium रै hosted Super Bowl xlii, and the 2011 bcs National Championship Game, a game that it hosts every four years, which set the स्थान 's entertainment attendance रिकार्ड of 78,603 on जनवरी 11, 2011.
It होगा again host Super Bowl XLIX in 2015.
The University of फीनिक्स acquired the नामकरण rights in सितंबर 2006, shortly बाद the stadium had opened अंतर्गत the name Cardinals Stadium.
The `` University of Phoenix `` नाम is applied as a corporate sponsor, और not as the घर stadium of the विश्वविद्यालयों ( which रै no intercollegiate athletics program ).
The स्टेडियम has also hosted the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई event रेसलमेनिया XXVI साथ 72,219 fans in attendance.
The event was held in the स्टेडियम on March 28th 2010.
Joshua Lawrence चेम्बरलेन ( सितंबर 8, 1828 – February 24, 1914 ), born as लॉरेंस जोशुआ Chamberlain, was an अमरीकी कॉलेज professor from the State of Maine, who volunteered दौरान the अमरीकी Civil War to join the Union फौज.
Although having no earlier education in military strategies, he became a highly respected and decorated Union अधिकारी, reaching the rank of brigadier general ( and brevet प्रमुख general ).
लिये his gallantry at gettysburg, he was awarded the Medal of Honor.
He was given the सम्मान of commanding the Union सैनिकों at the surrender ceremony लिये the infantry of Robert E. Lee 's फौज at Appomattox, Virginia.
After the war, he entered politics as a रिपब्लिकन and served चार one-year terms of office as the 32nd Governor of maine.
He परोसा on the संकाय, and as president, of his alma mater, Bowdoin कॉलेज.
An inning, or innings, is a fixed-length खण्ड of a खेल in कोई of a variety of sports – most notably cricket and baseball दौरान which one team attempts to score while the अन्य team कोशिशें to prevent the first from scoring.
In क्रिकेट, the पद पारी is both singular and बहुवचन and is always spelled और pronounced with the टर्मिनल `` s ''.
in बेसबॉल and softball, the singular form is inning and only the plural takes an `` s ''.
in many other sports, the length of the खेल is dictated by a clock and teams swap offensive and defensive roles dynamically by taking possession of a ball or समान item.
in baseball और क्रिकेट, however, एक team, said to be `` batting '', attempts to स्कोर `` runs '' —see चलाएं ( बेसबॉल ) and run ( cricket ) —while the अन्य team, said to be `` fielding '', attempts to prevent the scoring of runs and get सदस्यों of the batting team आउट.
The टीमों switch places बाद the fielding team रै succeeded in getting a fixed क्रमांक of players out, बनाना a clock unnecessary.
In क्रिकेट, the term पारी is भी used to refer to the खेल of one particular खिलाड़ी ( Smith had a poor innings, scoring तभी 12 ).
by extension, this term can be used in British अंग्रेज़ी लिये almost any कार्यकलाप जिससे takes a period of time ( The Liberal सरकारी had a good innings, लकिन आखिरकार lost दफ्तर in 1972, or You 've had a fair innings, अभी it 's my फेरे, meaning `` तुम have spoken for long enough, now let me speak '' ).
it is also प्रयुक्त in reference to someone who रै died at a reasonably old आयु or जिया a समृद्ध and rewarding life ( Ah, खूब.
John थी 89.
at least he had a good पारी ).
The baseball-derived parallel to इस in American अंग्रेज़ी is the term at चमगादड़.
according to the Oxford English शब्दकोष, the term innings रै been used in reference to cricket चूंकि at least 1735.
as cricket was a mature, highly organized sport in the 1600s in England, the पद 's उत्पत्ति could well precede this first अंकित usage.
The word inning meaning 'a gathering in ' is first recorded in 1522, और could be related.
Adenosine deaminase deficiency, भी called एडीए deficiency or ada-scid, is an autosomal recessive metabolic विकार that causes immunodeficiency.
It occurs in fewer than one in 100,000 live births worldwide.
It accounts लिये about 15 % of सब cases of कठोर combined immunodeficiency ( SCID ).
it is very विरल, तुम have a 3 % मौका of getting this gene.
एडीए deficiency may be present in शैशव, childhood, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset and गंभीरता is related to कुछ 29 known genotypes संबद्ध with the disorder.

Poverty is the राज्य of one who lacks a निश्चित amount of material possessions or money.
Absolute poverty or destitution refers to the deprivation of मौलिक इंसान needs, which commonly शामिल food, water, sanitation, कपडे, shelter, health care and education.
सापेक्ष poverty is defined contextually as आर्थिक inequality in the स्थान or society in which लोगों live.
लिये much of history, poverty was considered largely unavoidable as परंपरागत मोड्स of उत्पादन were insufficient to give an entire population a आरामदायक standard of जीना.
बाद the industrial क्रान्ति, द्रव्यमान production in factories made wealth increasingly more inexpensive and accessible.
Of more importance is the modernization of agriculture, such as fertilizers, in order to provide enough yield to फीड the जनसांख्यिकी.
the supply of मौलिक needs can be restricted by constraints on सरकारी services such as भ्रष्टाचार, tax avoidance, debt and loan conditionalities and by the brain नाली of health care and शैक्षणिक professionals.
Strategies of increasing income to make basic needs अधिक सस्ती typically include welfare, आर्थिक freedoms, and providing वित्तीय सेवाएं.
Poverty reduction is a major goal and issue for many international संगठन such as the United राष्ट्र and the संसार Bank.
The World Bank अनुमानित 1.29 billion लोगों यहूद जीना in निरपेक्ष गरीबी in 2008.
Of these, about 400 million people in absolute poverty जिया in India and 173 million people in China.
In USA 1 in 5 children lives in गरीबी.
In terms of percentage of क्षेत्रीय populations, sub-Saharan Africa at 47 % had the highest incidence rate of absolute गरीबी in 2008.
Between 1990 and 2010, about 663 लाख लोगों स्थानांतरित ऊपर the absolute poverty स्तर.
Still, extreme poverty is a global challenge ; it is observed in सब parts of the world, including the विकसित economies.
Mushroom विषाक्तता ( also known as mycetism ) refers to नुकसानदेह effects इससे ingestion of toxic substances present in a मशरूम.
These symptoms can vary इससे slight gastrointestinal discomfort to death.
The toxins present हैं secondary metabolites उत्पादित in specific biochemical pathways in the fungal cells.
मशरूम poisoning is usually the result of ingestion of wild mushrooms after misidentification of a विषाक्त mushroom as an edible प्रजाति.
The most common कारण for this misidentification is close प्रतिरूप in शर्तें of colour and सामान्य morphology of the toxic mushrooms species साथ edible species.
भी very experienced wild mushroom gatherers हैं upon rare occasion poisoned by eating विषाक्त प्रजाति, despite being खूब जागरूक of the risks, through carelessness.
To prevent mushroom poisoning, mushroom gatherers need to be बहुत familiar with the mushrooms they intend to collect as खूब as with any similar-looking toxic प्रजाति.
In addition, edibility of मशरूम may depend on विधि of preparation for cooking.
collectors भी need to be खूब aware that edibility or toxicity of some प्रजाति varies साथ geographic स्थान.
Human height is the अलहदा इससे the bottom of the feet to the शीर्ष of the head in a human body, standing erect.
When populations share genetic background and environmental factors, average height is frequently characteristic within the समूह.
Exceptional height विभिन्नता ( around 20 % deviation इससे average ) भीतर ऐसे a जनसांख्यिकी is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism, जिससे हैं medical conditions caused by विशिष्ट genes or अंतःस्रावी abnormalities.
In regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare, पर्यावरणीय factors जैसे दीर्घकालिक malnutrition during बाल्यकाल or adolescence may account for विलम्बित growth and/or ( in severe मामले ) marked reductions in adult stature even without the presence of any of these medical शर्तें.
अपोलो 11 was the spaceflight कि उतरा the first humans, अमेरिकी Neil Armstrong और बज़ Aldrin, on the Moon on जुलाई 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.
Armstrong became the पहला to step onto the चंद्र surface 6 hours बाद on July 21 at 02:56 UTC.
Armstrong spent परिचय दो and a half hours outside the spacecraft, Aldrin थोड़ा कम ; और साथ they एकत्रित of चंद्र material लिये return to धरती.
a third member of the mission, माइकल कॉलिन्स, piloted the कमांड spacecraft alone in चंद्र कक्षा until आर्मस्ट्रांग और एल्ड्रिन returned to it just under a day later लिये the trip back to Earth.
Launched by a Saturn V प्रक्षेपास्त्र from कैनेडी Space Center in Merritt Island, Florida on July 16, Apollo 11 was the पांचवां manned mission of NASA 's Apollo program.
the Apollo spacecraft था three parts : a Command मोड्यूल साथ a cabin for the three astronauts जिससे थी the तभी part which landed back on Earth ; a Service मोड्यूल जिससे समर्थित the Command Module साथ नोदन, विद्युत power, ऑक्सीजन and जल ; and a चंद्र मोड्यूल for landing on the चंद्रमा.
After being भेजा to the Moon by the Saturn V 's upper stage, the astronauts separated the spacecraft इससे it और travelled for three days until they entered into lunar orbit.
Armstrong और Aldrin then moved into the चंद्र Module and landed in the Sea of tranquility.
They stayed a total of about 21 and a हाफ hours on the lunar सतह.
बाद उठाने off in the upper भाग of the Lunar Module and rejoining कॉलिन्स in the Command Module, they लौटे to धरती and उतरा in the प्रशांत समंदर on July 24.
ब्रॉडकास्ट on live tv to a world-wide audience, Armstrong stepped onto the lunar surface और described the इवेंट as `` एक small step for [ a ] man, one दानव leap for mankind. ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the स्पेस Race and fulfilled a national goal प्रस्तावित in 1961 by the late u.S. President जॉन F. Kennedy in a वाक before the United States Congress, `` before this decade is out, of लैंडिंग a man on the चंद्रमा and returning him safely to the धरती. ''
The FIFA World Cup, प्रायः simply the संसार कप, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय association football competition contested by the senior मेन 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( फीफा ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has महरूम awarded every चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it थी not आयोजित क्युकी of the Second World War.
The current champions हैं Spain, who won the 2010 tournament.
The current स्वरूप of the tournament involves 32 teams स्पर्धा for the title at venues भीतर the host nation ( s ) over a period of परिचय a month ; this phase is प्रायः called the World Cup Finals.
a qualification phase, जिससे currently takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament साथ with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World कप tournaments have been जीती by eight different नेशनल teams.
ब्राज़ील have जीती five times, और they are the only team to have played in every tournament.
the other World कप winners are Italy, with four titles ; जर्मनी, साथ three शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना and inaugural winners Uruguay, with two titles प्रत्येक ; और England, France, and Spain, with one title प्रत्येक.
The World Cup is the संसार 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million लोगों watched the फाइनल match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next तीन संसार Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
Genocide is a पद coined in 1944 by Raphael lemkin to describe the deliberate and systematic destruction, in whole or in भाग, of an ethnic, racial, religious, or national group.
It is defined in आलेख 2 of the सम्मेलन on the रोकथाम and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following अधिनियमों committed with intent to destroy, in पूरे or in part, a national, ethnical, जातिगत or religious group, as such : हत्या members of the group ; causing गंभीर bodily or mental harm to members of the समूह ; deliberately inflicting on the groups conditions of life, calculated to bring about its शारीरिक destruction in whole or in part ; imposing measures intended to prevent births within the समूह ; [ and ] forcibly transferring children of the group to another group. ''
Skulls of victims of the Rwandan Genocide
The प्रस्तावना to the CPPCG not only राज्य कि `` genocide is a crime under अंतरराष्ट्रीय law, contrary to the स्पिरिट और aims of the United Nations and condemned by the civilized world '', लकिन also that `` at सब periods of history genocide has inflicted great losses on मानवता ''.
Determining what historical events constitute a genocide और which हैं merely दण्ड or अमानवीय behavior is not a clear-cut पदार्थ.
in nearly every मामला where accusations of genocide have circulated, partisans of विभिन्न sides have fiercely विवादित the निर्वचन और details of the event, often to the पाइंट of promoting wildly different versions of the तथ्य.
an accusation of genocide is certainly not taken lightly and होगा almost always be controversial.
The following सूची of genocides and alleged genocides should be understood in this context and can नहीं be regarded as the final शब्द on these subjects.
