toothed belt, a flexible belt साथ teeth moulded onto its inner सतह
Timing belt ( camshaft ), a toothed बेल्ट used to drive the camshaft ( s ) भीतर an आतंरिक combustion engine
The culture of the United राज्य is primarily a Western संस्कृति, लकिन is भी influenced by Native American, African, Asian, Polynesian, and Latin अमरीकी संस्कृतियों.
American संस्कृति प्रारंभ its गठन over 10,000 years ago with the migration of Paleo-Indians from Asia into the region that is today the महाद्वीपीय United राज्य.
It has its अपना unique सोशल and cultural characteristics such as dialect, music, कला, सोशल habits, cuisine, and folklore.
The United राज्य of अमेरिका is an ethnically and racially diverse country as a परिणाम of large-scale immigration from many different countries throughout its history.
Its chief early European influences came from English, Scottish, वेल्श and Irish settlers of औपनिवेशिक America during British rule.
British culture, due to औपनिवेशिक ties with Britain कि स्प्रेड the English language, legal system and other cultural inheritances, had a formative influence.
Other important influences came from other parts of पश्चिमी Europe, especially Germany, France, and Italy.
Original elements also play a strong role, ऐसे as the आविष्कार of Jeffersonian democracy.
थामस Jefferson 's Notes on the राज्य of Virginia was perhaps the पहला influential domestic cultural critique by an अमरीकी and a reactionary piece to the prevailing European consensus that America 's domestic originality was degenerate.
Prevalent ideas and ideals that evolved domestically, ऐसे as नेशनल छुट्टियाँ, uniquely American sports, military tradition, और innovations in the arts and entertainment give a strong sense of national pride among the जनसांख्यिकी as a whole.
American culture शामिल both conservative and liberal elements, scientific and religious competitiveness, political structures, रिस्क लेने और फ़्री expression, materialist और moral elements.
Despite certain consistent ideological principles ( e.g. व्यक्तिगत, समतावाद, और आस्था in स्वतंत्रता and democracy ), American culture रै a variety of expressions due to its भौगोलिक स्केल and demographic विविधता.
The flexibility of u.S. culture और its highly symbolic nature lead some researchers to categorize American संस्कृति as a mythic identity ; others see it as अमरीकी exceptionalism.
It also शामिल elements कि evolved इससे Indigenous अमेरिकी, and other जातीय cultures—most prominently the संस्कृति of African अमेरिकी, cultures इससे Latin America, and Asian American संस्कृतियों.
Many American cultural तत्व, especially from लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, have spread across the globe through modern mass media.
The संयुक्त राज्य रै often been विचार of as a melting pot, but beginning in the late 1990s and early 2000s, it रुझान towards सांस्कृतिक विविधता, pluralism and the चित्र of a salad कटोरी instead.
Due to the extent of American culture, there are many एकीकृत but unique social subcultures भीतर the United States.
The cultural affiliations an individual in the संयुक्त States may have commonly निर्भर on social class, political अभिविन्यास and a multitude of demographic विशेषताएँ such as religious background, occupation और ethnic group सदस्यता.
samoan ( Gagana fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — आईपीए : ) is the language of the samoan Islands, comprising the independent country of Samoa and the United States territory of अमरीकी समोआ.
it is an official language—alongside English —in both jurisdictions.
Samoan, a पोलिनेशियाई भाषा, is the first language for most of the Samoa Islands ' population of about 246,000.
साथ many Samoan people living in other देशों, the total क्रमांक of speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000.
The language is notable for the phonological differences between formal and अनौपचारिक वाक as well as a ceremonial रूप प्रयुक्त in Samoan छाये.
a glucose tolerance test is a चिकित्सा test in जिससे glucose is दिए and blood samples taken afterward to determine how quickly it is साफ इससे the blood.
The परीक्षण is usually used to test for diabetes, इंसुलिन resistance, and sometimes प्रतिक्रिया hypoglycemia and acromegaly, or rarer disorders of carbohydrate metabolism.
In the most commonly performed संस्करण of the test, an मौखिक glucose सहिष्णुता परीक्षण ( OGTT ), a मानक dose of ग्लूकोज is ingested by मुँह and blood स्तर are checked two hours later.
अनेक variations of the GTT have महरूम devised over the years लिये various उद्देश्य, with different standard doses of ग्लूकोज, different routes of administration, different intervals और durations of sampling, and various substances measured in addition to blood glucose.
`` What About me '' is a सोंग written by गैरी तुषार और Frances Swan, first अंकित by Australian rock band Moving Pictures from उनके album Days of Innocence.
It was the band 's first number-one सिंगल in Australia spending six consecutive weeks on the शीर्ष ; there, it was the second-highest selling सिंगल of 1982.
the success of the सोंग led उन्हें to अमेरिका where it became a hit, reaching # 29 on the U.S. Billboard hot 100 चार्ट.
The song stayed in the U.S. चार्ट for ऐसे a long time that it managed to मेक billboards top 100 Pop Singles of 1983, at # 88, a विरल feat for a single साथ such a low peak स्थिति.
The song made an unusual comeback in 1989, peaking at # 46.
on the left a मुर्गा egg, the egg सबसे commonly खाया by humans, and on the right two quail eggs
Eggs are रखी by females of अनेक different species, including birds, reptiles, amphibians, and मछली, and have been eaten by mankind for thousands of सालो.
बर्ड और reptile eggs consist of a सुरक्षात्मक eggshell, albumen ( egg white ), and vitellus ( egg yolk ), contained भीतर various पतला membranes.
Popular चुनाव for egg consumption are chicken, duck, quail, roe, and caviar, but the अंडा most often consumed by humans is the मुर्गा egg, by a चौड़ी margin.
Egg yolks and whole eggs स्टोर significant amounts of protein और choline, और are widely used in cookery.
Due to their protein content, the United States विभाग of कृषि ( USDA ) categorizes eggs as Meats within the Food Guide पिरामिड.
Despite the nutritional मान of अंडे, there are some potential health issues arising from egg विशेषता, भंडार, और individual allergies.
Chickens and other egg-laying creatures हैं widely kept throughout the world, and mass production of मुर्गा अंडे is a वैश्विक उद्योग.
In 2009, an estimated 62.1 लाख मीट्रिक tons of eggs were produced worldwide from a total laying झुण्ड of approximately 6.4 billion hens.
There हैं issues of regional विभिन्नता in माँग और expectation, as well as current debates concerning methods of mass उत्पादन, with the European Union 's बैन on battery farming of chickens.
प्रमुख League Soccer ( mls ) is a professional सॉकर league representing the sport 's highest level in the United राज्य and कनाडा.
मंजूर by the संयुक्त राज्य Soccer संघ ( u.S. सॉकर ), the league is composed of 19 टीमों — 16 in the U.S. और 3 in Canada.
Seasons presently चलाएं from कूच to December, with each टोली playing 34 games in the regular season.
Ten teams compete in the postseason mls कप playoffs culminating in the championship game, the mls Cup.
Major League Soccer थी founded in 1993 as part of the United States ' बोली to host the 1994 FIFA संसार कप.
The first ऋतु took प्लेस in 1996 beginning with ten teams.
Instead of operating as an association of independently owned teams, MLS is a single entity जहाँ each team is owned and controlled by the league 's investors.
The लीग 's closed membership makes it one of the संसार 's few soccer लीग नहीं using promotion और relegation.
The legality of cannabis varies इससे country to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries और रै been since the beginning of widespread कैनबिस prohibition in the लेट 1930s.
However, many देशों have decriminalized the possession of small quantities of cannabis, particularly in North America, South America and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is विधिक or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North Korea and would be in the U.S. राज्य of Colorado और वॉशिंगटन if it were not for federal विधि, which governs व्यक्तियों in all states.
The medicinal use of कैनबिस is legal in a क्रमांक of countries, including Canada, the Czech Republic and इसराईल.
जबकि संघीय law in the संयुक्त राज्य bans all sale and कब्ज़ा of cannabis, प्रवर्तन varies widely at the राज्य स्तर and कुछ राज्य have established औषधीय मारिजुआना programs in that contradict federal law ; दो states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of कैनबिस and replaced them with a नियामक शासन, also contrary to federal statute.
कुछ countries have laws that हैं not as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य लकिन, apart from the countries that offer अभिगम to medical marijuana, most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to बहुत severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in कुछ countries than others in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, उपयोग, कब्ज़ा or transfer of cannabis लिये recreational use.
a few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of small quantities of cannabis, making it punishable by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
Some क्षेत्राधिकारs/ drug courts उपयोग mandatory treatment कार्यक्रम for young or frequent users, with freedom from narcotic दवाएँ as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit कैनबिस use for medicinal purposes.
There हैं also changes in a more restrictive दिशा as in Canada.
ड्रग tests to detect कैनबिस हैं increasingly common in many countries और have resulted in jail वाक्य and people losing their कार्य.
However, simple कब्ज़ा can carry long jail sentences in some countries, particularly in भाग of East Asia and southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may सीसे to a वाक्य of जीवन in prison or भी execution.
in cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the volumetric भिन्न of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart ताल or cardiac साईकिल.
it can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or the left ventricle जिससे ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic परिसंचरण.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian दिल is the आर्ट that allows meaningful mathematical अभिव्यक्ति defining EF.
noninvasive हृदय इमेजिंग has become a worldwide utility enabling study of हृदय performance reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection fraction is a mathematical product allowed by cardiac imaging.
As a mathematical term, Ejection Fraction is an एक्सटेंशन of the work of Adolph Fick in हृदय output.
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, चुम्बकीय Resonance इमेजिंग और MUGA स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक mathematics regarding Ischemia, Congenital दिल बीमारी और Heart Failure.
State Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south state highway in the U.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, largely in the Mojave मरुस्थल.
The दक्षिणी portion of the highway is हस्ताक्षरित as the Antelope Valley Freeway.
the रूट connects अंतरराज्यीय 5, or Golden State Freeway, निकट Santa Clarita and साथ U.S. Route 395 निकट Inyokern.
Legislatively, the रूट extends दक्षिण of I-5 to राज्य रूट 1 in the Pacific Palisades क्षेत्रफल of Los Angeles, however the portion south of the जंक्शन with i-5 has नहीं been constructed.
The southern part of the constructed route is a busy commuter freeway serving and connecting the communities of Santa Clarita, palmdale and lancaster with the rest of the वृहद Los Angeles area.
The उत्तरी portion, from Vincent ( south of Palmdale ) to रूट 395, is legislatively named the Aerospace Highway, as the highway serves एडवर्ड्स Air फ़ोर्स Base, once one of the प्राथमिक landing स्ट्रिप्स for NASA 's Space शटल.
इस खण्ड is rural, following the line between the hot mojave desert and the forming सिएरा Nevada mountain range.
Most of Route 14 is loosely paralleled by a प्रमुख लकीर of the दक्षिणी Pacific Railroad, used for the antelope Valley लकीर of the metrolink commuter rail प्रणाली as well as a connection between Los Angeles and the California सेंट्रल घाटी via Tehachapi Pass.
Linked with US 395, this road connects Los Angeles साथ such places as Mammoth Mountain, Mono Lake, Yosemite नेशनल पार्क and रेनो, Nevada.
रूट 14 was भाग of u.S. रूट 6 prior to truncation in 1964, when U.S. 6 थी a coast-to-coast रूट from Long बीच to Provincetown, मैसाचुसेट्स.
The non-freeway खण्ड of SR 14 इससे Silver Queen सड़क north of Rosamond to Mojave is known as Sierra Highway, as is the old routing between Interstate 5 और Silver Queen Road where SR 14 has been moved to a newer freeway alignment.
Portions of रूट 14 remain हस्ताक्षरित साथ names संबद्ध with us 6, सहित मिडलैंड Trail, Theodore Roosevelt Highway और Grand फौज of the Republic Highway.
This route is part of the California Freeway और एक्सप्रेसवे प्रणाली.
दृष्टिहीनता is the कंडीशन of lacking visual perception due to physiological or neurological factors.
विभिन्न scales have been developed to describe the extent of vision loss and define दृष्टिहीनता.
Total blindness is the complete lack of रूप और visual लाइट बोध and is clinically recorded as nlp, an abbreviation for `` no light perception. ''
Blindness is अक्सर used to describe severe visual पुतलियों with दृष्टि.
Those वर्णित as having only light perception have no more sight than the क्षमता to tell light इससे dark and the general direction of a light source.
To determine which लोगों may need special assistance because of उनके विज़ुअल disabilities, विभिन्न governmental jurisdictions have formulated more complex definitions referred to as legal blindness.
in North America and most of Europe, legal blindness is defined as विज़ुअल तीक्ष्णता ( दृष्टि ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or less in the better नजर with best correction संभावित.
This अर्थात् that a legally blind individual would have to स्टैंड from an object to देखिए it—with corrective lenses —with the वही उपाधि of clarity as a normally sighted person could इससे.
In many क्षेत्रों, people with average तीक्ष्णता who nonetheless have a visual field of less than 20 डिग्री ( the norm being 180 degrees ) हैं भी classified as being legally blind.
लगभग ten percent of those deemed legally अँधा, by any measure, have no vision.
The rest have some दृष्टि, from लाइट बोध alone to relatively good acuity.
Low vision is sometimes used to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to 20/200.
By the 10th Revision of the WHO अंतरराष्ट्रीय Statistical वर्गीकरण of रोगों, चोटों और Causes of Death, low vision is defined as visual तीक्ष्णता of less than 20/60 ( 6/18 ), but बराबर to or बेहतर than 20/200 ( 6/60 ), or सम्बन्धित visual फ़ील्ड loss to less than 20 डिग्री, in the बेहतर eye with best possible सुधार.
Blindness is defined as visual acuity of कम than 20/400 ( 6/120 ), or corresponding visual field घाटा to कम than 10 degrees, in the better eye with best possible correction.
अँधा लोगों साथ undamaged eyes may still register light non-visually for the purpose of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark साईकिल.
लाइट signals लिये this purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic ट्रैक्ट and are not affected by ऑप्टिक nerve damage परे where the retinohypothalamic tract exits.
Earl Simmons ( born December 18, 1970 ), better known by his stage names DMX and अंधेरा man X, is an American rapper and actor.
In 1999, DMX released उसके best-selling एल्बम... And Then There Was x, which प्रदर्शित the hit single `` Party Up ( Up in यहाँ ) ``.
He has acted in films such as पेट, Romeo जरूर Die, Exit Wounds, Cradle 2 The Grave, and Last घंटा.
In 2006, he starred in the वास्तविकता television series, which थी primarily aired on the BET केबल television संजाल.
In 2003, DMX published a किताब of his memoirs entitled, E.A.R.L. : The Autobiography of dmx.
DMX released a mixtape The तौल In as a prelude/promotion towards his एल्बम Undisputed ( 2012 ).
dmx रै sold over 30 million records विश्वव्यापी, making him one of the best-selling hip-hop artists of all time.
Professional certification, व्यापार certification, or professional designation, often पुकारा simply certification or योग्यता, is a designation earned by a person to assure qualification to perform a job or task.
Not all certifications that use post-nominal letters हैं an acknowledgement of educational उपलब्धि, or an एजेंसी appointed to safeguard the पब्लिक interest.
Bugs Bunny is a funny एनिमल cartoon character, best remembered लिये his starring roles in the Looney Tunes and merrie Melodies series of theatrical short films produced by warner Bros. during the सुनहरी आयु of American animation.
His popularity during इस era led to his becoming a कॉरपोरेट mascot of Warner भाईs. Entertainment.
Bugs is an anthropomorphic gray hare or खरगोश who is प्रसिद्ध for his flippant, personality, a pronounced नई York accent, उसके portrayal as a trickster, and his catch phrase `` Eh...
What 's up, दस्तावेज़ ? ''
( प्रायः said जबकि chewing a carrot ).
Bugs रै appeared in अधिक films than any other cartoon अक्षर and is the ninth सबसे portrayed film व्यक्तित्व in the world.
According to his 1990 `` biography '' Bugs बनी : 50 सालो and तभी एक Grey हरे, Bugs was born on July 27, 1940 in ब्रुकलीन, New York in a वारेन under Ebbets Field, home of the Brooklyn डॉजर्स.
In वास्तविकता, he was brought to life by the animators and staff of Leon schlesinger Productions ( बाद Warner Bros. Cartoons ) : including Tex Avery, who directed बग ' early definitive छोटी A Wild Hare ( 1940 ) ; रॉबर्ट McKimson, who created Bugs ' definitive character design ; and Mel Blanc, who originated the voice of Bugs.
the mucous झिल्लियों ( or mucosae or mucosas ; एकवचन mucosa ) हैं linings of mostly endodermal origin, covered in epithelium, which are involved in absorption and secretion.
They line cavities कि हैं exposed to the बाह्य environment and आतंरिक अंगों.
वे हैं at several स्थान संलग्न with skin : at the nostrils, the होठ of the mouth, the eyelids, the कानों, the genital area, और the गुदा.
The sticky, thick द्रव secreted by the mucous membranes and glands is termed mucus.
The term mucous झिल्ली refers to where they are found in the body and नहीं every mucous membrane secretes mucus.
The glans clitoridis, glans penis ( head of the शिश्न ), along साथ the inside of the अग्रत्वचा and the clitoral hood, are mucous membranes.
The urethra is भी a mucous झिल्ली.
the secreted mucus फंदा the pathogens in the body, preventing any further activities of diseases.

Cake is a form of bread or bread-like food.
In its modern फ़ॉर्म, it is typically a sweet baked मिठाई.
In इसके oldest forms, cakes यहूद सामान्यतः fried breads or cheesecakes, and सामान्यतः had a disk shape.
Determining whether a दिए food should be classified as bread, केक, or pastry can be difficult.
Modern cake, especially layer cakes, normally contain a combination of flour, शुगर, अंडे, and butter or oil, with some varieties also requiring liquid ( typically milk or जल ) और leavening एजेंटों ( such as yeast or baking powder ).
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées, nuts, dried or candied fruit, or extracts are प्रायः added, and numerous substitutions लिये the primary ingredients are possible.
Cakes are प्रायः भर with fruit preserves or dessert sauces ( जैसे पेस्ट्री मलाई ), iced with buttercream or अन्य icings, and decorated with marzipan, piped borders or candied fruit.
केक is प्रायः the मिठाई of चुनाव लिये meals at ceremonial अवसरों, particularly विवाह, anniversaries, and जन्मदिन.
There are अनगिनत cake व्यंजनों ; some are bread-like, some rich and elaborate, और many are centuries old.
केक making is no longer a complicated procedure ; while at one time considerable labor गई into केक बनाना ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ), baking equipment and directions have been simplified so that even the सबसे amateur cook may bake a cake.
Tamara Faye LaValley Bakker messner ( March 7, 1942 – July 20, 2007 ) was an American Christian सिंगर, इंजीलवादी, उद्योगों, author, talk show host, and television personality.
She थी married इससे 1961 to 1992 to televangelist, and later convicted felon, Jim bakker.
वो co-hosted with him on The PTL क्लबों ( 1976–1987 ).
वो was a participant in the 2004 season of the reality show The surreal Life.

The population थी 767 at the 2010 census.

Public policy is the principled guide to action taken by the administrative executive शाखाओं of the state साथ regard to a क्लास of issues in a manner consistent साथ law and संस्थागत customs.
In general, the foundation is the pertinent नेशनल and substantial संवैधानिक law and implementing legislation ऐसे as the us Federal कोड.
Further substrates include both judicial interpretations और regulations which are generally authorized by legislation.
अन्य scholars define it as a system of `` courses of action, regulatory उपायों, laws, और funding priorities concerning a given टॉपिक promulgated by a सरकारी entity or its representatives. ''
पब्लिक policy is commonly embodied `` in constitutions, legislative acts, और judicial decisions. ''
In the United राज्य, इस concept refers नहीं only to the result of policies, लकिन अधिक broadly to the decision-making और विश्लेषण of सरकारी decisions.
As an academic अनुशासन, पब्लिक policy is studied by professors और विद्यार्थी at public policy schools of major universities throughout the देश.
The U.S. पेशेवर association of public नीति practitioners, researchers, scholars, और students is the Association for पब्लिक Policy Analysis and Management.
Digestion is the mechanical and रासायनिक विश्लेषण of food into smaller components that are more easily absorbed into a रक्त stream, लिये instance.
Digestion is a form of catabolism : a breakdown of large food molecules to smaller ones.
When food enters the mouth, digestion of the food starts by the action of mastication, a रूप of mechanical digestion, and the wetting contact of saliva.
Saliva, a liquid secreted by the salivary glands, contains salivary amylase, an एंजाइम which starts the digestion of starch in the खाना.
बाद undergoing mastication and starch पाचन, the food होगा be in the form of a small, round slurry द्रव्यमान called a bolus.
It होगा तब सफर down the ग्रासनाल और into the पेट by the कार्रवाई of peristalsis.
Gastric juice in the stomach starts protein पाचन.
Gastric रस मुख्यतः contains hydrochloric acid and pepsin.
As these दो रसायन may damage the stomach वॉल, mucus is स्रावित by the stomach, providing a slimy layer that अधिनियमों as a shield against the damaging effects of the chemicals.
At the same time प्रोटीन digestion is occurring, mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis, which are waves of muscular contractions that move along the पेट wall.
This allows the mass of food to further मिक्सर with the digestive enzymes.
After कुछ time ( typically an hour or दो in इंसानो, 4–6 hours in कुत्तो, somewhat shorter duration in house cats ), the resulting thick liquid is पुकारा chyme.
When the pyloric sphincter valve opens, chyme enters the duodenum where it mixes with digestive एंजाइमों from the pancreas, and then गुजरता through the small intestine, in जिससे digestion continues.
When the chyme is fully digested, it is अवशोषित into the blood.
95 % of absorption of nutrients occurs in the small intestine.
जल और खनिज are reabsorbed वापस into the रक्त in the colon ( large intestine ) जहाँ the pH is थोड़ा acidic परिचय 5.6 ~ 6.9.
Some विटामिन, such as biotin और विटामिन K ( K2MK7 ) उत्पादित by bacteria in the colon are also absorbed into the blood in the colon.
बर्बाद material is eliminated इससे the मलाशय during defecation.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was king of England इससे 21 April 1509 जबतक उसके death.
he was रब, and बाद king, of आयरलैंड, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry थी the second monarch of the ट्यूडर dynasty, succeeding उसके father, Henry सात.
Besides उसके six marriages, हेनरी viii is ज्ञात for his role in the विरह of the Church of England from the Roman कैथोलिक Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड from papal authority, the विच्छेद of the Monasteries, and his अपना establishment as the Supreme सिर of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological teachings, even after his excommunication from the रोमन Catholic गिरिजाघर.
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales with the कानून in वेल्स Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new किंग allied साथ the Holy Roman सम्राट, maximillian I, and invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a large, well-equipped army, लकिन हासिल छोटी at a considerable वित्तीय cost.
Maximillian, for his part, used the English invasion to उसके अपना ends, और इस prejudiced England 's क्षमता to defeat the फ्रेंच.
इस foray would prove the start of an obsession लिये Henry, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the महत्वपूर्ण city of Boulogne, लकिन again the Holy Roman Emperor, Charles v, supported Henry only as long as he needed to और England, strained by the enormous cost of the war, ransomed the city back लिये peace.
His contemporaries considered हेनरी in his prime to be an attractive, educated and accomplished king, and he has महरूम वर्णित as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to बैठना on the English सिंहासन ''.
Besides ruling साथ absolute शक्ति, he also सगाई himself as an author और composer.
His desire to provide England साथ a पुरूष heir – जिससे stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly क्युकी he believed a daughter होता be unable to consolidate the Tudor राजवंश और the नाजुक peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses – led to the two things for जिससे Henry is most remembered : his six marriages और the अंग्रेज़ी Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण obese and his स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to उसके मौत in 1547.
He is frequently characterised in his later जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, हर्ष, और insecure king.
Bongos ( Spanish : bongó ) are an Afro-Cuban percussion यंत्र.
The ड्रम हैं of different size : the larger drum is पुकारा in स्पेनी the hembra ( female ) and the smaller the मर्दाना ( male ).
वे are membranophones, or instruments that create sound by a vibration of a stretched झिल्ली.
Different religious groups include different books in their Biblical canons, in varying आदेश, and sometimes divide or combine books, or incorporate additional material into canonical किताबे.
ईसाई Bibles range इससे the sixty-six books of the प्रोटोस्टेंट canon to the eighty-one books of the Ethiopian परंपरागत Tewahedo Church canon.
The यहूदी बाइबल, or Tanakh, contains twenty-four किताबे divided into three parts ; the five books of the Torah ( `` teaching '' or `` law '' ), the nevi'im ( `` prophets '' ), and the ketuvim ( `` writings '' ).
the पहला भाग of Christian Bibles is the बूढ़ा Testament, which contains, at न्यूनतम, the twenty-four books of the Hebrew Bible divided into thirty-nine books और ordered differently इससे the Hebrew Bible.
The Catholic Church and Eastern Christian churches भी थाम certain deuterocanonical books and passages to be part of the Old वसीयत canon.
The दूसरी भाग is the नई वसीयत, containing twenty-seven किताबे ; the चार canonical gospels, अधिनियमों of the रसूलों, twenty-one Epistles or letters and the Book of Revelation.
the Eastern Orthodox, Oriental Orthodox and Eastern कैथोलिक चर्च may have नाबालिग differences in उनके lists of accepted books.
The सूची given here for ये चर्च is the most inclusive : if at least एक पूर्वी गिरिजाघर स्वीकृत the book it is included here.
The नेशनल flag of the United राज्य of अमेरिका, प्रायः simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) alternating with श्वेत, साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing fifty small, श्वेत, five-pointed सितारों arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top और bottom ) alternating with rows of five सितारों.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 राज्य of the United राज्य of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the किंगडम of ग्रेट Britain and became the पहला राज्य in the Union.
Nicknames लिये the flag include the `` सितारों and धारियाँ '', `` Old Glory ``, और `` the Star-Spangled Banner. ''
Dred Scott v. Sandford,, भी known as the Dred Scott Decision, was a landmark निर्णय by the U.S. Supreme अदालत.
It बना दो प्रमुख rulings.
The first ruling was that african-americans were not नागरिकों, and therefore had no standing to sue in संघीय अदालत.
The दूसरी ruling थी that the federal government had no शक्ति to regulate गुलामी in any territory acquired subsequent to the creation of the संयुक्त राज्य.
दिए the first ruling, most विद्वानों और many समकालीन political आंकड़े ( सहित the leadership of the then-new Republican Party ) considered that the दूसरी ruling was नहीं binding precedent, but mere कहावत.
The rationale of the Supreme Court regarding the jurisdictional सत्ताधारी implied that people of African descent ( both slave and फ़्री ) were नहीं protected by the Constitution and were नहीं u.S. citizens.
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the u.S. Constitution, both rulings are superseded and no longer मान्य precedent.
Nonetheless, the case retains historical significance as it is widely regarded as the worst decision कभी made by the Supreme Court.
The राय of the अदालत, written by मुख्य Justice Roger B. taney, stirred debate.
The decision was 7–2, और every Justice besides Taney लिखा a separate concurrence or dissent.
For the पहला time चूंकि Marbury v. मैडिसन, the Court held an Act of Congress to be unconstitutional.
Dred स्कॉट, an African-American स्लेव, had पूछा a United राज्य सर्किट Court to पुरस्कार him his freedom because he and his निपुण had resided in a state ( Illinois ) और a territory ( Wisconsin territory ) where slavery had been banned.
Chief Justice Roger Taney, लिखने for the अदालत, held that Scott, as a person of African ancestry, थी not a citizen of the संयुक्त States और therefore had no right to मुकदमा in federal court.
This पकड़कर थी contrary to the practice of numerous states at the समय, particularly Free राज्य, जहाँ फ़्री अश्वेतों किया in fact आनंद the rights of citizens, such as the right to vote and hold public दफ्तर.
in what is sometimes considered mere obiter कहावत, the Court गई on to hold कि कॉंग्रेस had no authority to prohibit slavery in federal territories because slaves are निजी property and the Fifth Amendment to the संविधान protects property owners विरूद्ध deprivation of their property without due प्रक्रम of law.
In reaching इस decision, taney had hoped to settle the growing controversy surrounding slavery in the संयुक्त States, but it had the opposite effect.
The निर्णय was fiercely debated across the country, as perhaps best सरंचनाओं by the Lincoln–Douglas debates of 1858.
अब्राहम Lincoln, the second-ever Republican nominee for President, was able to win the अध्यक्षीय election in 1860 ; the stopping of the further विस्तार of गुलामी was a key रिपब्लिकन party plank.
The decision निभाई an important role in the timing of state secession and the सिविल युद्ध, although it is extreme to कह the decision `` caused '' the युद्ध.
the decision is acknowledged for the influential role it played in altering the national राजनैतिक landscape : it is credited साथ launching Abraham Lincoln’s national political career and ultimately allowing for his election.
Although the परम् अदालत has never explicitly overruled the dred Scott मामला, the Court stated in the Slaughter-House मामले कि at तनिक one part of it था already been overruled by the Fourteenth amendment in 1868, which begins by stating, `` All persons born or देशीयकृत in the United राज्य, और विषय to the jurisdiction thereof, हैं citizens of the संयुक्त States और of the State wherein they reside. ''
To which the Court noted:
the first अवलोकन we have to make on this clause is, कि it puts at rest दोनो the सवाल जिससे we stated to have been the subject of मतभेद of opinion.
It declares that persons may be citizens of the United राज्य without regard to their citizenship of a particular राज्य, and it overturns the Dred स्कॉट निर्णय by making सब व्यक्तियों born within the United States and subject to its क्षेत्राधिकार citizens of the United States.
वहीँ are दर्जनों of पड़ोस in Columbus, Ohio.
कुछ are मुश्किल to define, as they encompass विशाल areas developed at different times—often with sub-neighborhoods within them.
Borders can also change based on लोकप्रिय समझना of the area, as खूब as the whims of the residents.
इस article uses data from the Datasourcecolumbus Web site, Spotcrime.com, HelloColumbus.com, as well as the various Columbus Area Commissions to define the various areas.
Excerpts and border information are drawn directly from the प्रमुख आलेख.
a biologist is a scientist who studies जीना organisms and their relationship to their environment.
biologists शामिल in basic research attempt to discover underlying mechanisms कि govern how जीवों work.
biologists involved in applied research attempt to develop or improve medical, industrial or agricultural processes.

आधार कूद, also sometimes written as b.a.s.e. कूद, is an activity जहाँ भागीदार jump from फिक्स्ड objects और use a पैराशूट to break their fall.
`` BASE '' is an एक्रोनिम that stands for चार categories of fixed objects from which एक can jump : इमारतें, antennas, spans ( पुलों ), और धरती ( cliffs ).

it has been the most popular breed of cat registered by the uk 's Governing Council of the Cat फैंसी ( GCCF ) since 2001, when it overtook the पारसी breed.
The USA Basketball Men 's Senior National Team, commonly known as the संयुक्त राज्य मेन 's नेशनल basketball team, represents the United States of America in international men 's बास्केट.
the USA is the most कामयाब team in international प्रतियोगिता, जीतना medals in all सत्रह Olympic tournaments it has डाला, coming दूर with चौदह golds.
Two of its gold medal-winning squads were inducted to the Naismith Memorial बास्केट हॉल of Fame as teams in August 2010—the 1960 टोली, which प्रदर्शित six Hall of Famers ( 4 players, 2 coaches ), and the 1992 `` सपना Team '', featuring 14 Hall of famers ( 11 players, 3 coaches ).
The संयुक्त States is फिलहाल क्रमित first in the FIBA World rankings.
Traditionally रचित of amateur players, a 1989 rule change by fiba allowed USA Basketball to field टीमों with पेशेवर players.
The first such team, ज्ञात as the `` सपना Team '', won the gold medal at the 1992 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in Barcelona, स्पेन, playing in the फाइनल against Croatia.
With the परिचय of professionals, the टोली was able to spark a second run of dominance after capturing तभी a कांस्य medal in 1988.
A team of पेशेवर players competed at the 1994 fiba World चैंपियनशिप, finishing first.
in 1996, 2000, 2008, and 2012 the USA again captured सुनहरा medals.
Facing increased प्रतियोगिता, the यूएसए failed to win a पदक at the 2002 FIBA World Championship, finishing sixth.
The 2004 गर्मियाँ ओलम्पिक टोली खोया three खेल on its way to a bronze medal, a रिकार्ड that represented more नुकसान in a single year than the country 's Olympic teams था suffered in all previous Olympiads combined.
संकल्पित to put an end to these failures, USA Basketball initiated a long-term project aimed at creating better, अधिक cohesive teams.
The USA जीती its first seven खेल at the 2006 FIBA World Championship in Japan before losing विरूद्ध यूनानियों in the semi-finals, ending the competition with the bronze medal.
The USA जीती gold two सालो later, though, at the 2008 Summer Olympics with a प्रबल performance.
This success was followed up at the 2010 FIBA World Championship, where despite fielding a roster featuring no खिलाड़ी from the 2008 Olympic टोली, the USA did not lose a single game en रूट to defeating मेजबान Turkey for the gold medal.
The USA जारी this streak of दबदबा by going undefeated और capturing gold once अधिक at the 2012 गर्मियाँ Olympics.

the Super Bowl ring is an award in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग given to the winners of the league 's annual World चैंपियनशिप game, the Super Bowl.
Since only one विंस Lombardi Trophy is awarded to the team ( ownership ) itself, the Super Bowl ring offers a collectible memento लिये the वास्तविक players and team members to keep for themselves to symbolize the विजय.

A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` dropping, trickling '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem that rises इससे the मंजिल of a limestone cave due to the टपकता of mineralized समाधान और the deposition of calcium carbonate.
इस stalagmite formation occurs तभी under निश्चित pH conditions भीतर the भूमिगत cavern.
The corresponding गठन on the छत of a गुफा is known as a stalactite.
if these formations grow together, the परिणाम is known as a कालम.
The Hall of Giants in the carlsbad caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched, since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the water solution onto the old surface ; skin oils can alter the surface where the mineral जल will cling, thus affecting the growth of the formation.
oils and dirt इससे human contact can also stain the formation and change इसके color permanently.
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes, associated with some types of lavacicles, although the mechanism of formation is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can भी form on concrete ceilings and floors, हालांकि they form much more rapidly वहीँ than in the natural cave environment.
The largest stalagmite in the world is ऊँची and is located in the cave of Cueva Martin Infierno, क्यूबा.
In the Zagros kyu of south इरान, approximately from the प्राचीन city of Bishapur, in the Shapur cave on the fourth of five terraces स्टैंड the 3rd century CE statue of Shapur I, second ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
The statue, carved from एक stalagmite, is nearly high.
How I Met Your माँ is an American sitcom that premiered on CBS on सितंबर 19, 2005.
The show was created by Craig Thomas और कार्टर bays.
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the साल 2030, when Ted Mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter ( lyndsy fonseca ) and son ( David Henrie ) to बताना them the story of how he met their mother.
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh radnor ) as a सिंगल, 27-year-old architect living साथ his दो best friends from Wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों, Marshall Eriksen ( Jason Segel ), a law student, and Lily Aldrin ( alyson Hannigan ), a kindergarten teacher, who have been dating for लगभग नौ years जब Marshall proposes.
Their engagement कल्याणकारी Ted to think परिचय finding उसके own soul mate, much to the disgust of his friend बार्नी stinson ( Neil पैट्रिक Harris ), a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job.
और thus, Ted begins his search लिये his perfect mate, और meets रोबिन Scherbatsky ( कोबी Smulders ), whom he also befriends.
the 100th episode of How I Met Your Mother aired on जनवरी 11, 2010.
On दिसम्बर 21, 2012, the series थी renewed for a नवीं season.

Gringo (,, ) is a कठबोली स्पेनी and पुर्तगाली word used in Ibero-America, to denote foreigners, प्रायः from the United States.
The term can be applied to someone who is दरअसल a foreigner, or it can denote a strong association or assimilation into foreign ( particularly us ) समाज and culture.
In Spanish it does नहीं have a negative connotation.
Roger Axtell, a travel etiquette expert, notes कि `` [ t ] he शब्द gringo is नहीं necessarily a bad word.
It is slang but is derogatory only in its use और context. ''
The word was used in Spain long before it crossed the Atlantic to denote foreign, non-native speakers of Spanish.
the great white shark, carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great white, white pointer, white shark, or श्वेत death, is a species of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal सतह waters of all the major oceans.
The great श्वेत shark is mainly ज्ञात for इसके size, with the largest individuals ज्ञात to have approached or exceeded in length, and in वज़न.
This shark पहुँच its परिपक्वता around 15 सालो of आयु और can have a जीवन स्पैन of over 30 years.
The ग्रेट white shark is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish, and is एक of the primary परभक्षी of समुद्री mammals.
it is also ज्ञात to prey upon a variety of other marine पशु, including मछली and seabirds.
It is the तभी known surviving प्रजाति of its genus Carcharodon, and is क्रमित first in having the सबसे हमले on humans.
The आईयूसीएन सूची the great white shark as a vulnerable species, while it is included in Appendix ii of CITES.
The bestselling अनोखा Jaws by Peter benchley and the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर film by स्टीवन Spielberg चित्रित the great श्वेत शार्क as a `` ferocious man भक्षक ``.
In वास्तविकता, इंसानो हैं not the preferred शिकार of the ग्रेट श्वेत shark.
the संयुक्त राज्य Armed शक्तियां are the military forces of the United States of America.
They consist of the फौज, Navy, Marine Corps, Air फ़ोर्स, and coast गार्ड.
The U.S. has a दमदार tradition of civilian control of the सैन्य.
The अध्यक्ष is the सैन्य 's overall head, और helps form military नीति with the U.S. विभाग of Defense ( DoD ), a संघीय कार्यपालिका विभाग, acting as the principal organ by which military policy is carried out.
the dod is headed by the Secretary of Defense, who is a civilian और Cabinet member.
The Defense Secretary is second in the सैन्य 's chain of कमांड, बस नीचे the President, and serves as the प्रिंसिपल सहायक to the President in सब DoD-related matters.
to निर्देशांक military कार्रवाई साथ कूटनीति, the President has an सलाहकार National सुरक्षा Council headed by a National Security Advisor.
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint chiefs of स्टाफ, which includes the head of प्रत्येक of the Defense Department 's service शाखाओं as खूब as the मुख्य of the नेशनल Guard ब्यूरो.
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff और the Vice अध्यक्ष of the Joint chiefs of Staff.
The कमांडेंट of the Coast Guard is not a सदस्य of the संयुक्त Chiefs of स्टाफ.
All of the branches work together दौरान operations and संयुक्त missions, under the Unified Combatant Commands, अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the Secretary of रक्षा with the exception of the Coast Guard.
The Coast गार्ड falls अंतर्गत the administration of the Department of Homeland Security and receives इसके operational orders from the सचिव of मातृभूमि Security.
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the विभाग of the Navy by the President or Congress during a time of war.
सब five armed सेवाएं are among the seven uniformed services of the United States ; the अन्य are the U.S. Public स्वास्थ्य Service Commissioned corps and the National Oceanic और वायुमंडलीय Administration commissioned corps.
From the time of its inception, the military played a decisive role in the इतिहास of the United States.
A sense of national unity and identity थी forged as a result of victory in the First Barbary War and the Second Barbary युद्ध.
Even so, the Founders were संदिग्ध of a स्थाई military force and not जबतक the outbreak of संसार War II did a large खड़ा army become officially established.
the National सुरक्षा Act of 1947, अपनाया following World War II and दौरान the Cold War 's onset, निर्मित the modern U.S. military framework ; the Act मिलाया previously Cabinet-level Department of War and the विभाग of the नेवी into the National Military Establishment ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ), headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and निर्मित the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council.
the U.S. military is one of the largest militaries in terms of क्रमांक of कर्मियों.
It draws its manpower from a विशाल pool of paid volunteers ; although conscription रै been प्रयुक्त in the past in various टाइम्स of both war and peace, it has not been प्रयुक्त since 1972.
as of 2013, the u.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund its सैन्य forces, और appropriates approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations.
put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the world 's military expenditures.
the U.S. हथियारबंद Forces as a whole possess large quantities of advanced और powerful उपकरण, along साथ widespread placement of forces around the संसार, giving them significant सामर्थ्य in दोनो defense and शक्ति projection.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's राय and विचार using one 's देह और property to anyone who is willing to प्राप्त them.
The term freedom of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes used synonymously, but शामिल any अधिनियम of seeking, receiving और imparting सूचना or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
in practice, the right to स्वतंत्रता of speech is not निरपेक्ष in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, राजद्रोह ( including, लिये example inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright उल्लंघन, revelation of information that is classified or वरना.
The right to स्वतंत्रता of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the सार्वभौमिक Declaration of इंसान Rights and recognized in international इंसान rights विधि in the International Covenant on सिविल and Political अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
आलेख 19 of the ICCPR states कि `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold राय without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the सही to freedom of expression ; this right shall include स्वतंत्रता to seek, receive और impart information और ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any अन्य media of उसके choice ''.
आलेख 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special कर्तव्य and responsibilities `` and may `` इसलिए be विषय to certain प्रतिबंध '' जब necessary `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of others '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल security or of public order ( अनुक्रम पब्लिक ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious विधिक प्रणालियों and in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense, such as the British जातिगत and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
the बिग Bang Theory लोगो.
The बिग Bang सिद्धान्त is an American comedy television श्रेणी created और executive उत्पादित by Chuck Lorre और विधेयक Prady.
जैसे the नाम of the series itself, साथ the exception of the first episode— '' Pilot '' —episode शीर्षक of The Big बंग सिद्धान्त always start साथ `` the '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a प्लाट point or quirk.
, 133 episodes have aired.
the Big Bang सिद्धान्त has been renewed for a seventh season.
ड्वाइट दाउद `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced, ; अक्तूबर 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) was the 34th President of the United States from 1953 until 1961.
He had previously महरूम a five-star general in the United राज्य Army during World War ii और परोसा as Supreme Commander of the Allied शक्तियां in Europe ; he had responsibility for नियोजन और supervising the invasion of North अफ़्रीकी in Operation Torch in 1942–43 और the successful आक्रमण of France और Germany in 1944–45 इससे the पश्चिमी सामने.
In 1951, he became the पहला supreme commander of NATO.
आइज़नहावर was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large family in Kansas by अभिभावक with a robust कार्य ethic and धार्मिक पृष्ठभूमि.
As एक of six sons, he थी conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल जिससे instilled self-reliance.
he attended और ग्रैजुएट from वेस्ट पाइंट और later married and had दो sons.
After World War ii, आइज़नहावर served as फौज Chief of Staff अंतर्गत President Harry S. Truman, then assumed the post of President at Columbia University.
आइज़नहावर डाला the 1952 अध्यक्षीय race as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of सीनेटर रॉबर्ट A. Taft और to crusade against `` साम्यवादी, Korea और भ्रष्टाचार ''.
He won by a landslide, defeating Democrat Adlai stevenson और ending दो दशकों of the नई Deal Coalition.
In the first साल of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, Eisenhower deposed the leader of Iran in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China.
His नई Look policy of नाभिकीय deterrence gave प्रधानता to inexpensive नाभिकीय weapons while reducing the funding लिये conventional सैन्य शक्तियां ; the goal was to रखना दबाव on the Soviet Union और reduce संघीय deficits.
in 1954, Eisenhower पहला articulated the domino theory in his description of the threat प्रस्तुत by the स्प्रेड of communism.
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution, which सक्रिय him to prevent चाइनीज communist aggression against Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. नीति of defending Taiwan.
When the soviets launched Sputnik in 1957, he had to खेल catch-up in the space race.
आइज़नहावर forced Israel, the uk, और फ़्रांस to end their invasion of Egypt during the स्वेज Crisis of 1956.
In 1958, he sent 15,000 US सैनिकों to Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western government from falling to a Nasser -inspired क्रान्ति.
निकट the end of his पद, उसके efforts to set up a summit meeting with the soviets collapsed because of the U-2 incident.
on the domestic सामने, he covertly opposed Joseph मैकार्थी and contributed to the समाप्त of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern विस्तारित संस्करण of कार्यपालिका विशेषाधिकार.
he वरना बाएँ most राजनैतिक activity to his Vice अध्यक्ष, Richard Nixon.
He was a moderate conservative who continued नई सौदे एजेंसियों and expanded Social Security.
Among his enduring innovations, he launched the Interstate Highway प्रणाली ; the Defense Advanced Research प्रोजेक्ट Agency ( DARPA ), which led to the internet, among many invaluable आउटपुट ; the National Aeronautics and स्पेस Administration ( नासा ), driving शांतिपूर्ण discovery in space ; the स्थापना of strong science education via the नेशनल Defense Education अधिनियम ; और प्रोत्साहित peaceful use of नाभिकीय power via amendments to the Atomic उर्जा Act.
In social नीति, he sent federal सैनिकों to Little Rock, Arkansas, for the first समय चूंकि Reconstruction to enforce संघीय court आदेश to desegregate पब्लिक schools.
he also हस्ताक्षरित civil अधिकारों विधान in 1957 and 1960 to protect the right to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two सालो and made five नियुक्ति to the परम् Court.
He थी the first term-limited president in accordance with the 22nd Amendment.
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful ones लिये the most part and saw considerable आर्थिक prosperity except for a sharp मंदी in 1958–59.
Eisenhower is प्रायः ranked highly among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force One is the official air ट्रैफ़िक control call sign of a United States एयर Force aircraft carrying the President of the संयुक्त States.
In आम parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft specifically designed, built, and प्रयुक्त लिये the purpose of transporting the अध्यक्ष.
the Presidential aircraft is a prominent प्रतीक of the American प्रेसिडेंसी and इसके power.
The idea of designating विशिष्ट सैन्य वायुयान to हस्तांतरण the President arose in 1943, जब officials of the United States फौज एयर शक्तियां – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned साथ relying on commercial एयरलाइंस to transport the अध्यक्ष.
a C-87 मुक्तिवादी Express was reconfigured for उपयोग as a presidential transport ; however, it was अस्वीकृत by the Secret Service amid concerns over the वायुयान 's safety record.
A c-54 Skymaster was then converted for presidential use ; this वायुयान, उतावले the पवित्र Cow, transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the yalta Conference in फ़रवरी 1945, and was subsequently used लिये another दो years by President Harry S. Truman.
The `` Air Force एक '' call sign was created after a 1953 incident during which a flight carrying President Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a वाणिज्यिक airline उड़ान using the same कॉल sign.
Several aircraft have been used as Air फ़ोर्स One since the creation of the presidential fleet, including दो Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s और 1970s, respectively ; since 1990, the अध्यक्षीय fleet has consisted of two Boeing vc-25as – specifically configured, अत्यधिक customized बोइंग 747-200b series aircraft.
the एयर Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 वायुयान with three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017.
a wedding anniversary is the anniversary of the date a wedding took प्लेस.
Traditional names exist for सबसे of them : लिये उदाहरण, 50 years of marriage is called a `` सुनहरी wedding anniversary '' or बस a `` golden anniversary ''.
A scanner with Duplexing Automatic दस्तावेज़ Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one printers, fax machines, photocopiers and scanners, an स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ feeder or ADF is a feature which takes अनेक pages और feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier, allowing the user to scan, and thereby नक़ल, print, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to हस्तचालित replace each पेज.
Most copiers allow scanning on the flatbed or platen ( the `` कांच '' ) or through a document फीडर.
The vast majority of fax मशीने have an ADF, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, कुछ fax machine स्वामी use the फैक्स machine as a scanner, faxing multi-page documents to themselves.
Document feeders हैं described by speed, in pages per minute or ppm, and capacity, प्रायः in a range from 10 चादरें to 200.
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or RADF scans one side of a page, तब flips it और scans the other side.
A duplexing automatic दस्तावेज़ feeder or dadf scans both sides in एक pass.
The advantage of the DADF is faster speed for two-sided originals.
radfs और DADFs are rated in बिंब per minute ( IPM ), the number of sides वे can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational and शैक्षणिक जटिल स्तिथ in Dallas, Texas ( USA ).
The जटिल is registered as a डलास Landmark, National Historic Landmark और is home to nine museums, six प्रदर्शन facilities, a लैगून, and the largest फेरिस व्हील in North America.
अनेक of the buildings on the complex were constructed for the Texas centennial Exposition in 1936 which drew over six लाख visitors.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still survive and it is recognized as a significant उदाहरण of Art डेको architecture.
Fair Park has महरूम designated a ग्रेट Place in America by the अमरीकी नियोजन Association.
The अमरीकी नियोजन Association ( APA ) “is an independent, not-for-profit educational organization कि provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places in अमरीकी program helps to celebrate areas with “exemplary character, quality, and planning.”
Being designated as a Great Place in अमेरिका, Fair Park was एक of only टेन शहरों chosen in 2011.
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. जोसेफ ) is the third-largest city in California, the tenth-largest in the U.S., and the काउंटी सीट of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern end of सैन Francisco खाड़ी.
San Jose is the largest city भीतर Silicon Valley, which is a major component of the greater सैन Francisco खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, a region of 8.4 लाख people and the पांचवां largest metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ( CSA ) in the संयुक्त राज्य.
it is the largest city in Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
सैन Jose was founded on नवम्बर 29, 1777, as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe, the first civilian town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, which later became alta California.
The नगर served as a खेती community to support Spanish military installations at San Francisco और Monterey.
जब California gained statehood in 1850, San Jose served as इसके पहला पूंजी.
बाद more than 150 सालो as a small farming city, सैन Jose और the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( और largest ) संलग्न area of undeveloped जमीन surrounding the सैन Francisco Bay.
सैन Jose अनुभवी increased demand लिये housing from soldiers and veterans returning from World War II.
San Jose then continued इसके aggressive expansion during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing अधिक जमीन area.
The rapid विकास of the high-technology and electronics उद्योग further accelerated the transition from an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
By the 1990s, सैन जोस 's location within the booming local technology उद्योग अर्जित the नगर its उपनाम, Capital of Silicon Valley.
San Jose now maintains global city status और is the largest नगर in the San Francisco खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें of population, land क्षेत्रफल, and industrial development.
The u.S. Census Bureau reported the population of the city to be 945,942 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
As of April 2013, the estimated population of सैन Jose was 984,000.
San Jose, along साथ the सांता Clara Valley, experienced परिचय half a सदी of spectacular suburban sprawl, with characteristics of intense urbanization similar to the लॉस एंजिल्स area of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The city रै taken definite steps to avoid बनने `` L.A. उत्तर ''.
However, the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los Angeles by उपायों such as population घनत्व and public पारगमन सुरक्षा, investment, और ridership.
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the लोगों inhabiting the European continent since it was first आबादी in प्रागैतिहासिक times to present, with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 bc.
the earliest settlers to Prehistoric Europe आए during the paleolithic era.
The arrival of कृषि around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic आयु.
Neolithic Europe lasted लिये 4000 सालो, overlapping साथ metal-using cultures that gradually स्प्रेड throughout the continent.
Technological advances during the prehistoric आयु tended to arrive इससे the Middle East, spreading gradually to the northwest.
Some of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric यूरोपीय were मिनोआई and Mycenaean, जिससे flourished दौरान the कांस्य Age until वे collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as classical antiquity began with the rise of the city-states of Ancient Greece.
Greek influence reached इसके zenith अंतर्गत the expansive साम्राज्य of Alexander the Great, spreading throughout Asia.
उत्तरी and पश्चिमी Europe यहूद dominated by the la Tène संस्कृति, a precursor to the Celts.
Rome, a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC, would grow to become the रोमन Republic in 509 BC and होता succeed यूनानी संस्कृति as the dominant Mediterranean civilization.
The events of the rule of Julius Caesar led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire.
the empire was later divided by the सम्राट Diocletian into the Western and Eastern empires.
दौरान the बाद सालो of the Roman Empire, the germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated हमले led to the Fall of the पश्चिमी Roman साम्राज्य in AD 476, a तिथि जिससे traditionally marks the समाप्त of the classical period and the प्रारंभ of the Middle Ages.
During the Middle Ages, the Eastern रोमन Empire बच, though आधुनिक historians refer to इस state as the Byzantine Empire.
In Western Europe, Germanic peoples स्थानांतरित into positions of शक्ति in the remnants of the former Western Roman साम्राज्य and established kingdoms and empires of उनके own.
Of all of the germanic peoples, the Franks would rise to a स्थिति of Hegemony over western Europe, the Frankish साम्राज्य reaching इसके peak अंतर्गत Charlemagne around AD 800.
francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the Kingdom of France, जबकि East francia would evolve into the पावन Roman Empire, a precursor to modern जर्मनी.
the अंग्रेजों Isles यहूद the site of several large-scale migrations.
देशी Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the काल of Roman Britain, and when the Romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों Isles during the 400s, waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern ब्रिटेन and established a series of petty kingdoms in कया would eventually develop into the Kingdom of इंग्लैण्ड by ad 927.
During this period, the Kingdom of Poland and किंगडम of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद organized as well.
the viking आयु, a period of migrations of Scandinavian peoples, वर्चस्व the काल इससे the late 700s to the मध्य 1000s.
Chief among the Viking states थी the Empire of Cnut the ग्रेट, a Danish leader who would become किंग of England, Denmark, and Norway.
The Normans, a Viking people जो settled in उत्तरी France and founded the duchy of normandy, would have a significant प्रभाव on many parts of Europe, from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and सिसिली.
Another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, होता go on to मिला Kievan Rus ', an early राज्य which was a precursor लिये the modern देश of Russia.
As the Viking Age drew to a close, the period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously-motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian नियम, began.
Several Crusader states यहूद संस्थापित in the eastern Mediterranean.
ये यहूद all short-lived.
the Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of यूरोपीय.
Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
Extinct dog breeds is a compilation of श्वान breeds that have become extinct.
Wii बोलो is a microphone accessory for Nintendo 's वी video game console.
Connected to the console via USB, the यंत्र can be placed near the वीडियो display, allowing voice chat to be conducted with the संपूर्ण room.
The device features an LED to indicate when the माइक्रोफोन is active.
Wii बोलो was घोषित at निन्टेंडो 's 2008 E3 media drug.
It was released separately and bundled with Animal Crossing : City Folk on November 16, 2008, in North America, और was released on December 5, 2008, in यूरोपीय.
The Wii बोलो accessory is succeeded by the अंतःस्थापित microphone on the Wii U 's GamePad controller.
Nissan Intelligent key®
a smart key is an electronic अभिगम और authorization system जिससे is available as an option or standard in several cars.
It was पहला विकसित by Siemens in the mid-1990s और introduced by mercedes-benz अंतर्गत the नाम `` Keyless Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following इसके design पेटेंट filed by Daimler-Benz on may 17, 1997.
univisión ( ) is a spanish-language टेलीविज़न संजाल in the United States.
The संजाल is primarily dedicated for Latin अमरीकी families जो reside in the United States.
It has the largest audience of spanish-language टेलीविज़न दर्शक in the world according to Nielsen ratings.
Randy falco, ( CEO as of June 29, 2011 ) COO, has been in charge of the company since the प्रस्थान of univision संचार president और सीईओ Joe Uva in अप्रैल 2010.
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's पाँच प्रमुख English-language television संजाल, and is often a दमदार fifth, outranking the cw, with कुछ fourth-place weekly placings, और as of 2012, even first place rankings for individual कार्यक्रम over all पाँच अंग्रेज़ी networks due to the network 's consistent अनुसूची of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in नई York, and has इसके प्रमुख studios, production सुविधाएं, and operations in doral, Florida, a उपनगरीय of Miami.
in 2009, another television studio was announced, Univision Studios, to be built in doral.
univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country, साथ local stations in over 50 markets साथ विशाल Hispanic and लातीनी populations and a national केबल network फीड distributed in markets बगैर either the availability or the demand लिये a locally-based स्टेशन.
सबसे of these stations air full लोकल news and अन्य local programming in addition to network shows, and in major markets such as लॉस Angeles, New यॉर्क, and मियामी the लोकल newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated station ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive साथ their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim saban 's saban Capital Group ( जो had previously owned the entity saban Entertainment ), TPG पूंजी, L.P., Providence Equity साझेदार, Madison Dearborn साझेदार, and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 अरब or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired कर्ज़.
The buyout left the कम्पनी with a debt level of twelve times इसके annual cash flow, which was twice the norm in buyouts किया over the previous two years.
Artist 's conception of a आदिग्रह disk
the गठन and of the Solar प्रणाली is अनुमानित to have begun 4.6 अरब सालो पहले with the gravitational collapse of a small भाग of a दानव molecular cloud.
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre, forming the Sun, जबकि the बाकी flattened into a protoplanetary disk out of which the planets, moons, asteroids, और other small Solar System bodies formed.
This widely accepted model, known as the nebular परिकल्पना, was first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel Kant, और pierre-simon लाप्लास.
Its subsequent development रै interwoven a किस्में of scientific disciplines including astronomy, physics, geology, and planetary विज्ञान.
Since the भोर of the स्पेस आयु in the 1950s और the discovery of extrasolar planets in the 1990s, the model रै been दोनो challenged and परिष्कृत to खाता for new observations.
the Solar System रै evolved considerably चूंकि its आरंभिक formation.
Many moons have formed from circling discs of गैस and dust around उनके parent ग्रह, जबकि अन्य moons are thought to have formed independently and later been captured by their planets.
Still others, as the धरती 's चंद्रमा, may be the result of giant collisions.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the present day and have been सेंट्रल to the एवोल्यूशन of the Solar System.
The स्थितियाँ of the planets प्रायः shifted, and planets have switched places.
This planetary migration is now thought to have महरूम responsible लिये much of the सौर System 's early evolution.
In roughly 5 अरब सालो, the सूर्य होगा cool और expand outward many टाइम्स its वर्तमान diameter ( बनने a रेड giant ), before ढलाई बंद its बाहरी layers as a planetary nebula and leaving पीछे a तारकीय remnant known as a white dwarf.
in the far distant future, the gravity of passing stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets.
Some ग्रह होगा be destroyed, अन्य ejected into अंतरतारकीय space.
Ultimately, over the कोर्स of tens of billions of years, it is संभावित that the Sun होगा be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it.
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German शीर्षक :, later as, और ) is a अनोखा written by Franz Kafka in 1914 और 1915 but नहीं published until 1925.
एक of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the स्टोरी of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, inaccessible authority, साथ the nature of उसके अपराधों revealed to neither him nor the reader.
जैसे काफ्का 's other novels, The विचारण was never समाप्त, हालांकि it करता include a अध्याय जिससे brings the story to an end.
Because of this वहीँ हैं certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel, such as disparities in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration.
After काफ्का 's death in 1924 his dost and literary executor Max Brod edited the text लिये प्रकाशन by Verlag Die Schmiede.
The original manuscript is आयोजित at the संग्रहालय of आधुनिक Literature, Marbach am Neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the किताब थी listed in Le mondes 100 Books of the Century and as No. 2 of the Best जर्मनी Novels of the Twentieth सदी.
लिसा Anne Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an American singer-songwriter और actress.
She launched उसके career in 1994 with the song, `` रहो ( I Missed You ) ``, which was included in the film वास्तविकता Bites.
वो was the first artist to have a क्रमांक one सिंगल in the United राज्य while नहीं signed to a recording contract.
Her पाँच studio CDs include her प्रमुख लेबल debut, the gold-selling Tails और its follow-up, the grammy-nominated, gold-selling Firecracker.
Loeb has also worked in फिल्मी, television, voice-over work and children’s रिकार्डिंग.
लोएब has appeared in दो television series, Dweezil & Lisa, a साप्ताहिक culinary एडवेंचर for the Food संजाल and Number 1 Single, a वास्तविकता show on the E !
Network in 2006 केन्द्रित on उसके quest for love, success, career, और family.
Her children 's music शामिल the albums कैच the Moon ( 2003 ), and Camp Lisa ( 2008 ).
Her first joint children 's किताब और album Lisa Loeb 's Silly Sing-Along : the Disappointing पैनकेक and अन्य zany गीतों थी published in 2011.
In 2010 she संस्थापित the लिसा Loeb Eyewear Collection, जिससे is based on her अपना designs.
The Coat of arms of the State of New Jersey includes:
a shield with three plows emblazoned, representative of नई Jersey 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing नाईट 's helmet.
a horse 's head as the crest of the helmet.
The मादा figures Liberty and Ceres, प्रतिनिधि of the राज्य 's motto ( देखिए next मद ).
स्वतंत्रता is holding a staff supporting a `` liberty cap `` ; Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the पैर of the emblem contains the State Motto of नई जर्सी, `` Liberty and Prosperity '', and the year of statehood, 1776.
it was originally designed by Pierre Eugene du Simitiere in 1777 and was modified slightly in 1928.
The seal is the central motif in the ध्वज of New जर्सी and the ग्रेट Seal of the राज्य of New जर्सी.
the कोट of arms contains a horse 's सिर.
A helmet प्रर्दशित that New Jersey governs itself तदनुसार and three plows on a शील्ड referring to the State 's कृषि परंपरा, giving it the nickname `` Garden राज्य ''.
The two देवियाँ represent the State motto, `` Liberty and Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the left.
She is पकड़कर a staff with a liberty cap on it, and the word स्वतंत्रता underneath her.
The देवी on the right is Ceres, goddess of कृषि.
She is पकड़कर a cornucopia with prosperity written below her.
according to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11, 1896, the date in which the Assembly officially स्वीकृत the flag as the state emblem, the buff color is due indirectly to जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, who had ordered on October 2, 1779, that the वर्दी coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had जबतक तब महरूम reserved तभी for उसके own uniform और those of other Continental generals and their aides.
Then, on February 28, 1780, the महाद्वीपीय War Officers in Philadelphia directed that the uniform कोट facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background रंग of the regiments ' राज्य flag.

`` we Can Work It Out '' is a song by the Beatles, लिखा by पॉल McCartney और John Lennon.
it was released as a `` double A-sided `` single with `` Day Tripper ``, the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial release.
Both songs were recorded during the रबर आत्मा सत्र.
The सोंग is an उदाहरण of lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a depth कि happened only rarely after they लिखा the hit singles of 1963.
इस song, `` A Day in the Life ``, `` Baby, तुम 're a समृद्ध Man `` and `` I 've Got a Feeling ``, हैं among the notable exceptions.
As a चिकित्सा diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric विकार in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, हालांकि specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point लिये prepubescence to age 13 ).
an adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at least पाँच years older than the prepubescent child before the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term रै a range of definitions, as found in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, and law प्रवर्तन.
the International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` विकार of adult personality and behaviour '' in जिससे there is a sexual preference for children of prepubertal or जल्दी pubertal आयु.
According to the निदान and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( dsm ), it is a paraphilia in जिससे वयस्कों or adolescents 16 years of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र and recurrent यौन urges towards and fantasies परिचय prepubescent children that they have either acted on or जिससे कारण उन्हें distress or interpersonal difficulty.
in popular usage, pedophilia means कोई sexual interest in children or the act of child sexual abuse, प्रायः termed `` pedophilic behavior ''.
For example, The अमरीकी विरासत Stedman 's Medical शब्दकोष राज्य, `` pedophilia is the act or fantasy on the भाग of an वयस्क of engaging in यौन activity with a child or children. ''
This common use application also extends to the यौन interest in और sexual contact with रोमिल or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise उपयोग be avoided क्युकी although people जो कमिट child यौन abuse commonly exhibit the disorder, some offenders do नहीं मिलें the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and ये standards pertain to prepubescents.
Additionally, not सब pedophiles दरअसल commit such गाली.
pedophilia was first formally recognized and named in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of research in the area has लिया place since the 1980s.
Although ज़्यादातर प्रलेखित in men, वहीँ are भी महिलाओं जो exhibit the disorder, and researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the सच्चा number of female pedophiles.
No cure लिये pedophilia रै महरूम विकसित, but वहीँ are therapies कि can reduce the incidence of a person committing चाइल्ड यौन abuse.
In the संयुक्त States, following Kansas v. Hendricks, sex offenders who are diagnosed with certain mental विकार, particularly pedophilia, can be विषय to indefinite civil प्रतिबद्धता, अंतर्गत various state laws ( generically called SVP कानून ) and the संघीय Adam वाल्श Child सुरक्षा and सुरक्षा Act of 2006.
at उपस्थित, the exact causes of pedophilia have not been conclusively established.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated with several अलग neurological abnormalities, and often co-exists with other व्यक्तित्व विकार and psychological pathologies.
in the contexts of forensic मनोविज्ञान and law enforcement, a किस्में of typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
जूलियो César chávez ( born Julio César Chávez González on July 12, 1962 ) is a रिटायर्ड Mexican professional boxer.
Chávez is considered by many people for their खेल statistics the greatest fighter ever to come out of मैक्सिको.
He is a six-time world champion in three वज़न divisions, और for several सालो he was माना एक of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a career that spanned over 25 सालो, Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, WBC Lightweight in 1988, wbc लाइट Welterweight in 1989, IBF Light welterweight in 1990, and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994.
He holds रिकॉर्ड for most कामयाब consecutive defenses of संसार titles ( 27 ), most title झगड़े ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis साथ ( 23 ) लिये most title defenses जीती by knockout ( 21 ).
Chávez also has the longest undefeated streak in मुक्केबाज़ी history, 13 सालो.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie Randall और had an 87 fight win streak जबतक his `` draw '' with Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was ज्ञात लिये उसके outstanding punching शक्ति, devastating body attack, remarkably दमदार chin and the relentless stalking of his प्रतिद्वंद्वियों.
He बाँधने # 24 on ESPN 's 50 Greatest Boxers of All Time.
On December 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय Boxing Hall of Fame for the क्लास of 2011.
He is the father of prospect ओमर Chávez and पूर्व WBC Middleweight Champion Julio césar Chávez, Jr.

The Holocaust ( from the यूनानी ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also ज्ञात as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, HaShoah, `` catastrophe '' ; यहूदी :, Churben or hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the mass murder or genocide of approximately six million यहूदियों during World युद्ध II, a programme of systematic state-sponsored हत्या by Nazi Germany, led by Adolf Hitler और the Nazi Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe before the Holocaust, approximately two-thirds were killed.
Over एक million यहूदी children यहूद killed in the Holocaust, as were लगभग two million Jewish women and तीन million Jewish मेन.
A संजाल of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory were used to concentrate, थाम, and मार Jews और other पीड़ितों.
Some scholars argue कि the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the परिभाषा, and some use the common noun `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य Nazi mass murders, including those of Soviet prisoners of war, पॉलिश and Soviet civilians, और homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the पतन of the सोवियत संघ indicates some ten to eleven million civilians and बंदियों of war यहूद intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution and genocide were carried out in stages.
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society, most prominently the nuremberg Laws, यहूद enacted in Germany सालो पहले the outbreak of World युद्ध II.
Concentration camps यहूद established in which inmates were subjected to slave labor जबतक वे died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe, specialized units called Einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and political opponents in द्रव्यमान shootings.
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos before being transported by freight train to extermination शिविरों where, if वे survived the journey, सबसे were systematically killed in gas chambers.
प्रत्येक arm of Germany 's अफसरशाही was involved in the logistics that led to the genocides, turning the Third Reich into what एक Holocaust scholar रै called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-h in the United राज्य is a युवावस्था organization administered by the National Institute of Food and कृषि of the संयुक्त States Department of कृषि ( USDA ), with the mission of `` engaging youth to पहुँचें their fullest संभावित while advancing the field of youth विकास. ''
the नाम represents four personal development areas of focus for the संगठन : head, दिल, हैंड्स, and health.
The organization has over 6.5 लाख सदस्यों in the United राज्य, from ages five to twenty-one, in लगभग 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-H is to develop नागरिकता, नेतृत्व, responsibility और जीवन कौशल of youth through experiential learning programs and a positive युवावस्था विकास दृष्टिकोण.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its history, 4-H today focuses on citizenship, healthy living, science, engineering, और technology programs.
Today, 4-h और related programs मौजूद in over eighty countries around the world ; the organization and प्रशासन varies from देश to country.
Each of ये programs operates independently, but cooperatively through international exchanges, global education कार्यक्रम, and communications.
The 4-H motto is `` To मेक the best better '', while इसके slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes लिखा as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
the national flag of चिली, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of श्वेत and red and a blue वर्गाकार the same height as the white band in the canton, जिससे bears a white five-pointed star in the center.
It was अपनाया on 18 October 1817.
The Chilean ध्वज is भी ज्ञात in Spanish as La Estrella solitaria ( The लोन Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; ब्लू symbolizes the sky and the Pacific Ocean, white is for the snow-covered Andes, and रेड स्टैंड for the रक्त spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La araucana, the colors यहूद derived from those from the ध्वज flown by the mapuche during the arauco युद्ध.
`` ध्वज Day '' is आयोजित each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 बैटल of La Concepción.

वहीँ are no precise dates for जब Generation Y starts और ends.
