Virginia ( ), officially the राष्ट्रमंडल of वर्जिनिया, is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the South Atlantic region of the United States.
वर्जिनिया is nicknamed the `` Old डोमिनियन '' and the `` Mother of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों born there.
The geography and जलवायु of the Commonwealth are shaped by the ब्लू Ridge kyu और the chesapeake Bay, जिससे provide habitat लिये much of इसके flora और fauna.
the capital of the राष्ट्रमंडल is Richmond ; and वर्जिनिया Beach is the सबसे populous city.
Fairfax County is the most populous political subdivision.
the wealthiest is loudoun काउंटी.
the राष्ट्रमंडल 's population is over आठ लाख.
The क्षेत्रफल 's history begins साथ several indigenous groups, सहित the Powhatan.
In 1607 the लंदन Company established the Colony of वर्जिनिया as the first permanent New World English उपनिवेश.
स्लेव labor और the जमीन acquired from displaced Native अमरीकी tribes each निभाई a significant भूमिका in the colony 's जल्दी politics and वृक्षारोपण अर्थव्यवस्था.
Virginia was एक of the 13 colonies in the अमरीकी Revolution and joined the Confederacy in the अमरीकी Civil युद्ध, दौरान which रिचमंड was made the Confederate capital and वर्जिनिया 's northwestern counties seceded to form the राज्य of West Virginia.
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction, both major national पार्टियों हैं competitive in modern Virginia.
The वर्जिनिया सामान्य Assembly is the oldest विधानमंडल in the Western गोलार्ध.
The राज्य government has been repeatedly ranked most effective by the pew Center on the States.
It is अद्वितीय in how it ट्रीट cities और counties equally, manages लोकल सड़कें, and prohibits इसके governors from serving consecutive terms.
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : कृषि in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal एजेंसियों in Northern Virginia, including the headquarters of the Department of रक्षा और सीआईए ; and सैन्य सुविधाएं in Hampton Roads, the site of the प्रदेश 's main seaport.
वर्जिनिया 's public स्कूलों and अनेक कॉलेजों और universities have contributed to growing media और technology sectors.
As a result, computer चिप्स have become the राज्य 's leading export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie मेकर, codenamed Sundance ) is a freeware video editing तन्त्र by Microsoft.
It is a भाग of Windows Essentials तन्त्र सुइट और offers the ability to create और edit वीडियो as well as to प्रकाशित उन्हें on SkyDrive, Facebook, YouTube, and फ्लिकर.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single by Tupac Shakur, and tenth track इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, 2Pacalypse अभी.
the सोंग, which सुविधाएँ R & B singer डेव Hollister, is परिचय a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who lives in a ghetto, has a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
the सोंग explores the issue of teen pregnancy and its effect on the young mothers and उनके परिवारों.
Like अनेक of Shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's Got a baby '' draws from the plight of the impoverished.
Using Brenda to represent यंग mothers in सामान्य, Shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father, the government, and समाज in general.
Shakur wrote the सोंग when he read a समाचारपत्र article about a twelve-year-old लड़की who got pregnant from her cousin and, because वो did not want उसके parents to know about the baby, threw it in a trash can.
The official लोगो of पोकीमॉन लिये its international release ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी लिये the असली Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a मीडिया franchise published and owned by Japanese वीडियो game company Nintendo और created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games developed by खेल Freak, Pokémon has since become the second-most successful और lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind तभी Nintendo 's own Mario franchise.
पोकीमॉन properties have since महरूम merchandised into दुश्मनी, manga, trading ताश, खिलौने, किताबे, and अन्य media.
the franchise celebrated in 2006, और, संचयी sales of the वीडियो games ( सहित home console संस्करण, ऐसे as the `` Pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have reached more than 200 million नक़ल.
in November 2005, 4kids Entertainment, जिससे had प्रबंधित the non-game related licensing of Pokémon, announced that it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement.
Pokémon USA inc. ( now The Pokémon Company अंतरराष्ट्रीय ), a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co., अभी oversees all Pokémon लाइसेंसिंग बाहर of एशिया.
The name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the Japanese brand.
the पद पोकीमॉन, in addition to referring to the पोकीमॉन franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in पोकीमॉन media as of the release of the fifth generation शीर्षक Pokémon Black 2 और White 2 ; with the upcoming रिलीज of पोकीमॉन x and Y, 6 नई Pokémon have been featured in प्रचार for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular और plural, as is each व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति name ; it is grammatically correct to कह `` एक Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.
Cover of the पहला संस्करण of the publication Dada by Tristan tzara ; Zurich, 1917
दादा ( ) or Dadaism was an art गति of the European avant-garde in the जल्दी 20th century.
अनेक claim Dada began in Zurich, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter but the ऊँचाई of नई York दादा was the year before in 1915.
to quote Dona Budd 's The भाषा of आर्ट Knowledge, Dada was born out of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I.
इस international movement was begun by a group of artist and poets associated साथ the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
दादा अस्वीकृत कारण और logic, prizing nonsense, irrationality और intuition.
the origin of the name Dada is unclear ; कुछ believe that it is a nonsensical word.
अन्य maintain that it originates इससे the रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन Tzara और Marcel janco 's बारंबार उपयोग of the words da, da, meaning यस, yes in the Romanian language.
Another theory says that the name `` दादा '' came during a बैठक of the समूह when a पेपर knife stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ', a French word for 'hobbyhorse '.
The movement primarily involved विज़ुअल कला, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, आर्ट theory, theatre, and graphic design, and concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in आर्ट through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to being anti-war, Dada was also anti- bourgeois और had political affinities with the radical left.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, और प्रकाशन of art/literary journals ; passionate coverage of art, राजनीती, and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy hennings, hans Arp, Raoul Hausmann, Hannah Höch, Johannes Baader, ट्रिस्टन Tzara, फ्रांसिस picabia, Richard huelsenbeck, Georg grosz, John heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice Wood, कर्ट Schwitters, and hans Richter, among अन्य.
The movement influenced बाद styles like the avant-garde and downtown music आंदोलनों, और groups सहित surrealism, Nouveau réalisme, pop art और fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry, a starting पाइंट लिये performance आर्ट, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on पॉप art, a celebration of antiart to be बाद embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s और the movement कि lay the foundation for Surrealism.
पहला trophic level.
The plants in this image, and the शैवाल and phytoplankton in the lake, are primary producers.
They take nutrients from the soil or the water, and manufacture their own खाना by photosynthesis, using उर्जा इससे the sun.
The trophic level of an organism is the position it occupies in a खाना chain.
The शब्द trophic derives from the Greek τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
a food कड़ी represents a उत्तराधिकार of organisms that eat another organism and हैं, in turn, eaten themselves.
The number of steps an सजीव is from the start of the chain is a माप of its trophic level.
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary निर्माता such as plants, move to herbivores at level 2, predators at level 3 और typically finish साथ carnivores or apex परभक्षी at level 4 or 5.
The path साथ the chain can form either a one-way flow, or a खाना `` web. ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity रूप more complex trophic paths.

a silk-producing raspy cricket.
Silk is a प्राकृतिक protein fibre, some forms of which can be woven into textiles.
The protein fibre of silk is रचित mainly of fibroin और produced by certain कीट लार्वे to रूप cocoons.
the best-known type of silk is प्राप्त from the cocoons of the लार्वे of the mulberry silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering appearance of रेशा is due to the triangular प्रिज़्म -like ढांचा of the silk fibre, which allows रेशा cloth to refract आवक light at different कोण, thus producing different colors.
Silks are produced by several other कीट, but generally only the silk of moth caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing.
There has been कुछ research into अन्य silks, which differ at the molecular level.
Many silks are mainly उत्पादित by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis, लकिन some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk, and कुछ insects such as raspy crickets उपज रेशा throughout their जीवनदान.
Silk उत्पादन also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, और ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
अन्य प्रकार of arthropod produce silk, most notably विभिन्न arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ).
Late Show with David Letterman is an अमरीकी late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS.
The show debuted on August 30, 1993, and is produced by Letterman 's उत्पादन कम्पनी, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The show 's music director and band-leader of the हाउस band, the CBS Orchestra, is Paul Shaffer.
The head writer is Matt Roberts and the announcer is Alan Kalter.
of the major u.S. late-night programs, लेट Show ranks second in संचयी average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time.
The show leads other लेट night shows in ad revenue साथ $ 271 million in 2009.
In most u.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time, but is recorded Monday through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m., and गुरुवार at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday एपीसोड प्रायः airs on Friday of that week.
In 2002, Late Show with David Letterman थी क्रमित no. 7 on tv Guide 's 50 Greatest TV Shows of सब Time.
CBS रै a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by then, लेटरमैन होगा surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host.
the Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality documentary television कार्यक्रम on ब्रावो, set in नारंगी County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
It was the first The Real housewives program in the श्रेणी.
the श्रेणी is a voyeuristic dekh into the wealthy lives of these housewives, as वे shop, get plastic surgery, gossip, fight and सजीव lavishly.
the financial crisis, the beginning of which coincided almost exactly साथ the पहला season 's broadcast, रै since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses, evictions, बंधक मूलभूत, foreclosures, और वैवाहिक stress—all अंकित in प्रगतिशील seasons of the show.
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other electronic means to stalk or harass an individual, a group of individuals, or an संगठन.
It may शामिल the making of false accusations or statements of फैक्ट ( as in defamation ), निगरानी, making खतरे, identity theft, damage to data or equipment, the solicitation of minors लिये sex, or gathering सूचना that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' जरूर meet the criterion that a reasonable person, in कब्ज़ा of the same सूचना, would regard it as sufficient to cause another उचित व्यक्ति तकलीफ.
Cyberstalking is अलग from स्थानिक or offline stalking in कि it occurs through the उपयोग of electronic communications प्रौद्योगिकी such as the internet.
however, it sometimes leads to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both हैं criminal offenses.
cyberstalking shares important characteristics साथ ऑफ़लाइन stalking.
Many stalkers – online or बंद – हैं motivated by a desire to कंट्रोल their victims.
a cyberstalker may be an online अजनबी or a person whom the target knows.
a cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of other people online who do not even know the target.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense कि comes into play under state anti-stalking laws, slander laws, और harassment कानून.
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining अनुक्रम, परिवीक्षा, or even दण्ड दंड against the assailant, including jail.
A कारोबार अक्षर is प्रायः used when लिखने from one company to another, or for पत्राचार between such organizations and their customers, clients and अन्य बाह्य parties.
The overall style of letter will निर्भर on the संबंध between the पार्टियों चिंतित.
वहीँ are many reasons to लिखें a business letter.
It could be to request direct information or कार्रवाई from another party, to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ from a supplier, to पहचानो a गलती that थी वचनबद्ध, to reply सीधे to a request, to apologize for a wrong or बस to convey goodwill.
Even आज, the business letter is still very उपयोगी because it produces a permanent रिकार्ड, is confidential, औपचारिक और delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred species of cichlid fish इससे the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia हैं mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow streams, ponds, rivers and झीलों, and कम commonly मिला living in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of major महत्व in artisan fishing in अफ़्रीकी and the Levant, and हैं of increasing importance in aquaculture.
tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally नहीं in temperate climates due to their अक्षमता to survive in cooler waters below परिचय.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 कॉमेडी drama crime फिल्मी starring tom Hanks and beasley the श्वान as the eponymous characters, Turner और hooch respectively.
The film also stars Mare Winningham, Craig T. Nelson, and Reginald VelJohnson.
It was निर्देशित by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film was originally slated to be निर्देशित by Henry Winkler, but he थी terminated due to `` creative differences ''.
It was co-written by Michael blodgett from परे the Valley of the Dolls fame.
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to इस film ( exactly three महीने पहले ), Turner & hooch became more popular and seemingly overshadowed its greater success, भी हालांकि k-9 had a बहुत similar plot.

Adolf हिटलर ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born जर्मनी politician and the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; नेशनल समाजवादी German Workers Party ).
He थी chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 और तानाशाह of नाजी Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi Germany, World War ii in यूरोपीय, and the Holocaust.
हिटलर was a सजा veteran of World War I.
he joined the German मजदूर ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became leader of the nsdap in 1921.
In 1923, he attempted a तख्तापलट d'état in Munich, known as the Beer Hall Putsch.
the विफल coup resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment, दौरान which समय he wrote his memoir, Mein Kampf ( my Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, Hitler gained लोकप्रिय support by attacking the सन्धि of versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, और anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the Weimar Republic into the Third Reich, a single-party dictatorship आधारित on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New अनुक्रम of निरपेक्ष Nazi जर्मनी hegemony in महाद्वीपीय Europe.
To इस end, उसके foreign और घरेलू policies had the aim of seizing lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) for the Germanic people.
He निर्देशित the rearmament of जर्मनी और the invasion of कैंडल by the Wehrmacht in सितंबर 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War ii in Europe.
Under हिटलर 's rule, in 1941 German forces and their European allies occupied most of यूरोपीय और North Africa.
In 1943, Germany had been forced onto the रक्षात्मक and suffered a series of escalating defeats.
In the फाइनल days of the युद्ध, during the बैटल of Berlin in 1945, Hitler married उसके long-time partner, Eva Braun.
On 30 अप्रैल 1945, कम than two दिनों later, the two committed suicide to avoid capture by the Red Army, and their corpses were burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is considered the main cause of the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
उसके antisemitic policies and racially प्रेरित ideology resulted in the deaths of at तनिक 5.5 million Jews, and millions of अन्य people deemed racially inferior.
thumb
a डोमेन name is an identification string that defines a realm of administrative autonomy, authority, or control on the Internet.
Domain names are formed by the rules और procedures of the Domain Name System ( DNS ).
technically, any name registered in the DNS is a domain name.
Domain names are used in विभिन्न networking contexts and application-specific नामकरण और addressing purposes.
In general, a डोमेन नाम represents an Internet Protocol ( ip ) resource, such as a personal कंप्यूटर used to access the Internet, a server computer hosting a वेब site, or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the अंतरजाल.
Domain names हैं organized in subordinate levels ( subdomains ) of the DNS root domain, जिससे is nameless.
the first-level set of डोमेन names are the top-level domains ( tlds ), including the generic top-level domains ( gtlds ), such as the prominent domains com, info, जाल and org, और the country कोड top-level domains ( cctlds ).
नीचे these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level डोमेन names that are typically open for reservation by end-users who काश to कनेक्ट local क्षेत्रफल networks to the Internet, create other publicly accessible Internet संसाधन or run वेब साइट.
The registration of ये domain names is प्रायः administered by डोमेन नाम registrars who बेचें उनके services to the public.
A fully qualified डोमेन name ( fqdn ) is a domain name that is completely specified in the hierarchy of the DNS, having no omitted parts.
Domain names are usually लिखा in lowercase, although labels in the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली are case-insensitive.

Agriculture is a प्रमुख industry in the संयुक्त राज्य and the देश is a net exporter of food.
as of the last जनसांख्यिकी of agriculture in 2007, वहीँ were 2.2 million farms, covering an area of, an average of प्रति फार्म.
Although agricultural activity occurs in सबसे states, it is विशेषकर concentrated in the vast expanse of flat, arable land known as the ग्रेट Plains, which encompasses the central region of the स्वदेश.
The Mpemba प्रभाव, named after Tanzanian छात्र erasto Mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer water can freeze faster than colder जल.
Although वहीँ is anecdotal support for the प्रभाव, there is no अनुबंध on exactly what the effect is and अंतर्गत कया हालातों it occurs.
There have महरूम reports of समान phenomena since प्राचीन times, although साथ अपर्याप्त विवरण for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to thermodynamics, but a number of possible explanations लिये the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition of `` जमने '' and control a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the effect.
the Siamese (, ) is एक of the पहला distinctly पहचाना breeds of Oriental cat.
The नस्ल originated in Thailand ( formerly ज्ञात as Siam ), where they are एक of several native breeds and are पुकारा wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name अर्थ `` moon डायमंड '' ).
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became one of the most popular breeds in यूरोपीय और उत्तर America.
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a सुपरमार्केट chain आधारित in Bellevue, Washington, with 64 स्टोर्स in the Puget ध्वनि region of Washington state और in the पोर्टलैंड, Oregon metropolitan area.
In economics, the money सप्लाई or money stock, is the total amount of मौद्रिक assets उपलब्धियाँ in an economy at a specific time.
There हैं several ways to define `` धन, '' लकिन standard measures usually include currency in circulation और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily accessed एसेट on the books of financial institutions ).
धन supply आंकड़ा are recorded और published, usually by the government or the central bank of the country.
Public and private सेक्टर analysts have long monitored changes in money supply because of its effects on the price स्तर, महंगाई, the exchange rate and the business cycle.
कि relation between money and prices is historically associated साथ the quantity theory of money.
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth और long-term दाम inflation, at least for rapid increases in the राशि of money in the अर्थव्यवस्था.
That is, a country such as ज़िम्बाब्वे which देखी rapid increases in इसके धन सप्लाई also देखी rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is one कारण for the reliance on monetary नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling महंगाई.
the nature of this causal chain is the subject of contention.
Some heterodox economists argue that the धन supply is endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था, not by the central bank ) and that the स्त्रोत of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the अर्थव्यवस्था.
In जोड, those economists देखकर the central bank 's control over the धन सप्लाई as feeble say that वहीँ हैं two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation रेट.
First, in the aftermath of a मंदी, जब many resources are underutilized, an increase in the धन supply can कारण a sustained बढ़ाएँ in रियल production बजाय of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of धन, i.e., the ratio between नाममात्र GDP and धन सप्लाई, changes, an increase in the money supply could have either no प्रभाव, an अतिरंजित effect, or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP.

imax ( an संक्षिप्त लिये Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film स्वरूप and a set of cinema projection मानकों created by the Canadian company imax Corporation.
IMAX रै the capacity to record and प्रदर्शक images of far greater size और रेज़ोल्यूशन than conventional film systems.
Since 2002, some feature films have महरूम परिवर्तित ( or upgraded ) into IMAX format for display in imax theatres and some have also महरूम partially shot in imax.
IMAX is the most widely used system for special-venue फिल्मी presentations.
, there are 697 IMAX थिएटर in 52 देशों.

It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and मान channel/odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as खूब as many PBS stations throughout the United States.
It was set in a विभाग स्टोर, based on the flagship location of the अभी defunct Simpson 's in Toronto.
Many sequences for it यहूद shot at the Queen Street West and Yonge Street store after hours.
Constitutionalism, in इसके most general meaning, is `` a complex of विचार, attitudes, और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle कि the authority of सरकारी derives from and is limited by a देह of fundamental law ''.
a political organization is constitutional to the extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the protection of the रूचि और लिबर्टीज of the citizenry, सहित those कि may be in the minority ``.
As वर्णित by political scientist and constitutional scholar David fellman :
An ice-cream सिरदर्द, also known as brain फ्रीज, cold-stimulus headache, or its दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` तंत्रिका pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ), is a form of brief cranial पीड़ा or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly जल्दी खपत ) of cold beverages or भोजन such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having कुछ cold टच the roof of the mouth ( तालु ), और is believed to result from a तंत्रिका response causing rapid constriction और swelling of रक्त बरतन or a `` referring `` of पीड़ा इससे the छत of the mouth to the head.
The rate of intake for ठंडा भोजन has महरूम studied as a contributing factor.
There हैं लोगों who can नहीं experience `` brain फ्रीज '' or similar लक्षण.
The पद ice-cream headache has महरूम in use since at least 31 January 1937, contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by Rebecca Timbres published in the 1939 किताब We किया n't पूछो Utopia : a quaker family in Soviet Russia.
The first published उपयोग of the term brain फ्रीज, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, was on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स poem written by Robert Burns in 1788 और नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत folk song ( roud # 6294 ).
It is खूब known in many देशों, विशेषकर in the English-speaking world ; its traditional use being to celebrate the प्रारंभ of the नई Year at the स्ट्रोक of midnight.
By एक्सटेंशन, it is also सुंग at funerals, graduations and as a farewell or ending to other occasions.
The international लड़के Scout youth movement, in many देशों, uses it as a बंद to jamborees and other functions.
The song 's स्कॉट्स title may be translated into English वस्तुतः as `` old long since '', or अधिक idiomatically, `` long long ago '', `` days gone by '' or `` बूढ़ा टाइम्स ''.
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '', as it appears in the first लकीर of the कोरस, might be loosely translated as `` लिये ( the खातिर of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is भी used in similar poems by रॉबर्ट ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), और James Watson ( 1711 ) as well as पुरानी folk गीतों predating Burns.
मैथ्यू fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld लैंग syne '' as the equivalent of `` एकबार upon a समय...
`` in his retelling of fairy tales in the Scots language.
Ben Schulz, खिलाड़ी of leeroy जेनकींस at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins और प्रायः elongated with numerous additional letters, is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित for a player character निर्मित by Ben Schulz in blizzard Entertainment 's mmorpg, World of Warcraft.
The character became popular due to a वीडियो of the game that circulated around the Internet.
The घटना has since spread beyond the सीमाएँ of the गेमिंग community into अन्य online and मुख्यधारा media.
Oscar Grant थी fatally shot by बार्ट police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States, in the early morning घंटों of New Year 's Day 2009.
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल Rapid Transit ट्रैन returning from San Francisco, BART Police officers detained Oscar ग्रान्ट और अनेक other यात्री on the मंच at the fruitvale BART Station.
Officer Johannes mehserle and another officer यहूद restraining Grant, who was सजदा and allegedly resisting गिरफ़्तार.
Officer mehserle stood और, according to witnesses, said : `` मिलेंगी back, i 'm gon na tase उसे. ''
Then mehserle drew उसके gun और shot Grant एकबार in the back ; Mehserle appeared stunned, put his hands to his सिर and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
During his court testimony, Mehserle said that Grant then exclaimed, `` तुम shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead the अगला morning at Highland Hospital in ओकलैंड.
The events यहूद captured on multiple digital वीडियो and cell फोन कैमरे.
the footage was disseminated to media outlets and to various वेबसाइटों, where it was देखी millions of टाइम्स.
The following days saw both peaceful और violent विरोध.
The shooting has been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On January 13, alameda काउंटी prosecutors चार्ज Mehserle with murder लिये the शूटिंग.
He resigned उसके position and pleaded not guilty.
the trial began on June 10, 2010.
Michael Rains, Mehserle 's criminal रक्षा attorney, argued that mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol, intending to use his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that his क्लाएंट did not commit first-degree murder and पूछा a लॉस Angeles judge to instruct the जूरी to limit its deliberations to either second-degree हत्या or acquittal.
Oakland civil rights attorney John burris filed a $ 25 million wrongful death अर्जी against BART on behalf of Grant 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the जूरी लौटे its verdict : Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter और नहीं guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter.
आरंभिक protests against the सत्ताधारी were शांतिपूर्वक organized ; looting, arson, विनाश of property, and छोटी riots broke out बाद dark.
Nearly 80 people यहूद eventually गिरफ्तार.
On Friday, July 9, 2010, the U.S. इंसाफ Department opened a civil rights मामला विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय government can prosecute उसे independently लिये the same act अंतर्गत the पृथक sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
The Department of Justice will be working साथ the u.S. Attorney 's office in San Francisco और the FBI.
on November 5, 2010, Mehserle was sentenced to दो years, minus time served.
He served his time in the लॉस Angeles County Jail, occupying a निजी कोशिका दूर from other prisoners.
he थी released on June 13, 2011 and is अभी on parole.
Major representatives of the Harlem Renaissance.
The हार्लेम Renaissance was a cultural गति that spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it was known as the `` नई नीग्रो गति '', named after the 1925 anthology by Alain locke.
Though it थी centered in the हार्लेम neighborhood of New York City, many French-speaking black लेखक इससे अफ़्रीकी and caribbean colonies who जिया in Paris were also बहकावे by the हार्लेम Renaissance.
the Harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have spanned from परिचय 1919 जबतक the जल्दी or mid-1930s.
Many of its ideas जिया on much longer.
the zenith of इस `` flowering of Negro literature '', as जेम्स Weldon जॉनसन preferred to call the Harlem पुनर्जागरण, थी placed between 1924 ( the year कि Opportunity : A जर्नल of Negro जीवन hosted a पार्टी for black writers जहाँ many white publishers were in attendance ) और 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ).
African States between 500 BCE and 1500 CE

c. 1200 BCE.

the history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of Homo sapiens in East अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse and नीतियां developing nation राज्य.
Some जल्दी प्रमाण of कृषि in अफ़्रीकी तिथियाँ from 16,000 BCE, और metallurgy from about 4000 BCE.
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt, और later in Nubia, the Maghreb and the सींग of Africa.
दौरान the Middle Ages, Islam spread through the regions.
क्रासिंग the Maghreb and the Sahel, a major center of मुस्लिम culture थी टिम्बकटू.
Some notable pre-colonial राज्य and societies in Africa शामिल the nok संस्कृति, Mali साम्राज्य, Ashanti Empire, Kingdom of Mapungubwe, किंगडम of Sine, किंगडम of saloum, Kingdom of Baol, Kingdom of Zimbabwe, Kingdom of Kongo, Ancient कार्थेज, Numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite साम्राज्य, the Ajuuraan State और the adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th century, europeans और Arabs took slaves इससे वेस्ट, Central और Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave व्यापार.
European colonization of अफ़्रीकी developed rapidly in the हाथापाई for Africa of the late 19th और जल्दी 20th सदियां.
following struggles for independence in many parts of the continent, as well as a weakened Europe after the Second संसार War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history has been challenging for researchers in the फ़ील्ड of African अध्ययन because of the scarcity of written sources in large भाग of sub-saharan Africa.
scholarly techniques ऐसे as the recording of oral history, historical भाषाविज्ञान, archaeology और आनुवंशिकी have been crucial.
Curry Foley was the पहला player in प्रमुख League Baseball इतिहास to hit for the साईकिल.
In बेसबॉल, hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a सिंगल, a double, a triple, and a home run in the same game.
Collecting the हिट्स in कि order is ज्ञात as a `` natural cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 times since the first by curry Foley in 1882.
The साईकिल is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 आवृत्ति in MLB history ) ; it has महरूम called `` one of the rarest '' और `` most difficult feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive levels, the probability of an औसत एमएलबी खिलाड़ी hitting for a cycle विरूद्ध an average टोली in a खेल is लगभग 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 चक्र in a 162-game ऋतु with 30 teams.
In अन्य baseball leagues, the cycle is achieved less अक्सर.
through September 4, 2008, 62 players in निप्पन Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level baseball organization in Japan, have hit for the cycle, the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara.
Two players have hit लिये the cycle on the same दिन once in NPB history ; इस रै occurred twice in MLB history.
One NPB player has also hit लिये the साईकिल in an NPB all-star खेल.
No खिलाड़ी has ever hit for the साईकिल in the एमएलबी all-star Game or the postseason.
the प्रमुख slave routes in medieval अफ़्रीकी.
This article discusses systems, history, and प्रभाव of slavery within अफ़्रीकी.
See Arab slave व्यापार, Atlantic स्लेव trade, Maafa, and Slavery in समकालीन Africa for other discussions.
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण in अफ़्रीकी ''.
Europeans usually did not डालें the interior regions.
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the continent लिये many centuries, and continues in the वर्तमान day.
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the continent, as they were in much of the ancient world.
in most अफ़्रीकी societies जहाँ slavery was prevalent, the enslaved people were largely treated as indentured servants and नहीं treated as chattel slaves.
जब the Arab slave trade और अटलांटिक slave trade began, many of the लोकल स्लेव systems बदला and began supplying captives for स्लेव markets outside of Africa.
Slavery in historical Africa थी practiced in अनेक different forms and some of these do not clearly fit the definitions of गुलामी elsewhere in the world.
Debt गुलामी, enslavement of war captives, military slavery, और criminal slavery were सब practiced in various parts of अफ़्रीकी.
Although there had been कुछ trans-Saharan trade इससे the आंतरिक of Sub-Saharan Africa to अन्य regions, गुलामी was a small part of the economic जीवन of many societies in Africa until the परिचय of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab और अटलांटिक ).
Slave practices were again transformed साथ European colonization of Africa and the formal abolition of गुलामी in the जल्दी 1900s.
खिड़कियाँ Task Manager is a कार्य manager or प्रणाली monitor अनुप्रयोग included with the Microsoft Windows NT परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग systems that provides सीमित information परिचय computer performance और running अनुप्रयोग, processes and cpu usage, commit चार्ज और memory सूचना, संजाल activity and statistics, logged-in users, and प्रणाली services ( and as प्रायः is the case with तन्त्र tools provided by Microsoft for खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir कार्य Manager '', `` प्रक्रम Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
the Task Manager can also be प्रयुक्त to set process priorities, प्रोसेसर अपनापन, forcibly terminate processes, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off इससे खिड़कियाँ.
Windows Task Manager was introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ NT included the कार्य सूची application, which had far fewer features.
The task list was सक्षम of listing फिलहाल running processes और killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows XP तभी, a Shutdown menu is also present कि allows access to standby, hibernate, Turn off, restart, Log Off and स्विच User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) had a कार्यक्रम known as tasks to display the programs currently running.
This संचिका was executed by running the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.

Created and executive उत्पादित by अधिकतम Burnett, Greg Coolidge और क्रिस Morgan, the series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18, 2009.

Sparsely आबादी in relation to its क्षेत्रफल, the Democratic गणतंत्र of the Congo ( DRC ) is home to a vast potential of प्राकृतिक resources and mineral wealth, its untapped जमा of raw खनिज are estimated to be worth in excess of US $ 24 trillion, yet the economy of the DRC has अस्वीकृत drastically since the mid-1980s.
at the time of its independence in 1960, DRC थी the दूसरी most industrialized country in Africa after South Africa ; it boasted a thriving खनन सेक्टर and its agriculture sector थी relatively उत्पादक.
if the दर्शक stares at this image for 20–60 सेकेंड और stares at a श्वेत object, a ऋणात्मक afterimage होगा appear ( in इस case, it होगा be cyan on magenta ).
This can भी be achieved by the viewer closing his/her eyes and tilting उनके head up.
An afterimage or ghost image or चित्र burn-in is an optical illusion that refers to an चित्र continuing to appear in एक 's vision after the एक्सपोज़र to the original चित्र has ceased.
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to float before one 's eyes after looking into a light सोर्स for a few seconds.
Closing the eye can help achieve a बेहतर sense of the color in its own aspect.
afterimages आइये in two फ़ॉर्म, negative ( inverted ) और positive ( retaining original रंग ).
The प्रक्रम behind positive afterimages is अनजान, though विचार to be related to neural adaptation.
on the अन्य हाथ, negative afterimages are a retinal phenomenon and हैं खूब understood.
Lost is an American serial drama television series कि premiered on September 22, 2004 on the American प्रसारण Company ( ABC ).
The श्रेणी was निर्मित by J. J. Abrams and Damon lindelof, आधारित upon an original pilot script titled Nowhere लिखा by जेफरी lieber.
छह सीज़न of the show aired, in addition to numerous काटें shows to recap previous एपीसोड.
ABC announced that Lost would समाप्त after six seasons, having produced a कुल of 121 episodes.
The series follows the पास्ट, उपस्थित, and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a plane crash on a यात्री jet, oceanic Flight 815, flying from Sydney to लॉस एंजिल्स after it crashes on a तीव्र island in the South प्रशांत.
the series also includes stories of the lives of people already living on the island — they include the `` अन्य ``, who initially antagonize the survivors, as खूब as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana.
Each episode typically features कार्रवाई on the island as well as a द्वितीयक storyline from another point in a character 's life.
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of the survivors in a अलग वास्तविकता, as if the flight had never क्रैश.
In the following list, the term `` प्रदर्शित character ( s ) '' refers to the character or characters who are प्रदर्शित in the द्वितीयक storyline of each episode.
`` No.
in श्रेणी '' refers to the episode 's number in the overall series, whereas `` No.
in ऋतु '' refers to the episode 's number in each particular season.
`` U.S. viewers ( लाख ) '' refers to the क्रमांक of Americans in लाखो जो watched the episode live.

Flat फीट ( भी called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the foot collapses, with the entire sole of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground.
in some individuals ( an अनुमानित 20–30 % of the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी ) the arch simply never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ).
Three studies ( see citations नीचे in military section ) of military recruits have shown no evidence of बाद increased injury, or पैर problems, due to flat feet, in a जनसांख्यिकी of लोगों who पहुँचें military service age without prior foot problems.
however, these अध्ययन can not be used to judge possible भविष्य damage from this कंडीशन जब diagnosed at younger ages.
वे भी can नहीं be applied to व्यक्तियों जिनकी flat feet are associated with foot symptoms, or certain symptoms in other parts of the देह ( ऐसे as the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to Gen X, is the पीढी born after the Western post-world युद्ध II baby boom.
demographers, historians and टीकाकारों use beginning birth dates from the early 1960s to the early 1980s.
The term was popularized by Douglas Coupland 's 1991 novel Generation x : Tales लिये an त्वरित Culture.
Before that, it had been used for various subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s.
Pressure ulcers, भी known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, are localized injuries to the skin and/or underlying tissue usually over a bony prominence, as a result of pressure, or दबाव in combination साथ shear and/or friction.
सबसे commonly this will be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the hips, but other साइट such as the elbows, knees, ankles or the वापस of the cranium can be affected.
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure applied to soft tissue so कि रक्त प्रवाह to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is also a कारण ; shear pulls on रक्त vessels that feed the skin.
दबाव छाले सबसे commonly develop in persons जो are not moving about or are confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed that other कारकों can influence the tolerance of skin for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure अल्सर development.
These factors हैं protein-calorie malnutrition, microclimate ( स्किन wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), diseases that reduce blood flow to the स्किन, such as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the स्किन, such as paralysis or न्यूरोपैथी.
The healing of pressure छाले may be slowed by the age of the person, medical conditions ( such as arteriosclerosis, diabetes or infection ), smoking or medications ऐसे as antiinflammatory drugs.
Although often prevented and treatable if मिला early, pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in critically बीमार patients, frail बड़ो, wheelchair users ( विशेषकर where स्पाइनल injury is शामिल ) और terminally ill patients.
Primary रोकथाम is to redistribute pressure by turning the patient regularly.
The लाभ of turning to avoid further sores is well प्रलेखित since at least the 19th century.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the रोगी in bed or wheelchair, eating a balanced diet साथ adequate protein and keeping the skin free इससे exposure to मूत्र and stool is very important.
The prevalence of दबाव ulcers in hospital जमावट is high, but improvements are being made.
according to the 2010 ipup ( International Pressure Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted in Canada, there was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired व्यापकता of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010.
Ulcers were most commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx ulcer स्थान ; however, heel ulcers were the most आम facility-acquired location in the survey.

Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in the u.S. state of विस्कॉन्सिन, located at the head of ग्रीन खाड़ी, a sub-basin of झील Michigan, at the mouth of the फॉक्स River.
it has an elevation of ऊपर sea level and is located north of मिल्वौकी.
The population थी 104,057 at the 2010 census.
It is the third-largest नगर in the state of विस्कॉन्सिन, after Milwaukee और Madison.
it is भी the third-largest city on the वेस्ट shore of Lake Michigan, after शिकागो और Milwaukee.
Green खाड़ी is घर to the ग्रीन खाड़ी Packers of the National Football League, बनाना it by far the smallest metropolitan क्षेत्रफल in the यूएसए to host a major professional खेल franchise.
Green Bay is the principal city of the ग्रीन Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area, जिससे covers भूरा, kewaunee, और oconto Counties and had a संयुक्त population of 282,599 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
Green Bay is an industrial city with अनेक meatpacking and paper plants, and a port on Green खाड़ी, an भुजा of Lake Michigan that locals कॉल the खाड़ी of Green खाड़ी, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
it is home to the National Railroad संग्रहालय ; the नेविली Public Museum, with exhibitions of art, history, and विज्ञान ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay.
Luteinizing hormone ( LH, भी ज्ञात as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a हार्मोन produced by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the अग्रवर्ती pituitary gland.
In females, an अधि rise of LH ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the corpus luteum.
in males, जहाँ LH था also been called अंतरालीय cell-stimulating hormone ( ICSH ), it stimulates Leydig cell production of testosterone.
it acts synergistically साथ FSH.
सेलिना quintanilla-pérez ( April 16, 1971 – March 31, 1995 ), ज्ञात बस as Selena, थी an American singer-songwriter.
She was नामित the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best selling Latin कलाकार of the decade '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये her fourteen top-ten singles in the Top लैटिन Songs chart, including seven number-one hits.
Selena था the सबसे successful singles of 1994 और 1995, `` amor prohibido `` और `` No me Queda Más ``.
She was called `` The Queen of tejano music `` and the Mexican समतुल्य of मैडोना.
Selena released her first album, Selena y लॉस Dinos, at the age of twelve.
She won Female Vocalist of the साल at the 1987 Tejano Music Awards and landed a recording अनुबंध with emi a few years later.
उसके fame grew throughout the जल्दी 1990s, especially in spanish-speaking countries, and वो had begun recording in English as खूब.
सेलिना was murdered at the age of 23 on कूच 31, 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar, the पूर्व president of her प्रशंसक club.
On April 12, 1995, दो weeks बाद her death, जार्ज W. बुश, governor of Texas at the time, declared उसके birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas.
warner Bros. produced Selena, a film based on her जीवन starring Jennifer Lopez, in 1997.
Selena 's life थी भी the basis of the musical Selena Forever starring Veronica vazquez as Selena.
in जून 2006 Selena was commemorated with a life-sized bronze प्रतिमा ( Mirador de la Flor in कॉर्पस Christi, Texas ) and a सेलिना museum opened there.
वो रै बेची over 60 million albums worldwide, making her one of the best-selling artists of all समय.
She is also the only female artist to have five एल्बम in u.s. बिलबोर्ड 200 at the वही time.
German Stahlhelm from World War II
तमगा of the Bolivian Army Colorados regiment, showing a stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
stahlhelm ( बहुवचन, stahlhelme ) is German for `` steel हेल्मेट ''.
The Imperial German Army began to बदलें the traditional boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) साथ the Stahlhelm during World War i in 1916.
The term Stahlhelm refers दोनो to a generic स्टील helmet, और more specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design.
The Stahlhelm, with इसके distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape, थी an instantly recognizable icon लिये military imagery and became a common element of सैन्य propaganda on both sides, बस like the pickelhaube before it.
Its name was भी प्रयुक्त by the Stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक nationalist organization स्थापित at the end of 1918.
glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the production and उत्सर्जन of light by a living सजीव
Chemiluminescence, is the emission of light ( luminescence ) without emission of ऊष्मा
Phosphorescence, a विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
radioluminescence, production of संदीप्ति in a material by the बमबारी of ionizing विकिरण
Glow in the अंधेरा Tour, a 2008 concert tour by Kanye West
Frankfurt Airport serves as a hub नगर लिये Lufthansa और receives flights from स्टार गठबंधन वाहक.
एयरलाइन hubs are airports क्रमित as large, medium, small, and non-hubs as one of the faa विमानक्षेत्र categories which हैं re-evaluated प्रत्येक year based on number of वाणिज्यिक passengers.
the more आम but informal उपयोग for the phrase एयरलाइन hub is an विमानक्षेत्र that an airline उपयोग as a transfer point to get यात्री to their intended destination.
it is part of a hub and spoke model, where travelers moving between airports not परोसा by direct flights change planes en route to उनके गंतव्यों.
इस is as opposed to the Point to पाइंट model.
अनेक hubs of the एयरलाइंस are also situated at airports in the cities of the respective सिर offices.
कुछ airlines may use तभी a single hub, while other airlines उपयोग अनेक hubs.
Hubs are used for both passenger flights as well as कार्गो फ़्लाइट.
Many airlines भी use focus cities, which function much the same as hubs.
Airlines may also उपयोग secondary hubs, a non-technical term for large फ़ोकस cities.
A हब in the middle of a route is more effective than at either end as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) रूट over a two-stop ( three-leg ) रूट.

Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to हेलेन and menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze आयु नगर that stood on the hill of therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River निहार the भविष्य साईट of डोरियन स्पार्टा.
आरपार the valley the successive ridges of Mount Taygetus हैं in प्रमाण.
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ), or Lacedaemon, was a prominent city-state in ancient यूनानियों, situated on the banks of the Eurotas River in laconia, in south-eastern Peloponnese.
it उभरा as a राजनैतिक entity around the 10th सदी BC, when the invading Dorians subjugated the local, non-Dorian population.
Around 650 bc, it rose to become the dominant सैन्य land-power in ancient Greece.
दिए इसके military pre-eminence, Sparta was recognized as the overall leader of the combined यूनानी forces during the greco-persian Wars.
between 431 and 404 BC, Sparta थी the प्रिंसिपल enemy of एथेंस during the Peloponnesian युद्ध, from which it emerged victorious, though at great लागत.
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra in 371 BC ended स्पार्टा 's prominent role in Greece.
However, it कायम इसके राजनैतिक independence जबतक the Roman conquest of यूनानियों in 146 BC.
It then underwent a long period of decline, विशेषकर in the Middle Ages, when many spartans स्थानांतरित to live in Mystras.
आधुनिक Sparta is the capital of the Greek क्षेत्रीय ईकाई of laconia और a center for the processing of goods such as citrus and olives.
स्पार्टा was unique in ancient यूनानियों लिये its social प्रणाली and constitution, which completely focused on military training and excellence.
इसके inhabitants were classified as spartiates ( Spartan citizens, who enjoyed full rights ), Mothakes ( non-Spartan फ़्री मेन raised as spartans ), Perioikoi ( freedmen ), और helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan लोकल population ).
spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training and education regimen, and spartan phalanges यहूद widely माना to be among the बेहतरीन in battle.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more rights और equality to मेन than elsewhere in the classical world.
Sparta was the विषय of fascination in its own day, as well as in the West following the revival of शास्त्रीय सीखना.
This प्रेम or admiration of Sparta is known as Laconism or Laconophilia.
Fantasy football is an इंटरैक्टिव प्रतियोगिता in which users compete against प्रत्येक अन्य as general managers of virtual टीमों.
the खिलाड़ी that an individual is able to manage are पेशेवर American football players in the National Football League.
the different actions people are able to make are drafting, व्यापार, adding or dropping खिलाड़ी, and बदलना rosters.
due to the growth of the Internet, Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity, विशेषकर क्युकी Fantasy फ़ुटबॉल providers such as ESPN, Yahoo, CBS, and the NFL itself are able to keep track of statistics entirely online, eliminating the need to जाँच बक्सा scores और newspapers regularly to keep track of खिलाड़ी.
Most लीग have a single week championship in सप्ताह 16 of the NFL season.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, आधारित on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) and us Census Bureau ऐतिहासिक estimates ( ब्लैक ).
Actual recorded population figures are in blue.
according to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
the world population is the total क्रमांक of जीना humans on धरती.
As of today, it is estimated to क्रमांक billion by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The uscb estimates that the संसार population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund, it पहुँचे this milestone on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the समाप्त of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of विकास – global population increases above 1.8 % प्रति year – were seen briefly during the 1950s, and लिये a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख, and are now अपेक्षित to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 लाख, while deaths क्रमांक 56 million प्रति year, और हैं अपेक्षित to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
वर्तमान projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global जनसांख्यिकी expected to reach between 7.5 और 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the वैश्विक population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global खाना supplies, and energy संसाधन.
Skeletal मांसपेशियां homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are लगभग 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the typical human, and लगभग every मांसपेशी constitutes one part of a जोड़ी of identical bilateral muscles, found on both sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as presented in this आलेख.
Nevertheless, the exact क्रमांक is difficult to define because different स्त्रोत समूह muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as अनेक muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा from 640 to 850.
The मांसपेशियां of the इंसान body can be categorized into a number of groups जिससे शामिल muscles relating to the सिर and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the अपर limbs, और muscles of the निम्नतर limbs.
the action refers to the action of each मांसपेशी from the मानक anatomical स्थिति.
In other positions, अन्य actions may be performed.
A gold bar is a मात्रा of परिष्कृत धात्विक gold of any आकार that is made by a bar producer meeting मानक conditions of manufacture, labeling, and रिकार्ड keeping.
larger सुनहरा bars that are produced by pouring the molten metal into molds are पुकारा ingots.
Smaller बार may be manufactured by minting or stamping इससे appropriately rolled सुनहरा sheets.
the standard सुनहरा बार held as gold reserves by central बैंको और traded among bullion dealers is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery सुनहरा बार.
The kilobar, जिससे is to कह 1000 गामा in द्रव्यमान, is the bar कि is more manageable and is used extensively लिये व्यापार and investment.
The premium on these bars when traded is very कम over the spot value of the gold बनाना it ideal लिये small हस्तांतरण between बैंको and traders.
Most kilobars are flat, although कुछ निवेशकों, particularly in Europe, prefer the brick आकार.
elisha Archibald `` Archie '' मैनिंग III ( born May 19, 1949 ) is a former अमरीकी football क्वार्टरबैक in the National Football लीग, playing for the New Orleans संतो from 1971 to 1982, then लिये the ह्यूस्टन Oilers and Minnesota Vikings.
he is the father of वर्तमान Denver broncos quarterback peyton Manning, वर्तमान New York Giants starting quarterback Eli Manning, और पूर्व ओले Miss receiver Cooper मैनिंग.
Advocacy is a राजनैतिक process by an individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions within political, आर्थिक, and social systems and institutions.
वकालत can शामिल many activities कि a person or संगठन undertakes including मीडिया अभियान, public speaking, commissioning and publishing शोध or polls or the filing of an amicus brief.
Lobbying ( प्रायः by लॉबी groups ) is a रूप of advocacy जहाँ a direct approach is made to legislators on an issue जिससे plays a significant भूमिका in modern politics.
Research is beginning to explore how वकालत समूह in the U.S. और Canada are using social media to facilitate नागरिक engagement and सामूहिक action.
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a लंबवत tricolor of ग्रीन, white, and red with the नेशनल कोट of arms charged in the बीच of the श्वेत stripe.
While the meaning of the colors has बदला over time, these three colors यहूद adopted by Mexico following स्वतंत्रता from स्पेन दौरान the country 's युद्ध of Independence, and subsequent First Mexican Empire.
the current ध्वज थी adopted in 1968, लकिन the overall डिज़ाइन रै been used since 1821, जब the First National ध्वज थी created.
The current law of नेशनल symbols, Law on the National Arms, ध्वज, and गान, कि governs the उपयोग of the national flag has महरूम in place since 1984.
रेड, श्वेत, and green are the रंगों of the नेशनल liberation army in मैक्सिको.
the central emblem is the Aztec pictogram for Tenochtitlan ( now Mexico नगर ), the center of उनके empire.
It recalls the लेजेंड that inspired the Aztecs to settle on what was originally a lake-island.
The रूप of the कोट of arms was most recently revised in 1968.
a ribbon in the national colors is at the bottom of the coat of arms.
Throughout इतिहास, the flag रै changed four टाइम्स, as the डिज़ाइन of the coat of बाहें and the length-width ratios of the flag have महरूम modified.
however, the कोट of arms has had the same features throughout : an त्रिभुज, holding a serpent in its talon, is perched on top of a prickly pear cactus ; the कैक्टस is situated on a चट्टान that rises above a lake.
The coat of बाहें is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods told them to build a city जहाँ they spot an eagle on a nopal eating a serpent, which is now Mexico City.
the वर्तमान national flag, the Fourth नेशनल Flag, is also used as the Mexican naval ensign by ships registered in Mexico.
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor ब्यूरो promotes a town, city, प्रदेश, or देश in order to increase the number of visitors.
it promotes the विकास और marketing of a destination, focusing on convention sales, tourism marketing, और services.
ऐसे organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing visits from tourists and business travelers, जिससे generates overnight आवास for a destination, visits to रेस्तरां, और खरीदारी revenues.
Convention और visitor bureaus are the सबसे important tourism विपणन organizations in their respective tourist destinations, as वे हैं directly responsible for विपणन the गंतव्य ब्रांड through travel और पर्यटन `` product awareness '' to visitors.
DMOs produce billions of dollars in direct और अप्रत्यक्ष revenue and taxes for their destinations ' economies साथ their marketing and sales विशेषज्ञता.
Destination marketing संगठन are often पुकारा travel, convention, visitors, or tourism bureaux, welcome centers, information centers और more.
regardless of the name, ये organizations offer many सेवाएं to the traveling public.
The नीलगाय or wapiti ( cervus canadensis ) is एक of the largest प्रजाति of हिरण in the world, और one of the largest जमीन mammals in North America and eastern एशिया.
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European रेड deer ( cervus elaphus ), but evidence from a 2004 study of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the two हैं पृथक प्रजाति.
This एनिमल should not be उलझन साथ the larger moose ( Alces alces ), to which the name `` elk '' applies in Eurasia.
Apart from the moose, the तभी other member of the हिरण परिवार to प्रतिद्वंद्वी the elk in आकार is the south Asian sambar ( rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in forest और forest-edge आवास, feeding on grasses, पौधे, leaves, और छाल.
Although देशी to उत्तर America और eastern Asia, they have adapted well to countries where they have महरूम introduced, including Argentina, Australia, and New Zealand.
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic प्रजाति and ecosystems into which they have महरूम introduced.
Male elk have large antlers which are shed each year.
Males भी engage in ritualized mating व्यवहार during the rut, सहित posturing, antler wrestling ( sparring ), and bugling, a loud श्रेणी of vocalizations जिससे establishes दबदबा over other males and attracts females.
नीलगाय are susceptible to a number of infectious diseases, कुछ of which can be transmitted to livestock.
प्रयत्न to eliminate infectious diseases इससे नीलगाय populations, largely through vaccination, have had mixed success.
Some cultures revere the elk as a आध्यात्मिक फ़ोर्स.
In parts of एशिया, antlers and their मखमल हैं प्रयुक्त in परंपरागत दवाइयाँ.
Elk हैं hunted as a खेल species ; the meat is leaner and higher in protein than beef or chicken.
The जार्ज वॉशिंगटन University ( gw, gwu, or जार्ज Washington ) is a comprehensive private, coeducational research विश्वविद्यालयों located in Washington, d.C..
It awards certificates, Bachelor डिग्री, Masters डिग्री, और phds आरपार several dozen disciplines.
the university was चार्टर्ड by an Act of Congress on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as The Columbian College in the District of Columbia.
The lion ( पेंथेरा leo ) is one of the four बिग cats in the genus Panthera और a member of the family फ़ेलिडाए.
With some males exceeding in वज़न, it is the second-largest living cat बाद the बाघ.
जंगली lions currently exist in sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in Gir वन National Park in India ) while other types of शेर have disappeared इससे North Africa और Southwest एशिया in historic times.
जबतक the late Pleistocene, about 10,000 सालो पहले, the lion was the most widespread large land mammal after humans.
वे यहूद found in most of Africa, across यूरेशिया from western Europe to India, और in the americas इससे the Yukon to Peru.
the lion is a vulnerable species, having seen a प्रमुख population मनाही of 30–50 % over the past two decades in इसके African दायरा.
Lion populations हैं untenable बाहर designated reserves and national parks.
Although the cause of the मनाही is not fully समझा, habitat loss and conflicts with humans are currently the महानतम causes of concern.
Within Africa, the West अफ़्रीकी शेर population is विशेषकर endangered.
Lions live for 10–14 years in the wild, while in captivity they can live longer than 20 सालो.
in the जंगली, males seldom live longer than 10 सालो, as चोटों sustained from continual fighting with प्रतिद्वंद्वी males greatly reduce उनके longevity.
They typically inhabit सवाना and grassland, although they may लो to bush and forest.
शेर are unusually social compared to other cats.
A अभिमान of lions consists of सम्बन्धित महिलाओं और औलाद and a small number of वयस्क males.
Groups of female lions typically हंट together, preying mostly on विशाल ungulates.
Lions are apex and keystone predators, although वे scavenge as opportunity allows.
While शेर do not typically hunt इंसानो, some have महरूम known to do so.
Sleeping mainly during the day, शेर हैं primarily nocturnal, although bordering on crepuscular in nature.
अत्यधिक distinctive, the पुरूष शेर is easily recognised by its mane, and its face is one of the सबसे widely recognised animal symbols in इंसान संस्कृति.
depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic काल, with carvings and paintings इससे the Lascaux and Chauvet Caves, through virtually all ancient और medieval cultures where they एकबार occurred.
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures, in paintings, on नेशनल flags, and in contemporary films और literature.
Lions have been kept in menageries since the time of the Roman साम्राज्य, and have been a कुंजी species sought for प्रदर्शनी in zoos over the world since the लेट 18th सदी.
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding programs for the endangered एशियाटिक subspecies.
In the history of वीडियो games, the seventh generation of consoles is the previous generation, and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo, Microsoft, and सोनी.
For home consoles, the सातवाँ generation began on 22 November 2005 with the release of Xbox 360 and continued with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 नवम्बर 2006, and Wii on 19 November 2006.
प्रत्येक new console introduced a new प्रकार of breakthrough in प्रौद्योगिकी.
The Xbox 360 offered खेल rendered natively at HD resolutions, the PlayStation 3 offered, in जोड to fhd gaming, HD फिल्म playback via a built-in 3d blu-ray Disc player, and the Wii focused on integrating परिरक्षक with गति sensors as well as joysticks.
Joining निन्टेंडो in the गति मार्केट, सोनी released the PlayStation मूव in September 2010.
The प्लेस्टेशन Move features motion sensing gaming, similar to that of the Wii.
Microsoft also joined Sony and निन्टेंडो, with इसके kinect.
Unlike the अन्य two systems ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ), kinect करता not उपयोग any controllers of कोई sort and makes the उपयोक्ता the `` controller. ''
Having sold 8 लाख units in इसके first 60 days on the मार्केट, Kinect रै claimed the गिनीज World Record of होने the `` fastest selling उपभोक्ता electronics यंत्र ''.
While the Xbox 360 offers wired controllers as a standalone product, all PlayStation 3 controllers can be used in wired और wireless configurations.
starting साथ handheld consoles, the seventh generation began on 21 November 2004 साथ the North American परिचय of the निन्टेंडो ds as a `` third pillar '', alongside Nintendo 's existing खेल लड़के अग्रिम और GameCube consoles.
The Nintendo ds ( NDS ) features a touch screen and built-in माइक्रोफोन, and supports बेतार IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the revised version of the NDS, the dsi, features two built in कैमरे, the ability to download games इससे the DSi store, and a web browser.
the PlayStation Portable, or PSP, released later the same year on 12 दिसम्बर 2004, followed a अलग pattern.
It became the पहला handheld video game console to use an optical disc स्वरूप, Universal Media डिस्क ( UMD ), as its प्राथमिक भंडार media.
Sony also gave the PSP robust multi-media काबिलियत, connectivity with the PlayStation 3 and other PSPs, and Internet कनेक्टिविटी.
The Nintendo ds likewise has connectivity to the अंतरजाल through the Nintendo Wi-Fi कनेक्शन and Nintendo ds ब्राउजर, as well as wireless connectivity to अन्य DS systems और Wii consoles.
despite high sales numbers for दोनो consoles, प्लेस्टेशन Portable बिक्री have consistently पिछड़ापन behind those of the Nintendo ds ; nevertheless, the PlayStation Portable रै the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo हैंडहेल्ड gaming system.
Sgt. Pepper 's निर्जन Hearts Club बैंड ( प्रायः shortened to sgt. Pepper ) is the eighth studio एल्बम by English rock बैंड the Beatles.
Released in June 1967, the album included गीतों such as `` With a Little Help इससे My Friends ``, `` Lucy in the आसमान with Diamonds ``, और `` A Day in the Life ``.
continuing the artistic maturation देखी on the band 's album रिवाल्वर ( 1966 ), sgt. pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of the समय and incorporated balladry, साइकेडेलिक, music hall, and symphonic प्रभाव.
During the Sgt. pepper sessions, the group improved upon the quality of उनके म्यूज़िक 's production while exploring प्रायोगिक recording तकनीकों.
निर्माता George Martin 's innovative दृष्टिकोण शामिल the use of an orchestra.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the एल्बम कवर, designed by English pop artists Peter ब्लेक and Jann Haworth, was inspired by a sketch by Paul McCartney that चित्रित the band posing in सामने of a collage of some of उनके favourite हस्तियाँ.
Sgt. Pepper थी a worldwide critical and वाणिज्यिक success, spending 27 सप्ताह at the top of the UK एल्बम Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US बिलबोर्ड 200.
A seminal work in the उभरते psychedelic चट्टान style, the album was critically acclaimed upon release and won four Grammy Awards in 1968.
With an अनुमानित 32 लाख नक़ल sold, it is एक of the world 's best selling albums.
Sgt. pepper is considered by many to be the most influential and famous rock album ever, and रै been named the greatest album of all time by दोनो All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone.
The temporal पालि is a region of the cerebral cortex कि is located beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on both दिमागी बांटती of the mammalian दिमाग.
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories, प्रसंस्करण संवेदी इनपुट, comprehending language, storing new memories, emotion, and deriving meaning.
The इंसान फेफड़े हैं the organs of respiration in humans.
Humans have two lungs, a सही lung and a left lung.
The right lung consists of three lobes while the बाएँ lung is थोड़ा smaller consisting of तभी two निर्मोक ( the left lung has a `` हृदय notch '' allowing space for the heart भीतर the छाती ).
Together, the lungs contain लगभग of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a कुल surface क्षेत्रफल of about ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the same area as one side of a tennis अदालत.
Furthermore, if all of the capillaries that घेर the alveoli were unwound and रखी समाप्त to end, they होता extend लिये about.
Each फेफड़ों weighs, इसलिए making the संपूर्ण organ about.
Human फेफड़े
the trachea divides into two bronchi ( one for each side ) at the level of T4.
This junction is भी known as the carina.
the conducting zone contains the trachea, the bronchi, the bronchioles, and the टर्मिनल bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar नलिकाएं, और the alveoli.
the conducting मण्डल और the respiratory stuffers ( लकिन not the alveoli ) are बना up of एयरवेज़.
The conducting zone has no गैस exchange साथ the blood, and is reinforced with उपास्थि in order to hold खोलें the airways.
The conducting मण्डल warms the air to और humidifies the air.
It भी cleanses the एयर by removing particles via cilia located on the walls of all the passageways.
the फेफड़े are surrounded by the rib cage.
The respiratory zone is the site of gas exchange साथ blood.
The सहानुभूतिपूर्ण बेचैन system via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors causes bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine, which acts on the M-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting टोन of the bronchiolar चिकना muscle.
इस action is सम्बन्धित, although माना पृथक from bronchoconstriction.
अनेक other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, सहित carbon dioxide and ऑक्सीजन, are also शामिल in the regulation process.
The pleural cavity is the संभावित space between the parietal pleura, अस्तर the भीतरी wall of the thoracic cage, and the visceral pleura lining the lungs.
The lung parenchyma is सख्ती used to refer solely to alveolar tissue साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar ducts and टर्मिनल bronchioles.
However, it प्रायः शामिल कोई form of lung tissue, भी including bronchioles, bronchi, blood vessels और फेफड़ों interstitium.
The मार्गरिटा is a Mexican cocktail consisting of टकीला mixed साथ Cointreau or similar orange -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or lemon juice, often परोसा with salt on the glass rim.
It is the सबसे common tequila-based cocktail in the United States.
The पेय is परोसा shaken with बर्फ ( on the रॉक्स ), blended with ice ( frozen मार्गरिटा ), or without ice ( सीधा up ).

Burgundy is a dark red color associated with the Burgundy wine of the वही name, जिससे in turn is named बाद the Burgundy region of France.
The color burgundy is समान to other शेड्स of dark red such as maroon.
When referring to the color, `` burgundy '' is usually not capitalized.
The first recorded use of `` burgundy '' as a color name in English थी in 1881.

लापता in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned अंतर्गत the Status of Missing to armed सेवाएं personnel who हैं reported लापता during active service.
They may have been killed, wounded, become a prisoner of war, or deserted.
If deceased, neither उनके remains nor संगीन can be positively पहचाना.
Becoming MIA रै been an occupational risk लिये सेवा personnel लिये as long as वहीँ has been warfare.

Intense red-eye effect in ब्लू eyes with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common रूप of red pupils in रंग photographs of eyes.
It occurs जब using a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक flash very close to the कैमरा लेंस ( as with most compact cameras ), in ambient low light.
The प्रभाव appears in the eyes of humans and पशु that have tapetum lucidum.
Theatrical followspot operators, positioned nearly coincidentally with a very bright light and somewhat दूर from the actors, occasionally witness red-eye in अभिनेताओं on स्टेज.
the effect is not visible to the rest of the audience क्युकी it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी angle between the followspot ऑपरेटर and the लाइट.
the University of California, Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC सांता बारबरा or ucsb ) is a पब्लिक research विश्वविद्यालयों and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system.
The main कैम्पस is स्तिथ on a साईट in Goleta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States, from Santa Barbara and northwest of लॉस Angeles.
ट्रेसिंग its जड़ें back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college, UCSB joined the University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system.
UCSB is एक of अमेरिका 's पब्लिक Ivy universities, which recognizes top public शोध universities in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the university is a comprehensive डॉक्टरेट विश्वविद्यालयों and is organized into पाँच colleges और schools offering 87 undergraduate degrees और 55 graduate degrees.
The कैम्पस is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment with 18,977 undergraduate और 2,950 graduate विद्यार्थी.
In 2012, UCSB थी ranked 41st among `` National Universities '' and 10th among public विश्वविद्यालयों by U.S. न्यूज & World Report.
The university थी also ranked 35th worldwide by the Times उच्चतर Education World University Rankings और 34th worldwide ( 6th worldwide लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the Academic Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < संदर्भ name= '' shanghairanking.com/fieldeng2012 '' >
UC Santa बारबरा is a `` very ऊँची activity '' शोध university and खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on शोध expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year, 97th-largest in the United States.
UCSB घरों twelve नेशनल research centers, including the renowned kavli Institute for Theoretical भौतिकी.
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates, one Fields Medalist, 29 members of the National Academy of sciences, 27 members of the National Academy of Engineering, और 31 members of the अमरीकी अकादमी of Arts and Sciences.
UCSB थी the no. 3 मेजबान on the ARPAnet and थी elected to the Association of American Universities in 1995.
