Saint जोसेफ 's Day, March 19, the feast of st. जोसेफ is in Western christianity the principal feast दिन of Saint जोसेफ, Spouse of the Blessed वर्जिन मरियम.
he is also the step-father of Jesus of Nazareth /Jesus मसीह.
it has the rank of a solemnity in the Roman कैथोलिक Church ; catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast.
Previous to 1962 it was मनाये as a feast of the rank of double of the first class.
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the Anglican Communion, और a feast or पर्व in the लूथरन Church.
Saint जोसेफ 's Day is the Patronal feast day लिये Poland as well as for Canada, persons named Joseph, Josephine, etc., for धार्मिक institutes, schools और parishes bearing his name, and for carpenters.
It is also पिता 's Day in कुछ Catholic countries, mainly स्पेन, Portugal, and इटली.
March 19 was dedicated to संत जोसेफ in अनेक Western calendars by the दसवाँ सदी, and this custom was established in रोम by 1479.
Pope st. Pius v extended its use to the entire Roman Rite by his Apostolic संविधान quo Primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, Episcopal Conferences may, if they wish, transfer it to a तिथि outside Lent.
between 1870 and 1955, a feast थी celebrated in honor of St. Joseph as जीवनसाथी of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the Universal Church, the latter title having been दिए to him by Pope Pius IX.
Originally celebrated on the तीसरा Sunday बाद Easter साथ an अष्टक, बाद Divino Afflatu of St. पायस X ( देखिए Reform of the रोमन Breviary by Pope Pius X ), it थी moved to the preceding Wednesday.
the feast थी also retitled The Solemnity of संत Joseph.
This celebration and its accompanying octave थी abolished दौरान the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955.
It is still maintained by Catholics who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals.
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles ss. फिलिप and James, May 1, had faded from the memory of सबसे Catholics by the mid-twentieth सदी, कि of Joseph the Worker थी created in order to coincide with the जश्न of international श्रमिक दिन ( May दिन ) in अनेक देशों.
the feast of Ss. Philip and जेम्स, which had been मनाये on that तिथि since the छठे सदी, थी स्थानांतरित from इसके traditional place.
In the new calendar published in 1969, the feast, जिससे at एक समय occupied the उच्चतम possible रैंक in the Church पंचांग, was reduced to an optional Memorial, the lowest rank लिये a संत 's day.
the पूर्वी Orthodox Church celebrates Saint जोसेफ on the संडे after क्रिसमस.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, record निर्माता, actress, और लोकसेवक.
Under the मार्गदर्शन of कोलंबिया Records executive Tommy Mottola, कैरी released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive क्रमांक one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 चार्ट.
Following उसके marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit रिकॉर्ड Emotions ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), और Merry क्रिसमस ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second सिंगल `` One मीठी Day ``, a duet with Boyz ii Men, खर्च a रिकार्ड sixteen weeks on top of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100, और remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart इतिहास.
During the recording of the album, कैरी began to deviate from her R & b and पॉप beginnings और धीरे traversed into हिप hop.
इस musical change became evident साथ the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at जिससे time Carey had separated from Mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, and signed a record-breaking $ 100 million recording अनुबंध साथ Virgin Records.
Before the release of उसके पहला feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical और emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for कठोर exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, वो was खरीदा out of her recording contract for $ 50 million, which led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful period, returned to the top of music charts with The emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second सिंगल `` We belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s, and was later named `` सोंग of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey एकबार again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received starring भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the ताड़ Springs International फिल्मी Festival, and Black रील और NAACP चित्र Award nominations.
in a career spanning over two दशकों, कैरी रै sold अधिक than 200 million records विश्वव्यापी, making her एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक artists of all time.
In 1998, वो was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards.
Carey थी भी named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the रिकॉर्डिंग Industry Association of America, वो is the तीसरा best-selling female artist in the संयुक्त राज्य, साथ 63.5 लाख certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained her eighteenth क्रमांक एक single in the संयुक्त राज्य, अधिक than any other solo artist.
in 2012, Carey थी ranked second on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest महिलाओं in Music ''.
aside इससे उसके वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, Carey has जीती five ग्रैमी Awards, 17 संसार Music Awards, 11 American म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, and 31 Billboard म्यूज़िक Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed for her five-octave vocal range, power, melismatic style और signature use of the whistle register.
A bumblebee is कोई member of the मधुमक्खी genus Bombus, in the परिवार apidae.
वहीँ are over 250 known species, existing primarily in the Northern गोलार्ध हालांकि वे also occur in South America.
वे have been introduced to New जीलैंड और the Australian राज्य of Tasmania.
Bumblebees are social insects that are characterised by ब्लैक और yellow body बालों, often in bands.
However, some प्रजाति have orange or red on their लाशें, or may be entirely black.
another obvious ( but नहीं unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the hair ( long, branched setae ), पुकारा pile, that covers उनके entire देह, बनाना them appear and feel fuzzy.
They are best distinguished from similarly विशाल, fuzzy bees by the form of the female हिन्द लेग, which is modified to रूप a corbicula : a चमकदार concave surface कि is bare, but surrounded by a fringe of बालों used to transport pollen ( in similar bees, the hind लेग is completely hairy, and पराग दाने are wedged into the hairs लिये transport ).
Like उनके relatives the honey bees, bumblebees feed on nectar and gather पराग to फीड their यंग.
A man openly carrying a handgun in a Burger किंग in Eagle, Colorado.
in the संयुक्त States, open carry is shorthand terminology for `` खुलकर carrying a firearm in public '', as distinguished from concealed carry, जहाँ firearms can नहीं be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, where gun owners openly carry firearms जबकि they go about their daily कारोबार, has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years.
This has been marked by a number of organized कार्यक्रम intended to increase the दृश्यता of खोलें carry और पब्लिक जागरूकता about the अभ्यास.
Proponents of खोलें carry पाइंट to history and statistics, noting कि criminals usually conceal their weapons.
प्रोत्साहित by groups like OpenCarry.org, GeorgiaCarry.org and कुछ भागीदार of the फ़्री State Project, open carry has देखी a revival in recent सालो, लकिन it is not yet clear if इस represents just a short-term trend.
The gun rights community has been mixed in its जवाब.
Alan gottlieb of the दूसरी Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, जबकि special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and georgiacarry.org, and certain नेशनल समूह such as the Gun Owners of अमेरिका ( GOA ) have been अधिक outspoken in favor of the practice.
खोलें carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups such as the ब्रैडी अभियान and the Coalition to Stop Gun हिंसा.
the Cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in France.
फ़्रांस produces around three quarters of इसके electricity by nuclear शक्ति.
the Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in Germany.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition घोषित on may 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 nuclear शक्ति stations होगा be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following जापानी 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear विपत्ति.
Currently, 68 रिएक्टरों are under निर्माण in 15 देशों.
Nuclear शक्ति स्टेशन operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, पहले the Fukushima daiichi nuclear विपत्ति, it was reported कि an औसत of परिचय 10 nuclear reactors were अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति year, although according to the संसार Nuclear Association, of the 17 civilian reactors नियोजित to become operational between 2007 and 2009, तभी पाँच actually came on स्ट्रीम.
As of June 2011, जर्मनी and स्विट्ज़रलैंड are phasing-out nuclear power.
As of June 2011, countries such as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Austria, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, इटली, Latvia, Liechtenstein, ध्वज, Malaysia, Malta, नई जीलैंड, नार्वे and पुर्तगाल remain opposed to nuclear शक्ति.
Color गति picture फिल्मी refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a format उपयुक्त for use in a motion चित्र camera, and to finished motion picture फिल्मी, ready for उपयोग in a projector, which bears images in रंग.
the first color cinematography थी by means of additive color systems such as the one patented in England by Edward Raymond टर्नर in 1899 and tested in 1902.
A simplified additive प्रणाली थी विकसित by जार्ज अल्बर्ट Smith and successfully commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These जल्दी प्रणालियों used black-and-white film to फोटोग्राफ and project two or more component images through अलग रंग फ़िल्टर.
Still from footage recorded by एडवर्ड Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology, वहीँ are two distinct प्रक्रियाओं : eastman रंग Negative 2 chemistry ( camera ऋणात्मक stocks, duplicating interpositive और internegative स्टॉक्स ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 रसायन ( positive prints लिये direct projection ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 और ecp-2.
Fuji 's products are compatible with ECN-2 and ecp-2.
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, and actress.
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album, जिससे प्रदर्शित the hit song `` foolish ``, and sold over 503,000 copies in its first week of release throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
The एल्बम set a Soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest opening week sales for a new female कलाकार, outselling debuts by एलिसिया कुंजियाँ and Lauryn Hill.
in the same week, she became the first मादा यजमान to simultaneously थाम the top two स्थान on the Billboard hot 100 singles chart with `` foolish '', और `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with Fat Joe ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs, `` foolish, '' `` What 's Luv ? '' और `` Always on Time ``, on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 चार्ट in the वही week, होने the first स्त्री to accomplish this feat और होने second only to the Beatles.
In 2003, the self-titled debut album जीती Ashanti उसके पहला ग्रैमी Award लिये Best Contemporary R & B एल्बम.
As of April 1st 2013, ashanti has बेची over 27.7 million रिकॉर्ड worldwide.
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the third शीर्ष नई R & b artist behind Alicia Keys और Beyoncé.
She also ended the दशक at number 38 on the Top कलाकार of the Decade list.
She is currently on the सूची of the Twenty Best selling Music Singles Since 1990 लिये her single foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date.
Ashanti has an estimated net लायक of $ 40 लाख dollars [ USD ].
ashanti wrote and sang पृष्ठभूमि on Jennifer Lopez 's `` ai n't It Funny ( हत्या Remix ) ``, which reached number one on बिलबोर्ड Hot 100, जिससे was भी in the top 10 chart at the same time as `` Foolish '', `` Always on समय '' ( with Ja नियम ), और `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ).
बाद that year, she was acclaimed as the `` राजकुमारी of hip-hop & R & B '' by her label and capped off her कामयाब debut by जीतना आठ Billboard awards और two American म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Within seven years of Ashanti 's career, she रै scored 16 top 40 hits on the Hot 100.
Ashanti रै endorsed numerous products including Gap, हर्बल essences और Mudd जीन्स.
Ashanti cites Whitney ह्यूस्टन, Janet Jackson, प्रिंस, मैडोना, तुपाक Shakur, मरियम J. Blige, Ella fitzgerald, Smokey रॉबिन्सन, डोना Summer, and ब्लू Magic as उसके musical influences.
Praised as a gifted songwriter by उसके peers and critics alike, ashanti has written/co-written the bulk of सब उसके music.
She is currently working on her own publishing company हकदार Written entertainment.
वो released her fourth studio एल्बम entitled The Declaration on जून 3, 2008 और is फिलहाल in the स्टुडियो working on her fifth.
She also performed the दान tune `` Just Stand up `` alongside 15 अन्य मादा गायकों लिये the `` स्टैंड Up to कर्कट '' live television special which helped raise $ 100 million डॉलर for cancer research.
The United राज्य Army एयर Forces ( usaaf or AAF ) was the सैन्य aviation भुजा of the संयुक्त States of America during और immediately बाद World War II, and the direct पूर्ववर्ती of the संयुक्त States Air Force.
The AAF was a component of the United राज्य फौज, which in 1942 थी divided functionally by executive अनुक्रम into three autonomous शक्तियां : the फौज Ground Forces, the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the फौज Service Forces ), and the aaf.
Each of these शक्तियां था a commanding general who reported directly to the मुख्य of Staff of the United राज्य फौज.
The AAF administered all भाग of military aviation formerly वितरित among the फौज Air Corps, General मुख्यालय Air फ़ोर्स, and मैदान शक्तियां corps area commanders, और thus became the पहला एयर संगठन of the U.S. Army to कंट्रोल इसके own installations और support personnel.
In practice, the aaf थी virtually autonomous inside the Army.
The peak आकार of the aaf was over 2.4 million men और महिलाओं in service और nearly 80,000 वायुयान in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in December 1943.
by VE Day it था 1.25 लाख men stationed overseas and operated from अधिक than 1,600 airfields विश्वव्यापी.
The एयर corps became the Army एयर शक्तियां in June 1941 to provide the air भुजा a greater autonomy in which to expand more efficiently, and to provide a structure लिये the additional कमांड echelons जरूरी by a vastly increased force.
Although other राष्ट्र already had separate एयर शक्तियां independent of the army or navy ( ऐसे as the British Royal Air फ़ोर्स and the जर्मनी Luftwaffe ), the AAF remained a part of the United States Army until the United States एयर Force came into होने in सितंबर 1947.
however, in its expansion and conduct of the युद्ध, the AAF became more than just an भुजा of the greater organization.
By the समाप्त of World War ii the aaf had become virtually an independent service.
by विनियमन and कार्यपालिका order, the aaf थी a अधीनस्थ agency of the War Department tasked तभी with आयोजन, training, और equipping combat इकाई, limited in responsibility to the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त States, as were the Army Ground शक्तियां and the फौज Service Forces.
In reality, Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war in प्रत्येक part of the world, determining air policy and issuing orders without transmitting उन्हें through the मुख्य of Staff.
This `` कंट्रास्ट between theory and fact is... fundamental to an understanding of the aaf. ''
The स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियम ( FOIA ) is a संघीय freedom of information law that allows for the full or partial प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased information and documents controlled by the United States government.
the Act defines agency records विषय to disclosure, outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण procedures and grants nine exemptions to the statute.
It was originally signed into law by President Lyndon B. जॉनसन, despite his misgivings, on July 4, 1966 as and went into effect the following साल.
the Federal Government 's स्वतंत्रता of Information Act should not be उलझन with the different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed by the individual states.
अनेक of those state acts may be समान but नहीं एकसमान to the संघीय act.
The European Union ( eu ) is an economic and political union of 27 member राज्य that हैं located primarily in यूरोपीय.
The EU operates through a प्रणाली of supranational independent institutions और intergovernmental negotiated निर्णय by the सदस्य states.
Institutions of the eu include the यूरोपीय Commission, the Council of the यूरोपीय Union, the यूरोपीय परिषद, the अदालत of इंसाफ of the European संघ, the European सेंट्रल Bank, the Court of Auditors, और the यूरोपीय Parliament.
the European Parliament is elected every पाँच years by EU citizens.
the eu 's de facto पूंजी is Brussels.
The EU traces इसके origins इससे the यूरोपीय Coal and Steel Community ( ECSC ) and the European आर्थिक जातियाँ ( EEC ), formed by the Inner छह countries in 1951 and 1958 क्रमशः.
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of new member राज्य and in शक्ति by the addition of नीति areas to its remit.
the Maastricht Treaty established the यूरोपीय Union अंतर्गत its current name in 1993.
The latest major amendment to the संवैधानिक basis of the EU, the Treaty of Lisbon, came into फ़ोर्स in 2009.
the EU has developed a single market through a standardised system of laws कि apply in सब सदस्य राज्य.
Within the शेंगेन क्षेत्रफल ( जिससे includes 22 EU and 4 non-eu राज्य ) passport नियंत्रण have been abolished.
EU policies aim to ensure the फ़्री गति of लोगों, goods, सेवाएं, और capital, enact legislation in इंसाफ and घर affairs, और maintain common policies on trade, agriculture, fisheries और क्षेत्रीय विकास.
A मौद्रिक union, the eurozone, was स्थापित in 1999 and is composed of 17 member राज्य.
Through the Common Foreign and Security Policy the eu has विकसित a भूमिका in external relations and defence.
Permanent diplomatic missions have been established around the संसार.
The EU is represented at the संयुक्त Nations, the wto, the g8 and the g-20.
With a combined population of over 500 million inhabitants, or 7.3 % of the संसार population, the eu, in 2012, उत्पन्न a nominal gross domestic product ( GDP ) of 16.584 trillion US डॉलर, representing approximately 20 % of the global जीडीपी when measured in terms of purchasing शक्ति parity, and represents the largest nominal जीडीपी and GDP PPP in the संसार.
The eu was the recipient of the 2012 Nobel Peace Prize.
The Wales national रग्बी लीग team represent वेल्स in international रग्बी लीग football matches.
Currently the टोली is seventh in the RLIF World rankings.
The team were run under the auspices of the रग्बी Football League, लकिन an independent body, Wales Rugby League, now runs the team from Cardiff.
a कुल of तीन वेल्श players have महरूम entered into the Rugby लीग Hall Of कीर्ति.
Similar to many अन्य Welsh नेशनल sporting teams, Wales strip रै been primarily red for many years, including now.
However in उनके last World Cup अभियान in 2000 they किया wear a shirt featuring the वेल्श flag, adding a टच of green and white.
the team is known as `` the Dragons '' and so the टीमों लोगो on the shirt is a रेड dragon.
The team date back to 1907, बनाना them the third oldest national side after England and नई Zealand.
और it थी a touring नई Zealand पक्ष कि Wales first निभाई against in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly played England, चूंकि 1935 France, as well as welcomed the touring Australia और New जीलैंड teams, हालांकि वे rarely toured themselves, नहीं playing a मैच in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere until 1975.
लिये twenty-six years वेल्स competed against their two biggest rivals, England and France, in the European Nations कप, winning the ट्रॉफी चार times.
Wales have also competed in the World कप on three occasions, the first समय होने in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 वे had their most कामयाब tournaments to तिथि, surprisingly बनाना the Semi-Finals on both occasions पहले being beaten by इंग्लैण्ड and ऑस्ट्रेलिया क्रमशः.
वेल्स विफल to qualify लिये the 2008 संसार Cup, being the दूसरी highest ranked side not to do so, having खोया to स्कॉटलैंड on points difference over दो मिलान.
in 2008 ऑस्ट्रेलियाई John Dixon became the new सिर coach and appointed Lee Briers as captain, having played for Wales चूंकि 1998.
in हाल seasons वेल्स have taken massive strides under former player Iestyn Harris जो has coached Wales to वापस to वापस यूरोपीय Cup successes, which culminated in a Four राष्ट्र रूप in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` दिल muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the फलन of the myocardium ( the दिल muscle ) for any कारण, usually leading to दिल विफलता ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral एडिमा ( swelling of the legs ).
लोगों with cardiomyopathy are often at risk of खतरनाक forms of irregular heart beat and sudden cardiac मौत.
The सबसे आम form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
बकवास in its शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the act of sexual intercourse.
It is an English शब्द कि is प्रायः used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
The उत्पत्ति of the word is obscure.
It is usually माना to be first attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
in modern उपयोग, बकवास and its derivatives ( such as कमीने और fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a noun, a क्रिया, an क्रियाशील or an क्रियाविशेषण.
There हैं many common phrases which make use of the शब्द, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.

The United States is घर to the largest passenger vehicle मार्केट of कोई country in the world.
overall, वहीँ यहूद an estimated 254.4 million registered passenger vehicles in the United States according to a 2007 DOT study.
इस number, साथ with the average age of vehicles, has increased steadily since 1960, indicating a growing number of वाहनों per capita.
The चाइनीज car मार्केट, however, is poised to जल्द exceed the संयुक्त States ; by the end of 2012, वहीँ were over 240 million cars on the road in China.
The United States is भी home to तीन विशाल vehicle manufacturers : सामान्य Motors, Ford Motor कम्पनी and Chrysler, which have historically महरूम referred to as the `` Big तीन. ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the शीर्ष three ; but is क्रमांक five, behind Toyota और Honda.
The motor car has clearly become an अभिन्न भाग of American life, साथ vehicles outnumbering licensed drivers.
नैदानिक laboratory in a Hospital setting प्रर्दशित several automated analysers.
A medical laboratory or clinical प्रयोगशाला is a laboratory where tests हैं done on clinical नमूनों in order to get information about the health of a patient as pertaining to the निदान, उपचार, and prevention of बीमारी.
In पोकर, players construct hands of पाँच cards according to predetermined नियम, जिससे vary according to जिससे रूपांतर of poker is being played.
These hands are compared using a हाथ ranking system that is मानक across all विसंगतियाँ of poker, the player साथ the highest-ranking hand winning कि particular deal in most variants of poker.
In some variants, the lowest-ranking hand can win or tie.
These hand rankings हैं also used in some अन्य card games, और in पोकर dice.
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including multiple cards of the same कार्ड rank, by all five ताश being इससे the same suit, or by all five cards being of लगातार रैंक.
The relative ranking of the various hand श्रेणी is आधारित on the probability of होने randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck.
ब्रूस Randall Hornsby ( born नवम्बर 23, 1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a singer, pianist, synthesizer, accordion, और dulcimer player, and songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live प्रदर्शन, Hornsby draws frequently from शास्त्रीय, जैज़, bluegrass, folk, Motown, gospel, rock, blues, and jam band musical परंपराओं with his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within.
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a क्रमांक of occasions with industry awards, सहित the Best New कलाकार Grammy in 1987 साथ Bruce Hornsby and the Range, the Best ब्लूग्रास Recording ग्रैमी in 1990, और the बेहतरीन Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993.

Sugarcane plantation in rural क्यूबा
Agriculture in Cuba has played an important part in the economy लिये अनेक hundred years.
Agriculture contributes less than 10 प्रतिशत to the सकल domestic product ( GDP ), but it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population.
About 30 percent of the देश 's जमीन is used for crop cultivation.
The inefficient agricultural industry in Cuba रै led to the need to import large amounts of foods.
क्यूबा now imports परिचय 80 % of the food it rations to the public.
the rationing program खाते for परिचय a third of the food उर्जा the average क्यूबन consumes.
Overall, however, Cuba is निर्भर on imports for तभी 16 % of इसके food.

Mega लाखो ( initially called the Big Game Mega लाखो as the successor of The Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game.
The first ( the बिग Game ) आचमन Millions drawing was in 2002 ( देखिए below ).
The minimum आचमन लाखो advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 बराबर yearly किश्तों ( unless the cash option is चुनी ) ; usually, the jackpot increases जब there is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no जैकपॉट winner for the $ 12,000,000 December 18, 2012 drawing, the jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21.
( See below लिये information on how the game 's jackpot is funded. )
reflecting common अभ्यास among अमरीकी lotteries, the जैकपॉट is advertised as a nominal value of annual किश्तों.
A नकदी value विकल्प ( the usual choice ), जब चुनी by a jackpot winner ( see below ), pays the approximate present value of the किश्तों.
आचमन Millions currently uses a 5/56 ( white balls ) plus 1/46 ( the Mega बॉल ) double matrix to select its winning numbers.
Each game लागत $ 1.
in 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the एक्सेप्शन ), there is an option, called megaplier ( ऐसे खेल are $ 2 प्रत्येक ) जहाँ non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
The Megaplier was made available to all आचमन Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. पूर्वी समय मंगलवार and शुक्रवार, including holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of its 12 original lotteries and the drawings are held at WSB-TV in Atlanta, Georgia.
supervised by the Georgia Lottery.
the largest jackpot in Mega Millions, as well as in American लॉटरी history, was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a नकदी option of $ 474,000,000 ) लिये the March 30, 2012 drawing in which वहीँ were तीन jackpot-winning टिकटें ; one प्रत्येक in Illinois, Kansas, और Maryland.
All three tickets had been claimed as of April 18, with प्रत्येक नियत of विजेता चुनना the cash option.
is a Japanese manga series created by writer Tsugumi Ohba और manga कलाकार Takeshi Obata.
The main character is लाइट Yagami, a high school student who discovers a अलौकिक notebook, the `` मौत नोट '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk.
The Death Note grants इसके user the ability to kill anyone जिनकी नाम and face they जान, by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their फेस.
The series centers around Light 's attempt to बनाएँ and rule a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` God '' using the कोपी, और the efforts of a detective ज्ञात as L to रोकें him.
Death Note was पहला serialized in 108 chapters by Shueisha in the Japanese manga magazine साप्ताहिक Shōnen जम्प from December 2003 to May 2006.
The series was also प्रकाशित in tankōbon format in जापानी starting in may 2004 and समाप्ति in October 2006 with a total of thirteen आयतन.
The anime श्रेणी aired in जापानी इससे अक्तूबर 3, 2006, to June 26, 2007.
रचित of 37 एपीसोड, the दुश्मनी was developed by Madhouse and directed by Tetsuro Araki.
a लाइट novel based on the series, written by nisio isin, was released in Japan.
Additionally, विभिन्न video games have महरूम published by Konami for Nintendo DS.
The series थी adapted into live-action films released in जापानी on जून 17, 2006, November 3, 2006, and फ़रवरी 2, 2008.

the episodes from the anime first appeared in North America as downloadable by ign.
Viz later licensed the anime series and it aired on Bionix in कनाडा और on Cartoon Network in the संयुक्त States.

Halloween or hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), भी known as All Hallows ' Eve, is a वार्षिक celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or सब Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead साथ possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain और has solely ईसाई roots.
Typical festive हैलोवीन क्रियाएँ include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching हॉरर films.
New York City taxicabs during Midtown rush hour in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New यॉर्क City, with their distinctive yellow पेंट, are a widely recognized प्रतीक of the city.
Taxicabs हैं operated by private companies और licensed by the New York City Taxi और Limousine Commission ( tlc ).
it also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles, सहित `` ब्लैक cars '', commuter वैन and ambulettes.
`` Medallion taxis, '' the familiar yellow cabs, are the only vehicles in the city permitted to pick up passengers in response to a गली hail.
schematic क्रॉस section of part of leaf, xylem shown as रेड वृत्त at figure 8.
Xylem is एक of the दो प्रकार of transport tissue in vascular plants ( फ्लोएम is the other ).
the शब्द xylem is निकला इससे the यूनानी word ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem ऊतक is लकडी, though it is found throughout the plant.
इसके मौलिक function is to हस्तांतरण water, but it also transports some nutrients through the संयंत्र.
U.S. women suffragists demonstrating लिये the सही to vote, फ़रवरी 1913.
Women 's suffrage also ज्ञात as woman suffrage is the right of women to vote and to run for office.
सीमित मतदान rights were gained by महिलाओं in Sweden, फिनलैंड और some western U.S. states in the late 19th century.
International organizations यहूद formed to coordinate efforts, especially the International Council of Women ( 1888 ) and the International Woman suffrage गठबंधन ( 1904 ).
In 1893, नई Zealand, तब a self-governing British उपनिवेश, granted adult women the right to vote and the self-governing British colony of South ऑस्ट्रेलिया did the same in 1895, but also permitted women to चलाएं for दफ्तर.
ऑस्ट्रेलिया federated in 1901, and महिलाओं acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections इससे 1902, though uneven restrictions on aboriginal महिलाओं voting in नेशनल elections यहूद not completely removed until 1962.
The first यूरोपीय देश to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of फिनलैंड, then part of the रूसी Empire, जिससे also produced the world 's first मादा members of parliament in the 1907 संसदीय चुनावों.
Norway followed, granting full women 's suffrage in 1913.
in most Western countries, महिलाओं 's suffrage came after World I युद्ध i I, with कुछ important late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971.
Women 's suffrage रै generally महरूम recognized after political अभियान to obtain it were waged.
In many countries it थी granted पहले universal suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a सही under the Convention on the विलोपन of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women, adopted by the United Nations in 1979.
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a gothic सस्पेंस novel, the author 's first published book.
यहोवा 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist ईसाई denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct इससे मुख्यधारा Christianity.Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : The organization रिपोर्ट्स worldwide membership of over 7.78 लाख adherents involved in इंजीलवाद, convention उपस्थिति of over 12 लाख, and सालाना Memorial उपस्थिति of over 19 million.
They are directed by the शासी Body of Jehovah 's Witnesses, a समूह of बड़ो in Brooklyn, नई York, that establishes all doctrines.
Jehovah 's गवाह ' मान्यताओं are आधारित on their interpretations of the बाइबल and they prefer to उपयोग उनके own translation, the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures.
They believe कि the विनाश of the present world system at Armageddon is imminent, और कि the स्थापना of परमेश्वर 's kingdom on earth is the only समाधान for सब problems faced by mankind.
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the late 1870s by Charles Taze रसेल साथ the गठन of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the नेतृत्व of Joseph फ्रैंकलिन Rutherford.
The name Jehovah 's witnesses, based on Isaiah 43:10–12, was अपनाया in 1931 to distinguish themselves इससे other Bible Student groups and symbolize a ब्रेक with the legacy of Russell 's traditions.
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known for their door-to-door उपदेश, distributing literature such as The बुर्ज and Awake !
, and refusing military सेवा and blood transfusions.
They consider उपयोग of the name Jehovah vital लिये उचित worship.
They reject Trinitarianism, inherent अमरत्व of the soul, and hellfire, जिससे वे consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
They do not observe Christmas, Easter, birthdays, or other holidays and customs they consider to have pagan origins incompatible with christianity.
adherents commonly refer to their देह of मान्यताओं as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
वे consider धर्मनिरपेक्ष समाज to be morally भ्रष्ट and अंतर्गत the influence of शैतानी, और most limit उनके social interaction with non-Witnesses.
Congregational disciplinary actions शामिल disfellowshipping, their पद लिये औपचारिक expulsion और shunning.
Baptized individuals who formally leave are considered disassociated and are भी shunned.
disfellowshipped और disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The धर्म 's स्थिति regarding ईमानदार आपत्ति to military service और refusal to salute national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments.
नतीजतन, यहोवा 's Witnesses have महरूम persecuted and their activities हैं banned or प्रतिबंधित in some countries.
Persistent legal challenges by यहोवा 's गवाह have influenced legislation related to civil rights in several countries.
पिछला Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian रोमांटिक नाटक film directed by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a हाल American widower who begins an बेनाम sexual relationship with a young, betrothed Parisian woman.
It सितारों Marlon Brando, मरिया Schneider, and Jean-Pierre Léaud.
The फिल्मी 's कच्चा portrayal of यौन violence and emotional turmoil led to international controversy and drew various स्तर of government censorship.
The MPAA दिया the फिल्मी an X दरजा upon रिलीज in the United States.
After revisions यहूद made to the mpaa ratings कोड, it थी वर्गीकृत as an NC-17 in 1997.
MGM released a censored R-rated काटें in 1981.
The फिल्मी has its NC-17 rating लिये `` some explicit यौन content. ''
Windows XP is an ऑपरेटिंग system उत्पादित by Microsoft for use on personal computers, सहित घर and business desktops, लैपटॉप और media centers.
First released to कंप्यूटर निर्माताओं on August 24, 2001, it is the दूसरी most popular version of खिड़कियाँ, आधारित on संस्थापित user base.
the नाम `` XP '' is short for `` eXPerience '', highlighting the उन्नत उपयोक्ता experience.
खिड़कियाँ XP, the successor to खिड़कियाँ 2000 और Windows ME, was the पहला consumer-oriented operating system produced by microsoft to be निर्मित on the Windows NT कर्नेल.
Windows XP थी released worldwide for retail sale on October 25, 2001, and over 400 million copies were in उपयोग in January 2006.
it was succeeded by Windows Vista in जनवरी 2007.
सीधा OEM and retail बिक्री of खिड़कियाँ XP ceased on June 30, 2008.
Microsoft जारी to sell Windows XP through their System बिल्डर ( smaller oems who sell समवेत computers ) program until January 31, 2009.
On April 10, 2012, microsoft reaffirmed that extended support लिये खिड़कियाँ xp and Office 2003 would end on अप्रैल 8, 2014 and suggested कि administrators begin preparing to migrate to a नए OS.
The nt -based versions of Windows, जिससे are programmed in C, C++, और सभा, हैं known for उनके improved stability and efficiency over the 9x संस्करण of Microsoft Windows.
खिड़कियाँ xp presented a significantly redesigned आलेखीय user interface, a change Microsoft promoted as more user-friendly than पिछला versions of Windows.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` कि plagued the past संस्करण of Windows, improved side-by-side सभा technology in Windows xp allows side-by-side installation, registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared तन्त्र components in full isolation.
it is also the first version of Windows to use product activation to कॉम्बैट illegal copying.
दौरान Windows XP 's development, the project was codenamed `` whistler '', after Whistler, British Columbia, as many Microsoft employees skied at the whistler-blackcomb स्की resort.
according to web analytics आंकड़ा generated by Net Applications, खिड़कियाँ xp was the most widely used operating system until August 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows xp मार्केट share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost every month चूंकि at least November 2007, the first month लिये which आंकडे are सरेआम available from Net अनुप्रयोग.
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with music and lyrics लिखा in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo le प्रभा क्रमशः.
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase meaning `` by a head '', which refers to a घोड़ा जीतना a race by the length of one head.
the गीत बोलो of a compulsive horse-track gambler जो compares उसके addiction लिये horses with his attraction to women.
अल्फ्रेडो Le प्रभा थी a ब्राज़ीलियाई from São Paulo, a much italian-influenced area in Brazil, and also the birthplace of Zequinha de abreu, composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá.
le प्रभा and Gardel died in an airplane crash in Medellín, ( Colombia ), on June 24, 1935.
Por una Cabeza
The tango has चूंकि been performed by numerous tango orchestras.
टैंगो scenes साथ `` पोर una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ), Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), Schindler 's List ( 1993 ), True झूठ ( 1994 ), टाइटैनिक ( 1996 ), Bad Santa ( Uncut Version, 2003 ), All the किंग 's Men ( 2006 ), Planet 51 ( 2009 ), episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ), episode 9 of दक्षिण Korean drama series मीठी Spy ( 2005–08 ), the beginning and समाप्ति क्रेडिट of the South कोरियाई drama ब्रॉडकास्ट I 'm Sorry, I Love You ( 2004 ), and the एपीसोड `` bas the खरगोश Hole `` ( 2007 ).
in the फिल्म Frida ( Salma Hayek, 2002 ), gardel is heard गायन it on a radio.
It is also quoted in David Del Tredici 's `` शुभ न्यूज !
Nilda is Back '' ( इससे the song साईकिल Miz Inez sez ).
In सैंट of a Woman ( 1992 ), the tango is performed by the `` The टैंगो Project '', who actually appear in the dancing scene starring al Pacino ( the रिकॉर्डिंग used is available on एक of their CD albums ).
John Williams arranged a version of the piece that appears on the album `` Cinema serenade '' साथ the सारंगी solo performed by Itzhak Perlman.
Perlman and विलियम्स ( conducting ) have भी performed the टुकड़ा together in live concerts.
In 2012 a dance version थी released by the समूह `` Da Carrera '' featuring the असली vocal रिकॉर्डिंग by Carlos Gardel.
the baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is एक of the body 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining blood दबाव.
it provides a negative प्रतिक्रिया loop in जिससे an elevated blood दबाव reflexively causes heart रेट to decrease इसलिए causing blood दबाव to decrease ; likewise, decreased blood दबाव activates the baroreflex, causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure.
the system relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स, known as baroreceptors, in the aortic arch, carotid साइनस, and elsewhere to monitor changes in रक्त दबाव और रिले उन्हें to the brainstem.
subsequent परिवर्तन in blood दबाव are mediated by the autonomic बेचैन system.
अलिंदी natriuretic peptide forms a समानांतर negative प्रतिक्रिया loop in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system.
the Loma Prieta earthquake, also ज्ञात as the भूकंप of '89 और the World श्रेणी Earthquake, was a major भूकंप that struck the San Francisco Bay Area of California on अक्तूबर 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
Caused by a slip साथ the San Andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 seconds and measured 6.9 on दोनो the moment magnitude स्केल ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) और on the open-ended Richter Scale.
the quake killed 63 people throughout northern California, injured 3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000 people बेघर.
the earthquake occurred during the warm-up अभ्यास for the तीसरा game of the 1989 World श्रेणी, featuring both of the Bay Area 's Major लीग बेसबॉल teams, the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants.
Because of game-related sports coverage, इस was the first प्रमुख earthquake in the संयुक्त राज्य to have its initial jolt broadcast live on television.
Pawn in the मानक Staunton pattern
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest टुकड़ा in the खेल of शतरंज, historically representing infantry or, अधिक particularly, armed peasants or pikemen.
in शतरंज, each player begins the खेल with आठ pawns, one on प्रत्येक square of the rank immediately in सामने of the other टुकड़े.
( In algebraic notation, the white pawns start on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, जबकि black pawns start on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
Individual pawns are referred to by the संचिका on जिससे they stand.
लिये example, one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` ब्लैक 's b-pawn '', or less commonly ( using descriptive notation ), `` White 's king 's bishop साहूकार '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn ''.
It is भी common to refer to a rook साहूकार, meaning any साहूकार on the a- or h-file, a नाईट pawn ( on the b- or g-file ), a bishop pawn ( on the c- or f-file ), a queen pawn ( on the d-file ), a king pawn ( on the e-file ), and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ).
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and लेस्बियन ) और द्विलिंगी individuals.
The armed forces of most विकसित countries have now removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with सख्त नीतियों on sexual harassment ).
Nations that परमिट gay people to serve खुलकर in the सैन्य include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security परिषद ( United States, United किंगडम, फ़्रांस, and Russia ), the Republic of चीन ( Taiwan ), Australia, Israel, South अफ़्रीकी, Argentina, and all नाटो members excluding Turkey.
हाइड्रोजन production is the family of industrial methods लिये generating hydrogen.
फिलहाल the dominant technology for direct उत्पादन is भाप reforming from hydrocarbons.
Many other methods are known including electrolysis और thermolysis.
in 2006, the United राज्य थी अनुमानित to have a उत्पादन क्षमता of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen.
5 लाख टन of hydrogen यहूद consumed on-site in oil refining, और in the production of अमोनिया ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 लाख टन यहूद an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
Hydrogen production is an अनुमानित $ 100 अरब industry.
A basis पाइंट ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the बहुवचन as `` bips '', भी known as a `` बीप '' ) is a unit equal to एक hundredth of a percentage पाइंट, or एक भाग per ten thousand, 1/10000.
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad, literally meaning 'for ( every ) असंख्य ( ten thousand ) ', and in कि context is written with which looks जैसे a percent चिह्न ( % ) with दो extra zeroes at the समाप्त ( like a stylized रूप of the four zeros in the denominator, although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
a basis पाइंट is पारिभाषित as:
1 basis पाइंट = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
आधार अंक are used as a convenient unit of मापन in contexts where percentage differences of less than 1 % are discussed.
The most common example is interest दरों, where differences in ब्याज दरों of less than 1 % per year हैं usually meaningful to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 basis अंक ( e.g. a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ).
Like प्रतिशत points, आधार अंक avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute चर्चाएँ परिचय interest दरों by dealing only with the absolute change in न्यूमेरिक मान of a rate.
लिये उदाहरण, if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % interest rate, this could refer to an बढ़ाएँ either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative, 1 % of 10 % ), or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute, 1 % plus 10 % ).
if, however, the report says there has been a `` 10 आधार point बढ़ाएँ '' from a 10 % interest rate, तब we जान कि the interest rate of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the निरपेक्ष change ) to a 10.1 % rate.
it is common practice in the वित्तीय industry to use आधार points to denote a rate change in a financial instrument, or the difference ( spread ) between दो interest rates, including the yields of fixed-income प्रतिभूति.
चूंकि certain loans और bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to कुछ index or underlying security, they will often be quoted as a spread over ( or under ) the index.
लिये उदाहरण, a loan कि bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( libor ) is कहा to be 50 basis points over libor, which is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or simply `` l+50 ''.
the term `` basis पाइंट '' रै इसके origins in व्यापार the `` basis '' or the spread between दो interest rates.
Since the basis is usually छोटी, these are quoted multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` full point '' गति in the `` आधार '' is a basis point.
Contrast with pips in fx forward markets.
the relationship between percentage changes and basis points can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage पाइंट change = 100 basis points, and 0.01 प्रतिशत अंक = 1 basis point.
so, a bond whose उपज increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is कहा to बढ़ाएँ by 50 आधार points ; or interest rates that have risen 1 percentage point are said to have increased by 100 आधार अंक.
The British royal Family is the group of close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom.
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of लोगों जो are the relations of the monarch in उसके or उसके role as sovereign of any of the other राष्ट्रमंडल realms, यूँ sometimes at variance साथ आधिकारिक national शर्तें for the परिवार.
Members of the Royal परिवार belong to, either by birth or marriage, the House of Windsor, since 1917, when George v बदला the name of the royal house from saxe-coburg and Gotha.
This निर्णय थी primarily लिया because Britain and her Empire were at war with Germany और given the अंग्रेजों royal Family 's strong German ancestry ; it was felt कि its public image could be improved by choosing a more British हाउस name.
The नई name chosen, विंडसर, था absolutely no connection अन्य than as the name of the castle जिससे थी और continues to be a royal residence.
Although in the संयुक्त किंगडम there is no strict विधिक or formal definition of who is or is not a सदस्य of the Royal परिवार, and अलग lists will include different लोगों, those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ), or उसके or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered सदस्यों, which प्रायः results in the application of the पद to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the widowed consorts of पिछला monarchs, the children of the monarch and previous monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and पिछला monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line पोते.
On 30 November 1917, King George V issued अक्षर Patent defining जो are सदस्यों of the Royal परिवार ; the text of the notice from the London गजट is as follows:
In 1996, Her majesty the Queen परिवर्धित ये Letters पेटेंट, as was evidenced by this Notice from the London gazette:
in 2013 Letters पेटेंट were issued to extend a शीर्षक and a style borne by सदस्यों of the Royal Family to अतिरिक्त persons to be born, evidenced by this सूचना from the लंदन Gazette:
Members और relatives of the अंग्रेजों Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various स्थान throughout the अंग्रेजों Empire, sometimes लिये extended periods as viceroys, or for specific ceremonies or कार्यक्रम.
Today, वे often perform ceremonial और social duties throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on behalf of the संयुक्त किंगडम.
aside from the monarch, their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve, if योग्य and when नियुक्त by letters patent, as a Counsellor of State, two or more of whom कसरत the प्राधिकार of the Crown ( within stipulated हद ) in the indisposal or absence इससे the British realm of the monarch.
in the other realms of the Commonwealth royalty do not serve as counsellors of State.
However in each ऐसे फ्रेम the monarch 's family members may act on behalf of, are funded by, and represent the sovereign of that particular state, and नहीं the United Kingdom.
The महारानी, her consort, her children and grandchildren, as well as all former अधिपति ' children and grandchildren hold places in the first sections of the official orders of पूर्वता in England and Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
पत्नियां of the कहा आनंद their husbands ' precedence, and husbands of princesses हैं unofficially but habitually placed साथ उनके wives as well.
However, the महारानी changed the private अनुक्रम of पूर्वता in the Royal परिवार in पक्ष of राजकुमारियों ऐनी and Alexandra, जो henceforth लो private पूर्वता over the Duchess of Cornwall, जो is वरना the फ्रेम 's उच्चतम ranking woman after the Queen herself.
She did नहीं alter the relative precedence of other born-princesses, ऐसे as the daughters of उसके younger sons.
Haiti ( ; haitian क्रियोल Ayiti ), officially the गणतंत्र of Haiti ( ; ), is a Caribbean देश.
It occupies the western, smaller portion of the island of Hispaniola, in the Greater antillean द्वीपसमूह, जिससे it shares with the डोमिनिकन Republic.
ayiti ( जमीन of high mountains ) was the indigenous Taíno or amerindian name for the island.
The country 's उच्चतम पाइंट is pic la Selle, at.
The total area of Haiti is and इसके पूंजी is port-au-prince.
Haitian Creole and फ्रेंच are the आधिकारिक languages.
Haiti 's क्षेत्रीय, ऐतिहासिक, and ethno-linguistic position is unique for several reasons.
it थी the first स्वतंत्र nation of Latin अमेरिका and the Caribbean, the first black -led गणतंत्र in the world, and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave revolution स्थायी nearly a decade.
In 2012, हैती announced its इरादे to seek associate सदस्यता औकात in the African Union.
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly Francophone independent राष्ट्र in the Americas.
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with कनाडा ) to designate फ्रेंच as an official भाषा ; the other French-speaking areas are सब overseas départements, or collectivités, of फ़्रांस.
Haiti is the most populous full member-state of the Caribbean जातियाँ ( caricom ).
it is the poorest country in the Americas as measured by the इंसान विकास Index.
Political violence has occurred regularly throughout its history, leading to government instability.
सबसे recently, in February 2004, a तख्तापलट d'état originating in the north of the country मजबूर the resignation और exile of President Jean-Bertrand aristide.
A provisional सरकारी took control with security provided by the United Nations Stabilization मिशन in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel martelly, the current president, was निर्वाचित in the Haitian general चुनाव, 2011.
The island रै had a history of destructive earthquakes.
a 7.0 magnitude भूकंप struck Haiti on 12 January 2010 and devastated port-au-prince.
The highest reliable death गिनती was अनुमानित at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates were higher.
The Presidential palace, पार्लियामेंट and many अन्य important structures were destroyed, along साथ countless homes and businesses, leaving सैंकड़ों of thousands of people homeless.
the country has yet to रिकवर from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of the damage Haiti endured in 2010, as well as a government कि थी अप्रभावी well before the earthquake.
United States aid organizations have donated $ 2 billion.
Combined साथ other अंतरराष्ट्रीय दान, these funds हैं intended to योगदान to the rebuilding of the country.
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir bob Cornelius rifo, the Italian electro house and dance-punk म्यूज़िक producer, dj और photographer.
The Bloody Beetroots is well-known लिये the black Venom mask he wears दौरान प्रदर्शन.
In fact, the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the year `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार his chest, which is दोनो the साल that the निर्माता and punk-rock was born.
`` the Bloody Beetroots DJ नियत '' contains Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo and Tommy Tea.
A मोटोरोला सलाहकार alphanumeric पेजर used in Brazil in the 1990s, operated by Teletrim
A pager is a बेतार telecommunications device that receives और प्रदर्शक numeric or text संदेश, or receives और announces voice messages.
one-way pagers can only प्राप्त messages, जबकि response pagers and two-way pagers can also acknowledge, reply to, और originate संदेश using an internal ट्रांसमीटर.
pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes one or अधिक फिक्स्ड ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the case of response pagers and two-way pagers, एक or more आधार stations ), as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users.
These systems can range from a restaurant system साथ a single low-power transmitter, to a देशभर system with thousands of high-power base stations.
One of the first व्यावहारिक paging सेवाएं was launched in 1950 लिये physicians in the नई York City क्षेत्रफल.
Physicians paid US $ 12 per माह for the सेवा and carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर that होता प्राप्त phone messages within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
The प्रणाली थी manufactured by the Reevesound कम्पनी और operated by telanswerphone.
In 1960, John Francis मिशेल combined तत्व of मोटोरोला 's Walkie Talkie and automobile radio technologies to create the first transistorized pager, and from this point, paging technology continued to advance, और pager adoption जारी to expand, until the early 1990s.
however, by the mid-1990s, as सेल्यूलर technologies became सस्ता and अधिक widely available, advanced सेवाएं began to displace paging as a commercial product.
Today, pagers exist largely as niche products, finding preferential use in applications ऐसे as hospitals, public safety, and retail स्थितियाँ where their simplicity, high विश्वसनीयता, and कम लागत represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a town in dorchester County, दक्षिण Carolina, United राज्य.
The population was 196 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
as पारिभाषित by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget, and used by the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो लिये सांख्यिकीय purposes only, Reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north Charleston-Summerville metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born magdalena Carmen frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; जुलाई 6, 1907 – July 13, 1954 ) was a मैक्सिकन painter, born in Coyoacán, जो is बेहतरीन known for उसके self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began and ended in Mexico नगर, in her home known as the ब्लू हाउस.
She दिया her birth तिथि as जुलाई 7, 1910, but उसके जनम certificate shows July 6, 1907.
Kahlo had allegedly चाही the year of उसके birth to coincide with the year of the beginning of the Mexican revolution so कि उसके life would begin with the जनम of modern Mexico.
उसके work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of नेशनल and स्वदेशी tradition, and by feminists for इसके uncompromising चित्रण of the female अनुभव and form.
Mexican culture और amerindian cultural परंपरा are महत्वपूर्ण in उसके कार्य, which has been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or लोक art.
Her कार्य रै also महरूम described as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 André Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist गति, described Kahlo 's आर्ट as a `` रिबन around a bomb ''.
Kahlo had a volatile विवाह with the famous Mexican artist डिएगो रिवेरा.
She suffered lifelong health समस्याएं.
Many of her health problems were the result of a traffic accident she बच as a teenager.
Recovering from उसके injuries isolated उसके from other लोगों और this अलगाव influenced her works, अनेक of which हैं self-portraits of एक sort or another.
Kahlo suggested, `` I पेंट myself because I am so often alone and because I am the विषय i know बेहतरीन. ''
She also stated, `` I थी born a bitch.
I was born a painter. ''

Theresienwiese on the दिन before Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating बियर held annually in Munich, Bavaria, जर्मनी, running इससे late September to the first वीकेंड in अक्तूबर.
It is one of the most famous events in Germany and is the world 's largest मेला, with more than 6 लाख people from around the world attending the event every year.
To the locals, it is not पुकारा Oktoberfest, but `` die Wiesn '', after the colloquial नाम of the fairgrounds themselves.
The oktoberfest is an important part of Bavarian संस्कृति, having been held चूंकि 1810.
Other cities across the संसार भी hold oktoberfest जश्न, modeled बाद the original Munich event.
the Munich Oktoberfest originally took place during the sixteen days up to, और including, the पहला संडे in October.
In 1994, the अनुसूची was modified in जवाब to जर्मनी reunification so that if the पहला Sunday in October falls on the 1st or 2nd, then the पर्व would go on जबतक October 3 ( जर्मनी Unity Day ).
Thus, the पर्व is now 17 दिनों जब the first संडे is October 2 and 18 दिनों जब it is अक्तूबर 1.
In 2010, the पर्व lasted जबतक the पहला सोमवार in October, to चिह्नित the वर्षगांठ of the इवेंट.
the festival is आयोजित in an क्षेत्रफल नामित the Theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of therese ), प्रायः पुकारा Wiesn लिये short, located near Munich 's center.
विशाल quantities of Oktoberfest बियर are consumed, साथ almost 7 million liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007.
Visitors may भी enjoy a चौड़ी variety of traditional खाना such as Hendl ( मुर्गा ), Schweinebraten ( रोस्ट पोर्क ), schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ), Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick ), würstl ( sausages ) along with brezeln ( Pretzel ), knödel ( potato or bread पकौड़ी ), Käsespätzle ( cheese नूडल्स ), Reiberdatschi ( आलू pancakes ), sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with ऐसे Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter स्प्रेड ) and weisswurst ( a white sausage ).

Wheels of Gouda
Cheese is a generic term लिये a विविध समूह of milk-based food products.
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging flavors, बनावट, and forms.
Cheese consists of प्रोटीन और fat from milk, प्रायः the मिल्क of cows, buffalo, goats, or शीप.
It is produced by coagulation of the milk protein casein.
typically, the मिल्क is acidified and addition of the enzyme rennet causes जामन.
The solids are अलग and pressed into फाइनल रूप.
कुछ cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
सबसे cheeses melt at cooking तापमान.
Hundreds of प्रकार of cheese from various देशों हैं produced.
Their शैलियाँ, textures और जायका निर्भर on the origin of the milk ( सहित the animal 's आहार ), whether they have महरूम pasteurized, the butterfat सामग्री, the जीवाणु and mold, the processing, and वृद्धावस्था.
Herbs, मसाले, or wood smoke may be used as flavoring agents.
The yellow to red रंग of many cheeses, ऐसे as Red Leicester, is normally formed from adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or नीबू रस.
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser उपाधि by bacteria, which turn milk sugars into lactic एसिड, तब the जोड of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet हैं available ; most are produced by fermentation of the fungus Mucor miehei, but अन्य have महरूम extracted इससे various प्रजाति of the Cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued लिये its पोर्टेबिलिटी, long life, and ऊँची content of मोटे, protein, कैल्सियम, और phosphorus.
चीज is more compact and has a longer shelf जीवन than मिल्क, हालांकि कैसा long a cheese will keep may depend on the type of चीज ; labels on packets of cheese प्रायः अर्जी that a चीज should be consumed within three to five दिनों of opening.
Generally speaking, hard cheeses last longer than soft cheeses, such as Brie or बकरी 's मिल्क चीज.
cheesemakers near a dairy region may benefit from fresher, lower-priced milk, and lower shipping costs.
The long storage life of कुछ cheese, especially if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक rind, allows selling जब markets are favorable.
Additional ingredients may be added to some cheeses, ऐसे as black peppers, garlic, chives or cranberries.
A विशेषज्ञ seller of cheese is sometimes ज्ञात as a cheesemonger.
to become an विशेषज्ञ in इस field, जैसे वाइन or cooking, requires some formal शिक्षा और सालो of tasting और hands-on experience.
This position is typically responsible लिये all aspects of the चीज inventory ; selecting the cheese menu, purchasing, receiving, भंडार, and ripening.
Legal citation सिग्नल are a set of brief abbreviated phrases or words प्रयुक्त to clarify the authority or significance of a विधिक citation as it relates to a proposition.
सिग्नल help a reader quickly discern अर्थ or usefulness of a particular reference when the reference itself does नहीं provide adequate सूचना.
Most citation signals हैं placed in सामने of the citation to जिससे they apply.
लिये example, in the अनुच्छेद जब writing a legal argument, it is important to refer to प्राथमिक sources.
to assist पाठक in locating these स्त्रोत, it is desirable to use a standardized citation format.
देखिए generally Harvard Law Review संघ, The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that कुछ courts may require कोई विधिक papers that are submitted to उन्हें to conform to a different citation format.
the सिग्नल is the phrase `` see generally, '' which indicates that the citation `` The Bluebook : a वर्दी System of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic.
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August 5, 1930 – August 25, 2012 ) was an American astronaut and the first person to चलना on the Moon.
he was also an aerospace engineer, नवल aviator, test pilot, and university professor.
Before becoming an astronaut, आर्मस्ट्रांग was an officer in the U.S. नेवी and परोसा in the Korean युद्ध.
After the war, he earned his स्नातक 's उपाधि at purdue विश्वविद्यालयों और served as a test pilot at the National सलाहकार Committee for Aeronautics High-Speed Flight Station, अभी known as the ड्राइडेन Flight शोध Center, where he logged over 900 फ़्लाइट.
He later समाप्त graduate studies at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
A भागीदार in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in Space Soonest and x-20 Dyna-Soar human spaceflight programs, Armstrong joined the नासा Astronaut Corps in 1962.
he made उसके first space flight, as command pilot of मिथुन 8, in 1966, becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to मक्खी in space.
On this mission, he performed the first docking of two spacecraft, with pilot David Scott.
Armstrong 's दूसरी and पिछला spaceflight was as mission commander of the अपोलो 11 moon लैंडिंग, in जुलाई 1969.
On इस mission, आर्मस्ट्रांग and Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface and spent two और a हाफ hours exploring, जबकि Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in the कमांड Module.
साथ साथ कॉलिन्स और Aldrin, Armstrong थी awarded the Presidential पदक of स्वतंत्रता by अध्यक्ष Richard निक्सन ; in 1978, President Jimmy Carter प्रस्तुत आर्मस्ट्रांग the Congressional Space Medal of Honor in 1978 ; he and his पूर्व crewmates received the congressional सुनहरा Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in सिनसिनाटी, Ohio, on अगस्त 25, 2012, at the age of 82, after जटिलताओं from coronary धमनी bypass सर्जरी.
सचिवालय ( March 30, 1970 – अक्तूबर 4, 1989 ) थी an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first u.s. Triple क्राउन champion in 25 years.
He set रेस records in all तीन events in the श्रेणी — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records कि स्टिल stand today.
he is considered to be one of the greatest thoroughbreds of all समय.
In 1999, ESPN क्रमित Secretariat the 35th best खिलाड़ी of the 20th सदी, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked दूसरी behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the शीर्ष 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th सदी.
Secretariat थी sired by बिंदास शासक out of somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at the Meadow in Caroline County, Virginia.
Like उसके प्रसिद्ध predecessor Man o ' War, Secretariat थी a large शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown विजेता सिएटल Slew.
Owned by Penny chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, साथ with apprentice jockey पॉल Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran एडी Maple ( पिछला रेस ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered colors और his groom थी Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, and weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his racing प्रधान.
मैड्रिड (, ) is the capital and largest नगर of Spain.
The population of the नगर is roughly 3.3 लाख and the entire जनसांख्यिकी of the मैड्रिड metropolitan क्षेत्रफल is calculated to be around 6.5 million.
it is the third-largest नगर in the यूरोपीय Union, after London और Berlin, और इसके metropolitan area is the third-largest in the European संघ बाद London and Paris.
the city spans a total of.
The city is located on the manzanares river in the centre of दोनो the देश और the जातियाँ of Madrid ( जिससे comprises the नगर of Madrid, its conurbation and विस्तारित suburbs और villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile और León and Castile-La मांचा.
as the पूंजी city of Spain, seat of सरकारी, और residence of the Spanish monarch, मैड्रिड is also the राजनैतिक, economic and cultural centre of Spain.
The current mayor is Ana Botella from the People 's Party ( PP ).
The मैड्रिड urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the European संघ and इसके influences in politics, education, entertainment, environment, media, fashion, science, culture, और the arts all contribute to इसके status as one of the संसार 's major global शहरों.
Due to इसके economic output, high standard of living, और market size, Madrid is considered the major वित्तीय centre of दक्षिणी यूरोपीय and the इबेरिया प्रायद्वीप ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major स्पेनी companies, such as telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
मैड्रिड is the most touristic city of Spain, the fourth-most touristic of the continent, और the सातवाँ most visited नगर in the world according to Forbes.
Is the 10th most livable city in the world according to Monocle magazine, in its 2010 अनुक्रमणिका.
Madrid also ranks among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > मैड्रिड is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics.
मैड्रिड houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ), belonging to the United Nations संगठन ( UN ), the segib, the संगठन of Ibero-American States ( OEI ), और the पब्लिक Interest oversight Board ( PIOB ).
it also hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of Spanish Language अकादमियों, headquarters of the Royal स्पेनी Academy ( rae ), the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ).
Madrid organizes fairs as fitur, आरको, SIMO TCI और the Cibeles Madrid फ़ैशन Week.
जबकि Madrid possesses a आधुनिक infrastructure, it रै preserved the look and feel of many of इसके historic neighbourhoods and streets.
Its landmarks include the royal Palace of Madrid ; the teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen retiro पार्क, संस्थापित in 1631 ; the 19th-century नेशनल पुस्तकालयों building ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing some of Spain 's ऐतिहासिक archives ; a विशाल number of National संग्रहालय, and the सुनहरी Triangle of Art, located along the paseo del Prado and comprising three आर्ट संग्रहालय : Prado Museum, the Museo nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía, a संग्रहालय of modern art, और the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, which completes the त्रुटियां of the other two museums.
cibeles Palace and फव्वारा have become the monument symbol of the city.
the path of the Via Appia and of the Via Appia Traiana.
remains of the Appian Way in Rome, near Quarto Miglio
Near Rome.
The Appian रास्ता ( Latin and Italian : Via Appia ) was एक of the earliest और strategically most important रोमन roads of the ancient republic.
It connected Rome to Brindisi, apulia, in southeast Italy.
इसके importance is indicated by its आम name, recorded by statius :
appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the appian way is the queen of the long roads ''
The road is named after appius Claudius caecus, the रोमन censor who began और completed the first section as a military road to the south in 312 BC during the samnite युद्धों.
The Draupner wave, a single giant wave measured on New Year 's दिन 1995, finally confirmed the अस्तित्व of freak लहरें, which था previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( भी known as freak waves, दानव लहरें, killer waves, extreme waves, and abnormal waves ) are relatively large और spontaneous ocean सतह waves that occur far out at sea, and are a threat even to विशाल ships and ocean liners.
In oceanography, they are more precisely defined as waves जिनकी height is more than twice the significant wave ऊँचाई ( swh ), जिससे is itself पारिभाषित as the mean of the largest तीसरा of waves in a वेव रिकार्ड.
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest waves मिला at sea ; they are, rather, surprisingly विशाल waves for a given sea state.
Rogue लहरें seem not to have a single distinct cause, but occur जहाँ physical factors such as ऊँची हवाएँ and strong currents कारण लहरें to विलय to create a single exceptional large वेव.
Electress Sophia of Hanover ( 1630–1714 )
The लकीर of succession to the अंग्रेजों throne is the ordered अनुक्रम of all those people eligible to succeed to the throne of the संयुक्त Kingdom and the अन्य 15 Commonwealth realms.
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed उत्तराधिकार on the Electress Sophia of Hanover और her descendants while excluding Roman Catholics.
the British सरकारी does not publish an official सूची of all those in लकीर to succeed, but the कार्य of genealogical लेखक and amateur researchers suggests that वहीँ हैं several thousand लोगों potentially in line.
At a summit in Perth, Western Australia in 2011, the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to अपनाना निरपेक्ष primogeniture, end the exclusion of people married to Roman catholics, and make other changes in the उत्तराधिकार नियम.
the line of succession is भी used to select the Counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need arises ) under the provisions of the Regency अधिनियम 1937.
For पहले versions of the लकीर of succession, see History of the British लकीर of succession.
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17, 1920july 23, 1966 ) थी an American film and स्टेज कर्ता The New यॉर्क times’ obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody, sensitive young men ''.
He प्रायः played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; उदाहरण include the social climber in George Stevens 's a प्लेस in the Sun, the anguished कैथोलिक priest in हिचकॉक 's I कबूल, the doomed regular सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली Prewitt in फ्रेड Zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity, and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in एडवर्ड Dmytryk 's the Young Lions.
बाद, बाद a disfiguring car crash in 1956, और alcohol and prescription drug गाली, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important भूमिकाएँ यहूद still his, including `` the लापरवाह, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in John Huston 's The Misfits, the title role in Huston 's, और the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during his करियर, तीन for Best Actor और एक for Best Supporting कर्ता.
the युद्ध on Terror ( भी known as the Global War on आतंक ) is a पद commonly applied to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय military campaign जिससे started as a परिणाम of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the संयुक्त States.
इस resulted in an international सैन्य campaign to eliminate al-qaeda and other उग्रवादी organizations.
The United किंगडम and many अन्य NATO और non-nato nations participate in the conflict.
the phrase 'war on आतंक ' थी पहला used by US अध्यक्ष George W. बुश on 20 September 2001.
the Bush administration और the Western media have चूंकि used the term to signify a global military, राजनैतिक, lawful, and conceptual struggle—targeting both संगठन designated as terrorist and regimes अभियुक्त of supporting them.
it थी typically प्रयुक्त with a particular focus on उग्रवादी islamists, al-Qaeda, और other jihadi groups.
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of us President Barack Obama ( जिससे instead uses the term Overseas Contingency आपरेशन ), it is स्टिल commonly used by राजनेता, in the मीडिया and by कुछ aspects of government officially, such as the संयुक्त राज्य ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal.

the प्रमुख कल्याणकारी of संसार War ii were nationalistic मुद्दे, unresolved issues, and resentments resulting इससे World युद्ध i and the interwar period in Europe, in जोड to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s.
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of war are generally समझा to be the 1939 आक्रमण of कैंडल by Germany and सोवियत रूस and the 1937 आक्रमण of the Republic of चीन by the साम्राज्य of Japan.
These military aggressions were the परिणाम of decisions made by the authoritarian सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in Germany and by the नेतृत्व of the Kwantung Army in Japan.
World युद्ध II started after ये aggressive क्रियाएँ were मिले with an official declaration of war and/or armed resistance.
