The मित्सुबिशी galant is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors between 1969 and 2012.
The नाम was derived from the French word galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
There have महरूम नौ distinct पीढियां, and cumulative बिक्री अभी exceed five million.
It began as a compact sedan, but over the course of its life रै evolved into a larger mid-size car.
Initial production थी only based in Japan, लकिन चूंकि 1994 the अमरीकी market has महरूम served by वाहनों assembled at the पूर्व diamond-star Motors ( dsm ) सुविधा in सामान्य, इलिनोइस.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial रक्त pressure, is the pressure exerted by circulating रक्त upon the walls of blood vessels, और is one of the principal vital signs.
जब used without further specification, `` blood pressure '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic circulation.
During प्रत्येक heartbeat, blood दबाव varies between a अधिकतम ( systolic ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure.
The blood pressure in the circulation is principally due to the pumping action of the heart.
मतभेद in mean रक्त दबाव are responsible लिये blood flow from one location to another in the circulation.
The rate of mean blood flow depends on the प्रतिरोध to flow प्रस्तुत by the blood vessels.
Mean रक्त pressure decreases as the circulating रक्त चालें दूर from the heart through arteries and capillaries due to viscous losses of उर्जा.
Mean रक्त pressure drops over the whole परिसंचरण, although most of the fall occurs along the small धमनियों and arterioles.
Gravity affects रक्त pressure via hydrostatic शक्तियां ( e.g., during खड़ा ) and valves in रगों, breathing, and pumping इससे contraction of skeletal मांसपेशियां also influence blood pressure in veins.
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the systemic arterial pressure measured at a person 's upper arm and is a माप of the दबाव in the brachial धमनी, the major artery in the upper arm.
A person’s blood pressure is usually expressed in terms of the systolic दबाव over diastolic pressure and is measured in millimetres of पारा ( mmHg ), for उदाहरण 120/80.
A वीटो – Latin लिये `` I forbid '' – is the power ( used by an officer of the state, for example ) to unilaterally रोकें an official कार्रवाई, especially the enactment of विधान.
A वीटो can be absolute, as for instance in the संयुक्त Nations Security Council, whose permanent सदस्यों ( China, फ़्रांस, Russia, United Kingdom, United States of America ) can block कोई resolution.
Or it can be limited, as in the विधान process of the संयुक्त States, where a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate may override a Presidential वीटो of विधान.
A वीटो तभी gives शक्ति to stop changes, not to adopt them ( except for the rare `` amendatory veto '' ).
यूँ a veto allows इसके holder to protect the औकात quo.
the concept of a veto body originated साथ the Roman consuls and tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding office in a दिए साल could block a military or civil decision by the other ; any tribune had the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the रोमन Senate.
Sulfur डाइऑक्साइड ( also sulphur डाइऑक्साइड ) is the रासायनिक compound with the formula.
It is a toxic gas with a pungent, irritating smell, that is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes.
चूंकि coal और petroleum प्रायः contain sulfur compounds, उनके combustion generates sulfur dioxide जबतक the sulfur compounds are removed before burning the fuel.
Further oxidation of SO2, usually in the presence of a catalyst such as NO2, फ़ॉर्म H2SO4, and thus एसिड rain.
गंधक dioxide emissions are also a precursor to particulates in the atmosphere.
दोनो of ये impacts are cause लिये चिंता over the environmental impact of these fuels.
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '', `` कमज़ोरी '', and `` serious '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an असंक्राम्य neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability.
It is an असंक्राम्य disorder, in which कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies that ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction, inhibiting the excitatory प्रभाव of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
myasthenia is treated medically साथ acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, और, in चयनित cases, thymectomy.
The disease incidence is 3–30 मामले प्रति million per year और उठती as a result of increased जागरूकता.
mg must be विशिष्ट from जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes that can present समान लक्षण but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments.
परावर्तक twisted nematic liquid crystal display.
Polarizing filter film with a vertical axis to polarize light as it enters.
Glass substrate with ITO electrodes.
The shapes of ये electrodes will determine the shapes that will appear when the LCD is turned ON.
Vertical ridges etched on the surface are smooth.
Twisted nematic liquid crystal.
कांच substrate with common electrode film ( ITO ) with horizontal ridges to line up with the horizontal filter.
Polarizing filter film with a horizontal axis to block/pass light.
Reflective surface to send light back to viewer.
( In a backlit LCD, this layer is replaced with a लाइट source. )
A liquid-crystal display ( एलसीडी ) is a flat panel display, electronic विज़ुअल display, or video display कि uses the light modulating गुण of liquid crystals.
द्रव crystals do not emit लाइट directly.
LCDs are available to display arbitrary बिंब ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images जिससे can be प्रदर्शित or छुपा, such as preset शब्द, digits, and 7-segment प्रदर्शक as in a digital clock.
वे use the same मौलिक technology, मगर that arbitrary images हैं made up of a large number of small pixels, जबकि अन्य displays have larger elements.
LCDs are used in a wide दायरा of अनुप्रयोग सहित computer मॉनीटर, टेलीविज़न, instrument panels, aircraft cockpit displays, और साइनेज.
They are common in consumer डिवाइस such as video खिलाड़ी, gaming devices, घड़ियाँ, घड़ियाँ, calculators, and telephones, और have replaced cathode ray ट्यूब ( CRT ) प्रदर्शक in सबसे अनुप्रयोग.
They are available in a wider range of screen sizes than CRT and plasma displays, और since वे do not उपयोग phosphors, they do not suffer image burn-in.
lcds हैं, however, susceptible to image persistence.
The LCD स्क्रीन is अधिक उर्जा कुशल and can be disposed of अधिक safely than a CRT.
Its low विद्युत power consumption enables it to be प्रयुक्त in battery -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक उपकरण.
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any number of segments filled साथ liquid crystals and arrayed in front of a light source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in रंग or monochrome.
द्रव crystals were पहला discovered in 1888.
By 2008, विश्वव्यापी sales of televisions with LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT इकाई ; the CRT became obsolete for most उद्देश्य.
The Borgata Hotel Casino और Spa is a luxury hotel, casino, और spa in Atlantic नगर, New जर्सी, संयुक्त States.
It is owned by Marina ज़िला Development, a joint venture between boyd Gaming and a divesture विश्वास स्थापित by MGM Resorts International.
The $ 1.1 अरब casino hotel सुविधाएँ 2,002 कक्ष and is the largest hotel in नई जर्सी.
the borgata खोली in जुलाई 2003 as a लास Vegas-style megaresort और is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic नगर.
A बोतल of high potency B-complex vitamin संपूरक गोलियां.
A vitamin ( or ) is an सशुल्क यौगिक required by an सजीव as a vital nutrient in limited amounts.
An organic रासायनिक compound ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is called a विटामिन when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained इससे the diet.
Thus, the पद is conditional both on the हालातों and on the particular organism.
For example, ascorbic एसिड ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans, but not लिये most अन्य animals, and biotin and vitamin D are required in the human diet only in certain circumstances.
By सम्मेलन, the पद vitamin includes neither other essential nutrients, ऐसे as dietary minerals, essential fatty acids, or essential amino acids ( which are needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of अन्य nutrients कि प्रचार health but are वरना required कम प्रायः.
Thirteen vitamins are universally recognized at present.
Vitamins are वर्गीकृत by their biological and chemical activity, नहीं their ढांचा.
यूँ, each `` विटामिन '' refers to a क्रमांक of vitamer compounds कि सब show the biological activity associated साथ a particular विटामिन.
Such a set of रसायन is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic descriptor '' शीर्षक, ऐसे as `` विटामिन A ``, which includes the compounds retinal, retinol, and चार known carotenoids.
vitamers by definition are convertible to the active रूप of the vitamin in the देह, and are sometimes inter-convertible to one another, as well.
Vitamins have विविध biochemical functions.
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of खनिज metabolism ( such as vitamin D ), or regulators of cell and ऊतक विकास and differentiation ( such as some फ़ॉर्म of vitamin A ).
Others फलन as antioxidants ( e.g., विटामिन E और sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest क्रमांक of विटामिन ( such as b complex vitamins ) function as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors, कि help enzymes in their work as catalysts in चयापचय.
In this भूमिका, विटामिन may be tightly bound to enzymes as part of prosthetic groups : For example, biotin is part of एंजाइमों involved in making वसीय acids.
Vitamins may भी be कम tightly बंधी to एंजाइम catalysts as coenzymes, detachable अणुओं that function to carry रासायनिक groups or electrons between molecules.
For उदाहरण, folic acid may carry methyl, formyl, और methylene समूह in the cell.
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are विटामिन ' best-known function, the other vitamin functions are equally important.
जबतक the mid-1930s, when the first commercial yeast-extract विटामिन b जटिल and semi-synthetic विटामिन C supplement tablets यहूद बेची, vitamins were obtained solely through खाना intake, and changes in diet ( जिससे, लिये उदाहरण, could occur during a particular growing season ) प्रायः greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested.
However, vitamins have been उत्पादित as कमोडिटी chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary और खाना supplements and एडिटिव, since the मध्य of the 20th सदी.
World Muslim जनसांख्यिकी by percentage ( Pew Research Center, 2009 )
संसार Muslim जनसांख्यिकी in millions
Islam is the world 's second largest धर्म after Christianity.
According to a 2010 study, islam has 1.62 billion adherents, making up over 23 % of the world population.
islam is the predominant धर्म in the Middle East, in सहेल, in the Horn of अफ़्रीकी and northern अफ़्रीकी, and in some parts of एशिया.
Large communities of Muslims are also found in China, the Balkans, and रूस.
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western यूरोपीय, for उदाहरण, islam is the दूसरी largest religion after Christianity, जहाँ it represents 6 % of the total population.
According to the Pew Research Center in 2010 there were 49 muslim-majority countries.
around 62 % of the world 's Muslims सजीव in South and Southeast Asia, with over 1 अरब adherents.
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia, home to 12.7 % of the संसार 's मुसलमान, followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ), India ( 10.9 % ), and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of Muslims live in Arab देशों.
In the मध्य East, the non-Arab देशों of तुर्कों and इरान हैं the largest muslim-majority countries ; in Africa, Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities.
a study conducted by the Pew Research Center in 2010 और released जनवरी 2011 found that there हैं 1.62 अरब Muslims around the world.
The पढ़ाई found अधिक मुसलमान in the संयुक्त किंगडम than in Lebanon और more in चीन than in Syria.
Rhode द्वीप ( or ), officially the State of rhode Island and विधाता Plantations, is a state in the New England region of the United States.
rhode द्वीप is the smallest in area, the आठवीं तनिक populous, but the second most densely populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey.
rhode द्वीप is bordered by Connecticut to the west और Massachusetts to the north and east, and it साझा a water boundary with New York 's Long Island to the southwest.
Rhode Island was the first of the 13 असली colonies to घोषित independence इससे अंग्रेजों नियम, declaring itself स्वतंत्र on May 4, 1776, two महीने before any अन्य colony.
The राज्य was also the last of the thirteen असली colonies to ratify the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The Ocean State '', a सन्दर्भ to the राज्य 's geography, चूंकि rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14 % of its total area.
Its land area is, लकिन its total area is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a city in the संयुक्त Arab अमीरात, located within the emirate of the same name.
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf on the Arabian Peninsula and is one of the seven emirates कि make up the country.
It has the largest जनसांख्यिकी in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) और the second-largest जमीन territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi.
Dubai और Abu Dhabi, the नेशनल capital, are the only two अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over critical matters of नेशनल महत्व in the country 's विधानमंडल.
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's उत्तरी coastline and heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan area.
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a country or city-state and, in some cases, the UAE as a whole has been described as 'dubai '.
The earliest mention of Dubai is in 1095 AD, and the earliest अंकित settlement in the region तिथियाँ from 1799.
the Sheikhdom of Dubai थी formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum bin butti Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of his tribe of the Bani Yas, living in what was then the Second Saudi राज्य and now part of सऊदी अरब, to follow him to the Dubai क्रीक by the Abu falasa clan of the Bani Yas.
It remained अंतर्गत the जनजाति 's कंट्रोल जब the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in 1892 and joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब Emirates upon independence in 1971 as the country 's दूसरी अमीर.
Its strategic geographic स्थान made the कस्बा an important trading hub and by the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी, दुबई थी already an महत्वपूर्ण regional बंदरगाहों.
आज, Dubai has उभरा as a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन metropolis that has grown steadily to become a global city and a business and cultural hub of the मध्य East and the Persian Gulf region.
Although Dubai 's economy थी historically निर्मित on the oil industry, the emirate 's western-style model of कारोबार drives इसके अर्थव्यवस्था with the main revenues now coming from tourism, real estate, and वित्तीय सेवाएं.
Dubai has recently आकर्षित world attention through many innovative विशाल construction प्रोजेक्ट and sports कार्यक्रम.
the city रै become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise इमारतें, ऐसे as the world 's tallest burj खलीफा, in addition to ambitious development projects including man-made islands, होटल, and कुछ of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world.
इस increased attention has भी highlighted मजदूर और human rights issues concerning the city 's largely South Asian paid workforce.
दुबई 's प्रॉपर्टी market अनुभवी a major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a result of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008.
however, दुबई has बना a स्थिर and gradual recovery with help coming from neighboring emirates.
the handful of new projects that are in the पाइपलाइन have महरूम able to सहायता दुबई real estate make a comeback.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd सबसे महंगी city in the world, and the most expensive city in the Middle ईस्ट, surpassing Israel 's tel aviv ( 31st ).
Dubai has also महरूम रेटेड as एक of the बेहतरीन places to सजीव in the Middle ईस्ट, including by us American global परामर्श firm Mercer जो rated the नगर as the best प्लेस to सजीव in the Middle ईस्ट in 2011.

सतह of the अटलांटिक ocean meeting the धरती 's planetary boundary layer and troposphere.
लहरें on an ocean coast.
This एनिमेशन uses धरती विज्ञान आंकड़ा इससे a किस्में of sensors on NASA Earth observing satellites to measure physical oceanography parameters such as ocean currents, समंदर winds, समुद्र सतह height और sea surface temperature.
An ocean ( ; the World Ocean of शास्त्रीय antiquity ) is a body of saline water that composes a विशाल part of a ग्रह 's hydrosphere.
in the context of धरती, it refers to one or all of the प्रमुख divisions of the planet 's संसार Ocean – वे are, in descending अनुक्रम of area, the प्रशांत, Atlantic, Indian, Southern ( अंटार्कटिक ), and आर्कटिक Oceans.
The word `` sea `` is प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably with `` ocean '', but strictly बोलना a sea is a body of saline जल ( संभवतः a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
Earth is the तभी planet known to have an ocean ( or any large amounts of खोलें द्रव water ).
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline water कि is customarily divided into several principal oceans and smaller seas, साथ the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's सतह.
In शर्तें of the hydrosphere of the धरती, the समंदर contains 97 % of the Earth 's जल.
oceanographers have stated that out of 97 %, only 5 % of the ocean as a whole on Earth रै been explored.
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere, the संसार ocean is integral to सब ज्ञात life, फ़ॉर्म भाग of the carbon cycle, and influences climate and weather patterns.
The total volume is लगभग 1.3 billion घन kilometres ( 310 लाख cu mi ) with an average depth of.
it is the habitat of 230,000 known species, although much of the ocean 's depths remain unexplored and it is अनुमानित that over two million marine species exist.
the origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown, लकिन oceans are believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have been the impetus for the emergence of जीवन.
Extraterrestrial oceans may be composed of a wide range of elements and compounds.
The तभी confirmed विशाल stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of टाइटन, although there is evidence लिये the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System.
Early in their geologic histories, मंगल and Venus are theorized to have had large water oceans.
The Mars ocean परिकल्पना suggests that nearly a third of the surface of मंगल was once covered by जल, though the water on Mars is no longer oceanic, and a runaway ग्रीनहाउस effect may have boiled दूर the वैश्विक ocean of Venus.
Compounds ऐसे as salts और ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point, so that water might मौजूद in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice.
Unconfirmed महासागर हैं speculated beneath the surface of many dwarf planets and natural satellites ; notably, the समंदर of Europa is believed to have over twice the water आवाज़ of Earth.
The Solar प्रणाली 's gas giant planets हैं also believed to possess द्रव atmospheric layers of yet to be confirmed compositions.
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons, including सतह oceans of liquid water within a circumstellar habitable मण्डल.
Ocean planets are a hypothetical type of planet with a surface completely covered with liquid.
Elvis आरोन Presley ( जनवरी 8, 1935 – August 16, 1977 ) थी an अमरीकी singer and actor.
A cultural icon, he is commonly ज्ञात by the सिंगल नाम एल्विस.
One of the most लोकप्रिय संगीतकारों of the 20th century, he is often referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King ''.
Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, Presley moved to Memphis, टेनेसी, with his family at the age of 13.
he began his करियर वहीँ in 1954, working with Sun Records owner Sam phillips, who wanted to लाओ the sound of African-American म्यूज़िक to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist स्कॉटी Moore and bassist Bill ब्लैक, Presley थी the most महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -ड्राइवn fusion of country and लय and ब्लूज़.
RCA Victor acquired उसके अनुबंध in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom पार्कर, who गई on to मैनेज the singer for over two decades.
प्रेस्ली 's first आरसीए single, `` heartbreak Hotel ``, released in January 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the अग्रणी फिगर of the newly लोकप्रिय sound of rock and फेंकें with a series of network television appearances and chart-topping रिकॉर्ड.
His सक्रिय interpretations of songs, many from African-American sources, और उसके uninhibited performance style made उसे enormously popular—and controversial.
In नवम्बर 1956, he made his film debut in Love me Tender.
drafted into सैन्य service in 1958, प्रेस्ली relaunched his recording career two years बाद with some of his सबसे commercially successful कार्य.
He staged few concerts however, and guided by पार्कर, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making Hollywood movies and साउंडट्रैक albums, most of them critically derided.
In 1968, after seven सालो दूर from the stage, he returned to live performance in a मनाये वापसी television special कि led to an extended लास Vegas concert residency and a स्ट्रिंग of profitable टुर.
in 1973 प्रेस्ली मंचन the first concert broadcast globally via उपग्रह, aloha from Hawaii.
नुस्खा drug abuse severely deteriorated his health, और he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42.
प्रेस्ली is regarded as एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण figures of 20th-century popular संस्कृति.
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide success encompassing अनेक genres, including country, pop ballads, इन्जील, and blues.
He is the best-selling सोलो artist in the history of popular music.
मनोनीत लिये 14 competitive Grammys, he जीती तीन, और प्राप्त the Grammy Lifetime उपलब्धि Award at age 36.
He has been inducted into अनेक music halls of fame.
a glass of रूट beer साथ foam
रूट beer is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally बना using the root of a sassafras plant ( or the छाल of a sassafras पेड़ ) as the प्राथमिक flavor.
रूट beer, popularized in उत्तर America, आता in दो फ़ॉर्म : alcoholic and soft पेय.
the historical रूट beer थी analogous to small beer in that the प्रक्रम provided a पेय साथ a very कम दारू content.
Although roots are used as the source of many soft drinks throughout the world, often different names are used.
Fluorescent minerals emit दृश्य light when exposed to ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is the emission of लाइट by a पदार्थ that has अवशोषित light or other electromagnetic radiation.
It is a form of luminescence.
In सबसे cases, the उत्सर्जित light has a longer wavelength, और therefore lower उर्जा, than the absorbed radiation.
However, जब the absorbed इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation is intense, it is possible for एक electron to absorb दो photons ; इस two-photon अवशोषण can lead to emission of radiation having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
The emitted radiation may also be of the वही wavelength as the absorbed radiation, termed `` resonance प्रतिदीप्ति ''.
the most striking उदाहरण of fluorescence occur when the absorbed विकिरण is in the ultraviolet region of the spectrum, and thus invisible to the human eye, और the emitted लाइट is in the दृश्य region.
प्रतिदीप्ति has many व्यावहारिक applications, सहित mineralogy, gemology, chemical sensors ( fluorescence spectroscopy ), fluorescent लेबलिंग, dyes, biological detectors, और, most commonly, fluorescent lamps.
अनौपचारिक logic, intuitively, refers to the principles of logic and लॉजिकल thought बाहर of a formal सेटिंग.
However, शायद because of the अनौपचारिक in the title, the precise definition of अनौपचारिक लॉजिक is a matter of some dispute.
Ralph H. जॉनसन and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as `` a branch of logic जिनकी task is to develop non-formal standards, criteria, procedures लिये the analysis, interpretation, मूल्यांकन, आलोचना और construction of argumentation. ''
This definition reflects what had been अव्यक्त in उनके अभ्यास और what others were doing in their informal लॉजिक texts.
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies, critical thinking, the सोच Skills गति और the interdisciplinary पूछताछ known as argumentation theory.
frans H. van eemeren writes that the लेबल `` informal logic '' कवर a `` collection of normative approaches to the पढ़ाई of reasoning in ordinary भाषा that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than औपचारिक logic. ''
यूएसए annual real GDP 1910–60, साथ the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
बेरोजगारी rate in the us 1910–1960, साथ the years of the ग्रेट Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression began in August of 1929, when the संयुक्त States अर्थव्यवस्था पहला went into an economic recession.
हालांकि the country spent दो महीने with declining GDP, it was not जबतक the वॉल Street Crash of October, 1929 that the प्रभाव of a घटती अर्थव्यवस्था यहूद felt, और a major worldwide economic downturn ensued.
The मार्केट क्रैश marked the beginning of a decade of ऊँची unemployment, poverty, कम profits, deflation, plunging farm incomes, and lost opportunities लिये economic growth and personal advancement.
Although इसके कल्याणकारी are still अनिश्चित and controversial, the net effect थी a sudden और general घाटा of confidence in the economic future.
The usual स्पष्टीकरण include numerous कारकों, especially ऊँची consumer debt, ill-regulated बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic loans by banks और investors, and the lack of high-growth नई industries, सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward economic spiral of reduced spending, falling confidence, and lowered उत्पादन.
Industries that suffered the most included construction, agriculture as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, mining, और logging as well as durable goods like automobiles और उपकरण that could be postponed.
The economy reached नीचे in the winter of 1932–33 ; then came four years of very rapid विकास until 1937, when the मंदी of 1937 brought back 1934 स्तर of बेरोजगारी.
The अवसाद caused major political परिवर्तन in America.
तीन years into the अवसाद, Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 presidential election to फ्रैंकलिन Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan, the New सौदे, instituted unprecedented programs for relief, रिकवरी and reform, और brought about a major realignment of अमरीकी politics.
The Depression also resulted in an increase of emigration of लोगों to other countries लिये the first समय in American history.
For example, कुछ immigrants गई back to उनके देशी countries, और some native US नागरिकों गई to कनाडा, Australia, और South Africa.
It भी resulted in the द्रव्यमान migration of लोगों from badly hit क्षेत्रों in the Great मैदान और the South to स्थान ऐसे as California और the North, क्रमशः ( see Okies और the ग्रेट माइग्रेशन of African Americans ).
Racial tensions भी increased during this time.
By the 1940s immigration had returned वापस to सामान्य, and emigration declined.
A well-known example of an emigrant was Frank McCourt, who गई to Ireland, as recounted in his book Angela 's राख.
The मेमोरी of the Depression also shaped modern theories of अर्थशास्त्र and resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in how the सरकारी dealt with economic downturns, such as the use of stimulus पैकेज, keynesian economics, and Social Security.
It भी shaped आधुनिक American literature, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels ऐसे as जॉन Steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of प्रकोप `` and `` Of Mice और Men ``.
the Great अवसाद of the 1930s प्रारंभ साथ the भण्डार market क्रैश of अक्तूबर 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental country, located ज़्यादातर on Anatolia in पश्चिमी एशिया and on East Thrace in southeastern Europe.
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; यूनानियों to the west ; Georgia to the पूर्वोत्तर ; Armenia, Iran और the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the ईस्ट ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
the Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the Aegean Sea is to the वेस्ट ; और the Black समुद्र is to the north.
the Sea of मरमरा, the bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which together form the Turkish Straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace और आनातोलिया ; वे also separate यूरोपीय and Asia.
तुर्कों 's location at the crossroads of यूरोपीय and Asia makes it a country of significant geostrategic importance.
The देश 's आधिकारिक भाषा is तुर्की, a Turkic language, which is बोला by लगभग 85 % of the population as mother tongue.
The most numerous ethnic group is the turks, जो constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the जनसांख्यिकी according to the संसार Factbook.
kurds are the largest ethnic minority and, according to the वही source, number around 18 % of the population while other ethnic अल्पसंख्यकों are estimated to be at 7–12 %.
The vast majority of the population is मुस्लिम.
the क्षेत्रफल now called Turkey has been inhabited चूंकि the Paleolithic, सहित विभिन्न Ancient आनातोलियाई civilizations and Thracian peoples.
After Alexander the Great 's conquest, the क्षेत्रफल थी Hellenized, which continued with the Roman rule और the परिवर्तन into the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century, starting the process of turkification, which was greatly accelerated by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071.
The Seljuk सल्तनत of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small तुर्की beyliks.
Starting इससे the late 13th century, the Ottoman beylik संयुक्त Anatolia and निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of Southeastern Europe, Western Asia और North Africa.
After the उस्मानी Empire collapsed following its शिकस्त in World युद्ध i, parts of it were occupied by the victorious allies.
A संवर्ग of young सैन्य अधिकारियों, led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues, organized a successful प्रतिरोध to the allies ; in 1923 वे स्थापित the modern Republic of तुर्कों, with Atatürk as इसके पहला president.
Turkey is a democratic, secular, unitary, संवैधानिक republic with a diverse सांस्कृतिक heritage.
Turkey रै become increasingly integrated with the West through membership in organisations ऐसे as the Council of Europe, NATO, OECD, OSCE and the G-20 प्रमुख economies.
Turkey began full सदस्यता negotiations with the European संघ in 2005, having महरूम an associate member of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU कस्टम Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered close सांस्कृतिक, political and economic संबंध with the Middle ईस्ट, काकेशस, the Turkic states of Central एशिया and the African countries through membership in organisations such as the Turkic Council, Joint Administration of turkic Arts and संस्कृति, Organisation of Islamic सहयोग and the आर्थिक सहयोग Organisation.
तुर्कों 's growing economy और diplomatic initiatives have led to its recognition as a क्षेत्रीय power.
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP और the 16th largest by purchasing power parity.
caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated ब्लैक woman in the Deep South.
She प्राप्त a nomination for the अकादमी Award for Best अभिनेत्री और won उसके first Golden ग्लोब Award लिये her role in the film.
in 1990, she निभाई Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक Swayze ) save his lover ( demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This प्रदर्शन won her a second Golden ग्लोब और an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this बना Goldberg तभी the second ब्लैक woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for गए With the Wind in 1939.
notable later films शामिल सिस्टर अधिनियम and Sister अधिनियम 2, the Player, Made in America, कैसा Stella मिला Her नाली Back, लड़की, बाधित and Rat Race.
वो is भी acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The अगला Generation, as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' जोकर Flash, और as Carmen Tibideaux in ग्ली, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The शेर किंग.
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 एमी Awards for her work in television.
She थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल show Hollywood वर्गों from 1998 to 2004.
वो has महरूम the moderator of the daytime talk show The दृश्य चूंकि 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In जोड, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, चार People 's Choice Awards, and रै been honored with a star on the Hollywood चलना of Fame.
वो is one of the few entertainers who have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Award.
Augusta is a consolidated city in the U.S. state of जॉर्जिया, located at the पतन line of the Savannah River, at the head of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 census, the Augusta– Richmond County population थी 195,844 नहीं counting the unconsolidated cities of hephzibah and Blythe.
augusta is the principal नगर of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical क्षेत्रफल, which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877, making it both the second-largest नगर and the second-largest मैट्रो area in the राज्य after Atlanta.
It is the 116th-largest नगर in the United States.
internationally, Augusta is best known for hosting the मास्टर्स टूर्नामेंट in गोल्फ़ प्रत्येक spring.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact डिस्क जिससे contains आंकड़ा.
The नाम is an acronym which stands लिये `` Compact Disc read-only memory ``.
कंप्यूटर can read CD-ROMs, लकिन can not write on उन्हें.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute कंप्यूटर software, including video खेल and multimedia applications, हालांकि कोई data can be stored ( up to the क्षमता limit of a डिस्क ).
Some cds, called उन्नत cds, थाम both computer आंकड़ा and audio with the latter capable of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी, while data ( ऐसे as software or digital video ) is only usable on a कंप्यूटर ( such as आईएसओ 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard कि defines the format of CD-ROMs.
एक of a set of color-bound किताबे that contain the तकनीकी specifications लिये all CD formats, the Yellow किताब, निर्मित by Sony and Philips, थी the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to hold कोई form of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as ब्लैक Hawks before 1986, और known colloquially as the Hawks ) are a professional बर्फ hockey team based in Chicago, इलिनोइस.
They are members of the सेंट्रल Division of the Western सम्मेलन of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
वे have जीती four Stanley Cup championships since their founding in 1926, सबसे recently in 2009–10.
The ब्लैकहॉक्स are one of the Original छह एनएचएल teams, साथ with the डेट्रॉयट Red Wings, Montreal canadiens, Toronto मेपल Leafs, Boston Bruins and नई यॉर्क रेंजरों.
चूंकि the Blackhawks have played their home games at the United Center बाद having spent 65 सालो playing at शिकागो Stadium.

The violet color is often संबद्ध with penance और detachment.
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in अन्य कैथोलिक countries, sometimes associated with mortification of the flesh.

Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many ईसाई denominations, lasting for a काल of approximately छह weeks leading up to ईस्टर Sunday.
In the general Latin-rite और most Western denominations lent is taken to चलाएं इससे राख बुधवार to Maundy गुरुवार ( Holy गुरुवार ) morning or to Easter Eve.
In the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर, Lent lasts until Holy Thursday, while other denominations run until ईस्टर Eve.
the traditional purpose of lent is the preparation of the believer through दुआ, penance, repentance, almsgiving, and self-denial.
इसके institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of पावन Week, marking the death, दफ़न and resurrection of यीशु, which recalls the कार्यक्रम of the Bible when यीशु is crucified on शुभ Friday, जिससे then culminates in the celebration on ईस्टर Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ.
During Lent, many of the faithful कमिट to fasting or giving up certain types of luxuries as a form of penitence.
The Stations of the Cross, a devotional commemoration of Christ 's carrying the Cross and of his execution, are often observed.
Many रोमन कैथोलिक और कुछ Protestant churches हटाएँ flowers from उनके altars, while crucifixes, धार्मिक statues, और other विस्तृत धार्मिक symbols are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain परहेज़गारों कैथोलिक countries, कुछ adherents mark the season साथ the traditional abstention from the consumption of meat.
In कुछ countries, ग्रैंड religious processions and cultural customs are observed, and the faithful attempt to विज़िट seven churches during पावन Week in honor of यीशु Christ heading to Mount Calvary.
Lent is traditionally वर्णित as lasting for forty days, in commemoration of the forty days which, according to the Gospels of Matthew, चिह्नित and Luke, यीशु खर्च fasting in the मरुस्थल पहले the beginning of his public ministry, जहाँ he endured प्रलोभन by the Devil.
However, अलग Christian denominations calculate the forty days of Lent differently.
In सबसे Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as भाग of Lent ; यूँ the period इससे Ash Wednesday until ईस्टर consists of 40 दिनों when the Sundays हैं excluded.
However in the Roman कैथोलिक Church Lent is now लिया to end on Holy Thursday rather than ईस्टर Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays, or 44 दिनों in कुल.
This event, along साथ its pious customs हैं observed by catholics, Lutherans, Methodists, Presbyterians, और Anglicans.

the chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ), जिससे was under the direct क्षेत्राधिकार of the central authorities of the Soviet संघ.
An explosion और आग released large quantities of radioactive अणु into the atmosphere, which स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी ussr and Europe.
The Chernobyl विपत्ति is widely माना to have been the worst nuclear power plant दुर्घटना in history, और is एक of only two classified as a level 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Nuclear इवेंट स्केल ( the other being the Fukushima daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination और avert a greater catastrophe ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर और cost an अनुमानित 18 billion rubles.
The official सोवियत casualty count of 31 मौतों has महरूम disputed, and long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers and deformities are still being accounted लिये.
In grammar, a subject complement is a predicative expression कि follows a linking क्रिया ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
in the former मामला, a renaming noun phrase ऐसे as a संज्ञा or सर्वनाम is पुकारा a predicative nominal.
an adjective following the copula and describing the subject is पुकारा a predicative adjective.
In either case the predicative complement in effect mirrors the subject.
विषय complements are used with a छोटी क्लास of verbs called linking क्रियाएँ or copula, of which be is the most common.
Since copula are stative क्रियाएँ, subject complements are not affected by कोई action of the verb.
Subject complements are typically not clause arguments, nor are वे clause केंद्रीभूत.
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम नियत.
इस पेज only शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी awards won by various artists.
This does नहीं include the various खास awards that हैं प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल Academy of रिकॉर्डिंग Arts and sciences ऐसे as आजीवन Achievement पुरस्कार, trustees पुरस्कार, Technical Awards or Legend पुरस्कार.
the page however करता include अन्य non-performance related Grammys ( known as the शिल्प & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
मार्शल Bruce Mathers III ( born अक्तूबर 17, 1972 ), better ज्ञात by his स्टेज name Eminem ( stylized as EMINƎM ) and by उसके alter ego Slim छायादार, is an अमरीकी rapper, record producer, songwriter and actor.
एमिनेम, along with his solo career, is a member of his group D12, और also one half of the हिप हॉप duo Bad meets Evil, साथ रॉयस da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is one of the best-selling कलाकारों in the संसार और is the best-selling कलाकार of the 2000s.
He रै been listed और क्रमित as one of the greatest कलाकारों of सब time by अनेक मैगज़ीन, सहित Rolling Stone magazine which ranked him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of सब Time.
the same magazine declared him The किंग of हिप हॉप.
सहित उसके work with D12 and Bad Meets Evil, Eminem has achieved ten number-one एल्बम on the Billboard 200.
He has sold more than 100 लाख records worldwide, सहित 42 लाख tracks and 49.1 लाख albums in the संयुक्त States.
as an underground rapper एमिनेम released his debut solo album, Infinite in 1996.
the album थी a critical and वाणिज्यिक failure.
He gained mainstream लोकप्रियता in 1999 बाद the रिलीज of उसके major-label डेब्यू album the Slim छायादार lp.
The lp भी earned एमिनेम उसके first ग्रैमी पुरस्कार for Best रैप Album.
उसके अगला two रिकॉर्ड the मार्शल Mathers lp, and The एमिनेम Show, also won Best रैप Album Grammy Awards, making एमिनेम the first artist to win Best Rap Album for three लगातार एलपी.
इस थी followed by another studio release in 2004 titled Encore.
एमिनेम then went on अंतराल after touring in 2005.
He released his first album in five years titled पतन, on may 15, 2009.
In 2010, Eminem released his seventh studio एल्बम रिकवरी.
रिकवरी was an international success और was नामित the best selling एल्बम of 2010 worldwide, joining the Eminem Show, जिससे थी the best seller of 2002.
Eminem जीती Grammy Awards for both Relapse and Recovery, giving उसे a कुल of 13 Grammys in his करियर.
Eminem has opened अन्य ventures, including उसके own record लेबल छायादार रिकॉर्ड with his manager Paul Rosenberg.
He भी has his own radio channel, Shade 45 on Sirius XM रेडियो.
Eminem began an acting career in 2002, when he स्ट्रक्चर in the hip hop नाटक film 8 Mile.
He won the अकादमी Award for बेहतरीन Original Song, becoming the first रैप artist ever to win the पुरस्कार.
He has भी made cameo appearances in the Wash ( 2001 ), मजेदार People ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage.
The एकड़ is a unit of area used in the imperial and u.S. customary systems.
An acre is परिचय 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – slightly smaller than an American football फ़ील्ड.
The acre is no longer commonly प्रयुक्त, although a few notable exceptions शामिल the United States, Australia, Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the संयुक्त Kingdom, हालांकि is still used in रियल estate descriptions ).
It is स्टिल प्रयुक्त, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac, and is defined as 1/640 of a square मील.
The most commonly used acre आज is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़.
In the United States both the international एकड़ and the slightly different US survey एकड़ are in उपयोग.
the most common use of the एकड़ is to measure tracts of land.
एक international acre is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 square मीटर.
During the मध्य Ages, an एकड़ थी the राशि of जमीन that could be plowed in one दिन साथ a yoke of oxen.
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of द्रव्यमान led to अनेक new निष्कर्षों in the 19th century.
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions और जॉन Dalton 's atomic theory branched from the discoveries of एंटोनी Lavoisier.
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments नाज़िल that combustion involved oxygen बल्कि than what was previously thought to be phlogiston.
The विधि of संरक्षण of mass, or principle of mass conservation, states कि for any system closed to सब transfers of पदार्थ और energy ( दोनो of जिससे have द्रव्यमान ), the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली must remain constant over समय, as system mass can not change quantity if it is not added or removed.
hence, the मात्रा of mass is `` conserved '' over समय.
the law implies that द्रव्यमान can neither be निर्मित nor destroyed, although it may be rearranged in space, or the entities संबद्ध with it may be बदला in रूप, as लिये example when light or शारीरिक work is रूपांतरित into particles कि योगदान the same mass to the system as the light or कार्य had contributed.
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical reaction, nuclear reaction, or रेडियोसक्रिय decay in an पृथक प्रणाली, the द्रव्यमान of the reactants or starting सामग्री must equal the mass of the products.
The अवधारणा of mass conservation is widely used in अनेक fields such as chemistry, mechanics, and द्रव डायनामिक्स.
Historically, द्रव्यमान संरक्षण थी discovered in रासायनिक reactions by एंटोनी Lavoisier in the late 18th सदी, and was of निर्णायक importance in the progress from alchemy to the आधुनिक natural विज्ञान of रसायन.
The closely related concept of पदार्थ संरक्षण was found to hold good in रसायन to such high approximation कि it failed तभी लिये the ऊँची energies treated by the बाद refinements of आपेक्षिकता theory, but otherwise remains useful और sufficiently सटीक for most chemical calculations, even in modern practice.
in special relativity, needed for सटीकता when large energy हस्तांतरण between systems is involved, the difference between thermodynamically बंद and पृथक systems becomes महत्वपूर्ण, since conservation of द्रव्यमान is strictly and perfectly upheld only लिये so-called isolated systems, i.e. those completely पृथक इससे all exchanges with the पर्यावरण.
In this circumstance, the mass-energy equivalence theorem राज्य that mass संरक्षण is equivalent to total energy संरक्षण, which is the first law of ऊष्मागतिकी.
By contrast, लिये a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e., one which is closed to exchanges of पदार्थ, but open to exchanges of non-material energy, ऐसे as heat और work, with the surroundings ) द्रव्यमान is ( usually ) only approximately conserved.
the इनपुट or आउटपुट of non-material energy must change the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली in relativity theory, although the change is usually small, चूंकि relatively large amounts of ऐसे energy ( by comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a small राशि of mass ( again by ordinary मानकों of measurement ).
In special relativity, द्रव्यमान is not converted to उर्जा, चूंकि energy in all of इसके forms always retains its equivalent amount of mass throughout any transformation or translocation into, or out of, a प्रणाली.
However, certain प्रकार of matter ( a different concept ) may be converted to energy, so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the प्रक्रम.
However, if such energy is removed इससे systems, वे must lose the mass that is associated साथ it.
In general आपेक्षिकता, mass ( and उर्जा ) conservation in expanding volumes of space is a complex concept, विषय to different definitions, and neither mass nor energy is as सख्ती and simply conserved as is the case in special relativity और in Minkowski space.
लिये a discussion, see द्रव्यमान in general relativity.
A सुअर is any of the animals in the genus Sus, within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the domestic pig, its पूर्वज the जंगली boar, और several other जंगली रिश्तेदारों.
Young and small pigs are ज्ञात as piglets.
Pigs are omnivores और are highly सोशल और intelligent animals.

A floppy disk, or diskette, is a disk भंडार medium composed of a disk of thin and flexible magnetic भंडार medium, sealed in a आयताकार प्लास्टिक वाहक lined with fabric that removes dust particles.
They are पढ़ा और written by a floppy disk drive ( fdd ).
Floppy डिस्क, initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes, यहूद a ubiquitous form of data भंडार and एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s खूब into the first decade of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured साथ floppy ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an external usb ड्राइव, लकिन ``, 8 ``, and non-standard ड्राइव could only be handled by बूढ़ा उपकरण.
While फ्लॉपी disk ड्राइव still have some limited uses, especially with विरासत industrial computer equipment, they have been superseded by आंकड़ा storage विधि साथ much greater क्षमता, such as USB flash ड्राइव, portable external hard disk drives, optical discs, memory ताश, और computer networks.
an animated आरेख of a कटर
in baseball, a कटर, or काटें fastball, is a प्रकार of fastball जिससे breaks slightly toward the pitcher 's glove side as it reaches home थाली.
This pitch is कही between a slider and a fastball, as it is usually thrown faster than a स्लाइडर but with अधिक motion than a ठेठ fastball.
Some pitchers use a cutter as a way to prevent hitters इससे expecting their regular fastballs.
A common technique used to throw a cutter is to use a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the हाथ.
When a batter is समर्थ to hit a कटर पिच, it प्रायः results in soft contact and an easy out, due to the pitch 's movement keeping the बॉल away इससे the bat 's sweet spot.
The कटर is typically 2–5 किमी धीमा than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball.
in 2010, the औसत pitch वर्गीकृत as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher थी 88.6 mph ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 mph.
`` What It Takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by American मुश्किल चट्टान बैंड Aerosmith.
It थी written by Steven Tyler, Joe Perry, and Desmond Child.
it was released in 1990 as the तीसरा single इससे एरोस्मिथ 's critically and commercially कामयाब 1989 एल्बम पंप.

Odysseus ( or ; Greek :, ), also known by the रोमन नाम Ulysses ( ; ), was a legendary Greek किंग of ithaca and a hero of Homer 's एपिक कविता the ओडिसी.
Odysseus also plays a key भूमिका in Homer 's Iliad और अन्य works in कि वही Epic साईकिल.
Husband of Penelope, father of Telemachus, and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea, Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance, guile, and versatility ( polytropos ), और is hence known by the epithet Odysseus the cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning प्रज्ञा `` ).
he is most famous for the टेन eventful years he took to return home बाद the decade-long trojan War और his प्रसिद्ध Trojan घोड़ा ploy to कैप्चर the city of Troy.
erie is a statutory Town in Boulder और Weld counties in the U.S. state of Colorado.
The जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135 और was अंकित as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
The Town of Erie is located just west of I-25 for easy access to i-70, Denver International Airport and Colorado 's entire Front Range.
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 वर्गाकार मील, extending from the north पक्ष of State Highway 52 south to State Highway 7, and between US 287 on the वेस्ट और Interstate 25 to the east.
Erie is approximately 35 मिनट्स from Denver International Airport, 25 minutes to Denver और 20 minutes from Boulder.
The फलक of Trustees serves as the विधान and governing देह of the कस्बा of Erie and is responsible for establishing Town policies and goals.
The Board has the authority to अपनाना laws, ordinances और रिज़ॉल्यूशन as needed to conduct the business of the कस्बा, and by अध्यादेश may enter into contracts or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish, receive सेवाएं or to provide for cooperative सेवा delivery.
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of trustees, the Town Administrator is the मुख्य operating and प्रशासनिक officer of the Town and is जिम्मेदार for providing पेशेवर leadership in the administration and execution of policies और objectives formulated by the Board.
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to communicate and work with the जातियाँ to maintain a safe पर्यावरण, prevent crime and enforce the law, while protecting the अधिकारों of सब.
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by the Town of erie and is strategically located in the Denver-Boulder महानगर area on Colorado Highway 7, a छोटी over तीन मील वेस्ट of Interstate 25.
The main runway is concrete paved and 4,700 फीट long.
The is a home video game console produced by Sony Computer entertainment.
It is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन 2, as भाग of the प्लेस्टेशन series.

It was पहला released on नवम्बर 11, 2006, in Japan, with international markets following shortly thereafter.
the console थी पहला officially announced at E3 2005.
Originally set for a spring 2006 रिलीज date, it was विलम्बित several टाइम्स until finally hitting stores at the end of the year.

as of November 4, 2012, 70 million PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide.
Its successor, PlayStation 4, is नियत for a Q4 2013 release.
Salvador Domingo फेलिप Jacinto Dalí i domènech, 1st Marqués de dalí de pubol ( May 11, 1904January 23, 1989 ), known as Salvador dalí ( ), was a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in figueres, स्पेन.
dalí was a skilled draftsman, best known for the striking and bizarre images in उसके surrealist work.
His painterly skills are often attributed to the influence of Renaissance मास्टर्स.
His best-known work, The Persistence of Memory, थी समाप्त in 1931.
dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included फिल्मी, मूर्तिकला, and छायाचित्र, in collaboration साथ a range of artists in a variety of मीडिया.
dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and excessive, my passion for लक्ज़री and my love of प्राच्य clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '', claiming कि his पूर्वजो यहूद descended from the Moors.
Dalí was highly कल्पनाशील, and also enjoyed indulging in unusual and grandiose behavior.
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions sometimes drew more ध्यान than his artwork, to the dismay of those जो held his work in ऊँची esteem, and to the जलन of उसके आलोचकों.

The humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture, using methods that are primarily विश्लेषणात्मक, critical, or सट्टे, and having a significant historical element, as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the प्राकृतिक sciences.
the मानवता include ancient and modern languages, साहित्य, दर्शनशास्त्र, धर्म, and visual and performing arts such as music and theatre.
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences include इतिहास, anthropology, area studies, communication studies, cultural studies, law, economics and linguistics.
Scholars working in the मानवता हैं sometimes described as `` humanists ''.
however, कि पद also describes the philosophical स्थिति of मानवतावाद, जिससे some `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities reject.
Some द्वितीयक स्कूलों offer humanities classes, प्रायः consisting of English साहित्य, वैश्विक studies, and art.
इंसान disciplines like इतिहास, सांस्कृतिक मानवशास्त्र and psychoanalysis पढ़ाई विषय matters to which the प्रायोगिक विधि करता नहीं apply, and they have access instead to the comparative विधि और comparative research.

The White House Christmas Tree, भी known as the ब्लू Room क्रिसमस Tree, is the official indoor क्रिसमस tree at the residence of the अध्यक्ष of the United States, the White House.
the पहला indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime in the 19th century ( there are varying claims as to the सटीक year ) और since 1961 the tree रै had a प्रसंग motif at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States.
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state and सिर of government of the United States.
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government and is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States हथियारबंद Forces.
Article II of the u.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the संयुक्त राज्य in the अध्यक्ष and charges him with the execution of federal विधि, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal कार्यपालिका, diplomatic, नियामक, और न्यायिक officers, and concluding treaties with विदेशी powers, with the advice and सहमति of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to ग्रान्ट federal pardons and reprieves, and to convene और adjourn either or both houses of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United राज्य, the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष and the संघीय government have grown substantially and each modern president, despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely जिम्मेदार लिये dictating the विधान agenda of his party और the विदेशी and घरेलू policy of the United States.
the president is frequently described as the most powerful person in the संसार.
the president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, और is one of only two nationally elected federal officers, the other being the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the presidency for a तीसरा full पद.
It also prohibits a person from being निर्वाचित to the presidency more than एकबार if that व्यक्ति previously had served as अध्यक्ष, or acting president, for more than दो years of another person 's term as president.
in सब, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year शर्तें.
On जनवरी 20, 2009, बराक ओबामा became the 44th and current president.
On November 6, 2012, he was re-elected और is scheduled to serve जबतक January 20, 2017.
Senses are physiological capacities of organisms that provide data for perception.
the senses and their आपरेशन, classification, and theory are overlapping विषय पढ़ाई by a variety of फ़ील्ड, most notably neuroscience, संज्ञानात्मक psychology ( or cognitive science ), and philosophy of perception.
The nervous system has a specific sensory system or organ, समर्पित to प्रत्येक भाव.
Humans have a multitude of होश.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), सुनना ( audioception ), taste ( gustaoception ), smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ), and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized.
जबकि the ability to detect अन्य stimuli परे those governed by the traditional senses exists, including temperature ( thermoception ), kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ), पीड़ा ( nociception ), balance ( equilibrioception ), त्वरण ( kinesthesioception ), and विभिन्न internal stimuli ( e.g. the different chemoreceptors लिये detecting नमक and carbon डाइऑक्साइड concentrations in the blood ), तभी a small क्रमांक of these can safely be classified as पृथक senses in और of themselves.
What constitutes a sense is a matter of some बहस, leading to difficulties in धमक what exactly a भाव is.
Animals भी have receptors to भाव the world around उन्हें, with डिग्री of काबिलियत varying greatly between species.
Humans have a comparatively weak भाव of महकते, जबकि some animals may lack one or अधिक of the traditional five senses.
Some पशु may also intake और interpret संवेदी stimuli in very different तरीके.
Some species of पशु हैं समर्थ to sense the संसार in a way that humans can नहीं, with some species समर्थ to sense electrical और magnetic fields, and detect water pressure and currents.
मकड़ियों ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have eight टाँगे and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
वे are the largest order of arachnids और rank सातवाँ in total species विविधता among all अन्य groups of जीवों.
Spiders are found worldwide on प्रत्येक continent मगर for Antarctica, and have become established in nearly every आवास साथ the एक्सेप्शन of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 spider species, और 109 परिवारों have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there रै been confusion भीतर the scientific जातियाँ as to how all ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications that have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual देह segments हैं fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
नापसंद कीट, spiders do नहीं have antennae.
In सब except the सबसे primitive समूह, the Mesothelae, spiders have the सबसे centralized nervous प्रणालियों of all arthropods, as सब their ganglia हैं fused into one द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
Unlike सबसे arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have महरूम modified into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six प्रकार of रेशा ग्रंथियों within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, shape और the राशि of sticky thread used.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms, और मकड़ियों that उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant और विविध than orb-web मकड़ियों.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, but these animals जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स from, और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern मकड़ियों, Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic काल, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but सब other known species are predators, mostly preying on insects and on other spiders, although a few large प्रजाति also take birds and lizards.
मकड़ियों use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it with sticky bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or कार्यशील it down.
सबसे detect prey मुख्यतः by sensing कंपन, but the active hunters have acute vision, और hunters of the genus portia show लक्षण of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' गुस्ताखी are too narrow to लो solids, और they liquidize their खाना by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of complex प्रेमालाप rituals to avoid होने eaten by the महिलाओं.
Males of सबसे species जीवित a few matings, सीमित mainly by their short life spans.
महिलाओं weave silk egg-cases, प्रत्येक of which may contain सैंकड़ों of eggs.
महिलाओं of many species care for their young, for example by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing food with them.
A minority of प्रजाति are social, भवन communal webs कि may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social बर्ताव ranges इससे precarious toleration, as in the विधवा spiders, to co-operative शिकार and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at सबसे two सालो, tarantulas और other mygalomorph मकड़ियों can live up to 25 years in captivity.
जबकि the venom of a few species is dangerous to इंसानो, scientists are अभी researching the use of spider venom in medicine और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a संयोजन of lightness, शक्ति and elasticity that is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक materials, and spider silk जीनों have been inserted into mammals और plants to see if ये can be प्रयुक्त as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of सब्र, cruelty और creative powers.
धूसर 's Anatomy is an American television चिकित्सा नाटक that premiered on the अमरीकी Broadcasting Company ( ABC ), as a mid-season बदलना on March 27, 2005.
The series has aired नौ seasons, and focuses on the fictional lives of सर्जिकल interns and residents as वे gradually evolve into seasoned डॉक्टर, while trying to maintain personal जीवनदान.
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes, who serves as an कार्यपालिका producer, along with Betsy beers, चिह्नित गॉर्डन, Krista Vernoff, Rob मकई, Mark wilding, और Allan Heinberg.
the series थी created to be racially विविध, utilizing a color-blind casting technique.
it is primarily filmed in Los एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
the श्रेणी ' समर्थक is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen Pompeo ), who originally is स्वीकृत into the रेसिडेंसी program at the fictional Seattle अनुग्रह हॉस्पिटल.
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra विल्सन ), along with dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ), Dr. George O'Malley ( T. R. नाईट ), Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine heigl ), and Dr. एलेक्स karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following O'Malley 's death and स्टीवंस ' departure, the hospital 's विलय with रहमत West brings in dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( Jesse Williams ) and Dr. April Kepner ( सारा खींचा ), in the sixth season.
The सर्जिकल wing is primarily supervised by Dr. रिचर्ड Webber ( जेम्स Pickens, jr. ), जो is eventually replaced by Dr. डेरेक Shepherd ( पैट्रिक Dempsey ), and बाद Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ).
dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season, और is replaced by Dr. Erica hahn ( ब्रुक Smith ), who पत्ते the show during the fifth season, और later Dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim Raver ), who प्रस्थान at the end of the eighth ऋतु.
Introduced in the second season is dr. Addison Montgomery ( Kate वाल्श ), who leaves the दिखाएँ at the end of the third season, in अनुक्रम to लॉन्च her अपना spin-off medical drama Private Practice.
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark स्लोअन ( Eric Dane ) also enter the दिखाएँ in the second ऋतु, while the latter dies in the premiere of the ninth season.
मेरेडिथ 's half-sister, Dr. Lexie Grey ( Chyler leigh ), appears from season तीन and dies at the समाप्त of season आठ.
dr. एरिज़ोना रॉबिन्स ( Jessica Capshaw ) is given series regular status at the शुरूआत of the sixth ऋतु.
धूसर 's anatomy is the highest-rated drama in the key 18–49 demographic.
Previously among the overall top-ten rated shows in the United States, धूसर 's Anatomy has been well प्राप्त by critics.
Considered an प्रभाव on culture, the series रै received numerous awards, and has भी been included in various critics ' top ten lists.
The show has produced several specials, as well as distributed all seasons to DVD, और released a collection of merchandise.
In 2012, धूसर 's Anatomy was named the fifth-highest revenue कमाई दिखाएँ, in शर्तें of advertising per half-hour.
On may 11, 2012, the श्रेणी was renewed लिये a ninth season, which premiered on September 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a mental disorder characterized by a breakdown of विचार प्रक्रियाओं and by a deficit of ठेठ emotional प्रतिक्रियाएँ.
आम symptoms include auditory मति, paranoid or bizarre delusions, or disorganized speech and thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in young adulthood, with a global आजीवन prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is based on observed behavior and the रोगी 's reported अनुभवों.
Genetics, जल्दी पर्यावरण, neurobiology, and मनोवैज्ञानिक and social processes appear to be important contributory factors ; some recreational और prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms.
Current शोध is focused on the role of neurobiology, although no single isolated organic cause has been मिला.
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the diagnosis represents a single विकार or a number of discrete syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to विभाजित '' ) and phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` mind '' ), schizophrenia does नहीं imply a `` split personality '', or `` अनेक personality disorder '' ( which is known ये days as dissociative पहचान disorder ) —a condition with which it is often confused in पब्लिक perception.
Rather, the term अर्थात् a `` splitting of दिमागी functions '', क्युकी of the symptomatic presentation of the illness.
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic medication, which primarily suppresses dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor कार्यकलाप.
Psychotherapy और वोकेशनल और social rehabilitation are also important in treatment.
in अधिक गंभीर cases—where there is रिस्क to स्वः and others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, although hospital stays are now shorter and less frequent than they एकबार were.
The विकार is thought मुख्यतः to affect cognition, but it also प्रायः contributes to chronic problems with बर्ताव and emotion.
People with schizophrenia are likely to have अतिरिक्त ( comorbid ) conditions, including प्रमुख depression और anxiety disorders ; the lifetime occurrence of substance use विकार is almost 50 %.
सोशल समस्याएं, such as long-term unemployment, poverty, and homelessness हैं common.
The औसत life expectancy of लोगों with the disorder is 12 to 15 years कम than those बगैर, the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ).

the एपिक of gilgamesh, an epic poem इससे मेसोपोटामिया, is amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with पाँच स्वतंत्र Sumerian कविताएं about 'bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian लिये Gilgamesh ), किंग of uruk.
Four of ये यहूद used as source सामग्री for a combined epic in अक्कादी.
इस first combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, तिथियाँ to the 18th century BC and is titled after इसके incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` surpassing All अन्य किंग्स '' ).
तभी a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of approximately दो तिहाई of this longer, twelve-tablet version have been बरामद.
Some of the best copies were discovered in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king ashurbanipal.
The स्टोरी centers on a friendship between gilgamesh और enkidu.
enkidu is a जंगली man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him इससे oppressing the लोगों of Uruk.
साथ, they journey to the Cedar Mountain to defeat humbaba, इसके monstrous संरक्षक.
बाद they मार the Bull of Heaven, which the goddess इश्तार sends to punish Gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके अग्रिम.
As a punishment for these actions, the देवताओं sentence enkidu to मौत.
The दूसरी half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's death, and his quest लिये अमरत्व.
In अनुक्रम to learn the secret of eternal life, gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous यात्रा.
He learns that `` the life that you are seeking you will never find.
When the gods created man वे allotted to him मौत, लकिन life they retained in उनके own keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal flood नायिका Utnapishtim in the अक्कादी version of the epic.
nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's कीर्ति जिया on बाद his death, क्युकी of his great building projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim बताई him happened during the flood.
The स्टोरी has been translated into many different भाषाएं, और gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an organism whose cells contain complex structures enclosed within membranes.
eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota.
the defining membrane-bound ढांचा कि सेट eukaryotic cells apart from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus, or nuclear लिफाफा, within which the जेनेटिक सामग्री is carried.
The presence of a केंद्रक देता eukaryotes their name, which comes from the यूनानी ( eu, `` शुभ '' ) and ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ).
सबसे eukaryotic cells भी contain other membrane-bound organelles such as mitochondria, chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus.
All large complex organisms हैं eukaryotes, including animals, plants and fungi.
the समूह भी includes many unicellular organisms.
कोशिका division in eukaryotes is different from that in organisms without a nucleus ( prokaryote ).
it involves separating the duplicated chromosomes, through आंदोलनों directed by microtubules.
There are two types of division processes.
In mitosis, one कोशिका divides to produce two genetically identical कोशिकाएं.
In meiosis, which is जरूरी in sexual reproduction, एक द्विगुणित कोशिका ( having two उदाहरण of each chromosome, one from each जनक ) undergoes recombination of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of parental chromosomes, और तब two चरण of कोशिका division, resulting in four haploid cells ( gametes ).
प्रत्येक gamete रै just one complement of गुणसूत्रों, each a अद्वितीय mix of the corresponding pair of parental chromosomes.
Eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, and so makes up one of the three domains of life.
The two अन्य domains, Bacteria and Archaea, हैं prokaryotes and have none of the above features.
eukaryotes represent a छोटा अल्पसंख्यक of all जीना बाते ; even in a human body वहीँ are 10 times more microbes than इंसान cells.
However, due to their much larger size their सामूहिक worldwide biomass is estimated at about equal to that of prokaryotes.
They are considered to have पहला विकसित approximately 1.6–2.1 billion years ago.
The use of अंतरजाल services or तन्त्र with अंतरजाल access to defraud victims or to otherwise लो लाभ of उन्हें, लिये example by stealing personal information, which can even lead to identity theft.
a very common form of Internet fraud is the वितरण of दुष्ट security software.
Internet सेवाएं can be used to उपस्थित fraudulent solicitations to prospective victims, to conduct बेईमान transactions, or to transmit the proceeds of fraud to वित्तीय संस्थानों or to others connected with the scheme.
Internet धोखाधड़ी can occur in chat कक्ष, ईमेल, संदेश boards, or on websites.
The International Security सहायता Force ( isaf ) is a NATO -led security मिशन in Afghanistan that was established by the United राष्ट्र Security Council in दिसम्बर 2001 by Resolution 1386, as envisaged by the Bonn Agreement.
Its प्रमुख purpose is to train the अफगान National सुरक्षा Forces ( ansf ) and assist अफगानिस्तान in rebuilding कुंजी सरकारी संस्थानों but is also सगाई in the 2001-present war साथ बागी समूह.
isaf was initially charged with securing काबुल and surrounding areas इससे the तालिबान, al Qaeda and factional warlords, so as to allow लिये the स्थापना of the अफगान transitional Administration headed by हामिद Karzai.
In अक्तूबर 2003, the UN Security Council प्राधिकृत the विस्तार of the isaf मिशन throughout Afghanistan, and isaf subsequently expanded the मिशन in चार प्रमुख stages over the whole of the country.
इससे 2006 to 2011, ISAF had been शामिल in increasingly more intensive combat परिचालन in southern and पूर्वी Afghanistan.
troop contributors शामिल from the United States, United Kingdom, नाटो सदस्य states and a क्रमांक of अन्य देशों.
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing राष्ट्र varies greatly, with the संयुक्त राज्य, United किंगडम, and Canada sustaining the majority of हताहत in intensive combat operations, with other contributors sustaining significantly कम.
as of early 2010, there were at least 700 military bases अंदर Afghanistan but अधिक were expected to be निर्मित in the coming years.
परिचय 400 of these were used by American‐led नाटो forces and 300 by ANSF.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca संयंत्र.
The name आता इससे `` coca '' and the alkaloid suffix -ine, forming कोका.
It is a stimulant, an appetite suppressant, और a topical anesthetic.
biologically, कोका अधिनियमों as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, also known as a ट्रिपल reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ).
It is addictive because of इसके प्रभाव on the mesolimbic बदला pathway.
नापसंद most molecules, cocaine has pockets with both high hydrophilic और lipophilic efficiency, violating the नियम of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance.
इस causes it to cross the blood–brain अवरोध far better than अन्य psychoactive chemicals और may even induce blood-brain barrier विश्लेषण.
It is illegal to possess, produce, or वितरित cocaine for non-medicinal और non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य in almost every country.

The tri-tip is a cut of beef इससे the bottom sirloin primal cut.
It is a small triangular muscle, usually 1.5 to 2.5 lbs. ( 675 to 1,150g ) per पक्ष of बीफ.
The scientific name of this मांसपेशी is tensor fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the connective ऊतक covering the quadriceps femoris, also पुकारा quadriceps extensor, a group of चार muscles जिससे in turn प्रविष्ट in the patella, or घुटना cap of the animal.

The population थी 19,610 at the 2010 census.
