The Speaker of the United राज्य House of Representatives ( or Speaker of the हाउस ) is the presiding अधिकारी of the chamber.
The दफ्तर was established in 1789 by आलेख I, Section 2 of the United राज्य Constitution, which states in भाग, `` The House of Representatives shall chuse उनके Speaker... ''
The current Speaker is John Boehner, a Republican जो represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district.
The Constitution करता not आवश्यकता that the Speaker be a सदस्य of Congress, but no non-member रै कभी महरूम elected to the दफ्तर.
the Speaker is second in the United States presidential line of succession, after the वाइस President and ahead of the President प्रो tempore of the U.S. सीनेट.
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments, in जिससे the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan, in the संयुक्त राज्य the Speaker of the House is a leadership position and the office-holder actively works to set the majority party 's legislative agenda.
The Speaker usually does not personally preside over debates, बजाय delegating the duty to सदस्यों of the House from the majority party.
aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political party, the स्पीकर also performs administrative और प्रक्रियात्मक functions, and represents उसके or उसके congressional ज़िला.
A सायकिल frame is the प्रमुख component of a bicycle, on to which wheels and other components are fitted.
The modern and सबसे common frame design for an कतरा bicycle is based on the safety bicycle, and consists of दो त्रिकोण, a main triangle and a paired rear triangle.
इस is known as the diamond frame.
Frames are required to be strong, stiff and light, which they do by combining different materials and आकार.
`` Simple gravity pendulum '' मॉडल assumes no friction or air प्रतिरोध.
an exemplar एनिमेशन of a लोलक showing the velocity and acceleration vectors
A लोलक is a weight suspended from a so कि it can swing freely.
When a लोलक is displaced बगलों इससे its resting संतुलन position, it is subject to a restoring force due to गम्भीरता that होगा accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the लोलक 's mass causes it to oscillate परिचय the संतुलन position, swinging वापस और forth.
the time for एक complete cycle, a left झूले और a right swing, is पुकारा the period.
A pendulum swings साथ a specific काल जिससे depends ( mainly ) on its length.
इससे its डिस्कवरी around 1602 by Galileo गैलिली the regular motion of pendulums was used for timekeeping, और was the संसार 's most accurate timekeeping technology until the 1930s.
Pendulums हैं used to regulate pendulum घड़ियाँ, and are used in वैज्ञानिक instruments ऐसे as accelerometers and seismometers.
Historically they were used as gravimeters to माप the acceleration of gravity in geophysical surveys, and even as a standard of length.
The शब्द 'pendulum ' is new Latin, इससे the Latin pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple गम्भीरता pendulum is an idealized mathematical model of a pendulum.
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the समाप्त of a massless cord suspended from a, without friction.
When given an initial push, it will swing back और forth at a constant amplitude.
रियल pendulums हैं विषय to friction and air खीचें, so the amplitude of their swings declines.
the First Battle of Bull Run, भी ज्ञात as पहला manassas ( the name used by Confederate forces ), थी fought on जुलाई 21, 1861, in Prince विलियम County, Virginia, निकट the city of Manassas.
it थी the first major जमीन battle of the American सिविल War.
Just महीने after the प्रारंभ of the war at Fort Sumter, the Northern public clamored for a march विरूद्ध the Confederate capital of रिचमंड, Virginia, which वे expected to लाओ an early end to the विद्रोह.
Yielding to political pressure, Brig. Gen. Irvin McDowell led उसके unseasoned Union फौज across Bull Run विरूद्ध the equally inexperienced Confederate Army of Brig. Gen. P. G. T. beauregard camped near manassas Junction.
mcdowell 's महत्वाकांक्षी plan for a surprise flank attack on the Confederate बाएँ was poorly चलाया by his अधिकारियों and men ; nevertheless, the Confederates, who had been planning to आक्रमण the Union left पार्श्व, मिला themselves at an initial disadvantage.
Confederate reinforcements अंतर्गत Brig. gen. जोसेफ E. johnston arrived इससे the Shenandoah Valley by railroad and the course of the battle quickly changed.
A brigade of Virginians under a अपेक्षाकृत unknown colonel इससे the Virginia Military Institute, Thomas J. Jackson, stood their मैदान and Jackson received his famous nickname, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
the confederates then शुभारम्भ a strong counterattack, and as the संघ troops began withdrawing under fire, अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as mcdowell 's men frantically ran बगैर order in the direction of Washington, D.C.
दोनो armies यहूद sobered by the fierce fighting and many हताहत, and एहसास the war was going to be much longer and bloodier than either had anticipated.

Weather is the राज्य of the माहौल, to the उपाधि कि it is hot or ठंडा, wet or dry, calm or stormy, clear or cloudy.
सबसे मौसम phenomena occur in the troposphere, just below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and वर्षण activity, whereas climate is the term लिये the average atmospheric conditions over longer periods of समय.
When used without qualification, `` weather '' is understood to be the weather of धरती.
Weather is चलित by एयर दबाव ( temperature and moisture ) differences between one प्लेस और another.
These pressure और तापमान differences can occur due to the सूर्य angle at कोई particular spot, which varies by latitude from the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध.
The strong temperature कंट्रास्ट between polar और tropical air gives वृद्धि to the jet स्ट्रीम.
मौसम systems in the mid-latitudes, such as extratropical cyclones, are caused by instabilities of the जेट स्ट्रीम flow.
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted सापेक्ष to इसके orbital plane, sunlight is incident at different कोण at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures usually दायरा ±40 °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually.
over thousands of years, changes in धरती 's orbit affect the amount और distribution of सौर उर्जा received by the Earth and influence long-term climate and global climate change.
Surface temperature differences in turn cause pressure differences.
Higher altitudes are cooler than lower altitudes due to differences in compressional heating.
Weather forecasting is the अनुप्रयोग of science and प्रौद्योगिकी to भविष्यवाणी the state of the माहौल लिये a future समय and a दिए location.
The माहौल is a chaotic system, so small changes to one part of the system can grow to have विशाल प्रभाव on the system as a whole.
इंसान कोशिशें to कंट्रोल the weather have occurred throughout human इतिहास, and वहीँ is evidence that human कार्यकलाप such as agriculture and उद्योग has inadvertently modified मौसम patterns.
Studying how the weather works on अन्य planets has been सहायक in understanding how weather works on धरती.
A famous landmark in the Solar System, Jupiter 's ग्रेट Red Spot, is an anticyclonic तूफ़ान known to have existed for at least 300 सालो.
however, weather is नहीं सीमित to ग्रहीय bodies.
A star 's corona is constantly होने lost to space, creating कया is essentially a very thin atmosphere throughout the Solar प्रणाली.
The movement of mass ejected इससे the Sun is ज्ञात as the solar wind.
Katy Perry is an American singer-songwriter इससे Santa Barbara, California.
She हस्ताक्षरित with Capitol Records.
Perry has released three studio एल्बम, including her डेब्यू Christian effort कैटी Hudson, One of the Boys, and Teenage Dream.
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked बंद with the massive chart success of her debut सिंगल `` I Kissed a लड़की ``.
दौरान her करियर, Perry रै महरूम nominated for numerous प्रमुख music awards, primarily लिये teenage Dream and One of the Boys.
The following is a सूची of sovereign राज्य and territories जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक language or भाषा of सरकारी.
in 2012, there were 88 राज्य in total ( 60 sovereign states और 28 non-sovereign राज्य ).
In many countries अंग्रेज़ी is the dominant language, but करता not have official status.
In Australia, अंग्रेज़ी is बोला by the vast majority of the population और is the only language प्रयुक्त in सरकारी संस्थानों, लकिन Australia करता not have an official भाषा.
The मामला is the same in the United Kingdom and the संयुक्त States, हालांकि many states and regions within the U.S. do have English as an official language.
English is the dominant language of New Zealand और an आधिकारिक language of Canada ( along साथ फ्रेंच ), India ( along with Hindi और अनेक other languages ), आयरलैंड ( along with Irish ), और the Philippines ( along with tagalog ).
English is the एकमात्र official language of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Commonwealth खेल.
English is एक of the आधिकारिक languages of the United Nations, the यूरोपीय Union and the International ओलम्पिक Committee.
अनेक of these countries are वर्तमान or पूर्व colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( see भी British Empire ), or of the United States, itself a former colony of the UK.
Notable अपवाद include Rwanda, which was a former Belgian colony and इरित्रिया, which was an इतालवी colony जहाँ the British Empire spanned its control only in World War ii और shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's linguistic चित्र is complex.
According to the Constitution of India, `` Hindi in the देवनागरी script '' is the official language of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all संघीय laws and Supreme Court निर्णय and ( साथ with Hindi ) is one of the दो भाषाएं of the Indian Parliament.
English is प्रयुक्त almost exclusively लिये उच्चतर शिक्षा, business और science.
पाठ्यक्रम in बहुमत of the schools हैं taught exclusively in English.
English is extensively used for प्रशासनिक उद्देश्य in इण्डिया.
इण्डिया is the second-largest English-speaking country in the world by number of अध्यक्षों, after the United राज्य.
as such, many consider English to be the de facto आधिकारिक language of India.
See Official भाषाएं of India.
the linguistic मेकअप of Pakistan is similarly complex.
While the national language is Urdu, English is an official language and used in business, government और law.
English is a compulsory language in schools.
All school courses are सिखाया in English.
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking country in the world by population.
Southern Cone (, ) is a geographic region composed of the southernmost क्षेत्रों of South America, दक्षिण of the tropic of Capricorn.
हालांकि geographically इस शामिल दक्षिणी और part of southeast ( São पाउलो ) of Brazil, in terms of राजनैतिक भूगोल the Southern cone रै traditionally comprised Argentina, Chile, पैराग्वे, और Uruguay.
in the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, चिली और उरुग्वे, bounded on the north by the states of Brazil, पैराग्वे, Bolivia and पेरू, on the west by the Pacific समंदर, and south to the जंक्शन between the प्रशांत and अटलांटिक महासागर, जिससे it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life expectancy, the उच्चतम Human विकास अनुक्रमणिका of Latin अमेरिका, high Standard of जीना, significant भागीदारी in the global markets and the emerging अर्थव्यवस्था of इसके सदस्यों make the दक्षिणी कोन the most prosperous macro-region in South अमेरिका.
लिये multi-event एथलेटिक competitions देखिए Track and फ़ील्ड Competitions, section `` Meetings ''.
Meetings are sometimes held around सम्मेलन tables.
in a बैठक, दो or more लोगों आइये together to discuss one or more topics, often in a formal setting.
An official game in baseball, also sometimes called a विनियमन game, is a game कि has progressed beyond the point at which it can be considered पूरा if जरुरी.
This is approximately the halfway पाइंट of the game.
in the case of inclement weather, any खेल which रै reached इस पाइंट may be रोका and shortened as needed, साथ the result being फाइनल, and all records and statistics counted.
a game जिससे रै not पहुँचे this point before being stopped is either considered a suspended खेल ( to be continued at a बाद date इससे the point of stoppage ), or is simply canceled और replayed from the प्रारंभ.
( इस depends on the नियम of each व्यक्तिगत लीग. )
In either case, no statistics हैं गिने until the खेल becomes आधिकारिक.
Since सबसे पेशेवर baseball games are nine innings long, the fifth inning is used as the threshold लिये an official game.
if the visiting टोली is अग्रणी, or the game is tied, the end of the fifth inning marks this पाइंट.
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the स्कोर, और theoretically would नहीं need इसके half of the fifth inning, then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e., the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official खेल.
the game is also माना आधिकारिक if the home टोली scores to लो the lead in the bottom of the fifth inning, चूंकि the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all cases, the `` official game '' status is प्रयुक्त to determine whether a rain check will be honored लिये fans पकड़कर tickets.
If a खेल is started लकिन करता not पहुँचें the point of बनने आधिकारिक, fans are हकदार to a new ticket लिये the make-up game or ( in most cases ) कोई other available game of उनके choice.
If a खेल is halted after it becomes official, the game is simply shortened and no rain check is given.
the `` official game '' statistic received some attention during the 1995 season, when Cal Ripken, Jr. was approaching the record लिये consecutive खेल played, previously आयोजित by Lou Gehrig.
Large numbers यहूद hung on the पक्ष of the B & O Warehouse at Oriole Park at camden Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
प्रत्येक दिन, a new क्रमांक was unfurled during the fifth inning after each खेल had become official ( since the statistic होता not have counted if the game था been stopped before that point ).
a similar practice रै महरूम used to गिनती down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including दिग्गजों Stadium in फिलाडेल्फिया in 2003, Busch Memorial Stadium in St. लुई in 2005, और the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as each game became आधिकारिक, the team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the क्रमांक of खेल left to be played in the stadium.
a टेलीफोन क्रमांक or फोन number is a sequence of digits used to कॉल from one telephone line to another in a पब्लिक switched telephone network.
When टेलीफोन numbers यहूद invented, they were short — as few as one, two or तीन digits — और यहूद given orally to a switchboard operator.
as phone systems have grown and interconnected to encompass the world, telephone numbers have become longer.
In addition to telephones, वे now access other devices, such as computers और fax machines.
the number contains the information necessary to identify uniquely the intended endpoint for the टेलीफोन कॉल.
Each such endpoint जरूर have a unique क्रमांक within the public switched telephone संजाल.
Most countries use fixed लंबाई संख्याएँ ( लिये normal lines at least ) and इसलिए the number of endpoints determines the necessary लंबाई of the telephone number.
it is भी possible लिये each subscriber to have a set of shorter numbers for the endpoints most often used.
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed calling '' numbers are automatically translated to unique telephone संख्याएँ before the call can be connected.
Some special सेवाएं have उनके own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, और 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers लिये China, जापानी, South Korea, Taiwan और Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States ; Australia ; the संयुक्त Kingdom, Ireland, South अफ़्रीकी, Poland, सऊदी Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Morocco, Macao, Bahrain, Qatar, बांग्लादेश, Botswana, घाना, Kenya, Hong Kong, मलेशिया, Mauritius, सिंगापुर, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; नई जीलैंड ; कुवैत और the European Union, क्रमशः. )
Many प्रणालियों also allow calls within a local क्षेत्रफल to be बना without dialing the लोकल area code.
For उदाहरण, a फोन क्रमांक in North America will start with three numbers ( ऐसे as 661 ), which is the area code, followed by सात digits विभाजित into sections of three and चार ( such as 550-1212 ), which is the लोकल क्रमांक.
Some क्षेत्रों now have अनिवार्य ten-digit dialing in place, भी for लोकल calls.
Most टेलीफोन संजाल today ( exceptions होने private intercom और secure phone networks ) are interconnected in the international telephone network, where the format of टेलीफोन numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies that the entire number should be 15 digits or shorter, and begin with a country prefix.
लिये most countries, this is followed by an क्षेत्रफल कोड or city code and the subscriber number, which might consist of the कोड for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes कैसा to represent an अंतरराष्ट्रीय telephone क्रमांक in writing or print, starting with a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the country कोड.
When calling an international number from a fixed लकीर फोन, the + must be replaced with the international call prefix chosen by the country the कॉल is being बना इससे.
Some mobile फोन allow the + to be डाला सीधे.
The format and allocation of local phone numbers हैं controlled by each स्वदेश 's respective government, either directly or by प्रायोजित organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar inc. ).
पहले a telephone call is कनेक्ट, the telephone number जरूर be dialed by the कॉलिंग पार्टी or Caller.
The called party might have equipment कि presents कॉलर ID before the call is answered.
a collection agency is a कारोबार that pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or व्यवसायों.
Most collection agencies operate as एजेंटों of creditors और collect debts for a fee or percentage of the कुल amount owed.
There are अनेक types of संग्रहण agencies.
first-party agencies are oftentimes subsidiaries of the original कम्पनी the कर्ज़ is owed to.
Third-party एजेंसियों are separate companies contracted by a कम्पनी to collect debts on their behalf लिये a fee.
कर्ज़ buyers purchase the कर्ज़ at a percentage of its value, then attempt to collect it.
Each country has इसके own rules और regulations regarding them.

Cannabis, भी known as marijuana ( from the मैक्सिकन Spanish marihuana ), और by अन्य names, is a preparation of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one of 483 known यौगिकों in the संयंत्र, सहित at least 84 अन्य cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
और cannabigerol ( CBG ).
इस is a सूची of American football quarterbacks who have started for the Washington redskins, as खूब as its पूर्ववर्तियों the Boston Braves ( 1932 ) and बोस्टन Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the National Football League ( NFL ).
The वॉशिंगटन Redskins franchise was originally संस्थापित in Boston, Massachusetts as the बोस्टन Braves, named after the local baseball मताधिकार.
The name was बदला the following year to the Redskins.
In 1937, the franchise moved to वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
Of the 49 Redskins starting quarterbacks, two have been inducted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल Hall of कीर्ति : Sammy Baugh और Sonny Jurgensen.

1st खास शक्तियां Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ), popularly ज्ञात as Delta Force, is one of the संयुक्त States ' four गुपचुप tier-one counter-terrorism and Special मिशन Units.
It was formerly listed as the Combat Applications Group by the Department of Defense but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented तत्व ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively supported by usasoc, it falls अंतर्गत the operational control of the संयुक्त Special Operations कमांड.
Delta Force and its Navy बंटवारा, the नवल Special Warfare Development Group, are the United राज्य military 's primary counter-terrorism units.
डेल्टा फ़ोर्स 's प्राथमिक कार्य हैं counter-terrorism, सीधा action, and national intervention operations, although it is an extremely बहुमुखी group capable of conducting अनेक प्रकार of covert missions, including, लकिन not limited to, hostage rescues and raids.
The Central Intelligence Agency 's अत्यधिक secretive खास Activities Division ( SAD ) और more specifically its elite Special परिचालन Group ( SOG ) often works साथ – and recruits – operators इससे डेल्टा फ़ोर्स.
अल्फा क्षय is एक उदाहरण type of radioactive decay, in जिससे an परमाणु nucleus emits an alpha particle, और thereby transforms ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an atom with a द्रव्यमान क्रमांक 4 less and atomic number 2 less.
Many other types of decays are संभावित.
रेडियोसक्रिय decay, also known as nuclear decay or radioactivity, is the process by जिससे a nucleus of an unstable अणु loses उर्जा by emitting particles of ionizing radiation.
A सामग्री that अनायास emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of ऊर्जावान alpha particles, beta अणु, और gamma rays — is considered radioactive.
There are अनेक different types of radioactive decay ( see table नीचे ).
A decay, or घाटा of energy, results जब an atom with एक प्रकार of nucleus, called the जनक radionuclide, transforms to an atom with a nucleus in a different राज्य, or to a different nucleus containing अलग संख्याएँ of protons और neutrons.
Either of ये products is named the daughter nuclide.
In some decays the parent and बेटी are अलग रासायनिक तत्व, और thus the क्षय process results in नाभिकीय transmutation ( सृष्टि of an atom of a new तत्व ).
The first decay processes to be discovered were alpha decay, beta decay, और gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs जब the केंद्रक ejects an alpha particle ( helium nucleus ).
This is the सबसे common प्रक्रम of emitting nucleons, लकिन in rarer types of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or विशिष्ट nuclei of other तत्व ( in the process called cluster decay ).
बीटा क्षय occurs when the केंद्रक emits an electron or positron और a type of neutrino, in a process that changes a प्रोटॉन to a न्यूट्रॉन or the अन्य way around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting इलेक्ट्रॉन, converting a proton into a neutron ( electron capture ).
All of these processes result in nuclear transmutation.
by कंट्रास्ट, there exist radioactive decay processes that do not result in transmutation.
The उर्जा of an उत्साहित nucleus may be उत्सर्जित as a gamma ray in गामा decay, or used to eject an orbital इलेक्ट्रॉन by interaction with the excited nucleus in a process called internal परिवर्तन.
radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, and this results in a change in an तत्व from one isotope to another.
One type of रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय results in products which हैं not defined, but appear in a range of `` टुकड़े '' of the original nucleus.
इस क्षय is called spontaneous परिवर्द्धन.
This decay happens when a विशाल unstable केंद्रक spontaneously splits into two ( और occasionally three ) smaller बेटी nuclei, and usually emits gamma किरणें, neutrons, or other particles as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the स्तर of single atoms, in कि, according to quantum theory, it is नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी when a particular atom will decay.
however, the मौका that a given atom will decay is constant over time.
लिये a large number of atoms, the क्षय रेट लिये the collection is computable इससे the measured decay constants of the nuclides ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
वैक्सिंग is a रूप of semi-permanent बाल removal जिससे removes the hair from the root.
नई hair will नहीं grow back in the previously waxed क्षेत्रफल for two to आठ weeks, although some लोगों will start to see regrowth in तभी a week.
Almost any area of the body can be waxed, सहित eyebrows, face, bikini area, टाँगे, arms, back, abdomen and फीट.
There हैं अनेक प्रकार of waxing उपयुक्त for removing अनावश्यक बाल.
Strip वैक्सिंग is accomplished by spreading a मोम thinly over the skin.
A cloth or paper strip is then pressed on the top और ripped off the direction of hair growth.
This removes the wax साथ with the बाल.
Strip मोम can भी be made at home using नीबू रस, water, sugar and honey.
Hot वैक्सिंग utilizes Hot wax ( as opposed to स्ट्रिप मोम ).
In this case, the wax is applied somewhat thickly and with no cloth or पेपर strips.
the मोम तब hardens जब it cools, thus allowing the easy removal by a चिकित्सक without the aid of cloths.
This waxing method is very beneficial to people who have sensitive skin.
वॉल पेंटिंग ( 1st century AD ) from Pompeii depicting a multigenerational भोज
Ancient रोमन culture existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year history of the सभ्यता of Ancient Rome.
the पद refers to the culture of the Roman Republic, later the रोमन Empire, which, at इसके peak, covered an क्षेत्रफल इससे Lowland Scotland and Morocco to the euphrates.
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the city of रोम, its famed सात hills, और its स्मारकीय structures ऐसे as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( now पुकारा the कोलोसियम ), the फ़ोरम of Trajan, and the Pantheon.
The city also had several theaters, gymnasiums, and many taverns, baths, and brothels.
throughout the territory under ancient रोम 's कंट्रोल, residential वास्तुकला ranged from very modest houses to country विला, and in the capital city of Rome, there यहूद imperial residences on the elegant palatine Hill, from जिससे the शब्द palace is निकला.
the vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी lived in the city center, packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ).
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of that time, with a population कि may खूब have exceeded one million people, with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 प्रतिशत of the population अंतर्गत the city 's क्षेत्राधिकार lived in innumerable urban centers, with population of at least 10,000 और अनेक military settlements, a बहुत ऊँची रेट of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
The most urbanized भाग of the Empire थी Italy, which था an अनुमानित rate of urbanization of 32 %, the same रेट of urbanization of England in 1800.
सबसे Roman towns and cities had a forum, temples और the वही type of buildings, on a smaller स्केल, as found in Rome.
The large urban population required an endless supply of food which was a complex logistical कार्य, including acquiring, transporting, storing and वितरण of food for Rome and other urban centers.
Italian खेतो supplied vegetables और fruits, but fish and meat were luxuries.
Aqueducts were built to bring water to शहरी centers और wine and आयल were imported from Hispania, gaul और Africa.
There was a very large राशि of कॉमर्स between the प्रांतों of the Roman Empire, since इसके transportation प्रौद्योगिकी was बहुत efficient.
the average लागत of transport and the technology were comparable with 18th-century Europe.
The बाद city of Rome did not भरण the space within its ancient Aurelian walls until बाद 1870.
Eighty percent of the जनसांख्यिकी under the jurisdiction of ancient रोम lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in cities and their estates यहूद बाएँ in the care of farm प्रबंधक.
The plight of rural slaves was generally बदतर than उनके counterparts working in urban aristocratic households.
to stimulate a higher labor productivity most landlords freed a large number of slaves और many प्राप्त wages.
Some records indicate कि `` as many as 42 लोगों जिया in one छोटी फार्म hut in Egypt, while six families owned a सिंगल ज़ैतून tree. ''.
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of population to urban centers until the early 2nd century, जब the urban जनसांख्यिकी stopped growing और started to decline.
starting in the middle of the 2nd century bc, private Greek संस्कृति was increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of hellenized संस्कृति इससे the conservative moralists.
by the time of augustus, cultured Greek household स्लेव taught the Roman young ( sometimes भी the girls ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came इससे the यूनानी ईस्ट.
यूनानी sculptures adorned hellenistic लैंडस्केप gardening on the Palatine or in the विला, or were imitated in Roman sculpture गज by Greek slaves.
The Roman भोजन preserved in the cookery किताबे ascribed to Apicius is essentially Greek.
Roman writers disdained Latin for a cultured यूनानी स्टाइल.
Only in law और governance was the तिरछा प्रकृति of रोम 's accretive संस्कृति supreme.
विरूद्ध this इंसान background, दोनो the urban and rural setting, one of history 's सबसे influential civilizations took आकार, leaving behind a सांस्कृतिक विरासत कि survives in भाग today.
James जोसेफ `` Duffy '' Waldorf, Jr. ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर golfer.

Glass उत्पादन involves two प्रमुख methods – the फ्लैश glass process, which produces sheet glass, और glassblowing which produces bottles और other containers.
a season is a subdivision of the year, marked by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, and घंटों of daylight.
सीज़न result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution.
In शीतोष्ण and polar regions, the seasons are marked by परिवर्तन in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's सतह, variations of which may cause animals to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June और July, the northern hemisphere is उजागर to अधिक direct sunlight because the hemisphere चेहरों the sun.
the वही is true of the दक्षिणी hemisphere in नवम्बर, December and जनवरी.
it is the tilt of the धरती that causes the Sun to be उच्चतर in the sky दौरान the गर्मियाँ महीने which increases the solar फ्लक्स.
however, due to मौसमी lag, June, July and August are the hottest महीने in the northern गोलार्ध and December, January and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally चार calendar -based सीज़न ( साथ their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) और शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly उपयोग a छह season मॉडल for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as पृथक seasons along with the traditional चार.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the शुष्क season, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
in some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' हैं loosely defined based on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane season, बवंडर ऋतु or a दावानल season.
The छह ecological सीज़न
The चार calendar seasons, depicted in an ancient Roman mosaic इससे Tunisia
The Battle of फोर्ट Sumter ( अप्रैल 12–14, 1861 ) was the bombardment and surrender of Fort Sumter, near Charleston, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, that started the American Civil War.
following घोषणाओं of secession by सात Southern states, South Carolina demanded that the u.S. फौज abandon its facilities in Charleston Harbor.
On दिसम्बर 26, 1860, U.S. प्रमुख रॉबर्ट एंडरसन surreptitiously moved उसके small command from the indefensible Fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island to फोर्ट Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of चार्ल्सटन Harbor.
An attempt by U.S. President James बुकानन to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the unarmed merchant ship Star of the West, विफल when it थी fired upon by shore batteries on जनवरी 9, 1861.
दक्षिण कैरोलिना authorities then seized all Federal property in the Charleston area, except for फोर्ट sumter.
During the early months of 1861, the हालात around Fort Sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In कूच, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the first general अधिकारी of the newly formed Confederate States of अमेरिका, थी लगाई in कमांड of Confederate forces in Charleston.
Beauregard energetically निर्देशित the strengthening of batteries around Charleston harbor aimed at फोर्ट sumter.
Conditions in the फोर्ट grew dire as the Union सैनिको rushed to पूरा the संस्थापना of additional बंदूकों.
Anderson was short of men, food, and supplies.
the resupply of Fort Sumter became the first crisis of the प्रशासन of अध्यक्ष Abraham Lincoln.
He notified the राज्यपाल of South Carolina, Francis W. pickens, that he was sending supply ships, जिससे resulted in an ultimatum इससे the Confederate सरकारी : evacuate Fort Sumter तत्काल.
प्रमुख Anderson refused to surrender.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on अप्रैल 12, the Confederates bombarded the फोर्ट from artillery batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the Union garrison returned fire, they were significantly outgunned and, after 34 hours, Major Anderson agreed to evacuate.
There was no घाटा of life on either पक्ष as a direct परिणाम of this engagement, although a gun विस्फोट during the surrender ceremonies on April 14 caused two संघ deaths.
Following the battle, वहीँ थी फैली support from both North और दक्षिण for further सैन्य action.
Lincoln 's तात्कालिक call for 75,000 volunteers to suppress the विद्रोह resulted in an additional चार southern slave राज्य also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy.
The Civil War had begun.
3G, short लिये third Generation, is the third generation of मोबाईल telecommunications प्रौद्योगिकी.
3g दूरसंचार networks support सेवाएं that provide an information transfer rate of at तनिक 200 kbit/s.
however, many services advertised as 3g provide higher गति than the minimum technical requirements for a 3G service.
Recent 3g रिलीज, प्रायः denoted 3.5g and 3.75G, also provide mobile broadband access of अनेक Mbit/s to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop कंप्यूटर.
3g finds application in wireless voice telephony, मोबाईल Internet access, fixed wireless Internet अभिगम, वीडियो calls and mobile tv.

traditionally, बाद the groom breaks the glass, the guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! ``.
A birthday cake, iced with the शब्द `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is often done in Israel.

`` good लक '' ) is a phrase प्रयुक्त to express congratulations लिये a happy and significant occasion or event.
hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the liver, caused by the hepatitis C वायरस ( HCV ).
The infection is प्रायः asymptomatic, लकिन दीर्घकालिक infection can lead to scarring of the जिगर and ultimately to cirrhosis, which is generally apparent after अनेक सालो.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis will go on to develop liver failure, जिगर cancer or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood contact associated with intravenous ड्रग उपयोग, poorly sterilized medical उपकरण और transfusions.
an estimated 130–200 million people विश्वव्यापी are infected with.
The अस्तित्व of ( originally `` non- A non- b hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s और proven in 1989.
only infects humans and chimpanzees.
the वायरस persists in the liver in about 85 % of those संक्रमित.
इस persistent infection can be treated with दवा : the standard therapy is a combination of peginterferon and ribavirin, साथ either boceprevir or telaprevir added in कुछ cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of people treated are cured.
Those who develop cirrhosis or liver cancer may require a जिगर transplant.
is the अग्रणी cause of जिगर प्रत्यारोपण, हालांकि the वायरस usually recurs after transplantation.
No टीका विरूद्ध is उपलब्धियाँ.
a flexible spending खाता ( fsa ), also known as a लचीली spending arrangement, is one of a number of tax-advantaged वित्तीय accounts कि can be set up through a कैफेटेरिया plan of an employer in the United States.
An FSA allows an कर्मचारी to set aside a portion of earnings to pay लिये qualified expenses as established in the कैफेटेरिया plan, सबसे commonly for चिकित्सा खर्च लकिन often for निर्भर care or अन्य expenses.
Money deducted इससे an कर्मचारी 's pay into an FSA is नहीं subject to payroll taxes, resulting in substantial payroll tax बचत.
One significant disadvantage to using an fsa is that funds not used by the end of the योजना year are खोया to the कर्मचारी, known as the `` use it or खोना it '' rule.
The most common type of लचीली spending खाता, the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or health FSA ), is समान to a स्वास्थ्य बचत account ( HSA ) or a health reimbursement account ( HRA ).
However, while hsas और HRAs are almost exclusively used as components of a consumer driven health परवाह योजना, medical FSAs are commonly offered with अधिक traditional स्वास्थ्य योजनाएँ as well.
in जोड, निधि in a health savings account हैं नहीं lost जब the योजना साल is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper forms or an fsa debit card, also known as a flexcard, may be used to access the account funds.
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S. state located in the southeastern United States.
Tennessee is the 36th सबसे extensive and the 17th most populous of the 50 United States.
टेनेसी is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the north, North Carolina to the east, Georgia, Alabama, and Mississippi to the south, and Arkansas and Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern भाग of the राज्य, and the मिसिसिपी River फ़ॉर्म the state 's western किनारा.
Tennessee 's capital and दूसरी largest city is नैशविले, which has a population of 609,644.
Memphis is the राज्य 's largest city, with a जनसांख्यिकी of 652,050.
The राज्य of टेनेसी is rooted in the Watauga Association, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the first संवैधानिक सरकारी west of the Appalachians.
What is now Tennessee थी initially part of North Carolina, and later part of the Southwest Territory.
Tennessee थी admitted to the संघ as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
Tennessee was the पिछला state to leave the संघ and जुड़ें the confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. सिविल War in 1861, and the first state to be readmitted to the संघ at the end of the युद्ध.
Tennessee सुसज्जित अधिक सैनिको लिये the Confederate Army than any other राज्य, and अधिक soldiers for the संघ फौज than any अन्य Southern state.
In the 20th सदी, टेनेसी transitioned इससे an agrarian economy to a more diversified अर्थव्यवस्था, aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley प्राधिकार.
In the जल्दी 1940s, the city of ओक Ridge was established to हाउस the Manhattan Project 's uranium enrichment सुविधाएं, helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb.
Tennessee has played a critical role in the विकास of अनेक forms of अमरीकी popular music, including rock और फेंकें, ब्लूज़, country, और rockabilly.
Beale गली in मेम्फिस is माना by many to be the जन्मस्थान of the blues, with संगीतकारों such as w.c. Handy performing in इसके क्लब as early as 1909.
Memphis was भी home to Sun Records, where musicians such as एल्विस प्रेस्ली, Isaac Hayes, Johnny नकदी, Carl Perkins, जेरी Lee Lewis, Roy Orbison, and Charlie Rich began their recording करियर, and जहाँ rock and roll took आकार in the 1950s.
the 1927 Victor रिकॉर्डिंग sessions in Bristol generally चिह्नित the beginning of the देश music विधा और the वृद्धि of the ग्रैंड Ole opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the country म्यूज़िक recording industry.
Three ईंटें and mortar museums recognize टेनेसी 's भूमिका in nurturing various फ़ॉर्म of लोकप्रिय music : the Memphis चट्टान n ' आत्मा Museum, the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum in Nashville, and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly हॉल of Fame, an ऑनलाइन site recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in जिससे टेनेसी played a निर्णायक role, is based in Nashville.
टेनेसी 's major industries शामिल agriculture, manufacturing, and पर्यटन.
Poultry, soybeans, and cattle are the राज्य 's प्राथमिक agricultural products, and major manufacturing निर्यात include रसायन, transportation equipment, और electrical equipment.
The ग्रेट Smoky kyu National Park, the nation 's most visited national park, is headquartered in the eastern part of the state, और a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North कैरोलिना किनारा.
अन्य major tourist attractions शामिल the Tennessee Aquarium in Chattanooga, the Sunsphere in Knoxville, Dollywood in Pigeon forge, the Parthenon, the देश Music Hall of Fame and Museum, और Ryman Auditorium in नैशविले, and Elvis Presley 's graceland residence and tomb in Memphis.
एक design रूपांतर of a cock रिंग.
a cock ring is a रिंग that can be placed around a man 's शिश्न, usually at the आधार, primarily to slow the flow of blood from the erect penile ऊतक, thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time.
Cock rings can be worn around बस the penis or दोनो the penis and scrotum, or बस the scrotum alone, though इस is usually called a testicle cuff.
बजती can be बना of a variety of different सामग्री, most commonly leather, रबर, or silicone, though नायलॉन और metal are भी used either as the प्रमुख component or part of the closure.
The term cock रिंग is sometimes used as a synonym for a प्रिंस Albert piercing, a piercing of the penis कि is प्रायः, हालांकि not always, a metal ring.
When used in मामले of erectile dysfunction they हैं known by various names ऐसे as `` स्तंभन रिंग '' और `` tension रिंग ''.
The मुख्यालय of Major League बेसबॉल at 245 Park Avenue, midtown Manhattan, नई यॉर्क City, USA.
Major League बेसबॉल ( MLB ) is a professional baseball league, consisting of टीमों that खेल in the National लीग and the American League.
डेटिंग to 1876 और 1901 respectively, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a सिंगल organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball, after 100 years as separate विधिक entities.
MLB constitutes one of the major professional sports leagues of the United राज्य and कनाडा.
It is composed of 30 teams — 29 in the United States और one in कनाडा.
Teams in एमएलबी play 162 games each season over six months ( अप्रैल through सितंबर ).
पाँच teams in प्रत्येक league अग्रिम to a four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games चैंपियनशिप series between the two league champions which dates to 1903.
the organization oversees many minor-league baseball leagues जिससे operate परिचय 240 टीमों संबद्ध with the major-league clubs.
साथ the International Baseball संघ, the league also manages the international World Baseball Classic टूर्नामेंट.
एमएलबी has the highest ऋतु उपस्थिति of any sports league in the world with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
डेलावेयर ( ) is a U.S. state located on the अटलांटिक Coast in the Mid-Atlantic region of the संयुक्त राज्य.
It is bordered to the south and west by Maryland, to the northeast by New Jersey, और to the north by Pennsylvania.
the state takes its नाम from Thomas West, 3rd Baron De la Warr, an English nobleman and Virginia 's पहला colonial governor, बाद जिसको कया is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
डेलावेयर is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva प्रायद्वीप और is the second smallest, the छठे least populous, but the sixth most densely populated of the fifty United राज्य.
डेलावेयर is divided into तीन काउंटी.
From उत्तर to south, these three counties are नई Castle, केंट, और ससेक्स.
जबकि the southern two counties have historically महरूम predominantly agricultural, New किला County रै महरूम more industrialized.
Before इसके तटरेखा was explored by europeans in the 16th सदी, Delaware was inhabited by अनेक groups of Native Americans, including the Lenape in the north and nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by Dutch traders at Zwaanendael, located near the present कस्बा of lewes, in 1631.
डेलावेयर was one of the 13 colonies participating in the अमरीकी Revolution और on December 7, 1787, became the first state to ratify the Constitution of the United States, thereby becoming ज्ञात as the पहला State.
Energy परिवर्तन in Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or उर्जा conversion is the प्रक्रम of changing एक form of energy to another.
In भौतिकी, the पद energy describes the capacity to उपज certain changes within a system, बगैर लिहाज़ to limitations in transformation imposed by Entropy.
परिवर्तन in total energy of प्रणालियों can तभी be accomplished by adding or subtracting उर्जा from them, as energy is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved, according to the पहला law of thermodynamics.
according to special आपेक्षिकता, परिवर्तन in the energy of systems will also coincide with परिवर्तन in the प्रणाली 's mass, और the total amount of mass of a system is a measure of its energy.
उर्जा in a प्रणाली may be transformed so that it resides in a different state, or a अलग type of energy.
उर्जा in many states may be used to do अनेक किस्में of physical work.
उर्जा may be used in natural processes or machines, or else to provide कुछ service to society ( such as ऊष्मा, light, or motion ).
For example, an internal combustion इंजन converts the potential रासायनिक उर्जा in gasoline and oxygen into ऊष्मा, which is then transformed into the propulsive उर्जा ( kinetic उर्जा कि moves a गाडी ).
A solar कोशिका converts solar विकिरण into electrical उर्जा कि can तब be used to लाइट a bulb or power a कंप्यूटर.
The जेनेरिक name for a device जिससे converts energy from एक form to another, is a ट्रान्सड्यूसर.
In general, सबसे types of उर्जा, सहेजें for thermal energy, may be converted efficiently to any अन्य kind of energy.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, such as जब potential energy is converted to kinetic energy as an object falls in vacuum, or जब it orbits nearer or farther इससे another object, in स्पेस.
Conversion of other types of energies to heat may also occurs with nearly perfect दक्षता ( अनेक types of घर्षण do this ).
Exceptions लिये पूर्ण परिवर्तन efficiency ( even for isolated प्रणालियों ) occur जब energy रै already been partly distributed among many available क्वांटम राज्य लिये a collection of अणु, जिससे are freely अनुमत to explore any राज्य of momentum and position ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a माप called एन्ट्रॉपी, or evening-out of energy distribution in ऐसे राज्य, dictates कि भविष्य states of the system जरूर be of at तनिक बराबर evenness in उर्जा distribution.
( वहीँ is no रास्ता, taking the ब्रह्मांड as a पूरे, to collect energy into fewer राज्य, once it रै spread to them ).
a consequence of इस requirement is कि there हैं limitations to the efficiency with जिससे thermal energy can be converted to other kinds of energy, since थर्मल energy in संतुलन at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all संभावित राज्य.
Such energy is sometimes considered `` degraded energy, '' because it is not entirely usable.
the second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, लिये इस कारण, thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy साथ efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased by other means, to compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy सामग्री.
Otherwise, only a part of thermal उर्जा may be converted to other kinds of energy ( और thus, useful work ), since the शेष of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a निम्नतर temperature, in such a way that the बढ़ाएँ in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये this प्रक्रम अधिक than compensates for the entropy decrease associated साथ परिवर्तन of the बाकी of the ऊष्मा into other प्रकार of energy.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर ice हॉकी league of 30 franchised member clubs, of जिससे सात are currently located in Canada और 23 in the United States.
headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the world, and one of the प्रमुख professional खेल leagues in the संयुक्त राज्य और Canada.
the Stanley Cup, the oldest पेशेवर sports trophy in North अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each ऋतु.
the लीग was व्यवस्थित on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, कनाडा, after the suspension of operations of its predecessor संगठन, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It प्रारंभ with चार teams और, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred थी Canada, हालांकि the लीग has now been binational चूंकि 1924 when it expanded into the United राज्य.
After a श्रमिक विवाद that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
the NHL draws अनेक highly skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the संसार and फिलहाल has खिलाड़ी from about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the पास्ट four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty क्लब since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European खिलाड़ी.
इस is the complete सूची of the ratified और unratified amendments to the United राज्य Constitution which received the approval of the संयुक्त States Congress.
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the Constitution, the first टेन of जिससे are known collectively as the Bill of अधिकारों.
The procedure लिये amending the United States Constitution is governed by आलेख V of the original text.
वहीँ have been अनेक other proposals for amendments to the United States Constitution introduced in Congress, but not submitted to the states.
पहले an amendment can take प्रभाव, it must be प्रस्तावित to the राज्य by a two-thirds vote of both houses of Congress or by a सम्मेलन ( known as an Article v सम्मेलन ) called by two-thirds of the states, and ratified by three-fourths of the राज्य or by three-fourths of conventions thereof, the विधि of ratification being determined by कॉंग्रेस at the time of proposal.
To date, no सम्मेलन लिये proposing amendments has been called by the राज्य, and तभी once—in 1933 for the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of अनुसमर्थन महरूम employed.
FMR llc ( Fidelity प्रबन्धन and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is an American multinational financial services corporation.
It is one of the largest mutual निधि and financial सेवाएं groups in the world.
It थी founded in 1946 and serves North अमरीकी investors.
Fidelity Ventures is इसके venture capital arm.
Fidelity International सीमित ( FIL ), was an अंतरराष्ट्रीय affiliate संस्थापित in 1969, सेवारत most countries in the rest of the world.
in September 2011, FIL was rebranded as 'Fidelity Worldwide Investment '.
वफ़ादारी Investments manages a large family of परस्पर निधि, provides निधि distribution and investment सलाह services, as well as providing discount brokerage services, रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं, माल प्रबन्धन, securities निष्पादन and क्लीयरेंस, life बीमे और a number of other सेवाएं.

समाजशास्त्र is the scientific study of इंसान society and its origins, development, संगठन, और institutions.
It is a social science which uses various विधि of empirical investigation and critical analysis to develop a body of ज्ञान about human social कार्यकलाप, structures, and functions.
a लक्ष्य लिये many sociologists is to conduct research which may be लागू सीधे to social नीति and welfare, while others फ़ोकस primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes.
विषय matter ranges from the सूक्ष्म level of individual agency and बातचीत to the macro level of systems और the सोशल structure.
The traditional focuses of समाजशास्त्र include social stratification, सोशल class, culture, रेस and ethnicity, gender and कामुकता, social mobility, religion, secularization, law, and deviance.
As all spheres of human activity are प्रभावित by the interplay between social ढांचा and व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी, sociology has gradually expanded its फ़ोकस to further subjects, ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य, चिकित्सा, military and penal संस्थानों, the Internet, environmental sociology, political economy और the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge.
The range of social scientific methods has भी expanded.
Social शोधकर्ताओं draw upon a variety of qualitative and quantitative techniques.
the linguistic and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the विश्लेषण of समाज.
conversely, recent decades have देखी the वृद्धि of नई analytically, mathematically और computationally rigorous techniques, such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis.
समाजशास्त्र चाहिए नहीं be उलझन with various सामान्य social studies पाठ्यक्रम which bear little relation to sociological theory or social science research methodology.
Thunder is the sound caused by lightning.
depending on the nature of the lightning और अलहदा of the listener, thunder can range from a शार्प, loud crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden increase in pressure and तापमान from lightning produces rapid विस्तार of the एयर surrounding and within a bolt of बिजली.
In फेरे, इस विस्तार of एयर creates a sonic shock wave, similar to a सोनिक boom, which produces the sound of thunder, often referred to as a clap, क्रैक, or peal of थंडर.
The distance of the lightning can be गणना by the listener आधारित on the time अंतराल इससे when the lightning is seen to जब the sound is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full Palma de Mallorca, is the प्रमुख नगर and बंदरगाहों on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city of the autonomous community of the balearic Islands in स्पेन.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( नगर of Majorca ) और Ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the Spanish उत्तराधिकार और हैं still used by people in Majorca.
However, the official name was Mallorca, the वही as the island.
It is situated on the दक्षिण coast of the island on the Bay of Palma.
as of the 2009 census, the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर of Palma proper थी 401,270, और the population of the संपूर्ण urban क्षेत्रफल was 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
Almost half of the total population of Majorca live in Palma.
The cabrera Archipelago, though widely अलग from Palma proper, is administratively considered भाग of the municipality.
इसके airport, बेटे सन्त Joan, serves over 22 million passengers प्रत्येक year.
The Marivent राजमहल was offered by the city to the then Prince जुआन Carlos I of Spain.
The royals have since खर्च their summer holidays in Palma.

For other uses, see Luther ( disambiguation ).
Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' luthor is a fictional अक्षर, a supervillain appearing in comic books published by DC Comics.
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has also आइये into conflict साथ Batman और other superheroes in the dc Universe.
Created by Jerry siegel and जो Shuster, the character first appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ).
Luthor is वर्णित as `` a power-mad, दुष्ट scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically center on हत्या Superman, the foremost obstacle to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals.
Despite periodically wearing a powered बहि, Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual पहचान.
the character was originally depicted as a mad वैज्ञानिक who, in the vein of गूदा novels, wreaks havoc on the संसार with his futuristic weaponry.
in his earliest appearances, luthor is दिखाया with a full सिर of रेड hair.
Despite इस, the अक्षर later became hairless as the result of an कलाकार 's mistake.
A 1960 story by जेरी Siegel विस्तारित upon Luthor 's origin and motivations, revealing him to be a childhood friend of सुपरमैन 's जो lost his hair when a fire नष्ट उसके laboratory ; luthor vowed revenge.
following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths, the अक्षर was re-imagined as a Machiavellian industrialist and white-collar criminal, भी briefly serving as President of the United States.
In recent years, various लेखक have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The अक्षर was ranked as the 8th महानतम Villain by Wizard on its 100 Greatest खलनायक of सब समय list.
IGN 's list of the Top 100 कॉमिक Book खलनायक of All Time ranked Luthor as # 4.
Luthor is भी described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic Peter Sanderson, one of a few genre-crossing खलनायक whose adventures take प्लेस `` in a world in which the ordinary कानून of प्रकृति are slightly suspended '' ; वर्ण ऐसे as प्राध्यापक Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, Doctor Doom, and Darth Vader, also अनुरूप इस वर्णन.
Martin Luther King, Jr. दिन is a United States federal अवकाश marking the birthday of रेव. dr. Martin Luther किंग, Jr.
It is observed on the तीसरा Monday of January प्रत्येक साल, which is around the time of King 's birthday, January 15.
the floating holiday is similar to छुट्टियाँ set under the वर्दी Monday Holiday Act, though the act predated the establishment of मार्टिन Luther किंग, Jr. दिन by 15 years.
किंग थी the chief spokesman लिये nonviolent सक्रियता in the civil rights गति, जिससे successfully protested racial discrimination in संघीय and state law.
The campaign for a federal holiday in किंग 's honor began जल्द after उसके assassination in 1968.
Ronald Reagan हस्ताक्षरित the holiday into law in 1983, and it थी first observed on January 20, 1986.
At first, some राज्य resisted observing the अवकाश as such, giving it alternative names or combining it with other holidays.
It थी officially observed in सब 50 states for the first समय in 2000.

as it 's automatic and instant, the उपयोक्ता does नहीं have to उपयोग a cable or removable media to connect to a personal computer.
A कैमरा phone is a मोबाईल phone which is समर्थ to कैप्चर स्टिल photographs ( and usually video ).
चूंकि early in the 21st सदी the majority of मोबाईल phones in उपयोग are कैमरा फोन.
Most कैमरा phones हैं simpler than पृथक digital कैमरे.
Their usual fixed फ़ोकस lenses और छोटी sensors सीमा their प्रदर्शन in poor lighting.
Lacking a physical शटर, सबसे have a long shutter lag.
Flash, where present, is usually weak.
Optical zoom and tripod screws are rare.
कुछ also कमी a usb connection, removable memory कार्ड, or other way of transferring their pictures more जल्दी than by the phone 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the more expensive camera फोन have only a few of these technical disadvantages, which लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट conditions and in कोई case have not inhibited their widespread use.
Most मॉडल lines improve in these regards every year or two.
कुछ, such as the droid Incredible तभी have a menu choice to start an अनुप्रयोग कार्यक्रम to activate the camera.
Others, ऐसे as the BlackBerry Storm 2, Droid X, मोटोरोला V980 and Nokia 5800 also have a पृथक camera button लिये quickness और convenience.
Windows Phones can be configured to operate as a कैमरा even if the phone is asleep.
कुछ camera फोन हैं designed to resemble separate low-end digital कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे in रूप और to some extent in सुविधाएँ और चित्र विशेषता, and हैं branded as दोनो mobile phones and cameras, including certain Sony phones.
The प्रिंसिपल advantages of कैमरा phones are cost and compactness ; बेशक for a user who carries a mobile phone anyway, the additional size and cost are negligible.
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile अनुप्रयोग to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging और image stitching.
a few ऊँची समाप्त phones can उपयोग उनके touch screen to direct their कैमरा to focus on a particular object in the field of view, giving even an inexperienced user a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned फ़ोटोग्राफ़र using हस्तचालित focus.
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of कल ? '' is a 1986 comic book स्टोरी featuring the dc कॉमिक्स character of Superman.
Written by Alan Moore साथ help from long-time, और soon to be retiring, Superman editor, Julius schwartz, the story थी published in two parts, शुरूआत in Superman # 423 and ending in Action Comics # 583, both published in September 1986.
The स्टोरी was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan, in his final major contribution to the Superman titles, और was inked by George Pérez in the issue of सुपरमैन and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of कार्रवाई Comics.
the स्टोरी was an imaginary टेल which बताई the फाइनल story of the चांदी Age Superman और his long history, which थी होने rebooted following the कार्यक्रम of Crisis on अनन्त Earths, पहले उसके आधुनिक introduction in the John byrne series, the Man of Steel.
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long इतिहास of the अक्षर and to serve as a complete निष्कर्ष to his mythology.
The स्टोरी is a frame story नियत टेन years बाद Superman was पिछला देखी, जहाँ लोइस Lane recounts the tale of the end of Superman 's career to a रिपोर्टर from the Daily Planet.
Her स्टोरी शामिल numerous violent हमले विरूद्ध Superman by his दुश्मनों, the public revelation of his रहस्य identity of Clark Kent and a number of मौतों of those closest to him.
The स्टोरी has been cited as one of the best stories of the character of सुपरमैन, और critics और audiences frequently चुनें it as one of the most यादगार comics ever published.
It is used as an example of कैसा to close the long-time निरंतरता of a comic किताब character.
The स्टोरी 's विरासत has endured with similar stories written as श्रद्धांजलि to it.
the शीर्षक is a reference to एक of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of Tomorrow, और was used in the title of another सुपरमैन.
the Bugatti Veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, फ़्रांस by Bugatti ऑटोमोबाइल S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन car in the world, with a top speed of.
The original संस्करण रै a top गति of.
It was named Car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme शीर्ष गियर.
The standard Veyron जीती Top Gears Best Car चलित सब Year award in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the world with the Veyron ग्रैंड खेल Vitesse, reaching on average a शीर्ष गति of.
The Veyron 's chief designer थी Hartmut Warkuss, और the exterior was designed by jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the अभियान्त्रिकी work being conducted अंतर्गत the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang schreiber.

`` At the पिछला Supper, on the रात्रि he थी गद्दारी, हमारी Savior instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body और Blood. ''
( Catechism of the Catholic Church 1323 )
eucharist in the कैथोलिक Church refers to both the जश्न of the द्रव्यमान, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, and the bread and वाइन which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and रक्त of यीशु Christ, Lord and God, a घोषणा formulated by the परिषद of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this.
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional पद used in the Roman कैथोलिक Church to refer to the eucharistic species ( the Body and रक्त of Christ ).

A short स्टोरी is a brief work of literature, usually written in narrative prose.
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th century, the short story रै grown to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy आसान characterization.
at its most prototypical the छोटी story features a छोटी cast of named वर्ण, and focuses on a self-contained incident साथ the intent of evoking a `` सिंगल effect '' or mood.
In so doing, short stories मेक use of plot, resonance, and अन्य dynamic components to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote, yet to a far lesser degree than a novel.
While the छोटी स्टोरी is largely पृथक from the novel, authors of both generally draw from a आम pool of literary तकनीकों.
Short stories have no नियत length.
in terms of word count there is no official demarcation between an किस्सा, a short story, and a novel.
Rather, the form 's parameters are given by the rhetorical और practical context in जिससे a given story is उत्पादित and considered, so कि what constitutes a छोटी story may differ between genres, countries, eras, और टीकाकारों.
Like the अनोखा, the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the available markets for publication, और the evolution of the रूप seems closely tied to the evolution of the publishing industry and the सबमिशन guidelines of its constituent houses.
The short story has been माना both an apprenticeship form preceding अधिक lengthy works, और a crafted form in इसके own right, collected साथ in किताबे of similar length, price, और वितरण as novels.
Short story writers may define their works as भाग of the artistic and personal expression of the form.
They may also attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed रूप.
