the raccoon (, procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, भी ज्ञात as the आम raccoon, North American raccoon, northern raccoon and colloquially as coon, is a medium-sized mammal देशी to North अमेरिका.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid परिवार, having a body length of and a body weight of.
Its grayish कोट ज़्यादातर consists of dense underfur which insulates against cold weather.
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive सुविधाएँ हैं its अत्यधिक dexterous front paws और its facial मुखौटा, जिससे are विषयवस्तु in the mythology of अनेक Native American tribes.
Raccoons are विख्यात for their intelligence, with studies प्रर्दशित that they हैं समर्थ to remember the solution to tasks for up to तीन सालो.
The आहार of the omnivorous raccoon, which is usually nocturnal, consists of about 40 % invertebrates, 33 % संयंत्र foods, and 27 % vertebrates.
The असली habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and mixed forests, but due to their adaptability वे have विस्तारित their range to mountainous areas, तटीय marshes, and urban areas, where some homeowners consider them to be पीड़कों.
As a परिणाम of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century, raccoons are now also वितरित across the यूरोपीय mainland, the Caucasus प्रदेश and Japan.
हालांकि previously विचार to be एकान्त, वहीँ is now प्रमाण that raccoons engage in gender-specific सोशल behavior.
Related females often share a आम area, while unrelated males सजीव साथ in groups of up to four पशु to maintain their positions विरूद्ध विदेशी males during the mating season, और other potential invaders.
घर range sizes vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres ) for females in cities to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies.
बाद a gestation काल of परिचय 65 दिनों, two to five young, ज्ञात as `` kits '', are born in वसन्त.
The kits are subsequently raised by their mother जबतक dispersion in late fall.
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 सालो, उनके average life expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 years.
in many areas, hunting and vehicular injury are the two most आम causes of death.
The 2010 Haiti earthquake थी a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 mw earthquake, साथ an epicenter near the town of Léogâne ( ouest Department ), approximately west of Port-au-Prince, Haiti 's capital.
The earthquake occurred at 16:53 local time ( 21:53 UTC ) on Tuesday, 12 January 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or वृहद had महरूम अंकित.
An estimated three million people यहूद प्रभावित by the quake.
The highest विश्वसनीय death count थी estimated at 220,000.
haitian government estimates यहूद उच्चतर.
The सरकारी of Haiti estimated that 250,000 residences और 30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged.
the earthquake caused major damage in port-au-prince, Jacmel और अन्य settlements in the region.
अनेक notable landmark buildings were significantly क्षतिग्रस्त or destroyed, including the Presidential Palace, the National Assembly building, the Port-au-Prince Cathedral, and the main कारावास.
Among those killed were archbishop of port-au-prince जोसेफ Serge Miot, and विपक्ष leader Micha gaillard.
the मुख्यालय of the United Nations स्थिरीकरण Mission in हैती ( MINUSTAH ), located in the capital, collapsed, killing many, including the Mission 's Chief, Hédi Annabi.
Many countries responded to appeals लिये humanitarian aid, pledging funds and dispatching rescue और medical teams, engineers and support personnel.
Communication systems, air, land, and sea transport facilities, hospitals, and electrical networks had महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त by the earthquake, जिससे hampered rescue और सहायता efforts ; भ्रम over जो was in charge, air traffic जमघट, and समस्याएं with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work.
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were अभिभूत with tens of thousands of bodies.
ये had to be buried in द्रव्यमान graves.
As rescues tailed बंद, supplies, चिकित्सा care and स्वच्छता became प्राथमिकताएं.
Delays in सहायता distribution led to angry appeals from aid workers and survivors, and लूटने and sporadic हिंसा were observed.
On 22 January the United राष्ट्र noted कि the emergency phase of the relief operation was drawing to a बंद, and on the following day the Haitian सरकारी officially पुकारा off the search for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse, originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by Walter R. Brooks, and बाद in an American टेलीविज़न हालात comedy produced by Filmways कि first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2, 1961, and then on CBS इससे अक्तूबर 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
The stars of the show were Mister ed, a palomino horse who could `` talk '', played by gelding Bamboo harvester और voiced by former Western स्टार Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire length of the series ), and his मालिक, an eccentric and enormously klutzy, yet friendly, वास्तु named Wilbur Post ( एलन Young ).
Much of the program 's humor stemmed from the फैक्ट Mister ed होता speak only to Wilbur, as खूब as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
अन्य कार्यशील jokes centered on Wilbur 's character being a विशाल klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or others.
according to the दिखाएँ 's producer, Arthur lubin, यंग was चुनी as the lead character because he `` just लगा जैसे the sort of guy a horse would talk to ''.
Lubin, a friend of Mae West, scored a coup by persuading the स्क्रीन icon to guest star in one episode.
In the संयुक्त States, reruns aired on उपनाम at Nite इससे March 3, 1986, to February 1, 1993.
Sister station TV Land also reran the show from 1996–98 and again from 2003-06.
The series is currently broadcast प्रत्येक morning on This TV, along साथ Highway पैट्रोल, और The Patty Duke Show.
It is also फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on Hallmark Movie चैनल.
as of January 1, 2011, the पहला two सीज़न of the दिखाएँ हैं available on Hulu.
The Rapture is a पद in ईसाई eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, when the `` dead in Christ '' and `` we जो are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to मिलें `` the Lord in the एयर ''.
The term `` rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at तनिक two senses.
In the pre-tribulation view, a समूह of लोगों होगा be left behind on धरती after another group वस्तुतः leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air. ''
This is now the most आम use of the पद, especially among fundamentalist ईसाइयों and in the United States.
The अन्य, older use of the पद `` rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final resurrection generally, without a belief that a group of लोगों is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation काल after the कार्यक्रम of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
This भेद is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in धार्मिक education, but might use the पुरानी और more सामान्य sense of the word `` rapture '' in referring to कया happens during the final resurrection.
There are many views among ईसाइयों regarding the timing of मसीह 's return ( सहित whether it will occur in एक इवेंट or two ), और विभिन्न views regarding the गंतव्य of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4.
Denominations such as Roman Catholics, परंपरागत Christians, Lutheran ईसाइयों, और reformed Christians believe in a rapture only in the sense of a general final resurrection, when मसीह returns a सिंगल time.
They do not believe that a समूह of people is बाएँ पीछे on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was विकसित in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby और the Plymouth brethren, and popularized in the संयुक्त States in the early 20th सदी by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible.
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born फ़रवरी 6, 1985 ) is an American professional basketball player with the ब्रुकलीन Nets.
the Philistine cities of गाजा, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Ekron, and gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, Plištim ), Pleshet or peleset, were a people who as part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the दक्षिणी coastal area of Canaan at the शुरूआत of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 bc ), सबसे probably from the ईजियन region.
according to the बाइबल, they ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine pentapolis '' ) of Gaza, Ashkelon, Ashdod, Ekron and Gath, इससे Wadi Gaza in the दक्षिण to the Yarqon River in the उत्तर, but with no fixed border to the east.
the बाइबल paints उन्हें as the किंगडम of Israel 's most खतरनाक enemy.
originating somewhere in the Aegean, their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC, rising to a शिखर of 30,000 in the 11th century bc, of which the Aegean element थी नहीं more than half the total, and perhaps much less.
Nothing is ज्ञात for certain about the original language or languages of the Philistines, however they were not part of the Semitic canaanite population.
वहीँ is कुछ सीमित प्रमाण in पक्ष of the assumption that the philistines were Indo-European-speakers either from Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor.
Philistine-related words found in the बाइबल are नहीं Semitic, and can in some cases, with reservations, be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots.
By the beginning of the 1st मिलेनियम BCE they था adopted the general Canaanite language of the region.
The Armed Services Vocational योग्यता Battery ( asvab ) is a अनेक चुनाव test, administered by the United States Military Entrance Processing Command, प्रयुक्त to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States हथियारबंद forces.
It is often offered to American ऊँची school students when they are in the 10th, 11th and 12th grade, though anyone eligible लिये enlistment may लो it.
Although the test is administered by the सैन्य, it is not ( और never रै महरूम ) a requirement कि a test-taker साथ a qualifying score enlist in the armed शक्तियां.
In वित्तीय accounting, a balance sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole बंदोबस्त, a business partnership, a corporation or अन्य कारोबार संगठन, such as an llc or an LLP.
Assets, liabilities and ownership equity are listed as of a specific date, ऐसे as the end of its financial year.
a संतुलन चादर is often वर्णित as a `` स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी 's financial कंडीशन ''.
Of the चार मौलिक financial statements, the संतुलन sheet is the तभी बयान which applies to a single point in समय of a business ' calendar year.
A standard company balance चादर has तीन parts : एसेट, liabilities and ownership equity.
the प्रमुख categories of assets are usually सूचीबद्ध पहला, and typically in अनुक्रम of liquidity.
एसेट हैं followed by the liabilities.
The difference between the assets और the liabilities is known as इक्विटी or the net assets or the जाल worth or capital of the company and according to the accounting equation, net worth जरूर बराबर एसेट ऋण देनदारी.
another way to dekh at the same equation is कि assets equals देनदारी प्लस owner 's इक्विटी.
looking at the समीकरण in this way shows how assets यहूद financed : either by उधार money ( liability ) or by using the owner 's money ( मालिक 's equity ).
Balance sheets are usually प्रस्तुत with assets in one section and liabilities and जाल लायक in the other section with the two sections `` balancing. ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing the संपूर्ण बैंको balance at the समाप्त of the period, plus any नकदी in हाथ.
However, many व्यवसायों are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment.
In other शब्द : businesses have एसेट and so वे can नहीं, भी if वे want to, immediately turn ये into cash at the समाप्त of each period.
Often, ये व्यवसायों owe धन to आपूर्तिकर्ता and to कर authorities, और the proprietors do नहीं withdraw all their original पूंजी and profits at the end of प्रत्येक period.
In other words businesses also have liabilities.
.17 Hornady Magnum rimfire, commonly known as the.17 HMR, is a rimfire rifle cartridge developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002.
It descended इससे the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 Magnum case to take a.17 caliber ( 4.5 mm ) bullet, and it is अधिक costly to shoot than traditional.22 caliber rimfire कारतूस.
Commonly loaded with a 17 अनाज ( 1.1 g ) गोली, it can deliver muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The schaumburg flyers यहूद a पेशेवर baseball team based in Schaumburg, Illinois, in the United States.
the Flyers were to be a charter member of the उत्तर American League, which is not संबद्ध with Major League Baseball, however, the टोली folded in March 2011, पहले वे began play in the nal.
From the 1999 season to the 2010 ऋतु, the flyers played their घर खेल at alexian Field, निकट the एल्गिन O'Hare Expressway.
The team formerly निभाई in Thunder खाड़ी, ओंटारियो, where वे were ज्ञात as the Thunder Bay whiskey jacks.
The team थी originally a सदस्य of the Northern League इससे 1993 to 2010.
on July 27, 2009, the Flyers played host to Battle of the लिंगों II, जिससे pitted the Flyers against the National Pro fastpitch Softball Champions, the Chicago Bandits.
निभाई by official softball नियम, the game was seen by an overflow record crowd of 8,918, और was won by the Bandits 4-2.
In 1999, the Flyers hired their पहला manager, Ron Kittle.
kittle is best known for his playing days साथ the Chicago White Sox, and former Chicago Cubs and White Sox खिलाड़ी Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach.
During the early years of the franchise, Kittle did a series of TV commercials to promote the team, using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle. '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma. ''
The ads यहूद successful at sparking some आरंभिक interest in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal away fans इससे the nearby Kane County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the highly कामयाब converse ads जहाँ Larry जॉनसन स्ट्रक्चर as both खुद and `` gramama. ''
At the end of the 2001 season, however, kittle resigned from उसके managerial position, और जिम Boynewicz was hired to replace उसे.
In 2004, the Flyers made it to the Northern League Championship Series विरूद्ध the st. पॉल Saints.
Despite अग्रणी the five-game श्रेणी 2-1, Schaumburg eventually lost the series.
In खेल 5, Flyers relief पिचर Lyle Prempas allowed a खेल winning ग्रैंड slam by St. पॉल infielder मार्क Mirizzi in the ninth inning.
The flyers appeared in the Northern लीग playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) लकिन never जीती the चैंपियनशिप.
Some famous players who निभाई लिये the flyers were former Oakland a 's outfielder Ozzie canseco and पूर्व शिकागो शावक outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी film and थिएटर अभिनेत्री और पूर्व fashion मॉडल.
वाइज़ began her acting करियर at Trinity Hall, Cambridge in the early 1990s, then started working in television, appearing in Inspector Morse, the British mini-series Scarlet and ब्लैक, and the television film Advocates II.
She made her film début in the फिल्मी मौत यंत्र ( 1994 ), but her breakthrough role आए in the फिल्मी Chain प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ), अग्रणी to a high-profile role as एवलिन Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ).
Other notable films featuring Weisz are दुश्मन at the Gates, About a Boy, constantine, The फव्वारा and The Constant Gardener, for which she received an Academy Award, a Golden Globe and a Screen Actors ' Guild award लिये उसके supporting role as Tessa quayle.
वो has been labelled an `` अंग्रेज़ी rose '' since her minor भूमिका in चोरी Beauty ( 1996 ).
वाइज़ भी works in theatre.
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of noël Coward 's play डिज़ाइन for जीना, जिससे earned उसके the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar Warehouse उत्पादन of Tennessee Williams ' Suddenly, Last Summer, and their 2009 revival of a Streetcar Named ख्वाहिश.
Her portrayal of blanche DuBois in the latter play अर्जित her the Critics ' वृत्त थिएटर Award for बेहतरीन Actress.
वो has recently निभाई Evanora in Oz the ग्रेट और Powerful.
The American सिविल War ( ACW ), also ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the States or simply the सिविल War ( देखिए naming ), थी a सिविल war fought इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` संघ '' or the `` North '' ) और अनेक Southern slave states that घोषित their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its उत्पत्ति in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of खूनी कॉम्बैट that left over 600,000 soldiers dead और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
lincoln जीती, but before his inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave राज्य formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित his administration would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states continued to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession.
confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a सलाम सम्मेलन failed to find a compromise, और both sides prepared for war.
The confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` कि they would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the new Confederate राज्य of America.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण Carolina.
Lincoln called for प्रत्येक राज्य to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, चार more स्लेव states joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
the Union soon controlled the किनारा states and स्थापित a नवल blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the पतझड़ 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of antietam, dissuading British हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
to the west, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the Confederate river navy, तब much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of सब Union सेना in 1864.
in the Western Theater, विलियम T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy इससे all दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army विफल, अग्रणी to Lee 's surrender to Grant at appomattox अदालत हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil युद्ध थी one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies सब foreshadowed World युद्ध I.
it remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers और an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
Historian जॉन Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 years बूढ़ा, और 30 percent of सब Southern white males aged 18–40.
Potato bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the regular wheat flour.
it is cooked in a किस्में of methods, including by baking it on a hot griddle or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, and may have a variety of other संघटक baked into it.
The ratio of potato to wheat flour varies significantly from रेसिपी to रेसिपी, with कुछ व्यंजनों having a majority of potato, and others having a majority of गेहूं flour.
Some recipes कॉल for mashed आलू, साथ others calling for dehydrated potato flakes.
It is available as a commercial product in many देशों, with similar variations in संघटक, cooking method, and other परिवर्तनीय.
the Pacific Time Zone observes standard time by subtracting आठ hours from समन्वित Universal Time ( ).
The clock समय in this zone is आधारित on the औसत solar time of the 120th meridian west of the ग्रीनविच Observatory.
During daylight saving time, इसके time offset is.
In the संयुक्त States and Canada, this time zone is generically पुकारा प्रशांत Time ( PT ).
specifically, it is Pacific मानक समय ( PST ) when observing standard time ( winter ), और Pacific daylight Time ( पीडीटी ) when observing daylight छायांकन time ( summer ).
सबसे of Canada uses daylight saving समय.
In Mexico the UTC−8 समय मण्डल is known as the उत्तरपश्चिम Zone, which is synchronized साथ the u.S. PDT daylight saving schedule.
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone is Los Angeles in California इससे यूएसए ; the city 's महानगर area is the largest in the zone.
the zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska समय मण्डल, one घंटा पीछे the Mountain Time Zone and three hours behind the पूर्वी समय Zone.
Stereo 8, commonly known as the eight-track cartridge, eight-track tape, or simply eight-track, is a magnetic tape ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग technology.
It was popular in the संयुक्त राज्य from the mid-1960s through to the early 1980s, but was relatively unknown in many European countries.
It थी, however, very popular in the United Kingdom दौरान इस period.
स्टीरियो 8 थी created in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill Lear of Lear जेट Corporation, along with Ampex, Ford मोटर Company, General Motors, Motorola, और RCA Victor Records ( RCA ).
It was a further development of the similar Stereo-Pak four-track cartridge निर्मित by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz.
a बाद quadraphonic version of the स्वरूप थी announced by आरसीए in April 1970 and first known as Quad-8, then later changed to बस Q8.
रामेसेस ii ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 bc ; मिश्र :, alternatively transcribed as Rameses and ramses or ), referred to as Ramesses the ग्रेट, was the third Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 BC ) of the Nineteenth dynasty.
he is प्रायः regarded as the greatest, most मनाये, and most powerful pharaoh of the मिश्र Empire.
उसके successors and later Egyptians called him the `` ग्रेट Ancestor. ''
Ramesses II led several military रिझाने into the Levant, re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan.
He भी led expeditions to the दक्षिण, into नुबिया, commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-wali and gerf Hussein.
At age fourteen, Ramesses थी appointed Prince Regent by his पिता Seti i.
He is believed to have लिया the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled मिश्र from 1279 BC to 1213 bc लिये 66 years and 2 months, according to both Manetho and Egypt 's समकालीन historical records.
He was एकबार said to have lived to be 99 सालो old, but it is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year.
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 bc as सबसे Egyptologists today believe, he would have assumed the throne on may 31, 1279 BC, आधारित on his known accession date of III Shemu दिन 27.
Ramesses II मनाये an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the पहला held after thirty सालो of a pharaoh 's reign, and then every तीन years ) during his reign—more than कोई other pharaoh.
On his मौत, he was buried in a tomb in the घाटी of the किंग्स ; his body was later moved to a royal cache where it was discovered in 1881, और is now on display in the कायरो Museum.
The early part of his शासनकाल was केन्द्रित on भवन cities, temples and monuments.
He स्थापित the city of pi-ramesses in the Nile Delta as his new capital and main base लिये his अभियान in Syria.
This city was निर्मित on the remains of the city of Avaris, the capital of the Hyksos जब वे took over, and was the location of the main Temple of नियत.
He is also known as ozymandias in the Greek sources, from a transliteration into Greek of a part of रामेसेस 's सिंहासन नाम,, `` Ra 's mighty truth, chosen of Ra ''.
the Texas Rangers हैं a professional baseball team स्तिथ in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, based in Arlington, Texas.
The Rangers franchise is currently a member of the Western Division of Major League Baseball 's अमरीकी League.
चूंकि, the रेंजरों have निभाई in Rangers Ballpark in आर्लिंगटन in आर्लिंगटन, Texas.
the team 's name is borrowed from the famous law enforcement एजेंसी of the same नाम.
The franchise was established in 1961 by the नाम of the वॉशिंगटन Senators, an expansion team awarded to वॉशिंगटन, d.C., after the city 's पहला ballclub, the original Washington Senators, moved to Minnesota and became the Twins.
After the ऋतु, the new सीनेटरों moved to Arlington, Texas, और debuted as the Rangers the following spring.
The टेक्सास रेंजरों Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason, all following division championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the Rangers उन्नत past the Division श्रेणी for the first time, defeating the Tampa Bay Rays.
टेक्सास then brought home उनके first American League Pennant after beating the New यॉर्क Yankees in six games.
In the 2010 संसार Series, the मताधिकार 's पहला, the Rangers fell to the San Francisco Giants in five खेल.
Their लोन victory made them the first टेक्सास team to win a World Series game, the Houston Astros having been swept in their 2005 संसार श्रेणी appearance.
They repeated as अमरीकी League champions the following year, तब lost the 2011 World Series to the St. लुई Cardinals in सात games.
Gaius Julius Caesar (, जुलाई 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) थी a Roman general, statesman, Consul and notable लेखक of Latin गद्य.
he निभाई a critical role in the events कि led to the demise of the Roman Republic and the वृद्धि of the रोमन Empire.
In 60 bc, सीज़र, crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance कि was to dominate Roman राजनीती लिये several years.
Their कोशिशें to amass शक्ति through populist tactics were opposed by the conservative elite within the रोमन सीनेट, among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero.
Caesar 's conquest of gaul, समाप्त by 51 BC, विस्तारित Rome 's territory to the अंग्रेज़ी चैनल and the Rhine.
Caesar became the पहला Roman सामान्य to cross both when he built a bridge across the Rhine और conducted the first आक्रमण of Britain.
ये उपलब्धियाँ granted him बेमेल सैन्य power and threatened to ग्रहण the standing of Pompey, who had realigned himself with the Senate after the death of Crassus in 53 BC.
साथ the gallic युद्धों concluded, the Senate ordered सीज़र to lay down his military कमांड and वापसी to Rome.
सीज़र refused, and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing the Rubicon with a legion, leaving उसके province and illegally entering Roman territory under arms.
Civil war resulted, from जिससे he emerged as the unrivaled leader of Rome.
बाद assuming control of government, Caesar began a कार्यक्रम of social and governmental reforms, including the सृष्टि of the जूलियन calendar.
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and थी आखिरकार proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity ''.
लकिन the underlying राजनैतिक conflicts had not been resolved, और on the Ides of March ( 15 कूच ) 44 BC, Caesar थी assassinated by a समूह of senators led by मार्कस Junius ब्रूटस.
A new series of civil wars broke out, और the constitutional सरकारी of the Republic थी never restored.
Caesar 's adopted वारिस Octavian, बाद known as augustus, rose to sole power, and the era of the Roman साम्राज्य began.
Much of सीज़र 's जीवन is known from his own खाते of his military campaigns, और इससे other contemporary sources, mainly the letters and भाषणों of सिसरो and the historical writings of Sallust.
The later biographies of Caesar by Suetonius and प्लूटार्क are also प्रमुख sources.
Caesar is deemed to be एक of the greatest military commanders of इतिहास.
Linguistic मैप of Nigeria, Cameroon, and Benin.
Sign in English, outside the University of लागोस
There are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The प्रमुख languages are Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Edo, fulfulde, कनूरी, and ibb.
the official language of सीरियल, English, the former औपनिवेशिक language, was chosen to सुकर the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the देश 's urban elite, and is नहीं widely बोला in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries जनसांख्यिकी.
सीरियल 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a पूरे, encompassing तीन प्रमुख African languages families : afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and niger–congo.
Nigeria also has अनेक as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, such as Cen tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी greater विविधता prior to the spread of the current भाषा परिवारों.
daucus carota ( आम names शामिल जंगली carrot, ( UK ) bird 's nest, bishop 's फीता, and Queen Anne 's lace ( उत्तर America ) ) is a flowering plant in the family Apiaceae, native to temperate regions of Europe, southwest Asia and naturalised to North अमेरिका और Australia.
domesticated carrots are cultivars of a subspecies, daucus carota subsp. sativus.
In the संयुक्त States, the title of federal न्यायधीश प्रायः means a judge नियुक्त by the President of the United States और confirmed by the संयुक्त States Senate pursuant to the नियुक्ति Clause in आलेख ii of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the परम् Court of the संयुक्त States, whose existence and some aspects of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार are परे the संवैधानिक power of Congress to alter, acts of कॉंग्रेस have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over अलग regions of the संयुक्त राज्य, and 94 United States ज़िला courts.
Every judge appointed to such a अदालत may be categorized as a संघीय न्यायधीश ; ऐसे positions include the मुख्य इंसाफ and Associate Justices of the परम् अदालत, सर्किट Judges of the न्यायालयों of appeals, और district judges of the United राज्य district courts.
All of ये judges वर्णित यूँ दूर are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' क्युकी they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal सरकारी by Article iii of the U.S. Constitution.
In जोड, judges of the Court of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal न्यायालयों, including मजिस्ट्रेट judges and दिवालियापन judges, are भी sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, वे are neither appointed by the President nor पुष्टि by the Senate, और their power derives from Article i बजाय.
देखिए आलेख I and Article III tribunals.
Nelly किम Furtado ( born December 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई singer, songwriter and actress.
वो has sold 20 लाख albums विश्वव्यापी and more 20 लाख singles, bringing her total sales to over 40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around the world.
फ़र्टाडो first gained कीर्ति साथ उसके debut album, Whoa, नेल !
, which spawned दो successful singles, `` I 'm जैसे a Bird `` और `` Turn Off the Light ``. ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno पुरस्कार for सिंगल of the Year और a 2002 Grammy Award for Best मादा पॉप Vocal प्रदर्शन.
In 2003, Furtado released लोकगीत, which उत्पादित three international singles— `` Powerless ( Say What You Want ) ``, `` Try `` and `` Força ``.
Three years बाद she released Loose, a विश्वव्यापी commercial कामयाबी.
The एल्बम शाखित चार number-one hits : `` Promiscuous ``, `` Maneater ``, `` Say it Right `` and `` सब Good Things ( आइये to an समाप्त ) ``.
After a three-year ब्रेक, she released her first full-length Spanish album, mi Plan, and Furtado प्राप्त a लैटिन ग्रैमी for Best Female पॉप गायन Album.
In 2012, फ़र्टाडो 's fourth English-language studio एल्बम, The स्पिरिट Indestructible was released.
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous पुरस्कार और accolades, including 2 Grammy Awards, 10 juno Awards, 3 MuchMusic Video Awards और a star on Canada 's Walk of कीर्ति.
Creatures of the रात्रि is the tenth studio एल्बम by Kiss.
It is the बैंड 's last एल्बम लिये Casablanca Records, the तभी label the समूह had कभी recorded for at कि point.
The album was समर्पित to the मेमोरी of कासाब्लांका founder and early Kiss supporter neil Bogart, who had died of cancer during the रिकॉर्डिंग सत्र.
It is also the band 's last album recorded साथ इक्का Frehley credited as an आधिकारिक member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ), और its first एल्बम with Vinnie Vincent as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( विंसेंट would बाद be credited, लकिन not featured pictorially on the कवर, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
Touch is a निर्णायक means of receiving information.
इस फ़ोटो shows tactile markings identifying stairs for visually impaired लोगों.
The somatosensory प्रणाली is a विविध sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to उपज the sensory modalities such as touch, temperature, proprioception ( देह position ), and nociception ( पीड़ा ).
The संवेदी receptors कवर the स्किन and epithelia, skeletal मांसपेशियां, bones और joints, internal organs, and the cardiovascular system.
While टच is considered एक of the पाँच traditional होश, the impression of टच is formed from several modalities.
In medicine, the colloquial पद `` touch '' is usually replaced with `` somatic senses '' to बेहतर प्रतिबिंबित the किस्में of mechanisms involved.
Somatic होश are sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses, with the समझना कि somesthesis includes टच, proprioception and ( depending on usage ) भी haptic perception.
The प्रणाली reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of information from the receptors गुजरता via sensory nerves through tracts in the स्पाइनल cord and into the दिमाग.
Processing primarily occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory area in the parietal पालि of the cerebral cortex.
The cortical homunculus was devised by Wilder Penfield.
At its simplest, the system works when activity in a संवेदी neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus ऐसे as heat ; this signal eventually passes to an क्षेत्रफल in the दिमाग uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be लगा at the correct location.
the point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the brain is called a homunculus and is अनिवार्य in the सृष्टि of a देह image.
इस brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) map is not immutable, however.
नाटकीय shifts can occur in response to stroke or injury.
magnolia is a विशाल genus of about 210 flowering संयंत्र species in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family magnoliaceae.
It is नामित after फ्रेंच botanist पियरे Magnol.
magnolia is an ancient genus.
Appearing पहले bees किया, the flowers evolved to encourage pollination by beetles.
To avoid क्षति इससे pollinating भृंग, the carpels of Magnolia flowers are extremely tough.
Fossilised नमूनों of Magnolia acuminata have been मिला dating to 20 million years पहले, and of plants identifiably belonging to the magnoliaceae डेटिंग to 95 लाख years ago.
another aspect of Magnolias that is माना to represent an ancestral state is कि the flower bud is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated और पुकारा tepals rather than पृथक sepals and petals.
magnolia shares the tepal characteristic साथ several other flowering पौधे near the base of the flowering संयंत्र lineage ऐसे as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently निकला पौधे such as Lilium ).
The प्राकृतिक दायरा of Magnolia प्रजाति is a disjunct distribution, with a main केन्द्र in ईस्ट and southeast Asia और a द्वितीयक centre in eastern North अमेरिका, Central America, the वेस्ट Indies, and कुछ species in South America.

`` श्वेत Christmas '' is an Irving बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned Christmas setting.
According to the गिनीज Book of World रिकॉर्ड, the version sung by Bing Crosby is the best-selling single of all time, with अनुमानित sales in excess of 50 million नक़ल worldwide.
Accounts vary as to when and where Berlin wrote the song.
One स्टोरी is that he wrote it in 1940, in गरम La quinta, California, while staying at the La Quinta Hotel, a frequent हॉलीवुड retreat also favored by writer-producer फ़्रैंक capra, हालांकि the Arizona biltmore also claims the सोंग थी written there.
he often ठहरे up all रात्रि लिखने — he told his secretary, `` पकड़ें your pen and लो bas this song.
I just wrote the बेहतरीन सोंग i 've ever written — heck, I just लिखा the best सोंग that anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country स्कीइंग ( or XC skiing ) is a form of स्की touring in जिससे participants propel themselves across snow-covered मैदान using skis and poles.
The activity is लोकप्रिय in many places with large snowfields, primarily Northern यूरोपीय, Canada, and अलास्का.
cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing sport family, which includes ski jumping, nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country skiing and ski jumping ), biathlon ( skiing and rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which शामिल मैप navigation साथ snow trails और tracks ).
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of skiing that most resembles prehistoric skiing, विशेषकर when किया in the backcountry.
it is also related to Telemark skiing.
a use tax in संयुक्त States is complementary to sales tax which means, if you ख़रीदे a Taxable product/services without paying any बिक्री कर to vendor, you owe use tax.
You must स्वः assess use tax and अदा it directly to the state where the products were खपत or services were rendered.
Use कर typically is a कर on consumption but if you buy an मद ( without paying sales tax ) and स्टोर it in अपना warehouse initially, उपयोग tax applies to that location जहाँ goods were stored.
बाद on when the final consumption takes place at some अन्य स्थान, you हैं required to pay the अवकल of कर rate to the jurisdiction of परम प्लेस of खपत.
This really means that you do n't have to pay both Sales Tax as well as Use Tax on एक transaction.
it is only one or the other कि you हैं required to अदा on खरीदें of taxable products/services.
If vendor does n't charge any बिक्री tax on इसके invoice तब it is the दायित्व of the buyer to self assess Use कर and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication.
Use Tax is generally charged at the same कर रेट of Sales Tax लकिन in some states the tax रेट is different.
Use tax is भी termed as `` Consumption कर '' or `` उपभोक्ता Use Tax ''.
A उपयोग tax is a type of excise tax levied in the United States by numerous राज्य सरकारें.
it is assessed upon tangible personal प्रॉपर्टी purchased by a resident of the assessing state for use, भंडार, or consumption in that state ( not लिये resale ), regardless of where the खरीदें took place.
if a resident of a state makes a purchase within his home राज्य, full sales tax is सशुल्क at the time of the लेनदेन.
The use कर applies when a निवासी of the assessing राज्य purchases an मद कि is not subject to his home state 's sales कर.
Usually, this is due to out-of-state purchases, as well as ordering वस्तुएं through the mail, by phone, or over the Internet from other states.
The use कर is typically assessed at the same रेट as the sales कर कि would have been owed ( if कोई ) had the वही goods been purchased in the राज्य of residence.
For example, a resident of Massachusetts, with a 6.25 % `` बिक्री and उपयोग tax '' on certain goods and services, purchases non-exempt goods or services in नई हैम्पशायर लिये उपयोग, storage or other खपत in मैसाचुसेट्स.
Under New Hampshire law, the New हैम्पशायर vendor collects no sales taxes on the goods, लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user must still pay 6.25 % of the बिक्री price directly to the विभाग of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use कर.
if the वही goods are खरीदा in a US राज्य कि does collect sales कर लिये such goods at time of खरीदें, whatever taxes were paid by the क्रेता to that state can be deducted ( as a tax credit ) from the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग, storage or खपत in Massachusetts.
With few exceptions, no state 's विक्रेता will charge the native state 's बिक्री कर on goods shipped आउट of state, meaning सब goods ordered इससे out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax.
The क्रेता is therefore required to declare और pay the use कर to his घर state on these ordered goods.
the assessing jurisdiction may make the use tax payable annually, but कुछ states require a मासिक भुगतान.
For example, जहाँ a Vermont resident has नहीं paid at least 6 % sales कर on property brought in for use in the state, वर्मांट law requires filing a कर वापसी ( Form su-452 और payment ) by the 20th day of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late शुल्क, a 5 % penalty प्रति month, to a maximum of 25 %, plus statutory ब्याज on the unpaid tax and दंड.
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit संगठन or governmental agencies, purchases for पुनर्विक्रय in commerce, and purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary कोर्स of कारोबार.
भी note that there are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing lists of विशिष्ट types of goods और services कि are नहीं taxable.
As an उदाहरण of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment of tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased and downloaded over the Internet for installation and use in Massachusetts, regardless of जहाँ it originates.
However, the actual उपयोग of the same software downloaded by a Massachusetts resident to a सर्वर in another state remains a non-taxed `` service ''.
In कंट्रास्ट, Arkansas generally करता not कर anything delivered over the Internet ( such as downloaded तन्त्र or म्यूज़िक ), except VoIP which is specifically पारिभाषित as taxable `` telecommunications services ''.
Software ( pre-written or कस्टम ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered ऑनलाइन, मगर `` custom software for a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` प्रोग्रामिंग services '' even if delivered on a disk.
In most cases, this complexity is part of the underlying बिक्री कर laws ; लकिन while a brick-and-mortar store रै to deal with only the sales कर कानून of इसके own स्थान, remote sellers have to deal with the use tax कानून of many jurisdictions—up to every us state and locality कि प्रकृती उन्हें, if the कम्पनी has a उपस्थिति or `` nexus '' in प्रत्येक state ( as विशाल `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and बेहतरीन Buy do ).
In medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery, pulmonary vein, or pulmonary capillaries, together known as the lung vasculature, leading to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and other symptoms, all of which are exacerbated by exertion.
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease with a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and heart failure.
It was first identified by dr. अर्नस्ट वोन romberg in 1891.
According to the most recent classification, it can be एक of पाँच different types : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or विविध.

sanuk, a प्रभाग of deckers Outdoor निगम, is a footwear brand आधारित in दक्षिणी California.
Sanuk, the Thai word लिये fun, was founded by Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया देशी Jeff kelley when he started making चप्पल आउट of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The पहला उत्पाद created was green carpeted and entitled the `` Fur Real '' after one दूकान owner asked if the novelty sandal was `` For Real. ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores and not the intended surf shops.
The novelty act was followed up by a चन्दन लपेटा in wire जाल, a leopard print संस्करण, and styles बना out of a poncho material in a किस्में of रंगों.
Sanuk has grown to शामिल स्टाइल options for men, women and youth and is distributed आरपार the United States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe, Asia, South अमेरिका और Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle advocating the slogan, `` Smile, Pass it on ! ``.
in computer science, array प्रोग्रामिंग languages ( also ज्ञात as vector or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize परिचालन on scalars to apply transparently to vectors, matrices, and उच्चतर dimensional arrays.
Array प्रोग्रामिंग primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस broad ideas परिचय आंकड़ा manipulation.
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in निश्चित मामले : it is नहीं uncommon to ढूँढें array programming language one-liners that require अधिक than a couple of पृष्ठों of Java कोड.
apl, designed by Ken Iverson, was the पहला प्रोग्रामिंग language to provide array programming capabilities.
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A प्रोग्रामिंग Language '' and not to arrays per se. Iverson 's contribution to rigor and स्पष्टता was probably अधिक important than the simple एक्सटेंशन of dimensions to functions.
In the United States an annuity अनुबंध is created when an insured party, usually an individual, pays a जीवन insurance कम्पनी a single प्रीमियम that will later be वितरित back to the insured party over time.
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time, ऐसे as via fixed payments, जबतक the मौत of the व्यक्ति or व्यक्तियों named in the contract or जबतक a फाइनल date, whichever comes first.
However, the बहुमत of आधुनिक annuity ग्राहक use annuities तभी to accumulate funds फ़्री of income और पूंजी gains कर and to later लो lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life विशेषता.
President Barack Obama.
Barack Obama with his first परम् अदालत nominee, सोनिया Sotomayor.
following is a list of all United राज्य संघीय न्यायाधीशों नियुक्त by President बराक ओबामा दौरान his presidency.
as of April 30, 2013, 187 ओबामा nominees to Article iii judgeships have been पुष्टि by the United राज्य Senate, namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United States, 35 judges to the संयुक्त राज्य courts of appeals and 150 न्यायाधीशों to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations are currently प्रतीक्षारत Senate कार्रवाई.
वहीँ हैं currently 16 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त States ज़िला courts और 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that हैं anticipated to occur before the end of ओबामा 's second term.
Obama has नहीं made कोई recess नियुक्ति to the federal courts.
Obama रै बना two nominations to the United States Court of International Trade, an आलेख III ट्रिब्यूनल.
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United States Court of Federal Claims, an Article I court, to be मुख्य न्यायधीश of that court.

Agency कर्ज़ also ज्ञात as an एजेंसी bond is a security, usually a bond, issued by a U.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these agencies हैं backed but not guaranteed by the US government चूंकि the agencies हैं private entities.
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan Marketing संघ ( sallie Mae ), Federal National Mortgage संघ ( fannie Mae ) और Federal घर Loan Mortgage निगम ( फ्रेडी Mac ).
Agency प्रतिभूति are प्रायः exempt from state और local कर, but not federal tax.
Agency debt is also called an agency security.
The susquehanna भाप Electric Station, a खौलते water reactor.
the reactors हैं located अंदर the rectangular containment इमारतें towards the सामने of the cooling towers.
तीन nuclear-powered American warships, ( top to bottom ) nuclear cruisers uss Bainbridge and USS Long Beach साथ USS Enterprise the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964.
क्रू सदस्यों are spelling out Einstein 's mass-energy equivalence formula E = mc2 on the flight deck.
The रूसी nuclear-powered icebreaker NS yamal on a 1994 joint expedition साथ the NSF.
Nuclear शक्ति is the use of sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate heat and electricity.
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7 % of the संसार 's उर्जा and 13 % of the संसार 's विद्युत, in 2012.
in 2013, the IAEA report कि वहीँ are 437 operational nuclear power रिएक्टरों ( although not all हैं producing electricity ), in 31 countries.
in addition, वहीँ are approximately 140 naval vessels using nuclear propulsion in operation, powered by some 180 reactors.
There is an ongoing बहस about the use of nuclear उर्जा.
proponents, such as the World नाभिकीय Association, the IAEA and Environmentalists for Nuclear उर्जा contend that नाभिकीय power is a चिरस्थायी energy source that reduces carbon emissions.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, such as Greenpeace International and nirs, believe कि नाभिकीय शक्ति poses अनेक खतरे to people and the environment.
नाभिकीय power plant accidents शामिल the Chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ), Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster ( 2011 ), and the तीन Mile Island accident ( 1979 ).
वहीँ have also been कुछ nuclear-powered submarine mishaps.
शोध into safety improvements is continuing और नाभिकीय संलयन, believed to be safer, may be used in the future.
As of 2012, according to the IAEA, worldwide there यहूद 68 civil nuclear power reactors under निर्माण in 15 देशों.
in the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have महरूम extended to 60 years, and plans to build another dozen are अंतर्गत गंभीर विचार.
however, जापानी 's 2011 Fukushima daiichi nuclear विपत्ति prompted a rethink of नाभिकीय energy नीति in many countries.
Germany decided to close all its रिएक्टरों by 2022, and इटली has banned nuclear शक्ति.
Following Fukushima, the International उर्जा एजेंसी halved its estimate of additional nuclear generating क्षमता to be built by 2035.
फोटोग्राफ of the Berlin Wall taken from the West पक्ष.
the Wall was निर्मित in 1961 to prevent East Germans from fleeing from Communism.
It was an iconic प्रतीक of the ठंडा War and its fall in 1989 marked the समाप्त of the War.
the ठंडा युद्ध, प्रायः दिनाँक इससे 1947 to 1991, was a sustained राज्य of राजनैतिक and सैन्य टेंशन between शक्तियां in the Western Bloc, वर्चस्व by the United States साथ NATO among इसके allies, and शक्तियां in the पूर्वी Bloc, dominated by the Soviet Union साथ with the वॉरसॉ Pact.
इस began after the success of their temporary wartime गठबंधन विरूद्ध Nazi Germany, leaving the USSR and the us as two superpowers with profound economic and political differences.
a neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned गति founded by मिश्र, इण्डिया, और Yugoslavia ; इस faction rejected संघ with either the us-led West or the Soviet-led East.
The Cold War थी so नामित क्युकी the दो major powers—each possessing nuclear weapons और thereby threatened साथ mutual assured विनाश —never मिले in direct military कॉम्बैट.
बजाय, in their संघर्ष लिये global influence they engaged in जारी psychological warfare and in regular indirect confrontations through proxy युद्धों.
Cycles of सापेक्ष calm would be followed by high tension, which could have led to world war.
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the कोरियाई युद्ध ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez संकट ( 1956 ), the बर्लिन Crisis of 1961, the Cuban missile crisis ( 1962 ), the वियतनाम War ( 1959–1975 ), the Yom Kippur War ( 1973 ), the सोवियत war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ), the Soviet downing of Korean Air लाइनों Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions, strategic conventional फ़ोर्स deployments, extensive सहायता to client states, espionage, विशाल propaganda campaigns, conventional और nuclear arms races, appeals to न्यूट्रल nations, rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ), और technological competitions ऐसे as the Space Race.
The us और ussr became शामिल in राजनैतिक and सैन्य विरोध in the Third संसार देशों of लैटिन America, Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia.
to alleviate the risk of a potential नाभिकीय war, both sides sought relief of राजनैतिक तनाव through détente in the 1970s.
in the 1980s, the United राज्य increased राजनयिक, सैन्य, and economic pressures on the Soviet Union, at a time when the communist state was already suffering इससे economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the new सोवियत अध्यक्ष Mikhail Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) और glasnost ( `` खुलेपन '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures लिये नेशनल स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in पूर्वी Europe, विशेषकर Poland.
They reached a breaking point जब Gorbachev refused to use Soviet troops to support the faltering सरकारी of East Germany in लेट 1989.
भीतर सप्ताह all the satellite states broke free इससे Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( there was some हिंसा in Romania ).
the pressures escalated अंदर the Soviet Union, जहाँ Communism fell और the USSR थी formally dissolved in late 1991.
the United राज्य remained as the संसार 's only superpower.
The ठंडा युद्ध and its कार्यक्रम have left a significant विरासत, and it is प्रायः referred to in popular culture, especially in media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of नाभिकीय warfare.
pikes Peak State Park is a राज्य park of आयोवा, USA, featuring a bluff overlooking the Upper मिसिसिपी River opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin नदी.
The park is operated by the आयोवा Department of Natural Resources.
It is nearly a हजार acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
The nearest city is McGregor, Iowa.
आयोवा Highway 76 approximately defines its उत्तरी boundary.
It gets its name from the Iowa अवतार of Pikes Peak, a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper Mississippi, और जैसे Pikes Peak in कोलोराडो, is नामित for Zebulon पाइक.
There हैं hiking trails, campgrounds और rv सुविधाएं.
Mountain bikes are permitted in certain portions of the पार्क.
Aside from recreational development, the land in the पार्क was never cleared and to a large extent remains as it थी before the advent of white उपनिवेश.
It is part of a larger जटिल of पार्क, reserves and refuges जिससे शामिल Effigy Mounds नेशनल Monument, the various components of the Yellow River State वन, the enormous Upper Mississippi नदी National Wildlife and Fish शरण and much smaller, much less खूब known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge.
The Northeast Iowa विरासत Trail System is undergoing development, and will connect तत्व of these साइट.
Zac Brown बैंड is an American country/folk band आधारित in Atlanta, Georgia.
the लाइनअप consists of zac भूरा ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( चलाऊ, vocals ), John Driskell Hopkins ( bass guitar, vocals ), coy Bowles ( guitar, keyboards ), क्रिस fryar ( drums ), Clay कुक ( guitar, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and डेनियल de लॉस Reyes ( percussion ).
The band रै toured throughout the United राज्य, सहित a स्लॉट on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival.

बात radio is a radio स्वरूप containing discussion about topical मुद्दे.
सबसे shows are regularly hosted by a single individual, और often विशेषता साक्षात्कार with a number of different अतिथि.
बात radio typically includes an element of listener भागीदारी, usually by प्रसारण सजीव बातचीत between the host and listeners who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show.
श्रोता contributions are usually screened by a show 's निर्माता ( s ) in order to अधिकतम audience ब्याज और, in the case of commercial बात रेडियो, आकर्षित advertisers.
generally, the shows हैं organized into खण्ड, each separated by a pause लिये advertisements ; however, in पब्लिक or non-commercial रेडियो, music is sometimes निभाई in place of commercials to separate the program segments.
Variations of talk radio include रूढ़िवादी talk, hot talk, liberal talk और खेल बात.
जबकि talk radio has historically been associated साथ am/fm, starting around 2005 the technology for internet-based talk-radio shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts.
Now, it is possible for an individual to use a variety of सेवाएं to host an Internet-based talk-radio show without carriage by a परंपरागत रेडियो स्टेशन.
In addition tv programming इससे talk and news outlets ऐसे as BBC, CNN, Bloomberg और Fox are now often available expanding the world of बात रेडियो further.
Talk radio सुनना is अभी enjoyed नहीं only on radios, but a wide variety of other devices and सेवाएं सहित PCs using iTunes, स्टेशन निर्देशिका ऐसे as Tunein, show directory smartphones साथ apps ऐसे as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the family hippidae, containing the following species:
Hippa adactyla Fabricius, 1787
Hippa admirabilis ( thallwitz, 1892 )
hippa alcimede ( De man, 1902 )
Hippa australis Hale, 1927
Hippa carcineutes Holthuis & Manning, 1970
Hippa celaeno ( de Man, 1896 )
hippa granulatus ( Borradaile, 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( Dana, 1852 )
Hippa indica Haig, Murugan & Balakrishnan Nair, 1986
Hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards, 1862 )
Hippa picta ( Heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( Stimpson, 1860 )
hippa testudinaria ( Herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( miers, 1878 )
It is closely सम्बन्धित to the genus Emerita, and species have often been transferred between the two genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially known as the Special Capital प्रदेश of Jakarta ( ), is the capital and largest नगर of Indonesia.
स्तिथ on the northwest coast of Java, जकार्ता is the country 's आर्थिक, cultural और political centre, and with a population of 10,187,595 as of नवम्बर 2011, it is the सबसे populous नगर in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia, and is the तेरहवीं सबसे populated city in the world.
the official metropolitan area, known as jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the आरंभिक syllables of जकार्ता, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi ), is the second largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's उपनगरों still continue beyond it.
जकार्ता is सूचीबद्ध as a वैश्विक city in the 2008 वैश्वीकरण and World शहरों Study समूह and संजाल ( gawc ) शोध.
और has an क्षेत्रफल of.
This area has population of खूब over 28 million, बनाना it one of the संसार 's largest conurbations in terms of क्रमांक of inhabitants.
in 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the संसार 's 200 largest शहरों, a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171.
जकार्ता has grown more rapidly than kuala lumpur, बीजिंग and Bangkok.
Established in the fourth सदी, the नगर became an important व्यापार बंदरगाहों लिये the Kingdom of Sunda.
It was the de facto capital of the डच East Indies ( when it was known as batavia ) और has continued as the capital of इंडोनेशिया since the country 's independence थी declared in 1945.
The नगर is the seat of the ASEAN सचिवालय.
जकार्ता is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport, और tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is कनेक्ट by several intercity and commuter railways, and परोसा by several बस लाइनों running on सुरक्षित busways.
A typical home air कंडीशनिंग window unit.
एयर conditioning is the process of altering the properties of air ( primarily temperature और humidity ) to more favourable शर्तें.
More generally, एयर कंडीशनिंग can refer to any form of technological cooling, हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन, or disinfection कि modifies the कंडीशन of एयर.
an air कंडीशनर ( प्रायः referred to as air con, AC or A/C, and नहीं to be confused साथ the abbreviation for alternating current ) is a major or home appliance, प्रणाली, or mechanism designed to change the air temperature and आर्द्रता within an area ( used लिये cooling and sometimes हीटिंग depending on the air गुण at a दिए समय ).
The cooling is typically किया using a simple प्रशीतन cycle, but sometimes evaporation is used, commonly for comfort cooling in buildings और motor vehicles.
In construction, a पूरा प्रणाली of heating, वेंटिलेशन और एयर कंडीशनिंग is referred to as `` HVAC ``.

dc बात ( styled as dc बात ), is a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio.
the group थी formed in lynchburg, Virginia in 1987 by Toby McKeehan, Michael Tait, and Kevin अधिकतम Smith.
They have released five प्रमुख studio एल्बम together : dc बात ( 1989 ), Nu Thang ( 1990 ), Free at Last ( 1992 ), यीशु Freak ( 1995 ), and Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian म्यूज़िक called DC Talk `` the सबसे लोकप्रिय overtly Christian अधिनियम of all time. ''
In 2000, the group released an EP titled Solo which contained two solo songs from each member.
चूंकि that time, dc बात रै been on an indefinite अंतराल, और the three band सदस्यों have each led solo careers.
They have performed and recorded individual songs together several times during the 2000s, हालांकि the समूह never officially reunited or disbanded.
The समूह 's musical style विकसित significantly throughout उनके career.
Their पहला दो रिलीज, DC Talk और nu Thang, were of the hip hop विधा.
DC बात 's third album, Free at पिछला, भी mainly took influence from the hip hop style, हालांकि their म्यूज़िक began taking on a चट्टान sound.
The तिकड़ी 's पिछला दो albums, Jesus Freak and Supernatural, यहूद predominantly pop rock.
the Bible is a संकलन of अनेक shorter books लिखा at different times और later समवेत into the biblical canon.
All लकिन the shortest of ये books have been divided into अध्याय, generally a page or so in length, चूंकि the early 13th century.
चूंकि the mid-16th century, each chapter has been further divided into `` verses '' of a few छोटी lines or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one श्लोक, as in the मामला of, and sometimes वहीँ is more than one वाक्य in a single श्लोक, as in the मामला of.
As the अध्याय and verse divisions were not भाग of the original texts, they form part of the paratext of the Bible.
The Jewish विभाजन of the Hebrew टेक्स्ट differ at various points from those प्रयुक्त by ईसाइयों.
For उदाहरण, in Jewish tradition, the ascriptions to many Psalms हैं regarded as independent verses, making 116 more verses, whereas the established Christian अभ्यास is to गिनती and number each Psalm ascription साथ with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in अलग places, e.g. in Hebrew bibles is गिने as in ईसाई अनुवाद.
An अनुक्रमणिका ( plural : indexes ) is a list of शब्द or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and associated pointers ( 'locators ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be मिला in a document.
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings will शामिल names of people, places and events, and concepts selected by a person as होने relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book.
The pointers are typically page संख्याएँ, paragraph numbers or section संख्याएँ.
In a पुस्तकालयों catalog the words are authors, titles, subject headings, etc., and the pointers are कॉल numbers.
अंतरजाल ढूंढें engines, such as Google, और full टेक्स्ट searching help provide अभिगम to सूचना but are not as selective as an index, as वे provide non-relevant links, और may मिस relevant सूचना if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect.
In संयुक्त States financial regulation, a संदिग्ध कार्यकलाप report ( or SAR ) is a रपट बना by a financial institution to the Financial अपराधों Enforcement Network ( FinCEN ), an एजेंसी of the United States विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity.

Facebook is an online सोशल नेटवर्किंग service, whose name तना from the colloquial नाम for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by कुछ university administrations in the United राज्य to सहायता students मिलेंगी to know each other.
It थी संस्थापित in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with उसके college roommates and fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin moskovitz and Chris ह्यूजेस.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the संस्थापकों to Harvard students, लकिन was expanded to अन्य कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन क्षेत्रफल, the Ivy League, and Stanford विश्वविद्यालयों.
It gradually added support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य universities before opening to high school students, and आखिरकार to anyone aged 13 और over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years old to become पंजीकृत users of the site.
उपयोक्ता must register पहले using the site, बाद which वे may create a personal प्रोफ़ाइल, add other उपयोक्ता as friends, and एक्सचेंज messages, including automatic सूचनाएं when they update their profile.
additionally, users may जुड़ें common-interest उपयोक्ता groups, organized by workplace, स्कूल or कॉलेज, or other विशेषताएँ, and categorize their friends into lists ऐसे as `` People इससे Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
as of सितंबर 2012, Facebook has over one billion active उपयोक्ता.
According to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता Reports survey, there हैं 7.5 million children under 13 with खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10, violating the साईट 's terms of सेवा.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, and जिम Breyer added $ 1 million of उसके own money to the pot.
a January 2009 Compete.com पढ़ाई ranked Facebook as the most प्रयुक्त social networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment साप्ताहिक included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची, saying, `` How on धरती did we stalk our exes, याद हमारी co-workers ' birthdays, bug हमारी friends, and play a rousing खेल of Scrabulous before फेसबुक ? ''
Critics, such as फेसबुक detox, state कि Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the संयुक्त States, resulting in vast amounts of time lost और प्रोत्साहित आत्ममोह.
Quantcast estimates Facebook रै 138.9 million monthly अद्वितीय U.S. visitors in May 2011.
According to Social मीडिया आज, in अप्रैल 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी had a फेसबुक account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's मार्केट growth started to stall in some regions, with the site खोने 7 million active users in the United States और Canada in may 2011.
Facebook आखिरकार filed for an initial public offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, and थी headquartered in मेनलो Park, California.
Facebook inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक और trading on the NASDAQ on may 18, 2012.
Sulfonamide कार्यात्मक समूह
Hydrochlorothiazide is a sulfonamide and a thiazide.
furosemide is a sulfonamide, लकिन not a thiazide.
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of drugs.
the original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha दवाएँ ) हैं सिंथेटिक antimicrobial agents that contain the sulfonamide समूह.
Some sulfonamides are also devoid of जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas और thiazide diuretics हैं नए drug समूह based on the जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies are common, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
it is important to make a भेद between sulfa drugs और other sulfur-containing दवाएँ and एडिटिव, ऐसे as sulfates and sulfites, which हैं chemically unrelated to the सल्फोनेमाइड group, and do नहीं कारण the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides.

30 सेकेंड to Mars is an American चट्टान band from Los एंजिल्स, formed in 1998.
चूंकि 2007, the बैंड रै consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals, लय गिटार, songwriter ), Shannon leto ( ड्रम, percussion ) और Tomo Miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
Following the प्रस्थान of Matt Wachter ( now of Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007, टिम Kelleher became the bassist for the group, performing live तभी साथ both Jared और Miličević recording bass for स्टुडियो रिकार्डिंग, while Braxton olita ( keyboards ) थी added to the touring lineup in 2009.
Previously, the group भी featured guitarists Solon Bixler ( अभी of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of polaroid चुंबन ).
to date, 30 सेकेंड to मंगल have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ), A Beautiful झूठ ( 2005 ), This is War ( 2009 ) और तीन extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), To the किनारे of the धरती ( 2008 ), और MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' म्यूज़िक has been associated ज़्यादातर with neo-prog, प्रगतिशील metal and post-grunge, लकिन वे have also शामिल भावनाएं, screamo, space rock और synthrock into their music.
They have महरूम compared to गुलाबी Floyd ( who were an influence on their कार्य ) and Tool क्युकी of उनके उपयोग of philosophical और आध्यात्मिक lyrics, concept albums और their use of experimental music.
A क्रिसमस Story is a 1983 American Christmas comedy film based on the short कहानियां and semi-fictional anecdotes of लेखक and raconteur Jean गड़रिये, आधारित on उसके किताब In God We Trust, All Others अदा Cash, साथ some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of सुनहरी Memories.
it was directed by Bob क्लार्क.

New York City Cruise Liner Terminal in Hell 's रसोईघर at 52nd Street.
The नई York Passenger जलयान Terminal ( also known as the Luxury Liner पंक्ति or Manhattan Cruise Terminal or New यॉर्क Cruise Terminal ) is a टर्मिनल लिये ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's वेस्ट side.
The टर्मिनल consists of उत्तर नदी Piers 88, 90, 92 और 94 on the हडसन River between वेस्ट 46th और West 54th Street.
( As a general rule, pier numbers in Manhattan can be determined by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street. )
Ships अभी dock at पियर 88, 90 और 92.
बांध 94 on the उत्तर side is now प्रयुक्त लिये exhibition space.
बांध 86, एकबार used by United राज्य Lines, is now home to the uss Intrepid.
In 2003, the terminal handled 900,000 passengers.
The city is forecasting that 1.5 million will use the terminal by 2017.
The पियर हैं long and apart.
They were पहला completed in 1935 to replace the Chelsea पियर as the city 's लक्ज़री liner terminal.
The new टर्मिनल was built to handle bigger ships that had outgrown the Chelsea पियर.
the piers were renovated in 1970 and हैं currently undergoing another $ 150 million renovation.
The renovated plans call for it to handle three large ships at a time.
In doing renovations, the city is also considering decommissioning बांध 92.
Logo of the नई यॉर्क Cruise terminal.for
दशकों the टर्मिनल was the only ocean-going passenger terminal in New यॉर्क harbor.
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's क्षमता to हैंडल comfortably only three large ships at a time, two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the Cape स्वतंत्रता क्रूज Port खोली in 2004 in bayonne, New Jersey ( used by royal Caribbean Cruise लकीर, Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ), and the ब्रुकलीन Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen मरियम 2 and other ships of the Carnival निगम cruise brands ) खोली in 2006 in Brooklyn, नई यॉर्क.
the वेस्ट Side राजमार्ग takes a छोटी jog east from the पियर to below West 42nd Street because when the terminal was built जमीन had to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer पियर.
the US Army corps of Engineers, who control the waterfront आयाम, would नहीं extend the pierhead line farther into the river, so the city विस्तारित the pier by cutting away at the land.
the city earlier did this for the Chelsea पियर ; however in Chelsea only landfill was taken away.
At the यात्री Terminal actual Manhattan schist was taken away.
From downstream in the नदी
Many major यात्री ships have docked there, including the RMS Queen Mary 2 and स्वतंत्रता of the Seas, पहले the Brooklyn and bayonne terminals खोली.
The SS Normandie caught fire और subsequently capsized at इसके Pier 88 berth during World War II.
The Normandie, renamed USS lafayette, झूठ capsized in the frozen mud at Pier 88 in the शीत of 1942
नॉर्वेजियाई Cruise Line 's soon to be newest ship the Norwegian Breakaway will sail year-round out of the New यॉर्क Passenger जलयान टर्मिनल.
The city होगा खर्च $ 4 million to renovate and उन्नयन the क्रूज terminal to accommodate the जलयान.

Christian right is a term प्रयुक्त in the United States to describe right-wing Christian political समूह that हैं characterized by their strong support of socially conservative policies.
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply उनके understanding of the शिक्षाओं of christianity to politics और पब्लिक नीति by proclaiming the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to use those शिक्षाओं to influence विधि and पब्लिक policy.
In the u.S., the Christian right is an informal coalition formed around a core of evangelical Protestants कि draws `` support from politically conservative catholics, Jews, Mormons, and occasionally secularists '' जो share their goals.
The movement has its roots in American राजनीती going back as दूर the 1940s and has महरूम especially influential since the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, from grassroots activism as well as their फ़ोकस on सोशल मुद्दे and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
the Christian right is notable today for advancing socially रूढ़िवादी positions on issues including स्कूल prayer, stem cell research, homosexuality, निरोधक, abortion, और pornography.
हालांकि the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S., the गति रै been a कुंजी factor in the राजनीती of Canada, the Netherlands, Northern Ireland and Australia, among अन्य.
Far East Movement ( stylized as Far★East गति or abbreviated FM ) is an American हिप हॉप band quartet based in Los Angeles.
the group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ), Prohgress ( जेम्स Roh ), J-Splif ( Jae choung ), and DJ Virman ( virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's पहला claim to कीर्ति थी उनके song `` गोलाकार Round '' प्रदर्शित in the Hollywood movie, The Fast and the Furious : Tokyo बहाव, and इसके subsequent soundtrack, video game और DVD.

lr44 is the आईईसी नामांकन for an alkaline 1.5 volt button कोशिका, commonly used in छोटी LED flashlights, digital thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, घड़ियाँ, toys and laser pointers.
lr44 alkaline cell
The battery nomenclature is पारिभाषित by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्युततकनीकी Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 मानक ( Primary batteries, भाग 3 देखें batteries ).
The अक्षर l indicates the electrochemical system used ; a zinc negative electrode, मैंगनीज dioxide depolarizer और positive electrode, and an alkaline electrolyte.
r44 indicates a round कोशिका 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their अपना part numbers लिये IEC प्रकार lr44 batteries including:
lr44, LR44G, LR44GD, LR44H

4.5-volt, D, C, aa, AAA, AAAA, a23, 9-volt, CR2032 and LR44 बैटरी
अन्य types of batteries are or यहूद made in the R44 आकार.
Formerly, mercury बैटरी were made as button cells ( प्रकार MR44 और NR44 ).
Zinc-air बैटरी type PR44 आवश्यकता एयर to work.
Silver-oxide batteries type sr44 may provide extra क्षमता compared to LR44 types but have slightly अलग voltage characteristics.
प्रदर्शन of a यंत्र meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded with substitution of LR44 types.
