hurricane Katrina was the deadliest और most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season.
it was the costliest natural विपत्ति, as खूब as one of the five deadliest hurricanes, in the history of the United States.
among recorded Atlantic hurricanes, it थी the sixth strongest overall.
At तनिक 1,833 लोगों died in the hurricane और subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest U.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ; total प्रॉपर्टी damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly ट्रिपल the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
hurricane Katrina formed over the बहामा on August 23, 2005 and crossed southern Florida as a मॉडरेट Category 1 hurricane, causing some deaths और flooding there before strengthening rapidly in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
the hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf जल, लकिन weakened before making इसके second landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, अगस्त 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused कठोर destruction along the Gulf coast इससे central Florida to Texas, much of it due to the storm surge.
the most significant number of deaths occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स, Louisiana, which flooded as the levee system catastrophically failed, in अनेक cases hours after the storm had moved inland.
Eventually 80 % of the city और विशाल tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, और the floodwaters lingered लिये weeks.
However, the worst प्रॉपर्टी damage occurred in तटीय क्षेत्रों, such as सब Mississippi beachfront towns, which were flooded over 90 % in घंटों, as boats और casino barges rammed इमारतें, pushing cars and houses अंतर्देशीय, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans हैं माना the worst civil अभियान्त्रिकी disaster in u.S. history and prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the U.S. Army Corps of इंजीनियर्स ( usace ), the designers and builders of the तटबन्ध system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
जिम्मेदारी for the failures और flooding was रखी squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge stanwood डुवल, U.S. District Court, but the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was also an investigation of the प्रतिक्रियाएँ from संघीय, राज्य and local governments, resulting in the इस्तीफा of Federal आपात प्रबन्धन Agency ( FEMA ) director माइकल D. Brown, और of New ऑरलियन्स पुलिस Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent एडी Compass.
Several agencies including the संयुक्त States Coast गार्ड ( USCG ), National hurricane Center ( NHC ), and National Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for उनके actions.
They provided accurate hurricane weather tracking forecasts with sufficient सीसे time.
Even the most insistent appeals from national, राज्य and local पब्लिक officials to residents to evacuate पहले the storm किया not warn that the levees could उल्लंघन और fail.
U.S. debt from 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' and black लाइनों indicate the कुल national debt or gross public debt.
the difference is the `` intragovernmental कर्ज़, '' which includes दायित्वों to government programs ऐसे as Social Security.
stated as a formula, नेशनल कर्ज़ = Debt held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt.
The second फलक shows the दो debt figures as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar मान of U.S. आर्थिक उत्पादन लिये that year ).
The top panel is deflated so every साल is in 2010 डॉलर.
the United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United राज्य through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal सरकारी agencies.
US public debt consists of दो components:
कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक includes राजकोष securities held by investors outside the संघीय सरकारी, including that held by individuals, corporations, the संघीय आरक्षित System and विदेशी, state and local governments.
Debt आयोजित by government खाते or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury प्रतिभूति held in accounts administered by the federal government कि are owed to कार्यक्रम beneficiaries, ऐसे as the Social सुरक्षा Trust निधि.
कर्ज़ आयोजित by government accounts represents the संचयी surpluses, including interest earnings, of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a परिणाम of the सालाना एकीकृत budget deficit or surplus.
The संघीय government budget deficit or surplus is the अंतर between government रसीदें and spending, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
However, some spending कि is excluded इससे the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
Historically, the us public debt as a share of GDP increased दौरान wars और recessions, and subsequently declined.
लिये उदाहरण, कर्ज़ आयोजित by the public as a share of GDP peaked बस after World War ii ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ), but तब गिरी over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, large बजट deficits और the resulting increases in debt have led to concern about the long-term sustainability of the संघीय government 's fiscal policies.
On 2 April 2013, debt held by the public was approximately $ 11.959 trillion or परिचय 75 % of GDP.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 खरब, giving a संयुक्त कुल पब्लिक debt of $ 16.805 trillion.
as of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the पब्लिक was owned by foreign निवेशकों, the largest of which were the People 's Republic of China and जापानी at बस over $ 1.1 खरब each.
In बास्केट, an assist is attributed to a खिलाड़ी who passes the बॉल to a teammate in a रास्ता that लीड to a स्कोर by field goal, meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket.
There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited साथ an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer भी if the player जो receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the बॉल.
however, the original definition of an assist किया not include ऐसे परिस्थितियों, so the तुलना of assist statistics across eras is a complex पदार्थ.
तभी the pass directly before the स्कोर may be counted as an assist, so no अधिक than one assist can be अंकित per field goal ( unlike in other खेल, ऐसे as ice hockey ).
A pass कि leads to a shooting foul और scoring by free throws does not count as an assist in the NBA, but करता in FIBA play ( तभी एक assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least एक free throw is made ).
Point गार्ड tend to get the सबसे assists per game ( apg ), as their role is primarily कि of a passer and ballhandler.
Centers tend to मिलेंगी fewer assists, but centers with शुभ मंजिल presence and court vision can dominate a team by assisting.
होने अंदर the key, the center often रै the best angles और the best position for `` dishes '' and अन्य short passes in the scoring area.
Center wilt चेम्बरलेन led the एनबीए in assists in 1968.
a strong center with inside-scoring prowess, ऐसे as former NBA बीच hakeem Olajuwon, can भी be an effective assistor because the रक्षा 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters.
The NBA single-game assist record is 30, held by Scott Skiles of the Orlando जादू विरूद्ध the Denver टेंडर्स, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record for most career assists is held by John Stockton with 15,806.
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK, जब discussing property taxes in the United States, or previously in Cyprus और माल्टा ) is a now-abstract ईकाई of currency used sometimes in accounting.
in the संयुक्त States, it is a notional unit समतुल्य to of a United States डालर ( a tenth of a cent ).
In the United किंगडम it was प्रस्तावित दौरान the decades of discussion on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound स्टर्लिंग.
Several other currencies used the मिल, such as the Maltese lira.
The term comes from the Latin `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth part ''.
The greco-persian युद्धों ( also often called the Persian Wars ) were a series of conflicts between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic संसार कि started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC.
The collision between the fractious political world of the Greeks and the enormous साम्राज्य of the Persians began when Cyrus the Great conquered ionia in 547 bc.
Struggling to नियम the independent-minded cities of Ionia, the Persians नियुक्त tyrants to नियम प्रत्येक of उन्हें.
इस would prove to be the source of much ट्रबल for the यूनानियों और Persians alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to conquer the द्वीप of Naxos, with Persian support ; however, the expedition थी a debacle and, pre-empting his dismissal, Aristagoras incited all of हैलेनिक Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians.
इस was the beginning of the Ionian विद्रोह, which would last until 493 BC, progressively आरेखण more regions of Asia Minor into the विरोध.
Aristagoras secured military support from एथेंस and Eretria, और in 498 BC ये शक्तियां helped to कैप्चर and burn the Persian क्षेत्रीय capital of Sardis.
The Persian king Darius the ग्रेट vowed to have revenge on Athens and eretria for this act.
The revolt continued, with the two पहलू effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
In 494 bc, the Persians regrouped, and attacked the epicentre of the विद्रोह in Miletus.
At the बैटल of lade, the Ionians suffered a निर्णायक शिकस्त, and the rebellion collapsed, साथ the final members होने stamped out the following year.
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the interference of the मेनलैंड Greeks, दारा embarked on a योजना to conquer Greece and to सजा Athens and Eretria लिये burning sardis.
The पहला Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC, साथ the Persian general Mardonius conquering Thrace और Macedon पहले several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign.
In 490 bc a second force was sent to Greece, this time आरपार the Aegean Sea, अंतर्गत the command of Datis and Artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the cyclades, before besieging, capturing और razing Eretria.
However, while en route to attack Athens, the पारसी force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon, समाप्ति Persian प्रयत्न for the time होने.
Darius तब began to plan to complete the conquest of Greece, लकिन died in 486 bc and जिम्मेदारी लिये the conquest passed to his son xerxes I.
In 480 BC, Xerxes personally led the second पारसी invasion of Greece साथ एक of the largest प्राचीन armies कभी assembled.
विजय over the 'allied ' Greek states ( led by Sparta और एथेंस ) at the Battle of thermopylae अनुमत the Persians to मशाल Athens and overrun most of Greece.
however, while seeking to नष्ट the combined यूनानी fleet, the Persians suffered a कठोर defeat at the Battle of Salamis.
The following year, the confederated Greeks went on the अप्रिय, defeating the पारसी army at the Battle of Plataea, and ending the invasion of Greece.
the allied यूनानियों followed up their success by destroying the बाकी of the Persian बेड़े at the Battle of Mycale, before expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The क्रियाएँ of the सामान्य Pausanias at the घेरा of byzantium alienated many of the यूनानी states from the Spartans, और the anti-Persian गठबंधन was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The delian League continued to अभियान against फारस for the अगला three दशकों, beginning with the expulsion of the remaining पारसी garrisons from Europe.
At the बैटल of the Eurymedon in 466 BC, the League won a दोगुना victory कि finally secured freedom for the cities of ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous defeat, and further campaigning was suspended.
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 bc, but achieved छोटी, and जब it withdrew the greco-persian Wars drew to a quiet end.
Some ऐतिहासिक sources suggest the समाप्त of hostilities was marked by a peace treaty between एथेंस and Persia, the so-called सलाम of callias.
Hooverville near Portland, ऑरेगॉन
A `` hooverville '' is the popular name लिये shanty towns निर्मित by homeless people during the Great अवसाद.
वे were named बाद Herbert Hoover, जो थी अध्यक्ष of the United States during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed लिये it.
The term was coined by Charles Michelson, publicity chief of the Democratic नेशनल कमेटी.
Matthew Michael hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an American football quarterback for the इंडियानापोलिस Colts of the नेशनल Football लीग ( NFL ).
He थी drafted in the sixth गोलाकार of the 1998 NFL Draft by the ग्रीन Bay Packers.
After a season on the अभ्यास squad और two सीज़न backing up Brett favre, he थी traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, और led Seattle to six playoff appearances and a Super कटोरी रूप ; he was selected to three प्रो Bowls and an All-Pro selection.
Following ten seasons with the सीहॉक्स, Hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck तब signed a अनुबंध साथ the इंडियानापोलिस Colts in 2013 less than 24 घंटों after होने released by the टेनेसी Titans.
आईसीटी is inevitably related to the computer network.
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an extended synonym लिये information technology ( it ), but is a more विशिष्ट पद that तनावों the भूमिका of unified communications and the integration of दूरसंचार ( telephone lines and बेतार signals ), कंप्यूटर as खूब as जरुरी enterprise तन्त्र, middleware, storage, and audio-visual प्रणालियों, जिससे enable users to access, store, transmit, और manipulate information.
The phrase आईसीटी had been used by academic researchers चूंकि the 1980s, लकिन it became लोकप्रिय बाद it थी प्रयुक्त in a report to the UK government by Dennis stevenson in 1997 और in the revised नेशनल Curriculum for इंग्लैण्ड, वेल्स and उत्तरी Ireland in 2000.
the पद ICT is now also used to refer to the अभिसरण of audio-visual और टेलीफोन networks with computer संजाल through a सिंगल cabling or कड़ी system.
There are large आर्थिक incentives ( huge लागत बचत due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual, building management and telephone network with the computer network system using a single unified system of cabling, signal distribution and management.
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a shorter form of information and communication ( s ) technology.
In fact infocommunications is the expansion of telecommunications साथ information processing और content handling functions on a आम digital technology base.
लिये a comparison of these and other शर्तें, see.
लिये आईसीटी विकास Index around the संसार, see.

A schematic presentation of the plum खीर model of the atom ; in Thomson 's mathematical model the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in rotating बजती
the वर्तमान model of the sub-atomic structure involves a dense केंद्रक घिरी by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum खीर model of the atom by J. J. thomson, who खोजा the electron in 1897, was प्रस्तावित in 1904 पहले the डिस्कवरी of the atomic nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model.
In this model, the atom is रचित of electrons ( which thomson still पुकारा `` corpuscles '', though G. J. stoney had प्रस्तावित कि atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894 ) घिरी by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges, जैसे negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding ``.
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the अणु, लकिन with अनेक structures संभावित for positioning multiple electrons, particularly घूर्णन rings of electrons ( see below ).
बजाय of a soup, the atom थी also sometimes said to have था a `` cloud '' of धनात्मक चार्ज.
With इस model, thomson abandoned his earlier `` nebular अणु '' परिकल्पना in which the अणु was रचित of immaterial vortices.
Now, at least भाग of the atom was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles, हालांकि the rest of the positively charged भाग of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 thomson मॉडल was disproved by the 1909 सुनहरा foil experiment of hans Geiger और Ernest मार्सडेन.
इस was interpreted by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very high धनात्मक charge ( in the case of सुनहरा, पर्याप्त to balance परिचय 100 electrons ), यूँ leading to the रदरफोर्ड model of the अणु.
Although gold रै an परमाणु number of 79, immediately after Rutherford 's पेपर appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the intuitive सुझाव कि परमाणु number is नाभिकीय charge.
the matter required experiment to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the effective nuclear charge थी very बंद to the परमाणु number ( Moseley found only एक ईकाई difference ), और Moseley referenced only the papers of वैन डेन Broek and Rutherford.
This कार्य culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) bohr model of the अणु in the same year, in जिससे a nucleus containing an परमाणु क्रमांक of positive चार्ज is surrounded by an बराबर क्रमांक of electrons in orbital shells.
Bohr had भी प्रेरित moseley 's work.
thomson 's मॉडल थी compared ( though not by Thomson ) to a British मिठाई called प्लम pudding, hence the name.
thomson 's पेपर was प्रकाशित in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine, the अग्रणी British science journal of the दिन.
In thomson 's दृश्य :... the atoms of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of वर्दी धनात्मक electrification,...
in इस model, the electrons were free to घूर्णन within the blob or cloud of positive substance.
ये orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact कि when an electron स्थानांतरित farther इससे the center of the positive बादल, it लगा a larger net positive inward फ़ोर्स, because there was अधिक material of opposite charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
in thomson 's model, electrons were फ़्री to rotate in बजती जिससे were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, and spectra were to be accounted for by उर्जा मतभेद of different ring orbits.
thomson attempted to make his model account लिये some of the major spectral lines known for some elements, but was not notably कामयाब at इस.
Still, thomson 's model ( साथ with a similar Saturnian ring model for atomic electrons, also put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James क्लर्क मैक्सवेल 's मॉडल of Saturn 's rings ), were earlier harbingers of the बाद and अधिक successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the अणु.
Typical strip of bacon.
Bacon is a cured मांस prepared इससे a सुअर.
It is first cured using large quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a dry पैकिंग ; the result is fresh bacon ( also ज्ञात as green बेकन ).
Fresh बेकन may then be further dried for weeks or months in cold एयर, or it may be boiled or smoked.
Fresh और dried बेकन is typically पकाया पहले eating.
boiled bacon is ready to खा, as is कुछ smoked बेकन, लकिन may be cooked further before खाने.
Bacon is prepared from several अलग cuts of meat.
It is प्रायः made from side and back कटौती of पोर्क, मगर in the United States, जहाँ it is almost always prepared from पोर्क belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` fatty '', or `` American style '' बाहर of the US and कनाडा ).
The side cut has more meat and less fat than the belly.
बेकन may be prepared from either of दो distinct back cuts : fatback, which is लगभग pure fat, and pork loin, which is very झुकना.
Bacon-cured पोर्क loin is known as back bacon.
uncooked pork belly बेकन strips.
Bacon may be eaten smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or grilled, or used as a नाबालिग संघटक to स्वाद dishes.
Bacon is also used for barding and larding roasts, especially game, e.g. venison, pheasant.
the word is derived इससे the Old High German bacho, अर्थ `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` side of बेकन '', और cognate साथ the Old French बेकन.
In महाद्वीपीय Europe, this part of the pig is usually not स्मोक्ड like bacon is in the United राज्य ; it is प्रयुक्त primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient, valued both as a source of मोटे and लिये its flavor.
in Italy, इस is called pancetta और is usually cooked in छोटी cubes or served uncooked and thinly sliced as part of an antipasto.
Meat from other पशु, ऐसे as beef, मेमने, chicken, goat, or तुर्कों, may also be cut, cured, or otherwise prepared to resemble bacon, and may भी be referred to as `` bacon ''.
ऐसे use is common in areas with significant Jewish और Muslim populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured पेट of a swine carcass '' ; other कटौती and characteristics must be separately qualified ( e.g., `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ).
For सुरक्षा, बेकन must be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by trichinella, a parasitic roundworm जिससे can be नष्ट by हीटिंग, जमने, drying, or धूम्रपान.
Bacon is distinguished from salt pork and हैम by मतभेद in the brine ( or शुष्क packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients, most notably sodium नाइट्राइट, और occasionally sodium नाइट्रेट or potassium nitrate ( साल्टपीटर ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate are added to accelerate curing and stabilize color.
Flavorings such as brown sugar or maple are used for some products.
if used, sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability और reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried.
Today, a brine for ham, but नहीं bacon, includes a विशाल amount of शुगर.
Historically, `` ham '' and `` बेकन '' referred to different cuts of मांस कि were brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
The Employee रिटायरमेंट Income Security अधिनियम of 1974 ( ERISA ) (, codified in भाग at ) is a federal law which establishes minimum standards लिये pension plans in private industry और provides लिये extensive नियम on the federal आय tax प्रभाव of transactions associated with employee benefit योजनाएँ.
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of employee benefit plan भागीदार and उनके beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of वित्तीय और other information concerning the योजना to beneficiaries ;
establishing standards of conduct for plan fiduciaries ;
Providing लिये appropriate remedies and access to the federal न्यायालयों.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the पूरा body of कानून regulating employee benefit plans, which हैं found mainly in the Internal आय Code and erisa itself.
जिम्मेदारी for the interpretation and enforcement of erisa is divided among the Department of Labor, the Department of the Treasury ( विशेषकर the Internal Revenue सेवा ), and the Pension लाभ Guaranty निगम.
Illegal immigration to the संयुक्त States is the act of विदेशी नागरिकों प्रवेश the United राज्य, बगैर government permission and in violation of संयुक्त States nationality विधि, or staying beyond the termination date of a visa, also in उल्लंघन of the law.
A चेतावनी sign at the international boundary between the United States and Canada in Point Roberts, Washington.
A much different दृष्टिकोण at the u.s.-mexico border near el Paso, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the Center for आव्रजन Studies to be about 11 million people, down from 12.5 लाख people in 2007.
अन्य estimates range from 7 to 20 million.
According to a 2005 pew Hispanic Center report, 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों were इससे मैक्सिको ; 22 % were from other Latin American countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % यहूद from Europe और Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent स्कूल District is a school ज़िला based in Alvin, टेक्सास ( USA ).
एल्विन ISD is a विशाल suburban स्कूल ज़िला दक्षिण of Houston in the समुदायों of एल्विन, Manvel, pearland, Hillcrest, Rosharon, Iowa उपनिवेश, Liverpool, and एम्सटर्डम.
AISD serves pearland नगर 's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the city सहित the new large master-planned communities of Shadow Creek Ranch, South Fork, and Southern Trails.
Alvin ISD covers of land.
In इंसान anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a तंत्रिका which runs near the ulna bone.
the ulnar collateral ligament of कोहनी joint is in relation साथ the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the human देह ( अर्थ unprotected by muscle or अस्थि ), so injury is common.
इस तंत्रिका is directly connected to the little finger, और the adjacent half of the ring finger, supplying the palmar side of these fingers, सहित both front और वापस of the नुस्ख़े, शायद as far वापस as the fingernail beds.
One method of injuring the nerve is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar तंत्रिका is trapped between the bone and the overlying skin at इस point.
इस is commonly referred to as bumping one 's `` funny bone ''.
This name is thought to be a pun, based on the sound resemblance between the name of the bone of the upper arm, the `` humerus `` and the शब्द `` humorous ``.
Alternatively, according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation अनुभवी when it is struck ''.
Hogwarts स्कूल of Witchcraft और Wizardry, shortened Hogwarts, is a fictional British स्कूल of magic for विद्यार्थी aged eleven to eighteen, and is the primary सेटिंग लिये the first छह books in j.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
रोलिंग has suggested that she may have inadvertently लिया the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ), जिससे she had देखी at Kew Gardens some time before writing the श्रेणी, although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel molesworth book How To Be Topp by geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts स्कूल was voted as the 36th best Scottish educational establishment in a 2008 online ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School.
According to a निदेशक of the Independent Schools संजाल rankings, it थी added to the schools listing `` for fun '' और थी then voted on.
The u.S. subprime mortgage crisis थी a set of events और conditions that led to a वित्तीय संकट and subsequent मंदी that began in 2008.
It was characterized by a rise in subprime बंधक delinquencies and foreclosures, और the resulting मनाही of securities समर्थित by कहा mortgages.
Several major financial संस्थानों collapsed in September 2008, साथ significant disruption in the flow of क्रेडिट to businesses और उपभोक्ता और the onset of a कठोर वैश्विक recession.
There were many कल्याणकारी of the crisis, साथ टीकाकारों assigning different levels of blame to वित्तीय institutions, regulators, credit एजेंसियों, सरकारी housing नीतियों, और consumers, among others.
a proximate cause was the rise in subprime lending.
the percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year rose from the historical 8 % or निम्नतर range to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006, साथ much higher ratios in कुछ भाग of the U.S.
A ऊँची percentage of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 for example, यहूद adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two परिवर्तन were part of a broader ट्रेंड of lowered lending मानकों और higher-risk बंधक products.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly indebted, साथ the ratio of कर्ज़ to disposable personal आय rising इससे 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the समाप्त of 2007, much of इस increase mortgage-related.
जब u.S. घर prices declined steeply after peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' ability to refinance उनके loans became more difficult.
as adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at higher interest rates ( causing higher मासिक भुगतान ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, including subprime mortgages, widely आयोजित by financial firms globally, lost most of their मान.
वैश्विक निवेशकों also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed debt और अन्य प्रतिभूति as part of a decline in the capacity और willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of u.S. credit और financial markets led to tightening credit around the world और slowing economic विकास in the u.S. and यूरोपीय.
the संकट had severe, long-lasting consequences for the U.S. और European economies.
The U.S. डाला a deep recession, साथ nearly 9 million jobs खोया during 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. आवास कीमतें fell nearly 30 % on average और the U.S. भण्डार market गिरी लगभग 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. stock market था recovered to its pre-crisis peak but आवास कीमतें remained near their low point और unemployment remained elevated.
Economic growth remained below pre-crisis स्तर.
यूरोपीय also continued to struggle साथ its own economic crisis.
Carl जंग in 1910.
मायर्स and Briggs extrapolated their MBTI सिद्धान्त इससे Jung 's कृतियाँ in his किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक Types.
The myers-briggs प्रकार Indicator ( MBTI ) assessment is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure psychological preferences in कैसा people perceive the world and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated इससे the typological theories proposed by Carl गुस्ताव Jung and first प्रकाशित in उसके 1921 किताब Psychological Types ( English संस्करण, 1923 ).
Jung theorized कि there हैं four प्रिंसिपल psychological functions by जिससे we experience the world : sensation, intuition, feeling, और thinking.
One of ये चार functions is dominant most of the समय.
the original डेवलपर of the personality inventory यहूद katharine कुक Briggs and her daughter, इसाबेल Briggs Myers ; these two, having studied extensively the work of Jung, turned उनके ब्याज of human बर्ताव into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use.
They began creating the indicator during World War II, believing that a knowledge of personality वरीयताओं होता help women who यहूद entering the industrial workforce लिये the पहला time to पहचानो the sort of war-time jobs that होता be `` most आरामदायक और प्रभावी ''.
the initial questionnaire grew into the myers-briggs Type indicator, which was first published in 1962.
The mbti focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring मतभेद.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo मानना `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is कि we all have specific preferences in the रास्ता we construe our experiences, and these वरीयताओं underlie हमारी interests, needs, values, और motivation '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American रिकॉर्डिंग artist Lady Gaga, इससे her दूसरी studio album born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15, 2011, चार days ahead of its scheduled release.
लिखा and उत्पादित by Lady गागा और RedOne, `` यहूदा '' is a dance और electro house सोंग about a woman in love with a man who गद्दारी her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the past, और its core meaning refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग of उसके life that she ca n't escape.
गागा has further explained कि the song was भी about honoring एक 's भीतरी darkness in order to bring oneself into the light.
The कलाकृति लिये the single was designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on अनेक religious समूह, the सोंग was generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों, who likened the सोंग to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
the song रै a similar ध्वनि to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks, सहित `` पोकर फेस ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` ख़राब रोमांस '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन distinct hooks and a हाउस -influenced break down.
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk परिचय her as beyond redemption, regarding the परंपरागत views of what a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening, but थी कम successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The सोंग reached the शीर्ष ten of the charts in most प्रमुख म्यूज़िक markets, and also पहुँचे the top of the चार्ट in South Korea.
A music video for the सोंग was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus.
it has a biblical storyline जहाँ reedus played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary magdalene.
The वीडियो portrays them as modern day missionaries going to जेरूसलम.
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying यीशु, and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its release, the Catholic लीग condemned गागा for the alleged use of religious imagery and her role in the वीडियो.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, नहीं ढूंढना any अप्रिय content.
The video was मनोनीत for two पुरस्कार at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of टेलीविज़न shows, including The Graham नॉर्टन Show, Saturday Night सजीव, Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '', the French x फ़ैक्टर as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
मारविन Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born मारविन Pentz gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and संगीतकार.
gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s साथ a string of हिट्स including `` कैसा Sweet It Is ( To be Loved By You ) `` and `` I सुना It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells और Tammi Terrell, बाद earning the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस of Motown '' और `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye अंकित the concept albums कया 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became among the first artists in Motown to ब्रेक away from the reins of its production company.
gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres ऐसे as शांत storm और neo-soul.
Following a period in यूरोपीय under a कर निर्वासन in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 Grammy award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the मध्यरात्रि Love album.
चूंकि his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously honored by many संस्थानों, सहित the Grammy Lifetime उपलब्धि Award and the Rock and Roll हॉल of कीर्ति.
The Academy Award for Best चित्र is one of the अकादमी Awards of मेरिट प्रस्तुत annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences ( AMPAS ) to producers working in the motion picture उद्योग and is the only category in जिससे प्रत्येक member is eligible to मनोनीत for.
बेहतरीन Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards, as it represents all the directing, acting, music composing, writing, संपादन and अन्य प्रयत्न put forth into a film.
Consequently, Best Picture is the final पुरस्कार and the conclusion of the annual Academy पुरस्कार ceremony.
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, जहाँ the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held since 2002, showcase प्रत्येक film कि has won the Best चित्र title since the पुरस्कार 's inception 85 सालो ago.
Heavy बरसात is an interactive drama action-adventure वीडियो game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the PlayStation 3.
the game is written और directed by Quantic Dream 's संस्थापक and सीईओ दाउद पिंजरा.
Heavy rains story is a dramatic thriller modelled after फिल्मी noir, featuring four protagonists शामिल with the mystery of the origami Killer, a सीरियल killer who uses विस्तारित अवधि of वर्षा to drown his victims.
Ethan मंगल is trying to save his बेटे from being the next victim, while investigative journalist Madison Paige, एफबीआई profiler Norman Jayden, and निजी जासूस Scott शेल्बी हैं प्रत्येक trying to track down clues to the Origami कातिल 's पहचान.
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to motions on the नियंत्रक, and in some मामले, performing a श्रेणी of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences.
The player 's decisions and actions during the game will affect the कथा.
The main characters can be killed, and certain actions may lead to different scenes and endings.
A playable डेमो was released on 11 February 2010.
The demo was released prior to this तिथि for people जो took part in a Four दिन Challenge on 5 February 2010.
a patch to allow उपयोग of the PlayStation Move controller to play the game was released in सितंबर 2010.
Heavy Rain थी critically acclaimed and has sold over two million copies.
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN और Gaming संघ, and Best PS3 खेल of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN.
a modified version of the खेल was released titled Heavy Rain Edition Modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger दर्शक.
In 2010, the खेल थी included in the book 1001 Video खेल You Must Play Before You die.
Total superannuation industry liabilities : सदस्यों funds और reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988.
Annual total superannuation industry asset विकास 1996-2005.
Superannuation in Australia refers to the arrangements which लोगों मेक in Australia to have funds available लिये उन्हें in रिटायरमेंट.
In Australia, superannuation arrangements are government-supported and encouraged, और minimum provisions are अनिवार्य for employees.
For example, employers are जरूरी to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries और wages ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation fund, but लोगों are encouraged to put aside अतिरिक्त funds into superannuation.
the न्यूनतम दायित्व required by employers is set to बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping annually इससे 2013 to 2020.
an व्यक्तिगत can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the व्यक्ति meets एक of the conditions of रिलीज contained in अनुसूची 1 of the superannuation उद्योग ( पर्यवेक्षण ) regulations 1994.

Electoral कॉलेज map showing the results of the 2012 U.S. presidential चुनाव.
President Barack ओबामा ( d - il ) जीती the popular vote in 26 states and the District of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes.
पूर्व राज्यपाल Mitt Romney ( R - MA ) won the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 states ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 electoral votes.
Cartogram प्रतिनिधित्व of the Electoral College vote for the 2012 election, साथ each square representing one electoral vote.
the United राज्य चुनावी College is the संस्था that officially elects the President and वाइस President of the संयुक्त States every four सालो.
the President और वाइस President are not निर्वाचित directly by the voters.
Instead, they हैं निर्वाचित by `` electors '' जो are chosen by popular vote on a state-by-state basis.
Electors are apportioned to प्रत्येक state और the District of Columbia, but not to territorial possessions of the United States, such as प्यूर्टो Rico और Guam.
The number of electors in each राज्य is बराबर to the number of members of कॉंग्रेस to which the state is हकदार.
The Twenty-third Amendment रै always resulted in the District of कोलंबिया having three निर्वाचक.
There are 538 निर्वाचक, based on there होने 435 प्रतिनिधि और 100 senators, प्लस the three electors इससे the ज़िला of Columbia.
Electors are pledged to particular अध्यक्षीय and vice presidential candidates, though unpledged electors हैं possible.
in सब राज्य, except maine and नेब्रास्का, निर्वाचक are elected on a `` winner-take-all '' आधार.
कि is, all निर्वाचक pledged to the अध्यक्षीय candidate who wins the most मत in a राज्य become निर्वाचक for that राज्य.
maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '', selecting one elector within each congressional district by popular vote and selecting the बाकी दो electors by a राज्यव्यापी popular vote.
हालांकि no elector is required by संघीय विधि to honor a pledge, there have only been very few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a प्रतिज्ञा.
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice President are elected and requires each elector to cast one vote लिये President and another vote for वाइस President.
Critics argue कि the Electoral College is inherently undemocratic and gives झूले states अनुपातहीन influence in electing the President और वाइस अध्यक्ष.
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the president to the smaller राज्य, as the न्यूनतम number of electors for the small states is three compared to एक for the election of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all method of voting favors the larger राज्य.
A क्रमांक of constitutional amendments have been प्रस्तावित seeking to alter the चुनावी कॉलेज or replace it with a सीधा popular vote.
Barack hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th और current President of the संयुक्त States, the first African American to hold the office.
born in Honolulu, Hawaii, Obama is a graduate of Columbia University and Harvard विधि School, where he थी अध्यक्ष of the Harvard Law Review.
he थी a community आयोजक in शिकागो before कमाई his law उपाधि.
He worked as a civil अधिकारों attorney in शिकागो and taught संवैधानिक law at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004.
He served three terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004, कार्यशील unsuccessfully for the United राज्य House of Representatives in 2000.
In 2004, Obama प्राप्त national attention during उसके campaign to represent Illinois in the संयुक्त States Senate साथ his victory in the March Democratic पार्टी primary, his keynote address at the Democratic National Convention in July, and उसके election to the Senate in November.
He began his अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 2007, and in 2008, बाद a close primary अभियान against Hillary Rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination.
He तब defeated Republican nominee जॉन McCain in the सामान्य चुनाव, and was inaugurated as अध्यक्ष on January 20, 2009.
Nine months later, Obama was named the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected अध्यक्ष in November 2012, defeating Republican nominee Mitt romney, and थी sworn in लिये a दूसरी term on जनवरी 20, 2013.
Early in उसके first term in दफ्तर, Obama signed into law economic stimulus विधान in response to the Great Recession in the form of the अमरीकी Recovery और Reinvestment Act of 2009 और the कर Relief, Unemployment बीमे Reauthorization, and Job Creation अधिनियम of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in उसके presidency शामिल the रोगी सुरक्षा और Affordable Care Act, often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask, Do n't बताना Repeal Act of 2010 ; the बजट Control Act of 2011 ; और the American करदाताओं Relief Act of 2012.
in May 2012, he became the first बैठे u.S. president to publicly support same-sex विवाह और in 2013 his administration filed briefs which urged the Supreme अदालत to rule in एहसान of same-sex युगल in दो high-profile मामले.
in विदेशी policy, ओबामा ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop levels in अफगानिस्तान, हस्ताक्षरित the New START arms control treaty साथ रूस, ordered U.S. military involvement in Libya, and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama बिन Laden.
The Honda cbr1100xx Super blackbird was a Honda motorcycle बना from 1996 to 2007.
The bike was developed to challenge the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-11 as the संसार 's fastest production मोटरसाइकिल, and होंडा succeeded साथ a top speed of.
Two सालो बाद the title passed to the suzuki Hayabusa, which पहुँचे.
The Blackbird is named after the Lockheed sr-71, also a speed record holder.

Sample view of an electronic health record
An electronic health record ( ehr ) is an evolving concept पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य information about individual patients or populations.
It is a record in digital स्वरूप that is theoretically capable of being साझा across different health care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and अन्य सूचना networks or exchanges.
ehrs may शामिल a range of data, सहित जनसांख्यिकी, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization औकात, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital signs, निजी stats like age और weight, and billing information.

One of the wood-engraved illustrations by gustave doré.
The Rime of the प्राचीन मेरिनर ( originally The Rime of the Ancyent marinere ) is the longest major कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर Coleridge, written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
आधुनिक editions use a later संशोधित version मुद्रित in 1817 that featured a gloss.
साथ with other poems in Lyrical ballads, it थी a signal शिफ़्ट to modern poetry and the beginning of British Romantic literature.
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines कैसा वेब browsers और other user एजेंटों can automatically choose the appropriate प्रॉक्सी सर्वर ( अभिगम विधि ) for fetching a given url.
A PAC संचिका contains a JavaScript फलन “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This फलन returns a string with एक or more access method specifications.
These विशेषताएँ cause the उपयोक्ता agent to use a particular प्रॉक्सी server or to connect सीधे.
अनेक विशेषताएँ provide a fall-back when a proxy fails to respond.
The ब्राउजर fetches इस PAC file before requesting other URLs.
The URL of the PAC file is either configured हस्तचालित or संकल्पित automatically by the वेब Proxy Autodiscovery प्रोटोकॉल.
Zendaya कोलमैन ( born September 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as Zendaya, is an American actress, singer and dancer.
वो सितारों on the Disney Channel sitcom शेक It Up as रॉकी Blue.
She has starred in two films and played one of the lead roles in the film frenemies as Halley Brandon.
She voiced फर्न in the Pixie खोखला खेल.
She appeared in Good Luck Charlie as Rocky Blue and in a शुभ Luck Charlie and Shake It Up crossover title Charlie शेक it Up.
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` Walk The Prank '' and on A.N.T. Farm as sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative सलाहकार. ''
Zendaya is also a संगीतकार.
वो signed a सौदे with Hollywood Records on अगस्त 8, 2012 and प्रारंभ रिकॉर्डिंग songs for उसके debut album on August 12, 2012.
वो released a single from an स्वतंत्र लेबल called `` Swag it Out `` और another सिंगल with Bella Thorne पुकारा `` Watch Me, '' which is featured on the Break it bas एल्बम.
On March 20, 2012, zendaya and Bella Thorne released an album together called शेक It Up : Live 2 Dance, each have उनके own song on it, along साथ a mash-up of both songs together as one.

This is a सूची of airports in Pennsylvania ( a u.S. state ), grouped by type and sorted by location.
it contains सब public-use and सैन्य airports in the state.
कुछ private-use और former एयरपोर्ट may be included where notable, such as एयरपोर्ट that यहूद previously public-use, those with commercial enplanements अंकित by the FAA or airports assigned an iata airport code.
iOS ( previously iPhone os ) is a मोबाईल operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc. Originally released in 2007 लिये the iPhone और iPod Touch प्लेटफ़ॉर्म, it has been extended to support other Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple tv.
Unlike microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's Android, Apple does not license iOS लिये installation on non-apple hardware.
, Apple 's App स्टोर contained more than 700,000 iOS अनुप्रयोग, which have collectively महरूम downloaded more than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile operating system units shipped in the fourth क्वार्टर of 2012, behind only google 's एंड्रॉइड.
In जून 2012, it accounted for 65 % of मोबाईल web आंकड़ा consumption ( including use on both the iPod Touch and the iPad ).
At the half of 2012, there यहूद 410 million devices activated.
According to the खास media event held by Apple on September 12, 2012, 400 million devices have महरूम sold through June 2012.
The user interface of iOS is based on the अवधारणा of direct हेरफेर, using multi-touch इशारों.
Interface control elements consist of sliders, switches, and buttons.
Interaction with the os includes gestures such as swipe, tap, pinch, और reverse pinch, all of which have विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर the context of the आईओएस operating system and its multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers are प्रयुक्त by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one common result is the undo command ) or rotating it in तीन आयाम ( one आम result is switching from portrait to लैंडस्केप mode ).
iOS is derived from OS x, साथ which it साझा the Darwin foundation.
iOS is ठहराना 's mobile version of the os X ऑपरेटिंग system used on Apple computers.
In आईओएस, there are four abstraction layers : the Core OS layer, the Core सेवाएं layer, the मीडिया परत, and the cocoa Touch परत.
The current version of the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 gb of the device 's flash memory for the system partition, using roughly 800 mb of कि विभाजन ( varying by model ) for iOS itself.
आईओएस currently runs on iPhone, iPad, iPod टच और Apple tv.

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic device जिनकी intended design फलन is to 'spoil ' unfavorable air movement across a body of a vehicle in motion, usually described as turbulence or drag.
Spoilers on the सामने of a गाडी are प्रायः called air dams, क्युकी in addition to directing air flow they भी reduce the amount of air flowing underneath the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic लिफ्ट and drag.
Spoilers are often fitted to रेस और high-performance खेल cars, although वे have become common on passenger vehicles as well.
कुछ spoilers हैं added to cars primarily for styling purposes and have either little aerodynamic benefit or भी मेक the aerodynamics बदतर.
विघ्न for cars are often incorrectly confused with, or the term used interchangeably साथ, विंग्स.
ऑटोमोटिव wings हैं डिवाइस whose intended design is to generate downforce as air passes around them, नहीं simply disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, जो serves as Nintendo 's mascot, is a fictional character created by game designer Shigeru miyamoto and voiced by Charles martinet.
This is a list of video games जहाँ the character Mario plays a भाग, either as the समर्थक, antagonist, supporting character, as भाग of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game भीतर a game.
It does नहीं include सरल references to the character, such as the portraits of मारियो मिला in the लेजेंड of Zelda : A Link to the Past.

It करता n't include कोई आभासी Console re-releases.
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` i am A man of निरंतर Sorrow '' ) is a traditional अमरीकी folk song first recorded by Dick burnett, a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky.
The सोंग was originally recorded by Burnett as `` विदाई Song '' मुद्रित in a Richard Burnett songbook, circa 1913.
an early संस्करण थी recorded by Emry आर्थर in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public interest in the सोंग was renewed बाद the रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी O bhai, Where Art thou ?
, as it plays a central भूमिका in the फिल्मी 's plot.
The song was also included in the film 's अत्यधिक successful, multiple-platinum selling soundtrack.

the volt ( symbol : v ) is the SI derived unit लिये electric संभावित ( वोल्टेज ), electric potential difference, and electromotive force.
The वोल्ट is named in सम्मान of the Italian physicist Alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ), जो invented the voltaic pile, संभवतः the first chemical बैटरी.
a plaque commemorating the location of the साराजेवो assassination and steps of gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, पहले steps were removed in 1992 and plaque बदला from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the साराजेवो assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
on 28 जून 1914, archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, और his wife, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo princip, one of a group of छह Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by डेनियल ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so वे could be combined into a Greater सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया.
the हत्यारे ' motives यहूद सतत साथ the गति that बाद became ज्ञात as Young Bosnia.
Serbian सैन्य officers stood behind the attack.
At the शीर्ष of these सर्बियाई military conspirators थी मुख्य of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin dimitrijević, his righthand man प्रमुख vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
प्रमुख Tankosić armed the हत्यारे साथ बम and pistols and trained them.
The हत्यारे were given अभिगम to the वही clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and एजेंटों that rade Malobabić प्रयुक्त for the infiltration of हथियार and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The हत्यारे, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the key सर्बियाई military conspirators who were स्टिल alive यहूद arrested, आजमाया, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914.
The other conspirators were गिरफ्तार and tried पहले a सर्बियाई कंगारू court on the French-controlled salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia चलाया three of the शीर्ष military conspirators.
Much of कया is known परिचय the assassinations comes इससे ये two trials and related रिकॉर्ड.
कार्यभार of जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World युद्ध i one month later.
Mission सैन Juan capistrano थी a Spanish मिशन in Southern California, located in present-day San Juan Capistrano.
It was founded on All संतो ' Day November 1, 1776, by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan अनुक्रम.
Named for giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th century theologian और `` योद्धा पुजारी '' who resided in the abruzzo region of Italy, San Juan capistrano रै the distinction of होने home to the oldest building in California स्टिल in उपयोग, a चैपल built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` सेरा 's चैपल '' और `` Father Serra 's Church, '' it is the only extant structure जहाँ it has been प्रलेखित that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated द्रव्यमान.
One of the best known of the Alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया missions ( और one of the few मिशन to have actually been संस्थापित twice—others being मिशन San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La purísima concepción ).
The साईट was originally consecrated on October 30, 1775, by Father Fermín Lasuén, लकिन was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in सैन डिएगो.
The success of the settlement is evident in its historical records.
prior to the arrival of the missionaries, some 550 natives were scattered throughout the local area.
By 1790, the number of परिवर्तित Christians था grown to 700, and just six years later nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the मिशन यौगिक.
1,649 baptisms यहूद conducted that year alone, out of the total 4,639 souls converted between 1776 and 1847.
More than 2,000 former निवासियों ( mostly Juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं buried in unmarked क़ब्रों in the Mission 's कब्रिस्तान ( campo santo ).
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. जॉन O'Sullivan, who पहचाना the property 's historic value और working tirelessly to conserve और rebuild its structures, are buried at the प्रवेश to the cemetery on the west side of the property, and a प्रतिमा raised in उसके honor stands at the head of the crypt.
the surviving चैपल भी serves as the final resting प्लेस of तीन पैड्रेस who passed on while serving at the Mission : fathers जोस Barona, Vicente Fustér, and विसेंट Pascual oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor.
the Criolla or `` Mission grape, '' थी first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the पहला wine produced in alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया उभरा from the मिशन 's winery.
the मिशन entered a long period of gradual decline after secularization in 1833.
Numerous efforts were made over the सालो to restore the Mission to its former glory, लकिन none met with great success until the आगमन of Father o'sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, and `` Serra 's Chapel '' is still प्रयुक्त लिये religious सेवाएं.
About half-a-million visitors, including 80,000 school children, आइये to the Mission each साल.
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) हैं a renowned architectural अचरज, the Mission is perhaps best ज्ञात लिये the annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed प्रत्येक March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's दिन ).
Mission San Juan capistrano has परोसा as a favorite विषय लिये many notable artists, and has been immortalized in साहित्य and on film numerous times, perhaps more than any other मिशन.
In 1984, a आधुनिक church complex थी constructed just north और west of the मिशन compound and is अभी ज्ञात as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a संग्रहालय, with the Serra चैपल भीतर the compound serving as a chapel लिये the mission मोहल्ला.
Better Off Dead is a 1985 American teen रोमांटिक comedy film अभिनीत जॉन Cusack और लिखा and निर्देशित by Savage Steve Holland.
It tells the स्टोरी of ऊँची school student Lane Myer जो is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him.
mercedes-benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome और commonly the superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium, located in the Central कारोबार ज़िला of New ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, USA.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the New Orleans modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis.
Its steel frame covers a expanse.
इसके dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम and रै a diameter of, making it the largest फिक्स्ड domed structure in the world.
It is home to the एनएफएल 's New Orleans संतो, the ncaa 's प्रभाग I-A tulane Green वेव football team ( the largest football स्टेडियम in Conference यूएसए ), the State फार्म Bayou Classic, the r+l वाहक New Orleans Bowl, the Allstate Sugar Bowl and, every fourth year, the BCS National Championship Game.
क्युकी of the आकार and location in एक of the major tourist गंतव्यों in the United States, the superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of उम्मीदवार being माना for major sporting कार्यक्रम, such as the सुपर Bowl और the Final Four.
in 2005, the Superdome gained international attention of a different type when it housed हज़ारों of लोगों seeking आश्रय from hurricane Katrina.
the भवन suffered extensive damage as a परिणाम of the storm, and was बंद for many months afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it थी announced that German automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased naming rights to the stadium.
The new name took effect on October 23, 2011.
It is the third stadium कि has naming rights इससे mercedes-benz ( और first in the United States ), after the Mercedes-Benz Arena, the stadium of Bundesliga club vfb Stuttgart, in Stuttgart, Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai, China.

Disney 's एनिमल Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed deluxe resort at the Walt Disney World रिज़ॉर्ट.
It खोली on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
the रिज़ॉर्ट is स्वामित्व और operated by वॉल्ट Disney Parks and रिसॉर्ट.
Disney 's Animal किंगडम आवास is located in the Animal Kingdom Resort Area, adjacent to Disney 's एनिमल किंगडम.
It gives guests the opportunity to view grazing वन्यजीव outside उनके कक्ष and public areas in the resort within निकटता of the animals, conveying the feeling of being in an African सवाना.
The People 's Party, भी known as the `` Populists '', was a short-lived political पार्टी in the United States established in 1891 during the Populist गति ( संयुक्त राज्य, 19th Century ).
it was most important in 1892-96, and then rapidly faded दूर.
Based among ग़रीब, white cotton किसानो in the South ( विशेषकर North कैरोलिना, अलबामा, and टेक्सास ) and hard-pressed गेहूं किसानो in the मैदान states ( विशेषकर Kansas और नेब्रास्का ), it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading form of agrarianism and दुश्मनी to बैंको, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions साथ labor संघ, और in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed their presidential nominee, विलियम Jennings ब्रायन.
the terms `` populist '' और `` populism `` are commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist appeals in opposition to स्थापित interests and mainstream पार्टियों.
Linguistic map of सीरियल, Cameroon, और बेनिन.
Sign in अंग्रेज़ी, outside the विश्वविद्यालयों of Lagos
There are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The प्रमुख languages are योरूबा, हौसा, Igbo, ईदो, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
the official language of सीरियल, English, the पूर्व colonial language, थी chosen to facilitate the cultural और linguistic एकता of the country.
अंग्रेज़ी, however, remains an विशेष preserve of the country 's urban elite, and is not widely spoken in rural areas, which comprise तीन quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing तीन प्रमुख African भाषाएं families : afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, such as cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an even वृहद diversity prior to the spread of the current language परिवारों.
a श्रेणी of events led to the attack on Pearl Harbor.
युद्ध between Japan और the संयुक्त States था been a possibility that each स्वदेश 's military forces नियोजित for since the 1920s, though रियल tension किया not शुरू until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by जापानी.
Over the next decade, Japan expanded धीरे into China, अग्रणी to सब out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French इंडोचायना in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into China, including war supplies खरीदा from the U.S.
This move prompted the United राज्य to embargo सब आयल exports, leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate that it had less than two years of बंकर आयल remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch ईस्ट Indies.
Planning had been underway for कुछ time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East एशिया co-prosperity Sphere that जापानी envisioned in the Pacific.
the Philippine islands, at that समय an American territory, were भी a जापानी निशाना.
The Japanese सैन्य concluded that an आक्रमण of the फिलीपीन होता provoke an American military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait for the अपरिहार्य US counterattack, Japan 's military leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor आक्रमण, which they assumed होता negate the American शक्तियां needed for the मुक्ति and reconquest of the islands.
नियोजन लिये the आक्रमण had begun in बहुत जल्दी 1941, by Admiral isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally जीती assent from the Naval High कमांड by, among other बाते, threatening to resign.
The आक्रमण थी approved in the गर्मियाँ at an Imperial सम्मेलन and again at a दूसरी Conference in the fall.
Simultaneously over the साल, pilots यहूद trained, and जहाजों prepared लिये इसके execution.
Authority for the attack was granted at the दूसरी इम्पीरियल Conference if a राजनयिक परिणाम satisfactory to Japan was नहीं reached.
बाद final approval by सम्राट हिरोहितो the अनुक्रम to attack was issued at the beginning of December.
A common office stapler
A आम स्कूल stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins sheets of पेपर or समान material by driving a पतला metal स्टेपल through the चादरें and folding the ends.
Staplers are widely प्रयुक्त in government, business, offices, homes और स्कूलों.
The word `` stapler '' can actually refer to a number of different devices of varying uses.
In जोड to joining paper sheets साथ, staplers can also be प्रयुक्त in a surgical setting to join tissue साथ with सर्जिकल staples to बंद a सर्जिकल wound ( much in the same रास्ता as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, most staplers are used to जुड़ें multiple sheets of paper.
पेपर staplers come in two पृथक types : manual and इलेक्ट्रिक.
हस्तचालित staplers हैं normally hand-held, although models कि are used जबकि set on a desk or other surface हैं not uncommon.
Electric staplers exist in a variety of अलग designs and models.
उनके primary operating function is to join विशाल संख्याएँ of paper sheets together in rapid succession.
Some electric staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 चादरें at a time.
swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the प्रक्रम in the human or animal body that makes कुछ pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, और into the ग्रासनाल, जबकि shutting the epiglottis.
if इस fails और the object goes through the श्वासनली, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the इंसान body it is controlled by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( अप्रैल 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of पेन्सिलवेनिया, थी a leader of the कट्टरपंथी Republican faction of the रिपब्लिकन Party and a fierce opponent of slavery.
He थी one of the सबसे influential members in the इतिहास of Congress.
As chairman of the powerful House तरीके and Means Committee, Stevens, a witty, sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party leader, वर्चस्व the हाउस from 1861 until his death.
He wrote much of the financial legislation that paid for the American सिविल War.
स्टीवंस and Senator चार्ल्स Sumner were the prime leaders of the कट्टरपंथी republicans दौरान the war and पुनर्निर्माण era.
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply चूंकि his death as interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण have changed.
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating American traditions of republicanism, depicting स्टीवंस as a विलेन for his advocacy of harsh measures in the दक्षिण such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
इस highly ऋणात्मक characterization आयोजित sway into the 1950s.
The वृद्धि of the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a strong धनात्मक सराहना of स्टीवंस ' work on civil rights for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes उसे as, `` The Great Commoner, रक्षक of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against गुलामी in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction, the only member of the हाउस of Representatives ever to have been ज्ञात as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
Overview of the translation of eukaryotic messenger rna
Diagram showing the translation of mrna and the synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
in molecular biology and genetics, translation is the प्रक्रम through जिससे cellular ribosomes manufacture proteins.
It is part of the प्रक्रम of gene अभिव्यक्ति.
In translation, मेसेंजर RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce a specific amino acid chain, or polypeptide, that will later मोड़ें into an क्रियाशील protein.
in bacteria, अनुवाद occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm, जहाँ the large and छोटी subunits of the ribosome हैं located, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, translation occurs आरपार the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial संश्लेषण.
The राइबोसोम facilitates decoding by inducing the बाइंडिंग of trnas with पूरक anticodon sequences to that of the mrna.
the tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as the mrna passes through और is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock टिकर and टिकर टेप.
In many उदाहरण, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum and releases the nascent protein polypeptide अंदर for बाद vesicle हस्तांतरण और secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, such as transfer rna, ribosomal RNA, और छोटी nuclear rna, do not undergo अनुवाद into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : दीक्षा, elongation, translocation और termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain, or polypeptide that is the product of अनुवाद ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes and assembled into proteins.
In सक्रियण, the सही अमीनो एसिड is covalently बंधुआ to the सही ट्रांसफ़र RNA ( tRNA ).
The amino एसिड is joined by its carboxyl group to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an अमीनो acid linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the small subunit of the ribosome बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' समाप्त of mrna with the सहायता of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens जब the A site of the ribosome चेहरों a stop codon ( UAA, uag, or UGA ).
no tRNA can recognize or bind to इस codon.
बजाय, the stop codon induces the बाइंडिंग of a release factor प्रोटीन that prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex.
A क्रमांक of antibiotics अधिनियम by inhibiting translation ; these शामिल anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, and puromycin, among अन्य.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different ढांचा from that of eukaryotic ribosomes, and thus एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic मेजबान 's cells.
A मल्टीमीडिया message on a mobile phone.
Multimedia Messaging Service ( mms ) is a standard रास्ता to भेजें संदेश that include multimedia content to and from mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( छोटी संदेश Service ) काबिलियत that allowed exchange of text messages only up to 160 characters in length.
The most popular उपयोग is to भेजें photographs इससे camera-equipped handsets, although it is also popular as a विधि of delivering न्यूज और entertainment content including वीडियो, pictures, text pages and ringtones.
the standard is developed by the Open Mobile Alliance ( OMA ), हालांकि during विकास it थी part of the 3GPP and वैप समूह.
smallpox was an संक्रामक disease unique to humans, caused by either of दो वायरस variants, Variola major and Variola minor.
the disease is भी ज्ञात by the Latin names Variola or variola वीरा, निकला from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease थी originally known in अंग्रेज़ी as the `` pox '' or `` रेड plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' was first प्रयुक्त in Britain in the 15th century to फर्क variola from the `` great pox '' ( उपदंश ).
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor ) was diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox localized in small blood vessels of the skin और in the मुँह और throat.
In the स्किन it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash और, later, raised fluid-filled फफोले.
V. major produces a more serious disease and has an overall मृत्यु rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also ज्ञात as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, and Cuban itch ) जिससे kills about 1 % of its victims.
Long-term complications of V. major संक्रमण शामिल characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting इससे corneal ulceration and scarring, and limb deformities due to arthritis और osteomyelitis हैं कम आम complications, देखी in परिचय 2–5 % of cases.
Smallpox is believed to have emerged in इंसान populations परिचय 10,000 BC.
the earliest शारीरिक evidence of it is probably the pustular rash on the mummified body of Pharaoh ramses V of मिश्र.
The disease मारे an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually during the closing years of the 18th century ( सहित five reigning monarchs ), and was जिम्मेदार for a third of all blindness.
of all those संक्रमित, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died from the बीमारी.
Smallpox थी responsible लिये an estimated 300–500 लाख deaths during the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the World स्वास्थ्य Organization ( WHO ) estimated that 15 million लोगों contracted the disease and that two लाख died in that year.
After टीकाकरण campaigns throughout the 19th और 20th सदियां, the जो certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
smallpox is एक of दो infectious रोगों to have महरूम eradicated, the other होने rinderpest, which was declared eradicated in 2011.
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' is a song by the अंग्रेज़ी rock band the बीटल्स.
लिखा by John लेनन and पॉल mccartney, and recorded in अक्तूबर 1963, it थी the first Beatles record to be बना using four-track उपकरण.
With advance orders exceeding एक लाख copies in the United किंगडम, `` I Want to Hold अपना हाथ '' would ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the अंग्रेजों record charts on its day of release ( 29 नवम्बर 1963 ) had it नहीं been अवरोधित by the group 's first million seller `` She loves You ``, the Beatles ' previous uk सिंगल, which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media कवरेज of the group.
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold अपना हाथ '' stayed at क्रमांक एक लिये five weeks और remained in the uk top fifty लिये twenty-one weeks in total.
It थी also the group 's first अमरीकी number one, entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry.
by 1 February it held the number एक spot — for seven सप्ताह — before being replaced by `` She loves You '', a reverse scenario of कया था occurred in Britain, and remained in the US चार्ट for a कुल of fifteen weeks.
`` I Want to Hold Your हाथ '' became the बीटल्स ' best-selling सिंगल worldwide.
A gasser was a प्रकार of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the लेट 1950s and continued until the early 1970s.
gassers यहूद आधारित on उत्पादन models इससे the 1930s to mid-1960s, जिससे have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight वितरण on acceleration ( Beam axles are also हल्का than an independent सामने suspension ), though a raised stock सामने suspension is common as well.
Common weight reduction तकनीकों include fiberglass body panels, stripped interiors और plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
क्युकी they यहूद primarily निर्मित लिये racing, these cars typically had the इंजन swapped to a larger or अधिक शक्तिशाली one, the मौजूदा भण्डार इंजन modified ( often heavily ) or both.
it was very common to अनुरूप a जड़ें supercharger and mechanical fuel injection, such as एक from Algon, Hilborn, or Crower.
साथ form होने dictated by function, their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly, largely due to सामने ends being raised higher than stock, to assist in the weight transfer during rapid त्वरण ( रेसिंग ).
Having उनके exhaust pipes exit through the सामने फेंडर खूब is a common characteristic of gassers, as is having लाशें painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild फ़ॉन्ट्स.
The name arose क्युकी वे competed in a gasoline -fueled drag racing class, बल्कि than एक using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the predecessor of the modern Funny Car.
