electrocardiography ( ईसीजी or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the वक्ष or छाती ) निर्वचन of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes संलग्न to the surface of the skin और recorded by a device external to the body.
the recording उत्पादित by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( भी ईसीजी or ईकेजी ).
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats, as well as the size and position of the chambers, the presence of any damage to the heart, and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart, ऐसे as a pacemaker.
सबसे ecgs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on इंसान hearts, लकिन may also be performed on animals, usually लिये diagnosis of दिल abnormalities or research.
Donald John Trump, Sr. ( born June 14, 1946 ) is an American कारोबार magnate, टेलीविज़न personality and author.
He is the chairman and president of The Trump संगठन and the founder of Trump entertainment Resorts.
Trump 's हद lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC वास्तविकता show The Apprentice have made उसे a well-known celebrity who थी No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes हस्ती 100 list.
Trump is the son of Fred Trump, a धनवान नई York City real-estate developer.
he worked for his पिता 's firm, Elizabeth ट्रम्प & बेटे, while attending the Wharton School of the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania, and in 1968 officially joined the company.
He थी दिए control of the कम्पनी in 1971 और renamed it The Trump संगठन.
in 2010, ट्रम्प expressed an ब्याज in बनने a candidate लिये president of the United States in the 2012 election, though in May 2011, he घोषित he would not be a candidate.
In December 2011, Trump was suggested as a संभावित vice अध्यक्षीय selection by मिशेल Bachmann, if वो were to win the रिपब्लिकन nomination.
`` a Change is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke, written और first recorded in 1963 and released अंतर्गत the आरसीए विक्टर label shortly after his death in लेट 1964.
Though only a modest hit for Cooke in comparison with his previous singles, the song आए to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
the सोंग has gained in लोकप्रियता और critical acclaim in the decades चूंकि इसके रिलीज, और is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल energy generated and भंडारित in the Earth.
थर्मल energy is the energy that determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal उर्जा of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of खनिज ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the कोर of the ग्रह and its सतह, ड्राइव a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat इससे the core to the सतह.
the adjective geothermal originates from the Greek जड़ें γη ( ge ), meaning धरती, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the कोर of the धरती, thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding cooler rock.
The high temperature and pressure cause कुछ rock to melt, creating magma संवहन upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the ठोस rock.
The magma heats rock and water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
इससे hot springs, geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये bathing चूंकि paleolithic times and लिये स्पेस हीटिंग since ancient Roman टाइम्स, but it is अभी better ज्ञात लिये electricity पीढी.
विश्वव्यापी, about 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal शक्ति is online in 24 countries.
an additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district हीटिंग, space heating, स्पा, औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं, desalination and agricultural अनुप्रयोग.
Geothermal power is cost effective, विश्वसनीय, sustainable, and environmentally friendly, but has historically been सीमित to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically विस्तारित the range and size of viable संसाधन, especially for अनुप्रयोग such as home heating, opening a potential लिये फैली शोषण.
geothermal wells release ग्रीनहाउस gases फंस गहन within the earth, but these emissions हैं much निम्नतर per उर्जा unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources हैं theoretically more than पर्याप्त to supply मानवता 's energy needs, but only a बहुत small fraction may be profitably exploited.
खुदाई and exploration for deep resources is बहुत expensive.
forecasts लिये the future of geothermal शक्ति depend on assumptions परिचय technology, energy कीमतें, subsidies, and ब्याज rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power कार्यक्रम show that customers would be willing to pay a छोटी more for a renewable energy सोर्स like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and उद्योग अनुभव, the cost of generating geothermal शक्ति has decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy लागत between दो और टेन cents per सम्पात.
Ownership of property may be private, collective, or आम and the property may be वस्तुएँ, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
Determining स्वामित्व in विधि involves determining who has certain अधिकारों and duties over the property.
ये अधिकारों और duties, sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle of rights ', can be separated and held by different parties.
The question of स्वामित्व reaches back to the ancient philosophers, Plato and अरस्तू, जो आयोजित different opinions on the विषय.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought निजी प्रॉपर्टी निर्मित divisive inequalities, while Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 BC ) thought private प्रॉपर्टी enabled people to प्राप्त the full लाभ of their labor.
Private property can circumvent कया is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” प्रॉब्लम, जहाँ लोगों tend to रुसवा आम property अधिक than they do private property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private प्रॉपर्टी प्रणाली can मेक these tragedies worse—for example, a private owner of a piece of oil-rich property, depending on his worldview, might be अधिक interested in short-term financial gain than incremental उपयोग साथ an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g., those of future पीढियां, the disenfranchised, इत्यादि. ).
While Aristotle justified the existence of निजी ownership, he left open questions of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate property between what is निजी and common और ( 2 ) कैसा to allocate the निजी property within society.
Over the सहस्राब्दियों, and across cultures कया can be property और how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the आधार for many other concepts that रूप the foundations of ancient and modern societies such as money, trade, कर्ज़, bankruptcy, the criminality of चोरी, और निजी vs. public प्रॉपर्टी.
Ownership is the key building ब्लाक in the development of the capitalist socio-economic प्रणाली.
Adam Smith stated कि one of the sacred कानून of justice was to गार्ड a person 's property and possessions.
The प्रक्रम और mechanics of ownership are fairly जटिल : one can gain, transfer and lose ownership of प्रॉपर्टी in a number of तरीके.
to acquire property one can purchase it साथ money, trade it लिये other property, प्राप्त it as a gift, चोरी it, find it, make, it or होमस्टीड it.
One can transfer or खोना ownership of प्रॉपर्टी by selling it लिये धन, exchanging it लिये other property, giving it as a gift, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped इससे one 's ownership through legal अर्थात् ऐसे as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in कि the owner of कोई property will भी अपना the economic benefits of that प्रॉपर्टी.
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a सोंग recorded by Barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग artist Rihanna, for her fifth स्टुडियो album लाउड ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the song was released as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे Loud on October 29, 2010 through Def Jam Recordings.
The r & B song was उत्पादित by the Norwegian production duo StarGate, and was लिखा by the duo along with Ester Dean, traci Hale, and Drake.
Lyrically, it incorporates विषयवस्तु of sexual intercourse and रोमांस.
Music critics gave the song धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ, citing it some of Rihanna 's बेहतरीन vocal कार्य to तिथि ; there was a तारीफ़ regarding its romantic nature, as well as its यौन tones.
`` कया 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 chart, giving रिहाना her third number-one सिंगल in 2010, as well as her eighth overall on the chart.
The सोंग also अव्वल the charts in हंगेरियाई और the United किंगडम and reached the top five in Canada, Ireland, नई जीलैंड, Norway and Slovakia.
The song प्राप्त a nomination at the 54th Grammy Awards for Best Rap/Sung सहयोग.

`` What 's My नाम ? '' was promoted with live performances across both sides of the अटलांटिक, including Saturday Night Live in अमेरिका and the श्रेणी सात finale of The X फ़ैक्टर in the United Kingdom.
The latter प्रदर्शन resulted in an investigation इससे the देश 's मीडिया regulator, ofcom, for the raunchy nature of रिहाना 's outfit.
a mathematical constant is a special क्रमांक, usually a real क्रमांक, that is `` significantly interesting in some रास्ता ''.
Constants उठता in अनेक different areas of गणित, with constants such as e ( mathematical निरंतर ) | and pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as geometry, क्रमांक theory and calculus.
What it means for a constant to उठता `` naturally '', and what makes a constant `` interesting '', is ultimately a matter of taste, और some mathematical स्थिरांक हैं notable more for historical reasons than लिये उनके intrinsic गणितीय interest.
the अधिक लोकप्रिय constants have been studied throughout the ages and computed to many decimal places.
All गणितीय स्थिरांक are definable numbers and प्रायः हैं also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ).
Elections to the संयुक्त States सीनेट were held on November 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 सीटे.
( a special चुनाव on January 19, 2010 in मैसाचुसेट्स थी held earlier in the साल. )
thirty-four of the seats यहूद for six-year शर्तें to the सीनेट 's `` class three '', and three were special चुनावों for shorter terms.
Of the 37 चुनावों, 19 featured लाज़िम डेमोक्रेट ( 7 of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ) और 18 featured incumbent Republicans ( eight of जिसको retired or were defeated in the प्राथमिक ).
After the पिछला elections ( in 2008 ), the United States Senate was composed of 58 Democrats, 40 republicans, and 2 independents जो caucus with the Democrats.
republicans जीती चार seats held by retiring Democrats and Republicans defeated दो incumbent Democrats.
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994 चुनावों और also the पहला समय since that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats.
This was the fourth consecutive चुनाव of `` क्लास 3 '' senators where Democrats have failed to gain सीटे and the third consecutive mid-term election आयोजित in a अध्यक्ष 's first term जहाँ Republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these रिपब्लिकन wins, however, the Democrats retained a बहुमत of the सीनेट with 51 seats plus 2 independents जो caucus with उन्हें, compared to the 47 Republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice प्रत्येक year as the Sun reaches its उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion सापेक्ष to the celestial equator on the celestial गोला.
As a result, on the दिन of the solstice, the Sun appears to have reached its उच्चतम or lowest annual ऊँचाई in the आसमान ऊपर the horizon at local solar noon.
The word संक्रांति is derived from the लैटिन सोल ( sun ) और sistere ( to stand still ), because at the solstices, the सूर्य stands स्टिल in declination ; that is, the seasonal movement of the सूर्य 's path ( as देखी from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, together साथ the equinoxes, हैं connected साथ the seasons.
In many cultures the solstices चिह्नित either the शुरूआत or the midpoint of शीत और summer.
the पद solstice can also be used in a broader sense, as the date ( दिन ) when इस occurs.
the day of the solstice is either the longest day of the year ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest day of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics.
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29, 1935 ) is an अमरीकी rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter और pianist.
he is known by the nickname `` The कातिल '' and is often viewed as “rock & roll 's first ग्रेट wild man”.
an early pioneer of rock and roll music, in 1956 Lewis made his first recordings at सूर्य Records.
`` Crazy Arms `` बेची 300,000 नक़ल in the South, but it थी his 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going on `` कि shot लुईस to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed इस in that वही year when he recorded songs such as `` Great गेंदें of Fire ``, `` Breathless `` and `` ऊँची School Confidential ``.
लुईस sold more रिकॉर्ड than Elvis Presley at this time.
However, Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in the वेक of his marriage to his यंग cousin.
He had little कामयाबी in the charts following the कांड and उसके popularity quickly faded.
His live performance शुल्क plummeted from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
In the meantime he was determined to gain back some of उसके popularity.
दौरान the early 60’s he किया n't have much chart success with few अपवाद such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
उसके live performances at इस समय यहूद increasingly wild and energetic.
His album Live at the स्टार Club, Hamburg इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by many music पत्रकारों और fans as एक of the wildest and greatest rock and फेंकें concert albums कभी.
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for अनेक years साथ little कामयाबी, in 1968 लुईस made a transition into country music and था हिट्स with गीतों such as `` another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited his career and throughout the late '60s और '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
उसके # 1 देश हिट्स included `` to Make Love Sweeter For तुम ``, `` वहीँ जरूर Be More to Love Than This ``, `` Would You Take another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
लुईस 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll past with songs such as a कवर of the Big Bopper 's `` chantilly Lace `` and `` Rockin ' my जीवन Away ``.
in the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to ऑडियंस around the world और still releases new albums.
एक such एल्बम, titled Last man खड़ा, is his best selling to date at over a million copies बेची worldwide.
This was followed by Mean Old man जिससे has received कुछ of the बेहतरीन sales of Lewis’s career.
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both चट्टान and country, won several Grammy awards, including a Lifetime उपलब्धि Award.
लुईस was inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 1986, and his pioneering contribution to the genre has been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
in 1989, his life was chronicled in the फिल्म ग्रेट गेंदें of Fire, starring Dennis quaid.
In 2003, रोलिंग Stone पत्रिका listed उसके box set All कातिल, No Filler : the anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all समय ``.
In 2004, they ranked him क्रमांक 24 on their list of the 100 Greatest Artists of सब Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' लाख Dollar Quartet और the Class of '55 एल्बम, which also included Johnny नकदी, कार्ल Perkins, रॉय Orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry लुई Stephens, untitled watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / गुलामी ''.
The Emancipation Proclamation was an अनुक्रम जारी to all segments of the Executive branch ( सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त States by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil युद्ध.
It was based on the president 's constitutional authority as कमांडर in मुख्य of the armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever फ़्री, and ordered the Army ( and सब segments of the Executive branch ) to treat as फ़्री सब those enslaved in ten states कि were स्टिल in rebellion, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 लाख slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under विद्रोह, but as the army took control of Confederate regions, the स्लेव in those regions were emancipated rather than लौटे to उनके masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions जहाँ rebellion had already been subdued यहूद तत्काल emancipated, and over 3 million अधिक were emancipated as the Union army उन्नत.
The Proclamation किया not लागू to the five slave states that यहूद not in rebellion, nor to सबसे regions already controlled by the Union army ; emancipation there would आइये after separate state क्रियाएँ and/or the दिसम्बर 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made गुलामी illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did नहीं compensate the owners, किया not itself outlaw slavery, and did not make the ex-slaves ( पुकारा freedmen ) citizens.
it made the eradication of गुलामी an सुस्पष्ट war goal, in जोड to the goal of reuniting the Union.
on September 22, 1862, Lincoln had जारी a preliminary proclamation that he would अनुक्रम the emancipation of all स्लेव in कोई राज्य of the confederate States of अमेरिका that किया not return to Union control by January 1, 1863.
none returned, and the अनुक्रम, signed and issued January 1, 1863, took effect मगर in locations where the Union had already mostly regained control.
The उदघोषणा outraged श्वेत southerners जो envisioned a race war, angered कुछ Northern डेमोक्रेट, सक्रिय anti-slavery forces, and weakened forces in यूरोपीय कि wanted to intervene to सहायता the Confederacy.
it also lifted the spirits of अफ़्रीकी Americans both in the Southern and उत्तरी States, and led to many slaves escaping उनके masters and running behind Union lines in अनुक्रम to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder और co-written by him और स्टीव शिबुया.
It is Snyder 's पहला film आधारित on an असली script.
The film सितारों Emily Browning, Abbie cornish, जेना Malone, Vanessa Hudgens, Jamie Chung, and Carla gugino.
the कथानक follows the fantasies of a यंग woman जो is वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी संस्था, as she makes a योजना to escape the hospital पहले suffering a lobotomy.
The film was released in both conventional and IMAX theatres in the United राज्य at midnight on March 25, 2011.
It received generally negative reviews from आलोचकों, but थी a मॉडरेट box दफ्तर success.

a digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes वीडियो or still photographs by recording बिंब on an electronic image sensor.
Most cameras sold today are digital, and digital cameras are incorporated into many devices ranging from गुस्से and mobile phones ( called camera फोन ) to vehicles.
डिजिटल and फिल्मी cameras share an ऑप्टिकल system, typically using a lens with a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an image पिकअप device.
The diaphragm and शटर admit the correct amount of लाइट to the imager, just as with फिल्मी but the image पिकअप device is इलेक्ट्रॉनिक rather than रासायनिक.
however, unlike फिल्मी cameras, digital cameras can display images on a screen immediately after होने अंकित, and स्टोर and delete बिंब from memory.
Many digital कैमरे can also record moving video with ध्वनि.
Some digital cameras can crop and stitch तस्वीरें and perform other elementary image editing.
The अंदर and सामने of a डेल PowerEdge web server, a computer designed लिये रैक mounting
Multiple web servers may be used for a ऊँची traffic website, here four Sun आग x4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application ) कि helps to deliver web content कि can be पहुँचा through the अंतरजाल.
the सबसे आम use of web servers is to मेजबान websites, but there are अन्य uses such as gaming, आंकड़ा storage or कार्यशील enterprise अनुप्रयोग.
the अमरीकी रेड Cross ( ARC ), also known as the अमरीकी National रेड Cross, is a humanitarian organization that provides आपात assistance, विपत्ति relief and education inside the संयुक्त States.
It is the designated u.S. संबद्ध of the International Federation of रेड Cross and Red crescent समाजों.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster राहत, the अमरीकी रेड Cross offers सेवाएं in five other क्षेत्रों : जातियाँ services that सहायता the needy ; communications सेवाएं and comfort लिये military members and their family members ; the collection, प्रसंस्करण and distribution of blood और blood products ; educational programs on preparedness, स्वास्थ्य, and सुरक्षा ; और अंतरराष्ट्रीय राहत और development programs.
Issued a corporate चार्टर by the संयुक्त States Congress under शीर्षक 36 of the United States Code, Section 3001, the American नेशनल Red क्रॉस is governed by स्वयंसेवक and supported by जातियाँ दान, आय from health and सुरक्षा training and उत्पाद, and income from blood products.
The अमरीकी Red Cross is headquartered in Washington, D.C.

The current President and Chief Executive Officer is गेल J. mcgovern.

A मुर्गा ( भी called a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
It usually refers to a male मुर्गा ( gallus gallus ).
Immature पुरूष chickens कम than one साल बूढ़ा are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United राज्य, and the पद is widely used throughout उत्तर America, as खूब as ऑस्ट्रेलिया और New जीलैंड.
in the संयुक्त Kingdom और आयरलैंड the older term `` cockerel '' is more commonly प्रयुक्त.
`` मुर्गा '' is in general use as the नाम for a पुरूष of other प्रजाति of बर्ड, for उदाहरण `` Cock गौरैया ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to sleep at night, and is किया by दोनो sexes.
The मुर्गा is polygamous, but can नहीं गार्ड several nests of eggs at एकबार.
He guards the general क्षेत्रफल where his hens are nesting, और will attack अन्य roosters that enter his territory.
दौरान the daytime, he usually sits on a high perch, usually 3–5 फीट off the मैदान to serve as a lookout for his झुण्ड.
he will sound a distinctive alarm call if predators हैं आसपास.
the Pokémon Trading कार्ड Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card खेल based on the Pokémon video game series, first published in October 1996 by Media फैक्टरी in Japan.
In the US, it was initially published by Wizards of the coast, the company that produces, in दिसम्बर 1998.
Nintendo took over publishing in June 2003.
It is एक of निन्टेंडो 's last बाकी strong links to its heritage as a playing card company.
Land Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon, Warwickshire, संयुक्त Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
It is भाग of the Jaguar Land Rover group, a subsidiary of Tata Motors of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in the world ( after जीपी ).
The Land Rover name was originally प्रयुक्त by the Rover Company for एक specific vehicle model, named बस the Land रोवर, launched by Rover in 1948.
Over the following सालो it developed into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive models, including the defender, डिस्कवरी, Freelander, Range Rover, Range रोवर खेल and Range रोवर Evoque.
Land रोवर्स हैं फिलहाल assembled in the company 's Halewood and Solihull plants, with शोध and विकास लेने place at jlr 's gaydon और Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी in 2009.
Although the ब्रांड originates इससे the original 1948 model, जमीन रोवर as a कम्पनी रै तभी existed चूंकि 1978.
prior to this, it थी a उत्पाद line of the Rover Company which थी subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the अंग्रेजों leyland मोटर Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland मोटर निगम ’s takeover of रोवर in 1967.
The ongoing वाणिज्यिक success of the original Land Rover series मॉडल, and latterly the Range रोवर in the 1970s in the midst of bl’s well प्रलेखित business troubles prompted the establishment of a separate Land Rover company but still अंतर्गत the BL umbrella, remaining भाग of the subsequent Rover समूह in 1988, under the स्वामित्व of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were टूटा up and privatised.
in 1994 Rover Group plc was acquired by BMW.
in 2000, Rover Group थी broken-up by BMW and Land रोवर थी sold to Ford मोटर कम्पनी, बनने part of इसके Premier ऑटोमोटिव समूह.
In 2006 Ford खरीदा the Rover brand इससे bmw for around £6 million.
इस reunited the रोवर and जमीन Rover ब्रांड्स लिये the first time चूंकि 2000 when the रोवर group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, Ford बेची both Land रोवर and Jaguar Cars to tata Motors.
This sale also included the dormant Rover brand

The एपीसोड ' प्लाट focuses on the introduction of a new आत्मा reaper captain, shūsuke Amagai, and the mystery surrounding the kasumiōji clan, one of the परिवारों कि constitute the nobility of आत्मा Society.
The season began airing on April 23, 2008 in Japan on TV Tokyo and ended on अक्तूबर 7, 2008.

The विनियमन of prostitution in the संयुक्त राज्य is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States संविधान, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the राज्य to परमिट, prohibit, or वरना विनियमित commercial sex, मगर insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce साथ laws like the मन Act.
In most राज्य, वेश्यावृति is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public order अपराधों, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one समय माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised statutes.
तभी 8 counties फिलहाल contain active brothels.
सब फ़ॉर्म of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson नगर, Douglas काउंटी, और lincoln County.
The अन्य counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of ये counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : street वेश्यावृति, brothel prostitution, and अनुरक्षण prostitution.
The ईस्ट Coast of the United States, भी known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard and commonly shortened to ईस्ट Coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic समंदर.
The राज्य which have shoreline on the ईस्ट Coast are, from north to south, the u.S. states of Maine, New हैम्पशायर, मैसाचुसेट्स, rhode Island, Connecticut, नई यॉर्क, नई जर्सी, Delaware, मेरीलैंड, Virginia, North Carolina, South कैरोलिना, Georgia, and Florida.
रिचर्ड Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, serving इससे 1969 to 1974, जब he became the only president to resign the office.
निक्सन had previously served as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि and senator from California and as the 36th Vice अध्यक्ष of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in yorba Linda, California.
he ग्रैजुएट from Whittier College in 1934 and ड्यूक University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to practice law.
He and उसके wife, Pat Nixon, moved to वॉशिंगटन to work for the federal government in 1942.
he subsequently served in the United States नेवी दौरान World युद्ध II.
Nixon was निर्वाचित in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the House of Representatives in 1946 और to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to नेशनल prominence.
He थी the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican पार्टी presidential nominee in the 1952 चुनाव.
निक्सन served for eight सालो as vice president.
he waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960, narrowly खोने to John F. Kennedy, and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he भागा again for the presidency and थी elected.
Although निक्सन initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended u.S. involvement in 1973.
निक्सन 's visit to the People 's गणतंत्र of China in 1972 opened राजनयिक relations between the दो nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile सन्धि with the Soviet Union the वही year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन to the states.
Among other things, he launched पहलों to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed मजदूरी और price controls, enforced desegregation of some दक्षिणी schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled वापस manned स्पेस exploration.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's दूसरी term देखी an अरब oil embargo, the resignation of his vice अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, and a continuing series of revelations परिचय the वाटरगेट scandal and अन्य misconduct by members of the administration.
The कांड escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of लगभग certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring several books और undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his पब्लिक image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, and died चार दिनों later at the age of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
It was introduced to the market by Pfizer in 1991.
sertraline is primarily prescribed for प्रमुख depressive disorder in adult outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive, panic, and सोशल anxiety disorders in both adults and children.
in 2011, it was the second-most विहित antidepressant on the U.S. retail market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to कि of older tricyclic antidepressants, but its side effects are much less pronounced.
मतभेद with newer antidepressants are subtler and also mostly confined to side effects.
Evidence suggests कि sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression.
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline परिणाम in a significant घटी of the क्रमांक of panic हमले and in improved quality of life.
लिये obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as प्रभावी as cognitive behavioral चिकित्सा ; the best results have been achieved by combining ये two treatments.
Although स्वीकृत लिये social phobia और posttraumatic तनाव disorder, sertraline leads to तभी modest improvement in these conditions.
sertraline भी alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric विकार and can be प्रयुक्त in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for इसके उपचार.
Sertraline shares the common side प्रभाव और contraindications of other SSRIs, साथ ऊँची rates of nausea, अतिसार, insomnia, and sexual side effects ; however, it does not cause वज़न gain, और its effects on both संज्ञान and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women लेने sertraline, the drug थी present in significant concentrations in fetal blood, and was also संबद्ध with a higher rate of various birth defects.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline for depression may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality.
the पाँच Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama फिल्मी directed by Robert Townsend, who co-wrote the script साथ keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century Fox, the film 's main cast शामिल Townsend, माइकल Wright, Leon Robinson, हैरी J. lennix, Tico Wells, Harold निकोलस of the निकोलस Brothers, और diahann कैरल.
the plot of the film ( जिससे is loosely आधारित on the lives of several artists : The Dells, The temptations, Four Tops, Wilson Pickett, जेम्स भूरा, Frankie lymon, sam cooke and अन्य ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats.
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main समर्थक, Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ), who serves as a narrator throughout the film.
However, a majority of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a consecutive time लकीर as opposed to traditional फ्लैश backs.
The फिल्मी includes a significant amount of original music conceived by various कलाकारों लिये the film 's soundtrack, including singles such as `` A दिल is a हाउस लिये Love ``, `` We Have n't समाप्त Yet '', and `` Nothing लकिन प्रेम ''.
the film was released to most North American ऑडियंस March 29, 1991 however it थी not made available to ऑडियंस in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another dvd release in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary.
The movie received मिश्रित reviews इससे critics.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an अमरीकी Thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple क्राउन champion in 25 सालो.
he set race records in all three कार्यक्रम in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), और the belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — records कि स्टिल स्टैंड today.
He is माना to be one of the greatest thoroughbreds of सब time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked सचिवालय the 35th best खिलाड़ी of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He क्रमित second behind Man o ' War in the blood-horse 's सूची of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th सदी.
Secretariat थी sired by Bold Ruler out of somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
he was foaled at the Meadow in Caroline County, Virginia.
जैसे his प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती Man o ' War, Secretariat was a विशाल chestnut colt and was दिए the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple क्राउन winner सिएटल Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he थी trained by Lucien Laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, साथ with प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( पहला two races ), and दिग्गज Eddie Maple ( last रेस ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue और white checkered colors and his दूल्हे थी Eddie Sweat.
सचिवालय stood approximately tall, and weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
a typical 12 V, 40 Ah lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable battery that आपूर्तियाँ electric energy to an ऑटोमोबाइल.
Usually इस refers to an SLI बैटरी ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर, the lights, और the प्रज्वलन system of a vehicle’s इंजन.
Automotive SLI बैटरी are usually lead-acid type, और are made of six गैल्वानी cells in series to provide a 12 volt system.
प्रत्येक cell provides 2.1 volts लिये a कुल of 12.6 volt at पूरा चार्ज.
भारी vehicles such as highway ट्रक or tractors, प्रायः equipped साथ diesel engines, may have two batteries in series for a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली, or may have parallel strings of batteries.
Lead-acid batteries हैं बना up of plates of lead और separate plates of lead dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte समाधान of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % जल.
This causes a रासायनिक reaction that releases electrons, allowing them to flow through conductors to उपज electricity.
As the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte reacts with the materials of the plates, changing their surface to सीसे sulfate.
When the बैटरी is recharged, the रासायनिक reaction is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into सीसे डाइऑक्साइड and lead.
With the प्लेटों restored to their असली condition, the process may now be repeated.
Battery रीसाइक्लिंग of automotive batteries reduces the need लिये resources required for manufacture of new batteries, diverts toxic सीसे from landfills, and रोकता risk of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is employment in जिससे a person works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of hours defined as such by his/her employer.
Full-time नियुक्ति प्रायः आता साथ benefits कि are not typically offered to part-time, अस्थाई, or लचीली workers, ऐसे as annual leave, sickleave, और स्वास्थ्य insurance.
full-time कार्य are often considered careers.
वे generally pay अधिक than part-time jobs, और usually carry more घंटों per week.
the Fair Labor Standards Act ( FLSA ) does not define full-time नियुक्ति or part-time employment.
इस is a matter generally to be determined by the employer ( US Department of मजदूर ).
the परिभाषा by employer can vary and is generally published in a company 's कर्मचारी Handbook.
Companies commonly आवश्यकता from 30–35 or 40 hours प्रति week to be defined as full-time और therefore eligible for benefits.
full-time status varies between company और is often आधारित on the shift the कर्मचारी must work दौरान each work week.
The `` standard '' कार्य week consists of five eight-hour days, commonly परोसा between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
जबकि a four-day week generally consists of चार ten-hour days ; it may भी consist of as little as nine hours लिये a total of a 36 घंटा work week.
Twelve-hour shifts are often तीन days per week, unless the company रै the intention of paying out the कर्मचारी overtime.
ओवरटाइम is legally paid out anytime an employee works more than 40 hours per सप्ताह.
The legal minimum for overtime starts at आधार Pay + One-Half.
The increased भुगतान is considered to compensate slightly for the increased थकान which a person अनुभवों on such long shifts.
Shifts can also be बहुत irregular, as in retail, but are still full-time if the required number of hours is reached.
There are some situations जहाँ a person जो needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, जिससे is sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
seahorse is the title given to 54 species of marine मछली in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the Ancient Greek hippos meaning `` horse '' and kampos अर्थ `` sea monster ''.
The Controlled Substances अधिनियम ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug गाली Prevention and कंट्रोल Act of 1970.
the CSA is the संघीय U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The अधिनियम also परोसा as the national implementing विधान for the सिंगल Convention on narcotic Drugs.
The विधान created five schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
दो संघीय agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the विभिन्न schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the आरंभिक listing, and कॉंग्रेस has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. farias और सामन्था Reid Date-Rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, which लगाई gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification निर्णय are required to be made on criteria including potential लिये abuse ( an अपरिभाषित पद ), फिलहाल accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, और international treaties.
Maya numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral प्रणाली used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
The numerals are made up of तीन symbols ; zero ( शेल आकार ), one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
For example, thirteen is written as तीन dots in a horizontal पंक्ति ऊपर दो horizontal लाइनों stacked above each अन्य.
Lyndon Baines जॉनसन ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as lbj, was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who परोसा in all four निर्वाचित federal कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त States : Representative, Senator, Vice President, और President.
Johnson, a डेमोक्रेट इससे Texas, परोसा as a United राज्य Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator इससे 1949–1961, सहित six सालो as United States Senate Majority नेता, दो as Senate Minority Leader और two as Senate Majority Whip.
बाद campaigning unsuccessfully for the लोकतांत्रिक nomination in 1960, Johnson was पूछा by John F. कैनेडी to be his running mate for the 1960 अध्यक्षीय election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on November 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's पद and was निर्वाचित President in his own right, winning by a large margin over Barry goldwater in the 1964 election.
जॉनसन was greatly समर्थित by the Democratic Party और as अध्यक्ष, he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` Great Society `` legislation that included कानून that upheld civil rights, public प्रसारण, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental सुरक्षा, सहायता to शिक्षा, and his `` युद्ध on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering व्यक्तित्व and the `` जॉनसन treatment, '' his coercion of शक्तिशाली politicians in order to advance विधान.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American भागीदारी in the वियतनाम War, from 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट troops in early 1968, as अमरीकी हताहत soared और the सलाम process bogged bas.
The involvement stimulated a large एंग्री antiwar movement based especially on university campuses in the u.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, and crime rates soared, as his opponents raised demands for `` विधि and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in अनेक feuding गिरोहों, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended उसके बोली for reelection.
Republican Richard Nixon was elected to succeed him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency चिह्नित the peak of modern उदारतावाद in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some इतिहासकारों क्युकी of his domestic नीतियों.
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the female menstrual साईकिल, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) और embryogenesis of इंसानो and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a क्लास of hormones called progestogens, and is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big Bird is a समर्थक of the children 's टेलीविज़न show Sesame Street.
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall उज्जवल primrose-yellow bird.
He can roller skate, ice skate, नृत्य, गाओ, write poetry, draw and even ride a unicycle.
But despite this wide सरणी of talents, he is prone to बारंबार misunderstandings, on एक occasion भी singing the alphabet as one big long word ( from the सोंग called `` ABC-DEF-GHI, '' सुनाया `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
he lives in a large घोंसला पीछे the 123 Sesame गली brownstone and रै a teddy bear named Radar.

The Second crusade ( 1145–1149 ) थी the second major crusade launched from यूरोपीय.
the Second Crusade थी started in जवाब to the पतन of the County of Edessa the previous year to the forces of zengi.
the county था been संस्थापित during the First crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
जबकि it थी the first Crusader state to be संस्थापित, it was also the first to पतन.
The दूसरी Crusade was घोषित by पोप यूजीन III, and was the first of the crusades to be led by European kings, namely Louis सात of France and कोनराड III of Germany, with help from a क्रमांक of अन्य यूरोपीय nobles.
The armies of the दो kings marched separately आरपार Europe.
After crossing Byzantine territory into आनातोलिया, दोनो सेना were separately defeated by the Seljuq turks.
the main Western ईसाई source, odo of deuil, और Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress, particularly in Anatolia where he is कथित to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack उन्हें.
लुई and Conrad and the remnants of their armies reached Jerusalem और, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus.
The crusade in the east थी a failure लिये the crusaders और a great विजय for the मुसलमान.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall of Jerusalem और दे वृद्धि to the Third crusade at the end of the 12th century.
the only success of the Second Crusade came to a संयुक्त force of 13,000 फ्लेमिश, Frisian, नॉर्मन, English, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
यात्राएं from England, by ship, to the पावन जमीन, the army रोका और helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the capture of लिस्बन, expelling इसके Moorish occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, inc. ( ), ब्रांडेड as Walmart, is an अमरीकी multinational खुदरा corporation कि runs chains of large discount विभाग स्टोर्स और गोदाम stores.
The company is the world 's तीसरा largest public corporation, according to the सौभाग्य Global 500 list in 2012, the biggest private employer in the संसार with over two million employees, और is the largest रिटेलर in the संसार.
walmart remains a family-owned कारोबार, as the company is controlled by the Walton family, who own a 48 प्रतिशत stake in walmart.
It is also एक of the world 's most valuable companies.
The company was संस्थापित by Sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on अक्तूबर 31, 1969, and सरेआम traded on the नई यॉर्क Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in bentonville, अरकंसास.
Walmart is भी the largest grocery retailer in the संयुक्त States.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of इसके US $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery business.
It भी owns and operates the Sam 's Club retail warehouses in उत्तर अमेरिका.
by 1988, wal-mart थी the most लाभप्रद retailer in the US, and by November 1990, it outsold K-mart.
by 1991 it outsold Sears in retail, making it अमेरिका 's largest retailer, a distinction it still holds.
walmart has 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 countries, under 55 अलग names.
The company operates अंतर्गत the Walmart नाम in the United राज्य, including the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
it operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the United Kingdom as Asda, in Japan as seiyu, और in India as बेहतरीन Price.
It has wholly स्वामित्व operations in Argentina, Brazil, and Canada.
walmart 's investments outside उत्तर America have had mixed परिणाम : its operations in the United Kingdom, South अमेरिका, and China are highly successful, whereas ventures in जर्मनी और South Korea were unsuccessful.
रॉबर्ट William गेरी मूर ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011 ), was a उत्तरी Irish musician, most widely recognised as a singer और guitarist.
In a career dating वापस to the 1960s, Moore played with artists including Phil lynott और Brian Downey during his teens, leading him to सदस्यताएँ साथ the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three पृथक occasions.
Moore shared the स्टेज with such blues और rock luminaries as B.B. किंग, Albert King, Colosseum ii, जार्ज हैरिसन और Greg Lake, as खूब as having a successful solo career.
He guested on a क्रमांक of albums अंकित by high profile musicians, including a cameo appearance playing the lead guitar solo on `` She 's My Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys Vol. 3.
an example of rack mounted servers
A वेब hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and संगठन to make उनके website accessible via the World Wide वेब.
Web hosts हैं companies कि provide space on a server owned or leased for उपयोग by क्लाइंट, as well as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data बीच space and connectivity to the Internet for other सर्वर स्तिथ in their data बीच, called colocation, also ज्ञात as Housing in Latin अमेरिका or France.
The scope of web hosting services varies greatly.
The most basic is वेब page and small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via संचिका Transfer Protocol ( एफटीपी ) or a Web interface.
The फाइलें हैं usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
अनेक अंतरजाल service प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) प्रस्ताव this सेवा फ़्री to subscribers.
Individuals और संगठन may भी obtain Web page hosting from वैकल्पिक service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business वेब site hosting often has a उच्चतर व्यय depending upon the size and प्रकार of the website.
Single page होस्टिंग is generally sufficient लिये personal web pages.
A जटिल site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support and application development प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. PHP, Java, माणिक्य on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These सुविधाएं allow customers to लिखें or install scripts for applications like forums and content प्रबन्धन.
Also, Secure Sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The मेजबान may also provide an इंटरफ़ेस or control फलक for managing the Web सर्वर और installing scripts, as well as other मौड्यूल और service applications like e-mail.
Some होस्ट specialize in certain तन्त्र or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly used by larger कंपनियाँ that outsource संजाल अवसंरचना.
obstetrics ( from the लैटिन obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the चिकित्सा specialty dealing with the care of सब women 's reproductive tracts and their children during pregnancy ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians are also gynecologists, अर्थ they perform in both specialties.
In the संयुक्त States, these physicians are commonly referred to as ob/gyns.
the Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) और Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – may 30, 1912 ), were two American brothers, inventors, and विमानन pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the संसार 's पहला कामयाब airplane and making the first controlled, powered and sustained heavier-than-air इंसान flight, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the भाइयो developed their उड़ती machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft.
Although नहीं the पहला to build and fly प्रायोगिक aircraft, the राइट brothers were the पहला to invent aircraft controls that made fixed-wing संचालित flight possible.
The brothers ' आधारभूत भेदन was उनके invention of three-axis control, which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively और to maintain its संतुलन.
This method became standard and remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical कार्य, the Wright brothers focused on विकासशील a reliable method of pilot control as the key to solving `` the उड़ती problem ''.
This दृष्टिकोण differed significantly from other experimenters of the time who put more जोर on विकासशील शक्तिशाली engines.
Using a छोटी homebuilt हवा tunnel, the Wrights भी collected more सटीक data than any पहले, enabling them to design और build विंग्स and propellers that were अधिक efficient than any पहले.
Their पहला U.S. पेटेंट, 821,393, did नहीं claim invention of a flying यंत्र, लकिन बल्कि, the आविष्कार of a system of aerodynamic control that manipulated a उड़ती machine 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical skills essential लिये their success by working for सालो in their दूकान with printing presses, bicycles, मोटर्स, and other machinery.
उनके work with bicycles in particular influenced उनके belief कि an unstable vehicle like a उड़ती machine could be controlled and balanced with अभ्यास.
From 1900 जबतक उनके पहला संचालित फ़्लाइट in लेट 1903, they conducted extensive glider tests that also developed their कौशल as pilots.
उनके bicycle shop कर्मचारी चार्ली Taylor became an महत्वपूर्ण part of the team, भवन उनके first वायुयान engine in close collaboration with the brothers.
the Wright brothers ' औकात as inventors of the airplane has महरूम विषय to counter-claims by विभिन्न parties.
much controversy persists over the many competing दावा of early aviators.

The number of girls was reduced to 13, the first समय चूंकि Cycle 9, बाद being कायम at 14 in the पिछला two cycles.
