Exxon mobil निगम, or ExxonMobil, is an American multinational oil and gas corporation headquartered in Irving, Texas, United States.
it is a सीधा descendant of जॉन D. rockefeller 's Standard Oil company, और was formed on November 30, 1999, by the merger of exxon और Mobil.
it is affiliated with Imperial Oil which operates in Canada.
exxonmobil is the संसार 's largest company by revenue और in 2013, became the largest सरेआम traded company by market capitalization in the world.
The company is क्रमित # 5 globally in Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013.
exxon Mobil 's reserves यहूद 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the समाप्त of 2007 and, at then ( 2007 ) rates of production, are expected to पिछला over 14 years.
साथ 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily शोधन क्षमता of, exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world, a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870.
ExxonMobil is the largest of the संसार 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil समतुल्य ).
In 2008, इस was approximately 3 % of संसार production, which is less than अनेक of the largest state-owned पेट्रोलियम कंपनियाँ.
जब ranked by oil और gas reserves it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total.
a 2012 आलेख in The Daily Telegraph says कि ExxonMobil has `` grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations, समर्थ to determine American foreign policy और the भाग्य of entire nations ''.
in terms of its environmental record, ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to उन्हें by dictatorships, such as those in chad and भूमध्यरेखीय गिनी.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s मुख्य executive until 2005, थी `` notoriously sceptical about जलवायु change and disliked सरकारी हस्तक्षेप at कोई level ''.
The company was widely criticized लिये its slow response to cleaning its 1989 Valdez आयल spill in Alaska.
This article is about the Globe Theatre of शेक्सपियर.
For the modern reconstruction in लंदन, देखिए Shakespeare 's Globe.
For other उपयोग, see Globe Theatre ( disambiguation ).
The ग्लोब Theatre was a थिएटर in London associated with William Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the रब Chamberlain 's Men, on जमीन स्वामित्व by Thomas Brend और inherited by his son, Nicholas Brend और grandson सर मैथ्यू Brend, और थी destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.
A second Globe थिएटर was built on the same साईट by जून 1614 and closed in 1642.
A आधुनिक reconstruction of the Globe, named `` Shakespeare 's Globe ``, opened in 1997 लगभग from the site of the असली theatre.
It 's a अद्भुत Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed by Frank Capra, based on the short story `` the Greatest Gift ``, जिससे Philip Van Doren stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945.
The फिल्मी is माना one of the सबसे loved films in American cinema और has become traditional देखने दौरान the Christmas season, alongside लोकप्रिय classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas कैरोल.
The film stars जेम्स Stewart as George Bailey, a man who has given up his dreams in order to help others and whose निकट आत्महत्या on Christmas Eve brings about the हस्तक्षेप of his guardian angel, क्लेरेंस odbody ( हेनरी Travers ).
क्लेरेंस shows George all the lives he has touched और कैसा different जीवन in his community of Bedford Falls would be had he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high उत्पादन costs and stiff competition at the समय of its release, the film has come to be regarded as a classic and is a staple of Christmas टेलीविज़न around the world.
theatrically, the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million, approximately twice the production लागत, a figure it never आए बंद to achieving in इसके initial रिलीज.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it थी not the complete box office failure that today everyone believes... it थी initially a प्रमुख निराशा and confirmed, at तनिक to the studios, that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist सुविधाएँ कि made उसके films the must-see, money-making कार्यक्रम वे एकबार were. ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and रै been recognized by the अमरीकी Film Institute as एक of the 100 best अमरीकी films कभी made, रखकर number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie सूची, and होता also प्लेस number one on its list of the most प्रेरणादायक अमरीकी films of सब time.
Data गोदाम Overview
in computing, a data गोदाम or enterprise आंकड़ा warehouse ( DW, dwh, or edw ) is a database प्रयुक्त for रिपोर्टिंग and data विश्लेषण.
It is a central repository of data जिससे is created by integrating आंकड़ा from एक or more disparate sources.
Data warehouses store current as well as historical data and are used for creating trending रिपोर्ट्स for senior management reporting such as सालाना and त्रैमासिक comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational systems ( ऐसे as marketing, sales etc., shown in the फिगर to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational data store for अतिरिक्त operations पहले वे are प्रयुक्त in the dw लिये रिपोर्टिंग.
The ठेठ etl -based data गोदाम uses staging, data integration, and अभिगम layers to house इसके key कृत्यों.
the स्टेजिंग layer or staging डेटाबेस स्टोर्स raw data निकाली इससे each of the disparate source data systems.
the integration परत integrates the disparate आंकड़ा सेट by transforming the data from the staging layer प्रायः storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ods ) डेटाबेस.
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database, प्रायः called the data warehouse database, जहाँ the data is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate तथ्य.
The combination of facts and dimensions is sometimes called a star schema.
The access layer helps users retrieve data.
A data गोदाम constructed from an integrated data source systems करता नहीं require ETL, staging databases, or operational data स्टोर databases.
The एकीकृत data source systems may be considered to be a part of a distributed operational data store परत.
Data federation methods or आंकड़ा virtualization methods may be used to access the वितरित एकीकृत source आंकड़ा systems to consolidate और aggregate data सीधे into the आंकड़ा warehouse डेटाबेस tables.
Unlike the ETL-based data गोदाम, the एकीकृत सोर्स data systems और the आंकड़ा गोदाम are सब integrated since there is no transformation of dimensional or सन्दर्भ data.
This integrated data गोदाम architecture supports the drill bas from the aggregate data of the आंकड़ा warehouse to the transactional data of the एकीकृत source data systems.
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided into आंकड़ा marts.
Data marts store subsets of data from a गोदाम.
इस definition of the data warehouse focuses on data storage.
The प्रमुख source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged और made available for उपयोग by managers and other business पेशेवर for data mining, online analytical प्रसंस्करण, मार्केट research and निर्णय support ( Marakas & o'brien 2009 ).
However, the अर्थात् to retrieve and analyze आंकड़ा, to extract, transform and load data, and to manage the data dictionary are also माना essential components of a data warehousing system.
अनेक references to data warehousing उपयोग इस broader context.
यूँ, an expanded definition for data warehousing शामिल business intelligence tools, टूल्स to extract, रूपांतरण and load data into the repository, and टूल्स to मैनेज और retrieve metadata.
Portland stone पाषाण on the Isle of Portland, England
An abandoned construction aggregate quarry निकट Adelaide, South Australia
A पाषाण is a type of open-pit mine इससे which rock or खनिज are निकाली.
Quarries हैं generally used लिये extracting भवन materials, such as dimension stone, निर्माण aggregate, riprap, बालू, and gravel.
They are often collocated साथ concrete और डामर plants due to the आवश्यकता for large amounts of कुल in those materials.
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as खोलें pit mines.
The शब्द quarry can include underground quarrying for स्टोन, such as Bath stone.
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to Mormonism, the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the Latter दिन Saint movement of Restorationist Christianity, which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate नई York दौरान the 1820s.
After Smith 's मौत in 1844 the mormons followed ब्रिघम Young to what would become the Utah Territory.
Today Mormons are understood to be सदस्यों of The Church of यीशु मसीह of Latter-day Saints ( LDS गिरिजाघर ).
Some Mormons are also either independent or non-practicing.
the center of Mormon cultural influence is in Utah, and North अमेरिका रै अधिक Mormons than any other continent, though the बहुमत of Mormons सजीव बाहर the United States.
Mormons have विकसित a strong भाव of communality that stems from their doctrine and history.
During the 19th century mormon converts tended to एकत्रित to a central geographic स्थान, and between 1852 and 1890 a minority of Mormons खुलकर practiced plural marriage, a form of धार्मिक polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and संसाधन to serving in their गिरिजाघर, and many young mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a स्वास्थ्य code that eschews alcoholic beverages, तम्बाकू, coffee, चाय, and other addictive substances.
They tend to be बहुत family-oriented, and have दमदार connections आरपार generations and with extended परिवार, reflective of their belief that परिवारों can be sealed together beyond मौत and throughout eternity.
Mormons भी have a strict law of chastity, requiring abstention इससे यौन relations outside of marriage और सख्त fidelity भीतर marriage.
Mormons self-identify as Christian, हालांकि कुछ of their beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity.
mormons मानना in the बाइबल, as well as अन्य किताबे of scripture, such as the किताब of Mormon.
वे have a अद्वितीय view of cosmology, and believe that all people are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the उदाहरण of Jesus Christ, और accepting his atonement through ordinances ऐसे as बपतिस्मा.
They believe that Christ 's church थी लौटी through Joseph Smith, और is guided by living prophets and apostles.
Central to Mormon faith is the विश्वास that परमेश्वर speaks to his children और जवाब उनके prayers.
In वित्तीय accounting, assets हैं आर्थिक resources.
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of being owned or controlled to produce value and that is held to have धनात्मक आर्थिक value is considered an asset.
बस stated, assets represent value of ownership कि can be converted into cash ( हालांकि cash itself is also considered an एसेट ).
The balance sheet of a firm records the monetaryJ.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. shim, `` the Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.There हैं different विधि of assessing the monetary मान of the assets अंकित on the संतुलन Sheet.
In some cases, the Historical Cost is used ; such that the value of the asset जब it थी bought in the past is used as the monetary मान.
in अन्य उदाहरण, the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट value of the asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
मान of the assets स्वामित्व by the firm.
It is धन और other valuables belonging to an व्यक्तिगत or कारोबार.
Two major एसेट वर्ग are tangible assets और intangible assets.
Tangible एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses, सहित current एसेट and फिक्स्ड assets.J.
Downes, J.E. गुडमैन, `` शब्दकोष of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's वित्तीय Guides, 2003 Current assets include inventory, while fixed assets शामिल such items as buildings and उपकरण.J. downes, J.E. Goodman, `` शब्दकोष of वित्त & निवेश Terms '', Baron 's Financial मार्गदर्शिका, 2003 ; और J. G. siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest जेब CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
intangible एसेट हैं nonphysical resources and rights that have a value to the firm because they give the firm some दयालु of advantage in the मार्केट place.
उदाहरण of intangible assets are goodwill, copyrights, trademarks, patents और computer कार्यक्रम, and financial एसेट, including ऐसे वस्तुएं as accounts receivable, bonds and stocks.
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell कि processes and transmits information through electrical and chemical सिग्नल.
A chemical signal occurs via a synapse, a specialized कनेक्शन with other cells.
Neurons कनेक्ट to प्रत्येक other to form neural networks.
Neurons हैं the core components of the बेचैन system, which शामिल the दिमाग, spinal cord, and peripheral ganglia.
a number of specialized प्रकार of neurons exist : sensory न्यूरॉन्स respond to touch, sound, light and numerous other stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं of the sensory organs कि then send signals to the स्पाइनल cord and brain.
मोटर neurons प्राप्त signals from the brain and spinal cord, cause मांसपेशी contractions, and affect glands.
Interneurons connect न्यूरॉन्स to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स within the same प्रदेश of the दिमाग or स्पाइनल cord.
A ठेठ neuron possesses a कोशिका देह ( often पुकारा the soma ), dendrites, and an axon.
Dendrites are thin structures that arise from the cell body, often extending for सैंकड़ों of micrometres and branching अनेक टाइम्स, giving rise to a जटिल `` dendritic tree ''.
an axon is a special सेल्यूलर extension that arises from the cell body at a साईट पुकारा the axon hillock and travels for a distance, as far as 1 meter in इंसानो or even more in other species.
the कोशिका देह of a neuron अक्सर gives rise to अनेक dendrites, but never to more than one axon, although the axon may branch सैंकड़ों of टाइम्स before it terminates.
At the बहुमत of synapses, सिग्नल हैं भेजा इससे the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another.
There are, however, many exceptions to these rules : न्यूरॉन्स that lack dendrites, neurons that have no axon, synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All न्यूरॉन्स are electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by अर्थात् of metabolically driven ion पंपों, जिससे combine with ion channels embedded in the झिल्ली to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, और कैल्सियम.
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent आयन चैनल्स.
if the voltage changes by a large enough राशि, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action potential is generated, which travels rapidly साथ the कोशिका 's axon, और activates सिनेप्टिक connections साथ other कोशिकाएं when it arrives.
न्यूरॉन्स do नहीं undergo कोशिका प्रभाग.
In most cases, neurons are उत्पन्न by खास types of stem cells.
astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have भी been observed to turn into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in दो दिमाग areas, the hippocampus and घ्राण bulb, वहीँ is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons.
सुपर Bowl XLIII was an American फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the American फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( afc ) champion पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स and the नेशनल Football Conference ( NFC ) चैंपियन एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season.
the स्टीलर्स defeated the Cardinals by the score of 27–23.
the game was played on फ़रवरी 1, 2009, at Raymond जेम्स स्टेडियम in tampa, फ्लोरिडा.
With this win, the Steelers became the first team to win six Super Bowls.
पिट्सबर्ग, जो finished the नियमित ऋतु with a 12–4 रिकार्ड, also won उनके दूसरी Super Bowl in चार years बाद winning Super कटोरी XL at the end of the 2005 season.
The Cardinals entered the game seeking their first NFL title since 1947, the longest चैंपियनशिप drought in the league.
The club became an अनपेक्षित विजेता during the regular season, compiling a 9–7 record, और the playoffs with the aid of head coach Ken Whisenhunt, who थी the Steelers ' offensive coordinator in Super Bowl xl, और the re-emergence of quarterback कर्ट Warner, who थी the सुपर Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with उसके पूर्व team, St. Louis मेढ़ों.
पिट्सबर्ग कूद to a 17–7 मध्यांतर lead, aided by linebacker जेम्स Harrison 's सुपर Bowl record 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth क्वार्टर, Arizona scored 16 unanswered अंक, सहित चौड़ी receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown रिसेप्शन, to लो the सीसे साथ 2:37 बाकी in the game.
But the Steelers marched 78 yards to स्कोर on चौड़ी receiver santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, जो caught नौ गुजरता for 131 yards and a touchdown, including चार receptions for 73 yards on that फाइनल game-winning drive, was named सुपर Bowl MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the पुरस्कार, and also was the third पिट्सबर्ग receiver to win the award, following Lynn Swann and Hines वार्ड.
Despite the global financial crisis और limited amount of ancillary festivities कि हैं normally held पहले the game, the NBC टेलीविज़न network broadcast attracted an औसत U.S. audience of 98.7 million दर्शक, making it the most watched Super कटोरी in इतिहास to that point.
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, showing various गुण across the range of बारंबारता and wavelengths
The electromagnetic वर्णक्रम is the range of all संभावित frequencies of electromagnetic radiation.
the `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning, and is instead the characteristic distribution of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण उत्सर्जित or absorbed by that particular object.
The इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum extends इससे below the कम बारंबारता used for modern रेडियो communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths from हज़ारों of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The सीमा for long wavelengths is the आकार of the universe itself, जबकि it is विचार that the short wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite और निरन्तर.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum हैं used in science लिये spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize पदार्थ.
in जोड, radiation from various भाग of the वर्णक्रम has found many अन्य uses लिये संचार और manufacturing ( see इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation for अधिक अनुप्रयोग ).
लेजेंड
Marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name प्रयुक्त to refer to all embryophytes ( land पौधे ) that do not have true vascular tissue and are इसलिए called ' non-vascular पौधे '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the हस्तांतरण of जल ; however since these do not contain lignin, they हैं not माना to be true vascular ऊतक.
Currently bryophytes are विचार not to be a natural or monophyletic group ; however the name is convenient and remains in use as a collective term for mosses, hornworts, और liverworts.
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ), but they produce neither पुष्प nor seeds, reproducing via spores.
The term bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` संयंत्र ''.
A bank is a financial institution and a financial intermediary that accepts deposits and channels those deposits into lending activities, either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A बैंको is the connection between customers that have capital deficits and ग्राहक with capital surpluses.
Due to उनके influence भीतर a वित्तीय system और an economy, banks are generally अत्यधिक regulated in most countries.
Most बैंको operate under a system known as fractional reserve banking where they hold only a छोटी reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the rest for profit.
वे हैं generally विषय to minimum capital requirements which are आधारित on an international set of capital standards, ज्ञात as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in अस्तित्व is Monte देई paschi di Siena, headquartered in Siena, इटली, which has been operating continuously since 1472.
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 ) and sveriges riksbank of स्वीडन ( 1668 ).
बैंकिंग in its modern sense evolved in rich cities of पुनर्जागरण Italy, such as Florence, Venice and Genoa.
in the इतिहास of बैंकिंग, a number of बैंकिंग dynasties —among them notably Medici, Fugger, Welser, berenberg, Baring and Rothschild —have निभाई a सेंट्रल role over अनेक सदियां.
The एक्सबॉक्स is a वीडियो game console manufactured by Microsoft.
it थी released on November 15, 2001 in उत्तर America, फ़रवरी 22, 2002 in Japan, and March 14, 2002 in Australia and Europe.
It was Microsoft 's first foray into the gaming console मार्केट.
as part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation 2, sega 's dreamcast ( which stopped American sales before the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
the एक्सबॉक्स थी the पहला console offered by an American company after the atari जैगुआर stopped बिक्री in 1996.
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in November 2002 allowed players to खेल खेल online with a ब्रॉडबैंड कनेक्शन.
it first competed with Dreamcast 's online service but later primarily competed with प्लेस्टेशन 2 's online सेवा.
हालांकि these two are free जबकि Xbox सजीव required a subscription, as well as broadband-only connection which थी not completely adopted yet, Xbox Live was a success due to better servers, features such as a buddy list, and पड़ाव शीर्षक like Halo 2 released in November 2004, जिससे is the best-selling Xbox video खेल and was by far the most popular online game लिये सालो.
Xbox 's successor, the Xbox 360, was शुभारम्भ in November 2005.
The Xbox was discontinued in late 2005 in Japan where sales were poor.
it थी discontinued in late 2006 in Europe and early 2007 in उत्तर America.
The last एक्सबॉक्स खेल in Europe was Tony हॉक 's Project 8 released in November 2006, and the last game in उत्तर अमेरिका थी Madden NFL 09 released in अगस्त 2008.
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2, 2009, stating कि कोई in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox access to Xbox Live was stopped on अप्रैल 15, 2010.
The इन्जील According to John ( यूनानी τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the Gospel of John or simply John and often referred to in नई Testament स्कॉलरशिप as the Fourth Gospel, is an खाता of the public मंत्रालय of यीशु.
it begins with the witness और प्रतिज्ञान by जॉन the Baptist और concludes with the death, burial, क़यामत, and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus.
This account is चौथी of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics मैथ्यू, चिह्नित और ल्यूक.
states that the किताब derives from the गवाही of the ' disciple जिसको यीशु loved. '
Along with Peter, the बेनाम disciple is especially close to यीशु, और early-church tradition identified him as John the Apostle, one of यीशु ' Twelve रसूलों.
The gospel is closely related in स्टाइल और सामग्री to the three surviving Epistles of John such कि टीकाकारों treat the four किताबे साथ, yet, according to most modern scholars, John थी not the लेखक of कोई of these books.
हाल Christian scripture scholarship more and more has लगाई John within a first-century Jewish कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
रेमंड E. Brown did pioneering work to trace the development of the परंपरा from which the gospel arose.
The प्रवचन seem to be concerned साथ the actual मुद्दे of the church-and-synagogue बहस at the time when the Gospel was written.
It is notable कि, in the gospel, the जातियाँ still appears to define itself primarily against judaism, rather than as part of a wider ईसाई गिरिजाघर.
Though Christianity started as a movement भीतर Judaism, gradually ईसाइयों and यहूदियों became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, meaning that it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the divine Logos through whom all बाते were made, as the object of veneration, and more explicitly as God incarnate.
तभी in John does यीशु बात at length परिचय himself और his दैवी role, often shared साथ the disciples only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on different चमत्कार ( सहित resurrecting Lazarus ), दिए as signs meant to engender faith.
Synoptic तत्व such as parables and exorcisms हैं not मिला in John.
it presents a एहसास eschatology in which मोक्ष is already present लिये the आस्तिक.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also called the Ten plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, were ten calamities कि, according to the biblical किताब of Exodus, Israel 's परमेश्वर, Yahweh, inflicted upon मिश्र to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated israelites from slavery.
Pharaoh capitulated after the tenth plague, triggering the exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to कंट्रास्ट the power of Yahweh with the नपुंसकता of Egypt 's विभिन्न gods.
Some commentators have संबद्ध several of the plagues with judgment on specific gods संबद्ध with the Nile, fertility और natural phenomena.
The plagues of मिश्र are also mentioned in the कुरान ( 7,133–136 ).
according to the Book of Exodus, God proclaims that all the gods of Egypt will be judged through the दसवाँ and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the plague of hail और fire ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( आरपीजी and sometimes roleplaying खेल ) is a game in जिससे players assume the भूमिकाएँ of वर्ण in a fictional setting.
Players take responsibility लिये acting out these भूमिकाएँ within a narrative, either through literal acting or through a process of संरचित decision-making or अक्षर development.
क्रियाएँ taken within अनेक games succeed or fail according to a formal system of नियम and guidelines.
There are several forms of RPG.
The original रूप, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through discussion, whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions.
in both of these फ़ॉर्म, an arranger पुकारा a game निपुण ( GM ) usually decides on the rules and सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और acts as referee, जबकि each of the अन्य खिलाड़ी plays the role of a single अक्षर.
Several किस्में of RPG भी exist in electronic media, such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors, massively एकाधिक online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
role-playing games also शामिल single-player offline role-playing video games in which players control a character or team जो undertake quests, और may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics.
These games often share settings और rules with tabletop RPGs, but emphasize अक्षर उन्नति more than collaborative storytelling.
despite this variety of फ़ॉर्म, कुछ game forms such as trading card games and wargames that हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing खेल may not be included.
role-playing activity may sometimes be उपस्थित in such खेल, but it is not the primary focus.
the term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay सिमुलेशन खेल and exercises used in शिक्षण, training, and academic research.
The अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), थी a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several दक्षिणी स्लेव states that declared their secession and formed the confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war had its उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया not intervene.
After four years of खूनी combat that बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers dead and नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी was abolished, और the difficult पुनर्निर्माण process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
in the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव states formed the Confederacy.
outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष James बुकानन and the incoming republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित his administration would not initiate civil युद्ध.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत calls लिये secession.
Confederate शक्तियां seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन failed to find a compromise, और both sides prepared लिये war.
The Confederates assumed that यूरोपीय देशों were so निर्भर on `` King Cotton `` कि they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of अमेरिका.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी fort held by संघ troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln पुकारा लिये each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, चार more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके total to eleven.
The Union जल्द नियंत्रित the border राज्य and established a naval blockade कि अबोध the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
the Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which बना ending slavery a war लक्ष्य.
to the west, by summer 1862 the संघ destroyed the confederate river नेवी, then much of their western armies, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant कमांड of all Union सेना in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी थिएटर, William T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the confederacy इससे all directions, and could afford to लड़ो battles of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army विफल, leading to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा industrial युद्धों.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, banks, परिवहन and food आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed World War i.
it remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years बूढ़ा, and 30 प्रतिशत of all दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
the definition of the world 's व्यस्ततम airport has महरूम specified by the एयरपोर्ट परिषद अंतरराष्ट्रीय in Geneva, Switzerland.
The aci defines and measures the following three types of airport traffic:
यात्री ट्रैफ़िक : total यात्री emplaned and deplaned, passengers in पारगमन गिने once
Cargo traffic : loaded and unloaded भाड़ा and mail in मीट्रिक tonnes
Traffic movements : landings and take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( wwi ) was a वैश्विक war centred in यूरोपीय that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted जबतक 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध from इसके occurrence जबतक the start of World War ii in 1939, and the First World युद्ध or World War I thereafter.
It शामिल all the world 's great powers, जिससे were assembled in दो opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the ट्रिपल Entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, France and Russia ) and the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, austria-hungary and इटली ; but, as Austria–Hungary had लिया the offensive against the agreement, इटली did not डालें into the war ).
ये alliances were both reorganised and विस्तारित as अधिक nations डाला the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the उस्मानी साम्राज्य and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
it was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world इतिहास, subsequently paving the रास्ता for विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
एक of the long-term causes of the war थी the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign नीतियों of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
अधिक immediately, the assassination of archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis जब Austria-Hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of सर्बिया.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous दशकों were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख powers were at war and, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation लिये the आक्रमण of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of युद्ध विरूद्ध Germany.
After the German कूच on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the Western सामने settled into a स्थिर battle of attrition साथ a गर्त line कि changed little until 1917.
on the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful विरूद्ध the Austro-Hungarians, लकिन was रोका in its आक्रमण of East Prussia by the germans.
In नवम्बर the Ottoman Empire joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, मेसोपोटामिया and the sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria गई to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the त्सार 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
जर्मनी, जिससे had इसके own trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the युद्ध ended in victory for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts यहूद as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to लड़ो a total war.
by the end of the war, चार major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two खोया a great amount of territory, while the latter two यहूद dismantled entirely.
The मैप of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller राज्य.
The लीग of Nations थी formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The यूरोपीय nationalism spawned by the युद्ध और the breakup of empires, the परखना of Germany 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the Treaty of Versailles हैं सहमत to be factors contributing to World War II.
the Deepwater क्षितिज आयल spill ( also referred to as the bp आयल spill, the BP oil disaster, the गल्फ of मैक्सिको आयल spill, and the macondo blowout ) was an आयल spill in the Gulf of मैक्सिको on the BP -operated Macondo prospect, माना the largest accidental marine आयल spill in the इतिहास of the पेट्रोलियम उद्योग, estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I आयल spill.
Following the विस्फोट and sinking of the deepwater Horizon oil rig, which claimed 11 जीवनदान, a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated for 87 दिनों, until it थी capped on 15 July 2010.
The total निर्वहन is estimated at.
A massive response ensued to protect beaches, wetlands and estuaries इससे the spreading oil utilizing skimmer जहाजों, floating booms, नियंत्रित burns and of Corexit oil dispersant.
After several विफल प्रयत्न to contain the प्रवाह, the well was declared sealed on 19 September 2010.
Some रिपोर्ट्स indicate the खूब site continues to leak.
Due to the months-long spill, along साथ प्रतिकूल effects from the जवाब and क्लीनअप activities, extensive damage to समुद्री and wildlife habitats, fishing and पर्यटन industries, and इंसान health समस्याएं have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill, tar गेंदें could still be found on the मिसिसिपी coast.
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the explosion and record-setting spill.
Notably, the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the well, faulting mostly bp, but भी well operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a श्वेत House commission likewise blamed BP and इसके साझेदार for a series of cost-cutting निर्णय and an insufficient safety प्रणाली, लकिन भी concluded that the spill resulted from `` systemic '' root causes and `` absent significant reform in both उद्योग practices and government नीतियों, might well recur ''.
in November 2012, BP and the United राज्य Department of इंसाफ settled federal दण्ड charges with BP pleading अपराधी to 11 counts of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to Congress.
bp also agreed to four years of सरकारी monitoring of its safety practices और आचार, and the पर्यावरणीय Protection एजेंसी announced कि BP would be temporarily banned इससे new अनुबंध with the us सरकारी.
BP and the Department of Justice सहमत to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines और other payments लकिन further विधिक proceedings not expected to conclude जबतक 2014 are जारी to determine payouts and fines under the Clean जल अधिनियम and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment.
as of फ़रवरी 2013, दण्ड and सिविल settlements and payments to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion.
`` जहाँ the गलियों Have No Name '' is a सोंग by rock band U2.
it is the opening track from their 1987 album The जोशुआ Tree और was released as the एल्बम 's third single in August 1987.
the song 's आँकड़ा is a repeating गिटार arpeggio using a delay effect, played during the सोंग 's introduction and again at the end.
सीसे vocalist बोनो wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is संभावित to identify a व्यक्ति 's धर्म and income based on the street on which they lived, particularly in belfast.
During the band 's difficulties recording the song, producer Brian Eno considered erasing the song 's tapes to have them प्रारंभ from scratch.
`` Where the Streets Have No नाम '' was praised by critics और became a commercial success, peaking at number thirteen in the us, number चौदह in Canada, क्रमांक टेन in the नीदरलैंड्स, and क्रमांक four in the United किंगडम.
The song has become one of the band 's most popular songs and has remained a staple of their live अधिनियम since the song debuted in 1987 on the जोशुआ Tree Tour.
The song थी notably performed on a Los Angeles छत for the filming of its music video, which जीती a Grammy Award for Best Performance Music Video.Recently the song has been used by the एनएफएल 's बाल्टीमोर ravens as उनके entrance song in Super कटोरी XLVII
थामस जेफरी `` tom '' हैंक्स ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an American actor, producer, writer, and director.
Hanks is known for उसके roles in Apollo 13, Big, That बात You Do !
, the Green Mile, You 've Got Mail, Sleepless in Seattle, Charlie विल्सन 's War, कैच me if तुम can, Forrest गंप, Cast दूर, A League of Their Own, the Da विंची Code, फ़रिश्ते & राक्षसों, as खूब as animated films जैसे the Toy Story film श्रेणी, the Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career, including जीतना a Golden Globe लिये Best Actor and an अकादमी Award for बेहतरीन Actor लिये his role in Philadelphia and a सुनहरी ग्लोब, an Academy Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and a People 's चुनाव Award for बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये his role in Forrest Gump, and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia पुरस्कार for Excellence in Film from the baftas in 2004.
Hanks is also known for his सहयोग with फिल्मी director Steven Spielberg on छायांकन Private रयान and the mini-series Band of Brothers, जिससे शुभारम्भ Hanks also as a successful director, producer and लेखक.
As of 2012, हैंक्स ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the United States box दफ्तर alone, and over $ 8.5 billion विश्वव्यापी making him the highest all-time box office star.
The केप is an American superhero नाटक series.
It premiered on एनबीसी दौरान the 2010–2011 टेलीविज़न season as a mid-season replacement beginning with a two-hour pilot एपीसोड on Sunday, January 9, 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time.
An encore played on सोमवार, January 10, साथ follow-up episodes continuing on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on जनवरी 17.
NBC subsequently काटें the कुल क्रमांक of एपीसोड to be aired from 13 to 10 as a result of कम ratings.
on March 2, 2011, NBC announced that the श्रेणी finale would तभी be aired on the network 's website.
Halley 's धूमकेतु or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible इससे Earth प्रत्येक 75–76 सालो.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked नजर from धरती, and thus the only naked-eye comet कि might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be brighter और अधिक spectacular, but will appear तभी once in thousands of सालो.
Halley 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी Solar System have been observed और recorded by खगोलशास्त्रियों since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances यहूद made by Chinese, Babylonian, and मध्यकालीन European chroniclers, but were नहीं recognized as reappearances of the वही object at the time.
The धूमकेतु 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली, after जिसको it is now नामित.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar प्रणाली in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During इसके 1986 apparition, Halley became the पहला comet to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma और tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet निर्माण, particularly Fred whipple 's `` गंदा snowball '' model, जिससे correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon डाइऑक्साइड और ammonia – और धूल.
The मिशन भी provided आंकड़ा which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now समझा कि Halley 's surface is largely रचित of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, and that only a छोटी portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the सबसे populous incorporated places of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
as defined by the United राज्य जनसांख्यिकी Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations, सहित city, कस्बा, village, बरो, and नगरपालिका.
A few असाधारण Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the जनसांख्यिकी Bureau 's listing of incorporated स्थान.
संचित city-counties represent a distinct type of सरकारी कि includes the entire जनसांख्यिकी of a काउंटी, or county समतुल्य.
Some संचित city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated places.
This list presents only कि portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated प्लेस.
नोट that this सूची refers only to the population of individual municipalities within उनके defined हद, which करता not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A अलग ranking is evident when considering U.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.
The Mayflower थी the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a कोर group of Separatists, to New इंग्लैण्ड.
Their story is एक of travail and अस्तित्व in a harsh New World environment.
a New जीलैंड forward ( in white ) takes a शॉट on goal against Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup.
आगे, also known as strikers, are the खिलाड़ी on a team in संघ फ़ुटबॉल who खेल निकटतम to the opposing team 's लक्ष्य, and हैं therefore principally responsible for scoring goals.
इस very advanced position and its सीमित रक्षात्मक जिम्मेदारियों औसत forwards normally score अधिक लक्ष्य than other players.
This position requires intelligence, speed, और power, दोनो of execution और of thought, to perform the role well.
आधुनिक team formations usually शामिल one to three forwards ; two is the सबसे common.
कोच typically field one striker जो plays in an उन्नत स्थिति ( the centre forward ), and another attacking आगे who plays somewhat deeper और assists in making goals as खूब as scoring ( the second striker ).
It चाहिए be noted कि inside forwards develop इससे attacking midfield positions and hence are naturally midfielders.
Barcelona FC star Lionel मेस्सी is a typical attacking Midfielder seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy.
A California domestic partnership is a विधिक relationship उपलब्धियाँ to same-sex युगल, और to certain opposite-sex couples in जिससे at least one party is at least 18 years of आयु.
it affords the couple `` the वही अधिकारों, protections, और benefits, and... the वही responsibilities, दायित्वों, and duties under law... '' as married spouses.
enacted in 1999, the घरेलू partnership registry was the first of its kind in the United राज्य created by a legislature बगैर court हस्तक्षेप.
Initially, घरेलू partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally just hospital-visitation rights and the right to be claimed as a अगला of kin of the estate of a मृतक partner.
the legislature has चूंकि विस्तारित the पैमाना of California domestic partnerships to include all of the अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों common to marriage.
As such, California घरेलू partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil संघ offered in अनेक other राज्य.
हालांकि the कार्यक्रम enjoys broad support in California, it has been the source of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the expansion of घरेलू partnerships in अदालत.
Conversely, advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights विस्तारित to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era.
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball coach, and former player who is the वर्तमान head कोच of the सुनहरी राज्य Warriors of the NBA.
A पाइंट गार्ड from St. जॉन 's विश्वविद्यालयों, he निभाई for the New York Knicks, Indiana Pacers, Los एंजिल्स Clippers, Denver Nuggets, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the एनबीए in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004.
Jackson has also worked as a commentator for ESPN and एबीसी alongside his former coach Jeff वैन gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen.
he was previously an NBA analyst for the YES संजाल 's New Jersey नेट खेल.
South Africa has ग्यारह official languages : अफ्रीकी, English, Ndebele, Northern Sotho, sotho, Swazi, Tswana, सोंगा, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
कम than two percent of South Africans बोलो a first language other than an official one.
Most South Africans can बोलो more than one language.
डच and अंग्रेज़ी were the पहला आधिकारिक languages of South Africa from 1910 to 1925.
Afrikaans थी added as a भाग of डच in 1925.
डच was replaced by Afrikaans when South अफ़्रीकी became a republic in 1961, and डच थी dropped in 1983, so between 1983 and 1994, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी had two आधिकारिक languages : English और Afrikaans.
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, sepedi ( referring to Northern sotho ), Setswana, English, Sesotho ( referring to Southern sotho ), Xitsonga, siswati, Tshivenda और isindebele ( referring to Southern ndebele ).
In दक्षिण Africa, दक्षिणी Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele, as सबसे speakers of Northern Ndebele live in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 version of the संविधान referred to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa, लकिन the 1996 संस्करण referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different government departments and आधिकारिक bodies use different terms to denote Northern sotho.
the main language of government is अंग्रेज़ी even if South africans often take pride in using indigenous भाषाएं for any purpose.
Afrikaans also features prominently in commerce साथ with English as the भाषाएं with the highest क्रमांक of fluent speakers हैं Afrikaans और English.
in शर्तें of linguistic classification, the आधिकारिक भाषाएं शामिल दो west-germanic languages ( अंग्रेज़ी और Afrikaans ) and nine bantu languages.
Four of these are Nguni languages ( ज़ुलू, ख़ोसा, स्वाति और Ndebele ) and three are Sotho–Tswana languages ( Northern Sotho, Southern Sotho और Tswana ).
Tsonga is a Tswa–Ronga language.
South African Sign Language is a distinct हालांकि incompletely emerged नेशनल standard language जिससे also subsumes a क्लस्टर of semi-standardised dialects.
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric एसिड, मौजूदा सामान्यतः as a crystalline hydrate, सबसे commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate, Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
The नई York Jets हैं a professional football team headquartered in Florham पार्क, नई Jersey, representing the New यॉर्क महानगर area.
The team is a सदस्य of the Eastern Division of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
In a unique arrangement for the लीग, the jets share MetLife Stadium in East रदरफोर्ड, New Jersey with the नई यॉर्क Giants.
The franchise is legally और corporately registered as नई York Jets, LLC.
The team was founded in 1959 as the टाइटन्स of New York, an original member of the American फ़ुटबॉल League ; later, the मताधिकार joined the NFL in the afl–nfl merger.
The team began to play in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
Under new ownership, the current name was अपनाया in 1963 और the franchise was relocated to shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984.
The Jets उन्नत to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in Super Bowl III where they defeated the Baltimore कोल्टस, becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World चैंपियनशिप Game.
Since 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen टाइम्स, and in the afc Championship Game four times, most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010.
however, the jets have never returned to the Super Bowl, बनाना them one of three NFL teams to win उनके lone Super Bowl appearance, साथ with the New Orleans Saints and Tampa खाड़ी Buccaneers.
The team 's प्रशिक्षण facility, Atlantic Health Jets प्रशिक्षण बीच, जिससे opened in 2008, is located in Florham पार्क.
the टोली currently holds उनके सालाना प्रशिक्षण camp सत्र on the campus of the State University of नई यॉर्क at Cortland in Cortland, New यॉर्क while holding occasional सत्र at the florham Park complex.
Psilocybe semilanceata
psilocybin मशरूम, also known as साइकेडेलिक मशरूम, are fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There हैं अनेक colloquial terms लिये psilocybin मशरूम, the most common being shrooms and magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin मशरूम include Agrocybe, Conocybe, Copelandia, Galerina, Gerronema, Gymnopilus, Hypholoma, inocybe, Mycena, Panaeolus, Pluteus, and psilocybe.
There are approximately 190 species of psilocybin mushrooms and most of them fall in the genus psilocybe.
Psilocybin मशरूम have संभावित महरूम used since प्रागैतिहासिक times और may have महरूम depicted in चट्टान art.
अनेक cultures have प्रयुक्त these mushrooms in धार्मिक rites.
In modern Western society वे हैं used recreationally for their साइकेडेलिक effects.
Recent studies किया at इम्पीरियल College London and Johns Hopkins School of Medicine conclude that when प्रयुक्त properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as सुझाया by fmri brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the North American महाद्वीप, with the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ Canada to the ईस्ट, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, साथ Russia further वेस्ट आरपार the Bering Strait.
अलास्का is the largest राज्य in the United States by area, the 4th least populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
लगभग half of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों live भीतर the Anchorage metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil, natural गैस, and फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it has these resources in प्रचुरता.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित for महंगाई ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, and the 49th राज्य of the U.S. on जनवरी 3, 1959.
The name `` अलास्का '' ( аляска ) थी already introduced in the रूसी colonial काल, when it was प्रयुक्त तभी for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the मेनलैंड '' or, अधिक literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
it is also known as Alyeska, the `` great land '', an Aleut word derived from the वही root.
The 101 French विभाग are विभाजित into 342 arrondissements, which may be अनूदित into अंग्रेज़ी as districts.
the capital of an arrondissement/district is पुकारा a subprefecture.
जब an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department, that prefecture is the पूंजी of the arrondissement, acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture.
arrondissements हैं further divided into cantons and communes.
The योनि ( from Latin vāgīna, literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट which is a sex अंग and has two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth.
in humans, इस passage लीड from the opening of the vulva to the uterus ( womb ), लकिन the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
Unlike men, जो have only one genital orifice, महिलाओं have दो, the urethra and the योनि.
The vaginal खोलने is much larger than the urethral खोलने, and both openings are protected by the labia.
The inner mould of the vagina has a foldy बनावट which can create friction for the penis during मैथुन.
दौरान arousal, the vagina gets moist to facilitate the entrance of the शिश्न.
the Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely used in English.
colloquially, the word vagina is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to the vulva or to the female गुप्तांग in सामान्य.
however, by इसके dictionary and anatomical परिभाषाएं, vagina refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major लीग Baseball team based in सिनसिनाटी, Ohio.
वे हैं members of the National League Central Division.
स्थापित in 1881 as an स्वतंत्र club, the टोली became a charter सदस्य of the American संघ in 1882, और joined the National लीग in 1890.
the club traditionally traces इसके उत्पत्ति to baseball 's first openly professional team in 1869.
The लाल have जीती five संसार Series शीर्षक, एक American Association pennant, nine नेशनल लीग pennants and ten division titles.
The Reds played in the National League West between 1969 and 1993 and have महरूम in the नेशनल League सेंट्रल since 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have played at Great American Ball Park, built next to उनके home from 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
Bob Castellini रै owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006.
A prank stink bomb.
a stink bomb is a device designed to create an unpleasant महकते.
They range in effectiveness from simple pranks to military grade malodorants or riot control रासायनिक agents.
the Guinness Book of Records सूचियाँ two smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government मानक Bathroom malodor '' ; a mixture of eight chemicals with a stench resembling human मल, तभी much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and एयर fresheners.
Another one, `` Who me ? ``, is a mixture of पाँच sulfur-containing रसायन और खुश्बू जैसे rotting खाना and carcasses.
The कहावत `` A picture is लायक a thousand शब्द '' refers to the notion कि a complex idea can be conveyed साथ just a single still चित्र.
it also aptly characterizes one of the प्रमुख goals of visualization, namely making it संभावित to absorb large amounts of data quickly.
the अभिव्यक्ति `` Use a चित्र.
It 's worth a thousand शब्द. '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor आर्थर Brisbane discussing journalism और publicity.
1913 newspaper advertisement
A similar phrase, `` एक dekh Is Worth a Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 समाचारपत्र advertisement for the piqua स्वचालित Supply हाउस of Piqua, ओहियो.
An जल्दी use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 समाचारपत्र advertisement for the San Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's महानतम Editors Says : One चित्र is Worth a हजार Words The सैन अंतोनियो लाइट 's सचित्र Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm रिसेप्शन it रै received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers.
it is believed by some कि the आधुनिक use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the advertising व्यापार journal मुद्रक ' स्याही, promoting the उपयोग of images in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars.
the December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad entitled, `` एक Look is Worth A Thousand Words. ''
another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 issue साथ the phrase `` One Picture लायक Ten हजार Words, '' where it is labeled a Chinese कहावत ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
the घर Book of Proverbs, Maxims, और परिचित वाक्यांश quotes Barnard as saying he called it `` a Chinese कहावत, so that लोगों होता take it seriously. ''
Soon after, the proverb would become popularly attributed to Confucius.
The discussion of `` One Picture लायक हजार शब्द '' बनाम `` One चित्र लायक टेन Thousand शब्द '' Wan येन i hua और 10.000 miles worth 10.000 किताबे is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in अलग disciplines और cultures.
A picture is लायक a हजार words
Despite this आधुनिक उत्पत्ति of the लोकप्रिय phrase, the sentiment रै been expressed by earlier writers.
For example the रूसी लेखक इवान Turgenev लिखा ( in Fathers and बेटे in 1862 ), `` A picture shows me at a glance कया it takes दर्जनों of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer programmer and लेखक Fred Brooks makes an opposite बयान regarding programming in The mythical man-month : `` Show me your flowcharts and छिपाते अपना टेबल, and I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me your टेबल, and I won’t usually need अपना flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has भी been spoofed by John McCarthy, the famous कंप्यूटर scientist, to make the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say, 1001 words is worth more than a चित्र. ''
a ऋतु is a subdivision of the year, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, और hours of daylight.
Seasons परिणाम इससे the वार्षिक revolution of the Earth around the सूर्य and the tilt of the Earth 's अक्ष relative to the plane of revolution.
In शीतोष्ण और polar regions, the seasons हैं marked by परिवर्तन in the intensity of धूप कि reaches the धरती 's सतह, variations of which may कारण animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, जून and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct sunlight क्युकी the गोलार्ध faces the sun.
the वही is true of the southern hemisphere in November, दिसम्बर और January.
it is the tilt of the Earth that causes the सूर्य to be higher in the sky during the summer months जिससे increases the सौर flux.
however, due to मौसमी lag, जून, July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere और December, January and February हैं the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate और subpolar regions, generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), पतझड़ ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
however, ecologists ज़्यादातर use a छह ऋतु model for temperate climate regions कि includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or मानसून ) season और the dry season, and in कुछ tropical areas, a cool or mild ऋतु.
In some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on important कार्यक्रम such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a दावानल ऋतु.
the six ecological सीज़न
the four पंचांग सीज़न, depicted in an प्राचीन Roman मोज़ेक इससे ट्यूनीशिया
डच निर्यात in 2006
at the time of writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था of the संसार.
( see : List of countries by GDP ( nominal ) )
जीडीपी per capita is roughly $ 42,000 जिससे puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the संसार ( see : List of देशों by GDP ( PPP ) प्रति capita ).
between 1996 and 2000 annual economic विकास ( GDP ) averaged over 4 %, खूब above the European average.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as part of the global economic slowdown.
2006 and 2007 however दिखाया economic growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The Dutch अर्थव्यवस्था was hit considerably by the ongoing global वित्तीय crisis and the ensuing European कर्ज़ crisis.
Several banks went bankrupt, और a number of others had to receive governmental सहायता.
In 2009 the economy declined साथ 3.5 %, followed by two years of mild growth.
The Dutch economy is फिलहाल in a recession again, with an आर्थिक decline of 0.5 % in 2012.
महंगाई is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
Unemployment रै been अपेक्षाकृत low compared to other EU राष्ट्र for decades but बाद mid-2012 it रै seen a तेज़ increase and in February 2013 it रै hit 7.7 %.
the Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at least until March 2013 according to the three major क्रेडिट rating agencies.
Historically, the डच introduced और invented the भण्डार market by the merchandise trading through Dutch West India Company.
The Netherlands is a founding सदस्य of the European संघ, the OECD and the World Trade Organization.

The original फलक of The View ; मेरेडिथ Vieira, Star Jones, Debbie matenopoulos and Barbara Walters in 1997.
The View is an American talk show ब्रॉडकास्ट on ABC that debuted in 1997 as part of the network 's daytime प्रोग्रामिंग block.
Created by बारबरा Walters and Bill Geddie, who दोनो also serve as the show 's executive producers, the program सुविधाएँ a panel of women as co-hosts.
साथ साथ Walters, the वर्तमान panel includes Whoopi Goldberg, जो serves as the moderator, आनन्द behar, Elisabeth Hasselbeck, and Sherri गड़रिये.
International versions of the program are aired in several countries.
As of the 2012–13 season, its 16th, the दृश्य is the fourth-longest running national daytime talk show in इतिहास, behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ), the variously-named Live !
कार्यक्रम ( 25 ), and The ओपरा Winfrey Show ( 25 ).
prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, Virginia बर्ड चेरी and western chokecherry ( also ब्लैक chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to उत्तर America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the महाद्वीप, except for the far north and far south.
Los एंजिल्स International विमानक्षेत्र is the primary airport सेवारत the वृहद Los Angeles Area, the second-most आबादी महानगर area in the United राज्य.
it is most प्रायः referred to by its IATA विमानक्षेत्र code lax, with the letters pronounced individually.
LAX is located in southwestern Los Angeles along the Pacific coast in the पड़ोस of westchester, from the downtown core and is the प्राथमिक airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( lawa ), an एजेंसी of the लॉस Angeles city सरकारी formerly known as the विभाग of Airports.
In 2011, LAX थी the sixth busiest airport in the world after hartsfield-jackson अटलांटा International विमानक्षेत्र, Beijing Capital अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, London Heathrow Airport, Chicago O'Hare अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, and Tokyo Haneda अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र with 61,862,052 passengers.
The airport holds the claim for `` the संसार 's busiest origin and destination ( O & d ) airport '' in 2011 कि involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
It is भी the तभी विमानक्षेत्र to rank among the शीर्ष five U.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये both passenger and कार्गो traffic.
lax is the busiest airport in the वृहद लॉस Angeles Area, लकिन अन्य airports including Bob Hope Airport, John Wayne Airport, Long Beach Airport, LA/Ontario International विमानक्षेत्र, and Palm Springs अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र also serve the region.
LAX is also the व्यस्ततम airport in California and the West Coast of the United States in शर्तें of flight operations, passenger traffic and air cargo कार्यकलाप, leading it to be referred to as the `` गेटवे to the Pacific Rim ``.
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an American football quarterback लिये the Denver Broncos of the नेशनल Football लीग ( NFL ).
He played लिये the Indianapolis Colts लिये 14 seasons from 1998 to 2011.
He is the son of former NFL क्वार्टरबैक Archie Manning and an elder brother of नई यॉर्क Giants quarterback एली मैनिंग.
Manning played college football for the University of Tennessee, अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 सेक चैंपियनशिप in उसके senior ऋतु.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the No. 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the Orange Bowl giving नेब्रास्का and tom ओसबोर्न their 3rd national championship in 4 years.
He was चुनी by the Indianapolis Colts with the first overall चुनें in the 1998 NFL Draft.
इससे 1998 to 2010, he led the Colts to eight ( seven AFC South and one AFC East ) division championships, दो AFC championships, and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ).
He रै जीती a रिकार्ड four league सबसे मूल्यवान player awards, was the सबसे valuable player of Super Bowl XLI, has been named to बारह प्रो Bowls, has बारह 4,000-yard passing seasons, और is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown गुजरता ( 399 ).
in 2009, he was नामित the best player in the एनएफएल और फॉक्स खेल along साथ खेल illustrated named him the NFL player of the दशक of the 2000s.
in may 2011, he underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन pain and arm weakness he dealt साथ during the previous few seasons before signing a five-year, $ 90 लाख contract एक्सटेंशन with the Colts in July 2011.

मैनिंग had never missed an एनएफएल game in his career, but थी forced to miss the entire 2011 ऋतु.

Baker Hughes is one of the world 's largest oilfield services companies.
It operates in over 90 countries, providing the oil and gas industry with products and services for drilling, formation evaluation, completion, उत्पादन and reservoir consulting.
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the अमरीकी General बीच in Neartown, ह्यूस्टन.
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय और Hughes Tool Company merged in 1987.
Baker Hughes operates विश्वव्यापी with major offices in Liverpool, संयुक्त Kingdom ; Singapore ; Dubai ; a शोध और maintenance facility in celle, Germany ; lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, टेक्सास ; Pescara, Italy ; and Kuala lumpur, मलेशिया.
The company is administered broadly in दो hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe, अफ़्रीकी, the मध्य East, Asia Pacific and russia/caspian ) and the western hemisphere with चार regions ( कनाडा, us जमीन, US Gulf, and Latin अमेरिका ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into बाज़ार.
The United States one- cent coin, commonly known as a पैनी, is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a संयुक्त States डालर.
The cent 's symbol is ¢.
Its obverse has प्रदर्शित the profile of अध्यक्ष Abraham Lincoln since 1909, the centennial of his birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the रिवर्स featured the lincoln Memorial.
चार different रिवर्स designs in 2009 सम्मानित Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a new, permanent reverse – the Union शील्ड – थी introduced in 2010.
the सिक्का is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter और 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The U.S. Mint 's official name for a पैनी is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official नाम is `` one cent piece ''.
the colloquial term पैनी derives इससे the British सिक्का of the same नाम, the pre-decimal version of which had a समान मान.
In American English, pennies is the plural form, अन्य plural फ़ॉर्म पेंस and pee ( मानक उपयोग in British English ) are not used.
As of 2012, it लागत the U.S. Mint 2.00 सेंट to make a cent because of the लागत of सामग्री and production.
This फिगर शामिल the Mint’s fixed components लिये distribution and fabrication, estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
It also शामिल Mint overhead allocated to the penny, which was $ 17.7 million for 2011.
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be absorbed by other circulating coins without the penny.
The loss in profitability due to producing the एक cent coin in the संयुक्त States for the साल of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
This was a पतला घटी from 2011, the year पहले, which had a उत्पादन loss of $ 60,200,000.
or अधिक specifically, are ornamental varieties of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio ) that are kept लिये decorative purposes in outdoor कोई ponds or water gardens.

the American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 कर्मचारी of the federal government, about 5,000 कर्मचारी of the District of Columbia, and a few सौ private सेक्टर employees, mostly in and around federal facilities.

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing स्तर of complexity, इससे the earliest algal mats, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the जटिल gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
While many of the groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in which they evolved, for a समय each new grade of संगठन became more `` successful '' than इसके predecessors.
In the Ordovician period, around, the first land plants appeared.
ये began to diversify in the late Silurian Period, around, and the परिणाम of their diversification हैं displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert.
This chert preserved early plants in cellular विवरण, petrified in volcanic springs.
by the middle of the devonian Period, सबसे of the features recognised in plants आज हैं present, including roots, leaves और secondary लकडी ; and, by late Devonian times, seeds had evolved.
Late devonian पौधे था thereby पहुँचे a उपाधि of sophistication that allowed them to form वनों of tall trees.
विकासवादी नवीनता जारी into the carboniferous period and is still जारी आज.
Most plant groups were अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the Permo-Triassic extinction event, although the structures of समुदायों changed.
इस may have set the झाँकी लिये the रूप of the flowering plants in the triassic ( ~ ), and their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene.
The latest major समूह of plants to evolve were the grasses, which became important in the mid-Paleogene, from around.
The grasses, as खूब as many other groups, विकसित new mechanisms of metabolism to survive the low and गरम, शुष्क शर्तें of the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध over the पिछला.
the winning Super Bowl team receives the विंस Lombardi Trophy.
The Super Bowl is an annual American football खेल that determines the champion of the National Football League ( NFL ).
The प्रतियोगिता is आयोजित in an अमरीकी city that is chosen three to four years beforehand, usually in warm-weather or domed साइट.
Since 1971, the विजेता of the अमरीकी Football Conference ( AFC ) Championship खेल रै faced the winner of the National फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( nfc ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs.
पहले the 1970 विलय between the American Football League ( AFL ) and the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ), the two लीग met in four ऐसे contests.
The first दो were known as the `` afl-nfl World Championship Game. ''
Super कटोरी iii in 1969 थी the first such game that carried the `` Super Bowl '' moniker, the names `` Super Bowl I `` and `` सुपर कटोरी ii `` यहूद retroactively applied to the first दो games.
The NFC /NFL leads in सुपर कटोरी wins with 25, while the AFC /AFL रै won 22.
Eighteen अलग franchises, सहित teams that relocated to another city, have won the Super कटोरी.
The Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स have won the सबसे Super Bowls with six championships ( record 6–2 ), while both the Dallas cowboys and San फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have five wins प्रत्येक ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas और Pittsburgh have the most Super कटोरी appearances with eight, while the भैंस Bills have the most लगातार appearances with four losses in a पंक्ति इससे 1990 to 1993.
The New England Patriots, Denver Broncos और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स have भी lost a record four Super Bowls.
भैंस and Minnesota are both 0–4, डेनवर is 2–4 and New England is 3–4.
The record for लगातार wins is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay पैकर्स, the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 Pittsburgh Steelers ( the only team to accomplish इस feat twice ), the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys, the 1997-98 डेनवर Broncos, और the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The only टोली साथ multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the Baltimore Ravens, who in winning Super कटोरी xlvii unseated and replaced the 49ers in that स्थिति.
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a सुपर कटोरी, सहित franchise relocations and renaming : the क्लीवलैंड Browns, Detroit Lions, jacksonville Jaguars, and ह्यूस्टन Texans, though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL चैंपियनशिप games prior to the creation of the सुपर कटोरी.

Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP, alkp ) ( ) is a hydrolase एंजाइम responsible for removing फास्फेट groups from many प्रकार of molecules, including nucleotides, proteins, and alkaloids.
the process of removing the phosphate group is पुकारा dephosphorylation.
As the नाम suggests, क्षारीय phosphatases are most effective in an क्षारीय environment.
It is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as basic phosphatase.
Triticale ( × triticosecale ), ( ) is a hybrid of wheat ( Triticum ) and rye ( Secale ) first bred in laboratories during the late 19th सदी.
the grain थी originally bred in Scotland और स्वीडन.
commercially उपलब्धियाँ triticale is almost सदा a दूसरी generation hybrid, i.e., a cross between two kinds of प्राथमिक ( first क्रॉस ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the उपज potential और grain quality of wheat with the disease और environmental tolerance ( including मृदा conditions ) of rye.
Only recently has it been developed into a commercially viable crop.
depending on the cultivar, triticale can more or less resemble either of its parents.
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder, although some triticale-based भोजन can be purchased at health food स्टोर्स or are to be मिला in some breakfast cereals.
जब क्रासिंग wheat और rye, गेहूं is प्रयुक्त as the female parent और rye as the पुरूष parent ( pollen donor ).
the resulting संकर is बंध्य, and must be treated साथ colchicine to induce polyploidy और thus the ability to reproduce itself.
The प्राथमिक producers of triticale are Poland, Germany, France, Belarus and Australia.
In 2009, according to the खाना and Agriculture Organization ( FAO ), 15.0 लाख tons were harvested in 29 countries across the world.
The triticale संकरण are all amphidiploid, which means the plant is diploid लिये two genomes derived from अलग species.
In other शब्द, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In earlier years, most work थी किया on octoploid triticale.
अलग ploidy levels have been created and evaluated over time.
the tetraploids showed little promise, but hexaploid triticale was successful पर्याप्त to find वाणिज्यिक application.
the CIMMYT triticale improvement कार्यक्रम wanted to improve food उत्पादन and पोषण in developing देशों.
triticale has संभावित in the उत्पादन of bread and other food products, such as cookies, pasta, pizza dough and नाश्ता cereals.
The प्रोटीन content is higher than that of गेहूं, although the glutenin भिन्न is less.
The grain has also महरूम stated to have उच्चतर levels of lysine than गेहूं.
Assuming increased acceptance, the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale, as the मिलिंग तकनीकों employed for wheat are unsuited to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be प्रयुक्त as a feed grain, and later research मिला its starch was विशेषकर readily digested.
As a feed grain, triticale is already खूब established and of high आर्थिक importance.
It has प्राप्त attention as a potential energy crop, and research is currently होने conducted on the use of the crop 's बायोमास in bioethanol उत्पादन.
`` कश, the Magic ड्रैगन '' is a सोंग लिखा by Leonard Lipton और Peter Yarrow, and made लोकप्रिय by Yarrow 's समूह Peter, Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording.
The song achieved great popularity.
A college football national championship in the highest level of कॉलेजिएट खेल in the संयुक्त राज्य, फिलहाल the National कॉलेजिएट Athletic Association ( ncaa ) Division I Football कटोरी Subdivision ( FBS ), is a designation awarded annually by various third-party organizations to उनके चयन ( s ) of the best कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल team ( s ).
प्रभाग I FBS ( formerly Division I-A ) football is the तभी NCAA sport in which a yearly champion is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event.
Because the championship team is not determined by a NCAA चैंपियनशिप or tournament event, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship ``.
चूंकि the NCAA, the sport 's governing body, does not determine or declare a national champion in this फ़ील्ड, determination of such has often engendered controversy.
A championship टोली is independently घोषित by various individuals और संगठन, प्रायः referred to as `` चयनकर्ताओं ''.
These चुनाव are sometimes at हालात साथ each other.
जबकि the NCAA has never officially endorsed an annual championship team, it रै documented the चुनाव of several चयनकर्ताओं in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records.
In addition, various third पार्टी विश्लेषकों have independently published उनके अपना सूचियाँ of what they have determined to be the सबसे legitimate selections for each season.
These are भी प्रायः at हालात with each other as well as individual school 's दावा on national championships, जिससे, for any particular season, may or may नहीं correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
Currently, two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press, which conducts a poll of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters, and the USA आज Coaches ' Poll, a poll of American फ़ुटबॉल कोच Association active coaches that is contractually obligated to नाम the winner of the Bowl Championship Series चैंपियनशिप खेल as its नेशनल चैंपियन.
