The Washington नागरिकों are a professional baseball team आधारित in Washington, d.c.
The Nationals are a member of the East Division of the National League of Major League Baseball ( MLB ).
the टोली 's home ballpark is Nationals Park, located on South Capitol Street in Southeast D.C., निकट the Anacostia नदी.
The park opened in 2008, replacing rfk स्टेडियम, the team 's home from 2005 to 2007.
The Nationals ' name derives इससे the former Washington baseball टोली that had the same name ( प्रयुक्त interchangeably with सीनेटरों ).
Their उपनाम is `` the Nats '' —a shortened version कि was भी used by the बूढ़ा D.C. teams.
an expansion franchise, the क्लबों थी founded in as the Montreal Expos, the first प्रमुख league टोली in Canada.
वे यहूद based in Montreal, Quebec, and played their home games at Jarry पार्क Stadium and later in ओलम्पिक Stadium.
In, the Expos जीती a division championship, won उनके first-ever playoff series by defeating the फिलाडेल्फिया Phillies, 3–2, and advanced to the National लीग Championship Series, where वे would go on to खोना to the Los Angeles Dodgers, 3–2, in their only postseason appearance दौरान the strike-shortened ऋतु.
The expos had their highest जीतना percentage in the strike-shortened season of, जब the team था the बेहतरीन record in बेसबॉल.
the team 's subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused fan interest to drop बंद.
After the 2001 ऋतु, MLB माना revoking the team 's franchise, along with either the मिनेसोटा Twins or the tampa Bay Devil Rays.
बाद being purchased by MLB in 2002, the टोली was moved before the ऋतु to Washington और renamed the Nationals, the first relocation since the second वॉशिंगटन Senators स्थानांतरित to Arlington, Texas, and became the टेक्सास Rangers in.
The Nationals हैं one of two एमएलबी franchises, और the only one in the National League, that has never निभाई in a संसार Series ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ).
A निर्भर fee ( in the United States ) or सशर्त शुल्क ( in इंग्लैण्ड and Wales ) is कोई शुल्क लिये services provided where the fee is payable only if there is a favourable result.
In the law, it is defined as a `` fee charged for a वकील 's services only if the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably settled आउट of court....
Contingent fees हैं usually गणना as a percentage of the client 's जाल recovery. ''
In the English legal प्रणाली, it is generally referred to as no जीत no fee.
A conditional शुल्क अनुबंध between a law firm and a client.
The usual form of this agreement is that the solicitor will take a विधि case on the समझना that if खोया, no payment is बना.
However, if the case is won, the lawyer will be entitled to the normal fee based on hourly billing, प्लस a success fee.
The success fee in इंग्लैण्ड must be as a percentage no वृहद than 100 % of the normal fee.
This contrasts with the आकस्मिकता fee in the US, which gives the successful attorney a प्रतिशत of the damages awarded in एहसान of his क्लाएंट.
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights चूंकि वरना, to sue someone for a अपकृत्य, one must first be wealthy पर्याप्त to pursue such litigation in the पहला प्लेस.
however, because of the high रिस्क, few attorneys होगा take cases on a contingency basis unless they feel the case रै शुभ merit.
according to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer, निर्भर शुल्क यहूद allowed as of that year in the following countries : Australia, Brazil, Canada, the Dominican Republic, France, Greece, Ireland, Japan, नई जीलैंड, the United Kingdom and the United States.
वे हैं also allowed in personal injury क्रियाएँ in लिथुआनिया.
Recently, वे have been अनुमत in Belgium as well.

Sons of Anarchy is a television नाटक series created by Kurt Sutter about the lives of a close-knit गैरकानूनी मोटरसाइकिल club operating in आकर्षक, a fictional town in California 's Central Valley.
the show centers on protagonist Jackson `` Jax '' Teller ( Charlie Hunnam ), the then-vice अध्यक्ष of the क्लबों, जो begins questioning the club and himself.
Sons of Anarchy premiered on सितंबर 3, 2008, on केबल संजाल fx.
The तीसरा ऋतु of the series आकर्षित an औसत of 4.9 लाख दर्शक per week, making it FX 's highest rated series कभी, surpassing fx 's other hits The Shield, Nip/Tuck, and Rescue Me.

the Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '', singular : ) and the ज्वालामुखी of the same नाम हैं in South-East आइसलैंड.
वे are in the highlands of आइसलैंड at the northwestern पक्ष of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
the झीलों are at, at an elevation of.
beneath the lakes is the magma chamber of the Grímsvötn volcano.
grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano which has the highest eruption frequency of all the volcanoes in Iceland and has a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system.
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 was a part of the same fissure system.
grímsvötn was erupting at the same time as Laki during 1783, लकिन continued to erupt until 1785.
Because सबसे of the volcano lies underneath vatnajökull, most of its eruptions have been subglacial and the interaction of magma and meltwater from the बर्फ causes phreatomagmatic explosive कार्यकलाप.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC, an eruption began, with ऊँची plumes accompanied by अनेक भूकंप, resulting in cancellation of 900 flights in Iceland, and in the United Kingdom, ग्रीनलैंड, Germany, Ireland and नार्वे on 22–25 May.
Until 25 may the फटना scale had been larger than कि of the 2010 फटना of Eyjafjallajökull.
the eruption रोका at 02:40 utc on 25 May 2011, although there was some explosive कार्यकलाप इससे the tephra vents affecting only the क्षेत्रफल around the crater.

a prospective person or project may be vetted before making a hiring decision.

caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an American public गेमिंग corporation that owns and operates over 50 casinos, hotels, and सात golf पाठ्यक्रम under several brands.
the कम्पनी, based in Paradise, नेवाडा, is the largest गेमिंग company in the world, with सालाना revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ).
caesars is a पब्लिक कम्पनी, साथ a joint venture of Apollo वैश्विक प्रबन्धन and टेक्सास Pacific Group ownig a large portion of the स्टेक और Blackstone समूह also पकड़कर a significant stake.
The नाम बदलें from `` harrah 's Entertainment inc. '' to `` Caesars entertainment निगम '' थी made official on November 23, 2010.
Harrah 's remains a key brand in the कम्पनी.
on November 5, 2010, Harrah 's announced an initial पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 साझा लकिन retracted this offering on नवम्बर 19.
A स्थाई Resident in कनाडा is a व्यक्ति who is not a कनाडाई citizen but who has महरूम granted अनुमति to live and work in Canada बगैर कोई time limit on his or her stay.
A permanent resident must live in Canada for two years आउट of every पाँच or रिस्क losing that status.
A Permanent Resident holds अनेक of the same rights और जिम्मेदारियों as a Canadian citizen, among अन्य the right to work for any एंटरप्राइज़ as well as for the federal or provincial सरकारी ( under restriction of अभिगम rights to certain regulated professions ).
The main मतभेद हैं that residents can not :
vote in elections in Canada ;
चलाएं for elected office ;
थाम Canadian passports ;
In जोड, they may be allowed to join कनाडा 's armed forces if the नेशनल interest would not be prejudiced.
Permanent residents also risk प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर crimes committed जबकि resident in Canada.
स्थाई residents may apply for कनाडाई citizenship after तीन years in कनाडा ; however इस is not mandatory.
Erica केन is a fictional character from the American एबीसी Daytime soap opera All my Children.
The character थी portrayed by अभिनेत्री Susan Lucci from उसके डेब्यू on जनवरी 16, 1970 until the last ब्रॉडकास्ट television episode aired on September 23, 2011.
On February 11, 2013, it थी announced that Lucci होगा guest-star on the prospect Park 's continuation of All My children.
In the U.S., एरिका is considered to be the सबसे popular character in साबुन opera history.
regarding the North-American मार्केट, tv Guide calls उसके `` unequivocally the सबसे प्रसिद्ध soap ओपेरा अक्षर in the history of daytime tv '', and शामिल her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest Villains of All Time.
A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue ), और its percent annual change ( in red )
a consumer price index ( CPI ) उपायों changes in the price level of a market बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods and services purchased by households.
The CPI in the United States is defined by the ब्यूरो of Labor Statistics as `` a माप of the औसत change over time in the कीमतें paid by urban consumers for a मार्केट बास्केट of consumer goods और सेवाएं. ''
the CPI is a statistical estimate constructed using the prices of a sample of representative वस्तुएं जिनकी prices हैं एकत्रित periodically.
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for अलग categories and sub-categories of goods and services, होने combined to produce the overall अनुक्रमणिका with weights reflecting उनके shares in the total of the उपभोक्ता expenditures covered by the index.
It is one of several price indices गणना by most national सांख्यिकीय एजेंसियों.
The annual percentage बदलें in a CPI is प्रयुक्त as a measure of महंगाई.
a CPI can be used to index ( i.e., समायोजन for the प्रभाव of inflation ) the real value of मजदूरी, salaries, pensions, for regulating prices और लिये deflating monetary magnitudes to show परिवर्तन in रियल values.
In most countries, the CPI is, साथ साथ the population census and the USA नेशनल Income और Product खाते, एक of the सबसे closely watched नेशनल economic statistics.
Knocking on wood, or to टच लकडी, refers to the apotropaic tradition in western लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on wood, or merely stating that you are doing or intend वही, in अनुक्रम to avoid `` tempting भाग्य `` after बनाना a favourable observation, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's own मौत.
रॉकर arm
generally referred to within the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आतंरिक combustion engine of automotive, marine, मोटरसाइकिल और प्रत्यागमनी aviation इंजन, the रॉकर arm is an oscillating लीवर that conveys radial movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it.
एक समाप्त is raised और lowered by a rotating lobe of the camshaft ( either directly or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) जबकि the other end acts on the valve stem.
When the camshaft lobe raises the बाहर of the भुजा, the inside presses down on the valve stem, opening the valve.
When the बाहर of the arm is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts rotation, the inside rises, allowing the वाल्व spring to close the वाल्व.
The drive cam is driven by the camshaft.
This pushes the rocker भुजा up and down परिचय the trunnion pin or rocker शाफ्ट.
Friction may be घटाया at the point of सम्पर्क with the valve stem by a roller कैम follower.
a similar व्यवस्था transfers the motion via another roller cam अनुसरणकर्ता to a second rocker भुजा.
This rotates about the rocker shaft, and हस्तांतरण the motion via a tappet to the poppet valve.
in इस मामला इस opens the सेवन valve to the cylinder head.
the effective leverage of the arm ( और यूँ the फ़ोर्स it can exert on the valve स्टेम ) is determined by the rocker arm ratio, the अनुपात of the distance from the rocker arm 's बीच of rotation to the tip विभाजित by the distance from the center of rotation to the पाइंट acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current ऑटोमोटिव design favors rocker भुजा ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the past smaller धनात्मक ratios ( the valve लिफ्ट is greater than the cam लिफ्ट ) and भी ऋणात्मक ratios ( valve लिफ्ट smaller than the कैम लिफ्ट ) have been used.
अनेक pre-ww2 engines उपयोग 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios.
लिये car इंजन the rocker arms are generally स्टील stampings, providing a reasonable संतुलन of strength, वज़न और किफायती cost.
Because the rocker arms are, in part, reciprocating वज़न, excessive mass विशेषकर at the lever ends limits the इंजन 's क्षमता to reach high operating speeds.
`` The Night the लाइट्स Went आउट in Georgia '' is a दक्षिणी Gothic song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence.
reba mcentire later covered it in 1991.
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western studios on सूर्यास्त in हॉलीवुड और released less than two weeks later in November 1972, the song centers around the older brother of the narrator, falsely convicted of और executed लिये a murder, जिससे the narrator herself has वचनबद्ध.
In डाक मेल, a return address is an explicit inclusion of the पता of the person sending the संदेश.
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine कैसा to respond to the sender of the message if needed.
the वापसी address need not include a sender 's name, but should include address or P.O. box विवरण in the वही way as the delivery पता should.
In some countries, the वापसी पता is conventionally located in the upper left hand corner of the envelope, card, or लेबल.
In the United Kingdom, the return address is प्रायः placed on the reverse of the envelope, निकट the top.
Businesses often use लिफाफे preprinted with a return पता.
Many individuals have sheets of adhesive लेबल्स preprinted with their घर पता to affix to their correspondence.
Charities sometimes include ऐसे sheets in mailshots.
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized labels to provide individuals an easy way to peel and स्टिक वापसी address labels to उनके लिफाफे.
The return पता is not जरूरी on postal मेल.
However, lack of a वापसी पता prevents the डाक service from होने able to return the item if it proves undeliverable ; ऐसे as from damage, postage due, or invalid गंतव्य.
ऐसे mail may thus become dead अक्षर mail.
Should the return address be of a different state or country, the मेल may be routed through that स्थान for ease of return.
a nerve guidance conduit ( भी referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or artificial तंत्रिका graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an artificial अर्थात् of guiding axonal regrowth to सुकर nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries.
जब direct suturing of the two आउट of a severed nerve can not be accomplished without टेंशन, the standard clinical treatment for परिधीय nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting.
Due to the सीमित availability of donor ऊतक और कार्यात्मक recovery in autologous nerve grafting, neural ऊतक अभियान्त्रिकी research has focused on the development of bioartificial तंत्रिका guidance conduits as an alternative treatment, especially for large दोषों.
Similar तकनीकों are also होने explored लिये nerve repair in the स्पाइनल cord but nerve regeneration in the central बेचैन प्रणाली poses a greater challenge क्युकी its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their native environment.
the creation of कृत्रिम conduits is भी known as entubulation क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends and intervening gap are enclosed within a tube composed of biological or synthetic materials.
Whether the conduit is in the रूप of a biologic tube, synthetic ट्यूब or tissue-engineered conduit, it should सुकर neurotropic and neurotrophic संचार between the proximal and distal ends of the तंत्रिका gap, block external inhibitory factors, और provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth.
The most basic objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to combine physical, chemical, and biological cues under शर्तें that होगा foster ऊतक formation.
सामग्री कि have been used to make biologic tubes include blood vessels और skeletal मांसपेशियां, while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable सिंथेटिक tubes have महरूम बना from silicone and polyglycolide respectively.
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many elements : scaffold structure, scaffold सामग्री, cellular therapies, neurotrophic कारकों और biomimetic materials.
the चुनाव of जिससे physical, रासायनिक and biological cues to use is based on the properties of the nerve environment, जिससे is critical in creating the most वांछनीय पर्यावरण for axon regeneration.
The factors that control material चयन शामिल biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical अखंडता, controllability during तंत्रिका विकास, implantation and sterilization.
हार्डकोर Pawn is an American वास्तविकता television श्रेणी produced by RDF यूएसए ( later Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions लिये truTV परिचय the day-to-day operations of अमरीकी Jewelry और Loan, a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road, between 8 Mile सड़क and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit, Michigan.
The series premiered on August 16, 2010, delivering दो million viewers, setting a record as truTV 's most-watched series प्रीमियर ever.
Amoxicillin BP
amoxicillin ( INN ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), and abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic used to treat बैक्टीरियल infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
it is usually the drug of choice भीतर the क्लास क्युकी it is better absorbed, following oral प्रशासन, than other β-lactam antibiotics.
amoxicillin is one of the most common antibiotics prescribed for children.
the drug became available in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria, which हैं resistant to a व्यापक spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics, such as पेनिसिलीन.
For इस reason, it is प्रायः combined साथ clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases effectiveness by reducing इसके susceptibility to β-lactamase प्रतिरोध.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – जनवरी 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, was the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after उसके service as the 37th Vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1961–1963 ).
he is one of only four people who परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय offices of the संयुक्त States : Representative, सीनेटर, Vice President, और President.
Johnson, a Democrat from टेक्सास, served as a संयुक्त States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, दो as Senate अल्पसंख्यक Leader और two as Senate बहुमत Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic नामांकन in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be उसके running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी following the assassination of जॉन F. Kennedy on नवम्बर 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's term and was निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके own right, winning by a large हाशिया over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly समर्थित by the Democratic Party और as President, he थी responsible लिये designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that शामिल laws कि upheld civil rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, पर्यावरणीय protection, aid to education, और his `` War on गरीबी. ''
Johnson थी renowned लिये उसके domineering personality and the `` जॉनसन treatment, '' his coercion of powerful politicians in अनुक्रम to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, जॉनसन escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in जल्दी 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace प्रक्रम bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar movement based विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer दंगे broke out in most प्रमुख cities after 1965, and crime दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों raised मांगे for `` law and order '' policies.
The लोकतांत्रिक Party split in multiple feuding गिरोहों, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire प्राथमिक, he ended उसके bid for reelection.
रिपब्लिकन Richard Nixon was निर्वाचित to succeed उसे.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency चिह्नित the peak of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some historians क्युकी of उसके domestic policies.
The बिग Bang सिद्धान्त cast at Comic Con 2009, इससे left : Kunal Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Kaley cuoco, जिम Parsons, and जॉनी Galecki
The अमरीकी sitcom The बिग Bang सिद्धान्त, created and executive उत्पादित by चक Lorre and Bill prady, premiered on CBS on सितंबर 24, 2007.
the दिखाएँ centers on five characters : roommates शेल्डन Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a वेट्रेस and aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान across the हॉल ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends और co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh koothrappali.
over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie winkle ( season 1 पुनरावर्ती ; season 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a प्रेमी of both Leonard और हावर्ड ; bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time वेट्रेस alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy farrah Fowler ( season 3 अतिथि ; season 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), जो joins the समूह after होने matched to शेल्डन on a डेटिंग जालस्थल ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as राज 's best dost when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting वर्ण, each of whom plays a prominent भूमिका in a small group of episodes.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil युद्ध ( see naming ), was a सिविल युद्ध fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` संघ '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave राज्य कि declared उनके secession and formed the confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its उत्पत्ति in the issue of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead और नष्ट much of the South 's infrastructure, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult पुनर्निर्माण process of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, but before his उद्घाटन on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष James Buchanan और the incoming republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके administration would not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, और both sides prepared लिये war.
the Confederates assumed that यूरोपीय countries were so निर्भर on `` King कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a कुंजी fort आयोजित by संघ troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four more स्लेव states joined the Confederacy, bringing their कुल to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border राज्य and established a naval नाकेबंदी that अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
the Eastern थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended with confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln issued the Emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending गुलामी a war goal.
To the west, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ destroyed the Confederate river navy, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी armies, and the संघ at Vicksburg split the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. ली 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of all Union सेना in 1864.
in the Western Theater, William T. शरमन drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the रास्ता.
the Union marshaled the resources और manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate army failed, अग्रणी to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at Appomattox अदालत House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
the American Civil War थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian हताहत.
Historian John huddleston estimates the death toll at टेन percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
इंसान evolution refers to the evolutionary process leading up to the रूप of modern humans.
जबकि it began साथ the last common पूर्वज of all जीवन, the topic usually कवर तभी the विकासवादी history of primates, in particular the genus होमो, and the emergence of होमो sapiens as a distinct प्रजाति of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ).
The पढ़ाई of इंसान evolution involves many scientific disciplines, including physical मानवशास्त्र, primatology, पुरातत्व, linguistics, विकासवादी psychology, भ्रूणविज्ञान and genetics.
According to जेनेटिक अध्ययन, primates diverged from अन्य स्तनधारियों परिचय in the Late Cretaceous period, और the earliest जीवाश्मों appear in the paleocene, around.
The family Hominidae diverged from the hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 million years पहले, और around, the ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged from the Hominidae family.
bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line, and the earliest bipedal Hominin is considered to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin, साथ ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat बाद.
The gorilla और chimpanzee diverged around the same time, about 4-6 million years ago, और either sahelanthropus or orrorin may be our last साझा ancestor with them.
the जल्दी bipedals eventually evolved into the australopithecines and बाद the genus होमो.
the earliest documented सदस्यों of the genus Homo are होमो habilis which evolved around ; the earliest species लिये जिससे there is positive evidence of उपयोग of stone टूल्स.
the दिमाग of these early hominins were about the वही size as that of a chimpanzee.
During the next million सालो a process of encephalization began, and with the आगमन of Homo erectus in the fossil record, cranial capacity had doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to छोड़ अफ़्रीकी, and these species स्प्रेड through Africa, Asia, और Europe between.
It is believed that ये species were the पहला to use fire और complex टूल्स.
According to the Recent अफ़्रीकी Ancestry theory, modern इंसानो विकसित in Africa संभवतः from Homo heidelbergensis, Homo rhodesiensis or होमो antecessor और migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 years पहले, replacing लोकल populations of Homo erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis और होमो neanderthalensis.
Archaic होमो sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो, विकसित between 400,000 and 250,000 years पहले.
Recent DNA प्रमाण suggests that अनेक haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-African populations, and Neanderthals और other hominids, such as Denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of their genome to present-day इंसानs. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > anatomically modern इंसानो evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the मध्य paleolithic, परिचय 200,000 years ago.
The transition to behavioral modernity साथ the विकास of symbolic संस्कृति, language, और specialized lithic technology happened around 50,000 years पहले according to अनेक anthropologists although some suggest a क्रमिक change in behavior over a longer समय span.
Lisa Cuddy, m.d., is a fictional character on the Fox संजाल चिकित्सा drama House.
She is portrayed by Lisa edelstein.
Cuddy was the डीन of आयुर्विज्ञान and hospital administrator of the fictional Princeton-Plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New Jersey.
She also becomes हाउस 's love interest through the सालो to start a संबंध with उसे in ऋतु seven.
Cuddy quit her job after the events of ऋतु seven 's finale `` Moving On ``.
Track और फ़ील्ड is a sport comprising विभिन्न competitive एथलेटिक contests based on कार्यशील, कूद, and फेंकना.
the name of the खेल derives from the competition venue : a stadium with an oval running track around a ग्रास field.
The throwing and jumping कार्यक्रम generally लो place in the सेंट्रल enclosed area.
Track और field falls अंतर्गत the umbrella sport of athletics, जिससे also includes road running, cross देश running, और race walking.
The two most prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय track and field competitions हैं held under the banner of एथलेटिक्स : the एथलेटिक्स competition at the Olympic Games and the IAAF संसार Championships in एथलेटिक्स.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय Association of Athletics Federations is the international governing body लिये track और फ़ील्ड.
Track और field events are generally individual sports with athletes चुनौतीपूर्ण each other to decide a single victor.
The racing events are won by the खिलाड़ी with the fastest time, while the कूद and फेंकना events are जीती by the athlete who has achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest.
The running events are categorised as sprints, middle and long-distance events, relays, and hurdling.
Regular jumping events include long जम्प, triple jump, ऊँची जम्प and pole vault, जबकि the most common throwing events हैं shot put, javelin, discus and hammer.
There हैं also `` combined events '', ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon, in which एथलीट compete in a number of the above events.
Records are रखा of the best performances in विशिष्ट events, at संसार and नेशनल levels, सही down to a निजी level.
However, if athletes are deemed to have violated the इवेंट 's rules or regulations, they are disqualified इससे the competition and their marks are erased.
In North America, the term track और field may be used to refer to athletics in general, बल्कि than specifically track and field कार्यक्रम.
the Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed आपरेशन मरुस्थल तूफ़ान ( 17 January 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) थी a युद्ध waged by a u.n.-authorized Coalition force इससे 34 nations led by the United States, against इराकी in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait.
The युद्ध is also ज्ञात अंतर्गत other names, such as the Persian गल्फ War, First Gulf War, गल्फ War I, or the पहला Iraq War, before the term `` Iraq War '' became identified instead with the 2003 Iraq War ( भी referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi स्वतंत्रता '' ).
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 August 1990 थी मिले साथ international condemnation, and brought immediate economic sanctions विरूद्ध Iraq by members of the U.N. Security Council.
U.S. President George H. W. Bush तैनात U.S. forces into Saudi Arabia, and urged other countries to send their own forces to the scene.
An array of nations joined the गठबन्धन.
The great बहुमत of the Coalition 's सैन्य forces were from the U.S., with Saudi अरब, the United Kingdom and मिश्र as leading contributors, in कि order.
Saudi Arabia paid around US $ 36 अरब of the US $ 60 billion cost.
The war was marked by the beginning of सजीव न्यूज on the front लाइनों of the fight, साथ the primacy of the u.S. network सीएनएन.
The war रै भी earned the उपनाम Video Game War after the daily broadcast images on board the u.S. बमवर्षक दौरान Operation Desert तूफ़ान.
the आरंभिक conflict to expel Iraqi troops from कुवैत began with an aerial bombardment on 17 January 1991.
This थी followed by a ground assault on 24 February.
इस was a निर्णायक victory for the Coalition forces, who liberated कुवैत and advanced into Iraqi territory.
The Coalition ceased their advance, और declared a cease-fire 100 hours after the ground campaign started.
Aerial and ground कॉम्बैट थी confined to इराकी, Kuwait, और areas on Saudi Arabia 's border.
Iraq launched scud missiles against Coalition military लक्ष्य in Saudi Arabia and against Israel.
The nickel, in American usage, is a five- cent सिक्का issued by the United States Mint.
रचित of 75 % copper and 25 % nickel, the piece has been struck since 1866.
The silver हाफ dime, equal to पाँच cents, had been issued चूंकि the 1790s.
The American सिविल War caused economic hardship, driving gold और silver from परिसंचरण ; in जवाब, in place of low-value coins, the government at first issued पेपर currency.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional currency note after Spencer M. क्लार्क, head of the Currency ब्यूरो ( today the ब्यूरो of Engraving और मुद्रण ), placed his own पोर्ट्रेट on the denomination.
After successful परिचय of two-cent और three-cent टुकड़े, without अनमोल metal, कॉंग्रेस also प्राधिकृत a five-cent piece consisting of base मेटल ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866.
The आरंभिक design of the Shield nickel थी struck जबतक 1883, तब replaced by the Liberty सिर nickel.
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as part of a drive to increase the beauty of American coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson निकल followed.
In 2004 and 2005, special designs in honor of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition यहूद जारी.
In 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson निकल पंक्तियां फेलिक्स Schlag 's original reverse ( or `` tails '' side ), although a new obverse, by जेमी Franki, was substituted.
As of 2013, it costs more than ग्यारह cents to उपज a nickel ; the Mint is exploring the possibility of reducing cost by using कम expensive metals.
a poster with flowers or clusters of flowers produced by twelve प्रजाति of flowering plants from different families
a flower, sometimes ज्ञात as a bloom or blossom, is the reproductive structure found in flowering plants ( plants of the division Magnoliophyta, also पुकारा angiosperms ).
the biological फलन of a flower is to effect जनन, usually by providing a mechanism लिये the संघ of शुक्राणु with eggs.
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs इससे different individuals in a जनसांख्यिकी ) or allow selfing ( fusion of sperm and egg from the same पुष्प ).
Some पुष्प उपज diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where gametophytes develop.
पुष्प दे वृद्धि to फल and seeds.
Many flowers have evolved to be attractive to animals, so as to कारण them to be सदिश for the transfer of pollen.
in जोड to facilitating the reproduction of flowering पौधे, flowers have long been admired और used by इंसानो to beautify their environment, and also as objects of रोमांस, ritual, religion, medicine और as a source of खाना.
The McDonnell Douglas ( अभी Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine, all-weather tactical fighter designed by mcdonnell डगलस to gain और maintain air superiority in aerial combat.
It is माना among the सबसे successful modern fighters, with over 100 aerial combat victories साथ no नुकसान in dogfights.
Following reviews of proposals, the संयुक्त States एयर Force चयनित McDonnell Douglas ' design in 1967 to meet the service 's need for a dedicated air superiority fighter.
The त्रिभुज first flew in July 1972, and entered सेवा in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the त्रिभुज has been exported to Israel, जापानी, Saudi अरब, and other राष्ट्र.
The f-15 was originally envisioned as a pure air superiority aircraft.
इसके डिज़ाइन शामिल a secondary ground-attack काबिलियत that was largely अप्रयुक्त.
the डिज़ाइन proved flexible enough that an all-weather strike डेरिवेटिव, the F-15E स्ट्राइक Eagle, was later विकसित, और डाला service in 1989.
The f-15 Eagle is expected to be in service with the U.S. Air Force पास्ट 2025.
mimio is a brand नाम of a लकीर of प्रौद्योगिकी products aimed at the education market.
The primary products हैं केन्द्रित around कंप्यूटर whiteboard इंटरैक्टिव teaching डिवाइस.
MimioCapture devices also allow users to capture all of the ink strokes कि are लिखा on the whiteboard.
जब प्रयुक्त in conjunction साथ a video projector it turns the ordinary whiteboard surface into a fully interactive whiteboard.
the product line was originally designed by Virtual Ink.
On अक्तूबर 4, 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio interactive whiteboard ( iWB ) product line.
Rahab of Jericho
rahab, ( ; ; ) was, according to the Book of Joshua, a स्त्री who lived in Jericho in the promised Land and assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
nearly all अंग्रेज़ी translations of Joshua describe उसके as a बदचलन or prostitute.
the Organization of American States ( स्पेनी : Organización de los Estados Americanos, Portuguese : organização dos Estados Americanos, French : Organisation des États américains ), or the OAS, is a क्षेत्रीय international organization.
the oas was founded on 30 April 1948, and रै its मुख्यालय in Washington, D.C., United राज्य.
Its सदस्यों are the 35 independent states of the Americas.
चूंकि 26 May 2005, the Secretary General of OAS has महरूम José Miguel insulza.
Christopher कोलंबस ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão कोलोन ; पहले 31 अक्तूबर 145120 May 1506 ) was an Italian एक्सप्लोरर, navigator, and colonizer, born in the Republic of Genoa, in what is आज northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the कैथोलिक monarchs of Spain, he completed चार voyages across the अटलांटिक Ocean that led to general European awareness of the American continents.
Those voyages, and उसके efforts to establish स्थाई settlements on the island of हिस्पानिओला, initiated the Spanish colonization of the नई World.
in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of emerging western साम्राज्यवाद and economic प्रतियोगिता between European kingdoms seeking माल through the establishment of व्यापार routes and colonies, Columbus 's speculative proposal, to reach the ईस्ट Indies by sailing westward, eventually received the support of the Spanish crown, which saw in it a वादा, however remote, of gaining the upper hand over rival powers in the contest for the lucrative मसाला व्यापार with Asia.
दौरान his first voyage in 1492, बजाय of reaching Japan as he had intended, Columbus उतरा in the Bahamas archipelago, at a locale he named San Salvador.
Over the course of three more voyages, Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser Antilles, as well as the Caribbean coast of Venezuela and Central अमेरिका, claiming them for the Spanish Empire.
Though Columbus थी not the first European एक्सप्लोरर to reach the Americas ( having महरूम preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif Ericson in the 11th century ), Columbus 's voyages led to the पहला lasting European contact with the Americas, inaugurating a period of European खोजी, conquest, और colonization कि lasted for several centuries.
They had, इसलिए, an enormous impact in the historical विकास of the modern Western संसार.
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments primarily in the लाइट of the spreading of the Christian धर्म.
Never admitting कि he था पहुँचे a continent previously unknown to Europeans, rather than the ईस्ट Indies he had नियत out for, Columbus called the निवासियों of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish लिये `` इंडियंस `` ).
Columbus 's strained relationship with the स्पेनी crown और its appointed औपनिवेशिक प्रशासकों in America led to उसके arrest and dismissal as governor of the settlements on the द्वीप of Hispaniola in 1500, और later to protracted वाद over the benefits जिससे कोलंबस and his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown.
Bred in Germany, the Boxer is a breed of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
the coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; रंगों are fawn or brindled, with or without श्वेत markings, which may cover the entire body.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad, छोटी skulls ), and have a square muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), very strong jaws, and a powerful काटना आदर्श लिये hanging on to large prey.
The Boxer was bred from the बूढ़ा English Bulldog और the now extinct bullenbeisser, and is part of the molosser group.
मुक्केबाज were पहला exhibited in a श्वान दिखाएँ लिये st. Bernards in Munich in 1895, the first Boxer club being founded the next year.
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics, Boxers आयोजित स्थिर as the seventh most popular breed of dog in the United राज्य for the तीसरा लगातार साल.
सीरियल ata ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that connects host बस adapters to mass storage devices such as hard disk drives और optical drives.
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ; later referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ), offering several advantages over the पुरानी interface : reduced cable size और cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ), native hot swapping, faster data transfer through उच्चतर signalling दरों, और more कुशल ट्रांसफ़र through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
SATA host adapters और devices communicate via a high-speed serial केबल over two pairs of conductors.
in contrast, parallel ATA ( the redesignation for the legacy ata विशेषताएँ ) used a 16-bit wide data bus साथ अनेक additional support and control signals, all operating at much निम्नतर frequency.
to ensure पिछड़ा संगतता with legacy ATA तन्त्र and applications, sata उपयोग the वही basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as विरासत ata devices.
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in consumer डेस्कटॉप and laptop computers, and has largely replaced PATA in new अंतःस्थापित applications.
SATA 's market share in the desktop PC market was 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely used in industrial और embedded applications that use compactflash भंडार, even हालांकि the नई cfast standard is based on sata.
सीरियल ATA industry संगतता विशेषताएँ originate from The Serial ata अंतरराष्ट्रीय Organization ( aka.
SATA-IO, serialata.org ).
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, and publishes the interoperability विशेषताएँ, the test cases, और plug-fests.
As साथ many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA सामग्री ownership is transferred to अन्य industry bodies : primarily the INCITS T13 उपसमिति ATA, the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( scsi ) ; a subgroup of T10 जिम्मेदार for Serial संलग्न SCSI ( sas ).
The पूरा specification from SATA-IO.
The remainder of this article will try to use the शब्दावली और विशेषताएँ of SATA-IO.
The history of the Internet began with the विकास of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was पहला introduced to the concepts that would सीसे to the Internet when a message थी sent over the ARPANet from कंप्यूटर science Professor Leonard kleinrock 's laboratory at University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Los Angeles ( ucla ), after the दूसरी piece of संजाल equipment was संस्थापित at स्टैनफोर्ड Research संस्थान ( SRI ).
पैकेट switched networks such as ARPANET, चिह्नित I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, मेरिट Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a किस्में of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the विकास of protocols लिये internetworking, in which multiple पृथक networks could be joined साथ into a संजाल of संजाल.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) थी मानकीकृत, and consequently, the concept of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected TCP/IP networks, पुकारा the Internet, was introduced.
Access to the arpanet was expanded in 1981 जब the National विज्ञान Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when nsfnet provided access to महासंगणक sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
वाणिज्यिक Internet service providers ( isps ) began to emerge in the late 1980s और जल्दी 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The अंतरजाल was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, removing the last प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the Internet to carry वाणिज्यिक traffic.
चूंकि the mid-1990s, the अंतरजाल has था a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet Protocol ( voip ) `` phone calls '', two-way interactive video calls, और the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social नेटवर्किंग, and online shopping sites.
The research and शिक्षा जातियाँ continues to develop and use advanced networks such as NSF 's very ऊँची speed रीढ़ Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, और National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर and उच्चतर speeds over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or more.
The अंतरजाल 's takeover over the global communication लैंडस्केप was लगभग instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way दूरसंचार networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever greater amounts of online सूचना, commerce, entertainment, and social networking.

Professor Albus पर्सिवल Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a प्रमुख character and protagonist of J. K. रोलिंग 's Harry Potter श्रेणी.
For सबसे of the श्रेणी, he is the headmaster of the wizarding school हॉग्वार्ट्स.
as part of his backstory, it is नाज़िल कि he is the संस्थापक और leader of the अनुक्रम of the Phoenix, an organisation dedicated to fighting the प्रमुख antagonist of the series, रब Voldemort.
Dumbledore is portrayed by Richard Harris in the film adaptions of Harry कुम्हार and the Philosopher 's स्टोन और हैरी Potter and the Chamber of रहस्य.
After हैरिस ' मौत, माइकल Gambon portrayed Dumbledore for सब of the remaining films.
रोलिंग stated वो chose the name Dumbledore, जिससे is an Early Modern अंग्रेज़ी word for `` bumblebee ``, because of Dumbledore 's love of म्यूज़िक : she imagined him चलना around `` humming to himself a lot ''.
calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide हार्मोन that is उत्पादित in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular cells ( भी ज्ञात as C-cells ) of the thyroid, and in अनेक अन्य animals in the ultimobranchial body.
It अधिनियमों to reduce blood calcium ( ca2+ ), opposing the effects of parathyroid हार्मोन ( PTH ).
calcitonin has महरूम found in fish, reptiles, birds, and mammals.
Its importance in humans रै नहीं been as well established as its importance in अन्य पशु, as its function is प्रायः not significant in the regulation of सामान्य calcium homeostasis.
it belongs to calcitonin-like protein family.
A mousepad with a padded wrist rest.
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a surface लिये रखकर and moving a कंप्यूटर mouse.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse सीधे on a table by providing a सतह to allow the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in former models ) to माप movement accurately and बगैर jitter.
कुछ mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded कलाई rest.

riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), later known as Cinergy Field ( 1996–2002 ), was the home of the Cincinnati लाल नेशनल League baseball टोली and the Cincinnati Bengals नेशनल Football League team.
स्तिथ on the Ohio नदी in downtown Cincinnati, the stadium was बेहतरीन known as the home of `` The Big Red Machine ``, as the Reds were often called in the 1970s.
Construction began on February 1, 1968, and थी completed at a लागत of कम than $ 50 लाख.
On June 30, 1970, the Reds hosted the अटलांटा Braves in their grand opening, with हांक Aaron hitting the first ever home run at Riverfront.
Two सप्ताह बाद on July 14, 1970, Riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख League Baseball All-Star Game.
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed collision at घर थाली between लाल स्टार Pete Rose और catcher Ray Fosse of the Cleveland इंडियंस.
in सितंबर 1996, Riverfront Stadium थी renamed `` Cinergy Field '' in a प्रायोजन deal with Greater Cincinnati 's energy company, Cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to make room लिये Great American Ball Park, the seating क्षमता at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000.
There was a विशाल wall in Center Field visible after the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
The stadium थी demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.

The मूक बहुमत is an unspecified विशाल majority of people in a देश or समूह who do not एक्स्प्रेस their opinions सरेआम.
The term was popularized ( though not first used ) by U.S. President Richard Nixon in a November 3, 1969, speech in which he कहा, `` And so tonight—to you, the ग्रेट silent majority of my fellow Americans—I पूछो for your support. ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who किया नहीं join in the large demonstrations against the वियतनाम युद्ध at the time, who किया not जुड़ें in the counterculture, और जो किया नहीं participate in public प्रवचन.
Nixon along साथ many others saw this group of Middle Americans as होने निष्प्रभ in the media by the अधिक vocal minority.
the phrase was प्रयुक्त in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the लोगों जो have died, and others have प्रयुक्त it before and after Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the संसार.
Sam, a rhesus मंकी, flew to an ऊँचाई of 88 km in 1959.
( NASA )
Before humans गई into space, several animals were launched into space, including numerous monkeys, so that scientists could investigate the biological effects of space travel.
The United राज्य launched flights containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 with one उड़ान in 1969 and one in 1985.
फ़्रांस launched दो monkey-carrying flights in 1967.
the Soviet संघ and Russia launched monkeys between 1983 और 1996.
सबसे monkeys were anesthetized before lift-off.
overall thirty-two बंदरों flew in the space program ; none flew more than एकबार.
numerous back-up monkeys also went through the कार्यक्रम but never flew.
Monkeys from several species were used, सहित rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus बंदरों, गिलहरी बंदरों, and pig-tailed macaques.
कुछ chimpanzees ( which हैं apes बल्कि than monkeys ) were also used.
रेड ( redundant array of स्वतंत्र disks, originally अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive disks ) is a storage technology कि combines multiple डिस्क drive components into a logical unit.
Data is distributed आरपार the drives in एक of several तरीके called `` RAID levels '', depending on the level of अतिरेक और प्रदर्शन required.
The पद `` रेड '' was first defined by David Patterson, Garth A. Gibson, and Randy Katz at the University of California, बर्कली in 1987.
Marketers representing industry RAID निर्माताओं later attempted to reinvent the term to describe a redundant array of स्वतंत्र disks as a means of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology.
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for computer data storage schemes कि can divide and replicate data among अनेक physical drives : रेड is an example of भंडार आभासीकरण and the array can be पहुँचा by the operating system as one single ड्राइव.
The different schemes or architectures are named by the word रेड followed by a number ( e.g. रेड 0, RAID 1 ).
Each scheme provides a different संतुलन between the key goals : reliability and उपलब्धता, प्रदर्शन and capacity.
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide protection against unrecoverable ( sector ) read errors, as well as पूरे डिस्क failure.
A lymphocyte is a type of white रक्त cell in the vertebrate immune प्रणाली.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
विशाल granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( NK cells ).
छोटी lymphocytes consist of T cells and B कोशिकाएं.
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy फिल्मी written and directed by Joel and Ethan Coen.
जेफ़ Bridges सितारों as जेफ़ Lebowski, an बेरोजगार Los Angeles slacker और avid बॉलर, nicknamed `` the यार. ''
After a मामला of mistaken identity, The Dude is introduced to a करोड़पति also named जेफरी Lebowski.
When the करोड़पति Lebowski 's trophy wife is बाद kidnapped, he commissions The Dude to deliver the ransom to सुरक्षित उसके रिलीज.
The plan goes awry when The Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak ( जॉन गुडमैन ) schemes to रखना the full ransom.
स्टीव buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, दाउद Huddleston, Julianne Moore, Tara Reid, and John Turturro also star in the film, जिससे is narrated by a काउंटी known only as `` The Stranger '', played by Sam Elliott.
The film is loosely inspired by the work of Raymond Chandler.
जोएल Coen stated : `` We चाही to do a चांडलर दयालु of story – how it चालें episodically, and deals with the वर्ण trying to unravel a mystery, as खूब as having a hopelessly जटिल प्लाट कि 's ultimately महत्वहीन. ''
the original स्कोर was composed by Carter Burwell, a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers.
the बिग Lebowski was a disappointment at the U.S. box दफ्तर and received mixed reviews at the time of its release.
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time, and the film रै become a cult पसंदीदा, विख्यात for इसके idiosyncratic characters, dream sequences, unconventional dialogue, and eclectic soundtrack.
सेवेरस Snape is a fictional character in the Harry Potter book series लिखा by j.K. Rowling.
in the first novel of the श्रेणी, he is hostile toward हैरी and is built up to be the primary विपक्षी जबतक the final chapters.
As the series progresses, snape 's character becomes more layered and जटिल.
Rowling does not fully खुलासा the details of his सच्चा loyalties जबतक the end of the final किताब, Harry कुम्हार and the Deathly Hallows.
Over the course of the series, Snape 's portrayal evolves from that of a malicious and partisan teacher to that of a pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily सिखाती Potions at हॉग्वार्ट्स, though in the sixth novel he teaches Defence विरूद्ध the Dark Arts, a position जिससे he was known to have desired throughout the श्रेणी.
he ultimately becomes Headmaster of Hogwarts in the final novel.
Rowling has described उसे as `` a gift of a character ''.
grits refers to a ground-corn खाना of Native American उत्पत्ति, that is आम in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य and मुख्यतः खाया at breakfast.
Modern grits हैं commonly made of alkali-treated corn known as hominy.
Grits are similar to अन्य मोटा maize-based porridges from around the world ऐसे as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` Instant grits '' have महरूम processed to speed cooking.
The शब्द `` grits '' derives from the Old English शब्द `` grytt, '' meaning coarse meal.
This word originally referred to wheat and other porridges now known as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize, unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages, is a food derived from corn ( a New World plant ) and `` corn '' had been used to describe wheat products in many यूरोपीय regions.
`` Grits '' may be either singular or plural ; historically, in the American South the word was invariably एकवचन notwithstanding its plural form ( cf. such food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '', likewise बहुवचन in रूप, but एकवचन in use ).
Sometimes, grits हैं called sofkee or sofkey ( from a देशी American Muskogee word ).
In आणविक biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg बाद धारणा.
बाद during pregnancy it is made by the विकासशील placenta, and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors उपज this hormone ; therefore, elevated स्तर measured when the रोगी is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is नहीं known whether this production is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of all आयु.
, the FDA रै निषिद्ध the बिक्री of `` होम्योपैथिक '' and over the काउंटर hCG आहार products and declared them fraudulent and illegal.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, restaurants, and वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक country except Cuba और उत्तर Korea.
It is उत्पादित by the Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to simply as कोक ( a registered trademark of The coca-cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it was invented in the लेट 19th century by John pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought आउट by businessman Asa griggs Candler, whose विपणन tactics led Coke to its dominance of the संसार soft-drink market throughout the 20th सदी.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is तब बेची to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, जो hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध साथ the company, produce finished product in डिब्बे and bottles इससे the concentrate in combination with filtered water और sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending मशीने.
ऐसे bottlers शामिल Coca-Cola Enterprises, जिससे is the largest single coca-cola bottler in North अमेरिका and पश्चिमी Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company भी बिकता concentrate लिये soda fountains to major restaurants and खाना सेवा distributors.
The coca-cola Company has, on occasion, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name.
The most आम of these is Diet कोक, साथ others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke caffeine-free, Coca-Cola चेरी, Coca-Cola शून्य, coca-cola Vanilla, और special versions साथ lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best वैश्विक brand 2011, Coca-Cola थी the संसार 's सबसे valuable brand.
an ombudsman is an official, usually appointed by the government or by parliament but with a significant degree of independence, who is charged with representing the interests of the public by investigating and संबोधित complaints of maladministration or violation of rights.
In कुछ countries an Inspector General, नागरिक Advocate or अन्य official may have कर्तव्य similar to those of a नेशनल ombudsman, and may also be नियुक्त by the legislature.
नीचे the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, local or नगरपालिका सरकारी, and unofficial ombudsmen may be appointed by, or even कार्य for, a corporation such as a utility प्रदायक or a newspaper, for an NGO, or for a पेशेवर नियामक body.
Whether appointed by the legislature, the executive, or an संगठन ( or, less frequently, elected by the constituency that he or she serves ), the typical duties of an ombudsman हैं to investigate शिकायत and attempt to निराकरण them, usually through सुझाव ( binding or not ) or मध्यस्थता.
ombudsmen sometimes also aim to identify प्रणालीगत issues leading to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches of people 's rights.
at the national level, सबसे ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal with the entire public sector, and sometimes भी elements of the private sector ( for example, contracted service प्रदाताओं ).
In some cases, there is a more restricted mandate, for example साथ particular sectors of society.
अधिक recent developments have शामिल the creation of specialised Children 's ombudsman and Information Commissioner agencies.
in some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about नेशनल सरकारी is more formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g. the United Kingdom Parliamentary Commissioner for Administration, और the Western ऑस्ट्रेलियाई state Ombudsman ).
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with alleged maladministration to promoting और protecting human अधिकारों, the ombudsman is recognised as the national human अधिकारों institution.
the post of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th century been instituted by सबसे governments and by कुछ intergovernmental संगठन such as the यूरोपीय Union.
Making a शिकायत to an ombudsman is usually free of charge.

New इंग्लैण्ड is a प्रदेश in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the six राज्य of Maine, New Hampshire, वर्मांट, Massachusetts, Rhode द्वीप, और कनेक्टिकट.
New England is bordered by New यॉर्क state to the दक्षिणपश्चिम, क्यूबेक to the northwest, और New Brunswick और the अटलांटिक Ocean to the east.
In one of the earliest English settlements in North अमेरिका, Pilgrims from England first settled in New इंग्लैण्ड in 1620, to form plymouth Colony.
Ten years later, the Puritans settled north of Plymouth Colony in बोस्टन, thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony.
Over the next 130 years, New England fought in चार French and Indian Wars, until the अंग्रेजों पराजित the French and उनके देशी allies in उत्तर America.
In the लेट 18th century, the New England Colonies initiated the resistance to the British पार्लियामेंट 's efforts to impose नई taxes without the consent of the colonists.
The Boston Tea Party थी a विरोध to जिससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन responded साथ a series of punitive laws stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government, which were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों authorities from New इंग्लैण्ड in spring 1776, और the Declaration of Independence in जुलाई 1776.
Some of the first movements of अमरीकी literature, philosophy, और शिक्षा originated in नई इंग्लैण्ड.
The region played a prominent role in the गति to abolish गुलामी, and was the first प्रदेश of the United States to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution.
आज, New England is a प्रमुख world center of education, high प्रौद्योगिकी, बीमे, और medicine.
Boston is इसके सांस्कृतिक, वित्तीय, educational, medical and transportation center.
प्रत्येक state is principally subdivided into छोटी incorporated municipalities known as New England कस्बों, which are often governed by town meeting.
The only unincorporated territory in New इंग्लैण्ड exists in the sparse, northern regions of Vermont, New Hampshire, और Maine.
चूंकि 1970, voters have more often समर्थित liberal उम्मीदवार at the राज्य और federal level than those of any अन्य region in the United States.
New England is the only one of the United States Census Bureau 's nine regional divisions जिनकी name does नहीं derive from its geography, and it is the तभी multi-state region with clear, consistent boundaries.
It maintains a दमदार sense of cultural पहचान set apart इससे the rest of the country, although the शर्तें of this identity are प्रायः contested, combining puritanism साथ liberalism, agrarian life with industry, और isolation साथ immigration.
