is an American television series that combines the चिकित्सा drama और action-adventure genres.
It थी produced by Mark सात सीमित and distributed by सार्वभौमिक Studios.
it debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15, 1972, on एनबीसी, replacing the two short-lived series the Partners and The शुभ Life, and ran until September 3, 1977, with छह अतिरिक्त two-hour टेलीविज़न films during the following two years.
आपात !
थी created और produced by जोकर Webb and Robert A. Cinader, both of whom यहूद also responsible लिये the पुलिस dramas Adam-12 and dragnet.
The Eastern Time Zone ( et ) encompasses 17 U.S. states in the eastern भाग of the contiguous United States, parts of Canada and तीन countries in South अमेरिका.
Places that उपयोग Eastern Standard समय ( EST ) जब observing मानक time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 घंटों behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
Eastern daylight Time ( EDT ), when observing daylight छायांकन समय ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind Coordinated Universal समय ( ).
in the उत्तरी भाग of the time zone, during the second Sunday in March, at 2:00 a.m. EST, clocks हैं उन्नत to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap. ''
दौरान the पहला संडे in नवम्बर, at 2:00 a.m. EDT, घड़ियाँ are स्थानांतरित back to 1:00 a.m. EST, thus `` duplicating '' one घंटा.
Southern भाग of the मण्डल ( पनामा and the Caribbean ) do not observe daylight छायांकन.
मानक form of the आवधिक table.
The colors represent अलग categories of elements explained नीचे.
The periodic table is a table display of the chemical तत्व, organized on the basis of their परमाणु numbers, electron configurations, and recurring chemical properties.
तत्व हैं presented in order of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ).
The मानक रूप of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of elements, positioned ऊपर a छोटी double row of elements.
The table can भी be deconstructed into चार rectangular ब्लॉक : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, और the f-block below that.
The rows of the तालिका हैं called अवधि ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks are पुकारा groups, साथ some of these having names ऐसे as the halogens or the noble gases.
चूंकि, by परिभाषा, a periodic तालिका incorporates recurring trends, any such table can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the गुण of the elements and predict the गुण of नई, yet to be discovered or synthesized, तत्व.
as a result, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a useful framework लिये analyzing chemical बर्ताव, and such टेबल are widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
हालांकि precursors exist, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the publication, in 1869, of the पहला widely पहचाना आवधिक तालिका.
He developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements.
mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in इस table.
Most of his predictions यहूद proved correct when the तत्व in question यहूद subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table रै since been expanded and refined with the डिस्कवरी or synthesis of further new elements और the development of new theoretical models to बताइये chemical behavior.
सब elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to मौजूद naturally, although some are found तभी in trace amounts and were initially discovered by संश्लेषण in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have only been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions होने a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minecraft is a सैंडबॉक्स indie game originally created by Swedish programmer Markus `` पायदान '' Persson and बाद विकसित and published by Mojang.
it was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental अल्फा संस्करण और, after gradual updates, was published as a full release संस्करण on November 18, 2011.
A version for Android थी released a month पहले on October 7, and an iOS version was released on November 17, 2011.
on May 9, 2012, the game थी released on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade खेल, co-developed by 4J studios.
सब versions of Minecraft receive periodic updates.
The रचनात्मक and भवन aspects of Minecraft allow players to build constructions out of textured घन in a 3D procedurally उत्पन्न world.
अन्य activities in the game include exploration, महफ़िल resources, crafting and combat.
Gameplay in its वाणिज्यिक रिलीज has two principal modes : survival, which requires players to acquire resources and maintain their health and hunger ; और creative, where players have an असीमित supply of resources, the ability to fly, और no health or hunger.
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival, differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest setting और respawning is disabled, forcing खिलाड़ी to delete their worlds upon death.
Minecraft प्राप्त five awards from the 2011 Game डेवलपर Conference : it थी awarded the Innovation Award, बेहतरीन Downloadable Game Award, and the बेहतरीन डेब्यू Game Award इससे the Game Developers Choice Awards ; और the Audience Award, as well as the seumas mcnally Grand पुरस्कार, from the Independent Games Festival in 2011.
In 2012, Minecraft was awarded a Golden Joystick Award in the category Best downloadable खेल.
As of April 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 million copies on pc और as of जनवरी 22, 2013, over 20 million नक़ल across all platforms.
The Dark Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
आधारित on the DC Comics character Batman, the film is the second part of नोलन 's Batman फिल्मी series and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the lead भूमिका of Bruce wayne/batman, with a returning cast of Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James Gordon और Morgan Freeman as लुसियस Fox.
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( आरोन Eckhart ), गोथम 's newly निर्वाचित District Attorney and the consort of ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल friend रेचल Dawes ( Maggie जिलएनहॉल ), who joins Batman and the police in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` the Joker `` ( Heath लेजर ).
Nolan 's inspiration for the film was the जोकर 's comic book डेब्यू in 1940, the 1988 ग्राफिक novel, and the 1996 series, which retold two-face 's origin.
The nickname `` the Dark नाईट '' was first applied to Batman in बैटमैन no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a story written by Bill Finger.
The अंधेरा नाईट was filmed primarily in Chicago, as well as in अनेक other locations in the United States, the संयुक्त Kingdom, और हांग काँग.
Nolan प्रयुक्त an imax कैमरा to film some sequences, including the Joker 's first appearance in the फिल्मी.
On January 22, 2008, some months बाद he था completed फिल्मांकन on The Dark Knight and छह महीने before the film 's release, Heath लेजर died from a विषाक्त combination of prescription drugs, leading to intense ध्यान इससे the press और movie-going पब्लिक.
Warner भाईs. had initially निर्मित a viral marketing अभियान for The अंधेरा Knight, विकासशील promotional websites and trailers highlighting स्क्रीन shots of Ledger as the जोकर, but after लेजर 's death, the studio refocused its promotional campaign.
The Dark Knight was released on July 16, 2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, on जुलाई 18, 2008 in उत्तर America, and on जुलाई 24, 2008 in the United Kingdom.
Considered एक of the best films of the 2000s और one of the best superhero films ever made, the फिल्मी received highly धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ और नियत numerous records during its theatrical चलाएं.
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide, it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all time, unadjusted for महंगाई.
The फिल्मी received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for बेहतरीन Sound Editing and Ledger was posthumously awarded Best Supporting Actor.
the अंधेरा नाईट उदय, the final भाग of the trilogy, was released on जुलाई 20, 2012.
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio, the प्रौद्योगिकी और events that produced instruments कि use radio waves and activities that लोगों undertook.
Later, the history is dominated by programming and contents, which is closer to general history.
the सिडनी Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales, ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
it was conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn Utzon, opening in 1973 after a long gestation कि began साथ उसके competition-winning design in 1957.
जोसेफ Cahill 's नई South Wales Government gave the go-ahead लिये work to begin in 1958.
The government 's bold निर्णय to select Utzon 's design is प्रायः निष्प्रभ by the कांड that followed.
it is on Bennelong पाइंट in Sydney Harbour, बंद to the सिडनी Harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern टिप of the Sydney central business district ( the CBD ), surrounded on three sides by the harbour ( Sydney Cove और फार्म Cove ) and अंतर्देशीय by the Royal Botanic gardens.
Contrary to its name, it houses अनेक प्रदर्शन venues.
It is among the busiest performing arts केंद्रों in the संसार, hosting over 1,500 performances each year attended by some 1.2 million people.
it provides a स्थान लिये many performing-arts कंपनियाँ, सहित the four key निवासी companies Opera Australia, The Australian बैले, the Sydney Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, and presents a wide range of productions on इसके own account.
it is also one of the most popular visitor attractions in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, with more than seven million people visiting each year, 300,000 of whom लो a हिदायत tour.
It is administered by the Sydney Opera House Trust, under the New South Wales Ministry of the कला.
On 28 June 2007, it was made a युनेस्को World Heritage साईट.
it is एक of the 20th century 's most distinctive इमारतें और एक of the most प्रसिद्ध performing arts केंद्रों in the world.
A graph of देह द्रव्यमान index as a फलन of body mass and body ऊँचाई is shown ऊपर.
the dashed लाइनों represent subdivisions भीतर a major class.
लिये instance the `` underweight '' classification is further divided into `` कठोर '', `` मॉडरेट '', और `` mild '' subclasses.
The body mass अनुक्रमणिका ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a माप for इंसान देह आकार आधारित on an individual 's weight and ऊँचाई.
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the belgian polymath Adolphe quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of developing `` सोशल physics ''.
देह mass अनुक्रमणिका is पारिभाषित as the individual 's body mass divided by the वर्गाकार of their height.
the formulae universally used in आयुर्विज्ञान उपज a unit of माप of kg/m2.
BMI can also be संकल्पित using a बीएमआई chart, which प्रदर्शक BMI as a function of weight ( horizontal अक्ष ) and ऊँचाई ( लंबवत axis ) using contour लाइनों for different मान of BMI or colors for अलग BMI categories.
† The फ़ैक्टर for uk/us units is more precisely 703.06957964, लकिन that level of परिशुद्धता is नहीं meaningful लिये this calculation.
To कार्य from stone and pounds पहला multiply the स्टोन by 14 तब add the पाउंड to दे the whole mass in pounds ; to कार्य from feet और inches first गुणा the फीट by 12 then add the इंच to दे the whole height in inches.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( ns February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) was an english-american political activist, author, राजनैतिक theorist and revolutionary.
as the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the अमरीकी Revolution, he inspired the Patriots in 1776 to declare स्वतंत्रता from Britain.
उसके ideas reflected Enlightenment era rhetoric of transnational इंसान अधिकारों.
He रै been called `` a corsetmaker by trade, a journalist by profession, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
Born in Thetford, England, in the county of Norfolk, Paine emigrated to the British American colonies in 1774 साथ the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the अमरीकी Revolution.
His principal योगदान were the powerful, widely पढ़ा pamphlet Common भाव ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial अमेरिका 's independence इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट Britain, और The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams कहा, `` Without the कलम of the author of Common भाव, the sword of Washington होता have been raised in vain.”
paine जिया in फ़्रांस for most of the 1790s, becoming deeply involved in the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति.
He wrote the अधिकारों of man ( 1791 ), in part a defence of the French Revolution against इसके critics.
His हमले on British लेखक एडमंड Burke led to a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the अपराधों of seditious मानहानि.
In 1792, despite नहीं being able to speak French, he थी elected to the French National सम्मेलन.
The girondists regarded him as an ally.
Consequently, the Montagnards, especially Robespierre, regarded उसे as an enemy.
In December 1793, he was गिरफ्तार and imprisoned in Paris, then released in 1794.
he became notorious because of the Age of कारण ( 1793–94 ), his book that advocates deism, promotes reason and freethinking, and argues against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
he also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, and introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income.
In 1802, he returned to अमेरिका where he died on जून 8, 1809.
Only six लोगों attended his funeral as he had been ostracized for his ridicule of christianity.
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical शोध और drug development कि generate safety और efficacy data ( or अधिक specifically, सूचना about adverse drug reactions and adverse प्रभाव of other treatments ) लिये health interventions ( e.g., drugs, diagnostics, devices, therapy प्रोटोकॉल ).
They are conducted only बाद संतोषजनक information रै been gathered on the quality of the non clinical सुरक्षा, और health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where स्वीकृति of the drug or device is sought.
previously, many emerging देशों did not require local ट्रायल for उत्पाद approvals.
Now, हालांकि emerging countries still accept data from u.s./europe, they also require some लोकल trials.
Depending on the प्रकार of product and the stage of its development, investigators initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot अध्ययन, and subsequently conduct larger स्केल studies in मरीजों that often compare the new उत्पाद with others already approved for the affliction of interest.
As positive safety and efficacy data हैं gathered, the number of patients is typically increased.
नैदानिक trials can vary in size, and can involve a सिंगल शोध entity in one country or many ऐसे entities in multiple countries.
A full series of trials may incur sizable costs, और the burden of paying लिये all the जरुरी लोगों and services is usually borne by the sponsor, which may be a सरकारी संगठन or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or medical device company.
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the संसाधन of the sponsor, a नैदानिक trial is managed by an outsourced संगी, such as a contract research organization or a clinical ट्रायल unit in the academic sector.
the Green Bay Packers are an American football team based in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
वे are सदस्यों of the North Division of the नेशनल Football सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL, having been organized और playing in 1919.
the Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned major league पेशेवर sports team in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common in the NFL during the 1920s और 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and जार्ज व्हिटनी Calhoun, the Green Bay पैकर्स can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in ग्रीन Bay डेटिंग back to 1896.
in 1919 and 1920 the पैकर्स competed as a semi-professional football team against clubs इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन और the मिडवेस्ट.
They joined the अमरीकी पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल Association ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
Although Green खाड़ी is the last NFL `` small town '' टोली, its local प्रशंसक आधार और media extends into nearby मिल्वौकी ; the team also निभाई चयनित home games वहीँ between 1933 और 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have जीती 13 league championships ( more than any अन्य टोली in the NFL ), सहित नौ NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era और four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( सुपर Bowl i ), 1968 ( सुपर Bowl ii ), 1997 ( Super कटोरी XXXI ) और 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, कड़वा rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the शिकागो Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल history, डेटिंग back to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl दारू ), the वही type of दारू found in alcoholic beverages.
It is सबसे often used as a motor fuel, मुख्यतः as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
World ethanol production for transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 billion to अधिक than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in global gasoline प्रकार fuel use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
in 2011 worldwide इथेनॉल ईंधन production reached 22.36 अरब U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), with the United States as the top निर्माता with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), हिसाब लिये 62.2 % of वैश्विक production, followed by ब्राज़ील with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 अरब liters ).
Ethanol ईंधन has a `` गैसोलीन गैलन equivalency `` ( GGE ) value of, जिससे means 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one गैलन of गैसोलीन.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil और in the संयुक्त States, और together both countries were responsible लिये 87.1 % of the संसार 's ethanol ईंधन production in 2011.
सबसे cars on the road today in the U.S. can run on blends of up to 10 % ethanol, and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011.
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it अनिवार्य to blend ethanol साथ गैसोलीन, and चूंकि 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol और 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
by दिसम्बर 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and लाइट trucks और 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly उपयोग neat ethanol fuel ( ज्ञात as E100 ).
Bioethanol is a रूप of renewable energy कि can be उत्पादित इससे agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made इससे बहुत common फसलों such as sugar cane, potato, manioc and मकई.
There has been considerable बहस about how उपयोगी bioethanol will be in replacing गैसोलीन.
Concerns परिचय its production और use relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for crops, as well as the उर्जा and pollution संतुलन of the whole cycle of ethanol production, विशेषकर from corn.
Recent developments with cellulosic ethanol production और commercialization may allay कुछ of these concerns.
cellulosic इथेनॉल offers promise because cellulose मछली, a प्रमुख and सार्वभौमिक component in plant cells दीवारें, can be प्रयुक्त to उपज ethanol.
According to the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी, cellulosic इथेनॉल could allow ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role in the future than previously विचार.

the second e85 flexifuel मॉडल introduced by Saab in the Swedish market.
A प्लैक commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो assassination और steps of gavrilo Princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987, पहले steps यहूद removed in 1992 and plaque बदला इससे Cyrillic to Latin स्क्रिप्ट )
A plaque commemorating the location of the साराजेवो assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
on 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of hohenberg, were shot मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a group of छह बोस्नियाई Serb assassins coordinated by डेनियल Ilić.
The राजनैतिक objective of the assassination was to ब्रेक off Austria-Hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so they could be combined into a वृहद Serbia or a यूगोस्लाविया.
The हत्यारे ' motives were सतत with the गति that later became ज्ञात as Young Bosnia.
सर्बियाई military officers stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of ये सर्बियाई military conspirators was मुख्य of Serbian सैन्य Intelligence dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man Major Vojislav tankosić, and masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić हथियारबंद the assassins with bombs और pistols and प्रशिक्षित उन्हें.
the हत्यारे were दिए access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses और agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons और operatives into austria-hungary.
The assassins, the key members of the clandestine टनल, और the कुंजी Serbian military षड्यंत्रकारियों जो were still alive were arrested, आजमाया, convicted and punished.
those जो यहूद arrested in Bosnia were आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर 1914.
the अन्य conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo अदालत on the French-controlled Salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated false आरोप ; Serbia चलाया three of the top military षड्यंत्रकारियों.
Much of कया is known about the assassinations comes from these two trials and सम्बन्धित records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing और murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World युद्ध I one माह later.
renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April 25, 1969 ) is an American actress और producer.
Zellweger पहला gained फैली attention for her role in the फिल्मी Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ), and subsequently प्राप्त two nominations for the अकादमी पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री for her roles as Bridget Jones in the कॉमेडी Bridget जोन्स 's Diary ( 2001 ), और as Roxie Hart in the musical शिकागो ( 2002 ).
वो won the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the नाटक Cold पहाड़ ( 2003 ).
She रै won an Academy पुरस्कार, three सुनहरी Globe पुरस्कार, three स्क्रीन Actors Guild Awards, and a bafta पुरस्कार ; was named Hasty खीर 's Woman of the साल in 2009 ; और established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the तीन smallest हड्डियों in the human body, the malleus, the incus and the stapes.
वे are contained within the middle कान space और serve to संचारण ध्वनि from the एयर to the fluid-filled व्यामोह ( cochlea ).
The अनुपस्थिति of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing घाटा.
The term `` ossicles '' literally means `` छोटा bones '' and commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
The नई वचन ( Hebrew • • — यूनानी • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical निर्वचन originally निकला from a phrase in the किताब of यिर्मयाह, in the Hebrew Scriptures.
it is often विचार of as an eschatological मुक्तिदाता Age or संसार to come और is सम्बन्धित to the biblical अवधारणा of the किंगडम of परमेश्वर.
generally, Christians believe that the New वचन was instituted at the पिछला भोजन as भाग of the eucharist, which in the Gospel of जॉन includes the New commandment.
There हैं several Christian eschatologies that further define the नई Covenant, as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the नई वचन as an जारी संबंध between Christian believers and परमेश्वर that होगा be in पूरा fruition after the Second coming of मसीह ; that is, it होगा नहीं only be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the भविष्य external world as खूब.
the connection between the रक्त of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in most modern अंग्रेज़ी translations of the नई Testament with the saying : `` इस कप कि is poured out for you is the नई वचन in my रक्त ''.
Christians believe that यीशु is the mediator of the नई Covenant, and that the Blood of Christ shed at उसके crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant.
As with all covenants between God और man वर्णित in the Bible, the New Covenant is माना `` a बंध in रक्त sovereignly administered by God. ''
It has been theorized कि the New वचन is the विधि of Christ as spoken during उसके उपदेश on the Mount.
the following List of लोगों pardoned or granted clemency by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States documents the most prominent cases of each presidency.
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II, Section 2, Clause 1 ), राष्ट्रपतियों have the power to ग्रान्ट दया in one or अधिक of the following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon, to भ्रमण a वाक्य, or to तोड़ना a ठीक.
U.S. Presidents have no शक्ति to grant clemency लिये crimes prosecuted under state law.
As to the अंतर between a pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम vacating a conviction.
a commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a वाक्य लिये a crime pursuant to a conviction, बगैर vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons and clemencies यहूद issued by U.S. presidents in the 20th century alone.
The records of acts of दया यहूद public until 1934.
In 1981 the दफ्तर of the pardon Attorney थी निर्मित and records from President H. W. Bush आगे हैं now listed.
This list includes pardons and commutations.
Tampa ( ) is a city in the u.S. state of फ्लोरिडा.
it serves as the काउंटी सीट for hillsborough काउंटी and is located on the वेस्ट coast of Florida, on Tampa Bay near the Gulf of मैक्सिको.
The जनसांख्यिकी of Tampa in 2011 थी 346,037.
The current location of Tampa was एकबार inhabited by indigenous peoples of the Safety हार्बर संस्कृति, most notably the tocobaga and the Pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It was briefly छान by Spanish explorers in the early 16th century, but वहीँ were no permanent American or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर आज 's city हद until after the संयुक्त राज्य था acquired फ्लोरिडा from स्पेन in 1819.
In 1824, the United States फौज established a frontier चौकी called Fort ब्रुक at the mouth of the Hillsborough River, निकट the site of today 's tampa Convention बीच.
The first civilian residents यहूद pioneers who settled near the fort for protection इससे the nearby Seminole population.
The कस्बा grew slowly until the 1880s, when railroad links, the डिस्कवरी of फास्फेट, and the arrival of the cigar industry jump-started Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the जल्दी 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a भाग of the metropolitan area most commonly referred to as the Tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल.
लिये U.S. Census purposes, tampa is भाग of the Tampa-St. Petersburg-Clearwater, Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The four-county area is रचित of roughly 2.7 लाख निवासियों, making it the second largest metropolitan statistical area ( MSA ) in the state, और the fourth largest in the southeastern संयुक्त States, behind मियामी, Washington, d.C., and Atlanta.
The Greater tampa Bay area has just over 4 million residents and generally includes the Tampa और sarasota मैट्रो areas.
The Tampa खाड़ी Partnership और U.S. जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़ा showed an average annual growth of 2.47 प्रतिशत, or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per साल.
Between 2000 and 2006, the वृहद tampa Bay Market experienced a combined growth rate of 14.8 percent, growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 लाख and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 अनुमान shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 people और a 2017 projection of 4,536,854 लोगों.
Tampa has a number of खेल teams, such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League, the Tampa Bay Lightning of the नेशनल हॉकी League, and the Tampa Bay Storm of the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल League.
The Tampa खाड़ी Rays in Major League बेसबॉल and the tampa Bay Rowdies of the North अमरीकी सॉकर League खेल their home games in neighboring St. Petersburg, Florida.
In 2008, Tampa was क्रमित as the 5th best outdoor नगर by Forbes.
A 2004 survey by the NYU समाचारपत्र वॉशिंगटन Square News ranked Tampa as a शीर्ष city for `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is now ranked as a `` Gamma '' संसार city by loughborough University.
according to Loughborough, tampa बाँधने alongside अन्य world cities ऐसे as Phoenix, सेंटो Domingo, and ओसाका.
in recent years tampa has देखी a notable upsurge in high-market demand from उपभोक्ता, signaling अधिक wealth concentrated in the क्षेत्रफल.
tampa hosted the 2012 Republican National Convention.
The Chevrolet cavalier was a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल produced from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
Built on the कम्पनी 's J platform, the cavalier produced the उच्चतम sales in 1984.
at & T Mobility LLC ब्रांडेड and referred to as AT & t ( formerly Cingular बेतार LLC ), is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of AT & t Inc. that provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 million subscribers in the United States, including प्यूर्टो Rico and the U.S. वर्जिन Islands.
AT & t Mobility is the दूसरी largest बेतार telecommunications provider in the United राज्य and प्यूर्टो Rico, पीछे Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012.
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in the Lenox Park क्षेत्रफल of DeKalb Co. Georgia, बस outside Atlanta.
originally Cingular बेतार llc from 2000 to 2007, a संयुक्त venture between SBC संचार and BellSouth, the company acquired the old AT & T Wireless in 2004 ; sbc later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
Cingular became wholly owned by AT & T in December 2006 as a result of at & T 's अधिग्रहण of BellSouth.
In January 2007, Cingular confirmed it होता re-brand itself under the AT & T नाम.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, for both regulatory and brand-awareness reasons दोनो brands were used in the company 's साइनेज and advertising during a transition period.
the परिवर्तन concluded in late June, बस prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
on March 20, 2011, at & T गतिशीलता घोषित its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 अरब.
if it had received government और regulatory approval, at & T would have had more than 130 million subscribers.
However, the U.S. Department of Justice, the Federal Communications आयोग, and AT & t Mobility 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( such as Sprint nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds कि it would reduce competition in the cellular communications मार्केट.
In December 2011, in the face of both governmental and widespread उपभोक्ता विपक्ष, AT & T withdrew their offer to पूरा the merger.
मार्टिन Luther किंग, Jr. ( January 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) was an American clergyman, activist, and leader in the african-american Civil Rights Movement.
he is बेहतरीन known for his भूमिका in the advancement of civil rights using nonviolent civil disobedience.
King has become a national icon in the history of American progressivism.
A Baptist minister, King became a सिविल rights activist early in उसके करियर.
He led the 1955 Montgomery बस Boycott and helped found the दक्षिणी Christian Leadership Conference ( SCLC ) in 1957, सेवारत as its पहला president.
साथ the SCLC, किंग led an unsuccessful संघर्ष against segregation in albany, Georgia, in 1962, and organized nonviolent विरोध in Birmingham, Alabama, कि आकर्षित national attention following television news कवरेज of the क्रूर police response.
King भी helped to व्यवस्थित the 1963 कूच on वॉशिंगटन, where he delivered his `` I Have a सपना `` वाक.
There, he स्थापित his reputation as one of the greatest orators in अमरीकी history.
He also स्थापित उसके reputation as a radical, and became an object of the Federal Bureau of Investigation 's COINTELPRO for the rest of his life.
FBI agents investigated him for possible communist ties, अंकित उसके extramarital liaisons and reported on them to government officials, and on one occasion, mailed King a threatening anonymous letter कि he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit आत्महत्या.
On October 14, 1964, King received the नोबेल Peace Prize लिये combating racial inequality through nonviolence.
In 1965, he और the SCLC helped to व्यवस्थित the selma to Montgomery marches and the following साल, he took the movement north to शिकागो.
In the final years of his life, King expanded his focus to include गरीबी और the Vietnam War, alienating many of his उदार allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
King was नियोजन a national occupation of Washington, d.C., पुकारा the ग़रीब People 's Campaign.
किंग was assassinated on April 4, 1968, in मेम्फिस, Tennessee.
उसके death थी followed by riots in अनेक U.S. cities.
दोषारोपण that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of हत्या किंग, had been framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट with सरकारी एजेंटों persisted for decades बाद the shooting, and the jury of a 1999 civil trial मिला Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध King.
King थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय Medal of Freedom and the Congressional सुनहरा Medal मरणोपरांत.
Martin Luther King, Jr. दिन was स्थापित as a U.S. federal अवकाश in 1986.
Hundreds of गलियों in the U.S. have महरूम renamed in उसके सम्मान.
A memorial statue on the National Mall थी opened to the पब्लिक in 2011.
The tiger ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest cat species, reaching a कुल देह लंबाई of up to और weighing up to.
it is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only the polar भालू and the brown bear ).
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of अंधेरा vertical stripes on reddish-orange फर with a हल्का underside.
it has exceptionally stout teeth, and the canines are the longest among जीना felids साथ a crown height of as much as or even.
In zoos, tigers have जिया लिये 20 to 26 years, which also seems to be उनके longevity in the wild.
वे are territorial और generally solitary but social animals, often requiring large contiguous areas of habitat कि support their शिकार requirements.
This, coupled with the fact that they are indigenous to some of the more densely populated places on धरती, रै caused significant conflicts साथ humans.
Tigers once ranged widely across Asia, इससे Turkey in the west to the eastern coast of Russia.
over the past 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their historic दायरा, और have been extirpated from southwest and सेंट्रल Asia, from the आइलैंड्स of जावा and Bali, and from विशाल areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
आज, they दायरा इससे the Siberian ताइगा to open grasslands और tropical mangrove swamps.
The remaining छह tiger subspecies have been classified as endangered by आईयूसीएन.
The global population in the जंगली is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, down from around 100,000 at the start of the 20th सदी, with सबसे remaining populations occurring in छोटी pockets isolated from each other.
Major reasons for population मनाही शामिल आवास विनाश, आवास fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of area occupied by टाइगर्स is अनुमानित at कम than, a 41 % मनाही इससे the area estimated in the mid-1990s.
Tigers हैं among the सबसे recognisable और लोकप्रिय of the world 's charismatic megafauna.
वे have प्रदर्शित prominently in ancient mythology और folklore, and continue to be depicted in आधुनिक films and साहित्य.
Tigers appear on many ध्वज, coats of arms, and as mascots for sporting teams.
the बंगाल tiger is the national animal of दोनो India और Bangladesh.
The simplified internal structure of a chloroplast
Overview of the Calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि बदलें कार्बन dioxide and other यौगिकों into glucose.
ये reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ take the light-dependent reactions and perform further रासायनिक processes on उन्हें.
There are three phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ, collectively पुकारा the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, इस process occurs only when लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ.
Plants do नहीं carry out the Calvin साईकिल by night.
They, बजाय, रिलीज sucrose into the phloem from their मंड reserves.
This प्रक्रम happens जब लाइट is available स्वतंत्र of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 कार्बन fixation, and crassulacean Acid चयापचय ) ; CAM plants स्टोर malic एसिड in their vacuoles प्रत्येक night और रिलीज it by दिन in order to मेक this process work.
A linen रूमाल with pulled thread कढ़ाई around the edges
Linen cloth recovered इससे Qumran Cave 1 near the Dead Sea.
लिनेन ( ) is a textile made इससे the fibers of the flax संयंत्र, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, but when it is made into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness and ताजगी in hot weather.
The word `` लिनेन '' is of वेस्ट Germanic origin और cognates with the Latin name लिये the flax plant linum, और the earlier यूनानी λινόν ( linon ).
This word history रै given rise to a number of other terms in English, the most notable of which is the English word line, निकला इससे the use of a लिनेन ( flax ) लड़ी to determine a सीधा line.
Textiles in a लिनेन बुनते texture, even when बना of cotton, hemp and other non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
Such fabrics generally have their own विशिष्ट names other than linen ; लिये example, ठीक cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam.
the collective पद `` linens `` is still often प्रयुक्त generically to describe a class of woven और भी knitted bed, bath, तालिका and रसोईघर textiles.
The name linens is retained because traditionally, linen was used लिये many of these वस्तुएं.
in the past, the शब्द `` linens '' थी also used to mean lightweight undergarments such as shirts, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a शब्द also cognate साथ लिनेन ), और detachable कमीज़ छल्लों and cuffs, which were historically बना लगभग exclusively out of linen.
the inside cloth layer of fine composite clothing garments ( as for उदाहरण jackets ) थी traditionally made of linen, and इस is the origin of the शब्द अस्तर.
लिनेन textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the world : their इतिहास goes वापस many thousands of years.
Fragments of straw, seeds, मछली, yarns, and various types of fabrics which date back to about 8000 bc have been found in Swiss झील dwellings.
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in जॉर्जिया suggest the use of woven लिनेन fabrics इससे wild flax may date back even पहले to 36,000 BP.
लिनेन थी sometimes प्रयुक्त as करेंसी in ancient मिश्र.
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in लिनेन because it थी seen as a symbol of light and पवित्रता, and as a display of wealth.
कुछ of ये fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, were very fine लिये उनके दिन, but हैं coarse compared to modern linen.
आज, लिनेन is usually an expensive textile, और is produced in relatively छोटी quantities.
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual रेशा length ) relative to cotton and other natural मछली.
Many products हैं made of linen : aprons, bags, तौलिये ( swimmers, bath, beach, body और धो towels ), napkins, bed linens, linen चौके, धावक, chair कवर, और men 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA संसार कप, प्रायः simply the संसार कप, is an international association फ़ुटबॉल competition contested by the senior मेन 's national टीमों of the सदस्यों of Fédération Internationale de Football संघ ( फीफा ), the sport 's वैश्विक शासी देह.
The championship has महरूम awarded every चार years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World युद्ध.
The current champions are स्पेन, who won the 2010 टूर्नामेंट.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a काल of about a माह ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes प्लेस over the preceding three years, is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament साथ with the मेजबान nation ( s ).
the 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम जीती by eight अलग नेशनल टीमों.
Brazil have जीती five times, and they are the only team to have played in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट.
the other World Cup winners हैं इटली, with four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural winners Uruguay, साथ दो शीर्षक each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title प्रत्येक.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final मैच of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
the अगला three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, रूस in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
The is an विस्तार यंत्र for the वी Remote video game controller for the वी that allows it to more accurately capture complex motion.
According to निन्टेंडो, the सेंसर in the device पूरक the accelerometer and सेंसर बार capabilities of the वी Remote to enable क्रियाएँ to be rendered identically on the screen in रियल time.
The Wii 's successor console, the Wii U, supports the Wii MotionPlus और इसके peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
majulah Singapura ( onward सिंगापुर ) is the national anthem of सिंगापुर.
Composed by Zubir कहा in 1958 as a थीम song for official functions of the City Council of Singapore, the song was चयनित in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government.
Upon full independence in 1965, Majulah Singapura was formally adopted as सिंगापुर 's नेशनल anthem.
by विधि the anthem may only be sung साथ its original Malay lyrics, हालांकि there exist authorized translations of the lyrics of the गान in सिंगापुर 's three अन्य आधिकारिक भाषाएं : English, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally रचित in the कुंजी of G प्रमुख, in 2001 the नेशनल गान थी officially relaunched in the lower key of F प्रमुख as इस was said to allow लिये a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement ''.
the नेशनल anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools और हथियारबंद शक्तियां camps at ceremonies आयोजित at the beginning and/or the समाप्त of each day, during which the national ध्वज is also raised and lowered and the नेशनल pledge is लिया.
Singaporeans are especially प्रोत्साहित to गाओ the नेशनल गान on occasions of national जश्न or national significance such as at the नेशनल दिन Parade, at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions और government departments, and at sporting कार्यक्रम at which Singapore टीमों are participating.

shipbuilding is the construction of ships and फ्लोटिंग vessels.
It normally takes place in a specialized facility known as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, भी पुकारा shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces इसके जड़ें to पहले recorded इतिहास.
shipbuilding और ship repairs, दोनो वाणिज्यिक and military, are referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The construction of boats is a similar activity called boat भवन.
The dismantling of ships is called जलयान breaking.

the following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the United States of America.
As पारिभाषित by the संयुक्त States Census ब्यूरो, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` includes a variety of designations, including city, कस्बा, गाँव, borough, and municipality.
a few exceptional Census Designated Places ( cdps ) हैं भी included in the जनसांख्यिकी Bureau 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated स्थान.
संचित city-counties represent a distinct type of सरकारी that includes the entire population of a county, or county समतुल्य.
कुछ consolidated city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated places.
This सूची presents तभी कि portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties कि are not a part of another incorporated place.
Note कि इस list refers only to the population of व्यक्तिगत municipalities भीतर their defined हद, which करता नहीं शामिल other municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों within शहरी agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident जब considering u.S. metropolitan area populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are डिवाइस used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress बिंब, homebrew video खेल and downloaded वाणिज्यिक games ( चूंकि the Nintendo DS is not बेची with a rewritable storage medium ).
Licensed डेवलपर, however, can use a blue Intelligent Systems Nitro emulator बक्सा to फ्लैश cards.
These devices are also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
वहीँ are two प्रमुख classes of flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस which अनुरूप in Slot-2 ( the Game लड़के Advance Game Pak slot ) और newer डिवाइस that fit in slot-1 ( the ds Game Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) डिवाइस have been historically cheaper due to economies of स्केल ( inherited from their use with Game लड़के Advance ), लकिन आवश्यकता a booting tool in Slot-1 in अनुक्रम to उपयोग the touch screen and other ds features.
Second-generation devices ( those which only उपयोग Slot-1 ) do not कार्य with GBA homebrew, लकिन became less expensive and easier to use, rivaling अनेक Slot-2 devices in price.
first-generation डिवाइस include GBA flash cartridges, GBAMP CF, SuperCard, and M3.
Second-generation devices include R4 क्रान्ति, cyclods, G6 Real and ds-x.
The storage यंत्र either contains flash मेमोरी or a slot for a memory card to store homebrew.
Storage devices with a memory-card slot प्रायः have अधिक भंडार क्षमता than flash-memory डिवाइस.
Although flash-memory क्षमता is usually measured in megabits ( mb ), memory-card capacity is usually measured in megabytes ( mb ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 mb ).
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; ds and खेल लड़के Advance ROMs ; खास features ( ऐसे as ability to play मीडिया files ) ; शारीरिक size और cost.
Strictly बोलना, a storage device is not जरुरी लिये DS with FlashMe संस्थापित because homebrew can be भेजा to the DS using WMB.
however, इस is नहीं an easily-portable method because the DS needs to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi कार्ड.
are American people of Japanese विरासत.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest Asian अमरीकी communities, but in recent decades, it रै become the sixth largest समूह at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 census, the largest जापानी American communities यहूद मिला in कैलिफ़ोर्निया with 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, New York with 37,780, Washington with 35,008, and Illinois with 17,542.
दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै the largest japanese-american population in उत्तर America.

This is a comprehensive listing which हाइलाइट significant achievements and milestones based upon Billboard पत्रिका 's singles charts, सबसे notably the Billboard hot 100.
This list spans इससे the समस्या dated January 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue dated अगस्त 4, 1958, and is फिलहाल the standard लोकप्रिय music chart in the United States.
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100, Billboard प्रकाशित four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '', `` Most निभाई by Jockeys '', `` सबसे Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These charts, जिससे ranged from 20 to 100 slots, यहूद phased आउट at different times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically नहीं part of the Hot 100 chart history, their data is included लिये computational purposes, and to avoid unenlightening or भ्रामक characterizations.
All items listed below are from the Hot 100 era, unless otherwise विख्यात ( pre-Hot 100 charts ).

A remake of the 1983 miniseries निर्मित by Kenneth Johnson, the new श्रेणी chronicles the आगमन on Earth of a technologically advanced alien प्रजाति जिससे ostensibly comes in सलाम, but actually रै sinister motives.

geocaching is an बाहरी recreational activity, in which the participants उपयोग a वैश्विक Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and तलाश containers, called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
a typical संचय is a small waterproof container containing a logbook जहाँ the geocacher enters the date they मिला it and signs it with their स्थापित code name.
After signing into the log, the संचय must be लगाई back exactly where the person found it.
larger containers such as plastic भंडार containers ( Tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes can also contain items for व्यापार, usually toys or trinkets of छोटी value.
Geocaching साझा many aspects साथ benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, और waymarking.
Boogie Down प्रोडक्शन्स was a hip hop group that was originally composed of KRS-One, d-nice, and DJ Scott La Rock.

The name of the group, Boogie bas, derives from a nickname for the South Bronx खण्ड of the Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New यॉर्क नगर.

A municipal बंध is a bond issued by a local government, or their agencies.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include राज्य, cities, काउंटी, redevelopment agencies, special-purpose districts, school districts, पब्लिक यूटिलिटी districts, publicly owned airports and seaports, और कोई अन्य governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state स्तर.
नगरपालिका bonds may be general obligations of the issuer or secured by specified revenues.
In the संयुक्त States, ब्याज income प्राप्त by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the संघीय आय tax and from the income tax of the state in which they are issued, हालांकि नगरपालिका bonds issued for certain purposes may नहीं be tax exempt.
Unlike new issue stocks कि हैं brought to market with price प्रतिबंध until the deal is बेची, municipal bonds हैं free to व्यापार at any time एकबार वे हैं purchased by the investor.
Professional व्यापारियों regularly trade और retrade the same bonds several times a week.
`` gim me कुछ Lovin ' '' is a song लिखा by Steve winwood, Spencer डेविस and Muff winwood, और originally performed by The Spencer डेविस समूह.

( The us version रै more often been used on reissue CDs, even those coming इससे Europe. )

The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of सूचना सम्बन्धित to films, टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, and वीडियो खेल.
This शामिल actors, production crew कर्मियों, and fictional वर्ण featured in ये three visual entertainment media.
It is one of the सबसे popular online entertainment destinations, with over 100 million अद्वितीय उपयोक्ता each month and a ठोस और rapidly growing मोबाईल उपस्थिति.
आईएमडीबी was शुभारम्भ on October 17, 1990, and in 1998 was acquired by Amazon.com.
as of अप्रैल 27, 2013, IMDb had 2,503,783 शीर्षक ( includes episodes ) and 5,192,493 personalities in its database, as well as 43 million registered उपयोक्ता.

Fibre Channel Host Bus Adapter ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI मेजबान बस Adapter ( 16-bit ISA कार्ड )
In कंप्यूटर hardware, a मेजबान controller, host एडाप्टर, or मेजबान bus एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a host प्रणाली ( the computer ) to other network और भंडार devices.
The terms are primarily used to refer to devices लिये connecting SCSI, Fibre Channel and esata डिवाइस.
However, devices for connecting to IDE, Ethernet, FireWire, usb and other systems may भी be called host adapters.
Recently, the आगमन of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought परिचय Ethernet HBAs, जिससे are different from Ethernet NICs in that they शामिल TCP Offload Engines.
There हैं also converged HBAs that support दोनो Ethernet और Fibre Channel called converged Network adapters ( CNAs ).
Cashmere Scarves
Modern men 's cashmere sweaters for sale.
Cashmere wool, usually बस ज्ञात as cashmere, is a रेशा प्राप्त from Cashmere बकरियों and other types of goat.
the word cashmere derives इससे an old spelling of काश्मीर.
cashmere is fine in texture, दमदार, light, and नरम.
Garments बना from it provide excellent insulation.
in the United States, under the U.S. Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939, as amended, ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), states कि a wool or textile उत्पाद may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool उत्पाद is the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere goat ( capra hircus laniger ) ;
the औसत diameter of the fiber of such wool product does not exceed 19 माइक्रोन ; and
such wool product does नहीं contain more than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 माइक्रोन.
The average fiber व्यास may be subject to a coefficient of विभिन्नता around the औसत that shall not exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner and licensor of sofabed और leather specialty retail stores in the संयुक्त States, with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the मिडवेस्ट, on the West Coast और in the दक्षिणपश्चिम.

Egg roll is a पद used for अनेक different foods around the world.
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls are found in mainland चीन, अनेक Chinese-speaking regions of Asia, and Chinese अप्रवासी communities around the world.
अंडा rolls as referred to in China.
In Guangdong and हांग Kong, अंडा roll usually refers to biscuit roll.
This is a type of biscuit.
The संघटक included egg, आटा and sugar.
अंडा roll भी is a डिश in कैण्टन and Hong काँग, इस is usually made साथ सब्ज़ी.
Within China egg रोल्स are खाया predominantly in the southeast and हैं not as commonly consumed in the north और western parts of चीन.
In American Chinese cuisine, an egg roll is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer.
It is usually भरवां साथ chicken, pork or shrimp, cabbage, गाजर, tomatoes, bean sprouts and other सब्जियां, and then deep fried.
इस variety of the अंडा roll is very आम and popular, across भी regional varieties of American चाइनीज food, and is often included as part of a `` combination platter ''.
In मॉन्ट्रियल, कनाडा, open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese संलयन dish.
They can be either kosher certified or merely kosher style.
पीड़ा and suffering is the legal पद for the physical और emotional stress caused इससे an injury ( see also पीड़ा and कष्ट ).
Some damages that might be under इस श्रेणी would be : aches, temporary and permanent limitations on कार्यकलाप, potential shortening of life, अवसाद or scarring.
When दाखिल a lawsuit as a परिणाम of an injury, it is आम for किसी to seek धन दोनो in मुआवजे for वास्तविक money कि is खोया and for the pain और stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a suit, पीड़ा and suffering is part of the `` सामान्य damages '' section of the claimant 's claim, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery for the दिमागी anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for जिससे the अभियोक्ता seeks redress.
अलावा इससे धन damages awarded in trial, money क्षतिपूर्ति are also दिए informally outside the judicial system in mediations, arbitration ( दोनो of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or non litigated दावा ) as खूब as in routine insurance settlements.
व्यक्तिगत claimants or those represented by lawyers often उपस्थित demands to insurers to settle for money.
ये demand for bodily चोट compensation monies often set out क्षतिपूर्ति that are similarly प्रयुक्त in the अदालत litigated pleadings.
Demands are usually written summaries of a claimant 's medical care और the तथ्य which resulted in the चोट.
नमूना of a medallion signature गारंटी stampIn
the संयुक्त States and Canada, a medallion signature guarantee is a special signature guarantee for the ट्रांसफ़र of securities.
it is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the हस्ताक्षर is वास्तविक and the financial institution स्वीकृत liability लिये any जालसाजी.
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized transfers and possible investor losses.
वे also सीमा the liability of the ट्रांसफ़र agent who accepts the certificates.
अलग institutions have अलग policies as to what type of पहचान they require to provide the गारंटी और whether they charge a fee लिये ऐसे सेवा ( usually nominal if any ).
सबसे संस्थानों होगा नहीं गारंटी a signature of किसी who has नहीं already महरूम their customer.
A medallion हस्ताक्षर guarantee is नहीं the same as an acknowledgment by a नोटरी public, in the sense that a `` हस्ताक्षर guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is प्रामाणिक, and an acknowledgment is a प्रमाणन by a notary public attesting that the signer हस्ताक्षरित a दस्तावेज़ voluntarily.
Some बैंको may no longer provide इस service, however, many still do as well as other वित्तीय संस्थानों ऐसे as a Savings and Loans and Credit संघ.
At उनके sole discretion, these institutions may still decline to provide the medallion Signature Guarantees.
When us citizens are विदेश, some financial संस्थानों may accept United राज्य दूतावास seals, in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
प्रशांत इलेक्ट्रिक रेल streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल Island, Los Angeles काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, कूच 1956
The सामान्य Motors स्ट्रीटकार conspiracy ( also ज्ञात as the ग्रेट अमरीकी स्ट्रीटकार scandal ) refers to दोषारोपण and convictions in relation to a कार्यक्रम by General Motors ( GM ) और other companies who खरीदा and तब dismantled streetcar and electric ट्रैन systems in many American शहरों.
Between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and Pacific नगर Lines —with investment from GM, Firestone टायर, Standard Oil of California, Phillips Petroleum, Mack Trucks, and the Federal Engineering corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 cities including बाल्टीमोर, न्यूर्क, Los Angeles, नई York City, ओकलैंड and San Diego and परिवर्तित them into bus आपरेशन.
Several of the कंपनियाँ involved were convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to monopolize interstate commerce लकिन यहूद acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies.
Some suggest कि this program निभाई a कुंजी role in the decline of public transit in शहरों आरपार the United राज्य ; notably Edwin J. Quinby, जो first खींचा ध्यान to the कार्यक्रम in 1946, and then Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney for the संयुक्त States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national जागरूकता.
दोनो Quinby और snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars थी part of a larger strategy to धक्का the संयुक्त States into automobile dependency.
अन्य कह that independent economic कारकों brought about changes in the transit system, including the Great Depression, the Public Utility Holding कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935, labor अशांति, मार्केट forces, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, taxation policies कि favored private vehicle ownership, and general enthusiasm for the automobile.
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others गिरी into simplistic conspiracy सिद्धान्त thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` clearly, GM waged a war on electric traction.
It थी indeed an सब आउट assault, but by no means the सिंगल reason for the विफलता of rapid transit.
भी, it is just as साफ that actions and inactions by सरकारी contributed significantly to the elimination of electric कर्षण. ''
तभी a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving प्रभावी rail-based urban हस्तांतरण प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams, सहित Newark, Philadelphia, सैन Francisco, Pittsburgh, और बोस्टन ; others हैं re-introducing them.
The story has been explored several times in छपाई, film और अन्य मीडिया, notably in Who framed Roger Rabbit, Taken for a सवारी and The End of Suburbia.

These शैलियाँ are associated साथ the houses, churches and government इमारतें of the काल from about 1600 through the 19th century.

The वरुण Canada project is the world’s first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory कि plugs सीधे into the Internet.
चूंकि December 2009, it has allowed people to `` लहरे '' the seafloor while समंदर scientists चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग from labs और विश्वविद्यालयों around the world.
Along with इसके सिस्टर project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a unique approach to ocean science.
traditionally, ocean वैज्ञानिकों have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out their research, जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट uses a remotely संचालित क्रॉलर.
A gramophone रिकार्ड, commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American अंग्रेज़ी ), vinyl record ( in सन्दर्भ to vinyl, the material most commonly प्रयुक्त after about 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a रिकार्ड '', is an एनालॉग sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral groove.
The groove usually starts निकट the periphery और ends near the बीच of the डिस्क.
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, इत्यादि. ), the rotational speed at which वे are played ( `` 33 आरपीएम ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', etc. ), their समय capacity ( `` long playing '' ), उनके reproductive accuracy, or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '', `` Orthophonic '', `` full-range '', इत्यादि. ), और the क्रमांक of चैनल्स of audio provided ( `` mono ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph रिकॉर्ड were the प्राथमिक medium used for म्यूज़िक reproduction for most of the 20th century, replacing the phonograph cylinder, with which it था co-existed, by the 1920s.
By the late 1980s, digital media था gained a larger market share, and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured and sold in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 million units shipped, the सबसे in any साल since 1998 and the format has continued to slowly regain लोकप्रियता.
They हैं especially प्रयुक्त by DJs and audiophiles for many types of music.
as of 2013, विनाइल रिकॉर्ड continue to be used for distribution.

Grasslands are areas जहाँ the vegetation is वर्चस्व by grasses ( Poaceae ), however sedge ( Cyperaceae ) and फटाफट ( Juncaceae ) परिवारों can भी be found.
Grasslands occur naturally on all महाद्वीपों except Antarctica.
In शीतोष्ण latitudes, such as northwestern यूरोपीय and the Great Plains and California in North America, देशी grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch grass species, whereas in warmer climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation.
grasslands are मिला in सबसे ecoregions of the Earth.
For example there are पाँच स्थलीय ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands, savannas, and shrublands biome ( ' ecosystem ' ), which is one of आठ स्थलीय ecozones of the धरती 's surface.
Henna ( lawsonia inermis, also called हिना tree ) or Hina is a flowering plant, the sole species in the genus lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
The अंग्रेज़ी name `` henna '' आता from the अरबी ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The नाम is भी प्रयुक्त लिये dye preparations निकला from the plant, और for the art of temporary गोदना आधारित on those dyes.
Henna has been used चूंकि antiquity to dye skin, hair, and fingernails, as well as fabrics including Silk, ऊन and leather.
Additionally, the name is misused लिये other स्किन and hair dyes, ऐसे as ब्लैक henna or neutral henna, which are नहीं निकला from the संयंत्र.
A पतला film is a layer of material ranging from भिन्नों of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to अनेक micrometers in thickness.
Electronic सेमीकंडक्टर devices and ऑप्टिकल coatings are the प्रमुख applications benefiting from thin-film construction.
A familiar अनुप्रयोग of thin films is the household mirror, which typically has a thin metal कोटिंग on the back of a sheet of glass to रूप a परावर्तक interface.
The process of silvering थी once commonly प्रयुक्त to उपज mirrors.
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer thick ) is used to उपज two-way mirrors.
The performance of ऑप्टिकल coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or ar, coatings ) हैं typically उन्नत when the thin-film coating consists of अनेक परतों having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
similarly, a आवधिक structure of alternating thin films of different सामग्री may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of quantum कारावास by restricting इलेक्ट्रॉनिक phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being किया साथ ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for उपयोग as computer मेमोरी.
it is also होने applied to दवाएँ, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films are used to उपज thin-film batteries.
Thin films are also used in dye-sensitized सौर cells.
Ceramic पतला films are in wide use.
The relatively high hardness और inertness of ceramic materials make this type of thin coating of interest for सुरक्षा of substrate materials against संक्षारण, oxidation and wear.
in particular, the उपयोग of ऐसे coatings on cutting tools can extend the जीवन of these items by several orders of परिमाण.
Research is being किया on a new class of thin-film अकार्बनिक oxide सामग्री, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides, जिससे could be used to make पारदर्शी transistors that हैं inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of War is a सैन्य science fiction third-person शूटर वीडियो game विकसित by Epic Games and published by Microsoft Game studios.
It was initially released as an विशेष title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North America, Australia, and सबसे of Europe और included a `` सीमित Collector 's संस्करण '' साथ added content and an art book titled नष्ट Beauty that detailed much of the खेल 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft खिड़कियाँ version of the game थी विकसित in conjunction साथ People Can Fly and released a year later, featuring new सामग्री including additional अभियान levels, a new multiplayer game विधि, and Games for Windows Live कार्यक्षमता.
The खेल focuses on the troops of Delta Squad as they wield a desperate, last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the remaining human inhabitants of the fictional planet Sera इससे a relentless and seemingly अजेय subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde.
The खिलाड़ी assumes the role of Marcus fenix ( लकिन can भी play as Dominic Santiago ), a पूर्व कैदी and war-hardened soldier.
the game is आधारित on the use of कवर and रणनीतिक fire लिये the player to advance through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
The game also features अनेक online multiplayer game मोड्स लिये up to eight players.
Gears of युद्ध बेची over three million copies in just ten weeks and was the fastest-selling video game of 2005 as खूब as the second-most played game over Xbox Live दौरान.
It currently stands as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 game of सब time.
The खेल has चूंकि बेची over five million copies by September 2008.
The game was well प्राप्त by आलोचकों, who praised इसके gameplay और detailed visuals, और it जीती several `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006.
The कामयाबी of the खेल has led to the development of the गियर्स of War franchise, सहित the 2008 sequel Gears of युद्ध 2 और its follow-up, Gears of War 3, जिससे was released on September 20, 2011, बाद having initially been नियत to have been released on April 5, 2011, the date upon जिससे एपिक Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night साथ jimmy Fallon.

World map with the intertropical मण्डल highlighted in red.
तीव्र climate zones of the Earth जहाँ all बारह months have mean temperatures above 18 °C ( 64 °F ).
The ऊष्णकटिबन्ध is a region of the धरती surrounding the Equator.
It is सीमित in अक्षांश by the Tropic of Cancer in the northern hemisphere at लगभग n and the tropic of Capricorn in the southern गोलार्ध at S ; these latitudes correspond to the अक्षीय tilt of the Earth.
the tropics are भी referred to as the तीव्र zone और the torrid zone ( see भौगोलिक zone ).
The ऊष्णकटिबन्ध शामिल सब the क्षेत्रों on the धरती where the सूर्य reaches a point directly overhead at least once during the सौर year.
The ऊष्णकटिबन्ध are distinguished from the अन्य climatic and biomatic regions of Earth, the मध्य latitudes and the polar regions on either side of the भूमध्यरेखीय zone.

playhousesquare, in the Cleveland Theater District in downtown क्लीवलैंड, Ohio, is the second-largest theater जटिल in the United States, दूसरी तभी to New यॉर्क नगर 's lincoln Center ).

The driver and passenger front airbags, after having been तैनात, in a British Peugeot 306 car.
An airbag is a vehicle सुरक्षा यंत्र.
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of a flexible कपड़ा envelope or cushion designed to inflate rapidly दौरान an ऑटोमोबाइल collision.
इसके purpose is to cushion occupants during a crash and provide protection to their लाशें when they strike आंतरिक objects ऐसे as the steering व्हील or a window.
Modern vehicles may contain अनेक airbag modules in विभिन्न side and frontal locations of the passenger seating स्थितियाँ, and सेंसर may deploy एक or more airbags in an impact मण्डल at variable rates आधारित on the प्रकार, कोण and severity of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in मॉडरेट to कठोर frontal crashes.
airbags are normally designed साथ the intention of supplementing the protection of an occupant who is correctly restrained साथ a seatbelt.
Most designs are inflated through pyrotechnic means and can तभी be संचालित once.
नए side-impact airbag modules consist of compressed air cylinders that हैं triggered in the इवेंट of a side impact vehicle impact.
The first commercial designs यहूद introduced in passenger ऑटोमोबाइल during the 1970s with limited कामयाबी.
Broad वाणिज्यिक अपनाना of airbags occurred in अनेक बाज़ार during the late 1980s and early 1990s साथ a driver airbag, and a front passenger airbag as well on some गाड़ियाँ ; और many modern vehicles now include four or more इकाई.
IRS कर forms are used लिये taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to report financial सूचना to the Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) of the United States.
वे हैं used to रपट आय, calculate कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय government of the United States, and disclose अन्य information as जरूरी by the Internal Revenue Code ( आईआरसी ).
There are over 800 various forms and schedules.
The best-known of these is Form 1040 used by individuals.
in the संयुक्त राज्य, ड्राइवर 's licenses हैं जारी by each individual state ( सहित Washington, d.C. और territories ), बल्कि than the federal government क्युकी of the political concept of federalism.
Drivers हैं normally required to obtain a license from their state of निवास and सब states recognize प्रत्येक other 's licenses लिये temporary visitors subject to normal age requirements.
A state may also बर्खास्तगी an individual 's ड्राइविंग privilege within its सीमायें for traffic उल्लंघनों.
Many states share a common system of अनुज्ञा classes, साथ some अपवाद, and commercial license classes हैं मानकीकृत by संघीय regulation at 49 CFR भाग 383.
China has महरूम the सोर्स of many inventions, including the चार Great Inventions : papermaking, the compass, gunpowder, and printing ( both woodblock and movable प्रकार ).
The सूची below contains these and अन्य आविष्कारों.
the Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, और गणित लागू to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, कृषि, engineering, music theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the युद्धरत States Period ( 403–221 bc ), वे had advanced metallurgic technology, including the धमाका furnace और cupola भट्टी, while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
A sophisticated आर्थिक system in China दिया birth to inventions such as paper money during the Song राजवंश ( 960–1279 ).
The आविष्कार of बारूद by the 10th सदी led to an array of आविष्कारों such as the fire lance, जमीन mine, naval मेरा, hand cannon, exploding गोलों, multistage rocket, and rocket bombs with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads.
With the navigational सहायता of the 11th-century compass and ability to steer at ऊँची sea with the 1st-century sternpost rudder, premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as East Africa और Egypt.
in water-powered clockworks, the premodern चाइनीज had प्रयुक्त the escapement mechanism since the 8th century और the endless power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th सदी.
वे भी बना large mechanical कठपुतली theaters driven by waterwheels and carriage wheels and wine-serving automatons driven by चप्पू wheel boats.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest Neolithic संस्कृतियों of चीन and were formed around 7000 BC.
कुछ of the first inventions of Neolithic, prehistoric China include semilunar and आयताकार stone knives, स्टोन hoes और spades, the cultivation of millet, rice and the सोयाबीन, the refinement of sericulture, the भवन of rammed धरती structures with lime -plastered हाउस floors, the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's wheel, the सृष्टि of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs, the creation of pottery tripods और pottery steamers, and the विकास of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination.
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and भैंस during the Longshan संस्कृति ( c. 3000–c. 2000 bc ) period, the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops, पूरा evidence of longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal फसलों जिससे gave ऊँची yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated, '' सुझाएँ that the हल was known at तनिक by the Longshan culture period and explains the ऊँची agricultural उत्पादन yields which अनुमत the rise of चाइनीज civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 BC ).
With बाद आविष्कारों such as the multiple-tube seed ड्रिल and भारी moldboard iron plow, China 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger जनसांख्यिकी.
For the purposes of this सूची, inventions हैं regarded as technological firsts developed in China, and as such करता not include विदेशी technologies जिससे the Chinese acquired through contact, ऐसे as the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope इससे Early modern यूरोपीय.
It भी does not include technologies developed elsewhere और later invented separately by the Chinese, such as the odometer and chain pump.
वैज्ञानिक, mathematic or प्राकृतिक discoveries, changes in minor concepts of design or style और artistic innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the सूची.
सकल domestic उत्पाद in 2011 US डॉलर प्रति capita, adjusted for inflation and purchasing power parity ( log स्केल ) from 1860 to 2011, साथ population ( disk area ) लिये the us ( yellow ), UK ( orange ), Japan ( रेड ), China ( रेड ), and India ( blue ).
Globalization ( or globalisation—see spelling differences ) is the process of अंतरराष्ट्रीय संयोजन arising from the इंटरचेंज of world views, products, ideas, and other aspects of culture.
Put in simple शर्तें, globalization refers to processes कि promote world-wide exchanges of नेशनल and सांस्कृतिक resources.
Advances in transportation and telecommunications infrastructure, including the rise of the अंतरजाल, हैं प्रमुख कारकों in globalization, generating further interdependence of आर्थिक and सांस्कृतिक activities.
हालांकि several scholars place the origins of globalization in आधुनिक टाइम्स, अन्य trace its इतिहास long पहले the यूरोपीय age of discovery and voyages to the New संसार.
Some even ट्रेस the origins to the तीसरा millennium bce.
Since the beginning of the 20th सदी, the pace of वैश्वीकरण has intensified at a rapid rate, especially during the Post Cold युद्ध era.
The term globalization has been in increasing use चूंकि the mid-1980s and विशेषकर चूंकि the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Monetary Fund ( imf ) identified four basic पहलुओं of वैश्वीकरण : व्यापार and ट्रांजेक्शन, capital and निवेश movements, migration and movement of लोगों and the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental challenges such as climate change, cross-boundary water और एयर pollution, and over-fishing of the समंदर हैं linked with globalization.
Globalizing processes affect और हैं affected by कारोबार and कार्य organization, economics, socio-cultural resources, and the प्राकृतिक पर्यावरण.

It stars कियानू Reeves, Gene Hackman, और Brooke Langton.

This airport is the airline 's largest हब.
