The list includes the city, country, the कोड of the International एयर Transport Association ( IATA airport code ) and the International Civil Aviation संगठन ( icao airport code ), और the airport 's name, साथ the airline 's hubs, focus cities and seasonal destinations marked.
The list also contains गंतव्यों no longer served by the airline, जिससे are marked as terminated destinations.
It करता नहीं include destinations served for अमरीकी Airlines by its regional affiliates अमरीकी Eagle Airlines, कार्यपालिका Airlines, and AmericanConnection.
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a परंपरागत Jamaican mento folk song, the best-known संस्करण of which थी sung by Harry Belafonte and an alternate version interspersed साथ another Jamaican folksong, हिल and गुल्ली Rider, by Dame शर्ली Bassey.
Despite the song 's mento influences, `` day-o ( the Banana Boat सोंग ) '' is widely known as an उदाहरण of calypso music.
It is a work song, from the पाइंट of दृश्य of dock workers working the रात्रि shift loading bananas onto जहाजों.
daylight रै come, the shift is over और वे want their कार्य to be गिने up so that वे can go home.
World युद्ध I ( WWI ) थी a global war centred in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the Great War from इसके occurrence until the प्रारंभ of World युद्ध ii in 1939, और the First World War or World युद्ध I thereafter.
it involved all the संसार 's ग्रेट powers, which were assembled in दो opposing alliances : the Allies ( आधारित on the Triple entente of the United किंगडम, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of जर्मनी, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary था taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the war : इटली, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire और बुल्गारिया the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest युद्धों in इतिहास.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the युद्ध was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More तत्काल, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of ऑस्ट्रिया, the heir to the सिंहासन of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव nationalist Gavrilo princip in Sarajevo triggered a राजनयिक crisis जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via उनके colonies, the conflict soon स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the पहला shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल Belgium और Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli लिये Britain 's declaration of war against जर्मनी.
After the जर्मनी march on Paris थी brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the Marne —the पश्चिमी Front settled into a static बैटल of attrition with a trench line कि changed little जबतक 1917.
On the पूर्वी Front, the Russian army थी successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट Prussia by the germans.
in November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia और the sinai.
इटली and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in रूस, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the Russians to शर्तें with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय along the western front, the Allies drove back the germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, जिससे had its अपना trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory लिये the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their जनशक्ति and economic resources to लड़ो a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, रूसी, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to मौजूद.
the successor states of the पूर्व two lost a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
the मैप of central यूरोपीय was redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's defeat और problems with the Treaty of versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War ii.
नर्स Jackie is an अमरीकी series कि premiered on June 8, 2009, on Showtime, फिल्म सेंट्रल and The Movie Network.
The श्रेणी stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie Peyton, an emergency department nurse at All Saints ' Hospital in New यॉर्क नगर.
For Jackie, `` प्रत्येक day is a high wire act of juggling patients, doctors, fellow नर्स and her own indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an American वास्तविकता television series that premiered on अक्तूबर 14, 2007, on E !.
It फ़ॉलो the lives of the Kardashian/Jenner family, including sisters Kourtney, Kim, और Khloé Kardashian.
The series ' कामयाबी रै led to the spin-offs Kourtney and Kim Take New York, Khloé & Lamar, कोर्टनी and Khloé लो मियामी, and कोर्टनी and Kim Take मियामी.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the इस्लामी Republic of Afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming part of South एशिया, Central Asia, and to some extent Western Asia.
It has a जनसांख्यिकी of around 30 लाख inhabiting an क्षेत्रफल of approximately, making it the 42nd most populous और 41st largest nation in the world.
it is bordered by पाकिस्तानी in the south और the east, Iran in the west, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan और ताजिकिस्तान in the north, और चीन in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has महरूम an प्राचीन फोकल point of the रेशा Road और human migration.
Archaeologists have found evidence of human habitation from as far back as the Middle Paleolithic.
Urban civilization may have begun in the area as early as 3,000 to 2,000 bce.
Sitting at an महत्वपूर्ण geostrategic location that connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति with Central Asia और the Indian उपमहाद्वीप, the जमीन has been home to विभिन्न peoples through the आयु और witnessed अनेक military campaigns, notably by सिकंदर the Great, Genghis Khan, and in modern era पश्चिमी शक्तियां.
the जमीन also परोसा as a source इससे जिससे the greco-bactrians, kushans, hephthalites, Saffarids, Ghaznavids, ghorids, Khiljis, Timurids, मुगलों, durranis, and others have risen to form major empires.
The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in 1709, when the Hotaki dynasty was स्थापित in Kandahar followed by अहमद शाह Durrani 's वृद्धि to power in 1747.
In the लेट 19th सदी, Afghanistan became a बफ़र state in the `` Great खेल `` between the British और Russian empires.
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan युद्ध, King Amanullah began a यूरोपीय style modernization of the देश but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold War, after the वापसी of the अंग्रेजों इससे neighboring इण्डिया in 1947, the संयुक्त States and the सोवियत संघ began spreading प्रभाव in Afghanistan, जिससे led to a bloody युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां और the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
इस was followed by the 1990s सिविल युद्ध, the rise और पतन of the extremist Taliban government और the 2001–present युद्ध.
In दिसम्बर 2001, the संयुक्त Nations Security Council प्राधिकृत the सृष्टि of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Security Assistance फ़ोर्स ( ISAF ) to help maintain सुरक्षा in Afghanistan और assist the Karzai administration.
Three decades of war made अफगानिस्तान one of the world 's most dangerous countries, including the largest निर्माता of refugees and asylum seekers.
While the international community is पुनर्निर्माण war-torn Afghanistan, terrorist समूह such as the Haqqani संजाल and hezbi Islami are actively involved in a nationwide Taliban -led insurgency, which शामिल hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks.
According to the United Nations, the insurgents यहूद responsible लिये 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012.
the American Civil War ( acw ), भी known as the युद्ध between the States or बस the Civil War ( देखिए नामकरण ), was a सिविल युद्ध fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United राज्य ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern slave राज्य कि घोषित their secession and formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war had its origin in the समस्या of गुलामी, especially the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी powers did not intervene.
After चार years of bloody कॉम्बैट that left over 600,000 सैनिको dead and destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the मुश्किल Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the Confederacy.
outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी slave states continued to अस्वीकृत calls लिये secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन failed to ढूँढें a compromise, and both sides prepared for युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed कि European देशों यहूद so dependent on `` किंग कपास `` कि they would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the new confederate States of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by Union troops in दक्षिण Carolina.
Lincoln called for प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the confederacy, bringing their कुल to ग्यारह.
the Union जल्द controlled the border states और स्थापित a naval नाकेबंदी that crippled the दक्षिणी economy.
the Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln जारी the Emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending गुलामी a war लक्ष्य.
to the west, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the Confederate river navy, then much of their western सेना, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
In 1863, Robert E. ली 's Confederate incursion north ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, विलियम T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to capture अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources और manpower to attack the confederacy from all दिशानिर्देश, and could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate पूंजी.
the defending Confederate army failed, leading to ली 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन and food supplies सब foreshadowed संसार युद्ध I.
It remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार जॉन Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 प्रतिशत of सब Southern white males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods sold ( COGS ) refer to the inventory लागत of those goods a business रै बेची during a particular काल.
Costs हैं associated with particular goods using एक of several formulas, सहित specific identification, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average cost.
Costs शामिल सब costs of खरीदें, costs of conversion and other costs incurred in bringing the inventories to उनके present location and condition.
Costs of goods made by the business include material, labor, and allocated ओवरहेड.
The costs of those goods नहीं yet sold हैं deferred as costs of inventory जबतक the inventory is sold or written down in value.

A confectionery स्टोर ( more commonly referred to as a मीठी दूकान in the United किंगडम, a candy store in the North अमेरिका, or a lolly दूकान in Australia ) sells confectionery और is usually targeted to children.
Most confectionery स्टोर्स are filled with an assortment of sweets far larger than a पंसारी or convenience store could accommodate.
They often offer a selection of old fashioned treats, and sweets इससे अलग देशों.
Very often अपरिवर्तित in layout since their inception, confectioneries are ज्ञात for उनके वार्मिंग and nostalgic feel.
The village of Pateley Bridge claims to have the oldest confectionery store in इंग्लैण्ड.

ओक्लाहोमा ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th सबसे extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
the state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma, meaning `` red लोगों '', and it is known informally by its nickname, the sooner State.
formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian territory on November 16, 1907, Oklahoma was the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents हैं known as oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and इसके capital और largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major निर्माता of natural गैस, oil, और agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of विमानन, energy, दूरसंचार, और biotechnology.
It रै one of the fastest growing economies in the nation, रैंकिंग among the top states in per capita income growth और सकल domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living भीतर उनके metropolitan statistical areas.
साथ small पहाड़ सीमाएँ, prairie, mesas, and eastern वनों, most of Oklahoma lies in the Great Plains and the u.s. Interior Highlands —a region विशेषकर prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a व्यापकता of English, German, Scottish, आयरिश and Native American ancestry, अधिक than 25 Native अमरीकी languages are spoken in Oklahoma, second तभी to California.
Oklahoma is स्तिथ on a संगम of तीन major American cultural regions and historically served as a route for cattle ड्राइव, a destination for southern settlers, और a government-sanctioned territory for देशी Americans.
Stacked and standing car tires
a tire ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a wheel 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle प्रदर्शन.
Most tires, such as those for automobiles और bicycles, provide कर्षण between the गाडी and the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock.
The materials of modern न्यूमेटिक tires are synthetic rubber, प्राकृतिक रबर, fabric and wire, साथ with carbon ब्लैक and other chemical compounds.
They consist of a tread and a body.
The tread provides कर्षण जबकि the body provides containment लिये a मात्रा of संपीडित air.
पहले रबर was विकसित, the first संस्करण of टायर यहूद simply bands of metal that fitted around wooden wheels to prevent wear and tear.
Early rubber tires were solid ( not pneumatic ).
Today, the majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped देह of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally filled with संपीडित air to रूप an inflatable cushion.
न्यूमेटिक tires are used on many प्रकार of vehicles, including cars, bicycles, मोटरसाइकिल, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
मेटल tires are स्टिल used on इंजनों और railcars, और solid rubber ( or other polymer ) tires हैं still प्रयुक्त in various non-automotive applications, ऐसे as कुछ casters, carts, lawnmowers, और wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an American डॉक्टर who played a leading भूमिका in American Patriot संगठन in बोस्टन in early days of the American Revolution, eventually सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the revolutionary मैसाचुसेट्स Provincial Congress.
वारेन enlisted पॉल Revere and William Dawes on April 18, 1775, to leave Boston and spread the alarm कि the British garrison in Boston was setting out to रेड the town of concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock और Samuel एडम्स.
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of lexington और Concord, जिससे are commonly considered to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War.
वारेन had been commissioned a प्रमुख General in the colony 's militia shortly before the June 17, 1775 बैटल of Bunker Hill.
बल्कि than exercising उसके rank, वारेन served in the battle as a private सिपाही, and was मारे in combat जब British सैनिकों stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's हिल.
His death, immortalized in John trumbull 's painting, The Death of सामान्य Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's हिल, जून 17, 1775, galvanized the rebel forces, और he has महरूम memorialized in many place names in the United States.
stm image of self-assembled supramolecular chains of the organic semiconductor Quinacridone on ग्रेफाइट.
an सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर is an organic material with semiconductor properties, that is, with an विद्युत conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals.
सिंगल molecules, छोटी chain ( oligomers ) and organic polymers can be semiconductive.
semiconducting small अणुओं ( खुशबूदार hydrocarbons ) include the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
polymeric सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ), poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as खूब as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
वहीँ हैं two major अतिव्यापी classes of सशुल्क semiconductors.
These are organic charge-transfer complexes और various linear-backbone conductive polymers निकला from polyacetylene.
Linear backbone organic semiconductors include polyacetylene itself and its derivatives polypyrrole, और polyaniline.
At least locally, charge-transfer complexes often exhibit समान conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors.
Such mechanisms arise इससे the presence of hole and electron conduction layers separated by a band gap.
While such क्लासिक mechanisms are महत्वपूर्ण locally, as with inorganic amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, localized राज्य, mobility gaps, और phonon -assisted hopping भी significantly योगदान to conduction, विशेषकर in polyacetylenes.
Like अकार्बनिक semiconductors, organic semiconductors can be doped.
सशुल्क semiconductors susceptible to doping such as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) और हैं भी known as organic metals.
Typical current carriers in organic semiconductors हैं holes and electrons in π-bonds.
लगभग all सशुल्क solids are insulators.
But when their constituent अणुओं have π-conjugate प्रणालियों, electrons can मूव via π-electron cloud overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling and related mechanisms.
polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons और phthalocyanine नमक crystals are उदाहरण of इस type of सशुल्क semiconductor.
Mainly due to low mobility, even unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
ऐसे unpaired electrons can function as current carriers.
This type of semiconductor is also प्राप्त by pairing an electron दाता molecule with an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor अणु.
Female स्खलन is the expulsion of द्रव by human females from the paraurethral नलिकाएं through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is भी ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are considered to be different phenomena in कुछ research publications.
The exact सोर्स and nature of the द्रव continue to be a topic of बहस among चिकित्सा professionals, which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's संसार Cup is an international association football competition लडे by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the खेल 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1991.
Japan won the 2011 tournament in a दंड गोलीबारी.
the current स्वरूप of the tournament involves 16 teams competing for the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the host nation ( s ) over a period of about three सप्ताह ; – this phase is प्रायः पुकारा the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three सालो, is used to determine which टीमों qualify for the tournament साथ साथ the host स्वदेश ( s ).
The FIFA Women 's संसार कप is recognized as the सबसे important अंतरराष्ट्रीय competition in women 's football and is निभाई amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल teams of the member states of FIFA, the sport 's global governing देह.
The first Women 's World कप टूर्नामेंट, named the Women 's World Championship, was held in 1991, sixty-one years after the मेन 's first FIFA World कप tournament in 1930.
The six संसार कप tournaments have been जीती by four different नेशनल teams.
The अगला संसार कप will be hosted by Canada in 2015.

'Son of man ' is the अनुवाद of various Hebrew and यूनानी phrases used in both the Hebrew Bible and the नई Testament.
it रै विविध meanings, ranging इससे a normal human being to a prophesied अनन्त, दैवी ruler.
The Hebrew अभिव्यक्ति `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears one सौ और seven times in the यहूदी Bible.
इस is the सबसे common Hebrew construction लिये the एकवचन but is used mostly in ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere.
In thirty two cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural रूप `` sons of men '', i.e. human beings.
As generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the Koine यूनानी of the New Testament, `` the son of man '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
The उपयोग of the definite article in `` the son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is novel, और before its use वहीँ, no records of its उपयोग in कोई of the surviving Greek documents of प्राचीनता exist.
Geza vermes रै stated कि `` the Son of man '' in the Christian gospels is unrelated to Hebrew बाइबल usages.
in Christian usage, unlike the Son of God title, which has been an अनिवार्य तत्व of ईसाई creeds चूंकि the Apostolic age, the उदघोषणा of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity.
the interpretation of the उपयोग of `` the Son of man '' in the New वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण and after 150 years of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars.
Master of foxhounds leads the फ़ील्ड इससे Powderham Castle in Devon, इंग्लैण्ड, with the hounds in front.
Fox शिकार is an activity involving the tracking, chase, and sometimes killing of a फॉक्स, traditionally a red फॉक्स, by trained foxhounds or अन्य scent hounds, and a group of unarmed followers led by a निपुण of foxhounds, who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
फॉक्स शिकार originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the 16th century, but is practised all over the संसार, including in Australia, कनाडा, France, Ireland, Italy and the संयुक्त States.
In Australia, the term भी refers to the hunting of foxes साथ firearms समान to spotlighting or हिरण hunting.
In much of the संसार hunting in general is समझा to सुनाना to any game animals or weapons ( e.g., deer hunting साथ धनुष and तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन and Ireland, `` hunting '' बगैर qualification implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or other forms of hunting साथ hounds- beagling, stag hunting, मिंक शिकार, drag शिकार or hunting the clean boot ) as वर्णित here.
The sport is controversial, विशेषकर in the UK, where it थी banned in Scotland in 2002, and in England and Wales in November 2004 ( law enforced from February 2005 ), though शूटिंग foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an महत्वपूर्ण part of ग्रामीण culture and useful लिये reasons of conservation और pest control, while opponents argue that it is cruel और unnecessary.
तम्बाकू advertising is the advertising of tobacco products or use ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान ) by the tobacco industry through a variety of media including sponsorship, particularly of sporting events.
It is now एक of the सबसे highly regulated फ़ॉर्म of marketing.

the company थी founded in 1968 as Advanced पेटेंट Technology.

inferno ( इतालवी for `` Hell `` ) is the first part of दांते Alighieri 's 14th-century epic कविता दैवी Comedy.
it is followed by purgatorio और Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through Hell, guided by the Roman poet वर्जिल.
In the poem, Hell is depicted as nine circles of कष्ट located within the Earth.
Allegorically, the दैवी Comedy represents the journey of the soul towards परमेश्वर, with the Inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin.

The हिम्मत to change the things i can,
And अक्ल to know the difference.
the Declaration and resolves of the पहला Continental कॉंग्रेस ( भी known as the Declaration of Colonial अधिकारों, or the Declaration of अधिकारों ), थी a बयान अपनाया by the First Continental कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14, 1774, in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament.
The घोषणा outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable अधिनियमों, listed a colonial bill of rights, and provided a detailed सूची of grievances.
it was similar to the Declaration of Rights और Grievances, passed by the Stamp अधिनियम कॉंग्रेस a decade पहले.
the Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans : to डालें into a boycott of अंग्रेजों व्यापार ( the Continental Association ) until their grievances were redressed, to प्रकाशित addresses to the people of Great Britain and British अमेरिका, and to send a petition to the King.
Pulse pressure is the pressure that is लगा when अहसास the pulse.
measured in millimeters of पारा ( mmHg ), the pressure difference between the systolic and diastolic pressures is the pressure बदलें to create the pulse, जिससे is the पल्स pressure.
if resting blood दबाव is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), पल्स दबाव is 40.

in पोकर, ख़राब ताल is a subjective term for a hand in which a player with what appear to be strong ताश nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs where one खिलाड़ी bets the clearly stronger hand और their opponent makes a ग़रीब call that eventually `` hits '' और विन्स.
There is no consensus among poker players as to what exactly constitutes a bad ताल and often players will असहमत about whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater fish in the family Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes.
It was one of the earliest fish to be domesticated, और is one of the most commonly रखा aquarium मछली.
a relatively small member of the carp परिवार ( which also includes the koi carp and the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful कार्प ( carassius auratus ) देशी to east Asia.
it was पहला domesticated in China more than a thousand सालो ago, and several distinct breeds have since been developed.
goldfish breeds vary greatly in आकार, देह आकार, fin विन्यास और coloration ( विभिन्न combinations of white, पीला, नारंगी, red, भूरा, and black are known ).
uncooked Rouladen
rouladen ( or rinderroulade, एकवचन : roulade ) is a German मांस roulade प्रायः consisting of bacon, प्याज, सरसों and अचार wrapped in thinly sliced बीफ which is तब पकाया.
In some countries, the roulade is also known as `` beef ज़ैतून ''.
बीफ or वील is used as meat हालांकि कुछ food scholars tend to believe that the original संस्करण was संभवतः venison or pork, and pork is still popular in कुछ क्षेत्रों.
the बीफ rouladen as we जान them today have become popular over the last century.
The cut is usually topside beef or silverside since इस is the सस्ता काटें.
The more expensive version would be the round स्टीक, भी known as rump स्टीक.
The meat is cut into large, पतला slices.
The filling is a मिश्रण of smoked and cooked पोर्क पेट, chopped प्याज and chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at times varied by adding minced meat, sausage मांस, pine nuts और mustard.
The mixture varies from region to region.
Rouladen are traditionally served लिये dinner.
Red wine is often परोसा with this डिश.
Typical eukaryotic cell.
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ और processes कि take place in the कोशिकाएं of जीवों to convert biochemical उर्जा from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ), and then release waste products.
The reactions शामिल in श्वसन are catabolic reactions, जिससे ब्रेक विशाल molecules into smaller ones, releasing energy in the process as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds हैं replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
श्वसन is one of the key तरीके a cell gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity.
Cellular respiration is considered an ऊष्माक्षेपी redox प्रतिक्रिया.
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the body, most of which are redox प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves.
हालांकि technically, cellular respiration is a combustion reaction, it clearly does not resemble एक जब it occurs in a living cell.
This difference is क्युकी it occurs in many पृथक कदम.
While the overall reaction is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, no single reaction कि comprises it is a combustion reaction.
Nutrients कि are commonly used by animal and plant कोशिकाएं in respiration include शुगर, amino acids और वसीय acids, and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is आणविक oxygen ( O2 ).
the energy stored in ATP ( इसके तीसरा फास्फेट समूह is weakly bonded to the बाकी of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring उर्जा for उपयोग by the कोशिका ) can तब be प्रयुक्त to drive processes requiring energy, सहित biosynthesis, locomotion or परिवहन of अणुओं across कोशिका membranes.
देशों by 2011 GDP ( nominal ) according to the CIA World Factbook.
This आलेख शामिल a सूची of countries in the world sorted by उनके gross घरेलू उत्पाद ( GDP ), the market मान of all final goods and services from a nation in a given साल.
the जीडीपी डालर estimates presented here are calculated at market or government official exchange rates.
Several economies which हैं नहीं considered to be countries ( world, the EU, and some dependent territories ) are included in the सूचियाँ क्युकी वे appear in the sources.
These economies are not ranked in the charts यहाँ, लकिन हैं सूचीबद्ध where लागू.
The figures प्रस्तुत here do नहीं take into account differences in the लागत of living in different देशों, और the परिणाम can vary greatly from one year to another आधारित on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency.
Such fluctuations may change a country 's ranking from one साल to the next, even हालांकि वे often मेक little or no अंतर to the standard of जीना of इसके population.
इसलिए these आंकड़े should be प्रयुक्त साथ सावधानी.
Some countries/regions may have citizens जिससे हैं on average wealthy.
These countries/regions could appear in इस list as having a small जीडीपी.
This would be क्युकी the country/region listed रै a छोटी population, and इसलिए छोटी कुल economy ; the GDP is calculated as the जनसांख्यिकी times the wealth प्रति capita.
comparisons of national wealth are भी अक्सर बना on the आधार of खरीदना शक्ति parity ( PPP ), to समायोजन for मतभेद in the लागत of living in different देशों.
( See List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the एक्सचेंज rate problem, but has इसके अपना drawbacks ; it does नहीं reflect the value of economic output in international trade, and it also requires अधिक estimation than nominal जीडीपी.
on the whole, ppp per capita figures हैं अधिक narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita figures.
the first list includes आंकड़ा compiled by the United राष्ट्र Statistics प्रभाग for 2011.
The second list largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the International Monetary निधि for 2012.
the third list shows the World Bank 's ज़्यादातर 2011 estimates, and the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the सीआईए World Factbook.
Lapping is a machining प्रक्रम, in which two सतहों are rubbed together with an abrasive between them, by हाथ movement or by way of a machine.
इस can लो two forms.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called पीस ), typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( भी known as the `` गोद '' or grinding tool ) with an abrasive such as aluminum oxide, jeweller 's रूज, optician 's rouge, एमरी, सिलिकॉन कार्बाइड, diamond, etc., in between उन्हें.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the abrasive रोल्स about between the two surfaces and removes material इससे both.
the other form of lapping involves a softer सामग्री such as pitch or a ceramic लिये the lap, which is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The lap is तब प्रयुक्त to काटें a harder material—the workpiece.
the abrasive embeds within the softer material which holds it and permits it to score across and cut the harder material.
Taken to a finer limit, इस होगा produce a polished सतह such as साथ a polishing cloth on an automobile, or a पॉलिशिंग cloth or पॉलिशिंग pitch upon कांच or स्टील.
Taken to the ultimate सीमा, with the सहायता of accurate interferometry and specialized polishing machines or skilled hand polishing, lensmakers can produce surfaces कि are flat to better than 30 nanometers.
This is one twentieth of the wavelength of light from the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source.
Surfaces this चपटा can be molecularly बंधुआ ( optically contacted ) by bringing them together under the right conditions.
( इस is not the same as the wringing प्रभाव of Johansson ब्लॉक, although it is similar ).

A पिकअप truck or pick-up, प्रायः simply referred to as a पिकअप, is a light motor vehicle साथ an open-top, पश्च कार्गो क्षेत्रफल ( bed ).
In North अमेरिका, the पद pickup is प्रयुक्त for light trucks साथ a lighter duty chassis और factory built, integrated bed, as well as लिये coupé utility वाहनों, often आधारित on a personal car chassis, but also often on a खास dedicated chassi for such उपयोग.
कुछ countries have their अपना शर्तें similar to pickup, such as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और New Zealand, or bakkie in दक्षिण Africa.
Large pickup trucks are somewhat विरल in Europe, जहाँ vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
The अध्यक्ष of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the सिर of state and head of सरकारी of the संयुक्त States.
The president leads the executive branch of the federal सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States Armed शक्तियां.
Article ii of the U.S. संविधान vests the कार्यपालिका power of the United States in the president और आरोप him with the निष्पादन of federal law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal कार्यपालिका, diplomatic, नियामक, and judicial अधिकारियों, and concluding treaties साथ foreign powers, with the advice and सहमति of the Senate.
The अध्यक्ष is further empowered to ग्रान्ट संघीय pardons and reprieves, and to convene and adjourn either or दोनो houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
चूंकि the founding of the United राज्य, the power of the president और the संघीय सरकारी have grown substantially and प्रत्येक modern president, despite possessing no औपचारिक legislative शक्तियां beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative कार्यसूची of his party and the विदेशी and domestic नीति of the United States.
the president is अक्सर described as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, और is एक of only two nationally निर्वाचित federal officers, the other being the वाइस President of the United States.
The twenty-second Amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी being elected to the presidency for a तीसरा full पद.
It also prohibits a व्यक्ति from being निर्वाचित to the presidency more than एकबार if that person previously had परोसा as president, or acting अध्यक्ष, for more than two सालो of another person 's term as president.
In सब, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और current president.
On नवम्बर 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve until जनवरी 20, 2017.
बोतलबंद mineral जल
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., खूब जल, distilled जल, Mineral जल, or spring जल ) packaged in plastic or glass जल बोतलों.
Bottled water may be carbonated or नहीं.
आकार दायरा इससे छोटी single सेवारत bottles to large carboys लिये water coolers.
Map of the प्रमुख नदियाँ, lakes, and reservoirs in India
Map प्रर्दशित rivers और flood prone areas in India
Rivers of India play an महत्वपूर्ण role in the lives of the Indian people.
The river systems provide irrigation, potable water, cheap transportation, electricity, और the livelihoods for a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains why nearly सब the major cities of India हैं located by the banks of rivers.
The नदियाँ also have an important role in Hindu mythology और are माना holy by all Hindus in the country.
सात प्रमुख rivers along साथ their numerous tributaries make up the river system of इण्डिया.
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however, कुछ of the rivers whose courses take them through the western भाग of the country and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the arabian Sea.
भाग of लद्दाख, northern parts of the Aravlli range and the arid भाग of the थार Desert have inland drainage.
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the courses of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया along साथ their tributaries और शाखाओं in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute खाता of it.
The shifting of the courses और bed over the centuries is very remarkable.
अनेक of the channels mentioned in that सर्वेक्षण have now become मुर्दे, dried or even extinct.
All प्रमुख नदियाँ of इण्डिया originate from one of the three main watersheds :
the हिमालय और the काराकोरम सीमाएँ
Vindhya and satpura सीमाएँ and Chotanagpur plateau in central इण्डिया
Sahyadri or पश्चिमी Ghats in western India
the Bretton वुड्स प्रणाली of monetary management स्थापित the rules for commercial and financial relations among the world 's major औद्योगिक states in the mid-20th सदी.
The Bretton Woods system was the first example of a fully negotiated monetary अनुक्रम intended to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as संसार War II was still raging, 730 delegates from all 44 अलाइड nations gathered at the Mount वॉशिंगटन Hotel in Bretton Woods, New Hampshire, United States, लिये the United Nations Monetary और Financial Conference.
the delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 July 1944, and हस्ताक्षरित the Agreement on its फाइनल day.
सेटिंग up a प्रणाली of नियम, institutions, and procedures to विनियमित the international मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the planners at bretton वुड्स established the International Monetary निधि ( IMF ) and the International बैंको for Reconstruction and Development ( ibrd ), जिससे आज is part of the World Bank समूह.
ये organizations became operational in 1945 after a sufficient क्रमांक of countries had ratified the agreement.
The मुख्य features of the Bretton वुड्स system यहूद an दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक देश to adopt a monetary policy that maintained the exchange rate by tying its currency to the U.S. dollar और the क्षमता of the IMF to सेतु temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to सुनहरा.
इस brought the bretton Woods system to an end और देखी the dollar become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the निक्सन shock, निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the संयुक्त States dollar became a reserve currency प्रयुक्त by अनेक states.
at the वही time, अनेक fixed currencies ( such as GBP, for example ), also became free floating.
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian company कि designs and manufactures मोटरसाइकिल.
headquartered in बोलोग्ना, Italy, Ducati is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
a credit स्कोर is a numerical अभिव्यक्ति based on a सांख्यिकीय analysis of a person 's credit files, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
a credit स्कोर is primarily based on credit report सूचना typically sourced from credit bureaus.
lenders, such as banks and क्रेडिट card companies, उपयोग credit scores to evaluate the potential रिस्क posed by lending धन to उपभोक्ता and to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
Lenders use credit scores to determine जो qualifies for a loan, at what interest rate, and what क्रेडिट limits.
lenders also use credit scores to determine which customers are likely to bring in the most आय.
The use of credit or identity स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing अभिगम or granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system.
Credit scoring is नहीं limited to banks.
Other संगठन, such as mobile phone companies, insurance कंपनियाँ, landlords, and सरकारी विभाग employ the same तकनीकों.
Credit स्कोरिंग भी has a lot of overlap साथ data mining, which उपयोग अनेक similar techniques.
These तकनीकों combine thousands of factors लकिन they are more or less similar or the same.
the सात SI base units and the interdependency of their definitions : for example, to निकालें the definition of the मीटर from the गति of light, the definition of the second must be ज्ञात while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy जिससे in फेरे is defined in terms of length, द्रव्यमान and time.
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines seven units of माप as a basic नियत from which all other SI units are derived.
These SI आधार units and उनके physical quantities are:
मीटर for length ( us English : meter )
किलोग्राम for द्रव्यमान ( note : not the ग्राम )
दूसरी for समय
ampere for electric current
केल्विन for temperature
candela for luminous तीव्रता
mole for the amount of substance.
The SI आधार quantities रूप a set of mutually स्वतंत्र आयाम as required by dimensional विश्लेषण commonly employed in विज्ञान और technology.
However, in a given realization of these units they may well be interdependent, i.e. defined in शर्तें of each other.
The names of SI इकाई are written in लोअरकेस वर्ण ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets इस rule, as 'degree ' is the ईकाई, and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ).
The symbols of units are लिखा in lowercase ( e.g. metre has the symbol m ), except कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई named बाद persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the अपरकेस प्रतीक Hz ).
Many other units, ऐसे as the litre ( US अंग्रेज़ी : liter ), हैं formally not भाग of the SI, but are accepted for use with si.
स्मारक canyon
Colorado National स्मारक ( locally referred to as The Monument ) is a part of the National Park Service near the नगर of ग्रैंड Junction, कोलोराडो.
Spectacular canyons काटें गहन into sandstone और even granite–gneiss–schist चट्टान formations, in कुछ areas.
This is an area of desert land high on the कोलोराडो Plateau, साथ pinion and juniper वनों on the पठार.
the park hosts a wide range of wildlife, including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles, ravens, jays, desert bighorn sheep, और coyotes.
Activities include hiking, horseback riding, road bicycling, और scenic drives ; a visitor center on the west side contains a natural history museum और gift shop.
There are भव्य दृश्य from trails and the Rim Rock Drive, which winds along the plateau.
आसपास are the Book Cliffs, and the largest flat-topped mountain in the world, the Grand Mesa.
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which रनों the width of the पार्क, and शामिल rock formations such as स्वतंत्रता Monument, the चुंबन Couple, and Coke Ovens.
The स्मारक शामिल 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles ), much of which has been recommended to Congress for designation as wilderness.
left to right : Utility Uniform, Blue Dress Uniform, Service वर्दी, and संध्या पोशाक uniforms
The वर्दी of the United राज्य Marine Corps serve to distinguish Marines from members of other सेवाएं.
Among current uniforms in the United States Armed शक्तियां, the Marines ' uniforms have महरूम in service the longest.
The Marine पोशाक Blue uniform has, with few परिवर्तन, महरूम worn in essentially इसके current form since the 19th सदी.
उत्तर American टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल codes 419 and 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the u.S. राज्य of ओहियो.
The largest city served by these area कोड is Toledo ( and इसके suburbs of Holland, Maumee, northwood, Oregon, Ottawa पहाड़ियाँ, Perrysburg, rossford, Sylvania, swanton, Waterville, and Whitehouse ).
Other शहरों परोसा by these area कोड include एडीए, Ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, बोलिंग Green, Bryan, Bucyrus, celina, क्लाइड, Crestline, defiance, Delphos, एडिसन, Erastus, Findlay, Fostoria, Fremont, Galion, Kenton, लीमा, मैन्सफील्ड, Mount Gilead, Napoleon, Norwalk, Oak Harbor, Port क्लिंटन, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, tiffin, अपर sandusky, Van wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, willard.
Other क्षेत्रों served include the Lake Erie Islands उत्तर of Port Clinton और west of Sandusky.
The main क्षेत्रफल code, 419, was निर्मित as one of the original area codes in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the overlay area code 567 was created on जनवरी 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the राज्य 's fourth-largest city, 419 थी the पिछला of ओहियो 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल codes to have महरूम विभाजित or overlaid.
Mickey Leroy gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an American country म्यूज़िक singer and musician.
हालांकि he started आउट गायन straight-up देश and western material in the 1970s, he moved towards a more पॉप -friendly sound in the 1980s, bringing him further success on नहीं just the country charts, but the pop चार्ट as well.
Among उसके biggest hits are `` रूम पूरा of Roses, '' `` Do n't the लड़कियों All मिलेंगी prettier at Closing समय, '' and the remake of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me ``.
He is भी the cousin of जेरी Lee Lewis, Carl mcvoy, Jim gilley और Jimmy swaggart.
According to the Federal Aviation Administration, Gilley is a licensed pilot, who holds an instrument दरजा with commercial pilot privileges for multi-engine airplanes, as well as private pilot privileges for सिंगल engine वायुयान.
The सितंबर 11 attacks ( also referred to as सितंबर 11, सितंबर 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated आतंकवादी हमले शुभारम्भ by the Islamic terrorist समूह al-Qaeda upon the United राज्य in New York City and the Washington, D.C. area on September 11, 2001.
चार यात्री airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda आतंकवादी so they could be flown into इमारतें in suicide हमले.
दो of those planes, American Airlines Flight 11 और संयुक्त Airlines उड़ान 175, were क्रैश into the उत्तर और South towers, क्रमशः, of the World Trade बीच जटिल in New York City.
Within two घंटों, दोनो मीनारें collapsed with debris and the resulting फ़ायर causing partial or complete collapse of all other buildings in the WTC complex, as well as major damage to टेन other large surrounding structures.
A तीसरा plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was क्रैश into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the United States Department of Defense ), अग्रणी to a आंशिक collapse in its पश्चिमी पक्ष.
The चौथी plane, United एयरलाइंस Flight 93, was targeted at the संयुक्त राज्य Capitol in Washington, D.C., लकिन crashed into a field निकट Shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, बाद its यात्री आजमाया to overcome the hijackers.
In कुल, almost 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers सवार the चार planes.
Suspicion quickly गिरी on al-qaeda.
Although the समूह 's leader, ओसामा bin Laden, initially denied कोई भागीदारी, in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks.
Al-Qaeda और बिन Laden cited U.S. support of Israel, the उपस्थिति of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the हमले.
the United States responded to the attacks by launching the युद्ध on Terror and invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban, which had harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation and विस्तारित law enforcement powers.
Having evaded capture for years, बिन Laden was located and killed by U.S. शक्तियां in May 2011.
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other properties caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of Lower मैनहटन और had a significant effect on global बाज़ार.
Cleanup of the World व्यापार बीच साईट was समाप्त in May 2002, और the Pentagon was repaired within a year.
numerous memorials have been constructed, including the National September 11 मेमोरियल & Museum in New यॉर्क, the Pentagon मेमोरियल, और the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy विलंब, the एक World Trade Center is expected to be completed at Ground शून्य in New यॉर्क City in 2013.
Finding Nemo is a 2003 अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film written और directed by Andrew Stanton, released by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Pictures, and the पांचवां film produced by Pixar Animation studios.
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert ब्रूक्स ) who, along साथ a regal tang named Dory ( एलेन degeneres ), searches लिये his abducted son nemo ( Alexander Gould ) सब the रास्ता to सिडनी harbour.
साथ the way, Marlin learns to take risks and let Nemo take care of himself.
It is Pixar 's पहला फिल्मी to be released in cinemas in the northern गोलार्ध summer.
The फिल्मी थी re-released for the first time in 3D on सितंबर 14, 2012, and it was released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
A sequel, ढूंढना Dory, is currently in development, नियत to be released on November 25, 2015.
The film received सार्वभौमिक critical acclaim and won the Academy पुरस्कार for Best Animated Feature, और was nominated in तीन more categories including Best असली Screenplay.
It was the दूसरी highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2003, कमाई a कुल of $ 921 लाख worldwide.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling dvd of all time, with over 40 लाख नक़ल बेची as of 2006, और was the highest-grossing G-rated film of all time before Pixar 's अपना Toy स्टोरी 3 overtook it.
it is also the 23rd highest-grossing film of सब time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated फिल्मी.
In 2008, the अमरीकी Film Institute नामित it the tenth महानतम एनिमेटेड film ever बना during their शीर्ष 10.
the sixth ऋतु of अमेरिका 's Best नृत्य Crew, also ज्ञात as America 's Best नृत्य Crew : Season of the सुपरस्टार, premiered on April 7, 2011 और concluded on June 5, 2011.
Auditions यहूद held in four शहरों from January 21 through February 5 : शिकागो, Houston, New यॉर्क, and लॉस Angeles.
This season takes a different रूट from पास्ट seasons.
The crews must perform to the music of one specific artist प्रत्येक week, including Rihanna, Lil वेन, and अन्य popular stars.
इस season भी features special guest appearances by various music celebrities सहित Justin Bieber, the Black Eyed Peas, Katy Perry, Kesha, Nicki minaj, and Kanye West.
Dominic `` D-Trix '' Sandoval, a पूर्व member of क्वेस्ट क्रू, the विजेता of the third ऋतु of America 's बेहतरीन नृत्य Crew, joins returning न्यायाधीशों Lil मामा और JC Chasez as the newest judge.
In the ऋतु finale, I aM mE was declared the विजेता of Season 6 and received the $ 100,000 ( USD ) prize.
In the United States, Social सुरक्षा refers to the Old-Age, survivors, और Disability Insurance ( OASDI ) संघीय program.
the original सोशल Security Act ( 1935 ) और the current version of the अधिनियम, as amended, encompass अनेक social welfare and social insurance कार्यक्रम.
Social Security is primarily funded through समर्पित payroll कर called Federal Insurance Contributions अधिनियम कर ( fica ).
कर deposits हैं formally entrusted to the Federal old-age और Survivors Insurance Trust निधि, the Federal Disability बीमे विश्वास निधि, the Federal Hospital बीमे Trust निधि, or the संघीय अनुपूरक Medical Insurance विश्वास Fund which comprise the Social Security विश्वास Fund.
upward redistribution of income is responsible लिये परिचय 43 % of the projected Social Security shortfall over the next 75 सालो.
according to economist Martin Feldstein, the combined spending for all social insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of सरकारी expenditure and 7 % of the सकल घरेलू product.
Social सुरक्षा is फिलहाल estimated to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older आउट of poverty.
the Social सुरक्षा Administration is headquartered in woodlawn, Maryland, just वेस्ट of Baltimore.
The alcohol by volume दिखाया on a bottle of absinthe.
Alcohol by आवाज़ ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a मानक measure of कैसा much दारू ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
the ABV standard is used worldwide.
In कुछ countries, alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the French chemist Joseph Louis gay-lussac ).
Laurel खोखला is a village in the कस्बा of Oyster खाड़ी in Nassau County, New York in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The population थी 1,952 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
चार्ल्स John Huffam Dickens ( ; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870 ) was an English लेखक और social आलोचक.
He created some of the world 's most यादगार fictional characters and is generally regarded as the महानतम उपन्यासकार of the Victorian period.
During उसके life, his works enjoyed unprecedented fame, और by the twentieth सदी उसके literary genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars.
His novels और छोटी stories continue to be widely popular.
Born in Portsmouth, England, Dickens left स्कूल to work in a factory after उसके पिता was thrown into debtors ' prison.
Although he had little formal education, his जल्दी impoverishment drove him to सफल.
Over his career he edited a weekly journal लिये 20 सालो, लिखा 15 novels, 5 novellas and सैंकड़ों of short stories and non-fiction articles, lectured और performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter writer, और campaigned vigorously for children 's अधिकारों, education, and other social reforms.
Dickens sprang to fame with the 1836 serial publication of The Pickwick papers.
Within a few years he had become an international literary celebrity, famous for his ह्यूमर, satire, and keen observation of character and समाज.
His novels, most published in monthly or weekly किश्तों, pioneered the serial प्रकाशन of कथा fiction, which became the प्रबल Victorian mode for novel publication.
The instalment स्वरूप allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's reaction, और he प्रायः modified his plot and character विकास based on such प्रतिक्रिया.
For example, जब his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way Miss Mowcher in David Copperfield seemed to reflect her disabilities, डिकेंस went on to improve the character with धनात्मक lineaments.
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; उसके कैरीकेचर of Leigh Hunt in the figure of Mr skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned down on advice इससे some of his friends, as they read episodes.
In the same novel, both Lawrence Boythorne और मूनी the beadle are drawn from real जीवन – Boythorne from वाल्टर जंगली landor and मूनी from 'Looney ', a beadle at salisbury वर्गाकार.
His भूखंड were carefully constructed, और Dickens often wove in elements from topical events into his कहानियां.
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each नई मासिक episode पढ़ा to them, opening up and प्रेरणादायी a नई class of readers.
डिकेंस थी regarded as the literary colossus of उसके age.
उसके 1843 novella, a Christmas Carol, is one of the most influential works कभी लिखा, और it remains popular and continues to inspire adaptations in प्रत्येक artistic genre.
उसके रचनात्मक genius has महरूम praised by fellow writers—from leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton और George Orwell —for its यथार्थवाद, comedy, गद्य style, unique characterisations, और social criticism.
on the अन्य hand ऑस्कर Wilde, Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a कमी of psychological गहराई, loose writing, और a vein of saccharine sentimentalism.

The civil अधिकारों movement was a series of worldwide राजनैतिक movements for equality पहले the law that peaked in the 1960s.
in अनेक situations it took the form of campaigns of civil resistance aimed at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In some situations it थी accompanied, or followed, by civil unrest and armed rebellion.
The process was long और tenuous in many countries, और many of these movements did नहीं fully achieve उनके goals although, the प्रयत्न of ये movements did lead to सुधार in the विधिक rights of previously oppressed groups of लोगों.
the प्रमुख उद्देश्य of the civil rights गति शामिल, and शामिल, ensuring that the rights of all people are बराबर protected by the law, including the अधिकारों of minorities.
सिविल rights movements ranging from the वैश्विक LGBT अधिकारों movement to the वैश्विक Women 's rights गति to various racial minority rights आंदोलनों around the world continue.
the 2010 फीफा World कप was the 19th FIFA संसार कप, the संसार championship for men 's नेशनल संघ फ़ुटबॉल टीमों.
It took place in South अफ़्रीकी इससे 11 जून to 11 July 2010.
the bidding process for होस्टिंग the tournament finals थी खोलें only to African nations ; in 2004, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय football federation, FIFA, selected South Africa over Egypt और Morocco to become the first African स्वदेश to host the finals.
The मिलान यहूद निभाई in ten स्टेडियम in nine host cities around the country, with the final played at the Soccer City stadium in दक्षिण Africa 's largest city, Johannesburg.
thirty-two teams were selected for participation via a worldwide योग्यता tournament that began in अगस्त 2007.
In the first round of the tournament finals, the teams competed in round-robin groups of चार teams for points, with the top दो टीमों in each group proceeding.
ये sixteen teams उन्नत to the knockout stage, where three rounds of play decided which teams होता participate in the final.
In the फाइनल, Spain, the European champions, पराजित third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद extra time, with Andrés iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world title, becoming the eighth स्वदेश to win the tournament, and the पहला European nation to win the टूर्नामेंट बाहर इसके home महाद्वीप.
Host nation South Africa, 2006 world champions Italy और 2006 runners-up France were all eliminated in the first round of the tournament.
It थी the पहला time that the hosts were eliminated in the पहला round.
New Zealand साथ their तीन draws were the only undefeated team in the tournament, but यहूद also eliminated in the first गोलाकार.

John Lennon was an English musician who gained विश्वव्यापी fame as एक of the founders of The Beatles, लिये his subsequent solo career, and लिये उसके political activism और शांतिवाद.
He थी shot by Mark David Chapman at the प्रवेश of the building जहाँ he lived, The Dakota, in New York City on 8 दिसम्बर 1980.

Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. luke's-roosevelt Hospital Center, where it थी stated that nobody could have जिया लिये more than a few minutes after sustaining ऐसे injuries.
shortly after लोकल news स्टेशन reported Lennon 's death, crowds gathered at Roosevelt हॉस्पिटल और in front of the Dakota.

The first रपट of लेनन 's death to a U.S. national दर्शक थी announced by हावर्ड cosell, on ABC 's सोमवार Night फ़ुटबॉल.
नई Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major संयुक्त States बंदरगाहों and the largest city and metropolitan area in the राज्य of Louisiana.
The population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical क्षेत्रफल ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and थी the 46th largest in the United States.
The नई orleans–metairie–bogalusa Combined Statistical क्षेत्रफल, a larger trading क्षेत्रफल, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is नामित after orléans, a नगर located on the Loire River in केन्द्र, फ़्रांस, and is well ज्ञात for its distinct French Creole वास्तुकला, as खूब as its cross-cultural और multilingual विरासत.
New Orleans is also प्रसिद्ध for its cuisine, म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the birthplace of jazz ), and इसके annual celebrations और festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is प्रायः referred to as the `` most unique '' in अमेरिका.
New Orleans is स्तिथ in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi नदी.
The city और Orleans Parish ( ) are.
The city and मोहल्ला are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north, st. Bernard to the east, plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the दक्षिण and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is included in the city limits, lies to the north और Lake Borgne झूठ to the east.
The United States presidential चुनाव of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on मंगलवार, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former vice-president रिचर्ड Nixon, won the चुनाव over the Democratic nominee, लाज़िम vice-president Hubert humphrey.
Nixon भागा on a campaign कि promised to restore विधि और order to the nation 's cities, फटा by दंगे and अपराधों.
विश्लेषकों have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the New सौदे गठबन्धन कि had dominated presidential politics लिये 36 years.
coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. जॉनसन won in a historic landslide, the चुनाव saw the incumbent president मजबूर out of the रेस और a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years.
it was a wrenching national अनुभव, conducted दौरान a year of violence that included the assassination of सिविल rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक presidential प्रत्याशी Robert F. Kennedy, widespread विपक्ष to the Vietnam War across विश्वविद्यालयों campuses, and violent confrontations between पुलिस and anti-war प्रदर्शनकारियों at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the लोकतांत्रिक party split again and again.
the चुनाव प्रदर्शित the strongest third पार्टी effort since 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end स्कूल segregation, he carried the Deep दक्षिण and ran खूब in जातीय औद्योगिक districts in the उत्तर.
This was the last election in जिससे New यॉर्क had the most votes in the चुनावी college ( 43 मत ).
After the 1970 census, California gained the most electoral votes और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य चूंकि तब.
This is the latest election जहाँ a अध्यक्षीय ticket won without carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय candidate 's home state.

Kurt डोनाल्ड Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – अप्रैल 5, 1994 ) was an अमरीकी musician and कलाकार, best ज्ञात as the सीसे singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band निर्वाण.
कोबेन formed निर्वाण with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 and स्थापित it as भाग of the Seattle music scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the स्वतंत्र record लेबल Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label dgc Records, the बैंड found भेदन success with `` खुश्बू जैसे Teen Spirit `` from इसके second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
following the success of Nevermind, Nirvana थी labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation x, और Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his message और artistic दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the public, with उसके personal issues often विषय to मीडिया ध्यान.
he challenged निर्वाण 's दर्शक with its फाइनल studio एल्बम In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of उसके life, Cobain struggled with heroin व्यसन, illness और अवसाद.
He also had difficulty coping साथ his fame और पब्लिक image, and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his बीवी, musician कोर्टनी Love.
on April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle, the victim of कया थी officially शासित a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the सिर.
The हालातों of his मौत at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination और बहस.
Since their debut, Nirvana, with कोबेन as a songwriter, has बेची over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 लाख worldwide.
a millwright is a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and maintenance of machinery.
More generally in the अंग्रेज़ी speaking world, early millwrights were specialist बढ़ई who erected मशीने used in कृषि, food processing and प्रसंस्करण lumber and paper.
In the जल्दी part of the औद्योगिक Revolution, उनके skills were pressed into service भवन the earliest संचालित textile mills.
Modern millwrights work with steel and अन्य materials in addition to लकडी और must प्रायः combine the skills of several skilled ट्रेड in order to successfully fabricate औद्योगिक machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts.
the modern millwright must also be समर्थ to read blueprints और other schematics to aid उसे in the निर्माण of complex systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, साथ around 45 % unionized in the US, हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights often set themselves up as independent ठेकेदारों.

Sodium azide is the inorganic compound with the formula nan3.
This colorless salt is the gas-forming component in many car airbag systems.
It is प्रयुक्त for the तैयारी of other azide compounds.
It is an ionic पदार्थ, is highly soluble in water, and is very acutely विषाक्त.
दोगुना rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the inside of the primary चाप.
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the bottom marks the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ).
A रेनबो is an optical and meteorological घटना that is caused by reflection of लाइट in जल droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere, resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the आसमान.
It takes the form of a multicoloured arc.
Rainbows caused by sunlight always appear in the section of आसमान directly विपरीत the sun.
In a `` primary rainbow '', the arc shows रेड on the outer part and बैंगनी on the inner side.
This rainbow is caused by light होने refracted जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the वापस of the droplet और refracted again जब leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a दूसरी arc is देखी outside the प्राथमिक चाप, and रै the order of इसके colours reversed, रेड facing toward the अन्य एक, in both rainbows.
इस दूसरी रेनबो is caused by light reflecting twice अंदर water droplets.
the Conservative Party, officially the Conservative और Unionist Party और colloquially referred to as the Tory पार्टी or the Tories, is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of कोसा and अंग्रेजों unionism.
it is the largest राजनैतिक party in the संयुक्त Kingdom, होने the largest सिंगल party in the House of कॉमन्स with 303 MPs, the largest party in local सरकारी साथ 9,391 पार्षदों, and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 meps.
It governs in coalition with the Liberal Democrats, with पार्टी leader David Cameron as Prime Minister.
The Conservative Party was founded in 1834, and was one of two प्रबल parties in the 19th सदी, along with the Liberal पार्टी.
It बदला its name to the Conservative और Unionist Party in 1912 बाद merging with the Liberal यूनियनिस्ट Party, although that नाम is rarely प्रयुक्त और it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the उदार vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the conservatives ' main rivals.
Conservative Prime Ministers led सरकारें for 57 सालो of the 20th सदी, including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic उदारीकरण और saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The party was लौटे to government in coalition, having failed to win a majority, in 2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of दाउद cameron.
In the European Parliament, the Conservatives हैं the largest British party साथ 25 MEPs, who बैठना with the soft eurosceptic European conservatives and Reformists ( ecr ) parliamentary group, while the पार्टी itself is a member of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
वे are the third-largest party in the स्कॉटिश पार्लियामेंट और second-largest in the वेल्श Assembly.
वे were formally अलाइड to the Ulster Unionist Party ( uup ) as part of the Ulster Conservatives and unionists व्यवस्था, with the UUP currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
नियति 's Child थी an American R & b girl समूह whose final, and शायद most recognizable, line-up comprised बेयोंस Knowles, Kelly Rowland and Michelle विलियम्स.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, नियति 's चाइल्ड members began उनके musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, latavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After सालो of limited success, they were signed to Columbia रिकॉर्ड as Destiny 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the release of उनके best-selling second album, The Writing 's on the Wall, जिससे contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
Despite critical and वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, the group was plagued by internal conflict and विधिक turmoil, as Roberson और Luckett attempted to विभाजित इससे the group 's manager mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his बेटी and niece, respectively.
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with विलियम्स and Farrah Franklin ; however, in 2000, Franklin was dismissed, leaving them as a trio.
Their third एल्बम, उत्तरजीवी, which contains विषयवस्तु the public interpreted as a channel to the समूह 's experience, contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women ``, `` Survivor `` और `` Bootylicious ``.
in 2002, they announced a hiatus and re-united two years later for the release of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो album, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
नियति 's चाइल्ड रै sold अधिक than 50 million records worldwide to date.
बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका ranks the समूह as एक of the महानतम musical trios of all समय, the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s, और लगाई the group 68th in its all-time hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
the Centers लिये बीमारी Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United राज्य federal agency under the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated DeKalb काउंटी, Georgia, in Greater अटलांटा.
It works to protect public health and safety by providing information to बढ़ाएँ health decisions, and it promotes स्वास्थ्य through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations.
the सीडीसी फ़ोकस national attention on विकासशील and applying disease prevention and control ( especially संक्रामक रोगों and foodborne pathogens and अन्य सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ), पर्यावरणीय health, occupational सुरक्षा and health, health promotion, injury prevention and शिक्षा activities designed to improve the स्वास्थ्य of the people of the संयुक्त राज्य.
The CDC is the United राज्य ' national पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य institute and is a founding member of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of National पब्लिक Health Institutes.
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time, location, और परिमाण of a future earthquake within stated limits '', और विशेषकर of `` the next strong भूकंप to occur in a region. ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting, which is the probabilistic मूल्यांकन of general earthquake hazard, including the frequency and परिमाण of damaging earthquakes, in a given क्षेत्रफल over अवधि of years or decades.
This can be further विशिष्ट from real-time earthquake चेतावनी प्रणालियों, which, upon detection of a कठोर भूकंप, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking.
To be उपयोगी, an earthquake prediction जरूर be precise enough to वारंट the लागत of increased precautions, सहित disruption of ordinary क्रियाएँ और commerce, और timely enough कि preparation can be बना.
पूर्वानुमान जरूर also be reliable, as false सचेतक and रद्द alarms हैं नहीं तभी economically costly, लकिन seriously undermine confidence in, and thereby the प्रभावकारिता of, any kind of चेतावनी.
With over 7,000 भूकंप around the world each year साथ a परिमाण of 4.0 or greater, trivial success in भूकंप prediction is easily obtained using fear broad पैरामीटर्स of time, location, or magnitude.
However, such trivial `` successful predictions '' are नहीं उपयोगी.
Major earthquakes हैं often followed by reports कि वे were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a कामयाब prediction of a major भूकंप has बच बंद inquiry.
In the 1970s वहीँ was तीव्र optimism amongst वैज्ञानिकों that some method of predicting earthquakes might be found, but by the 1990s continuing failure led many वैज्ञानिकों to question whether it was even possible.
While many वैज्ञानिकों still hold that, given enough resources, भविष्यवाणी might be संभावित, many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently नामुमकिन.
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born may 13, 1993 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, singer, musician, songwriter and रिकार्ड producer.
रयान is best ज्ञात for starring as बेली Pickett in the Disney चैनल Original Series The Suite Life on Deck.
In 2008, the Suite Life on Deck ranked as TV 's top series among बच्चे 6-11 and the No. 2 scripted series among tweens 9-14.
Ryan started एक्टिंग in professional theatres at the आयु of seven ; in 2007 वो appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the फायरहाउस और तब थी खोजा in a देशभर search by Disney.
She is also known for appearing in the 2008 feature film The longshots as Edith.
In 2009, she guest starred in an episode of Wizards of Waverly प्लेस in Wizards on Deck साथ हन्ना Montana as Bailey Pickett along साथ her other डाल mates from The Suite Life on Deck.
तब, in 2010, she starred in the film 16 बधाइयां, which थी the most देखी cable program on the दिन of इसके premiere on the Disney चैनल.
16 Wishes introduced रयान to new ऑडियंस ; the movie received high viewership in the adults demographic ( 18-34 ).
जल्द after that, रयान starred in the independent नाट्य film, कया if..., जिससे premiered on August 20, 2010.

Released February 17, 2012.
Ryan stars in the titular role in the Disney चैनल Original Series, Jessie.
Stührling Tourbillon गति ( ).
in horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a देखें escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis breguet इससे an पहले idea by the English chronometer maker John अर्नाल्ड, a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of gravity by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a घूर्णन cage, to negate the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain स्थिति.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons हैं still included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty और demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The mechanism is प्रायः exposed on the watch 's face to show it off.
the खिड़कियाँ Installer ( previously known as Microsoft installer ) is a software component used for the installation, मेंटेनेंस, and removal of तन्त्र on modern Microsoft खिड़कियाँ systems.
the installation information, और often the files themselves, are packaged in installation packages, loosely relational databases structured as com Structured Storages and commonly known as `` MSI फाइलें '', from their default संचिका extension.
खिड़कियाँ Installer contains significant परिवर्तन इससे its पूर्ववर्ती, Setup API.
New features include a GUI फ्रेमवर्क and automatic generation of the uninstallation sequence.
Windows Installer is positioned as an वैकल्पिक to stand-alone executable installer frameworks such as older संस्करण of installshield and NSIS.
microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows installer as the आधार for installation frameworks, so that they synchronize correctly with other installers and रखना the internal database of installed products consistent.
Important features such as rollback और versioning निर्भर on a consistent आतंरिक database लिये विश्वसनीय operation.
furthermore, Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing software संस्थापना by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four लोको is a line of alcoholic पेय, originally marketed as energy drinks, बेची by Phusion प्रोजेक्ट of Chicago, इलिनोइस.
Phusion operates as Drink चार Brewing Company.
Four Loko, the company 's most popular पेय, debuted in the United States मार्केट in 2005.
It is now sold in 48 states, and in कनाडा, The Bahamas, Bolivia, Honduras, and Europe.
The नाम `` Four '' is निकला from the original उर्जा पेय 's चार main ingredients : alcohol, कैफीन, taurine, और guarana.
Four branded products have महरूम the ऑब्जेक्ट of विधिक, नैतिक, and health concerns related to the company allegedly marketing them to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine.
बाद the पेय was banned in several states, a product reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed caffeine, taurine, और guarana as ingredients, और the malt पेय is no longer marketed as an energy पेय.
The neck of a guitar प्रर्दशित the नट ( in the background, coloured white ) और first चार मेटल frets.
A fret is a उठाया element on the neck of a stringed instrument.
Frets प्रायः extend across the पूरा width of the गर्दन.
on most आधुनिक western fretted instruments, frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
On कुछ historical यंत्र and non-European यंत्र, frets are made of pieces of string tied around the neck.
Frets divide the गर्दन into fixed segments at intervals related to a musical framework.
On instruments ऐसे as guitars, each fret represents one semitone in the standard western system where one अष्टक is divided into twelve semitones.
Fret is often प्रयुक्त as a verb, meaning simply `` to दबायें down the string behind a fret. ''
Fretting often refers to the frets and/or their प्रणाली of placement.
वहीँ was consumption of alcohol both during and after prohibition.
the 18th Amendment निषिद्ध the production, distribution and sale of alcoholic पेय in the United राज्य और was widely समर्थित by the American public when it went into effect in 1920.
The temperance गति had popularized the विश्वास that दारू was the major cause of सबसे personal और social problems and निषेध was seen as the समाधान to the nation 's गरीबी, अपराधों, violence, and other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the famous evangelist Billy संडे said that `` the slums will जल्द be only a memory.
We will turn our जेलों into कारखानों और our jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( Compare Christianity and alcohol. )
Since alcohol was to be बैन and since it थी seen as the cause of सबसे, if not all, अपराधों, some समुदायों बेची उनके jails.
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted that `` There is as much chance of repealing the eighteenth Amendment as there is for a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
the metre ( meter in अमरीकी English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; si आयाम प्रतीक : l ), is the fundamental ईकाई of लंबाई in the International System of इकाई ( SI ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the North Pole ( at समुद्र level ), its परिभाषा has been periodically परिष्कृत to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it has been defined as `` the length of the path travelled by लाइट in vacuum during a समय interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''
