A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid matter that constitutes the Earth as खूब as the processes and history that has तराशा it.
geologists प्रायः engage in studying geology.
geologists, अध्ययन more of an applied science than a theoretical one, must दृष्टिकोण Geology using भौतिकी, chemistry और जीवविज्ञान as well as other sciences.
Geologists, compared to scientists engaged in other fields, हैं generally अधिक exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; हालांकि कुछ geologists prefer to perform सबसे of उनके studies in the lab.
geologists are सगाई in exploration for खनन companies in search of धातुओं, oils, and other Earth संसाधन.
They are भी in the forefront of प्राकृतिक hazards और disasters warning and शमन, studying earthquakes, volcanic activity, tsunamis, weather storms, और the like ; their studies are प्रयुक्त to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events.
Currently, geologists are also engaged in the चर्चा of climate change, as they study the इतिहास और evidence for this Earth process.

आधुनिक vacuum tubes, mostly miniature स्टाइल
in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, a vacuum ट्यूब, इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्यूब ( in North America ), thermionic valve, tube, or valve is a यंत्र controlling electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The container is often पतला पारदर्शी कांच in a roughly cylindrical shape.
The simplest वैक्यूम tube, the diode, is essentially an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode अंदर.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' off its surface और into the vacuum inside the bulb.
If the एलेक्ट्रोड -- called a `` थाली '' or `` anode '' -- is बना अधिक positive than the hot filament, a सीधा current flows through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison प्रभाव ).
As the current only flows in one direction, it makes it possible to convert an alternating वर्तमान applied to the फिलामेंट to सीधा current.
the introduction of a third electrode, a ग्रिड between the filament और the plate, yields another function.
a voltage applied to the grid controls the वर्तमान flowing from the filament to the plate.
Thus, it allows the यंत्र to be प्रयुक्त as an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धक.
Vacuum tubes are thus प्रयुक्त for rectification, प्रवर्धन, switching, or similar processing or creation of electrical signals.
The विशाल majority of modern दिन tubes consist of a sealed container with a vacuum inside, and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament.
Some exceptions to this हैं dealt with in the section about gas-filled tubes below.
वैक्यूम tubes यहूद critical to the विकास of electronic technology, जिससे drove the विस्तार and commercialization of radio broadcasting, television, radar, ध्वनि reinforcement, sound recording and reproduction, large टेलीफोन संजाल, analog and digital computers, और industrial प्रक्रम कंट्रोल.
Although कुछ applications had counterparts using earlier technologies such as the spark gap ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर, it थी the invention of the vacuum ट्यूब साथ three electrodes ( called a triode ) और its काबिलियत of electronic amplification that made ये technologies फैली and practical.
in most अनुप्रयोग, solid-state devices ऐसे as transistors and other semiconductor डिवाइस have replaced tubes.
Solid-state devices last longer and are छोटी, more efficient, more reliable, और cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant unwanted heat, और can लो many seconds—many minutes in नाजुक applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance.
however, tubes still find uses where solid-state डिवाइस have नहीं been विकसित, are impractical, or जहाँ a tube has superior performance, as with some डिवाइस in professional ऑडियो and high-power radio transmitters.
Tubes हैं still produced for ऐसे applications.
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक pulse produced by नाभिकीय explosions and geomagnetic storms उत्पादित by giant solar flares.
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured sweets, currently produced and marketed by the Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company, a प्रभाग of Mars, inc.
They have hard sugar shells which carry the letter s.
The inside is mainly शुगर, corn syrup, और hydrogenated ताड़ कर्नेल आयल along with fruit juice, citric एसिड, and प्राकृतिक and artificial flavours.
the confectionery रै been sold in a variety of फ्लेवर संग्रहण, such as Tropical और Wild Berry.
सर विंस्टन Leonard Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) थी a अंग्रेजों राजनेता जो थी the Prime Minister of the United किंगडम इससे 1940 to 1945 और again from 1951 to 1955.
widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime नेताओ of the 20th century, Churchill was भी an अधिकारी in the अंग्रेजों Army, a इतिहासकार, a writer, and an artist.
He is the only British Prime Minister in इतिहास to have प्राप्त the Nobel Prize in साहित्य, और was भी the first person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the संयुक्त States.
चर्चिल was born into an वैभवशाली family as the grandson of the 7th ड्यूक of marlborough.
His पिता, Lord Randolph Churchill, थी a charismatic राजनेता who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his माँ, Jennie Jerome, थी an अमरीकी socialite.
As a young फौज officer, he saw action in अंग्रेजों इण्डिया, The Sudan, and the Second Boer War.
he gained fame as a युद्ध correspondent and wrote books परिचय his campaigns.
At the forefront of politics for fifty years, he held many राजनैतिक and कैबिनेट positions.
Before the पहला World युद्ध, he served as अध्यक्ष of the Board of व्यापार, Home Secretary, and पहला Lord of the Admiralty as भाग of the Asquith Liberal government.
दौरान the war, he continued as पहला रब of the admiralty जबतक the disastrous Gallipoli अभियान caused his departure from government.
He then briefly resumed active army service on the Western Front as commander of the 6th Battalion of the Royal Scots Fusiliers.
he returned to government as Minister of Munitions, Secretary of State लिये War, और Secretary of State for Air.
बाद the War, Churchill served as Chancellor of the exchequer in the रूढ़िवादी ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold मानक at its pre-war पैरिटी, a move widely देखी as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy.
Also controversial was उसके विपक्ष to increased home rule for इण्डिया और उसके resistance to the 1936 abdication of एडवर्ड VIII.
आउट of दफ्तर and politically `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s, चर्चिल took the lead in चेतावनी about नाजी जर्मनी and in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the Second World युद्ध, he थी again appointed First Lord of the admiralty.
following the resignation of नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 may 1940, Churchill became प्रधान Minister.
His वफ़ादार refusal to consider defeat, आत्मसमर्पण, or a सुलह सलाम helped inspire British resistance, especially during the difficult जल्दी days of the War जब ब्रिटेन stood alone among European countries in its active विपक्ष to एडोल्फ Hitler.
Churchill was particularly noted for his speeches and रेडियो broadcasts, which helped inspire the British people.
He led Britain as प्रधान मंत्री until विजय over Nazi Germany had been secured.
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 चुनाव, he became Leader of the Opposition to the श्रमिक ( attlee ) government.
After जीतना the 1951 election, he again became Prime Minister, before retiring in 1955.
upon उसके मौत, एलिज़ाबेथ II granted him the honour of a state अंत्येष्टि, which saw one of the largest assemblies of world कूटनीतिज्ञों in इतिहास.
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as being among the most influential people in अंग्रेजों history.

An agar थाली -- an example of a bacterial growth medium.
Specifically, it is a streak plate ; the orange lines and dots are formed by bacterial colonies.
a growth medium or culture मीडियम is a द्रव or gel designed to support the growth of microorganisms or कोशिकाएं, or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are different types of media लिये growing अलग प्रकार of cells.
There हैं two major types of विकास media : those प्रयुक्त लिये cell संस्कृति, which उपयोग विशिष्ट cell types derived इससे plants or animals, and microbiological culture, जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त for growing microorganisms, such as जीवाणु or खमीर.
The most आम विकास media लिये microorganisms हैं nutrient broths and आगर plates ; specialized media are sometimes required लिये microorganism और कोशिका culture growth.
Some organisms, termed fastidious organisms, आवश्यकता specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements.
Viruses, लिये उदाहरण, हैं obligate intracellular परजीवी और require a growth मीडियम containing जीना cells.
A talent एजेंट, or बुकिंग agent, is a person who पाता कार्य लिये अभिनेताओं, authors, film directors, musicians, models, producers, पेशेवर athletes, writers and other people in विभिन्न entertainment व्यवसायों.
An agent also defends, supports and promotes the interest of his/her clients.
Agents can not उपज उनके अपना shows due to विरोध of ब्याज.
a talent agent must be familiar with their clients.
An agent has to know कया kind of work the client can और can not do in अनुक्रम to मैच them with various jobs.
having an एजेंट is नहीं required, लकिन does help the artist in getting jobs.
In many मामले casting directors, or other businesses, go to talent agencies to find artists they are looking लिये.
The एजेंट is सशुल्क a percentage of the star 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
Agents sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations that govern different types of एजेंटों that are established by artist 's संघ and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates.
There are भी professional organizations that license हुनर एजेंसियों.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, from the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a स्मारकीय शिफ़्ट in how studios would produce films and thus reducing the cost of विशेष and महंगी actors.
Actors और actresses यहूद working लिये the studios लकिन were नहीं स्वामित्व by एक प्रमुख studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with other studios.
Because of इस, agents were अभी देखी as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents अभी became third parties that negotiated between studios and clients, इस making उनके services imperative between each पार्टी.
चूंकि talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts, सब talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the California Labor Code, which calls an agent a `` person or corporation who engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, promising, or attempting to procure employment for कलाकार or artists. ''
मंगल has two known moons, Phobos और Deimos, which are thought to be captured क्षुद्रग्रह.
Both satellites were खोजा in 1877 by Asaph Hall और हैं named after the वर्ण phobos ( panic/fear ) और Deimos ( terror/dread ) जो, in Greek mythology, accompanied उनके father Ares, god of युद्ध, into battle.
एरीस was ज्ञात as Mars to the Romans.
It is possible कि Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters and a dust ring between Phobos and Deimos may be present लकिन none have महरूम discovered.
In law enforcement parlance, the term murder book refers to the मामला संचिका of a murder investigation.
typically, murder किताबे शामिल crime scene photographs और sketches, autopsy और forensic reports, transcripts of investigators ' notes और witness interviews.
The murder किताब encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder investigation, from the time the murder is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically गार्ड हत्या किताबे carefully, and it is असामान्य for नागरिकों to be दिए unfettered अभिगम to these kinds of रिकॉर्ड, especially लिये unsolved cases.

They हैं generally used in fruit salad.
A KSA, or ज्ञान, कौशल, and Abilities, is a series of narrative कथन that हैं required when applying to United राज्य संघीय सरकारी जॉब उद्घाटन.
KSAs are प्रयुक्त to determine, along साथ resumes, जो the best आवेदकों are जब several candidates qualify for a job.
The ज्ञान, skills and abilities ( ksas ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन of a position हैं contained on each job vacancy announcement.
In 2009 the Office of Personal प्रबन्धन पूछा संघीय एजेंसियों to stop requiring job applicants to fill out the questionnaires, to be phased out within a साल.
KSAs are brief and केन्द्रित essays परिचय एक 's करियर and educational background that presumably qualify one to perform the duties of the position being applied for.
a ज्ञान, skills, and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay परिचय one 's talent और विशेषज्ञता और related अनुभवों ( work, education, volunteer ) and accomplishments.
A श्रेणी of ksa statements are प्रायः required when applying for most संघीय government and कुछ state and नगर सरकारी कार्य.
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in शर्तें of संभावित ability to perform the duties of the जॉब.
सबसे सरकारी भर्ती officials look लिये a छोटी, crisp और साफ ksa that emphasizes results or accomplishments प्राप्त in पिछला work.
ksa statements are भी known as मूल्यांकन Factors.
अन्य एजेंसियों sometimes call them `` दरजा Factors '', `` Quality Ranking Factors '', `` ज्ञान, abilities, skills and Other Characteristics '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The name can be बस a नाम but often it influences content and लंबाई of the निबन्ध.
Every एजेंसी रै its own regulations but most of the time the each KSA फ़ैक्टर should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 पृष्ठों long.
The नीचे definitions are defined by the U.S. Office of Personnel प्रबन्धन :
ज्ञान, कौशल, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes जरूरी to perform a जॉब and हैं generally demonstrated through qualifying service, education, or training.
Knowledge - is a देह of information लागू directly to the प्रदर्शन of a function.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a learned psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable behavior or a बर्ताव that परिणाम in an observable उत्पाद.
The scoring of KSA essays is based on a scale of from one to 100.
Job आवेदकों must score above 70 to be considered for the position.
ऊँची scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible, providing examples इससे previous employment or training that clearly demonstrate you मिलें the qualifications.
When applying to federal government स्थितियाँ, a Federal Resume is प्रायः जरूरी in addition to KSA statements.

It was recorded at various studios in New York and the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997.
it was produced by JoJo and several अन्य, including devante झूले, James Mtume, और Jeff Redd.
The duo were originally a part of Jodeci पहले this album.
the album peaked at छठे on the US बिलबोर्ड 200 and also appeared on international charts.
the single `` All My Life `` charted number one in multiple countries, और सब four of the album 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the us hot r & B/Hip-Hop Songs और the New Zealand शीर्ष 40 Singles.
Love Always थी प्राप्त favorably by critics, who praised the brothers ' singing ability and the production.
the एल्बम has महरूम certified तीन times platinum by the Recording Industry संघ of अमेरिका ( RIAA ) and gold by म्यूज़िक Canada और IFPI Sweden.
As of जून 1999 it had बेची 2.9 लाख copies in the United States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ), or ट्रैकर mortgage is a बंधक ऋण with the interest रेट on the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the लागत to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's standard variable rate/ आधार रेट.
वहीँ may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index, but जहाँ the lender offers no specific link to the underlying market or अनुक्रमणिका the rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States, whilst in the संयुक्त States, `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is सबसे common, और implies a mortgage regulated by the संघीय government, with caps on charges.
in many देशों, adjustable rate mortgages are the norm, and in such places, may बस be referred to as mortgages.
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity राजकोष ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of निधि Index ( cofi ), और the London interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders use their own cost of निधि as an अनुक्रमणिका, rather than using other indices.
This is done to ensure a steady हाशिया लिये the lender, whose own cost of funding होगा usually be related to the अनुक्रमणिका.
Consequently, payments बना by the borrower may change over समय साथ the बदलना ब्याज रेट ( alternatively, the पद of the ऋण may change ).
This is पृथक from the ग्रैजुएट payment mortgage, which offers changing payment amounts but a फिक्स्ड interest rate.
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage, the फिक्स्ड rate बंधक, the negative amortization mortgage, and the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable दरों transfer part of the interest rate risk इससे the lender to the borrower.
They can be used जहाँ मनमौजी ब्याज rates मेक फिक्स्ड रेट loans difficult to obtain.
the borrower benefits if the interest rate falls but loses if the interest रेट increases.
the borrower benefits इससे reduced margins to the underlying लागत of borrowing compared to फिक्स्ड or capped rate mortgages.
the assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy, a United States Senator और brother of assassinated President जॉन Fitzgerald `` जोकर '' Kennedy, took place shortly after midnight on जून 5, 1968, in लॉस Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, दौरान the campaign season लिये the United States Presidential election, 1968.
After winning the California and दक्षिण डकोटा primary elections for the Democratic नामांकन for President of the United States, Kennedy थी shot as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador होटल and died in the Good सामरी Hospital twenty-six hours later.
Sirhan sirhan, a 24-year-old Palestinian / जार्डन अप्रवासी, थी convicted of कैनेडी 's हत्या और is serving a life sentence for the अपराधों.
Sirhan 's lawyers have released statements claiming evidence that he was framed.
The शूटिंग was अंकित on audio tape by a freelance newspaper reporter, and the aftermath थी captured on film.
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's गिरजाघर in New यॉर्क for two days before a funeral द्रव्यमान was आयोजित on June 8.
His देह थी interred निकट his bhai John at Arlington National Cemetery.

the Modern Age of कॉमिक Books is an informal नाम for the काल in the history of mainstream American comic किताबे generally माना to last from the mid-1980s जबतक present day.
in this period, कॉमिक किताब characters generally became गहरा and अधिक psychologically complex, creators became better-known और active in changing the उद्योग, स्वतंत्र comics flourished, and larger publishing घरों became अधिक commercialized.
An वैकल्पिक name for this period is the Dark आयु of कॉमिक Books, due to the popularity and artistic influence of grim titles, ऐसे as and Watchmen.
When Harry मिले Sally... is a 1989 अमरीकी रोमांटिक comedy film written by Nora Ephron और directed by Rob Reiner.
It stars Billy Crystal as हैरी and Meg Ryan as सैली.
the स्टोरी फ़ॉलो the title characters from the time they मिलें just before sharing a cross-country ड्राइव, through twelve years or so of chance मुठभेड़ों in New York City.
The film raises the question `` Can men and women कभी just be friends ? '' और अग्रिम many विचार परिचय relationships that became household अवधारणाओं, such as those of the `` '' गर्लफ्रेंड and the `` transitional person ''.
the origins of the film came इससे Reiner 's वापसी to single life after a तलाक.
An interview Ephron conducted साथ Reiner provided the आधार for हैरी.
सैली थी based on Ephron and some of her मित्रों.
क्रिस्टल came on board and made his own contributions to the पटकथा, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the structure of the film with much of the dialogue based on the real-life friendship between reiner और Crystal.

Connick जीती his first Grammy Award लिये Best Jazz पुरूष Vocal Performance.

जब हैरी Met Sally... grossed a total of US $ 92.8 लाख in North America.

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged खाना products primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled साथ a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.

The उत्पाद line also features products with other starches such as rice or potatoes instead of pasta.
It is made by General मिलों.
हालांकि the क्लासिक boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce पैकेट्स, some varieties of the उत्पाद include ground beef.

There is also an `` instant '' संस्करण of Hamburger हेल्पर containing निर्जलित meat, noodles and seasonings in a छोटी pouch, requiring only water to be added.
The Hamburger हेल्पर mascot is the `` helping हाथ '', an anthropomorphic animated, चार fingered left-hand glove, which appears in the product 's टेलीविज़न commercials और on the packages.

A बौना planet is a planetary-mass ऑब्जेक्ट that is neither a planet nor a उपग्रह.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( iau ) defines a बौना planet as a celestial body in direct orbit of the सूर्य that is विशाल enough for its shape to be नियंत्रित by gravitation, but that नापसंद a ग्रह has not cleared इसके orbital region of अन्य वस्तुएँ.
the term बौना planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of लाशें orbiting the सूर्य, brought परिचय by an increase in discoveries of trans-Neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in size, and finally precipitated by the डिस्कवरी of an even more massive object, Eris.
This वर्गीकरण states that bodies विशाल पर्याप्त to have cleared the neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा are पारिभाषित as ग्रह, जबकि those कि are not massive पर्याप्त to be rounded by their अपना gravity हैं पारिभाषित as small Solar System लाशें.
Dwarf planets come in between.
The exclusion of बौना ग्रह from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised और criticized ; it was said to be the `` सही निर्णय '' by Mike Brown, जो खोजा and other new dwarf planets, but has महरूम rejected by Alan stern, जो had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990.
The iau currently recognizes five बौना planets in the Solar System :, प्लूटो,,, and.
However, तभी दो of these लाशें, Ceres और प्लूटो, have been observed in enough विवरण to demonstrate that they fit the definition.
Eris has महरूम accepted as a dwarf planet क्युकी it is more विशाल than Pluto.
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-neptunian objects with an absolute परिमाण brighter than +1 ( and hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a ज्यामितीय albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they हैं dwarf ग्रह.
The तभी two such objects known at the समय, Makemake and हउमेया, गई through this naming procedure and यहूद declared to be dwarf planets.
It is suspected कि another hundred or so known objects in the Solar System हैं बौना planets.
Estimates हैं कि up to 200 बौना planets may be found जब the entire प्रदेश known as the Kuiper belt is explored, and कि the क्रमांक may exceed 10,000 when वस्तुएँ scattered outside the kuiper belt are considered.
व्यक्तिगत astronomers recognize several of these, and in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 प्रत्याशी objects, ranging from `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf ग्रह. '
भूरा identifies nine known वस्तुएँ – the five accepted by the IAU plus,,, and – as `` virtually certain '', with another two dozen highly संभावित, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in अन्य planetary systems with the characteristics of dwarf ग्रह has नहीं been addressed.
A debit card ( भी known as a bank card or check card ) is a plastic भुगतान card that provides the cardholder electronic access to his or her बैंको account ( s ) at a financial संस्था.
कुछ cards have a stored मान with which a payment is made, while सबसे relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account.
The कार्ड, जहाँ accepted, can be प्रयुक्त instead of cash when बनाना purchases.
In some cases, the प्राथमिक खाता क्रमांक is assigned exclusively for उपयोग on the Internet और there is no physical card.
In अनेक countries, the use of debit cards has become so फैली that their volume रै overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and, in some instances, cash transactions.
The development of डेबिट cards, unlike credit cards और charge cards, रै generally been country विशिष्ट resulting in a number of different systems around the world, which यहूद often असंगत.
चूंकि the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be प्रयुक्त in other countries and अनुमत their use for internet and phone purchases.
नापसंद credit और चार्ज ताश, payments using a debit card are immediately transferred from the cardholder 's designated bank account, instead of उन्हें paying the money back at a later date.
Debit ताश usually also allow for instant वापसी of cash, एक्टिंग as the एटीएम कार्ड लिये withdrawing नकदी.
Merchants may also offer cashback सुविधाएं to ग्राहक, where a customer can withdraw cash along with their खरीदें.
Francois Henri `` जोकर '' LaLanne ( September 26, 1914 - January 23, 2011 ) was an American फ़िटनेस, कसरत, और nutritional विशेषज्ञ और प्रेरक स्पीकर who is sometimes पुकारा `` the गॉडफादर of fitness '' और the `` first fitness सुपरहीरो. ''
he वर्णित himself as being a `` sugarholic '' and a `` जंक food junkie '' until he was 15.
He also था behavioral problems, but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public लेक्चर by पॉल Bragg, a well-known nutrition speaker.
दौरान उसके करियर, he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the health of its जनसांख्यिकी, writing कि `` physical culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America. ''
Decades before health and fitness began होने promoted by celebrities जैसे Jane Fonda और Richard Simmons, LaLanne थी already widely recognized for publicly उपदेश the health benefits of regular exercise और a शुभ diet.
he published numerous किताबे on फ़िटनेस और hosted a fitness television show between 1953 और 1985.
As जल्दी as 1936, at age 21, he opened one of the nation 's पहला फ़िटनेस gyms in Oakland, California, जिससे became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s टेलीविज़न exercise programs was aimed toward women, whom he भी encouraged to join उसके स्वास्थ्य clubs.
He invented a number of exercise मशीने, including leg-extension और pulley डिवाइस.
besides producing उसके अपना श्रेणी of videos, he coached the बुजुर्ग और disabled नहीं to forgo कसरत, believing it would enable उन्हें to बढ़ाएँ उनके strength.
LaLanne भी gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder, as खूब as for his prodigious feats of strength.
अर्नाल्ड Schwarzenegger once stated, `` That Jack lalanne 's an animal !, '' after lalanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old श्वार्ज़नेगर `` badly '' in an informal contest.
On the अवसर of lalanne 's death, Schwarzenegger credited lalanne for होने `` an apostle लिये fitness '' by inspiring `` billions all over the संसार to live healthier lives, '' और, as governor of California, था earlier placed him on his राज्यपाल 's Council on शारीरिक Fitness.
Steve Reeves credited LaLanne as his inspiration to build उसके muscular physique जबकि keeping a slim waist.
He was inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति and रै a star on the हॉलीवुड Walk of कीर्ति.
Air forces of most of the countries use system similar to Armies.
However, the RAF and the air forces of अनेक Commonwealth देशों, or those formerly under a British influence, उपयोग a different नियत of ranks loosely आधारित on naval equivalents ; Lieutenant, Commander, कप्तान और Commodore are prefixed for air force use with Flight, Wing, Group and एयर, क्रमशः ( the first three होने the units कि they used to कमांड ).
Penélope Cruz sánchez ( ; born April 28, 1974 ) is a Spanish actress.
Signed by an agent at age 15, she बना her एक्टिंग डेब्यू at 16 on television and उसके विशेषता film डेब्यू the following year in Jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to critical acclaim.
उसके subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included खोलें अपना Eyes ( 1997 ), the hi-lo Country ( 1999 ), the Girl of अपना Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ).
Cruz achieved recognition for her lead भूमिकाएँ in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow.
वो has since built a successful career, appearing in films from a wide दायरा of genres, including the comedy Waking up in Reno ( 2002 ), the थ्रिलर Gothika ( 2003 ), the क्रिसमस movie Noel ( 2004 ), and the action adventure सहारा ( 2005 ).
वो has प्राप्त critical acclaim लिये उसके roles in volver ( 2006 ) and नौ ( 2009 ) receiving Golden Globe and Academy पुरस्कार nominations लिये प्रत्येक.
वो जीती the Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री in 2008 for Vicky Cristina बार्सिलोना.
She was the first Spanish अभिनेत्री in history to प्राप्त an अकादमी Award and the first स्पेनी अभिनेत्री to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Cruz has modeled for कंपनियाँ ऐसे as Mango, Ralph लॉरेन and L'Oréal.

वो has donated both उसके समय और धन to charities.
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and इण्डिया, where she spent one week working for माँ Teresa ; she donated her सैलरी इससे ' to help fund the लेट nun 's mission.

File Explorer, previously known as Windows Explorer, is a संचिका manager अनुप्रयोग and भी a navigation औजार कि is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from Windows 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical user इंटरफ़ेस for accessing the संचिका systems.
It is also the component of the operating system that presents अनेक user interface items on the मॉनिटर ऐसे as the taskbar और desktop.
Controlling the computer is possible बगैर खिड़कियाँ Explorer running ( for example, the File | चलाएं command in Task मैनेजर on nt-derived versions of Windows होगा फलन बगैर it, as will commands typed in a command prompt window ).
Located in the C : \Windows directory, it is sometimes referred to as the खिड़कियाँ shell, explorer.exe, or बस “Explorer”.

The original कलाकृति for the cards थी painted by कलाकार Elena kucharik.
In 1983, Kenner turned the Care Bears into plush teddy bears.
The Care Bears appeared in उनके own TV specials पुकारा The Care Bears in the Land बगैर Feelings ( 1983 ) और The Care Bears Battle the Freeze यंत्र ( 1984 ).
वे also had उनके own television श्रेणी from 1985 to 1988, in addition to three विशेषता films : The Care Bears फिल्म ( 1985 ), परवाह Bears Movie II : A New पीढी ( 1986 ), and The परवाह bears एडवेंचर in वंडरलैंड ( 1987 ).
Each Care Bear comes in a different color and रै a specialized insignia on its belly that represents its duty and personality.

Interstate 70 ( i-70 ) is an Interstate राजमार्ग in the संयुक्त राज्य कि runs from अंतरराज्यीय 15 near कोव Fort, यूटा, to a पार्क and Ride निकट Baltimore, मेरीलैंड.
It was the पहला Interstate राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the United राज्य.
i-70 approximately traces the path of U.S. Route 40 ( और भी the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the Rockies, the route of I-70 was derived इससे अनेक स्त्रोत.
I-70 is the पांचवां longest अंतरराज्यीय Highway, after i-90, I-80, I-40, and i-10.
the construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel as the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel, Glenwood canyon, and the San Rafael swell.
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the उच्चतम point along the अंतरराज्यीय Highway system with an elevation of.
The भाग of the अंतरराज्यीय in Missouri and Kansas have laid अर्जी to be the पहला interstate in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Though disputed, the Federal Highway Administration रै claimed the section of I-70 through Glenwood canyon, completed in 1992, was the पिछला piece of the अंतरराज्यीय Highway system, as originally नियोजित, to खोलें to ट्रैफ़िक.

As देखी from the धरती, a सौर eclipse occurs जब the Moon गुजरता between the Sun and धरती, और the चंद्रमा fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the सूर्य.
This can happen only at new moon, when the Sun और the चंद्रमा are in संयोजन as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy.
in a total ग्रहण, the disk of the सूर्य is fully obscured by the Moon.
In partial और annular eclipses तभी भाग of the सूर्य is obscured.
if the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit, a छोटी करीब to the Earth, and in the वही कक्षीय प्लेन, there would be total solar eclipses every single month.
however, the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5 डिग्री to धरती 's orbit around the सूर्य ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at new moon usually misses धरती.
Earth 's orbit is पुकारा the ecliptic प्लेन as the Moon 's कक्षा must cross this plane in order लिये an eclipse ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur.
In जोड, the Moon 's वास्तविक कक्षा is elliptical, प्रायः लेने it far enough दूर इससे Earth that its apparent आकार is not large enough to block the Sun totally.
The orbital planes cross each year at a line of नोड resulting in at least two, and up to five, सौर eclipses occurring each साल ; no अधिक than two of which can be कुल eclipses.
However, total solar eclipses are rare at कोई particular location क्युकी totality exists only along a narrow पाथ on Earth 's surface traced by the चंद्रमा 's shadow or umbra.
An eclipse is a प्राकृतिक घटना.
Nevertheless, in some ancient and modern संस्कृतियों, solar eclipses have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as ख़राब omens.
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people who are unaware of its astronomical स्पष्टीकरण, as the सूर्य seems to disappear during the दिन and the आसमान darkens in a पदार्थ of minutes.
क्युकी it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun, observers should use special eye protection or अप्रत्यक्ष देखने तकनीकों जब देखने a partial eclipse, or the partial phases of a total ग्रहण.
It is safe to दृश्य the कुल phase of a total solar ग्रहण with the unaided eye और without protection, however.
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will सफर to remote locations to observe or witness predicted सेंट्रल solar eclipses.
A political party ( from, Genitive partis, `` part '', `` portion '' ) is a राजनैतिक संगठन कि typically seeks to influence, or entirely control, सरकारी policy, प्रायः by nominating candidates with aligned राजनैतिक views and trying to सीट them in political office.
Parties participate in electoral campaigns और educational outreach or protest क्रियाएँ.
Parties प्रायः espouse an विचारधारा or vision, expressed in a party कार्यक्रम, bolstered by a written platform साथ specific goals, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a मांसल stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting trees in the flowering plant परिवार Anacardiaceae.
The mango is देशी to South Asia, from जहाँ it has been distributed विश्वव्यापी to become one of the सबसे cultivated fruits in the tropics.
जबकि other Mangifera species ( e.g. घोड़ा आम, M. foetida ) हैं भी grown on a अधिक localized आधार, mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'इण्डियाn mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in अनेक तीव्र and subtropical regions.
it is the national फल of इण्डिया, Pakistan और Philippines.
In several cultures, its फल and leaves are ritually used as floral decorations at weddings, पब्लिक जश्न and धार्मिक ceremonies.
गिल arnette Byrd, < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born February 20, 1961 in San फ्रांसिस्को, California ) is a former professional American football player.

World map showing the tropic of Cancer
The tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the Northern tropic, is the circle of अक्षांश on the Earth that marks the सबसे northerly position at जिससे the सूर्य may appear directly overhead at इसके zenith.
This event occurs once प्रति साल, at the time of the June solstice, when the Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
It फिलहाल ( Year 2013 ) झूठ at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ उत्तर of the equator.
Its Southern Hemisphere बंटवारा, marking the most southerly position at जिससे the सूर्य may appear directly overhead, is the Tropic of Capricorn.
These tropics are two of the पाँच प्रमुख degree measures or major circles of latitude that mark मानचित्र of the Earth, besides the आर्कटिक और Antarctic Circles and the Equator.
The स्थितियाँ of these circles of latitude ( other than the Equator ) हैं dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's axis of rotation relative to the plane of its orbit.
dvd-video is a consumer video format used to स्टोर digital video on dvd discs, और is currently the dominant consumer video format in Asia, उत्तर America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive और an h.262/mpeg-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD ड्राइव with a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a संयोजन of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video और ऑडियो of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
typically, the data रेट लिये DVD movies सीमाएँ from 3 mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit रेट is usually adaptive.
it was पहला उपलब्धियाँ लिये retail around 1997.
the DVD-Video specification was निर्मित by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त from DVD Format/Logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम for a fee of $ 5,000.
the specification is not सरेआम available, because प्रत्येक subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
निश्चित information in the dvd Book is proprietary and confidential.
in computing and specifically Internet, a leech is एक जो लाभ, usually deliberately, from others ' information or प्रयत्न but does not offer anything in return, or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being पुकारा a leech.
in economics, this type of behavior is पुकारा `` free riding '' and is associated with the free rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of कंप्यूटर resources, but often बजाय to greedy use according to etiquette : to wit, using too much of कया is freely दिए without contributing a reasonable राशि back to the जातियाँ that provides it.
the नाम derives इससे the जोंक, an animal that झंझट रक्त and then tries to leave unnoticed.
Other शर्तें are used, ऐसे as `` freeloader '', लकिन leech is the most आम.

The संयुक्त राज्य डाक Service ( usps ), also known as the पोस्ट Office and u.S. Mail, is an independent agency of the United States संघीय government responsible लिये providing postal service in the United States.
It is one of the few government एजेंसियों explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution.
The usps traces its roots to 1775 during the Second Continental कॉंग्रेस, जहाँ बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन was appointed the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level पोस्ट Office Department was निर्मित in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and transformed into इसके current form in 1971 अंतर्गत the Postal reorganization Act.
The usps employs over 574,000 मजदूर and operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The usps is the operator of the largest vehicle बेड़े in the संसार.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve all अमेरिकी, regardless of geography, at वर्दी दाम and विशेषता.
the USPS has विशेष access to letter बाक्स marked `` u.S. मेल '' and personal letterboxes in the United States, but still competes विरूद्ध private package delivery services, ऐसे as UPS और FedEx.
The USPS has नहीं सीधे received taxpayer-dollars since the early 1980s with the नाबालिग एक्सेप्शन of subsidies for costs associated with the disabled and विदेशी voters.
Since the 2006 all-time peak मेल volume, बाद जिससे Congress passed the Postal Accountability and enhancement Act ``, ( जिससे mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the future, a requirement unique among organizations and व्यवसायों in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume, prompting the डाक सेवा to look to अन्य sources of revenue जबकि cutting costs to reduce its बजट deficit.
वॉशिंगटन, D.C. रै महरूम the पूंजी of the United States since 1800.
Eight अन्य cities have served as the meeting प्लेस लिये Congress और are therefore considered to have एकबार महरूम the पूंजी of the United States.
In addition, प्रत्येक of the 50 u.S. states और the five principal territories of the संयुक्त राज्य maintains its own capital.
राजकुमारी काटें diamond नियत in a रिंग
The Princess cut is the second सबसे popular cut आकार for diamonds, next to a गोलाकार शानदार.
The face-up shape of the राजकुमारी काटें is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is समान to that of an inverted पिरामिड साथ four beveled पहलू.
The princess cut is a relatively नई diamond cut, having महरूम created in the 1960s.
It has gained in लोकप्रियता in हाल years as a more distinctive alternative to the more लोकप्रिय round brilliant cut, in जिससे the top of डायमंड, called the क्राउन, is cut with a round face-up shape and the bottom, पुकारा the pavilion, is तराशा समान to a cone.
a राजकुमारी cut with the वही width as the diameter of a गोलाकार brilliant होगा weigh अधिक as it रै four corners which would otherwise have been cut बंद and rounded to रूप a round brilliant.
The princess काटें is sometimes referred to as a square modified शानदार.
However, while displaying the same high degree of brilliance, its faceting स्टाइल is unique and completely different from that of a round brilliant.
The राजकुमारी cut had its origins in the early `` फ्रेंच '' काटें, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` क्रॉस '' cut क्राउन and a श्रेणी of अद्वितीय, chevron-shaped facets in the मण्डप जिससे combine to give a distinct cross-shaped reflection when the स्टोन is viewed directly through the table.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the ऊँची उपाधि of light return of a round brilliant cut with a distinctive square or आयताकार shape.
The square राजकुमारी काटें diamond is प्रायः थोड़ा cheaper than round brilliant cut diamonds of the वही कैरेट weight because it retains about 80 % of the rough डायमंड, as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only परिचय 50 % of the rough.
The ability to retain more crystal weight makes इस shape popular amongst diamond cutters.
Accredited gem appraisers ( AGA ) and American gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) and European Gem Laboratories-USA ( egl-usa ) हैं currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut लिये काटें.
वहीँ is no सार्वभौमिक definition of what माप make an आदर्श princess cut diamond and many diamond manufacturers market ideal ईंट with differing facet patterns और angles as `` आदर्श cut ''.
In कंट्रास्ट to the AGSL, AGA, और egl-usa the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) रै stated that there is not पर्याप्त industry consensus or empirical आंकड़ा to specify काटें grading मानकों for Princess cut diamonds and to do so is at the risk of consumers जो may be deceived by ईंट accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent काटें grades.
the name `` राजकुमारी Cut '' थी originally used in कनेक्शन with another diamond cut, otherwise known as the `` Profile '' काटें, designed by Arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The वही name थी later used and made लोकप्रिय by ygal Perlman, Betzalel Ambar, और Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
A समान काटें साथ only 49 facets, as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the princess काटें, थी later branded the `` quadrillion '' and initially वितरित by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles.
Three years of optical शोध yielded a square stone साथ faceting similar to that of a round brilliant cut diamond.
A तुलना
The number of chevrons can affect the overall outlook of a princess काटें डायमंड.
This can usually be determined by the तार diagram that is plotted in diamond grading reports.
By adding अधिक chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond, the व्यक्तिगत facets of the diamond होगा now be broken down into smaller facets.
as a परिणाम, it can give a princess cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look.
वाइस versa, when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons, it tends to give the diamond a chunky आउटलुक due to broader facets.
the domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the धूसर wolf ( canis lupus ), a member of the कैनिडाए family of the mammalian अनुक्रम Carnivora.
The term `` domestic श्वान '' is generally used लिये दोनो domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog रै been the first animal to be domesticated and has महरूम the most widely रखा working, hunting, and पालतु animal in human history.
the word `` श्वान '' may also mean the male of a canine species, as opposed to the word `` कुतिया '' for the मादा of the species.
MtDNA प्रमाण shows an evolutionary विभाजित between the modern श्वान 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years पहले लकिन,, the oldest fossil specimens genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage date to लगभग 33,000-36,000 years ago.
Dogs ' value to जल्दी इंसान hunter-gatherers led to them quickly becoming सर्वव्यापी across world संस्कृतियों.
Dogs perform many roles for people, such as शिकार, herding, pulling loads, protection, assisting police and सैन्य, companionship, and, अधिक recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
इस प्रभाव on human समाज has given them the nickname `` man 's बेहतरीन Friend '' in the पश्चिमी संसार.
In some cultures, dogs हैं भी a source of meat.
in 2001, वहीँ यहूद अनुमानित to be 400 million कुत्तो in the संसार.
Most breeds of dogs हैं at सबसे a few सौ सालो old, having been artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies and behaviors by लोगों for specific functional roles.
Through इस चयनात्मक breeding, the dog रै विकसित into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral and morphological विभिन्नता than any other land स्तनधारी.
For example, ऊँचाई measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to परिचय in the Irish wolfhound ; color varies from श्वेत through grays ( usually पुकारा `` blue '' ) to black, and browns from light ( tan ) to अंधेरा ( `` red '' or `` चॉकलेट '' ) in a चौड़ी variation of patterns ; coats can be छोटी or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, घुंघराले, or चिकना.
It is आम for सबसे breeds to shed this coat.
Diagram of a हस्तांतरण electron microscope
A 1973 siemens electron microscope, Musée des Arts et métiers, Paris
An electron microscope ( EM ) is a प्रकार of सूक्ष्मदर्शी that उपयोग an electron बीम to illuminate a specimen and उपज a magnified image.
an EM has greater resolving शक्ति than a लाइट microscope और can reveal the ढांचा of smaller वस्तुएँ because electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to परिचय 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x.
The electron microscope उपयोग electrostatic and इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to control the इलेक्ट्रॉन beam and focus it to रूप an image.
These electron optical lenses are analogous to the glass lenses of a light optical microscope.
इलेक्ट्रॉन microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide दायरा of biological and inorganic specimens सहित microorganisms, cells, large molecules, biopsy samples, metals, and crystals.
industrially, the electron microscope is often used लिये quality control and विफलता analysis.
Modern इलेक्ट्रॉन microscopes उपज electron micrographs, using specialized डिजिटल कैमरे or फ़्रेम grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried chicken तेज़ खाना restaurants founded in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes और sometimes as popeyes मुर्गा & बिस्कुट or Popeyes मुर्गा & Seafood, It was acquired by Sandy Springs, Georgia -आधारd AFC Enterprises, originally America 's पसंदीदा Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a कम्पनी press release dated जून 29, 2007, Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service मुर्गा रेस्तरां group, measured by number of units '', साथ अधिक than 1,800 restaurants in more than 40 राज्य and the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और over 22 countries worldwide including Turkey, उत्तरी Cyprus, Bahrain, China, Hong Kong, इराकी, इंडोनेशिया, जॉर्डन, Kuwait, संयुक्त Arab अमीरात, जापानी, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, South Korea, Singapore, कनाडा, जमैका, Guyana, Suriname, Mexico, त्रिनिदाद, Puerto Rico, होंडुरास, Vietnam, Panama, पेरू, and Costa Rica.
About तीस locations are company-owned, the rest franchised.
The leg press is a वज़न training कसरत in जिससे the व्यक्तिगत pushes a weight or resistance away from them using their टाँगे.
the term leg press भी refers to the apparatus प्रयुक्त to perform this exercise.
the लेग press can be used to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's overall lower देह शक्ति ( इससे knee joint to हिप ).
Using the diagonal sled-type लेग press machine.
वहीँ हैं two प्रमुख types of leg press:
the तिर्यक or vertical 'sled ' प्रकार leg press.
वज़न disks ( plates ) are attached directly to the sled, जिससे is mounted on rails.
the उपयोक्ता sits नीचे the sled and pushes it upward with their feet.
These machines normally include adjustable safety brackets कि prevent the user from होने trapped under the weight.
The 'cable ' type leg press, or 'seated leg दबायें ', commonly मिला on multigyms.
The user sits कतरा और pushes forward with their फीट onto a plate कि is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel केबल.
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born Wendy Joan विलियम्स ; जुलाई 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, अभिनेत्री and author.
She hosts a syndicated टेलीविज़न talk दिखाएँ, The Wendy Williams Show.
prior to television, Williams was a `` shock jockette `` on अनेक radio shows.
Williams has gained सुर्खी for her on-air spats with celebrities.
She was the subject of the 2006 vh1 reality TV series called the Wendy Williams अनुभव which broadcast events surrounding her radio show.
वो has written an आत्मकथा and several other books, and रै निर्मित a उत्पाद लकीर called Adorn by Wendy Williams.
पैट्रिक Henry `` Treason '' speech before the House of Burgesses in an 1851 पेंटिंग by Peter F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty, or दे me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to पैट्रिक Henry from a speech he made to the वर्जिनिया Convention.
On कि day, at St. John 's Church in Richmond, Virginia, and is credited साथ having swung the संतुलन in convincing the Virginia हाउस of burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the वर्जिनिया troops to the क्रांतिकारी War.
Among the delegates to the convention were future US Presidents थामस Jefferson and George Washington.
Newfoundland and Labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
Situated in the country 's Atlantic region, it incorporates the island of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest, साथ a संयुक्त area of.
In 2011, the प्रांत 's population was 514,536.
Approximately 92 प्रतिशत of the province 's population जीवनदान on the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड ( including its associated smaller islands ), of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The प्रांत is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous, with 97.6 % of residents रिपोर्टिंग अंग्रेज़ी ( Newfoundland अंग्रेज़ी ) as their माँ tongue in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland थी also home to unique varieties of French, और आयरिश, as well as the now-extinct Beothuk language.
In labrador, लोकल dialects of Innu-aimun and Inuktitut हैं also बोला.
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest नगर, St. John 's, is कनाडा 's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी Metropolitan Area, और is home to almost 40 percent of the प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी.
st. John 's is the seat of government, home to the हाउस of Assembly of Newfoundland और labrador and the highest court in the क्षेत्राधिकार, the Newfoundland and Labrador अदालत of Appeal.
A former colony and dominion of the संयुक्त Kingdom, न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador became the tenth province to enter the Canadian Confederation on March 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
on December 6, 2001, an amendment थी बना to the संविधान of कनाडा to बदलें the province 's आधिकारिक name to Newfoundland and Labrador.
in day-to-day वार्तालाप, however, Canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as Newfoundland and to the region on the कनाडाई mainland as Labrador.
Theodore `` t.r. ''
Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; October 27, 1858—january 6, 1919 ) was the 26th President of the United States ( 1901–1909 ).
He is विख्यात for his समृद्ध personality, range of interests और achievements, और his नेतृत्व of the Progressive गति, as खूब as उसके `` काउंटी `` persona and robust masculinity.
he was a leader of the Republican Party और founder of the first incarnation of the short-lived Progressive ( `` सांड Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before becoming President, he held offices at the city, state, and federal levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, explorer, शिकारी, author, and soldier are as much a भाग of his fame as कोई दफ्तर he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old जब sworn in as President of the United States in 1901, making him the youngest president ever ; he ताल out the youngest elected president, John F. Kennedy, by only एक year.
Roosevelt was also the पहला of only तीन sitting presidents to have जीती the Nobel Peace Prize.
The Teddy भालू is नामित after him, despite उसके contempt लिये होने called `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy परिवार in नई York City, Roosevelt थी a sickly child who suffered इससे दमा and stayed at घर studying natural इतिहास.
to overcome उसके physical weakness, he embraced a strenuous life.
Home-schooled, he became an eager student of nature.
He attended Harvard University, where he studied biology, boxed and developed an interest in naval affairs.
In 1881, one साल out of हार्वर्ड, he थी निर्वाचित to the New York State Assembly, where he became a नेता of the सुधार faction of his Republican Party ( the `` gop '' ).
His The नवल युद्ध of 1812 ( 1882 ) established उसके professional reputation as a serious historian ; he wrote numerous किताबे on hunting, the outdoors, and current political मुद्दे, as well as frontier history.
in 1884, his first बीवी and his mother died on the same दिन.
he temporarily left politics and went to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to नई York City, he भागा for महापौर in 1886, finishing तीसरा with 60,000 मत.
He later gained fame by taking vigorous charge of the city police.
at the national level, he was a leader in सिविल service सुधार.
The spanish–american युद्ध broke आउट in 1898 while रूज़वेल्ट थी, effectively, running the Department of the नेवी.
He promptly resigned and formed the Rough Riders – a स्वयंसेवी cavalry रेजीमेंट that fought in Cuba.
The war hero was elected governor in 1898 and in 1900 was मनोनीत लिये vice अध्यक्ष.
He successfully सक्रिय the gop base as a अत्यधिक visible campaigner to reelect President विलियम McKinley on a platform of high tariffs, the gold standard, साम्राज्यवाद, समृद्धि at home और victory abroad.
In 1901, President विलियम mckinley was assassinated and Roosevelt became President.
he attempted to move the Republican पार्टी ( GOP ) toward Progressivism, सहित trust busting और increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a पद in his own सही in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his पूर्ववर्ती, winning the largest percentage of the popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820.
रूज़वेल्ट coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his घरेलू agenda, emphasizing कि the average citizen would मिलेंगी a fair share under उसके policies.
As an outdoorsman और naturalist, he promoted the संरक्षण गति.
On the world stage, रूज़वेल्ट 's नीतियों were characterized by उसके slogan, `` Speak softly and carry a big स्टिक ``.
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares एक or अधिक common ancestor ( s ) ( other than a parent, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or sibling of a parent/ancestor ).
however in आम parlance, `` cousin '' normally specifically means `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' और `` removals '' are प्रयुक्त in the english-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the ancestor they have in common.
विभिन्न governmental entities have स्थापित प्रणालियों लिये legal उपयोग that can more precisely specify kinships with आम ancestors मौजूदा any number of generations in the past, though common उपयोग प्रायः eliminates the degrees और removals और refers to लोगों with आम ancestry as बस `` दूर cousins '' or `` रिश्तेदारों ''.
वेबस्टर is an अमरीकी situation comedy that aired on ABC from September 16, 1983 until May 8, 1987, and in first-run अनुप्रयोग from September 21, 1987 until March 10, 1989.
The series was created by stu Silver.
The show stars emmanuel लुईस in the title role as a यंग boy who, बाद losing his parents, is adopted by his NFL -pro godfather, portrayed by Alex karras, और his नई socialite बीवी, played by सुसान Clark.
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had to adjust to their new lives and sudden parenthood, but it was the अनुकूल Webster खुद who drove much of the प्लाट.
The series थी produced by Georgian खाड़ी Ltd., Emmanuel Lewis entertainment Enterprises, Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and सर्वोपरि Television.
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes, Webster प्रदर्शित a young african-american boy adopted by a white family.
Three types of cell प्रभाग
Cell division is the process by which a जनक cell divides into दो or more daughter कोशिकाएं.
कोशिका division usually occurs as part of a larger कोशिका cycle.
In eukaryotes, वहीँ are two distinct प्रकार of cell division : a vegetative division, whereby each daughter cell is genetically identical to the जनक cell ( mitosis ), and a reductive cell division, whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is घटाया by half, to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these कोशिका division cycles are जरूरी in sexually reproducing जीवों at some point in उनके life साईकिल, and both are believed to be present in the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as शब्दकोष परिवर्द्धन, where their जेनेटिक सामग्री is segregated बराबर into two daughter cells.
All cell divisions, regardless of organism, are preceded by a single round of DNA replication.
For सरल एककोशिकीय organisms such as the amoeba, एक cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an संपूर्ण नई सजीव is created.
On a larger scale, mitotic cell division can create progeny इससे multicellular organisms, such as plants कि grow from cuttings.
Cell प्रभाग also enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division इससे गैमीट.
और after growth, कोशिका division allows for continual निर्माण and मरम्मत of the organism.
a human being 's देह अनुभवों about 10,000 trillion cell divisions in a lifetime.
Cell division has been modeled by finite subdivision नियम.
the प्राथमिक concern of कोशिका division is the मेंटेनेंस of the original cell 's genome.
पहले division can occur, the genomic information that is stored in chromosomes जरूर be replicated, और the duplicated genome must be अलग cleanly between कोशिकाएं.
a great deal of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information सतत between `` generations ''.

Howard Jones ( born John Howard जोन्स, 23 February 1955, Southampton, हैम्पशायर, England ) is a British musician, सिंगर and songwriter.
According to the Guinness Book of अंग्रेजों hit singles & Albums, `` Jones is an accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with उसके brand of synthpop.
जोन्स, who was equally popular in the U.S., appeared at Live सहायता ``.
Allmusic journalist, Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds, `` Jones was one of the defining आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop.
His म्यूज़िक merged the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive sound of New वेव साथ the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop.
Jones racked up a स्ट्रिंग of hits in the mid और late 1980s, before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
The International Isle of man TT ( Tourist ट्रॉफी ) Race is a motorcycle रेसिंग इवेंट held on the Isle of man and was for many सालो the सबसे prestigious मोटरसाइकिल रेस in the world.
The event थी part of the FIM मोटरसाइकिल Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 before being transferred to the United किंगडम after safety concerns and run by the fim as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season.
The आइल of man tt Races became भाग of the TT Formula 1 Championship इससे 1977 to 1990 to बचाना the इवेंट 's racing औकात.
इससे 1989 the रेसिंग has महरूम developed by the Isle of man Department of Tourism as the आइल of Man TT Festival.
The रेस is चलाएं in a time-trial format on public roads बंद for racing by the प्रावधानों of an Act of Tynwald ( the पार्लियामेंट of the Isle of Man ).
the first race थी held on मंगलवार 28 May 1907 और was called the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Auto-Cycle पर्यटक Trophy.
The event थी organised by the Auto-Cycle क्लबों over 10 गोद of the St जॉन 's Short Course of 15 मील 1,470 yards for road-legal touring मोटरसाइकिल साथ exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals and mud-guards.
The winner of the single-cylinder class, और overall winner of the first event in 1907, थी Charlie Collier riding a matchless motorcycle in a time of 4 घंटों, 8 minutes and 8 सेकेंड at an average race speed of 38.21 mph.
The विजेता of the twin-cylinder क्लास थी Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a समय of 4 hours 21 मिनट्स और 52 सेकेंड at an average race speed of 36.21 किमी.
The trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the विजेता of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race, was donated by the बिल्ले de Mouzilly St. Mars.
It प्रदर्शित a stylised संस्करण of ओलम्पिक परमेश्वर Hermes by Giovanni da बोलोग्ना as a चांदी figurine astride a winged wheel.
the ट्रॉफी was समान in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy प्रस्तुत to John Napier ( arrol-johnston ) as the inaugural winner of the आइल of Man पर्यटक Trophy car रेस in 1905 now known as the rac Tourist Trophy.
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars ट्रॉफी is अभी presented annually to the winner of the Isle of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man tt was the Centenary event which भागा between 26 may और 8 June 2007 and प्रदर्शित a special Re-enactment of the 1907 Isle of Man TT रेस held on the गाँव ग्रीन next to tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007.
The vintage parade of 100 क्लासिक motorcycles लिये the centenary Re-enactment on the original St जॉन 's छोटी Course was flagged away by former संसार Motor-Cycle चैंपियन ज्यॉफ Duke.
The पहला of the participants to be flagged दूर was the recently restored twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the first Isle of man TT Race in 1907.
भी participating in the 2007 Re-enactment थी TT race competitor guy मार्टिन सवारी a 1938 Triumph बाघ 100 500 cc and other पूर्व TT प्रतिस्पर्धी including Alan Cathcart, सैमी मिलर, Nick jefferies and मिक ग्रान्ट भी completed the Re-enactment गोद.

Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs when लोगों are without work और actively seeking कार्य.
The unemployment rate is a measure of the व्यापकता of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force.
During अवधि of recession, an economy usually अनुभवों a अपेक्षाकृत high बेरोजगारी रेट.
According to International Labour Organization report, more than 197 million people globally are out of work or 6 % of the world 's workforce were without a job in 2012.
वहीँ remains considerable theoretical debate regarding the कल्याणकारी, consequences and समाधान लिये unemployment.
Classical अर्थशास्त्र, New शास्त्रीय economics, and the Austrian स्कूल of economics argue कि market mechanisms हैं reliable अर्थात् of resolving unemployment.
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the मजदूर मार्केट इससे the outside, ऐसे as unionization, minimum wage laws, taxes, and other regulations that they claim discourage the hiring of workers.
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment और recommends सरकारी interventions in the economy that it दावा होगा reduce unemployment during recessions.
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks कि suddenly reduce कुल demand for goods and services and thus reduce demand for workers.
keynesian models सुझाएँ government interventions designed to बढ़ाएँ माँग for workers ; these can include वित्तीय stimuli, सरेआम वित्तपोषित job सृष्टि, and expansionist मौद्रिक policies.
In addition to these comprehensive theories of बेरोजगारी, वहीँ are a few categorizations of unemployment that हैं used to more precisely मॉडल the effects of unemployment within the economic प्रणाली.
The प्रमुख types of बेरोजगारी include structural बेरोजगारी which focuses on structural problems in the अर्थव्यवस्था और inefficiencies inherent in श्रमिक बाज़ार, including a mismatch between the supply और demand of laborers with जरुरी skill sets.
Structural arguments emphasize causes and solutions सम्बन्धित to disruptive technologies and वैश्वीकरण.
Discussions of frictional unemployment focus on voluntary decisions to work based on each individuals ' valuation of उनके own work and कैसा that compares to current wage rates plus the time and प्रयत्न required to find a job.
कल्याणकारी and समाधान for frictional unemployment प्रायः address job entry दहलीज and wage दरों.
behavioral अर्थशास्त्रियों हाइलाइट individual biases in निर्णय बनाना, and often involve problems and समाधान concerning sticky wages and दक्षता wages.
collectivism is any philosophic, political, धार्मिक, economic, or social outlook that emphasizes the interdependence of every human being in a society or civilization.
Collectivism is a basic cultural तत्व कि exists as the reverse of व्यक्तिगत in human प्रकृति ( in the same रास्ता high कॉन्टेक्स्ट culture exists as the reverse of कम कॉन्टेक्स्ट culture ).
Collectivist orientations तनाव the महत्व of cohesion within social groups ( ऐसे as an `` in-group '', in कया विशिष्ट context it is defined ) and in some मामले, the प्रधानता of group goals over individual goals.
collectivists प्रायः फ़ोकस on जातियाँ, society, nation or country.
It रै been प्रयुक्त as an तत्व in many अलग and diverse types of government and राजनैतिक, आर्थिक and शैक्षणिक तत्त्वज्ञान throughout इतिहास and most human समाजों in अभ्यास contain elements of both individualism and collectivism.
कुछ उदाहरण of collectivist cultures include India and Japan.
collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism और vertical collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals, and is यूँ usually आधारित on decentralization and egalitarianism.
लंबवत collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power और on moral and cultural conformity, और is therefore based on centralization and hierarchy.
a सहकारी एंटरप्राइज़ होता be an example of horizontal collectivism, whereas a military hierarchy would be an example of vertical collectivism.
अधि disseminated encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an immune mediated disease of the दिमाग.
it प्रायः occurs following a viral संक्रमण but may appear following टीकाकरण, bacterial or parasitic infection, or even appear spontaneously.
As it involves असंक्राम्य demyelination, it is similar to अनेक sclerosis, and is considered part of the Multiple sclerosis borderline रोगों.
The incidence rate is about 8 per 1,000,000 लोगों per year.
Although it occurs in all आयु, सबसे reported cases are in children and adolescents, with the average आयु around 5 to 8 years बूढ़ा.
The mortality रेट may be as high as 5 %, full recovery is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases, जबकि up to 70 to 90 % recover साथ some minor residual disability.
The average time to recover is one to six महीने.
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the brain and spinal cord, particularly in the white matter.
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white पदार्थ and cortical gray-white जंक्शन of दोनो cerebral hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, और spinal cord, लकिन periventricular white matter and gray matter of the cortex, thalami and basal ganglia may also be शामिल.
जब the रोगी suffers more than एक demyelinating episode, it is called तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( mdem ).
The पेट is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the digestion system which functions as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive tract in some animals, including vertebrates, echinoderms, कीट ( mid-gut ), and molluscs.
It is involved in the second phase of digestion, following mastication ( चबाने ).
The stomach is located between the esophagus और the small intestine.
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes पुकारा protease और दमदार acids to सहायता in खाना digestion, ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through चिकना muscular contortions ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines.
the word stomach is derived इससे the Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately इससे stoma ( ), `` mouth ''.
The words gastro- and gastric ( meaning related to the stomach ) are both निकला from the यूनानी शब्द gaster ( ).
1940 Pontiac Special Series 25 Woodie
A woodie is a car देह स्टाइल, विशेषकर a स्टेशन wagon, where the rear bodywork is constructed of wood फ्रेमवर्क with infill panels of लकडी or painted मेटल.
बाद the निधन of actual wood निर्माण, manufacturers used simulated woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional, simulated framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, wood construction was evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex साथ a series of side और पश्च आड़ा grooves.
A pearl is a hard object produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc.
Just like the shell of a clam, a pearl is बना up of calcium carbonate in minute crystalline form, which has been deposited in केंद्रिय layers.
the ideal pearl is perfectly round and smooth, but अनेक other shapes of pearls ( baroque pearls ) occur.
the finest विशेषता natural मोती have been highly valued as रत्नों और objects of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक centuries, and because of this, the word पर्ल has become a रूपक लिये something very rare, ठीक, admirable, and मूल्यवान.
The most valuable pearls occur spontaneously in the wild, but they are extremely rare.
These जंगली pearls हैं referred to as natural pearls.
Cultured or farmed मोती इससे पर्ल oysters and freshwater mussels मेक up the majority of those that हैं currently sold.
Imitation pearls are also widely बेची in inexpensive jewelry, लकिन the quality of their iridescence is usually बहुत poor, and often, artificial pearls are easily विशिष्ट from genuine मोती.
मोती have महरूम harvested and cultivated primarily for use in jewelry, लकिन in the पास्ट they were also stitched onto lavish clothing.
मोती have also महरूम crushed and प्रयुक्त in cosmetics, दवाइयाँ, and in paint formulations.
Whether wild or cultured, gem quality मोती are almost सदा nacreous and, as is the interior of the shell that produces them.
However, लगभग सब प्रजाति of shelled molluscs are capable of producing pearls ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by कुछ sources ) of lesser चमक or less spherical shape.
Although these may भी be legitimately referred to as `` मोती '' by gemological labs and भी अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय Trade Commission नियम, and are formed in the same रास्ता, most of them have no value, except as curiosities.
Bing ( ज्ञात previously as सजीव ढूंढें, Windows Live Search, और एमएसएन Search ) is a web ढूंढें engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) इससे Microsoft.
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer on May 28, 2009 at the All बाते Digital सम्मेलन in San Diego for release on जून 1.
notable changes शामिल the listing of search सुझाव जबकि queries are entered and a list of related searches ( पुकारा `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology इससे Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
on July 29, 2009, Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced a deal in जिससे bing would power Yahoo ! Search.
All Yahoo ! ढूंढें global customers और साझेदार are expected to have made the transition by जल्दी 2012.
In October 2011, bing announced it was working on new back-end search infrastructure, with the goal of delivering faster और थोड़ा more relevant search results for users.
Known as `` बाघ '', the new index-serving technology has महरूम incorporated into bing globally, since August 2011.
In May 2012, Bing घोषित another redesign of its ढूंढें engine that includes `` साइडबार '', a social विशेषता कि खोज उपयोक्ता ' social संजाल लिये information relevant to the search query.
A आरेख showing an I गठन on offense and a 4-3 गठन on defense
in अमरीकी football, each team has ग्यारह players on the field at one time.
The specific role that a player takes on the field is called उनके स्थिति.
अंतर्गत the आधुनिक rules of अमरीकी football, टीमों are allowed असीमित subsititutions, कि is teams may बदलें any क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the team with the बॉल, who is trying to स्कोर ), the रक्षा ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking परिस्थितियों ).
Within those platoons, विभिन्न विशिष्ट positions exist depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Irish people ( or na héireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : airish fowk ) हैं an ethnic group जो originate in आयरलैंड, an island in northwestern यूरोपीय.
Ireland has been populated for around 9,000 years ( according to पुरातत्व studies, see Prehistoric Ireland ).
the Irish people 's earliest ancestors are अंकित in legends – वे are claimed to be descended from groups ऐसे as the nemedians, Fomorians, Fir bolg, Tuatha dé Danann and the milesians.
Lebor Gabála Érenn, a book of Irish mythology tells that Milesians were स्काइथियन descendants.
the main groups that interacted with the आयरिश in the Middle आयु include the Picts, Scots, और the Vikings.
Due to this contact, icelanders हैं noted लिये having कुछ Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the ऊँची Middle Ages, the English plantations and the subsequent English rule of the country introduced the Normans और Flemish into Ireland.
Welsh, Picts, Bretons, and छोटी पार्टियों of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons are known in Ireland from much earlier टाइम्स.
There have been many notable Irish people throughout history.
the 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as एक of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '', followed by Kilian of Würzburg और Vergilius of Salzburg.
The scientist रॉबर्ट बॉयल is माना the `` father of रसायन ``.
Famous Irish explorers include Brendan the Navigator, Robert McClure, Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean.
By कुछ खाते, the पहला यूरोपीय child born in North America had Irish descent on both sides ; और an Irishman was the first European to set पैर on अमरीकी soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There हैं वंशजों of Irish लोगों जीना in अनेक पश्चिमी countries, particularly in English-speaking countries.
Historically, करणों रै been caused by politics, अकाल and आर्थिक issues.
An estimated 50 to 80 million लोगों are descendants of Irish people, primarily in the United Kingdom, the United States, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Canada and Iceland ; there are also smaller numbers in अर्जेंटीना, Chile, Mexico, जमैका, Barbados, South Africa, New Zealand, France, Germany and Brazil.
The largest क्रमांक of descendants of Irish people live in the United States.
The क्रमांक of people living in Australia who are of Irish descent is higher, as a percentage of total population, than that of any अन्य country.
Approximately forty percent of the settlement population of Iceland came from आयरलैंड or स्कॉटलैंड.
The very first inhabitants of Iceland यहूद Irish.
the हबल Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space दूरदर्शी कि थी carried into orbit by a Space Shuttle in 1990 and remains in आपरेशन.
A एपर्चर telescope in low Earth orbit, हबल 's four main instruments observe in the निकट ultraviolet, visible, and near infrared.
The दूरदर्शी is named after the astronomer Edwin Hubble.
Hubble 's orbit बाहर the distortion of धरती 's माहौल allows it to take अत्यधिक sharp images with almost no background लाइट.
Hubble 's Deep Field have been कुछ of the most detailed visible-light images ever, allowing a गहन दृश्य into स्पेस and time.
अनेक हबल observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics, ऐसे as accurately determining the रेट of expansion of the universe.
हालांकि not the first space telescope, Hubble is one of the largest और most versatile, और is well known as both a vital research tool और a public relations बून लिये astronomy.
The HST थी निर्मित by the United States space agency NASA, with contributions from the European Space Agency, and is operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute.
The hst is one of NASA 's Great Observatories, along with the Compton गामा रे Observatory, the चन्द्रा x-ray Observatory, and the Spitzer Space Telescope.
Space telescopes were proposed as early as 1923.
Hubble was funded in the 1970s, with a proposed launch in 1983, but the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by technical delays, budget problems, and the Challenger disaster.
When finally launched in 1990, scientists मिला that the main mirror had been ground incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's capabilities.
The दूरदर्शी was restored to इसके intended quality by a सर्विसिंग मिशन in 1993.
Hubble is the only telescope designed to be serviced in स्पेस by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, चार मिशन repaired, upgraded, and replaced systems on the telescope ; a fifth mission was रद्द on safety grounds following the Columbia विपत्ति.
However, after spirited पब्लिक discussion, NASA व्यवस्थापक माइक Griffin approved one final सर्विसिंग mission, completed in 2009 by स्पेस Shuttle Atlantis.
The telescope is अभी expected to फलन until at least 2013.
Its scientific successor, the जेम्स Webb Space Telescope ( jwst ), is to be launched in 2018 or possibly बाद.
Anti-inflammatory refers to the प्रॉपर्टी of a substance or treatment कि reduces inflammation.
anti-inflammatory दवाएँ make up परिचय हाफ of analgesics, remedying पीड़ा by reducing सूजन as opposed to opioids, which affect the central बेचैन system.
the tonight Show is a us late-night talk show that has aired on एनबीसी since 1954.
it is the longest currently running regularly अनुसूचित entertainment program in the US and the तीसरा longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद Meet the दबायें and आज.

Several guest hosts also appeared, विशेषकर during the Paar and Carson eras.
