ss एंड्रिया Doria.
सुनाया was an ocean लाइनर for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia ) home ported in Genoa, इटली, most प्रसिद्ध for its डूब in 1956, when 52 लोगों died ( 51 from तात्कालिक impact ).
Named बाद the 16th-century genoese admiral Andrea Doria, the ship had a gross पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 and a capacity of about 1,200 यात्री and 500 क्रू.
For a country attempting to rebuild its अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा बाद World War II, Andrea डोरिया was an icon of Italian नेशनल pride.
Of सब Italy 's जहाजों at the time, एंड्रिया डोरिया was the largest, fastest and माना safest.
Launched on 16 जून 1951, the ship undertook its maiden voyage on 14 जनवरी 1953.
On 25 July 1956, जबकि the Andrea Doria थी approaching the coast of nantucket, Massachusetts, bound लिये New York City, the eastbound of the Swedish American Line collided साथ it in कया became one of इतिहास 's most infamous maritime disasters.
Struck in the side, the top-heavy एंड्रिया डोरिया immediately प्रारंभ to list severely to starboard, which left half of its lifeboats unusable.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant घाटा of जीवन, but the दक्षता of the ship 's technical design अनुमत it to stay afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming.
the good behavior of the crew, improvements in communications and the रैपिड response of अन्य ships averted a विपत्ति समान in scale to that of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued और survived, while 46 लोगों died as a consequence of the collision.
the evacuated लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized और sank the following morning.
This accident remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in United राज्य waters since the डूब of the in 1915.
The incident and its aftermath were heavily covered by the news मीडिया.
जबकि the rescue efforts were both successful and commendable, the cause of the टक्कर with the Stockholm and the loss of Andrea डोरिया generated much interest in the media और many lawsuits.
largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between the two shipping कंपनियाँ during hearings immediately after the disaster, no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published.
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the इतालवी liner, more recent discoveries have indicated that a misreading of radar on the Swedish ship may have initiated the टक्कर कोर्स, leading to errors on both ships.
Andrea डोरिया was the पिछला प्रमुख transatlantic यात्री vessel to डूबना before aircraft became the preferred method of travel.
Dialysis tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable झिल्ली tubing made इससे regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used लिये diffusion with solutes or osmosis if प्रयुक्त with water only.
Osmosis is when water passes through a semi-permeable परत to पहुँचें equilibrium.
Diffusion, on the अन्य hand, allows the movement of molecules from ऊँची concentration to low विशेषज्ञता.
it will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable membrane or layer if the अणु is small enough to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore.
This usually परिणाम with the effects of diffusion through a membrane only वाकई affects small अणुओं, और almost never larger molecules.
डायलिसिस tubing is used in clinical हालातों to ensure a filtered प्रवाह of molecules, preventing the flow of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` washed '' आउट of a solution which is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent, usually water, which surrounds it और in which वे can be flushed away.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a solution containing अनेक types of molecules, usually ग्लूकोज and starch, is placed into a semi-permeable डायलिसिस bag, such as a cellulose membrane with pores, and the bag is sealed with a गांठ or elastic band.
The sealed डायलिसिस bag is लगाई in a संग्राहक of a अलग solution, or water.
Molecules छोटी enough to pass through the tubing ( water, salts, monosaccharides, and other small अणुओं ) tend to move into or out of the dialysis bag in the direction of decreasing concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
larger molecules ( ऐसे as प्रोटीन, or polysaccharides ) that have dimensions significantly greater than the pore diameter हैं retained inside the डायलिसिस bag.
The water और smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a समाधान that has a lesser solute concentration than the समाधान it is referenced to ) will क्रॉस a semi-permeable झिल्ली, जैसे डायलिसिस tubing, into a hypertonic solution ( a solution that रै a higher solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is referenced to ) in an attempt to पहुँचें संतुलन, जहाँ the solute विशेषज्ञता of each समाधान is in संतुलन.
Mercury प्रयोगशाला thermometer
A thermometer ( इससे the Greek, thermos, meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον, metron, `` माप '' ) is a device that measures temperature or temperature gradient using a variety of different सिद्धान्त.
A थर्मामीटर has two महत्वपूर्ण elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g. the bulb on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे some शारीरिक change occurs with temperature, plus some अर्थात् of converting इस शारीरिक change into a numerical मान ( e.g. the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ).
There are many types and अनेक uses for thermometers, as detailed below in sections of this article.
हिम श्वेत और the Seven dwarfs is a 1937 American एनिमेटेड musical fantasy film उत्पादित by वॉल्ट Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures.
आधारित on the German fairy टेल by the भाइयो Grimm, it is the first full-length cel animated feature film और the earliest in the वॉल्ट Disney Animated Classics series.
The story was adapted by storyboard कलाकारों Dorothy ऐन Blank, रिचर्ड Creedon, Merrill De Maris, ओटो englander, Earl Hurd, Dick rickard, Ted सियर्स और webb स्मिथ.
दाउद हाथ was the supervising निदेशक, while William Cottrell, विल्फ्रेड Jackson, Larry Morey, Perce Pearce, and Ben sharpsteen निर्देशित the film 's individual sequences.
हिम White premiered at the carthay Circle Theatre on December 21, 1937, followed by a nationwide release on फ़रवरी 4, 1938, और with international earnings of $ 8 लाख during its initial release briefly assumed the रिकार्ड of highest grossing sound film at the time.
The popularity of the फिल्मी has led to it being re-released theatrically many times, until its home video रिलीज in the 1990s.
Adjusted for inflation, it is एक of the top ten performers at the North American बक्सा दफ्तर.
At the 11th Academy पुरस्कार, Walt डिज़्नी was awarded an मानद Oscar, और the फिल्मी was मनोनीत for बेहतरीन Musical Score.
It was added to the United राज्य National Film रजिस्ट्री in 1989 and is क्रमित in the American फिल्मी Institute 's सूची of the 100 महानतम American films, who भी नामित the फिल्मी as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008.
डिज़्नी 's take on the fairy tale has had a बिग cultural impact, resulting in a popular theme park attraction, a video game, and a Broadway musical.
प्रसव, labour, डिलीवरी, birth, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a pregnancy period with the expulsion of one or अधिक newborn infants इससे a woman 's uterus.
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the cervix, descent and birth of the शिशु, और birth of the placenta.
In many cases and with increasing frequency, childbirth is achieved through induction of labor or caesarean section, which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in the उदर, बल्कि than through vaginal birth.
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. इससे 1996 to 2006, and comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada.
साथ आदर to induced labor, more than 22 % of women undergo induction of labour in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Medical professional नीति makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be नुकसानदेह to the fetus and neonate as well as harmful or बगैर benefit to the mother, and have established strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean पहले 39 सप्ताह.

the Atlanta Braves are a professional baseball team based in Atlanta.
the Braves are a member of the पूर्वी Division of Major League बेसबॉल 's National League.
The Braves have played in टर्नर फ़ील्ड since 1997.
the `` Braves '' name, which was first used in 1912, originates इससे a पद for a देशी अमरीकी warrior.
They are nicknamed `` the bravos '', and often referred to as `` अमेरिका 's Team `` in सन्दर्भ to the team 's खेल being ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ TBS from the 1970s until 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
इससे 1991 to 2005 the braves यहूद one of the most कामयाब franchises in baseball, winning division शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 consecutive times in that काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 ऋतु in which there यहूद no official division champions ).
The braves जीती the NL वेस्ट 1991–93 and the NL ईस्ट 1995–2005, और returned to the playoffs as the National League Wild कार्ड in 2010.
the Braves advanced to the संसार श्रेणी पाँच times in the 1990s, जीतना the शीर्षक in 1995.
चूंकि उनके debut in the National League in 1876, the franchise रै won 16 divisional शीर्षक, 17 National लीग pennants, as well as three World श्रेणी championships—in 1914 as the बोस्टन braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves, and in 1995 in अटलांटा.
The braves are the only MLB मताधिकार to have won the World श्रेणी in three अलग home cities.
The क्लबों is one of the National लीग 's दो remaining चार्टर franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and थी founded in बोस्टन, Massachusetts, in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( नहीं to be उलझन with the अमरीकी League 's Boston Red sox ).
They are माना `` the oldest continuously playing team in प्रमुख उत्तर American sports. ''
There is an argument as to जो is दरअसल older because although the शावक are a पूरा season `` पुरानी '' ( formed as the शिकागो White Stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो lost two seasons to the Great शिकागो आग, thus the Braves have played अधिक consecutive seasons.
After विभिन्न name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters ), the team संचालित as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century.
in 1953, the टोली moved to मिल्वौकी, Wisconsin and became the Milwaukee braves, followed by the move to Atlanta in 1966.
The team 's कार्यकाल in अटलांटा is famous for Hank Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's career घर चलाएं record in 1974, though the बहुमत of Aaron 's home रनों were hit जबकि the team was in Milwaukee.
His रिकार्ड stood until 2007, जब San Francisco left क्षेत्ररक्षक Barry Bonds broke the रिकार्ड.
The पत्ते of a Beech tree
3D रेंडरिंग of a μCT स्कैन of a leaf piece, resolution circa 40 μm/ voxel.
A पत्ता is an अंग of a vascular संयंत्र, as defined in botanical terms, and in particular in plant morphology.
Foliage is a mass संज्ञा that refers to leaves as a feature of पौधे.
typically a leaf is a पतला, flattened अंग borne above मैदान और specialized for photosynthesis, but अनेक types of पत्ते are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : कुछ are not flat ( लिये example अनेक succulent पत्ते and conifers ), some are not above ground ( ऐसे as bulb scales ), और कुछ are without major photosynthetic function ( consider for उदाहरण cataphylls, spines, and cotyledons ).
conversely, many structures of non-vascular plants, or even of some lichens, जिससे are नहीं plants at all ( in the sense of होने members of the kingdom Plantae ), do look and function much जैसे leaves.
furthermore, several structures found in vascular plants look like पत्ते but are not actually पत्ते ; वे differ इससे पत्ते in their structures और origins.
उदाहरण शामिल phyllodes, cladodes, and phylloclades.
Title कार्ड for the 1937 हमारी गिरोह comedy Rushin ' बैले.
Our Gang ( also known as The Little Rascals or एचएएल रोच 's दुष्टों ) are a series of American comedy short films about a group of ग़रीब पड़ोस children और उनके adventures.
Created by comedy निर्माता एचएएल Roach, the series is विख्यात for showing children behaving in a relatively natural रास्ता, as रोच and original director Robert F. mcgowan worked to film the unaffected, कच्चा nuances apparent in regular children rather than have उन्हें imitate वयस्क एक्टिंग styles.
In जोड, Our Gang notably put boys, girls, whites and अश्वेतों साथ in a group as बराबरी, something that `` broke नई ground, '' according to फिल्मी historian Leonard Maltin.
Such a thing had never महरूम done पहले in सिनेमा लकिन has since been repeated after the success of Our गिरोह.
The first production at the Roach studio in 1922 was a श्रेणी of silent short subjects.
When Roach changed distributors from pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM ) in 1927, and converted the series to sound in 1929, the series took बंद भी further.
उत्पादन continued at the रोच स्टुडियो जबतक 1938, when the श्रेणी was sold to mgm, who then continued producing the comedies until 1944.
The हमारी Gang series शामिल a total of 220 shorts and one feature फिल्मी, General Spanky, featuring over forty-one child actors.
As MGM retained the rights to the Our गिरोह ट्रेडमार्क following their खरीदें of the production rights, the 80 Roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated for television under the title The छोटी Rascals शुरूआत in 1955.
दोनो Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now स्वामित्व by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's हमारी गिरोह package ( now owned by Warner Bros. Entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in syndication, with आवधिक new प्रोडक्शन्स आधारित on the shorts surfacing over the years, including a 1994 छोटी दुष्टों feature फिल्मी released by सार्वभौमिक तस्वीरें.
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias Jansen or Sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from middelburg associated with the आविष्कार of the first optical दूरदर्शी.
Janssen is sometimes also credited लिये inventing the पहला truly compound microscope.
However, the origin of the microscope, just like the origin of the दूरदर्शी, is a matter of बहस.
Lake tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater झील in the Sierra Nevada of the United राज्य.
At a surface उन्नयन of, it is located साथ the border between California और Nevada, west of Carson नगर.
झील Tahoe is the largest अल्पाइन झील in उत्तर America.
Its depth is, बनाना it the United State 's second-deepest ( the deepest is Crater Lake in ऑरेगॉन, होने deeper, at ).
Additionally, Lake Tahoe is listed as the 26th largest lake by आवाज़ in the संसार at.
the lake was formed about 2 million years ago and is a भाग of the झील tahoe जलाशय with the modern lake being तराशा during the ice ages.
it is known लिये the स्पष्टता of इसके water और the परिदृश्य of surrounding mountains on all पहलू.
The area surrounding the झील is भी referred to as झील tahoe, or बस Tahoe.
झील Tahoe is a major tourist attraction in दोनो Nevada and California.
It is घर to a क्रमांक of स्की resorts, गर्मियाँ outdoor मनोरंजन, और tourist attractions.
Snow और skiing are a significant part of the area 's economy and reputation.
Mountain and lake scenery हैं attractions throughout the साल.
The नेवाडा पक्ष also includes विशाल कसीनो.
राजमार्गों provide year-round access from Reno, Carson City, and Sacramento.

The Twenty-seventh amendment ( Amendment xxvii ) prohibits any law कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of सदस्यों of the कॉंग्रेस from taking effect until the प्रारंभ of the next set of शर्तें of दफ्तर for Representatives.
It is the सबसे recent amendment to the United राज्य संविधान.
It was submitted to the states लिये अनुसमर्थन in 1789 और थी adopted in 1992.
“First they came... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin Niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) परिचय the sloth of German intellectuals following the Nazis ' rise to power and the subsequent purging of their chosen targets, group after group.
वहीँ is कुछ असहमति over the exact wording of the quotation और when it थी created ; the content of the quotation may have been presented differently by Niemöller on different अवसरों.

Four Thirds लोगो
The चार तिहाई system is a standard created by ओलम्पस and Kodak for digital single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) design और development. < संदर्भ name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
the प्रणाली provides a standard that, with digital cameras and lenses available इससे multiple manufacturers, allows for the इंटरचेंज of lenses और लाशें from अलग manufacturers.
seems to cover the standard.
Proponents describe it as an open standard, but कंपनियाँ may only use it under a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
नापसंद older SLR systems, Four तिहाई रै been designed from the ground up to be entirely digital.
Many lenses are extensively computerized, to the point कि Olympus offers firmware अद्यतन लिये many of उन्हें.
लेंस design has been tailored to the requirements of डिजिटल sensors, most notably through telecentric designs.
the आकार of the सेंसर is significantly छोटी than for most DSLRs और this implies that lenses, विशेषकर telephoto lenses, can be smaller.
For उदाहरण, a Four Thirds lens साथ a 300 mm focal लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the same कोण of view as a 600 mm फोकल length lens for the 35 mm film standard, and is correspondingly अधिक compact.
यूँ, the Four तिहाई प्रणाली रै crop factor ( फोकल लंबाई multiplier ) of about 2, and while this enables longer focal length लिये greater magnification, it does n't aid the manufacture of wide angle lenses.
The चित्र sensor format, generally इंटरमीडिएट between those of larger slrs and छोटी compact कैमरे, generally देता स्तर of cost, performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes.
hvac systems use ventilation air ducts installed throughout a building to supply conditioned air to a room through outlet vents, called diffusers ; and ducts to remove एयर through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air कंडीशनिंग ) is the technology of अंदर और ऑटोमोटिव environmental comfort.
hvac प्रणाली डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the सिद्धान्त of thermodynamics, द्रव mechanics, and heat transfer.
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & r or hvacr, or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( such as the नामांकन of hacr-rated सर्किट ब्रेकर्स ).
HVAC is important in the design of medium to large industrial and दफ्तर buildings such as skyscrapers and in समुद्री environments ऐसे as aquariums, where सुरक्षित और healthy building शर्तें are regulated with respect to temperature and आर्द्रता, using fresh air from outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught प्रणाली, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, और air conditioning is based on inventions और discoveries made by निकोलय Lvov, Michael Faraday, Willis Carrier, Reuben Trane, James Joule, William rankine, Sadi Carnot, and अनेक अन्य.
the आविष्कार of the components of hvac systems गई hand-in-hand with the औद्योगिक revolution, and new methods of modernization, higher दक्षता, और प्रणाली कंट्रोल are constantly introduced by कंपनियाँ और आविष्कारक worldwide.
The तीन central कृत्यों of हीटिंग, ventilating, and air-conditioning are interrelated, especially with the need to provide thermal सुकून and acceptable indoor air quality within reasonable installation, आपरेशन, and मेंटेनेंस costs.
HVAC systems can provide ventilation, reduce एयर घुसपैठ, और maintain pressure relationships between spaces.
The means of air delivery और removal from स्पेसेस is known as रूम air वितरण.
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both लिये cooling और heating depends on the exterior जलवायु और interior specified conditions.
However पहले लेने up the heat load calculation, it is जरुरी to find fresh एयर requirements for each क्षेत्रफल in detail, as pressurization is an महत्वपूर्ण consideration.
In आधुनिक buildings the design, installation, और कंट्रोल प्रणालियों of these functions are एकीकृत into one or more hvac systems.
लिये very small buildings, contractors normally क्षमता engineer and select HVAC systems और उपकरण.
For larger buildings, building सेवाएं designers और engineers, such as mechanical, architectural, or building सेवाएं engineers analyze, डिज़ाइन, और specify the hvac systems, and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them.
Building permits और code-compliance inspections of the installations are सामान्यतः required for all sizes of buildings.
The hvac industry is a worldwide enterprise, साथ भूमिकाएँ सहित आपरेशन और maintenance, system डिज़ाइन and निर्माण, equipment manufacturing और sales, और in education और शोध.
The HVAC industry थी historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment, but regulating and मानकों organizations such as HARDI, ASHRAE, SMACNA, ACCA, वर्दी mechanical Code, International mechanical Code, and AMCA have been स्थापित to support the industry और encourage ऊँची मानकों and उपलब्धि.
Royal नेवी कमांडर James Bond, CMG, RNVR, is a fictional character निर्मित by अंग्रेजों journalist and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
He is the protagonist of the जेम्स Bond श्रेणी of novels, films, कॉमिक्स and video खेल.
Fleming लिखा बारह Bond novels और two छोटी story collections before his death, although the last दो books— The Man with the Golden Gun और octopussy और The Living Daylights —were published posthumously.
The बंध character is a रहस्य सेवा agent, code number 007, residing in London but क्रियाशील internationally.
Bond थी a कम्पोजिट अक्षर who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew during उसके service in the Naval Intelligence Division during संसार War ii, to whom Fleming added his अपना style और a क्रमांक of his own tastes ; Bond 's नाम was appropriated इससे American ornithologist James Bond.
Bond has a number of character traits which चलाएं throughout the किताबे, including an enjoyment of cars, a love of food and पेय, और an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a दिन.
चूंकि Fleming 's death in 1964, there have been अन्य authorised writers of बंध material, including John Gardner, जो लिखा fourteen novels and two novelizations और Raymond बेंसन, who wrote six novels, three novelizations and तीन छोटी stories.
वहीँ have भी महरूम three authors who wrote one किताब प्रत्येक, किंग्सले एमिस ( writing as रॉबर्ट markham ), Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver.
additionally a series of novels based on बंध 's youth— Young बंध —was written by Charlie Higson.
as spin-offs from the साहित्यिक works, there was a television अनुकूलन of the पहला novel, Casino Royale, in which बंध was played as an American agent.
A कॉमिक strip series also ran in the Daily Express समाचारपत्र.
वहीँ have also been twenty-five Bond films ; seven अभिनेताओं have निभाई बंध in ये films.
`` Nature Boy '' is a song by Eden Ahbez, published in 1947.

louisiana ( or ;, ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a state located in the southern region of the United States of America.
Louisiana is the 31st most extensive and the 25th most populous of the 50 United राज्य.
इसके पूंजी is baton रूज and largest city is New ऑरलियन्स.
Louisiana is the तभी state in the U.S. साथ राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes, जिससे are लोकल government 's समतुल्य to काउंटी.
The largest parish by population is East Baton रूज Parish, and the largest by land area is Cameron Parish.
Much of the state 's lands यहूद formed इससे sediment washed down the Mississippi River, leaving enormous deltas and विशाल areas of coastal दलदल और swamp.
These contain a rich southern biota ; typical examples शामिल पक्षियों such as ibis and egrets.
वहीँ are भी many species of पेड़ frogs, and मछली such as sturgeon and paddlefish.
In more elevated areas, आग is a natural process in the landscape, और has उत्पादित extensive क्षेत्रों of longleaf पाइन वन and गीला savannas.
ये support an exceptionally विशाल number of संयंत्र species, including many species of orchids and carnivorous plants.
Some Louisiana शहरी environments have a multicultural, multilingual विरासत, being so strongly बहकावे by an जिसमें of 18th-century French, Spanish, Native American ( Indian ) and African संस्कृतियों that they are माना to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
पहले the अमरीकी purchase of the territory, the वर्तमान Louisiana राज्य had been दोनो a Spanish and French colony.
In जोड, the pattern of development included importing numerous African slaves in the 18th century, साथ many इससे the वही region of West अफ़्रीकी, thus concentrating their culture.
in the post-Civil युद्ध environment, Anglo-Americans increased the pressure for Anglicization, और in 1915, अंग्रेज़ी was made the only official language of the state.
महिलाओं 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide.
in some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by विधि, लोकल custom, and behaviour, whereas in अन्य they may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human rights through दावा of an inherent historical और traditional bias विरूद्ध the exercise of rights by women और girls in पक्ष of men and boys.
Issues commonly संबद्ध with धारणाएं of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily अखंडता and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold पब्लिक office ; to work ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into विधिक contracts ; and to have marital, parental and धार्मिक rights.
The laws of science or scientific laws are statements that describe, predict, और perhaps explain क्यों, a दायरा of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature.
the term `` law '' has विविध usage in many cases : approximate, accurate, broad or सीमित theories, in all natural scientific disciplines ( physics, chemistry, जीवविज्ञान, geology, astronomy etc. ).
an analogous term लिये a scientific law is a principle.
वैज्ञानिक विधिs:
summarize a विशाल collection of facts determined by प्रयोग into a single statement,
can प्रायः be formulated mathematically as one or several कथन or equation, or at least stated in a single sentence, so that it can be प्रयुक्त to predict the निष्कर्ष of an experiment, given the initial, boundary, and अन्य physical conditions of the processes which take place,
are strongly supported by empirical प्रमाण - वे are scientific ज्ञान कि प्रयोग have repeatedly सत्यापित ( and never falsified ).
Their सटीकता does not बदलें when नई theories are worked out, but rather the पैमाना of अनुप्रयोग, since the equation ( if कोई ) representing the law does not change.
As with other scientific knowledge, वे do नहीं have absolute certainty like mathematical theorems or identities, and it is सदा possible for a विधि to be overturned by भविष्य observations.
are प्रायः quoted as a आधारभूत controlling influence rather than a वर्णन of observed facts.
I.e. `` the laws of motion require कि ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates, which are proposed during the scientific process पहले and during validation by experiment and observation.
These are not कानून चूंकि they have नहीं been verified to the same degree and may not be fear general, although वे may lead to the formulation of कानून.
a law is a more solidified and औपचारिक बयान, distilled from repeated experiment.
हालांकि the concepts of a law or principle in प्रकृति is borderline to philosophy, और presents the depth to which mathematics can describe प्रकृति, scientific laws are माना इससे a scientific perspective and follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; वे `` serve their purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of लॉजिकल absolution '' ( गणितीय ).
For example, whether a law `` refers to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical issue, rather than scientific.
fundamentally, all वैज्ञानिक laws follow from physics, laws जिससे occur in other sciences ultimately follow इससे physical laws.
Often, from mathematically fundamental viewpoints, सार्वभौमिक constants emerge from scientific laws.

Lauren Fenmore baldwin ( formerly विलियम्स और Grainger ) is a fictional character इससे the CBS soap operas the Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful, portrayed by ट्रेसी E. Bregman.
She made उसके debut during the episode airing on January 21, 1983.

The 2010 NBA Finals was the National बास्केट संघ ( NBA ) championship श्रेणी लिये the 2009–10 season.
The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the लॉस Angeles लेकर्स, champions of the पश्चिमी Conference और defending NBA champions, और the Boston सेल्टिक्स, champions of the Eastern Conference.
The Lakers defeated the Celtics, चार games to three, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA चैंपियनशिप.
The 64th edition of the championship series was played between जून 3 और जून 17, थी broadcast on ABC, and was watched by an average of 18.1 million people.
The Celtics earned उनके berth into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic Division.
The Lakers won the Pacific Division to earn their berth.
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven पूर्वी Conference पहला Round, the क्लीवलैंड cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinals, and defending Eastern conference champion ऑरलैंडो जादू in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference फाइनल.
the लेकर्स reached the NBA फाइनल by defeating the Oklahoma नगर थंडर in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन First Round, the Utah Jazz in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी Conference semifinals, and the Phoenix सन्स in the best-of-seven Western सम्मेलन Finals.
the NBA फाइनल were scheduled in the Major लीग Baseball संसार Series 2–3–2 सात खेल format, with the लेकर्स possessing home-court लाभ as a बदला for finishing with बेहतर नियमित season record than the Celtics.
Repeated baskets from starters कोबे Bryant, Pau Gasol, and रॉन artest brought the Lakers close to victory in Game 1.

The Celtics जीती Game 4 ; it किया n't hurt कि they netted an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, while Paul पियर्स led the टोली to a Game 5 win with 27 points on 57 % shooting from the floor.
The Lakers avoided विलोपन by winning a decisive खेल 6 with 24 points contributed by their bench.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points जल्दी in the third quarter, the Lakers rallied और won their second consecutive चैंपियनशिप by लेने over an exciting Game 7 aided by late contributions on offense by Pau Gasol and artest and rebounding.
Bryant was named Most Valuable Player of the फाइनल लिये उसके second लगातार trophy.
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full सात खेल since and तभी the चौथी since the NBA Finals लौटे to a 2–3–2 format in.
The laker franchise रै 16 एनबीए Championships ( पाँच in Minneapolis, 11 in Los Angeles ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships.

The एनबीए होता वापसी to the 2–2–1–1–1 National Hockey लीग seven खेल श्रेणी format until 1985.
Black pepper ( पाइपर nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae, cultivated लिये its fruit, जिससे is usually dried and प्रयुक्त as a मसाला and seasoning.
the फल, known as a peppercorn when dried, is लगभग in diameter, dark red when fully वयस्क, and, जैसे all drupes, contains a सिंगल seed.
Peppercorns, और the मैदान pepper derived इससे them, may be described simply as pepper, or more precisely as black pepper ( cooked and dried unripe फल ), green pepper ( dried unripe फल ) और white pepper ( dried ripe बीज ).
Black pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in तीव्र regions.
फिलहाल वियतनाम is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has been used चूंकि antiquity for दोनो its flavour and as a आयुर्विज्ञान.
Black pepper is the संसार 's most traded spice.
It is one of the सबसे आम spices added to यूरोपीय cuisine and its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be उलझन with the capsaicin that देता fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the आधुनिक world, often paired with salt.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the volumetric भिन्न of blood उत्तेजित out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each दिल beat or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful गणितीय अभिव्यक्ति defining EF.
noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a worldwide यूटिलिटी enabling study of हृदय performance reproducibly और inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection fraction is a गणितीय उत्पाद allowed by cardiac इमेजिंग.
as a गणितीय term, ejection Fraction is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac आउटपुट.
Dedicated प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, Magnetic अनुनाद इमेजिंग और MUGA scanning have definitively अनुमत clinically relevant गणित regarding ischemia, Congenital दिल बीमारी and Heart Failure.
the अभियोजक is the chief legal representative of the prosecution in countries with either the common law adversarial system, or the civil law inquisitorial प्रणाली.
The prosecution is the विधिक party जिम्मेदार for presenting the case in a criminal विचारण against an individual अभियुक्त of breaking the law.

abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿabd Allāh ibn ʿabd al-Muṭṭalib इब्न Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), also transliterated as Muhammad ( ), थी a religious, political, and military leader from Mecca who एकीकृत Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by मुसलमान और Bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर और नबी of परमेश्वर.
Muhammad is लगभग universally considered by मुसलमान as the पिछला prophet sent by God लिये mankind.
Non-Muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider उसे to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic आस्था of Adam, Noah, अब्राहम, Moses, यीशु, and other prophets.
born in परिचय 570 CE in the arabian city of Mecca, he थी orphaned at an early age and brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह of his uncle abu Talib.
he बाद worked mostly as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a गड़रिये, और was पहला शादीशुदा by आयु 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several नाइट्स of seclusion और prayer, he later reported that it थी वहीँ, at age 40, that he प्राप्त his first revelation from परमेश्वर.
Three years after this इवेंट Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, कि complete `` surrender '' to उसे ( lit.
islām ) is the तभी way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and कि he himself was a prophet and messenger of God, in the same रग as other इस्लामी नबियों.
मुहम्मद gained few अनुसरणकर्ता जल्दी on, and was met साथ hostility इससे some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers यहूद treated harshly.
to escape persecution, Muhammad sent some of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया before he and his अनुसरणकर्ता in Mecca migrated to मदीना ( तब ज्ञात as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the हिज्र, marks the beginning of the इस्लामी calendar, which is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the tribes under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of लड़ साथ the meccan tribes, his followers, जो by तब had grown to 10,000, took control of मक्का in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He नष्ट the pagan idols in the नगर and then sent his अनुसरणकर्ता out to नष्ट all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern अरब.
In 632, a few months after returning to Medina इससे the Farewell Pilgrimage, Muhammad fell बीमार and died.
By the समय of उसके death, सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप था converted to Islam, और he था संयुक्त अरब into a single Muslim religious polity.
The revelations ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until उसके मौत – form the verses of the कुरान, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based.
besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( सिरा ) and traditions ( sunnah ) हैं also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss मुहम्मद and other नबियों of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever उनके names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval christendom and premodern times यहूद largely negative, appraisals in आधुनिक history have been दूर less so.
The Great Books ( दूसरी edition )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of books originally प्रकाशित in the United राज्य in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica inc. to present the Great Books in a single पैकेज of 54 volumes.
the श्रेणी is now in its second edition and contains 60 आयतन.
The असली editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a किताब must be relevant to समकालीन issues, and not only महत्वपूर्ण in इसके historical context ; it must reward rereading ; and it जरूर be a part of `` the great conversation about the ग्रेट ideas, '' प्रासंगिक to at least 25 of the 102 ग्रेट ideas पहचाना by the सम्पादक.
किताबे यहूद not chosen on the basis of जातीय or cultural inclusiveness, historical influence, or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a song लिखा and recorded by JJ Cale in 1976, but also known as a cover संस्करण recorded by Eric Clapton.
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly लोकप्रिय hits '' and notes that `` भी लिये an artist like Clapton साथ a huge body of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' बाँधने among his बेहतरीन. ''
Glyn Johns, जो था previously worked साथ The Who, Led Zeppelin and the रोलिंग Stones, produced the Clapton recording, which was released on Clapton 's 1977 एल्बम Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
The live version of `` कोका '', from the Just एक Night album recorded in टोकियो, charted on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 as the B-side of `` Tulsa Time ``, which was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of cale 's songs recorded by क्लैप्टन, including `` After Midnight `` and `` travelin ' लाइट ''.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called हवाई आपरेशन or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( आपरेशन z in planning ) and the Battle of पर्ल हार्बर ) was a surprise सैन्य strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the संयुक्त States नवल आधार at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of दिसम्बर 7, 1941 ( दिसम्बर 8 in जापानी ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive कार्रवाई in order to रखना the U.S. Pacific बेड़े इससे interfering with military क्रियाएँ the Empire of Japan was planning in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the संयुक्त Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The आधार was attacked by 353 Japanese सेनानी, बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in two waves, launched from six aircraft carriers.
All आठ U.S. नेवी battleships यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त, with चार होने sunk.
Two of ये were later उठाया, and with the remaining four repaired, six battleships returned to service later in the युद्ध.
The Japanese also sank or क्षतिग्रस्त three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. aircraft were नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans यहूद killed और 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, डॉकयार्ड, maintenance, and ईंधन and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the submarine piers and headquarters भवन ( भी home of the intelligence section ) यहूद not attacked.
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines खोया, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One जापानी नाविक was captured.
the आक्रमण आए as a profound shock to the American people and led सीधे to the American प्रविष्टि into World युद्ध ii in both the Pacific और European theaters.
The following दिन ( December 8 ), the United States घोषित युद्ध on Japan.
घरेलू support लिये non-interventionism, जिससे had been strong, disappeared.
Clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( for example the neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by क्रियाशील alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to घोषित युद्ध on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
वहीँ were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य action by Japan.
However, the कमी of any औपचारिक warning, विशेषकर while negotiations यहूद स्टिल apparently ongoing, led अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
प्रोजेक्ट Runway Season 2 was the second ऋतु of ब्रावो 's कामयाब Project Runway, a reality प्रतियोगिता लिये fashion designers.
ऋतु 2 began airing on December 7, 2005.
Following a nationwide search पहले in the year, sixteen designers were चुनी as semi-finalists and brought to New York नगर in जून, 2005.
After the first चुनौती, called `` सड़क To The Runway '', fourteen went on to compete as finalists.
The winning designer, Chloe dao, received $ 100,000 in बीज money to help launch her अपना line, a 2007 Saturn Sky roadster, a स्प्रेड in ELLE magazine, and a mentorship with the Banana गणतंत्र डिज़ाइन Team.
Winning alongside Dao was her model, अनुग्रह Kelsey, who received the ELLE Magazine spread.

in numismatics, a खच्चर is a सिक्का or medal minted with obverse and reverse डिजाइन not सामान्यतः देखी on the same piece.
ये can be जानबूझकर or produced by error.
इस type of error is highly sought after, और examples can fetch steep कीमतें इससे collectors.
The earliest mules हैं found among ancient यूनानी and Roman coins.
Opinion is विभाजित between those जो सोचो that they हैं accidental, the परिणाम of an incorrect combination of a new die साथ one कि था officially महरूम withdrawn इससे उपयोग, or the work of coiners working साथ dies stolen from an official mint, perhaps at a समय when one of them should have been destroyed.
The name derives from the खच्चर, the संकर offspring of a घोड़ा and a donkey, due to such a coin having two sides intended लिये different coins, much as a mule has parents of दो different species.
This पेज documents the tornadoes और tornado outbreaks of 2010.
the majority of tornadoes form in the U.S., but they can occur almost anywhere अंतर्गत the सही conditions.
A lesser क्रमांक occur outside the U.S., सबसे notably in parts of neighboring southern कनाडा during the उत्तरी गोलार्ध 's summer season, but are also known in South अमेरिका, यूरोपीय, Asia, and Australia.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United राज्य in 2010 ( of which at least 1,266 were confirmed ), with 45 पुष्टि fatalities.
Elsewhere in the संसार, 11 people were killed in tornadoes, six in अर्जेंटीना, three in the बहामा, एक in Bangladesh, और one in Germany.
The year थी near average for tornadoes despite an अत्यधिक quiet early वसन्त period, however ऐसे changed after a huge upswing starting in लेट अप्रैल and a व्यस्त late वसन्त और गर्मियाँ period.
The पतझड़ months were थोड़ा above average.
a lymphocyte is a type of white blood cell in the vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा system.
अंतर्गत the microscope, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes और छोटी lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes include natural killer कोशिकाएं ( NK कोशिकाएं ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t cells और B cells.
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task स्वचालन framework, consisting of a command-line शेल and संबद्ध एनक्रिप्शन भाषा built on.NET फ्रेमवर्क.
PowerShell provides full access to com और wmi, enabling administrators to perform administrative tasks on दोनो लोकल and remote Windows systems.
in PowerShell, प्रशासनिक tasks हैं generally performed by cmdlets ( pronounced command-lets ), which हैं specialized.NET classes implementing a particular operation.
Sets of cmdlets may be संयुक्त together in scripts, executables ( which are standalone applications ), or by instantiating नियमित.NET वर्ग ( or wmi/com Objects ).
ये कार्य by accessing आंकड़ा in different data stores, like the filesystem or registry, which are made available to the PowerShell runtime via Windows powershell providers.
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting api with which the Windows powershell runtime can be embedded अंदर other applications.
These applications can तब उपयोग Windows powershell functionality to implement certain operations, including those exposed via the graphical interface.
इस capability रै महरूम used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as PowerShell cmdlets and प्रदाताओं and implement the आलेखीय management tools as PowerShell hosts जिससे invoke the necessary cmdlets.
Other microsoft applications including microsoft SQL सर्वर 2008 also expose उनके management इंटरफ़ेस via powershell cmdlets.
With PowerShell, आलेखीय interface-based प्रबन्धन applications on खिड़कियाँ हैं layered on top of Windows PowerShell.
A powershell एनक्रिप्शन interface लिये Windows products is mandated by the आम Engineering Criteria.
Windows powershell शामिल its own extensive, console-based help, similar to man pages in Unix shells, via the Get-Help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical फिल्मी starring Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, and glynis Johns, produced by Walt डिज़्नी, and आधारित on the मरियम poppins books series by P. L. Travers.
The फिल्मी थी directed by रॉबर्ट Stevenson और written by Bill वाल्श and Don DaGradi, with songs by the Sherman Brothers.
It थी shot at वॉल्ट Disney studios in Burbank, California.
जूली Andrews won the अकादमी Award लिये Best Actress for her प्रदर्शन as मरियम Poppins and the film also won Oscars for Best Film Editing, Original म्यूज़िक Score, Best Song for `` chim Chim Cher-ee '' and Best विज़ुअल Effects, and received a total of 13 nominations.
a story arc is an extended or continuing कथानक in episodic storytelling media ऐसे as television, कॉमिक books, comic strips, boardgames, video खेल, और in some मामले, films.
On a television program, for example, the story होता unfold over अनेक episodes.
In टेलीविज़न, the use of the story arc is much more common in dramas than in comedies, विशेषकर in साबुन operas.
Webcomics हैं more संभावित to use story arcs than समाचारपत्र comics, as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have पठनीय archives online that a newcomer to the strip can read in order to understand what is going on.
Although स्टोरी arcs have existed for decades, the पद `` story arc '' was coined in 1988 in संबंध to the television श्रेणी Wiseguy, and थी quickly adapted for other uses.
Many अमरीकी comic book series हैं now लिखा in four or six-issue arcs, within a continuing series.
छोटी स्टोरी arcs are easier to package as व्यापार paperbacks for resale, and more accessible to the casual reader than the never-ending continuity कि एकबार characterised comics.
ब्लैक Friday is the day following Thanksgiving Day in the United States, often regarded as the beginning of the क्रिसमस shopping season.
In recent years, most major रिटेलर have opened अत्यधिक early and offered promotional बिक्री to kick off the holiday shopping ऋतु, similar to Boxing Day बिक्री in many राष्ट्रमंडल Nations.
Black शुक्रवार is not an official public अवकाश as such, लकिन many non-retail कर्मचारी और schools have both Thanksgiving and the day after off, followed by a weekend, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It रै routinely been the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी day of the साल चूंकि 2005, although news रिपोर्ट्स, which at that time were inaccurate, have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम shopping day of the year लिये a much longer period of time.
The day 's नाम originated in Philadelphia, where it originally was used to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian और vehicle ट्रैफ़िक which would occur on the दिन after Thanksgiving.
Use of the पद started before 1961 and began to देखिए broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
Later an alternative स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : that `` ब्लैक Friday '' indicates the पाइंट at जिससे retailers begin to turn a profit, or हैं `` ''.
लिये many years, it थी common for retailers to open at 6:00 a.m., लकिन in the लेट 2000s अनेक had crept to 5:00 or भी 4:00.
इस was taken to a new extreme in 2011, जब अनेक retailers ( including Target, Kohl 's, Macy 's, Best ख़रीदे, और Bealls ) खोली at midnight for the first time.
In 2012, walmart and अनेक other retailers घोषित that वे would open most of their स्टोर्स at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( मगर in राज्य where खोलने on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to ब्लू कानून, such as Massachusetts where वे still खोली around midnight ), prompting काल्स लिये a walkout among some workers.
Black Friday खरीदारी is known for attracting आक्रामक crowds, with annual reports of assaults, shootings, and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run आउट.
the Family That preys is a 2008 American movie drama written, उत्पादित, and directed by Tyler Perry.

It is also the second Perry-directed film ( alongside Daddy 's छोटी Girls ) that is नहीं आधारित on any of the filmmaker 's stage plays.
Net 10, जाल 15, जाल 30 and जाल 60 ( भी Net 10 दिनों, et al ) हैं forms of trade क्रेडिट जिससे बताएँ कि the net amount ( the total बकाया on the invoice ) is अपेक्षित to be paid in full and received by the seller भीतर 10, 15, 30 or 60 दिनों after the goods are dispatched or service is completed.
Net 30 or Net 60 शर्तें are प्रायः coupled साथ a credit for early payment.
The word net in this भाव अर्थात् `` total after all discounts. ''
it originally derives from the लैटिन nitere ( to shine ) और nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), और more recently from the फ्रेंच net ( sharp, neat, साफ ).

the British West इंडीज were the islands in और around the Caribbean कि यहूद part of the British Empire.
In 1912, the British वेस्ट Indies were divided into eight colonies : The Bahamas, Barbados, British Guiana, British Honduras, Jamaica ( साथ its dependencies the Turks and Caicos Islands और the केमन Islands ), Trinidad और टोबैगो, the Windward Islands और the Leeward Islands.
between 1958 and 1962, all of the island territories except the British Virgin आइलैंड्स, the बहामा, अंग्रेजों Honduras and British Guiana were organised into the West इंडीज Federation.
it was hoped that the संघ would become independent as a सिंगल nation, but it था limited powers, अनेक practical problems, and a lack of popular support.
Consequently, the West इंडीज Federation थी dissolved.
सबसे of the territories, सहित all the larger ones, हैं अभी स्वतंत्र as separate देशों, with membership to many international forums ऐसे as the Organization of American States, the संघ of Caribbean States, the संसार Trade संगठन, the United Nations, the Caribbean Community, the Commonwealth of राष्ट्र और the Caribbean Development Bank among अन्य.
the शेष are अंग्रेजों overseas territories.
सब the former राष्ट्र of the British West Indies, except the Commonwealth of डोमिनिकन, Guyana और त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, हैं Commonwealth realms.
The term is still प्रयुक्त for British विदेशी Territories in the Caribbean, such as the Cayman Islands.

`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by bob Thiele ( as `` George Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss.
It was first recorded by Louis आर्मस्ट्रांग and released as a single in 1967.
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the music world ( Thiele as a producer और वेइस as a composer/performer ).
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in the Grammy Hall of कीर्ति in 1999.
The publishing लिये this song is controlled by मेमोरी Lane Music Group, Carlin Music Corp., and Bug Music, Inc.

the inauguration of the president of the United States is a ceremonial इवेंट अंकन the शुरुआत of a नई four-year term of a president of the संयुक्त राज्य.
The day a presidential inauguration occurs is known as `` उद्घाटन Day '' and occurs on जनवरी 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ).
( Prior to the बीसवीं Amendment, the तिथि was March 4, the दिन of the साल on जिससे the Constitution of the संयुक्त States first took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the last उद्घाटन to take place on the पुरानी date थी Franklin D. Roosevelt 's first one on कूच 4, 1933. )
The सबसे recent public presidential inauguration ceremony, the swearing in of President बराक ओबामा to begin उसके दूसरी four-year term in office, took place on सोमवार, जनवरी 21, 2013.
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is कि the अध्यक्ष मेक an oath or affirmation before that person can `` enter on the निष्पादन '' of the office of the presidency.
however, over the years, विभिन्न traditions have arisen that have expanded the inauguration from a सरल oath-taking रस्म to a day-long event, including parades, भाषणों, and balls.
From the presidency of एंड्रयू Jackson through that of jimmy Carter, the primary Inauguration Day ceremony took प्लेस on the Capitol 's East Portico.
Since the 1981 inauguration of Ronald Reagan, the ceremony has been held at the Capitol 's West Front.
The inaugurations of William Howard taft in 1909 और reagan in 1985 यहूद स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to ठंडा weather.
the War of 1812 and संसार युद्ध II caused दो inaugurations to be आयोजित at other locations in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
When जार्ज Washington was inaugurated, the oath was administered by Robert Livingston, Chancellor of New York State, in 1789, और by विलियम Cushing, Associate इंसाफ of the Supreme Court, in 1793.
Since Chief Justice Oliver एल्सवर्थ swore in President जॉन Adams, no chief justice has छूटी an उद्घाटन Day.
जब उद्घाटन Day has fallen on a Sunday, the chief justice has administered the शपथ to the president on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly.
जब a new president takes over mid-term due to the मौत or resignation of a अध्यक्ष, the oath of office is administered but औपचारिक, public उद्घाटन events have not महरूम आयोजित.
stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta ( ; born March 28, 1986 ), known by her stage name Lady Gaga, is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, dancer, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and philanthropist.
born और raised in New York City, वो primarily studied at the Convent of the पवित्र दिल and briefly attended New York विश्वविद्यालयों 's Tisch School of the Arts पहले withdrawing to focus on उसके musical career.
She जल्द began performing in the rock music scene of मैनहटन 's निम्नतर ईस्ट पक्ष.
By the end of 2007, रिकार्ड executive और producer Vincent हर्बर्ट signed her to his label streamline Records, an imprint of Interscope Records.
initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records, उसके vocal abilities captured the attention of recording artist एकॉन, who also signed her to Kon सजीव Distribution, his own लेबल under Interscope.
महिला गागा came to prominence as a recording artist following the release of उसके debut album, the Fame ( 2008 ), which was a critical and commercial success that अव्वल charts around the world और included the international number-one singles `` बस Dance `` and `` Poker फेस ``.
After embarking on the The कीर्ति Ball Tour, she followed the एल्बम साथ The Fame Monster ( 2009 ), which spawned the विश्वव्यापी hit singles `` Bad रोमांस ``, `` टेलीफोन ``, and `` Alejandro ``.
the Fame Monsters कामयाबी अनुमत उसके to embark on the eighteen-month long दानव Ball दौरे, जिससे बाद became one of the highest-grossing कॉन्सर्ट tours of all time.
उसके most हाल album, Born This रास्ता ( 2011 ), अव्वल the charts of most major markets and generated more अंतरराष्ट्रीय chart-topping singles, including `` born This Way ``, `` Judas ``, and `` The Edge of Glory ``.
Influenced by Britney Spears, David Bowie, Michael Jackson, मैडोना, and Queen, Lady Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant, diverse and outré contributions to the music industry through her fashion, performances and music videos.
as of October 2011, वो has sold an अनुमानित 23 लाख albums and 64 million singles विश्वव्यापी and उसके singles are कुछ of the best-selling worldwide.
Her उपलब्धियाँ include five ग्रैमी Awards and 13 MTV Video Music Awards.
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the साल ( स्कोरिंग the definitive title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest महिलाओं in Music, is the छठे best selling digital singles artist in us according to RIAA, is regularly placed on सूचियाँ रचित by Forbes magazine and was नामित one of the most influential people in the संसार by Time magazine.
Besides उसके musical career, वो involves herself साथ humanitarian कल्याणकारी and LGBT activism.

the फ्लोरिडा gators baseball team represents the University of फ्लोरिडा in the खेल of baseball.
The Florida Gators compete in Division i of the National Collegiate Athletics संघ ( NCAA ), and the Eastern Division of the southeastern सम्मेलन ( SEC ).
वे play उनके home games in अल्फ्रेड A. mckethan Stadium on the university 's Gainesville, Florida campus, and हैं फिलहाल led by head कोच Kevin o'sullivan.
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball कार्यक्रम, the team has जीती twelve SEC championships and has appeared in eight College World Series tournaments.

A political campaign is an organized effort which seeks to influence the decision बनाना process भीतर a specific group.
In democracies, political campaigns often refer to electoral campaigns, wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided.
In modern politics, the most high profile political campaigns are केन्द्रित on उम्मीदवार लिये head of राज्य or सिर of सरकारी, प्रायः a President or Prime मंत्री.
Elizabeth Cady stanton और her बेटी, harriot
Elizabeth cady Stanton ( नवम्बर 12, 1815 – अक्तूबर 26, 1902 ) थी an American social activist, abolitionist, and अग्रणी figure of the early women 's rights movement.
उसके Declaration of sentiments, प्रस्तुत at the पहला women 's rights convention held in 1848 in seneca Falls, New यॉर्क, is often credited with initiating the first organized women 's rights and women 's suffrage movements in the संयुक्त States.
Before stanton narrowed उसके political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights, she was an active abolitionist together with her husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, Gerrit स्मिथ.
Unlike many of those involved in the women 's rights गति, Stanton addressed various issues pertaining to women परे voting rights.
Her चिंताएं included women 's parental and कस्टडी अधिकारों, property अधिकारों, नियुक्ति and income rights, divorce, the economic health of the परिवार, and birth control.
वो was also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance movement.
बाद the American Civil War, Stanton 's प्रतिबद्धता to female suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति जब वो, together साथ सुसान B. Anthony, अस्वीकृत to support ड्योढ़ी of the Fourteenth और Fifteenth Amendments to the United राज्य संविधान.
वो opposed giving added legal protection and voting rights to अफ़्रीकी American मेन while women, black and श्वेत, were अस्वीकृत those same rights.
Her स्थिति on this issue, together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and women 's issues beyond मतदान rights, led to the formation of two पृथक women 's rights संगठन कि were finally rejoined, with Stanton as president of the joint organization, approximately बीस years after her break from the original महिलाओं 's suffrage गति.
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both the Woman 's बाइबल and her आत्मकथा, along साथ many आलेख and pamphlets concerning female suffrage और women 's rights.
my Fair Lady is a musical based upon George बर्नार्ड Shaw 's Pygmalion and साथ book और गीत by एलन Jay lerner and music by Frederick Loewe.
the स्टोरी concerns Eliza Doolittle, a Cockney flower girl who takes speech lessons इससे professor Henry हिगिंस, a phoneticist, so that she may pass as a well-born lady.
the musical 's 1956 ब्रॉडवे उत्पादन थी a hit, setting what was then the record लिये the longest run of कोई major musical theatre उत्पादन in history.
It थी followed by a hit लंदन production, a popular film version, and numerous revivals.
It has महरूम called `` the perfect musical ''.

it is therefore विपरीत of regulation, which refers to the प्रक्रम of the सरकारी regulating certain activities.

Ethnicity or जातीय समूह is a socially पारिभाषित category आधारित on common culture or nationality.
Ethnicity can, but does not have to, शामिल common ancestry, appearance, cuisine, dressing style, heritage, history, भाषा or dialect, religion, प्रतीकों, traditions, or अन्य cultural फ़ैक्टर.
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through आम विशेषताएँ which नियत the समूह apart इससे other groups.

Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the sun, has महरूम harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
सौर energy technologies include solar हीटिंग, solar photovoltaics, सौर thermal electricity, solar वास्तुकला and artificial photosynthesis, जिससे can make considerable contributions to solving कुछ of the सबसे urgent उर्जा problems the world now faces.
सौर technologies हैं broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the way they capture, बदलें और distribute solar energy.
Active सौर तकनीकों शामिल the use of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to harness the energy.
passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy एजेंसी said that `` the विकास of affordable, inexhaustible and clean solar उर्जा technologies होगा have huge longer-term लाभ.
It will बढ़ाएँ countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible and ज़्यादातर import-independent resource, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating जलवायु बदलें, and रखना fossil fuel कीमतें lower than otherwise.
These लाभ are global.
hence the additional costs of the प्रोत्साहन for early deployment should be considered learning investments ; they जरूर be wisely spent and need to be widely साझा ''.
the classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved from a western variety of the यूनानी alphabet called the cumaean alphabet, जिससे was adopted and परिवर्धित by the etruscans who ruled early Rome.
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and further modified by the ancient Romans to लिखें the Latin भाषा.
During the Middle Ages, the लैटिन alphabet was adapted to रोमांस languages, सीधा वंशजों of लैटिन, as well as to Celtic, germanic, बाल्टिक, and कुछ Slavic languages.
With the age of colonialism and ईसाई evangelism, the Latin स्क्रिप्ट थी spread overseas, और लागू to indigenous अमरीकी, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, Austronesian, austroasiatic, and अफ़्रीकी languages.
अधिक recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the लैटिन script or the International ध्वन्यात्मक वर्णमाला ( itself largely based on Latin script ) when transcribing or creating written मानकों for non-European भाषाएं, such as the अफ़्रीकी reference वर्णमाला.
The पद Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet प्रयुक्त to लिखें लैटिन ( as वर्णित in this आलेख ), or other alphabets based on the Latin script, जिससे is the basic set of अक्षर आम to the various alphabets descended इससे the classical लैटिन एक, such as the English alphabet.
These Latin-derived alphabets may discard letters, जैसे the rotokas alphabet, or add नई letters, जैसे the Danish and Norwegian वर्णमाला.
Letter आकार have changed over the centuries, including the creation for Medieval Latin of lower मामला forms जिससे किया not exist in the शास्त्रीय period.
The हत्या of United States अध्यक्ष Abraham Lincoln took place on Good Friday, April 14, 1865, as the American Civil War was drawing to a close.
The assassination occurred पाँच days बाद the कमांडर of the confederate Army of Northern Virginia, General Robert E. Lee, surrendered to Lieutenant General ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the first अमरीकी president to be assassinated, हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था महरूम made on Andrew Jackson 30 years before in 1835.
the हत्या was planned and carried आउट by the well-known stage actor John Wilkes Booth, as भाग of a larger षड्यंत्र in a bid to revive the Confederate cause.
बूथ 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and दाउद Herold, who were assigned to kill Secretary of State William H. Seward, and George Atzerodt जो थी to kill Vice President एंड्रयू Johnson.
By simultaneously eliminating the top three लोगों in the administration, बूथ and his co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United राज्य government.
Lincoln was shot जबकि watching the play Our American cousin with his wife Mary टॉड Lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर in Washington, D.C. on the night of April 14, 1865.
he died early the next morning.
the बाकी of the षड्यंत्रकारियों ' plot विफल ; Powell only managed to wound Seward, while Atzerodt, जॉनसन 's would-be assassin, खोया his nerve and fled Washington.

Club स्तर seating is a special section of seating in आधुनिक sports stadiums.
The Club Level is usually स्तिथ towards the middle of the स्टेज of seating sections, above the lower deck but below the upper deck.
They हैं usually सही next to the लक्ज़री Boxes, either right above, सही below, or sandwiched between two स्तर of Luxury बाक्स.
Club स्तर seating is considered as higher क्लास than sitting anywhere else in the arena, लकिन lower क्लास compared to the Luxury Boxes.
Unlike the लक्ज़री Boxes, सबसे क्लबों levels do not रैप entirely around the arena.
Some club levels stop at a certain पाइंट, giving way to an विस्तार of the मेज़ानाइन, while others give way to lower class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party suites '' ).
A notable exception to इस is अमीरात स्टेडियम in London, which has a complete tier of club seating.
क्लबों Levels allow fans multiple levels of entertainment.
Club Level seating is open to the तत्व, as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury boxes, जिससे gives more of an outdoors impression at roofless and open-roof stadiums and arenas.
क्लबों स्तर seating is normally bought on a contract आधार to allow for maximum profit on the part of the stadium.
the Club Level provides fans साथ special access to an indoor part of the एरिना exclusive to fans with special tickets.
These areas are air conditioned and allow access to खास restaurants, merchandise stands, और lounge areas of the stadium that हैं नहीं वरना available.
Concession stands and vendors on the क्लबों Level also often offer different मेनू than in other stands to give more of a खास feel to the Club.
ये क्षेत्रों हैं closed off to the rest of the stadium, and वे usually can तभी be पहुँचा through the exclusive, private क्लबों entrances.
Sophia लोरेन ( ; born सोफिया villani scicolone ; 20 September 1934 ) is an Italian actress.
Loren is widely पहचाना as Italy 's most प्रसिद्ध and सम्मानित actress.
She थी the पहला actress of the talkie era to win an Academy Award for a non-English-speaking प्रदर्शन, for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women.
Her other awards शामिल a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, five special Golden Globes, a BAFTA Award and a लॉरेल Award.
in 1995 she received the सेसिल B. demille Award for lifetime उपलब्धियाँ, एक of many such awards.
Her films शामिल : houseboat ( 1958 ), El Cid ( 1961 ), कल, Today and Tomorrow ( 1963 ), विवाह Italian-Style ( 1964 ), and A खास Day ( 1977 ).
In later years वो has appeared in American blockbusters ऐसे as Grumpier बूढ़ा Men ( 1995 ), and Nine ( 2009 ).
In 1994 she स्ट्रक्चर in Robert Altman 's prêt-à-porter, जिससे अर्जित her a सुनहरी Globe nomination the same साल.
वो has also हासिल critical and commercial success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ).
मौतों लिये self-inflicted injuries per 100,000 inhabitants in 2004.
Incidence of आत्महत्या is underreported due to both religious and social pressures, and संभवतः completely unreported in some areas.
Nevertheless, from reported मामले, certain रुझान are apparent.
Since the data is skewed, comparing suicide rates between राष्ट्र is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves are not the cause, but may be indicative of a root cause.

हॉस्पिटल Emergency Codes are प्रयुक्त in hospitals विश्वव्यापी to alert staff to विभिन्न emergencies.
the use of codes is intended to convey essential information quickly and with minimal misunderstanding to स्टाफ, while preventing stress और panic among visitors to the hospital.
ये codes may be posted on placards throughout the hospital, or printed on employee identification badges for तैयार reference.
Back of a hospital ID badge showing disaster कोड.
Hospital आपात कोड may denote अलग events at different hospitals, सहित nearby ones.
Because many physicians work at अधिक than एक facility, this may lead to भ्रम in emergencies, so uniform systems have महरूम प्रस्तावित.
The रूट of the Eifel aqueduct, with its औसत slope.
The Eifel Aqueduct was one of the longest aqueducts of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
the जलसेतु, constructed in AD 80, carried water some इससे the hilly eifel region of what is now Germany to the प्राचीन नगर of Colonia claudia आरा Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
If the auxiliary spurs to additional springs are included, the length was.
the निर्माण थी almost entirely below ground, और the प्रवाह of the जल was उत्पादित entirely by गम्भीरता.
A few पुलों, सहित one up to in length, were needed to pass over valleys.
Unlike कुछ of the other प्रसिद्ध रोमन aqueducts, the eifel aqueduct थी specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it इससे damage and जमने.
In रसायन, a disulfide bond ( Br.E. disulphide bond ) is a covalent bond, usually derived by the coupling of two thiol groups.
The linkage is also पुकारा an SS-bond or disulfide सेतु.
The overall connectivity is therefore R-S-S-R.
The terminology is widely used in biochemistry.
In formal terms, the connection is a persulfide, in analogy to इसके congener, peroxide ( r-o-o-r ), but this शब्दावली is obscure and is no longer used ( मगर in reference to R-S-S-H or h-s-s-h compounds ).
Formal चित्रण of disulfide बंध formation as an oxidation.
