धर्म in the United Kingdom and in the देशों that preceded it, has been dominated, for over 1,400 years, by various forms of Christianity.
According to some सर्वेक्षण, a majority of citizens still पहचानो साथ Christianity, although regular church attendance रै गिरे dramatically चूंकि the middle of the 20th century, and immigration और demographic change have contributed to the growth of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of UK नागरिकों are recorded by नियमित surveys, the four प्रमुख ones being the UK Census, the Labour Force Survey, the British सोशल Attitudes सर्वेक्षण और the European Social Survey.
According to the 2001 uk जनसांख्यिकी, christianity is the major religion, followed by islam, Hinduism, Sikhism, Judaism and Buddhism in terms of क्रमांक of adherents.
This, and the अपेक्षाकृत large क्रमांक of individuals साथ नाममात्र or no धार्मिक संबद्धों has led commentators to variously describe the United किंगडम as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-christian society.
the United Kingdom was formed by the संघ of previously independent countries इससे 1707, and नतीजतन सबसे of the largest धार्मिक groups do नहीं have UK-wide organisational structures.
While some groups have separate structures for the व्यक्तिगत countries of the United Kingdom, others may have a सिंगल structure covering इंग्लैण्ड and Wales or Great Britain.
Similarly, due to the relatively recent सृष्टि of उत्तरी आयरलैंड in 1921, most major religious groups in Northern Ireland हैं organised on an all-Ireland basis.
The 1967 न्यूर्क riots यहूद a प्रमुख civil disturbance कि occurred in the city of Newark, नई जर्सी between July 12 and July 17, 1967.
The six days of rioting, looting, और destruction बाएँ 26 dead and hundreds घायल.
In संयुक्त राज्य college athletics, redshirt is a delay or suspension of an खिलाड़ी 's भागीदारी in अनुक्रम to lengthen his or उसके period of पात्रता.
Typically, a student 's एथलेटिक eligibility in a दिए sport is four seasons, a क्रमांक निकला from the four years of academic classes that are सामान्यतः required to obtain a bachelor 's उपाधि at an American college or विश्वविद्यालयों.
However, a student खिलाड़ी may be offered the अवसर to redshirt लिये up to two सालो, which allows the athlete to spread those four सालो of eligibility over five, or sometimes six years.
In a redshirt year, a student athlete may attend classes at the कॉलेज or university, practice साथ an athletic team, and dress लिये खेल लकिन he or वो may not compete during the game.
Using this mechanism, a student athlete रै up to five academic years to use the four years of पात्रता, thus becoming a fifth-year senior.
The term is used as a verb, noun, and क्रियाशील.
लिये उदाहरण, a coach may choose to redshirt a player who is then referred to as a redshirt freshman or बस a redshirt.
the opposite of this is a `` true freshman. ''
संसार युद्ध I ( WWI ) was a global war केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted जबतक 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the Great War इससे its occurrence until the start of World युद्ध II in 1939, and the पहला संसार युद्ध or संसार युद्ध i thereafter.
it involved all the world 's ग्रेट powers, जिससे were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( based on the Triple entente of the United किंगडम, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the ट्रिपल Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary और Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the agreement, Italy किया not enter into the war ).
These alliances were दोनो reorganised और expanded as अधिक nations entered the युद्ध : Italy, Japan and the United राज्य joined the Allies, और the Ottoman Empire और बुल्गारिया the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य कर्मियों, including 60 लाख Europeans, यहूद mobilised in one of the largest wars in इतिहास.
More than 9 million combatants were मारे, largely because of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित improvements in protection or mobility.
It थी the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार history, subsequently paving the way for various political परिवर्तन, such as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the युद्ध was the पुनरुत्थान of imperialism in the विदेशी policies of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
भीतर weeks, the प्रमुख powers यहूद at युद्ध and, via उनके colonies, the conflict soon स्प्रेड around the संसार.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the war as तैयारी for the आक्रमण of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German कूच on पेरिस was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the Western Front settled into a स्थिर battle of attrition with a trench line that बदला छोटी until 1917.
On the Eastern सामने, the Russian फौज थी कामयाब against the Austro-Hungarians, लकिन was रोका in इसके आक्रमण of East Prussia by the Germans.
in November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia और the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
in रूस, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the russians to terms साथ the Central Powers.
बाद a 1918 जर्मनी offensive along the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
जर्मनी, which था its अपना trouble साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the घर fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to लड़ो a कुल war.
by the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the former two lost a ग्रेट amount of territory, while the latter two यहूद dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller states.
The लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed in the hope of preventing another such विरोध.
the European nationalism शाखित by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of Germany 's defeat and problems साथ the सन्धि of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to संसार War II.
मैप of countries that घोषित themselves to be socialist राज्य under the Marxist–Leninist or Maoist definition - that is to कह, `` Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983.
This period चिह्नित the greatest territorial extent of Communist states.
A कम्युनिस्ट state is a state where the अर्थात् of उत्पादन are collectively owned by the society.
it रै a form of सरकारी characterized by single-party नियम or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred as तानाशाही of the Proletariat by its proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
technically, `` कम्युनिस्ट state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist समाज as पारिभाषित by both Marxists and anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this perspective, the पद Marxist-Leninist state is more appropriate.
Historically, a `` communist राज्य '' referred to a प्रणाली where public ownership of all or most अर्थात् of production by the Communist party -run state is deemed necessary to further the interests of the working class ; today, a communist राज्य can also, for instance, refer to समकालीन चीन and Vietnam, where a Communist Party-run राज्य exists alongside a mixed economy.
According to marxist–leninists, the state is a tool in the hands of the ruling class, which in a socialist society is the working क्लास, so a समाजवादी state is, according to leninists, a राज्य of the working class.
In अभ्यास, communist राज्य do not actually refer to themselves as such.
They do this not to disguise the fact कि the सत्ताधारी party is communist, लकिन बल्कि क्युकी they do नहीं consider themselves to be a communist society at present.
Instead, they constitutionally पहचानो themselves as समाजवादी राज्य or workers ' राज्य.
The प्राथमिक goal of these states, which also explains उनके आधिकारिक name, is to guide उनके संबंधित countries in the प्रक्रम of भवन socialism, ultimately leading to साम्यवादी.
Communist states may have अनेक विधिक political पार्टियों, but the कम्युनिस्ट party is usually granted a special or प्रबल role in सरकारी, प्रायः by statute or under the constitution.
Consequently, the institutions of the state and of the communist party become intimately entwined, such as in the development of parallel institutions.
In the 20th century, सबसे communist राज्य adopted नियोजित economies.
However, there were exceptions : the सोवियत Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after World युद्ध ii allowed limited बाज़ार and a degree of worker self-management, while China, Vietnam और Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
in the 21st century, China and Vietnam have allowed a mixed अर्थव्यवस्था to develop.
the आधारभूत अवधारणाओं of communist states often diverge from the original socio-economic ideologies इससे which वे develop.
As a result, many adherents of ये ideologies often oppose the political systems commonly associated साथ these states.
For उदाहरण, dissenting साम्यवादियों ऐसे as Trotskyists were often opposed to the कम्युनिस्ट states of the 20th century, claiming either कि वे had nothing to do साथ `` real '' साम्यवादी or कि the ideology of such states had reached a point of अटल भ्रष्टाचार.
Michael फ्रेड Phelps ii ( born June 30, 1985 ) is a retired American swimmer और the most सजा ओलंपियन of all time, साथ a total of 22 medals.
Phelps also holds the all-time records लिये Olympic gold medals ( 18, double the दूसरी highest record holders ), Olympic gold medals in individual कार्यक्रम ( 11 ), और ओलम्पिक medals in व्यक्तिगत events for a male ( 13 ).
In winning eight सुनहरा medals at the 2008 बीजिंग Games, Phelps took the record for the most first-place finishes at कोई single ओलम्पिक Games.
Five of those victories were in व्यक्तिगत events, tying the single Games record.
In the 2012 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in London, फेल्प्स won four golds and two silver medals, making उसे the most successful athlete of the खेल for the third ओलंपिक in a row.
Phelps is the long course संसार recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly, 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter individual medley as well as the पूर्व long कोर्स world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle और 200-meter व्यक्तिगत medley.
He has जीती a total of 71 medals in प्रमुख international long-course competition, 57 gold, 11 silver, और तीन bronze spanning the Olympics, the World, और the पण Pacific Championships.
फेल्प्स 's international titles and record-breaking performances have earned him the World तैराक of the Year Award seven times and अमरीकी Swimmer of the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012.
उसके unprecedented Olympic success in 2008 earned Phelps Sports Illustrated पत्रिका 's sportsman of the Year award.
बाद the 2008 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक, फेल्प्स started the Michael Phelps Foundation, which focuses on growing the sport of तैराकी and promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further कार्य with his foundation बाद the 2012 Olympics, which he has said will be his last.
लेनोवो Group Limited ( ) is a चाइनीज बहुराष्ट्रीय computer हार्डवेयर and electronics company with इसके headquarters in Beijing, China and morrisville, North कैरोलिना and its पंजीकृत office in हांग काँग, China.
Its products include personal computers, टैब्लेट computers, मोबाईल फोन, workstations, सर्वर, electronic storage devices, IT management software and smart televisions.
Lenovo is the world 's second-largest PC विक्रेता by 2012 unit sales.
It markets the ThinkPad line of कोपी कंप्यूटर and the thinkcentre line of desktops.
Lenovo रै operations in more than 60 countries and sells इसके products in around 160 countries.
Lenovo was founded in Beijing in 1984 और incorporated in Hong Kong in 1988 under its previous name, लेजेंड.
लेनोवो is listed on the Hong काँग Stock एक्सचेंज and is a constituent of the Hang Seng China-Affiliated Corporations अनुक्रमणिका.
Slug is a common name for an apparently shell-less terrestrial gastropod mollusk.
The word `` slug '' is भी often प्रयुक्त as part of the common name of any gastropod mollusc that has no shell, has a बहुत reduced shell, or has तभी a small internal shell.
( इस is in contrast to the common name `` घोंघा ``, which is applied to gastropods कि have a coiled shell कि is विशाल पर्याप्त that the नरम भाग of the एनिमल can retract fully into it. )
Slugs मौजूद on land and in the sea, और वहीँ is भी एक genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to land slugs, whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater हैं usually referred to as `` समुद्र slugs `` और `` freshwater slugs ''.
जमीन gastropods with a shell कि is नहीं quite vestigial, but is too small to retract into ( जैसे many in the family urocyclidae ), हैं known as semislugs.
The विभिन्न taxonomic families of slugs form भाग of several quite different विकासवादी lineages which भी include snails.
Thus, for example, the various families of land slugs are not बहुत closely related to one another, despite a superficial similarity in the overall body form.
the shell-less condition has arisen many times independently during the evolutionary past, and यूँ the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, like सब other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting of the internal अंगों ) दौरान development.
internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the प्रभाव of इस rotation, but externally the bodies of जमीन slugs appear to be more or less सममित, except for the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one side of the animal, normally the सही hand side.
The soft, slimy लाशें of slugs हैं prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and जरूर retreat to नम hiding स्थान जब the weather is dry.
The subsequent information in this article applies to land slugs.

Sic, Cluj, a commune in रोमानिया

Napoleon Bonaparte (, ; 15 अगस्त 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a फ्रेंच सैन्य and political leader जो rose to prominence during the latter stages of the French क्रान्ति and इसके associated wars in Europe.
As Napoleon I, he थी Emperor of the French इससे 1804 to 1815.
His विधिक सुधार, the Napoleonic कोड, रै been a major influence on many civil विधि jurisdictions worldwide, but he is best remembered for his भूमिका in the युद्धों led विरूद्ध France by a श्रेणी of coalitions, the so-called Napoleonic युद्धों.
He established hegemony over सबसे of continental Europe and sought to spread the ideals of the French Revolution, while consolidating an इम्पीरियल monarchy जिससे लौटी aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime.
due to his success in these युद्धों, often against numerically superior enemies, he is generally regarded as one of the महानतम military commanders of all time, and his campaigns हैं पढ़ाई at military academies विश्वव्यापी.
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble Italian ancestry जिससे था settled Corsica in the 16th century.
He trained as an artillery officer in मेनलैंड फ़्रांस.
he रोज़ to prominence अंतर्गत the French First Republic and led successful campaigns विरूद्ध the पहला और Second Coalitions arrayed विरूद्ध France.
he led a कामयाब आक्रमण of the Italian प्रायद्वीप.
in 1799, he मंचन a तख्तापलट d'état and installed खुद as पहला Consul ; five years later the French Senate proclaimed him emperor, following a plebiscite in his favour.
In the पहला decade of the 19th सदी, the French साम्राज्य अंतर्गत नेपोलियन सगाई in a series of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that involved every प्रमुख European power.
बाद a streak of victories, France secured a dominant स्थिति in continental Europe, and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the formation of extensive alliances and the appointment of friends और परिवार members to rule other European countries as French क्लाएंट states.
The Peninsular War and 1812 फ्रेंच आक्रमण of Russia चिह्नित turning points in नेपोलियन 's fortunes.
His ग्रांडे Armée was badly damaged in the campaign and never fully बरामद.
In 1813, the Sixth Coalition defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the following year the Coalition invaded फ़्रांस, forced नेपोलियन to abdicate और exiled उसे to the island of Elba.
Less than a year बाद, he escaped Elba और returned to power, but was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815.
नेपोलियन spent the पिछला six years of उसके life in कारावास by the British on the island of संत Helena.
An autopsy concluded he died of पेट cancer, but there रै been कुछ debate about the कारण of उसके मौत, as कुछ scholars have speculated that he was a शिकार of arsenic विषाक्तता.
This is a chronological listing of the United States Senators from Pennsylvania.
United States Senators are popularly elected, for a six-year term, beginning January 3.
चुनावों are held the पहला Tuesday बाद नवम्बर 1.
पहले 1914, they were chosen by the Pennsylvania General Assembly, and before 1935, their शर्तें began March 4.
The South अफ़्रीकी national rugby union team ( known as the springboks ) represents South Africa in rugby union.
They compete in the सालाना Rugby Championship, along with southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina, Australia and नई जीलैंड.
They have won इस championship on three अवसरों in sixteen years.
वे are currently ranked second in the world by the International Rugby Board, और were named 2008 संसार टोली of the Year at the Laureus World Sports पुरस्कार.
हालांकि South अफ़्रीकी was instrumental in the सृष्टि of the Rugby World कप competition, the Springboks did not compete in the पहला दो संसार Cups in 1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South अफ़्रीकी.
the team made its World Cup डेब्यू in 1995, जब the newly democratic South Africa hosted the टूर्नामेंट.
The springboks तब defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in the फाइनल, जिससे is now remembered as one of the महानतम moments in दक्षिण Africa 's sporting history, और a watershed पल in the post-apartheid nation-building process.
South अफ़्रीकी regained their title as champions 12 years later, when वे defeated इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the 2007 final.
As a result of the 2007 संसार Cup tournament the Springboks were promoted to पहला place in the आईआरबी World Rankings, a स्थिति they held until July the following year when नई Zealand regained the top स्पॉट.
The Springboks खेल in green और gold jerseys, and their emblems हैं the Springbok and the Protea.
the पक्ष has been playing international रग्बी since 1891, when a British Isles side toured the स्वदेश, playing दक्षिण Africa in their first परीक्षण on 30 July.
South अफ़्रीकी was coached by Jake White, who led the Boks to the 2007 World कप title, announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007.
उसके replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) अनुबंध expired in 2011, following a 11–9 शिकस्त to Australia in the रग्बी World कप quarter-final, जो तब stated he would not be signing a नई deal.
The पिछला captain was John Smit, जो before he रिटायर्ड in 2011 निभाई hooker लिये most of his career, हालांकि he रै also महरूम a prop, mainly in 2008 and 2009.
Due to smit being अनुपलब्ध for the November 2010 परीक्षण बाद सर्जरी, lock Victor Matfield took Smit 's प्लेस as captain लिये that tour.
the वर्तमान कप्तान is जां de Villiers.
The बैटल of gettysburg (, with an ध्वनि ), थी fought July 1–3, 1863, in and around the town of gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
it was the battle with the largest number of हताहत in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध and is often described as the war 's turning point.
Union maj. Gen. जार्ज Gordon meade 's फौज of the Potomac पराजित attacks by Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee 's Army of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया, समाप्ति ली 's invasion of the North.
बाद उसके success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863, Lee led उसके army through the Shenandoah Valley to begin his दूसरी आक्रमण of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign.
With his फौज in high spirits, Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up उनके prosecution of the war by penetrating as दूर as harrisburg, Pennsylvania, or even Philadelphia.
prodded by President Abraham Lincoln, Maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker moved his army in pursuit, but थी सुकून बस three दिनों before the battle और replaced by Meade.
Elements of the दो armies initially collided at gettysburg on जुलाई 1, 1863, as Lee तत्काल concentrated his forces there, his objective being to engage the Union army और destroy it.
Low ridges to the northwest of town were defended initially by a Union प्यादे division under ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जॉन Buford, और soon reinforced साथ two corps of Union infantry.
however, two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest and north, collapsing the hastily विकसित संघ lines, sending the defenders retreating through the गलियों of कस्बा to the पहाड़ियाँ बस to the दक्षिण.
On the दूसरी दिन of battle, most of both armies था assembled.
The संघ line was laid आउट in a रक्षात्मक formation resembling a fishhook.
In the late afternoon of July 2, Lee launched a heavy उत्पीड़न on the संघ left flank, and fierce fighting raged at Little Round Top, the wheatfield, शैतान 's Den, and the आड़ू Orchard.
On the Union right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on Culp 's हिल and Cemetery हिल.
All आरपार the रणभूमि, despite significant losses, the Union defenders held उनके lines.
On the तीसरा day of battle, July 3, fighting resumed on culp 's Hill, and cavalry battles raged to the east and south, लकिन the प्रमुख event was a dramatic infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the बीच of the Union line on कब्रिस्तान Ridge, known as Pickett 's Charge.
The charge थी repulsed by Union rifle और तोपखाने fire, at ग्रेट losses to the Confederate army.
Lee led his army on a torturous retreat back to Virginia.
between 46,000 and 51,000 सैनिको from both armies were हताहत in the three-day बैटल.
That November, President lincoln used the dedication ceremony for the Gettysburg National Cemetery to सम्मान the गिरे संघ soldiers and redefine the purpose of the युद्ध in his ऐतिहासिक gettysburg Address.
An academic discipline, or field of study, is a शाखा of knowledge that is taught and researched at the college or university स्तर.
Disciplines are defined ( in भाग ), and recognized by the अकादमिक जर्नल्स in जिससे शोध is published, और the सीखे societies and अकादमिक विभाग or faculties to which उनके practitioners belong.
However, there exists no formal criteria लिये जब educational programs और scholarly journals form an academic discipline.
a huge अंतर exists between, on the one hand, well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities सब over the संसार, have a long इतिहास, and have a खूब स्थापित set of जर्नल्स and conferences, और, on the अन्य hand, suggestions लिये new fields समर्थित only by few universities और publications.
Fields of study प्रायः have several sub-disciplines or branches, and the distinguishing lines between ये हैं often both मनमानी and अस्पष्ट.
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development लकिन also used as a general-purpose programming language.
PHP is now installed on more than 244 million websites और 2.1 million web servers.
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the reference implementation of पीएचपी is now produced by The पीएचपी Group.
While PHP originally stood for Personal घर Page, it now stands for PHP : Hypertext Preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP code is interpreted by a वेब server with a पीएचपी processor module which generates the resulting web page : PHP कमांड can be embedded directly into an एचटीएमएल source document rather than calling an external file to process data.
It has also evolved to include a command-line interface काबिलियत and can be used in स्टैंडअलोन आलेखीय applications.
PHP is फ़्री software released under the PHP License, जिससे is असंगत साथ the ग्नू General पब्लिक License ( GPL ) due to प्रतिबंध on the usage of the term PHP.
PHP can be तैनात on most वेब servers और also as a standalone shell on लगभग every operating system और platform, free of चार्ज.
जॉन fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), प्रायः referred to by his आद्याक्षर JFK, was the 35th President of the United राज्य, सेवारत from 1961 जबतक his death in 1963.
After military सेवा as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण Pacific, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. हाउस of प्रतिनिधि from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the u.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर Roosevelt ), और the first person born in the 20th century to serve as अध्यक्ष.
A कैथोलिक, Kennedy is the only non- प्रोटोस्टेंट president, and is the तभी president to have जीती a पुलित्जर पुरस्कार.
Events during his presidency शामिल the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban मिसाइल संकट, the building of the Berlin Wall, the Space रेस, the African-American Civil अधिकारों गति, and early stages of the Vietnam युद्ध.
Therein, कैनेडी increased the number of military advisers, special operation forces, and helicopters in an प्रयत्न to curb the spread of communism in South ईस्ट एशिया.
The Kennedy administration adopted the नीति of the Strategic Hamlet कार्यक्रम which थी implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It शामिल निश्चित मजबूर relocation, village internment, और पृथक्करण of rural दक्षिण Vietnamese from the उत्तरी and दक्षिणी communist insurgents.
कैनेडी was assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime, but he थी शॉट and killed by जोकर Ruby two दिनों बाद, पहले a विचारण could take place.
The एफबीआई और the Warren Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the लोन assassin.
However, the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
however, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, confirmed the findings of the वारेन Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense tfx fighter bomber program led to a congressional investigation कि lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private life रै आइये to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become better known, especially since the 1990s.
हालांकि initially kept रहस्य from the सामान्य public, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy बाँधने अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय दरजा of U.S. presidents.
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King and written by King, जेरी Leiber, and माइक Stoller, inspired by the spiritual `` रब Stand by Me, '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
There have महरूम over 400 recorded versions of the सोंग.
a political cartoon from an 1894 पक पत्रिका by illustrator s.d. ehrhart, shows a farm woman labeled `` Democratic पार्टी '' sheltering इससे a tornado of political बदलें.
A रूपक is a figure of वाक कि describes a subject by asserting that it is, on some point of comparison, the वही as another otherwise unrelated object.
Metaphor is a प्रकार of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical figures of speech that achieve उनके प्रभाव via association, तुलना or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, and simile.
in simpler terms, a रूपक compares दो वस्तुएँ or things without using the words `` like '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent examples of a रूपक in अंग्रेज़ी literature is the सब the world 's a स्टेज monologue इससे As You Like It :
All the world 's a stage,
And all the men and women merely players ;
वे have their exits और their entrances ; — William Shakespeare, As तुम जैसे It, 2/7
This quote is a रूपक because the संसार is not literally a stage.
By figuratively asserting that the world is a stage, Shakespeare uses the points of comparison between the world और a स्टेज to convey an understanding about the mechanics of the संसार and the lives of the people within it.

Printmaking is the process of making artworks by मुद्रण, सामान्यतः on पेपर.
Printmaking normally कवर only the process of बनाना prints with an तत्व of originality, बल्कि than just being a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक reproduction of a painting.
Except in the case of monotyping, the process is सक्षम of producing multiples of the वही टुकड़ा, which is called a print.
प्रत्येक print produced is not माना a `` नक़ल '' but बल्कि is considered an `` असली ''.
This is because typically प्रत्येक print varies to an extent due to परिवर्तनीय intrinsic to the printmaking process, और also because the imagery of a print is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another work लकिन बल्कि is often a unique image designed from the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking तकनीक.
A छपाई may be ज्ञात as an impression.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not चुनी only for इसके क्षमता to उपज multiple impressions, but बल्कि for the unique qualities that each of the printmaking प्रक्रियाओं lends itself to.
Prints हैं created by transferring ink इससे a matrix or through a prepared screen to a चादर of paper or other material.
आम types of matrices include : metal plates, usually तांबे or जस्ता, or polymer plates for नक्काशी or etching ; stone, एल्यूमिनियम, or पॉलिमर for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts.
Screens made of रेशा or synthetic fabrics हैं used for the screenprinting process.
Other प्रकार of matrix substrates and related processes are discussed below.
Multiple impressions printed from the same matrix form an संस्करण.
Since the लेट 19th सदी, artists have generally signed individual impressions from an edition and often क्रमांक the impressions to form a limited edition.
Prints may also be printed in किताब form, such as illustrated किताबे or artist 's किताबे.
Il Divo is an English multinational operatic pop गायन समूह created by म्यूज़िक manager, executive, and reality TV star Simon Cowell.
Formed in the संयुक्त Kingdom, वे हैं भी हस्ताक्षरित to Cowell 's record label, Syco Music.
Il Divo is a समूह of four male singers : French pop singer सेबेस्तियन izambard, Spanish baritone Carlos Marín, अमरीकी tenor David Miller, and Swiss tenor उर्स Bühler.
To date, they have sold more than 26 million albums worldwide.

An interceptor aircraft ( or बस interceptor ) is a type of सेनानी वायुयान designed specifically to prevent missions of enemy aircraft, particularly बमवर्षक and reconnaissance वायुयान, और नष्ट them, relying usually on ग्रेट speed और powerful armament.
Being used since the पहला संसार युद्ध, after the late 1960s, interceptors became कम important due to shifting from बमवर्षक to intercontinental ballistic missiles ( ICBMs ) लिये nuclear warfare.
A Vietnamese American ( ) is an American of Vietnamese descent.
वे मेक up about half of all विदेशी वियतनामी ( Người Việt Hải Ngoại ) और are the fourth-largest एशियाई American group.
द्रव्यमान Vietnamese immigration to the United States started after 1975, after the end of the Vietnam युद्ध.
Early immigrants यहूद refugee boat people fleeing persecution or poverty.
Forced to भागो from उनके homeland and often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods, these newcomers have nevertheless प्रबंधित to स्थापित दमदार समुदायों in a short amount of time.
अधिक than sixty प्रतिशत of वियतनामी Americans reside in the states of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Texas, Washington, फ्लोरिडा, और Virginia.

Adolf Hitler committed आत्महत्या by gunshot on 30 April 1945 in his führerbunker in बर्लिन.
His wife Eva ( née braun ) वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या with उसे by ingesting cyanide.
कि afternoon, in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions, their remains were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit, doused in petrol and नियत alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker.
the सोवियत अभिलेख record that उनके जले remains were recovered and interred in successive locations until 1970 when they were again exhumed, cremated and the ashes बिखरे.
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only और another कि he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, while biting bas on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary historians have rejected ये accounts as होने either Soviet propaganda or an attempted compromise in order to reconcile the different conclusions.
One eye-witness recorded that the देह showed signs of having महरूम शॉट through the mouth, but इस has महरूम सिद्ध असंभावित.
वहीँ is भी विवाद regarding the authenticity of skull और जबड़ों fragments जिससे were recovered.
In 2009, DNA tests were performed on a skull सोवियत officials था long believed to be हिटलर 's.
the tests revealed that the कपाल थी actually कि of a woman less than 40 years old.
Location of Missouri
the alcohol laws of Missouri हैं among the least प्रतिबंधक और सबसे lax and permissive in the United States.
मिसौरी is known throughout the Midwest लिये its largely laissez-faire approach to alcohol विनियमन, in sharp कंट्रास्ट to the very सख्त दारू laws of कुछ of its neighbors, like Kansas and Oklahoma.
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome, is a विरल infection of the deeper layers of skin और subcutaneous ऊतकों, easily spreading across the fascial प्लेन भीतर the subcutaneous tissue.
necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing, having वृहद risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes, cancer, etc.
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and is usually treated immediately with high doses of intravenous एंटीबायोटिक.
Type I describes a polymicrobial infection, whereas Type II describes a monomicrobial infection.
अनेक प्रकार of जीवाणु can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ), Staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, Bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
ऐसे infections are more संभावित to occur in people साथ compromised immune systems.
Historically, Group A streptococcus made up most मामले of Type ii infections.
However, since as जल्दी as 2001, another serious रूप of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis रै been observed साथ increasing आवृत्ति, caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ).
Some published मामला reports have implied a possible कड़ी between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs और nf, though the प्रमाण of the link थी said to be कमजोर because of a small number of case patients और it was unclear whether the drugs बस masked the symptoms of a secondary संक्रमण or were a cause प्रति se.
World War ii ( WWII or WW2 ), also known as the Second World युद्ध, थी a global युद्ध that lasted from 1939 to 1945.
it involved the vast majority of the world 's nations —including all of the great powers —eventually forming two opposing सैन्य alliances : the allies and the Axis.
It was the most widespread war in history, with more than 100 लाख people सेवारत in military units from over 30 अलग countries.
In a state of `` total war ``, the प्रमुख भागीदार placed their संपूर्ण economic, औद्योगिक, and वैज्ञानिक capabilities at the सेवा of the युद्ध effort, erasing the distinction between civilian और military resources.
Marked by द्रव्यमान deaths of civilians, including the Holocaust और the only use of nuclear हथियार in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities.
These deaths make संसार War II by दूर the deadliest विरोध in human इतिहास.
the Empire of जापानी aimed to dominate East Asia and थी already at युद्ध साथ the Republic of China in 1937, but the world war is generally कहा to have begun on 1 September 1939 with the आक्रमण of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of युद्ध on जर्मनी by France and Britain.
From लेट 1939 to जल्दी 1941, in a series of campaigns और treaties, Germany formed the अक्ष गठबंधन with इटली, conquering or subduing much of महाद्वीपीय Europe.
following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, Germany and the Soviet Union partitioned और annexed territories between themselves of their यूरोपीय neighbours, including Poland.
The United Kingdom and the अन्य members of the British Commonwealth यहूद the only major Allied शक्तियां continuing the fight against the अक्ष, साथ battles लेने प्लेस in North Africa as खूब as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
in June 1941, the यूरोपीय Axis launched an आक्रमण of the सोवियत Union, giving a start to the largest land theatre of युद्ध in इतिहास, जिससे tied down the major part of the अक्ष ' सैन्य forces लिये the rest of the war.
in December 1941, Japan joined the Axis, attacked the संयुक्त राज्य and European territories in the Pacific समंदर, and जल्दी conquered much of the पश्चिमी प्रशांत.
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942, बाद Japan lost a श्रेणी of नवल battles and European Axis troops were defeated in North अफ़्रीकी and, decisively, at Stalingrad.
In 1943, with a श्रेणी of German defeats in Eastern Europe, the Allied आक्रमण of इटली, and American victories in the प्रशांत, the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts.
in 1944, the पश्चिमी Allies invaded France, while the सोवियत संघ regained all of its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies.
दौरान 1944 and 1945 the United राज्य पराजित the Japanese नेवी and captured key Western Pacific islands.
The युद्ध in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by Soviet and पॉलिश troops और the subsequent German unconditional आत्मसमर्पण on 8 May 1945.
Following the Potsdam घोषणा by the Allies on 26 July 1945, the United राज्य dropped atomic bombs on the Japanese शहरों of Hiroshima on 6 August, और Nagasaki on 9 August.
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent, and the Soviet Union having घोषित war on जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया, जापानी surrendered on 15 August 1945, ending the war in Asia और cementing the total विजय of the Allies over the Axis.
World War II altered the political alignment और social structure of the world.
The United राष्ट्र ( UN ) was established to foster international cooperation और prevent future conflicts.
The ग्रेट शक्तियां that यहूद the victors of the war—the United States, the Soviet Union, China, the संयुक्त किंगडम, and France—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the United Nations सुरक्षा परिषद.
the Soviet Union and the संयुक्त राज्य emerged as rival superpowers, setting the stage लिये the Cold War, which lasted लिये the next 46 years.
meanwhile, the influence of European ग्रेट powers प्रारंभ to decline, जबकि the decolonisation of Asia and अफ़्रीकी began.
Most countries whose industries था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त स्थानांतरित towards आर्थिक रिकवरी.
राजनैतिक integration, especially in Europe, emerged as an effort to stabilise postwar relations and fight more effectively in the Cold युद्ध.
A limited liability company ( llc ) is a लचीली form of एंटरप्राइज़ that blends elements of साझेदारी and corporate structures.
नोट than an llc is not a corporation, और कॉलिंग an LLC a corporation is technically incorrect.
an llc is a legal रूप of company that provides limited liability to its owners in the विशाल बहुमत of United States jurisdictions.
LLCs do नहीं need to be व्यवस्थित for profit.
Five K-Cups
The inside of a प्रयुक्त K-Cup, साथ the शीर्ष foil and the प्रयुक्त coffee grounds removed.
इस shows the filter अंदर the K-Cup.
K-Cup portion packs हैं used साथ Keurig or other single cup brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप of coffee, tea, or hot chocolate.
प्रत्येक K-Cup is a plastic container with a coffee फिल्टर inside.
मैदान coffee beans हैं packed in the k-cup और sealed air-tight with a संयोजन plastic and foil ढक्कन.
जब the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup and शक्तियां hot water under दबाव through the K-Cup and into a mug.
keurig licenses इसके K-Cup प्रौद्योगिकी to coffee roasters and चाय makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, Diedrich/ Gloria Jeans, Timothy 's संसार Coffee, Van houtte, हिरण Coffee, Celestial Seasonings, Bigelow Tea Company, twinings, Tully 's, कॉफी People and Newman 's Own.
Keurig 's patents on the असली K-Cup design समाप्त in September 2012.
keurig holds at least one अतिरिक्त, still-active US patent and another पेटेंट application, detailing सुधार कि have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design.
Electa Pocket Chronograph ( ca. 1890s ) manufactured by the gallet देखें Company in La chaux-de-fonds, स्विट्ज़रलैंड.

A chronograph is a specific type of देखें that is used as a stopwatch संयुक्त with a display देखें.
A basic chronograph has an independent स्वीप दूसरी hand ; it can be started, रोका, और लौटे to zero by successive pressure on the stem.
Louis moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional पीसीआई ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect, part of the PCI लोकल Bus मानक और often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer बस for attaching हार्डवेयर devices in a computer.
the PCI bus supports the functions found on a processor बस, लकिन in a standardized format that is independent of any particular प्रोसेसर.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the प्रोसेसर to be connected directly to the processor bus, और हैं assigned addresses in the processor 's पता space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an एकीकृत circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, पुकारा a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion कार्ड that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in ibm PC compatibles, where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one vesa Local बस as the बस configuration.
It has subsequently been adopted for other computer types.
पीसीआई और PCI-X are होने replaced by पीसीआई Express, लकिन, most motherboards are still बना with one or more पीसीआई स्लॉट, which हैं sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification covers the शारीरिक size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board किनारे विद्युत contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus समय, and protocols.
The specification can be purchased from the PCI Special ब्याज Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : संजाल ताश, sound cards, modems, अतिरिक्त ports such as usb or serial, tv ट्यूनर cards और disk controllers.
PCI वीडियो cards replaced ISA and vesa ताश, until growing बैंडविड्थ requirements outgrew the capabilities of पीसीआई ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain available for use with old PCs without AGP or पीसीआई Express slots.
Many devices previously provided on पीसीआई expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in universal serial बस और PCI एक्स्प्रेस versions.
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born October 7, 1957 ) is an American contemporary ईसाई संगीतकार, who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the मुख्यधारा charts.
His biggest success in मुख्यधारा music was in 1991 when `` प्लेस in this World '' hit no. 6 on the Billboard Hot 100.
Smith is a three-time Grammy Award winner, and has अर्जित 40 dove पुरस्कार.
Over the course of his career, he sold अधिक than 13 million albums और recorded 29 No. 1 Hit songs, चौदह gold albums, and पाँच platinum albums.
Smith is an American म्यूज़िक Award recipient ; he was also named one of People पत्रिका 's `` सबसे Beautiful People ''.
an अमरीकी poster from the World War II -era that was used to inform लोगों about what वे should do if वे suspect sabotage.
Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through subversion, obstruction, disruption, or विनाश.
in a workplace सेटिंग, sabotage is the conscious वापसी of दक्षता generally directed at causing कुछ बदलें in workplace conditions.
One जो engages in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur.
As a नियम, saboteurs try to conceal their identities because of the consequences of their actions.
For उदाहरण, whereas an environmental pressure group might be प्रसन्न to be identified साथ an act of sabotage, it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators known.
पैट्रिक हेनरी College ( phc ) is a private, independent college with an Evangelical Christian आधार that focuses on teaching शास्त्रीय उदार arts and सरकारी, located in Purcellville, Virginia, United States.
पैट्रिक Henry is known for इसके रूढ़िवादी evangelical ईसाई फ़ोकस.
as of अप्रैल 17, 2007, the college was accredited by the Transnational संघ of Christian Colleges और Schools, a national faith-related accrediting organization पहचाना by the Department of शिक्षा and the परिषद for उच्चतर Education प्रत्यायन.
The school थी founded with the help of the Home School Legal Defense संघ, and now serves as the headquarters for the organization, with which it is still closely connected.
the history of टेलीविज़न comprises the work of numerous engineers और inventors in several countries over अनेक decades.
the earliest प्रस्ताव was in 1908, in a paper by a. A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the उपयोग of कैथोड rays.
The first व्यावहारिक demonstrations of television, however, were developed using electromechanical विधि to स्कैन, transmit, and reproduce an image.
As electronic कैमरा and प्रदर्शक tubes were perfected, electromechanical television दिया way to all-electronic प्रणालियों in nearly all अनुप्रयोग.

A ठेठ multiplex ( एएमसी Promenade 16 in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a cinema, movie house, फिल्मी house, film थिएटर or picture हाउस ) is a venue, प्रायः a building, लिये viewing films.
Most but नहीं all फिल्म theaters हैं commercial परिचालन केटरिंग to the general public, who attend by purchasing a ticket.
The movie is projected with a movie projector onto a large projection screen at the front of the auditorium.
Most movie थिएटर are now equipped for digital cinema projection, निकालना the need to create and transport a physical फिल्मी print.

A motorcycle club is a समूह of individuals जिनकी प्राथमिक ब्याज and activities involve motorcycles.
Lyme disease, Lyme borreliosis is an infectious disease caused by at least three प्रजाति of bacteria belonging to the genus Borrelia.
borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main कारण of lyme बीमारी in उत्तर अमेरिका, whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii कारण most European मामले.
The disease is नामित after the कस्बों of Lyme और Old Lyme, Connecticut, USA, where a number of cases were identified in 1975.
Although Allen Steere realized कि Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the cause of the बीमारी remained a mystery until 1981, जब B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy burgdorfer.
Lyme disease is the most common tick-borne बीमारी in the Northern Hemisphere.
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the bite of infected ticks belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
Early लक्षण may include fever, headache, fatigue, अवसाद, और a characteristic circular skin rash पुकारा erythema migrans ( EM ).
Left अनुपचारित, बाद symptoms may involve the joints, दिल, and central बेचैन system.
In most cases, the संक्रमण and its symptoms are eliminated by antibiotics, especially if the बीमारी is treated जल्दी.
Delayed or inadequate treatment can lead to more serious symptoms, which can be disabling and मुश्किल to treat.
penises of minke whales on display at the Icelandic Phallological Museum
Penis ( बहुवचन penises or penes ) is a general पद for the organs with which male और उभयलिंगी animals introduce sperm into receptive females during copulation.
Such organs occur in many animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, but males do not bear a penis in every animal species, and in those species in जिससे the male does bear a so-called penis, the penes in the various प्रजाति are not necessarily homologous.
For example, the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the penis of a male insect or barnacle.
the term शिश्न applies to many reproductive intromittent organs, but not to all ; लिये उदाहरण the intromittent organ of सबसे cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised arm, और male spiders use their pedipalps.
in most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis, it has no प्रमुख फलन अन्य than intromission, or at least conveying the sperm to the female, लकिन in the placental mammals the शिश्न bears the distal भाग of the urethra, which discharges both मूत्र दौरान urination और semen दौरान copulation as the अवसर requires.
Artists और repertoire ( a & R ) is the division of a record label or म्यूज़िक publishing company that is responsible for हुनर scouting and overseeing the कलाकारी development of recording artists and/or songwriters.
It भी acts as a liaison between कलाकारों and the record लेबल or प्रकाशन company ; every activity involving कलाकारों to the point of एल्बम रिलीज is generally माना under the purview of, and responsibility of, a & R.
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary units equal to one-eighth of a mile, equivalent to 220 yards, 660 feet, 40 rods, or 10 chains.
The सटीक value of the furlong varies थोड़ा among English-speaking देशों.
Five furlongs are approximately 1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ).
Since the असली definition of the metre थी one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident with the मध्याह्न of longitude passing through पेरिस ), the circumference of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.

Lithium 9 volt, AA, & AAA आकार
लिथियम batteries हैं disposable ( प्राथमिक ) batteries that have lithium metal or lithium यौगिकों as an anode.
They stand अलावा from other बैटरी in उनके ऊँची charge घनत्व ( long life ) and high लागत प्रति ईकाई.
depending on the design and chemical compounds प्रयुक्त, lithium cells can produce voltages from 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or alkaline बैटरी ) to about 3.7 V. लिथियम batteries are widely used in उत्पाद ऐसे as portable consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक devices.
Raymond `` Ray '' Charles Jack LaMontagne ( ; born जून 18, 1973 ) is an American singer-songwriter.
LaMontagne has released four studio albums, Trouble, Till the Sun turns Black, Gossip in the Grain and परमेश्वर Willin ' & the Creek do n't Rise.
He थी born in नई हैम्पशायर and was inspired to create music after hearing an album by स्टीफन Stills.
Critics have compared LaMontagne 's music to that of the बैंड, वैन Morrison, Nick Drake, और टिम buckley.
he lives in मैसाचुसेट्स साथ उसके wife और दो children.

Facebook is an online social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic साल by कुछ university administrations in the United States to सहायता students get to know each अन्य.
It was संस्थापित in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with उसके college roommates and fellow Harvard University students एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and क्रिस ह्यूजेस.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard students, but was expanded to अन्य colleges in the Boston क्षेत्रफल, the आइवी League, and स्टैनफोर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों.
it gradually added support for विद्यार्थी at various other universities before खोलने to ऊँची school students, and आखिरकार to anyone aged 13 and over.
फेसबुक now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years old to become registered users of the site.
उपयोक्ता जरूर register before using the site, बाद जिससे they may बनाएँ a personal profile, add other users as friends, और exchange संदेश, सहित automatic notifications when they update their प्रोफ़ाइल.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user समूह, organized by workplace, school or college, or other characteristics, and categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे Work '' or `` बंद Friends ''.
As of September 2012, फेसबुक रै over one billion active users.
According to a May 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स survey, there are 7.5 million children under 13 with खाते and 5 लाख under 10, violating the site 's शर्तें of service.
In may 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, and Jim Breyer added $ 1 लाख of उसके own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used social networking सेवा by विश्वव्यापी मासिक क्रियाशील users.
Entertainment साप्ताहिक शामिल the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची, saying, `` How on earth किया we stalk our exes, याद our co-workers ' जन्मदिन, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous पहले फेसबुक ? ''
आलोचकों, such as फेसबुक Detox, राज्य that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of time lost and प्रोत्साहित आत्ममोह.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly unique u.S. विज़िटर in May 2011.
according to Social Media आज, in अप्रैल 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the u.S. population had a Facebook account.
nevertheless, Facebook 's मार्केट विकास started to stall in some regions, साथ the site losing 7 million क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in the United States and Canada in may 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1, 2012, और was headquartered in मेनलो Park, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the public and trading on the नैस्डैक on May 18, 2012.
Erwin Johannes Eugen ख़बरों ( 15 November 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly ज्ञात as The मरुस्थल Fox ( Wüstenfuchs, ), थी a जर्मनी Field Marshal of संसार युद्ध ii.
He earned the respect of both उसके own troops and the दुश्मनों he लड़ा.
Rommel was a अत्यधिक decorated officer in World War I और was awarded the Pour le Mérite लिये his exploits on the इतालवी front.
In World War II, he further distinguished खुद as the commander of the 7th Panzer Division during the 1940 आक्रमण of France.
His नेतृत्व of German and Italian forces in the उत्तर African campaign स्थापित him as one of the most समर्थ कमांडरों of the युद्ध, और अर्जित उसे the appellation of the मरुस्थल Fox.
He is regarded as one of the सबसे skilled commanders of desert warfare in the विरोध.
He later commanded the जर्मनी forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in normandy.
His assignments never took him to the Eastern सामने.
Rommel is regarded as having been a humane और professional officer.
His Afrika कोर्प्स was never accused of war crimes, and सैनिको captured दौरान his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
आदेश to मार यहूदी soldiers, नागरिकों और captured कमांडो were ignored.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the षड्यंत्र to assassinate Adolf Hitler.
चूंकि ख़बरों was a national hero, Hitler desired to eliminate him quietly.
He मजबूर Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill, in return for assurances that Rommel 's family would not be persecuted following उसके death.

the सात gifts of the पावन Spirit is an enumeration of seven आध्यात्मिक gifts originating with patristic authors, later elaborated by five intellectual virtues and four other groups of ethical विशेषताएँ.
They are : अक्ल, understanding, wonder और डरते ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, knowledge, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).

Earth दिन is an annual event, celebrated on April 22, on which कार्यक्रम हैं held worldwide to demonstrate support for environmental protection.
It was first मनाये in 1970, and is अभी coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network, और celebrated in more than 192 countries each year.
in 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in सैन Francisco, the तिथि proposed थी March 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere.
This day of nature 's equipoise was later sanctioned in a Proclamation हस्ताक्षरित by सचिव General U Thant at the United राष्ट्र.
a month बाद a separate Earth Day was संस्थापित by United States Senator gaylord नेल्सन as an पर्यावरणीय teach-in first held on April 22, 1970.
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential पदक of स्वतंत्रता Award in मान्यता of his work.
While this April 22 Earth Day थी focused on the United States, an organization launched by Denis हेज़, who थी the असली national coordinator in 1970, took it अंतरराष्ट्रीय in 1990 और organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous समुदायों celebrate Earth सप्ताह, an entire week of activities केन्द्रित on environmental issues.
Iodine is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ symbol I and atomic number 53.
The name is इससे Greek ioeidēs, meaning violet or purple, due to the रंग of elemental आयोडीन वाष्प.
आयोडीन and its यौगिकों are primarily used in nutrition, and industrially in the production of acetic acid and निश्चित polymers.
Iodine 's relatively high atomic क्रमांक, low toxicity, and ease of attachment to organic compounds have बना it a part of many X-ray कंट्रास्ट materials in modern medicine.
Iodine रै तभी एक stable समस्थानिक.
a क्रमांक of iodine radioisotopes are also प्रयुक्त in medical applications.
Iodine is found on धरती मुख्यतः as the highly water-soluble iodide आयन, I−, जिससे concentrates it in oceans and brine तालों.
Like the other हैलोजन्स, free आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic molecule I2, and then only momentarily after being oxidized from आयोडाइड by an oxidant like free oxygen.
In the universe and on Earth, आयोडीन 's high परमाणु क्रमांक makes it a relatively विरल element.
However, its उपस्थिति in ocean जल रै given it a role in जीवविज्ञान.
it is the heaviest अनिवार्य element utilized widely by जीवन in biological कृत्यों ( तभी tungsten, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in अनेक soils, due to initial low abundance as a crust-element, and also leaching of soluble iodide by rainwater, has led to अनेक deficiency problems in land पशु और अंतर्देशीय human populations.
आयोडीन deficiency affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable कारण of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is जरूरी by higher पशु, which use it to synthesize thyroid हार्मोन, which contain the element.
Because of this function, radioisotopes of आयोडीन are concentrated in the thyroid gland along with nonradioactive iodine.
if inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a high fission उत्पाद उपज, concentrates in the thyroid, but is easily remedied साथ potassium iodide treatment.
lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence निर्णय बना by officials in the government, most प्रायः विधायक or सदस्यों of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by अनेक different प्रकार of लोगों and organized समूह, सहित individuals in the निजी sector, corporations, fellow legislators or government officials, or वकालत groups ( interest groups ).
lobbyists may be among a विधायक 's constituencies, meaning a voter or bloc of मतदाता within उसके or her चुनावी district, or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a कारोबार, or not.
Professional lobbyists हैं लोगों whose business is trying to influence विधान on behalf of a group or individual who hires them.
Individuals और nonprofit संगठन can also lobby as an act of स्वयंसेवा or as a small part of their सामान्य job ( for उदाहरण, a CEO meeting with a representative about a प्रोजेक्ट important to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
Governments प्रायः define and regulate organized group lobbying that has become influential.
The ethics and morality of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, जब the implication is that लोगों with अत्यधिक socioeconomic power are corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it away from निष्पक्षता ) in order to serve their own conflict of ब्याज.
But another side of lobbying is making sure कि others ' interests are duly defended against अन्य ' corruption, or भी simply बनाना sure that minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority.
लिये उदाहरण, a medical association, or a trade association of health insurance companies, may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of tobacco companies, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by सबसे people as justified ( विधिवत defending विरूद्ध others ' corruption ).
The difficulty in drawing उद्देश्य लाइनों between जिससे lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' और which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with which lobbyists or their क्लाइंट can argue कि उनके own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the प्रयत्न to influence legislation is a power struggle.
As in other फ़ॉर्म of power संघर्ष, ऐसे as war or law enforcement, motives range इससे to self-defense to fighting for justice, and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization.
Sunshine of your love गिटार रिफ
Cream यहूद a 1960s अंग्रेजों चट्टान supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist जोकर ब्रूस, guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton, and वादक Ginger बेकर.
उनके sound थी characterised by a hybrid of blues चट्टान, hard चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक rock, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing और vocals, जोकर Bruce 's आवाज़ and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
the group 's third एल्बम, पहियों of Fire, थी the world 's first platinum-selling दोगुना album.
Cream are widely regarded as being the world 's पहला successful supergroup.
In their career, they sold over 15 million एल्बम worldwide.
Cream 's music शामिल songs आधारित on traditional blues such as `` क्रॉसरोड्स `` और `` spoonful ``, and modern blues such as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as खूब as more eccentric songs ऐसे as `` Strange Brew ``, `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` टॉड ``.
Cream 's biggest हिट्स यहूद `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, क्रमांक 11 ), `` सनशाइन of Your Love `` ( US, number 5 ), `` श्वेत Room `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( us, number 28 ), and `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
मलाई बना a significant impact on the popular म्यूज़िक of the time, और, साथ साथ Jimi हेंड्रिक्स, and टेरी कठ of Chicago, popularised the उपयोग of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient musical theme that foreshadowed और influenced the emergence of अंग्रेजों bands ऐसे as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
The band 's live performances बहकावे progressive rock acts such as Rush.
मलाई यहूद inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1993.
वे were included in दोनो Rolling Stone और VH1 's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 Greatest Artists of All Time ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on vh1 's `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 कॉमेडी film लिखा और directed by John waters, and अभिनीत ricki Lake, Sonny बोनो, Debbie हैरी, Michael St. Gerard, Shawn थॉम्पसन, Colleen Fitzpatrick, जेरी Stiller, and in उसके last फिल्मी role, दैवी.
Hairspray was a नाटकीय departure इससे Waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended audience.
in fact, Hairsprays pg is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA.
नियत in 1962 Baltimore, Maryland, the फिल्मी घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था Tracy Turnblad as वो pursues stardom as a dancer on a local TV दिखाएँ and rallies against racial पृथक्करण.
Hairspray was तभी a मॉडरेट success upon इसके initial theatrical रिलीज, earning a modest gross of $ 8 लाख.
However, it managed to attract a larger audience on home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic.
Most critics praised the film, हालांकि some यहूद displeased with the overall campiness.
in 2002, the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the same name, which जीती आठ Tony पुरस्कार, including बेहतरीन musical in 2003.
A second film version of Hairspray, an अनुकूलन of the स्टेज musical, थी भी released by New Line सिनेमा in 2007, which included many changes of scripted items from the original.
The film भी ranks # 444 on साम्राज्य magazine 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest फिल्मों of all time.
A ईसाई denomination is an identifiable religious देह under a common name, structure, and doctrine भीतर christianity.
कुछ समूह included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the Catholic गिरिजाघर considers itself the one सच्चा church and the Apostolic See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination और do not have any formal denominational structure, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this श्रेणी.
Some groups हैं large ( e.g. Catholics, Lutherans, Anglicans or Baptists ), while others are just a few छोटी churches, and in सबसे cases the relative आकार is नहीं evident in this list.
आधुनिक movements ऐसे as Fundamentalist christianity, pietism, Evangelicalism, Pentecostalism और the Holiness गति sometimes cross denominational लाइनों, or in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the case for अनेक United और uniting चर्च, for example ).
Such subtleties and complexities are not clearly depicted here.
प्रमुख divisions within Christianity.
Note : This is not a पूरा list, but aims to provide a comprehensible overview of the diversity among denominations of christianity.
as there हैं reported to be लगभग 41,000 ईसाई denominations, many of which can नहीं be verified to be significant, तभी those denominations साथ Wikipedia articles होगा be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure that सब entries on इस list हैं notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, and comparative religionists there are considerable disagreements परिचय जिससे groups can be properly पुकारा Christian, disagreements arising primarily इससे doctrinal मतभेद between groups.
लिये the purpose of simplicity, this list is intended to प्रतिबिंबित the self-understanding of each denomination.
स्पष्टीकरण of different opinions concerning their status as Christian denominations can be found at their संबंधित articles.
There is no आधिकारिक recognition in most भाग of the world for religious bodies, and there is no official clearinghouse which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies.
प्रायः there is considerable disagreement between various चर्च about whether other churches should be labeled with pejorative terms such as `` cult '', or about whether इस or that group enjoys some माप of respectability.
Such considerations प्रायः vary इससे place to place, जहाँ one धार्मिक group may आनंद majority status in one प्रदेश, लकिन be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world.
समावेश on this सूची करता not indicate कोई judgment about the size, importance, or character of a group or its members.
1804 map of `` Louisiana ``, edged on the west by the Rocky kyu.
The louisiana Purchase ( `` बिक्री of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the संयुक्त States of America in 1803 of of France 's अर्जी to the territory of Louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) प्लस रद्दीकरण of debts worth 18 लाख francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a total sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 सेंट प्रति एकड़ ) for the louisiana territory ( $ लाख in dollars, less than 42 cents per एकड़ ).
the louisiana territory encompassed all or part of 15 present u.S. states and two कनाडाई provinces.
The land खरीदा contained सब of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, आयोवा, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that यहूद वेस्ट of the Mississippi River ; most of North डकोटा ; सबसे of South डकोटा ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas ; the portions of Montana, व्योमिंग, and Colorado ईस्ट of the Continental Divide ; Louisiana west of the Mississippi नदी, including the नगर of New Orleans ; और small portions of land कि would eventually become भाग of the Canadian provinces of Alberta और Saskatchewan.
फ़्रांस controlled this विशाल area from 1699 until 1762, the year it gave the territory to इसके ally Spain.
अंतर्गत Napoleon Bonaparte, France took back the territory in 1800 in the hope of building an साम्राज्य in North अमेरिका.
a slave revolt in हैती and an impending युद्ध with Britain, however, led France to लापरवाही these plans and sell the entire territory to the United States, जो had originally intended only to तलाश the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
The purchase of the territory of Louisiana took place during the प्रेसिडेंसी of थामस जेफरसन.
At the समय, the purchase faced घरेलू opposition because it थी thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain प्रावधानों for acquiring territory, Jefferson decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in order to हटाएँ फ़्रांस 's presence in the region and to protect both u.S. trade access to the port of नई Orleans and फ़्री ड्योढ़ी on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at Place d'armes, नई Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United States, 10 कूच 1804, as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` Cool Jerk '' is a popular song written by Donald Storball and originally performed by the capitols.
released in 1966, it reached No. 2 on the अमरीकी R & b chart और No. 7 on the pop chart.
The बैकिंग track लिये this song was actually अंकित ( secretly ) by the motown हाउस band The दुर्गंध भाइयो.
Per one of the दुर्गंध Brothers, the सोंग थी originally to be called `` pimp Jerk. ''
This was लिया इससे watching neighborhood pimps, जो होता dance in the clubs, लकिन were too `` cool '' to do the झटका like regular folks.
Their version थी subsequently नामित `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
the निर्माता थी afraid that a सोंग साथ the word pimp in the title would be बैन or नहीं प्राप्त much positive attention, और था the शीर्षक बदला to इसके current form.
the Go-Go 's, Todd rundgren, Big Trouble, Human Sexual Response, The la De Da 's, The Creation, और the Coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren किया उसके version in an विषम time signature ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky महसूस to the सोंग.
The Go-Go 's covered the song लिये उनके 1982 एल्बम Vacation and later re-recorded it for their 1990 album महानतम.
In the विशेषता फिल्मी घर अलोन 2 : खोया in New York, Uncle Frank ( gerry Bamman ) गाती `` Cool Jerk '' in the बरसात.
a संस्करण of the song with different lyrics ( `` do the Cool चाबुक '' ) is used in कूल Whip commercials.
A recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by Ricardo Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).

a league is a unit of length ( or, rarely, क्षेत्रफल ).
It was long common in Europe and Latin America, but it is no longer an official ईकाई in कोई nation.
The league originally referred to the distance a person could walk in an hour.
चूंकि the मध्य Ages, many मान have been निर्दिष्ट in several countries.
in the context of nautical distances, the 3 मील ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of average ऊँचाई ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can देखिए जब खड़ा at समुद्र स्तर.
Thus, a ship traveling एक `` league '' रै पहुँचे what थी previously the farthest दृश्य अलहदा on the क्षितिज.
The lack of a ऐतिहासिक and वैश्विक standard लिये the exact measure of a `` league '' can be accounted for by the variable उन्नयन of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State, a डोमिनियन of the British Commonwealth, having seceded इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of Ireland 's 32 counties.
Since 1949 it रै existed as the Republic of Ireland.
From इसके foundation, the Irish Free State थी embroiled in a civil युद्ध between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the Treaty and प्रतिद्वंद्वियों who supported a republic.
The pro-Treaty side, organised as Cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections.
They formed the government of the state until 1932, when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty गुट in Fianna fáil, जो पराजित them in an चुनाव.
The Irish state, despite its violent beginnings, has remained a liberal democracy throughout इसके अस्तित्व.
a new संविधान in 1937 removed many of the links साथ Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the दूसरी World युद्ध demonstrated its independence in foreign नीति matters from ब्रिटेन.
In 1948 Ireland formally बाएँ the British Commonwealth and adopted the शीर्षक of `` Republic ''.
In the आर्थिक गोला, the Irish state has था a mixed performance.
On स्वतंत्रता, it was one of the wealthier countries in Europe प्रति सिर of population.
However it भी inherited from अंग्रेजों नियम the समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी, emigration, uneven भौगोलिक development and lack of a देशी औद्योगिक आधार.
लिये much of इसके history, the state struggled to rectify ये problems.
particular peaks of emigration यहूद अंकित during the late 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, when the Irish अर्थव्यवस्था recorded छोटी विकास.
In the 1930s, Fianna Fáil governments attempted to create Irish domestic उद्योग using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these नीतियों were dropped in पक्ष of free trade with चयनित देशों and encouraging of foreign निवेश with low taxes.
This थी expanded when Ireland डाला the European Economic Community in 1972.
in the 1990s और 2000s, आयरलैंड experienced an आर्थिक boom ज्ञात as the Celtic Tiger, in which the देश 's जीडीपी surpassed many of इसके यूरोपीय पड़ोसी.
आव्रजन भी surpassed emigration, bringing the state 's population up to over 4 लाख.
However, चूंकि 2008, Ireland रै experienced a severe crisis in the banking sector and with sovereign debt.
The resultant आर्थिक slump has deepened the प्रभाव of the संसार recession on आयरलैंड.
इससे 1937 to 1998, the Irish constitution included a claim on उत्तरी आयरलैंड as a part of the national territory.
however, the राज्य also opposed and used इसके security forces विरूद्ध those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army, who tried to एकजुट Ireland by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s and 1980s और has continued on a reduced scale.
Irish governments meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the विरोध ज्ञात as The Troubles within Northern Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s.
the British government officially recognised the right of the Irish government to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish अनुबंध of 1985.
In 1998, as भाग of the Good Friday अनुबंध, the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to हटाएँ the territorial claim to उत्तरी Ireland और instead extend the right of Irish citizenship to all the लोगों of the द्वीप should they काश to have it.
जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स ( जुलाई 11, 1767february 23, 1848 ) was the sixth President of the संयुक्त States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as अमरीकी diplomat, Senator, and Congressional प्रतिनिधि.
He थी a member of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, National Republican, और later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams थी the बेटे of former President John Adams और Abigail एडम्स.
As a राजनयिक, Adams निभाई an important role in negotiating many international treaties, most notably the Treaty of Ghent, जिससे ended the War of 1812.
As Secretary of राज्य, he negotiated साथ the संयुक्त Kingdom over America 's northern border with कनाडा, negotiated साथ Spain the annexation of Florida, and authored the मुनरो doctrine.
Historians agree he थी one of the greatest diplomats and secretaries of state in American history.
As president, he sought to modernize the American अर्थव्यवस्था and promoted शिक्षा.
Adams enacted a part of his agenda and सशुल्क off much of the नेशनल debt.
He was stymied by a Congress controlled by his enemies, and उसके lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him.
He lost his 1828 bid लिये re-election to Andrew Jackson.
In doing so, he became the first अध्यक्ष चूंकि उसके father to serve a single term.
Adams is best known as a diplomat who तराशा अमेरिका 's foreign policy in line with his ardently राष्ट्रवादी commitment to America 's republican values.
अधिक recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' आजीवन, technological innovations and new अर्थात् of communication spread messages of religious पुनरुद्धार, social reform, and party politics.
Goods, money, और लोगों traveled more rapidly and efficiently than कभी before.
Adams थी निर्वाचित a u.S. प्रतिनिधि from Massachusetts after leaving office, सेवारत for the last 17 सालो of his life with far greater acclamation than he had हासिल as अध्यक्ष.
he is, so far, the तभी अध्यक्ष later elected to the United States House of Representatives ( though John टायलर was निर्वाचित to the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ).
Animated by his growing revulsion विरूद्ध गुलामी, एडम्स became a leading opponent of the Slave Power.
he predicted कि if a civil युद्ध were to break out, the president could abolish slavery by using his war powers.
एडम्स भी predicted the Union 's विच्छेद over the slavery issue, but said that if the South became independent वहीँ होता be a श्रेणी of bloody slave revolts.
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( ie9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web ब्राउजर इससे Microsoft.
It was released to the पब्लिक on March 14, 2011.
Microsoft has released Internet एक्सप्लोरर 9 as a प्रमुख out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the release schedule of any particular version of Windows, unlike पिछला versions.
it is the first version चूंकि Internet एक्सप्लोरर 2 to not be bundled with a Windows operating system, although कुछ OEMs have installed it साथ Windows 7 on उनके pcs, as well as new खिड़कियाँ 7 laptops.
the system आवश्यकताएँ लिये Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Vista सेवा पैक 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 साथ the Platform अद्यतन.
Windows XP और earlier are not supported.
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर to be supported on Windows विस्टा.
Both IA-32 और x64 builds are available.
अंतरजाल Explorer 9 supports several सीएसएस 3 properties, embedded आईसीसी v2 or v4 color प्रोफ़ाइल support via Windows Color System, और has improved JavaScript performance.
It is the last of the five प्रमुख web browsers to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ).
It also सुविधाएँ hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite, hardware-accelerated video rendering using मीडिया न्यास, imaging support provided by खिड़कियाँ Imaging Component, and high fidelity printing powered by the XML पेपर specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet एक्सप्लोरर 9 also supports the HTML5 वीडियो and audio tags and the वेब Open Font स्वरूप.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid और pain reliever पहला marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by Maurice Treener, सिर chemist at Miles, in elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed लिये relief of नाबालिग aches, pains, inflammation, ज्वर, headache, heartburn, खट्टा पेट, अपच, and hangovers, जबकि neutralizing excess stomach एसिड.
It was शुभारम्भ in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer बना to relieve जुकाम and flu, Alka-Seltzer Plus, was later introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin रूपांतर, Alka-Mints, was introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is currently स्वामित्व by Bayer schering फार्मा ag, Germany.
The नाम `` Alka-Seltzer '' रै been extended to incorporate an संपूर्ण line of medications बेची over the counter and taken by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving tablets कि form a carbonated समाधान in जल.
