A stalactite (, ; from the Greek stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', and meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( secondary mineral ) कि hangs from the ceiling of चूना caves.
It is a type of dripstone.
The corresponding formation on the floor of the गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations हैं used as an वैकल्पिक way to specify an academic degree instead of spelling आउट the शीर्षक in पूरा, such as in reference books जैसे Who 's Who and on business cards.
Many डिग्री have अधिक than one abbreviation.
In the UK, it is नहीं generally the कस्टम to punctuate abbreviations for डिग्री with full stops ( e.g. `` बीएससी '' बल्कि than `` B.Sc. ``.
रेस is a classification system used to categorize इंसानो into विशाल और पृथक populations or groups by anatomical, सांस्कृतिक, ethnic, जेनेटिक, भौगोलिक, historical, linguistic, religious, or social affiliation.
First प्रयुक्त to denote नेशनल संबद्धों, the term began to be प्रयुक्त to relate to physical traits in the 17th सदी.
in the early 20th century the term was often प्रयुक्त, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
जबकि biologists sometimes use the concept of race to मेक distinctions among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the वैज्ञानिक community suggest that the विचार of race often is used in a naive or simplistic रास्ता, i.e. that among इंसानो, race has no taxonomic significance : all जीना humans belong to the वही species, Homo sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions और groupings of दौड़ vary over समय, involving लोक taxonomies
that define of individuals based on आभास traits.
वैज्ञानिकों consider biological essentialism obsolete, और generally discourage जातिगत explanations लिये collective differentiation in दोनो physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the विचारधाराओं and theories that grew out of the work of 19th-century विज्ञानियों और physiologists रै led to the उपयोग of the word रेस itself becoming problematic.
हालांकि still used in general contexts, it is अभी often replaced by अन्य words which are less अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज, ऐसे as populations, लोगों ( s ), ethnic समूह or communities depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – अक्तूबर 19, 1893 ) थी a prominent अमरीकी abolitionist and suffragist, और a गायन advocate and organizer promoting अधिकारों for women.
In 1847, Stone became the first woman from मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a कॉलेज degree.
She spoke out for महिलाओं 's अधिकारों and against slavery at a समय when women were discouraged and prevented from पब्लिक speaking.
Stone was the पहला अंकित American स्त्री to retain उसके own last name after विवाह.
Stone 's organizational activities लिये the cause of महिलाओं 's rights yielded ठोस gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th सदी.
स्टोन helped initiate the first National महिलाओं 's Rights Convention and वो supported और sustained it annually along with a क्रमांक of other local, state और regional activist conventions.
स्टोन spoke in front of a number of legislative लाशें to प्रचार laws giving अधिक rights to women.
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National वफ़ादार लीग to सहायता pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery, after which वो helped रूप the largest group of like-minded women 's rights reformers, the politically मॉडरेट American Woman Suffrage Association, which worked for decades at the state स्तर in favor of women 's सही to vote.
स्टोन लिखा extensively about a wide दायरा of women 's rights, publishing and distributing speeches by herself and others, and convention proceedings.
in the long-running and influential स्त्री 's Journal, a साप्ताहिक periodical that she established और promoted, स्टोन aired both her own और differing दृश्य परिचय women 's rights.
पुकारा `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the स्त्री 's अधिकारों movement '', Stone delivered a speech which sparked सुसान B. Anthony to take up the cause of महिलाओं 's suffrage.
एलिज़ाबेथ Cady stanton लिखा that `` Lucy Stone was the first व्यक्ति by whom the दिल of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman सवाल. ''
Together, Anthony, stanton, और Stone have महरूम called the 19th century `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
in finance, a bond is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the बंध issuer to the धारकों.
it is a कर्ज़ security, under which the जारीकर्ता owes the holders a debt और, depending on the terms of the bond, is obliged to अदा them interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date, termed the maturity.
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals ( semiannual, सालाना, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the बंध is परक्राम्य, i.e. the स्वामित्व of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of ऋण or IOU : the holder of the बंध is the lender ( creditor ), the issuer of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ), और the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance long-term निवेश, or, in the case of government bonds, to वित्त current expenditure.
Certificates of जमा ( CDs ) or short पद commercial पेपर are considered to be money market instruments and नहीं bonds : the main difference is in the length of the पद of the instrument.
bonds और stocks are both securities, but the प्रमुख अंतर between the two is कि ( पूंजी ) stockholders have an equity stake in the कम्पनी ( i.e. they हैं owners ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
Another difference is that bonds usually have a पारिभाषित पद, or maturity, after जिससे the bond is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
an एक्सेप्शन is an irredeemable bond, such as consols, which is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond साथ no maturity.

A स्केल model is a शारीरिक model, a representation or नक़ल of an ऑब्जेक्ट that is larger or smaller than the वास्तविक size of the object, जिससे seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the स्केल factor ) of the physical size of the असली object.
Very often the scale मॉडल is प्रयुक्त as a मार्गदर्शिका to making the ऑब्जेक्ट in full आकार.
स्केल models are built or collected लिये many reasons.
The Zune hd थी a पोर्टेबल media खिलाड़ी in the Zune उत्पाद family released on सितंबर 15, 2009 by microsoft.
It was a direct competitor with the ठहराना ipod and iPhone series of मोबाईल devices.
It was initially released in 16 और 32 GB capacities.
A 64 GB version was released on अप्रैल 9, 2010.
It utilized a टचस्क्रीन इंटरफ़ेस लिये नेविगेशन और शामिल Wi-Fi for synchronization, access to the Zune Marketplace और वेब browsing.
the Zune HD utilized the nvidia Tegra apx 2600 chip, allowing it to play 720p video through the optional HDMI Zune डॉक on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, content would be scaled bas to 480x272 पिक्सेल on the player 's oled टचस्क्रीन.
बूढ़ा sparky, the electric chair used at गाओ गाओ prison
निष्पादन by electrocution, प्रायः performed using an electric chair, is an निष्पादन विधि originating in the United राज्य in which the condemned person is strapped to a विशेषकर निर्मित wooden कुर्सी and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This निष्पादन method was created by employees of Thomas Edison दौरान the War of currents, and रै been used तभी in the United States and, for a काल of several दशकों, in the फिलीपीन ( its first उपयोग वहीँ in 1924 under American occupation, पिछला in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned person was attached to the chair, various cycles ( differing in voltage and अवधि ) of alternating current would be passed through the individual 's body, in order to cause fatal क्षति to the internal organs ( including the दिमाग ).
The पहला jolt of electric current थी designed to cause तात्कालिक unconsciousness और दिमाग मौत ; the दूसरी one थी designed to cause fatal damage to the vital अंगों.
Death was frequently caused by electrical overstimulation of the heart.
Although in the संयुक्त States the electric chair has become a symbol of the death penalty, its use is in decline due to the वृद्धि of lethal इंजेक्शन, जिससे is widely believed to be a अधिक humane विधि of execution.
Although some राज्य still maintain electrocution as a method of निष्पादन, आज it is तभी maintained as a secondary विधि that may be चुनी over lethal इंजेक्शन at the request of the prisoner.
As of 2010, electrocution is an optional form of execution in Alabama, Florida, South कैरोलिना and वर्जिनिया.
They allow the prisoner to चुनें lethal injection as an alternative विधि.
In the राज्य of Kentucky and Tennessee, the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी has महरूम retired except लिये those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31, 1998 ) और who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates जो do नहीं choose electrocution or inmates जो वचनबद्ध their crimes after the designated date are killed by lethal इंजेक्शन.
The electric कुर्सी is an alternate form of execution approved for potential उपयोग in Arkansas and Oklahoma if अन्य फ़ॉर्म of execution हैं found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution.
it is the sole method of execution in Vermont, where treason is the only capital अपराधों.
On February 8, 2008, the Nebraska परम् अदालत determined that execution by electric chair थी a `` बेदर्द and असामान्य punishment '' under the राज्य 's constitution.
This brought executions of this प्रकार to an end in Nebraska, the तभी remaining state to retain electrocution as इसके sole method of execution for murder.
the Maryland हाउस of Delegates is the lower हाउस of the सामान्य Assembly, the राज्य विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी State of Maryland, और is रचित of 141 Delegates elected from 47 जिले.
The हाउस of Delegates Chamber is स्तिथ in the मेरीलैंड State House ( state capitol ) on राज्य वृत्त in Annapolis, जिससे is the state पूंजी.
the State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the offices of the Governor and लेफ्टिनेंट Governor of the राज्य of Maryland.
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis, in the आसपास कैस्पर R. Taylor, jr. House Office Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( also ज्ञात as the Battle लिये Paris ) took place during World युद्ध ii from 19 अगस्त 1944 until the surrender of the occupying German गैरीसन on 25 August.
The Liberation of Paris प्रारंभ with an uprising by the French Resistance विरूद्ध the जर्मनी garrison.
On 24 August, the French Forces of the आंतरिक ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) प्राप्त सुदृढीकरण from the Free French Army of Liberation और from the U.S. Third Army अंतर्गत सामान्य Patton.
the capital प्रदेश of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the हस्ताक्षर of the Second Compiègne Armistice in जून 1940, जब the German Army occupied northern और westernmost फ़्रांस, and when the कठपुतली शासन of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France.
इस बैटल marked the liberation of Paris and the exile of the Vichy government to sigmaringen in Germany.
however, वहीँ was still much heavy fighting to be किया before France was liberated, including the campaign in southern France during August-September ( in provence and extending into the southwestern region of the Vosges Mountains ), साथ the German-held seaports of western फ़्रांस ( such as at brest and Dunkirk ), in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern France, such as साथ the Rhine and Moder Rivers.
the German Army and SS लड़ा doggedly in ये areas for the शेष of 1944 and into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a song written by Dave Mason of the English चट्टान बैंड Traffic इससे their eponymous 1968 एल्बम, Traffic.
The सोंग थी भी a hit single लिये several performers : जो cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, US # 33 ), Mongo Santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) और Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971, us # 54 ).
it रै also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ), The 5th आयाम ( 1970 ), लू Rawls, Freddie King, पॉल Weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), विरल Earth, The Electric Concept ऑर्केस्ट्रा, Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ), The ओहियो खिलाड़ी ( 1971 ), डायना Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo पार्कर, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread दहशत and the Black Crowes.
A Steel ढोल version by Trinidad Oil Company was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation ब्लू Juice 2.
It was also featured in the 2000 film Duets, sung by Huey Lewis.
दोनो the original and the जो Cocker cover यहूद प्रदर्शित in the movie उड़ान, starring Denzel Washington.
Devon werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor, आवाज़ actor, singer, songwriter और musician, best known लिये his अभिनीत role as Ned bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's declassified School Survival Guide और लिये his role in the 2007 TV Movie shredderman नियम, as the lead character Nolan byrd.

नमूना view of an electronic health record आधारित on images
Sample दृश्य of an electronic health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual मरीजों or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically सक्षम of being shared आरपार different health care settings.
In some मामले this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including जनसांख्यिकी, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization औकात, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital लक्षण, निजी stats like age और वज़न, और billing information.
ऋण origination is the process by which a borrower applies for a new ऋण, और a lender processes that application.
Origination generally includes all the steps from taking a loan application up to disbursal of funds ( or घटती the अनुप्रयोग ).
Loan servicing कवर everything after disbursing the funds until the loan is fully paid बंद.
Loan origination is a specialized version of new account opening लिये वित्तीय services संगठन.
Certain लोगों and संगठन specialize in loan origination.
Mortgage brokers and other बंधक originator companies serve as a prominent example.
There are अनेक अलग प्रकार of loans.
For अधिक information on ऋण प्रकार, see the loan and उपभोक्ता lending articles.
कदम involved in originating a loan vary by loan type, विभिन्न kinds of loan रिस्क, नियामक, lender policy, और अन्य कारकों.
Top बाएँ : the टेनेसी घाटी Authority, भाग of the नई सौदे, being signed into law in 1933.
Top सही : Franklin delano रूज़वेल्ट, जो was responsible for initiatives and programs collectively ज्ञात as the New Deal.
Bottom : A public भित्ति from एक of the artists employed by the नई सौदे.
The नई Deal थी a series of economic programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936.
They involved अध्यक्षीय executive orders or laws passed by Congress दौरान the first पद of President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
The programs were in response to the Great Depression, and focused on what historians call the `` 3 Rs '' : राहत, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief for the unemployed और poor ; Recovery of the economy to सामान्य स्तर ; and Reform of the financial system to prevent a repeat depression.
The New Deal produced a राजनैतिक realignment, बनाना the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the श्वेत House for seven out of नौ Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ), साथ इसके base in उदार विचार, the white दक्षिण, traditional Democrats, big city मशीने, and the newly empowered labor संघ and ethnic minorities.
The Republicans were split, with conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth, and liberals accepting कुछ of it और promising to make it more efficient.
The realignment crystallized into the नई Deal Coalition कि वर्चस्व सबसे presidential elections into the 1960s, जबकि the opposition Conservative Coalition largely नियंत्रित Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the पद `` liberal '' typically was प्रयुक्त for supporters of the New सौदे, और `` रूढ़िवादी `` लिये its opponents.
इससे 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt थी assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn इससे two-party, competitive, non-machine, प्रगतिशील, and बाएँ party districts ).
As noted by Alexander हिक्स, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat सीनेटरों — spelled Second New सौदे reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ), with the second one more liberal और more विवादास्पद.
The `` First नई Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with विविध groups, from बैंकिंग and railroads to industry and खेती, all of which demanded help for economic अस्तित्व.
The Federal आपात Relief प्रशासन, for उदाहरण, provided $ 500 million for relief operations by states और cities, while the short-lived CWA ( Civil Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
the `` Second New सौदे `` in 1935–38 शामिल the Wagner Act to promote labor संघ, the works प्रगति Administration ( WPA ) relief program ( which made the संघीय government by far the largest single नियोक्ता in the nation ), the Social Security अधिनियम, और new programs to सहायता किरायेदार किसानो and migrant मजदूर.
The फाइनल major वस्तुएं of New Deal विधान were the सृष्टि of the संयुक्त राज्य आवास Authority और फार्म Security प्रशासन, दोनो in 1937, और the मेला मजदूर मानकों Act of 1938, which set maximum hours and minimum wages लिये most श्रेणी of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter split between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major Republican gains in कॉंग्रेस in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the informal रूढ़िवादी Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut bas relief programs ऐसे as the WPA and CCC और blocked प्रमुख liberal proposals.
रूज़वेल्ट himself turned his ध्यान to the युद्ध effort, and जीती reelection in 1940 and 1944.
the Supreme Court declared the National रिकवरी Administration ( nra ) and the पहला संस्करण of the Agricultural Adjustment Act ( aaa ) unconstitutional, however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after fdr, ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New Deal largely intact, even expanding it in कुछ areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society प्रयुक्त the New Deal as inspiration लिये a dramatic विस्तार of liberal programs, जिससे Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained.
बाद 1974, however, the call लिये deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
the New Deal regulation of banking ( glass–steagall Act ) थी suspended in the 1990s.
Many नई सौदे कार्यक्रम remain active, with कुछ still operating under the original names, including the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the संघीय Crop बीमे Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), and the टेनेसी Valley प्राधिकार ( TVA ).
The largest programs still in existence आज are the Social Security System and the प्रतिभूति and Exchange Commission ( सेक ).
A woman ( ), pl : women ( ) is a female इंसान.
the term woman is प्रायः reserved लिये an adult, with the term लड़की होने the usual term for a female चाइल्ड or adolescent.
However, the term woman is also sometimes used to identify a मादा human, regardless of age, as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically सक्षम of giving birth, though पुरानी women जो have gone through रजोनिवृत्ति और some intersex women can not.
`` i Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a song performed by अमरीकी चट्टान band Aerosmith for the 1998 film armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first # 1 लिये the बैंड after 28 years together ).
The song stayed at क्रमांक one लिये four सप्ताह from September 5 to सितंबर 26, 1998.
The song भी stayed at number 1 for several weeks in several other countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at क्रमांक चार, बनने Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the uk, where it was the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and has sold over a लाख copies.
Although नहीं used by the majority of the world 's countries, daylight छायांकन time is common in the Western world.
daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is the practice of advancing घड़ियाँ दौरान the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight और mornings have कम.
typically clocks are adjusted आगे one hour near the start of वसन्त and हैं adjusted backward in autumn.
the modern विचार of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by जार्ज Vernon Hudson and it was पहला implemented दौरान the पहला World युद्ध.
अनेक countries have used it at various टाइम्स since then.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s, and dst उपयोग expanded following the 1970s energy crisis और has been widely प्रयुक्त in North America and Europe चूंकि then.
the practice रै been both praised और criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, sports, और other activities that exploit sunlight after working hours, but can cause समस्याएं for संध्या entertainment और other occupations tied to the sun.
हालांकि an जल्दी goal of DST थी to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of electricity ), modern heating और कूलिंग उपयोग patterns differ greatly, और research परिचय how dst currently affects energy use is सीमित or contradictory.
DST clock shifts उपस्थित other चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt meetings, travel, बिलिंग, record keeping, medical devices, heavy equipment, and नींद patterns.
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically, लकिन this can be limited and error-prone, particularly जब DST dates are changed.
Floorplan of the château de montargis
Montargis is a कम्यून in the Loiret विभाग in north-central France on the loing river.
The town is located about south of पेरिस और east of Orléans in the Gâtinais.
montargis is the दूसरी largest नगर in the Loiret, after Orléans.
it is near a large forest, and contains लाइट उद्योग and farming, including saffron.
Due to its numerous canals and bridges, Montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though quite modern, it retains a मध्यकालीन charm in इसके downtown area.
In computer storage, a लॉजिकल ईकाई number, or LUN, is a क्रमांक used to पहचानो a logical unit, which is a यंत्र addressed by the SCSI प्रोटोकॉल or प्रोटोकॉल which encapsulate SCSI, such as Fibre चैनल or iSCSI.
A LUN may be प्रयुक्त with any device जिससे supports read/write operations, such as a tape drive, but is most प्रायः used to refer to a logical डिस्क as created on a SAN.
Though not technically correct, the term `` LUN '' is often also used to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel according to चिह्नित (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply चिह्नित, is the second किताब of the New Testament.
This canonical खाता of the जीवन of यीशु of नासरत is one of the three synoptic gospels.
It was thought to be an epitome, which खाते for its place as the second gospel in the Bible.
However, most contemporary scholars now regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark थी used as a सोर्स for the अन्य synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and Gospel of ल्यूक is widely held by many, हालांकि नहीं all, New Testament विद्वानों.
the Gospel of चिह्नित narrates the मंत्रालय of Jesus इससे his baptism by जॉन the Baptist to his मौत और resurrection.
It focuses particularly on the last week of उसके life ( अध्याय 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as a heroic man of action, an exorcist, healer और miracle worker.
An important theme of Mark is the Messianic रहस्य.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to रखना his मुक्तिदाता identity secret, and conceals his message साथ parables.
Meanwhile, the शिष्यों fail to understand दोनो the implication of the miracles of Jesus और the meaning of the things he predicts परिचय उसके गिरफ़्तार, death and क़यामत.
Most scholars believe कि the असली टेक्स्ट of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb और कि the following account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition.
According to परंपरा and some early गिरिजाघर writers, the author is चिह्नित the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle Peter.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on अनेक underlying स्त्रोत, varying in रूप and in धर्मशास्त्र, जिससे tells against the tradition कि the gospel थी आधारित on Peter 's preaching.
the टेक्स्ट is a compilation which may include eye-witness खाते as खूब as ज्ञात apostolic preachings, और pre-existing लिखा records that do नहीं exist आज लकिन can be confirmed from 2nd-century टीकाकारों.
Some of the कहानियां in the gospel may have been transmitted orally before होने written down.
Various elements within the gospel सुझाएँ that the author लिखा in सीरियाई or फिलिस्तीन लिये a non-Jewish ईसाई जातियाँ.
the रब of the Rings is an epic high काल्पनिक अनोखा written by English philologist और University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
the story began as a sequel to tolkien 's 1937 children 's काल्पनिक अनोखा The Hobbit, but eventually विकसित into a much larger work.
it थी written in stages between 1937 और 1949, much of it during World युद्ध II.
It is the दूसरी best-selling novel ever written, with over 150 लाख copies बेची.
The शीर्षक of the novel refers to the स्टोरी 's main antagonist, the Dark Lord Sauron, जो had in an पहले age created the One Ring to नियम the other Rings of शक्ति as the परम weapon in his campaign to conquer and नियम all of Middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit जमीन not unlike the English countryside, the story ranges आरपार north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the आँखें of its characters, notably the hobbits frodo Baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee, Meriadoc `` मैरी '' Brandybuck and peregrin `` Pippin '' Took, लकिन also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : aragorn, a इंसान Ranger ; Boromir, a man from gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf योद्धा ; Legolas, an elven prince ; और Gandalf, a जादूगर.
The work थी initially intended by tolkien to be one आवाज़ of a two-volume नियत, साथ the other being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
it was decided लिये economic कारण to प्रकाशित the Lord of the Rings as तीन आयतन over the course of a year from 29 July 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955, thus creating the अभी familiar रब of the बजती trilogy.
the three volumes यहूद हकदार The फेलोशिप of the रिंग, The Two Towers, और The Return of the King.
Structurally, the novel is विभाजित internally into six किताबे, two per आवाज़, साथ several appendices of background material included at the end of the third volume.
The Lord of the Rings रै since been reprinted numerous टाइम्स and translated into अनेक भाषाएं.
tolkien 's work has been the subject of extensive analysis of इसके themes and origins.
हालांकि a प्रमुख work in itself, the स्टोरी was only the पिछला गति of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on चूंकि 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
Influences on this earlier work, and on the story of the Lord of the Rings, include philology, mythology, religion और the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization, as well as earlier काल्पनिक works and tolkien 's अनुभवों in World युद्ध i.
The Lord of the बजती in इसके turn is माना to have had a ग्रेट effect on modern fantasy ; the प्रभाव of Tolkien 's works is such कि the use of the शब्द `` Tolkienian '' और `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the ऑक्सफोर्ड English शब्दकोष.
The enduring popularity of the रब of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular संस्कृति, the founding of many societies by fans of Tolkien 's works, and the publication of many books परिचय tolkien and उसके works.
The रब of the बजती has inspired, and continues to inspire, कलाकृति, music, films और टेलीविज़न, video games, और subsequent साहित्य.
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made लिये radio, theatre, और film.

The series debuted on January 11, 2004.

ड्रेक Bell, Josh पेक, और मिरांडा cosgrove were the only अभिनेताओं to appear in सब 60 एपीसोड.
the San Francisco 49ers conduct training शिविर at the team 's headquarters और practice facility in Santa क्लारा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in अगस्त 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of क्वार्टरबैक Alex स्मिथ, who is in a black जर्सी ; the रक्षा in white.
In the National फ़ुटबॉल League, training camp refers to the समय before the season commences.
दौरान इस time, teams होगा sometimes congregate at an outside location, प्रायः a university, to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर for at least the पहला few weeks.
इस is similar to baseball 's वसन्त प्रशिक्षण.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is used in अनेक different ways.
New players and कोच उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to new teammates और systems.
For younger players, it serves as a period of evaluation ; for veterans, it is time to गोलाकार वापस into form.
Training camp is विभाजित into several different components.
the first is scrimmages.
These are pseudo-games where teams run nearly पूरा games ' worth of plays.
Sometimes, दो practice sessions हैं held on the वही दिन.
इस concept is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of प्रशिक्षण camp include drills, meetings साथ coaches and other players at one 's position, weight प्रशिक्षण, and pre-season games.
the latter half of training camp leads सीधे into the exhibition season.
साथ NFL training camps starting in late-july, the biggest concern has been dehydration.
In 2001, Minnesota वाइकिंग्स player Korey Stringer died of a medical condition based इससे dehydration and heatstroke.
the death of Stringer prompted the NFL to बदलें their training नीतियों.
At each practice, every टोली must have the टोली डॉक्टर और trainers on the field ; additionally, an ambulance must be present दौरान practices.
With एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण शिविरों शुरूआत in late जुलाई, severe weather can affect अभ्यास और प्रदर्शनी games.
In 2002, a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to lightning निकट Cleveland भूरा Stadium, और severe तूफ़ान have been known to disrupt प्रशिक्षण camps.
Fans हैं often able to visit their favorite team 's प्रशिक्षण camp to कैच an जल्दी look at the players ; admission to practices is प्रायः free or substantially less expensive than a खेल टिकट, making training camp यात्राएँ a popular option for fans who can not attend अनेक खेल due to वित्तीय or अन्य reasons.
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at शिविर sites along with offering activities and कार्यक्रम to make training शिविर a more fan-friendly experience.
In computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to स्टोर, retrieve and update a नियत of files.
The पद could refer to the abstract data structures used to define फाइलें, or to the actual तन्त्र or firmware components कि implement the abstract ideas.
Some file systems are used on local आंकड़ा storage डिवाइस ; others provide file अभिगम via a संजाल protocol ( e.g. NFS, SMB, or 9P clients ).
Some संचिका systems हैं `` virtual '', in कि the `` files '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store.
the संचिका system manages अभिगम to both the content of files and the metadata about those files.
It is जिम्मेदार for arranging भंडार space ; विश्वसनीयता, efficiency, and ट्यूनिंग with regard to the physical storage medium are महत्वपूर्ण design considerations.
विलियम Howard taft ( September 15, 1857 – कूच 8, 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United राज्य ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have परोसा in दोनो of ये offices.
Before becoming President, Taft, a रिपब्लिकन, थी selected to serve on the Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the United राज्य and in 1891 a judge on the United States अदालत of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
in 1900, अध्यक्ष विलियम McKinley appointed Taft Governor-General of the Philippines.
In 1904, अध्यक्ष Theodore Roosevelt नियुक्त Taft Secretary of War in an effort to groom Taft, तब उसके close political ally, into his handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on कुछ occasions the भूमिका of एक्टिंग सचिव of State, while declining दोहराया offers from रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the Supreme अदालत.
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt, Taft won an आसान victory in उसके 1908 bid for the presidency.
in his only term, taft 's घरेलू कार्यसूची emphasized trust-busting, civil सेवा reform, strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय Commerce Commission, improving the performance of the postal सेवा, and passage of the सोलहवीं Amendment.
विदेश, Taft sought to further the economic development of nations in Latin अमेरिका and Asia through `` Dollar Diplomacy ``, and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented taft was बेख़बर to the political ramifications of his निर्णय, often alienated his अपना कुंजी constituencies, और was overwhelmingly पराजित in his बोली for a दूसरी पद in the अध्यक्षीय election of 1912.
In सर्वेक्षण of अध्यक्षीय scholars, Taft is usually क्रमित near the मध्य of lists of सब American राष्ट्रपतियों.
बाद leaving office, Taft spent his time in academia, मध्यस्थता, और the search लिये संसार peace through his self-founded League to enforce Peace.
in 1921, after the First संसार War, President Warren G. Harding appointed taft मुख्य Justice of the United States.
Taft served in this capacity जबतक shortly before उसके death in 1930.
The Ten आयतें is a 1956 epic film उत्पादित and directed by सेसिल B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus, in जिससे the Hebrew-born Moses, an adopted Egyptian prince, becomes the deliverer of the यहूदी slaves.
It स्ट्रक्चर Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul brynner as his adoptive brother, Pharaoh Rameses II, Anne बैक्सटर as Nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. Robinson as Dathan, Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora, Debra पेजेट as Lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast includes Sir सेड्रिक Hardwicke as Pharaoh सेती I, Nina foch as bithiah, Martha स्कॉट as Yoshebel, जूडिथ एंडरसन as Memnet, विंसेंट दाम as Baka, and जॉन carradine as Aaron.
The फिल्मी थी released by सर्वोपरि Pictures in VistaVision on अक्तूबर 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, जिससे DeMille narrated, थी the पिछला film that he निर्देशित.
he was set to direct the 1958 रीमेक of his 1938 फिल्मी the Buccaneer, but his final illness forced उसे to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also नियोजित to film the जीवन of रब Baden पावेल, the संस्थापक of the Scout movement, with दाउद Niven ; this project थी never realized.
The Ten Commandments is a partial रीमेक of demille 's 1923 silent फिल्मी.
कुछ of the cast and crew of the 1956 संस्करण worked on the original.
It has since been remade as a टेलीविज़न miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
the Ten Commandments is एक of the सबसे financially successful films कभी made, grossing over $ 65 million at the u.S. box office.
Adjusting for महंगाई, this makes it the sixth highest-grossing film domestically, with an adjusted कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
the box office जालस्थल `` the Numbers '' सूचियाँ the domestic gross at $ 80 लाख.
in 1999, The टेन Commandments was selected लिये preservation in the United राज्य नेशनल Film Registry by the Library of Congress as होने `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
in जून 2008, the अमरीकी Film Institute revealed its `` Ten Top Ten `` —the बेहतरीन ten films in ten American फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative जातियाँ.
the Ten Commandments was listed as the tenth बेहतरीन film in the epic genre.
The फिल्मी received seven Academy Award nominations including बेहतरीन Picture, and won the Academy पुरस्कार for Best Visual Effects.
चार्ल्टन Heston was nominated लिये a Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन गति Picture Actor in the drama category.
Yul Brynner जीती the National फलक of पुनर्विलोकन पुरस्कार for Best कर्ता for उसके role as Rameses, along with उसके other roles in The King and I और Anastasia.
louisville (, or ) is a प्रमुख नगर and the largest city in the U.S. राज्य of Kentucky and the county seat of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the नगर 's सीमायें have been with those of the county because of a city-county merger.
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी was 741,096 ( Louisville 's संतुलन total, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous कस्बों and is the जनसांख्यिकी listed in most sources and national rankings ).
as of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ( MSA ) had a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding काउंटी, आठ in Kentucky and four in Southern Indiana ( see Geography below ).
The Louisville Combined सांख्यिकीय Area, having a population of 1,451,564, includes the MSA, Hardin काउंटी और Larue County in Kentucky, and Scott County, Indiana.
an important internal shipping port in the 19th century, Louisville today is best known as the location of the Kentucky डर्बी, the पहला of three annual thoroughbred horse races बनाना up the ट्रिपल Crown.
a typical प्रायोगिक setup for an aldol reaction.
Both flasks हैं submerged in a dry ice/acetone कूलिंग bath ( −78 °c ) the temperature of which is being monitored by a तापयुग्म ( the wire on the left ).
A cooling bath, in laboratory chemistry ( often but नहीं सदा organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid मिश्रण which is प्रयुक्त to maintain कम temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
These low temperatures are प्रयुक्त to collect liquids after distillation, to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator, or to perform a chemical प्रतिक्रिया below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
कूलिंग baths are generally एक of two types : ( a ) a ठंडा fluid ( particularly liquid नाइट्रोजन, water, or भी एयर ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling एजेंट ( ऐसे as dry ice or जल ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'कैरीr ' ( such as liquid जल, ethylene glycol, acetone, etc. ), which हस्तांतरण heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid प्रणाली.
( A familiar उदाहरण of इस is the use of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze बर्फ cream.
The phase-change of ice into liquid जल requires energy, 'pulling ' ऊष्मा from the system.
adding salt lowers the temp at जिससे this happens, meaning more उर्जा has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the बर्फ 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull ' more ऊष्मा इससे its पर्यावरण to become liquid. )
खाने disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or excessive खाना सेवन to the detriment of an individual 's शारीरिक and mental health.
Bulimia nervosa और anorexia नर्वोज़ा are the सबसे common specific फ़ॉर्म in the United Kingdom.
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating disorder and खाने disorder नहीं otherwise specified.
bulimia nervosa is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce vomiting, over-exercising, और the usage of diuretics, enemas, और laxatives.
एनोरेक्सिया nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the point of self-starvation and excessive वज़न loss.
हालांकि primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10 million being प्रभावित in the U.K. ), eating disorders affect males as खूब.
An अनुमानित 10 – 15 % of people with खाने disorders are males ( गोर्गान, 1999 ).
( an अनुमानित 1 लाख U.K. males होने प्रभावित ).
हालांकि eating विकार are increasing all over the world among दोनो मेन and women, there is evidence to सुझाएँ that it is women in the पश्चिमी world जो हैं at the highest risk of developing them and the उपाधि of westernization increases the risk.
nearly half of all Americans personally know किसी with an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the सेंट्रल प्रक्रियाओं of appetite has increased tremendously since leptin was discovered, and the कौशल to observe the functions of the दिमाग as खूब.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory control प्रक्रियाओं are involved in eating behaviour, जिससे is a कुंजी घटक in eating विकार.
the precise कारण of खाने विकार is नहीं entirely समझा, लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण कि it may be linked to other medical conditions और situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting diverse populations.
एक study showed that लड़कियों with adhd have a greater chance of getting an eating disorder than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested कि women साथ PTSD, especially due to sexually related आघात, are more likely to develop एनोरेक्सिया nervosa.
एक पढ़ाई showed कि फोस्टर लड़कियों are अधिक संभावित to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think कि peer दबाव and idealized body-types seen in the media are also a significant factor.
Some research show कि for certain people there are genetic reasons why वे may be prone to developing an eating disorder.
Recent studies have found evidence a correlation between patients with bulimia नर्वोज़ा and पदार्थ उपयोग disorders.
In addition, anxiety disorders and personality disorders हैं आम आवृत्ति with clients of eating disorders.
While उचित treatment can be highly effective लिये many suffering from विशिष्ट प्रकार of खाने disorders, the consequences of खाने disorders can be severe, including death ( whether from direct चिकित्सा प्रभाव of disturbed खाने habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal सोच ).
गुलामी in the United States existed from the early years of the औपनिवेशिक period ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
however, by 1804, all states north of the मेसन and डिक्सन लकीर था either abolished slavery outright or passed laws for the क्रमिक abolition of slavery.
In 1787 Congress निषिद्ध गुलामी in the Northwest Territory.
But slavery gained new जीवन in the South with the कपास industry after 1800, और expanded into the Southwest.
The nation was polarized into slave and free states along the mason-dixon लकीर, जिससे separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States और Great ब्रिटेन दोनो prohibited the international slave व्यापार in 1808, but the घरेलू trade, with sales to the Deep दक्षिण, expanded dramatically, and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade.
पहले the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending गुलामी and its expansion into the territories.
in the North some abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार, and numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां अस्वीकृत it as detrimental to the rights of फ़्री men.
After विफल compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's चुनाव, in 1861 eleven slave states broke away to रूप the confederate राज्य of America, leading to the अमरीकी Civil युद्ध.
The federal government in 1862 बना abolition of गुलामी a war goal.
In January 1863 President Lincoln freed slaves in the confederacy through the emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, प्रभावी December 1865, abolished slavery throughout the entire United States, सहित the किनारा राज्य and the Indian territories.
इससे the 16th to the 19th centuries, an estimated 12 million africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See Slavery in the Americas.
The great बहुमत went to the sugar बागानों of the West Indies or Brazil, where mortality was ऊँची.
परिचय 645,000 were brought to what is now the United States.
by the 1860 United States Census, the slave population in the अमरीकी South had grown to चार million.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states, nearly 400,000 आयोजित slaves ( roughly एक in four ), amounting to 8 % of सब American families.
जबकि some स्लेव worked as house बन्दों and शहरी शिल्पकार, the great majority worked on plantations or large farms, cultivating lucrative cash crops, such as rice, तम्बाकू, sugar और, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
by 1860 most स्लेव यहूद held in the Deep दक्षिण, where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
In small operations, वे worked with उनके owners.
In large plantations they were directed by श्वेत सशुल्क overseers.
अंतर्गत the प्रणाली that became chattel गुलामी ( ownership of a human होने, और of his/her वंशजों ), a racial तत्व थी आधारभूत : slaves यहूद blacks of African descent and स्वामित्व, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by अन्य southern colonies, enacted law that children of slave माताओं were born into गुलामी.
Slaves could लाभ freedom तभी by running away ( which was difficult and illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, जिससे was regulated by states, and became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also organized कार्य by a system of bonded labor known as indentured servitude.
इस typically lasted लिये several सालो लिये दोनो ग़रीब Europeans और Africans alike, to pay off the costs of हस्तांतरण to the colonies.
वे contracted for such arrangements because of poor economies in their home countries.
Between 1680 और 1700, as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to import more Africans as slaves.
Recognizing the importance of slavery, the हाउस of burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान and added new provisions enforcing श्वेत supremacy in the विधि.
Schematic cross section of part of leaf, xylem दिखाया as red वृत्त at figure 8.
जाइलम is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ).
the word xylem is निकला इससे the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is लकडी, though it is मिला throughout the संयंत्र.
Its basic function is to हस्तांतरण water, but it also transports some nutrients through the संयंत्र.
This clock representation shows some of the major units of geological time and निर्णायक events of धरती इतिहास.
the Hadean eon represents the time before fossil रिकार्ड of जीवन on Earth ; its upper boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 Ga ( अरब years ago ).
अन्य subdivisions reflect the evolution of life ; the Archean and Proterozoic are both eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and cenozoic are eras of the phanerozoic eon.
The two million साल Quaternary period, the time of recognizable humans, is too small to be visible at this स्केल.
The geologic समय scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time, और is used by geologists, paleontologists, और other earth scientists to describe the timing and relationships between events that have occurred throughout धरती 's history.
The table of geologic time spans प्रस्तुत here agrees with the तिथियाँ और nomenclature नियत forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Commission on स्तरिकी.
Evidence from radiometric डेटिंग indicates that the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old.
the भूविज्ञान or deep time of Earth 's past has महरूम व्यवस्थित into various units according to कार्यक्रम which took प्लेस in प्रत्येक period.
अलग spans of समय on the gts are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond to them, indicating major geological or paleontological events, such as mass extinctions.
For उदाहरण, the boundary between the Cretaceous period and the Paleogene period is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction इवेंट, which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and अनेक other groups of जीवन.
Older time spans जिससे predate the reliable चट्टान record ( before the proterozoic Eon ) are पारिभाषित by निरपेक्ष आयु.
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator made by Texas Instruments.
The TI-82 थी designed in 1993 as a stripped down, अधिक user friendly version of the TI-85, and as a बदलना for the ti-81.
It थी the direct predecessor of the TI-83.
it साझा साथ the TI-85 a 6 mhz zilog z80 माइक्रोप्रोसेसर.
Like the TI-81, the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display, and the core feature नियत of the ti-81 with अनेक नई features.
The डाल of वर्ण of The King of Fighters XI.
The King of सेनानी fighting game series, produced by SNK playmore, शामिल a wide cast of वर्ण, some of which are लिया from other SNK games.
the story takes place in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in which an annual श्रेणी of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
the first खेल in the series introduces the आरंभिक main character of the श्रेणी, kyo Kusanagi, a यंग Japanese fighter जो is the वारिस to a powerful समूह of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
kyo झगड़े against the kusanagi गोत्र 's enemies, उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वी iori Yagami, and the god Orochi और its human followers, among others.
the first चार games in the श्रेणी revolve about ये fights, while The किंग of Fighters '99 introduces a new स्टोरी arc, revolving around k ', a young man जो seeks to destroy the mysterious NESTS संगठन क्युकी they kidnapped उसे at an early आयु and stripped him of his past यादें, so कि they could force him to be a fighter अंतर्गत their control.
In The किंग of Fighters 2003, a new character named Ash Crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट, to चोरी the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the पास्ट for an unknown reason.
a new group of antagonists, known as Those इससे the Past, also appears in the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power लिये the purpose of giving it to उनके अनजान master.
the plot और the characters came from the Yamata no Orochi legend.
There are also several वर्ण in the games कि are parodies or homages to अनेक popular anime, manga, and films.
Merchandise आधारित on the characters has also महरूम released, सहित action आंकड़े and keychains.
the characters have garnered तारीफ़ इससे several video game publications for the quality of उनके डिजाइन and movesets.
Comments केन्द्रित on the lack of सुधार in some of the वर्ण, लकिन added that the रोस्टर is greatly विविध.
Whale युद्धों is a weekly अमरीकी documentary-style वास्तविकता television श्रेणी that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet केबल channel.
The program follows Paul वाटसन, founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, as he and the crew aboard their various vessels harass जापानी whalers off the coast of Antarctica.
On जनवरी 5, 2013, एनिमल ग्रह renewed the series for a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical species of eagle.
it is sometimes ज्ञात as the American harpy त्रिभुज to distinguish it from the Papuan त्रिभुज जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the New गिनी Harpy Eagle or Papuan harpy Eagle.
it is the largest and most शक्तिशाली raptor found in the Americas, and among the largest extant species of eagles in the world.
it usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy layer.
विनाश of its प्राकृतिक habitat रै देखी it vanish इससे अनेक भाग of इसके former range, and it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
biological वर्गीकरण, or scientific classification in biology, is a method of scientific taxonomy प्रयुक्त to group और categorize organisms into groups such as genus or species.
These groups are ज्ञात as taxa ( एकवचन : taxon ).
Modern biological classification रै its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, who grouped species according to shared physical विशेषताएँ.
These groupings have since महरूम संशोधित to improve consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the लेट 20th century, phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे organisms हैं grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in कुछ areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, जिससे uses DNA sequences as आंकड़ा, has also चलित many recent revisions and is likely to continue doing so.
Biological classification belongs to the विज्ञान of biological systematics.
लेनन 's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston ओनो Lennon, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 अक्तूबर 1940 – 8 दिसम्बर 1980 ) was an English संगीतकार, सिंगर and songwriter who रोज़ to विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as a founder member of the Beatles, one of the सबसे commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of लोकप्रिय music.
साथ Paul mccartney, he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a teenager लेनन became शामिल in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the quarrymen, विकसित into the बीटल्स in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a सोलो career कि उत्पादित the critically acclaimed albums John lennon/plastic ओनो Band and Imagine, and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` imagine ``.
After उसके marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969, he changed उसके नाम to John Ono लेनन.
लेनन disengaged खुद इससे the music business in 1975 to devote समय to raising his शिशु son शॉन, but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double काल्पनिक.
He was murdered तीन weeks बाद its release.
लेनन revealed a rebellious प्रकृति और acerbic wit in उसके music, writing, drawings, on फिल्मी and in interviews.
Controversial through his political and peace activism, he moved to नई York City in 1971, where his criticism of the वियतनाम War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard निक्सन 's administration to deport him, while some of his songs were अपनाया as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, लेनन 's solo एल्बम sales in the United राज्य exceed 14 million units, and as writer, co-writer or यजमान, he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 चार्ट.
In 2002, a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest britons voted him आठवीं, and in 2008, Rolling Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all समय.
He was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 और into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
Statue of Rip वैन Winkle in Irvington, New York, नहीं far from `` Sunnyside ``, the home of Washington इरविंग
`` Rip वैन winkle '' is a short story by American author वॉशिंगटन Irving published in 1819, as well as the नाम of the story 's fictional protagonist.
Written while Irving थी जीना in Birmingham, इंग्लैण्ड, it was भाग of a संग्रहण entitled The Sketch किताब of Geoffrey crayon.
Although the story is set in New यॉर्क 's Catskill Mountains, इरविंग later admitted, `` जब I wrote the स्टोरी, I था never महरूम on the catskills. ''
throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have been set.
This page तभी includes the competitive awards जीती by various artists.
इस करता नहीं include the various खास awards कि हैं presented by the National अकादमी of Recording Arts and sciences ऐसे as Lifetime Achievement Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.
The page however does include अन्य non-performance related grammys ( known as the Craft & Production Fields ) कि may have महरूम presented to the artist ( s ).
Pee-wee Herman is a कॉमिक fictional character निर्मित and portrayed by American हास्य Paul Reubens.
He is best known for his two television series and फिल्मी series दौरान the 1980s.
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a स्टेज अधिनियम that जल्दी led to an HBO special in 1981.
as the स्टेज performance gained further popularity, Reubens took the अक्षर to गति picture with pee-wee 's बिग एडवेंचर in 1985, toning down the वयस्क innuendo लिये the appeal of children.
This paved the way लिये Pee-wee 's Playhouse, an एमी Award जीतना children 's series कि ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
Another film, Big Top Pee-wee, थी released in 1988.
Due to negative media ध्यान following a scandal in 1991, reubens decided to shelve his alter अहंकार during the 1990s, and then धीरे resurrected it during the following decade.
it थी at that time that Reubens addressed योजनाएँ to write a new Pee-wee film, Pee-wee 's Playhouse : the Movie.
in जून 2007, reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first time since 1991 at स्पाइक TV 's Guys ' Choice Awards.
That '70s दिखाएँ is an American television काल sitcom कि centers on the lives of a समूह of teenage मित्रों living in the fictional suburban town of Point Place, Wisconsin, from May 17, 1976, to दिसम्बर 31, 1979.
It debuted on the Fox television संजाल, पहला airing on अगस्त 23, 1998, running for eight consecutive सीज़न, and concluding with the 200th episode on may 18, 2006.
The प्रमुख teenage cast members यहूद Topher अनुग्रह, Mila Kunis, एश्टन Kutcher, Danny Masterson, Laura prepon, और wilmer Valderrama.
The प्रमुख adult cast members were Debra jo rupp, Kurtwood Smith, Don Stark and, दौरान the first three seasons, तान्या रॉबर्ट्स.
Kansas ( ) is a u.S. state located in the Midwestern United States.
it is नामित after the Kansas River which flows through it, which in turn was named after the कंस Native American tribe, which inhabited the area.
the tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is प्रायः कहा to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` लोगों of the south wind, '' हालांकि इस was संभवतः not the term 's original meaning.
निवासियों of Kansas are called `` Kansans. ''
For thousands of सालो कया is now Kansas was home to numerous and diverse देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों.
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state generally lived in villages along the river घाटियों.
Tribes in the पश्चिमी part of the state were सेमi- nomadic and hunted large herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s, लकिन the pace of settlement accelerated in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the slavery issue.
When officially खोली to उपनिवेश by the u.S. government in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters इससे New इंग्लैण्ड and pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state.
यूँ, the क्षेत्रफल was a hotbed of violence and अराजकता in its early days as these शक्तियां collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
The abolitionists eventually prevailed and on January 29, 1861, कान्सास entered the संघ as a फ़्री state.
After the Civil War, the population of Kansas grew rapidly, when waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, कान्सास is एक of the most productive agricultural राज्य, producing high yields of wheat, sorghum and sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd सबसे populous of the 50 United राज्य.
Psychology is an academic and लागू अनुशासन कि involves the scientific study of mental कृत्यों and behaviors.
Psychology has the immediate लक्ष्य of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing सामान्य सिद्धान्त and researching specific cases, और by many खाते it ultimately aims to benefit समाज.
In this field, a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be वर्गीकृत as a social, behavioral, or संज्ञानात्मक scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and social behavior, while भी exploring the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors.
psychologists explore concepts such as perception, cognition, ध्यान, emotion, phenomenology, motivation, brain कामकाज, व्यक्तित्व, behavior, और interpersonal relationships.
Psychologists of विविध धारियाँ also consider the unconscious mind.
Psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य methods to infer causal और correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in विपक्ष, to employing empirical and deductive विधि, some—especially clinical और counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक interpretation and other inductive techniques.
मनोविज्ञान रै been described as a `` hub science '', साथ psychological findings linking to शोध and perspectives इससे the social sciences, natural sciences, medicine, and the humanities, such as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and treatment of दिमागी health समस्याएं, it is also directed towards understanding और solving problems in many अलग spheres of human कार्यकलाप.
The बहुमत of psychologists are involved in कुछ kind of therapeutic role, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics सम्बन्धित to mental प्रक्रियाओं and बर्ताव, और typically कार्य in university psychology विभाग or teach in अन्य अकादमिक settings ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
कुछ are employed in industrial and organizational settings, or in other areas such as human development and aging, खेल, health, and the media, as well as in forensic investigation and अन्य aspects of law.
Thomas जेफरसन ( April 13, 1743 ( April 2, 1743 O.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) was an अमरीकी founding Father, the principal लेखक of the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता ( 1776 ) and the third अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he परोसा in the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, representing Virginia and तब परोसा as a wartime राज्यपाल of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ).
बस after the war ended, from mid-1784 Jefferson served as a राजनयिक, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United States Minister to France.
Jefferson was the पहला United States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President George वॉशिंगटन.
With his close friend James मैडिसन he व्यवस्थित the Democratic-Republican पार्टी, and subsequently resigned इससे Washington 's cabinet.
Elected Vice President in 1796, when he came in second to John Adams of the federalists, Jefferson opposed Adams and with Madison secretly लिखा the केंटकी और वर्जिनिया Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien और Sedition अधिनियमों.
Elected अध्यक्ष in what जेफरसन called the क्रान्ति of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the vast louisiana Territory from France ( 1803 ), and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the नई west.
उसके second term was घिरा with troubles at home, ऐसे as the विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of his former Vice President Aaron Burr.
With escalating ट्रबल with Britain who was challenging American neutrality and threatening shipping at sea, he tried economic warfare with his embargo कानून which only damaged अमरीकी trade.
in 1803, अध्यक्ष Jefferson initiated a प्रक्रम of Indian tribal हटाना and relocation to the louisiana territory west of the Mississippi नदी, in order to खोलें lands for eventual American settlers.
a नेता in the Enlightenment, Jefferson was a बहुश्रुत who spoke पाँच languages fluently and was deeply interested in science, invention, वास्तुकला, religion और philosophy, interests that led him to the founding of the विश्वविद्यालयों of वर्जिनिया after उसके प्रेसिडेंसी.
He designed his अपना large mansion on a 5,000 acre वृक्षारोपण near Charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, which he named Monticello.
जबकि not a notable orator, Jefferson was a skilled लेखक and corresponded with many influential people in America और यूरोपीय throughout his वयस्क life.
हालांकि Jefferson owned many slaves, he opposed the संस्था all his life और consequently treated and took परवाह of them very खूब and expected them to work no अधिक than free farmers.
Since 1802 इतिहासकारों and others have महरूम विभाजित over the controversy of whether Jefferson was the father of one or more children belonging to सैली Hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
Historians are also in disagreement with कैसा much जेफरसन थी committed to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson signed into law a bill that banned the importation of स्लेव into the United राज्य.
After मार्था Jefferson, उसके wife of ग्यारह years, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a widower लिये the rest of his life ; their marriage produced छह children, of जिसको two survived to adulthood.
Though जेफरसन has been criticized by अनेक आधुनिक दिन scholars over the समस्या of गुलामी, he remains rated as एक of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest सोंग लिखा by Steven Van Zandt, produced by वैन zandt and आर्थर बेकर and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of apartheid.
The प्राथमिक अर्थात् of that opposition is to declare that all the कलाकारों involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at सूर्य City, a रिज़ॉर्ट which was located in Bantustan of bophuthatswana, one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the दक्षिण African government to forcibly relocate इसके black जनसांख्यिकी.

The National बास्केट Association ( NBA ) is a major professional basketball league in उत्तर अमेरिका.
It was founded in 1946 as the Basketball Association of America ( baa ).
The लीग adopted इसके current नाम at the start of the जब it merged with the National बास्केट लीग ( NBL ).
the NBA फाइनल is the चैंपियनशिप series लिये the एनबीए and the निष्कर्ष of the sport 's postseason.
The जीतना टोली of the श्रेणी receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.
Players इससे the winning टोली प्रायः प्राप्त championship बजती इससे the team honoring their contribution.
however, in some विरल occasion, the teams opted to gave other commemorative items, such as wrist घड़ियाँ, बजाय of बजती.
The number of championships won by NBA superstars is often प्रयुक्त as a measurement of their greatness.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the सबसे एनबीए championships won साथ 11 titles during his 13-year playing career.
He जीती his first championship with the Boston सेल्टिक्स in his rookie year.
afterwards, he went on to win 10 championships in the अगला 12 years, including आठ लगातार championships from 1959 to 1966.
He won the पिछला two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
रसेल 's teammate, sam Jones, won 10 championships इससे 1959 to 1969, the second सबसे in NBA history.
Four सेल्टिक्स players, Tom Heinsohn, K. C. Jones, Satch सैंडर्स and जॉन Havlicek, won eight championships each.
दो other Celtics, Jim Loscutoff and फ़्रैंक Ramsey, जीती seven championships each.
Four players, Bob Cousy, kareem Abdul-Jabbar, माइकल Jordan and Scottie Pippen, won छह championships each.
Jordan and Pippen हैं members of the Chicago Bulls team who जीती three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
रॉबर्ट Horry and John Salley are the तभी players to have won the championships with three different teams.
horry जीती seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the San Antonio Spurs, while salley won four championships with the डेट्रॉयट Pistons, the Bulls और the लेकर्स.
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr are the only players to win दो championships साथ दो different teams in consecutive seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the रोचेस्टर Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, while Kerr जीती consecutive championships साथ the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
सटीकता indicates निकटता of measurement results to the true value, परिशुद्धता to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and आंकडे, the सटीकता of a measurement प्रणाली is the degree of closeness of measurements of a मात्रा to that quantity 's actual ( true ) मान.
the precision of a मापन system, भी called reproducibility or repeatability, is the उपाधि to which repeated माप under अपरिवर्तित conditions show the वही results.
हालांकि the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, they are deliberately contrasted in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the scientific method.
A measurement प्रणाली can be accurate but not precise, precise but नहीं accurate, neither, or both.
For example, if an experiment contains a व्यवस्थित error, तब increasing the sample size generally increases precision but करता not improve accuracy.
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate string of results from the flawed experiment.
eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy but does not बदलें precision.
A measurement system is designated valid if it is both accurate और precise.
Related शर्तें include पूर्वाग्रह ( non- यादृच्छिक or directed प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or factors unrelated to the independent variable ) और गलती ( random variability ).
The terminology is भी applied to indirect measurements—that is, values obtained by a कम्प्यूटेशनल कार्यविधि from observed data.
in addition to accuracy and precision, measurements may also have a measurement resolution, which is the smallest change in the underlying physical मात्रा that produces a जवाब in the मापन.
In the मामला of full reproducibility, such as जब rounding a number to a representable फ्लोटिंग point number, the शब्द परिशुद्धता has a meaning नहीं related to reproducibility.
लिये example, in the आईईईई 754-2008 standard it अर्थात् the number of bits in the significand, so it is used as a measure for the relative accuracy साथ जिससे an arbitrary क्रमांक can be represented.
बकवास in इसके literal meaning refers to the act of यौन मैथुन.
It is an अंग्रेज़ी शब्द that is often used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
The origin of the word is obscure.
It is usually माना to be first attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern उपयोग, fuck और इसके derivatives ( such as कमीने and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There हैं many आम phrases जिससे make use of the शब्द, as खूब as a number of यौगिकों incorporating it, ऐसे as motherfucker.
एनिमेटेड, color-coded map प्रर्दशित the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention and model, some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example, Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( रेड शेड्स ), जबकि उत्तर और दक्षिण अमेरिका are sometimes recognized as one American महाद्वीप ( green shades ).
A महाद्वीप is एक of अनेक बहुत large landmasses on Earth.
They are generally identified by सम्मेलन rather than any सख्त मापदण्ड, साथ up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they हैं ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia, Africa, North America, South America, अंटार्कटिक, Europe, and Australia.
In geology, continents are described by means of tectonic plates.
Plate tectonics is the प्रक्रम and पढ़ाई of the गति, collision और division of continents, पहले known as continental drift.

Community property is a वैवाहिक property regime that originated in civil law jurisdictions and is अभी also मिला in some common विधि jurisdictions.
the states of the United राज्य कि recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from मैक्सिको 's ganancial community प्रणाली, which itself was inherited from स्पेनी law ( a रोमन -derived civil law system ) और ultimately from the visigoths.
While अंतर्गत स्पेनी नियम Louisiana अपनाया the ganancial community प्रणाली of acquests और gains, which replaced the traditional French जातियाँ of movables and acquests in its सिविल विधि system.
Map of the संयुक्त राज्य साथ community property states highlighted in रेड.
In addition to the highlighted राज्य, Alaska is a पृथक प्रॉपर्टी state कि permits couples to opt into a जातियाँ property arrangement.
In a community property क्षेत्राधिकार, most property acquired during the marriage ( except लिये उपहार or inheritances ) —the community, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by दोनो spouses और is divided upon divorce, annulment or death.
संयुक्त ownership is automatically presumed by law in the अनुपस्थिति of specific evidence कि would point to a contrary निष्कर्ष for a particular piece of प्रॉपर्टी.
Division of जातियाँ property may take place by item, by splitting all वस्तुएं or by मान.
In कुछ jurisdictions, such as कैलिफ़ोर्निया, a 50/50 प्रभाग of community प्रॉपर्टी is strictly mandated by statute, meaning that the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a तलाक अदालत may डिक्री an `` equitable distribution `` of community प्रॉपर्टी, which may result in an unequal प्रभाग of such.
In non-community property states प्रॉपर्टी may be विभाजित by equitable distribution.
generally speaking, the property that प्रत्येक संगी brings into the विवाह or receives by gift, bequest or devise during marriage is पुकारा separate property ( i.e., not जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी ).
देखिए division of property.
Division of जातियाँ debts may not be the same as प्रभाग of community property.
For उदाहरण, in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, community प्रॉपर्टी is जरूरी to be divided `` equally '' जबकि community कर्ज़ is जरूरी to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property कि is owned by one spouse पहले the marriage is the separate प्रॉपर्टी of कि जीवनसाथी, unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The नियम for इस vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.
the ड्यूक और duchess of Cambridge हिलाता to the भीड at the Mall shortly after the wedding.
The विवाह of प्रिंस William, ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज, and कैथरीन Middleton took place on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London.
the groom, Prince विलियम, Duke of Cambridge, is the ज्येष्ठ बेटे of Charles, Prince of वेल्स, और is second in the line of succession to the British Throne and the तख्तों of fifteen अन्य Commonwealth realms.
The bride, कैथरीन `` Kate '' मिडलटन is the eldest of three children of Michael और carole मिडलटन of bucklebury, Berkshire.
The Dean of Westminster, जॉन हॉल, presided at the सेवा ; the archbishop of canterbury, Rowan Williams, conducted the विवाह ; Richard chartres, the Bishop of लंदन, preached the उपदेश ; and a reading was given by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's बेहतरीन man was उसके bhai, Prince Harry, while the बहू 's सिस्टर, Pippa, was नौकरानी of honour.
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's परिवारों, as well as अनेक foreign royals, diplomats, और the युगल 's chosen personal अतिथि.
After the ceremony, the couple made the traditional रूप on the balcony of बकिंघम Palace.
As प्रिंस William was not the heir apparent to the throne, the wedding थी not a पूरा state अवसर और many विवरण were left to the युगल to decide, such as much of the guest list of about 1,900.
Prince William और Kate मिडलटन met in 2001.
उनके सगाई on 20 October 2010 was घोषित on 16 November 2010.
The build-up to the wedding और the अवसर itself आकर्षित much मीडिया attention, being compared in many ways साथ the 1981 विवाह of William 's parents.
The occasion थी a public अवकाश in the संयुक्त किंगडम और featured many ceremonial पहलुओं, including use of the राज्य carriages and roles for the Foot गार्ड and Household Cavalry.
Events यहूद आयोजित around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events across कनाडा, over 5,000 street पार्टियों were held throughout the संयुक्त Kingdom, and one लाख लोगों lined the route between Westminster ऐबी और बकिंघम Palace.
The ceremony was viewed सजीव by tens of millions more around the world, including 72 million on the YouTube royal Channel.
in the United Kingdom, television audiences peaked at 26.3 million viewers, with a total of 36.7 million watching भाग of the coverage.

A हाथ ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity स्तिथ at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates and humans, chimpanzees, बंदरों, and lemurs.
a few अन्य vertebrates such as the koala ( which has दो opposable thumbs on each `` हाथ '' और fingerprints remarkably समान to human fingerprints ) are प्रायः described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their सामने limbs.
हैंड्स are the main structures for physically manipulating the पर्यावरण, used लिये both gross motor कौशल ( such as grasping a large object ) and fine motor कौशल ( such as picking up a छोटी कंकड़ ).
The उंगलियों contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the देह, are the richest सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया, and have the महानतम positioning काबिलियत of the body ; thus the भाव of touch is intimately associated साथ hands.
Like अन्य paired organs ( eyes, फीट, legs ), each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain hemisphere, so that handedness, or the preferred hand choice for single-handed क्रियाएँ such as लिखने with a pencil, reflects व्यक्तिगत brain कामकाज.
कुछ evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for उदाहरण, in the context of whether the three digits of the bird हाथ involved the same homologous loss of दो digits as in the dinosaur hand.
The human हाथ रै 27 bones, नहीं including the sesamoid हड्डियों जिससे number varies between people.
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal, intermediate और distal ) of the fingers.
The metacarpals are the bones that connects the fingers and the wrist.
Each human हाथ has 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal हड्डियों.

A digital clock is a प्रकार of क्लॉक that displays the time digitally, i.e. in numerals or अन्य symbols, as opposed to an analog clock, जहाँ the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands.
Digital घड़ियाँ are प्रायः associated with electronic drives, लकिन the `` digital '' वर्णन refers तभी to the display, not to the drive यांत्रिकी.
( Both एनालॉग और डिजिटल clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms with digital displays are rare. )
The biggest digital क्लॉक is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light Time स्तर '' ) on the टेलीविज़न मीनार Rheinturm Düsseldorf, जर्मनी.
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane भी provides the voices of Peter griffin, stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family guy is an American एनिमेटेड sitcom that features five main voice actors, and numerous नियमित cast और recurring अतिथि stars.
the प्रिंसिपल आवाज़ cast consists of show creator सेठ MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila Kunis ( who replaced लेसी Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor beau ओसबोर्न.
पुनरावर्ती voice actors include Patrick Warburton, Adam वेस्ट, John G. Brennan, Nicole सुलीवान and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars शामिल Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many डाल members provide आवाज़ें for multiple characters.
The आवाज़ actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, चित्रण inspiration from celebrities और पॉप culture.
