kunis was मनोनीत for an Annie Award लिये voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 एपीसोड `` Barely Legal `` and macfarlane रै भी won an Emmy Award for बकाया Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award लिये Best Voice Acting in an Animated टेलीविज़न Production, though no अन्य cast member रै won an पुरस्कार for their कार्य on the श्रेणी.
The five sets of the फलक game Monopoly चित्रित यहाँ show the evolution of the game 's artwork और डिजाइन in the United States from 1935–2005.
The इतिहास of the board game Monopoly can be traced back to the early 20th century.
The earliest ज्ञात design was by the American, एलिज़ाबेथ magie, patented in 1904 but मौजूदा as early as 1902.
magie 's original intent was to प्रकाशित a board game to illustrate an economic principle, namely the Georgist concept of a single land value tax.
A series of board खेल were developed from 1906 through the 1930s कि involved the खरीदे और selling of land and the development of that land.
By 1934, a board game had been created much like the संस्करण of Monopoly बेची by Parker Brothers और its related कंपनियाँ through the बाकी of the 20th सदी, and into the 21st.
अनेक people, ज़्यादातर in the Midwestern संयुक्त States and निकट the East Coast, contributed to the game 's design and evolution.
By the 1970s, the विचार that the game था महरूम created solely by Charles Darrow था become popular folklore ; it थी printed in the game 's निर्देश for अनेक years, in a 1974 किताब devoted to Monopoly, और was cited in a general किताब परिचय toys even as recently as 2007.
भी a guide to family games published for रीडर 's Digest in 2003 तभी gave credit to Darrow and Elizabeth Magie, erroneously stating that Magie 's original game थी created in the 1800s, और नहीं acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the खेल, और the eventual प्रकाशन by Parker Brothers.
Also in the 1970s, Professor Ralph Anspach, जो had himself published a फलक game intended to illustrate the principles of both monopolies and trust busting, fought पार्कर Brothers and इसके then parent company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly फलक game.
Through the research of Anspach and others, much of the जल्दी history of the game was `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted Maxine ब्रैडी, लेखक of the 1974 book The एकाधिकार Book : रणनीति and Tactics of the संसार 's सबसे Popular Game over the वास्तविक history of the खेल on Barry Farber 's नई York City बात show in 1975.
Because of the lengthy court process, including appeals, the legal status of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985.
The game 's name remains a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of पार्कर भाइयो, as do इसके विशिष्ट डिज़ाइन elements.
At the निष्कर्ष of the court case, the game 's logo and graphic डिज़ाइन elements became part of a larger एकाधिकार brand, licensed by Parker Brothers ' parent companies onto a variety of वस्तुएं through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the फलक game 's जल्दी इतिहास in the 1970s और 1980s, and अनेक books and journal articles on the subject, Hasbro ( पार्कर भाइयो ' current parent company ) did नहीं acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on इसके official Monopoly जालस्थल as recently as June 2012.
nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone अन्य than Darrow in materials published or sponsored by them, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, first held in the early 1970s, continue to the present, with the next world चैंपियनशिप likely scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off board games and card games appeared on both sides of the Atlantic समंदर.
In 1989, the first of many video game और computer खेल editions थी published.
चूंकि 1994, many official विसंगतियाँ of the खेल, based on locations other than अटलांटिक नगर, नई Jersey ( the official U.S. setting ) or लंदन ( the official Commonwealth setting, excepting Canada ), have been published by Hasbro or its licensees.
in 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the रंग scheme and some of the gameplay of the standard U.S. संस्करण of the game to मैच the UK Edition, although the U.S. मानक edition maintains the Atlantic नगर property names.
हास्ब्रो also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr. Monopoly '' character a 3-D computer-generated dekh, जिससे has चूंकि been adopted by licensees USAopoly, जीतना चालें और Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro रै also been including the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's Monopoly : The Mega Edition by Winning Moves खेल, in versions produced सीधे by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship संस्करण ).
In बेसबॉल, a sacrifice fly is a batted ball that satisfies four criteria:
There are कम than दो outs when the ball is hit.
the ball is hit to the outfield ( fair or foul ), or to infield foul territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or बेईमानी territory ) catches the ball on the मक्खी ( alternatively if the बैटर होता have been out if not for an error or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल and another runner is put out ).
A धावक जो is already on आधार स्कोर on the play.
It is पुकारा a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to score a run, while sacrificing his own ability to do so.
मिनेसोटा ( ) is a U.S. राज्य located in the Midwestern United States.
मिनेसोटा was carved out of the eastern half of the Minnesota Territory और admitted to the संघ as the 32nd state on may 11, 1858.
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 झीलों '', the राज्य 's name आता from a Dakota word for `` sky-tinted जल ''.
Those waters, together साथ forests, पार्क, और wilderness क्षेत्रों, offer निवासियों and पर्यटकों a किस्में of outdoor recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th सबसे extensive and the 21st most populous of the U.S. राज्य.
nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ( ज्ञात as the `` Twin Cities '' ), the center of परिवहन, कारोबार, industry, education, government and घर to an internationally known कला community.
the remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast, now cleared, farmed and settled ; और the कम आबादी North वुड्स, used लिये mining, forestry, और recreation.
मिनेसोटा is ज्ञात for इसके relatively mixed social and political orientations, and has a high rate of civic भागीदारी and voter turnout.
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest states, और has a highly literate population.
The large majority of residents are of scandinavian and German descent.
the state is known as a center of scandinavian American संस्कृति.
Ethnic diversity रै increased in recent decades.
substantial influxes of Asian, African, and Latin American immigrants have joined the descendants of European settlers and the असली Native अमरीकी inhabitants.
Grants हैं non-repayable funds by एक party ( grant makers ), प्रायः a government department, corporation, न्यास or विश्वास, to a, often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity, शैक्षणिक संस्था, कारोबार or an व्यक्तिगत.
In order to receive a grant, some form of `` Grant लिखने '' often referred to as either a proposal or an अनुप्रयोग is प्रायः required.
Most grants are बना to निधि a specific project और आवश्यकता some level of compliance and reporting.
the grant writing प्रक्रम involves an आवेदक submitting a proposal ( or सबमिशन ) to a संभावित funder, either on the applicant 's अपना initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal इससे the funder.
Other grants can be given to individuals, such as पीड़ितों of natural आपदाओं or individuals who seek to खोलें a small business.
sometimes ग्रान्ट makers आवश्यकता grant जरुरतमंदों to have some form of tax-exempt औकात, be a पंजीकृत nonprofit organization or a लोकल सरकारी.
For उदाहरण, tiered funding लिये a फ्रीवे are very large grants negotiated at government policy स्तर.
however छोटी grants may be provided by a government agency ( e.g. नगरपालिका government ).
Project-related funding involving governments, business, communities, और individuals is often arranged by अनुप्रयोग either in writing or ऑनलाइन.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is रचित of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have महरूम characterized with the most stable being 60Co with a half-life of 5.2714 सालो, 57Co with a half-life of 271.79 दिनों, 56co with a half-life of 77.27 दिनों, and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining रेडियोसक्रिय isotopes have half-lives that हैं less than 18 घंटों और the majority of these have half-lives that हैं कम than 1 second.
इस element also रै 11 meta states, all of which have half-lives less than 15 minutes.
The isotopes of cobalt range in atomic वज़न from 47Co to 75Co.
The प्राथमिक decay विधि for isotopes with परमाणु द्रव्यमान unit values कम than that of the सबसे abundant stable isotope, 59Co, is electron capture और the primary विधि of decay for those of greater than 59 परमाणु द्रव्यमान units is बीटा decay.
The primary decay उत्पाद पहले 59Co हैं iron isotopes and the primary उत्पाद after are निकल isotopes.
Standard atomic द्रव्यमान : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
जो स्थानांतरित My Cheese ?
An Amazing Way to सौदे साथ Change in Your Work और in Your जीवन, प्रकाशित in 1998, is a प्रेरक किताब by Spencer Johnson लिखा in the स्टाइल of a parable or business fable.
It describes बदलें in one 's work and life, and four typical reactions to कहा change by two mice and two `` littlepeople '', during their hunt लिये चीज.
a New York Times business bestseller since release, जो Moved My चीज ?
remained on the list for almost five years और spent over 200 सप्ताह on Publishers साप्ताहिक 's सजिल्द nonfiction list.
It has sold अधिक than 26 million copies worldwide in 37 languages और remains to be one of the best-selling business books.
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( – September 11, 1971 ) led the सोवियत Union during part of the ठंडा War.
He served as First Secretary of the कम्युनिस्ट Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964, and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers, or प्रीमियर, इससे 1958 to 1964.
khrushchev थी responsible लिये the partial de-Stalinization of the सोवियत संघ, for backing the प्रगति of the early Soviet space program, and for several relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy.
khrushchev 's पार्टी colleagues removed उसे इससे power in 1964, replacing him साथ Leonid Brezhnev as पहला Secretary और Alexei Kosygin as Premier.
Khrushchev थी born in the Russian village of kalinovka in 1894, close to the present-day किनारा between Russia and Ukraine.
He was employed as a metalworker in his youth, and during the Russian सिविल युद्ध थी a राजनैतिक commissar.
With the help of lazar Kaganovich, he worked उसके way up the Soviet पदानुक्रम.
he समर्थित जोसेफ Stalin 's purges, and approved thousands of arrests.
In 1939, Stalin भेजा him to govern Ukraine, और he continued the purges there.
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the ग्रेट Patriotic War ( पूर्वी सामने of World War II ), khrushchev was again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals.
khrushchev was उपस्थित at the bloody defense of Stalingrad, a fact he took ग्रेट pride in throughout his life.
After the war, he returned to Ukraine before being recalled to मास्को as one of Stalin 's बंद advisers.
In the power संघर्ष triggered by स्टालिन 's death in 1953, Khrushchev, बाद several years, emerged विजयी.
On February 25, 1956, at the 20th Party कॉंग्रेस, he वितरित the `` Secret Speech, '' denouncing स्टालिन 's purges और ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union.
उसके घरेलू policies, aimed at bettering the lives of ordinary नागरिकों, यहूद often ineffective, विशेषकर in the area of कृषि.
Hoping eventually to rely on मिसाइलें for national defense, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
Despite the कटौती, Khrushchev 's rule saw the tensest years of the Cold War, culminating in the क्यूबन Missile Crisis.
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, particularly by his emerging विरोधियों, जो चुपचाप रोज़ in strength and deposed him in October 1964.
He did नहीं suffer the deadly fate of कुछ previous losers of सोवियत शक्ति struggles, but was pensioned बंद साथ an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
उसके lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the West and प्रकाशित in भाग in 1970.
Khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease.
Upper जठरांत्र ( GI ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the अपर gastrointestinal tract.
the anatomic cut-off लिये upper GI bleeding is the स्नायु of treitz, which connects the fourth portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper gi bleeds are माना चिकित्सा emergencies, and require admission to hospital for urgent diagnosis and प्रबन्धन.
Due to advances in medications and endoscopy, upper GI hemorrhage is अभी usually treated without सर्जरी.
संसार population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on un 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) and us Census Bureau ऐतिहासिक estimates ( ब्लैक ).
Actual recorded population figures are in ब्लू.
According to the उच्चतम अनुमान, the world जनसांख्यिकी may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
the world population is the कुल number of जीना humans on धरती.
as of आज, it is estimated to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates कि the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population निधि, it reached इस पड़ाव on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great अकाल and the Black मौत in 1350, when it stood at around 370 लाख.
the highest rates of growth – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल during the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and हैं अभी expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 स्तर of 134 million, जबकि deaths number 56 million प्रति year, और are expected to increase to 80 million प्रति year by 2040.
Current projections दिखाएँ a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी expected to पहुँचें between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the वैश्विक population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food आपूर्तियाँ, and energy संसाधन.
Philips Lumileds Lighting कम्पनी is the manufacturer of a wide range of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ).
it is a now a fully owned प्रभाग of फिलिप्स lighting.
knuckle mnemonic लिये the number of days in each माह of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month.
a mnemonic (, with a silent `` m '' ), or mnemonic device, is any learning technique that aids सूचना retention.
Mnemonics aim to translate सूचना into a form that the human दिमाग can retain बेहतर than इसके original रूप.
Even the process of applying this परिवर्तन might already aid the ट्रांसफ़र of information to long-term memory.
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form, such as short poems, acronyms, or यादगार वाक्यांश, but mnemonics can भी be for other प्रकार of सूचना और in विज़ुअल or kinesthetic forms.
Their use is based on the अवलोकन कि the human mind अधिक easily remembers स्थानिक, personal, आश्चर्यजनक, physical, sexual, humorous, or वरना 'relatable ' information, rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information.
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), अर्थ `` of memory '' और is सम्बन्धित to Mnemosyne ( `` स्मरण '' ), the नाम of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology.
Both of these शब्द are निकला from μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` remembrance, memory ''.
Mnemonics in प्राचीनता were most often माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of कया is today ज्ञात as the Art of मेमोरी.
Ancient Greeks and romans distinguished between two types of memory : the 'natural ' मेमोरी and the 'artificial ' मेमोरी.
The former is inborn, and is the one that everyone उपयोग automatically and without thinking.
The artificial memory in contrast has to be प्रशिक्षित and विकसित through the सीखना and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
Mnemonic प्रणालियों हैं special techniques or strategies consciously प्रयुक्त to improve memory, it helps employ सूचना already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task.
President बुश हस्ताक्षर the no Child Left Behind Act at हैमिल्टन H.S. in Hamilton, Ohio.
The No Child बाएँ Behind Act of 2001 ( NCLB ) is a United States अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the Elementary and Secondary Education अधिनियम, which included शीर्षक I, the government 's flagship सहायता program for disadvantaged विद्यार्थी.
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the आधार that setting high standards और establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education.
The Act requires states to develop assessments in मौलिक कौशल.
States must give these assessments to all students at select grade स्तर in अनुक्रम to receive federal स्कूल funding.
the अधिनियम does not assert a national achievement मानक ; standards are set by each individual state.
NCLB expanded the federal भूमिका in पब्लिक education through annual परीक्षण, annual academic progress, report ताश, teacher qualifications, and funding परिवर्तन.
the bill passed in the U.S. Congress साथ bipartisan support.

A पिकअप truck or pick-up, often बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट मोटर vehicle साथ an open-top, rear cargo क्षेत्रफल ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used लिये लाइट ट्रक with a हल्का duty chassis and factory निर्मित, integrated bed, as well as for coupé यूटिलिटी vehicles, प्रायः based on a personal car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for ऐसे उपयोग.
Some countries have their अपना शर्तें समान to pickup, ऐसे as ute in Australia and New जीलैंड, or bakkie in South Africa.
विशाल pickup trucks हैं somewhat rare in यूरोपीय, जहाँ वैन and लाइट lorries are commonly प्रयुक्त for समान roles.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with मेहराबदार neck, refined head और सुरुचिपूर्ण gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size, build और breed इससे the आधुनिक horse, and यहूद, on औसत, छोटी.
They were also more central to society than their modern counterparts, being अनिवार्य for युद्ध, agriculture, और transport.
नतीजतन, specific प्रकार of घोड़ा developed, many of जिससे have no modern equivalent.
जबकि an understanding of modern घोड़ा breeds और equestrianism is vital for any विश्लेषण of the medieval horse, researchers also need to consider documentary ( both written और pictorial ) and पुरातत्व evidence.
Horses in the Middle Ages यहूद rarely differentiated by breed, but बल्कि by use.
This led them to be वर्णित, लिये example, as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध horses ), `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ), कार्ट horses or packhorses.
Reference is भी given to their place of उत्पत्ति, such as `` Spanish घोड़े, '' but whether this referred to one breed or several is अनजान.
another difficulty arising during any study of मध्यकालीन documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval languages, where अनेक शब्द can be used for एक thing ( or, conversely, अनेक objects are referred to by one शब्द ).
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even within एक document ), and जहाँ one epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological अग्रिम in equestrian equipment, प्रायः introduced from other cultures, allowed for significant changes in दोनो warfare और कृषि.
in particular, improved designs लिये the solid-treed saddle as well as the arrival of the रकाब, horseshoe and horse collar यहूद significant advances in medieval समाज.
Consequently, the assumptions and theories developed by historians हैं not निर्णायक, and debate स्टिल rages on many issues, such as the प्रजनन or size of the horse, और a number of sources must be consulted in अनुक्रम to understand the breadth of the subject.
the म्यूज़िक Man is a musical with किताब, म्यूज़िक, and गीत by मेरेडिथ Willson, आधारित on a story by willson and Franklin लेसी.
the प्लाट concerns con man हेरोल्ड Hill, who poses as a boys ' बैंड आयोजक and leader and sells band instruments and वर्दी to naive townsfolk before skipping town साथ the नकदी.
in नदी नगर, Iowa, prim लाइब्रेरियन and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through him, but when Hill helps her younger brother overcome उसके fear of social interactions due to his lisp, marian begins to fall in love with हेरोल्ड.
हेरोल्ड, in फेरे falling for marian, risks होने caught to win उसके.
In 1957, the दिखाएँ became a hit on Broadway, winning five टोनी Awards, including बेहतरीन Musical, and running for 1,375 performances.
the डाल album जीती the पहला Grammy Award for `` Best Original डाल Album '' and was क्रमांक एक on the Billboard charts for 245 सप्ताह.
The show 's success led to revivals और a popular 1962 film adaptation and a 2003 television remake.

Surveyor 's व्हील
a surveyor 's wheel, also पुकारा a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle व्हील, measuring व्हील, or perambulator is a device for measuring distance.
Largest non-polar deserts
Sand dunes in the Rub ' al खली ( `` खाली quarter '' ) of Saudi अरब.
Makhtesh Ramon, Negev मरुस्थल, Israel
a desert is a landscape or region of land कि is very शुष्क because of low वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ), often has little कवरेज by plants, और in जिससे streams dry up जबतक they are supplied by water from outside areas.
Deserts can also be वर्णित as areas जहाँ more water is खोया by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation.
Desert पौधे must have special adaptations to survive साथ this little water.
Deserts generally प्राप्त कम than 25 cm of rain ( वर्षण ) each year.
Semideserts or steppes are regions जिससे प्राप्त between and.
in the Köppen climate classification system, deserts are classed as bwh ( hot desert ) or BWk ( temperate मरुस्थल ).
in the Thornthwaite climate classification प्रणाली, deserts would be classified as arid megathermal climates.
संसार War I ( wwi ) was a global war केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the ग्रेट War from इसके occurrence until the start of संसार युद्ध II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, जिससे यहूद assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( आधारित on the Triple entente of the United किंगडम, France and रूस ) and the Central शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; लकिन, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the अनुबंध, इटली did not enter into the युद्ध ).
These alliances were दोनो reorganised and expanded as more राष्ट्र डाला the war : Italy, जापानी और the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and बुल्गारिया the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य personnel, including 60 million Europeans, यहूद mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
अधिक than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons बगैर corresponding improvements in सुरक्षा or mobility.
It थी the fifth- deadliest conflict in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the युद्ध was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
अधिक immediately, the assassination of Archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by यूगोस्लाव nationalist Gavrilo princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic संकट when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the किंगडम of सर्बिया.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख powers were at युद्ध and, via उनके colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
on 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये Britain 's declaration of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी.
बाद the German march on पेरिस was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the Western सामने settled into a स्थिर battle of attrition with a trench लकीर that बदला little जबतक 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its आक्रमण of East Prussia by the Germans.
In नवम्बर the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria गई to युद्ध in 1915 और Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी offensive साथ the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as उग्र as on the battle fronts, as the participants आजमाया to mobilize उनके manpower और आर्थिक संसाधन to fight a total युद्ध.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
the successor states of the former दो lost a great राशि of territory, while the latter two यहूद dismantled entirely.
The मैप of central यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
the European राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the war और the breakup of empires, the repercussions of जर्मनी 's defeat और problems साथ the सन्धि of Versailles हैं agreed to be कारकों contributing to World War ii.
`` Girls Just Want to Have मजा '' is a 1979 सोंग originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट Hazard और made famous by सिंगर cyndi Lauper.
it थी the first major single released by Lauper as a solo artist and the lead-off single इससे her debut album She 's So Unusual.
lauper’s version gained recognition as a feminist गान and promoted by an award-winning video.
It has been covered on either an एल्बम or in सजीव concert by over 30 other artists.
The सिंगल was Lauper 's भेदन hit, reaching # 2 on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 and becoming a विश्वव्यापी hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984.
It remains one of lauper 's signature गीतों and was a widely लोकप्रिय सोंग दौरान the era of इसके रिलीज, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & एमटीवी : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '', `` रोलिंग Stone : `` the 100 Top म्यूज़िक Videos '' '' and the `` vh1 : 100 महानतम Videos '' lists ranked the song at # 22, # 39 and # 45, respectively.

दृश्य of defibrillator electrode position and placement.
Defibrillation is a आम उपचार for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected heart with a यंत्र called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's प्राकृतिक pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable लय, अर्थ that lay responders or bystanders are समर्थ to use them successfully साथ छोटी, or in some cases no training at all.
the Cato संस्थान is an American libertarian think tank headquartered in Washington, D.C.
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray Rothbard, Ed Crane और Charles Koch, अध्यक्ष of the board और मुख्य executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries, inc..
In July 1976, the name was changed to the केटो Institute.
according to the 2011 Global go to सोचो Tank Index, केटो is the 6th most influential US based think tank, ranking 3rd in आर्थिक नीति and 2nd in सोशल Policy.
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the समझना of public नीतियों आधारित on the principles of सीमित government, free markets, individual liberty, and सलाम.
the Institute होगा उपयोग the सबसे effective means to originate, advocate, प्रचार, और disseminate applicable नीति प्रस्ताव that create फ़्री, open, and civil societies in the United States और throughout the world. ''
केटो विद्वानों यहूद critical of जार्ज W. Bush 's Republican प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे, including the Iraq War, सिविल liberties, education, agriculture, उर्जा नीति, and excessive सरकारी spending.
on other issues, वे समर्थित बुश administration पहलों, most notably स्वास्थ्य care, Social Security, global वार्मिंग, tax policy, and आव्रजन.
During the 2008 U.S. presidential election, Cato विद्वानों criticized both major-party candidates, John मैक्केन और Barack Obama.
Cato has criticized President ओबामा 's stances on नीति issues since his inauguration, such as fiscal stimulus, healthcare reform, foreign policy, and the War on Drugs, while supporting उसके stance on the repeal of do n't Ask, do n't Tell और उदार immigration नीति.
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by आयरिश लेखक Bram Stoker.
प्रसिद्ध for introducing the character of the vampire गिनती ड्रैकुला, the novel tells the स्टोरी of Dracula 's attempt to relocate इससे Transylvania to England, and the बैटल between Dracula and a small group of men और women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
Dracula रै been आबंटित to many साहित्यिक genres including vampire literature, horror fiction, the गोथिक novel और आक्रमण साहित्य.
the novel touches on themes such as the भूमिका of महिलाओं in Victorian संस्कृति, sexual conventions, immigration, colonialism, और post-colonialism.
Although Stoker किया not invent the पिशाच, he defined its modern रूप, और the novel रै शाखित numerous theatrical, film and television interpretations.
Quidditch is a प्रतिस्पर्धी sport in the wizarding world of the Harry Potter universe, and is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels and फिल्मों.
It is an extremely अशिष्ट लकिन very लोकप्रिय semi-contact sport, played by wizards and witches.
Matches are played between दो teams of सात players सवारी उड़ती broomsticks, using चार balls and six elevated ring-shaped goals, तीन on each पक्ष of the quidditch pitch ( field ).
In the Harry Potter universe, quidditch holds a fervent following similar to the स्थिति कि association football holds as a globally popular खेल.
The खेल is monumental throughout the wizarding world.
Harry plays an important स्थिति for उसके हाउस team at Hogwarts : he is the seeker और becomes the captain in his sixth year there.
Regional and international competitions are mentioned throughout the series.
In Goblet of आग, quidditch at हॉग्वार्ट्स is cancelled for the Tri-Wizard Tournament, but Harry और the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup.
In जोड, हैरी उपयोग his Quidditch कौशल to capture a सुनहरी अंडा from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard टूर्नामेंट ), to capture a flying key in पारस 's Stone, and on दो key occasions in Deathly hallows — getting थाम of ravenclaw 's Diadem, and दौरान the final fight साथ Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder wand out of the air.
Harry Potter रै स्वामित्व two broomsticks, the nimbus 2000 और the Firebolt, दोनो of जिससे हैं नष्ट by the श्रेणी ' end.
The game रै been अपनाया in the real संसार in the form of Muggle Quidditch.
The United राज्य Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal government of the United States consisting of two houses : the lower house known as the House of Representatives and the अपर house ज्ञात as the Senate.
Congress meets in the कैपिटल in Washington, D.C.
Both representatives and सीनेटरों are chosen through सीधा election.
Congress रै a total of 535 voting members : 435 सदस्यों in the House of Representatives and 100 members in the सीनेट.
Members of the House of प्रतिनिधि serve two-year terms representing the people of a district.
Congressional districts हैं apportioned to राज्य by population using the United States Census results, each state in the संघ having at तनिक one representative in the हाउस of Representatives.
Regardless of जनसांख्यिकी, each of the 50 राज्य रै two सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक serve a six-year term.
the terms are staggered so every two years लगभग one-third of the Senate is up for चुनाव.
Each लड़खड़ाते group of one-third of the senators are पुकारा 'classes '.
no state of the United राज्य has two सीनेटरों from the same क्लास.
Most incumbents seek re-election, and उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 प्रतिशत.
In August 2012, a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s approval rating amongst अमेरिकी was at 10 %, matching a 38-year कम reached in November 2011.
`` A छोटी More Country Than That '' is the title of a song लिखा by जॉय + Rory 's Rory ली Feek, Wynn Varble, और Don poythress, and recorded by American country कलाकार Easton Corbin.
It was released in अगस्त 2009 as Corbin 's डेब्यू सिंगल and is शामिल on his self-titled डेब्यू album.

It रै been certified Gold by the RIAA.
The BlackBerry is a लकीर of बेतार हैंडहेल्ड डिवाइस and सेवाएं designed and marketed by शोध In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry.
The पहला ब्लैकबेरी device, an email पेजर, थी released in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल BlackBerry devices, the z10 and Q10, यहूद announced on January 30, 2013.
the उपयोक्ता interface varies by मॉडल ; most विशेषता a physical क्वर्टी keyboard, while नए generations have relied on a multi-touch screen and आभासी keyboard.
A ब्लैकबेरी can shoot वीडियो, take photos, play music, and perform online functions such as web-browsing and emailing.
They can also send and receive push email और instant संदेश while maintaining a high स्तर of security through on-device message एन्क्रिप्शन, and are designed to फलन as personal digital assistants.
BlackBerry डिवाइस support a विशाल variety of तत्काल messaging सुविधाएँ, with the सबसे popular being the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service.
The BlackBerry PlayBook is a tablet computer offered by the कम्पनी.
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in June quarter of 2010 and the 200 millionth smartphone थी shipped in सितंबर क्वार्टर of 2012.
BlackBerry खाते for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011, making its manufacturer the sixth सबसे popular device मेकर ( 25 % of mobile device sales हैं smartphones ).
The consumer BlackBerry Internet Service is उपलब्धियाँ in 91 countries विश्वव्यापी on over 500 mobile सेवा operators using various mobile technologies.
As of September 2012, there यहूद अस्सी लाख subscribers worldwide to BlackBerry.
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry स्मार्टफ़ोन विश्वव्यापी, with up to परिचय 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device.
ब्लैकबेरी, iPhone, एंड्रॉइड, and खिड़कियाँ Phone हैं considered the four major smartphone brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United States, जिससे alludes to इसके excessive उपयोग by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of क्रैक cocaine.
उपयोग of the term CrackBerry became so widespread that in November 2006 Webster 's New World College Dictionary नामित `` crackberry '' the `` नई शब्द of the Year. ''
An example of a demand वक्र shifting.
the shift from D1 To D2 means an बढ़ाएँ in demand साथ consequences for the अन्य variables
in economics, the demand वक्र is the graph depicting the relationship between the price of a certain कमोडिटी and the राशि of it that consumers are willing and समर्थ to खरीदें at that given price.
It is a graphic प्रतिनिधित्व of a demand schedule.
the demand वक्र for all consumers together follows इससे the demand curve of every individual उपभोक्ता : the individual demands at each दाम are added साथ.
माँग curves are प्रयुक्त to estimate behaviors in competitive markets, and are often संयुक्त with supply curves to estimate the संतुलन दाम ( the price at जिससे विक्रेता together are willing to sell the same राशि as buyers together हैं willing to buy, also known as मार्केट clearing price ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or सेवा that will be उत्पादित and bought बगैर surplus/excess सप्लाई or shortage/excess माँग ) of that मार्केट.
In a monopolistic market, the demand वक्र facing the monopolist is simply the market demand curve.
Historia
by Nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from यूनानी - historia, अर्थ `` पूछताछ, ज्ञान acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term कि relates to past events as well as the discovery, collection, organization, and presentation of सूचना परिचय these events.
The term includes cosmic, geologic, और organic history, but is often generically implied to mean human इतिहास.
Scholars who write परिचय इतिहास हैं called historians.
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative to examine and analyse a sequence of past events, और objectively determine the patterns of cause and प्रभाव कि determine them.
इतिहासकारों sometimes debate the nature of इतिहास and its usefulness by discussing the पढ़ाई of the अनुशासन as an end in itself and as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the उपस्थित.
Stories common to a particular culture, but not supported by external स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as the किस्से surrounding King Arthur ) are usually classified as cultural heritage or legends, क्युकी they do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the अनुशासन of history.
Events occurring prior to written रिकार्ड are considered prehistory.
हिरोडोटस, a 5th century b.c. Greek इतिहासकार is considered within the Western tradition to be the `` father of history '', and, साथ with उसके समकालीन Thucydides, helped form the foundations for the modern study of इंसान history.
Their work continues to be read today and the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus and the military-focused Thucydides remains a point of contention or approach in modern ऐतिहासिक writing.
in the Eastern परंपरा, a state chronicle the Spring and Autumn annals थी known to be compiled from as early as 722 bce although तभी 2nd century BCE texts survived.
Ancient प्रभाव have helped spawn variant interpretations of the nature of history which have evolved over the सदियां और continue to change today.
The modern study of history is wide-ranging, and शामिल the study of specific regions and the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical or thematical elements of historical investigation.
Often इतिहास is सिखाया as part of प्राथमिक and द्वितीयक education, and the academic study of history is a major discipline in University studies.
Malcolm X ( ; may 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born मैल्कम छोटी और also known as El-Hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american Muslim मंत्री and इंसान अधिकारों activist.
To his admirers, he थी a courageous एडवोकेट for the rights of blacks, a man who indicted white America in the harshest शर्तें for इसके अपराधों against black Americans.
Detractors accused him of preaching जातिवाद, ब्लैक supremacy, and violence.
he रै been called one of the greatest और most influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in इतिहास.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी यंग, and at least एक of his uncles थी lynched.
जब he थी 13, उसके mother was लगाई in a दिमागी hospital, and he थी लगाई in a series of foster homes.
in 1946, at आयु 20, he went to थाना लिये तोड़कर and entering.
In prison, मैल्कम X became a सदस्य of the Nation of Islam ; बाद उसके parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of इसके leaders.
For a dozen सालो, Malcolm X was the public face of the विवादास्पद group, लकिन disillusionment with स्वदेश of Islam head इलियास Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in Africa और the Middle ईस्ट, he लौटे to the United राज्य, where he founded Muslim Mosque, inc. और the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a साल after leaving the Nation of Islam, he was assassinated by three सदस्यों of the समूह.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time.
as a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated separation of ब्लैक और श्वेत Americans —in contrast to the सिविल rights movement 's emphasis on संयोजन.
After breaking साथ the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his संघ with it, `` I किया अनेक बाते as a [ ब्लैक ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
i was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction और told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni मुस्लिम, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work साथ सिविल अधिकारों leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' paulson, Jr. ( born March 28, 1946 ) is an American banker who served as the 74th United States सचिव of the Treasury.
he had परोसा as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs, और is now chairman of the paulson Institute, which he संस्थापित in 2011 to promote चिरस्थायी economic विकास and a cleaner environment around the world, साथ an initial focus on the United States and चीन.
A आभासी machine ( VM ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying hardware, which is presented to the अनुप्रयोग layer of the system.
Virtual मशीने may be based on specifications of a काल्पनिक computer or emulate the computer वास्तुकला and functions of a real world computer.
Spiders ( order araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have eight legs and chelicerae साथ fangs that inject venom.
They हैं the largest order of arachnids and रैंक seventh in कुल species diversity among सब other groups of organisms.
Spiders हैं मिला worldwide on every continent except for अंटार्कटिक, और have become established in nearly every आवास with the एक्सेप्शन of air और sea colonization.
As of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 spider प्रजाति, and 109 families have been अंकित by taxonomists ; however, there has महरूम confusion within the scientific community as to कैसा सब ये families should be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications कि have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual देह segments are fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a छोटी, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike कीट, spiders do not have antennae.
In all except the most primitive समूह, the mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of all arthropods, as सब their ganglia हैं fused into one mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike सबसे arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs और instead extend उन्हें by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been परिवर्धित into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to छह types of रेशा glands भीतर उनके abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, आकार और the amount of स्टिकी thread used.
it अभी appears that the spiral orb वेब may be एक of the earliest forms, और मकड़ियों that produce tangled cobwebs हैं more abundant और diverse than orb-web spiders.
spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian काल about, लकिन these animals जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks from, और are बहुत समान to the most primitive surviving अनुक्रम, the Mesothelae.
The प्रमुख groups of आधुनिक spiders, mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but सब other ज्ञात species are predators, mostly preying on कीट and on other spiders, although a few large प्रजाति भी take birds and lizards.
Spiders उपयोग a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the शिकार to avoid detection, or running it down.
सबसे detect prey mainly by sensing कंपन, but the active hunters have acute vision, and hunters of the genus Portia दिखाएँ signs of intelligence in उनके choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts हैं too narrow to take solids, और वे liquidize their food by flooding it साथ digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps, as वे do not have true jaws.
पुरूष मकड़ियों identify themselves by a variety of complex प्रेमालाप rituals to avoid होने खाया by the females.
Males of most species survive a few matings, सीमित mainly by उनके short life spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, each of which may contain hundreds of eggs.
Females of many species care लिये उनके young, for example by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing food with उन्हें.
A minority of प्रजाति are social, building communal webs कि may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
सोशल behavior सीमाएँ from precarious toleration, as in the widow spiders, to co-operative शिकार and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most two years, tarantulas और other mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few प्रजाति is खतरनाक to humans, scientists are now researching the उपयोग of spider venom in medicine और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength और elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials, और spider रेशा जीनों have been inserted into स्तनधारियों and पौधे to see if these can be प्रयुक्त as रेशा कारखानों.
As a result of their wide range of व्यवहार, spiders have become common प्रतीकों in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.

Portrayed by लौरा Prepon, Donna is the love interest to Eric Forman.
us काउंटी household median आय 2009.
Median us household income, 2001-2011
Household आय is a measure commonly used by the United राज्य सरकारी and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the income of every resident over the आयु of 15.
Income includes मजदूरी and salaries, बेरोजगारी बीमे, विकलांगता payments, चाइल्ड support payments प्राप्त, नियमित rental receipts, as खूब as any personal business, investment, or अन्य kinds of income प्राप्त routinely.
जबकि inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household income had महरूम increasing लगभग every year from 1945 to 1999, it रै चूंकि महरूम flat और even decreased recently.
u.S. median household income fell इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, अर्थ households living on less than $ 2 प्रति day before government benefits, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household for उनके earnings to be considered भाग of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a समान आर्थिक context, the use of household income remains among the सबसे widely accepted उपायों of income.
That the आकार of a household is नहीं commonly taken into account in such उपायों may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income categories, और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or even impossible.
A पंजीकृत agent, also known as a निवासी agent or statutory एजेंट, in संयुक्त States business law, is a business or individual designated to receive service of process ( sop ) जब a business entity is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons.
The registered agent 's पता may भी be where the राज्य will भेजें the paperwork for the yearly नवीकरण of the कारोबार एंटिटी 's charter.
The पंजीकृत agent for a business entity may be an व्यक्तिगत सदस्य of the company, or ( अधिक often ) a third party, such as the organization 's lawyer or a service कम्पनी.
Failure to properly maintain a registered agent can affect a कम्पनी negatively.

`` Life, स्वतंत्रता, and the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the संयुक्त States घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' साथ which सब human beings हैं endowed by their creator लिये their protection of which they institute governments.
Fencing, is typically divided into Olympic fencing, शास्त्रीय fencing and ऐतिहासिक fencing,.
The खेल of तलवारबाजी ( commonly called olympic fencing or competitive fencing ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil, sabre and épée.
शास्त्रीय तलवारबाजी uses the same three हथियार, but approaches तलवारबाजी as a martial आर्ट.
Competitive तलवारबाजी is one of five खेल which has been featured at every one of the आधुनिक ओलम्पिक Games, the other चार होने Athletics, साइकिलिंग, Swimming, and Gymnastics.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin लिये `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ), भी called simply the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a large muscle group that includes the four prevailing muscles on the front of the thigh.
it is the great extensor muscle of the knee, forming a विशाल fleshy mass which कवर the front और पहलू of the femur.
The proper Latin plural form of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites.
In modern English उपयोग, quadriceps is प्रयुक्त in both singular and बहुवचन.
The एकवचन form quadricep, produced by hypercorrection, is frequently प्रयुक्त.
RMS टाइटैनिक was a अंग्रेजों यात्री liner कि sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912 बाद colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to New यॉर्क City, US.
the sinking of टाइटैनिक caused the deaths of 1,502 people in one of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern इतिहास.
The RMS Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the time of her maiden voyage.
She was the second of three Olympic class ocean liners operated by the श्वेत स्टार Line, और she थी built by the Harland and wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas एंड्रयूज, who perished with the जलयान, as उसके naval architect.
On her maiden voyage, she carried 2,224 passengers and crew.
Under the कमांड of Edward Smith, her यात्री included some of the wealthiest लोगों in the world, as well as hundreds of emigrants इससे Great Britain and Ireland, Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new जीवन in North America.
The ship was designed to be the पिछला word in comfort and luxury, with an on-board gymnasium, swimming pool, पुस्तकालयों, high-class restaurants and opulent केबिन.
वो also had a powerful wireless telegraph provided लिये the convenience of यात्री as खूब as for operational use.
Though she had उन्नत सुरक्षा सुविधाएँ ऐसे as watertight compartments और remotely activated watertight doors, she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard.
Because of outdated मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा regulations, she carried only enough lifeboats लिये 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than half of the number यात्राएं on the maiden voyage, and one-third उसके total passenger और crew capacity.
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912, Titanic called at Cherbourg in France और Queenstown ( now cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards towards नई York.
On 14 अप्रैल 1912, four days into the crossing और about 375 miles ( 600 km ) south of Newfoundland, she hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm जलयान 's समय.
The glancing टक्कर caused Titanics hull plates to बकल inwards along उसके starboard side and opened पाँच of her sixteen watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with जल.
meanwhile, passengers और some crew सदस्यों were evacuated in lifeboats, अनेक of which were शुभारम्भ only partly loaded.
a disproportionate number of मेन were left aboard because of a `` women and children first `` प्रोटोकॉल followed by some of the अधिकारियों लदान the lifeboats.
By 2:20 AM, she broke apart और foundered, with खूब over एक thousand people स्टिल सवार.
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered, the Cunard liner RMS Carpathia arrived on the झाँकी of the डूब, where she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors.
the disaster थी greeted with worldwide shock and outrage at the huge घाटा of जीवन and the regulatory और operational असफलताओं that had led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain और the United States led to major improvements in maritime सुरक्षा.
One of उनके सबसे महत्वपूर्ण legacies थी the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention for the सुरक्षा of Life at समुद्र ( SOLAS ), which still governs मेरीटाइम safety today.
Additionally, several नई wireless regulations यहूद passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख इससे the many missteps in wireless communications -- -which could have saved many अधिक passengers.
Many of the survivors lost सब of उनके money and possessions and were बाएँ destitute ; many परिवारों, particularly those of crew members from Southampton, खोया उनके primary bread-winners.
वे यहूद helped by an outpouring of public सहानुभूति और charitable donations.
Some of the male survivors were accused of कायरता लिये leaving the ship जबकि people were स्टिल on board ; the White Star Line 's chairman, J. ब्रूस Ismay, faced social ostracism for the rest of उसके life.
The रेक of the Titanic remains on the समुद्रतल, विभाजित in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of.
Since its डिस्कवरी in 1985, thousands of artefacts have been recovered and put on प्रदर्शक at museums around the world.
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in history, her memory kept जिंदा by numerous किताबे, folk songs, films, exhibits, and memorials.
The इंसान leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of the human देह, including the foot, thigh and even the hip or gluteal region ; however, the precise definition in human anatomy refers तभी to the section of the lower limb extending इससे the knee to the ankle.
टाँगे हैं used for standing, walking, jumping, running, kicking, and समान क्रियाएँ, और constitute a significant portion of a व्यक्ति 's mass.

As of 2010, the population of Turkey is estimated to be 73.7 million साथ a growth rate of 1.21 % प्रति annum ( 2009 figure ).

James Madison, Jr. ( कूच 16, 1751 ( o.s. March 5 ) – June 28, 1836 ) was an अमरीकी statesman and political theorist, the fourth President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “Father of the Constitution” for होने instrumental in the drafting of the United States संविधान and as the key champion and author of the United राज्य Bill of Rights.
He served as a politician much of his वयस्क life.
बाद the संविधान had been drafted, Madison became एक of the नेताओ in the movement to ratify it.
उसके collaboration with Alexander Hamilton and जॉन Jay produced the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated तभी in New York at the time, वे would later be considered among the most महत्वपूर्ण polemics in support of the Constitution.
He was भी a delegate to the वर्जिनिया constitutional ratifying convention, and was instrumental to the successful ratification effort in वर्जिनिया.
Like most of उसके contemporaries, Madison changed his राजनैतिक views during his life.
During the drafting and ratification of the संविधान, he favored a strong national government, हालांकि later he grew to favor stronger state governments, before settling between the two extremes late in उसके life.
In 1789, Madison became a leader in the नई हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, drafting many basic कानून.
He is notable लिये drafting the पहला ten amendments to the Constitution, और thus is ज्ञात as the `` Father of the विधेयक of Rights ``.
Madison worked closely साथ President George Washington to व्यवस्थित the new federal सरकारी.
तोड़कर with हैमिल्टन और what became the federalist पार्टी in 1791, Madison and Thomas जेफरसन organized कया they called the Republican पार्टी ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
As jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ), मैडिसन supervised the Louisiana खरीदें, which doubled the nation’s size.
After his election to the presidency, he presided over renewed prosperity लिये several सालो.
As president ( 1809–17 ), after the failure of diplomatic protests and a trade embargo against ग्रेट Britain, he led the स्वदेश into the War of 1812.
He was responding to British encroachments on American सम्मान और अधिकारों ; in जोड, he wanted to end the influence of the अंग्रेजों among their भारतीय allies, जिनकी प्रतिरोध blocked संयुक्त States settlement in the मिडवेस्ट around the Great झीलों.
Madison मिला the war to be an administrative दुःस्वप्न, as the United States had neither a दमदार army nor financial प्रणाली ; as a result, he afterward supported a stronger national government और a strong सैन्य, as खूब as the national bank, which he had long opposed.
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave society, he was a slaveholder who inherited उसके plantation ज्ञात as Montpelier, and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate तम्बाकू and other crops.
मैडिसन समर्थित the three-fifths compromise that allowed three-fifths of the enumerated population of स्लेव to be counted लिये representation.

Hydraulic द्रव होने poured.
हाइड्रोलिक fluids, also called hydraulic liquids, are the medium by which power is transferred in hydraulic मशीनरी.
Common hydraulic fluids हैं आधारित on mineral oil or जल.
Examples of equipment कि might use hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, power steering प्रणालियों, transmissions, garbage ट्रक, aircraft flight control systems, lifts, और औद्योगिक machinery.
हाइड्रोलिक systems like the ones उल्लेखित ऊपर होगा work most efficiently if the hydraulic fluid used has no compressibility
Mahindra Tractor
Mahindra Tractors, the फार्म equipment division of Mahindra & Mahindra, builds and स्त्रोत tractors कि are बेची विश्वव्यापी across छह महाद्वीपों.
Mahindra is also among the top three ट्रैक्टर निर्माताओं in the world.
महिंद्रा रै a विशाल consumer base in India, चीन and America and a growing base in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
The company builds more tractors in इण्डिया than कोई अन्य निर्माता, and has the capacity to build 150,000 tractors a year.
In 1963, m & m formed a joint venture with अंतरराष्ट्रीय Harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the महिंद्रा nameplate for the Indian market.
हथियारबंद साथ engineering, tooling and manufacturing know-how gained इससे this relationship, M & M developed its first tractor, the B-275.
Mahindra tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 units annually is एक of the largest tractor companies in the world, and is number one in sales in India - the largest tractor मार्केट in the संसार.
to विस्तार into the growing tractor मार्केट in China, Mahindra acquired majority stake in Jiangling.
to raise awareness about Mahindra in the US, महिंद्रा USA announced its new प्रायोजन in the nascar Nationwide Series साथ r3 Motorsports, which is participating with a # 23 Mahindra Tractors शेवरलेट.
the car will be चलित by Robert रिचर्डसन, Jr. महिंद्रा यूएसए, Inc. announced a 17-race प्राथमिक and 18-race associate sponsorship for the 2009 nascar Nationwide Series.
साथ इस sponsorship, Mahindra was the first भारतीय company to sponsor a car in NASCAR.
In 2008, Mahindra was a sponsor of the मैकडोनाल्ड Motorsports team which भागा the # 81 car in the nascar देशभर Series.

It is part of the eCLipz project, कहा to have a लक्ष्य of converging ibm 's server hardware जहाँ practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries, pSeries, and zSeries ).
The American मध्य class is a social class in the United States.
While the concept is typically ambiguous in लोकप्रिय opinion and आम language उपयोग, contemporary सोशल scientists have put आगे अनेक, more or less congruent, theories on the American middle क्लास.
depending on क्लास model प्रयुक्त, the middle क्लास may constitute anywhere from 25 % to 66 % of households.
One of the first प्रमुख studies of the middle class in America was श्वेत कॉलर : The American मध्य वर्ग, published in 1951 by समाजशास्त्री C. Wright Wright_Mills मिलों wright_mills.
Later sociologists such as Dennis Gilbert of हैमिल्टन College commonly divide the मध्य class into दो sub-groups.
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the upper or professional मध्य class consisting of highly शिक्षित, वेतनभोगी professionals and प्रबंधक.
Constituting roughly one third of households is the lower मध्य class consisting mostly of semi-professionals, skilled craftsmen and lower-level management.
Middle-class व्यक्तियों commonly have a comfortable standard of जीना, significant economic security, considerable work स्वायत्तता और rely on their expertise to sustain themselves.
Members of the middle class belong to diverse समूह जिससे ओवरलैप with each other.
overall, middle-class व्यक्तियों, विशेषकर upper-middle-class individuals, are characterized by conceptualizing, बनाना और परामर्श.
Thus, college शिक्षा is one of the प्रमुख indicators of middle-class status.
largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, मध्य class values tend to emphasize independence, adherence to मूलभूत मानकों, valuing नवीनता और respecting non-conformity.
Politically more क्रियाशील than other demographics, college educated middle class professionals हैं split between the two major पार्टियों.
Income varies considerably from निकट the नेशनल median to well in excess of $ 100,000.
Household income आंकड़े, however, do not always reflect class status and standard of living, as वे हैं largely बहकावे by the number of आय earners और fail to recognize household size.
It is इसलिए संभावित for a large, dual-earner, lower middle class household to out-earn a छोटी, one-earner, upper middle class household.
The मध्य classes are very influential, as they encompass the majority of voters, writers, teachers, journalists, and editors.
Most societal रुझान in the US originate within the middle classes.
the following is a सूची of शनिवार Night Live cast सदस्यों, past and present.
The डाल सदस्यों of Saturday रात्रि Live were originally referred to as the `` Not तैयार For Prime Time खिलाड़ी ''.
