Ruins इससे the 1906 San Francisco earthquake, remembered as one of the worst natural disasters in United States इतिहास
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) जोखिम resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक damage or destruction, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A disaster can be ostensively पारिभाषित as any tragic event stemming from events such as earthquakes, floods, catastrophic accidents, fires, or विस्फोट.
it is a phenomenon that can cause क्षति to जीवन and property और destroy the economic, सोशल and cultural life of people.
in contemporary academia, आपदाओं are seen as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk.
ये risks are the product of a combination of both hazard/s और vulnerability.
जोखिमों that strike in areas with low vulnerability will never become आपदाओं, as is the मामला in uninhabited regions.
Developing देशों suffer the greatest costs जब a विपत्ति hits – more than 95 percent of all मौतों caused by disasters occur in विकासशील countries, और losses due to प्राकृतिक आपदाओं are 20 times greater ( as a percentage of जीडीपी ) in developing देशों than in industrialized countries.
In computing, booting ( also known as booting up ) is the initial set of operations that a computer system performs जब electrical शक्ति to the cpu is switched on.
the process begins जब a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized after being turned off, and ends when the computer is तैयार to perform its सामान्य operations.
On आधुनिक general purpose computers, this can take tens of सेकेंड and typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating और initializing peripheral devices, and then ढूंढना, loading and starting an operating प्रणाली.
Many computer प्रणालियों also allow ये परिचालन to be initiated by a तन्त्र command without cycling power, in कया is known as a soft रिबूट, हालांकि some of the आरंभिक operations might be skipped on a नरम रिबूट.
a boot लोडर is a computer कार्यक्रम that loads the main operating system or runtime environment for the computer बाद completion of the self-tests.
The computer term boot is छोटी for बूटस्ट्रैप or bootstrap लोड and derives from the phrase to pull oneself up by एक 's bootstraps.
the उपयोग काल्स attention to the आवश्यकता that, if most software is loaded onto a कंप्यूटर by other software already कार्यशील on the computer, some यांत्रिकी must exist to load initial software onto the computer.
जल्दी computers used a variety of ad-hoc methods to get a small program into memory to solve this problem.
The invention of integrated circuit read-only memory ( ROM ) of various प्रकार solved इस विरोधाभास by allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped with a प्रारंभ up कार्यक्रम कि could not be erased.
विकास in the क्षमता of rom has अनुमत ever more विस्तृत start up procedures to be implemented.
On सामान्य purpose कंप्यूटर, the boot process begins साथ the execution of an initial program stored in boot roms or read in another fashion.
in some older computers, the आरंभिक program might have महरूम the अनुप्रयोग to चलाएं, if no operating system थी used, or the ऑपरेटिंग system.
In other कंप्यूटर, the initial program is a बूट loader that may then load into random-access memory ( राम ), इससे nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard disk ड्राइव ) or, in some पुरानी computers, इससे a मीडियम such as punched cards, punched tape, or चुम्बकीय tape in older computers, the शब्दकोष code of an operating system or runtime पर्यावरण and तब execute it.
If the boot loader is सीमित in इसके size and capabilities, it may, instead, load a larger and more capable secondary boot लोडर, which होता तब load the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण.
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot sequence to शुरू functioning and when turned on may simply चलाएं operational programs that are stored in rom.
firebird is an open source एसक्यूएल रिलेशनल डेटाबेस management प्रणाली that रनों on Linux, Windows, और a variety of Unix.
The डेटाबेस forked from Borland 's open source संस्करण of InterBase in 2000, लकिन since firebird 1.5 the code रै been largely rewritten.
Outsourcing is the contracting आउट of an internal business process to a third-party organization.
the practice of contracting a business process out to a third party rather than स्टॉफ it internally is common in the आधुनिक economy.
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the संयुक्त राज्य निकट the turn of the 21st century.
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring employees और assets from one firm to another, but not always.
The definition of आउटसोर्सिंग includes both विदेशी and घरेलू contracting, और sometimes includes offshoring, which means relocating a business फलन to another country.
Financial बचत from lower international labor दरों is a बिग motivation for outsourcing/offshoring.
The opposite of आउटसोर्सिंग is पुकारा insourcing, which entails bringing प्रक्रियाओं handled by third-party firms in-house, and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration.
however, a business can provide a contract service to another कारोबार without necessarily insourcing that business process.
इंसान immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( एड्स ), a condition in इंसानो in which progressive विफलता of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood, वीर्य, vaginal द्रव, pre-ejaculate, or breast milk.
Within these bodily fluids, HIV is उपस्थित as both फ़्री virus particles और virus within संक्रमित immune cells.
HIV infects vital कोशिकाएं in the human immune system such as helper T कोशिकाएं ( specifically CD4 + T कोशिकाएं ), macrophages, और dendritic cells.
hiv संक्रमण लीड to low स्तर of CD4+ T cells through a क्रमांक of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander कोशिकाएं, सीधा viral killing of infected कोशिकाएं, and हत्या of संक्रमित cd4+ T cells by cd8 cytotoxic lymphocytes कि recognize संक्रमित cells.
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline नीचे a नाजुक स्तर, cell-mediated immunity is lost, and the देह becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic infections.
the firepole in a आग station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( भी पुकारा a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a मेटल tube or pipe संस्थापित between floors in fire स्टेशन, allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to जल्दी descend to the ground floor faster than by using a standard staircase.
The device थी invented in the 1870s by David kenyon, in Chicago, Illinois, although it is प्रायः incorrectly credited to the Boston Fire विभाग.
Mary Poppins is the title character of a series of children 's books written by P. L. ट्रेवर्स.
throughout the Mary poppins series, which lasted from 1934 to 1988, Mary Shepard was the illustrator और acted as a second लेखक.
The books centre on a जादुई अंग्रेज़ी nanny, Mary Poppins.
She is blown by the ईस्ट wind to Number सत्रह Cherry Tree लेन, London, and into the Banks ' household to परवाह for उनके children.
Encounters साथ चिमनी sweeps, shopkeepers and various adventures follow until मरियम Poppins abruptly leaves, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
The adventures take प्लेस over a कुल of आठ books.
However, only the पहला three books विशेषता मरियम Poppins arriving और leaving.
the बाद five books recount previously unrecorded adventures इससे her original three visits.
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction to Mary Poppins in the Park, `` She can नहीं forever arrive and depart. ''
the books यहूद adapted in 1964 into a musical Disney film starring जूली Andrews और लंड Van dyke.
In 2004, Disney Theatrical produced a स्टेज musical adaptation in the West End थिएटर.
the stage musical was transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3, 2013.
It has been highly कामयाब, as was the 1964 फिल्मी.
The Last सोंग is a 2010 अमरीकी coming of age टीन romantic नाटक film विकसित alongside Nicholas स्पार्क्स ' novel by the same नाम.
the film was directed by जूली Anne Robinson in उसके feature film directorial debut और co-written by Sparks and जेफ़ वैन wie.
The Last सोंग stars Miley सायरस, Liam hemsworth, and Greg kinnear and फ़ॉलो a troubled teenager as she reconnects with her estranged father and falls in love during a summer in a शांत Southern United States बीच town.
The film is distributed by Touchstone तस्वीरें.
स्पार्क्स was approached to लिखें both the फिल्मी 's screenplay and the अनोखा.
Sparks completed the पटकथा in जनवरी 2009, prior to the पूर्णता of the novel, बनाना The पिछला सोंग his first script to be optioned लिये film.
the सेटिंग, originally in North Carolina like the novel, moved to Georgia बाद the states had campaigned लिये महीने to host उत्पादन.
upon beginning production in Tybee द्वीप, Georgia and nearby savannah, The Last Song became the first movie to be both शॉट और set in Tybee द्वीप.
Filming lasted from June 15 to August 18, 2009 with much of it occurring on the द्वीप 's beach और pier.
The पिछला Song थी originally scheduled लिये wide रिलीज on January 8, 2010, लकिन थी स्थगित to March 31, 2010.
लिखा Simlish
simlish is a fictional language प्रदर्शित in ea खेल ' Sim series of खेल.
It debuted in SimCopter, and has been especially prominent in The Sims, The Sims 2 and The सीम 3.
The सीम विकास टोली created the unique Simlish language by experimenting साथ fractured Ukrainian, French, Latin, फ़िनिश, English, Fijian, सेबुआनो, and Tagalog.
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4, SimCity समाजों and SimCity 2013, लकिन far less अक्सर.
Civilized Creatures in Spore can also be taught to बोलो Simlish.
It is भी प्रदर्शित to an extent in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's simgolf.
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for dialogue in the game, लकिन विचार that using a real language would मेक it sound too repetitive और would भी be too costly to hire translators for world languages.
initially, inspired by the Native American कोड talkers of World War II, Sims निर्माता होगा Wright and भाषा विशेषज्ञ Marc gimbel suggested experimenting साथ the navajo language to create Simlish.
However, they ultimately decided कि Simlish worked best as a `` language '' बना up of gibberish words कि could n't be translated, so that इसके meaning would be left open to the कल्पना of the खिलाड़ी.
Wright later commented कि using `` बकवास language '' turned out to be the right development choice, as people were सक्षम of imagining it more realistically than a कंप्यूटर could सिमुलेट a रियल एक.
the वास्तविक ध्वनि of Simlish थी निर्मित improvisationally by voice actors Stephen Kearin और Gerri Lawlor.
an example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on blade roots of a V2500 iae aircraft engine.
Step 1 : The UT जांच is लगाई on the root of the blades to be inspected with the help of a खास borescope tool ( video probe ).
कदम 2 : Instrument settings are input.
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the blade root.
In इस मामला, an indication ( peak in the data ) through the red लकीर ( or gate ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the left of that range indicates a crack.
Principle of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण.
बाएँ : A probe sends a ध्वनि wave into a test material.
There हैं two indications, one इससे the initial पल्स of the probe, and the second due to the back वॉल echo.
RIGHT : A defect creates a third indication और simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication.
The depth of the defect is determined by the अनुपात D/E
in ultrasonic testing ( UT ), very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with center बारंबारता ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 mhz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize सामग्री.
a आम example is ultrasonic मोटाई measurement, which tests the thickness of the test object, for example, to monitor pipework corrosion.
अल्ट्रासोनिक testing is often performed on steel and other metals and alloys, हालांकि it can भी be used on कंक्रीट, wood and composites, albeit with less resolution.
It is a form of non-destructive परीक्षण used in many industries including aerospace, automotive and other transportation सेक्टर.
the vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), भी called ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ), is part of the पुरूष anatomy of अनेक vertebrates ; वे हस्तांतरण sperm from the epididymis in पुट of ejaculation.
Vascular ischemia of the toes with characteristic cyanosis.
in आयुर्विज्ञान, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; from यूनानी language ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- रूट denoting a प्रतिबंध or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean, haema blood ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues, causing a shortage of oxygen and ग्लूकोज needed लिये cellular चयापचय ( to रखना tissue alive ).
Ischemia is generally caused by problems with रक्त vessels, with resultant damage to or dysfunction of ऊतक.
It भी अर्थात् local रक्ताल्पता in a दिए part of a body sometimes resulting from जमघट ( ऐसे as vasoconstriction, thrombosis or embolism ).
bas syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's सिंड्रोम, also ज्ञात as trisomy 21, is a genetic विकार caused by the उपस्थिति of सब or part of a third copy of chromosome 21.
bas सिंड्रोम is the most आम chromosome abnormality in humans.
it is typically associated with a delay in cognitive ability ( दिमागी retardation, or MR ) and physical विकास, and a particular set of facial विशेषताएँ.
the average IQ of यंग वयस्कों साथ Down syndrome is around 50, whereas young adults without the condition typically have an iq of 100.
( MR रै historically been defined as an IQ below 70. )
A large proportion of individuals with bas सिंड्रोम have a severe degree of बौद्धिक disability.
Down syndrome is named बाद जॉन Langdon Down, the अंग्रेजों physician जो वर्णित the syndrome in 1866.
the कंडीशन थी clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne Dominique esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844.
Down सिंड्रोम was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. jérôme lejeune in 1959.
bas सिंड्रोम can be identified in a baby at जनम or before जनम by prenatal screening.
Pregnancies with this diagnosis are often terminated.
The CDC estimates कि about one of every 691 शिशु born in the United States प्रत्येक year is born with Down syndrome.
अनेक children with bas सिंड्रोम are शिक्षित in regular school वर्ग while अन्य require specialised शैक्षणिक facilities.
Some children graduate from ऊँची school, and, in the US, there are increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary education.
Education and proper care रै been दिखाया to improve quality of life significantly.
अनेक adults with bas Syndrome are able to कार्य at paid employment in the community, while others require a अधिक sheltered कार्य environment.
hot flashes ( भी ज्ञात as hot flushes, or night sweats if they happen at night ) are a लक्षण which may have several other causes, but which is often caused by the changing hormone levels कि are characteristic of menopause.
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L. 78-346, 58 स्टेट. 284m ), known informally as the G.I. विधेयक, थी a law that provided a range of benefits for returning World War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
Benefits included low-cost mortgages, low-interest loans to start a कारोबार or farm, cash payments of tuition and living expenses to attend college, high school or vocational education, as well as एक year of unemployment मुआवजे.
It थी available to प्रत्येक दिग्गज who had been on क्रियाशील ड्यूटी during the युद्ध years लिये at least ninety days और had नहीं been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required.
by the end of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 लाख veterans had used the G.I. विधेयक education benefits in अनुक्रम to attend colleges or universities, and an अतिरिक्त 6.6 million प्रयुक्त these लाभ for कुछ दयालु of training program.
Since the असली 1944 law, the term has come to शामिल other दिग्गज benefit programs निर्मित to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service.
Historians and economists consider the G.I. Bill a major राजनैतिक success—especially in कंट्रास्ट to the treatments of World War i veterans—and a major योगदान to अमेरिका 's stock of human capital कि sped long-term आर्थिक विकास.
The वाटरगेट scandal was a political scandal कि occurred in the संयुक्त राज्य in the 1970s as a result of the June 17, 1972 break-in at the लोकतांत्रिक National Committee headquarters at the Watergate office जटिल in Washington, D.C., और the Nixon प्रशासन 's attempted cover-up of इसके involvement.
The scandal आखिरकार led to the इस्तीफा of Richard निक्सन, the President of the United States, on अगस्त 9, 1974 — the तभी resignation of a U.S. President.
the scandal भी resulted in the indictment, trial, conviction, and incarceration of forty-three persons, dozens of whom यहूद निक्सन 's top administration officials.
The affair began with the arrest of पाँच men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on जून 17, 1972.
the Federal Bureau of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) connected cash मिला on the burglars to a slush fund used by the Committee लिये the re-election of the President, the आधिकारिक संगठन of निक्सन 's campaign.
In July 1973, as evidence mounted against the president 's staff, including गवाही provided by former staff सदस्यों in an investigation conducted by the सीनेट वाटरगेट कमेटी, it was नाज़िल that President निक्सन था a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations.
Recordings from these tapes implicated the president, revealing he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on कि had taken place during उसके administration, both before and after the break-in.
After a protracted series of bitter court battles, the U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled कि the president had to hand over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of प्रतिनिधि and a strong सम्भावना of a conviction in the Senate, Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9, 1974.
उसके successor, जेराल्ड Ford, then issued a pardon to him.
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing और Spencer ) is a fictional character on the ABC दिन साबुन ओपेरा सामान्य Hospital.
एलिज़ाबेथ is the granddaughter of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John beradino ), एक of the originating कोर characters of the series.
रेबेका herbst originated the character on अगस्त 1, 1997 और has been the only contract actress to खेल the role.
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings, Lucky Spencer and Elizabeth Webber और Jason Morgan and Elizabeth webber.
The संयुक्त States presidency of Ronald reagan, also ज्ञात as the Reagan administration, was a Republican administration headed by रोनाल्ड Reagan इससे January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
domestically, the administration favored reducing government कार्यक्रम and introduced the largest across-the-board कर cuts in American history.
the economic नीतियों enacted in 1981, ज्ञात as `` reaganomics ``, were an उदाहरण of supply-side economics.
reagan aimed to encourage उद्यमिता और limit the growth of सोशल spending, as well as the reduction of regulation और inflation.
Economic growth saw a strong रिकवरी in the 1980s, helping Reagan to win a landslide re-election.
the national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding विदेशी policy, the प्रशासन was steadfastly anti-communist, कॉलिंग the Soviet Union an `` evil साम्राज्य `` and ending 1970s détente.
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his पूर्ववर्ती, including an आक्रमण of Grenada, the first major विदेशी action by U.S. troops चूंकि the end of the Vietnam युद्ध.
The `` Reagan doctrine `` controversially granted aid to अर्धसैनिक शक्तियां seeking to overthrow communist सरकारें, particularly in war-torn Central America और Afghanistan.
Reagan also promoted नई technologies such as मिसाइल defense प्रणालियों in order to confront the Soviets and their allies.
In diplomacy, Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK प्रधान Minister मार्गरेट Thatcher, और he मिले with सोवियत General सचिव Mikhail Gorbachev four टाइम्स, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' नाभिकीय arsenals.
reagan 's प्रेसिडेंसी has been termed the `` Reagan क्रान्ति '', or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the political realignment both within and परे the u.S. in एहसान of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets.
The Reagan administration worked toward the पतन of Soviet साम्यवादी, and it did collapse just as he बाएँ दफ्तर.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar संसार with the U.S. as the world 's sole महाशक्ति.
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several reagan aides दौरान उसके second पद, Reagan himself left दफ्तर with a 63 percent स्वीकृति rating, one of the higher स्वीकृति ratings of दूँ राष्ट्रपतियों.
बाद सालो of unstinting तारीफ़ from the सही, and unrelenting आलोचना from the बाएँ, historian David Henry finds that by 2009 a consensus had emerged among scholars कि Reagan revived conservatism and turned the nation to the right by demonstrating a `` pragmatic कोसा '' कि प्रचारित ideology भीतर the constraints imposed by the divided political system.
Furthermore, says Henry, the सर्वसम्मति viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the presidency and American self-confidence, and contributed critically to ending the Cold War.
crude death rate by देश ( 2006 ).
Mortality rate is a माप of the number of मौतों ( in सामान्य, or due to a specific कारण ) in a जनसांख्यिकी.
Scaled to the size of that population, प्रति unit of time.
Mortality रेट is typically expressed in units of deaths per 1000 individuals per साल ; thus, a मृत्यु rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population, or 0.95 % out of the total.
it is पृथक from morbidity रेट, which refers to the number of individuals in poor स्वास्थ्य during a दिए time period ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the बीमारी प्रति ईकाई of time ( incidence rate ).
The पद `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately प्रयुक्त to refer to the क्रमांक of मौतों among a set of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल मामले लिये a disease or चोट, rather than for the general जनसांख्यिकी of a country or जातीय group.
This disease mortality statistic is अधिक precisely referred to as `` case fatality रेट `` ( CFR ).
One distinguishes:
The crude death rate, the total number of deaths per साल per 1000 लोगों.
the crude मौत rate लिये the whole world is about 8.37 per 1000 per साल according to the current CIA World Factbook.
the perinatal mortality rate, the sum of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) प्रति 1000 births.
The maternal मृत्यु अनुपात, the क्रमांक of maternal मौतों प्रति 100,000 सजीव births in same समय period.
the maternal mortality rate, the number of मातृ deaths per 1,000 women of reproductive age in the population ( generally defined as 15–44 सालो of age ).
The शिशु mortality rate, the number of deaths of children कम than 1 साल old per 1000 live births.
the child मृत्यु rate, the number of deaths of children कम than 5 years old per 1000 सजीव births.
the standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to the numbers of deaths that would have been अपेक्षित if the population had been of a मानक composition in terms of age, gender, etc.
The age-specific mortality रेट ( asmr ) - This refers to the total number of deaths per year per 1000 लोगों of a given age ( e.g. आयु 62 last birthday ).
in regard to the or विफलता of medical उपचार or procedures, one would also distinguish:
the जल्दी mortality rate, the कुल क्रमांक of deaths in the early stages of an ongoing उपचार, or in the period immediately following an उपचार.
The late मृत्यु रेट, the कुल number of deaths in the late stages of an ongoing उपचार, or a significant लंबाई of time after an acute treatment.
Note that the crude death रेट as defined ऊपर and applied to a पूरे population can give a misleading impression.
The crude मौत rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific mortality rates and the age ( and लिंग ) distribution of the population.
The क्रमांक of मौतों per 1000 people can be higher for विकसित nations than in less-developed देशों, despite life expectancy being उच्चतर in developed देशों due to standards of health होने बेहतर.
इस happens because developed countries typically have a completely different जनसांख्यिकी आयु वितरण, with a much higher proportion of पुरानी people, due to both lower recent birth दरों और निम्नतर mortality rates.
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life table which shows the mortality रेट separately for each आयु.
A life तालिका is necessary to दे a good estimate of जीवन expectancy.
an otoacoustic उत्सर्जन ( oae ) is a ध्वनि which is generated from भीतर the inner ear.
Having महरूम predicted by थामस Gold in 1948, its existence was first demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have चूंकि been shown to उठता by a क्रमांक of different cellular mechanisms within the inner ear.
अध्ययन have shown that OAEs गायब after the भीतरी ear has been damaged, so OAEs हैं often used in the laboratory और the क्लिनिक as a measure of inner ear health.
Broadly बोलना, there are दो types of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ), जिससे can occur without external stimulation, and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( eoaes ), which require an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane Tomas थी the nineteenth named storm and twelfth hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.
टॉमस विकसित from a tropical wave east of the windward Islands on October 29.
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane, it moved through the Windward Islands और passed बहुत निकट Saint लूसिया.
After reaching Category 2 status on the Saffir-Simpson scale, Tomas जल्दी weakened to a तीव्र तूफ़ान in the central Caribbean समुद्र, due to strong wind shear और dry एयर.
Tomas बाद regained hurricane औकात as it reorganized near the windward ड्योढ़ी.
throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 लोगों are known to have महरूम killed, 14 of जिसको यहूद in Saint Lucia.
मौद्रिक losses throughout the Windward Islands were अनुमानित at US $ 588 million, mainly in Saint लूसिया.
In the वेक of the storm in Haiti, बाढ़ intensified an जारी cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in दिसम्बर 2010, 55 people यहूद मारे in Cuba and hispanola, though the distribution of ये fatalities are अनजान.
Overall damage from the storm was at तनिक $ 741 million.
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2, 1959 ) is an American comedian, अभिनेत्री, satirist, singer और अंतरजाल ब्लॉगर बेहतरीन known as a डाल member of the NBC टेलीविज़न sketch comedy श्रेणी शनिवार Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992.
She has received ध्यान as a गायन आलोचक of अध्यक्ष Barack Obama, and is an active participant in the चाय Party movement.
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance on तकनीकों जैसे fragmentation, paradox, and questionable narrators, and is often ( though नहीं exclusively ) defined as a style or ट्रेंड which उभरा in the post–World War II era.
Postmodern works हैं देखी as a reaction against Enlightenment thinking और modernist approaches to literature.
Postmodern literature, like postmodernism as a whole, tends to resist definition or classification as a `` गति ''.
बेशक, the अभिसरण of postmodern literature with विभिन्न modes of critical theory, विशेषकर reader-response और deconstructionist approaches, और the subversions of the अव्यक्त अनुबंध between लेखक, टेक्स्ट और रीडर by जिससे its works are often characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the मोड़ें.
जबकि there is little consensus on the precise characteristics, scope, and importance of postmodern literature, as is प्रायः the मामला साथ artistic आंदोलनों, postmodern साहित्य is commonly defined in संबंध to a precursor.
For example, a postmodern literary कार्य tends not to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up समाप्ति as is often मिला in modernist साहित्य, but often parodies it.
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate chance over शिल्प, and further employ metafiction to undermine the लेखक 's प्राधिकार.
Another characteristic of postmodern साहित्य is the questioning of भेद between high and low संस्कृति through the use of pastiche, the combination of subjects and जाति not previously deemed fit for literature.

Scooby-Doo is an American एनिमेटेड cartoon franchise, comprising अनेक एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न series produced from 1969 to the present day.
The original series, scooby-doo, Where Are तुम !
, was निर्मित लिये Hanna-Barbera Productions by लेखक जो माणिक्य and Ken स्पीयर्स in 1969.
इस Saturday morning cartoon श्रेणी featured four teenagers— फ्रेड Jones, Daphne Blake, velma Dinkley, और Norville `` Shaggy '' रोजर्स — और their talking brown Great Dane dog named Scooby-Doo, who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps.
Following the success of the original series, Hanna-Barbera and its successor Warner Bros. Some versions of Scooby-Doo विशेषता different variations on the show 's supernatural theme, and include characters ऐसे as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum और nephew scrappy-doo in addition to or instead of कुछ of the original वर्ण.

और shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ], aired as part of Kids WB on The wb network and its successor, The CW network, from 2002 until 2008.

the पहले खेल in the series are नियत primarily in World War II, this includes : Call of ड्यूटी, कॉल of ड्यूटी 2, and कॉल of Duty 3.

The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a मृतक person, whether such property is transferred via a होगा, according to the राज्य laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident of the death of the owner, such as a transfer of प्रॉपर्टी इससे an intestate एस्टेट or विश्वास, or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account रकम to beneficiaries.
the estate कर is एक भाग of the Unified Gift and Estate Tax system in the United राज्य.
The other भाग of the system, the gift tax, imposes a tax on transfers of property दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate कर should a व्यक्ति want to give away his/her एस्टेट.
in जोड to the संघीय government, अनेक states also impose an एस्टेट tax, साथ the state version called either an estate tax or an उत्तराधिकार tax.
Opponents of the estate tax call it the `` मौत tax ''.
if an asset is left to a जीवनसाथी or a Federally recognized दान, the tax प्रायः does नहीं apply.
in जोड, up to $ 5,250,000 can be given by an व्यक्तिगत, पहले and/or upon उनके मौत, without incurring संघीय gift or estate कर.

raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or कूच 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), बेहतर ज्ञात बस as Raphael, थी an Italian चित्रकार and architect of the ऊँची पुनर्जागरण.
His work is admired for its clarity of form and ease of composition and for इसके visual achievement of the neoplatonic आदर्श of human grandeur.
Together साथ Michelangelo and लियोनार्डो da Vinci, he forms the traditional ट्रिनिटी of great masters of कि period.
Raphael थी enormously productive, running an unusually विशाल workshop, and despite his death at 37, a large देह of his work remains.
Many of his works are मिला in the Vatican राजमहल, where the frescoed Raphael कक्ष were the central, and the largest, work of his career.
the बेहतरीन ज्ञात कार्य is The School of एथेंस in the Vatican stanza della Segnatura.
बाद his early years in रोम much of his work was self-designed, but लिये the सबसे part executed by the workshop from his drawings, साथ considerable घाटा of quality.
He was अत्यधिक influential in his आजीवन, though outside Rome his work was ज़्यादातर known इससे his collaborative printmaking.
बाद his death, the influence of his ग्रेट rival Michelangelo was more फैली until the 18th and 19th centuries, when Raphael 's more serene and harmonious qualities यहूद again regarded as the highest models.
His career जलप्रपात naturally into three phases और three शैलियाँ, first described by Giorgio vasari : his जल्दी सालो in Umbria, then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic परंपराओं of Florence, followed by his last hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome, working लिये two Popes and their close associates.
Julia फिओना रॉबर्ट्स ( born October 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
वो became a Hollywood star after headlining the रोमांटिक comedy Pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ), which grossed $ 464 लाख worldwide.
After receiving Golden ग्लोब Awards and अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations for Steel magnolias ( 1989 ) और Pretty Woman, she जीती the Academy Award for Best अभिनेत्री for her performance in एरिन Brockovich ( 2000 ).

उसके fee लिये 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003, she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 लाख लिये उसके role in Mona लिसा मुस्कान ( 2003 ).

Mark इलियट zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an American कंप्यूटर programmer and अंतरजाल entrepreneur.
He is बेहतरीन known as one of five co-founders of the social networking website Facebook.
as of April 2013, Zuckerberg is the chairman और मुख्य executive of Facebook, Inc. और in 2013 his personal wealth थी अनुमानित to be us $ 13.3 अरब.
Together with उसके कॉलेज roommates and fellow Harvard University विद्यार्थी Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin moskovitz and Chris ह्यूजेस, Zuckerberg शुभारम्भ Facebook from Harvard 's शयनागार rooms.

In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook and the क्रमांक of Facebook उपयोक्ता worldwide reached a total of एक billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal विवादों that यहूद initiated by others in the group, who claimed a share of the company based upon their भागीदारी during the development phase of Facebook.
चूंकि 2010, Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest और most influential people in the world by Time magazine as a भाग of इसके Person of the साल accolade.

framedThe
कमेटी of Ways और Means is the chief tax -writing committee of the संयुक्त States हाउस of Representatives.
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on कोई other House समितियों जबतक they लागू for a waiver from their पार्टी 's congressional leadership.
The Committee रै क्षेत्राधिकार over सब taxation, tariffs and अन्य revenue-raising measures, as खूब as a क्रमांक of अन्य programs including:
सोशल Security
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement of चाइल्ड support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy परिवारों, a संघीय welfare program
Foster care and adoption programs
The u.S. Constitution requires कि सब बिल्स regarding taxation जरूर originate in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
Since हाउस procedure is that all बिल्स regarding taxation must go through इस committee, the committee is very influential, as is its Senate बंटवारा, the U.S. Senate Committee on वित्त.
The Ways और Means Committee in the 111th कॉंग्रेस थी chaired by चार्ली Rangel, who had लिया a छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as chairman until House ethics उल्लंघनों were resolved.
However, his leave of अनुपस्थिति as chairman was शासित to be a resignation.
Pete Stark resigned as एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, so sander Levin held कि position जबतक the start of the 112th कॉंग्रेस.
डेव Camp became the committee chair for the 112th Congress, after the Republicans जीती control of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( पुकारा Mysticeti ).
at in length and or more in weight, it is the largest ज्ञात animal to have ever existed.
long and slender, the ब्लू whale 's body can be various शेड्स of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath.
There are at least three पृथक subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and उत्तर Pacific, B. m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी समंदर and B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the सानो blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and दक्षिण Pacific समंदर.
B. m. indica, found in the Indian Ocean, may be another subspecies.
as with अन्य baleen whales, इसके diet consists almost exclusively of छोटी crustaceans known as krill.
ब्लू whales were abundant in nearly all the महासागर on Earth until the beginning of the twentieth सदी.
For over a century, they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers जबतक protected by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 report estimated वहीँ were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales विश्वव्यापी, स्तिथ in at तनिक five groups.
अधिक हाल research into the Pygmy subspecies suggests इस may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest population was in the Antarctic, क्रमांकन लगभग 239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to 311,000 ).
वहीँ remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the eastern उत्तर Pacific, Antarctic, and Indian Ocean groups.
There are two more groups in the North Atlantic, and at least दो in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere.
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a variety of a species of thistle cultivated as a food.
The खाद्य matter is buds कि रूप within the पुष्प heads पहले the flowers come into bloom.
The buds go away or बदलें to a coarse, मुश्किल खाद्य रूप जब the पुष्प blooms.
the uncultivated or wild किस्में of the species is पुकारा a cardoon.
It is a perennial plant देशी to the भूमध्यसागरीय प्रदेश.
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य currency.
U.S. statesman, inventor, and diplomat Benjamin Franklin is फिलहाल featured on the obverse of the bill.
on the reverse of the banknote is an चित्र of Independence Hall.
the $ 100 विधेयक is the largest denomination that has been मुद्रित चूंकि July 13, 1969, when the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were retired.
The ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और Printing says the average life of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 months ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to पहनें और tear.
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '', in reference to the use of बेंजामिन Franklin 's portrait on the denomination, or `` c-notes '', based on the रोमन numeral for 100.
The bill is one of दो denominations printed today that does नहीं feature a President of the United राज्य ; the other is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander Hamilton.
The time on the क्लॉक of स्वतंत्रता हॉल on the reverse, according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of Engraving and Printing, shows approximately 4:10.
One सौ hundred-dollar bills are delivered by संघीय आरक्षित Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 विधेयक redesign was unveiled on अप्रैल 21, 2010, and थी to be जारी to the public on February 11, 2011, but production was shut down in December 2010 क्युकी as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw.
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a blank space on the bill when खींचा out.
In उनके replacement, और continuing the high demand of इस denomination, the श्रेणी 2006A was launched retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ).
On अप्रैल 24, 2013, the Federal आरक्षित announced the new $ 100 bill would डालें परिसंचरण on October 8, 2013.

दाउद ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the यहूदी Bible, was the second king of the United Kingdom of Israel, and according to the New Testament Gospels of मैथ्यू और Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
उसके life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE, और उसके शासनकाल over the United Kingdom of इसराईल c. 1002–970 bce.
the Books of सैमुएल, 1 Kings, and 1 Chronicles are the only sources of information on David, although the tel डान stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` हाउस of David '', जिससे most scholars take as confirmation of the अस्तित्व in the mid-9th सदी BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of दाउद.
He is depicted as a righteous king, हालांकि नहीं without त्रुटियां, as well as an acclaimed योद्धा, musician, और कवि, traditionally credited for composing अनेक of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms.
दाउद is central to Jewish, Christian, and Islamic doctrine और culture.
biblical tradition maintains that a direct descendant of David होगा be the मसीहा.
In Islam he is considered to be a prophet and the king of a nation.
काठमांडू ( ; ) is the पूंजी और largest urban agglomerate of Nepal.
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu Metropolitan City at its core, and its sister शहरों Patan, kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
it also includes the recently recognized urban areas of Shankhapur, karyabinayak, and Champapur.
banepa, dhulikhel, and panauti are satellite urban क्षेत्रों of Kathmandu located just बाहर the Kathmandu घाटी.
काठमांडू is also known informally as `` KTM '' or the `` tri-city ''.
according to a census conducted in 2011, Kathmandu metropolis अलोन has 975,453 inhabitants ; और the agglomerate रै a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants.
the metropolitan city area is and has a population density of 19,250 per km2.
the city stands at an elevation of approximately in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of सेंट्रल Nepal.
it is घिरी by four प्रमुख mountains : shivapuri, Phulchoki, Nagarjun, and चंद्रगिरि.
काठमांडू Valley is part of three districts ( काठमांडू, Lalitpur, और भक्तपुर ), has the highest population density in the country, and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population.
During Rana and Shah eras, the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu Valley ; it थी what people जो lived बाहर the valley called it.
During this काल, अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों called the valley itself `` नेपाल Proper ''.
Today, काठमांडू is not तभी the capital of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, but also the headquarters of the Central Development Region of Nepal.
the Central Region comprises three zones : bagmati, Narayani, और Janakpur.
Kathmandu is स्तिथ in the bagmati मण्डल.
Kathmandu is the gateway to tourism in नेपाल.
It is also the nerve center of the country 's economy.
It रै the most advanced अवसंरचना of कोई urban क्षेत्रफल in Nepal, and its अर्थव्यवस्था is focused on पर्यटन, जिससे accounted for 3.8 % of नेपाल 's जीडीपी in 1995–96.
( पर्यटन in काठमांडू declined thereafter during a period of political अशांति, लकिन since then has improved. )
The city has a rich history, spanning nearly 2000 सालो, as inferred इससे inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious और cultural festivities रूप a प्रमुख part of the lives of people residing in Kathmandu.
सबसे of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and many अन्य follow Buddhism.
There हैं लोगों of other religious मान्यताओं as खूब, giving Kathmandu a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन culture.
Nepali is the सबसे commonly spoken language in the city.
नेपाल bhasa is the indigenous language spoken by the Newar people.
Hindi is widely समझा and अंग्रेज़ी is understood by Kathmandu 's शिक्षित निवासियों.
The city 's साक्षरता rate is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural विरासत, tourism industry, and economy ; therefore युनेस्को 's World Heritage Site lists all तीन शहरों ' स्मारक और attractions together under एक heading, `` Kathmandu valley- युनेस्को World Heritage साईट ``.
Field हॉकी, usually referred to simply as hockey, is a team खेल of the hockey family जिससे is played between दो teams of eleven खिलाड़ी साथ hockey sticks और a मुश्किल, solid plastic बॉल.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, with particular popularity throughout Europe, Asia, Oceania, and South America – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan और India.
the पद `` फ़ील्ड hockey '' is प्रयुक्त primarily in Canada, the संयुक्त States, and other regions of the world where the sport of बर्फ hockey is more popular.
During play, goal keepers are the तभी players जो हैं allowed to touch the बॉल साथ any भाग of their body ( with the exception of a player 's हाथ माना 'part of the stick ' ), with this only applying within the shooting circle ( also known as the D, or shooting arc, or just the circle ), जबकि field players खेल the ball with the flat side of their स्टिक.
The team that स्कोर the most लक्ष्य by the end of the match विन्स.
If the score is tied at the end of the game, either a draw is declared or the game goes into अतिरिक्त time and/or a दंड shootout, depending on the competition 's format.
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH ), साथ मेन और महिलाओं being represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games, Commonwealth खेल, Hockey World Cup, Champions Trophy और जूनियर हॉकी World Cup, साथ many countries running extensive junior, senior, और मास्टर्स ' club competitions.
The FIH is also responsible for organising the Hockey Rules Board and developing the नियम for the खेल.
A popular रूपांतर of field hockey is indoor hockey, which differs in a number of respects while embodying the primary principles of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant, साथ a फ़ील्ड which is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m.
साथ अनेक of the rules remaining the वही, including रुकावट और feet, there हैं several कुंजी variations - Players may not उठाएँ the ball unless shooting on goal, खिलाड़ी may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to ट्रांसफ़र the बॉल ), and the sidelines हैं replaced with ठोस barriers which the ball होगा rebound बंद.
Ethan `` cane '' Ashby ( né एटकिन्सन ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी CBS साबुन opera The यंग और the बेचैन.
He is portrayed by ऑस्ट्रेलियाई actor Daniel गोडार्ड, who originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the World Turns लकिन was अनुशंसित for a भूमिका on The यंग and the Restless instead.
The role थी to be portrayed as an American, लकिन Goddard 's Australian descent influenced the character 's background.
पूर्व सिर writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the एपीसोड airing on January 12, 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family, a debut that received a mixed जवाब.
Latham created cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly rhodes ) and jill Foster Abbott ( जेस Walton ) but the character 's पृष्ठभूमि was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009, reestablishing him as the son of Colin and genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie फ्रांसिस ).
Though characterized as `` mysterious '', Cane is `` loyal and समर्पित '', while Goddard described the character as a `` typical Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He was the first सदस्य of the एटकिन्सन family to appear on the series, followed by his parents और एकसमान twin brother.
Soon बाद उसके डेब्यू, he became a leading अक्षर, a decision praised by दर्शक and critics.
The character has महरूम involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ), Chloe Mitchell ( Elizabeth Hendrickson ) and most notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ), a romance that garnered significant fan attention.
in 2009, Cane and Lily were married ; Global bc होता later call लिली the प्रेम of Cane 's life.
the pair had two children, Charlie and mattie ashby.
In 2011, the actor was fired, and cane was शॉट to death onscreen.
However, गोडार्ड was rehired soon after दर्शक campaigned for his return, revealing that Cane 's identical जुड़वा brother थी in fact the man who died.
This sacrificed his marriage to Lily, but the couple were remarried on Valentine 's दिन in 2012.
गोडार्ड has महरूम widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; canyon News कहा that he portrays the character honestly, and is `` always dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
जॉन Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an अमरीकी actor, फिल्मी निर्माता, and musician.
he रै जीती the Golden Globe Award और स्क्रीन Actors गिल्ड पुरस्कार लिये Best Actor.
Depp रोज़ to prominence on the 1980s television श्रेणी 21 Jump गली, becoming a टीन idol.
असंतुष्ट साथ that औकात, Depp turned to film for more challenging भूमिकाएँ ; he played the title अक्षर of the acclaimed एडवर्ड Scissorhands ( 1990 ) और later found box office success in films such as Sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ), Charlie and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ), Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ), rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ).
he has collaborated with निदेशक और friend Tim Burton in आठ films ; the सबसे recent being अंधेरा Shadows ( 2012 ).
डेप has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such लोगों as ed Wood in Ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, Hunter S. Thompson in भय and Loathing in लास वेगास, George Jung in Blow, and the bank robber John dillinger in Michael Mann 's पब्लिक Enemies.
films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the संयुक्त States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.
He has महरूम मनोनीत for top पुरस्कार many times, winning the Best कर्ता Awards from the Golden –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy Globes –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy for स्वीनी Todd : the Demon Barber of Fleet गली and from the Screen अभिनेताओं Guild लिये Pirates of the Caribbean : The अभिशाप of the ब्लैक Pearl.
He भी has garnered a sex प्रतीक औकात in अमरीकी cinema, being twice named as the `` sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009.
He has महरूम listed in the 2012 गिनीज Book of World Records as the उच्चतम paid actor, with $ 75 लाख.
The संसार Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly ज्ञात as the web ), is a system of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट documents accessed via the Internet.
With a वेब browser, one can view web pages that may contain टेक्स्ट, images, videos, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his पहले hypertext प्रणालियों like ENQUIRE, British इंजीनियर, computer वैज्ञानिक and at that समय employee of the CERN, सर Tim Berners-Lee, now Director of the World Wide Web consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in कूच 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a यूरोपीय research organisation निकट जेनेवा straddling the border between फ़्रांस and स्विट्ज़रलैंड, Berners-Lee and Belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau proposed in 1990 to use हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can ब्राउज़ at होगा '', and वे सरेआम introduced the project in दिसम्बर of the same year.
चिह्नित ट्रैविस John Sanchez ( born November 11, 1986 ) is an American football क्वार्टरबैक for the New York Jets of the National Football लीग ( NFL ).
He थी drafted in the first round of the 2009 एनएफएल Draft as the पांचवां overall selection by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall.
He played college football at the University of Southern California ( USC ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined और athletic family.
in the eighth grade, he began to play फ़ुटबॉल and learn the intricacies of the quarterback position, training साथ his पिता, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया following his successful high school career in which he led उसके team to a championship शीर्षक during his फाइनल season.
At USC, Sanchez थी relegated as the backup quarterback दौरान his first three years हालांकि he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David बूटी.
Sanchez also became popular within the जातियाँ due to उसके mexican-american विरासत.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record और जीती the रोज़ Bowl against Penn State for जिससे Sanchez was awarded the सबसे Valuable Player award लिये his performance on offense.
Although अनेक considered him too inexperienced, सांचेज़ announced his इरादे to enter the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was चयनित by the Jets बाद they traded up with the Cleveland Browns, और was named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the season.
despite a subpar प्रदर्शन, सांचेज़ led the jets to the afc Championship Game, a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts, बनने the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL इतिहास to जीत his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games.
In उसके second season, Sanchez continued to develop और led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship Game where they narrowly lost to the Pittsburgh Steelers, 24–19.
साथ the win over the New England देशप्रेमी the सप्ताह prior, Sanchez tied four other quarterbacks for the second most post-season सड़क victories by a क्वार्टरबैक in NFL इतिहास.
In leading the Jets to two consecutive सम्मेलन championships, Sanchez joined quarterback Ben Roethlisberger as the only two quarterbacks in NFL history to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन championship in their first two seasons in the लीग.
The next two सीज़न would be a regression लिये दोनो the team and Sanchez as they failed to पहुँचें the playoffs.
Fans और media आलोचकों called for a struggling सांचेज़ to be benched.
He eventually was replaced towards the end of the 2012 season साथ ग्रेग McElroy.
पॉल एवेरी ( April 2, 1934december 10, 2000 ) was an American पुलिस reporter, best known for his कहानियां on the infamous serial कातिल known as the Zodiac, and बाद for उसके कार्य on the पेट्रीसिया Hearst kidnapping.
A छोटी submersible ac sump pump with a गार्डन hose connector
A sump pump is a pump used to हटाएँ water कि has संचित in a water collecting sump basin, commonly मिला in the basement of घरों.
The water may डालें via the perimeter नालों of a तहखाने waterproofing system, funneling into the basin or because of rain or natural ground जल, if the basement is नीचे the water तालिका स्तर.
sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly and to remedy dampness where the जल table is above the foundation of a home.
sump पंपों send water दूर from a house to any place where it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण, such as a municipal storm drain or a dry well.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in older संस्थापना.
Once माना acceptable, this practice may now violate the plumbing कोड or municipal bylaws, because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect and reroute sump pump discharge away इससे sanitary sewers.
Fines may be imposed लिये noncompliance.
अनेक homeowners have inherited उनके sump pump configurations and do नहीं realize that the pump discharges to the sewer.
If the discharge is fed to a laundry sink in the basement, it 's संभावित going to the sewer.
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical system, sump पंपों may have a battery backup.
the home 's pressurized जल supply powers some पंपों, eliminating the need लिये electricity at the expense of using potable water, potentially making them अधिक महंगी to operate than विद्युत पंपों and बनाना an अतिरिक्त जल disposal problem.
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped, a backup system is important for cases when the main power is out for prolonged अवधि of time, as दौरान a कठोर तूफ़ान.
वहीँ हैं generally दो प्रकार of sump पंपों — pedestal और submersible.
The pedestal pump 's motor is आरोहित ऊपर the sump, जहाँ it is more easily serviced, but is also अधिक conspicuous.
the pump impeller is driven by a long, vertical एक्सटेंशन shaft and the impeller is in a scroll housing in the आधार of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely mounted अंदर the sump, और is specially sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
Sump pump systems हैं also utilized in औद्योगिक और commercial applications to control water table -related problems in सतह soil.
An artesian aquifer or periodic ऊँची water table हालात can cause the ground to become unstable due to water saturation.
As long as the pump कृत्यों, the surface soil होगा remain stable.
These sumps are typically ten feet in depth or अधिक ; lined with corrugated metal pipe कि contains perforations or drain holes throughout.
They may include electronic control systems with विज़ुअल and audible alarms और are प्रायः covered to prevent debris and पशु from falling in.
Bleeding Kansas, Bloody Kansas or the Border War, was a श्रेणी of violent राजनैतिक confrontations involving anti-slavery free-staters and pro-slavery `` Border ruffian `` elements, कि took place in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns of मिसौरी between 1854 और 1861.
at the दिल of the conflict was the question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a फ़्री राज्य or slave state.
as such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy युद्ध between northerners and Southerners over the issue of slavery in the United States.
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the नई York Tribune ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil युद्ध.
Congress had long struggled to balance the रूचि of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces.
The events later ज्ञात as bleeding Kansas were set into गति by the kansas–nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, which nullified the Missouri Compromise और बजाय implemented the concept of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly democratic idea, popular प्रभुता stated कि the निवासियों of each territory or state should decide whether it would be a free or slave state ; however, this resulted in आव्रजन en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides.
At एक point, Kansas था two separate governments, each with its अपना constitution, हालांकि only एक थी federally recognized.
on जनवरी 29, 1861, Kansas was admitted to the संघ as a free state, कम than three months before the Battle of Fort sumter जिससे began the Civil War.
Benzene is an सशुल्क रासायनिक compound with the आणविक formula c6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon atoms joined in a ring, साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन atom संलग्न to प्रत्येक carbon atom.
Because its molecules contain only कार्बन and हाइड्रोजन atoms, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
बेंजीन is a प्राकृतिक constituent of crude oil, और is एक of the सबसे basic petrochemicals.
बेंजीन is an aromatic हाइड्रोकार्बन and the second [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a चक्रीय hydrocarbon with a continuous pi बंध.
it is sometimes abbreviated Ph –h. Benzene is a colorless and highly flammable liquid with a मीठी smell.
It is मुख्यतः used as a precursor to heavy chemicals, such as ethylbenzene and cumene, जिससे are उत्पादित on a billion किलोग्राम scale.
Because it has a high octane क्रमांक, it is an important component of गैसोलीन, composing a few percent of its mass.
सबसे non-industrial applications have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an इतालवी astronomer and विज्ञान historian.
वी homebrew refers to the reuse of निन्टेंडो 's Wii खेल console to चलाएं software that रै not been प्राधिकृत by Nintendo.
it achieves this by defeating the Wii 's copy protection और कोड signing उपायों.
In more general terms, Wii homebrew refers to the use of the वी 's hardware, accessories and software for purposes outside those intended by the manufacturer.
Original प्रयत्न focused on using the वी रिमोट as a pointing यंत्र on other operating systems, or running web-based games in the built-in web browser.
Subsequent developments in games exploits, such as the `` गोधूलि hack ``, `` bannerbomb '' और its later incarnation `` letterbomb '', `` Smash Stack '', `` Indiana pwns '', `` yu-gi-owned '', `` bathaxx '', and `` Return of the Jodi '', बना installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible.
Hadley ( right ) discussing the 2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis साथ बुश and Rice.
Stephen जॉन Hadley ( born फ़रवरी 13, 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. सहायक to the President for नेशनल Security Affairs ( commonly referred as National Security Advisor ), serving अंतर्गत President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing plants और give उर्वरक to half of उन्हें.
If there are differences between the fertilized plant समूह and the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह, ये differences may be due to the fertilizer.
A scientific कंट्रोल is an experiment or observation designed to minimize the effects of variables अन्य than the सिंगल स्वतंत्र परिवर्तनीय.
This increases the reliability of the परिणाम, often through a comparison between control measurements and the other माप.
Scientific नियंत्रण हैं a भाग of the scientific विधि.
लिये उदाहरण, दौरान ड्रग testing, scientists will कोशिश to control two समूह to keep them as identical as possible, then allow एक group to try the drug.
Another example might be परीक्षण संयंत्र fertilizer by giving it to तभी हाफ the plants in a garden : the पौधे that receive no उर्वरक are the कंट्रोल group, because वे establish the baseline level of growth कि the fertilizer-treated पौधे will be compared against.
बगैर a control group, the experiment can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow अधिक than they would have if untreated.
Ideally, all variables in an प्रयोग will be नियंत्रित ( accounted लिये by the कंट्रोल माप ) और none होगा be uncontrolled.
in ऐसे an experiment, if all the नियंत्रण work as expected, it is possible to conclude that the experiment is working as intended और that the परिणाम of the experiment are due to the effect of the variable being tested.
That is, scientific नियंत्रण allow an investigator to make a claim like `` Two परिस्थितियों यहूद identical until factor x occurred.
Since factor X is the only difference between the two situations, the new निष्कर्ष थी caused by factor X. ''

John एडम्स ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले परोसा as the first वाइस president of the संयुक्त States.
an अमरीकी Founding Father, he was a statesman, राजनयिक, और a leading advocate of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता from ग्रेट Britain.
खूब शिक्षित, he was an Enlightenment राजनैतिक theorist who promoted republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय his प्रायः seminal ideas, दोनो in प्रकाशित works और in letters to his wife and key adviser अबीगैल as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams आए to prominence in the early stages of the American क्रान्ति.
A वकील and public figure in Boston, as a delegate from Massachusetts to the महाद्वीपीय Congress, he played a leading भूमिका in persuading कॉंग्रेस to declare स्वतंत्रता.
he assisted थामस Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और was इसके primary एडवोकेट in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि with ग्रेट Britain, and was जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital governmental लोन from एम्सटर्डम bankers.
A राजनैतिक theorist और historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which साथ with his earlier Thoughts on Government, influenced American political thought.
One of his महानतम roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 सालो बाद nominated John मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him दो terms as George Washington 's vice president and his अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the Jeffersonian republicans, as well as the dominant गुट in his own federalist Party led by his bitter enemy सिकंदर Hamilton.
एडम्स हस्ताक्षरित the controversial Alien और राजद्रोह Acts, and built up the फौज और navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` quasi-war `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The प्रमुख accomplishment of his presidency was his peaceful resolution of the विरोध in the face of हैमिल्टन 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams was पराजित for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed उसके friendship with Jefferson.
he and उसके बीवी, Abigail Adams, founded an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता, diplomats, and इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams was the father of जॉन Quincy Adams, the sixth President of the United States.
His उपलब्धियाँ have received greater recognition in modern times, हालांकि उसके योगदान were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
Adams थी the first U.S. president to reside in the building कि eventually became known as the White House.
A Watt steam इंजन.
The steam इंजन, fuelled primarily by coal, propelled the Industrial क्रान्ति in Great Britain and the world.
the Industrial क्रान्ति was the transition to नई manufacturing processes that occurred in the काल from about 1760 to कुछ समय between 1820 and 1840.
This transition शामिल going from हाथ production विधि to machines, new chemical निर्माण and iron production processes, improved efficiency of जल power, the increasing use of भाप power and development of machine टूल्स.
the परिवर्तन also included the change from wood and other bio-fuels to कोयले.
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades spread to Western यूरोपीय और the संयुक्त States.
The Industrial क्रान्ति marks a प्रमुख turning point in history ; almost every पहलू of रोज़ जीवन थी बहकावे in कुछ रास्ता.
सबसे notably, औसत income and population began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained growth.
In the words of नोबेल पुरस्कार winner Robert E. Lucas, jr., `` लिये the first time in history, the living standards of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained growth... nothing remotely like this economic बर्ताव is mentioned by the शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्रियों, even as a theoretical सम्भावना. ''
विलियम घंटी Scott आयरन and Coal, 1855-60
The period of समय covered by the Industrial Revolution varies with different historians.
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s और was not fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s, while T. S. Ashton आयोजित कि it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century historians ऐसे as John clapham and निकोलस Crafts have argued that the प्रक्रम of economic and सोशल बदलें took place gradually and the term क्रान्ति is a misnomer.
This is still a subject of बहस among इतिहासकारों.
GDP प्रति capita was broadly stable पहले the औद्योगिक Revolution and the emergence of the modern capitalist economy.
the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति began an era of per-capita आर्थिक growth in capitalist economies.
Economic इतिहासकारों are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important इवेंट in the इतिहास of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants.
The First Industrial क्रान्ति evolved into the Second औद्योगिक Revolution in the परिवर्तन years between 1840 and 1870, when technological and economic प्रगति gained आवेग साथ the increasing adoption of steam-powered boats, जहाजों and रेल, the विशाल scale manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam संचालित factories.
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born सितंबर 27, 1969 ), is an American टेलीविज़न news रिपोर्टर, currently appearing on Fox न्यूज Channel.
This list ranks u.S. शहरों by land क्षेत्रफल ( not including लाशें of जल ).
Total क्षेत्रों ( including water ) are also दिए, लकिन note कि, जब ranked by total area, a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San Francisco is an extreme example ; water makes up nearly 80 % of इसके कुल area of 232 square मील ( 601 km2 ).
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily because its नगरपालिका government रै merged साथ the government of the surrounding county.
In some cases the county no longer exists, while in अन्य the व्यवस्था has formed a संचित city–county ( or city- borough in अलास्का, or city- मोहल्ला in louisiana ).
ये हैं दिखाया in bold in the list below ( लकिन नहीं all उदाहरण may be indicated ).
** ये हैं independent cities, meaning वे हैं नहीं a part of any county.
the large intestine ( or bowel, कोलन ) is the पिछला part of the digestive प्रणाली in vertebrate animals.
Its function is to absorb water from the remaining indigestible food पदार्थ, and then to pass useless waste सामग्री from the देह.
This article is primarily about the human gut, though the information परिचय its processes are directly लागू to most mammals.
The large intestine consists of the cecum, rectum और anal canal.
It starts in the right iliac region of the pelvis, just at or नीचे the सही waist, where it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine.
From here it continues up the abdomen, then across the width of the abdominal गुहा, and then it turns down, continuing to इसके endpoint at the anus.
The large intestine is about long, which is about one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal कनाल.
In terminologia Anatomica the large आंत includes the cecum, colon, rectum, and anal canal.
However, some स्त्रोत exclude the गुदा कनाल.
the ग्रीन Bay Packers are an American football टोली based in Green Bay, विस्कॉन्सिन.
वे are members of the उत्तर Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the नेशनल Football League ( एनएफएल ).
Green खाड़ी is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL, having been organized और playing in 1919.
The Packers हैं the तभी non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख league professional sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the पिछला vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा teams '' that यहूद एकबार आम in the NFL दौरान the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` घुंघराले '' lambeau ( hence the name lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and जार्ज Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay पैकर्स can trace their lineage to अन्य semi-professional teams in Green Bay डेटिंग back to 1896.
In 1919 और 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team विरूद्ध clubs from around Wisconsin और the मिडवेस्ट.
They joined the American Professional Football संघ ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is known आज as the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` छोटी town '' team, its local fan आधार और media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the टोली also निभाई selected घर games there between 1933 और 1994.
The ग्रीन Bay पैकर्स have won 13 league championships ( more than any other टोली in the NFL ), सहित नौ NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era और four सुपर Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl i ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( सुपर कटोरी XXXI ) and 2011 ( सुपर Bowl XLV ).
the Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their nfc North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers फंसने is one of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल history, डेटिंग back to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized घाटी located in the लॉस Angeles metropolitan क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी California, United States, defined by the mountains of the अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ circling it.
Home to 1.76 million people, it झूठ north of the larger and more populous Los Angeles जलाशय.
Nearly two thirds of the Valley 's जमीन क्षेत्रफल is part of the City of लॉस Angeles.
The अन्य incorporated cities in the valley हैं ग्लेनडेल, Burbank, San फर्नांडो, Hidden Hills और calabasas.

इसके well-known advertising as well as a host of entertainment areas and attractions, and is located in Atlanta, Georgia ( where the company 's headquarters are located ) at Pemberton Place ( नामित in सम्मान of John Pemberton, the inventor of Coca-Cola ).
