pretties is a 2005 विज्ञान fiction novel and the second book of the Uglies Trilogy written by स्कॉट westerfeld.
It is नियत in a future dystopian world in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by चरम cosmetic surgery upon reaching age 16.
It tells the story of किशोरावस्था Tally Youngblood who rebels against society 's enforced conformity.
Susan Leigh Vaughan स्मिथ ( born September 26, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी woman sentenced to life in थाना for murdering her children.
Born in Union, South कैरोलिना, और a former छात्र of the University of South Carolina Union, she was convicted on July 22, 1995 for murdering her two बेटे, 3-year-old Michael Daniel Smith, born October 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith, born August 5, 1993.
the मामला gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed, due to उसके claiming कि a ब्लैक man चुराया her car and kidnapped her sons.
She बाद claimed that she suffered इससे mental health issues that impaired उसके judgment.
according to the दक्षिण Carolina Department of Corrections, स्मिथ होगा be eligible for पैरोल on November 4, 2024, after serving a न्यूनतम of thirty years.
She is incarcerated at South Carolina 's Leath Correctional Institution, निकट greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali लिया from the Inuit Koyukon Athabaskan भाषा अर्थ `` The Great One '' ) is the highest mountain peak in the संयुक्त States and in North America with a summit elevation of above समुद्र level.
at some, the base to peak वृद्धि is माना the largest of any mountain situated entirely above समुद्र स्तर.
Measured by topographic prominence, it is the third most prominent peak after Mount Everest and अकोंकागुआ.
स्तिथ in the अलास्का दायरा in the interior of us state of Alaska, it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve.
The पहला यूरोपीय to document sighting the पहाड़ was जार्ज वैंकूवर in 1794.
in 1903, James wickersham recorded the first attempt at climbing McKinley which was unsuccessful.
in 1906, Frederick Cook claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be गलत.
The पहला verifiable ascent to mckinley 's summit थी achieved on June 7, 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck, Harry Karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert टैटम.
In 1951, Bradford Washburn pioneered the वेस्ट Buttress route considered to be the safest and easiest रूट and इसलिए the most popular currently in use.
The Honda s600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Honda.
It was launched in March 1964.
Available as a roadster – bearing strong resemblance to the Honda s500 – and as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the S600 थी the पहला Honda available in दो trim levels.
दौरान इसके उत्पादन चलाएं up to 1966, the model styling होता remain pretty much the same, with the most notable परिवर्तन coming to the front grille, bumper, and headlights.
Powered by a dohc, water-cooled, four-cylinder इनलाइन engine साथ चार carburetors, the engine क्षमता was increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc.
the engine उत्पादित at 8,500 rpm and had a शीर्ष speed of.
साथ the convertible weighing in at mere, the extra sheet metal of the कूप तभी added to the overall weight.
Suspension was स्वतंत्र with sealed रोलर chain drive to प्रत्येक पश्च wheel.
The S600 was the first mass marketed Honda car.
पहला offered तभी in right-hand ड्राइव, it soon became उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand drive to अपील to निर्यात बाज़ार.
There were a few pre-production s500s manufactured in left हाथ drive, two or तीन even being दिखाया in some early बिक्री विवरणिका.
Both the S600 roadster और coupé यहूद उपलब्धियाँ in standard trim and a खास, upgraded पैकेज called the sm600 which included, among अन्य items, special paint colors, exclusive badging, a मानक radio and speaker, a special antenna in the passenger side sun छज्जा, standard reversing lights, a standard सिगरेट हल्का, a मानक heater, better cushioned seats, and a detachable seat track for जल्दी हटाना of the passenger seat.
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964, साथ production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
उत्पादन dropped off in 1966 ( as वे were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles and 1,800 coupes लिये the 3 year span.
everybody Hates Chris is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न period sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of comedian क्रिस Rock ( who is भी the narrator ) while growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant neighborhood of ब्रुकलीन, New यॉर्क.
the show is set between 1983 और 1987 ; however, Rock खुद was a teenager between 1978 और 1983.
चट्टान grew up साथ a boy नामित Kenny montero, whom he has प्रायः referred to as the inspiration for a lot of the episodes.
In many interviews, Rock has वर्णित Kenny as the reason he got into comedy in the first place.
The show 's title parodies the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond.
Rock stated : `` Everybody Loves रेमंड लकिन everybody Hates क्रिस ! ``.
The show 's lead अभिनेताओं हैं टायलर जेम्स Williams, Terry क्रू, tichina Arnold, Tequan Richmond, imani Hakim, and Vincent Martella.
In Fall 2008, the The cw moved everybody hates क्रिस and The Game to the Friday रात्रि death स्लॉट.
The fourth season of the series premiered शुक्रवार, October 3, 2008, at 8:00PM Eastern/7:00PM Central.
On May 21, 2009, the CW announced कि it था cancelled Everybody hates क्रिस.
prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up साथ his own past—dropping out of ऊँची स्कूल to become a comedian—and कि it was time to end the दिखाएँ.
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the two pleural परतों, the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs.
excessive amounts of such द्रव can impair श्वास by limiting the expansion of the lungs during ventilation.
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an बूढ़ा English heroic epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as एक of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
it survives in a सिंगल manuscript ज्ञात as the Nowell Codex.
Its composition by an बेनाम Anglo-Saxon poet is दिनाँक between the 8th और the जल्दी 11th सदी.
in 1731, the manuscript थी badly damaged by a fire that swept through a building housing a collection of मध्यकालीन पांडुलिपियों assembled by Sir Robert ब्रूस Cotton.
The कविता fell into अस्पष्टता लिये दशकों, and इसके existence did not become widely known again जबतक it was printed in 1815 in an edition prepared by the icelandic-danish scholar grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia, आता to the help of Hroðgar, the king of the danes, whose मीड hall ( in heorot ) has महरूम under attack by a दानव ज्ञात as Grendel.
बाद बियोवुल्फ़ जानबूझ उसे, Grendel 's mother attacks the hall and is then also defeated.
विजयी, बियोवुल्फ़ goes home to Geatland in Sweden and later becomes king of the Geats.
After a काल of पचास years has passed, Beowulf defeats a dragon, लकिन is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his मौत, उसके attendants bury him in a tumulus, a दफ़न mound, in Geatland.
shem हैम and Japheth by James Tissot 1904.
Shem ( ; sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) थी one of the sons of Noah in the यहूदी Bible as खूब as in Islamic literature.
He is most popularly regarded as the eldest son, though some परंपराओं regard him as the दूसरी son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to सापेक्ष ages of Shem and his brother Japheth, लकिन with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different अनुवाद.
The श्लोक is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also, the father of सब the children of Eber, the brother of japheth the elder, even to him were children born. ``.
however, the New अमरीकी Standard Bible gives, `` Also to Shem, the पिता of all the children of Eber, and the older brother of Japheth, children यहूद born. ''
Genesis 11:10 records कि Shem was स्टिल 100 years old at the जनम of arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology नोट, ) two years after the flood, बनाना उसे मुश्किल 99 at the time the बाढ़ began ; और that he lived for another 500 years after इस, making his age at death 600 years.
the children of Shem यहूद ईलम, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, and Aram, in addition to बेटियां.
Abraham, the patriarch of the Hebrews और Arabs, was one of the descendants of arphaxad.
इस्लामी literature describes Shem as एक of the believing sons of Noah.
कुछ sources भी identify shem as a prophet in his own सही and कि he was the next नबी बाद उसके father.
In एक मुस्लिम लेजेंड, Shem was one of the people that God बना Jesus resurrect as a sign to the Children of इसराईल.
The 1st century इतिहासकार Flavius Josephus, among many अन्य, recounted the tradition कि these पाँच sons were the progenitors of the nations of ईलम, Assyria, Chaldea, Lydia, and सीरियाई, क्रमशः.
Semitic is still a commonly प्रयुक्त term for the सामीती भाषाएं, as a उपसमुच्चय of the Afro-Asiatic languages, denoting the common भाषाई heritage of Arabic, Aramaic, Akkadian, Ethiopic, Hebrew and Phoenician languages.
according to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. talmud Nedarim 32b ; उत्पत्ति Rabbah 46:7 ; उत्पत्ति Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; संख्याएँ Rabbah 4:8. ), Shem is believed to have been Melchizedek, King of सलेम whom Abraham is recorded to have met after the battle of the four kings.
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources कि describe him, shem is also credited with killing Nimrod, son of Cush.
Shem is mentioned in उत्पत्ति 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons shown in red, हैम 's sons in blue, shem 's बेटे in green.
go Daddy or Go Daddy समूह Inc. is a privately held कम्पनी कि is primarily an internet डोमेन registrar and web hosting कम्पनी.
Go Daddy समूह inc. दायर for an IPO in 2006, but बाद canceled it, due to `` market uncertainties ''.
In जोड to domain registration and hosting go Daddy also बिकता e-business सम्बन्धित software और सेवाएं.
On June 24, 2011, The वॉल Street जर्नल reported that private-equity firms केकेआर and Silver झील Partners, along with a third investor, were nearing a सौदे to buy the कम्पनी for between $ 2–2.5 billion.
On July 1, 2011 go Daddy confirmed that KKR, Silver Lake Partners और Technology Crossover ventures था closed the deal.

अंडोरा ( ;, ), officially the Principality of अंडोरा ( ), also called the Principality of the घाटियों of Andorra, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय, located in the पूर्वी Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France.
It is the sixth smallest nation in Europe, having an क्षेत्रफल of और an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, अंडोरा la Vella, is the highest capital city in यूरोपीय, at an elevation of above sea level.
The official language is कैटलन, हालांकि Spanish, Portuguese, and फ्रेंच are also commonly spoken.
Created under a charter in 988, the present Principality was formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed by दो co-princes – the Bishop of urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous देश mainly because of its tourism उद्योग, which सेवाएं an estimated 10.2 million विज़िटर annually, and also क्युकी of इसके status as a tax हेवन.
It is not a member of the यूरोपीय Union, but the euro is the de facto currency.
the लोगों of Andorra have the 4th उच्चतम human life expectancy in the world — 82 सालो at birth.

Oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` The Gathering प्लेस '', is the third largest of the Hawaiian आइलैंड्स and the most populous of the islands in the u.S. state of Hawaii.
the state पूंजी, Honolulu, is on Oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore islands such as घाट Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the eastern ( windward ) coast, it has a कुल जमीन area of, बनाना it the 20th largest island in the संयुक्त राज्य.
in the महानतम dimension, this volcanic island is long and आरपार.
The length of the shoreline is.
the द्वीप is the result of two separate shield ज्वालामुखी : Waianae और Koolau, साथ a व्यापक `` valley '' or saddle ( the central Oahu मैदान ) between them.
the highest point is Mt. Ka'ala in the Waianae Range, rising to above sea level.
The base currency of the United राज्य is the U.S. डालर, और is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
at one time, however, U.S. currency शामिल पाँच larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were printed for सामान्य उपयोग, and a $ 100,000 note थी printed for certain आतंरिक transactions.
British Honduras was a British colony in Central America.
In 1981, the colony gained full independence, और is now the स्वतंत्र nation of Belize.
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th सदी, the territory on the ईस्ट coast of Central America, south of Mexico, became a British crown colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing उपनिवेश.
बेलीज़ became fully स्वतंत्र from the United Kingdom in 1981.
Belize was the last continental possession of the United किंगडम in the americas.
Spelt, भी ज्ञात as dinkel wheat, or hulled wheat, is an ancient species of गेहूं from the fifth millennium BC.
spelt थी an महत्वपूर्ण staple in parts of यूरोपीय from the Bronze Age to medieval times ; it अभी survives as a relict crop in Central यूरोपीय and northern Spain and रै found a new मार्केट as a health food.
Spelt is sometimes माना a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम wheat ( T. aestivum ), in which मामला its वनस्पति नाम is माना to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid wheat, which अर्थात् it has छह sets of chromosomes.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by author और physician Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
a london-based `` परामर्श detective '' whose abilities किनारा on the fantastic, Holmes is famous लिये उसके astute लॉजिकल reasoning, his क्षमता to adopt almost any disguise, और उसके use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases.
Holmes, जो first appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887, was featured in चार novels और 56 short stories.
The पहला अनोखा, A पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट, appeared in Beeton 's Christmas सालाना in 1887 और the second, The Sign of the चार, in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
the character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of short stories in The Strand पत्रिका, शुरूआत साथ A कांड in Bohemia in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels प्रकाशित in serial रूप appeared between then and 1927.
The कहानियां cover a period from around 1880 up to 1914.
सब but चार stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer, dr. जॉन H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The शेर 's Mane `` ) and two others हैं written in the third व्यक्ति ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` और `` His पिछला Bow `` ).
In दो कहानियां ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ), holmes tells Watson the main स्टोरी from his यादें, जबकि वाटसन becomes the narrator of the फ़्रेम story.
The first and fourth novels, A Study in Scarlet और The Valley of Fear, each include a long अंतराल of सर्वज्ञ narration recounting events unknown to either holmes or Watson.
The United States House of Representatives is one of the two houses of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the हाउस.
The other house is the Senate.
the composition और powers of the House are established in Article एक of the United राज्य संविधान.
The प्रमुख power of the हाउस is to pass संघीय legislation कि affects the entire देश although its bills जरूर also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले becoming law ( unless both the House और Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds बहुमत in each कक्ष ).
The House has several exclusive शक्तियां : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, and to elect the u.S. President in case there is no बहुमत in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. राज्य is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is entitled to at least one representative.
The most populous राज्य, California, currently रै 53 representatives.
the total क्रमांक of voting representatives is fixed by law at 435.
Each representative serves for a two-year term.
the Speaker of the United राज्य House of प्रतिनिधि, जो presides over the कक्ष, is elected by the members of the House, और is इसलिए traditionally the leader of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन Conference, whichever party has अधिक मतदान सदस्यों.
The House meets in the south wing of the संयुक्त राज्य Capitol.

The brand 's popularity has led to it being used as a जेनेरिक पद for gelatin dessert आरपार the U.S. and Canada.
Kennywood is an amusement park located in वेस्ट Mifflin, Pennsylvania, a उपनगरीय of Pittsburgh.
the park पहला opened in 1898 as a `` ट्राली park '' attraction at the समाप्त of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The पार्क थी खरीदा in 1906 by F. W. Henninger और एंड्रयू McSwigan और thus began the Kennywood Entertainment company कि has remained a closely आयोजित परिवार business for over 100 years.
This traditional amusement पार्क still has structures और rides डेटिंग back to इसके opening और the early 1900s.
साथ with rye Playland Park, it is one of only दो amusement पार्क सूचीबद्ध in the National Register of Historic Places.
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment Company, जिससे जबतक December 2007 was a closely held family business स्वामित्व by the Henninger and McSwigan families.
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace Entertainment, a subsidiary of Parques Reunidos, an अंतरराष्ट्रीय मनोरंजन park company based in Madrid, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments, an निवेश fund based in the UK.
A सोशल Security card issued by the रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट Board in 1943 to a अभी deceased व्यक्ति.
In the संयुक्त States, a Social सुरक्षा number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number जारी to U.S. citizens, permanent निवासियों, and temporary ( working ) निवासियों under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the सोशल Security Act, codified as.
the number is जारी to an व्यक्तिगत by the Social Security प्रशासन, an independent agency of the United States सरकारी.
इसके प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals for Social Security purposes.
A Social सुरक्षा number may be obtained by applying on Form SS-5, `` Application for A सोशल सुरक्षा Number Card ''.
minimalism describes आंदोलनों in विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of आर्ट and design, विशेषकर visual art and म्यूज़िक, जहाँ the work is नियत out to expose the essence or identity of a subject through eliminating all non-essential forms, सुविधाएँ or अवधारणाओं.
Minimalism is any डिज़ाइन or style in जिससे the सरलतम और fewest elements are प्रयुक्त to create the अधिकतम effect.
As a specific movement in the कला it is identified with developments in post–world War II Western आर्ट, सबसे strongly with अमरीकी विज़ुअल कला in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent artists associated साथ this movement include Donald judd, जॉन mccracken, Agnes Martin, डान flavin, Robert Morris, Anne Truitt, and Frank Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism, and is often interpreted as a reaction विरूद्ध Abstract expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices.
The शर्तें have विस्तारित to encompass a movement in music which features repetition and iteration, as in the रचनाएं of La Monte Young, Terry Riley, Steve Reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
Minimalist compositions are sometimes known as systems music.
The term `` अल्पतम '' is often लागू colloquially to designate anything that is अतिरिक्त or stripped to its essentials.
It has भी been used to describe the plays and novels of सैमुएल Beckett, the films of Robert Bresson, the stories of Raymond Carver, and even the automobile designs of कोलिन Chapman.
The word was first प्रयुक्त in English in the early 20th सदी to describe the mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, डाल्टन 's law ( also पुकारा डाल्टन 's law of partial pressures ) states कि the total pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the आंशिक pressures of individual gases.
This empirical law थी observed by John डाल्टन in 1801 and is सम्बन्धित to the ideal gas कानून.
Mathematically, the pressure of a mixture of gases can be defined as the संकलन
or
जहाँ represent the partial pressure of each घटक.
It is assumed that the गैसों do not प्रतिक्रिया with each अन्य
where is the mole fraction of the i-th घटक in the कुल mixture of n components.
the relationship below provides a way to determine the आवाज़ आधारित concentration of कोई व्यक्तिगत गैसीय घटक
where is the concentration of the i-th component expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's विधि is नहीं exactly followed by real gases.
Those deviations are considerably विशाल at high pressures.
In such conditions, the volume occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the free space between them.
In particular, the short औसत distances between molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular शक्तियां between gas अणुओं enough to substantially change the दबाव exerted by उन्हें.
Neither of those effects are considered by the ideal gas मॉडल.

What this list शामिलs:

Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the क्रमांक of unique students who attended the university दौरान the year.

`` Right Round '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper flo rida, released as the सीसे सिंगल इससे his दूसरी studio album, R.O.O.T.S. ( 2009 ).
The song features guest vocals from kesha.
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was digitally released on 10 फ़रवरी by पो Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The सोंग lyrically बोलती of Flo Rida 's जाल बॉल referee enthusiasm, while adapting the chorus of the 1984 मुर्दे or जिंदा सोंग `` You Spin Me Round ( जैसे a Record ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the song 's लेखक, the chorus refers to मौखिक sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, but in the संयुक्त States, during the चलाएं atop the chart, kesha थी uncredited.
The सोंग received mostly negative समीक्षाएँ from आलोचकों, who claimed it थी kitsch और misogynistic.
However, it was a commercial success, reaching the शीर्ष टेन of the charts in nineteen countries worldwide.
in the United राज्य, it became Flo Rida 's दूसरी number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week बिक्री जब it थी released to डिजिटल retailers.
The single 's accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो was निर्देशित by Malcolm जोन्स and nominated लिये an MTV Video Music Award.
The song has been used in अनेक movies, ऐसे as the Hangover, The Ugly सच्चाई और the तेलुगु movie Pilla Zamindar.
in the movie Pitch Perfect, the सोंग is performed by the a cappella group the treblemakers.
The Chief Justice of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of the संयुक्त States federal court system ( the judicial शाखा of the federal सरकारी of the United राज्य ) and the chief judge of the Supreme अदालत of the United राज्य.
The Chief Justice is एक of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the Associate justices of the Supreme Court of the United States.
इससे 1789 until 1866, the office was known as the Chief Justice of the परम् Court.
the Chief Justice is the highest judicial अधिकारी in the country, and acts as a chief administrative officer for the federal courts and as head of the न्यायिक Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United राज्य Courts.
the Chief Justice भी serves as a प्रवक्ता for the judicial branch.
the Chief Justice लीड the business of the Supreme अदालत.
He presides over मौखिक arguments before the court.
When the court renders an opinion, the Chief Justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the अदालत 's opinion.
the Chief Justice भी रै significant agenda-setting शक्ति over the court 's meetings.
In the मामला of an महाभियोग of a President of the United States, जिससे has occurred twice, the Chief इंसाफ presides over the विचारण in the Senate.
In modern tradition, the मुख्य इंसाफ has the ceremonial ड्यूटी of administering the oath of office of the President of the संयुक्त States.
the first Chief इंसाफ was John Jay.
The 17th and current Chief इंसाफ is John G. Roberts, Jr.

Prudhoe Bay आयल Field is a विशाल oil फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's उत्तर Slope.
it is the largest oil field in both the संयुक्त States and in North अमेरिका, covering and originally containing लगभग of oil.
the amount of recoverable आयल in the field is अधिक than दोगुना that of the next largest फ़ील्ड in the संयुक्त राज्य, the East Texas oil field.
the फ़ील्ड is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and ConocoPhillips अलास्का.
Labor unions are legally recognized as प्रतिनिधि of मजदूर in many industries in the United राज्य.
उनके activity आज centers on collective bargaining over wages, benefits, और working conditions for their membership, and on representing उनके members in विवादों with प्रबन्धन over उल्लंघनों of contract provisions.
larger unions also typically engage in lobbying activities and electioneering at the राज्य and federal स्तर.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of दो larger छतरियाँ organizations : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, and the Change to जीत संघ which split from the afl-cio in 2005.
Both advocate policies और legislation on behalf of मजदूर in the United States and Canada, and लो an active role in politics.
The AFL-CIO is especially चिंतित with global trade मुद्दे.
In 2010, the percentage of मजदूर belonging to a union in the United States ( or कुल labor union `` घनत्व '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in Germany, 27.5 % in Canada, और 70 % in Finland.
Union सदस्यता in the निजी sector has गिरे under 7 % — levels नहीं seen चूंकि 1932.
Unions allege that employer-incited opposition has contributed to this decline in membership.
The most prominent unions are among public sector employees ऐसे as teachers and police.
Members of unions are disproportionately older, पुरूष and निवासियों of the Northeast, the Midwest, और कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
संघ workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in अमेरिका after controlling लिये individual, job, and मजदूर market characteristics.
हालांकि much smaller compared to उनके peak membership in the 1950s, अमरीकी unions remain a prominent political factor, both through mobilization of उनके own सदस्यताएँ and through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant अधिकारों, trade policy, स्वास्थ्य care, and जीना wage campaigns.
To fight कथित employer anti-union programs, संघ are फिलहाल advocating new `` card check `` federal legislation that would require employers to bargain with a union if अधिक than 50 % of workers signed फ़ॉर्म, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
The वर्तमान procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days लिये a federally पर्यवेक्षित secret-ballot कर्मचारी referendum on the subject.
The अर्थशास्त्री Joseph Stiglitz रै asserted that, `` Strong unions have helped to reduce inequality, whereas weaker unions have बना it easier for ceos, sometimes working with मार्केट शक्तियां कि वे have helped shape, to increase it. ''
the decline in unionization since WWII in the United States रै been associated with a pronounced वृद्धि in income और माल inequality.
a ईसाई Lacroix फ़ैशन boutique
a boutique is a small shopping outlet, विशेषकर one that specializes in elite and फैशनेबल items ऐसे as कपडे and jewelry.
the word is French for `` shop '', via Latin from यूनानी ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
the term entered into everyday अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग in the late 1960s जब, for a brief period, London was the centre of the fashion trade.
Carnaby Street और the Kings Road यहूद the focus of much media attention as home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era.
Now the ईस्ट of London has been regenerated और अधिक Boutiques pop up in fashionable areas, ऐसे as मीनार सेतु सड़क.
it can also refer to a specialised कड़ such as a boutique निवेश bank or बुटीक विधि firm.
The word is often प्रयुक्त to describe a प्रॉपर्टी in the independent section of the hotel market ( such as The rockwell in London ) in अनुक्रम to फर्क themselves from larger जंजीरों ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
In ऐसे मामले the establishments aim to convey the idea कि the operation is elite और highly specialised.
In the strictest sense of the word, boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but more generally speaking, some chains can be referred to as boutiques if they specialize in particular शैलियाँ.
Recently, the पद `` boutique '' has प्रारंभ being applied to normally-mass-market items कि are either niche or produced in intentionally छोटी numbers at very high कीमतें.
इस may be referred to as boutique निर्माण.
For उदाहरण, before the release of the वी, a Time Magazine article suggested that निन्टेंडो could become a `` boutique video-game कम्पनी '', producing games for niche audiences, rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony.
in the traditional luxury- watch उद्योग scalfaro अंतरराष्ट्रीय is माना as the precursor in manufacturing और बिक्री of bespoke घड़ियाँ.
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible बुटीक manufacturing site, which allows producing small श्रेणी or even unique timepieces.
हालांकि कुछ boutiques specialise in hand-made items और other truly one-of-a-kind items, others बस produce t-shirts, स्टिकर, and other fashion accessories in artificially छोटी runs and बेचें them at unusually high prices.
in the early 1990s सेलिना started निर्माण her own line of women 's कपडे.
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` सेलिना Etc. Boutique & Salon '' एक located in Corpus Christi and एक located in सैन अंतोनियो, टेक्सास.
एक थी due to open in Monterrey, मैक्सिको, in 1995 but due to her death it was not खोली.
Around 1999 the San Antonio स्थान closed और the Corpus Christi location थी closed in 2009.
In लेट 1990s कुछ European खुदरा व्यापारियों developed the idea of tailoring a shop towards a lifestyle theme, in the form of `` अवधारणा स्टोर्स '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate विभाग.
एक of the पहला concept stores was 10 कोरसो Como in मिलान, इटली followed by Colette in पेरिस and quartier 206 in बर्लिन.
Several well-known American जंजीरों such as Urban outfitters, D-A-S-H, and the Gap, Australian chain Billabong and, though कम common, रब & Taylor adapted to the अवधारणा store trend after 2000.
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a credit union headquartered in Vienna, Virginia, चार्टर्ड and regulated under the authority of the National Credit संघ प्रशासन ( NCUA ) of the u.S. संघीय government.
नेवी Federal is the largest natural member ( or खुदरा ) credit union in the संसार, both in asset size and in सदस्यता.
as of September 2012, Navy संघीय था over $ 50 billion USD in assets, and over 4 million members.
Stevland hardaway मॉरिस ( born may 13, 1950 as stevland Hardaway judkins ), known by उसके स्टेज name Stevie Wonder, is an American singer, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the लेट 20th century.
Blind since shortly बाद birth, Wonder हस्ताक्षरित with Motown 's Tamla label at the age of eleven, and continues to perform और record for motown to this दिन.
Among Wonder 's best known works हैं singles ऐसे as `` Superstition ``, `` सर Duke ``, `` You हैं the Sunshine of My Life `` and `` I Just पुकारा to Say I Love You ``.
Well known albums also include Talking Book, innervisions और Songs in the कुंजी of Life.
He has अंकित more than thirty u.S. top टेन hits and received twenty-two Grammy Awards, the most ever awarded to a male solo artist.
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for राजनैतिक causes, including उसके 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther किंग, Jr. 's birthday a अवकाश in the United States.
In 2009, Wonder was नामित a संयुक्त Nations Messenger of Peace.
In 2008, बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका released a सूची of the hot 100 All-Time शीर्ष Artists to celebrate the us singles chart 's पचासवें वर्षगांठ, साथ Wonder at number five.
By popular vote, स्टीवी was inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012.
मनस्ताप ( इससे the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '', लिये mind/soul, और -ωσις `` -osis '', लिये abnormal कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, and is a जेनेरिक मनोरोग term लिये a mental राज्य often described as involving a `` घाटा of सम्पर्क साथ reality ``.
People कष्ट इससे psychosis हैं described as psychotic.
मनस्ताप is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder, दौरान which hallucinations and delusions, सकल उत्तेजना or stupor and impaired इनसाइट may occur.
the term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can औसत anything from relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and द्विध्रुवी type 1 विकार.
moreover a wide variety of central nervous प्रणाली diseases, इससे दोनो external substances and internal physiologic illness, can produce symptoms of psychosis.
This led many professionals to कह कि मनस्ताप is not specific enough as a निदान पद.
despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally दिए to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative लक्षण ) and अधिक commonly to diverse types of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting very स्पष्ट signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas एक exhibiting बहुत हल्का लक्षण could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic रिस्क syndrome ''.
an excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of psychosis, especially those of schizophrenia.
This is विचार to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of these drugs, however, show either no significant difference between drug and placebo, or a very small effect आकार, suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much अधिक complex than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing psychosis may exhibit कुछ personality changes and thought disorder.
Depending on its गंभीरता, this may be accompanied by unusual or bizarre behavior, as well as परेशानी with social interaction और impairment in carrying आउट daily life क्रियाएँ.

A recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of स्वतंत्र Systems, a political faction of planetary systems waging युद्ध on the Galactic Republic.

Though the बदनाम Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the Clone युद्धों who had killed the सबसे जेडी in single combat, he did not hesitate to flee इससे battles he knew he would lose.
आंकडे play an महत्वपूर्ण role in summarizing baseball performance और evaluating players in the sport.
Since the प्रवाह of a baseball game रै natural ब्रेक to it, and normally players act individually rather than performing in clusters, the खेल lends itself to आसान record-keeping and आंकडे.
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball since the creation of the National लीग और American League, now part of Major लीग बेसबॉल.
Many statistics are also available इससे outside of Major League Baseball, इससे leagues ऐसे as the National संघ of Professional आधार Ball Players और the Negro Leagues.
dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts destitute pea pickers in California, centering on Florence Owens Thompson, आयु 32, a माँ of seven children, in nipomo, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, March 1936.

The unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression थी a कठोर worldwide economic अवसाद in the decade preceding World War II.
The timing of the Great Depression varied आरपार nations, but in सबसे countries it प्रारंभ in 1930 और lasted जबतक the late 1930s or middle 1940s.
It was the longest, most फैली, and deepest अवसाद of the 20th सदी.
In the 21st century, the Great Depression is commonly used as an उदाहरण of how दूर the world 's economy can decline.
The depression originated in the u.S., after the fall in stock कीमतें that began around September 4, 1929, and became worldwide न्यूज साथ the stock मार्केट क्रैश of October 29, 1929 ( ज्ञात as ब्लैक Tuesday ).
The ग्रेट Depression था devastating effects in countries rich and poor.
Personal income, tax revenue, profits and prices dropped, while international trade plunged by अधिक than 50 %.
बेरोजगारी in the U.S. rose to 25 %, and in some देशों रोज़ as high as 33 %.
Cities all around the world were hit hard, especially those निर्भर on heavy उद्योग.
Construction was virtually halted in अनेक countries.
Farming and rural areas suffered as क्रॉप prices गिरी by लगभग 60 %.
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of कार्य, areas निर्भर on primary sector industries such as cash cropping, mining and लॉगिंग suffered the most.
Some economies प्रारंभ to रिकवर by the mid-1930s.
in many countries, the ऋणात्मक effects of the Great अवसाद lasted जबतक the समाप्त of संसार War II.
a असामयिक ventricular संकुचन ( पीवीसी ), भी known as a premature ventricular complex, ventricular असामयिक contraction ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( vpc ), ventricular premature beat ( VPB ), or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ), is a relatively आम event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node, the normal heartbeat initiator.
The electrical events of the दिल detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped beat `` or लगा as palpitations in the chest.
In a सामान्य heartbeat, the ventricles contract बाद the atria have helped to fill them by contracting ; in this way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of रक्त both to the lungs और to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with रक्त, which means that परिसंचरण is inefficient.
However, सिंगल ताल PVC arrhythmias do not usually पोज़ a danger और can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William Gary Busey ( born जून 29, 1944 ), better known as Gary Busey, is an American फिल्मी and स्टेज कर्ता, और कलाकार.
He has appeared in a किस्में of films, including Lethal Weapon, Point Break, और Under घेरा, as well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke, Walker, Texas Ranger, विधि & अनुक्रम, and अनुगामी.
he थी nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor in 1978 for उसके भूमिका in The Buddy Holly Story.
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ), is a multinational सन्धि लिये the purpose of establishing international मानकों for बौद्धिक property अधिकारों प्रवर्तन.
the अनुबंध aims to establish an international legal फ्रेमवर्क for targeting नकली goods, जेनेरिक medicines and कापीराइट infringement on the Internet, और would create a नई governing body outside existing forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the World बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी Organization, or the संयुक्त Nations.
The अनुबंध थी हस्ताक्षरित in अक्तूबर 2011 by Australia, कनाडा, Japan, Morocco, नई जीलैंड, सिंगापुर, South कोरियाई, and the United States.
in 2012, मैक्सिको, the यूरोपीय Union and 22 countries जिससे हैं member राज्य of the European Union signed as well.
One signatory ( Japan ) रै ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement, which होता come into फ़ोर्स in countries that ratified it बाद ratification by छह countries.
समर्थक have described the agreement as a response to `` the increase in global trade of counterfeit goods and pirated copyright protected works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film and TV उद्योग और विशाल intellectual property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture Association of America and फार्मास्युटिकल Research and निर्माताओं of America were active in the treaty 's development.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों कह the सम्मेलन adversely affects fundamental rights including freedom of expression and privacy.
ACTA रै also been criticised by Doctors Without Borders for endangering access to दवाइयाँ in developing देशों.
The secret प्रकृति of negotiations has excluded सिविल society समूह, developing countries and the general public from the agreement 's negotiation process and it रै been described as policy laundering by critics including the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक Frontier Foundation और the Entertainment Consumers संघ.
The signature of the EU and many of इसके member राज्य resulted in the resignation in विरोध of the यूरोपीय Parliament 's appointed मुख्य investigator, rapporteur Kader Arif, as well as फैली protests across Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, अंग्रेजों MEP दाउद Martin, recommended विरूद्ध the treaty, stating : `` The intended लाभ of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European पार्लियामेंट rejected the agreement in plenary session, with 478 voting विरूद्ध the treaty, 39 in favour और 165 MEPs abstaining.

A semi-trailer ट्रक is an articulated vehicle that consists of a towing engine, known as a tractor in the United States and ट्रक in अनेक other places, attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry भाड़ा.
It is also ज्ञात as a transport in कनाडा, prime mover in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, truck and trailer, transfer ट्रक, 18-wheeler, mack truck, बिग रिग in the संयुक्त States, or artic, short for articulated lorry, in Britain और Ireland.
A semi-trailer करता नहीं trail completely behind the towing vehicle, but is attached at a point कि is बस आगे of the rear-most धुरी of the towing unit.
This is किया so that a fraction of the weight of the trailer is carried by the prime mover.
This arrangement means कि both ट्रैक्टर and semi-trailer will have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and ट्रेलर.
the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers are a professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in पिट्सबर्ग, Pennsylvania.
the team currently belongs to the उत्तर प्रभाग of the American फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( AFC ) in the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
Founded in, the Steelers are the oldest मताधिकार in the afc.
Pittsburgh has won more Super कटोरी titles ( six ), won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( fifteen ) and hosted more ( eleven ) conference championship games than any अन्य AFC or NFC टोली.
The Steelers share the record लिये सबसे Super Bowl appearances with the डलास Cowboys ( आठ ).
The Steelers won उनके most हाल championship, Super Bowl XLIII, on फ़रवरी 1, 2009.
the Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on जुलाई 8, 1933, by Art Rooney, लेने its original name from the बेसबॉल team of the वही नाम, as was common अभ्यास for NFL teams to do at the time.
The ownership of the स्टीलर्स has remained within the Rooney family since its founding.
The current owner is Art 's बेटे, Dan Rooney, who रै given much कंट्रोल of the franchise to his son Art रूनी II.
long एक of the एनएफएल 's flagship teams, the Steelers आनंद a large, widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler स्वदेश.
The Steelers currently खेल their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's North Side in the North Shore neighborhood, which also होस्ट the University of Pittsburgh Panthers.
निर्मित in 2001, the स्टेडियम replaced तीन Rivers Stadium which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons.
prior to Three नदियाँ, the Steelers था played their games in Pitt स्टेडियम और फोर्ब्स Field.
तीन अलग kinds of wheat और rye flour
Flour is a चूर्ण which is made by grinding cereal grains, or other seeds or जड़ें ( जैसे Cassava ).
It is the प्रमुख संघटक of ब्रैड, which is a staple food for many cultures, making the उपलब्धता of adequate supplies of flour a major economic और political समस्या at विभिन्न times throughout इतिहास.
Wheat flour is one of the सबसे important foods in यूरोपीय, उत्तर American, मध्य पूर्वी, Indian और North अफ़्रीकी cultures, और is the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads और pastries.
जबकि गेहूं is the most आम base for आटा, मकई flour रै been important in Mesoamerican cuisine चूंकि ancient टाइम्स, and remains a staple throughout the Americas.
rye flour is an महत्वपूर्ण constituent of bread in much of central Europe, और rice can also be प्रयुक्त in flour, though this is relatively uncommon.
दिल rate is the number of heartbeats per unit of time, typically expressed as beats प्रति minute ( bpm ).
Heart रेट can vary as the देह 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes, ऐसे as दौरान शारीरिक exercise, sleep, बीमारी, or as a परिणाम of ingesting दवाएँ :
Central nervous प्रणाली stimulants such as amphetamines बढ़ाएँ heart rate.
Central बेचैन प्रणाली depressants or sedatives decreases the heart rate ( apart from some विशेषकर अजीब ones with equally अजीब effects, ऐसे as ketamine which can कारण - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects ऐसे as tachycardia ).
There are many ways in which the दिल rate speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones होने released in the brain, many of which हैं those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and processing of drugs.
Due to individuals having a constant रक्त volume, one of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार more oxygen to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often.
Normal resting heart rates range इससे 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is defined as a resting दिल rate नीचे 60 bpm.
However, दिल rates from 50 to 60 bpm are आम among स्वस्थ लोगों और do नहीं necessarily require खास attention.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm, though persistent rest दरों between 80-100 bpm, mainly if they हैं present दौरान sleep, may be signs of हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म or रक्ताल्पता ( देखिए below ).
Catherine ii 's carved, painted and gilded राजतिलक Coach ( Hermitage Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle लिये लोगों, usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded, चूंकि वे are wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is विशेषकर designed for निजी passenger use and लिये comfort or लालित्य, though कुछ are also used to transport goods.
It may be light, smart और fast or भारी, large and comfortable.
carriages सामान्यतः have suspension using leaf springs, elliptical springs ( in the 19th सदी ) or leather strapping.
a पब्लिक यात्री vehicle would नहीं प्रायः be called a carriage – शर्तें for such include stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) वैगन and ( two-wheeled ) cart share important parts of the history of the carriage, as is the तेज़ ( two-wheeled ) chariot.
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 utc on Sunday, 26 December 2004, साथ an epicentre बंद the west coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is known by the वैज्ञानिक community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake.
The resulting सुनामी was given various names, सहित the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami, दक्षिण Asian tsunami, Indonesian tsunami, and the Boxing Day tsunami.
The भूकंप थी caused by subduction and triggered a series of विनाशकारी tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean, हत्या over 230,000 people in चौदह देशों, and inundating coastal समुदायों with waves up to ऊँची.
It was एक of the deadliest प्राकृतिक disasters in अंकित history.
Indonesia was the hardest-hit देश, followed by Sri Lanka, India, और थाईलैंड.
साथ a परिमाण of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the तीसरा largest earthquake ever अंकित on a seismograph.
the earthquake था the longest अवधि of faulting ever observed, between 8.3 and 10 मिनट्स.
it caused the संपूर्ण planet to vibrate as much as और triggered अन्य earthquakes as दूर दूर as अलास्का.
Its epicentre was between Simeulue and mainland Indonesia.
The plight of the affected लोगों and countries prompted a worldwide humanitarian response.
In all, the worldwide जातियाँ donated more than $ 14 अरब ( 2004 us $ ) in humanitarian सहायता.
भाप उठती from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power स्टेशन in Iceland.
geothermal energy is thermal energy generated and stored in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the उर्जा that determines the तापमान of matter.
The Geothermal उर्जा of the धरती 's crust originates from the original गठन of the planet ( 20 % ) and from रेडियोसक्रिय decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
the geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the ग्रह and its surface, ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of thermal energy in the form of ऊष्मा इससे the कोर to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), अर्थ earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the धरती, थर्मल उर्जा is created by रेडियोसक्रिय decay और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °f ).
Heat conducts इससे the core to surrounding cooler rock.
The high तापमान और pressure कारण some rock to melt, creating मैग्मा संवहन upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the solid rock.
The मैग्मा heats चट्टान and water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal उर्जा has been प्रयुक्त लिये bathing since Paleolithic times and लिये space heating since प्राचीन Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
an additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating क्षमता is installed लिये district हीटिंग, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination और agricultural applications.
Geothermal शक्ति is cost effective, विश्वसनीय, sustainable, and environmentally दोस्ताना, but रै historically been limited to क्षेत्रों near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable संसाधन, विशेषकर for अनुप्रयोग such as home heating, opening a संभावित for फैली exploitation.
geothermal wells release ग्रीनहाउस गैसों फंस गहन within the earth, but these emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति energy unit than those of चट्टान fuels.
as a परिणाम, geothermal power has the potential to सहायता mitigate global warming if widely deployed in प्लेस of fossil fuels.
the Earth 's geothermal संसाधन are theoretically more than adequate to supply मानवता 's energy needs, but तभी a बहुत small fraction may be profitably exploited.
खुदाई and exploration for deep संसाधन is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
पायलट programs जैसे EWEB 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in Green Power Program दिखाएँ that customers would be willing to pay a छोटी अधिक for a renewable energy सोर्स like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and उद्योग experience, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट दो decades.
in 2001, geothermal energy cost between two and ten cents per सम्पात.
The term cubic foot is an Imperial and us customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume, प्रयुक्त in the United राज्य and the United Kingdom.
It is defined as the volume of a cube with sides of one foot ( 0.3048 m ) in length.
To calculate cubic feet multiply लंबाई X width X height.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese उच्चारण :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn ái Quốc, was a Vietnamese communist क्रांतिकारी leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of Vietnam ( उत्तर Vietnam ).
he was a कुंजी फिगर in the foundation of the लोकतांत्रिक Republic of Vietnam in 1945, as खूब as the people’s Army of Vietnam ( PAVN ) and the Việt cộng ( nlf or vc ) during the Vietnam War.
He led the Việt मिन्ह independence movement इससे 1941 onward, establishing the communist -ruled Democratic Republic of वियतनाम in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the बैटल of Điện biên Phủ.
He officially stepped down इससे power in 1955 due to health problems, लकिन remained a अत्यधिक visible figurehead and प्रेरणा for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united, communist vietnam—until his मौत.
After the युद्ध, Saigon, capital of the गणतंत्र of Vietnam, थी renamed hồ Chí Minh नगर.

निर्देशित by Dennis fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, Jason London, Vivien cardone, वैनेसा शाखा, पीटर कायोटी, स्टीफन मिल्टन, and Allan Kayser.
