It was the last फिल्म he appeared in.
Sales taxes in the संयुक्त States are taxes placed on the बिक्री or lease of goods and services in the United States.
While no national general sales कर exists, the संघीय government levies अनेक national चयनात्मक बिक्री कर on the sale or lease of particular goods and services.
furthermore, forty-five राज्य, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और Guam impose general sales taxes कि apply to the sale or lease of सबसे goods and कुछ services, and राज्य also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or पट्टे of particular goods or services.
States may also delegate to लोकल सरकारें the authority to impose additional सामान्य or selective बिक्री कर.
Sales tax is calculated by multiplying the purchase दाम by the applicable कर rate.
Tax दरों vary widely by jurisdiction and range from less than 1 % to over 10 %.
Sales tax is collected by the seller at the समय of बिक्री.
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who रै not paid sales tax on a taxable purchase.
Unlike the value added tax, a बिक्री tax is imposed तभी once, at the retail level.
However, in cases where items are बेची at retail अधिक than once, such as प्रयुक्त cars, the sales tax can be charged on the same मद indefinitely.
The definition of खुदरा sales and what goods and services are taxable vary among the states.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous categories of goods and सेवाएं कि are exempt from बिक्री कर, or taxed at reduced rates.
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt from sales कर.
सबसे jurisdictions exempt food sold in किराना stores, prescription medications, and अनेक agricultural supplies.
Sales कर, including those imposed by लोकल governments, are generally administered at the state level.
States imposing sales tax आवश्यकता retail sellers to collect tax from customers, file रिटर्न, and remit the कर to the state.
Procedural rules vary widely.
Sellers generally must collect tax from in-state purchasers unless the purchaser provides an exemption certificate.
Most states allow or require electronic remittance.
A central processing unit ( CPU ), also referred to as a central processor unit, is the हार्डवेयर within a कंप्यूटर that carries आउट the निर्देश of a कंप्यूटर program by performing the मौलिक arithmetical, logical, और input/output परिचालन of the system.
the term has been in उपयोग in the computer industry at least चूंकि the जल्दी 1960s.
The form, डिज़ाइन, and implementation of CPUs have बदला over the कोर्स of their history, but their आधारभूत operation remains much the same.
a कंप्यूटर can have more than one CPU ; this is called multiprocessing.
Some एकीकृत circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple CPUs on a single chip ; those ICs are पुकारा multi-core processors.
Two ठेठ components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ), जिससे performs arithmetic and लॉजिकल परिचालन, and the control unit ( CU ), which extracts instructions from मेमोरी and decodes और executes them, calling on the alu when necessary.
नहीं all computational systems rely on a central प्रसंस्करण unit.
An array processor or वेक्टर processor has multiple parallel computing elements, with no one unit considered the `` center ''.
In the distributed computing मॉडल, समस्याएं are हल by a distributed interconnected नियत of processors.
RFID chip next to a grain of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded identification number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer products, और implanted in पालतु, लिये identification purposes.
Radio-frequency पहचान ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data, for the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying and tracking tags संलग्न to objects.
The tags contain electronically stored information.
Some tags हैं powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via चुम्बकीय fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others use a लोकल शक्ति source such as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field, and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic विकिरण at ऊँची frequencies ).
Battery powered टैग may operate at hundreds of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the tag करता नहीं necessarily need to be within लकीर of sight of the रीडर, and may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked object.
RFID tags are प्रयुक्त in many industries.
an RFID टैग संलग्न to an ऑटोमोबाइल during उत्पादन can be used to track its progress through the assembly line.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
पशुधन and pets may have टैग injected, allowing धनात्मक identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or भी implanted भीतर लोगों, the possibility of पढना personally-linked information without consent has उठाया गोपनीयता concerns.
Overtime is the amount of time किसी works beyond normal working hours.
Normal hours may be संकल्पित in several रास्ताs:
by कस्टम ( कया is considered स्वस्थ or reasonable by society ),
by practices of a given व्यापार or profession,
by legislation,
by अनुबंध between employers and workers or उनके प्रतिनिधि.
Most nations have ओवरटाइम labor कानून designed to dissuade or prevent employers इससे forcing their employees to work excessively long घंटों.
These laws may take into खाता other considerations than the humanitarian, such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One common approach to regulating ओवरटाइम is to आवश्यकता employers to pay workers at a higher hourly rate लिये overtime work.
कंपनियाँ may choose to pay workers higher overtime अदा भी if नहीं obliged to do so by law, विशेषकर if they believe कि वे फेस a backward झुकने supply वक्र of labour.
Overtime pay rates can कारण workers to work longer घंटों than they would at a flat hourly रेट.
Overtime laws, attitudes toward overtime and hours of work vary greatly from country to country और between different आर्थिक sectors.
Visualization of links between pages on a विक using a force-directed लेआउट.
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a class of algorithms for drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so कि all the edges are of more or less equal लंबाई और there are as few crossing edges as possible, by assigning forces among the set of किनारे and the नियत of nodes, based on their relative positions, and then using ये forces either to simulate the गति of the edges और nodes or to minimize their energy.
While आलेख drawing can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, होने physical simulations, प्रायः आवश्यकता no खास knowledge about graph सिद्धान्त such as planarity.
Purchasing शक्ति ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted लिये महंगाई ) is the amount of goods or सेवाएं that can be खरीदा with a ईकाई of currency.
For example, if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s, you would have been able to buy a greater number of items than तुम would आज, indicating कि you होता have had a greater खरीदना power in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a commodity money, जैसे सुनहरा or silver, or fiat currency, or free-floating market-valued currency like US डॉलर.
As आदम स्मिथ noted, having money देता one the ability to `` कमांड '' अन्य ' labor, so purchasing शक्ति to some extent is power over other लोगों, to the extent that they are willing to व्यापार their labor or goods for धन or currency.
If one 's monetary आय stays the same, but the price level increases, the खरीदना power of that income falls.
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of एक 's money income since it may वृद्धि faster than the दाम स्तर.
A higher रियल income means a higher खरीदना शक्ति since real आय refers to the income adjusted for inflation.
For a price index, its value in the base साल is प्रायः normalized to a value of 100.
The purchasing शक्ति of a ईकाई of currency, say a डालर, in a given year, expressed in dollars of the base year, is 100/p, where P is the price index in that year.
So, by definition the purchasing power of a dollar decreases as the price level rises.
The खरीदना power in today 's money of an राशि C of money, t years into the future, can be computed with the formula for the उपस्थित value :
जहाँ in this case i is an assumed future सालाना महंगाई रेट.
Education in South कोरियाई is viewed as being निर्णायक for success और competition is consequently very heated and fierce.
A central administration oversees the process for the education of children from kindergarten to the third and final year of high school.
Mathematics, science, Korean, English, और social studies are generally considered to be the most महत्वपूर्ण subjects.
सामान्यतः physical education is नहीं considered important as it is नहीं recognised, by the generally अकादमिक elitist South कोरियाई populace, as education and इसलिए many स्कूलों lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
South कोरियाई थी the first country in the संसार to provide high-speed internet अभिगम to all प्राथमिक, junior, और ऊँची schools.
हालांकि South Korean विद्यार्थी often रैंक highly on international comparative assessments when compared to students of most Western education systems, the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning और memorisation.
The South कोरियाई education प्रणाली is rather notably strict और overly संरचित as compared to its counterparts in सबसे Western societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( hagwon [ 학원 ] ), which too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in students are criticised as a प्रमुख सोशल प्रॉब्लम.
The My Lai नरसंहार (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass हत्या of between 347 and 504 unarmed civilians in South Vietnam on March 16, 1968, by संयुक्त States Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion, 20th Infantry Regiment, 11th ब्रिगेड of the Americal Division.
Victims शामिल women, men, children, and infants.
Some of the महिलाओं यहूद gang-raped और their bodies were बाद found to be mutilated और many महिलाओं were allegedly raped prior to the killings.
While 26 U.S. soldiers यहूद initially चार्ज with criminal offenses लिये their actions at Mỹ Lai, तभी दूसरी Lieutenant William Calley, a platoon leader in Charlie Company, was convicted.
मिला अपराधी of हत्या 22 ग्रामीणों, he was originally given a life sentence, but only परोसा three और a half years अंतर्गत house गिरफ़्तार.
the massacre took प्लेस in the hamlets of my Lai और my khe of Son my village.
The event is भी known as the Son My Massacre, विशेषकर in the Vietnamese राज्य media.
The U.S. military codeword for the `` Viet Cong stronghold '' was `` pinkville ''.
The incident prompted वैश्विक आक्रोश when it became पब्लिक knowledge in 1969.
The massacre भी increased domestic opposition to the U.S. भागीदारी in the Vietnam War.
Three u.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre और protect the wounded were initially denounced by several U.S. Congressmen as traitors.
They received नफ़रत mail and मौत threats and found mutilated animals on उनके doorsteps.
the तीन were later widely praised और decorated by the Army for their heroic क्रियाएँ.
The hijackers in the सितंबर 11 attacks यहूद 19 men affiliated with al-qaeda, and 15 of the 19 यहूद citizens of सऊदी Arabia.
Others यहूद इससे मिश्र, लेबनान, और the uae.
The hijackers were organized into four टीमों, each led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained to help subdue the pilots, passengers, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the संयुक्त States यहूद Khalid al-mihdhar and nawaf al-hazmi, जो settled in the San Diego क्षेत्रफल in जनवरी 2000.
वे were followed by three hijacker-pilots, Mohamed Atta, marwan al-Shehhi, और Ziad Jarrah जल्दी in the summer of 2000 to undertake उड़ान training in south फ्लोरिडा.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, Hani Hanjour, arrived in San डिएगो in December 2000.
The rest of the `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early गर्मियाँ of 2001, बस महीने before the September 11 हमले.
abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿabd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib इब्न Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), also transliterated as Muhammad ( ), थी a धार्मिक, political, and सैन्य leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single धार्मिक polity under Islam.
he is believed by मुसलमान और Bahá'ís to be a messenger और नबी of परमेश्वर.
Muhammad is almost universally considered by मुसलमान as the last prophet भेजा by परमेश्वर लिये mankind.
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the संस्थापक of islam.
मुसलमान consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered असली monotheistic आस्था of Adam, नूह, अब्राहम, Moses, Jesus, and अन्य prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he was orphaned at an early आयु and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu तालिब.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a merchant, as खूब as a गड़रिये, and was first married by आयु 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received उसके first revelation इससे God.
Three years after इस event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly, proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is One ``, that पूरा `` surrender '' to उसे ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to परमेश्वर, and कि he खुद was a prophet और messenger of God, in the same vein as अन्य Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers जल्दी on, और was मिले with दुश्मनी from कुछ meccan tribes ; he और his followers यहूद treated harshly.
to escape persecution, Muhammad भेजा some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the beginning of the Islamic calendar, which is also known as the hijri Calendar.
In मदीना, मुहम्मद संयुक्त the tribes under the Constitution of मदीना.
बाद eight years of लड़ with the Meccan जनजातियों, his followers, who by तब had grown to 10,000, took control of मक्का in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan मूर्तियों in the city and तब sent his followers आउट to destroy सब of the remaining pagan temples in पूर्वी अरब.
In 632, a few months बाद returning to Medina from the Farewell Pilgrimage, मुहम्मद fell ill and died.
By the time of उसके मौत, most of the arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam, and he had संयुक्त Arabia into a single मुस्लिम धार्मिक polity.
the खुलासे ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which मुहम्मद reported receiving until his मौत – रूप the verses of the Quran, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around जिससे the religion is based.
Besides the कुरान, Muhammad 's life ( सिरा ) and परंपराओं ( sunnah ) are भी upheld by मुसलमान as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and other नबियों of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names हैं उल्लेखित.
While conceptions of मुहम्मद in medieval Christendom and premodern times यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in modern history have been far कम so.
इस is a सूची of tables of the verified oldest people in the world in ordinal rank, ऐसे as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if उसके or her claim has been validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय body that specifically deals in आयु research, such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or गिनीज World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented इंसान lifespan is कि of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent वैन gogh जब she was 12 or 13.
This led to न्यूज media attention in 1985, after calment turned 110.
subsequent investigation found दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये Calment 's age, परे any उचित question, in the records of her native city, Arles, France.
अधिक evidence of calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; उसके case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon किमुरा, who फिलहाल lives in Japan और is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 December 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest जीना person in the संसार whose आयु can be documented.
He has also been the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year बूढ़ा Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living woman रै महरूम -year-old misao Okawa, also इससे Japan, born on 5 कूच 1898.
This is a timeline of the African-American Civil Rights गति.
The Civil Rights गति थी a freedom संघर्ष by African Americans in the 1950s और 1960s to gain equality.
the लक्ष्य of the movement were freedom from discrimination, equal opportunity in नियुक्ति, education and आवास, the right to vote and equal access to public facilities.
भारी metal ( प्रायः referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock music कि developed in the late 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States.
With जड़ें in blues rock and psychedelic rock, the bands कि created भारी मेटल developed a thick, massive sound, characterized by अत्यधिक amplified distortion, extended गिटार solos, emphatic beats, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance styles are generally संबद्ध with masculinity and machismo.
The first heavy मेटल bands such as led Zeppelin, गहन Purple and Black Sabbath attracted large ऑडियंस, though वे were प्रायः derided by critics, a status आम throughout the इतिहास of the genre.
In the mid-1970s Judas पुजारी helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़ influence ; Motörhead introduced a पंक rock sensibility and an increasing जोर on speed.
Bands in the New वेव of British Heavy मेटल such as Iron Maiden followed in a समान रग.
पहले the end of the decade, heavy metal fans became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक force with समूह like mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground दृश्यों produced an सरणी of more चरम, aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the mainstream साथ bands such as Metallica, Megadeth, slayer, and Anthrax, while other styles of the सबसे extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and ब्लैक metal remain subcultural phenomena.
चूंकि the mid-1990s, popular styles such as nu metal, which प्रायः incorporates तत्व of grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore, which blends extreme मेटल with hardcore पंक, have further expanded the definition of the genre.
the far-right ( also known as the extreme सही ) refers to the highest उपाधि of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right politics involves support of दमदार or complete social पदानुक्रम in society, और supports supremacy of certain individuals or समूह deemed to be innately superior or अस्तबलों who हैं to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
the दूर सही 's advocacy of supremacism is आधारित on what its adherents perceive as innate characteristics of people that can not be changed.
This स्टैंड as a point of difference साथ the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours, ऐसे as laziness or decadence, as the primary स्त्रोत of सोशल inequalities.
the centre right—unlike the दूर right—claims that people can end उनके behavioural inferiority through बदलना their habits and चुनाव.
The असली दूर right, which emerged in France after the फ्रेंच Revolution, refused to accept the French गणतंत्र and समर्थित a counter-revolution to restore the फ्रेंच monarchy and aristocracy.
The दूर सही is commonly संबद्ध साथ व्यक्तियों or समूह who hold extreme nationalist, xenophobic, जातिवाद, religious fundamentalist or प्रतिक्रियावादी views.
The सबसे extreme-right movements have pursued oppression and genocide against groups of people on the आधार of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in some older ग्रन्थ थामस Hobbs of malmsbury, was an अंग्रेज़ी philosopher, best known आज लिये his work on political philosophy.
उसके 1651 book leviathan स्थापित the न्यास लिये सबसे of पश्चिमी political दर्शनशास्त्र from the perspective of social contract theory.
hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, लकिन he भी developed कुछ of the fundamentals of European उदार thought : the right of the व्यक्तिगत ; the natural equality of सब men ; the कृत्रिम character of the political order ( जिससे led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view कि सब legitimate political शक्ति must be `` representative '' and based on the consent of the people ; और a उदार interpretation of विधि जिससे leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He was एक of the founders of modern political दर्शनशास्त्र.
उसके समझना of humans as being पदार्थ and motion, obeying the same physical laws as other matter and गति, remains influential ; and his खाता of human प्रकृति as self-interested cooperation, and of political communities as being based upon a `` social अनुबंध `` remains one of the प्रमुख विषय of राजनैतिक philosophy.
In जोड to political दर्शनशास्त्र, Hobbes also contributed to a diverse सरणी of other fields, सहित history, geometry, the physics of gases, theology, ethics, and सामान्य philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the क्षमता to identify, assess, and control the भाव of oneself, of others, और of groups.
It can be divided into ability EI and trait ei.
क्षमता EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with परंपरागत प्रज्ञा, whereas trait EI is प्रायः measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships साथ personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether ei is a रियल intelligence और whether it has incremental validity over IQ and the बिग Five व्यक्तित्व traits.
आनुवंशिकता is the passing of traits to औलाद from its parents or ancestor.
इस is the प्रक्रम by which an offspring कोशिका or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the विशेषताएँ of its जनक cell or organism.
Through heredity, विसंगतियाँ exhibited by individuals can accumulate और cause कुछ species to evolve.
the study of आनुवंशिकता in biology is called आनुवंशिकी, which includes the फ़ील्ड of epigenetics.
For United राज्य व्यक्तिगत income tax, समायोजित gross income ( agi ) is कुल gross आय ऋण विशिष्ट reductions.
taxable आय is adjusted सकल income minus allowances for personal exemptions और itemized deductions.
For सबसे individual tax purposes, agi is अधिक relevant than gross income.
Gross आय is sales दाम of goods or property, minus cost of the प्रॉपर्टी बेची, प्लस other आय.
it includes wages, ब्याज, dividends, कारोबार आय, rental income, and सब अन्य प्रकार of आय.
Adjusted gross income is सकल income less deductions इससे a कारोबार or rental activity और 21 other specific वस्तुएं.
अनेक deductions ( e.g. medical expenses and miscellaneous itemized deductions ) are limited based on a प्रतिशत of AGI.
निश्चित phase outs, सहित those of lower tax rates और itemized deductions, are based on स्तर of agi.
Many states आधार state income tax on agi साथ certain deductions.
`` Lazy Eye '' is the तीसरा single इससे silversun pickups ' debut एल्बम Carnavas.
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman, The Tonight Show साथ Jay लीनो, बाद With Jools Holland, and Last Call साथ कार्सन Daly.
The song is a playable track on Rock Band 2 and Guitar Hero : World Tour.
an alternate version of the song, साथ a लंबाई of 7:27, was निभाई on xmu before the shorter संस्करण was played on FM और अन्य xm चैनल्स.
This version was featured on their डेमो CD ( which featured early versions of four tracks ).
a telephone prefix is the first set of अंक of a telephone number ; in the North अमरीकी Numbering योजना देशों ( country code 1 ), it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone क्रमांक.
in other देशों both the prefix and the number may have different lengths.
It shows which exchange the बाकी numbers refer to.
a पूरा टेलीफोन number is usually made up of country code ( required for international calls only ), area कोड ( required लिये calls between telephone क्षेत्रों ), prefix, and subscriber क्रमांक.
कुछ स्थान सीमित certain prefixes to fax numbers or कोशिका फोन only ; in अन्य places such dedicated prefixes are नहीं used.
As टेलीफोन technology advanced, the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in अनेक places ; 485 in लंदन, UK, was एकबार the GULliver एक्सचेंज, but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of many क्रमांक blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
metformin ( BP, सुनाया, ; originally sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 मधुमेह, in particular, in overweight and obese लोगों and those with सामान्य गुर्दा function.
इसके उपयोग in गर्भकालीन diabetes has महरूम limited by सुरक्षा concerns.
it is also प्रयुक्त in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, and has been investigated for other रोगों where insulin resistance may be an important फ़ैक्टर.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज production by the liver.
Metformin is the तभी antidiabetic drug that has been conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular complications of मधुमेह.
it helps reduce ldl cholesterol और triglyceride levels, और is not संबद्ध with वज़न लाभ.
, metformin is one of only two मौखिक antidiabetics in the संसार स्वास्थ्य Organization Model List of Essential Medicines ( the अन्य being glibenclamide ).
When विहित appropriately, metformin causes few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the most common is gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated with a low रिस्क of hypoglycemia.
लैक्टिक एसिडोसिस ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a गंभीर concern in overdose और when it is prescribed to people with contraindications, but otherwise, there is no significant risk.
First synthesized and मिला to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin थी forgotten for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin और अन्य antidiabetic दवाएँ.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the लेट 1940s after several reports that it could reduce रक्त sugar levels in people, and in 1957, French physician Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a उपचार for diabetes.
It was introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958, कनाडा in 1972, और the United राज्य in 1995.
metformin is अभी believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United राज्य अलोन, अधिक than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its जेनेरिक formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite फेस of Mount rushmore निकट keystone, South डकोटा, in the United States.
sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his बेटे, Lincoln Borglum, Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of four संयुक्त States presidents : George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt और अब्राहम lincoln.
The entire memorial covers and is above sea level.
The tallest mountain in the प्रदेश is Harney Peak ( ).
South डकोटा इतिहासकार Doane Robinson is credited साथ conceiving the विचार of carving the likenesses of famous people into the Black पहाड़ियाँ प्रदेश of South Dakota in order to promote पर्यटन in the region.
Robinson 's initial विचार थी to sculpt the needles ; however, Gutzon borglum rejected the Needles site क्युकी of the ग़रीब quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the Mount Rushmore स्थान, which also रै the advantage of facing southeast for maximum सूर्य exposure.
Robinson wanted it to विशेषता western नायक like Lewis and Clark, Red बादल और Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture should have a more national फ़ोकस, and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing federal funding, निर्माण on the memorial began in 1927, और the राष्ट्रपतियों ' चेहरों were completed between 1934 and 1939.
upon gutzon Borglum 's death in कूच 1941, his son Lincoln Borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept called for प्रत्येक president to be चित्रित इससे head to waist, कमी of funding मजबूर निर्माण to समाप्त in late October 1941.
The u.S. National Park Service took कंट्रोल of the memorial in 1933, while it was स्टिल under निर्माण, and रै managed the मेमोरियल to the उपस्थित day.
it attracts nearly three million लोगों annually.

A कमीज़, पोशाक shirt, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up shirt is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर, a full-length opening at the front इससे the कॉलर to the hem, and टाँक with cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly प्रयुक्त by men, चूंकि women usually पहनें blouses.
the front opening is fastened using buttons or studs, and the cuffs बंद with buttons or cuff links.
शर्ट are normally बना इससे woven cloth, और are often accompanied by a jacket और tie, for उदाहरण with a suit or formalwear, but शर्ट are also worn more casually.
In अंग्रेजों English, dress shirt means specifically the more formal evening garment worn साथ black- or white- tie, also discussed below.
कुछ of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and detachable छल्लों संलग्न with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of कमीज़ which रै a कॉलर fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in गलती to apply to सब शर्ट ( with or without buttoned down collars ), होने प्रयुक्त as a synonym लिये `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative पेशेवर Day ( also known as Secretaries दिन or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, और other administrative support professionals.
in उत्तर America, it is मनाये on the बुधवार of the पिछला full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In फ़्रांस it is celebrated on the तीसरा Thursday in अप्रैल ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is celebrated on the पहला शुक्रवार in may

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 जून 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) थी the अग्रणी चित्रकार of the classical French Baroque style, although he खर्च most of his working life in Rome.
His work is characterized by स्पष्टता, logic, and अनुक्रम, and favors line over color.
Until the 20th सदी he remained a प्रमुख प्रेरणा for such classically उन्मुख artists as Jacques-Louis David, Jean-Auguste-Dominique ingres और पॉल Cézanne.
He worked in Rome for a वृत्त of leading collectors there और elsewhere, except for a छोटी काल when Cardinal रिचलू ordered उसे वापस to France to serve as First Painter to the King.
Most of his works are history paintings of धार्मिक or mythological subjects कि very प्रायः have a विशाल landscape तत्व.
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1, 1954stambler, इरविन, और Grelun landon ( 2000 ). - Country Music : The Encyclopedia. - New York : St. Martin 's Press. - p.533. - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—carlin, Richard ( 2003 ). - देश Music : a Biographical Dictionary. - New York : Routledge - p.427. - ISBN 978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin, Colin ( 1995 ). - The Guinness Encyclopedia of Popular Music. - New York : Stockton दबायें - P.4462. - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton, Scott ( 2003 ). - The Tombstone पर्यटक : Musicians. - नई यॉर्क : Pocket Books. - p.395. - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks, Jack. - `` सिंगर Keith Whitley 's Memory Alive through गीतों, प्रेम in Home Town ''. - The Kentucky पोस्ट. - September 25, 1991.— '' Country म्यूज़िक Star Keith whitley Dead at 33 ''. - Lexington Herald-Leader. - may 10, 1989.——hurst, Jack. - `` whitley 's Last दिनों ''. - शिकागो Tribune. - may 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills देश सिंगर Keith Whitley ''. - United Press International. - ( c/o the San Francisco Chronicle ). - May 10, 1989. — May 9, 1989 ), known professionally as Keith Whitley, थी an American country म्यूज़िक singer.
whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music lasted from 1984 जबतक उसके death in 1989, लकिन he continues to influence an entire generation of गायकों and songwriters.

Statute of ग्रैंड duchy of Lithuania, लिखा in Polish
A statute is a formal written enactment of a legislative authority कि governs a राज्य, city, or county.
Typically, statutes command or prohibit something, or घोषित policy.
The word is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to distinguish विधि बना by legislative bodies from case law, decided by courts, और regulations जारी by सरकारी agencies.
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation or `` ब्लैक letter विधि. ''
As a सोर्स of law, statutes are considered primary authority ( as opposed to secondary प्राधिकार ).
Ideally all statutes must be in सामंजस्य साथ the आधारभूत विधि of the land ( constitutional ).
इस word is used in contradistinction to the common विधि.
Statutes acquire their फ़ोर्स from the समय of their passage, however unless वरना provided.
statutes are of several kinds ; namely, Public or private.
Declaratory or remedial.
अस्थाई or perpetual.
A temporary statute is one which is limited in its अवधि at the time of its enactment.
it continues in force until the time of its limitation has expired, जबतक sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one लिये the फिराकर of which there is no limited समय, although it may not be expressly घोषित to be so.
If, however, a statute which किया not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is temporary only, the former will also be temporary and निर्भर upon the अस्तित्व of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in some countries, it must be सहमत upon by the highest executive in the government, and आखिरकार published as part of a code.
in many countries, statutes are व्यवस्थित in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) within publications पुकारा codes, such as the United States Code.
In many राष्ट्र statutory law is distinguished from and subordinate to संवैधानिक law.
The external iliac धमनियों are दो major धमनियों which bifurcate off the आम iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
वे proceed anterior and अवर along the medial border of the psoas major muscles.
वे exit the श्रोणि girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament परिचय एक third laterally from the insertion पाइंट of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at जिससे पाइंट वे are referred to as the femoral धमनियों.
The बाह्य iliac artery is usually the धमनी used to attach the renal artery to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a kidney transplant.
भाप is a digital distribution, digital rights प्रबन्धन, multiplayer और संचार platform developed by वाल्व निगम.
it is प्रयुक्त to distribute games and related media ऑनलाइन, from small independent डेवलपर to larger software घरों ; in अक्तूबर 2012, वाल्व विस्तारित the service to include non-gaming तन्त्र.
भाप provides the उपयोक्ता साथ installation and automatic management of software आरपार multiple कंप्यूटर, community features ऐसे as friends सूचियाँ and groups, cloud छायांकन, and in-game voice and chat functionality.
the तन्त्र provides a freely available अनुप्रयोग प्रोग्रामिंग interface, Steamworks, that developers can take लाभ of to integrate अनेक of भाप 's functions within उनके तन्त्र products, including copy protection, networking and matchmaking, in-game achievements and micro-transactions, and support for user-created सामग्री through Steam Workshop.
Though initially विकसित for use on microsoft खिड़कियाँ, the क्लाएंट has expanded to include OS X and Linux संस्करण, and clients with limited functionality on the प्लेस्टेशन 3 कंसोल and for दोनो iOS and एंड्रॉइड mobile devices.
in addition to being a central hub for gaming software, Valve has created a version of भाप with altered कार्यक्षमता to be used in schools for शैक्षणिक software, सहित a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science और critical सोच lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games available through Steam, और 54 million active user खाते.
as of January 2013, Steam has seen over 6.6 million संयुक्त players.
भाप रै an estimated 50–70 % share of the digital distribution मार्केट for वीडियो games.
the Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और लाठी from the Walschaerts वाल्व gear of a steam locomotive.
जेरी लुईस ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an अमरीकी comedian, actor, singer, film producer, screenwriter and film director.
he is ज्ञात लिये उसके slapstick humor in film, television, stage and रेडियो.
He was originally paired up साथ Dean Martin in 1946, forming the famed comedy team of Martin and Lewis.
In addition to the duo 's लोकप्रिय nightclub work, they starred in a successful श्रेणी of comedy films लिये Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is भी known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national chairman लिये the Muscular Dystrophy संघ ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards लिये आजीवन achievements इससे The American Comedy पुरस्कार, Los Angeles Film Critics संघ, and Venice Film पर्व, और he has दो stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
in 2005, he received the Governors Award of the अकादमी of टेलीविज़न Arts & Sciences Board of Governors, जिससे is the highest Emmy पुरस्कार presented.
On February 22, 2009, the Academy of Motion Picture कला and Sciences awarded लुईस the Jean hersholt Humanitarian पुरस्कार.
The राइन ( ; ; ) is a European river that रनों from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern स्विस Alps through Germany और eventually flows into the North Sea coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the twelfth longest नदी in Europe, at परिचय, साथ an average discharge of more than.
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern अंतर्देशीय frontier of the Roman Empire and, since those days, the राइन has been a vital and navigable जलमार्ग carrying व्यापार and goods deep अंतर्देशीय.
it has also served as a defensive feature and has been the basis for regional और international borders.
The अनेक castles and prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine गवाही to its importance as a जलमार्ग.
नदी traffic could be रोका at these स्थितियाँ, usually for the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state that controlled that portion of the नदी.
Sri ( Sinhala )
श्री ( Devanagari : श्री, IAST ; Śrī ), भी transliterated as Sree or Shri or श्री is a word of Sanskrit उत्पत्ति, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite रूप of address समतुल्य to the English `` Mr. '' in लिखा and spoken भाषा, or as a शीर्षक of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ).

सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी is a professional अभियान्त्रिकी अनुशासन कि deals with the डिज़ाइन, construction, और maintenance of the physical और naturally built environment, including works like roads, पुलों, नहरों, dams, और buildings.
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after सैन्य engineering, and it थी पारिभाषित to distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering.
it is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, भूगणित, control engineering, structural अभियान्त्रिकी, biomechanics, nanotechnology, transportation अभियान्त्रिकी, धरती विज्ञान, atmospheric sciences, forensic अभियान्त्रिकी, municipal or शहरी engineering, water resources engineering, सामग्री engineering, coastal engineering, सर्वेक्षण, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the public sector from नगरपालिका through to national governments, and in the निजी sector from individual homeowners through to अंतरराष्ट्रीय companies.

Katherine Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – May 21, 2006 ) थी an अमरीकी dancer, कोरियोग्राफर, लेखक, educator, and सोशल activist.
dunham had one of the most successful dance करियर in American and European theater of the 20th century, and directed उसके अपना dance company लिये अनेक years.
वो has been called the `` matriarch और queen mother of black dance ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, Dunham थी renowned throughout Europe और Latin America और was widely popular in the संयुक्त States, where the Washington Post पुकारा उसके `` dancer कैथरीन the Great ''.
For almost thirty सालो she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company, the only self-supported American black dance troupe at that समय, और over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances.
dunham was an innovator in African-American modern dance as खूब as a leader in the field of नृत्य anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses, commonly called peat मॉस due to its prevalence in wet habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
Sphagnum accumulations can store water, चूंकि both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside उनके cells ; पौधे may hold from 16-26 times as much water as their dry weight depending on the species.
The empty cells help retain water in drier conditions.
hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can slowly spread into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, both raised bogs and कंबल bogs.
These peat accumulations तब provide habitat for a wide सरणी of peatland plants, including sedges and ericaceous shrubs, as खूब as orchids और मांसाहारी plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not क्षय readily क्युकी of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls.
In जोड, bogs, जैसे all wetlands, develop anaerobic soil conditions, which produces slower anaerobic decay बल्कि than एरोबिक microbial action.
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings by taking up cations, such as calcium और मैग्नीशियम, और releasing hydrogen ions.
Under the right conditions, peat can accumulate to a depth of अनेक meters.
Different species of sphagnum have different tolerance limits for बाढ़ और pH, so कोई one peatland may have a number of different Sphagnum प्रजाति.
Individual peat moss पौधे consist of a main स्टेम, with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two or three spreading branches और दो to four hanging शाखाओं.
The top of the plant, or capitulum, रै compact clusters of young branches.
Along the स्टेम are बिखरे leaves of various shapes, नामित stem leaves ; the आकार varies according to प्रजाति.
the leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small, ग्रीन, जीना कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose cells ), and विशाल, clear, structural, dead cells ( hyaline cells ).
the latter have the विशाल water-holding capacity.
The earliest version of the संजाल Card, issued manually rather than through an aptis यंत्र.
The first aptis संस्करण of the संजाल Card.
This was used इससे the start of the aptis era in 1986/1987 until well into the 1990s, as स्टॉक्स had to be used up despite the introduction of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991.
The परिचय of the weekday minimum fare condition in 2002 resulted in a minor बदलें : the red `` R '' shows कि this is the `` Revised '' संस्करण of the railcard.
इस version is still in use as of 2007.
The संजाल Railcard is a discount कार्ड introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल, upon the creation of their संजाल SouthEast area around London, England.
The कार्ड is intended to encourage leisure सफर by rail by offering छूट for adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares.
The दायरा of discounts available, and the price of the कार्ड, have varied since that time, लकिन the card has always been valid लिये a year 's असीमित use.
It can be purchased by any व्यक्ति aged 16 or over from कोई staffed नेशनल Rail station or रेल Appointed Travel Agent, by completing an application form - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक पहचान or other documentation is needed to buy or use the card.
It is one of a number of concessionary fare schemes available on the British railway प्रणाली.
The United Nations ( un ; French : Organisation देस Nations Unies, ONU ) is the संसार 's largest, foremost, और most prominent international organization.
The stated aims of the संयुक्त Nations शामिल promoting and facilitating cooperation in international law, international security, आर्थिक विकास, social progress, इंसान अधिकारों, सिविल अधिकारों, civil liberties, राजनैतिक freedoms, democracy, and the achievement of स्थायी संसार peace.
The UN was founded in 1945 बाद World War II to replace the League of Nations, to stop wars between देशों, और to provide a मंच for संवाद.
It contains multiple subsidiary organizations to carry out its मिशन.
at its founding, the UN had 51 member राज्य ; as of 2011, there are 193.
From its offices around the world, the UN and its specialized agencies decide on सत्य and administrative मुद्दे in नियमित meetings आयोजित throughout the year.
The संगठन has six principal organs : the General सभा ( the main deliberative सभा ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding निश्चित resolutions लिये peace और security ) ; the Economic और सोशल Council ( लिये assisting in promoting international आर्थिक and social cooperation और विकास ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies, सूचना, और facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary judicial अंग ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ).
अन्य prominent UN प्रणाली एजेंसियों include the World Health Organization ( WHO ), the World खाना Programme ( wfp ) and United Nations Children 's निधि ( यूनिसेफ ).
The UN 's most prominent स्थिति is that of the office of Secretary-General which रै been held by Ban Ki-moon of दक्षिण Korea since 2007.
The United Nations मुख्यालय resides in international territory in New York City, with further main offices at Geneva, Nairobi, and Vienna.
the संगठन is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions इससे its सदस्य states, और has six आधिकारिक languages : अरबी, चाइनीज, English, French, रूसी, and Spanish.
South Beach, also nicknamed SoBe, is a neighborhood in the city of Miami Beach, Florida, United States, located due ईस्ट of Miami नगर proper between Biscayne खाड़ी and the अटलांटिक Ocean.
The area encompasses सब of the barrier islands of मियामी बीच south of Indian Creek.
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, धन्यवाद to the विकास प्रयत्न of Carl G. फिशर, the Lummus Brothers, और John S. Collins, the latter whose construction of the कॉलिन्स Bridge provided the first vital जमीन कड़ी between मेनलैंड मियामी and the beaches.
the area has gone through numerous artificial and natural changes over the years, including a booming regional economy, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
as of 2010, about 39,186 निवासियों live in दक्षिण Beach.
the United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential चुनाव, आयोजित on Tuesday, November 8, 1960.
The रिपब्लिकन Party nominated लाज़िम Vice-President Richard निक्सन, जबकि the Democratic पार्टी nominated जॉन F. Kennedy, Senator from मैसाचुसेट्स.
The incumbent अध्यक्ष, Republican ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower, was not eligible लिये re-election बाद सेवारत the maximum दो terms allowed by the twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy थी elected साथ a सीसे of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी College, the closest चूंकि 1916.
This थी the first election in which all fifty of the वर्तमान United States participated.
A number of factors explain why the election was so close.
Kennedy gained since there was an आर्थिक recession जिससे ठेस the incumbent Republican, and he था the advantage of 17 million more पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than republicans.
furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among catholics almost neutralized the नई votes Nixon gained among protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, Nixon 's emphasis on उसके experience carried little वज़न, and he wasted energy by campaigning in सब 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing राज्य.
Kennedy used उसके विशाल, well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination, सुरक्षित endorsements, और, with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to थाम the South और used टेलीविज़न effectively.
इस चुनाव is notable as being the पहला time in U.S. history that दो sitting U.S. Senators ( कैनेडी and जॉनसन ) were निर्वाचित as president और vice-president, a phenomenon that रै been दोहराया once, by Barack Obama and जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in both cases, the अध्यक्ष थी the younger, more junior सीनेटर ).
a poster लिये a c. 1884 अमरीकी production of Macbeth, starring Thomas W. keene.
चित्रित, counter clockwise from top-left, are : Macbeth और Banquo मिलें the witches ; just after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; मैकबेथ duels Macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a play written by विलियम Shakespeare.
It is माना एक of his darkest and most powerful tragedies.
Set in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political प्रभाव produced when its समर्थक, the स्कॉटिश रब Macbeth, chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power.
He commits regicide to become king और then furthers उसके moral descent साथ a शासनकाल of murderous आतंक to stay in power, eventually plunging the country into civil war.
In the end, he loses everything that gives अर्थ और purpose to उसके जीवन पहले खोने his life itself.
the play is believed to have been लिखा between 1603 and 1607, and is most commonly दिनाँक 1606.
the earliest account of a performance of what was probably शेक्सपियर 's play is अप्रैल 1611, when Simon Forman अंकित seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre.
it was first published in the folio of 1623, संभवतः from a संकेत book.
it was most likely लिखा during the reign of जेम्स I, who had महरूम James VI of स्कॉटलैंड पहले he succeeded to the English सिंहासन in 1603.
James was a संरक्षक of Shakespeare’s acting company, और of सब the plays Shakespeare लिखा during James’s reign, मैकबेथ most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship साथ the sovereign.
मैकबेथ is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, and tells the स्टोरी of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy इससे a तिकड़ी of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland.
खपत by ambition and spurred to कार्रवाई by his बीवी, Macbeth हत्याएं किंग डंकन और takes the सिंहासन for himself.
His reign is racked साथ guilt और paranoia, और he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to कमिट more और अधिक murders to protect himself इससे enmity और suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and Lady Macbeth into realms of arrogance, madness, और मौत.
Shakespeare 's source for the त्रासदी is the account of किंग Macbeth of Scotland, Macduff, and डंकन in Holinshed 's क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1587 ), a history of इंग्लैण्ड, Scotland और Ireland परिचित to Shakespeare and his contemporaries, हालांकि the कार्यक्रम in the खेल differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of theatre, some believe कि the play is cursed, and होगा not mention its title aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the कोर्स of many सदियां, the play रै attracted कुछ of the सबसे renowned actors to the भूमिकाएँ of Macbeth and महिला मैकबेथ.
It has been adapted to film, television, opera, novels, comic books, and other media.
The Milton Hershey School is a निजी philanthropic ( pre-k through 12 ) बोर्डिंग स्कूल in Hershey, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School, the institution was संस्थापित and funded by chocolate industrialist Milton Snavely Hershey and his wife, Catherine स्वीनी Hershey.
The school was originally स्थापित लिये impoverished, healthy, Caucasian, पुरूष orphans, जबकि today it serves विद्यार्थी of various backgrounds.
The Milton Hershey School विश्वास, जिससे निधि the school, owns controlling interest in The Hershey Company and owns the Hershey entertainment और रिसॉर्ट कम्पनी ( HERCO ) जिससे oversees many of the area होटल along with a theme पार्क called hersheypark.
With over छह अरब dollars in assets, the Milton Hershey School is एक of the wealthiest schools in the संसार.
the स्कूल is overseen by a Board of प्रबंधक.
the school currently serves 1,818 विद्यार्थी, and plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A सदस्य of कोर : गठबन्धन for Residential Education, it is the largest आवासीय education कार्यक्रम in the us.

EPUB, a फ़्री और open e-book standard
Electronic आलेख, articles in scholarly journals or magazines कि can be accessed via electronic transmission
The Controlled Substances अधिनियम ( CSA ) was enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the United राज्य as Title ii of the Comprehensive Drug गाली Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act भी served as the national implementing विधान for the Single Convention on Narcotic दवाएँ.
the legislation निर्मित पाँच Schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying qualifications लिये a पदार्थ to be शामिल in प्रत्येक.
दो संघीय agencies, the Drug प्रवर्तन Administration और the Food और Drug प्रशासन, determine जिससे substances हैं added to or removed इससे the various schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक listing, and कॉंग्रेस has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha reid date-rape Prevention अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे placed गामा hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on criteria सहित potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), फिलहाल accepted medical use in उपचार in the United States, और international treaties.
Second-language अधिग्रहण or second-language learning is the प्रक्रम by which people learn a second language.
second-language acquisition ( प्रायः abbreviated to SLA ) भी refers to the scientific अनुशासन devoted to studying that प्रक्रम.
दूसरी language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the अवधारणा is नामित second-language acquisition, it can also चरितार्थ the learning of तीसरा, चौथी, or subsequent भाषाएं.
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it करता not refer to practices in language teaching.
The academic discipline of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of लागू linguistics.
it is broad-based और relatively नई.
As well as the विभिन्न branches of भाषाविज्ञान, second-language अधिग्रहण is also closely सम्बन्धित to मनोविज्ञान, cognitive psychology, and education.
To separate the academic अनुशासन from the learning प्रक्रम itself, the शर्तें second-language acquisition research, second-language अध्ययन, and second-language acquisition studies are also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary फ़ील्ड, and because of इस it is मुश्किल to पहचानो a precise starting date.
however, it करता appear to have developed a great सौदे चूंकि the mid-1960s.
The term अधिग्रहण थी originally used to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning process, but in recent सालो learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage language learning, but it does नहीं प्रायः incorporate bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers देखिए bilingualism as being the end result of सीखना a language, not the process itself, and see the term as referring to native-like fluency.
Writers in fields ऐसे as education and मनोविज्ञान, however, often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of बहुभाषिकता.
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign language ; rather, the learning of second languages और the सीखना of विदेशी languages involve the same आधारभूत processes in different situations..
There has महरूम much debate about exactly how language is learned, और many issues are still unresolved.
There are many theories of second-language acquisition, but none हैं accepted as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers.
Due to the interdisciplinary प्रकृति of the field of second-language acquisition, this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future.
Forbes list of billionaires is an annual ranking of the world 's wealthiest people, compiled और published by फोर्ब्स, an American national कारोबार magazine.
the total net लायक of each individual on the list is estimated, in संयुक्त States dollars, based on their assets and accounting for debt.
The सूची only represents प्रत्येक person 's valuation on a single day, due to daily fluctuations among एक्सचेंज rates and stock valuations.
the United States रहस्य Service is a u.S. federal law enforcement agency that is part of the United States Department of Homeland Security.
The sworn सदस्यों are divided among the खास Agents and the Uniformed प्रभाग.
जबतक March 1, 2003, the Service थी भाग of the United States Department of the Treasury.
The U.S. रहस्य Service has two पृथक areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes, covering मिशन such as prevention and investigation of counterfeiting of U.S. करेंसी and U.S. treasury securities, and छानबीन of प्रमुख धोखाधड़ी.
सुरक्षा, which entails ensuring the safety of वर्तमान and former national leaders और their families, ऐसे as the President, पास्ट राष्ट्रपतियों, वाइस presidents, presidential candidates, visiting heads of राज्य, and विदेशी embassies ( प्रति an agreement with the U.S. State विभाग 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ), etc. )
The Secret सेवा 's आरंभिक जिम्मेदारी थी to investigate counterfeiting of u.S. currency, which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War.
the एजेंसी then विकसित into the United States ' first domestic intelligence और counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's मिशन were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the संघीय Bureau of छानबीन ( FBI ), ब्यूरो of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives ( atf ), Immigration और Customs Enforcement ( ICE ), and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` me and Bobby mcgee '' is a song written by Kris Kristofferson and फ्रेड Foster, originally performed by रोजर Miller.
Others performed the सोंग later, including kristofferson खुद, और Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart साथ the song in 1971 after her death, making the song the second posthumous number-one सिंगल in u.S. chart history बाद `` ( sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis redding.
Franklin Delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; January 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the संयुक्त राज्य during a time of worldwide economic depression और कुल war.
a dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a नई Deal गठबन्धन कि realigned American politics बाद 1932, as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the मध्य third of the 20th सदी.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy दिनों Are Here again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated लाज़िम Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his निजी victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing optimism and सक्रियता contributed to a renewal of the national spirit.
He worked closely with British प्रधान Minister विंस्टन चर्चिल and सोवियत General सचिव Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against जर्मनी and Japan in World War ii, और restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first सौ दिनों in office, which began कूच 4, 1933, Roosevelt पथप्रदर्शन major विधान and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government कार्य for the बेरोजगार ), रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ), and reform ( through विनियमन of Wall गली, बैंको और transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
the bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his पैकिंग the Supreme अदालत or passing any considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the relief programs जब unemployment diminished दौरान World War ii.
Most of the regulations on business यहूद ended about 1975–85, except for the विनियमन of वॉल Street by the Securities and एक्सचेंज Commission, which still exists.
साथ साथ अनेक smaller programs, major surviving programs include the संघीय Deposit Insurance निगम, जिससे थी created in 1933, and Social Security, जिससे Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, साथ the Japanese invasion of चीन and the aggression of Nazi जर्मनी, fdr gave strong राजनयिक and financial support to China and Great Britain, while बाकी officially neutral.
His goal थी to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which would supply munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, रूज़वेल्ट, with Congressional approval, provided lend-lease सहायता to the देशों fighting विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी with ब्रिटेन.
With very दमदार national support, he made war on Japan and जर्मनी after the Japanese attack on पर्ल Harbor on December 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` date which होगा live in infamy ``.
He पर्यवेक्षित the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war प्रयत्न.
As an active सैन्य leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts कि ended in the defeat of the Axis शक्तियां and the development of the संसार 's first atom बमबारी.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of लोगों moved to new jobs in war centers, and 16 million मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं were drafted or volunteered लिये military service.
Roosevelt dominated the अमरीकी political scene नहीं only during the twelve years of his presidency, लकिन also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
fdr 's New सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त labor unions, बिग city मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, African Americans and rural श्वेत Southerners.
He also influenced the बाद सृष्टि of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents, along with अब्राहम Lincoln and George Washington.
a liberal डेमोक्रेट, Roosevelt defined उसके ideological position as `` a little बाएँ of center. ''
Mara salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, मारा, and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang कि originated in Los एंजिल्स और रै spread to अन्य parts of the United States, कनाडा, Mexico, और Central America.
The majority of the gang is ethnically composed of Central अमेरिकी and active in urban और suburban areas.
In the U.S., the ms-13 रै an विशेषकर भारी presence in Los एंजिल्स County and the सैन Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the वॉशिंगटन, D.C. महानगर areas of फेयरफैक्स County, Virginia, मोंटगोमरी County, मेरीलैंड, और प्रिंस George 's काउंटी, मेरीलैंड ; long Island, नई York ; the Boston, Massachusetts area ; Charlotte, North Carolina ; and Houston, Texas.
There is also a presence of MS-13 in टोरंटो, ओंटारियो, Canada.
Members of MS फर्क themselves by tattoos covering the body and also प्रायः the face, as खूब as the उपयोग of their own sign language.
They are बदनाम for their use of हिंसा and a subcultural moral code that predominantly consists of merciless revenge और cruel retributions.
This क्रूरता of the distinguished members of the `` Maras '' or `` mareros '' earned उन्हें a पाथ to be recruited by the sinaloa Cartel battling against लॉस Zetas in an जारी ड्रग war दक्षिण of the संयुक्त States border.
उनके wide-ranging क्रियाएँ have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement, जो have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the देश.
हड्डियों is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the फॉक्स network in the United राज्य on September 13, 2005.
The show is आधारित on forensic मानवशास्त्र और forensic पुरातत्व, with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought by FBI खास एजेंट Seeley बूथ ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( एमिली Deschanel ).
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin, T. J. Thyne, eric Millegan, tamara Taylor, Jonathan Adams, और जॉन Francis डाले.
Created by Hart Hanson, the series is very loosely आधारित on the life and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy reichs, जो also produces the show.
Its title अक्षर, Temperance ब्रेनन, is named after the protagonist of Reichs ' अपराधों novel series.
Conversely, Dr. Brennan writes successful रहस्य novels based around a fictional ( in the हड्डियों universe ) forensic anthropologist नामित Kathy reichs.
हड्डियों is a joint उत्पादन by जोसेफसन entertainment, दूर फ़ील्ड Productions and 20th Century Fox Television.
The series has समाप्त airing इसके eighth season और has been renewed for a ninth season.
Super Bowl XXV थी an अमरीकी football game between the अमरीकी Football Conference ( afc ) चैंपियन Buffalo Bills and the National Football सम्मेलन ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National Football लीग ( NFL ) champion लिये the 1990 ऋतु.
The Giants defeated the बिल्स by the score of 20–19, winning their second कभी Super Bowl.
It is the only सुपर Bowl decided by one point.
the game was held at tampa Stadium in tampa, फ्लोरिडा, on January 27, 1991, during the ऊँचाई of the Gulf War.
it was यूँ निभाई under much patriotic fervor.
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` the Star-Spangled Banner `` by व्हिटनी Houston during the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills और उनके explosive no-huddle offense were making उनके first Super Bowl रूप बाद finishing the regular ऋतु with a 13-3 record, और leading the लीग in कुल points scored with 428.
In advancing to their दूसरी Super Bowl, the Giants भी posted a 13-3 regular ऋतु record, लकिन with a ball-control offense and a defense that अनुमत a league low 211 अंक.
The game is best remembered लिये Bills placekicker स्कॉट Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which गई चौड़ी सही of the uprights, leading to a Giants विजय, and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super कटोरी for the Bills.
The Giants नियत a सुपर Bowl रिकार्ड पकड़कर possession of the ball for 40 minutes और 33 seconds.
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, और बना a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव कि consumed a Super Bowl रिकार्ड 9:29 बंद the क्लॉक.
Giants running back Ottis Anderson, who carried the ball 21 टाइम्स लिये 102 yards and one touchdown, was named सुपर Bowl MVP.
He थी the first awardee to receive the newly named `` पीट rozelle ट्रॉफी '' ( named for the former commissioner ).
एंडरसन also recorded one reception for seven yards.
Malcolm X ( ; may 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born मैल्कम छोटी and also known as El-Hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist.
to his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks, a man जो indicted श्वेत America in the harshest शर्तें for its crimes against black Americans.
detractors accused him of preaching racism, black supremacy, और violence.
He रै been called one of the greatest and most influential African Americans in history.
मैल्कम X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he was young, और at तनिक one of उसके uncles थी lynched.
जब he was 13, his mother थी लगाई in a mental hospital, and he was लगाई in a series of foster homes.
in 1946, at age 20, he went to prison for तोड़कर and entering.
in prison, Malcolm x became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its नेताओ.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the public फेस of the controversial समूह, but disillusionment with स्वदेश of Islam सिर Elijah Muhammad led him to छोड़ the स्वदेश in March 1964.
After a period of सफर in अफ़्रीकी and the Middle East, he returned to the United राज्य, where he founded Muslim Mosque, inc. और the Organization of afro-american एकता.
In फ़रवरी 1965, less than a year after leaving the Nation of Islam, he was assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over समय.
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and श्वेत Americans —in contrast to the civil rights गति 's emphasis on संयोजन.
After तोड़कर with the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of his association with it, `` i किया many बाते as a [ Black ] मुस्लिम that I 'm sorry for now.
i was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and बताई to march '' —and becoming a Sunni मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद and expressed willingness to कार्य with civil rights leaders, he जारी to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
