Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth एलेक्जेंड्रा Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign states, ज्ञात as the Commonwealth realms, और their territories and dependencies, और head of the 54-member Commonwealth of राष्ट्र.
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड और, in some of उसके realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of उसके full title.
on उसके accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth और queen regnant of सात independent Commonwealth countries : the संयुक्त किंगडम, Canada, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence और कुछ realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned देशों, Elizabeth is महारानी of Jamaica, Barbados, the बहामा, Grenada, पापुआ नई Guinea, the Solomon आइलैंड्स, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, Saint Vincent और the Grenadines, Belize, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and नेविस.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a अंग्रेजों monarch ; only महारानी Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
एलिज़ाबेथ was born in London and educated privately at घर.
Her father acceded to the throne as जार्ज VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, from which time she थी the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World War, in which she served in the Auxiliary territorial Service.
In 1947, वो शादीशुदा Prince फिलिप, ड्यूक of Edinburgh, with whom she has four children : चार्ल्स, Anne, Andrew, और एडवर्ड.
उसके coronation service took place in 1953 और was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits और meetings शामिल a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and इससे the Pope.
the Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the संयुक्त Kingdom and the patriation of the कनाडाई constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births और marriages of her children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of माइलस्टोन such as उसके Silver, सुनहरी, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major कार्यक्रम in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern आयरलैंड, the Falklands युद्ध, युद्धों साथ Iraq और the War in Afghanistan.
वहीँ have महरूम times of personal विषाद for उसके जिससे शामिल the death of her पिता at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, रब Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her पूर्व daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
the महारानी रै occasionally faced severe दबायें criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments, but support लिये the monarchy and उसके निजी popularity remain high.
the 2010 संयुक्त States Senate चुनाव in Florida took place on November 2, 2010 along with other elections to the संयुक्त States Senate in other states as well as all चुनावों to the United States हाउस of प्रतिनिधि and various state and लोकल elections.
रिपब्लिकन Marco rubio, former स्पीकर of the फ्लोरिडा House of Representatives, defeated independent Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick नम्र in a three-way रेस.
One term Senator mel Martinez was निर्वाचित in a very close race विरूद्ध Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote.
मार्टिनेज announced on दिसम्बर 2, 2008 that he होता not seek re-election to the Senate, और would resign prior to the end of his term.
in August 2009, राज्यपाल चार्ली crist announced that he would नियुक्त उसके पूर्व Chief of Staff, जार्ज LeMieux, a रिपब्लिकन, to the Senate सीट होने vacated by Martinez.
Governor Crist publicly announced he was running लिये the seat in mid-2009.
At the time he received many Republican समर्थन, such as the National रिपब्लिकन senatorial Committee, Martinez, और the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain.
His support of the अमरीकी रिकवरी and Reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives, and प्रत्याशी Marco Rubio surged.
in April 2010 Crist announced he would drop आउट of the Republican primary and चलाएं as an स्वतंत्र.
The नेशनल Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its endorsement of crist और demanded a refund of its अभियान funds कि it provided for the Crist campaign.
Congressman Kendrick नम्र was the first Democrat to declare उसके intention to run.
सिकंदर Snitker was the first member of the libertarian Party on the ballot for senator in Florida 's history.
Satellite view of Doha
दोहा (, ' or ', literally : `` the बिग tree '' ) is the पूंजी city of the राज्य of क़तर.
स्तिथ on the coast of the Persian Gulf,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008, और is भी one of the municipalities of क़तर.
दोहा is Qatar 's largest city, with over 60 % of the nation 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in Doha or its surrounding suburbs, और is भी the आर्थिक केन्द्र of the country.
दोहा also serves as the seat of government of क़तर, जिससे is ruled by Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa al Thani.
Doha is घर to the Education नगर, an area devoted to research और शिक्षा.
दोहा was the साईट of the पहला ministerial-level meeting of the Doha Development Round of World Trade संगठन negotiations.
the नगर of Doha held the 2006 एशियाई खेल, which was the largest Asian खेल ever held.
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and most of the खेल at the 2011 AFC एशियाई कप.
दोहा hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 और will host a large number of the venues for the 2022 फीफा World Cup.
The World Petroleum Council held the 20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha in दिसम्बर 2011.
Paranasal साइनस are a समूह of चार paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ), above the आँखें ( frontal sinuses ), between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ), and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid साइनस ).
The sinuses are named लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों in जिससे वे are located.
Lean manufacturing, lean enterprise, or lean production, often बस, `` Lean, '' is a production practice that considers the expenditure of resources लिये कोई goal other than the सृष्टि of मान लिये the end ग्राहक to be wasteful, and यूँ a निशाना for elimination.
working from the perspective of the customer who consumes a product or सेवा, `` value '' is defined as any action or process कि a customer would be willing to अदा for.
Essentially, lean is centered on preserving value with कम work.
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy निकला mostly from the Toyota Production प्रणाली ( tps ) ( hence the term Toyotism is भी प्रचलित ) and identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s.
tps is renowned for इसके focus on कटौती of the original Toyota सात wastes to improve overall customer मान, but वहीँ are varying perspectives on how इस is बेहतरीन achieved.
The steady growth of टोयोटा, from a small company to the संसार 's largest automaker, has focused ध्यान on कैसा it has हासिल this कामयाबी.
iCarly लोगो
icarly is an अमरीकी sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon, which premiered on September 8, 2007.
Nickelodeon प्रचारित many एपीसोड so far ऐसे as `` iDo '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` iPity the Nevel '', `` iDate Sam & फ्रेडी '', इत्यादि. as specials, despite their being नियमित episodes.
Every episode शीर्षक begins with a lower मामला i which represents the internet, as in `` icarly ''.
the show was मनोनीत for an एमी award लिये Outstanding children 's कार्यक्रम in 2009.
The series starring Miranda cosgrove as Carly Shay, a 13-year-old जो becomes an Internet star.
the series ended on नवम्बर 23, 2012 with the one-hour special episode `` igoodbye ''.
a total of 7 seasons and 109 episodes were broadcast.
The largest दर्शक of the series थी 11.2 million viewers, with the special episode `` isaved अपना Life '' premiered in January 2010.
When कार्ली ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy बेहतरीन dost Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) अधिनियम मजेदार at a स्कूल talent show audition, tech-savvy Freddie ( Nathan kress ) टेपों it and पोस्ट it online without telling them.
After देखकर the लड़कियों ' दमदार chemistry and banter, the online audience clamors for more and the iCarly webcast is born.
जबकि grappling साथ ठेठ issues of adolescence, कार्ली, sam, and Freddie find out कि they have भी become online celebrities as their show – which सुविधाएँ हुनर contests, व्यंजनों, problem-solving, and यादृच्छिक नाचना – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in Seattle, वॉशिंगटन with her 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in उनके अपार्टमेंट.
Their माँ has never been seen or उल्लेखित, but their father, Steven शे ( David chisum ), is a u.S. Air फ़ोर्स अधिकारी temporarily stationed on a submarine, and is often उल्लेखित but is only seen in person during the series finale एपीसोड, `` iGoodbye ''.
Westlife were an Irish boy band which formed in 1998 और disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by Simon Cowell और managed by लुई Walsh, the group 's फाइनल line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne, kian Egan, Mark feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian McFadden थी a सदस्य from 1998 जबतक his departure in 2004.
Westlife sold over 50 million records worldwide, a total that included studio एल्बम, singles, वीडियो releases, and compilation albums.
the group संचित 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in uk history ), tying with Cliff Richard और ranking बस behind The Beatles and Elvis प्रेस्ली.
They achieved a कुल of 26 top टेन singles over their 14-year करियर.
By 2010, westlife थी listed in the गिनीज संसार Records, as the UK 's top-selling एल्बम समूह of the 21st century.
They also won The Record of the Year ( the only music award based on public मत in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012, the आधिकारिक Charts Company सूचीबद्ध westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music इतिहास.
despite their यूरोपीय और एशियाई success, westlife never प्रबंधित to break into the U.S. market, achieving only एक hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It again ``.
in October 2011, westlife घोषित their intention to split in 2012, following उनके महानतम Hits दौरे and the release of their Greatest हिट्स album.
The boyband 's final concerts were held on 22 and 23 जून 2012 at croke Park Stadium in Dublin.
the पहला farewell कॉन्सर्ट, offering 85,000 टिकटें, sold आउट in a record-breaking 5 minutes और the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide.
Vitamin A is a समूह of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, which include रेटिनॉल, retinal, retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin A carotenoids among जिससे beta-carotene is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण.
Vitamin A has अनेक functions, it is important लिये विकास and विकास, लिये the मेंटेनेंस of the प्रतिरक्षा system and good vision.
Vitamin a is needed by the retina of the eye in the रूप of retinal, जिससे combines साथ प्रोटीन opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule, कि is necessary लिये both low-light ( scotopic vision ) और color vision.
विटामिन A also functions in a very अलग role as an irreversibly oxidized रूप of retinol known as retinoic acid, which is an important hormone-like growth factor लिये epithelial and other cells.
in भोजन of animal origin, the प्रमुख form of vitamin A is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, which is converted to रेटिनॉल ( chemically an alcohol ) in the छोटी intestine.
The retinol रूप functions as a storage form of the विटामिन, and can be परिवर्तित to और from its visually active aldehyde form, retinal.
the संबद्ध एसिड ( retinoic एसिड ), a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A, has तभी आंशिक vitamin A कार्यकलाप, and does not फलन in the retina for the विज़ुअल cycle.
retinoic acid is used for विकास और cellular differentiation.
All forms of विटामिन A have a beta-ionone ring to जिससे an isoprenoid chain is attached, called a retinyl समूह.
Both संरचनात्मक सुविधाएँ are essential for vitamin कार्यकलाप.
The orange pigment of गाजर – beta-carotene – can be represented as two connected retinyl groups, जिससे are प्रयुक्त in the देह to योगदान to विटामिन A स्तर.
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a सिंगल retinyl group, जिससे give them some vitamin activity.
None of the other carotenes have vitamin activity.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and has vitamin कार्यकलाप in humans.
विटामिन a can be found in two principal forms in foods :
Retinol, the रूप of vitamin A absorbed when eating animal food sources, is a पीला, fat-soluble substance.
Since the pure दारू form is अस्थिर, the vitamin is found in tissues in a रूप of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ), but no other carotenoids, function as provitamin A in herbivores और सर्वाहारी animals, जिससे possess the एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa और converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores हैं poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, और pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for ये species ).
सेलिना Marie गोमेज़ ( born जुलाई 22, 1992 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर and actress.
She made her डेब्यू as a child अभिनेत्री in Barney & Friends.
In 2007, Gomez came to prominence as a अभिनीत cast member in the television series wizards of Waverly Place.
She signed to Hollywood Records the following year, और became the संस्थापक and lead सिंगर of the pop band Selena गोमेज़ & the Scene.
उनके स्टुडियो एल्बम Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), A साल Without Rain ( 2010 ), and When the Sun goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग Association of America ( riaa ) and have spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``, `` Who Says ``, and `` Love तुम like a प्रेम सोंग ``.
After the रिलीज of television films and their accompanying soundtracks, Gomez made उसके theatrical film debut in Ramona and beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte कार्लो in 2011.
upon the निष्कर्ष of wizards of Waverly प्लेस and the hiatus of Selena गोमेज़ & the Scene in 2012, she केन्द्रित on उसके film career, serving as a आवाज़ actress in होटल Transylvania और starring in Spring Breakers the following year.
उसके debut सोलो एल्बम is tentatively scheduled to be released in summer 2013, और is preceded by its lead सिंगल `` आइये & Get It ``.
Outside of उसके work in the entertainment industry, Gomez is involved in philanthropic activities through दान work and various social and environmental causes.
tracie Monique स्पेंसर ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an American R & B and pop singer-songwriter, actress, and model.
Sacramento is the capital city of the u.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the seat of government of Sacramento काउंटी.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American नदी in the उत्तरी portion of California 's expansive सेंट्रल Valley.
साथ an estimated 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core सांस्कृतिक और economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which शामिल seven counties with an अनुमानित 2009 population of 2,527,123.
इसके metropolitan क्षेत्रफल is the fourth largest in California बाद the Greater लॉस Angeles Area, San फ्रांसिस्को Bay Area, and the San डिएगो metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's most ethnically और racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a नगर through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John sutter, Sr., उसके son जॉन Sutter, Jr., and जेम्स W. मार्शल.
sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's फोर्ट, which थी established by sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution point, a commercial and agricultural center, and a terminus for वैगन trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the पहला Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, more commonly known as Sacramento राज्य or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is एक of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown, sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of विधि is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In addition, the University of California, Davis is located in nearby डेविस, west of the capital.
The uc Davis Medical बीच, a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
मेमोरियल Day is a United राज्य संघीय अवकाश which occurs every year on the final Monday of may.
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and महिलाओं जो died while serving in the United States Armed Forces.
Formerly ज्ञात as Decoration Day, it originated after the American Civil War to commemorate the Union and Confederate सैनिको जो died in the सिविल War.
By the 20th सदी मेमोरियल Day had been extended to honor all Americans who have died in सब wars.
It typically marks the प्रारंभ of the summer vacation ऋतु, while Labor दिन marks its end.
Many people visit cemeteries और memorials, विशेषकर to honor those who have died in military service.
Many volunteers place an American flag on each grave in national cemeteries.
by the जल्दी 20th सदी, Memorial Day was an occasion लिये अधिक general expressions of memory, as लोगों visited the graves of their deceased रिश्तेदारों in church cemeteries, whether they था served in the सैन्य or not.
It also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to खरीदारी, family महफिलों, आतिशबाजी, trips to the बीच, and national मीडिया events.
सालाना सजावट Days for particular कब्रिस्तान are held on a Sunday in late वसन्त or early गर्मियाँ in some ग्रामीण areas of the American दक्षिण, notably in the mountains.
In मामले involving a परिवार graveyard where remote ancestors as well as those who were deceased अधिक recently are दफ्न, this may take on the character of an extended परिवार reunion to जिससे some people travel hundreds of मील.
People एकत्रित on the designated day and put flowers on क़ब्रों and renew सम्पर्क with kinfolk and अन्य.
There प्रायः is a religious सेवा and a `` dinner on the ground, '' the traditional term for a potluck भोजन in which people used to spread the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed that this practice began before the American Civil War and thus may reflect the रियल origin of the `` मेमोरियल day '' idea.
Memorial Day is नहीं to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died while serving, while Veterans Day मनाता the सेवा of all U.S. military veterans, living or dead.
Mt. Zion Church state history marker near Philadelphia, मिसिसिपी.
Freedom गर्मियाँ ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a campaign in the United States launched in June 1964 to attempt to register as many अफ़्रीकी American voters as possible in Mississippi, which had historically excluded most blacks from voting.
the project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools, Freedom Houses, और community centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout Mississippi to aid the लोकल black population.
The प्रोजेक्ट थी organized by the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ), a गठबन्धन of the Mississippi शाखाओं of the चार प्रमुख civil rights संगठन ( sncc, कोर, NAACP और SCLC ).
Most of the impetus, नेतृत्व, और financing for the गर्मियाँ Project came इससे the SNCC.
रॉबर्ट Parris Moses, SNCC field सचिव और co-director of COFO, directed the summer project.
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre कि originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South `` of the United States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals, work songs, फ़ील्ड hollers, shouts and chants, और rhymed simple narrative ballads.
the blues रूप, सर्वव्यापी in jazz, rhythm और blues, और rock and roll is characterized by specific chord progressions, of which the twelve-bar blues chord progression is the most common.
the ब्लू notes that, for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or gradually bent ( नाबालिग 3rd to प्रमुख 3rd ) in संबंध to the पिच of the major scale, are also an important भाग of the ध्वनि.
The ब्लूज़ genre is based on the blues form but possesses other विशेषताएँ such as specific lyrics, bass lines, और यंत्र.
ब्लूज़ can be subdivided into अनेक subgenres ranging from country to शहरी blues कि were more or less लोकप्रिय during different अवधि of the 20th century.
Best ज्ञात हैं the Delta, Piedmont, Jump, and Chicago ब्लूज़ styles.
World War II marked the परिवर्तन from acoustic to electric ब्लूज़ और the progressive opening of blues music to a wider audience, विशेषकर white listeners.
In the 1960s and 1970s, a hybrid form called blues-rock evolved.
The term `` the ब्लूज़ '' refers to the `` blue devils '', meaning melancholy and sadness ; an early उपयोग of the term in इस sense is found in George Colman 's one-act तमाशा Blue Devils ( 1798 ).
Though the use of the phrase in African-American music may be older, it has been attested to since 1912, when Hart Wand 's `` डलास Blues `` became the पहला copyrighted ब्लूज़ composition.
In गीत the phrase is often प्रयुक्त to describe a depressed mood.
a quarter dollar, commonly shortened to quarter, is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त States dollar or 25 cents.
the quarter has been produced since 1796.
The चुनाव of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ which is अधिक common in अन्य parts of the world, originated साथ the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight कील तराशा segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ).
at one time `` दो बिट्स ``, i.e. two wedges, प्रत्येक wedge an eighth, यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी रियल, was a आम nickname लिये a quarter.
Day of the मुर्दे ( ) is a Mexican holiday celebrated throughout मैक्सिको and around the संसार in अन्य cultures.
The holiday focuses on महफिलों of परिवार and friends to pray for and remember friends और परिवार members जो have died.
It is particularly celebrated in Mexico, जहाँ it is a national अवकाश, और सब banks are closed.
the celebration takes place on नवम्बर 1 and 2, in कनेक्शन with the Catholic holidays of All संतो ' Day और All souls ' Day.
परंपराओं connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the मृतक using sugar skulls, marigolds, और the favorite भोजन और beverages of the रजि and visiting graves साथ ये as gifts.
They भी leave possessions of the मृतक.
Scholars ट्रेस the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous observances डेटिंग वापस hundreds of years and to an एज़टेक festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.
The holiday has स्प्रेड throughout the संसार : In Brazil, Dia de Finados is a public holiday that अनेक Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries और churches.
In Spain, there are festivals and parades, और, at the समाप्त of the दिन, people एकत्रित at कब्रिस्तान and pray लिये their मुर्दे loved ones.
समान observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly प्रसंग जश्न appear in many Asian and African cultures.
ANITA mk VIII.
the ANITA Mark सात and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the संसार 's first all- electronic डेस्कटॉप calculators.
Designed और निर्मित by the घंटी पंच Co.
in ब्रिटेन, and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer प्रभाग, they used वैक्यूम tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके logic circuits और nixie tubes for their numerical displays.
They were the first of a series of desktop and hand-held electronic calculators that the कम्पनी was to develop and बेचें अंतर्गत the ANITA name into the mid-1970s.
George वॉशिंगटन ( –, 1799 ) थी the पहला President of the United States ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the Continental Army during the अमरीकी Revolutionary युद्ध, और one of the Founding Fathers of the United राज्य.
he presided over the convention कि drafted the Constitution, जिससे replaced the Articles of Confederation and established the स्थिति of अध्यक्ष.
वॉशिंगटन थी elected अध्यक्ष as the unanimous choice of the 69 electors in 1788, and he served two शर्तें in दफ्तर.
He oversaw the सृष्टि of a दमदार, well-financed national सरकारी that maintained neutrality in the wars raging in Europe, suppressed rebellion, and जीती स्वीकृति among Americans of all types.
His नेतृत्व स्टाइल established अनेक forms and rituals of government that have महरूम used since, such as using a cabinet प्रणाली and delivering an inaugural पता.
Further, the शांतिपूर्ण transition from his presidency to the presidency of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st century.
Washington was hailed as `` पिता of his country `` even during उसके lifetime.
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia ; his wealthy planter family owned tobacco बागानों and स्लेव.
After both उसके father और older brother died जब he was यंग, Washington became personally and professionally attached to the powerful William Fairfax, who promoted his करियर as a निरीक्षक and soldier.
Washington जल्दी became a senior अधिकारी in the औपनिवेशिक forces during the पहला चरण of the फ्रेंच and Indian War.
Chosen by the Second महाद्वीपीय Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the Continental Army in the American Revolution, वॉशिंगटन managed to force the British आउट of Boston in 1776, but थी defeated and almost captured बाद that year जब he lost New York City.
बाद crossing the Delaware River in the dead of winter, he पराजित the British in दो लड़ाइयों, retook New Jersey और restored momentum to the Patriot cause.
क्युकी of his strategy, क्रांतिकारी forces captured two major British armies at साराटोगा in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781.
Historians laud Washington for his selection and पर्यवेक्षण of his सेनापतियों, encouragement of morale and ability to थाम together the फौज, coordination with the state राज्यपालों and state militia units, संबंध साथ कॉंग्रेस and attention to supplies, logistics, and प्रशिक्षण.
In बैटल, however, वॉशिंगटन was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies.
After victory had been finalized in 1783, Washington resigned as Commander-in-chief rather than seize power, proving his opposition to तानाशाही and his commitment to American republicanism.
Dissatisfied साथ the weaknesses of the आलेख of Confederation, in 1787 Washington presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution.
निर्वाचित unanimously as the first President of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1789, he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the स्वदेश.
he supported Alexander हैमिल्टन 's programs to pay off all state and नेशनल debt, to implement an effective tax system and to create a national bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ).
Washington proclaimed the United राज्य न्यूट्रल in the युद्धों raging in Europe बाद 1793.
He avoided war with Great ब्रिटेन और guaranteed a decade of peace और profitable trade by securing the jay Treaty in 1795, despite intense opposition इससे the Jeffersonians.
हालांकि never officially joining the Federalist Party, he समर्थित its programs.
वॉशिंगटन 's विदाई पता थी an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning विरूद्ध partisanship, sectionalism, and involvement in foreign युद्धों.
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his home, Mount vernon, and उसके domestic जीवन जहाँ he managed a variety of उद्यमों.
He freed सब his slaves by his final होगा.
Washington had a vision of a great and शक्तिशाली nation that would be built on republican lines using federal power.
He sought to use the national government to बचाना स्वतंत्रता, improve अवसंरचना, खोलें the western lands, प्रचार commerce, found a स्थाई पूंजी, reduce regional तनाव and promote a spirit of American राष्ट्रवाद.
at his death, वॉशिंगटन was eulogized as `` first in war, first in peace, and पहला in the hearts of उसके देशवासियों '' by Henry ली.
The Federalists made him the symbol of their party but for many सालो, the Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument.
As the leader of the पहला successful क्रान्ति against a colonial साम्राज्य in world history, वॉशिंगटन became an international प्रतीक for liberation और राष्ट्रवाद, especially in फ़्रांस और Latin America.
फिस्कल साल 2012 U.S. संघीय Spending – नकदी or बजट आधार.
फिस्कल साल 2012 U.S. Federal रसीदें.
The Budget of the United States Government often begins as the President 's proposal to the U.S. Congress which recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year, beginning October 1.
However, Congress is the body required by law to pass a बजट annually और to submit the बजट passed by both houses to the अध्यक्ष लिये signature.
Congressional decisions are governed by rules and legislation regarding the federal बजट process.
बजट committees set spending हद लिये the House और Senate committees and for Appropriations subcommittees, जिससे then approve individual appropriations बिल्स to allocate funding to various federal programs.
If Congress fails to pass an annual budget ( as has महरूम the case चूंकि 2009 ), a श्रेणी of Appropriations बिल्स must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures.
After Congress approves an appropriations bill, it is भेजा to the President, who may sign it into law, or may veto it ( as he would a budget when passed by the कॉंग्रेस ).
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress, which can pass it into law with a two-thirds बहुमत in each कक्ष.
कॉंग्रेस may also combine all or कुछ appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
in जोड, the अध्यक्ष may request और the कॉंग्रेस may pass supplemental appropriations बिल्स or emergency supplemental appropriations बिल्स.
अनेक सरकारी एजेंसियों provide budget आंकड़ा और analysis.
These include the Government Accountability दफ्तर ( GAO ), congressional बजट दफ्तर, the Office of Management and Budget ( omb ) and the U.S. Treasury विभाग.
ये agencies have reported that the federal government is facing a series of important financing challenges.
In the short-run, कर revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax policy choices, जबकि expenditures have expanded for wars, unemployment insurance and अन्य safety जाल spending.
In the long-run, expenditures related to healthcare कार्यक्रम such as Medicare and Medicaid हैं projected to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures.
New Guinea ( भी, टोक Pisin : Niugini, डच : Nieuw गिनी, and ; historically : पापुआ ) is the world 's second largest island, after ग्रीनलैंड, covering a land area of 786,000 km2.
स्तिथ in the southwest Pacific समंदर, it झूठ geographically to the east of the Malay Archipelago, with which it is sometimes included as भाग of a वृहद Indo-Australian Archipelago.
Geologically it is a part of the same tectonic थाली as ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
जब world sea स्तर were कम, the two साझा shorelines ( which अभी lie 100 to 140 metres below sea स्तर ), combining with lands now inundated into the tectonic continent of sahul, also known as वृहद Australia.
the two landmasses became अलग when the क्षेत्रफल now known as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the end of the last glacial period.
anthropologically, नई Guinea is माना part of Melanesia.
Politically, the western half of the island comprises two Indonesian provinces : Papua and West पापुआ.
the eastern half फ़ॉर्म the मेनलैंड of the country of Papua New गिनी.
the island has a population of परिचय 7.5 million, with a very low population density of only 8 inh/km2.
New गिनी is differentiated from इसके drier, flatter, and कम fertile southern counterpart, Australia, by its much उच्चतर rainfall और its क्रियाशील volcanic geology, with its उच्चतम point, Puncak Jaya, reaching an उन्नयन of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the two land masses share a similar animal fauna, with marsupials, सहित wallabies and possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or echidna.
अन्य than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent genera, there हैं no pre-human indigenous placental mammals.
Pigs, several अतिरिक्त species of चूहे, और the पूर्वज of the New गिनी Singing श्वान were introduced साथ इंसान colonization.
the human उपस्थिति on the द्वीप dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out of अफ़्रीकी.
Research indicates कि the highlands were an early and independent center of agriculture, with evidence of irrigation going back at तनिक 10,000 सालो.
Because of the time depth of इसके inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape, an unusually high number of भाषाएं are spoken on the island, with some 1,000 languages ( a figure उच्चतर than that of सबसे महाद्वीपों ) having महरूम catalogued आउट of an estimated world-wide pre-columbian total of 6,000 human dialects.
Most हैं classified as Papuan languages, a generally accepted geographical term जिससे a minority of लेखक hold to be a जेनेटिक one.
a number of Austronesian languages हैं spoken on the coast and on offshore islands.
in the 16th सदी Spanish explorers discovered the island और पुकारा it Nueva Guinea.
In recent इतिहास western New गिनी was included in the Dutch East इंडीज colony.
The germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the द्वीप as जर्मनी नई Guinea in their pre–World War I प्रयत्न to स्थापित themselves as a colonial power, whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
following the Treaty of Versailles, the जर्मनी portion was awarded to Australia ( which was already शासी the British claim, named the Territory of Papua ) as a लीग of Nations mandate.
The eastern half of the द्वीप थी granted स्वतंत्रता from ऑस्ट्रेलिया as Papua New गिनी in 1975.
The western half gained independence इससे the Dutch in 1961, but became part of Indonesia जल्द afterwards in विवादास्पद हालातों.
`` The वैन Buren लड़कों '' is the 148th episode of the sitcom seinfeld, and name of a fictional नई यॉर्क street gang.
Their sign is crossing the हैंड्स, साथ one हाथ with all the fingers 'up ' and spread आउट.
the अन्य hand रै all but the अंगूठा और pointer उंगली up, लिये a total of eight ( 8 ).
The गिरोह is नामित लिये the 8th President of the संयुक्त States, मार्टिन Van Buren ( who थी the first president इससे New यॉर्क ).
This थी the 14th episode for the 8th ऋतु.
It aired on February 6, 1997.
bevo sign
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or near beer, brewed in the United States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th सदी.
Bevo enjoyed its greatest कामयाबी during the time of prohibition, जब beer, wine and distilled liquors, यहूद बना illegal for thirteen years.
The Anheuser-Busch कम्पनी started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages यहूद prohibited in 1916 by the United States armed forces.
उत्पादन rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919, and Bevo was by दूर the सबसे लोकप्रिय of the अनेक `` cereal beverages '' or `` निकट beers '' of the समय.
At the peak of इसके लोकप्रियता in the early 1920s, more than five million मामले of Bevo यहूद sold annually.
Renard with a mug of bevo, चित्रित in terra cotta on the interior walls of the Bevo building, st. Louis
Labels on the bottles billed it as `` Bevo the पेय ''.
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` पेय '' and the Slavic language word for बियर `` pivo '', and was pronounced `` bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard the फॉक्स `` ( आधारित on the protagonist of a medieval फ्रेंच folk-tale ), and promotional mugs with this अक्षर यहूद manufactured.
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars in its st. Louis shops called the `` bevo Boats '' which were used लिये प्रमोशन.
Seven are believed to have महरूम built on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis while एक surviving example थी based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 v8.
Billboard advertising bevo in trenton, New Jersey, 1917
A contemporary विज्ञापन read `` Cooling और invigorating, Bevo the पेय.
अनुक्रम by the case इससे your पंसारी, druggist, or dealer. ''
The paper label on the back of the bottle read `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink.
appetizing - Healthful - पौष्टिक - Refreshing.
Milk or water may contain जीवाणु.
bevo never does. ''
bevo became part of the popular culture of the time, और is mentioned in various लोकप्रिय songs and Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to secondary slang uses of the शब्द ; लिये उदाहरण, in अमरीकी military कठबोली a young and inexperienced officer was पुकारा a `` bevo ''.
The University of Texas नामित its शुभंकर `` bevo '', a name जिससे has stuck to इस day.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the पेय, `` तुम Ca n't रहो up on bevo '', in his 1917 army revue, यिप Yip yaphank.
in the late 1920s smuggled बूटलेग बियर और liquor as well as `` homebrew ``, cut into bevo 's marketshare.
With बिक्री flattening to 100,000 cases by 1929, Anheuser-Busch stopped उत्पादन.
The bevo Mill, St. Louis, in 2008
The bevo building, with the renard अक्षर prominently displayed at the corners, स्टिल operates as a bottling facility at their प्रमुख brewery in St. Louis, Missouri.
The landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by अगस्त Anheuser बुच, sr. in 1917.
It was बंद in 2009, but it reopened in October 2009 under new owners.

Mylanta is an over the काउंटर medication used for the treatment of acid reflux, heartburn, and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ).

A कांच of pasteurized गाय मिल्क
मिल्क is a white liquid produced by the mammary ग्रंथियों of mammals.
It is the primary सोर्स of nutrition लिये young mammals before वे हैं समर्थ to digest other types of food.
अर्लy- lactation मिल्क contains colostrum, which carries the माँ 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the रिस्क of many diseases in the baby.
It also contains many other nutrients.
As an agricultural उत्पाद, milk is extracted इससे mammals और used as खाना for humans.
Worldwide, dairy farms उत्पादित about 730 लाख tonnes of मिल्क in 2011.
इण्डिया is the संसार 's largest producer और उपभोक्ता of milk, yet neither exports nor imports milk.
नई Zealand, the यूरोपीय Union 's 27 member राज्य, Australia, and the संयुक्त States are the world 's largest निर्यातक of milk और मिल्क products.
China and Russia हैं the संसार 's largest importers of मिल्क and milk products.
Throughout the world, there are more than 6 billion consumers of milk and मिल्क products.
Over 750 लाख लोगों live भीतर dairy farming households.
Milk is a key योगदानकर्ता to improving nutrition और खाना सुरक्षा particularly in विकासशील countries.
Improvements in livestock and दुग्ध technology offer significant वादा in reducing poverty और कुपोषण in the संसार.
Motorcycle स्पीडवे, usually referred to as स्पीडवे, is a मोटरसाइकिल sport involving four and sometimes up to छह riders स्पर्धा over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit.
Speedway मोटरसाइकिल use only एक gear and have no brakes और racing takes place on a flat ओवल track प्रायः consisting of मैल or loosely packed shale.
प्रतिस्पर्धी use this surface to slide उनके machines sideways, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the सीधा भाग of the track the motorcycles reach speeds of up.
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but वहीँ is evidence of a type of speedway रेसिंग होने practised in the USA पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध और in Australia in the late 1910s और early 1920s.
There हैं अभी दोनो domestic and international competitions in a number of देशों including the स्पीडवे World Cup whilst the highest overall scoring व्यक्तिगत in the स्पीडवे Grand प्रिक्स कार्यक्रम is pronounced the संसार चैंपियन.
Speedway is popular in सेंट्रल and उत्तरी Europe and to a lesser extent in Australia और North America.
A variant of track racing, speedway is administered internationally by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme ( FIM ).
Domestic speedway events are regulated by FIM संबद्ध national motor sport federations.
Vitamin d is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार for intestinal अवशोषण of calcium and phosphate.
in humans, the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित compounds of विटामिन D are विटामिन D2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( विटामिन D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin d2 ) हैं unique as they constitute what we know as विटामिन d and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can भी synthesize विटामिन D ( from cholesterol ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
हालांकि vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is नहीं actually an अनिवार्य dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by most mammals exposed to धूप.
( Cats and कुत्तो can not synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और must receive it in their diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, और जरूर be प्राप्त from their आहार.
However, as with other compounds commonly पुकारा विटामिन, विटामिन D थी discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood रूप of osteomalacia.
Additionally, जैसे other यौगिकों पुकारा vitamins, in the developed world vitamin d is added to staple foods, ऐसे as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous संश्लेषण from exposure to धूप as well as सेवन from the diet, and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the मेंटेनेंस of adequate serum एकाग्रता.
the प्रमाण indicates that the संश्लेषण of विटामिन D इससे sun exposure works in a प्रतिक्रिया loop that prevents toxicity but, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight, no recommendations हैं issued by the संस्थान of Medicine, USA, for the amount of सूर्य exposure required to meet विटामिन D आवश्यकताएँ.
Accordingly, the dietary Reference Intakes for विटामिन d assume that no संश्लेषण occurs and that सब of a person 's विटामिन D is from their आहार, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is परिवर्तित to calcidiol, which is also ज्ञात as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and जिससे is the specific विटामिन D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
भाग of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol, the biologically active form of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the concentration of कैल्सियम and phosphate in the bloodstream और promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is भी converted to calcitriol बाहर of the गुर्दे for other purposes, such as the proliferation, differentiation और apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular फलन and सूजन.
Beyond its उपयोग to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence for other health effects of विटामिन D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
the बेहतरीन evidence of benefit is लिये bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women.
The Duramax is a General Motors diesel engine family for light- and मीडियम duty ट्रक, designed by Isuzu.
The 6.6-liter duramax is produced by dmax, a joint venture between gm and Isuzu in Moraine, Ohio.

Balto ( 1919 – कूच 14, 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his team on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome, in which diphtheria antitoxin थी transported from anchorage, अलास्का, to nenana, Alaska, by train और then to Nome by श्वान sled to combat an outbreak of the बीमारी.
The run is commemorated by the annual Iditarod Trail sled Dog Race.
Balto थी named after the Sami explorer सैमुएल balto.
balto died at the age of 14.

The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810, an upscale six-cylinder version of the bluebird, और was spun into its own line in 1981, having महरूम made लगातार since then.
the `` Maxima '' name थी applied धीरे, beginning in 1981.

Propolis as hive sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey मधुमक्खियों collect from tree buds, sap बहती, or other botanical sources.
It is used as a sealant for unwanted खोलें स्पेसेस in the hive.
Propolis is प्रयुक्त for small gaps ( लगभग or less ), while larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax.
इसके रंग varies depending on its botanical सोर्स, the most आम होने अंधेरा भूरा.
Propolis is sticky at और ऊपर room temperature,.
At lower temperatures, it becomes hard and बहुत brittle.
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26, 1948 ) is an American सिंगर, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, best ज्ञात as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston -based चट्टान band एरोस्मिथ, in जिससे he भी plays the harmonica, और occasional पियानो and percussion.
he is known as the `` Demon of Screamin ' '' due to his high screams और उसके wide गायन range.
he is also ज्ञात for his on-stage acrobatics.
दौरान his high-energy performances, he usually पोशाक in bright, colorful outfits with his trademark scarves फांसी from उसके microphone stand.
in the 1970s, Tyler रोज़ to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith, which released such milestone hard rock albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks.
In the late 1970s and early 1980s, टायलर था a heavy drug and alcohol addiction, and the बैंड 's लोकप्रियता waned.
He completed ड्रग rehabilitation in 1986 और subsequently कायम sobriety for over 20 years, but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the late 2000s, for which he successfully प्राप्त treatment in 2009.
बाद Aerosmith शुभारम्भ a remarkable comeback in the लेट 1980s और early 1990s साथ the albums Permanent Vacation, Pump, and Get a पकड़, Tyler became a household name and has remained a relevant rock प्रतीक.
as a result, he रै since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest दिखावे on अन्य artists ' music, फिल्मी and TV भूमिकाएँ ( सहित as a न्यायधीश on American Idol ), authoring a bestselling book, and solo कार्य ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ).
however, he has continued to record music and perform with एरोस्मिथ, after अधिक than 43 years in the band.
The बैंड 's latest album, Music इससे Another Dimension !
, थी released on November 6, 2012.
Tyler is included among Rolling Stones 100 Greatest गायकों.
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit parader 's Top 100 Metal Vocalists of सब समय.
In 2001 he was inducted into the चट्टान and Roll Hall of Fame with Aerosmith, और he was the presenter when AC/DC थी inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be प्राप्तकर्ता of the ASCAP Founders पुरस्कार and होगा also be inducted into the songwriters Hall of कीर्ति.
the liver produces यूरिया in the urea cycle as a बर्बाद product of the digestion of protein.
Normal human adult blood चाहिए contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया nitrogen प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of रक्त.
व्यक्तिगत laboratories may have different reference ranges, and इस is because the procedure may vary.
Wayne fontes ( born फ़रवरी 2, 1940 ) is a former American फ़ुटबॉल coach और कॉलेज और professional football player जो थी the head कोच of the एनएफएल 's डेट्रॉयट Lions from 1988 to 1996.

The Jews ( आईएसओ 259-3 Israeli उच्चारण ), also ज्ञात as the यहूदी people, are a nation और an ethnoreligious group, originating in the israelites or hebrews of the Ancient निकट East.
The यहूदी ethnicity, राष्ट्रीयता, and धर्म हैं strongly interrelated, as judaism is the परंपरागत faith of the Jewish nation.
converts to Judaism, whose status as Jews भीतर the Jewish ethnos is equal to those born into it, have महरूम अवशोषित into the Jewish people throughout the millennia.
In Jewish परंपरा, Jewish ancestry is traced to the biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac और Jacob in the second मिलेनियम BCE.
The आधुनिक State of Israel was स्थापित as a यहूदी nation-state, और defines itself as ऐसे in इसके Basic Laws.
Its Law of Return grants the सही of नागरिकता to कोई Jew who requests it.
इसराईल is the only देश where Jews हैं a बहुमत of the population.
Jews भी enjoyed political स्वायत्तता twice before in प्राचीन history.
The first of these periods lasted from 1350 to 586 bce, और encompassed the periods of the Judges, the United Monarchy, and the Divided Monarchy of the kingdoms of Israel and Judah, ending with the destruction of the First Temple.
The second was the काल of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning from 140 to 37 bce.
Since the destruction of the पहला टेम्पल, most यहूदियों have lived in diaspora.
A अल्पसंख्यक in every country in which they live ( except इसराईल ), they have frequently experienced persecution throughout इतिहास, resulting in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries.
The संसार यहूदी population पहुँचे a शिखर of 15 लाख prior to the Second World War, but six million यहूदियों यहूद killed in the holocaust.
चूंकि then the population has risen again and, थी अनुमानित at 13.4 million by the North American Jewish Data बैंको, or less than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly one in every 514 people ).
According to इस report, about 42.5 % of सब Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ), and 39.3 % in the United राज्य ( 5.3 लाख ), साथ most of the remainder living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) और कनाडा ( 0.4 लाख ).
These numbers include all those जो consider themselves Jews, whether or not they are affiliated साथ a यहूदी संगठन.
the कुल world यहूदी population, however, is मुश्किल to measure.
In addition to issues साथ census methodology, वहीँ are halakhic विवादों regarding who is a Jew and secular, राजनैतिक, और ancestral identification factors कि may affect the figure considerably.

लिये अन्य उपयोग see कॉर्पस domini ( बहुविकल्पी )
The Feast of कॉर्पस Christi ( Latin for देह of मसीह ), also known as Corpus domini, is a Latin Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition और belief in the देह and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist, जिससे was observed on Holy Thursday in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of शुभ Friday.
in the उपस्थित Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of The Most पावन Body and Blood of मसीह.
it is भी celebrated in some Anglican, लूथरन, और बूढ़ा कैथोलिक Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real उपस्थिति.
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the गुरुवार after ट्रिनिटी Sunday or, `` where the Solemnity of the Most Holy Body and रक्त of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation, it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy ट्रिनिटी as इसके proper दिन ''.
At the समाप्त of Holy Mass, there is often a बारात of the Blessed sacrament, generally displayed in a monstrance.
The procession is followed by Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic procession is कि presided over by the Pope प्रत्येक year in Rome, जहाँ it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran and makes its way to the Basilica of Saint मरियम Major, जहाँ it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive प्रोटीन ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood, the स्तर of which वृद्धि in response to inflammation ( i.e. C-reactive protein is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the सतह of मुर्दे or मरना cells ( and some types of जीवाणु ) in अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक system via the C1Q complex.
सीआरपी is synthesized by the liver in response to कारकों released by macrophages and fat cells ( adipocytes ).
It is a member of the pentraxin family of proteins.
It is not related to C-peptide or protein C.
C-reactive प्रोटीन was the पहला pattern मान्यता receptor ( PRR ) to be identified.
the start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492, when a Spanish expedition headed by Christopher कोलंबस sailed लिये इण्डिया to open trade but inadvertently खोजा the americas.
European conquest, large-scale exploration and colonization soon followed.
Seeing that यूरोपीय was preoccupied with many आतंरिक wars और थी slowly recovering इससे the many मौतों that the bubonic plague caused, the rapid expansion at which it grew in wealth and शक्ति थी unforeseeable in the early 1400s.
the first expeditions occurred along the caribbean coasts on the islands of Hispaniola, Puerto रीको and Cuba, and after 1500 extended into the interiors of दोनो North and South America.
in 1497, sailing from the north on behalf of England, John cabot landed on the North American coast, और a साल later, Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast.
France founded colonies in much of eastern उत्तर अमेरिका, on a number of Caribbean islands, and in South America.
Portugal colonized Brazil.
Eventually, the entire पश्चिमी गोलार्ध came under the control of यूरोपीय governments, leading to profound परिवर्तन to its landscape, population, and plant and animal जीवन.
In the 19th सदी alone over 50 million लोगों left Europe for the Americas.
The post-1492 era is known as the period of the Columbian Exchange.
Keith Richards ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, singer-songwriter and founder member of the English rock band the Rolling Stones.
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards had निर्मित `` चट्टान 's महानतम single देह of riffs '', ranking him 4th on इसके सूची of 100 best guitarists.
Fourteen songs Richards wrote साथ the Rolling Stones ' lead vocalist मिक Jagger are listed among रोलिंग स्टोन magazine 's `` 500 Greatest गीतों of All समय ``.
Richards ' notoriety लिये illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and उसके candour regarding his addiction to and eventual abstinence from heroin.
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is a steroid hormone from the androgen समूह and is found in mammals, reptiles, birds, and other vertebrates.
In स्तनधारियों, testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of males and the ovaries of females, although small amounts are भी secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the principal पुरूष sex hormone और an anabolic स्टेरॉयड.
in men, टेस्टोस्टेरोन plays a कुंजी भूमिका in the development of पुरूष reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as promoting द्वितीयक यौन characteristics ऐसे as increased muscle, bone mass, and the विकास of body hair.
In addition, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य for health and well-being as खूब as the prevention of ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस.
on average, in वयस्क इंसान males, the plasma concentration of टेस्टोस्टेरोन is about 7–8 times as great as the concentration in adult इंसान females ' प्लाज्मा, but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is greater, the daily उत्पादन is about 20 times greater in men.
Females भी are more sensitive to the हार्मोन.
Testosterone is observed in most vertebrates.
Fish make a थोड़ा different form called 11-ketotestosterone.
Its counterpart in insects is ecdysone.
ये ubiquitous steroids suggest that sex हार्मोन have an ancient विकासवादी इतिहास.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` प्राकृतिक '' but relatively homogeneous groupings हैं evident in a statistical population.
It is प्रायः used in marketing शोध.
In this technique, the कुल जनसांख्यिकी is विभाजित into these groups ( or clusters ) और a simple random नमूना of the groups is selected.
Then the required सूचना is एकत्रित इससे a simple random sample of the elements भीतर each selected समूह.
This may be किया for every element in these groups or a subsample of elements may be selected भीतर each of these groups.
A common प्रेरणा लिये क्लस्टर sampling is to reduce the total number of साक्षात्कार and costs दिए the desired accuracy.
Assuming a fixed sample size, the technique gives more accurate परिणाम जब सबसे of the variation in the जनसांख्यिकी is भीतर the groups, नहीं between उन्हें.

The population was 3,382 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie hershlag ; ; जून 9, 1981 ) is an actress and model साथ dual American and israeli citizenship.
Her first role थी as an orphan लिया in by a hitman in the 1994 कार्रवाई film, but mainstream success came when वो was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel त्रयी ( released in 1999, 2002 and 2005 ).
In 1999, she enrolled at Harvard विश्वविद्यालयों to study psychology while still working as an actress.

in 2001, पोर्टमैन opened in नई York City 's Public थिएटर production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull.
In 2005, Portman received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री and won the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture लिये the drama करीब.
वो जीती a Constellation Award लिये बेहतरीन Female Performance and a Saturn Award लिये बेहतरीन Actress लिये उसके अभिनीत role in v लिये वेंडेट्टा ( 2006 ).
वो played leading roles in the ऐतिहासिक dramas Goya 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and The अन्य Boleyn लड़की ( 2008 ).

Copper is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक cu ( from ) and परमाणु number 29.
It is a ductile मेटल with very high thermal and electrical conductivity.
Pure तांबे is soft और malleable ; a freshly exposed surface has a reddish-orange color.
it is used as a कंडक्टर of heat and electricity, a भवन material, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
the मेटल and its alloys have been used for thousands of years.
In the Roman era, copper थी principally mined on Cyprus, hence the origin of the नाम of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of Cyprus ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) लवण, which often impart blue or green रंगों to minerals such as azurite and turquoise और have महरूम widely used historically as pigments.
Architectural structures निर्मित with तांबे corrode to give ग्रीन verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative art prominently features copper, both by itself और as भाग of pigments.
तांबे is essential to all living organisms as a trace dietary mineral क्युकी it is a कुंजी constituent of the respiratory enzyme जटिल cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs और crustacea तांबे is a constituent of the रक्त pigment hemocyanin, which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates.
the main areas जहाँ तांबे is found in vertebrates हैं liver, muscle and bone.
In sufficient concentration, तांबे compounds are poisonous to उच्चतर organisms and हैं प्रयुक्त as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, and wood preservatives.
The major professional खेल leagues, or simply major leagues, in the United राज्य and कनाडा हैं the highest पेशेवर competitions of team खेल in the two देशों.
हालांकि individual sports such as golf, tennis, and auto रेसिंग are भी very लोकप्रिय, the term is प्रायः limited to team खेल.
the term `` major league '' was first प्रयुक्त in 1921 in reference to प्रमुख लीग Baseball ( MLB ), the top level of professional American बेसबॉल.
Today, the major northern North America पेशेवर टोली खेल leagues हैं Major लीग Baseball ( MLB ), the National बास्केट Association ( NBA ), the National Football लीग ( NFL ), और the National हॉकी League ( NHL ).
Other notable लीग include Major League सॉकर ( MLS ), the Canadian Football लीग ( CFL ), the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल लीग, Major League lacrosse, the नेशनल Lacrosse लीग and the Women 's National बास्केट Association.
The NFL, MLB, एनबीए, और NHL are commonly referred to as the बिग Four.
प्रत्येक of these is the richest professional club प्रतियोगिता in इसके sport worldwide.
the best players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the world, क्युकी the लीग आनंद a significant प्लेस in popular culture in the US and Canada.
The NFL has 32 टीमों, and the others have 30 each.
the vast majority of major league teams हैं concentrated in the most populous metropolitan areas of the United States.
Baseball, football, हॉकी, और soccer have had पेशेवर leagues for over 100 years ; early leagues ऐसे as the National संघ, Ohio लीग, and National Hockey Association formed the basis of the आधुनिक MLB, NFL and NHL respectively.
Soccer थी first professionalized in 1894, but leagues suffered greatly from कमी of sustainability और seldom lasted more than a दशक.
Soccer 's महानतम सफलताओं यहूद in the form of the अमरीकी सॉकर League ( 1921-1933 ), the असली North American सॉकर League ( 1968-1984 ), the National पेशेवर सॉकर लीग ( 1984-2001 ) और, currently, प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( 1996-present ).
Basketball is a relatively new विकास ; the NBA विकसित इससे the National Basketball लीग and its splinter group the Basketball संघ of America, taking on its current form in 1949.
Every major league averages 15,000 fans in उपस्थिति per game or higher as of 2011.
मध्याह्न Altitude is an खगोलीय navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude.
Earned value management ( EVM ), or Earned मान project/performance प्रबन्धन ( EVPM ) is a प्रोजेक्ट management तकनीक for measuring project performance and progress in an उद्देश्य manner.
Because EVM has the ability to combine माप of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
and cost,
in a सिंगल integrated system, Earned मान Management is समर्थ to provide accurate forecasts of project प्रदर्शन समस्याएं, जिससे is an important contribution for project management.
Early EVM शोध showed कि the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by इसके use ; and similarly, using the methodology improves both पैमाना definition as well as the विश्लेषण of overall प्रोजेक्ट performance.
अधिक recent research अध्ययन have shown that the principles of EVM are धनात्मक predictors of प्रोजेक्ट success.
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years परे सरकारी contracting, in जिससे sector its महत्व continues to rise ( e.g., recent new DFAR rules ), in part because EVM can also surface in और सहायता substantiate अनुबंध विवादों.
