Spring is one of the four conventional temperate सीज़न, following winter and preceding summer.
वहीँ are various तकनीकी definitions of spring, लकिन लोकल usage of the term varies according to local climate, cultures and कस्टम.
When it is spring in the northern hemisphere, it will be पतझड़ in the southern hemisphere.
At the spring विषुव, days are close to 12 घंटों long साथ दिन length increasing as the ऋतु progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, and भी to विचार of rebirth, कायाकल्प, renewal, resurrection, और regrowth, with त्यौहार such as कार्निवल, ईस्टर and holi being celebrated at this time.
Jamestown was a settlement in the उपनिवेश of Virginia, the first permanent अंग्रेज़ी उपनिवेश in the americas.
स्थापित by the Virginia Company of London as `` James फोर्ट '' on May 14, 1607 ( o.s., may 24, 1607 n.s. ), it followed several earlier विफल attempts, including the Lost Colony of Roanoke.
Jamestown served as the capital of the colony for 83 सालो, from 1616 जबतक 1699.
the उपनिवेश was located भीतर the territory of a political entity known as Tsenacommacah, the राज्य of the powhatan confederacy, with around 14,000 देशी निवासियों, and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the paspahegh tribe.
The natives initially सत्कार the colonists with dancing, feasting और tobacco ceremonies, and they provided crucial प्रावधानों and support for the अस्तित्व of the colonists, जो were not agriculturally inclined, although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly जल्दी on, अग्रणी to the total annihilation of the paspahegh in warfare भीतर 3 years.
भीतर a साल of Jamestown 's founding, the वर्जिनिया कम्पनी brought Polish and Dutch colonists to help improve the settlement.
in 1619, the first प्रलेखित Africans were brought to jamestown, though the modern conception of slavery in the future United States did not begin in Virginia until 1660.
When the उपनिवेश was subdivided into the असली eight shires of वर्जिनिया in 1634, the town became located in the eponymous James नगर Shire.
the लंदन Company 's second settlement, Bermuda, दावा to be the site of the oldest कस्बा in the English New संसार, as st. George 's, बरमूडा थी officially established ( as New लंदन ) in 1612, whereas James Fort, in वर्जिनिया, was not to be converted into James towne जबतक 1619, and further did नहीं survive into the present day.
in 1699, the capital was relocated इससे Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg, बाद which Jamestown ceased to exist as a settlement, existing today तभी as an archaeological साईट.
Today, Jamestown is one of three स्थितियाँ comprising the ऐतिहासिक Triangle of Colonial Virginia, along साथ Williamsburg and Yorktown, with two primary विरासत साइट.
Historic Jamestowne, the archaeological site on jamestown द्वीप, is a cooperative effort by Jamestown नेशनल Historic साईट ( भाग of Colonial नेशनल Historical Park ), and Preservation Virginia.
the jamestown उपनिवेश, a living history interpretive site, is operated by the Jamestown yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia.
James Christopher Frey ( born September 12, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी writer.
उसके किताबे A लाख Little Pieces ( 2003 ) and My dost Leonard ( 2005 ), as well as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ), were bestsellers.
He was the subject of a scandal when investigators discovered that prison time and the extent of certain चोटों were exaggerated in A लाख Little Pieces, a purportedly autobiographical account of the author 's संघर्ष with addiction.
Deere & कम्पनी, most commonly ज्ञात by its name जॉन Deere, is an American corporation based in Moline, Illinois, and एक of the largest निर्माताओं of agricultural मशीनरी in the संसार.
in 2012, it थी listed as 97th in the सौभाग्य 500 अमेरिका 's ranking और 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking.
Deere and कम्पनी agricultural products, sold under the John Deere नाम, include tractors, combine harvesters, cotton harvesters, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, and UTVs.
The company is भी a manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment, as well as a supplier of diesel इंजन और drivetrains ( axles, transmissions, gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in heavy equipment.
Additionally, John Deere manufactures equipment प्रयुक्त in lawn, grounds, and turf care, such as walk-behind लॉन mowers, zero-turn लॉन mowers, lawn tractors, and snowthrowers.
To support the core businesses, John Deere also provides financial सेवाएं और other related activities.
The company 's slogan is `` nothing Runs Like a Deere '' and रै a picture of a leaping deer as a logo, a word play pun on `` nothing runs like a deer ''.
कार्ल westby coined the phrase `` Nothing रनों Like a deere '' for a marketing अभियान to sell snowmobiles.
The कम्पनी 's products are also identifiable by its distinctive shade of green paint, usually augmented by पीला trim.
The United States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त States करेंसी.
The first U.S. सचिव of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the विधेयक, while the U.S. Treasury भवन is featured on the reverse.
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
हैमिल्टन is one of only four people featured on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the present ) जो थी not born in the continental संयुक्त States, as he थी इससे the West इंडीज.
the others हैं : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 विधिक Tender ) ; George Meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष Note ) ; और Robert Morris, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver प्रमाणपत्र ).
In addition, Kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter. )
All $ 10 bills issued today हैं Federal Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving और Printing says the औसत life of a $ 10 bill in circulation is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to पहनें.
लगभग 6 % of all us banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are वितरित by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of नई York नगर हॉल.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a पोर्ट्रेट of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left, but was प्रयुक्त only for intra-government transactions ).
Andy Samuel ग्रिफ़िथ ( June 1, 1926 – July 3, 2012 ) was an American actor, television निर्माता, Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer, and writer.
He was a Tony Award nominee लिये two भूमिकाएँ, and gained prominence in the starring भूमिका in निदेशक Elia Kazan 's फिल्मी a फेस in the Crowd ( 1957 ) पहले he became better known for his टेलीविज़न भूमिकाएँ, playing the सीसे characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama matlock.
Theresa Penelope `` terri '' Irwin, ( née raines ; born July 20, 1964 ) is an Australian -आधारd, अमरीकी -born naturalist, लेखक, the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah, Queensland, ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
She co-starred with her husband on The मगरमच्छ शिकारी, their unconventional television nature documentary series साथ with its spin-off series, क्रोक Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries.
She has lived in Australia चूंकि 1992, जब she married स्टीव Irwin.
andreas cellarius 's illustration of the Copernican system, from the harmonia Macrocosmica ( 1660 ).
Heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the खगोलीय model in which the Earth and planets revolve around a relatively stationary Sun at the center of the Solar System.
The शब्द comes from the Greek ( helios `` sun '' and kentron `` center '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, which placed the धरती at the बीच.
The ख़्याल that the धरती घूमती around the Sun था महरूम proposed as early as the 3rd century BC by Aristarchus of Samos, but Aristarchus 's heliocentrism आकर्षित little ध्यान until कोपरनिकस revived and elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that this is a misleading छाप resulting इससे the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era.
Using indirect evidence he argues कि a heliocentric view was expounded in Hipparchus 's कार्य on गम्भीरता.
It was not until the 16th century that a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric प्रणाली was presented, by the Renaissance mathematician, astronomer, और Catholic मौलवी nicolaus कोपरनिकस of Poland, अग्रणी to the Copernican क्रान्ति.
in the following century, Johannes कॅप्लर elaborated upon और expanded इस मॉडल to शामिल अंडाकार orbits, and supporting observations बना using a दूरदर्शी were presented by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of William Herschel, Friedrich Bessel, और others, खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास that the sun was not the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड and by the 1920s एडविन Hubble had दिखाया कि it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many अरबों.
Norah जोन्स ( born Geetali Norah Jones शंकर ; March 30, 1979 ) is an American singer-songwriter, pianist, और अभिनेत्री.
She is the daughter of भारतीय सितार player Ravi Shankar और मुकदमा जोन्स.
वो is also Anoushka Shankar 's half-sister.
In 2002, वो launched her solo music करियर with the release of the commercially successful और critically acclaimed एल्बम Come दूर with Me, a संलयन of country म्यूज़िक and पॉप साथ तत्व of जैज़ जिससे was certified डायमंड album, selling over 26 million नक़ल.
The record earned जोन्स five ग्रैमी Awards, including the Album of the Year, Record of the Year, और Best New कलाकार.
उसके subsequent स्टुडियो एल्बम, Feels Like Home, released in 2004, Not too लेट, released in 2007, the वही year वो made her फिल्मी debut in my Blueberry नाइट्स, and her 2009 release The पतन सब gained Platinum status, selling over a लाख copies और were generally well received by आलोचकों.
Jones ' पांचवां studio album, छोटी टूटा Hearts, was released on April 27, 2012.
Jones has जीती nine Grammy पुरस्कार और थी 60th on Billboard पत्रिका 's artists of the 2000–2009 decade चार्ट.
Throughout her career, जोन्स रै won numerous पुरस्कार and has sold more than 50 million एल्बम worldwide.
Billboard named her the top jazz artist of the 2000–2009 decade.
Not to be confused साथ आयाम of a physical quantity.
For other uses, देखिए Dimension ( disambiguation ).
From left to right, the वर्गाकार, the cube, and the tesseract.
The वर्गाकार is bounded by 1-dimensional lines, the cube by 2-dimensional areas, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
a projection of the cube is given since it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
The same applies to the tesseract, जिससे additionally can only be shown as a projection भी in three-dimensional space.
A diagram showing the पहला four spatial dimensions.
in physics and mathematics, the आयाम of a स्पेस or object is informally defined as the minimum number of निर्देशांक needed to specify any point within it.
यूँ a line has a dimension of one because तभी one coordinate is needed to specify a पाइंट on it ( लिये example, the point at 5 on a number line ).
A surface ऐसे as a प्लेन or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of दो because दो निर्देशांक are needed to specify a point on it ( लिये उदाहरण, to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need दोनो its latitude and its longitude ).
The inside of a cube, a cylinder or a गोला is three-dimensional because तीन निर्देशांक हैं needed to locate a point within these स्पेसेस.
In physical terms, dimension refers to the constituent ढांचा of सब स्पेस ( आवाज़ ) और its position in समय ( perceived as a scalar dimension along the t-axis ), as well as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle और field conceptions, interact according to सापेक्ष properties of द्रव्यमान —and are fundamentally mathematical in description.
These, or other axes, may be referenced to uniquely identify a पाइंट or structure in its रवैया और relationship to other objects और occurrences.
शारीरिक theories कि incorporate समय, such as general relativity, are said to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( पारिभाषित as a Minkowski space ).
आधुनिक theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum फ़ील्ड and string theories.
The state-space of quantum mechanics is an infinite-dimensional function space.
The concept of dimension is नहीं restricted to physical objects.
High-dimensional spaces occur in गणित और the sciences for many reasons, अक्सर as configuration spaces such as in Lagrangian or Hamiltonian mechanics ; these हैं abstract spaces, स्वतंत्र of the physical स्पेस we live in.
fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 residents in सैन bernardino County, California.
संस्थापित in 1913, it remained essentially rural जबतक World War II, when entrepreneur हेनरी J. Kaiser built a large स्टील मिल in the area.
It is now a regional हब of the trucking industry, साथ Interstate 10 और State Route 210 transecting the city इससे east to west, and Interstate 15 passing diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
it is home to the largest of the सैन Bernardino काउंटी प्रणाली libraries, a संवर ऐतिहासिक theater, a municipal पार्क, and the स्वचालित Club Speedway on the साईट of the Kaiser स्टील Mill.
fontana also होस्ट the Fontana दिनों Half मैराथन and 5K run.
This race is the fastest half-marathon course in the world.
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that fontana 's population was 200,762 in 2012, making it the दूसरी सबसे populous city in San Bernardino काउंटी काउंटी and 14th in the राज्य.
Cowboys Stadium is a stadium with a retractable roof in Arlington, टेक्सास.
It serves as the home of the National Football लीग 's Dallas Cowboys.
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium, which opened in 1971, and served as the Cowboys ' home through the 2008 ऋतु.
it was completed on May 27, 2009.
the स्टेडियम सीटे 85,000, बनाना it the third largest स्टेडियम in the NFL by seating capacity.
The maximum capacity of the stadium, including खड़ा room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open क्षेत्रों ) sections हैं पीछे seats in प्रत्येक end zone and on a series of six elevated platforms connected by stairways.
It has the world 's largest column-free आंतरिक and the fourth largest high definition video screen, जिससे hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line.
the facility can भी be used for a variety of other क्रियाएँ outside of its main purpose ( professional फ़ुटबॉल ) such as concerts, बास्केट games, boxing matches, college football and ऊँची school football contests, soccer matches, and motocross races.
कनाडाई historians until the 1980s tended to focus on आर्थिक history, including labour history.
In part this is because Canada रै had दूर fewer political or military conflicts than अन्य societies.
इस थी especially सच्चा in the first half of the बीसवीं century when आर्थिक history was overwhelmingly dominant.
Many of the most prominent अंग्रेज़ी Canadian historians from this period यहूद आर्थिक historians, such as हेरोल्ड Innis, Donald Creighton और Arthur R. M. निम्नतर
विद्वानों of कनाडाई इतिहास were वारिस to the परंपराओं that developed in Europe and the United राज्य, लकिन frameworks कि worked well elsewhere प्रायः विफल in कनाडा.
The heavily मार्क्सवादी बहकावे economic history that dominates यूरोपीय has little relevance to सबसे of कनाडाई इतिहास.
A focus on क्लास, urban areas, and industry fails to address Canada 's rural and संसाधन based economy.
Similarly, the monetarist school that is dominant in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border.
The study of economic इतिहास in कनाडा became अत्यधिक केन्द्रित on economic भूगोल, और लिये अनेक सालो the प्रबल school of thought has been the staples thesis.
इस school of thought bases the पढ़ाई of the Canadian economy on the पढ़ाई of प्राकृतिक संसाधन.
This approach has since also become used outside of Canada in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and in many विकासशील राष्ट्र.
Before the arrival of Europeans, the First Nations of what होता become Canada had a large and हर्षोल्लास व्यापार network.
Furs, tools, decorative items, and other goods यहूद often transported thousands of kilometres, ज़्यादातर by canoe throughout the many rivers and झीलों of the region.
the early European history of the कनाडाई economy is usually studied through the staples thesis जिससे argues the Canadian economy विकसित through the exploitation of a series of स्टेपल्स that होता be exported to Europe.
Carbon-14, 14C, or radiocarbon, is a radioactive isotope of carbon साथ a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its presence in सशुल्क materials is the आधार of the radiocarbon dating method pioneered by willard लिब्बी and colleagues ( 1949 ) to date archaeological, geological and hydrogeological samples.
carbon-14 थी discovered on 27 February 1940, by Martin Kamen और Sam Ruben at the विश्वविद्यालयों of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley, although its existence had been सुझाया by Franz Kurie in 1934.
There are तीन naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, and carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts, i.e., making up about 1 part per खरब ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the कार्बन in the माहौल.
the half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through बीटा क्षय.
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on धरती is cosmic ray कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the atmosphere, and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide.
However, open-air नाभिकीय testing between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool.
The different isotopes of कार्बन do नहीं differ appreciably in their chemical गुण.
इस is प्रयुक्त in रासायनिक और biological research, in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to replace nonradioactive carbon, in अनुक्रम to trace chemical and biochemical reactions involving carbon atoms इससे any given सशुल्क यौगिक.
Lightning is a highly visible form of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a विशाल scale between the atmosphere और an earth-bound ऑब्जेक्ट.
They ज़्यादातर originate in thunderclouds और terminate on the मैदान, called बादल to मैदान ( CG ) बिजली.
However, they may also be initiated from a very लम्बा grounded object और reach into the clouds.
हालांकि `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all lightning, it is बल्कि erroneous and a misnomer, as तभी about 25 % of सब बिजली events worldwide are CG, the large बल्क of बिजली कार्यक्रम are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( cc ), where निर्वहन तभी occurs ऊँची in the atmosphere.
The scientific name लिये the complete process of a single बिजली इवेंट is a and it is a very जटिल, multiple stepped interaction, which is not completely understood.
Most cg flashes तभी `` strike '' one physical location, referred to as a termination.
The प्राथमिक conducting channel, the bright coursing light you may देखिए और call a `` strike '', is तभी about 1 inch in diameter, हालांकि to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are मील long, upwards of tens of miles.
And the संपूर्ण flash, lasts only a few fractions of a second, most of which is not visible to human eyes.
Thunder is always produced by बिजली.
Just जैसे lightning, that deceives our आँखें, usually looking larger or closer than it really is, the धरती 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the outside world, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
बिजली can not happen in a वैक्यूम devoid of ions, nor can thunder occur बगैर molecules to हिलना.
Thunder is a physical absolute for प्रत्येक single flash of lightning.
contrary to popular belief, a lightning strike itself is usually not जिम्मेदार for अनेक deaths or injuries from a single इवेंट.
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of a फ्लैश, जबतक people or animals यहूद stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक other, or they were somehow arranged vertically और part of the flash channel.
When बिजली ignites an available ईंधन source and an explosion occurs, it is the शॉक wave or fire causing the injuries, नहीं the strike itself.
Ground currents, also called कदम potential, of an earth termination is what truly causes most injuries or death to humans और animals.
The near instantaneous rush of सतह charges, induced by the overhead thundercloud itself, race to the strike point from hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge.
This current, caused दौरान each stroke, takes the path of least resistance, which may be ion rich human or animal legs, over poorly conducting earth.
This is why it is best to crouch, with feet बंद together, if कभी caught in the खोलें during a thunderstorm.
दुर्भाग्यवश, most reports do not draw a distinction between the real cause of injury or death, be it the strike itself, a resulting explosion or fire, or प्रायः responsible step potential.

Sealing is an अध्यादेश ( ritual ) performed in Latter Day Saints मंदिरों by a व्यक्ति holding the sealing प्राधिकार.
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar relationships, making possible the existence of family relationships throughout शाश्वत.
lds teachings place great importance on the विशिष्ट authority required to perform these sealings.
Church doctrine teaches that this authority, called the Priesthood, corresponds to कि given to संत पीटर in.
Sealings हैं typically performed as marriages or as sealing of children to parents.
They यहूद performed prior to the death of जोसेफ Smith, Jr. ( the main founder of the Latter Day Saint movement ), और हैं फिलहाल performed in the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day संतो.
हालांकि some other denominations, ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह, दृश्य sealing as an artifact of Smith 's practice of plural विवाह, कुछ do still perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` two thousands '', was a दशक that began on जनवरी 1, 2000, और ended on December 31, 2009.
Globalization, which had accelerated बाद the जल्दी 1990s पतन of साम्यवादी, जारी to be a फ़ोर्स in the 2000s.
The growth of the अंतरजाल was एक of the prime contributors to globalization during the दशक, making it possible for people to interact with other लोगों, express ideas, introduce अन्य to different cultures और backgrounds, उपयोग goods और services, sell और buy online, research and learn about things, along with experiencing the world बगैर having to leave home.
The institutions, linkages and technologies that emerged or were redefined पहले would subsequently in this decade लाभ many countries, in particular चीन and India.
However, in other parts of the world such progress विफल to address ongoing struggles with आधुनिकता, सबसे notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and अन्य Islamist groups.
The सितंबर 11 हमले in 2001 led to the संयुक्त States, United Kingdom, स्पेन, Canada और other राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी Afghanistan, as well as implementing various anti-terrorist measures at घर और विदेश in what was ज्ञात as the युद्ध on Terror.
The European संघ saw further integration and expansion throughout much of यूरोपीय.
the economic विकास of the 2000s had considerable environmental consequences, raised demand for diminishing उर्जा resources, and थी स्टिल shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global वित्तीय Crisis of the late 2000s.
the gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a gunfight that took place at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, October 26, 1881, in Tombstone, Arizona territory, और is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted only about thirty seconds, थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी cowboys Billy Claiborne, आइक and Billy clanton, and Tom and Frank McLaury, and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp और उसके brothers Assistant कस्बा Marshal मॉर्गन और अस्थाई lawman Wyatt, aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary मार्शल by Virgil.
Ike clanton और Billy Claiborne भागा from the fight unharmed, but आइक 's brother Billy Clanton was मारे, along with both McLaurys.
lawmen Virgil and Morgan Earp and Doc Holliday were wounded.
तभी Wyatt Earp came through the fight unharmed.
The fight has come to represent a समय in American इतिहास जब the frontier was open दायरा लिये outlaws opposed by law enforcement that was spread thin over विशाल territories, leaving some areas unprotected.
The gunfight थी नहीं खूब ज्ञात to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what रै चूंकि been संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized biography, Wyatt earp : Frontier Marshal, two years बाद Earp 's death.
Lake retold his story in a 1946 book that director John Ford developed into the movie My Darling Clementine.
After the movie Gunfight at the o.k. corral was released in 1957, the shootout came to be known by that नाम.
Since तब, the conflict has been portrayed with varying degrees of accuracy in numerous Western films and books.
Despite its नाम, the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot six doors वेस्ट of the rear entrance to the O.K. Corral on Fremont गली, and भी in the गली.
The two opposing पार्टियों were initially only about apart.
About thirty गोलियाँ were fired in thirty सेकेंड.
Ike Clanton दायर हत्या charges against the Earps और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे लकिन they यहूद eventually exonerated by a लोकल न्यायधीश बाद a 30-day preliminary सुनना and then again by a local ग्रैंड जूरी.
On दिसम्बर 28, 1881, Virgil earp थी maimed in an हत्या attempt by the गैरकानूनी cowboys, and on March 18, 1882, they assassinated मॉर्गन Earp.
The suspects furnished solid alibis, और newly appointed डिप्टी U.S. Marshal Wyatt Earp took matters into his अपना हैंड्स during the Earp वेंडेट्टा Ride, ironically pursued by काउंटी शेरिफ Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest.
hdmi ( high-definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed video data और compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a hdmi-compliant device ( `` the source device '' ) to a compatible computer मॉनिटर, video प्रोजेक्टर, digital टेलीविज़न, or digital ऑडियो device.
HDMI is a डिजिटल बदलना for मौजूदा analog वीडियो standards.
There are a क्रमांक of HDMI-standard cable connectors available, प्रत्येक of which can be used लिये any uncompressed tv or PC video format, including standard, enhanced, high परिभाषा, and 3D video signals ; up to 8 चैनल्स of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer Electronics Control ) कनेक्शन ; and an Ethernet data connection.
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards, जिससे define video formats and waveforms, transport of compressed, uncompressed, और LPCM audio, auxiliary data, and implementations of the VESA edid.
the cec allows HDMI devices to control प्रत्येक other जब जरुरी and allows the user to operate multiple डिवाइस with एक remote control handset.
Because hdmi is electrically compatible with the cea-861 signals used by digital विज़ुअल interface ( dvi ), no signal conversion is जरुरी, nor is there a loss of video quality जब a dvi-to-hdmi adapter is used.
as an uncompressed CEA-861 connection, HDMI is independent of the various डिजिटल television मानकों used by individual devices, such as atsc and dvb, as these हैं encapsulations of संपीडित MPEG वीडियो streams ( which can be decoded और आउटपुट as an uncompressed video stream on hdmi ).
उत्पादन of उपभोक्ता HDMI products started in late 2003.
in यूरोपीय either dvi-hdcp or HDMI is शामिल in the hd तैयार in-store labeling specification for TV sets for hdtv, formulated by EICTA with ses Astra in 2005.
HDMI began to appear on उपभोक्ता HDTV camcorders और digital still cameras in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, जिससे is ten सालो बाद the release of the first hdmi specification, over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard.
Bree वैन de Kamp ( née Mason ; also known in the series as ब्री Hodge and ब्री Weston ) is a fictional character and one of the चार protagonists on the ABC television series हताश Housewives.
वो is निभाई by actress marcia Cross, who has received multiple awards और nominations लिये उसके portrayal, सहित an Emmy Award nomination, three Golden Globe Award nominations, and two स्क्रीन Actors Guild पुरस्कार.
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by आलोचकों and fans.

Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect life despite various obstacles such as widowhood, तलाक, and alcoholism hindering her.

The English Renaissance was a सांस्कृतिक and कलाकारी गति in England डेटिंग इससे the late 15th और जल्दी 16th centuries to the early 17th सदी.
It is संबद्ध with the pan-european पुनर्जागरण कि is प्रायः regarded as शुरूआत in इटली in the लेट 14th century.
Like most of northern Europe, England saw little of these developments until more than a century बाद.
The beginning of the अंग्रेज़ी Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, जब the बैटल of Bosworth Field ended the युद्धों of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty.
Renaissance style and ideas, however, were slow in penetrating England, और the Elizabethan era in the second half of the 16th century is प्रायः regarded as the height of the English पुनर्जागरण.
Elizabeth Ann bloomer Warren `` बेट्टी '' घाट ( April 8, 1918 – जुलाई 8, 2011 ), was पहला Lady of the United States from 1974 to 1977 during the प्रेसिडेंसी of her husband Gerald घाट.
As First Lady, she was active in सोशल नीति and created precedents as a नीतियां active अध्यक्षीय wife.
Throughout her husband 's पद in office, she maintained high approval ratings despite opposition from some conservative Republicans who objected to her more moderate और उदार positions on social मुद्दे.
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer जागरूकता following her 1974 mastectomy और थी a passionate supporter of, और activist for, the Equal Rights Amendment ( era ).
Pro-choice on गर्भपात और a leader in the महिलाओं 's Movement, she gained fame as one of the सबसे candid first ladies in history, commenting on every hot-button issue of the time, including feminism, equal अदा, the ERA, sex, drugs, abortion, and gun कंट्रोल.
She also raised awareness of व्यसन जब she announced her long-running बैटल with alcoholism in the 1970s.
Following her White House years, वो continued to लॉबी for the ERA and remained active in the feminist movement.
वो was the founder, and परोसा as the पहला chair of the board of directors, of the बेट्टी घाट Center for पदार्थ abuse और addiction and is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the Congressional Gold Medal ( co-presentation with her husband, Gerald R. Ford, October 21, 1998 ) and the अध्यक्षीय Medal of स्वतंत्रता ( alone, presented 1991, by जार्ज H. W. Bush ).
platelet endothelial कोशिका adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as क्लस्टर of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a protein कि in human is एनकोडेड by the pecam1 जीन मिला on chromosome 17.

anglo-saxon इंग्लैण्ड refers to the period of the history of the भाग of Britain that became known as England, lasting from the end of Roman occupation and स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of इंग्लैण्ड in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a general पद referring to the Germanic peoples जो आए to ब्रिटेन during the 5th and 6th centuries, including Angles, Saxons, frisii, and jutes.
The पद also refers to the language spoken at the time in England, which is now called बूढ़ा English, and to the culture of the era, which has long attracted popular and scholarly attention.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England थी dominated by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of Northumbria, mercia, ईस्ट Anglia, एसेक्स, केंट, Sussex, और Wessex.
In terms of धर्म the kingdoms followed anglo-saxon paganism during the early period, but converted to christianity during the 7th century.
paganism had a फाइनल stronghold in a काल of Mercian आधिपत्य during the 640s, ending with the death of पेंदा of mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of Wessex became dominant दौरान the 9th century, under the नियम of Alfred the Great.
During the 10th सदी, the individual kingdoms unified अंतर्गत the rule of Wessex into the Kingdom of England, which stood opposed to the Danelaw, the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th सदी in the उत्तर and east of England.
The Kingdom of इंग्लैण्ड fell in the viking invasion इससे Denmark in 1013 and थी ruled by the House of Denmark जबतक 1042, when the anglo-saxon House of wessex थी restored.
The पिछला Anglo-Saxon king, Harold Godwinson, was killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings.

स्मोक्ड salmon is a तैयारी of salmon, typically a fillet that has महरूम cured and hot or cold smoked.
Due to its moderately high दाम, smoked सामन is considered a delicacy.
हालांकि the term lox is sometimes लागू to smoked salmon, they are different products.
View of defibrillator electrode position और placement.
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected दिल with a device पुकारा a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the heart मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device used or needed.
कुछ बाह्य units, known as स्वचालित बाह्य defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the diagnosis of treatable लय, meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little, or in some cases no training at all.
gabrielle `` Coco '' bonheur Chanel ( August 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) थी a French fashion designer और founder of the चैनल brand.
She was the तभी fashion designer to appear on Time magazine 's list of the 100 सबसे influential लोगों of the 20th century.
Along साथ Paul Poiret, Chanel was credited with liberating महिलाओं from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' और popularizing the acceptance of a sportive, casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- World War i era.
A prolific fashion निर्माता, चैनल 's influence extended परे couture कपडे.
उसके design aesthetic थी realized in jewelry, हैंडबैग, और महक.
Her signature scent, चैनल No. 5, has become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination, ambition and energy which she applied to her professional और सोशल life.
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence धन्यवाद to the connections she made through उसके work.
These included अनेक artists और craftspeople to whom she became a patron.
However, चैनल 's highly competitive, opportunistic personality led her to make questionable life choices which have generated controversy around her reputation, particularly her behaviour दौरान the German occupation of France in World War ii.

A gristmill ( also : grist मिल, corn mill or आटा mill ) grinds grain into flour.
the पद can refer to both the grinding mechanism और the भवन कि holds it.
Romania ( ; दिनाँक spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a देश स्तिथ at the intersection of सेंट्रल and Southeastern Europe, bordering on the Black Sea.
रोमानिया shares a border with Hungary and Serbia to the वेस्ट, Ukraine और Moldova to the northeast and east, और बुल्गारिया to the south.
at, Romania is the eighth largest देश of the यूरोपीय Union by area, and has the seventh largest population of the European Union साथ more than 19 million people.
इसके capital and biggest city is बुखारेस्ट, the 11th largest city in the EU.
The United Principalities उभरा when the territories of moldavia and wallachia were united under Prince Alexander ioan cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen थी called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in 1881 he was finally crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the किंगडम of Romania.
स्वतंत्रता इससे the उस्मानी Empire was घोषित on 9 May 1877, and थी internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of World युद्ध I, Transylvania, Bukovina and bessarabia united with the Kingdom of रोमानिया.
World युद्ध ii gave cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist सामान्य आयन Antonescu, जो chose to fight on the पक्ष of the Axis शक्तियां from 1941 to 1944.
After his removal, Romania switched पहलू in 1944 and joined the Allies.
By the end of the war, some formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the Soviet Union, with Red फौज इकाई stationed on Romanian soil.
In 1947 रोमानिया forcibly became a People 's गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 ) and a सदस्य of the वॉरसॉ Pact.
In 1965 nicolae Ceauşescu became सामान्य सचिव of the रोमानियाई Communist पार्टी, and the harsh austerity measures, political दमन, and cult of व्यक्तित्व he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually उसके authoritarian government was toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of 1989.
साथ the fall of the Iron Curtain, Romania began its transition towards democracy and a capitalist market economy.
बाद a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered आर्थिक रिकवरी.
As of 2010, Romania is an upper-middle-income देश with a high इंसान विकास index.
रोमानिया joined NATO on 29 March 2004, और the European संघ on 1 जनवरी 2007.
it is also a member of the : Latin Union, Francophonie, OSCE, WTO, bsec, United राष्ट्र, etc.
आज, Romania is a unitary semi-presidential गणतंत्र, in which the executive branch consists of the President and the सरकारी.
`` Ancient '' redirects यहाँ.
लिये other उपयोग, see Antiquity ( disambiguation ).

प्राचीन इतिहास is the study of the written past from the beginning of अंकित human इतिहास to the Early Middle Ages.
The स्पैन of अंकित history is roughly 5,000 years, with cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट, the oldest discovered रूप of coherent writing, इससे the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC.
This is the शुरूआत of इतिहास, as opposed to प्रागितिहास, according to the परिभाषा प्रयुक्त by most historians.
The term शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता is often प्रयुक्त to refer to इतिहास in the Old संसार इससे the beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 bc ( First Olympiad ).
This roughly coincides with the traditional तिथि of the founding of रोम in 753 BC, the beginning of the इतिहास of ancient Rome, और the शुरूआत of the Archaic period in प्राचीन यूनानियों.
Although the ending तिथि of प्राचीन history is disputed, some Western scholars उपयोग the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन Empire in 476 AD, the closure of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD, the death of the emperor Justinian I, the coming of islam or the rise of शारलेमेन as the end of प्राचीन और Classical European history.
in India, the काल includes the early period of the मध्य Kingdoms, and, in China, the समय up to the qin Dynasty is included.
methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin b12, occurring as dark रेड crystals कि freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, विटामिन B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a कुंजी role in the normal functioning of the दिमाग and nervous प्रणाली, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the eight B vitamins.
It is normally शामिल in the metabolism of प्रत्येक cell of the human body, especially affecting DNA synthesis and regulation, लकिन also वसीय एसिड synthesis और energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor पशु are सक्षम of producing vitamin B12.
तभी bacteria और आर्किया have the enzymes जरूरी लिये its synthesis, हालांकि अनेक foods हैं a natural सोर्स of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The विटामिन is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin और can be produced industrially only through बैक्टीरियल fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin b12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), सब of जिससे have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic ढांचा of the vitamin is संपन्नता only by जीवाणु ( जिससे usually produce hydroxocobalamin ), but conversion between different फ़ॉर्म of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A आम semi-synthetic form of the विटामिन, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in प्रकृति, but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals और supplements, and as a खाना योगात्मक, because of its stability and lower production cost.
in the देह it is converted to the human physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving पीछे the cyanide, albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता.
अधिक recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in अधिक expensive pharmacological products and खाना supplements.
The extra utility of these is currently debated.
विटामिन B12 was discovered from its संबंध to the बीमारी pernicious anemia, जिससे is an autoimmune disease in जिससे parietal cells of the पेट responsible for secreting intrinsic फ़ैक्टर are नष्ट.
मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर is crucial लिये the सामान्य अवशोषण of B12, so a lack of intrinsic factor, as seen in घातक रक्ताल्पता, कल्याणकारी a vitamin B12 कमियां.
Many other subtler kinds of विटामिन B12 deficiency and उनके biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
the Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican काल of the ancient Roman civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of सरकारी and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, और Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman गणतंत्र, which preceded it, had been destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire, सहित Julius सीज़र 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two सदियां of the साम्राज्य were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax romana ( `` रोमन Peace '' ).
It reached its greatest expanse दौरान the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened इसके अस्तित्व, लकिन was reunified और stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th century, during जिससे समय a system of डुअल नियम was developed in the लैटिन West and यूनानी East.
बाद the पतन of सेंट्रल सरकारी in the वेस्ट in the 5th century, the eastern हाफ continued as कया होता later be known as the Byzantine साम्राज्य.
Because of the Empire 's विशाल extent and long endurance, the संस्थानों and संस्कृति of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language, धर्म, architecture, दर्शनशास्त्र, विधि, and forms of government in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, और by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total देह सतह क्षेत्रफल ( tbsa ) is an assessment measure of burns of the skin.
In adults, the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the total percentage of area burned for each major section of the body.
In some cases, the burns may cover अधिक than one body part, or may not fully cover such a part ; in these cases, burns हैं measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference पाइंट for 1 % of the body.
For children and infants, the Lund-Browder चार्ट is used to assess the burned body surface क्षेत्रफल.
Different percentages हैं used because the ratio of the combined surface area of the सिर and गर्दन to the surface area of the limbs is typically larger in children than कि of an adult.
ठेठ values for आम groups of humans follow.
( Due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )

The उपाधि symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used, among other things, to represent degrees of arc ( e.g. in geographic coordinate systems ), hours ( in the चिकित्सा field ), or degrees of temperature.
the symbol consists of a छोटी उठाया वृत्त, historically a zero glyph.
In Unicode it is encoded at.
This is a सूची of roots, suffixes, and prefixes used in medical terminology, उनके meanings, और their etymology.
वहीँ हैं a few rules जब using medical roots.
Firstly, prefixes and suffixes, primarily in Greek, but also in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
as a general नियम, इस -o- almost always acts as a joint-stem to connect two consonantal roots, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped जब connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, बजाय of arthr-o-itis.
secondly, medical roots generally go together according to language : यूनानी prefixes go with Greek प्रत्यय and Latin prefixes with Latin प्रत्यय.
हालांकि international वैज्ञानिक vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining forms of अलग languages, it is advisable जब coining new words नहीं to मिक्सर different lingual जड़ें.
Stomach cancer, or gastric कर्कट, refers to cancer arising from any भाग of the stomach.
Stomach कर्कट causes about 800,000 मौतों विश्वव्यापी प्रति साल.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most मरीजों present with advanced disease.
Sara Lynn Evans ( born फ़रवरी 5, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी country सिंगर and songwriter.
For her entire career, वो रै been signed to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड Nashville.
Evans ' debut, Three मदारी and the सच्चाई, did not produce a Top 40 hit on the hot Country गीतों चार्ट.
She followed this up with No प्लेस That Far ( 1998 ), Born to Fly ( 2000 ), Restless ( 2003 ) and Real Fine प्लेस ( 2005 ).
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ), while the other तीन albums all were certified platinum.
ये discs शामिल the number 1 singles `` No Place That दूर ``, `` Born to Fly ``, `` suds in the Bucket `` and `` A Real Fine Place to Start ``, प्लस the top 10 हिट्स `` i could Not Ask for More `` ( a कवर of the एडविन McCain song ), `` I Keep Looking ``, `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' ``.
Her 2007 Greatest हिट्स included the top 15 hits `` You 'll Always Be My Baby `` and `` as If ``.

The world 's principal religions और spiritual traditions may be वर्गीकृत into a small number of major groups, although इस is by no means a वर्दी practice.
This theory began in the 18th सदी with the goal of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies.
Berliners watching a C-54 land at tempelhof विमानक्षेत्र ( 1948 )
The बर्लिन नाकेबंदी ( 24 जून 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was एक of the first major अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the ठंडा War.
During the multinational occupation of post–World War II जर्मनी, the Soviet Union अवरोधित the Western Allies ' railway, सड़क, and canal access to the सेक्टर of बर्लिन under अलाइड कंट्रोल.
Their aim थी to force the पश्चिमी powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying बर्लिन साथ food and fuel, thereby giving the soviets practical control over the संपूर्ण city.
in response, the Western Allies organized the Berlin airlift to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin.
Aircrews इससे the संयुक्त States Air फ़ोर्स, the British Royal एयर Force, the royal Australian एयर Force, the Royal Canadian एयर Force, the Royal नई जीलैंड एयर Force, और the South African एयर Force flew over 200,000 flights in एक year, providing up to 4700 टन of daily necessities such as fuel और food to the Berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the effort was clearly succeeding और, by April, the airlift थी delivering more cargo than था previously been transported into the नगर by rail.
The success of the बर्लिन Airlift brought embarrassment to the Soviets जो had refused to believe it could make a difference.
The blockade was lifted in may 1949 और resulted in the creation of दो पृथक German states.
the Federal गणतंत्र of Germany ( West Germany ) and the जर्मनी Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) विभाजित up बर्लिन.
In remembrance of the airlift, तीन airports in the former western zones of the नगर परोसा as the प्राथमिक gateways to Germany for another fifty सालो.
the euro चिह्न ; logotype and handwritten.
The euro चिह्न is the करेंसी sign used for the euro, the आधिकारिक currency of the eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
the design थी presented to the public by the European आयोग on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter code ( according to ISO standard आईएसओ 4217 ) लिये the euro is EUR.
In युनिकोड it is encoded at.
In English, the चिह्न precedes the मान.
In कुछ styleguides, but not अन्य, the euro sign is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a traditional South American infused drink, विशेषकर in Argentina, Uruguay, पैराग्वे and the southern states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, Syria and Lebanon.
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in पुर्तगाली as erva-mate ) in hot जल.
Mate is परोसा साथ a metal स्ट्रॉ from a shared खोखला calabash gourd.
The straw is called a bombilla in some Latin American countries, a bomba in पुर्तगाली, और a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic.
The straw is traditionally बना of silver.
आधुनिक, commercially available straws हैं typically made of निकल silver, called Alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is ज्ञात as a mate or a guampa ; जबकि in Brazil, it has the specific name of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the name लिये Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in other regions of ब्राज़ील, still used लिये general food और drink in रिमोट regions ).
भी if the water is supplied from a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally नशे from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves are सूखी, chopped, and ground into a powdery mixture पुकारा yerba.
The bombilla acts as दोनो a straw and a sieve.
the submerged end is flared, with small holes or स्लॉट that allow the brewed द्रव in, लकिन block the chunky matter that makes up much of the मिश्रण.
A modern bombilla डिज़ाइन uses a सीधा tube साथ holes, or spring sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in Argentina, Paraguay and Uruguay for many सालो अंतर्गत such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, और in ब्राज़ील under the name `` mate Leão ''.
This is considered a completely different पेय.
it is never drunk from cuias or पुकारा chimarrão, nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The automotive industry is a term कि covers a wide range of कंपनियाँ and organisations शामिल in the design, development, manufacture, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles और mopeds.
It is one of the world 's सबसे important economic सेक्टर by आय.
The पद automotive उद्योग usually does not include industries dedicated to the maintenance of ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user, ऐसे as repair दुकानें and motor ईंधन filling stations.
The term automotive was created इससे यूनानी autos ( self ), और Latin motivus ( of motion ) to represent any रूप of self-powered गाडी.
This term was proposed by SAE member Elmer Sperry.
दाउद Michael `` डेव '' bautista, jr. ( born January 18, 1969 ), is an American mixed martial कलाकार, bodybuilder, actor, and पूर्व professional wrestler best known for उसके time in World कुश्ती Entertainment competing अंतर्गत the ring name Batista.
In डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई, he became a six-time world champion, winning the World Heavyweight Championship चार times, and the WWE Championship two times.

After trying out at संसार Championship Wrestling 's Power संयंत्र, बतिस्ता हस्ताक्षरित a contract with the WWF in 2000 and was sent to इसके developmental territory, Ohio घाटी Wrestling ( ovw ), where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.

Henry T. Thomas sampson, Jr. ( born in Jackson, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American आविष्कारक.
he graduated from high स्कूल in 1951 इससे Lanier High स्कूल in जैक्सन, Mississippi.
He then attended Morehouse College लिये a couple of सालो पहले transferring to purdue University where he became a member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity.
he received a Bachelor 's degree in विज्ञान इससे Purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956.
he ग्रैजुएट with an MS degree in अभियान्त्रिकी from the University of California, Los Angeles in 1961.
sampson also received his MS in नाभिकीय Engineering from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 1965, और his PhD in 1967.
He is the पहला African American to earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in the United States.
Some of उसके accomplishments शामिल being a member of the United States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and earning an परमाणु उर्जा Commission सम्मान between 1964 and 1967.
Later he was awarded the Black चित्र Award from aerospace Corporation in 1982.
he थी awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied Science पुरस्कार, and prize for education, by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983.
In June 2007, Sampson थी शादीशुदा to लौरा Howzell Young in st. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
young-sampson is a प्राध्यापक in the College of Education at California State University San bernardino.

Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), भी known as सब Hallows ' संध्या, is a yearly जश्न observed in a number of countries on अक्तूबर 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the दिन initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All hallows ' संध्या is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead with संभावित pagan roots, particularly the Celtic samhain.
Other विद्वानों maintain that it originated independently of samhain and रै solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित वेशभूषा पार्टियों, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
Freedom of speech is the political सही to communicate एक 's opinions और ideas using one 's देह and property to anyone जो is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the सही to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country और the सही is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( सहित, लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय hatred ), copyright उल्लंघन, रहस्योद्घाटन of सूचना that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is पहचाना as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of इंसान Rights and पहचाना in international human rights law in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Covenant on Civil and Political अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to थाम opinions without हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to तलाश, receive and impart information और विचार of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in छपाई, in the form of art, or through कोई other media of उसके choice ''.
आलेख 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these अधिकारों carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` इसलिए be subject to certain प्रतिबंध '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or प्रतिष्ठा of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public अनुक्रम ( order public ), or of public health or नैतिकता ''.
स्वतंत्रता of वाक may be legally curtailed in some धार्मिक विधिक systems and in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions where it is found to कारण religious offense, ऐसे as the British Racial and Religious द्वेष Act 2006.
सिडनी Harbour from the air, प्रर्दशित the Opera हाउस, the CBD, Circular quay, the Bridge, the parramatta नदी, North Sydney and kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through मेहराब सेतु आरपार Sydney harbour that carries rail, vehicular, सायकिल और pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central business district ( सीबीडी ) and the North shore.
The नाटकीय view of the सेतु, the harbour, और the आसपास सिडनी Opera House is an iconic image of सिडनी, नई दक्षिण Wales, और Australia.
The सेतु is nicknamed `` the Coathanger '' क्युकी of इसके arch-based design.
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the nsw Department of Public works, the सेतु was designed और built by British कड़ Dorman Long and co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932.
the bridge 's डिज़ाइन was बहकावे by the Hell Gate Bridge in New York.
it was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) चौड़ी, जबतक निर्माण of the new Port Mann सेतु in Vancouver.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, and it is the tallest steel arch bridge, measuring इससे top to जल स्तर.
Until 1967 the Harbour सेतु was Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian आइलैंड्स, in the northern Pacific समंदर.
एक of the most well-known और heavily studied हॉटस्पॉट in the संसार, the Hawaii plume is responsible for the सृष्टि of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount chain, an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes, four of which are active, two of जिससे are dormant, और more than 123 of which are extinct, अनेक having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts और atolls.
the chain extends इससे south of the island of Hawaii to the edge of the aleutian गर्त, near the eastern edge of Russia.
While सबसे volcanoes हैं created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries, the Hawaii हॉटस्पॉट is located far from आसपास plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory, first प्रस्तावित in 1963 by जॉन Tuzo Wilson, proposes कि a single, फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds volcanoes कि then, cut बंद from their source by the movement of the प्रशांत Plate, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of सालो.
According to this theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and Hawaiian खण्ड of the कड़ी थी caused by a sudden shift in the गति of the प्रशांत Plate.
In 2003, भैस investigations of this irregularity led to the प्रस्ताव of a mobile hotspot theory, suggesting कि hotspots are mobile, not फिक्स्ड, और that the 47 million साल old bend was caused by a shift in the हॉटस्पॉट 's motion बल्कि than the plate 's.
प्राचीन Hawaiians were the पहला to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes to the उत्तर as वे progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
The volatile राज्य of the हवाई volcanoes and उनके constant बैटल with the sea was a प्रमुख element in Hawaiian mythology, समाविष्ट in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
बाद the arrival of Europeans on the द्वीप, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed the first औपचारिक geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the relationship long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the हवाई Volcano Observatory by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar, initiating निरन्तर वैज्ञानिक observation of the आइलैंड्स.
In the 1970s, a mapping प्रोजेक्ट थी initiated to gain अधिक information about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The हॉटस्पॉट रै चूंकि been tomographically imaged, showing it to be wide and up to deep, और ओलीवाइन and garnet -आधारd studies have shown its मैग्मा कक्ष is approximately.
in its at least 85 million years of कार्यकलाप the hotspot has produced an estimated of rock.
the chain 's rate of drift रै slowly increased over time, causing the amount of समय each व्यक्तिगत volcano is active to decrease, from 18 million years लिये the 76 लाख year old Detroit Seamount, to बस under 900,000 for the one million year-old Kohala ; on the अन्य hand, eruptive volume has increased from per year to about.
Overall, this has caused a ट्रेंड towards more क्रियाशील but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the निकट पक्ष of the hotspot ओवरलैप प्रत्येक other ( forming ऐसे superstructures as Hawaii island and the प्राचीन मावी Nui ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as दूर as apart.

Osteonecrosis of the जबड़ों ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible.
Various forms of onj have महरूम वर्णित over the पिछला 160 सालो, and a क्रमांक of causes have been suggested in the literature.
osteonecrosis of the jaws associated with bisphosphonate therapy, जरूरी by कुछ cancer treatment regimens, has महरूम identified और पारिभाषित as a pathological entity since 2003.
The possible risk from lower oral doses of bisphosphonates, लिया by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
Various treatment options have महरूम explored, however severe मामले of ONJ स्टिल आवश्यकता surgical removal of the प्रभावित bone.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible sites of dental infection हैं जरूरी to help prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is माना.
The Boston रेड Sox are a professional baseball टोली based in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स, and a सदस्य of Major League बेसबॉल 's American League पूर्वी प्रभाग.
संस्थापित in as एक of the American लीग 's आठ charter franchises, the Red Sox 's घर ballpark has महरूम Fenway Park चूंकि.
The `` रेड Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner, जॉन I. Taylor, around, following previous बोस्टन टीमों that had महरूम ज्ञात as the `` Red stockings ``.
वे have played in 11 World Series, winning 7.
Boston was a प्रबल team in the new लीग, defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the पहला World Series in और जीतना four अधिक championships by.
however, वे then गई into एक of the longest championship droughts in बेसबॉल history, called by some the `` Curse of the bambino `` after इसके alleged beginning with the Red sox 's बिक्री of Babe Ruth to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी Yankees two years बाद उनके संसार championship in 1918, an 86-year wait पहले the team 's sixth World चैंपियनशिप in.
However, the team 's history दौरान that period was hardly एक of futility, but was rather punctuated with some of the most memorable पल in World Series इतिहास, सहित Enos वध 's `` mad dash `` in, the `` Impossible Dream `` of, Carlton Fisk 's home run in, और विधेयक Buckner 's error in.
Red sox इतिहास has also been marked by the team 's intense rivalry साथ the New यॉर्क यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest और most historic in North American professional sports.
the बोस्टन रेड Sox हैं owned by Fenway खेल Group, who also own Liverpool फ़ुटबॉल Club of the Premier League in इंग्लैण्ड.
the Red Sox हैं consistently one of the शीर्ष MLB teams in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति, while the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the रेड sox sold out प्रत्येक home game-a कुल of 820 games ( 794 regular ऋतु ) for a major professional sports record that lasted लगभग a decade.
Mince pie भर with mincemeat
Mincemeat is a मिश्रण of chopped dried fruit, distilled आत्माओं and मसाले, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat always contained meat.
Many आधुनिक व्यंजनों contain beef suet, though vegetable shortening is sometimes used in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are found in Australia, Brittany, Canada, northern Europe, Ireland, South Africa, the United किंगडम और the United States.
in some देशों the term mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
Diana, राजकुमारी of Wales ( डायना frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 अगस्त 1997 ) थी the first wife of Charles, Prince of वेल्स, the eldest son and heir apparent of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ II.
वो थी well ज्ञात for her fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और as an प्रतिष्ठित हस्ती of the लेट 20th सदी.
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 जुलाई 1981 was held at St Paul 's गिरजाघर and seen by a global टेलीविज़न audience of over 750 लाख.
जबकि शादीशुदा she bore the titles Princess of Wales, Duchess of Cornwall, Duchess of Rothesay, Countess of चेस्टर and Baroness of Renfrew.
the marriage produced two बेटे, the princes William and हैरी, जो became second and third in लकीर to the अंग्रेजों throne.
Diana was born into an वैभवशाली English परिवार with royal ancestry.
वो was the चौथी child of John स्पेंसर, 8th Earl Spencer and his बीवी Frances, बेटी of Maurice Roche, 4th Baron Fermoy.
वो became a public फिगर साथ the announcement of her engagement.
She भी received recognition for उसके charity work और for her support of the International Campaign to बैन landmines.
From 1989, she was the अध्यक्ष of the ग्रेट Ormond गली Hospital for children, in addition to dozens of other charities.
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during and after उसके विवाह, जिससे ended in तलाक on 28 अगस्त 1996.
Media attention और पब्लिक शोक were considerable following her death in a car क्रैश in Paris on 31 August 1997.
Argentina, officially the अर्जेंटाइन गणतंत्र ( ), is the second largest देश in दोनो South America and the Latin America region.
the country is a federation of 23 प्रांतों and the autonomous city of Buenos आयर्स, its पूंजी and largest नगर.
It is the eighth -largest country in the संसार by land area and the largest among spanish-speaking nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population, with over 41 million people.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding member of the United Nations, Mercosur, the Union of South American राष्ट्र, the Organization of Ibero-American राज्य, the World Bank Group and the World Trade संगठन, and is एक of the G-15 and g-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South America, bordered by Chile to the west and दक्षिण, Bolivia and Paraguay to the north and ब्राज़ील and Uruguay to the northeast.
अर्जेंटीना claims sovereignty over part of अंटार्कटिक, the फ़ॉकलैंड Islands ( ) और South जॉर्जिया और the South सैंडविच Islands.
अर्जेंटीना is the successor state of the Viceroyalty of the Río de la प्लाटा, an overseas colony of the स्पेनी Empire.
अर्जेंटीना declared independence during the अर्जेंटाइन War of Independence, which थी followed by the अर्जेंटाइन सिविल Wars during most of the 19th सदी.
The country faced several military coups and political instability दौरान the 20th सदी, along साथ periodic economic crisis कि continue to this day.
A recognized Southern Cone शक्ति, and मध्य शक्ति, Argentina is Latin America 's third-largest economy, with a `` बहुत ऊँची '' rating on the इंसान विकास index.
Within Latin America, अर्जेंटीना has the पांचवां उच्चतम नाममात्र GDP per capita and the उच्चतम in खरीदना power terms.
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country रै a `` foundation for future विकास due to इसके market size, स्तर of foreign सीधा investment, and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '', और it is classed by निवेशकों as मध्य उभरते economy.
Argentina is the Latin American country साथ the सबसे Nobel Prizes, for a total of five, all प्राप्त during the second हाफ of the twentieth century.
The country has three Nobel prizes in विज्ञान और दो of सलाम.
The most important aspects of science and प्रौद्योगिकी in अर्जेंटीना are चिंतित with medicine, nuclear physics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, space और rocket प्रौद्योगिकी and several fields related to the देश 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the mega exhibition center of science, technology, industry and art that are Latin अमेरिका 's largest.
