the city 's 2010 अनुमानित population is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA, in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, पीट, or the obsolete petp or PET-P, is a thermoplastic polymer resin of the polyester परिवार और is used in सिंथेटिक fibers ; beverage, food और अन्य liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and अभियान्त्रिकी resins often in combination साथ glass fiber.
the पद polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion क्युकी इस पदार्थ, PET, does not contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate form, poly ( एथिलीन terephthalate ), is often used in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
depending on इसके processing and thermal इतिहास, polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर.
The semicrystalline सामग्री might appear पारदर्शी ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or opaque and white ( particle आकार up to a few microns ) depending on its क्रिस्टल ढांचा और particle आकार.
Its मोनोमर ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid और एथिलीन glycol साथ water as a byproduct, or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( done तत्काल after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET उत्पादन is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), with बोतल उत्पादन accounting for around 30 % of वैश्विक demand.
In the context of textile applications, PET is referred to by its common name, `` पॉलिएस्टर, '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally प्रयुक्त in relation to पैकेजिंग.
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer production and is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are पहला और second, respectively.
PET consists of polymerized units of the मोनोमर ethylene terephthalate, with repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, और has the number `` 1 '' as इसके recycling symbol.
Louisiana was admitted to the Union on April 30, 1812, and elects senators to वर्ग 2 and Class 3.
Its current senators are डेमोक्रेट Mary Landrieu and Republican David Vitter.
Black pudding, blood pudding or रक्त सॉसेज is a type of sausage बना by cooking blood or सूखी blood with a फिलर until it is मोटा enough to congeal when cooled.
The dish exists in various संस्कृतियों इससे Asia to Europe and the Americas.
Pig, cattle, शीप, duck, और बकरी रक्त can be used depending on different देशों.
In Europe and the Americas, typical fillers शामिल meat, fat, suet, bread, cornmeal, sweet potato, onion, chestnuts, जौ, and oatmeal.
In स्पेन, Portugal and Asia, potato is often replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
Stakeholder ( कॉरपोरेट ), a person, group, संगठन, member or system who affects or can be affected by an संगठन 's actions
Stakeholder, an एंटिटी कि can be प्रभावित by the परिणाम of कि in which they are said to be stakeholders, i.e., that in which they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a person, group or organization साथ an interest in a project
शेयरधारक theory, a theory that identifies and models the groups which are हितधारकों of a corporation or project
Stakeholder analysis, the process of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a third party who temporarily holds धन or property while इसके owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9, 1925 - सितंबर 1, 2003 ) was an अमरीकी थिएटर and film director.
Smight was born in मिनियापोलिस, Minnesota and went to school with future actor Peter Graves.
उसके film क्रेडिट शामिल The Traveling जल्लाद, खरगोश, Run, मीत युगल, मिडवे, Harper, विमानक्षेत्र 1975, फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning Eddie, as खूब as अनेक episodes of television series such as The Twilight मण्डल and The अल्फ्रेड Hitchcock Hour.
He also निर्देशित the 1960 Broadway play The 49th cousin and composed the music for the film adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry.
Smight died from cancer in लॉस Angeles, California.
Dmitri ivanovich mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907 o.s. 27 जनवरी 1834 – 20 जनवरी 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and आविष्कारक.
He formulated the Periodic विधि, created उसके अपना संस्करण of the periodic table of elements, and used it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements and also to predict the properties of तत्व yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the City of modesto, is the county सीट and largest नगर of Stanislaus County, California, संयुक्त States.
With a population of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the state of California.
The Modesto Census County Division, जिससे शामिल the cities of Ceres and Riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
modesto is located in the central valley area of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 miles north of Fresno, 92 miles ईस्ट of सैन फ्रांसिस्को, 68 miles south of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles वेस्ट of yosemite National पार्क, and 24 मील south of Stockton.
Modesto, a 29-time Tree नगर USA honoree, is surrounded by rich farmland, lending to a ranking लिये the county as 6th among all कैलिफ़ोर्निया counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, chickens, walnuts, and corn silage, the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 अरब in agricultural उत्पादन in 2011.
modesto was immortalized in the 1973 जार्ज Lucas film अमरीकी Graffiti.
The पुरस्कार winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the tv दिखाएँ Happy दिनों and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, Harrison Ford and Richard Dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in the film.
The soundtrack was a विशाल कामयाबी.
निदेशक George Lucas is a native of Modesto, graduating from downey ऊँची स्कूल in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011, which interviews 1,000 participants रोज़ और asks individuals to assess their jobs, finances, physical health, emotional state of दिमाग और communities, क्रमित Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed.
in दिसम्बर 2009, Forbes ranked Modesto 48th out of 100 among `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities ''.
In this ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability और travel time but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures.
Independence Day, commonly ज्ञात as the Fourth of July, is a federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4, 1776, declaring independence from the किंगडम of Great ब्रिटेन.
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, concerts, बेसबॉल खेल, family reunions, and political speeches and ceremonies, in जोड to विभिन्न other पब्लिक and निजी events celebrating the history, सरकारी, and traditions of the United States.
स्वतंत्रता Day is the national day of the United States.
a gender प्रतीक denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an agent by gender.
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀ हैं निकला from astrological symbols, denoting the शास्त्रीय planets मंगल and शुक्र, respectively.
These प्रतीकों have been in use चूंकि the पुनर्जागरण भी denoting तत्व in alchemy, specifically the धातुओं आयरन and copper.
वे यहूद first used to denote the effective gender of पौधे ( i.e. sex of व्यक्तिगत in a given crossbreed, since most plants are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a अस्थाई सही to hold land or property in which a lessee or a tenant holds rights of रियल property by कुछ रूप of title from a lessor or landlord.
हालांकि a किरायेदार does थाम rights to real प्रॉपर्टी, a leasehold estate is typically माना personal प्रॉपर्टी.
Leasehold is a रूप of land tenure or property tenure जहाँ एक पार्टी buys the right to occupy land or a भवन for a given length of time.
as lease is a legal estate, leasehold estate can be bought और sold on the open market.
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright और thereafter held for an अनिर्धार्य लंबाई of समय, and also differs from a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic आधार such as साप्ताहिक or मासिक.
जबतक the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or centuries ; a 99 year lease is quite common ) the leaseholder रै the right to remain in occupation as an assured किरायेदार paying an agreed किराया to the owner.
Terms of the अनुबंध are contained in a पट्टे, जिससे has elements of contract और प्रॉपर्टी law intertwined.
The पद estate for years may occasionally be used.
This refers to a leasehold estate for कोई specific period of समय ( the शब्द `` सालो '' is misleading ).
An estate for years is not automatically renewed.
colloquially, `` lease '' and `` पट्टे `` are often a formalization of a longer, specific period as compared साथ a `` rental '' कि created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the समाप्त of a short period.
ओलिविया ( also ज्ञात as Welcome to the World of the Pig ओलिविया ) is a British-American children 's animated television series produced by media कम्पनी Chorion and based on इयान Falconer 's books.
It is seen on Nick jr. in the us, Milkshake !
, Nick jr. in the UK and Ireland, और डिज़्नी Junior in लैटिन अमेरिका and Brazil, Treehouse TV in Canada.
The show has जीती a silver Parents ' Choice Award for its positive स्टोरी lines and characters.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( नीचे ) and Caribbean ( top ), with कनाल at शीर्ष center
The पनामा Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama कि connects the Atlantic समंदर ( via the Caribbean समुद्र ) to the प्रशांत Ocean.
the canal cuts आरपार the isthmus of Panama and is a key conduit लिये international मेरीटाइम trade.
There are locks at each end to लिफ्ट ships up to gatun Lake ( ऊपर sea-level ).
Gatun Lake थी created to reduce the राशि of work required for the कनाल.
The current locks are चौड़ी.
a तीसरा, wider lane of locks is being built.
France began कार्य on the कनाल in 1881, लकिन had to रोकें क्युकी of engineering समस्याएं and high mortality due to disease.
The United States ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to पूरा the canal in 1914, enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake ड्योढ़ी ) or to navigate the जलसन्धि of magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects कभी undertaken, the पनामा कनाल shortcut made it possible लिये जहाजों to travel between the अटलांटिक and Pacific महासागर in हाफ the समय previously required.
the shorter, faster, safer route to the us वेस्ट Coast and to राष्ट्र in और along the Pacific समंदर allowed those places to become more integrated with the world अर्थव्यवस्था.
During this time, ownership of the territory कि is अभी the Panama Canal was first कोलम्बियाई, then French, and then American ; the United राज्य समाप्त the construction.
The canal was taken over in 1999 by the Panamanian सरकारी, as long planned.
सालाना traffic has risen इससे about 1,000 जहाजों when the canal opened in 1914, to 14,702 vessels in 2008, the latter measuring a कुल of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( pc/ums ) टन.
by 2008, more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the कनाल, many of them much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can पारगमन the कनाल today are called Panamax.
The अमरीकी Society of Civil Engineers has named the पनामा कनाल एक of the seven wonders of the आधुनिक world.
बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन ( April 17, 1790 ) was one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
A विख्यात polymath, Franklin थी a अग्रणी लेखक, मुद्रक, political theorist, politician, postmaster, scientist, संगीतकार, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, और diplomat.
As a scientist, he थी a major फिगर in the American आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of physics लिये his discoveries and theories regarding विद्युत.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the Franklin stove, a carriage odometer, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated many civic संगठन, सहित a fire department and a university.
Franklin अर्जित the title of `` the First अमरीकी '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for औपनिवेशिक एकता ; as an author and spokesman in London for several colonies, तब as the first United States दूत to France, he exemplified the emerging अमरीकी nation.
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the व्यावहारिक values of thrift, hard work, education, community स्पिरिट, self-governing institutions, and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious, with the scientific and tolerant values of the आत्मज्ञान.
In the शब्द of इतिहासकार Henry Steele Commager, `` In a Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism बगैर its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its ऊष्मा. ''
To Walter Isaacson, इस makes Franklin `` the most accomplished American of his age and the most influential in inventing the प्रकार of society America would become. ''
Franklin, always proud of his working class roots, became a successful newspaper editor and printer in Philadelphia, the leading city in the colonies.
He was also partners with विलियम Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of जिसको published the पेन्सिलवेनिया Chronicle, a newspaper that was known for its revolutionary sentiments और criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
he became wealthy publishing Poor Richard 's Almanack and the पेन्सिलवेनिया Gazette.
Franklin gained international renown as a scientist for his famous experiments in electricity और for his many inventions, especially the बिजली rod.
he निभाई a प्रमुख role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania और was elected the first president of the American Philosophical Society.
फ्रैंकलिन became a नेशनल hero in America जब he spearheaded the effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular स्टैम्प Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the French as American minister to Paris और थी a प्रमुख figure in the विकास of positive Franco-American relations.
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies, which सक्रिय उसे to नियत up the first नेशनल संचार network.
He was active in community अफेयर्स, colonial और state politics, as खूब as नेशनल and अंतरराष्ट्रीय affairs.
इससे 1785 to 1788, he served as governor of पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Toward the end of his life, he freed his slaves and became एक of the most prominent abolitionists.
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement, and status as one of अमेरिका 's most influential Founding Fathers, have seen Franklin honored on coinage और money ; warships ; the names of many towns, काउंटी, शैक्षणिक institutions, namesakes, और companies ; and more than two centuries बाद his death, countless सांस्कृतिक सन्दर्भ.
Criminal Minds is an American police प्रक्रियात्मक television program that premiered September 22, 2005, on सीबीएस.
The series follows a team of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral विश्लेषण ईकाई ( BAU ) based in Quantico, वर्जिनिया.
The bau is part of the FBI National बीच लिये the विश्लेषण of हिंसक Crime.
the show differs from many procedural dramas by focusing on profiling the दण्ड, rather than the crime itself.
the दिखाएँ is उत्पादित by The Mark Gordon कम्पनी in association with CBS Television Studios ( originally Paramount संजाल Television then CBS Paramount Network टेलीविज़न ) and ABC studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS घोषित in October 2009 कि विरासत Interactive would develop a video game आधारित on the show.
The game would आवश्यकता players to जाँचें अपराधों scenes for clues to सहायता solve हत्या mysteries.
The interactive पहेली खेल was released in 2012, but did not feature any of the voices of the show 's cast, nor was the cast involved साथ the प्रोजेक्ट.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed Criminal Minds for an eighth ऋतु, which premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the अमरीकी grunge band निर्वाण, written by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain.
the song was released as the first सिंगल from the group 's third and फाइनल studio album, In utero, in 1993.
It थी one of दो songs from the एल्बम mixed by Scott Litt in अनुक्रम to augment the original production by producer Steve albini.
जबकि Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not रिलीज a शारीरिक single for बिक्री in the United States, `` heart-shaped बक्सा '' received much अमरीकी रेडियो airplay, reaching क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड Modern चट्टान ट्रैक्स चार्ट.
The international रिलीज of the single reached number five on the uk Singles Chart.
The song 's music वीडियो, directed by एंटोन Corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
the कक्षीय speed of a body, generally a planet, a natural satellite, an artificial उपग्रह, or a multiple star, is the speed at which it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a more विशाल body.
it can be प्रयुक्त to refer to either the mean orbital गति, the average गति as it completes an orbit, or instantaneous orbital गति, the गति at a particular पाइंट in its कक्षा.
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed इससे the distance to the central देह at कि position, and the specific कक्षीय energy, which is independent of स्थिति : the kinetic energy is the total उर्जा minus the potential energy.

Brown राजमहल Hotel is the second-oldest ऑपरेटिंग होटल in Denver, Colorado and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is now operated by कोरम Hotels और रिसॉर्ट.
It was built in 1892, one year later than the Oxford Hotel.
It was named for इसके original owner, Henry C. Brown, और was designed साथ इसके विषम triangular shape by architect फ़्रैंक Edbrooke.
The होटल is स्तिथ at 321 17th St, डेनवर, CO between 17th Street, Broadway और Tremont Street/Pl in शहर Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
the main entrance door is on Tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a उपभोक्ता video format used to स्टोर डिजिटल video on DVD discs, and is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता video format in एशिया, उत्तर America, यूरोपीय, and ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a dvd ड्राइव and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD खिलाड़ी, or a computer DVD ड्राइव साथ a तन्त्र dvd player ).
Commercial dvd movies are एनकोडेड using a combination of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 संपीडित video और ऑडियो of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate लिये DVD movies सीमाएँ from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, और the बिट rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available लिये retail around 1997.
the dvd-video specification was निर्मित by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त from dvd Format/Logo Licensing Corporation लिये a fee of $ 5,000.
the specification is not सरेआम available, because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain सूचना in the DVD Book is मालिकाना and confidential.
The nautical मील ( प्रतीक M, NM or nmi ) is a unit of length कि is परिचय one मिनट of चाप of latitude measured साथ any meridian, or about एक मिनट of arc of longitude at the equator.
By international अनुबंध it has been नियत at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( परिचय 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for उपयोग in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई by the bipm ) used especially by navigators in the शिपिंग and विमानन industries, और also in ध्रुवीय खोजी.
it is commonly used in international law and treaties, especially regarding the limits of territorial waters.
It developed from the sea mile and the सम्बन्धित geographical mile.
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air navigators worldwide क्युकी of इसके convenience जब working साथ charts.
Most nautical चार्ट उपयोग the मर्केटर projection जिनकी स्केल varies by about a factor of six from the equator to 80° अक्षांश, so चार्ट covering large areas can not उपयोग a सिंगल linear स्केल.
the nautical मील is nearly equal to a minute of अक्षांश on a चार्ट, so a अलहदा measured साथ a chart divider can be roughly परिवर्तित to nautical miles using the चार्ट 's latitude scale.
shippensburg is a borough in Cumberland and Franklin counties in the u.S. state of Pennsylvania.
settled in 1730, shippensburg झूठ in the Cumberland Valley, 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 people lived वहीँ ; in 1910, 3,457 ; और in 1940, 5,244 people जिया there.
the population थी 5,492 at the 2010 census.
Shippensburg was incorporated as a borough on January 21, 1819.
In the past, there यहूद फर्नीचर factories, engine and pump works, and other industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is भी the home of The Beistle Company, the oldest and largest manufacturer of सजावट and party goods, which sells इसके distinctive मधुकोश पेपर decorations विश्वव्यापी.
It is also the स्थान of Pague and fegan, the oldest continuously operated hardware स्टोर in Pennsylvania.
In may 2012, Volvo निर्माण उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख expansion project to bring its American headquarters to shippensburg.
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg University of पेन्सिलवेनिया, one of 14 universities of the Pennsylvania State System of उच्चतर Education.
Yearly the last full सप्ताह of जुलाई, the Shippensburg Community Fair is held.
Begun in 1958, the मेला bills itself as Pennsylvania 's largest bi-county fair.
The fair includes agricultural exhibits, a craft show, खाना vendors, and कार्निवल यात्राएँ amongst other things.
प्रत्येक summer on the last शनिवार of August, shippensburg holds the मकई Festival, an event कि brings regional artisans and vendors to operate stands downtown.
The downtown is closed to ट्रैफ़िक लिये at least 5 ब्लॉक लिये most of the day.
औसत उपस्थिति at the festival is estimated at 60,000 - 70,000 प्रत्येक year.
ब्लैक बालदार tongue ( BHT, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate साथ ब्लैक or भूरा discoloration, giving a black और hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, but it is a harmless condition.
Predisposing कारकों include smoking, xerostomia ( शुष्क mouth ), soft आहार, poor oral hygiene और certain medications.
Management is by improving मौखिक hygiene, विशेषकर scraping or brushing the tongue.
the IEEE 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a serial bus इंटरफ़ेस मानक for high-speed communications and isochronous real-time data ट्रांसफ़र.
it was विकसित in the लेट 1980s और early 1990s by Apple, जो called it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to usb, और प्रायः those दो technologies हैं माना साथ, though usb has more मार्केट share.
Apple first शामिल firewire in some of इसके 1999 मॉडल, and सबसे ठहराना computers since the year 2000 have included firewire पोर्ट, though, as of 2013, nothing परे the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is भी ज्ञात by the brand i.link ( Sony ), and लिंक्स ( Texas Instruments ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many applications, because of निम्नतर implementation लागत और a simplified, more adaptable cabling system.
the 1394 standard also defines a backplane इंटरफ़ेस, though this is not as widely प्रयुक्त.
IEEE 1394 is the high-definition Audio-Video संजाल Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection interface for A/V ( audio/visual ) घटक communication and control.
FireWire is also available in wireless, fiber optic, and समाक्षीय संस्करण using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` स्टीवी '' Ray Vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding सदस्य and leader of दोगुना Trouble.
Together with drummer Chris layton and bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the ब्लूज़ revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went सुनहरा.
he was born and raised in Dallas, टेक्सास, and for a short period of time lived in Graham, टेक्सास.
As the younger bhai of Jimmie Vaughan, vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
at आयु 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining समूह such as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a बैंड that eventually evolved into दोगुना Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan and दोगुना Trouble performed at the montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland, catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson browne.
बोवी asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance, जबकि Browne offered the बैंड फ़्री use of उसके personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double ट्रबल were signed to एपिक Records by दिग्गज record producer John हैमंड Sr. and released their डेब्यू album, Texas Flood in जून of that साल.
After successful touring, the समूह released the albums, could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) and आत्मा to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which प्रदर्शित new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
हालांकि his career था progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation हॉस्पिटल in Atlanta, जॉर्जिया to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit और returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, in कदम was released and अर्जित them a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार for Best Contemporary ब्लूज़ प्रदर्शन.
On अगस्त 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter क्रैश following a प्रदर्शन in ईस्ट Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style थी निकला from a किस्में of musical जाति.
He was influenced by blues musicians including अल्बर्ट King, Freddie King, Otis Rush, और Muddy Waters, and rock guitarists ऐसे as जिमि Hendrix और Lonnie mack.
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues और pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his गिटार playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest guitarists '' in 2011.
He was मरणोपरांत inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie रे vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come इससे the state of Texas.
GigE redirects here.
For the कैमरा protocol, देखिए gige दृष्टि.
In कंप्यूटर networking, gigabit Ethernet ( gbe or 1 GigE ) is a term describing various technologies for transmitting ईथरनेट frames at a rate of a gigabit per दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 बिट्स per दूसरी ), as पारिभाषित by the आईईईई 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into उपयोग beginning in 1999, gradually supplanting Fast ईथरनेट in तार लोकल networks, where it performed considerably faster.
the केबल and equipment are very समान to previous standards and were very common and economical by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links कनेक्ट through hubs हैं allowed by the specification, लकिन full-duplex usage with switches is much more common.

The main components of a stamp:
1. Image
2. Perforations
3. Denomination
4. Country name
A postage stamp is a small piece of पेपर कि is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as evidence of payment of postage.
Typically, stamps हैं made from special paper, with a नेशनल नामांकन and denomination ( दाम ) on the face, and a gum adhesive on the reverse side.
postage stamps are खरीदा इससे a डाक administration or other प्राधिकृत vendor and are प्रयुक्त to pay लिये the costs involved in moving mail as well as अन्य business necessities ऐसे as insurance and पंजीकरण.
The stamp’s आकार is प्रायः that of a small rectangle of varying proportions, though triangles or अन्य आकार are occasionally used.
the स्टैम्प is affixed to an envelope or अन्य postal कवर ( i.e., packet, box, mailing cylinder ) that the customer wishes to send.
The मद is तब processed by the postal प्रणाली, where a postmark, sometimes known as a cancellation mark, is usually applied over the stamp और cover ; this कार्यविधि marks the stamp as used, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the date और point of origin of the mailing.
The mailed मद is then delivered to the address कि the customer रै applied to the envelope or cover.
Postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail since the 1840s.
Before this time, ink और hand-stamps ( hence the शब्द 'stamp ' ), usually made इससे wood or कॉर्क, were often used to frank the mail and confirm the भुगतान of postage.
The पहला adhesive postage स्टैम्प, commonly referred to as the Penny Black, थी issued in the United Kingdom in 1840.
the आविष्कार of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of ग्रेट Britain और Ireland, which in the early 19th century was in disarray और rife with corruption.
There are varying खाते of the आविष्कारक or inventors of the stamp.
पहले the परिचय of postage stamps, mail in the UK was सशुल्क for by the recipient, a system that was संबद्ध with an irresolvable problem : the लागत of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were असमर्थ or unwilling to pay for वितरित वस्तुएं, and senders had no incentive to restrict the number, size, or weight of वस्तुएं भेजा, whether or not they would ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved इस समस्या in a simple and elegant manner, with the अतिरिक्त benefit of room लिये an element of beauty to be introduced.
Later related inventions include डाक stationery such as prepaid-postage envelopes, post cards, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage meters, और, more recently, specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the u.S. postal सेवा for प्रधानता or express mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience लिये दोनो the मेलर and postal officials, अधिक efficiently recovered costs for the postal service, और ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, their use resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps during this era were the most popular रास्ता of paying for mail, लकिन by the समाप्त of the 20th century were rapidly being eclipsed by the उपयोग of metered postage and बल्क mailing by व्यवसायों. )
the वही परिणाम with आदर to communications by निजी parties occurred over the last decade of the 20th century and the first दशक of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone संचार and the विकास and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) और bill paying प्रणालियों था.
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread basis, historians and collectors began to take सूचना.
The study of postage stamps and their use is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be दोनो a शौक and a form of historical study and reference, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing प्रणालियों have always महरूम शामिल with the history of राष्ट्र.
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public विश्वविद्यालयों in Birmingham in the U.S. राज्य of अलबामा.
Developing from an extension center established in 1936, the institution became an autonomous institution in 1969 and is today one of तीन institutions in the University of Alabama System.
UAB offers over 140 programs of पढ़ाई in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's, master 's, डॉक्टरेट, and पेशेवर डिग्री in the social and behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, business, शिक्षा, engineering, and health-related fields such as medicine, dentistry, optometry, नर्सिंग, and public स्वास्थ्य.
The school is highly प्रसिद्ध लिये its medical research and natural sciences programs.
The uab स्वास्थ्य System, one of the largest academic चिकित्सा centers in the संयुक्त States, is संबद्ध with the university.
UAB हॉस्पिटल sponsors residency कार्यक्रम in various चिकित्सा specialties, including आतंरिक आयुर्विज्ञान, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
UAB Hospital is the only acs verified Level I trauma center in Alabama, as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program.
UAB is the state 's largest employer, साथ अधिक than 18,000 faculty and staff and over 53,000 कार्य at the university और in the health प्रणाली.
An अनुमानित 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan क्षेत्रफल and 1 in 33 jobs in the राज्य of अलबामा are सीधे or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall annual economic प्रभाव was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the University of Alabama at बर्मिंघम नामांकित 17,999 विद्यार्थी from more than 110 countries, including 1,605 freshmen.
वहीँ are योजनाएँ to commence with an `` aggressive '' विकास in नामांकन at UAB.
The current uab President is Dr. Ray L. Watts.
Tofu, भी called सेम curd, is a food बना by coagulating soy juice and तब pressing the resulting curds into नरम white blocks.
it is a component in अनेक East Asian and Southeast Asian cuisines.
There हैं many different varieties of टोफू, including भैस tofu and tofu कि has been processed in some रास्ता.
Tofu रै a subtle स्वाद and can be used in savory और sweet बर्तन.
It is often seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
टोफू originated in ancient China some 2,000 सालो पहले.
Chinese legend ascribes its invention to prince Liu An ( Chinese : 劉安 Liú Ān, 179–122 BC ).
Tofu and इसके production technique were introduced into Korea and then Japan दौरान the nara period.
It spread into other parts of East Asia as well.
This स्प्रेड likely coincided साथ the स्प्रेड of Buddhism because it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism.
li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty described a विधि of making tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a कम कैलोरी count, अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of protein, and छोटी मोटे.
It is high in आयरन और depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may also be ऊँची in calcium and/or मैग्नीशियम.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common चिंपैंजी, known लिये being the one-time pet of American recording कलाकार माइकल Jackson, जो bought the primate इससे a Texas research सुविधा in the early 1980s.
The animal was a frequent travel साथी to the सिंगर, जिनकी attachment to the animal led to media mockery and, among अन्य factors, to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad संसार Tour, for उदाहरण, Jackson brought बुलबुले with him to Japan, जहाँ they both drank चाय with the mayor of Osaka.
Bubbles was initially kept at the Jackson family 's घर in encino, लॉस एंजिल्स, लकिन थी moved to Neverland ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in जैक्सन 's bedroom, प्रयुक्त the singer 's toilet, and ate candy in the Neverland movie थिएटर.
In 2003 the public learned कि, जैसे all captive chimpanzees, Bubbles था matured into a large and आक्रामक adult chimp unsuitable as a साथी एनिमल.
he was भेजा to a कैलिफ़ोर्निया animal प्रशिक्षक, where he was reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut bas his operation in 2004, Bubbles was moved to the Center for ग्रेट Apes, a sanctuary in Wauchula, Florida, जहाँ he रै जिया since 2005.
Muse are an अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान band from teignmouth, देवों, which formed in 1994.
The band consists of स्कूल friends Matthew bellamy ( सीसे vocals, lead guitar, piano, keyboards, keytar ), क्रिस्टोफर Wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and डोमिनिक हावर्ड ( ड्रम, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 album Black Holes and खुलासे, keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live साथ the बैंड.
Muse are ज्ञात for उनके energetic and extravagant live प्रदर्शन और their fusion of many music genres, सहित space rock, progressive rock, alternative rock, heavy metal, शास्त्रीय music and electronica.
चिंतन have released six स्टुडियो एल्बम : showbiz ( 1999 ), उत्पत्ति of Symmetry ( 2001 ), Absolution ( 2003 ), Black Holes and Revelations ( 2006 ), The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd विधि ( 2012 ).
They have also issued तीन सजीव एल्बम, Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ), जिससे is also a संकलन of b-sides, Absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley स्टेडियम in 2007.
ब्लैक छेद and Revelations earned the band a Mercury Prize नामांकन और a third place finish in the NME Albums of the Year सूची for 2006.
चिंतन have also जीती a collection of music awards throughout their history, including five MTV Europe Music Awards, छह q Awards, eight NME Awards, two Brit Awards —winning `` Best British सजीव अधिनियम '' twice, an MTV Video म्यूज़िक Award, four Kerrang !
Awards and an American म्यूज़िक Award.
वे यहूद also nominated लिये five Grammy Awards, of which they जीती Best चट्टान Album, for उनके fifth स्टुडियो album The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
bloemfontein (, ; Dutch लिये `` fountain of पुष्प '' ) is the capital नगर of the Free State Province of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; and, as the judicial capital of the स्वदेश, one of South Africa 's three national राजधानी – the other two being Cape Town, the legislative capital, and Pretoria, the administrative capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly और poetically known as `` the नगर of गुलाब ``, owing to the abundance of these पुष्प और the annual rose festival held वहीँ.
The city 's Sesotho name is mangaung, meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on dry घासभूमि at, at an altitude of above sea स्तर.
The नगर is home to 369,568 residents, जबकि the mangaung लोकल Municipality has a जनसांख्यिकी of 645,455.

The अर्थ of life is a philosophical सवाल concerning the significance of life or existence in सामान्य.
It can also be expressed in अलग forms, ऐसे as `` क्यों हैं we यहाँ ? ``, `` कया is life सब about ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
it has been the subject of much philosophical, scientific, and theological अटकलें throughout इतिहास.
There have been a विशाल number of proposed answers to these सवाल from अनेक different सांस्कृतिक और ideological पृष्ठभूमि.
The meaning of जीवन is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence, social ties, consciousness, and happiness, and borders on अनेक other issues, such as symbolic अर्थ, ontology, value, purpose, ethics, शुभ और दुष्ट, free will, the existence of one or multiple देवताओं, conceptions of God, the आत्मा, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions फ़ोकस primarily on describing related अनुभवजन्य facts परिचय the ब्रह्मांड, exploring the context and parameters concerning the 'how ' of जीवन.
Science also studies and can provide सुझाव for the pursuit of well-being and a related conception of morality.
An alternative, humanistic approach poses the question `` What is the अर्थ of my life ? ''
The value of the सवाल pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the achievement of ultimate वास्तविकता, or a अहसास of oneness, or even a feeling of sacredness.
Family Guy creator सेठ macfarlane भी provides the आवाज़ें of Peter Griffin, Stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, और ग्लेन Quagmire.
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features पाँच main voice actors, and numerous regular cast और recurring guest सितारों.
the प्रिंसिपल आवाज़ डाल consists of show creator सेठ macfarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila kunis ( जो replaced Lacey chabert after the first ऋतु ) और Mike हेनरी and now, the नई actor Beau Osborne.
पुनरावर्ती voice actors include Patrick Warburton, आदम West, John G. ब्रेनन, Nicole Sullivan और Jennifer Tilly, और repeat guest सितारों include Phyllis Diller, चार्ल्स Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast सदस्यों provide आवाज़ें for multiple वर्ण.
the voice actors, in portraying the विभिन्न character personalities on the show, draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture.
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor, after members of the show बाएँ the series or had conflicting obligations.
kunis थी nominated लिये an एनी Award लिये voicing Meg griffin in the season 5 episode `` मुश्किल Legal `` और MacFarlane has also जीती an Emmy Award for Outstanding voice-over प्रदर्शन and an Annie पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Voice Acting in an एनिमेटेड Television उत्पादन, हालांकि no other डाल member has won an award for their work on the series.

`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; शाब्दिक translation : `` the Princess on the मटर '' ) is a साहित्यिक fairy tale by hans Christian Andersen about a young woman जिनकी royal identity is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
the टेल थी first published with तीन अन्य by Andersen in an inexpensive booklet on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by c.a. Reitzel.
andersen had heard the story as a child, और it likely रै इसके source in folk material, संभवतः originating from Sweden as it is अनजान in the Danish oral परंपरा.
Neither `` the Princess and the मटर '' nor Andersen 's other किस्से of 1835 were खूब received by डैनिश critics, who disliked उनके कैज़ुअल, chatty style, and their lack of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess और the Pea '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production called Once Upon a Mattress अभिनीत Carol Burnett.
German Americans ( ) are नागरिकों of the संयुक्त States who were either born in जर्मनी or हैं of German ancestry.
They comprise about 50 million people, बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry group ahead of Irish Americans, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और अंग्रेज़ी Americans.
They comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora सब over the संसार.
None of the जर्मनी states had New World colonies.
Not जबतक the 1670s did the first significant groups of German immigrants arrive in the British colonies, settling primarily in New यॉर्क and Pennsylvania.
Immigration continued in very large numbers during the 19th century, with कुछ eight लाख arrivals इससे Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of land and religious freedom, and pushed out of Europe by shortages of जमीन and religious or political oppression.
Many arrived seeking धार्मिक or political स्वतंत्रता, others लिये economic opportunities वृहद than those in यूरोपीय, and others simply लिये the chance to प्रारंभ भैस in the New World.
The आमद before 1850 were ज़्यादातर किसानो जो sought आउट the most productive जमीन, जहाँ their intensive farming तकनीकों would अदा off.
After 1840, many came to cities, where `` germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon emerged.
German Americans established the पहला kindergartens in the United राज्य, introduced the Christmas tree tradition, और originated popular American foods ऐसे as hot कुत्तो और hamburgers.
जर्मनी अमरीकी celebrations हैं held throughout the country, one of the सबसे well-known being the german-american Steuben Parade in नई यॉर्क नगर, held प्रत्येक तीसरा शनिवार in September.
There are also major annual events in Chicago, Cincinnati, मिल्वौकी, Pittsburgh, St. Louis and other cities.
Like many अन्य immigrants that came to the United States, an overwhelming क्रमांक of लोगों of German or आंशिक जर्मनी descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United राज्य Constitution is a ब्रैड introductory बयान of the संविधान 's आधारभूत purposes and guiding principles.
It states in सामान्य terms, and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution होता achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United राज्य.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it sets into motion a सवाल as it pertains to that विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत rights and समता among सब लोगों ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social लोकतंत्र.
The इतिहास of the Internet began with the विकास of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts कि would lead to the Internet when a संदेश was भेजा over the arpanet from computer science Professor Leonard kleinrock 's laboratory at विश्वविद्यालयों of California, लॉस Angeles ( UCLA ), after the second piece of संजाल equipment was installed at Stanford Research संस्थान ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at npl in the UK, CYCLADES, मेरिट Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the लेट 1960s और early 1970s using a variety of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols लिये internetworking, in which multiple separate networks could be joined साथ into a network of संजाल.
In 1982, the Internet protocol सुइट ( TCP/IP ) was मानकीकृत, और consequently, the अवधारणा of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP संजाल, called the अंतरजाल, was introduced.
अभिगम to the ARPANET थी विस्तारित in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( nsf ) विकसित the Computer विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) and again in 1986 when nsfnet provided access to supercomputer साइट in the United राज्य इससे शोध and शिक्षा organizations.
Commercial अंतरजाल service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET थी decommissioned in 1990.
the Internet was commercialized in 1995 when nsfnet was decommissioned, removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the अंतरजाल रै had a revolutionary प्रभाव on culture and commerce, सहित the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` फोन calls '', two-way interactive video calls, and the World चौड़ी Web with इसके चर्चा forums, ब्लॉग, social networking, और online खरीदारी sites.
The research and शिक्षा community continues to develop and use advanced संजाल such as NSF 's बहुत ऊँची speed Backbone Network सेवा ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over रेशा optic networks ऑपरेटिंग at 1-gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or more.
the Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was लगभग तत्काल in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
आज the Internet continues to grow, driven by कभी greater amounts of online information, कॉमर्स, entertainment, and सोशल नेटवर्किंग.
Southwest एयरलाइंस co. ( ) is a major U.S. airline and the world 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in Dallas, टेक्सास.
It was established in 1967 और अपनाया its वर्तमान name in 1971.
the airline has more than 46,000 कर्मचारी and operates more than 3,400 flights per दिन.
as of जून 5, 2011, it carries the most domestic passengers of कोई U.S. airline.
As of अप्रैल 2013, Southwest Airlines has scheduled service to 84 destinations in 41 states और Puerto रीको.
Southwest एयरलाइंस has solely संचालित Boeing 737s, मगर for a few years in the 1970s और 1980s, when it operated Boeing 727s.
As of August 2012, Southwest is the largest ऑपरेटर of the 737 worldwide साथ over 550 in service, each ऑपरेटिंग an average of six flights per day.
in May 2011, the airline acquired airtran एयरवेज़, with integration of the carriers expected to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the company was issued a सिंगल operating प्रमाणपत्र, technically बनने one airline.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager शुभारम्भ in 1939 by the Latrobe brewing Company.
Although संस्थापित as a local बियर in Western Pennsylvania, it was marketed aggressively और eventually became a national उत्पाद.
The brand थी sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis, Missouri, in mid 2006, which transferred brewing परिचालन to New जर्सी.
बेनेडिक्ट XVI (,, ; born Joseph Aloisius ratzinger on 16 April 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church.
He परोसा as Pope from 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was both the leader of the Catholic गिरिजाघर and sovereign of the वेटिकन City State.
बेनेडिक्ट was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal Inauguration Mass on 24 April 2005, and took कब्ज़ा of his cathedral, the archbasilica of St. John Lateran, on 7 may 2005.
ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native Bavaria, Ratzinger established himself as a highly regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the late 1950s और was appointed a full professor in 1958.
बाद a long career as an academic, serving as a professor of धर्मशास्त्र at अनेक German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg, where he served as वाइस President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he थी नियुक्त archbishop of Munich and Freising and कार्डिनल by Pope पॉल VI in 1977, an unusual promotion लिये किसी साथ छोटी लुभावने experience.
In 1981, he settled in Rome जब he became Prefect of the Congregation for the doctrine of the Faith, एक of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 until his election as pope, he थी also डीन of the कॉलेज of Cardinals, and as ऐसे, the primus inter pares among the कार्डिनल्स.
prior to becoming pope, he थी `` a प्रमुख फिगर on the वेटिकन stage for a quarter of a century '' as `` एक of the most respected, influential और controversial members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none when it आए to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of पोप John Paul II 's closest confidants.
He was originally a liberal theologian, लकिन अपनाया conservative views after 1968.
उसके prolific writings defend traditional Catholic doctrine and values.
दौरान his papacy, Benedict XVI advocated a return to आधारभूत Christian values to counter the increased secularisation of many Western देशों.
he views relativism 's denial of objective truth, and the denial of moral सच्चाई in particular, as the central problem of the 21st सदी.
He taught the importance of both the Catholic Church and an understanding of परमेश्वर 's redemptive प्रेम.
Pope बेनेडिक्ट भी revived a number of परंपराओं including elevating the Tridentine द्रव्यमान to a more prominent स्थिति.
he renewed the संबंध between the Catholic Church and आर्ट, viewing the use of beauty as a path to the sacred, promoted the use of Latin, and reintroduced traditional papal garments, लिये जिससे reason he was पुकारा `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
he has महरूम described as `` the main intellectual force in the गिरिजाघर '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of Pope Benedict 's students इससे his अकादमिक करियर are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him, notably Christoph schönborn.
on 11 फ़रवरी 2013, Pope Benedict announced उसके इस्तीफा in a speech in लैटिन before the कार्डिनल्स, citing a `` lack of strength of mind और body '' due to उसके advanced age.
उसके resignation became प्रभावी on 28 February 2013.
he is the पहला pope to इस्तीफा चूंकि Pope ग्रेगरी बारहवीं in 1415, and the पहला to do so on his own initiative since पोप Celestine V in 1294.
As pope emeritus, Benedict retains the style of His पवित्रता, और the title of Pope, and will continue to dress in the papal colour of श्वेत.
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013, and he moved into the newly संवर मेटर Ecclesiae मठ for his retirement on 2 may 2013..

stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for बनाना or enhancing the illusion of गहराई in an image by means of stereopsis for binocular vision.
the word stereoscopy derives इससे the यूनानी `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` firm, solid '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to dekh '', `` to देखिए ''.
Most stereoscopic विधि present दो offset images separately to the बाएँ and right eye of the दर्शक.
These two-dimensional images हैं then combined in the दिमाग to दे the perception of 3D गहराई.
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that प्रदर्शक an चित्र in three पूरा dimensions, allowing the observer to increase सूचना about the 3-dimensional objects होने displayed by head और नजर आंदोलनों.
John Adams ( अक्तूबर 30, 1735 ( o.s. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United राज्य ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier परोसा as the पहला vice president of the United राज्य.
An American Founding पिता, he was a statesman, राजनयिक, and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain.
खूब educated, he was an Enlightenment political theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism and wrote prolifically परिचय his often seminal ideas, both in प्रकाशित works और in अक्षर to his बीवी and कुंजी adviser अबीगैल as well as to अन्य Founding Fathers.
एडम्स came to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the American क्रान्ति.
A lawyer and public figure in बोस्टन, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय Congress, he played a leading भूमिका in persuading Congress to declare independence.
he assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, and थी इसके primary advocate in the कॉंग्रेस.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि with ग्रेट Britain, and was responsible लिये obtaining vital governmental लोन इससे Amsterdam बैंकर्स.
A राजनैतिक theorist और historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together with उसके earlier Thoughts on Government, बहकावे American political विचार.
One of उसके greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated जार्ज Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later मनोनीत John मार्शल to be Chief Justice of the संयुक्त राज्य.
एडम्स ' revolutionary श्रेय secured him दो terms as George Washington 's वाइस president and उसके own election in 1796 as the second अध्यक्ष.
During his एक term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans, as well as the dominant faction in उसके अपना federalist Party led by his bitter दुश्मन Alexander हैमिल्टन.
एडम्स हस्ताक्षरित the controversial Alien and राजद्रोह Acts, and built up the army और नेवी विशेषकर in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
the major accomplishment of उसके presidency was उसके शांतिपूर्ण resolution of the conflict in the face of हैमिल्टन 's opposition.
in 1800, Adams was defeated लिये re-election by Thomas Jefferson and रिटायर्ड to Massachusetts.
He later resumed his friendship साथ Jefferson.
He and his wife, Abigail एडम्स, founded an संपन्नता family line of politicians, diplomats, and इतिहासकारों now referred to as the Adams राजनैतिक family.
Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams, the sixth President of the संयुक्त States.
His उपलब्धियाँ have received वृहद recognition in आधुनिक टाइम्स, though his contributions यहूद नहीं initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
एडम्स was the first u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the भवन कि eventually became known as the White हाउस.
The United States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States करेंसी.
the पहला u.S. सचिव of the राजकोष ( 1789–95 ), सिकंदर हैमिल्टन, is currently featured on the obverse of the bill, while the U.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse.
( हैमिल्टन is one of two non-presidents featured on फिलहाल issued U.S. bills.
The other is Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
हैमिल्टन is one of तभी चार people प्रदर्शित on U.S. paper करेंसी ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the महाद्वीपीय United States, as he थी इससे the West Indies.
the others are : Albert gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष Note ) ; और Robert मॉरिस, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी Certificate ).
In जोड, kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 हवाई state क्वार्टर. )
All $ 10 bills जारी today हैं संघीय Reserve Notes.
the Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of सब US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
टेन dollar बिल्स हैं delivered by संघीय Reserve Banks in पीला straps.
The source of the फेस on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of हैमिल्टन that belongs to the portrait collection of नई York City हॉल.
the $ 10 विधेयक is the only U.S. paper currency in परिसंचरण in which the portrait चेहरों to the left ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a portrait of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the left, but थी प्रयुक्त only for intra-government ट्रांजेक्शन ).

A jetboat is a boat propelled by a जेट of water ejected इससे the back of the craft.
नापसंद a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or पीछे the नाव, a jetboat draws the water from अंतर्गत the boat into a pump inside the boat, then expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats यहूद originally designed by Sir विलियम Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) for आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और shallow rivers of नई Zealand, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in ऐसे waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had बहुत short lifetimes, generally due to the inefficient डिज़ाइन of the units और the फैक्ट कि they offered few advantages over conventional propellers.
Unlike ये पिछला waterjet developments, ऐसे as campini 's और the Hanley Hydrojet, Hamilton had a specific need लिये a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow water, और the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution.
From इस, the popularity of the jet unit and jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it was मिला the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers for a चौड़ी range of vessel types, और as such, waterjets are प्रयुक्त widely आज for अनेक high-speed vessels, including यात्री ferries, rescue craft, patrol नौकाएँ and offshore supply vessels.
Jetboats हैं highly maneuverable, और अनेक can, from full speed, be reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their अपना length, in a maneuver known as a `` क्रैश stop ''.
The well known Hamilton फेरे or `` जेट spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre जहाँ the boat 's engine throttle is cut, the steering is turned sharply and the throttle opened again, causing the boat to स्पिन जल्दी around with a विशाल spray of जल.
वहीँ is no engineering limit to the आकार of jetboats, though the validity of उनके उपयोग depends a lot on the type of application.
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds, up to about, but as boat गति increases beyond this, the extra hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( इत्यादि. ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ).
भी, in situations with very large propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug boats ), the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical.
लिये these reasons, the विशाल majority of waterjet units are installed in high-speed vessels and in particular situations जहाँ shallow draught, maneuverability, and load लचीलापन are main concerns.
The biggest jet-driven vessels are found in military use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry.
South Africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
भी these German-built vessels हैं सक्षम of performing `` क्रैश stops ''.
uveitis is broadly defined as inflammation of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the middle, pigmented, vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and thorough examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ with urgent उपचार to control the inflammation.

Murphy is a fictional character on the comedy-drama television series अनुगामी.
He is played by Kevin Connolly.
The Shining is a 1980 मनोवैज्ञानिक horror फिल्मी produced and निर्देशित by Stanley kubrick, co-written साथ उपन्यासकार Diane Johnson, और starring Jack निकोल्सन, शेली duvall, Scatman Crothers, and Danny Lloyd.
the फिल्मी is based on the Stephen King novel The Shining.
A writer, Jack Torrance, takes a जॉब as an off-season caretaker at an isolated hotel.
His young बेटे possesses psychic abilities और is able to देखिए बाते from the past and future, such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
जल्द after settling in, the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm, and जोकर gradually becomes बहकावे by a supernatural उपस्थिति ; he descends into madness and attempts to murder उसके wife and बेटे.
नापसंद previous Kubrick films, which developed an दर्शक धीरे by building on word-of-mouth, The जगमगाता was released as a mass-market film, खोलने at first in बस two शहरों on Memorial दिन, then देशभर a माह later.
Although initial जवाब to the film थी मिश्रित, later critical मूल्यांकन थी more अनुकूल and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre.
Film director Martin Scorsese, लिखने in The Daily जानवर, क्रमित it as one of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों of all समय.
Film critics, film विद्यार्थी, और kubrick 's निर्माता, Jan Harlan, have remarked on the विशाल influence the film रै था on popular culture.
the आरंभिक European release of the Shining थी 25 minutes shorter than the American version, achieved by removing most of the scenes taking place बाहर the environs of the hotel.
आँगन Cola Bottle
आँगन आहार Cola was a brand of diet soda introduced by पेप्सी in 1963.
it was created in response to Diet Rite Cola, which was the first आहार cola on the market.
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake was आँगन आहार Cola 's spokesperson.
In 1964, आँगन released orange, grape, and root beer जायका.
This स्वाद line was नहीं meant to compete साथ ब्रांड्स जैसे Orange crush, but rather भरण out the line.
Patio sodas यहूद available in the cold-bottle market : grocery और mom-and-pop स्टोर्स.
विज्ञापन for आँगन was comparatively scarce ; at the समय, bottlers were regionally franchised, और related विज्ञापन was necessarily local.
In 1964, Patio diet कोला became Diet Pepsi.
The newly branded diet soda was advertised alongside पेप्सी with the टैगलाइन `` Pepsi either रास्ता '', which replaced the स्लोगन `` Dances साथ flavor ''.
The short जीवन span of Patio Diet cola makes it a great addition लिये bottle collectors.
Most of the remaining Patio line of flavors यहूद phased आउट by the जल्दी 1970s, जबकि a few बच जबतक the mid 70s
Infrastructure is मौलिक शारीरिक and organizational structures needed लिये the आपरेशन of a society or enterprise, or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural elements that provide framework supporting an entire ढांचा of development.
It is an important पद for judging a country or region 's विकास.
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a समाज, such as roads, bridges, water supply, sewers, electrical grids, telecommunications, and so forth, और can be defined as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and सेवाएं essential to enable, sustain, or enhance societal living शर्तें. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services, and also the distribution of समाप्त products to बाज़ार, as खूब as basic सोशल सेवाएं such as schools और अस्पताल ; for example, roads enable the transport of raw सामग्री to a factory.
in military parlance, the पद refers to the buildings and permanent संस्थापना necessary for the support, redeployment, and operation of सैन्य forces.
To make it सरल, infrastructure is anything कि is needed रोज, an everyday item.

Mitochondrial DNA.
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences दोनो within और among populations.
वहीँ may be multiple विसंगतियाँ of any दिए gene in the human population ( जीनों ), leading to बहुरूपता.
Many genes are नहीं polymorphic, अर्थ that तभी a सिंगल allele is present in the population : the जीन is then said to be fixed.
No two humans are genetically एकसमान.
Even monozygotic twins, जो develop from एक zygote, have infrequent जेनेटिक मतभेद due to mutations occurring during विकास and gene copy number variation.
Differences between individuals, even closely related individuals, are the key to techniques such as जेनेटिक fingerprinting.
Alleles occur at different बारंबारता in different human populations, with populations that are more geographically और ancestrally remote tending to differ more.
Causes of मतभेद between individuals include the एक्सचेंज of जीनों during meiosis और विभिन्न mutational events.
There are at तनिक two reasons why genetic variation exists between populations.
प्राकृतिक selection may confer an अनुकूली advantage to individuals in a विशिष्ट environment if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
alleles under चयन हैं संभावित to occur तभी in those geographic regions जहाँ they confer an advantage.
The second प्रमुख cause of genetic विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची उपाधि of neutrality of सबसे mutations.
Most mutations do नहीं appear to have कोई selective effect एक way or the other on the organism.
The प्रमुख कारण is genetic बहाव, this is the effect of random changes in the gene pool.
in humans, founder effect and पास्ट छोटी population आकार ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have था an महत्वपूर्ण influence in neutral मतभेद between populations.
the theory that इंसानो recently migrated out of अफ़्रीकी supports this.
the study of human जेनेटिक variation has दोनो विकासवादी significance and medical अनुप्रयोग.
it can help वैज्ञानिकों understand ancient human population migrations as well as how different इंसान groups हैं biologically सम्बन्धित to one another.
For medicine, पढ़ाई of human genetic variation may be महत्वपूर्ण because some disease-causing alleles occur more प्रायः in people from specific geographic regions.
नई findings show that each human has on average 60 new mutations compared to their parents.
Apart from mutations, many genes that may have aided humans in ancient times प्लेग humans today.
For example, it is suspected that genes कि allow humans to अधिक efficiently प्रक्रम food हैं those कि make लोगों susceptible to obesity and मधुमेह today.
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol और the नेशनल Mall at the करदाताओं कूच on वॉशिंगटन on September 12, 2009.
the Tea Party गति is an American political movement that advocates strict adherence to the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution, reducing U.S. सरकारी बिता and taxes, and कटौती of the U.S. national debt and federal budget deficit.
The गति रै महरूम called partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The गति has sponsored protests and supported political उम्मीदवार since 2009.
The name of the movement is derived from the Boston चाय Party of 1773, an iconic event in American history.
Anti-tax protesters in the United राज्य have often referred to the असली Boston Tea Party लिये inspiration.
References to the बोस्टन Tea Party यहूद भाग of Tax दिन विरोध आयोजित throughout the 1990s and पहले.
By 2001, a custom था developed among some conservative activists of mailing tea bags to legislators and अन्य officials as a सांकेतिक act.
The मुद्राएँ of प्यूर्टो Rico closely follow the historic development of Puerto Rico.
As a colony of स्पेन और the United States, प्यूर्टो Rico was granted the use of both foreign and provincial currencies.
following the Spanish colonization in 1502, Puerto Rico became an important बंदरगाहों, with इसके own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves ran empty within the century, the द्वीपसमूह 's economy suffered.
The Spanish क्राउन जारी the Situado Mexicano, जिससे meant that a semi-regular shipment of सुनहरा इससे the viceroyalty of नई Spain होता be sent to the island, as a way to provide economic support.
Between 1636 और 1637, Philip iv of Spain imposed a tax which had to be paid using a revenue stamp.
प्रेरित by this, प्यूर्टो Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, becoming the first उपनिवेश to print 8- रियल banknotes in the स्पेनी Empire and which in the Spanish सरकारी 's approval of subsequent issues.
The situado was discontinued during the 19th century, creating an आर्थिक संकट, as a result of Mexico gaining इसके independence from Spain.
साल्वाडोर Meléndez Bruna, the colonial governor in office, ordered the issue of provincial banknotes, बनाना the Puerto Rican peso.
However, printing of these banknotes ceased after 1815.
दौरान the following decades, foreign coins became the फैली currency.
In the 1860s and 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the Banco Español de Puerto रीको was inaugurated और began issuing banknotes.
the bank designed four series and placed three in परिसंचरण अंतर्गत स्पेनी rule.
in 1895, a Royal डिक्री ordered the production of provincial peso सिक्के.
On August 13, 1898, the Spanish-American War ended with स्पेन ceding Puerto Rico to the United राज्य.
The banco Español de Puerto रीको थी renamed Bank of Porto Rico and issued bills समतुल्य to the संयुक्त राज्य dollar, creating the Puerto Rican dollar.
in 1902, the पहला National Bank of Porto Rico जारी banknotes in a समानांतर manner.
Two अधिक श्रेणी were issued until 1913.
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system थी fully integrated into the United राज्य ' economic and मौद्रिक system, the Puerto rican डॉलर यहूद redeemed for those जारी by the संयुक्त States राजकोष.
The पेसो और डालर have महरूम followed by अन्य समकालीन issues, including commemorative banknotes, निजी currency, and a quarter सिक्का designed with Fort सैन Felipe del Morro in the face.
पेप्सी ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink कि is उत्पादित and manufactured by PepsiCo.
Created और developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink, it was renamed as pepsi-cola on August 28, 1898, then to पेप्सी in 1961.
The किताब of ezekiel is the तीसरा of the latter नबियों in the यहूदी Bible, following the किताबे of Isaiah and यिर्मयाह and preceding the किताब of the Twelve.
( The order is somewhat different in the Christian Old Testament ).
it derives its name from, and records the visions of, the 6th सदी bc priest and prophet Ezekiel.
according to the book, the नबी, exiled in Babylon, experienced a series of सात visions during the 22 years इससे 593 to 571 BC, a काल which spans the final विनाश of Jerusalem in 586.
the visions, और the किताब, are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on इसराईल ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the nations ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ).
New ऑरलियन्स ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest नगर और metropolitan area in the राज्य of Louisiana.
the population of the नगर was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans महानगर area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The नई Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
the नगर is named after Orléans, a city स्तिथ on the Loire River in Centre, फ़्रांस, और is खूब known for its distinct French क्रियोल architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New ऑरलियन्स is भी famous for its cuisine, म्यूज़िक ( particularly as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और its annual जश्न and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is स्तिथ in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The नगर and Orleans Parish ( ) are.
The नगर and मोहल्ला are bounded by the parishes of St. tammany to the north, St. बर्नार्ड to the east, Plaquemines to the south and जेफरसन to the south and west.
Lake pontchartrain, part of which is included in the city limits, झूठ to the north और Lake Borgne lies to the east.
The National जनम कंट्रोल League was a birth कंट्रोल organization in the संयुक्त States.
It थी founded in कूच 1915 by Mary Dennett, क्लारा Gruening Stillman और जेसी Ashley.
Its main purpose थी to overturn the laws which banned contraceptives इससे the U.S. mails.
Campaigns were mounted in New York, but in 1919 the लीग was disbanded और reformed into the Voluntary parenthood League.
Cancer, ज्ञात medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a broad group of various रोगों, all involving unregulated कोशिका growth.
In कर्कट, cells divide and grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade nearby भाग of the body.
the कर्कट may also spread to more distant parts of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
नहीं सब tumors are cancerous.
Benign tumors do नहीं grow uncontrollably, do नहीं invade neighboring tissues, and do not spread throughout the body.
There हैं over 200 different known cancers that afflict इंसानो.
Determining what causes cancer is जटिल.
अनेक things हैं ज्ञात to बढ़ाएँ the risk of cancer, including तम्बाकू उपयोग, certain infections, radiation, lack of physical activity, obesity, and पर्यावरणीय pollutants.
ये can directly damage genes or combine with existing जेनेटिक faults within कोशिकाएं to कारण the बीमारी.
लगभग five to ten प्रतिशत of cancers are entirely खानदानी.
Cancer can be detected in a number of तरीके, including the उपस्थिति of certain signs and symptoms, स्क्रीनिंग tests, or medical imaging.
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic परिक्षा of a tissue sample.
Cancer is usually treated साथ कीमोथेरेपी, विकिरण therapy and surgery.
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and location of the cancer और the extent of disease at the प्रारंभ of treatment.
While cancer can affect people of all आयु, and a few types of कर्कट are अधिक आम in children, the risk of developing cancer generally increases with age.
In 2007, cancer caused about 13 % of all human deaths worldwide ( 7.9 million ).
Rates हैं rising as more people सजीव to an old age and as mass जीवनशैली changes occur in the developing world.
