Skiing is a recreational activity and competitive sport in which the participant attaches long धावक or skis to boots or shoes on the feet and उपयोग them to travel on top of snow.
Aside from recreation and competition, skiing रै been used for military purposes and even travelling in areas कि अनुभव भारी snowfall.
Many types of competitive skiing events हैं recognized by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक कमेटी, and the International Ski Federation.
John मेनार्ड Keynes, 1st Baron keynes, cb, fba ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 अप्रैल 1946 ) थी a British अर्थशास्त्री whose ideas have fundamentally प्रभावित the theory और practice of आधुनिक macroeconomics, and informed the आर्थिक policies of सरकारें.
He built on and greatly refined earlier कार्य on the causes of business cycles, and is widely माना to be one of the founders of modern macroeconomics और the most influential अर्थशास्त्री of the 20th century.
His ideas हैं the आधार लिये the स्कूल of thought ज्ञात as keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, as well as इसके various offshoots.
In many तरीके, subsequent developments in 20th सदी economics can be viewed as either building on keynes ' ideas or reacting against them.
In the 1930s, Keynes पथप्रदर्शन a revolution in economic thinking, overturning the older विचार of neoclassical economics that आयोजित कि free बाज़ार would, in the छोटी to मीडियम term, automatically provide full employment, as long as मजदूर were flexible in their wage demands.
keynes instead argued that aggregate माँग संकल्पित the overall level of आर्थिक activity, और that inadequate aggregate demand could सीसे to prolonged periods of high बेरोजगारी.
He advocated the उपयोग of फिस्कल and monetary measures to mitigate the प्रतिकूल effects of आर्थिक recessions and depressions.
Following the outbreak of the Second संसार युद्ध, Keynes 's विचार concerning आर्थिक policy were adopted by अग्रणी पश्चिमी economies.
In 1942, Keynes was awarded a hereditary peerage as Baron Keynes of tilton in the County of ससेक्स.
Keynes died in 1946, but during the 1950s and 1960s the कामयाबी of Keynesian economics resulted in almost all पूंजीवादी सरकारें adopting its policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a परिणाम of समस्याएं that began to afflict the Anglo-American economies from the start of the decade, and partly क्युकी of critiques from मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन and अन्य economists जो were pessimistic about the ability of governments to विनियमित the business cycle साथ fiscal policy.
however, the advent of the global वित्तीय crisis in 2007 caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for आर्थिक policies undertaken in response to the crisis by राष्ट्रपतियों जार्ज W. बुश and Barack Obama of the United राज्य, Prime मंत्री गॉर्डन Brown of the United Kingdom, and अन्य heads of governments.
In 1999, Time पत्रिका included Keynes in उनके सूची of the 100 सबसे important and influential people of the 20th century, commenting that : `` His कट्टरपंथी विचार that governments should spend money वे do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
in जोड to being an economist, keynes was भी a civil servant, a director of the British Eugenics Society, a director of the Bank of इंग्लैण्ड, a संरक्षक of the arts and an art कलेक्टर, a part of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals, an advisor to several charitable trusts, a writer, a philosopher, a private investor, और a किसान.
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel sofer emulated the 1675 Ten Commandments at the Amsterdam Esnoga synagogue.
The टेन Commandments, also ज्ञात as the decalogue, are a नियत of biblical laws relating to ethics and worship, which play a fundamental role in Judaism, islam और Christianity.
They include instructions to worship तभी God, to keep the sabbath holy और prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry, blasphemy, murder, theft, deception and व्यभिचार.
Different groups follow थोड़ा different traditions लिये interpreting और numbering them.
The Ten Commandments appear twice in the यहूदी Bible, in the books of Exodus और deuteronomy.
According to the story in Exodus, God inscribed them on two स्टोन टैबलेट, जिससे he gave to मूसा on Mount Sinai.
आधुनिक स्कॉलरशिप has found संभावित influences in Hittite और Mesopotamian कानून and treaties, but is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments were लिखा और who wrote them.
The discography of the अंग्रेज़ी वैकल्पिक rock band the Smiths consists of चार स्टुडियो एल्बम, एक extended play ( EP ), one live album, ten compilation albums, बीस singles, one video album और चौदह music वीडियो on the Rough Trade, sire and WEA record labels.
The band थी formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist Morrissey, guitarist Johnny marr, बास खिलाड़ी Andy Rourke and drummer माइक Joyce.
Despite being championed by बीबीसी Radio 1 disc jockey जॉन Peel, the बैंड 's debut सिंगल, `` Hand in Glove `` ( may 1983 ), failed to चार्ट.
इसके follow-up, `` इस आकर्षक Man `` ( October 1983 ), met साथ critical acclaim और पहुँचे number twenty-five on the uk singles Chart.
The smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream कामयाबी in 1984, as they पहुँचे क्रमांक twelve in the uk with the `` What Difference Does It मेक ? `` सिंगल and reached number two on the uk Albums Chart साथ their debut album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
Their next तीन singles सब reached the top twenty of the charts in the UK, helping to consolidate their पिछला चार्ट कामयाबी.
the next स्टुडियो album, Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ), reached the शीर्ष of the British चार्ट ; however, the only single to be released from the एल्बम, `` That चुटकुला is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ), failed to break the UK Top 40.
returning to form, The smiths ' next छह singles all पहुँचे the उच्चतर than क्रमांक thirty in the UK and their third album, The Queen Is मुर्दे ( 1986 ), reached number दो in the uk.
Despite the band 's चार्ट success, Marr left the समूह in August 1987 due to a strained relationship with Morrissey.
failing to find a replacement, The Smiths disbanded by the समय their final studio album, Strangeways, Here We Come, was released in सितंबर that year.
strangeways, यहाँ We आइये reached क्रमांक दो in the uk and became the बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the United राज्य जब it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200.
In जल्दी 1992, wea acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths और उत्पादित two compilations – बेहतरीन... I and... Best ii – the first of जिससे reached the top of the UK Albums Chart.
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001, with a further compilation, the Sound of The Smiths, released in November 2008.
गए with the हवा is a अनोखा लिखा by Margaret Mitchell, first प्रकाशित in 1936.
It is often placed in the साहित्यिक sub-genre of the historical romance अनोखा.
However, it रै been argued the novel is a `` near miss '' and does नहीं contain all of the elements of the romance genre, making it simply a historical अनोखा.
The story is set in क्लेटन County, Georgia, and Atlanta during the American सिविल War and पुनर्निर्माण.
It depicts the अनुभवों of Scarlett O'Hara, the spoiled बेटी of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण मालिक, जो must use every means at her disposal to come out of the गरीबी she पाता herself in after शरमन 's `` March to the Sea ''.
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone साथ the Wind in 1926 to pass the time while recovering from an auto-crash चोट कि refused to चंगा.
In April 1935, हेरोल्ड लैथम of Macmillan, an editor who was looking for नई fiction, read what she had written and saw that it could be a best-seller.
After लैथम agreed to publish the किताब, Mitchell worked for another छह months checking the historical references, and rewrote the खोलने chapter several times.
Mitchell and her husband John Marsh, a copy editor by trade, edited the final version of the novel.
मिशेल wrote the book 's final पल पहला, and then wrote the events कि led up to it.
As to कया became of her lovers, Rhett and Scarlett, after the novel ended, मिशेल did not जान, and said, `` लिये all I जान, रहेट may have found someone else जो थी less difficult. ''
Mitchell प्राप्त the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction for the book in 1937.
The book was adapted into a 1939 American फिल्मी.
Gone with the हवा is the only अनोखा by Mitchell published during उसके आजीवन.
endodontics ( from the यूनानी endo `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is एक of the dental specialties recognized by the American Dental Association, Royal College of Dentists of Canada, and Royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons, and deals with the tooth pulp and the ऊतकों surrounding the root of a दाँत.
Endodontists perform a किस्में of procedures including endodontic therapy ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट canal therapy '' ), endodontic retreatment, surgery, treating cracked teeth, and treating dental trauma.
Root canal therapy is one of the सबसे common procedures.
If the गूदा ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic tissue, and fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or घायल, endodontic treatment is जरूरी to सहेजें the tooth.
सीरियल Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol that moves आंकड़ा to and इससे computer भंडार devices ऐसे as मुश्किल ड्राइव and tape ड्राइव.
sas replaces the पुरानी Parallel scsi ( pronounced `` scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
SAS, like its predecessor, uses the मानक SCSI command set.
sas offers backward compatibility with second-generation SATA ड्राइव.
SATA 3 Gbit/s ड्राइव may be connected to SAS backplanes, लकिन SAS ड्राइव can नहीं connect to SATA backplanes.
the T10 technical committee of the International Committee for Information प्रौद्योगिकी Standards ( INCITS ) develops और maintains the SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade संघ ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is एक of the eligibility requirements established in the संयुक्त States संविधान for election to the दफ्तर of President or Vice President.
इस requirement was intended to protect the स्वदेश from foreign influence.
the संविधान करता not define the phrase natural-born citizen, और various opinions have been offered over time regarding its precise meaning.
a 2011 congressional Research सेवा report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause रै महरूम mentioned in passing in अनेक decisions of the संयुक्त States Supreme अदालत और निम्नतर courts dealing साथ the सवाल of eligibility for citizenship by birth, but the Supreme अदालत has never directly addressed the सवाल of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen.
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22, 1971 ) is a former American football खिलाड़ी.
he played क्वार्टरबैक for three National Football League ( एनएफएल ) teams : the St. Louis Rams, the नई York Giants, और the एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स.
he थी originally हस्ताक्षरित by the Green Bay Packers as an undrafted फ़्री agent in 1994 after playing college football at उत्तरी Iowa.
Warner would go on to be माना the best undrafted player of all time, following a 12-year करियर regarded as एक of the महानतम stories in NFL history.
warner first attained stardom जबकि playing for the st. Louis मेढ़ों from 1998 to 2003, जहाँ he won two NFL MVP awards in 1999 और 2001 as well as the Super Bowl MVP पुरस्कार in Super कटोरी xxxiv.
he led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super Bowl xliii ( the franchise 's first सुपर Bowl berth ), and owns the three उच्चतम single-game passing yardage totals in Super कटोरी history.
warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ), and the third-highest करियर पूर्णता percentage in NFL इतिहास with 65.5 %.
In 13 करियर playoff खेल, warner बाँधने first all-time in completion percentage ( 66.5 % ), yards per attempt ( 8.55 ), and दूसरी in passer rating ( 102.8 ).
he also holds the highest completion percentage for a single game during the नियमित ऋतु, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on September 20, 2009, against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
he घोषित his retirement on January 29, 2010. < ref name='CNN 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet काय Ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26, 1953 ) is the junior संयुक्त राज्य Senator इससे North कैरोलिना, in office since January 2009.
Previously she served in the उत्तर कैरोलिना सीनेट from 1999 to 2009.
वो is a सदस्य of the Democratic पार्टी and is viewed as a moderate सदस्य of her party.
जब Hagan defeated Republican incumbent Elizabeth Dole in the 2008 United States सीनेट चुनाव, she became the first woman to शिकस्त an incumbent woman in a Senate election.
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually ज्ञात colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ), is awarded annually to the player deemed the most outstanding player in collegiate फ़ुटबॉल.
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club trophy और renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club 's एथलेटिक director, जॉन Heisman ( former भूरा University and विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania player ; सिर फ़ुटबॉल coach at Oberlin कॉलेज, Auburn विश्वविद्यालयों, clemson University, Rice University, and the University of पेन्सिलवेनिया ; and football, बास्केट, and बेसबॉल head coach और athletic निदेशक at जॉर्जिया Tech ).
the award is प्रस्तुत by the Heisman Trophy विश्वास in early December before the postseason bowl games.
It is the oldest of several overall awards in college football, including the Maxwell Award, Walter Camp Award, और the AP Player of the Year.
The heisman और the ap खिलाड़ी of the Year हैं the तभी awards to honor the most outstanding खिलाड़ी, जबकि the मैक्सवेल Award and Walter शिविर पुरस्कार recognize the बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी, and the Archie griffin Award recognizes the most valuable खिलाड़ी.
the संयुक्त राष्ट्र कमांड ( unc ) is the unified command structure लिये the multinational military forces supporting the गणतंत्र of Korea ( South कोरियाई or rok ) during and after the Korean War.
After troops of the लोकतांत्रिक लोगों 's Republic of Korea ( उत्तर Korea or DPRK ) invaded South कोरियाई on June 25, 1950, the United Nations सुरक्षा Council adopted रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 calling on उत्तर कोरियाई to cease hostilities और withdraw to the 38th समानांतर.
On June 27, 1950, it adopted रेज़ोल्यूशन 83, recommending कि members of the United Nations provide assistance to the Republic of Korea `` to repel the हथियारबंद attack and to restore international सलाम and security to the area ''.
Security परिषद Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended that members providing military शक्तियां and अन्य assistance to दक्षिण कोरियाई `` मेक ऐसे forces and अन्य assistance available to a unified command under the United राज्य of America ''.
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC were `` United Nations शक्तियां '', and United Nations itself could be माना a belligerent, in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the कॉम्बैट forces, which यहूद controlled by the United States.
Most observers concluded that the शक्तियां under the unc were नहीं in law United राष्ट्र सैनिकों, और the अधिनियमों of the UNC were not the acts of the संयुक्त Nations.
The UNC can be regarded as an गठबंधन of national armies, ऑपरेटिंग under the collective सही of self-defense.
On August 29, 1950, the अंग्रेजों Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry Brigade arrived at बुसान to join the UNC, which जबतक तब शामिल तभी ROK और U.S. forces.
the 27th ब्रिगेड moved into the Naktong River लकीर वेस्ट of Daegu.
Troop units from अन्य countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia, belgian United Nations कमांड, Canada, Colombia, Ethiopia, France, Greece, ध्वज, the Netherlands, New जीलैंड, the फिलीपीन, थाईलैंड और Turkey.
the Union of दक्षिण Africa provided air units which fought alongside the air forces of other सदस्य nations.
डेनमार्क, India, Norway, and Sweden provided medical इकाई.
Italy provided a hospital, even हालांकि it was not a un member.
The संयुक्त Nations Command and the Chinese-North Korean कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई Armistice अनुबंध on 27 July 1953, समाप्ति the भारी लड़.
The armistice agreement स्थापित the Military Armistice Commission ( MAC ), consisting of representatives of the two signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms.
the North Korean-Chinese MAC has been replaced by panmumjon प्रतिनिधि अंतर्गत exclusive उत्तर Korean प्रबन्धन.
Regular meetings have महरूम stopped, हालांकि duty officers of Joint सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल, commonly known as the Truce गाँव of Panmunjom, from प्रत्येक side meet regularly.
Lincoln Heights is an American family नाटक television series about Eddie Sutton, a Mission Vista police officer who moves his family back to उसके old neighborhood, Lincoln Heights, to प्रारंभ a new life and to help आउट उसके old पड़ोस.
It is a dangerous place to raise a परिवार, और through the many trials the परिवार goes through, they soon learn that settling in is नहीं as आसान as it seems.
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every दिन life as a street cop in Los Angeles, उसके kids कोशिश to fit in at their new स्कूलों and साथ their new neighbors.
The show premiered January 8, 2007 on the ABC Family network साथ 13 एपीसोड ordered for the first season.
it थी approved for a दूसरी season, which premiered September 4, 2007.
Vanessa Hudgens ' सोंग, कह OK था been used in a commercial to promote the second ऋतु.
To प्रचार the तीसरा season, they showed clips of cassie and चार्ल्स 's संबंध to the song, Crush by the अमरीकी आइडल 's सातवाँ season runner-up, David Archuleta.
To promote season 4, they 're using the song, Avalanche by Marie Digby.
the दिखाएँ 's theme सोंग was written and performed by bassist Stanley क्लार्क and singer-songwriter Blaire Reinhard.
On January 29, 2010, एबीसी Family announced the cancellation of the series after four seasons.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक body अंतर्गत a common name, structure, and doctrine within christianity.
In the Orthodox tradition, churches are divided often along ethnic and linguistic lines, into separate churches and परंपराओं.
Technically, divisions between एक group and another are defined by doctrine और church प्राधिकार.
मुद्दे such as the प्रकृति of यीशु, the authority of apostolic उत्तराधिकार, eschatology, and papal primacy separate one denomination इससे another.
the रोमन Catholic गिरिजाघर is the largest denomination साथ over 1.1 billion members, over half of all Christians worldwide, making it the largest denomination for कोई religion विश्वव्यापी ( although the church करता not view itself as a denomination, but as the original pre-denominational गिरिजाघर ).
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of ईसाइयों worldwide, and together the catholics, protestants, Anglicans, and अन्य closely सम्बन्धित denominations comprise Western christianity.
The पूर्वी Orthodox Church, Oriental Orthodox Churches and the assyrian Church of the East are considered Eastern Christian denominations.
Western Christian denominations जीतना in Western Europe and its former colonies.
Eastern ईसाई denominations हैं represented mostly in Eastern यूरोपीय, the Middle East and North Africa.
ईसाइयों have विभिन्न doctrines about the Church, the देह of faithful कि they मानना was established by यीशु Christ, and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of themselves solely to faithfully represent the एक Holy कैथोलिक और Apostolic गिरिजाघर to the exclusion of the other.
protestants अलग from the Catholic Church because of theologies और practices that they considered to be in violation of their interpretation.
Generally, सदस्यों of the विभिन्न denominations acknowledge each other as Christians, at least to the extent that they have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox views including the Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of sin and salvation, even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder full communion between churches.
चूंकि the reforms surrounding Vatican II, the कैथोलिक Church has referred to प्रोटोस्टेंट communities as `` denominations '', while reserving the पद `` church '' for apostolic churches, including the पूर्वी Orthodox ( see subsistit in and शाखा theory ).
वहीँ are however some non-denominational Christians जो do not follow any particular branch.
the panda ( Ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and white cat-foot '' ), also known as the giant panda to फर्क it इससे the unrelated red panda, is a bear देशी to central-western और south western China.
It is easily recognized by the large, distinctive ब्लैक patches around इसके आँखें, over the कानों, और across its round body.
हालांकि it belongs to the order Carnivora, the panda 's diet is 99 % बाँसुरी.
Pandas in the wild will occasionally खा other grasses, wild tubers, or even meat in the रूप of birds, rodents or carrion.
in captivity, they may प्राप्त honey, eggs, मछली, yams, shrub पत्ते, oranges, or bananas साथ साथ specially prepared food.
The giant panda lives in a few पहाड़ ranges in central चीन, mainly in Sichuan province, but also in the Shaanxi and Gansu प्रांतों.
As a result of farming, deforestation and other development, the panda has been driven out of the lowland क्षेत्रों where it once जिया.
The panda is a conservation reliant endangered प्रजाति.
A 2007 रपट shows 239 pandas living in captivity अंदर China and another 27 outside the country.
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows कि वहीँ are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild, while a 2006 पढ़ाई via DNA analysis estimated that this फिगर could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000.
कुछ reports also show that the number of pandas in the जंगली is on the rise.
However, the IUCN does नहीं मानना वहीँ is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the species इससे Endangered to Vulnerable.
While the dragon has प्रायः served as China 's national emblem, internationally the panda appears at least as commonly.
As such, it is बनने widely used within China in अंतरराष्ट्रीय contexts, for उदाहरण the पाँच fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics.
The Kite Runner is a 2007 अमरीकी drama film निर्देशित by मार्क Forster based on the novel of the same नाम by खालिद Hosseini.
it tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do boy इससे the Wazir Akbar खान district of काबुल, who is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his dost Hassan, the son of his father 's hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous कार्यक्रम, इससे the पतन of the साम्राज्य in अफगानिस्तान through the Soviet military intervention, the द्रव्यमान exodus of Afghan refugees to Pakistan और the United States, and the Taliban शासन.
Though most of the फिल्मी is नियत in Afghanistan, these parts were mostly shot in काश्गर, चीन, due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time.
the majority of the फिल्मी 's dialogue is in Dari, with the remainder बोला in English.
The child अभिनेताओं are native speakers, लकिन several adult अभिनेताओं had to learn Dari.
Filming लपेटा up on December 21, 2006, and the film was expected to be released on नवम्बर 2, 2007.
However, after concern for the safety of the young actors in the film due to fears of violent reprisals to the यौन प्रकृति of some scenes in which they appear, its release date थी pushed वापस six सप्ताह to December 14, 2007.
The पतंग Runner was released on DVD on कूच 25, 2008.
A HD DVD release was घोषित for the same date, लकिन was canceled following the स्वरूप 's demise.
The film was nominated लिये the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार for Best Foreign भाषा Film in 2007.
The film 's score by Alberto Iglesias थी nominated लिये Best Original Score at the Golden Globes and the Academy Awards.
the legality of cannabis varies इससे country to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has been since the शुरूआत of widespread कैनबिस prohibition in the late 1930s.
However, many देशों have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of cannabis, विशेषकर in North America, दक्षिण अमेरिका and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is विधिक or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North Korea and would be in the u.S. states of Colorado and Washington if it were not लिये federal law, which governs persons in all राज्य.
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a क्रमांक of countries, including Canada, the Czech गणतंत्र और Israel.
While संघीय law in the United States bans all बिक्री and possession of कैनबिस, enforcement varies widely at the राज्य level और some राज्य have established medicinal मारिजुआना programs in कि contradict संघीय law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their कानून prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced उन्हें with a नियामक regime, also contrary to संघीय statute.
Some देशों have कानून that हैं not as vigorously prosecuted as others but, apart from the countries कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम to medical marijuana, सबसे देशों have विभिन्न penalties ranging from lenient to very severe.
कुछ infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than अन्य in regard to the cultivation, use, कब्ज़ा or transfer of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties लिये possession of छोटी quantities of cannabis, making it punishable by confiscation और a fine, rather than imprisonment.
कुछ jurisdictions/ drug courts उपयोग अनिवार्य treatment programs लिये young or बारंबार users, with स्वतंत्रता from narcotic दवाएँ as the goal and a few jurisdictions परमिट cannabis use लिये औषधीय उद्देश्य.
There are also परिवर्तन in a अधिक restrictive दिशा as in Canada.
Drug tests to detect cannabis हैं increasingly common in अनेक countries and have resulted in jail sentences and लोगों खोने उनके jobs.
However, सरल possession can carry long jail वाक्य in some countries, particularly in parts of East Asia and Southeast Asia where the बिक्री of cannabis may सीसे to a sentence of जीवन in prison or even execution.
loxahatchee is a community स्तिथ in Palm Beach County, Florida, संयुक्त States.
It is located in the areas उत्तर of वेलिंगटन and west and northwest of Royal Palm बीच, फ्लोरिडा and approximately west of West Palm Beach.
Loxahatchee is भी the नाम of the Post दफ्तर कि serves this area, जिससे is under the zip code of 33470.
The name Loxahatchee अर्थात् `` कछुआ river. ''
Loxahatchee is located within the भारतीय trails Improvement District और the loxahatchee groves Water कंट्रोल District.
शेर देश Safari, a drive-through safari पार्क, is located in loxahatchee.
in 2006, the state of Florida स्वीकृत incorporation of part of Loxahatchee as the Town of loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th नगरपालिका in Palm Beach काउंटी.
The main reason for incorporating थी to better protect the क्षेत्रफल from बुवाई growth और to बचाना the rural character of the neighborhood.
Perhaps the सबसे rural area भीतर a close निकटता to West Palm बीच, with lot sizes range from 1-20 एकड़.
Along with The acreage, it is notable for loose जमीन प्रतिबंध और the देशी and exotic animal presence is quite notable.
Seminole लकीरें High स्कूल serves the क्षेत्रफल.
The Canadian नागरिकता Test is a test, administered by Citizenship and आव्रजन कनाडा ( CIC ), that is required for सब applicants for Canadian citizenship who are aged between 18 and 54 और who meet the basic requirements for citizenship.
The test is available in दोनो French and English, the official languages of Canada.
Renaissance Cruises, originally founded in 1989 स्वामित्व by Fearnley & Eger Rederi in Oslo - Norway, later purchased by Edward Rudner ( founder of alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered during the Gulf युद्ध.
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the Mediterranean, the Greek Isles, Tahiti and the South Pacific, Northern Europe and scandinavia.

The बेड़े is listed under List of cruise ships.

Epithelium is one of the four मौलिक प्रकार of एनिमल ऊतक, along with संयोजी tissue, muscle tissue and बेचैन tissue.
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures throughout the body, और also form many glands.
Functions of epithelial cells include secretion, चयनात्मक absorption, protection, transcellular transport और detection of sensation.
In यूनानी `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '', and `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they जरूर receive nourishment via diffusion of substances from the underlying संयोजी tissue, through the तहखाने झिल्ली.
Epithelia can also be organized into clusters of cells that फलन as exocrine and endocrine ग्रंथियों.
केंट E. Hovind ( born January 15, 1953 ) is an American यंग धरती creationist.
Hovind has spoken on creation science and has aimed to convince listeners to reject theories of evolution, भूभौतिकी, and cosmology in favor of his interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible.
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and कुछ of his ideas have also been criticized by young Earth creationist संगठन such as Answers in Genesis.
hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, and frequently spoke on यंग Earth creationism at seminars at private schools और churches, debates, और on रेडियो and television प्रसारण.
Since जनवरी 2007, Hovind has महरूम serving a ten-year थाना sentence after being convicted of 58 संघीय counts, सहित 12 tax offenses, एक count of obstructing संघीय agents, and 45 counts of structuring नकदी transactions.
He is incarcerated at the Federal Correctional Institution at बर्लिन, नई Hampshire.
Bride with Bindi decorated माथे
A bindi (, from Sanskrit bindu, meaning `` a drop, छोटी particle, बिन्दु '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in तमिल, Telugu, and Malayalam ) is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia ( विशेषकर India, Bangladesh, Nepal, श्री लंका and Mauritius ) and Southeast एशिया.
traditionally it is a bright बिन्दु of red रंग लागू in the center of the forehead बंद to the eyebrows, but it can भी consist of a sign or piece of jewelry worn at this location.

लाज़िम Democratic Governor David paterson, elected as लेफ्टिनेंट Governor in 2006 as the running mate of former Governor Eliot Spitzer, chose नहीं to चलाएं लिये a full-term.

The Dragon Ball manga and anime series features an extensive cast of characters created by Akira Toriyama.

The Comanche are a मैदान Indian tribe whose ऐतिहासिक territory, known as Comancheria, consisted of present day eastern नई Mexico, southern Colorado, northeastern एरिज़ोना, southern Kansas, all of ओक्लाहोमा, और सबसे of northwest Texas.
The comanche people हैं enrolled in the federally recognized Comanche Nation, in ओक्लाहोमा.
Historically, the Comanches were hunter-gatherers साथ a horse culture.
There may have been as many as 45,000 Comanches in the लेट 18th सदी.
आज, the Comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment numbers 15,191 साथ approximately 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – फोर्ट Sill and surrounding areas of Southwest ओक्लाहोमा.
the comanche स्वदेश Homecoming Powwow is आयोजित annually in walters, Oklahoma in mid-July.
The Comanche spoke the comanche language, a numic language of the uto-aztecan परिवार, sometimes classified as a Shoshone dialect ; however, तभी about 1 % of Comanches speak it आज.

Times वर्गाकार Studios ( TSS ) is an American television studio located in the टाइम्स Square neighborhood of the मैनहटन borough of New York नगर, नई यॉर्क.

Coca-Cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम drink बेची in stores, restaurants, and vending मशीने in every देश मगर क्यूबा और North Korea.
It is उत्पादित by The Coca-Cola कम्पनी of Atlanta, Georgia, और is often referred to simply as कोक ( a registered trademark of The coca-cola कम्पनी in the United States चूंकि March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it थी invented in the late 19th century by जॉन Pemberton, Coca-Cola थी खरीदा आउट by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led कोक to its dominance of the world soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then बेची to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध साथ the company, उपज समाप्त product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water और sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail स्टोर्स और vending machines.
ऐसे bottlers include coca-cola Enterprises, which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय.
the Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains to major restaurants and food service वितरकों.
the Coca-Cola कम्पनी has, on occasion, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke ब्रांड name.
the most common of these is Diet Coke, with अन्य including Caffeine-Free coca-cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola चेरी, Coca-Cola शून्य, coca-cola Vanilla, and special versions साथ lemon, लाइम or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, Coca-Cola was the world 's most मूल्यवान brand.
Types of bar-lines
In musical notation, a bar ( or माप ) is a खण्ड of समय पारिभाषित by a given number of beats, प्रत्येक of which are assigned a particular नोट value.
dividing music into बार provides regular reference अंक to pin पाइंट locations within a टुकड़ा of music.
It also makes written म्यूज़िक easier to follow, since each bar of स्टाफ प्रतीकों can be read and निभाई as a बैच.
Typically, a piece consists of several बार of the वही length, and in modern musical notation the number of beats in प्रत्येक बार is specified at the शुरूआत of the score by the top number of a time हस्ताक्षर ( such as 3/4 ), while the bottom number indicates the note मान of the beat ( the beat रै a quarter नोट value in the 3/4 example ).
the शब्द bar is more common in British अंग्रेज़ी, and the word measure is more common in American अंग्रेज़ी, although संगीतकारों generally समझे both usages.
in American English, although the words bar and measure are प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably the correct use of the शब्द 'bar ' refers only to the लंबवत line itself, while the शब्द 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between बार.
In international उपयोग, it is equally सही to speak of bar numbers and measure संख्याएँ, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
साथ the same lines, it is wise to reserve the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ इत्यादि. लिये beats only ; बार चाहिए be referred to by name in full.
the first metrically complete measure भीतर a piece of music is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the piece begins with an anacrusis ( an incomplete माप at the head of a piece of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
the 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार and can supply शक्ति 24 hours a दिन.
Solar energy, radiant light और heat from the सूर्य, रै been harnessed by humans since प्राचीन times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include सौर heating, solar photovoltaics, solar थर्मल विद्युत, solar architecture और artificial photosynthesis, जिससे can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent उर्जा problems the world now faces.
सौर technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील solar depending on the way they capture, बदलें and वितरित solar energy.
Active solar techniques include the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels and solar थर्मल collectors to harness the energy.
passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials साथ favorable thermal द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate एयर.
In 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा Agency said that `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible and साफ solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will बढ़ाएँ countries’ उर्जा security through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और mostly import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating जलवायु बदलें, and keep चट्टान ईंधन prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ are global.
Hence the additional लागत of the incentives for जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना investments ; वे जरूर be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
Primary care may be provided in community health centres.
Primary care is the health care given by a स्वास्थ्य care provider.
Typically this provider acts as the प्रिंसिपल पाइंट of consultation for मरीजों भीतर a health care प्रणाली और coordinates other specialists that the patient may need.
ऐसे a पेशेवर can be a primary care चिकित्सक, such as a सामान्य practitioner or family physician, or depending on the locality, health system organization, and patient 's discretion, वे may देखिए a फार्मासिस्ट, a physician सहायक, a nurse practitioner, a नर्स ( such as in the United किंगडम ), a clinical officer ( such as in भाग of अफ़्रीकी ), or an Ayurvedic or अन्य traditional आयुर्विज्ञान professional ( ऐसे as in parts of Asia ).
Depending on the nature of the health condition, patients may then be referred लिये secondary or tertiary care.
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a song recorded by American pop पंक group Yellowcard.
it was released in फ़रवरी 2004 as the second सिंगल from Ocean Avenue और the third track.

A psychiatrist is a physician who specializes in psychiatry.
a मनोचिकित्सक specializes in the उपचार of mental disorders.
psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine, conduct physical examinations, अनुक्रम and interpret laboratory tests, use मनोचिकित्सा और may अनुक्रम brain इमेजिंग अध्ययन ऐसे as computed टोमोग्राफी ( ct/cat स्कैन ), चुम्बकीय resonance imaging ( mri ), and positron emission टोमोग्राफी ( PET ) scanning.
Within the framework of the World Health संगठन 's ( जो ) definition of health as a state of complete शारीरिक, दिमागी और social well-being, और नहीं merely the अनुपस्थिति of disease or infirmity, reproductive health, or sexual health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, functions and system at all stages of जीवन.
Reproductive स्वास्थ्य, इसलिए, implies that people are समर्थ to have a responsible, satisfying and safer sex जीवन and that वे have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, जब and कैसा often to do so.
One interpretation of this implies कि मेन और महिलाओं ought to be सूचित of and to have access to safe, effective, affordable and acceptable विधि of birth कंट्रोल ; भी अभिगम to appropriate health care services of sexual, reproductive medicine and implementation of health education programs to stress the महत्व of women to go safely through pregnancy और childbirth could provide युगल with the best chance of having a healthy infant.
On the other हाथ individuals do face inequalities in reproductive health services.
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic औकात, शिक्षा स्तर, age, नस्ल, धर्म, और संसाधन available in their environment.
It is possible for example, कि कम income individuals कमी the resources लिये appropriate health services और the knowledge to know what is उचित for maintaining reproductive health.
According to the जो, `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts for 20 % of the global burden of ill-health for महिलाओं, and 14 % लिये मेन. ''
Reproductive health is a भाग of Sexual and reproductive health and अधिकारों.

Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's उपभोक्ता 64-bit x86-64 single-, dual-, and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models हैं single- die, whereas the quad-core मॉडल comprise two dies, each containing two cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of कोर 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market, and reunified laptop and डेस्कटॉप CPU lines, which previously had been विभाजित into the Pentium 4, Pentium D, और Pentium m brands.
The कोर 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the Solo ( single-core ), Duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), और in 2007, the Extreme ( dual- or quad-core CPUs लिये enthusiasts ) subbrands.
इंटेल कोर 2 processors साथ vPro technology ( designed for व्यवसायों ) शामिल the dual-core and quad-core branches.
the Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the नेशनल Football League ( एनएफएल ), the highest level of professional American फ़ुटबॉल in the संयुक्त States, culminating a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year.
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to पहचानो each game, बल्कि than the साल in which it is आयोजित.
For example, Super Bowl I थी निभाई on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 regular ऋतु, while Super Bowl xlvii was निभाई on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 ऋतु.
The game थी निर्मित as part of a merger अनुबंध between the NFL and इसके then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
it was agreed that the दो leagues ' champion teams would play in an afl–nfl World Championship Game until the विलय थी to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each league थी redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन ``, and the game was तब played between the conference champions.
Currently, the National फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 विन्स to 22 wins for the American Football सम्मेलन ( afc ).
the day on which the Super Bowl is played, now considered by some a de facto American national holiday, is called `` Super कटोरी Sunday ``.
It is the second-largest दिन लिये U.S. खाना consumption, after Thanksgiving Day.
in addition, the Super Bowl has frequently been the most watched अमरीकी television ब्रॉडकास्ट of the year.
Super कटोरी XLV, निभाई in 2011, became the most-watched American television program in history, आरेखण an औसत audience of 111 लाख दर्शक और लेने over the स्पॉट आयोजित by the पिछला year 's सुपर Bowl, which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of m*a*s*h.
the Super Bowl is भी among the most watched sporting कार्यक्रम in the world, almost all being North American audiences, and is दूसरी to association football ’s यूईएफए Champions League final as the most watched annual sporting इवेंट worldwide.
Because of its high viewership, commercial airtime during the Super Bowl broadcast is the सबसे महंगी of the year.
Due to the high cost of investing in advertising on the Super Bowl, companies regularly develop their most expensive विज्ञापन for this broadcast.
As a परिणाम, watching और discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials रै become a significant aspect of the event.
In addition, अनेक popular singers and musicians have performed दौरान the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure.
फिओना is a feminine given name.
the नाम Fiona थी invented, और पहला used, by the स्कॉटिश poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ), author of the ossian poems, which he claimed यहूद अनुवाद from ancient Gaelic sources ( स्त्रोत, when challenged, he never उत्पादित ).
the name was subsequently प्रयुक्त as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ), who authored several romantic works अंतर्गत the name `` फिओना macleod ''.
The name has since become लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड, Scotland and आयरलैंड.
The नाम is considered to be a Latinised form of the Gaelic word fionn, अर्थ `` श्वेत '', `` fair ''.
The name फिओना is भी sometimes used as an anglicisation of the Irish-language name Fíona, although these names are otherwise unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ).
वहीँ is also a आधुनिक tendency to equate the authentic Scottish Gaelic feminine name fionnghal साथ फिओना.
The name Fiona is rising in popularity particularly in German -speaking countries.
Fiona was the 49th सबसे popular name for baby लड़कियों born in 2008 in Germany.
फिओना was tied for तीसरा place in the ranking of most popular names for baby लड़कियों born in the tiny principality of liechtenstein in 2008.
The नाम was the 347th सबसे popular name for girls born in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008, where it has ranked among the top 1,000 सबसे popular names for लड़कियों since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for लड़कियों of Asian or प्रशांत Islander descent in नई York City, where Fiona क्रमित as the नवीं सबसे popular नाम for girls from those समूह in 2007.
Many languages are used, or historically have been used in the United States.
The सबसे commonly used language is अंग्रेज़ी.
There are also many भाषाएं स्वदेशी to North अमेरिका or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region.
भाषाएं brought to the country by colonists or आप्रवासियों from यूरोपीय, Asia, or other parts of the world मेक up a विशाल portion of the भाषाएं फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; अनेक languages, सहित creoles and चिह्न languages, have भी विकसित in the United States.
Approximately 337 भाषाएं हैं spoken or signed by the population, of जिससे 176 हैं स्वदेशी to the area.
Fifty-two languages formerly spoken in the country 's territory are now विलुप्त.
the किस्में of अंग्रेज़ी spoken in the संयुक्त राज्य is known as American अंग्रेज़ी.
अंग्रेज़ी is the de facto national language of the संयुक्त States, with 80 % of the population claiming it as a mother जीभ, और कुछ 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or `` very खूब ''.
However, no official language exists at the संघीय level.
There have been several proposals to make अंग्रेज़ी the national language in amendments to immigration reform bills, but none of ये bills has become law साथ the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels, with कुछ राज्य mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure capacity, others adopting अंग्रेज़ी alone, others officially adopting English as well as local languages, और still others adopting a नीति of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the second सबसे आम language in the country, and is spoken by over 12 % of the जनसांख्यिकी.
The संयुक्त States holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by मैक्सिको, स्पेन, कोलंबिया, और अर्जेंटीना.
Throughout the southwestern United राज्य, long-established Spanish-speaking समुदायों coexist with विशाल numbers of अधिक recent hispanophone आप्रवासियों.
Although many नई Latin American immigrants are less than धाराप्रवाह in English, nearly all second-generation Hispanic अमेरिकी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी fluently, while only about half स्टिल speak Spanish.
according to the 2000 US जनसांख्यिकी, people of जर्मनी ancestry make up the largest सिंगल ethnic समूह in the संयुक्त राज्य, और the German भाषा ranks fifth.
इतालवी, Polish, and French are स्टिल widely spoken among populations descending इससे immigrants इससे those countries in the early 20th century, but the use of ये भाषाएं is dwindling as the older पीढियां die.
Russian is भी spoken by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one million speakers each in the संयुक्त States, almost entirely within recent immigrant populations.
Both languages, along साथ the किस्में of the Chinese language, जापानी, and Korean, are now प्रयुक्त in elections in अलास्का, California, हवाई, Illinois, New York, टेक्सास, and Washington.
देशी American भाषाएं हैं spoken in smaller pockets of the country, but ये populations are अवरोहण, और the भाषाएं are almost never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, although having few native speakers, is an official language along साथ अंग्रेज़ी at the state level in Hawaii.
The state सरकारी of louisiana offers services और दस्तावेज़ in फ्रेंच, as does नई Mexico in Spanish.
Besides अंग्रेज़ी, स्पेनी, French, German, Navajo and other Native American भाषाएं, all other languages हैं usually learned from अप्रवासी ancestors that came after the समय of independence or learned through कुछ form of education.
1990 's Pontiac Grand am सेडान fender and क्वार्टर फलक
on an automobile, a क्वार्टर फलक ( or rear wing as it is ज्ञात in British English ) is usually considered the देह panel which goes between the rear द्वार और the ट्रंक and typically wraps around the wheel well ; however, the समान front section फेंडर ( गाडी ), between the door and the hood, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a क्वार्टर panel.
The quarter panel is typically made of चादर मेटल, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although, this varies with different makes and models.
A quarter फलक is typically a welded on component of the uni-body structure or monocoque.
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter फलक typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
Due to this high amount of specialized labor, a क्वार्टर panel may often be repaired बल्कि than replaced by hammering out the damage, and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the असली surface.
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in print तभी, Shrops ) is a काउंटी in the West मिडलैंड्स region of England.
it borders Wales to the वेस्ट, Cheshire to the north, Staffordshire to the east, Worcestershire to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south.
A एकात्मक authority ( shropshire Council ) was निर्मित on 1 April 2009, taking over इससे the previous county council and 5 district councils, और covers सबसे of the county.
The borough of telford and Wrekin has been a separate unitary प्राधिकार चूंकि 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial काउंटी.
the county 's population and अर्थव्यवस्था is centred on five towns : the काउंटी कस्बा of shrewsbury, which is culturally और historically महत्वपूर्ण और is located in the centre of the काउंटी ; Telford, a नई town in the east which was constructed around a number of older कस्बों, most notably Wellington, Dawley and madeley, which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, bridgnorth बस to the दक्षिण of Telford, और Ludlow in the दक्षिण.
The काउंटी has many further मार्केट towns, सहित Whitchurch in the उत्तर, न्यूपोर्ट बस to the north-east of telford, और Market Drayton in the north-east of the काउंटी.
the Ironbridge Gorge क्षेत्रफल is a UNESCO World विरासत Site, covering Ironbridge, coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley.
वहीँ are, additionally, other notable historic industrial sites स्तिथ around the काउंटी, such as at shrewsbury, broseley, Snailbeach and Highley as well as the shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire पहाड़ियाँ क्षेत्रफल of Outstanding Natural Beauty covers about a क्वार्टर of the county, मुख्यतः in the south.
shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties, with the population घनत्व of the shropshire Council area being बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
The wrekin is one of the most famous natural लैंडमार्क in the county, हालांकि the highest पहाड़ियाँ are the clee पहाड़ियाँ, Stiperstones and the Long Mynd.
Wenlock Edge is another significant भौगोलिक and geological landmark.
in the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's, whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve, one of the most important and best preserved bogs in ब्रिटेन.
the River Severn, ग्रेट Britain 's longest नदी, runs through the county, exiting into Worcestershire via the severn Valley.
Shropshire is landlocked, और with an area of, is England 's largest inland county.
The county पुष्प is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat purposes, the county ( कम the एकात्मक ज़िला of Telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( कोड ukg22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary क्षेत्रों ( covering all of the ceremonial county ), together with the अधिकारियों covering the ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire, comprise the `` shropshire and Staffordshire '' nuts 2 region.

the अमरीकी sitcom The Big बंग सिद्धान्त, created और executive उत्पादित by चक lorre and Bill prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
the show centers on five characters : roommates शेल्डन Cooper and Leonard hofstadter, दो Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard wolowitz, और astrophysicist राजेश koothrappali.
over समय, अनेक supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie winkle ( ऋतु 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at अलग times, a lover of both लियोनार्ड and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी, और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating जालस्थल ; and कॉमिक book store-owner, स्टुअर्ट खिलते ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; ऋतु 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best dost when हावर्ड is in स्पेस.
The show also सुविधाएँ numerous supporting characters, each of whom plays a prominent role in a small समूह of episodes.
The A-Team is an American action-adventure television श्रेणी, running from 1983 to 1987, परिचय a fictional group of ex– United राज्य Army Special Forces personnel जो work as soldiers of fortune, while on the run from the Army बाद being branded as war अपराधियों लिये a `` crime they did n't commit ``.
A विशेषता film based on the series थी released by 20th Century Fox on जून 11, 2010.

Diana Prince is a fictional character appearing regularly in कहानियां प्रकाशित by DC Comics.

Wat Phra Kaew, बैंकॉक, Thailand
वहीँ is no आधिकारिक राज्य religion in the Thai constitution, जिससे guarantees religious स्वतंत्रता लिये all Thai नागरिकों, though the king is जरूरी by law to be बौद्ध.
According to the पिछला जनसांख्यिकी ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are Buddhists of the थेरवाद परंपरा.
मुसलमान are the second largest religious समूह in Thailand at 4.6 %.
थाईलैंड 's southernmost provinces - pattani, Yala, narathiwat and भाग of Songkhla Chumphon have dominant Muslim populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai and मलय.
The southern tip of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays.
ईसाइयों, मुख्यतः catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A small but influential community of Sikhs in थाईलैंड and some हिन्दुओं also live in the country 's cities, and are heavily सगाई in retail commerce.
वहीँ is भी a small Jewish community in थाईलैंड, dating back to the 17th सदी.
चूंकि 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the Thai government as terrorists or separatists, have rallied विरूद्ध the central government because of alleged corruption और ethnic पूर्वाग्रह on the part of officials.
थाईलैंड 's Department of Religion, currently under the Ministry of Culture, is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in Thailand url_http जिससे hold properties through legally established foundations.
It रै oversight, along with the Immigration Police, over the work permits of प्रचारकों who are `` expatriate religious workers '' of all धर्मों.
A value added tax ( VAT ) is a form of consumption tax.
From the perspective of the buyer, it is a कर on the खरीदें price.
From कि of the seller, it is a tax only on the value added to a उत्पाद, material, or service, इससे an accounting point of दृश्य, by इस stage of its manufacture or distribution.
The निर्माता remits to the government the difference between these two amounts, and retains the बाकी for themselves to offset the कर they had previously सशुल्क on the inputs.
The value added to a उत्पाद by or with a कारोबार is the sale price चार्ज to इसके customer, minus the cost of materials और other taxable inputs.
a vat is like a sales कर in that ultimately only the समाप्त consumer is taxed.
It differs from the बिक्री कर in that, साथ the latter, the tax is एकत्रित and remitted to the government तभी once, at the point of खरीदें by the समाप्त consumer.
साथ the VAT, collections, remittances to the government, and credits लिये taxes already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products.
A रेफरी calling a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the नाम of दो infractions in the sport of ice हॉकी that may occur when a खिलाड़ी intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick above the ऊँचाई of the shoulders or above the cross बार of a हॉकी goal.
This can result in a stoppage of खेल or in a penalty.
in the rules of the नेशनल हॉकी League, high-sticking is पारिभाषित as a penalty in नियम 60 and as a non-penalty बेईमानी in Rule 80.
A stoppage in खेल परिणाम if a high स्टिक comes in contact साथ the puck and the team जो touched it regains control of the puck.
However, खेल usually continues if a player touches the puck with a high stick और the opposing team gains कंट्रोल of the puck.
if the पक goes into the opposing जाल बाद coming into सम्पर्क with a high stick, the goal is प्रतिबंधित.
The स्तर at जिससे a स्टिक is considered too high for a goal is the crossbar of the जाल.
However, if a खिलाड़ी knocks the पक into his अपना net with a high स्टिक, the goal is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a player हमलों another player with a high स्टिक.
The खिलाड़ी is given a minor penalty unless his high stick caused an चोट, in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match दंड.
It is the referee 's discretion जिससे penalty to assess : the rule calls लिये a double minor for an आकस्मिक injury, or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ).
चोट is प्रायः decided by the high stick causing bleeding, लकिन the presence of रक्त does not automatically औसत an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to पुरस्कार an extra penalty without the उपस्थिति of blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty.
ठेठ modern memory कार्ड रीडर, संगत with many common स्वरुप
A मेमोरी card reader is a device, typically having a USB interface, for accessing the data on a मेमोरी card such as a CompactFlash ( CF ), Secure डिजिटल ( sd ) or MultiMediaCard ( mmc ).
Most card readers भी offer write capability, और together with the कार्ड, this can function as a pen ड्राइव.
कुछ printers and निजी computers have a built-in card reader.
A multi card रीडर is प्रयुक्त for संचार साथ more than एक प्रकार of flash मेमोरी card.
मल्टी कार्ड readers do नहीं have built-in memory capacity, but are able to accept multiple प्रकार and शैलियाँ of memory cards.
The क्रमांक of compatible memory cards varies from reader to reader and can include अधिक than 20 different प्रकार.
The क्रमांक of different memory cards कि a मल्टी card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, साथ x being a फिगर of मेरिट indicating the क्रमांक of memory cards स्वीकृत, ऐसे as 35-in-1.
There are तीन श्रेणी of card readers sorted by the type और quantity of the card स्लॉट : single कार्ड रीडर ( e.g. 1x sd-only ), मल्टी कार्ड रीडर ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g. 4x sd only ).
कुछ kinds of memory ताश with उनके own USB कृत्यों do not need the card रीडर, such as the Intelligent Stick मेमोरी कार्ड, which can plug directly into a USB स्लॉट.
the USB device class used is 0x08.
धमकाना is detrimental to students ' well-being and development.
Bullying is the use of force or coercion to गाली or intimidate others.
The बर्ताव can be habitual and involve an असंतुलन of social or physical power.
it can include मौखिक harassment or threat, physical assault or coercion and may be निर्देशित repeatedly towards particular victims, perhaps on grounds of रेस, religion, लिंग, कामुकता, or क्षमता.
If bullying is done by a group, it is called mobbing.
The शिकार of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
Bullying can be defined in many different ways.
The uk currently रै no legal definition of धमकाना, जबकि some U.S. states have laws विरूद्ध it.
Bullying consists of three मौलिक प्रकार of abuse – emotional, verbal, and physical.
It typically involves subtle विधि of coercion such as intimidation.
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one bullying to अधिक complex धमकाना in which the bully may have one or अधिक `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary बुली in his or उसके bullying activities.
धमकाना in school और the कार्यस्थल is also referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed bullying in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of rankism.
a धमकाना संस्कृति can develop in कोई context in which इंसान beings interact with each अन्य.
इस includes school, church, परिवार, the workplace, घर, and neighborhoods.
Happy slapping in the Instituto क्षेत्रीय federico Errázuriz, Santa Cruz, चिली
लौरा बुश और Rae leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4, 2007, in Austin, टेक्सास, बाद the 8-year-old introduced mrs. Bush during announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the नेशनल Center for लापता and Exploited Children.
Rae leigh थी the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a परिणाम of an AMBER चेतावनी जब she थी 8 weeks old in November 1998.
An एम्बर Alert or a चाइल्ड Abduction Emergency ( वही code : CAE ) is a child abduction चेतावनी प्रणाली originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing : प्रसारण Emergency Response, named for एम्बर hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
Alternate क्षेत्रीय alert names यहूद once used ; in Georgia, `` लेवी 's Call '' ( नामित बाद Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii, `` maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; और Arkansas, `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ).
एम्बर Alerts are distributed via commercial radio स्टेशन, Internet रेडियो, satellite radio, television stations, and cable TV by the Emergency चेतावनी System and noaa Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction आपात '' or `` Amber चेतावनियाँ '' ).
The चेतावनियाँ are also issued via e-mail, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक traffic-condition signs, the led billboards which are located बाहर of newer Walgreens locations, along with the LED/LCD लक्षण of billboard कंपनियाँ such as Clear Channel Outdoor, CBS बाहरी और Lamar, or through wireless यंत्र sms text messages.
AMBER चेतावनी has also teamed up with Google और फेसबुक to रिले सूचना regarding an एम्बर Alert to an ever growing जनसांख्यिकी.
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in उनके area via SMS messages can visit बेतार एम्बर Alerts, जिससे हैं offered by law as free संदेश.
In some states, the display scrollboards in front of लॉटरी terminals are also used.
The decision to घोषित an AMBER Alert is made by each पुलिस organization ( in many cases, the state पुलिस or highway पैट्रोल ) which investigates प्रत्येक of the abductions.
पब्लिक information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name और description of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, and a वर्णन and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United राज्य President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper संबंध '' जबकि she worked at the White House in 1995 और 1996.
The affair and इसके repercussions ( which शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became ज्ञात as the lewinsky कांड.
House of Night is a series of पिशाच -थीमd fantasy novels by American author P. C. डाल and उसके daughter kristin Cast.
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old girl who has just become a `` fledgling vampyre '' और is required to attend the हाउस of Night boarding school in तुलसा, Oklahoma.
the series has been on the New York Times बेहतरीन Seller सूची for 63 weeks and there are over सात million copies in छपाई in North अमेरिका अलोन.
The sixth novel, Tempted, which went on sale on October 27, 2009 with a पहला printing of a million नक़ल, entered the USA आज bestseller list that week at # 1.
in जनवरी, 2010, Gezeichnet, a German अनुवाद of चिह्नित, reached the # 1 स्पॉट on the Der Spiegel बेस्टसेलर सूची.
The श्रेणी has so far sold more than ten million books in 39 countries.

In Greek mythology, the Trojan युद्ध थी waged against the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after Paris of Troy took Helen from उसके husband Menelaus king of Sparta.
The war is one of the most important events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through अनेक works of यूनानी literature, सबसे notably through होमर 's Iliad और the Odyssey.
the Iliad relates a part of the पिछला year of the घेरा of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a cycle of epic कविताएं, which have बच through fragments.
एपीसोड इससे the war provided material लिये Greek त्रासदी and other works of यूनानी literature, and for रोमन कवियों सहित Virgil and Ovid.
the war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena, Hera, and Aphrodite, बाद Eris, the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन, दिया them a golden apple, sometimes known as the Apple of अनबन, चिह्नित `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the देवियाँ to Paris, who judged कि Aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', should प्राप्त the ठहराना.
In एक्सचेंज, Aphrodite बना हेलेन, the most खूबसूरत of all women and wife of Menelaus, पतन in love with Paris, who took her to Troy.
Agamemnon, किंग of Mycenae और the brother of हेलेन 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of achaean सैनिकों to Troy and besieged the नगर for ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many नायक, सहित the Achaeans achilles and अजाक्स, and the Trojans Hector and Paris, the नगर गिरी to the ruse of the Trojan घोड़ा.
The achaeans slaughtered the ट्रोजन्स ( except for कुछ of the women और children whom they रखा or sold as slaves ) and desecrated the मंदिरों, thus कमाई the देवताओं ' wrath.
few of the achaeans returned सकुशल to their घरों and many founded colonies in दूर shores.
The romans later traced their उत्पत्ति to aeneas, एक of the ट्रोजन्स, who थी said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The प्राचीन Greeks विचार that the Trojan War थी a historical event that था taken place in the 13th or 12th century BC, and believed that Troy was स्तिथ in modern-day तुर्कों near the Dardanelles.
By modern times, दोनो the युद्ध and the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the जर्मनी archaeologist heinrich schliemann met फ़्रैंक Calvert, who convinced Schliemann कि Troy was at hissarlik और schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this अर्जी is now accepted by most scholars.
Whether वहीँ is कोई historical reality behind the Trojan War is an open question.
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the tale, though this may बस mean कि the homeric stories are a संलयन of विभिन्न tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the कांस्य आयु.
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are निकला इससे a specific historical विरोध usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries bc, प्रायः preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 BC, which roughly corresponds with पुरातत्व evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy viia.

Since the revival of अराजकतावाद around the start of the 21st-century संयुक्त with the rise of the anti-globalization गति, anarchist cultural प्रतीकों are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery, vein, and तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity.
