The climate of Antarctica is the coldest on the पूरे of धरती.
Antarctica रै the lowest naturally occurring temperature कभी recorded on the मैदान on Earth : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok स्टेशन.
It is भी अत्यधिक dry ( technically a desert ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of वर्षण प्रति year.
Even so, on most parts of the continent the हिम rarely melts और is eventually संपीडित to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet.
Weather fronts rarely घुस दूर into the continent.
Most of Antarctica रै an बर्फ cap जलवायु ( köppen EF ) with बहुत ठंडा, generally अत्यधिक dry मौसम throughout the साल and no month averaging ऊपर 0 °C ( 32 °f ).
कुछ fringe coastal areas have a tundra जलवायु ( Köppen ET ) साथ a short summer averaging above जमने, and much higher वर्षण.
वर्तमान head coach Mike Tomlin, दौरान the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise रै had 16 सिर coaches throughout its history.
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in, the नाम was बदला to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel.
Joe बच served two separate terms as head कोच and वॉल्ट Kiesling served three पृथक terms.
During the और seasons, due to the amount of players जो fought in World War II, the Steelers combined their टोली with फिलाडेल्फिया और Chicago, respectively.
During these seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with चिकनी Neale and फिल हैंडलर, who have नहीं been included within this सूची.
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early years, the team 's first ऋतु with more wins than नुकसान was coached by Jock Sutherland in.
in, अंतर्गत Sutherland, the Steelers निभाई their first playoff खेल विरूद्ध the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 सिर coaches spent उनके entire पेशेवर coaching careers with the मताधिकार, including John McNally, Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll, who have also been voted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल Hall of कीर्ति.
One of तभी चार मेन to कोच the वही team for 23 years, चक Noll retired in.
noll is also the only कोच in National Football League history to जीत four सुपर Bowls.
विधेयक Cowher, Noll 's बदलना, coached the Steelers to उनके fifth सुपर कटोरी विजय, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII, while head coached by Mike Tomlin, the team 's वर्तमान head coach.
in criminal law, fraud is intentional deception made for personal gain or to क्षति another व्यक्तिगत ; the सम्बन्धित adjective is बेईमान, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime और a civil law violation, though the specific criminal विधि definition varies by legal क्षेत्राधिकार.
Defrauding people or entities of धन or valuables is a common purpose of fraud.
A hoax also involves deception, लकिन without the intention of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil कार्रवाई for breach of contract or specific प्रदर्शन of a अनुबंध.
धोखाधड़ी is a basis for equitable क्षेत्राधिकार.
Passover, or Pesach ( इससे : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), tiberian :, आधुनिक Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah, Pesakh, यहूदी : Peysekh, Paysakh, Paysokh ) is an महत्वपूर्ण Biblically -derived Jewish पर्व.
Historically, साथ with Shavuot ( `` पेंटेकोस्ट '' ) and Sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ), Passover is one of the तीन pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire जनसांख्यिकी of the किंगडम of यहूदा made a pilgrimage to the टेम्पल in जेरूसलम.
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim, लकिन तभी men participate in public worship.
passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew माह of Nisan और lasts for either सात days ( in Israel ) or आठ दिनों ( in the diaspora ).
in Judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts जबतक the following संध्या, thus the first day of Passover तभी begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of nisan.
the संस्कार unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the passover seder when the 15th of Nisan रै begun.
In the Northern Hemisphere passover takes प्लेस in spring as the तोरा prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
it is एक of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
the Jewish लोगों celebrate Passover as a commemoration of उनके liberation over 3,300 years पहले by God from गुलामी in ancient मिश्र that was ruled by the pharaohs, and their birth as a nation अंतर्गत the leadership of मूसा.
It commemorates the स्टोरी of the Exodus as described in the यहूदी Bible विशेषकर in the किताब of Exodus, in which the Israelites यहूद freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the narrative of the exodus, the बाइबल tells that परमेश्वर helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the प्राचीन उन्होंने पहले the pharaoh would रिलीज उसके Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the मिश्र first-born.
The Israelites यहूद instructed to mark the doorposts of their homes साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered spring मेमने and, upon seeing this, the स्पिरिट of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the नाम of the holiday.
There is कुछ debate over where the पद is actually derived from.
जब the Pharaoh freed the israelites, it is said that वे left in such a hurry कि वे could not इंतजार for ब्रैड आटा to वृद्धि ( leaven ).
In commemoration, for the duration of passover no leavened bread is eaten, for which कारण it is पुकारा `` The Festival of the unleavened Bread ''.
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is खाया during Passover and it is a प्रतीक of the holiday.
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर from Earth, and thus the तभी naked-eye comet कि might appear twice in a human lifetime.
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल and more spectacular, लकिन will appear only once in thousands of years.
Halley 's रिटर्न to the inner सौर System have been observed and recorded by astronomers चूंकि at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, Babylonian, and मध्यकालीन European chroniclers, लकिन were not recognized as reappearances of the same ऑब्जेक्ट at the time.
the comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is अभी नामित.
Halley 's धूमकेतु पिछला appeared in the inner सौर प्रणाली in 1986 and होगा अगला appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the ढांचा of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail गठन.
ये observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` dirty स्नोबॉल '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley होता be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड and अमोनिया – and dust.
the missions भी provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; लिये instance it is now समझा that हैली 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, and कि only a small portion of it is icy.
anti-communism is opposition to communism.
व्यवस्थित anti-communism विकसित in प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of communism, especially after the 1917 October Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions दौरान the Cold War.
Most anti-communists reject the concept of ऐतिहासिक materialism, which is a central idea in Marxism.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that पूंजीवाद will be followed by socialism और communism, बस as सामंतवाद was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists सवाल the validity of the Marxist अर्जी that the socialist state will `` wither away '' when it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society.
anti-communists argue कि the repression in the early सालो of bolshevik rule, while not as चरम as that during जोसेफ Stalin 's rule, was still कठोर by reasonable मानकों, citing examples ऐसे as Felix dzerzhinsky 's secret police, which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, और the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to both साम्यवादी and fascism as totalitarianism, देखकर समानता between the क्रियाएँ of कम्युनिस्ट and फासिस्ट governments.
Historian रॉबर्ट conquest रै argued कि Communism was responsible for tens of millions of मौतों दौरान the 20th century.
Opponents argue that Communist पार्टियों that have आइये to power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of राजनैतिक विपक्ष.
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have दिखाया no signs of advancing from Marx 's socialist स्टेज of economy to an ideal communist stage.
Rather, Communist सरकारें have been accused of creating a नई ruling क्लास ( a Nomenklatura ), with powers और privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper वर्ग in the non- कम्युनिस्ट regimes.
Gil बगुला ( 9 April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer.
He थी the first black player to खेल for Scottish club सेल्टिक, and थी the father of poet और संगीतकार gil Scott-Heron.
He died in Detroit of a दिल attack on 27 नवम्बर 2008.
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( glycine max ) is a प्रजाति of legume देशी to ईस्ट एशिया, widely grown लिये its edible bean which has numerous uses.
The plant is classed as an oilseed rather than a पल्स by the UN खाना and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of प्रोटीन for animal फ़ीड्स and अनेक prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of प्रसंस्करण the soybean crop.
For उदाहरण, soybean products such as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many मांस and दुग्ध analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per एकड़ than most other उपयोग of जमीन.
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans शामिल सोया milk, and from the latter tofu and tofu स्किन.
Fermented foods include सोया sauce, fermented सेम paste, natto, and tempeh, among अन्य.
The आयल is प्रयुक्त in many industrial अनुप्रयोग.
The main producers of soy हैं the United States ( 35 % ), ब्राज़ील ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
The सेम contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
Harrison Ford ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an American फिल्मी actor और producer.
He is famous for his performances as Han सोलो in the असली Star युद्धों trilogy and the title character of the इंडियाना जोन्स film श्रेणी.
Ford is also known लिये his roles as Rick Deckard in ब्लेड Runner, John Book in Witness और Jack Ryan in Patriot खेल and साफ and Present Danger.
उसके करियर रै spanned six decades और शामिल roles in several हॉलीवुड blockbusters, सहित Presumed निर्दोष, the Fugitive, एयर Force One, and What Lies Beneath.
at one point, चार of the top छह box-office hits of सब time included one of his भूमिकाएँ.
Five of his films have been inducted into the National Film Registry.
in 1997, Ford was ranked No. 1 in Empire `` The Top 100 फिल्म Stars of All Time '' list.
, the United राज्य domestic बक्सा office grosses of Ford 's films कुल over US $ 3.5 billion, with worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the तीसरा उच्चतम grossing U.S. domestic box-office स्टार.
Ford is the husband of actress calista Flockhart.
a tube of chapstick
ChapStick is a ब्रांड name for lip balm manufactured by फाइजर उपभोक्ता Healthcare and used in many countries worldwide.
it is intended to help दावत and prevent chapped lips ; hence the name.
Many varieties भी include सनस्क्रीन in अनुक्रम to prevent sunburn.
Due to its popularity, the पद has become a genericized ट्रेडमार्क.
It popularly refers to कोई lip balm contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और applied in the वही manner as lipstick.
However, the term is still a registered ट्रेडमार्क, with rights exclusively स्वामित्व by Pfizer.
In Sweden और in the संयुक्त Kingdom, the product 's main competitor is lypsyl, बना by novartis Consumer Health, which is वितरित in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), भी known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher जिनकी primary उपलब्धि was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
This theory denies the existence of सामग्री substance और instead contends that familiar objects जैसे टेबल and chairs are तभी ideas in the minds of perceivers, and as a result can not exist without होने आभास.
Thus, as बर्कली famously put it, लिये शारीरिक objects `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ).
Berkeley is also ज्ञात for उसके critique of abstraction, an महत्वपूर्ण premise in his argument for immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published his first major work,, in जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of human vision and उन्नत the theory that the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but light और रंग.
इस foreshadowed his chief philosophical कार्य A Treatise concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 जिससे, after its ग़रीब reception, he rewrote in dialogue form और प्रकाशित under the title Three संवाद between Hylas and philonous in 1713.
In इस book, बर्कली 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of दिमाग ' ), while Hylas ( यूनानी : 'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents, in particular John Locke.
Berkeley argued विरूद्ध सर Isaac Newton 's doctrine of निरपेक्ष space, time and motion in De Motu ( on Motion ), published 1721.
His वितर्क were a precursor to the दृश्य of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published alciphron, a Christian क्षमाप्रार्थी विरूद्ध the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he published The Analyst, an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal कलन, which थी influential in the development of गणित.
His पिछला प्रमुख philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by advocating the medicinal use of tar water, और then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including विज्ञान, दर्शनशास्त्र, and धर्मशास्त्र.
Interest in बर्कली 's कार्य increased after संसार युद्ध ii, because he tackled many of the मुद्दे of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the समस्याएं of perception, the difference between प्राथमिक and secondary qualities, and the importance of भाषा.
Qingdao ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a major नगर in eastern Shandong province, Eastern China, with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level शहरों, is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010.
It सीमायें yantai to the northeast, Weifang to the west और Rizhao to the southwest.
Qīng ( ) in Chinese means `` ग्रीन '' or `` lush '', जबकि dǎo ( ) means `` island ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying across the Shandong प्रायद्वीप जबकि looking आउट to the Yellow Sea, चिंगदाओ is a प्रमुख seaport, naval आधार, and औद्योगिक centre.
it is also the site of the Tsingtao ब्रेवरी.
The world 's longest समुद्र bridge, the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge, links the main urban क्षेत्रफल of Qingdao with Huangdao district, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea क्षेत्रों.
चिंगदाओ is named China 's सबसे livable city.
mimivirus is a वाइरल genus containing a सिंगल identified species नामित Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ), or is a समूह of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated प्रायः MimiN ).
in colloquial speech, APMV is more commonly referred to as बस `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger वायरस Megavirus chilensis was described, it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses.
Mimivirus has a large और complex genome compared with सबसे other viruses.
mimivirus, short for `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to reflect its large आकार और apparent Gram-staining गुण.
The मैक्सिकन War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) थी an armed विरोध between the people of Mexico और the Spanish colonial authorities which started on September 16, 1810.
The गति, which became known as the Mexican War of Independence, थी led by Mexican-born Spaniards, mestizos और amerindians who sought स्वतंत्रता from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their colonial मास्टर्स, but ended as an unlikely alliance between मैक्सिकन ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents.
crohn 's disease, also known as Crohn syndrome और regional enteritis, is a type of inflammatory bowel बीमारी that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract इससे मुँह to गुदा, causing a wide variety of लक्षण.
It primarily causes abdominal पीड़ा, अतिसार ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ), vomiting ( can be निरन्तर ), or weight loss, but may भी cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract such as स्किन rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the नजर, tiredness, और lack of concentration.
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological और bacterial कारकों in genetically susceptible individuals.
इस results in a दीर्घकालिक inflammatory disorder, in which the body 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal ट्रैक्ट possibly directed at microbial antigens.
crohn 's disease has wrongly महरूम described as an autoimmune disease in the past ; हाल investigators have described it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic संघ साथ crohn 's disease, primarily with variations of the NOD2 gene and its protein, जिससे होश बैक्टीरियल cell दीवारें.
Siblings of प्रभावित individuals are at higher risk.
Males और females are बराबर affected.
Smokers are दो times more likely to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 और 600,000 people in North America.
Prevalence estimates for उत्तरी यूरोपीय have ranged इससे 27–48 प्रति 100,000.
crohn 's बीमारी tends to present initially in the teens and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, हालांकि the disease can occur at कोई आयु.
There is no ज्ञात pharmaceutical or surgical cure लिये crohn 's बीमारी.
Treatment options are restricted to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, और preventing relapse.
The बीमारी थी named बाद gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard crohn, who, in 1932, together with two other सहयोगियों at माउंट Sinai Hospital in नई York, described a series of patients साथ inflammation of the टर्मिनल ileum, the area most commonly प्रभावित by the illness.

youtube is a video-sharing website, निर्मित by three former PayPal employees in February 2005, on जिससे उपयोक्ता can upload, view और share videos.
The company is आधारित in सैन ब्रूनो, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to प्रदर्शक a wide variety of user-generated video content, including फिल्म clips, TV clips, and music वीडियो, as well as amateur content ऐसे as video blogging, short original वीडियो, and educational वीडियो.
Most of the content on youtube has महरूम uploaded by individuals, although media corporations including CBS, the BBC, Vevo, hulu, और अन्य organizations offer some of their material via the site, as part of the youtube partnership कार्यक्रम.
Unregistered उपयोक्ता can watch videos, while registered users can upload an unlimited number of वीडियो.
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content हैं available तभी to registered users at least 18 years old.
in November 2006, youtube, LLC was bought by Google लिये us $ 1.65 billion, and operates as a subsidiary of Google.

Microsoft DirectX is a संग्रहण of application प्रोग्रामिंग interfaces ( APIs ) for handling कार्य related to मल्टीमीडिया, विशेषकर game programming and video, on Microsoft platforms.
originally, the names of these APIs सब began with Direct, ऐसे as Direct3D, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, directplay, DirectSound, and so forth.
the name DirectX थी coined as shorthand पद for all of ये APIs ( the X standing in for the particular API names ) and जल्द became the name of the collection.
जब Microsoft later नियत out to develop a gaming console, the x थी used as the basis of the नाम Xbox to indicate कि the कंसोल थी based on डाइरेक्टएक्स technology.
The X initial रै been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed लिये the एक्सबॉक्स such as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio सृष्टि Tool ( xact ), जबकि the डाइरेक्टएक्स pattern has been continued for खिड़कियाँ APIs such as direct2d and directwrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics api within डाइरेक्टएक्स ) is widely used in the विकास of video खेल लिये microsoft Windows, microsoft Xbox, Microsoft Xbox 360 और some Sega Dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other software अनुप्रयोग for कल्पना and graphics tasks ऐसे as CAD/CAM engineering.
As Direct3D is the सबसे widely publicized component of डाइरेक्टएक्स, it is common to see the names `` DirectX '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably.
the DirectX तन्त्र development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable binary form, along with accompanying documentation और headers for उपयोग in कोडिंग.
Originally, the runtimes were only संस्थापित by games or explicitly by the user.
Windows 95 did not launch साथ DirectX, but DirectX was included साथ Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2.
Windows 98 and Windows nt 4.0 both shipped with DirectX, as has every version of खिड़कियाँ released since.
The SDK is उपलब्धियाँ as a free download.
While the runtimes are मालिकाना, closed-source तन्त्र, सोर्स code is provided for most of the SDK नमूने.
Starting साथ the release of Windows 8 Developer Preview, DirectX SDK has महरूम integrated into Windows sdk.
Direct3D 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 are तभी available for Windows Vista and newer because प्रत्येक of these new versions was built to depend upon the new Windows प्रदर्शक Driver Model that थी introduced for Windows Vista.
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture शामिल a new video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware लिये various applications and सेवाएं like the Desktop Window Manager.
Quetzaltenango, भी commonly known by its indigenous नाम, Xelajú, or अधिक commonly, xela, is the second largest नगर of ग्वाटेमाला.
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango Department and the नगरपालिका seat of quetzaltenango municipality.
It रै an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of 224,703.
the जनसांख्यिकी is about 61 % indigenous or amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European.
quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an elevation of 2,330 meters ( 7,655 ft ) ऊपर समुद्र स्तर at its lowest part.
It may पहुँचें above 2,400 मीटर within the city.
the नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango consists of an area of.

All these municipalities हैं भाग of the Department of quetzaltenango, मगर San आन्द्रेस Xecul जिससे is a part of the विभाग of totonicapán.
the Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
the literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems परिचय 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian लिये gilgamesh ), किंग of Uruk.
Four of these were used as source material for a combined एपिक in अक्कादी.
This first combined epic, known as the `` Old babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th सदी BC और is titled after इसके incipit, Shūtur एली sharrī ( `` surpassing सब अन्य Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th सदियां BC और bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who देखी the गहन '' ).
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the best copies were खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों ruins of the 7th-century bc assyrian किंग Ashurbanipal.
the story centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh और Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the लोगों of Uruk.
Together, वे यात्रा to the देवदार Mountain to defeat Humbaba, इसके monstrous guardian.
Later वे kill the Bull of Heaven, which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning her अग्रिम.
As a punishment for ये actions, the gods sentence enkidu to death.
The second हाफ of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
in order to learn the रहस्य of eternal life, Gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous यात्रा.
He learns that `` The जीवन कि तुम are seeking you होगा never find.
When the देवताओं created man they allotted to him death, लकिन जीवन वे retained in their अपना keeping. ''
This उद्धरण was originally attributed to siduri in the Old babylonian version of the एपिक, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian संस्करण of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after उसके मौत, because of उसके great भवन प्रोजेक्ट, and his account of what utnapishtim बताई him happened during the flood.
The story has महरूम translated into अनेक different languages, and gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
वहीँ हैं numerous debates over who निर्मित the first वीडियो game, साथ the answer depending largely on how video खेल हैं defined.
The एवोल्यूशन of video खेल represents a tangled web of अनेक different industries, सहित वैज्ञानिक, computer, arcade, and consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स.
The `` video '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
साथ the popular कैच phrase उपयोग of the term `` video खेल '', the term now implies all display types, formats, और platforms.
इतिहासकारों have also sought to बायपास the issue by बजाय using the more विशिष्ट `` डिजिटल games '' वर्णनात्मक.
This term leaves आउट the पहले analog-based कंप्यूटर games.
This is a सूची of best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises कि have बेची or shipped at least 5 million copies.
जबतक वरना stated, संख्याएँ indicate worldwide इकाई sold, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount.
The एक्सेप्शन are the ones specifying shipments, which have निम्नतर पूर्वता than others listing बिक्री.
Franchise बिक्री include expansion packs even हालांकि they are not considered full video खेल.
For best-selling व्यक्तिगत video games, see List of best-selling video games.
The sales आंकड़े given नीचे do नहीं शामिल arcade game sales, which can be found at सूची of highest-grossing arcade video games.
– इस color indicates a sub-series of a larger video खेल मताधिकार.
This does not necessarily लागू for series कि are not video game-based.
डोरोथी Ann Willis Richards ( सितंबर 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) थी an अमरीकी politician and the 45th राज्यपाल of Texas.
She पहला आए to national attention as the state कोषाध्यक्ष of Texas, when she delivered the keynote पता at the 1988 Democratic National Convention.
Richards served as the 45th Governor of Texas from 1991 to 1995 और was पराजित लिये re-election in 1994 by George W. बुश.
ऐन Richards थी the second female governor of टेक्सास.
आंकड़ा Execution रोकथाम ( DEP ) is a security विशेषता included in आधुनिक operating systems.
it is known to be available in Linux, Mac OS x, आईओएस, microsoft Windows and Android operating systems and is intended to prevent an application or service from executing कोड इससे a non-executable मेमोरी प्रदेश.
This helps prevent certain exploits कि स्टोर code via a buffer overflow, for उदाहरण.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP लिये cpu that can mark memory पृष्ठों as nonexecutable, and software-enforced DEP with limited सुरक्षा लिये CPUs that do not have हार्डवेयर support.
software-enforced DEP करता not protect against निष्पादन of कोड in data पृष्ठों, but बजाय counters SEH overwrite, another प्रकार of आक्रमण.
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on खिड़कियाँ in 2004 with Windows XP सेवा Pack 2, while Apple introduced DEP जब they moved to x86 in 2006.
उदाहरण उदाहरण of two common futanari विसंगतियाँ
, is the Japanese word लिये hermaphroditism, which is also प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव for androgyny.
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic genre of computer games, comics and animations, which शामिल characters that show both प्राथमिक sexual विशेषताएँ.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively for characters who have an overall feminine appearance.
in कि case the पद is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ), जिससे is occasionally भी used as term for the works itself.
जल्दी CAPTCHAs such as these, उत्पन्न by the ez-gimpy कार्यक्रम, were used on याहू !
A modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to create a distorted background और high levels of warping on the टेक्स्ट, might focus on बनाना segmentation मुश्किल by adding an angled लकीर.
another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together, as in Yahoo ! 's वर्तमान CAPTCHA format.
कुछ CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of people to देखिए three-dimensional objects.
on this image, symbols are drawn साथ लाइनों of different मोटाई to मेक an effect of extrusion.
a CAPTCHA ( ) is a प्रकार of challenge-response परीक्षण used in computing as an attempt to ensure that the response is उत्पन्न by a इंसान being.
The प्रक्रम usually involves a computer पूछे a user to complete a simple परीक्षण which the कंप्यूटर is able to ग्रेड.
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate but मुश्किल for a computer to solve, but again easy लिये a इंसान.
If a correct solution is received, it can be presumed to have महरूम entered by a human.
A आम type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type अक्षर and/or digits इससे a distorted image कि appears on the स्क्रीन.
ऐसे परीक्षण are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing वेबसाइटों, चूंकि a normal human can easily पढ़ा a CAPTCHA, while the bot can नहीं प्रक्रम the image अक्षर and इसलिए, can not answer properly, or at all.
Although most CAPTCHAs हैं अक्षर pictures randomly उत्पन्न, many of them have become मुश्किल even for a इंसान to read, so picture CAPTCHAs were created in which a human is shown a simple test to दिखाएँ a चित्र of a certain एनिमल ( given few animal pictures ), which is सरल for a इंसान होने to process, and therefore easy to pick, while a bot can not process and solve the सवाल क्युकी although it can analyze the picture, it can not easily guess the animal.
The term `` captcha '' was coined in 2000 by Luis वोन ahn, Manuel Blum, Nicholas J. Hopper, and John langford ( all of कार्नेगी Mellon विश्वविद्यालयों ).
It is an acronym आधारित on the शब्द `` कैप्चर '' and खड़ा for `` completely Automated पब्लिक turing test to tell Computers and इंसानो Apart ''.
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15 October 2004, लकिन the trademark application was abandoned on 21 April 2008.
A CAPTCHA is sometimes वर्णित as a reverse turing test, because it is administered by a machine and targeted at a इंसान, in contrast to the standard Turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
jacques-yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in अंग्रेज़ी as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a फ्रेंच नवल officer, एक्सप्लोरर, conservationist, filmmaker, innovator, scientist, photographer, author और researcher जो studied the sea and all फ़ॉर्म of life in water.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered marine conservation and was a member of the académie française.
KFC ( Kentucky Fried मुर्गा ) is a तेज़ food रेस्तरां chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, संयुक्त राज्य, which specializes in fried chicken.
an `` American icon '', it is the संसार 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by sales ) after McDonald 's, साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 देशों और territories.
The company is a subsidiary of यम !
Brands, a रेस्तरां कम्पनी which also owns Pizza Hut और टैको घंटी.
केएफसी थी संस्थापित by Harland सैंडर्स, जो began selling fried chicken इससे उसके roadside रेस्तरां in Corbin, केंटकी during the Great Depression.
Sanders थी एक of the first people to देखिए the potential of the restaurant franchising concept, साथ the first `` केंटकी Fried Chicken '' मताधिकार opening in Utah in 1952.
The franchise popularized chicken in the तेज़ food industry, thereby diversifying the मार्केट and challenging the दबदबा of the हैमबर्गर.
विपणन himself as `` कर्नल Sanders '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, and his image is still prominently प्रयुक्त in KFC branding.
the company 's rapid expansion देखी it grow too large लिये Sanders to manage, and in 1964 he sold the company to a समूह of investors led by John Y. Brown, jr. and Jack Massey.
KFC was एक of the पहला fast खाना जंजीरों to विस्तार internationally, opening outlets in इंग्लैण्ड, Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s, KFC experienced mixed सौभाग्य domestically, as it went through a series of corporate owners who था little or no experience in the restaurant business.
In the early 1970s, KFC थी बेची to the spirits firm Heublein, who यहूद लिया over by the R.J. रेनॉल्ड्स खाना and तम्बाकू conglomerate, जो sold the कड़ी to PepsiCo.
the chain जारी to विस्तार overseas however, and in 1987 KFC became the first Western restaurant chain to open in China.
The chain रै since विस्तारित rapidly in China, और the country is now the company 's most profitable मार्केट.
पेप्सिको spun off its restaurants division as Tricon Global Restaurants, जिससे बाद changed इसके नाम to Yum !
ब्रांड्स.
केएफसी primarily sells fried chicken टुकड़े और variations such as chicken sandwiches और wraps, salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw, desserts and soft drinks, often supplied by पेप्सिको.
इसके most प्रसिद्ध product is दबाव fried मुर्गा pieces, seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and मसाले.
the exact प्रकृति of these ingredients is unknown, and represents a notable trade secret.
Larger portions of fried मुर्गा हैं परोसा in a distinctive गत्ता `` bucket '', which has become a हस्ताक्षर of the chain since being introduced by franchisee पीट Harman.
KFC is प्रसिद्ध for the स्लोगन `` finger lickin ' good '', जिससे has since been replaced by `` Nobody करता chicken जैसे KFC '' and `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( with a मूक c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of animals मिला exclusively in जलीय और mostly समुद्री environments.
उनके distinguishing feature is cnidocytes, specialized cells that they use mainly for capturing prey.
उनके bodies consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like substance, sandwiched between दो layers of epithelium that are mostly one कोशिका thick.
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and स्थानबद्ध polyps, both of which हैं radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
Both forms have a single orifice and body cavity कि हैं used for पाचन and respiration.
Many cnidarian species उपज colonies कि are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or दोनो.
Cnidarians ' activities are coordinated by a विकेन्द्रित nerve net and सरल receptors.
अनेक free-swimming Cubozoa and scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, और some have सरल eyes.
नहीं all cnidarians reproduce sexually.
अनेक have जटिल lifecycles with asexual polyp stages और यौन medusae, but कुछ omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were लिये a long समय grouped with Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in पृथक phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four प्रमुख groups : the almost wholly sessile anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea pens ) ; तैराकी Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( बक्सा jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa, a diverse समूह that शामिल all the freshwater cnidarians as well as अनेक marine फ़ॉर्म, and रै both sessile members such as hydra and औपनिवेशिक swimmers ऐसे as the पुर्तगाली Man o ' War.
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in उनके own right बल्कि than a sub-group of Scyphozoa, and वहीँ is debate about whether Myxozoa और Polypodiozoa हैं cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ).
सबसे cnidarians शिकार on जीवों ranging in size from plankton to animals several टाइम्स larger than themselves, लकिन अनेक obtain much of उनके पोषण from endosymbiotic algae, and a few are parasites.
Many are preyed upon by other पशु including starfish, समुद्र slugs, fish and turtles.
Coral reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support some of the world 's most उत्पादक ecosystems, and protect vegetation in tidal zones और on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals हैं almost entirely restricted to warm, उथले समुद्री waters, other cnidarians सजीव in the depths, in polar seas और in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in रॉक्स formed परिचय, and other fossils show that corals may have महरूम present shortly before and diversified a few लाख years later.
Fossils of cnidarians कि do नहीं निर्माण mineralized structures are very विरल.
Scientists फिलहाल think that cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians are more closely related to calcareous sponges than these हैं to other sponges, and कि anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of अन्य cnidarians, and the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians, although माना अधिक `` primitive '' than bilaterians, have a wider दायरा of जीनों.

The Aztec people were निश्चित जातीय groups of सेंट्रल Mexico, particularly those समूह जो spoke the Nahuatl भाषा and who dominated large भाग of Mesoamerica इससे the 14th to 16th centuries.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) औसत `` people इससे Aztlan ``, a पौराणिक place for the Nahuatl-speaking culture of the समय, and later अपनाया as the शब्द to define the mexica people.
Often the term `` एज़टेक '' refers exclusively to the mexica लोगों of tenochtitlan ( now the location of Mexico City ), situated on an island in Lake Texcoco, who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah mexica.
Sometimes the term also शामिल the निवासियों of Tenochtitlan 's two principal अलाइड city-states, the acolhuas of Texcoco and the Tepanecs of Tlacopan, who साथ with the mexica formed the एज़टेक Triple गठबंधन which नियंत्रित what is often known as `` the Aztec साम्राज्य ''.
In other contexts, Aztec may refer to all the various city states और their peoples, who shared विशाल parts of their ethnic history और सांस्कृतिक traits with the Mexica, Acolhua और tepanecs, and who प्रायः also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca.
In this meaning it is possible to बात about an Aztec civilization सहित all the particular cultural पैटर्न common लिये most of the peoples inhabiting सेंट्रल Mexico in the late postclassic period.
From the 13th सदी, the Valley of मैक्सिको थी the heart of एज़टेक सभ्यता : here the capital of the एज़टेक Triple Alliance, the नगर of Tenochtitlan, थी built upon raised islets in झील Texcoco.
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary empire expanding इसके राजनैतिक hegemony far beyond the घाटी of Mexico, conquering अन्य city राज्य throughout Mesoamerica.
At its शिखर, Aztec culture had rich और complex mythological and religious traditions, as well as reaching remarkable architectural और artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán cortés, साथ साथ a large number of Nahuatl speaking indigenous allies, conquered Tenochtitlan और defeated the एज़टेक Triple Alliance under the leadership of hueyi tlatoani Moctezuma ii.
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico नगर on the site of the ruined Aztec capital, from where they proceeded with the process of colonizing सेंट्रल America.
Aztec culture and history is primarily ज्ञात through archaeological प्रमाण found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; इससे indigenous छाल paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such as Hernán Cortés and Bernal díaz del Castillo ; and especially from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec culture and history written by स्पेनी clergymen और साक्षर Aztecs in the Spanish or नावातल language, ऐसे as the प्रसिद्ध Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan भिक्षु Bernardino de Sahagún with the सहायता of indigenous Aztec informants.
Anderson Hays कूपर ( born जून 3, 1967 ) is an American journalist, लेखक, और television personality.
He is the primary anchor of the सीएनएन news show Anderson Cooper 360°.
The program is सामान्यतः broadcast सजीव from a नई York City studio ; however, कूपर प्रायः broadcasts live on location for breaking news stories.
As of सितंबर 2011, he also serves as मेजबान of his own eponymous syndicated daytime talk show, एंडरसन Live, जिससे will be cancelled at the end of the second season.
A plot of a सामान्य distribution ( or bell-shaped वक्र ) where प्रत्येक बैंड has a चौडाई of 1 मानक deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7 नियम
Cumulative probability of a normal वितरण with expected value 0 और standard deviation 1.
In आंकडे और probability सिद्धान्त, standard विचलन ( represented by the symbol sigma, σ ) shows how much variation or dispersion exists from the औसत ( औसत ), or अपेक्षित value.
A low मानक विचलन indicates कि the data अंक tend to be very बंद to the mean ; ऊँची मानक विचलन indicates that the data points are spread out over a large दायरा of values.
the मानक deviation of a random परिवर्तनीय, सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी, data set, or probability distribution is the square root of its variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically less robust than the average absolute विचलन.
a उपयोगी property of मानक deviation is that, नापसंद variance, it is expressed in the वही units as the आंकड़ा.
Note, however, that for माप with प्रतिशत as unit, the standard deviation will have प्रतिशत points as ईकाई.
In addition to expressing the variability of a population, मानक deviation is commonly used to माप confidence in statistical conclusions.
For example, the margin of error in polling data is determined by calculating the expected मानक विचलन in the results if the वही पोल यहूद to be conducted multiple टाइम्स.
the reported हाशिया of गलती is typically about twice the मानक विचलन ­– the दायरा of a 95 percent confidence interval.
in science, शोधकर्ताओं commonly report the मानक deviation of experimental आंकड़ा, and only प्रभाव that पतन far outside the दायरा of मानक विचलन are considered statistically significant – normal random error or variation in the measurements is in this रास्ता distinguished from causal variation.
मानक deviation is भी important in finance, जहाँ the मानक deviation on the rate of return on an investment is a माप of the volatility of the investment.
When only a sample of आंकड़ा from a population is available, the standard deviation of the population can be estimated by a modified quantity पुकारा the `` sample standard deviation ''.
When the sample is the संपूर्ण population, its unmodified standard deviation is called the `` population standard deviation ''.
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root सब्ज़ी, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
the ulluco is एक of the most widely grown और economically important रूट फसलों in the Andean प्रदेश of South America, second only to the potato.
It is known there साथ the आम नाम of papa lisa, but also by the regional names melloco ( Ecuador ), olluco ( Peru ), chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba ( Venezuela ), among others.
the leaf और the tuber are खाद्य, समान to spinach and the potato, क्रमशः.
वे are ज्ञात to contain high levels of प्रोटीन, कैल्सियम, and केरोटीन.
Papalisa were प्रयुक्त by the incas prior to arrival of Europeans in South America.
Ulluco tubers हैं marketed as `` धरती रत्नों '' in New Zealand, by Halfords exotic उपज.

An अप्रैल 24, 1851 poster warning the `` रंगीन people of Boston '' परिचय policemen acting as slave catchers.
the भगोड़े Slave विधि or Fugitive Slave अधिनियम was passed by the United States Congress on September 18, 1850, as भाग of the सुलह of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests और Northern free-soilers.
This was एक of the most controversial acts of the 1850 compromise and heightened Northern fears of a `` slave power conspiracy ''.
It declared that all runaway slaves were, upon कैप्चर, to be returned to their masters.
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' for the dogs that were प्रयुक्त to track down runaway slaves.

Trin-i-tee 5:7 is a gospel duo from New Orleans, Louisiana in the United राज्य.
The group थी marketed as a gospel वैकल्पिक to R & B लड़की groups ऐसे as Destiny 's Child और TLC.
Trin-i-tee 5:7 रै sold over 2.5 million albums.

Mary do n't You Weep ''.
the album बाद became certified सुनहरा.

The United States federal अर्जित income tax credit or अर्जित आय credit ( EITC or eic ) is a refundable tax क्रेडिट for low- और medium-income individuals and couples, primarily for those जो have qualifying children.
When the credit exceeds the amount of taxes owed, it results in a tax refund to those who claim the credit.
This credit is provided to offset the बोझ of सोशल सुरक्षा taxes and also to promote an प्रोत्साहन to work.
In order for a व्यक्ति or couple to claim one or more व्यक्तियों as their qualifying चाइल्ड ( ren ), the age, relationship, and shared residency requirements must be met, as well as some other requirements.
u.S. कर forms 1040EZ, 1040A, or 1040 can be used to claim eic बगैर qualifying children.
to claim the credit साथ qualifying children, 1040a or 1040 must be used, as well as attaching Schedule eic.
eic phases in slowly, has a medium-length plateau, and then phases आउट more slowly than it phased in.
Since the credit phases आउट at 21 % ( for two children and for three or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( लिये one qualifying child ), it is always preferable to have one more डालर of वास्तविक salary or wages ( although technically, चूंकि the EIC table moves by fifty dollar increments, it 's सदा preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ).
लिये कर year 2011, the maximum EIC for a single व्यक्ति or couple filing without qualifying children थी $ 464.
The अधिकतम EIC with एक qualifying child थी $ 3,094, साथ two children was $ 5,112, and with three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751.
These amounts are indexed annually for inflation.
The earned income tax क्रेडिट has been भाग of राजनैतिक debates in the United States regarding whether उठाने the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs.
the following is a list of halftime shows held at the National Football League 's चैंपियनशिप खेल, the Super Bowl.
While मध्यांतर shows are a tradition during फ़ुटबॉल games at all levels of competition, the Super Bowl मध्यांतर show represents a fundamental कड़ी to pop culture, which helps broaden the television दर्शक and nationwide interest.
In most years since the mid-1980s, the halftime show of the Super कटोरी has featured popular recording artists और अन्य well-known celebrities.
It has measurably increased television viewers during and बाद the halftime show.
The performance is regarded एक of the most-watched events in American television annually साथ over 100 million दर्शक in the United States alone.
musical genres over the years have represented a broad दायरा of music types, सहित पॉप, rock, क्लासिक rock, country, हिप हॉप, rap, ब्लूज़, and आत्मा.
In कुछ years, short skits or नाटक scenes are acted आउट on a स्टेज.
The performance समूह up with People has performed at the most Super कटोरी मध्यांतर shows, starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s.
According to nielsen ratings, सुपर Bowl XLVI halftime दिखाएँ headlined by मैडोना in 2012 remains the most-watched मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in history, with 114 लाख viewers or about 3 million अधिक than the actual game.
Beyonce 's 2013 मध्यांतर दिखाएँ performance was the second सबसे viewed दिखाएँ in history.
it is listed on the Guinness संसार Records as the largest TV audience for a Super Bowl half-time performance.
International Men 's दिन ( IMD ) is an सालाना international event celebrated on 19th नवम्बर.
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad और Tobago, the day and its events find support from a किस्में of individuals and groups in Australia, the Caribbean, North America, Asia, Europe and Africa.
Speaking on निमित्त of UNESCO, Director of Women and Culture of Peace ingeborg Breines said of IMD, `` इस is an excellent idea और होता give कुछ gender balance. ''
वो added that युनेस्को was looking forward to cooperating with the organizers.
The objectives of celebrating an International Men 's दिन include focusing on men 's और boys ' स्वास्थ्य, improving gender relations, promoting gender equality, and highlighting positive male भूमिका models.
It is an occasion to highlight discrimination against men and लड़कों and to celebrate उनके achievements and contributions, in particular for their contributions to community, family, marriage, और child care.
The broader and परम aim of the event is to प्रचार basic humanitarian values.
International मेन 's Day is मनाये in over 60 countries, including त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, Jamaica, Australia, India, China, United States, Romania, Singapore, माल्टा, United Kingdom, दक्षिण Africa, Tanzania, Zimbabwe, बोत्सवाना, Seychelles, Burundi, Hungary, Ireland, Isle of man, घाना, Canada, Denmark, नार्वे, Austria, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Ukraine, France, Italy, Pakistan, क्यूबा, Antigua and Barbuda, St. किट्स and Nevis, St. Lucia, Grenada और Cayman Islands, on 19 November, and वैश्विक support लिये the celebration is broad.

Developmental psychology is the scientific study of परिवर्तन that occur in human beings over the course of their life span.
Originally concerned with infants and children, the field has विस्तारित to include adolescence, adult development, aging, और the संपूर्ण life span.
This field examines बदलें across a broad range of विषय including motor कौशल and other psycho-physiological processes ; cognitive विकास involving areas such as प्रॉब्लम solving, moral understanding, and conceptual understanding ; language acquisition ; social, personality, और emotional विकास ; and self-concept और identity गठन.
developmental मनोविज्ञान includes issues such as the extent to जिससे विकास occurs through the क्रमिक accumulation of ज्ञान versus stage-like development, or the extent to जिससे children are born with स्वाभाविक mental structures versus सीखना through experience.
अनेक researchers हैं दिलचस्पी in the interaction between personal characteristics, the individual 's behavior, and environmental factors including social कॉन्टेक्स्ट, and their impact on development ; अन्य take a more narrowly-focused दृष्टिकोण.
Developmental मनोविज्ञान informs several applied fields, including : educational psychology, child psychopathology, और forensic developmental psychology.
Developmental मनोविज्ञान complements अनेक अन्य basic शोध fields in psychology including social psychology, संज्ञानात्मक psychology, ecological psychology, and comparative psychology.
Joseph माइकल `` जॉय '' Stivic is a fictional character who first appeared on the 1970s American sitcom All in the Family.
जॉय stivic was the बेटे and only child of माइक Stivic ( played by Rob Reiner ) और Gloria Stivic ( played by Sally struthers ), और the grandson of Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) and एडिथ Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ).
the character first appeared as a newborn baby in a two-part episode of All in the Family which aired in दिसम्बर 1975.
After many appearances on All in the Family until reiner and struthers बाएँ the series in 1978 ( by that time, Joey had महरूम निभाई सबसे often by alternating जुड़वा जेसन और Justin draeger ), the जॉय stivic अक्षर अगला appeared on the All in the Family spin-off series ( some call it a continuation of the असली ) Archie बंकर 's Place in a guest appearance in the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving पुनर्मिलन. ''
in this उदाहरण, the character was played by child actor Dick Billingsley और was appropriately pre-school आयु.
With ग्लोरिया now अलग from माइक, she लौटे to Archie बंकर 's प्लेस with Joey in the February 1982 episode `` Gloria Comes Home. ''
In this एपीसोड, जॉय was played by Christopher Johnston.
Joey Stivic was a regular अक्षर on the All in the Family spin-off series Gloria in 1982 and 1983.
On this series, in which the now-divorced Gloria Bunker अक्षर था स्थानांतरित to Upstate नई यॉर्क in order to कार्य as an सहायक veterinarian, the part of Joey stivic was निभाई by ten-year-old actor Christian Jacobs.
After Gloria was canceled in 1983, जॉय Stivic disappeared from prime time television for 11 सालो, until the अक्षर made one last रूप on 704 Hauser, a short-lived 1994 series about a black family जो had moved into the old Bunker home, years after Bunker था sold it.
in this रूप, the Joey Stivic character was played by Casey siemaszko, an actor born in 1961 ( 14 years before Joey Stivic 's fictional birth ).
In 1976 the Ideal खिलौना Company released a 14-inch `` Joey stivic गुड़िया '' ( पुकारा `` Archie बंकर 's पोता '' ) which थी billed as the `` first anatomically correct male doll. ''
The doll inspired mild controversy at the समय, and is a collectors ' item आज.
The 2011 Rose कटोरी was the 97th edition of the annual bowl game निभाई on January 1, 2011, as part of the 2010 college football season.
निभाई in Pasadena, California, the TCU Horned मेंढक of the Mountain वेस्ट Conference defeated the Wisconsin badgers of the Big Ten सम्मेलन by a score of 21 – 19.
The Pasadena Tournament of Roses Association was the organizer of the game.
vizio inc. was the कॉरपोरेट sponsor और the game was officially named `` The Rose Bowl Game presented by Vizio ''.
इस खेल marked the first time a टोली from a non-Automatic qualifying Conference played in, and जीती, the रोज़ Bowl in its 97 years.
The contest was broadcast on cable टेलीविज़न station ESPN with a रेडियो ब्रॉडकास्ट on ESPN रेडियो and XM Satellite रेडियो and espn3 streaming video over the internet.
Coverage began at 1:30 PM ( PST ) साथ kickoff at 2:10 pm ( PST ).
इस चिह्नित the पहला समय that the खेल was not broadcast nationally `` over-the-air '' ( terrestrial television ) since the games prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl, which थी the पहला nationally televised college football खेल.
The रोज़ Bowl Game, themed Building Dreams, Friendships, & Memories, थी a contractual sell-out, with 64,500 tickets allocated to the participating teams और conferences.
Ticket कीमतें लिये सब सीटे in the Rose Bowl are listed at $ 145.
the बाकी tickets went to the Tournament of Roses members, sponsors, नगर of pasadena निवासियों, and the general public.
