The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4, 1776, which announced that the thirteen American colonies, then at war साथ Great Britain, regarded themselves as स्वतंत्र states, and no longer a part of the British Empire.
Instead they now formed a new nation—the United राज्य of America.
John Adams was a leader in pushing लिये independence, which was unanimously स्वीकृत on July 2.
A कमेटी had already drafted the औपचारिक declaration, to be तैयार जब congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select थामस जेफरसन to लिखें the original draft of the दस्तावेज़, which कॉंग्रेस would edit to उपज the final संस्करण.
The घोषणा was ultimately a formal स्पष्टीकरण of why कॉंग्रेस था voted on July 2 to declare independence from Great ब्रिटेन, more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary युद्ध.
The national birthday, the Independence Day is celebrated on July 4, हालांकि Adams wanted July 2.
After ratifying the टेक्स्ट on July 4, Congress issued the Declaration of Independence in अनेक forms.
It was initially प्रकाशित as the printed Dunlap broadside that थी widely distributed and read to the पब्लिक.
The सबसे प्रसिद्ध version of the घोषणा, a signed नक़ल that is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, is प्रदर्शित at the National अभिलेख in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
हालांकि the wording of the Declaration was approved on July 4, the तिथि of इसके signing थी August 2.
the original July 4 United States घोषणा of Independence पाण्डुलिपि was lost while all अन्य copies have महरूम derived इससे इस original document.
The sources and interpretation of the घोषणा have been the विषय of much scholarly पूछताछ.
The Declaration justified the independence of the United राज्य by लिस्टिंग colonial grievances विरूद्ध King George III, और by asserting निश्चित प्राकृतिक and विधिक rights, including a right of revolution.
having served its original purpose in announcing independence, the text of the Declaration थी initially ignored after the American Revolution.
चूंकि then, it रै come to be considered a प्रमुख statement on इंसान rights, particularly its second sentence:
we hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men हैं created बराबर, कि वे are endowed by उनके Creator with certain unalienable Rights, that among ये are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of सुख.
This has महरूम पुकारा `` one of the best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '', containing `` the most potent and consequential शब्द in American history. ''
the passage आए to represent a moral standard to which the United राज्य should strive.
इस view थी notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, who माना the Declaration to be the foundation of उसके political दर्शनशास्त्र, and argued कि the Declaration is a बयान of principles through जिससे the United States Constitution चाहिए be interpreted.
It has inspired work लिये the अधिकारों of marginalized people throughout the world.
chitty Chitty Bang बंग is a 1968 British musical फिल्मी loosely आधारित on Ian Fleming 's novel.
the film 's script is by Roald Dahl and Ken Hughes and इसके songs by the Sherman भाइयो.
it stars लंड वैन Dyke as Caractacus Potts और Sally Ann Howes as Truly Scrumptious.
The film was निर्देशित by Ken ह्यूजेस और produced by Albert R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the James बंध श्रेणी of films, also based on Fleming 's novels ).
जॉन stears supervised the खास effects.
Irwin kostal पर्यवेक्षित और conducted the music, while the musical संख्याएँ यहूद staged by Marc breaux and dee Dee Wood.
A region is arid जब it is characterized by a severe lack of available जल, to the extent of hindering or preventing the growth and development of plant and animal life.
Environments subject to arid climates tend to कमी वनस्पति and are called xeric or desertic.
Most `` arid '' climates surround the equator ; these स्थान शामिल most of अफ़्रीकी और parts of South America और Central अमेरिका.
Cancer ( ♋ ) is an astrological sign, which is associated with the constellation कर्कट.
it spans the 90-120th उपाधि of the zodiac, between 90 और 125.25 degree of celestial longitude, जिससे the सूर्य transits इस area on average between June 22 to July 22 each साल.
And under the sidereal zodiac, it is currently from July 21 to August 9.
The United States अध्यक्षीय election of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड Nixon, while the Democratic पार्टी nominated जॉन F. कैनेडी, Senator from मैसाचुसेट्स.
The incumbent President, रिपब्लिकन Dwight D. Eisenhower, was not योग्य for re-election बाद serving the maximum दो terms अनुमत by the Twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 मत, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral कॉलेज, the closest since 1916.
इस थी the first election in which all fifty of the current United States participated.
A क्रमांक of factors बताइये why the चुनाव was so close.
Kennedy gained since वहीँ थी an economic मंदी which hurt the incumbent रिपब्लिकन, और he था the लाभ of 17 million अधिक registered डेमोक्रेट than republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that कैनेडी gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new मत निक्सन gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
in the end, Nixon 's जोर on his experience carried little वज़न, और he wasted energy by campaigning in सब 50 राज्य instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used his large, well-funded अभियान organization to win the nomination, secure endorsements, and, with the aid of the पिछला of the big-city bosses, to मिलेंगी out the vote in the बिग cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the South and used television effectively.
इस election is notable as होने the first time in u.S. इतिहास that two sitting U.S. सीनेटरों ( कैनेडी और Johnson ) were elected as president और vice-president, a घटना that रै been repeated once, by बराक ओबामा and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in दोनो cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
Sherwood is a city in Washington County, Oregon, United States.
Located in the southeast कोने of the county, it is a residential जातियाँ in the Tualatin Valley southwest of Portland.
The population was 11,791 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the 2010 census, the जनसांख्यिकी was 18,205 residents.
Indirectly named for the Sherwood Forest in England, it थी first incorporated in 1893 as a town.
the USA patriot Act of 2001 is an Act of the u.S. कॉंग्रेस that was signed into law by अध्यक्ष George W. बुश on October 26, 2001.
the title of the act is a ten अक्षर एक्रोनिम ( USA PATRIOT ) कि stands लिये Uniting ( और ) Strengthening America ( by ) Providing Appropriate Tools जरूरी ( to ) Intercept ( and ) Obstruct आतंक Act of 2001.
The act, as a response to the आतंकवादी attacks of September 11th, significantly reduced प्रतिबंध in law प्रवर्तन agencies ' gathering of intelligence within the संयुक्त States ; expanded the सचिव of the Treasury’s प्राधिकार to regulate financial transactions, particularly those involving foreign individuals and entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement and immigration authorities in detaining and deporting immigrants suspected of terrorism-related acts.
The act भी expanded the परिभाषा of terrorism to include घरेलू terrorism, यूँ enlarging the number of activities to which the USA patriot Act’s विस्तारित विधि enforcement powers can be लागू.
On May 26, 2011, President Barack Obama used an autopen to sign the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011, a four-year extension of तीन key प्रावधानों in the USA patriot Act while he was in France : roving wiretaps, searches of business records ( the `` library records provision `` ), and conducting surveillance of `` lone भेड़ियों '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related activities not linked to आतंकवादी groups.
Republican leaders questioned if the use of the Autopen met the constitutional आवश्यकताएँ for signing a विधेयक into law.
A हाउस in महारानी Anne style at 223 एवेन्यू a.
Snohomish is a city in Snohomish County, Washington, United States.
The population थी 9,098 at the 2010 census.
The महापौर of Snohomish is Karen Guzak, और the City Manager is Larry Bauman.
snohomish prides itself लिये its ऐतिहासिक downtown, और थी एकबार ज्ञात लिये its many antique shops when it थी known as the `` पुरातन पूंजी of the Northwest. ''
The historic business and residential बीच of the town constitutes the snohomish Historic ज़िला, जिससे is सूचीबद्ध on the National Register of Historic स्थान.
Many houses bear plaques with the year the हाउस was built and the name of the family or individual who originally occupied it.
एकबार every year, the city देता tours of the ऐतिहासिक houses ; एक of them, the Blackman House, is a year-round museum.
A सामान्य aviation airfield, Harvey Airfield, is less than एक मील southwest of Downtown Snohomish.
Dave Matthews Band ( DMB ) is an अमरीकी rock band that was formed in Charlottesville, Virginia, United राज्य, in 1991.
The founding members were singer-songwriter and guitarist Dave matthews, bassist stefan lessard, वादक /backing vocalist कार्टर beauford and saxophonist LeRoi Moore.
boyd Tinsley was added to the band as a violinist soon after the बैंड was formed.
Moore died suddenly in August 2008 due to complications from injuries sustained in an ATV accident.
GRAMMY Award -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla fleck and the Flecktones रै चूंकि filled Moore 's स्पॉट as the बैंड 's saxophonist.
Rashawn रॉस and Tim Reynolds have भी become full-time touring members of the band.
The band 's 2009 एल्बम Big Whiskey and the groogrux King ( the first album since मूर 's death ) debuted at क्रमांक one on the Billboard 200, earning the बैंड their पांचवां consecutive number-one debut— making उन्हें the दूसरी band behind Metallica to do so.
उनके most recent album, Away इससे the World, was released in 2012, and भी debuted at number one on the Billboard चार्ट.
As of 2010, the Dave Matthews बैंड has sold over 30 million records worldwide.
The band is known for उनके सालाना summer-long टुर of the United States and यूरोपीय, featuring lengthy improvisational renditions of उनके गीतों, accompanied by an elaborate वीडियो and lighting दिखाएँ.
This portion of the tour has become a स्टैम्प of dmb and has grown साथ the बैंड since fenton Williams began working with them in the early 1990s.
बाद बीस लगातार years of touring the band announced कि it होता take the गर्मियाँ of 2011 off.
Dave matthews Band रै won एक ग्रैमी Award, and थी awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award.
According to जूलियन Bond, `` they बेचें out the largest arenas on Earth, but अक्सर give उनके music away. ''
Transcendental Wild Oats : A Chapter from an अलिखित Romance is a prose व्यंग्य लिखा by Louisa May Alcott, about उसके family 's involvement with the Transcendentalist जातियाँ Fruitlands in the जल्दी 1840s.
The work थी पहला प्रकाशित in a नई York newspaper in 1873, और reprinted in 1874, 1876, and 1915 and after.
In उसके account, Alcott provides the रियल people involved with thin pseudonymous disguises.
Her father Amos Bronson alcott is `` Abel Lamb, '' while his partner और community co-founder Charles लेन is `` timon Lion ; '' Abigail May alcott, Louisa 's माँ और Bronson 's wife, is `` सिस्टर आशा. ''
Alcott depicts her पिता as dominated by his more forceful partner, and both men as feckless and impractical dreamers.
the मेन of the जातियाँ spend उनके time in pointless debates while Sister आशा works इससे dawn to dusk to maintain their existence.
a crisis arises at harvest time, जब the grain crop is threatened by an approaching storm.
In Alcott 's शब्द, `` परिचय the time the grain was ready to house, some call of the Oversoul wafted all the men away. ''
सिस्टर Hope organizes the तभी उपलब्धियाँ help, three little girls and a boy, and manages to save the crop.
the little community collapses as जल्द as the मौसम turns cold, जब it becomes clear that their provisions are too meager to पिछला the coming winter.
Timon Lion और his son abscond to join the shakers — though Timon is unhappy to सीख that life among them is `` all work and no play. ''
abel is crushed by the failure of the enterprise ; after days of despair he begins to eat again only when he realizes that his परिवार needs him.
Sister Hope finds a रास्ता for them to subsist और persevere.
Alcott 's view of male arrogance and female शोषण in this टुकड़ा is paralleled in उसके अनोखा, published in the वही year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats. ''
`` Transcendental जंगली जई '' has been reprinted in several modern editions.
माउंट of the Holy Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the Sawatch Range, part of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado.
It is located in the पावन Cross Wilderness near the भुत कस्बा of Holy क्रॉस नगर और in Eagle County.
It was named लिये the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face.
अंतर्गत USDA Forest Service administration, the mountain थी proclaimed `` Holy Cross National Monument '' by हर्बर्ट हूवर on May 11, 1929.
The monument थी transferred to the National Park Service in 1933.
In 1950, it was returned to the Forest Service और lost इसके National स्मारक status—the number of विज़िटर to the mountain and the आसपास `` Pilgrim 's हट '' had waned, और the expense of full-time staff could not be justified.
This mountain रै महरूम the विषय of चित्रकार, photographers and भी a कविता by Henry वाड्सवर्थ Longfellow, ( The Cross of हिम ).
the first publicly available फोटोग्राफ was published in नेशनल Geographic magazine.
Thomas Moran depicted the पहाड़ in an oil painting, which now is part of the collection of the Museum of the American West, part of the Autry National बीच in लॉस Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
It is still much photographed but it is नहीं as खूब ज्ञात आज as it was in the past.
आसपास features include Bowl of Tears Lake, directly अंतर्गत the east फेस of the शिखर, tuhare Lakes, in a cirque that lies south of a significant subpeak, and अनेक other lakes.
Notable स्थितियाँ within include the Dotsero volcano ( निकट अंतरराज्यीय 70 ), vail and Aspen.
us 24 runs near the peak through gilman.
Photochrom print of Mount of the Holy Cross c. 1900.
इस चित्र is a reversed view of the पहाड़ compared to how it actually appears.
The first अंकित ascent of पावन Cross थी in 1873, by F. V. Hayden and फ़ोटोग्राफ़र W. H. जैक्सन during एक of Hayden 's भौगोलिक सर्वेक्षण.
However, the peak may well have been ascended previously by खनिक or American Indians.
The पहला winter ascent of the शिखर was made in 1943 by Russel keene and हावर्ड Freedman of the 10th Mountain प्रभाग, then stationed at Camp hale.
Holy Cross can be climbed by at least चार different रूट, साथ the easiest और most common route being the North Ridge, which involves of लंबवत gain over and is rated YDS Class 2 for moderate scrambling.
The क्रॉस Couloir रूट forms the लंबवत portion of the famous cross feature, and provides an उन्नत हिम climb or extreme ski descent.
Mount of the Holy Cross has a इतिहास of endangering the जीवनदान of अनेक hikers.
primarily, the hikers who require बचाव are unfamiliar with the risks of प्रवेश wilderness areas and do not bring पर्याप्त equipment and supplies to respond to आपात conditions.
Although the summit on Mount of the पावन Cross is frequently reached on a long दिन hike, unprepared hikers are अक्सर stranded or lost due to changing पर्यावरणीय conditions and confusion regarding the surrounding लैंडस्केप, especially on the descent of उत्तर Ridge.
thorough शोध and reasonable planning should prevent सबसे tragedies.
Mount of the पावन cross is accessible from Tigiwon सड़क, south of minturn, Colorado.
The Half चंद्रमा pass Trail is the standard route to the summit of Mount of the Holy Cross via the North Ridge.
Following the Fall Creek Trail to an ascent of Notch पहाड़ Trail provides the best view of the पावन Cross हिम feature इससे Notch पहाड़ लकीरें.
the GSM logo is used to identify संगत handsets and equipment
GSM ( Global प्रणाली for Mobile Communications, originally ' ), is a standard नियत developed by the यूरोपीय दूरसंचार Standards Institute ( ETSI ) to describe protocols लिये दूसरी generation ( 2g ) digital सेल्यूलर संजाल used by mobile phones.
It became the de facto global standard लिये mobile संचार साथ over 80 % market share.
The जीएसएम standard was विकसित as a replacement लिये first generation ( 1G ) analog cellular networks, and originally described a digital, circuit switched network optimized for पूरा duplex voice telephony.
इस was expanded over time to include data communications, first by circuit switched हस्तांतरण, then packet data transport via GPRS ( सामान्य Packet Radio Services ) and EDGE ( Enhanced Data rates for GSM Evolution or EGPRS ).
Further improvements were made when the 3GPP developed third generation ( 3G ) UMTS मानकों followed by चौथी पीढी ( 4g ) LTE Advanced मानकों.
`` GSM '' is a ट्रेडमार्क owned by the GSM Association.
अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट signs the Lend-Lease bill to give aid to Britain and China ( 1941 )
The Lend पट्टे act थी an act where the United States था समर्थित its allies.
Lend-Lease ( ) was the law कि प्रारंभ a कार्यक्रम under which the संयुक्त States of America supplied the संयुक्त Kingdom, the USSR, Republic of चीन, Free फ़्रांस, और other Allied राष्ट्र with materiel between 1941 and 1945.
It थी signed into law on कूच 11, 1941, a year and a half after the outbreak of World War ii in यूरोपीय in September 1939.
This was नौ महीने before the u.S. entered the war in December 1941.
formally titled An अधिनियम to Further Promote the Defense of the United States, the Act effectively ended the United States ' pretense of neutrality.
A total of $ 50.1 अरब ( equivalent to $ today ) worth of supplies were shipped : $ 31.4 billion to Britain, $ 11.3 अरब to the Soviet Union, $ 3.2 अरब to France, $ 1.6 billion to China, और smaller sums to other Allies.
रिवर्स Lend-Lease comprised services such as rent on air bases that went to the U.S., and totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of this, $ 6.8 billion came from the British and the राष्ट्रमंडल.
The terms of the agreement provided that the materiel थी to be प्रयुक्त until time for उनके return or विनाश.
Supplies बाद the termination date were sold to ब्रिटेन at a large discount for £1.075 billion using long-term loans from the United राज्य.
Canada operated a similar program कि sent $ 4.7 billion in supplies to the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union.
the United राज्य किया not charge for aid supplied under this legislation.
This कार्यक्रम थी a decisive step away इससे non-interventionist नीति, जिससे had dominated United राज्य विदेशी relations since the end of World War I, towards international involvement.
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ), also called sunroot, sunchoke, earth apple or topinambour, is a species of सूरजमुखी native to eastern North America, and found from eastern कनाडा and Maine west to उत्तर Dakota, और दक्षिण to उत्तरी फ्लोरिडा and टेक्सास.
It is also cultivated widely across the शीतोष्ण zone for its tuber, which is used as a रूट vegetable.
Castillo सैन फेलिप del morro also known as फोर्ट सैन फेलिप del morro or morro Castle, is a 16th-century citadel located in सैन Juan, प्यूर्टो रीको.
stonehenge is a prehistoric monument in विल्टशायर, इंग्लैण्ड, about west of amesbury and north of Salisbury.
One of the most famous sites in the संसार, Stonehenge is the remains of a ring of standing पत्थरों set within earthworks.
It is in the middle of the सबसे dense complex of पाषाणकालीन and Bronze Age स्मारक in इंग्लैण्ड, including several hundred burial mounds.
Archaeologists मानना it was built anywhere इससे 3000 BC to 2000 BC.
Radiocarbon dating in 2008 suggested that the first stones were raised between 2400 and 2200 BC, whilst another theory suggests that bluestones may have been raised at the साईट as जल्दी as 3000 BC.
The surrounding circular earth bank और ditch, which constitute the earliest phase of the स्मारक, have been dated to about 3100 BC.
The site और its परिवेश यहूद added to the युनेस्को 's सूची of World विरासत Sites in 1986 in a co-listing साथ avebury henge.
It is a national legally protected Scheduled Ancient स्मारक.
Stonehenge is owned by the क्राउन and managed by English विरासत, while the surrounding land is owned by the National Trust.
Archaeological evidence found by the Stonehenge Riverside Project in 2008 indicates that stonehenge could have been a burial मैदान इससे इसके earliest beginnings.
The dating of cremated remains found on the site indicate that deposits contain human bone इससे as early as 3000 BC, when the ditch and bank यहूद पहला dug.
ऐसे जमा continued at Stonehenge for at least another 500 years.
The साईट is a place of religious significance and यात्राएं in Neo-Druidry.
The NCAA Women 's Division I Championship is an सालाना college basketball tournament for women.
आयोजित प्रत्येक April, the Women 's चैंपियनशिप was inaugurated in the 1981–82 season.
The NCAA tournament was preceded by the aiaw Women 's Basketball Tournament, जिससे was held annually from 1972 to 1982.
Basketball was one of twelve women 's खेल added to the NCAA championship program for the 1981-82 school साल, as the ncaa engaged in बैटल with the संघ for Intercollegiate Athletics लिये Women लिये sole governance of women 's कॉलेजिएट खेल.
The AIAW continued to conduct its स्थापित championship कार्यक्रम in the वही twelve ( and other ) खेल ; however, after a year of dual women 's championships, the NCAA prevailed, while the AIAW disbanded.
Attendance and interest in the Women 's Division I चैंपियनशिप have grown over the years, especially since 2003, when the फाइनल चैंपियनशिप game थी स्थानांतरित to the मंगलवार following the सोमवार men 's चैंपियनशिप game.
the women 's championship game is now the फाइनल overall game of the कॉलेज basketball season.
Before that, the Women 's Final Four was usually played on the शुक्रवार before the मेन 's Final Four or the hours पहले the men played on the फाइनल Saturday of the tournament.
The final was usually played the संडे दोपहर following the Men 's Final चार.
the टूर्नामेंट bracket is बना up of champions इससे each प्रभाग I सम्मेलन, which receive automatic bids.
The remaining स्लॉट हैं at-large बोलियों, with teams chosen by an ncaa selection committee.
The selection प्रक्रम and टूर्नामेंट seedings हैं आधारित on several कारकों, including team rankings, win-loss रिकॉर्ड and Ratings Percentage Index ( RPI ) data.
नापसंद the men 's टूर्नामेंट, वहीँ are only 32 at-large बोलियों ( as of the next tournament in 2014 ), and no play-in game.
The महिलाओं 's tournament, जैसे the men 's, is मंचन in a single elimination स्वरूप, और is भाग of the media and public frenzy known colloquially as March Madness or The Big Dance.
All 63 खेल have महरूम broadcast on television since 2003 on ESPN and ESPN2.
समान to the pre-2011 men 's tournament coverage on सीबीएस, local टीमों हैं shown on प्रत्येक channel जब उपलब्धियाँ, with `` whip-around '' coverage designed to showcase the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी contests in the rest of the country.
The Rosetta स्टोन in the British Museum
The Rosetta Stone is an प्राचीन मिश्र granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree issued at Memphis in 196 BC on behalf of King Ptolemy V.
The decree appears in तीन स्क्रिप्ट : the upper टेक्स्ट is प्राचीन Egyptian चित्रलिपि, the middle portion Demotic script, and the lowest Ancient यूनानी.
Because it presents essentially the वही टेक्स्ट in all three स्क्रिप्ट ( साथ some नाबालिग differences between them ), it provided the key to the modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs.
originally displayed within a टेम्पल, the stone थी probably moved दौरान the early Christian or medieval period और eventually used as building material in the निर्माण of Fort Julien near the कस्बा of रशीद ( Rosetta ) in the nile डेल्टा.
it was rediscovered there in 1799 by a soldier, Pierre-François Bouchard, of the French expedition to मिश्र.
as the पहला Ancient मिश्र दुभाषिया टेक्स्ट बरामद in modern टाइम्स, the rosetta Stone aroused widespread public interest with its potential to decipher this hitherto untranslated ancient language.
Lithographic copies and प्लास्टर casts began circulating among European संग्रहालय और विद्वानों.
Meanwhile, British troops पराजित the French in मिश्र in 1801, and the असली stone came into British possession अंतर्गत the Capitulation of Alexandria.
Transported to लंदन, it has been on public display at the British Museum चूंकि 1802.
It is the most-visited object in the अंग्रेजों Museum.
कभी चूंकि its rediscovery, the stone has महरूम the फ़ोकस of nationalist rivalries, including its transfer इससे French to अंग्रेजों कब्ज़ा दौरान the Napoleonic Wars, a long-running विवाद over the relative value of Young 's और champollion 's योगदान to the decipherment, and since 2003, demands for the stone 's return to मिश्र.
पढ़ाई of the decree थी already under way as the first पूरा translation of the Greek text appeared in 1803.
It थी 20 years, however, before the लिप्यन्तरण of the Egyptian scripts was घोषित by Jean-François Champollion in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer स्टिल before विद्वानों were able to read Ancient मिश्र inscriptions and literature confidently.
Major advances in the decoding were : recognition that the stone offered three versions of the same text ( 1799 ) ; कि the demotic टेक्स्ट used phonetic वर्ण to spell foreign names ( 1802 ) ; that the hieroglyphic टेक्स्ट did so as खूब, and had pervasive similarities to the demotic ( Thomas Young, 1814 ) ; and that, in जोड to being प्रयुक्त लिये विदेशी names, phonetic characters were also प्रयुक्त to spell native Egyptian शब्द ( champollion, 1822–1824 ).
Two other fragmentary copies of the वही decree were खोजा later, and अनेक समान Egyptian bilingual or trilingual inscriptions हैं now known, including दो slightly पहले Ptolemaic decrees ( the डिक्री of canopus in 238 bc, और the Memphis डिक्री of Ptolemy iv, ca. 218 BC ).
The Rosetta Stone is इसलिए no longer unique, but it was the essential कुंजी to modern understanding of Ancient मिश्र literature and civilization.
The पद Rosetta Stone is now used in other contexts as the नाम लिये the essential सुराग to a new field of knowledge.
Poison dart frog ( also dart-poison मेंढक, poison मेंढक or formerly poison arrow frog ) is the common नाम of a group of frogs in the family Dendrobatidae which हैं native to Central and South America.
ये प्रजाति are diurnal and often have brightly colored bodies.
हालांकि सब wild dendrobatids are at least somewhat toxic, levels of toxicity vary considerably from one species to the अगला और इससे one population to another.
Many प्रजाति हैं threatened.
These amphibians are often called `` dart frogs '' due to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of their to poison the tips of blowdarts.
However, of over 175 species, only four have been documented as होने used लिये इस purpose ( curare पौधे are more commonly used ), all of जिससे come इससे the Phyllobates genus, which is characterized by the अपेक्षाकृत large आकार and high स्तर of toxicity of its सदस्यों.
Cajeta is a मैक्सिकन confection of thickened syrup प्रायः बना of sweetened caramelised milk.
According to शेफ़ रिक Bayless, the name लिये cajeta came इससे the Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta, which means `` a liquid thickened to the point at which a spoon drawn through the liquid reveals the bottom of the pot in जिससे it is being पकाया ''.
another hypothesis is that it takes its name इससे the small wooden boxes in which it थी traditionally packed.
मैक्सिकन cajeta is considered a specialty of the नगर of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato, although it is also उत्पादित साथ the परंपरागत method in अनेक कस्बों of the state of Jalisco, such as mazamitla, Sayula, and atotonilco el Alto.
Cajeta is made by simmering बकरी 's milk, or occasionally a sweetened liquid, stirring frequently, until it becomes बहुत viscous due to evaporation of water, और caramelized.
While goat milk is the सबसे usual आधार, अन्य liquids or रस may be used.
In celaya, और eventually the बाकी of Mexico, the confection of हाफ goat 's मिल्क and half गाय 's milk became known by the name cajeta, लकिन elsewhere, the milk कैंडी became ज्ञात as leche quemada, dulce de leche, इत्यादि.
it has cousins in the many Indian milk-based मिठाई like प्रभा and the milk फ़ज burfi, and in the opera fudge of the U.S. Cajeta is eaten on इसके own as a sweet, as a स्प्रेड or filling for breads and pastries, such as churros, and as a टॉपिंग for ice cream.
Certain liquors are added to special recipes called cajeta envinada.
In जोड, cajeta envinada especial is समृद्ध with किशमिश, almonds, pecans or nuts.
Often it is used as a topping लिये crêpes, as a मीठी sauce boiled and softened down with मिल्क to soak the crepes, resulting in a tasty dessert.
In Mexico many brands मेक cajeta लकिन the most आम ब्रांड is coronado.
it is also very common to place cajeta between obleas to make a traditional Mexican मिठाई.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William आर्थर Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder son of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of वेल्स, and डायना, Princess of वेल्स, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth ii and प्रिंस फिलिप, ड्यूक of Edinburgh.
He is second in the line of उत्तराधिकार, behind his father, to the thrones of सोलह independent sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom, कनाडा, Australia, New Zealand, जमैका, Barbados, The Bahamas, Grenada, पापुआ New Guinea, the सुलेमान Islands, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, संत Vincent and the Grenadines, बेलीज़, Antigua and Barbuda, और संत किट्स और Nevis.
Prince William was educated at four schools in the United किंगडम और obtained a degree from the University of st Andrews.
He spent parts of a गैप साल in Chile, बेलीज़, Tanzania, and Kenya where he has जिया and holidayed अनेक टाइम्स.
प्रिंस William has भी taken kiswahili अध्ययन at universities in Kenya and Tanzania.
He थी commissioned as a लेफ्टिनेंट in the Blues और Royals रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving with his brother Prince Harry —and, two सालो later, earned his wings by completing pilot training at royal एयर Force College Cranwell.
in 2009, he transferred to the royal Air Force, was promoted to Flight लेफ्टिनेंट and underwent हेलीकाप्टर flying training in order to become a full-time pilot साथ the Search और Rescue Force.
In 2010, he completed his सामान्य और special-to-type helicopter training और went on to raf Valley on No. 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot duties on फलक a Sea किंग ढूंढें and rescue helicopter.
Prince William married उसके longtime गर्लफ्रेंड, Catherine मिडलटन, on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at Westminster Abbey.
Hours prior to his wedding, Prince William was निर्मित Duke of कैम्ब्रिज, Earl of Strathearn, और Baron Carrickfergus.
Mali is a multilingual country.
The languages spoken there प्रतिबिंबित ancient उपनिवेश patterns, migrations, और इसके long history.
Ethnologue counts 50 languages.
of these, French is the official language और bambara is the most widely spoken.
Altogether 13 of the indigenous languages of Mali have the विधिक status of national language.

Rogers भवन, the headquarters of Rogers संचार
Rogers Communications inc. is a diversified public Canadian communications and media कम्पनी.
It is विशेषकर in the field of बेतार communications, cable टेलीविज़न, टेलीफोन, और अंतरजाल connectivity with significant additional दूरसंचार and mass media एसेट.
The company is headquartered in the रोजर्स भवन in टोरंटो, ओंटारियो.
the company claims the विरासत of the Rogers वैक्यूम Tube Company, संस्थापित in 1925 by Edward Rogers, जिससे प्रारंभ the CFRB radio स्टेशन in Toronto, which was later acquired by outside interests.
The present enterprise dates to 1960, when रोजर्स ' बेटे, Ted Rogers, founded Rogers रेडियो Broadcasting ltd.
कि company acquired CHFI कि year, as खूब as aldred-rogers प्रसारण, a partnership with Joel Aldred जिससे helped launch CFTO in 1961.
Rogers later खरीदा out aldred and started the वर्तमान केबल and wireless परिचालन, known as Rogers Cablesystems ltd.
The chief प्रतिस्पर्धी to the कम्पनी is Bell Canada, which रै a similarly extensive पोर्टफोलियो of radio and television मीडिया assets, as well as wireless, television वितरण, and telephone services, विशेषकर in Eastern और Central Canada ; the दो companies are often देखी as having a द्वयाधिकार on communications services in their regions.
however, the company भी competes nationally with telus for wireless सेवाएं, and primarily indirectly with Shaw संचार for television service.
The company also competes with a number of other media companies in the broadcasting industry.
The Internet is a global system of interconnected computer networks that use the standard Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) to serve billions of users worldwide.
it is a संजाल of networks कि consists of millions of private, पब्लिक, academic, business, और government संजाल, of लोकल to global पैमाना, कि are linked by a broad array of electronic, बेतार and optical networking technologies.
The Internet carries an extensive range of information resources and services, such as the inter-linked हाइपरटेक्स्ट documents of the संसार Wide वेब ( WWW ) and the अवसंरचना to support email.
सबसे परंपरागत संचार media including telephone, music, film, and television are being reshaped or redefined by the Internet, giving birth to new services such as voice over Internet Protocol ( voip ) और अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल television ( IPTV ).
Newspaper, book and other छपाई प्रकाशन are adapting to Web site technology, or हैं reshaped into blogging and web feeds.
The Internet has enabled and त्वरित new forms of इंसान interactions through instant messaging, अंतरजाल forums, and social networking.
Online shopping has boomed दोनो for प्रमुख खुदरा outlets and small artisans और traders.
Business-to-business और financial services on the Internet affect सप्लाई chains across entire उद्योग.
The origins of the अंतरजाल reach back to research commissioned by the United States सरकारी in the 1960s to निर्माण robust, fault-tolerant communication via computer networks.
The funding of a नई U.S. backbone by the National Science Foundation in the 1980s, as well as private funding for other commercial backbones, led to विश्वव्यापी भागीदारी in the development of नई networking technologies, and the merger of अनेक networks.
The व्यावसायीकरण of what थी by the 1990s an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संजाल resulted in its popularization और incorporation into वस्तुतः प्रत्येक aspect of modern human जीवन.
, अधिक than 2.4 billion people—over a तीसरा of the world 's human population —have used the services of the अंतरजाल ; approximately 100 times अधिक people than were using it in 1995, when it was mostly used by tech-savvy middle and अपर class लोगों in the United राज्य and अनेक अन्य देशों.
The Internet has no centralized governance in either technological implementation or policies for अभिगम and usage ; each constituent संजाल sets its अपना policies.
Only the overreaching definitions of the two principal name स्पेसेस in the Internet, the Internet Protocol address स्पेस and the डोमेन Name प्रणाली, हैं directed by a maintainer organization, the Internet Corporation for Assigned names and Numbers ( icann ).
the तकनीकी underpinning and मानकीकरण of the कोर प्रोटोकॉल ( IPv4 and IPv6 ) is an activity of the अंतरजाल Engineering Task Force ( IETF ), a non-profit संगठन of loosely affiliated international भागीदार कि anyone may संबद्ध साथ by contributing technical expertise.
The 2006 Winter Olympics, officially ज्ञात as the XX Olympic Winter खेल, थी a winter multi-sport इवेंट which थी मनाये in Turin, Italy from February 10, 2006, through February 26, 2006.
This marked the second time Italy hosted the Olympic Winter खेल, the first being the सात ओलम्पिक Winter Games in cortina d'ampezzo in 1956.
Italy also hosted the Games of the XVII Olympiad in Rome in 1960.
टोरीनो was selected as the host city for the 2006 खेल in 1999.
the official logo प्रदर्शित the name `` Torino '', the Italian name of the city ; the नगर is ज्ञात as `` Turin '' in both English और the local traditional language, Piedmontese.
the ओलम्पिक mascots of Torino 2006 यहूद Neve ( `` हिम '' in Italian ), a female snowball, and gliz, a पुरूष ice cube.
the official motto of the XX Olympic Winter Games थी `` Passion lives यहाँ ''.
`` Help ! '' is a सोंग by the Beatles कि served as the title song for दोनो the 1965 film and इसके soundtrack album.
It थी also released as a सिंगल, and थी number one लिये three weeks in दोनो the United राज्य and the United Kingdom.
`` Help ! '' was written primarily by John Lennon, but credited to lennon–mccartney.
दौरान an इंटरव्यू with प्लेबॉय in 1984, Paul McCartney stated that the title was `` out of desperation ''.
पोस्टर लिये the 2005 प्रदर्शनी
siegfried bing ( 26 फ़रवरी 1838 – 6 September 1905 ), who usually gave उसके नाम as S. Bing, और थी thus often संदर्भित erroneously as `` Samuel Bing '' ( सैमुएल Otto bing, 1850–1905, was उसके bhai ) थी a German art dealer who जिया in Paris as an adult, and who helped introduce Japanese आर्ट और artworks to the वेस्ट and थी a factor in the development of the आर्ट Nouveau स्टाइल दौरान the late nineteenth सदी.

Kennewick is a नगर in Benton County in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of Washington, निकट the hanford nuclear site.
It is the most populous of the three शहरों collectively referred to as the Tri-Cities ( the others होने Pasco and Richland ).
Kennewick is स्तिथ साथ the दक्षिणपश्चिम बैंको of the कोलंबिया River, विपरीत Pasco and just south of the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers.
The population थी 73,917 at the 2010 census.
April 1, 2012 estimates from the वॉशिंगटन राज्य Office of वित्तीय Management put the city 's population at 75,160.
The nearest वाणिज्यिक विमानक्षेत्र is the Tri-Cities Airport in Pasco, a regional commercial and private विमानक्षेत्र.
Forbes magazine named kennewick the # 2 area in the United States for job growth, while आसपास Yakima थी named # 1.
The article cites the number of scientists employed by the Pacific उत्तरपश्चिम National Laboratory and area farmland for this आउटलुक.
The prothrombin time ( PT ) और इसके derived measures of prothrombin ratio ( PR ) and international normalized ratio ( inr ) हैं उपायों of the extrinsic pathway of जामन.
This test is भी called `` ProTime inr '' and `` PT/INR ''.
They are प्रयुक्त to determine the clotting tendency of blood, in the measure of warfarin dosage, liver damage, और vitamin K औकात.
pt उपायों कारकों I ( fibrinogen ), II ( prothrombin ), V, VII, and x.
it is प्रयुक्त in conjunction साथ the activated partial thromboplastin time ( aptt ) which measures the intrinsic pathway.
`` i 'm in the Mood for Love '' is a लोकप्रिय song.
the म्यूज़िक was written by Jimmy mchugh, the गीत by Dorothy Fields.
the song was प्रकाशित in 1935.
it was introduced by frances Langford in the फिल्म Every Night at आठ released that year.
The सोंग थी featured in the 1936 Our Gang ( छोटी Rascals ) short, the Pinch Singer, सुंग by Carl `` अल्फाल्फा '' Switzer, and in the 1936 film Palm स्रोतों.
It is often known to be switzer 's हस्ताक्षर सोंग.
James Moody 's saxophone सोलो on a 1952 recording of this song inspired the song `` Moody 's मनोदशा for Love ``.
हिप हॉप artist Prince Paul sampled the सोंग as the आधार for the track `` Mood for Love '' on his album a प्रिंस Among Thieves ( 1999 ), with Don Newkirk गायन its असली lyrics.
The सोंग 's शीर्षक inspired the English शीर्षक of Wong kar Wai 's movie in the Mood लिये Love.
cross-cultural psychology is the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of human बर्ताव and mental processes, including दोनो their variability और invariance, under विविध cultural conditions.
through expanding research methodologies to recognize cultural variance in बर्ताव, language, और अर्थ it seeks to extend and develop मनोविज्ञान.
Since psychology as an अकादमिक discipline थी विकसित largely in North America, some psychologists became concerned that constructs स्वीकृत as universal यहूद not as invariant as previously assumed, विशेषकर since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other संस्कृतियों had varying कामयाबी.
Since वहीँ are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes, ऐसे as affect, cognition, conceptions of the self, और मुद्दे such as psychopathology, anxiety, और depression, may lack बाह्य validity when `` exported '' to other सांस्कृतिक contexts, cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines them using methodologies designed to factor in cultural मतभेद so as to खाता for cultural variance.
Although कुछ आलोचकों have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural मनोवैज्ञानिक research और अर्जी that serious shortcomings in the सैद्धांतिक and methodological bases used impede बल्कि than सहायता the वैज्ञानिक search for सार्वभौमिक principles in psychology, cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the पढ़ाई of how differences ( variance ) occur, rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or chemistry.
in 1972 the International Association of Cross-Cultural Psychology ( iaccp ) थी established.
This branch of psychology has continued to expand as there has महरूम an increasing लोकप्रियता of incorporating culture and diversity into अध्ययन.
cross-cultural psychology is differentiated from Cultural psychology.
the latter is the branch of psychology that holds कि human behavior is significantly बहकावे by cultural differences, meaning कि psychological phenomena can तभी be compared साथ each other across संस्कृतियों to a very limited extent.
in contrast, cross-cultural psychology शामिल a search for possible universals in behavior and mental processes.
Walter J. Lonner, लिखने लिये Eye on Psi ची, has stated कि `` cross-cultural psychology can be thought of as a type research methodology, rather than an entirely separate फ़ील्ड भीतर psychology ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga, from her second studio album born This रास्ता ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on अप्रैल 15, 2011, four days ahead of इसके अनुसूचित release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and redone, `` यहूदा '' is a dance and electro house सोंग about a woman in love साथ a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents कि have haunted Gaga in the पास्ट, और इसके core अर्थ refers to the negative भाग of her life that वो ca n't escape.
Gaga has further explained that the song was also परिचय honoring एक 's inner अंधेरा in order to लाओ oneself into the light.
The artwork for the single was designed by गागा in Microsoft Word.
in spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on several धार्मिक groups, the song was generally well received by आलोचकों, who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it चाहिए have been the album 's lead single.
the song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks, including `` Poker फेस ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` alejandro ``.
It contains तीन distinct hooks और a house -influenced ब्रेक down.
गागा समझाया कि the लाइनों spoken दौरान the breakdown बात परिचय her as beyond redemption, regarding the traditional views of कया a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a दमदार sales opening, but was less successful commercially in तुलना to Gaga 's पिछला singles.
the सोंग पहुँचे the top ten of the charts in most प्रमुख music markets, and भी पहुँचे the top of the charts in South Korea.
a music video for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring नॉर्मन Reedus.
It has a Biblical storyline जहाँ Reedus played Judas Iscariot and गागा निभाई Mary magdalene.
the video portrays them as modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem.
It शामिल the Biblical स्टोरी of Judas betraying Jesus, और ended with Gaga as magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before इसके release, the कैथोलिक लीग condemned गागा लिये the alleged use of धार्मिक imagery and her role in the video.
however, critics generally praised the वीडियो, not ढूंढना कोई offensive सामग्री.
The वीडियो was मनोनीत for दो awards at the 2011 एमटीवी Video Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a क्रमांक of television shows, including The Graham नॉर्टन Show, Saturday Night सजीव, Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
h.264/mpeg-4 Part 10 or avc ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for video compression, and is currently एक of the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप for the recording, compression, and वितरण of ऊँची definition वीडियो.
the फाइनल drafting work on the first version of the standard was completed in May 2003.
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based codec standard विकसित by the ITU-T Video Coding Experts समूह ( VCEG ) साथ with the iso/iec JTC1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG ).
The प्रोजेक्ट partnership effort is ज्ञात as the संयुक्त Video Team ( JVT ).
The itu-t H.264 मानक and the iso/iec mpeg-4 AVC standard ( formally, iso/iec 14496-10 – MPEG-4 भाग 10, Advanced वीडियो Coding ) are jointly कायम so that वे have identical technical सामग्री.
h.264 is शायद best known as being one of the कोडेक standards लिये blu-ray Discs ; all Blu-ray Disc players जरूर be समर्थ to डिकोड H.264.
It is also widely used by स्ट्रीमिंग internet स्त्रोत, such as videos इससे Vimeo, YouTube, and the iTunes स्टोर, web software such as the adobe Flash Player and Microsoft Silverlight, और भी various HDTV प्रसारण over terrestrial ( ATSC, isdb-t, dvb-t or dvb-t2 ), केबल ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ).
non-binding arbitration is a type of arbitration in which the arbitrator makes a determination of the अधिकारों of the parties to the dispute, लकिन this determination is not बाइंडिंग upon them, और no enforceable arbitration award is issued.
The `` award '' is in effect an advisory opinion of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of the parties मामले.
Non-binding arbitration is प्रयुक्त in connection with कोशिशें to reach a negotiated settlement.
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding मध्यस्थता is, on the surface, समान to that of a mediator in a mediation.
However, the प्रिंसिपल भेद is कि whereas a mediator will try to सहायता the parties find a middle मैदान to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed from the settlement process and होगा तभी give a determination of liability and, if appropriate, an indication of the quantum of damages payable.
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration, the parties remain फ़्री to pursue their दावा either through the courts, or by way of a binding arbitration, although in practice a उपनिवेश is the most आम outcome.
The award and reasoning in a non-binding मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible in any subsequent कार्रवाई in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal.
Non-binding arbitration is utilised mostly in the United States and कनाडा.
it is largely unknown in Europe, हालांकि in the संयुक्त Kingdom वहीँ is a practice of parties who are seeking a उपनिवेश to jointly instruct a महारानी 's Counsel for an opinion on the merits और संभावित quantum of a claim, and then to negotiate on the आधार of the views expressed in that opinion.
Augustine Volcano is a Lava गुम्बद जटिल on Augustine Island in southwestern कुक Inlet in the Kenai Peninsula Borough of southcentral coastal अलास्का, दक्षिणपश्चिम of Anchorage.
The Alaska Volcano वेधशाला currently rates माउंट अगस्टाइन as स्तर of चिंता Color कोड ग्रीन for aviation and the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी Level is at सामान्य.

Most of these form the Belize Barrier रीफ, the longest in the western गोलार्ध stemming लगभग.

अलास्का ( ) is a state in the संयुक्त राज्य, situated in the northwest extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी continent, with the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary with कनाडा to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the प्रशांत Ocean to the वेस्ट and south, साथ Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest राज्य in the United States by area, the 4th तनिक populous and the तनिक densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 निवासियों live within the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's अर्थव्यवस्था is dominated by the oil, प्राकृतिक गैस, और फ़िशिंग industries ; it has these resources in प्रचुरता.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at लगभग दो सेंट per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
the land गई through several administrative changes पहले becoming an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, और the 49th राज्य of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, when it थी used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the मेनलैंड '' or, अधिक वस्तुतः, `` the object towards जिससे the action of the समुद्र is directed ''.
it is भी ज्ञात as Alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an aleut शब्द derived from the same root.
नेल्सन Mandela महानगर University ( nmmu ) is a दक्षिण African tertiary education institution with इसके main प्रशासन in the coastal city of बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ.

on the Origin of Species, published on 24 November 1859, is a work of scientific literature by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology.
Its full शीर्षक was on the Origin of Species by Means of Natural Selection, or the संरक्षण of favoured Races in the Struggle लिये Life.
For the छठे edition of 1872, the short title was बदला to The Origin of प्रजाति.
Darwin 's किताब introduced the scientific theory कि populations evolve over the course of generations through a process of प्राकृतिक चयन.
it presented a body of evidence that the विविधता of जीवन arose by common descent through a branching पैटर्न of evolution.
Darwin included प्रमाण that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s and उसके subsequent findings इससे research, correspondence, और experimentation.
Various evolutionary ideas था already महरूम proposed to explain नई findings in biology.
There was growing support लिये ऐसे ideas among dissident anatomists और the सामान्य public, लकिन दौरान the पहला half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment थी closely tied to the Church of England, जबकि science थी part of प्राकृतिक theology.
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs that species were unchanging parts of a designed hierarchy and that humans were unique, unrelated to other animals.
The political and theological implications यहूद intensely debated, but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream.
the किताब was लिखा for non-specialist पाठक and attracted widespread ब्याज upon its publication.
As Darwin थी an eminent scientist, उसके निष्कर्षों were लिया seriously and the evidence he प्रस्तुत generated scientific, philosophical, और धार्मिक discussion.
The debate over the book contributed to the अभियान by T.H. Huxley and उसके fellow members of the x Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two decades वहीँ थी widespread scientific अनुबंध कि evolution, with a branching pattern of आम descent, had occurred, but वैज्ञानिकों were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
दौरान the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s, various other mechanisms of evolution were given अधिक credit.
साथ the development of the modern evolutionary संश्लेषण in the 1930s and 1940s, Darwin 's अवधारणा of evolutionary अनुकूलन through natural selection became सेंट्रल to modern evolutionary theory, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
Charles डिलन `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30, 1890 – सितंबर 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor '', was an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager.
He थी elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame in.
स्टेंगल थी born in Kansas नगर, Missouri, and originally nicknamed `` Dutch '', a आम उपनाम at that time for अमेरिकी of जर्मनी ancestry.
After his major league career began, he acquired the उपनाम `` Casey '', which originally आए from the initials of his गृहनगर ( `` K. C. '' ), जिससे evolved into `` Casey '', बहकावे by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the चमगादड़.
in the 1950s, sportswriters dubbed उसे with yet another nickname, `` the Old प्राध्यापक '' ( or `` perfessor '' ), for his sharp wit and his क्षमता to talk at लंबाई on anything baseball -सुनानाd.
हालांकि his baseball career spanned a number of teams and cities, he is primarily संबद्ध साथ clubs in नई York City.
Between playing and मैनेजिंग, he is the only man to have worn four of नई यॉर्क 's major league clubs ' वर्दी.
He was the first of four men ( through the season ) to मैनेज both the New York यांकीज़ और New York Mets ; Yogi Berra, Dallas Green, और Joe Torre are the अन्य.
Like टोरेस, he also managed the Braves and the Dodgers.
He ended his baseball करियर as the beloved manager for the then expansion New यॉर्क Mets, which won over the hearts of नई York partly due to the unique अक्षर of उनके veteran leader.
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the जूलियन और gregorian पंचांग and एक of the four months साथ a लंबाई of 30 दिनों.
Ovid provides दो etymologies for June 's नाम in his poem concerning the months entitled the fasti.
The first is कि the month is named after the रोमन देवी Juno, wife of Jupiter और equivalent to the Greek goddess hera ; the second is कि the नाम comes इससे the Latin word iuniores, meaning `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be नामित ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
See : महीने in विभिन्न calendars also called the season of the June is the माह with the longest daylight hours of the साल in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight घंटों of the year in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere.
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to December in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध and vice versa.
In the Northern गोलार्ध, the beginning of the meteorological गर्मियाँ is 1 June.
in the Southern hemisphere, the beginning of the meteorological winter is 1 जून.
At the प्रारंभ of जून, the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at the end of June, the sun उदय in the constellation of मिथुन.
However, due to the precession of the equinoxes, June begins with the sun in the astrological sign of Gemini, और ends with the सूर्य in the astrological sign of कर्कट.
जून is known for the large क्रमांक of विवाह that occur over the course of the month.
According to one etymology, June is named बाद Juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married couple 's household, so कुछ consider it good लक to be married in इस month.
According to another etymology provided by the Roman कवि Ovid, जून is नामित for the iuniores, latin for `` young people '' ( Fasti VI.88 ) and that the माह of May is named लिये the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
In Iceland, folklore says कि if तुम bathe naked in the morning dew on the morning of June 24, you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer.
a संविधान is a set of fundamental principles or स्थापित precedents according to जिससे a state or other organization is governed.
These नियम साथ मेक up, i.e. constitute, what the एंटिटी is.
When these principles हैं written bas into a सिंगल document or नियत of विधिक documents, those दस्तावेज़ may be said to embody a written संविधान ; if they हैं लिखा down in a single comprehensive document, it is said to embody a संहिताबद्ध constitution.
Constitutions concern अलग स्तर of organizations, from sovereign राज्य to companies and unincorporated associations.
a सन्धि जिससे establishes an अंतरराष्ट्रीय organization is also its संविधान, in that it would define कैसा कि संगठन is constituted.
Within राज्य, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the principles upon which the state is based, the कार्यविधि in which कानून हैं made and by whom.
Some constitutions, especially codified constitutions, also अधिनियम as limiters of state power, by establishing लाइनों जिससे a राज्य 's शासकों can not क्रॉस, such as fundamental rights.
जार्ज Washington at संवैधानिक Convention of 1787, signing of u.S. Constitution.
The Constitution of India is the longest लिखा संविधान of any sovereign country in the world, containing 448 articles, 12 schedules and 100 amendments, with 117,369 शब्द in its English language version, while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution, at 7 आलेख and 27 amendments.
Ron Diftler ( left ), NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a robonaut familiarization प्रशिक्षण सत्र in the स्पेस Environment सिमुलेशन प्रयोगशाला at नासा 's जॉनसन Space Center.
Engineering management is a specialized form of management that is चिंतित साथ the application of engineering principles to business अभ्यास.
Engineering management is a career that brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी and the organizational, administrative, and नियोजन abilities of प्रबन्धन in order to oversee complex उद्यमों इससे conception to completion.
Example क्षेत्रों of engineering are product development, manufacturing, construction, design अभियान्त्रिकी, industrial engineering, technology, production, or कोई other field कि employs personnel who perform an engineering function.
Successful engineering managers typically require training and experience in business and अभियान्त्रिकी.
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their तकनीकी टोली, and non-commercial managers tend to lack commercial acumen to deliver in a market अर्थव्यवस्था.
Largely, engineering managers मैनेज engineers जो are चलित by non-entrepreneurial thinking, thus आवश्यकता the necessary people skills to coach, mentor and motivate technical professionals.
Engineering पेशेवर joining manufacturing companies sometimes become engineering प्रबंधक by default after a काल of time.
वे are required to सीख how to manage once वे are on the job, though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the amount of expenses that must be paid आउट of pocket before an insurer will pay any expenses.
In general usage, the पद deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of अनेक types of clauses ( see below ) that हैं used by insurance कंपनियाँ as a threshold लिये policy payments.
Deductibles are typically प्रयुक्त to deter the विशाल number of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant पर्याप्त to incur विशाल लागत, the बीमे firm expects to pay out थोड़ा smaller amounts much less frequently, incurring much higher बचत.
As a result, insurance premiums हैं typically cheaper when वे involve higher deductibles.
Deductibles हैं normally provided as clauses in an बीमे policy कि dictate how much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
They are सामान्यतः quoted as a fixed quantity and is a part of सबसे policies covering नुकसान to the नीति holder.
the insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses कि exceed इस amount ( subject to the maximum योग claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may apply प्रति covered incident, or per year.
For policies where incidences हैं not easy to delimit ( लिये example health insurance ), the deductible is typically लागू per year.
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based on the कारण of the claim.
लिये example, a single housing insurance policy may contain अनेक deductible amounts लिये घाटा or damage arising from चोरी, fire, प्राकृतिक calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health insurance अर्जी.
An invoice or bill is a वाणिज्यिक दस्तावेज़ issued by a seller to a खरीदार, indicating the products, quantities, and agreed prices for products or services the seller रै provided the buyer.
an invoice indicates the बिक्री transaction only.
भुगतान शर्तें are independent of the चालान and हैं negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
Payment शर्तें हैं usually शामिल on the invoice.
The खरीदार could have already paid for the products or services सूचीबद्ध on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a अधिकतम number of दिनों in which to अदा for ये goods and is sometimes offered a छूट if paid पहले the due date.
in the rental उद्योग, an चालान जरूर include a विशिष्ट सन्दर्भ to the duration of the समय होने billed, so in addition to quantity, price and discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
generally each line of a rental invoice होगा refer to the वास्तविक hours, days, weeks, months, etc., being billed.
From the point of view of a seller, an invoice is a sales चालान.
From the point of दृश्य of a buyer, an invoice is a purchase चालान.
The document indicates the buyer and seller, but the term चालान indicates धन is owed or owing.
In English, the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the term चालान is usually used to clarify its meaning, ऐसे as `` We sent उन्हें an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ).
The सही प्रमुख bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, and more vertical in direction than the बाएँ.
it is परिचय 2.5 cm long, and enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra.
The azygos vein arches over it from behind ; and the सही pulmonary artery झूठ at पहला below and then in सामने of it.
About 2 cm इससे its शुरुआत it gives off a branch to the upper पालि of the सही lung.
इस is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus, because it arises above the right pulmonary artery.
The bronchus now passes नीचे the धमनी, और is known as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two शाखाओं लिये the मध्य and lower निर्मोक.
if a विदेशी देह in the airway गुजरता through the trachea, it will most likely enter the सही main bronchus बजाय of the बाएँ, due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the trachea.
स्क्वैश is a racquet खेल निभाई by दो ( singles ) or four खिलाड़ी ( doubles ) in a four-walled court with a small, hollow rubber ball.
The players must वैकल्पिक in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the बॉल onto the playable सतहों of the four walls of the अदालत.
The खेल was formerly called squash racquets, a सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared with the fatter ball प्रयुक्त in its parent game racquets or rackets ).
स्क्वैश is पहचाना by the IOC और supporters are lobbying for इसके incorporation in a भविष्य ओलम्पिक program.
In 2003, फोर्ब्स रेटेड squash as the क्रमांक one healthiest sport to खेल.
Residual आयल is oil मिला in low एकाग्रता naturally or in exhausted oil fields.
Often mixed साथ जल, it can not be recovered by conventional techniques.
However, it can be बरामद using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2 EOR ) जिससे involves injecting carbon dioxide into the खूब reducing श्यानता and enhancing flow of the oil.
The technique is not new लकिन has not महरूम used extensively on अवशेष आयल zones, low-grade deposits of petroleum such as the 38 square मील in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by elliott रूज़वेल्ट jr.
The technique is limited by availability of carbon डाइऑक्साइड.
it करता नहीं परिणाम in sequestration of the carbon डाइऑक्साइड but the गैस is recycled as much as possible.
संयुक्त States reserves of residual आयल are estimated to be 100 billion barrels.

The ग्रेट शिकागो Fire थी a conflagration that burned from Sunday, अक्तूबर 8, to early मंगलवार, अक्तूबर 10, 1871, killing hundreds and destroying परिचय in Chicago, Illinois.
Though the fire was एक of the largest u.S. आपदाओं of the 19th सदी, the rebuilding that began helped develop Chicago as one of the सबसे populous and economically important American cities.
Henry viii ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was किंग of England इससे 21 April 1509 until his death.
He was lord, and बाद king, of Ireland, as well as continuing the nominal claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the दूसरी monarch of the Tudor dynasty, succeeding उसके father, Henry VII.
besides उसके six विवाह, Henry viii is known लिये उसके भूमिका in the separation of the गिरिजाघर of England इससे the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड from papal प्राधिकार, the Dissolution of the Monasteries, and उसके own स्थापना as the Supreme Head of the गिरिजाघर of England.
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological शिक्षाओं, भी after his excommunication from the रोमन Catholic Church.
हेनरी oversaw the legal union of इंग्लैण्ड and वेल्स with the Laws in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new किंग allied with the पावन Roman Emperor, Maximillian I, and invaded France in 1513 साथ a large, well-equipped army, but achieved छोटी at a considerable financial लागत.
Maximillian, for उसके भाग, प्रयुक्त the English आक्रमण to उसके own ends, and this prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to defeat the फ्रेंच.
This foray would prove the start of an obsession लिये हेनरी, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, लकिन again the Holy रोमन सम्राट, Charles V, supported Henry only as long as he needed to और England, strained by the enormous cost of the युद्ध, ransomed the city वापस for peace.
His contemporaries माना Henry in उसके prime to be an attractive, educated और accomplished king, and he रै been described as `` एक of the most charismatic शासकों to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling साथ absolute शक्ति, he also सगाई himself as an author and composer.
उसके desire to provide England with a पुरूष heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be असमर्थ to consolidate the Tudor dynasty और the fragile सलाम that existed following the Wars of the गुलाब – led to the two बाते लिये which Henry is most remembered : his छह marriages and the अंग्रेज़ी Reformation.
हेनरी became रुग्ण obese और his health suffered, contributing to his मौत in 1547.
He is अक्सर characterised in उसके later life as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
La Reina डेल Sur ( the महारानी of the दक्षिण ) is a spanish-language telenovela produced by the United States टेलीविज़न network telemundo, in conjunction with the Antena 3 network and RTI Producciones.
Based on a novel of the वही name by Spanish author Arturo Pérez-Reverte, the नाटक depicts the वृद्धि of Teresa Mendoza ( Kate डेल Castillo ), a यंग woman from Mexico who becomes the सबसे powerful ड्रग trafficker in दक्षिणी स्पेन.
Patricio wills, the president of Telemundo टेलीविज़न Studios, थी the executive producer.
Though La Reina डेल Sur was मनोनीत for Novela of the Year, Favorite Lead Actress, and बेहतरीन ख़राब Luck Video, it won no awards.
साथ a $ 10 million बजट, La Reina डेल Sur was the most महंगी telenovela ever produced by Telemundo.
The कार्यक्रम 's premiere on February 28, 2011, थी the network 's उच्चतम rated प्रीमियर लिये a telenovela to date.
The कार्यक्रम frequently वर्चस्व its time स्लॉट, even over English language प्रोग्रामिंग on other major U.S. networks.
La reina del Sur completed its 63 एपीसोड run on Telemundo and इसके 13 एपीसोड run on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The फाइनल एपीसोड was the highest रेटेड broadcast in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 million viewers ), and ताल all of the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
the program 's success spurred telemundo to लॉन्च its first campaign to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination.
A one-night खास featuring several cast सदस्यों aired on May 31, 2011, and चिह्नित the telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality क्रिस्टीना saralegui.
la reina del Sur is broadcast in अनेक other बाज़ार, including सर्बिया, Colombia, Chile, Cyprus, निकारागुआ, कोस्टा Rica, Mexico, Albania, Hungary, स्लोवेनियाई, क्रोएशिया, Romania, ( among अन्य ).

A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide वेब.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased लिये उपयोग by clients, as well as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data बीच.
वेब hosts can also provide data बीच स्पेस and connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their आंकड़ा बीच, called colocation, also ज्ञात as Housing in लैटिन America or फ़्रांस.
the scope of web hosting services varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग, where files can be uploaded via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a Web interface.
the फाइलें are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
Many अंतरजाल service providers ( ISPs ) प्रस्ताव this service free to subscribers.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web पेज होस्टिंग from alternative service providers.
Personal web site होस्टिंग is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business वेब साईट hosting often रै a higher expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
सिंगल page होस्टिंग is generally sufficient for निजी वेब pages.
a complex site काल्स for a more व्यापक package that provides डेटाबेस support and application development platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on rails, ColdFusion, or asp.net ).
These सुविधाएं allow ग्राहक to write or install scripts लिये अनुप्रयोग like forums और content management.
Also, सुरक्षित sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically प्रयुक्त for e-commerce.
The मेजबान may also provide an इंटरफ़ेस or कंट्रोल panel लिये managing the Web सर्वर and installing scripts, as well as अन्य modules and service अनुप्रयोग जैसे e-mail.
कुछ hosts specialize in निश्चित software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network अवसंरचना.
Madden एनएफएल ( ज्ञात as John मैडेन Football before 1993 ) is an American football वीडियो खेल श्रेणी developed by Electronic कला tiburon लिये ea Sports.
The game series is named after Pro Football हॉल of famer जॉन Madden, a well-known पूर्व Super Bowl –winning कोच of the ओकलैंड Raiders and color commentator.
The series is the best selling EA खेल series.
the खेल have consistently been a best seller, और रै भी spawned TV shows where खिलाड़ी compete.
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics, and voice commentary कि allows players to सुन the game as if it were a real TV ब्रॉडकास्ट.
The Madden NFL श्रेणी रै been nicknamed the NFL 's 33rd मताधिकार.
The श्रेणी थी originally conceived by Electronic Arts founder ट्रिप Hawkins, who तब approached Madden in 1984 for उसके endorsement and expertise.
Due to मैडेन 's insistence that the game be as realistic as possible, the first version of John Madden फ़ुटबॉल was not released जबतक 1988.
The second version of the game थी released in 1990, साथ annual versions since then.
The series ' नाम was changed to Madden एनएफएल in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to उपयोग NFL teams and खिलाड़ी.
Despite मैडेन 's retirement as a प्रसारणकर्ता in 2009, he continues to lend उसके name and provide expertise for the game.
सिंडी Lee मिलर sheehan ( born July 10, 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist जिनकी son, U.S. Army विशेषज्ञ Casey Sheehan, was मारे by enemy कार्रवाई during the Iraq War.
वो attracted national and international media ध्यान in अगस्त 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside President George W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a स्टैंड कि drew both passionate support और angry criticism.
Sheehan ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008.
She is a vocal critic of President Barack Obama 's foreign policy.
Her memoir, Peace Mom : a Mother 's Journey through Heartache to Activism, was published in 2006.
sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम and Freedom पार्टी.

In law, a set-off is a statutory defense to the whole or to a portion of a plaintiff 's अर्जी.
It था no existence अंतर्गत the अंग्रेज़ी आम law, होने created by 2 Geo. II c. 22 for the राहत of insolvent debtors, although set-off थी recognized in equity.
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite अक्षर, and did नहीं लागू to मामले in which damages यहूद claimed, nor to निष्पक्ष claims or demands.
By the rules of the परम् Court ( O. xix. r. 3 ) a defendant in an कार्रवाई may नियत बंद or set up any right or claim by रास्ता of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the वही प्रभाव as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
